berita: JAKARTA, Spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Arrmanatha Nasir said he was investigating internally regarding the burning of reog at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. "Essentially, there has been an official statement (statement) from the Consulate General in Davao regarding the reog issue and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs also has an internal process to confirm it because the item is an asset of a state agency," said Arrmanatha Nasir in Jakarta, Sunday. On 20 October 2015, the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao issued an official statement that the destruction of Ponorogo reog by burning was carried out because its condition had been damaged and eaten by termites. However, the photos that circulated virally and have even been distributed by local online media Bitung News, show that there was a certain ritual before the burning. One of the photos also shows that before being burned, the Ponorogo reog was stored in a glass cabinet and appeared to be in good condition. Apart from the reog, in another photo, it appears that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao removed the dragon ornaments on the gamelan set and then also burned it. Related to this, Arrmanatha conveyed that the Ministry of Foreign Affairs would carry out inspections according to the processes in accordance with existing standards. " Periodically there are internal inspections , " he said . indonesian Domestic reactions related to the burning of Reog Ponorogo at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, were conveyed by the Jabodetabek Reog Community. The community sent an official letter to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines, asking for clarification on information on the burning of reog art instruments by Indonesian Consulate General officials. Secretary General of the Jabodetabek Reog Association, Agus Setiyoko, said that his party hoped that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao would not only provide a detailed explanation of the burning of reog, but also broadcast clarifications on the burning of reog art objects in a number of national media.
berita_id: Jakarta, juru bicara Kementerian Luar Negeri Arrmanatha Nasir mengatakan dia sedang menyelidiki secara internal mengenai pembakaran reog di Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina."Pada dasarnya, telah ada pernyataan resmi (pernyataan) dari konsulat jenderal di Davao mengenai masalah reog dan Kementerian Luar Negeri juga memiliki proses internal untuk mengkonfirmasinya karena barang tersebut merupakan aset dari agen negara," kata Arrmanatha Nasir di Jakarta, Minggu.Pada tanggal 20 Oktober 2015, konsulat umum Indonesia di Davao mengeluarkan pernyataan resmi bahwa penghancuran Ponorogo Reog dengan pembakaran dilakukan karena kondisinya telah rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Namun, foto -foto yang beredar secara viral dan bahkan telah didistribusikan oleh media online Bitung News, menunjukkan bahwa ada ritual tertentu sebelum pembakaran.Salah satu foto juga menunjukkan bahwa sebelum dibakar, Ponorogo Reog disimpan dalam lemari kaca dan tampak dalam kondisi baik.Terlepas dari reog, di foto lain, tampaknya konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao menghapus ornamen naga pada set gamelan dan kemudian juga membakarnya.Terkait dengan ini, Arrmanatha menyampaikan bahwa Kementerian Luar Negeri akan melakukan inspeksi sesuai dengan proses sesuai dengan standar yang ada."Secara berkala ada inspeksi internal," katanya.Reaksi domestik Indonesia yang terkait dengan pembakaran Reog Ponorogo di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, disampaikan oleh komunitas Reog Jabodetabek.Komunitas mengirim surat resmi kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina, meminta klarifikasi tentang informasi tentang pembakaran instrumen seni reog oleh pejabat umum konsulat Indonesia.Sekretaris Jenderal Asosiasi Reog Jabodetabek, Agus Setiyoko, mengatakan bahwa partainya berharap bahwa Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao tidak hanya akan memberikan penjelasan terperinci tentang pembakaran REOG, tetapi juga menyiarkan klarifikasi tentang pembakaran benda -benda seni reog di sejumlah media nasional.

berita: After the boom of the Pokemon Go game, several issues began to emerge among lovers of the mobile game. Starting from the many victims because of Pokemon Go, to the assumption that Pokemon Go is Jewish. Hearing this, Pokemon Go players started looking for information about the issue of Pokemon being Jewish. As one of the game's players, Usama Harbatah is also looking for information on this issue. In the following video, Usama Harbatah clarifies the issue which he considers slander. At first, Usama heard rumors that the name Pokemon is a combination of the word syriac which means I am a Jew. He searched for the meaning of the word Pokemon from Syriac to English, but couldn't find the meaning. In addition to the word pokemon, he also looked for the names of Pikachu, Charmander and others, but also found nothing. In addition, he also argues that pokemon games that are considered to steal personal data safety are just feelings. Because basically social media has stolen the personal data of all its users. In this video, Usama Harbatah also provides tips for safe playing Pokemon Go. Here's a video clarification of Usama Harbatah about the notion that Pokemon are Jews.
berita_id: Setelah permainan booming Pokemon Go, beberapa masalah mulai muncul di antara para pecinta game mobile.Mulai dari banyak korban karena Pokemon Go, dengan asumsi bahwa Pokemon Go adalah orang Yahudi.Mendengar ini, pemain Pokemon Go mulai mencari informasi tentang masalah Pokemon menjadi Yahudi.Sebagai salah satu pemain permainan, Usama Harbatah juga mencari informasi tentang masalah ini.Dalam video berikut, Usama Harbatah mengklarifikasi masalah yang ia anggap fitnah.Pada awalnya, Usama mendengar desas -desus bahwa nama Pokemon adalah kombinasi dari kata Syria yang berarti saya seorang Yahudi.Dia mencari arti kata Pokemon dari Syria ke Bahasa Inggris, tetapi tidak dapat menemukan artinya.Selain kata Pokemon, ia juga mencari nama Pikachu, Charmander dan lainnya, tetapi juga tidak menemukan apa pun.Selain itu, ia juga berpendapat bahwa game Pokemon yang dianggap mencuri keamanan data pribadi hanyalah perasaan.Karena pada dasarnya media sosial telah mencuri data pribadi semua penggunanya.Dalam video ini, Usama Harbatah juga menyediakan tips untuk bermain Pokemon GO yang aman.Berikut klarifikasi video Usama Harbatah tentang gagasan bahwa Pokemon adalah orang Yahudi.

berita: Did you know that stroke is a dangerous health problem which is the number 3 killer in the world? Therefore, it is very important to know tips to prevent stroke from an early age and to know first aid if someone has a stroke. This is because in addition to causing death, stroke can also cause disability. In general, stroke is a condition where part of the brain is damaged. This happens because the arteries that supply blood to the brain are blocked, leaking, damaged or torn. How to prevent stroke that you can apply in your daily life is to start living a healthy lifestyle. If you have a history of diabetes and high blood pressure, you should reduce your sugar and salt intake. So what should you do when you see someone having a stroke? There are so many people who don't know and are confused about what to do when they see other people experiencing stroke symptoms. Though first aid is needed in order to prevent things that are not desirable. Here is first aid for people who have had a stroke that you can do. Why is that? This is because it can allow the rupture of blood vessels in the brain. In this condition, you should help so that the sufferer does not fall back. Pierce the fingertips with a needle The second step is to pierce all the fingertips using feel a needle. We recommend using a syringe to be more sterile. However, if you don't have one, you can use other needles such as sewing needles and pins. To sterilize the needle, you should burn it first. Then stick the needle all over the fingertips. Make sure the blood comes out. If you can't, you can press the fingers. In this way, the patient will be conscious in a period of about 10 minutes. Pull and pierce the ear with a needle The next aid is by pulling both ears and pricking them with a needle. This is done when the patient's mouth and face look less normal. The trick, pull the patient's ears until they look red. after that, pierce the lower ends of both ears and do this 2 times. In a few minutes the patient will return to normal and conscious. Seek medical help After the patient's condition begins to recover, seek medical help immediately. Take the patient to the nearest clinic or hospital for further action. So that's some first aid for people who have had a stroke that you can do.
berita_id: Tahukah Anda bahwa stroke adalah masalah kesehatan yang berbahaya yang merupakan pembunuh nomor 3 di dunia?Oleh karena itu, sangat penting untuk mengetahui tips untuk mencegah stroke sejak usia dini dan mengetahui pertolongan pertama jika seseorang mengalami stroke.Ini karena selain menyebabkan kematian, stroke juga dapat menyebabkan kecacatan.Secara umum, stroke adalah suatu kondisi di mana bagian otak rusak.Ini terjadi karena arteri yang memasok darah ke otak diblokir, bocor, rusak atau robek.Cara mencegah stroke yang dapat Anda terapkan dalam kehidupan sehari -hari adalah mulai menjalani gaya hidup sehat.Jika Anda memiliki riwayat diabetes dan tekanan darah tinggi, Anda harus mengurangi asupan gula dan garam.Jadi apa yang harus Anda lakukan ketika Anda melihat seseorang mengalami stroke?Ada begitu banyak orang yang tidak tahu dan bingung tentang apa yang harus dilakukan ketika mereka melihat orang lain mengalami gejala stroke.Meskipun pertolongan pertama diperlukan untuk mencegah hal -hal yang tidak diinginkan.Ini pertolongan pertama untuk orang -orang yang mengalami stroke yang dapat Anda lakukan.Kenapa begitu?Ini karena dapat memungkinkan pecahnya pembuluh darah di otak.Dalam kondisi ini, Anda harus membantu sehingga penderita tidak mundur.Menusuk ujung jari dengan jarum langkah kedua adalah menusuk semua ujung jari menggunakan Feel a Needle.Kami merekomendasikan menggunakan jarum suntik untuk menjadi lebih steril.Namun, jika Anda tidak memilikinya, Anda dapat menggunakan jarum lain seperti menjahit jarum dan pin.Untuk mensterilkan jarum, Anda harus membakarnya terlebih dahulu.Kemudian tempelkan jarum di seluruh ujung jari.Pastikan darah keluar.Jika Anda tidak bisa, Anda dapat menekan jari.Dengan cara ini, pasien akan sadar dalam jangka waktu sekitar 10 menit.Tarik dan tusuk telinga dengan jarum bantuan berikutnya adalah dengan menarik kedua telinga dan menusuknya dengan jarum.Ini dilakukan ketika mulut dan wajah pasien terlihat kurang normal.Triknya, tarik telinga pasien sampai terlihat merah.Setelah itu, menembus ujung bawah kedua telinga dan lakukan ini 2 kali.Dalam beberapa menit pasien akan kembali normal dan sadar.Carilah bantuan medis setelah kondisi pasien mulai pulih, segera cari bantuan medis.Bawa pasien ke klinik atau rumah sakit terdekat untuk tindakan lebih lanjut.Jadi itu adalah pertolongan pertama untuk orang -orang yang memiliki stroke yang bisa Anda lakukan.

berita: Terrorist inmates at the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters (Mako) branch of the Salemba Detention Center, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, rioted Friday (10/11/2017) afternoon at around 17.00 WITA. This resulted in a number of damages. However, the situation at the site is now conducive. This statement was conveyed by Karo Penmas of the Public Relations Division of the Indonesian National Police Brigadier General Rikwanto in his statement as quoted by detikcom, Friday. He explained that when a prisoner rioted, the authorities immediately took action to control the situation. “Members of the picket from Sat III Pioneer took action by firing warning shots upwards. At this time the atmosphere can be calmed down by the Densus picket. After that, members are on standby while waiting for developments," he said. According to Rikwanto, the trigger was that there were prisoners who did not accept being examined and provoked a commotion. It was explained that after Friday prayers, the prisoners were put into their respective cells and searched by the Densus 88 team. The result was that four readiness cellphones were found. "Four cellphones were found, belonging to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, and Jumali," he said. One of the detainees did not accept it and then provoked him. "It is true that with the inspection activities, one of the detainees did not accept it and provoked the officers with various words. Then there are members who are provoked by their words. Then there are prisoners who takbir loudly so that they provoke prisoners from the block next to them,” he explained. As a result, riots ensued. A number of facilities in the detention center were damaged by the inmates. "The prison cell door was broken into, the gate of the block hallway, the window panes (in block C and block B)," said Rikwanto. Meanwhile, the Head of the Public Relations Division of the Police Public Relations Division, Kombes Martinus Sitompul, also straightened out a wild issue on social media that said the riot was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by the officers. He said it was a hoax. “It is not true that there was a throwing of the Koran by the guard, there were the officers conducting an examination of the books and objects in the cell. Currently the conditions of the detention house are conducive and the residents of the detention center are calm,” he said. The head of the Mobile Brigade Corps, Inspector General Murad Ismail, said the same thing. He emphasized that it was not true that there were throwing of Korans and the burning of prison facilities as rumored. "Hoax," he said when asked for confirmation.
berita_id: Narapidana teroris di Cabang Markas Markas Markas Mobile Brigade (Mako) dari Pusat Penahanan Salemba, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, Kerusuhan Jumat (10/11/2017) Sore sekitar pukul 17.00 Wita.Ini mengakibatkan sejumlah kerusakan.Namun, situasi di lokasi sekarang kondusif.Pernyataan ini disampaikan oleh Karo Penmas dari Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat dari Brigadir Jenderal Polisi Nasional Indonesia Rikwanto dalam pernyataannya sebagaimana dikutip oleh Detikcom, Jumat.Dia menjelaskan bahwa ketika seorang tahanan kerusuhan, pihak berwenang segera mengambil tindakan untuk mengendalikan situasi."Anggota piket dari SAT III Pioneer mengambil tindakan dengan menembakkan tembakan peringatan ke atas. Pada saat ini atmosfer dapat ditenangkan oleh piket Densus. Setelah itu, anggota siaga sambil menunggu perkembangan," katanya.Menurut Rikwanto, pemicunya adalah bahwa ada tahanan yang tidak menerima diperiksa dan memicu keributan.Dijelaskan bahwa setelah doa Jumat, para tahanan dimasukkan ke dalam sel masing -masing dan dicari oleh tim Densus 88.Hasilnya adalah bahwa empat ponsel kesiapan ditemukan."Empat ponsel ditemukan, milik Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, dan Jumali," katanya.Salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan kemudian memprovokasi dia."Memang benar bahwa dengan kegiatan inspeksi, salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan memprovokasi petugas dengan berbagai kata. Lalu ada anggota yang diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka. Lalu ada tahanan yang Takbir dengan keras sehingga mereka memancing tahanan dari blok di sebelah mereka," jelasnya.Akibatnya, kerusuhan terjadi.Sejumlah fasilitas di pusat penahanan rusak oleh para tahanan."Pintu sel penjara dipecah, gerbang lorong blok, panel jendela (di blok C dan blok B)," kata Rikwanto.Sementara itu, kepala Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat dari Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Polisi, Kombes Martinus Sitompul, juga meluruskan masalah liar di media sosial yang mengatakan kerusuhan itu dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh petugas.Dia bilang itu tipuan."Tidak benar bahwa ada lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga, ada petugas yang melakukan pemeriksaan buku dan benda di dalam sel. Saat ini kondisi rumah penahanan kondusif dan penduduk pusat penahanan tenang," katanya.Kepala Korps Brigade Mobile, Inspektur Jenderal Murad Ismail, mengatakan hal yang sama.Dia menekankan bahwa itu tidak benar bahwa ada lemparan koran dan pembakaran fasilitas penjara seperti yang dikabarkan."Berbagai suara," katanya ketika diminta untuk konfirmasi.

berita: Is it true that Facebook will be closed on April 24, 2018?. This is the explanation of the Ministry of Communication and Information – In the last few days, a number of netizens in the country have been disturbed by a number of information stating that the government through the Ministry of Communication and Information will block or close the Facebook social network on April 24. Not a few of Facebook users who feel confused by this confusing information. They also wonder, is it true that Facebook will be closed in Indonesia or is it just hoax information?. Responding to the public's confusion, the Minister of Communication and Information of the Republic of Indonesia, Rudiantara, as reported by Liputan6 said, "We will see this situation first. If it gets worse, then we will temporarily close (block)". But firmly, Rudiantara explained that the Ministry of Communication and Information would not block or permanently close Facebook. In the case involving Facebook regarding the misuse of data by Cambrige Analityca, the government, in this case the Ministry of Communication and Information and the DPR, is conducting an investigation and asking for an official explanation from Facebook regarding the incident. Meutya Hafid, Member of Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives in his explanation regarding the discourse on closing Facebook said "We and the government - the Ministry of Communication and Information - will talk again regarding the follow-up to Facebook's mistakes. Personally, I'm still open to sanctions, it's also possible to suggest a Facebook service moratorium.” The politician from the Golkar Party hopes that the Ministry of Communication and Information can be more strict with Facebook. He explained that the decision on whether the discourse on closing access to Facebook services would actually be carried out still had to wait for the results of an internal investigation from Facebook for the next month. "We are waiting, I think a month should be enough time. We hope that the results of this investigation will not only blame who, but also there must be information, where this misused data went and what it was used for,” explained the DPR member who is also a former journalist. So, what is the cause of the widespread probe discourse of closing Facebook services? The confusion about the news that Facebook services will be closed in Indonesia on April 24th stems from the discovery of the fact that some of Facebook's user data has been misused for political purposes in the United States presidential election by the Cambrige Analityca Survey Institute. In the data release, it turns out that not only Facebook users in the USA are victims of data abuse, but Indonesia as a country with the most Facebook users in the world is also known to have become victims of data tapping by third-party applications connected to Facebook. More than one million Facebook users in the country are known to be part of a total of tens of millions of Facebook users who are known to have been harvested by third parties and used for their benefit. Although it is not known for certain what the Facebook user data in Indonesia is used for, but it has triggered government concerns in this case the Ministry of Communication and Information. Therefore, the information circulating about whether Facebook will be closed on April 24 is invalid information aka HOAX. Because so far the government through the Ministry of Communication and Information has not officially stated the exact date when the discourse on closing Facebook will actually take place.
berita_id: Benarkah Facebook akan ditutup pada 24 April 2018?.Ini adalah penjelasan dari Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi - dalam beberapa hari terakhir, sejumlah netizen di negara ini telah terganggu oleh sejumlah informasi yang menyatakan bahwa pemerintah melalui Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi akan memblokir atau menutup jejaring sosial Facebook pada 24 April. Tidak sedikit pengguna Facebook yang merasa bingung dengan informasi yang membingungkan ini.Mereka juga bertanya -tanya, benarkah Facebook akan ditutup di Indonesia atau hanya informasi tipuan?.Menanggapi kebingungan publik, Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi Republik Indonesia, Rudiantara, seperti yang dilaporkan oleh LiPUTAN6 mengatakan, "Kita akan melihat situasi ini terlebih dahulu. Jika semakin buruk, maka kita akan sementara waktu akan menutup (blok)".Namun dengan tegas, Rudiantara menjelaskan bahwa Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi tidak akan memblokir atau secara permanen menutup Facebook.Dalam kasus yang melibatkan Facebook mengenai penyalahgunaan data oleh Cambrige Analityca, pemerintah, dalam hal ini Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi dan DPR, sedang melakukan penyelidikan dan meminta penjelasan resmi dari Facebook tentang insiden tersebut.Meutya Hafid, anggota Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia dalam penjelasannya mengenai wacana tentang penutupan Facebook mengatakan "kami dan pemerintah - Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi - akan berbicara lagi mengenai tindak lanjut kesalahan Facebook. Secara pribadi, saya masih terbuka untuk sanksi, itu juga mungkin untuk menyarankan moratorium layanan Facebook."Politisi dari partai Golkar berharap bahwa Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi dapat lebih ketat dengan Facebook.Dia menjelaskan bahwa keputusan tentang apakah wacana tentang akses penutupan ke layanan Facebook sebenarnya akan dilakukan masih harus menunggu hasil penyelidikan internal dari Facebook untuk bulan berikutnya."Kami sedang menunggu, saya pikir sebulan harus cukup waktu. Kami berharap hasil penyelidikan ini tidak hanya akan menyalahkan siapa, tetapi juga harus ada informasi, di mana data yang disalahgunakan ini pergi dan untuk apa itu digunakan," jelas anggota DPR yang juga mantan jurnalis.Jadi, apa penyebab wacana penyelidikan luas untuk menutup layanan Facebook?Kebingungan tentang berita bahwa layanan Facebook akan ditutup di Indonesia pada 24 April berasal dari penemuan fakta bahwa beberapa data pengguna Facebook telah disalahgunakan untuk tujuan politik dalam pemilihan presiden Amerika Serikat oleh Cambrige Anality Survey Institute.Dalam rilis data, ternyata tidak hanya pengguna Facebook di AS adalah korban penyalahgunaan data, tetapi Indonesia sebagai negara dengan pengguna Facebook terbanyak di dunia juga diketahui telah menjadi korban pengetikan data oleh aplikasi pihak ketiga yang terhubung ke Facebook.Lebih dari satu juta pengguna Facebook di negara ini diketahui sebagai bagian dari total puluhan juta pengguna Facebook yang diketahui telah dipanen oleh pihak ketiga dan digunakan untuk keuntungan mereka.Meskipun tidak diketahui pasti untuk apa data pengguna Facebook di Indonesia, tetapi telah memicu kekhawatiran pemerintah dalam hal ini Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi.Oleh karena itu, informasi yang beredar tentang apakah Facebook akan ditutup pada 24 April adalah informasi yang tidak valid alias tipuan.Karena sejauh ini pemerintah melalui Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi belum secara resmi menyatakan tanggal pasti ketika wacana tentang penutupan Facebook akan benar -benar terjadi.

berita: The Head of the Legal, Communication and Public Information Bureau of the Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (KemenPAN-RB) Herman Suryatman stated that information about the president's salary, which was valued at Rp. 553 million, was not valid. This information cannot be used as a basis because it is sourced from last year's discussion material. "That's an invalid simulation number. Material for the coordination meeting of the Draft PP on Salaries and Benefits that was held last year. Precisely February 2017," said Herman, in Jakarta. Saturday (10/3). He explained that the explanation contained a simulation of the amount of income for civil servants and state officials (not just the president). “The data declared in the presentation is a discussion material that still requires further study. It not only contains a simulation of the income of State Officials, but also a simulation of the income of civil servants. Please don't be misunderstood." Furthermore, Herman said, if there is data or information circulating related to the field of utilization of the state apparatus and reform, it is expected to confirm it first with him. "Please confirm with us so that the problem is clear. Especially now in the era of public information disclosure, we are obliged to provide good information services,” concluded Herman.
berita_id: Kepala Biro Informasi Hukum, Komunikasi dan Publik dari Kementerian Reformasi Administratif dan Reformasi Birokrasi (Kemenpan-RB) Herman Suryatman menyatakan bahwa informasi tentang gaji presiden, yang dihargai Rp.553 juta, tidak valid.Informasi ini tidak dapat digunakan sebagai dasar karena bersumber dari materi diskusi tahun lalu."Itu adalah nomor simulasi yang tidak valid. Bahan untuk pertemuan koordinasi draft PP tentang gaji dan tunjangan yang diadakan tahun lalu. Justru Februari 2017," kata Herman, di Jakarta.Sabtu (10/3).Dia menjelaskan bahwa penjelasan itu berisi simulasi jumlah pendapatan untuk pegawai negeri dan pejabat negara (bukan hanya presiden)."Data yang dinyatakan dalam presentasi adalah bahan diskusi yang masih membutuhkan studi lebih lanjut. Ini tidak hanya berisi simulasi pendapatan pejabat negara, tetapi juga simulasi pendapatan pegawai negeri. Tolong jangan disalahpahami."Selain itu, Herman mengatakan, jika ada data atau informasi yang beredar terkait dengan bidang pemanfaatan peralatan dan reformasi negara, diharapkan untuk mengkonfirmasi terlebih dahulu dengannya."Harap konfirmasi dengan kami sehingga masalahnya jelas. Terutama sekarang di era pengungkapan informasi publik, kami berkewajiban untuk memberikan layanan informasi yang baik," simpul Herman.

berita: The government is currently discussing the Draft Government Regulation (RPP) on Salaries for State Civil Apparatus (ASN) or Civil Servants (PNS). In the RPP, it is stated that the new civil servant salary system is based on an income index. With the income index set out in the RPP, it is assumed that the income of the President of the Republic of Indonesia can reach Rp. 553 million. Then, is it natural for President Jokowi to have such an income? Public Service Observer from the University of Indonesia, Lina Miftahul Jannah, said that the current president's salary of only Rp. 62 million is considered too small. Moreover, the President's responsibility is enormous. According to Lina, it is only natural that the salaries of the President and Vice President are proposed to increase. "It's just that in the midst of the current conditions that civil servants have not increased their salaries since 2015, is that reasonable? If it is proposed to increase, I agree, only the amount if Rp 500 million is too drastic, it seems," said Lina fix to Liputan6.com
berita_id: Pemerintah saat ini sedang membahas rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) tentang gaji untuk peralatan sipil negara (ASN) atau pegawai negeri (PNS).Dalam RPP, dinyatakan bahwa sistem gaji pegawai negeri baru didasarkan pada indeks pendapatan.Dengan indeks pendapatan yang ditetapkan dalam RPP, diasumsikan bahwa pendapatan Presiden Republik Indonesia dapat mencapai RP.553 juta.Lalu, apakah wajar bagi Presiden Jokowi untuk memiliki pendapatan seperti itu?Pengamat Layanan Publik dari Universitas Indonesia, Lina Miftahul Jannah, mengatakan bahwa gaji Presiden saat ini hanya RP.62 juta dianggap terlalu kecil.Selain itu, tanggung jawab presiden sangat besar.Menurut Lina, wajar saja bahwa gaji presiden dan wakil presiden diusulkan untuk meningkat."Hanya saja di tengah -tengah kondisi saat ini bahwa pegawai negeri tidak menaikkan gaji mereka sejak 2015, apakah itu masuk akal? Jika diusulkan untuk meningkat, saya setuju, hanya jumlah jika Rp 500 juta terlalu drastis, tampaknya," kata Lina Fix ke LIPUTAN6.com

berita: Toothbrush is the most important bath tool to remove dirt around the teeth so that dental health is maintained. However, using a toothbrush should not be careless, especially in choosing the toothbrush you use. And when you want to buy a toothbrush, you should pay attention to the code behind the packaging, don't let your toothbrush be made of pig bristles. Currently, a number of people are shocked by a toothbrush product that uses pig bristles. The use of the product refers to the writing in English, namely bristles on the packaging. There is one secret code which means your toothbrush is made of boar bristles. The Or** * brand toothbrush is clearly made of bristles. The product packaging clearly explains the product, "Super thin Bristles". Responding to this case, the Chairman of the Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta said, if it is true that the toothbrush is made of pig bristles, the toothbrush is haram. "In Al Surah Al Maidah verse 3, it is explained that derivatives from pigs are haram. We will investigate this prohibition, whether it is really from sea urchins or not," said Muhammad Hatta. However, the Medan City Health Service through the Secretary of the North Sumatra Health Office, Afwan Lubis, is not sure about the existence of a toothbrush made of pig bristles. He added that laboratory tests were carried out if there were reports from the public metropolis regarding the boar bristle toothbrush. If it really contains sea urchins, then it should not be circulated because there are elements that are not halal. "I don't think it's possible. But what about it? We can comment if there is a laboratory test first. Currently there is no laboratory test," Afwan said, as reported by Tribunnews.com
berita_id: Sikat gigi adalah alat mandi paling penting untuk menghilangkan kotoran di sekitar gigi sehingga kesehatan gigi dipertahankan.Namun, menggunakan sikat gigi tidak boleh ceroboh, terutama dalam memilih sikat gigi yang Anda gunakan.Dan ketika Anda ingin membeli sikat gigi, Anda harus memperhatikan kode di balik kemasannya, jangan biarkan sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari bulu babi.Saat ini, sejumlah orang terkejut oleh produk sikat gigi yang menggunakan bulu babi.Penggunaan produk mengacu pada penulisan dalam bahasa Inggris, yaitu meremehkan kemasan.Ada satu kode rahasia yang berarti sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari bulu babi.Sikat gigi merek atau *** jelas terbuat dari bulu.Kemasan produk dengan jelas menjelaskan produk, "bulu super tipis".Menanggapi kasus ini, ketua Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta berkata, jika benar bahwa sikat gigi terbuat dari bulu babi, sikat gigi adalah haram."Dalam Al Surah Al Maidah ayat 3, dijelaskan bahwa turunan dari babi adalah Haram. Kami akan menyelidiki larangan ini, apakah itu benar -benar dari bulu babi atau tidak," kata Muhammad Hatta.Namun, Layanan Kesehatan Kota Medan melalui Sekretaris Kantor Kesehatan Sumatra Utara, Afwan Lubis, tidak yakin tentang keberadaan sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Dia menambahkan bahwa tes laboratorium dilakukan jika ada laporan dari kota kecil tentang sikat gigi bulu babi.Jika benar -benar mengandung bulu babi, maka itu tidak boleh diedarkan karena ada elemen yang tidak halal."Saya tidak berpikir itu mungkin. Tapi bagaimana dengan itu? Kita bisa berkomentar jika ada tes laboratorium terlebih dahulu. Saat ini tidak ada tes laboratorium," kata Afwan, seperti dilaporkan oleh tribunnews.com

berita: When one family member has a stroke, usually other family members take the initiative to provide first aid. For example, by pricking the tips of the patient's fingers with a needle to check whether he is numb or not. Then, make an impromptu family meeting to discuss the stroke patient to be taken to which hospital and which doctor. The initiative, said Prof. Dr. Dr. Mohammad Hasan Machfoed, Sp.S(K), MS is not important! This was revealed in the Grand Kalbe Academia talk show with the theme Indonesian Neurologist Forum in Jakarta, Saturday (4/2) yesterday. Mohammad Hasan said that as soon as one of the family members had a stroke, they should immediately be taken to a specialist. Don't think too much, hold a family meeting, call an elder sibling, blah-blah-blah. That makes things even worse. Stoke could not be helped by his own family members. You see, when someone has a stroke, the brain suddenly lacks oxygen and within 10 minutes can damage the entire brain. After those 10 minutes, he experienced a panombra area that is between life and death. At that time, we have to give proper help and only a specialist can do it. Giving wrong help can result in necrosis or cell death in all body tissues, said Mohammad Hassan to tabloidbintang.com. Stroke strikes at an unexpected time. It brings progressive change. Very fast. The very rapid changes, said Mohammad Hassan, are caused by the brain being suddenly deprived of oxygen. Due to lack of oxygen, the brain swells. If not treated quickly, the swelling causes the patient to die. The process to death will be very fast if he falls or experiences blockages in the airways. Importantly, family members must be careful to detect strange symptoms early on. For example, waking up talking sluggish. Or suddenly experience paralysis of one side. Or his mental state changes, forgets easily, told Mohammad Hassan. Another thing that should be considered by the family is at what time the patient had a stroke. For example, at 6 am. You must move quickly (take him to the doctor) in less than four hours after 6 am. Mohammad Hassan emphasized that four hours after the stroke occurred was the most crucial time. He must get the right help and fast. If you are in Jakarta, you family unit can take the patient to Cipto Mangunkusumo Hospital, for example. There, it allows patients to undergo thrombolysis (the process of destroying blood clots-red) which allows stroke survivors to recover. The condition is that you have to get help in less than four hours, he continued. Mohammad Hassan assessed that Indonesian people's awareness of the dangers of stroke has improved. However, it must continue to be improved considering that stroke is still the deadliest disease in this country. Therefore, the Chairperson of the Indonesian Neurologist Association welcomed the 2017 Grand Kalbe Academia. Director of PT Kalbe Farma Michael Buyung Nugroho added, the Indonesian Neurologist Forum talked about Neurological Disorder. Neurological disorders can lead to disability and even death. We want to contribute more in building competence for both senior and junior neurology doctors to better understand neurological disorders. Considering this disease has an impact on decreasing patient productivity and the quality of life of the patient's family.
berita_id: Ketika satu anggota keluarga mengalami stroke, biasanya anggota keluarga lainnya mengambil inisiatif untuk memberikan pertolongan pertama.Misalnya, dengan menusuk ujung jari pasien dengan jarum untuk memeriksa apakah dia mati rasa atau tidak.Kemudian, buat pertemuan keluarga dadakan untuk membahas pasien stroke untuk dibawa ke rumah sakit mana dan dokter mana.Inisiatif ini, kata Prof. Dr. Dr. Mohammad Hasan Machfoed, SP.S (K), MS tidak penting!Ini terungkap di acara bincang -bincang akademisi Grand Kalbe dengan tema Forum Neurologis Indonesia di Jakarta, Sabtu (4/2) kemarin.Mohammad Hasan mengatakan bahwa segera setelah salah satu anggota keluarga mengalami stroke, mereka harus segera dibawa ke spesialis.Jangan terlalu banyak berpikir, mengadakan pertemuan keluarga, panggil saudara penatua, bla-bla-bla.Itu membuat segalanya menjadi lebih buruk.Stoke tidak dapat dibantu oleh anggota keluarganya sendiri.Anda tahu, ketika seseorang mengalami stroke, otak tiba -tiba kekurangan oksigen dan dalam 10 menit dapat merusak seluruh otak.Setelah 10 menit itu, ia mengalami area Panombra yang berada di antara hidup dan mati.Pada saat itu, kami harus memberikan bantuan yang tepat dan hanya seorang spesialis yang dapat melakukannya.Memberikan bantuan yang salah dapat mengakibatkan nekrosis atau kematian sel di semua jaringan tubuh, kata Mohammad Hassan ke tabloidbintang.com.Stroke menyerang pada waktu yang tidak terduga.Ini membawa perubahan progresif.Sangat cepat.Perubahan yang sangat cepat, kata Mohammad Hassan, disebabkan oleh otak yang tiba -tiba kehilangan oksigen.Karena kurangnya oksigen, otak membengkak.Jika tidak dirawat dengan cepat, pembengkakan menyebabkan pasien mati.Proses sampai mati akan sangat cepat jika dia jatuh atau mengalami penyumbatan di saluran udara.Yang penting, anggota keluarga harus berhati -hati untuk mendeteksi gejala aneh sejak dini.Misalnya, bangun berbicara lamban.Atau tiba -tiba mengalami kelumpuhan di satu sisi.Atau perubahan keadaan mentalnya, lupa dengan mudah, memberi tahu Mohammad Hassan.Hal lain yang harus dipertimbangkan oleh keluarga adalah pada jam berapa pasien mengalami stroke.Misalnya, jam 6 pagi.Anda harus bergerak cepat (bawa dia ke dokter) dalam waktu kurang dari empat jam setelah jam 6 pagi.Mohammad Hassan menekankan bahwa empat jam setelah stroke terjadi adalah waktu yang paling penting.Dia harus mendapatkan bantuan dan cepat.Jika Anda berada di Jakarta, unit keluarga Anda dapat membawa pasien ke rumah sakit Cipto Mangunkusumo, misalnya.Di sana, memungkinkan pasien untuk menjalani trombolisis (proses menghancurkan gumpalan darah-merah) yang memungkinkan penderita stroke untuk pulih.Kondisinya adalah Anda harus mendapatkan bantuan dalam waktu kurang dari empat jam, lanjutnya.Mohammad Hassan menilai bahwa kesadaran rakyat Indonesia tentang bahaya stroke telah membaik.Namun, itu harus terus ditingkatkan mengingat stroke masih merupakan penyakit paling mematikan di negara ini.Oleh karena itu, ketua Asosiasi Saraf Indonesia menyambut Grand Kalbe Academia 2017.Direktur PT Kalbe Farmha Michael Buyung Nugroho menambahkan, Forum Neurologis Indonesia berbicara tentang gangguan neurologis.Gangguan neurologis dapat menyebabkan kecacatan dan bahkan kematian.Kami ingin berkontribusi lebih banyak dalam membangun kompetensi bagi dokter neurologi senior dan junior untuk lebih memahami gangguan neurologis.Mempertimbangkan penyakit ini berdampak pada penurunan produktivitas pasien dan kualitas hidup keluarga pasien.

berita: Bahtsul Masail Kubro throughout Java and Madura which was held at Ponpes Langitan on 13-14 March 2014 decided several laws regarding the use of the Eterna China Bristles brand brush which has been widely circulated in various shops. The reason is, the brush is produced from pig hair. Kadinkes Kab. Tuban in January 2014 sent a sample of the brand brush to the Indonesian Ulema Council Drug and Food Control Testing Institute (LPPOM MUI) East Java province. The result is positive that the brush with the brand ETERNA CHINA BRISTLES is made of animal hair with characteristics when burned with a stinging shoulder (Javanese: sangit). It's different if the brush is made of nylon or other synthetic materials. Then the shoulder will not sting and the brush will curl (Javanese: mengkeret). China Bristles means the same as Hog Bristles which means domesticated pigs. This product can be seen from the brush handle that reads Bristles, Pure Bristles, 100% China Bristles and so on. Budhi Baskhara, a Tuban chemist and practitioner, said, “Boar bristles are the cheapest to use brushes than others. The cost of producing a brush is much more profitable than synthetic bristles. It remains only to collect, clean and cut. Especially if the brush is produced in China, where the stock of pork skin is abundant.” The man who graduated from Ahmad Yani University Bandung majoring in chemistry said that synthetic fur which usually uses nylon, a type of polymer, is much more expensive to produce because the raw material for carbon is not cheap. In addition to nylon brushes, toothbrushes and makeup brushes are also used. In Yahoo Answers it is stated that the white and black bristles of the Pig are widely used in bread brushes, wall paint, cosmetics and so on. According to one employee at the District Court (PN) of Tuban Regency, Bahyu Agung Kurniawan, that it is necessary to be careful because not all of these sea urchins have Bristles inscribed. (Source: Radar Bojonegoro 21 & 24 January 2014 edition & Jawa Pos dated 21 January 2014 p. 13). Then, what about the law on wall paint or wood that has been polished on the walls of houses, mosques, bathrooms which are painted using a pig's bristle brush? In this case there is an error (difference of opinion) between the opinion of Imam Shafi'i who says the law is unclean, while according to Imam Malik and Ibn Qosim the law is holy. This unclean law is if it is already Tahaqqunnajasah (the brush with the brand above is really from sea urchins), if it is not tahaqquq then use the original law, which is holy. According to the Syafi'iyah, the paint is still unclean even though the brush has already been used to paint the mosque. The paint cannot be cleaned because it has become sharp (it becomes solid). And if what is already painted is a mosque, then for those who know it is obligatory to remove it immediately (paint.red). Isti'malun Najasah (use of unclean items) in this case is Haram except for people who do not know. Then, what is the solution for wholesalers who already buy take in large quantities and bakeries that have made bread in large quantities? The sale and purchase contract of the wholesalers is fasid (damaged) because the goods being sold are subject to unclean laws. The solution is to follow the opinion of Imam Malik who says that the hair of Dogs and Pigs is sacred. As for if you follow Imam Shafi'i, then the wholesalers are obliged to return the brushes to the producers and the producers are obliged to return the wholesalers' money because the transaction contract is damaged. However, the bahtsul masa'il decision is still not one hundred percent final because it still requires a re-enactment process from the mushohih regarding the collection of ta'bir-ta'bir.
berita_id: Bahtsul Masail Kubro di seluruh Jawa dan Madura yang diadakan di Ponpes Langitan pada 13-14 Maret 2014 memutuskan beberapa undang-undang mengenai penggunaan kuas merek Eterna China Bristles yang telah diedarkan secara luas di berbagai toko.Alasannya adalah, kuas dihasilkan dari rambut babi.Kadinkes Kab.Tuban pada Januari 2014 mengirim sampel sikat merek ke Indonesia Ulema Council Obat dan Institut Pengujian Makanan (LPPOM MUI) Provinsi Jawa Timur.Hasilnya adalah positif bahwa kuas dengan merek Eterna China Bristles terbuat dari rambut hewan dengan karakteristik ketika dibakar dengan bahu yang menyengat (Jawa: Sangit).Berbeda jika kuas terbuat dari nilon atau bahan sintetis lainnya.Maka bahu tidak akan menyengat dan sikat akan melengkung (Jawa: Mengkeret).China Bristles berarti sama dengan bulu babi yang berarti babi peliharaan.Produk ini dapat dilihat dari pegangan sikat yang membaca bulu, bulu murni, 100% bulu Cina dan sebagainya.Budhi Baskhara, seorang ahli kimia dan praktisi Tuban, mengatakan, “Bulu babi adalah yang termurah untuk menggunakan kuas daripada yang lain. Biaya memproduksi kuas jauh lebih menguntungkan daripada bulu sintetis. Itu tetap hanya untuk mengumpulkan, membersihkan dan memotong. Terutama jika kuas diproduksi di Cina, di mana stok kulit babi lebih banyak."Pria yang lulus dari Ahmad Yani University Bandaring jurusan kimia mengatakan bahwa bulu sintetis yang biasanya menggunakan nilon, sejenis polimer, jauh lebih mahal untuk diproduksi karena bahan baku untuk karbon tidak murah.Selain sikat nilon, sikat gigi dan sikat makeup juga digunakan.Dalam Jawaban Yahoo dinyatakan bahwa bulu babi putih dan hitam banyak digunakan dalam sikat roti, cat dinding, kosmetik dan sebagainya.Menurut seorang karyawan di Pengadilan Distrik (PN) Kabupaten Tuban, Bahyu Agung Kurniawan, bahwa perlu untuk berhati -hati karena tidak semua bulu babi laut ini tertulis.(Sumber: Radar Bojonegoro 21 & 24 Januari 2014 Edisi & Jawa POS tertanggal 21 Januari 2014 hal. 13).Lalu, bagaimana dengan hukum cat dinding atau kayu yang telah dipoles di dinding rumah, masjid, kamar mandi yang dicat menggunakan sikat bulu babi?Dalam hal ini ada kesalahan (perbedaan pendapat) antara pendapat Imam Shafi'i yang mengatakan hukum itu najis, sementara menurut Imam Malik dan Ibn Qosim Hukum itu suci.Hukum najis ini adalah jika sudah Tahaqqunnajasah (sikat dengan merek di atas benar -benar dari landak laut), jika bukan tahaqquq maka gunakan hukum asli, yang suci.Menurut Syafi'iyah, catnya masih najis meskipun kuas telah digunakan untuk mengecat masjid.Cat tidak dapat dibersihkan karena telah menjadi tajam (menjadi padat).Dan jika apa yang sudah dicat adalah masjid, maka bagi mereka yang tahu itu wajib untuk segera menghapusnya (cat.red).ISti'malun Najasah (penggunaan item najis) dalam hal ini adalah haram kecuali untuk orang yang tidak tahu.Lalu, apa solusi untuk pedagang grosir yang sudah membeli mengambil dalam jumlah besar dan toko roti yang telah membuat roti dalam jumlah besar?Kontrak penjualan dan pembelian pedagang grosir adalah FASID (rusak) karena barang yang dijual tunduk pada undang -undang najis.Solusinya adalah mengikuti pendapat Imam Malik yang mengatakan bahwa rambut anjing dan babi itu sakral.Adapun jika Anda mengikuti Imam Shafi'i, maka pedagang grosir wajib mengembalikan kuas kepada produsen dan produsen berkewajiban mengembalikan uang pedagang grosir karena kontrak transaksi rusak.Namun, keputusan Bahtsul Masa'il masih belum seratus persen final karena masih membutuhkan proses peragaan kembali dari mushohih mengenai pengumpulan ta'bir-ta'bir.

berita: Facebook is again a byword in the world, including in Indonesia. In fact, Facebook is threatened with closure by the Indonesian government. The cause, especially if not an indication of the leakage of customer personal data to a third company, Cambridge Analytica. This leak is also very large. To date, there have been 87 million personal data leaked. The data that Facebook collects is even up to short messages (SMS) and cell phone records of Facebook account owners. In Indonesia, the Facebook data leak has also been in the spotlight of the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology. The Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara, said that Facebook could be threatened with administrative and criminal sanctions if it is proven to have violated the law. ministry Minister Rudiantara firmly emphasized that his party would not hesitate to close the social media Facebook. There are two serious violations committed by Facebook. First, about the data leak of 1 million account owners from Indonesia. Second, Mark Zuckerberg's social media is suspected of being one of the social media platforms for spreading hoax news and propaganda. As quoted from The Guardian, Facebook admits that its media is used as an anti-Rohing propaganda tool in Myanmar. "I take a position, I threaten to close Facebook and the government has no doubts if it has to close Facebook if it is used for hacking," said Minister Rudiantara. Don't Just Take Action Regarding the two alleged big mistakes by Facebook, the Ministry of Communication and Information will not just take action. The ministry will investigate together with the relevant agencies. The government's actions will have to be based on the right reasons. "I'm coordinating with the police. If I take legal action in cyberspace. Later, if it is processed, there will be a process at the police," said Rudiantara. Rudiantara added that regarding data leakage, Facebook could be subject to corporal sanctions of up to 12 years and a fine of up to Rp12 billion. The reprimand against Facebook is not the first time. In November 2016, the Directorate General of Taxes said that Facebook's tax debt in Indonesia reached IDR 3 trillion. Facebook was also reprimanded by the Ministry of Communication and Information about content that must comply with regulations in Indonesia. “All social media must be willing to participate in maintaining the stability of the country if they want to do business in Indonesia. If it destabilizes Indonesia, the government will act decisively," said the Minister of Communication and Informatics.
berita_id: Facebook sekali lagi menjadi kata bibir di dunia, termasuk di Indonesia.Bahkan, Facebook terancam penutupan oleh pemerintah Indonesia.Penyebabnya, terutama jika bukan indikasi kebocoran data pribadi pelanggan kepada perusahaan ketiga, Cambridge Analytica.Kebocoran ini juga sangat besar.Sampai saat ini, ada 87 juta data pribadi bocor.Data yang dikumpulkan Facebook bahkan hingga pesan pendek (SMS) dan catatan ponsel pemilik akun Facebook.Di Indonesia, kebocoran data Facebook juga menjadi sorotan dari Kementerian Komunikasi dan Teknologi Informasi.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara, mengatakan bahwa Facebook dapat diancam dengan sanksi administrasi dan pidana jika terbukti telah melanggar hukum.Menteri Kementerian Rudiantara dengan tegas menekankan bahwa partainya tidak akan ragu untuk menutup media sosial Facebook.Ada dua pelanggaran serius yang dilakukan oleh Facebook.Pertama, tentang kebocoran data 1 juta pemilik akun dari Indonesia.Kedua, media sosial Mark Zuckerberg dicurigai sebagai salah satu platform media sosial untuk menyebarkan berita dan propaganda tipuan.Seperti dikutip dari The Guardian, Facebook mengakui bahwa medianya digunakan sebagai alat propaganda anti-rok di Myanmar."Saya mengambil posisi, saya mengancam untuk menutup Facebook dan pemerintah tidak memiliki keraguan jika harus menutup Facebook jika digunakan untuk peretasan," kata Menteri Rudiantara.Jangan hanya mengambil tindakan mengenai dua dugaan kesalahan besar oleh Facebook, Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi tidak akan hanya mengambil tindakan.Kementerian akan menyelidiki bersama dengan lembaga yang relevan.Tindakan pemerintah harus didasarkan pada alasan yang tepat."Saya berkoordinasi dengan polisi. Jika saya mengambil tindakan hukum di dunia maya. Kemudian, jika diproses, akan ada proses di polisi," kata Rudiiantara.Rudiantara menambahkan bahwa mengenai kebocoran data, Facebook dapat dikenakan sanksi fisik hingga 12 tahun dan denda hingga Rp12 miliar.Reprimand terhadap Facebook bukan pertama kalinya.Pada November 2016, Direktorat Jenderal Pajak mengatakan bahwa utang pajak Facebook di Indonesia mencapai IDR 3 triliun.Facebook juga ditegur oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan informasi tentang konten yang harus mematuhi peraturan di Indonesia.“Semua media sosial harus bersedia untuk berpartisipasi dalam menjaga stabilitas negara jika mereka ingin melakukan bisnis di Indonesia. Jika itu mengacaukan Indonesia, pemerintah akan bertindak dengan tegas,” kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika.

berita: Alam Islam - Help straighten it out, after HOAX code E as a product with all pork, this is a HOAX explanation that all bristles are also pork, hopefully it can reduce the anxiety of the BRISTLE community. general in nature. In Arabic, isim nakirah. The meaning of the word bristle is a fine/thin strand (filament) and firm/strong, according to the following dictionaries: The bristle written on the toothbrush, solely means bristles, NOT sea urchins. Now the word bristle which is general in nature (isim nakirah) only has a more special meaning when compared to other words, for example: pure bristle or 100% bristle or natural bristle: meaning fur made from pure animal hair or plant fiber. Can be from horses or other animals. Bristle from plant fibers is also available, namely SIWAK wood. The bristles or bristle of Tang dynasty (619 - 907) toothbrushes were indeed made of pig bristles, but modern toothbrushes made since 1938 are made of NYLON. The history can be seen here: Until now, there are STILL 10% of toothbrushes made of sea urchins circulating throughout the WORLD (so NOT 10% in Indonesia as Jeng wrote, whose status talk over I photographed). For hygiene reasons, modern toothbrush manufacturers and consumers prefer nylon toothbrushes. It seems that the joy of welcoming the toothbrush bristle information occurred due to a misunderstanding when reading articles on the LPPOK MUI website. Articles that discuss BRUSH FOR COOKING, are considered the same as the bristles on a toothbrush. this article : this is the misunderstood part : The handle of a boar bristle brush is often written with the words : Bristle, Pure Bristle, 100% China Bristle, etc. One of the meanings of the word Bristle is Pig Hair or sea urchins (Webster's Dictionary) which are unclean when wet. Therefore, bread that is touched by an unclean brush becomes unclean, so it is forbidden to eat it. A substitute for a boar bristle brush is a brush made of plastic (polyester). Brush companies Ken Master and Selery also produce brushes from this halal material. The word ONE in the article is not understood properly where one also means NOT ALL the meanings of the word bristle are sea urchins, including the bristles of modern NYLON toothbrushes. AND some people don't even bother to double-check if it's true that the word bristle ONLY means sea urchin. Qadar Allah this error is so massive that even one of the sites belonging to one of the asatidz interprets it incorrectly. So I hope that the manager of the LPPOM MUI site (maybe someone can contact Mr. Nanung to correct the article) will correct the article by providing a more detailed description of the meaning of the word bristle so that there are no mistakes like what we see in the picture. below this.
berita_id: Alam Islam - Membantu meluruskannya, setelah kode tipuan E sebagai produk dengan semua daging babi, ini adalah penjelasan tipuan bahwa semua bulu juga babi, semoga dapat mengurangi kecemasan komunitas bulu.umum di alam.Dalam bahasa Arab, Isim Nakirah.Arti kata bulu adalah untai halus/tipis (filamen) dan tegas/kuat, menurut kamus berikut: bulu yang ditulis pada sikat gigi, semata -mata berarti bulu, bukan landak laut.Sekarang kata bulu yang bersifat umum (isim nakirah) hanya memiliki makna yang lebih khusus jika dibandingkan dengan kata lain, misalnya: bulu murni atau bulu 100% atau bulu alami: artinya bulu yang dibuat dari rambut hewan murni atau serat tanaman.Bisa dari kuda atau hewan lain.Bulu dari serat tanaman juga tersedia, yaitu kayu Siwak.Bulu sikat gigi Dinasti Tang (619 - 907) memang terbuat dari bulu babi, tetapi sikat gigi modern yang dibuat sejak 1938 terbuat dari nilon.Sejarah dapat dilihat di sini: Sampai sekarang, masih ada 10% sikat gigi yang terbuat dari landak laut yang beredar di seluruh dunia (jadi tidak 10% di Indonesia seperti yang ditulis Jeng, yang statusnya berbicara tentang memotret saya).Untuk alasan kebersihan, produsen sikat gigi modern dan konsumen lebih suka sikat gigi nilon.Tampaknya kegembiraan menyambut informasi bulu gigi terjadi karena kesalahpahaman ketika membaca artikel di situs web LPPOK MUI.Artikel yang membahas kuas untuk memasak, dianggap sama dengan bulu pada sikat gigi.Artikel ini: Ini adalah bagian yang disalahpahami: pegangan sikat bulu babi sering ditulis dengan kata -kata: bulu, bulu murni, 100% china bristle, dll. Salah satu makna kata bulu adalah rambut babi atau landak laut (Kamus Webster) yang tidak bersih ketika basah.Oleh karena itu, roti yang disentuh oleh sikat najis menjadi najis, jadi dilarang memakannya.Pengganti untuk sikat bulu babi adalah kuas yang terbuat dari plastik (poliester).Perusahaan kuas Ken Master dan Selery juga menghasilkan kuas dari bahan halal ini.Kata satu dalam artikel ini tidak dipahami dengan baik di mana orang juga berarti tidak semua makna kata bulu adalah landak laut, termasuk bulu sikat gigi nilon modern.Dan beberapa orang bahkan tidak repot-repot memeriksa ulang jika benar bahwa kata Bristle hanya berarti landak laut.Qadar Allah Kesalahan ini sangat besar sehingga bahkan salah satu situs milik salah satu Asatidz menafsirkannya secara tidak benar.Jadi saya berharap manajer situs LPPOM MUI (mungkin seseorang dapat menghubungi Tn. Nanung untuk memperbaiki artikel) akan memperbaiki artikel dengan memberikan deskripsi yang lebih rinci tentang arti kata bulu sehingga tidak ada kesalahan seperti apa yang kita lihat dalam gambar.dibawah ini.

berita: Needlestick First Aid For Stroke Sufferers? Suspicious We often hear a chain message spread about First Aid for stroke survivors is to pierce needles at several points from the fingertips to the ear. Some websites from the internet say that this news is a mere hoax. Why? Because a stroke is caused by the rupture of a blood vessel in the brain. The blood that comes out can actually suppress the surrounding brain tissue so that its function is disrupted. A medical expert dr. Devika Y, on the aladokter.com website said that finger pricking with a needle in stroke sufferers is of no benefit. Puncture with a needle can actually pose a risk of infection if the needle used is not sterile. The first aid we need to do if someone has a stroke is to take the patient to a safe place content Position the person in a state of the body facing the left side Immediately contact the nearest hospital and ask for an ambulance to come to the location Or you can take the person directly to the hospital. The sooner a stroke is treated, the better the results. Subsequent treatment will be carried out by the medical team at the hospital. So, if someone has a stroke near us, don't hesitate to immediately take him to the nearest hospital so that he can be handled by an expert.
berita_id: Perlu pertolongan pertama yang perlu untuk penderita stroke?Mencurigakan kita sering mendengar pesan rantai menyebar tentang pertolongan pertama untuk penyintas stroke adalah untuk menembus jarum di beberapa titik dari ujung jari ke telinga.Beberapa situs web dari internet mengatakan bahwa berita ini hanyalah tipuan.Mengapa?Karena stroke disebabkan oleh pecahnya pembuluh darah di otak.Darah yang keluar sebenarnya dapat menekan jaringan otak di sekitarnya sehingga fungsinya terganggu.Seorang ahli medis DR.Devika Y, di situs web Aladokter.com mengatakan bahwa jari tusukan dengan jarum pada penderita stroke tidak bermanfaat.Tusukan dengan jarum sebenarnya dapat menimbulkan risiko infeksi jika jarum yang digunakan tidak steril.Pertolongan pertama yang perlu kita lakukan jika seseorang mengalami stroke adalah membawa pasien ke posisi konten tempat yang aman, orang dalam keadaan tubuh yang menghadap ke sisi kiri segera menghubungi rumah sakit terdekat dan meminta ambulans untuk datang ke lokasi atau Anda dapat membawa orang tersebut langsung ke rumah sakit.Semakin cepat stroke diobati, semakin baik hasilnya.Perawatan selanjutnya akan dilakukan oleh tim medis di rumah sakit.Jadi, jika seseorang memiliki stroke di dekat kami, jangan ragu untuk segera membawanya ke rumah sakit terdekat sehingga ia dapat ditangani oleh seorang ahli.

berita: "It is not true that there was a throwing of the Koran by the guard, what was there were the officers checking the books and objects in the cell," said Martinus Sitompul. tirto.id - Police Headquarters denied that there was an act of throwing the Koran by the prison picket officer in a riot at the Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba Branch, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, Friday (11/10/2017). "It is not true that there was a throwing of the Koran by the guard officers, there were officers conducting an examination of the books and objects that were in the cell," said Head of the Public Information Section of the National Police Headquarters Kombes Pol Martinus Sitompul in a written statement received by reporters, Friday. 10/11/2017). Martinus emphasized that the clash took place at the Salemba branch of the Mako Brimob Rutan in Kelapa Dua, Depok. The riot occurred at 16.00 WIB. This riot occurred as a reaction to the actions taken by the prison guard officers who confiscated cellphones belonging to prisoners in block C. "As a result of the turmoil, the prisoners from blocks B and C damaged the door of the cell room until it could no longer be used," said Martinus. Martinus did not deny the news that the prison conditions were chaotic. However, at this time, the situation of the Mako Brimob Kelapa Dua detention center has improved. The Head of the Public Information Bureau of the National Police Headquarters Brigadier General Pol Rikwanto also explained the chronology of the riots at the Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba Branch, Friday (11/10/2017). "On Friday, November 10, 2017 at 16.00 WIB, there was a commotion at the Mako Korbrimob terrorist detention center Salemba branch carried out by terrorist prisoners," said Rikwanto in a written statement received by Tirto, Friday (11/10/2017). The riot started after Friday prayers, after the detainees entered the cell, the Densus picket team removed the keys in rooms A 5 and C 5 (RB) because there was a lock from the inside, for security and to make it easier for the picket officers to open the cell door. During picket, the Densus team conducted a search and found 4 cellphones belonging pol to inmates Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, and Jumali. Unfortunately, the inspection did not go smoothly. One of the detainees did not accept the search. The prisoner tried to lure the officers in various ways. "Then there are members who are provoked by their words, and there are prisoners who while takbir loudly so that they provoke prisoners from the block next to them," said Rikwanto. After that, the picket members from the Pioneer III unit took action by shooting upwards as a sign of a commotion and giving warnings to the inmates. As a result of the riot, a number of prison facilities were damaged, such as the door of the prison cell being broken down, the gate of the hallway block, and the window panes in block C and block B. At present, the situation of the detainees has been successfully controlled by Densus 88. Members continue to be on standby while monitoring developments in the field. "However, the detainees still have takbir-takbir, which triggers others," said Rikwanto.
berita_id: "Tidak benar bahwa ada lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga, apa yang ada petugas yang memeriksa buku -buku dan benda -benda di dalam sel," kata Martinus Sitompul.TIRTO.ID - Markas besar polisi membantah bahwa ada tindakan melempar Alquran oleh petugas piket penjara dalam kerusuhan di cabang Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, Jumat (11/10/2017)."Tidak benar bahwa ada lemparan Alquran oleh petugas penjaga, ada petugas yang melakukan pemeriksaan buku dan benda -benda yang ada di dalam sel," kata kepala bagian informasi publik dari kantor pusat kepolisian nasional Kombes Pol Martinus Sitompul dalam sebuah pernyataan tertulis yang diterima oleh wartawan, Jumat.10/11/2017).Martinus menekankan bahwa bentrokan itu terjadi di cabang Salemba dari Mako Brimob Rutan di Kelapa Dua, Depok.Kerusuhan terjadi pada 16.00 WIB.Kerusuhan ini terjadi sebagai reaksi terhadap tindakan yang diambil oleh petugas penjaga penjara yang menyita ponsel milik tahanan di blok C. "Sebagai akibat dari kekacauan, para tahanan dari blok B dan C merusak pintu ruang sel sampai tidak bisa lagi digunakan," kata Martinus.Martinus tidak menyangkal berita bahwa kondisi penjara itu kacau.Namun, pada saat ini, situasi Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob Kelapa Dua telah membaik.Kepala Biro Informasi Publik Kepolisian Nasional Brigadir Jenderal Pol Rikwanto juga menjelaskan kronologi kerusuhan di cabang Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba, Jumat (11/10/2017)."Pada hari Jumat, 10 November 2017 pukul 16.00 WIB, ada keributan di Pusat Penahanan Teroris Mako Korbrimob Cabang Salemba yang dilakukan oleh para tahanan teroris," kata Rikwanto dalam sebuah pernyataan tertulis yang diterima oleh Tirto, Jumat (11/10/2017).Kerusuhan dimulai setelah doa Jumat, setelah tahanan memasuki sel, tim piket Densus melepas kunci -kunci di kamar 5 dan C 5 (RB) karena ada kunci dari dalam, untuk keamanan dan untuk memudahkan petugas piket membuka pintu sel.Selama piket, tim Densus melakukan pencarian dan menemukan 4 ponsel milik Pol untuk narapidana Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, dan Jumali.Sayangnya, inspeksi tidak berjalan lancar.Salah satu tahanan tidak menerima pencarian.Tahanan itu mencoba memikat para petugas dengan berbagai cara."Lalu ada anggota yang diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka, dan ada tahanan yang sementara Takbir dengan keras sehingga mereka memancing tahanan dari blok di sebelah mereka," kata Rikwanto.Setelah itu, anggota piket dari unit Pioneer III mengambil tindakan dengan menembak ke atas sebagai tanda keributan dan memberikan peringatan kepada para tahanan.Sebagai akibat dari kerusuhan, sejumlah fasilitas penjara rusak, seperti pintu sel penjara yang dipecah, gerbang blok lorong, dan panel jendela di Blok C dan Blok B. Saat ini, situasi para tahanan telah berhasil dikendalikan oleh Densus 88. Anggota terus menjadi siaga sambil memantau perkembangan di lapangan."Namun, para tahanan masih memiliki Takbir-Takbir, yang memicu orang lain," kata Rikwanto.

berita: Parents need to be vigilant. Drug trafficking begins to target children. The modus operandi used by the perpetrators was to mix drugs in pacifiers. The Trade Office is tracking shops, traditional markets and schools to make sure Mataram is free from the candy pacifier. The head of the Mataram City Trade Office, L. Alwan Basri, said this issue must be seen and examined first in the field. Because, this concerns the general public, especially children who need to be protected. The drug mafia mode is considered very dangerous for the younger generation. He asked the Supervision Division of the Trade Office to follow up by tracing the points of shopping centers, markets, kiosks and school canteens. "I will order the supervisory department and the head of the market to check later," said Alwan, Wednesday, March 8 2017. The investigation will involve the Center for Drug and Food Control, Satpol PP and police officers. If the goods are found circulating in the city of Mataram. It will immediately withdraw and secure for laboratory tests. "If it is found, we will immediately confiscate it and withdraw it," he said. The indications do not end there. Police officers will be asked to trace the source. Retailers and merchants will be scrutinized to find out the marketing chain. The government does not want illegal drugs to penetrate students. The former Head of Public Relations and Protocol of the Mataram City Secretariat emphasized that if necessary, the perpetrators were punished according to the applicable legal provisions. "There must be a link. This is what we will find out," he said. Not only pacifiers, but other products that contain harmful substances are routinely monitored. The Mayor and Deputy Mayor of Mataram continue to urge the public to avoid hazardous materials. Especially for parents to provide their children with food cooked at home. "Don't shop outside, let alone unclear hygiene," traffic he ordered.
berita_id: Orang tua harus waspada.Perdagangan narkoba mulai menargetkan anak -anak.Modus operandi yang digunakan oleh para pelaku adalah untuk mencampur obat pada dot.Kantor perdagangan melacak toko, pasar tradisional dan sekolah untuk memastikan Mataram bebas dari dot permen.Kepala Kantor Perdagangan Kota Mataram, L. Alwan Basri, mengatakan masalah ini harus dilihat dan diperiksa terlebih dahulu di lapangan.Karena, ini menyangkut masyarakat umum, terutama anak -anak yang perlu dilindungi.Mode mafia obat dianggap sangat berbahaya bagi generasi muda.Dia meminta divisi pengawasan kantor perdagangan untuk menindaklanjuti dengan menelusuri titik -titik pusat perbelanjaan, pasar, kios dan kantin sekolah."Saya akan memesan departemen pengawas dan kepala pasar untuk memeriksa nanti," kata Alwan, Rabu, 8 Maret 2017. Investigasi akan melibatkan Pusat Pengendalian Obat dan Makanan, Satpol PP dan petugas polisi.Jika barang ditemukan beredar di kota Mataram.Ini akan segera menarik dan mengamankan untuk tes laboratorium."Jika ditemukan, kami akan segera menyitanya dan menariknya," katanya.Indikasinya tidak berakhir di sana.Petugas polisi akan diminta untuk melacak sumbernya.Pengecer dan pedagang akan diteliti untuk mengetahui rantai pemasaran.Pemerintah tidak ingin obat -obatan terlarang menembus siswa.Mantan kepala hubungan masyarakat dan protokol Sekretariat Kota Mataram menekankan bahwa jika perlu, para pelaku dihukum sesuai dengan ketentuan hukum yang berlaku."Pasti ada tautan. Inilah yang akan kita ketahui," katanya.Tidak hanya dot, tetapi produk lain yang mengandung zat berbahaya dipantau secara rutin.Walikota dan wakil walikota Mataram terus mendesak masyarakat untuk menghindari bahan berbahaya.Terutama bagi orang tua untuk memberi anak -anak mereka makanan yang dimasak di rumah."Jangan berbelanja di luar, apalagi kebersihan yang tidak jelas," lalu lintasnya memesan.

berita: The candy packed with pacifiers was unexpected, it turned out that the cute and attractive candy was a very dangerous snack. he received information from the national police chief this afternoon, that the candy pacifier contained a drug-type powder. It had been tested in the laboratory for several samples and there were results that said it contained drugs. because it was suspected, when we eat the candy it makes us down sleepy. Not only is it suspected that there are drugs in it. There is an article that states that there is a dangerous formaldehyde that can cause cancer when consumed. Indeed, not all of these sweets contain formalin, even drugs! We never know which one which is healthy and which is not. You should be aware of your sons and daughters so as not to buy snacks carelessly, warn your friends not to consume pacifier-shaped candy. the !
berita_id: Permen yang dikemas dengan dot tidak terduga, ternyata permen yang lucu dan menarik itu adalah camilan yang sangat berbahaya.Dia menerima informasi dari kepala polisi nasional sore ini, bahwa dot permen berisi bubuk tipe narkoba.Itu telah diuji di laboratorium untuk beberapa sampel dan ada hasil yang mengatakan itu berisi obat -obatan.Karena dicurigai, ketika kita makan permen itu membuat kita mengantuk.Tidak hanya dicurigai ada obat -obatan di dalamnya.Ada sebuah artikel yang menyatakan bahwa ada formaldehida berbahaya yang dapat menyebabkan kanker saat dikonsumsi.Memang, tidak semua permen ini mengandung formalin, bahkan obat -obatan!Kami tidak pernah tahu mana yang sehat dan mana yang tidak.Anda harus menyadari putra dan putri Anda agar tidak membeli makanan ringan dengan ceroboh, memperingatkan teman-teman Anda untuk tidak mengonsumsi permen berbentuk dat.The!

berita: Terrorist inmates at the Mako Brimob Detention Center Salemba Branch, Central Jakarta, rioted in their cells on Friday (11/10/2017). A number of videos and photos of the riots went viral on social media. A number of accounts that spread the video on social media said petition the riots occurred because officers threw the Koran. However, the Head of the Public Information Section (Kabagpenum) of the National Police, Comr. Martinus Sitompul, emphasized that the throwing of the Koran by the prison guard was not true or a hoax. Martinus explained that what happened was that the guard checked a number of books and objects in the detention cell. The riot that occurred on Friday afternoon was triggered by the terrorist prisoners, who did not accept the search. "The turmoil that occurred was a reaction to the actions taken by guard officers who confiscated cell phones belonging to Block C detainees," he said. During the search, four cell phones belonging to four terrorist convicts were found, namely Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam and Jumali. A number of angry Block B and Block C inmates then broke the cell door. Not only that, a number of facilities at the Salemba detention center were also damaged, including the gates of Block B and Block C hallways and their windows. Head of the Public Information Bureau (Karopenmas) Brigadier General Rikwanto said the riot started after Friday prayers in congregation. After the prayer, the prisoners were put into their respective cells. After entering the cell, the picket officer who is a member of Densus 88 removed the keys in Rooms A5 and C5. "The key was removed because there was a key slot from the inside, for security and to make it easier for the picket officers to open the cell door," said Rikwanto. At that time, a search was also carried out in the two detention rooms, and four cell phones belonging to four terrorist prisoners were found. "During the search, one of the detainees did not accept it and provoked the officers with various words," he said. Then, one of the picket officers was provoked by the words of the inmate and fired a bullet up to warn other officers of a commotion. Rikwanto, the riot did not last long because it was quickly resolved.
berita_id: Narapidana teroris di Cabang Penahanan Mako Brimob Salemba, Jakarta Tengah, kerusuhan di sel -sel mereka pada hari Jumat (11/10/2017).Sejumlah video dan foto kerusuhan menjadi viral di media sosial.Sejumlah akun yang menyebarkan video di media sosial mengatakan petisi bahwa kerusuhan terjadi karena petugas melemparkan Alquran.Namun, Kepala Bagian Informasi Publik (Kabagpenum) dari Polisi Nasional, Comr.Martinus Sitompul, menekankan bahwa lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga penjara itu tidak benar atau tipuan.Martinus menjelaskan bahwa apa yang terjadi adalah bahwa penjaga memeriksa sejumlah buku dan objek di sel penahanan.Kerusuhan yang terjadi pada Jumat sore dipicu oleh para tahanan teroris, yang tidak menerima pencarian."Gejolak yang terjadi adalah reaksi terhadap tindakan yang diambil oleh petugas penjaga yang menyita telepon seluler milik tahanan blok C," katanya.Selama pencarian, empat ponsel milik empat narapidana teroris ditemukan, yaitu Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam dan Jumali.Sejumlah narapidana Blok B dan Blok C kemudian memecahkan pintu sel.Tidak hanya itu, sejumlah fasilitas di Salemba Detention Center juga rusak, termasuk gerbang blok B dan lorong blok C dan jendela mereka.Kepala Brigadir Jenderal Biro Informasi Publik (Karopenmas) Rikwanto mengatakan kerusuhan dimulai setelah doa Jumat di jemaat.Setelah doa, para tahanan dimasukkan ke dalam sel masing -masing.Setelah memasuki sel, petugas piket yang merupakan anggota Densus 88 menghapus kunci di kamar A5 dan C5."Kuncinya dihapus karena ada slot kunci dari dalam, untuk keamanan dan memudahkan petugas piket untuk membuka pintu sel," kata Rikwanto.Pada waktu itu, pencarian juga dilakukan di dua ruang penahanan, dan empat ponsel termasuk empat tahanan teroris ditemukan."Selama pencarian, salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan memprovokasi petugas dengan berbagai kata," katanya.Kemudian, salah satu petugas piket diprovokasi oleh kata -kata narapidana dan menembakkan peluru untuk memperingatkan perwira keributan lainnya.Rikwanto, kerusuhan tidak bertahan lama karena dengan cepat diselesaikan.

berita: The Pokemon Go game is currently endemic, craze and increasingly popular with netizens throughout Indonesia and the world. A question was asked to our editor, "Is playing Pokemon Go Game according to Islam, halal or haram?" As an introduction, Pokemon Go is an augmented-reality-based game developed by the Pokemon Company in collaboration with Niantic and Nintendo. How to play, someone uses a smartphone, both Android and iOS to hunt Pokemon monsters. With Android or iOS smartphone devices, users can hunt Pokemon monsters in the real world, for example in rivers, mountains, streets, offices, markets, supermarkets, lakes, and other places. So, Pokemon monsters seem to exist and hide in the real world that can be seen through your cellphone screen. Users are also busy hunting Pokemon monsters around them. In fact, some of them deliberately venture here and there to places where there are Pokemon monsters, such as Pikachu, Bulbasaur, Charmander, Squirtle, and so on. game pokemon go according to islam Suddenly, many children, teenagers and adults are addicted to the Pokemon Go game and are pacing around, busy playing hunting monsters. In fact, there are journalists on the sidelines of their coverage, hunting Pokemon monsters before waiting for sources. Pokemon Go game according to Islam To answer this question, the editor of Islamcendekia.com held a study and limited discussion. From the results of this study, we state that the Pokemon Go game can be legal/permissible or illegal/prohibited. Here's the explanation. Sunni scholars agree that the main sources of Islamic law are the Qur'an and the Sunnah (Hadith of the Prophet). Meanwhile, the sources of law that are still being debated by scholars include ijma, qiyas, ijtihad, istihsan, urf, maslahah mursalah, and so on. Pokemon Go game is clearly not regulated in the Quran and Hadith. That way, we use the maslahah mursalah basis in answering the question of whether the game is haram or halal. From the aspect of its application, it is clear that the law was initially allowed. However, when the game appears harmful, has a bad impact on someone, then the law becomes haram or not allowed. In this context, for example, forgetting the obligation to pray because they are busy hunting Pokemon monsters or being lazy to work, decreased work productivity, children are reluctant to study, and so on. Because, being too busy playing the Pokemon Go Game, which wastes time, even interferes with the concentration of learning and children's development, is part of the devil. So, it is not wrong when an Ulema Council in Egypt forbids the game. As quoted from the Mirror, Deputy Head of Al Azhar Egypt, Abbas Shuman likened the Pokemon Go game to alcohol which is prohibited in Islam. Because, monster hunting activities are considered like drunk people on the streets. People become on the streets with their eyes glued to their cellphone screens looking for locations where imaginary Pokemon monsters are. They are masses also busy capturing something imaginary or imaginary. In fact, some people even neglect work to find imaginary monsters in the world of cellphone screens. Meanwhile, he left work to earn a living that could support him. Or for example, students, students, or college students, suddenly turn on their smartphones, then hunt monsters and forget their study assignments. If the condition is so severe, then the law in Islam is haram. The analysis carried out by the Deputy Head of Al Azhar Egypt, Abbas Shuman, is quite good. That is, Abbas uses the qiyas method in analyzing a problem. The game Pokemon Go is likened to alcohol which is forbidden in Islam. This is called qiyas, which is establishing the law of a new case that has not been regulated in the Qur'an or hadith, but there are similarities in terms of causes, benefits, dangers, and various other aspects. When mixed with alcohol, with the same effect when drinking intoxicating alcohol, it can be concluded that the Pokemon Go game is haram. It's different when the existence of the Pokemon Go game actually makes people happy and happy, still doesn't leave praying, working and studying as usual, then free time is used to play Pokemon with the intention and purpose of refreshing. So in this case it is permissible or halal. That is, if the existence of the Pokemon Go game, which is currently being flooded with many fans, turns out to be beneficial and good for the mind-health, because there are games that are refreshing and fun, then in the name of benefit, this game is halal. Or, the existence of Pokemon Go will provide skills, skills, and has the benefit of sharpening the right brain, so the law is okay. Thus, this conclusion can be drawn.
