This is because a sample of the Eterna branded brush that reads "China Bristles" to LPPOM MUI East Java is positive for sea urchins. Characteristic, when burned his shoulder stings. For skirmish that, we should be wary of the toothbrush we use whether it contains China Bristles (sea urchins) or not. According to Imam Syafii, if a brush made of sea urchin is used to paint a mosque, the paint will also become unclean and must be removed. Then, what if it is used as a toothbrush to brush our teeth? Beware
berita_id: Di Bahtsul Masail Kubro pada tahun 2014 di Langitan Islamic Boarding School, ditekankan bahwa menurut Imam Syafi'i, kuas yang terbuat dari landak laut adalah najis.Masalahnya, bulu babi memiliki banyak istilah, salah satunya adalah China Bulu."Bulu babi adalah yang termurah untuk menggunakan bahan sikat daripada yang lain. Biaya memproduksi kuas jauh lebih menguntungkan daripada bulu sintetis. Yang harus Anda lakukan adalah mengumpulkan, bersih, dan dipotong. Terutama jika kuas diproduksi di Cina, di mana stok kulit babi berlimpah," kata Budhi Baskhara., Pakar dan praktisi kimia Tuban, seperti dikutip oleh Langitan Magazine.Selain digunakan sebagai bahan sikat, bulu babi juga dapat digunakan sebagai sikat gigi dan sikat make-up.Inilah yang seharusnya dimiliki oleh umat Islam.Ini karena sampel sikat bermerek Eterna yang bertuliskan "China Bristles" kepada LPPOM MUI Java Timur adalah positif untuk landak laut.Karakteristik, saat membakar sengatan bahunya.Untuk pertempuran itu, kita harus waspada terhadap sikat gigi yang kita gunakan apakah itu mengandung bulu Cina (landak laut) atau tidak.Menurut Imam Syafii, jika kuas yang terbuat dari landak laut digunakan untuk melukis masjid, cat juga akan menjadi najis dan harus dihilangkan.Lalu, bagaimana jika digunakan sebagai sikat gigi untuk menyikat gigi?Awas

berita: JAKARTA – After its release, Pokemon Go received a lot of response from people. However, this Pokemon Go mobile game raises the suspicion of many parties. The reason is, since 2001, Pokemon games and cartoons, which were banned by a number of scholars in the Middle East, have appeared again. According to them, the characters on Pokemon are un-Islamic and feature Zionist symbols. Some time ago, several Muslim clerics, among them Sheikh Yousef Qaradawi, said that Pokemon video games and card games were a waste of time and psychologically unhealthy for children. For penetrating Jewish names into children's memories. The real impact is, many pokemon players take to the streets in search of real-world digital monsters that are part of the game's gameplay. In America, the Pokemon Go fever that 'anesthetized' a number of smartphone users turned out to be quite disturbing the Holocaust Memorial Museum and Arlington National Cemetery in the United States. The reason, many players are hunting Pokemon in that place. In fact, the museum asked players not to catch Pokemon anymore when visiting the place. Pokemon before it was made into a game was a children's film. And pokemon movies have been banned in various countries. One of them is in Iraq. President Saddam Hussein at that time banned it because the name Pokemon was a Jewish mission. A document states that President Saddam Hussein received information about the film from the state intelligence agency. According to information, the names used in the Pokemon movies contain muslimism an invitation that cannot be tolerated. Apparently, the word Pokemon itself means "I'm Jewish". The name Pokemon is taken from the Syriac language, or the Syriac language which in Indonesian means 'I am Jewish'. Not only Pokemon that has this surprising meaning, but also in other characters, such as Pikachu, the main character in the Pokemon movie. Pikachu, means 'Be a Jew'. Charmander character, which also means: 'God is Weak'. Of course, the meaning is very offensive to adherents of religion, especially Islam and Christianity. Because, in Islam, it is clearly called Allahu Akbar (God is Great). And in Christianity it is called the Holy God
berita_id: Jakarta - Setelah dirilis, Pokemon Go menerima banyak tanggapan dari orang -orang.Namun, game mobile Pokemon Go ini menimbulkan kecurigaan banyak pihak.Alasannya adalah, sejak tahun 2001, Pokemon Games and Cartoons, yang dilarang oleh sejumlah sarjana di Timur Tengah, telah muncul lagi.Menurut mereka, karakter di Pokemon tidak islam dan fitur simbol Zionis.Beberapa waktu yang lalu, beberapa ulama Muslim, di antaranya Sheikh Yousef Qaradawi, mengatakan bahwa video game Pokemon dan permainan kartu adalah buang -buang waktu dan secara psikologis tidak sehat untuk anak -anak.Untuk menembus nama Yahudi ke dalam ingatan anak -anak.Dampak sebenarnya adalah, banyak pemain Pokemon turun ke jalan untuk mencari monster digital dunia nyata yang merupakan bagian dari gameplay game.Di Amerika, demam Pokemon Go yang 'membius' sejumlah pengguna smartphone ternyata cukup mengganggu Holocaust Memorial Museum dan Arlington National Cemetery di Amerika Serikat.Alasannya, banyak pemain berburu Pokemon di tempat itu.Bahkan, museum meminta pemain untuk tidak menangkap Pokemon lagi saat mengunjungi tempat itu.Pokemon sebelum dibuat menjadi permainan adalah film anak -anak.Dan film Pokemon telah dilarang di berbagai negara.Salah satunya di Irak.Presiden Saddam Hussein pada waktu itu melarangnya karena nama Pokemon adalah misi Yahudi.Sebuah dokumen menyatakan bahwa Presiden Saddam Hussein menerima informasi tentang film dari Badan Intelijen Negara.Menurut informasi, nama -nama yang digunakan dalam film -film Pokemon berisi undangan Muslimisme yang tidak dapat ditoleransi.Rupanya, kata pokemon itu sendiri berarti "aku orang Yahudi".Nama Pokemon diambil dari bahasa Syria, atau bahasa Syria yang dalam bahasa Indonesia berarti 'Saya Yahudi'.Tidak hanya Pokemon yang memiliki makna mengejutkan ini, tetapi juga dalam karakter lain, seperti Pikachu, karakter utama dalam film Pokemon.Pikachu, berarti 'menjadi orang Yahudi'.Karakter Charmander, yang juga berarti: 'Tuhan itu lemah'.Tentu saja, artinya sangat menyinggung penganut agama, terutama Islam dan Kekristenan.Karena, dalam Islam, itu jelas disebut Allahu Akbar (Tuhan itu hebat).Dan dalam agama Kristen itu disebut Tuhan yang kudus

berita: Head of Protocol Section of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah, admitted that his party had never prohibited the 212 protest crowd from visiting the Istiqlal mosque. He denied that if the Istiqlal Mosque had its gates locked, it would be used by the masses "A thousand percent hoax," said Abu when contacted, Tuesday (21/2/2017). Abu explained, the gate of the Istiqlal mosque was closed at 21.310 WIB, and would be reopened an hour before the dawn prayer. "Outside the fasting month, the Isha prayer ends, around 21.30 WIB according to the law, it is closed, sterile. Then it is opened again one hour before dawn. fast That is outside the fasting month," he explained. He said that the crowd who came to the Istiqlal mosque last night was a group from East Java, as many as 5 buses. They enter after Isha, then are given the opportunity to worship clean, talk nicely with the chairman, "We gave understanding, and thank God we understood and left istiqlal voluntarily," he said. He reiterated that if the Istiqlal Mosque had never banned the 212 mass demonstration, he said the issue of the ban was not true. "The intruders are the people who wrote accusing the PKI. Except for Axis 212, 411, which we expelled the day before and it was an emergency. There was no coordination, they didn't take action like 212," he said.
berita_id: Kepala Bagian Protokol Masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah, mengakui bahwa partainya tidak pernah melarang kerumunan protes 212 untuk mengunjungi masjid Istiqlal.Dia membantah bahwa jika masjid Istiqlal memiliki gerbang terkunci, itu akan digunakan oleh massa "seribu persen tipuan," kata Abu ketika dihubungi, Selasa (21/2/2017).Abu menjelaskan, gerbang masjid Istiqlal ditutup pada 21.310 WIB, dan akan dibuka kembali satu jam sebelum doa fajar."Di luar bulan puasa, doa Isha berakhir, sekitar 21.30 WIB menurut hukum, ditutup, steril. Kemudian dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum fajar. Cepat di luar bulan puasa," jelasnya.Dia mengatakan bahwa kerumunan yang datang ke masjid Istiqlal tadi malam adalah kelompok dari Jawa Timur, sebanyak 5 bus.Mereka masuk setelah Isha, kemudian diberi kesempatan untuk beribadah bersih, berbicara dengan baik dengan ketua, "Kami memberi pemahaman, dan syukurlah kami mengerti dan meninggalkan Istiqlal secara sukarela," katanya.Dia menegaskan bahwa jika masjid Istiqlal tidak pernah melarang demonstrasi massal 212, dia mengatakan masalah larangan itu tidak benar."Para penyusup adalah orang -orang yang menulis menuduh PKI. Kecuali untuk Axis 212, 411, yang kami ungkapkan sehari sebelumnya dan itu adalah keadaan darurat. Tidak ada koordinasi, mereka tidak mengambil tindakan seperti 212," katanya.

berita: Photos of participants of Action 212 Volume Two circulated on social media who could not enter the Istiqlal Mosque this morning because the mosque doors were closed. According to the mosque management, the rumors circulating are not true. "It's a thousand percent hoax," said the Head of the Protocol Section of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam to Republika.co.id Tuesday (21/2) morning. He explained, the rules at the Istiqlal Mosque other than the month of Ramadan, the mosque closes at 21.30 WIB. Opened again one hour before Fajr time. In the month of Ramadan, the mosque is open 24 hours. He said, for last night's case, there were indeed five bus participants who came from East Java. They claimed to come from Madura. Participants enter the mosque after Isha time. The mosque provides opportunities for worship and cleaning. "After approaching 10 (at night), we met with the head of his entourage, we announced to his entourage that the rules at Istiqlal, this mosque will be closed and will be opened again one hour go about before Fajr," he said. Abu explained, the group from East Java understood and understood. The mosque management waited for them to leave the Istiqlal Mosque voluntarily. Then at 03.40 WIB the mosque was reopened. Also read, Action 212, the Crowd Has Not Been Seen at Istiqlal-Al Azhar. "And what's in the photo, it looks like people are queuing up to enter, it's the Wali Songo pilgrimage group and school children, that's normal, they go to Istiqlal every day," he explained. He emphasized that in conclusion, the news circulating on Instagram, Twitter and other social media was a lie.
berita_id: Foto -foto peserta aksi 212 Volume Dua beredar di media sosial yang tidak bisa memasuki masjid Istiqlal pagi ini karena pintu masjid ditutup.Menurut manajemen masjid, rumor yang beredar tidak benar."Ini adalah tipuan seribu persen," kata kepala bagian protokol dari masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam ke Republika.co.id Selasa (21/2) pagi.Dia menjelaskan, aturan di Masjid Istiqlal selain bulan Ramadhan, masjid ditutup pada 21,30 WIB.Dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum waktu Fajr.Di bulan Ramadhan, masjid buka 24 jam.Dia mengatakan, untuk kasus tadi malam, memang ada lima peserta bus yang datang dari Jawa Timur.Mereka mengaku datang dari Madura.Peserta memasuki masjid setelah waktu Isha.Masjid ini memberikan kesempatan untuk beribadah dan membersihkan."Setelah mendekati 10 (pada malam hari), kami bertemu dengan kepala rombongannya, kami mengumumkan kepada rombongannya bahwa aturan di Istiqlal, masjid ini akan ditutup dan akan dibuka lagi satu jam berjalan sebelum Fajr," katanya.Abu menjelaskan, kelompok dari Jawa Timur memahami dan memahami.Manajemen masjid menunggu mereka meninggalkan masjid Istiqlal secara sukarela.Kemudian pada 03.40 WIB masjid dibuka kembali.Baca juga, Action 212, kerumunan belum terlihat di Istiqlal-al Azhar."Dan apa yang ada di foto, sepertinya orang -orang mengantri untuk masuk, itu adalah kelompok ziarah Wali Songo dan anak -anak sekolah, itu normal, mereka pergi ke Istiqlal setiap hari," jelasnya.Dia menekankan bahwa sebagai kesimpulan, berita yang beredar di Instagram, Twitter dan media sosial lainnya adalah kebohongan.

berita: The easy curve of the iPhone 6 Plus casing has become a hot topic of conversation lately. And it's not just a figment. There are already iPhone 6 Plus users who have experienced this incident. The screen size of 5.5 inches is indeed in a trouser pocket, but without realizing it while in the smartphone pocket, it changes shape (curved) due to pressure movements that are not realized by the owner. A video posted on Youtube shows the vulnerability of the aluminum-wrapped unibody design. A person in a video uploaded on YouTube tries to bend the iPhone 6 Plus through the pressure of both hands and succeeds. Seen the indentation on the left side, just below the volume buttons. Its slender form actually brings weakness to him. To be fair, someone in the video also uploaded another video with the same level of testing, but using a Samsung Galaxy Note 3 unit. The Samsung Galaxy Note 3, which uses a plastic casing, turns out to be a stronger design frame than the iPhone 6 Plus. Until now, as quoted from GSMarena, Apple has not video recording confirmed this.
berita_id: Kurva yang mudah dari casing iPhone 6 Plus telah menjadi topik percakapan yang hangat belakangan ini.Dan itu bukan hanya isapan jempol.Sudah ada pengguna iPhone 6 Plus yang mengalami kejadian ini.Ukuran layar 5,5 inci memang ada di saku celana, tetapi tanpa menyadarinya saat berada di saku smartphone, itu berubah bentuk (melengkung) karena gerakan tekanan yang tidak diwujudkan oleh pemilik.Video yang diposting di YouTube menunjukkan kerentanan desain unibody yang dibungkus aluminium.Seseorang dalam video yang diunggah di YouTube mencoba menekuk iPhone 6 Plus melalui tekanan kedua tangan dan berhasil.Melihat lekukan di sisi kiri, tepat di bawah tombol volume.Bentuknya yang ramping sebenarnya membawa kelemahan baginya.Agar adil, seseorang dalam video juga mengunggah video lain dengan tingkat pengujian yang sama, tetapi menggunakan unit Samsung Galaxy Note 3.Samsung Galaxy Note 3, yang menggunakan casing plastik, ternyata menjadi bingkai desain yang lebih kuat daripada iPhone 6 Plus.Sampai sekarang, seperti dikutip dari GSMARENA, Apple belum merekam video mengkonfirmasi hal ini.

berita: Here's a photo of the easily curved iPhone 6 circulating on the Internet. As quoted from Mashable, Wednesday (24/9/2014), a member of the MacRumors forum shared a photo of his curved iPhone 6 Plus. Hanzon, the member's name, admitted that he kept the iPhone 6 Plus in his front trouser pocket while driving. After a few hours of pocketing, Hanzon found the iPhone 6 had changed shape, the center was slightly curved. A similar case was also reported by a member of the MacRumors forum, DevinPitcher. He said that his colleague's iPhone 6 Plus also curved after being pocketed in the front pocket of his pants. A photo of the curved iPhone 6 was also posted by Devin in a thread. A post on the picture French forum, MacBidouille, also reported a similar case. Members of this forum also included a photo of a colleague's iPhone 6 that was bent just because it was placed in the front pocket of his pants. This crooked case is not the first to happen. Earlier this year, several iPhone 5S owners reported that their phones were curved even though they weren't impacted and also didn't sit in their back pockets or sit down. Meanwhile, in 2012, several iPhone 5 users claimed to experience such cases on their devices.
berita_id: Berikut adalah foto iPhone 6 yang mudah melengkung yang beredar di internet.Seperti dikutip dari Mashable, Rabu (24/9/2014), seorang anggota Forum Macrumors membagikan foto iPhone 6 Plus yang melengkung.Hanzon, nama anggota, mengakui bahwa ia menyimpan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana depannya saat mengemudi.Setelah beberapa jam mengantongi, Hanzon menemukan iPhone 6 telah berubah bentuk, pusatnya sedikit melengkung.Kasus serupa juga dilaporkan oleh anggota Forum Macrumors, Devinpitcher.Dia mengatakan bahwa iPhone 6 Plus rekannya juga melengkung setelah dikenakan di saku depan celananya.Foto iPhone 6 melengkung juga diposting oleh Devin di utas.Sebuah posting di Forum Prancis Picture, MacBidouille, juga melaporkan kasus serupa.Anggota forum ini juga menyertakan foto iPhone 6 kolega yang ditekuk hanya karena ditempatkan di saku depan celananya.Kasus bengkok ini bukan yang pertama terjadi.Awal tahun ini, beberapa pemilik iPhone 5S melaporkan bahwa ponsel mereka melengkung meskipun mereka tidak terpengaruh dan juga tidak duduk di saku belakang atau duduk.Sementara itu, pada tahun 2012, beberapa pengguna iPhone 5 mengklaim mengalami kasus seperti itu di perangkat mereka.

berita: Not long ago it was launched, the iPhone 6 Plus has been hit by bad news, which is why the iPhone 6 Plus is said to bend easily and bends easily when under pressure. Based on reports from a number of websites, a number of users of this sophisticated iPhone 6 Plus phablet have warped or bent the chassis after being put in the user's pocket. Not even that long ago, a video on YouTube showed the body of the iPhone 6 Plus that looks easy to bend or bend without expending much effort. Some sites say the weak point is at the bottom of the volume. Well, responding to the bad news circulating, Apple invited several journalists in the US to see firsthand the iPhone endurance test facility in Cupertino, California. For information, Apple also has an endurance test facility in China. One of the journalists who received an invitation from Apple was Lauren Goode from the site recode.net. Through his article entitled Inside Apple's Secret Testing Labs (25/9), it was revealed that several stages of the iPhone 6 endurance test had never been released to the public. This isn't the first time Apple has invited journalists to its Cupertino lab. In 2010, after the issue of "antenna gate" on the iPhone 4 rolled, Apple was also busy inviting the media for clarification purposes. Phil Schiller, Apple's VP of Worldwide Marketing said, “Of the approximately 15,000 iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus that have been marketed, we have received nine reports about the iPhone 6 Plus. Of course this is a small percentage. It's not right if there is an assumption that the iPhone 6 Plus is easy to bend due to the unibody aluminum casing combined with a thin body." Plus Schiler, the iPhone 6 Plus is actually formulated with a superior unibody construction, such as high-quality aluminum, the strongest screen layer, and components that are fed with steel and titanium. A true phone endurance test covers many aspects, and based on demonstrations from Apple, only four stages of testing for the iPhone 6 Plus were shown to journalists. This test involved several dozen technicians, as the test material was a mock up of the iPhone 6 Plus with the same size and weight as the original. Sit Test In this test, the iPhone 6 is simulated to be placed in a pocket, and is subjected to pressure as a result of being seated. This sitting test consists of three parts, the first part where the user sits on a hard surface. Second, the user sits immersed in a soft area, such as a sofa. And the third, simulated the iPhone 6 in a pocket and in a cradle at the corner of a hard surface. "We've done thousands of times for this test phase, and the results are quite satisfactory," said Dan Riccio, Apple's VP of Hardware Engineering. Three Point Bend Test This time the iPhone 6 Plus was tested by getting a pressure of up to 25 kg. Pressing is done directly to the center of the phone, the phone is pressed simultaneously from the front and back. This test is intended to measure the strength that can be tolerated. When the pressure is released, the iPhone 6 body appears to return to its original shape position. If the user puts a lot of pressure beyond the tolerable standard (deformation), then the iPhone 6 has the ability to 'restore' its original shape. Pressure Point Test Almost similar to the test above, in this test the iPhone 6 Plus received strong and fast pressure weighing 10 kg directly to the center area of ​​​​the phone (the center of the screen). Torsion Test This test covers iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, and MacBook Pro devices. The test is carried out by rotating the device journalist from various angles. This test is intended to measure the effects on mobile phones due to circular motion in various variants
berita_id: Belum lama ini diluncurkan, iPhone 6 Plus telah dilanda berita buruk, itulah sebabnya iPhone 6 Plus dikatakan mudah menekuk dan membungkuk dengan mudah ketika berada di bawah tekanan.Berdasarkan laporan dari sejumlah situs web, sejumlah pengguna iPhone 6 plus phablet yang canggih ini telah melengkung atau menekuk sasis setelah dimasukkan ke dalam saku pengguna.Bahkan lama sekali, video di YouTube menunjukkan tubuh iPhone 6 Plus yang terlihat mudah untuk ditekuk atau ditekuk tanpa mengeluarkan banyak usaha.Beberapa situs mengatakan titik lemah ada di bagian bawah volume.Nah, menanggapi berita buruk yang beredar, Apple mengundang beberapa jurnalis di AS untuk melihat secara langsung fasilitas uji ketahanan iPhone di Cupertino, California.Untuk informasi, Apple juga memiliki fasilitas uji ketahanan di Cina.Salah satu jurnalis yang menerima undangan dari Apple adalah Lauren Goode dari situs Recode.net.Melalui artikelnya yang berjudul Inside Inside's Secret Testing Labs (25/9), terungkap bahwa beberapa tahap uji ketahanan iPhone 6 tidak pernah dirilis ke publik.Ini bukan pertama kalinya Apple mengundang jurnalis ke laboratorium Cupertino -nya.Pada 2010, setelah masalah "Antena Gate" di iPhone 4 digulung, Apple juga sibuk mengundang media untuk tujuan klarifikasi.Phil Schiller, Wakil Presiden Apple dari Worldwide Marketing mengatakan, “Dari sekitar 15.000 iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus yang telah dipasarkan, kami telah menerima sembilan laporan tentang iPhone 6 Plus. Tentu saja ini adalah persentase kecil. Tidak benar jika ada asumsi bahwa iPhone 6 Plus mudah untuk menekuk karena alumerum unibody yang digabungkan dengan casing yang tipis."Ditambah Schiler, iPhone 6 Plus sebenarnya diformulasikan dengan konstruksi unibody yang unggul, seperti aluminium berkualitas tinggi, lapisan layar terkuat, dan komponen yang diumpankan dengan baja dan titanium.Tes daya tahan ponsel sejati mencakup banyak aspek, dan berdasarkan demonstrasi dari Apple, hanya empat tahap pengujian untuk iPhone 6 Plus yang ditunjukkan kepada jurnalis.Tes ini melibatkan beberapa lusin teknisi, karena bahan uji adalah tiruan dari iPhone 6 Plus dengan ukuran dan berat yang sama seperti aslinya.Tes duduk dalam tes ini, iPhone 6 disimulasikan untuk ditempatkan di saku, dan mengalami tekanan sebagai akibat dari tempat duduk.Tes duduk ini terdiri dari tiga bagian, bagian pertama di mana pengguna duduk di permukaan yang keras.Kedua, pengguna duduk terbenam di area yang lembut, seperti sofa.Dan yang ketiga, mensimulasikan iPhone 6 di saku dan dalam buaian di sudut permukaan yang keras."Kami telah melakukan ribuan kali untuk fase pengujian ini, dan hasilnya cukup memuaskan," kata Dan Riccio, Wakil Presiden Teknik Perangkat Keras Apple.Tes Tiga Bend Titik Kali ini iPhone 6 Plus diuji dengan mendapatkan tekanan hingga 25 kg.Menekan dilakukan langsung ke tengah telepon, telepon ditekan secara bersamaan dari depan dan belakang.Tes ini dimaksudkan untuk mengukur kekuatan yang dapat ditoleransi.Ketika tekanan dilepaskan, badan iPhone 6 tampak kembali ke posisi bentuk aslinya.Jika pengguna memberikan banyak tekanan di luar standar (deformasi) yang dapat ditoleransi, maka iPhone 6 memiliki kemampuan untuk 'memulihkan' bentuk aslinya.Tes titik tekanan hampir mirip dengan tes di atas, dalam tes ini iPhone 6 Plus menerima tekanan yang kuat dan cepat dengan berat 10 kg langsung ke area tengah ponsel (tengah layar).Tes Torsion Tes ini mencakup perangkat iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, dan MacBook Pro.Tes dilakukan dengan memutar jurnalis perangkat dari berbagai sudut.Tes ini dimaksudkan untuk mengukur efek pada ponsel karena gerakan melingkar dalam berbagai varian

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia is confirmed to be a hoax. This certainty was revealed after the Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati confirmed this in front of journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace, West Java. "It doesn't exist and has never been discussed," he said on Monday, (12/3/2018). When giving information about President Joko Widodo's meeting with the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) delegation, he received a question about it. The Minister of Finance explained government minister that at this time there were indeed many circulating information and documents that were made as if they came from government institutions. “What the Menpan said (in social media) was a hoax, that's what it is. In today's social media, there is a lot of information and documents that are made similar to those from the government and published," he said. Previously, it was widely circulated on social media about the plan to increase the salaries of the president and vice president. In the issue, it is stated that the president will be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp 553422694 per month. The vice president is said to be proposed to receive a salary of IDR 368,948,462 per month. That was the Deputy for Protocol, Press, and Media Secretariat Bey Machmudin. (
berita_id: Berita yang beredar tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia dikonfirmasi menjadi tipuan.Kepastian ini terungkap setelah Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati mengkonfirmasi hal ini di depan jurnalis di Istana Presiden Bogor, Jawa Barat."Itu tidak ada dan tidak pernah dibahas," katanya pada hari Senin, (12/3/2018).Saat memberikan informasi tentang pertemuan Presiden Joko Widodo dengan delegasi Bank Investasi Investasi Asia (AIIB), ia menerima pertanyaan tentang hal itu.Menteri Keuangan menjelaskan Menteri Pemerintah bahwa pada saat ini memang ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang beredar yang dibuat seolah -olah mereka berasal dari lembaga pemerintah."Apa yang dikatakan Menpan (di media sosial) adalah tipuan, itulah yang terjadi. Di media sosial saat ini, ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan yang dari pemerintah dan diterbitkan," katanya.Sebelumnya, secara luas diedarkan di media sosial tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden.Dalam masalah ini, dinyatakan bahwa Presiden akan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji hingga RP 553422694 per bulan.Wakil presiden dikatakan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji IDR 368.948.462 per bulan.Itu adalah wakil untuk protokol, pers, dan sekretariat media Bey Machmudin.(

berita: The Surabaya City government continues to carry out dot candy raids that indicate drugs. There are three sub-district points that are mobilized by the Surabaya City Satpol PP marketer to raid the green colored candy. They are Genteng District, Rungkut District and Sawahan District. The Head of Sawahan District of Surabaya City, Yunus said that raids had been carried out at three school points. "We raided SDN Pakis I, II, and IX on Jalan Pakistirtosari. The result was 20 teats," said Yunus. The candy pacifiers are suspected to contain drugs. Physically, the candy does not look like drugs but looks like ordinary candy. "Those who sell it at street vendors around the school are immediately secured. We secure them and take them to the sub-district office," said Yunus. Not only pacifiers, but in the food and beverage raids at a number of elementary schools in Sawahan, a number of hard candies were also found, namely candy containing formaldehyde which is dangerous if consumed by children. "For hard candy, there are 33 seeds and 17 packs of hard candy in tablet form. We also secure that," said Yunus
berita_id: Pemerintah Kota Surabaya terus melakukan serangan permen dot yang menunjukkan obat -obatan.Ada tiga poin sub-distrik yang dimobilisasi oleh pemasar Surabaya City Satpol PP untuk menyerang permen berwarna hijau.Mereka adalah Distrik Genteng, Distrik Rungkut dan Distrik Sawahan.Kepala distrik Sawahan di Kota Surabaya, Yunus mengatakan bahwa serangan telah dilakukan di tiga titik sekolah."Kami menggerebek Sdn Pakis I, II, dan IX di Jalan Pakistirtosari. Hasilnya adalah 20 dadah," kata Yunus.Permen dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Secara fisik, permen itu tidak terlihat seperti obat -obatan tetapi terlihat seperti permen biasa."Mereka yang menjualnya di pedagang kaki lima di sekitar sekolah segera diamankan. Kami mengamankannya dan membawanya ke kantor sub-distrik," kata Yunus.Tidak hanya dot, tetapi dalam serangan makanan dan minuman di sejumlah sekolah dasar di Sawahan, sejumlah permen keras juga ditemukan, yaitu permen yang mengandung formaldehida yang berbahaya jika dikonsumsi oleh anak -anak."Untuk permen keras, ada 33 biji dan 17 bungkus permen keras dalam bentuk tablet. Kami juga mengamankannya," kata Yunus

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia will increase drastically to reach Rp. 500 million per month. Or Rp 6.6 billion per year. This increase occurs if the Draft Government Regulation (RPP) on the Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities of Civil Servants is actually passed. The amount is stated in the RPP material. With the president's salary index of 96,000 points, it was found that the figure was Rp. 553 million. According to Article 2 of Law number 7 of 1978, the president's salary is 6 times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia (Chairman of the DPR, MA, and BPK). Meanwhile, in PP 75/2000, it is stated that the three officials receive a salary of Rp. 5,040,000 per month. Thus, the president's basic salary is Rp. 30,240,000 per month. Presidential Decree 68/2001 also states that the allowance for the position of the President is Rp. 32,500,000. So that the total money received by the president each month is IDR wage 62,740,000 or IDR 752,880,000 per year. According to the palace, this amount has not changed since 2001. The total salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia is relatively small compared to the leaders of major countries in the world. Prime Minister (PM) of Singapore, Lee Hsien Loong recorded the highest salary of USD 2.2 million or equivalent to Rp. 30.3 billion per year. After Lee, there is Doris Leuthard, the President of Switzerland, who has a salary of USD 437,000 or IDR 6 billion per year. Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Trunbull followed with a salary of USD 403,700 or Rp 5.5 billion per year. President Jokowi is only higher than PRC President Xi Jinping who is paid USD 20,500 or IDR 283 million per year. Meanwhile, US President Donald Trump recorded the smallest income, which was USD 1 per year. Of course this is Trump's personal request. The 45th president of the US has a personal fortune of around USD 3 billion. University of Indonesia (UI) public policy observer Lina Miftahul Jannah said it was very natural for the President to have a very large income index. So that the income received by the number one person in Indonesia is very high. "It makes sense too," he explained. He said that as head of state as well as head of government, the duties, responsibilities, and risks of a president are enormous. So, according to him, it is not natural for an official to be paid by the state budget, whose salary is greater than the president's. Instead, he said it would be dangerous if there were other government officials whose salaries were higher than the President. Meanwhile, the palace has not been able to comment further on the salary increase scheme for civil servants, presidents and other state officials. Presidential Spokesman Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo said his party had not received sufficient information about this. "I don't have the information yet. I'll confirm it later," he said when confirmed. The former Acting Officer (Plt) of the KPK leadership has also not been able to confirm the progress of the RPP
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis untuk mencapai RP.500 juta per bulan.Atau Rp 6,6 miliar per tahun.Peningkatan ini terjadi jika rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) pada gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas pegawai negeri sebenarnya disahkan.Jumlah tersebut dinyatakan dalam bahan RPP.Dengan indeks gaji presiden sebesar 96.000 poin, ditemukan bahwa angkanya adalah RP.553 juta.Menurut Pasal 2 Hukum Nomor 7 tahun 1978, gaji Presiden adalah 6 kali gaji dasar pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia (ketua DPR, MA, dan BPK).Sementara itu, dalam hal 75/2000, dinyatakan bahwa ketiga pejabat menerima gaji RP.5.040.000 per bulan.Dengan demikian, gaji dasar presiden adalah RP.30.240.000 per bulan.Keputusan Presiden 68/2001 juga menyatakan bahwa tunjangan untuk posisi presiden adalah RP.32.500.000.Sehingga total uang yang diterima oleh presiden setiap bulan adalah IDR upah 62.740.000 atau IDR 752.880.000 per tahun.Menurut Istana, jumlah ini tidak berubah sejak tahun 2001. Gaji total presiden Republik Indonesia relatif kecil dibandingkan dengan para pemimpin negara -negara besar di dunia.Perdana Menteri (PM) dari Singapura, Lee Hsien Loong mencatat gaji tertinggi USD 2,2 juta atau setara dengan RP.30,3 miliar per tahun.Setelah Lee, ada Doris Leuthard, presiden Swiss, yang memiliki gaji USD 437.000 atau IDR 6 miliar per tahun.Perdana Menteri Australia Malcolm Trunbull diikuti dengan gaji USD 403.700 atau RP 5,5 miliar per tahun.Presiden Jokowi hanya lebih tinggi dari Presiden RRC XI Jinping yang dibayar USD 20.500 atau IDR 283 juta per tahun.Sementara itu, Presiden AS Donald Trump mencatat pendapatan terkecil, yaitu USD 1 per tahun.Tentu saja ini adalah permintaan pribadi Trump.Presiden ke -45 AS memiliki kekayaan pribadi sekitar USD 3 miliar.Pengamat Kebijakan Publik University of Indonesia (UI) Lina Miftahul Jannah mengatakan sangat wajar bagi presiden untuk memiliki indeks pendapatan yang sangat besar.Sehingga pendapatan yang diterima oleh orang nomor satu di Indonesia sangat tinggi."Itu juga masuk akal," jelasnya.Dia mengatakan bahwa sebagai kepala negara serta kepala pemerintahan, tugas, tanggung jawab, dan risiko presiden sangat besar.Jadi, menurutnya, tidak wajar bagi seorang pejabat yang harus dibayar dengan anggaran negara, yang gajinya lebih besar dari presiden.Sebaliknya, dia mengatakan akan berbahaya jika ada pejabat pemerintah lain yang gaji yang gaji lebih tinggi dari presiden.Sementara itu, istana belum dapat berkomentar lebih lanjut tentang skema kenaikan gaji untuk pegawai negeri, presiden dan pejabat negara lainnya.Juru bicara presiden Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo mengatakan partainya belum menerima informasi yang cukup tentang hal ini."Aku belum punya informasinya. Aku akan mengkonfirmasi nanti," katanya ketika dikonfirmasi.Mantan Penjabat Petugas (PLT) kepemimpinan KPK juga tidak dapat mengkonfirmasi kemajuan RPP

berita: Toothbrush is the most important bath tool to remove dirt around the teeth so that dental health is maintained. However, using a toothbrush should not be careless, especially in choosing the toothbrush you use. And when you want to buy a toothbrush, you should pay attention to the code behind the packaging, don't let your toothbrush be made of pig bristles Currently, a number of people are shocked by a toothbrush product that uses pig bristles. The use of the product refers to the writing in English, namely bristles on the packaging There is one secret code which means your toothbrush is made of boar bristles. The Or** * brand toothbrush is clearly made of bristles. The product packaging clearly describes the product. Responding to this case, the Chairman of the Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta said, if it is true that the toothbrush is made of pig bristles, the toothbrush is haram. In Al Surah Al Maidah verse 3 it is explained that derivatives from pigs are haram. We will investigate this prohibition, research lab really from sea urchins or not," said Muhammad Hatta However, the Medan City Health Service through the Secretary of the North Sumatra Health Office, Afwan Lubis, is not sure about the existence of a toothbrush made of pig bristles. He added that laboratory tests were carried out if there were reports from the public regarding the boar bristle toothbrush. If it really contains sea urchins, then it should not be circulated because there are elements that are not halal I don't think it's possible. But how are you? We can comment if there is a laboratory test first. Currently there is no laboratory test," said Afwan, as quoted from Tribunnews.com (8/3)
berita_id: Sikat gigi adalah alat mandi paling penting untuk menghilangkan kotoran di sekitar gigi sehingga kesehatan gigi dipertahankan.Namun, menggunakan sikat gigi tidak boleh ceroboh, terutama dalam memilih sikat gigi yang Anda gunakan.Dan ketika Anda ingin membeli sikat gigi, Anda harus memperhatikan kode di balik kemasannya, jangan biarkan sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari bulu babi saat ini, sejumlah orang terkejut oleh produk sikat gigi yang menggunakan bulu babi.Penggunaan produk mengacu pada tulisan dalam bahasa Inggris, yaitu bulu pada kemasan ada satu kode rahasia yang berarti sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari bulu babi.Sikat gigi merek atau *** jelas terbuat dari bulu.Kemasan produk dengan jelas menggambarkan produk.Menanggapi kasus ini, ketua Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta berkata, jika benar bahwa sikat gigi terbuat dari bulu babi, sikat gigi adalah haram.Dalam Al Surah Al Maidah ayat 3 dijelaskan bahwa turunan dari babi adalah haram.Kami akan menyelidiki larangan ini, laboratorium penelitian yang benar -benar dari bulu babi atau tidak, ”kata Muhammad Hatta, namun, Layanan Kesehatan Kota Medan melalui Sekretaris Kantor Kesehatan Sumatra Utara, Afwan Lubis, tidak yakin tentang keberadaan sikat gigi yang tidak ada di bawah tanah yang tidak ada yang tidak ada di bawah.Diedarkan karena ada elemen yang tidak halal saya tidak berpikir itu mungkin.

berita: Toothbrushes are the most important thing in our daily lives, without a brush, we all might experience an unpleasant or unpleasant mouth. First, let's look at this information for you, especially "Muslims" to be more careful and vigilant in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use ingredients from non-halal ones. When you buy a toothbrush, check the packaging, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Remember Yes...!!! Bristle means Pig Hair in other words Pig Fur! Again, recheck your toothbrush package when you buy it, don't forget and procrastinate, look at it beforehand and when you buy the toothbrush you will use. Similarly on the brush (bread spreader), Generally noted "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". Close friends, please share that brushing teeth is done every day, there are many kinds of toothbrushes available in supermarkets or traditional markets, and there are also many materials used in making these toothbrushes. As Muslims, we must be vigilant and careful in knowing some of the ingredients or making toothbrushes that have been used for brushing teeth. Th. In 2012 we were shocked by the emergence of brushes or brushes that had some boar bristles until the MUI issued a fatwa against using a pig bristle brush, but recently there has been information about toothbrushes containing boar bristles. Information for you Muslim groups to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use materials from non-halal. Let's all examine the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair in other words Pig Fur! So check your toothbrush package again when you buy it. Similarly on the brush (bread spreader), Generally noted "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". "What are your toothbrush bristles made of? Plastic or Pig Bristle? Here are a few steps to check: Watch the wrap, if it's recorded from the bristles, so made of sea urchin. Please burn the bristles, if it smells like the smell of burning hair, it means it's from sea urchins. However, if it melts and becomes hard, it means sacrifice it is made of plastic and is safe to use. Possibility if using the haram: Worship is not accepted, prayer is not accepted, and hell is more worthy (hadith). Save ourselves and our loved ones. " In everyday life, we certainly use various types of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint homes, grease cake pans, to smear food. As in processing grilled chicken, bread, cakes, as well as a variety of grilled or grilled meat and seafood. Besides that, the brush is useful when combing hair, cleaning hair at a salon or barbershop, cleaning clothes, and scrubbing floors. Do you know, what do the brushes and brushes you use come from? Most likely it is FROM A FIRE! Brushes supplied in Indonesia usually come from China. Imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars that have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly HARAM. No matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption as well as for application. (the term is PIG/BOAR/HOG/BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places such as traditional markets, painting supply stores, building materials stores, cosmetic shops, beauty salons, and others. Are you familiar with the various forms. Be careful with painting brushes, wall paint brushes, make-up brushes, hair brushes, clothes brushes, and so on. HERE ARE SOME TIPS AVOIDING THE USE OF PIG BRUSHS AND BRUSHS: 1. USE 100% SYNTHETIC BRUSH & BRUSH, SUCH AS NYLON. There are wall paint brushes and feeding brushes, which are slightly more expensive. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. 2. USE OTHER ALTERNATIVES BUT THE BRUSH. For example, paint rollers for painting, sponges & cotton buds for makeup, and knives & spatulas for greasing food. 3. BEWARE OF FOOD THAT PROCESSES COOKING AND CLEANING utensils USING A PIG BRUSH. 4. CHARACTERISTICS OF PIG BRUSH BRUSH, WHEN BURNED WILL GIVE A SPECIFIC OTHER LIKE ROCKED MEAT. 5. USUALLY PIG BRUSH BRUSHS SOLD IN WHITE & BLACK COLORS. However, producers may process sea urchins by bleaching them and then coloring them, so that they look like other animal hairs
berita_id: Sikat gigi adalah hal terpenting dalam kehidupan kita sehari -hari, tanpa kuas, kita semua mungkin mengalami mulut yang tidak menyenangkan atau tidak menyenangkan.Pertama, mari kita lihat informasi ini untuk Anda, terutama "Muslim" untuk lebih berhati-hati dan waspada dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan-bahan dari yang non-halal.Saat Anda membeli sikat gigi, periksa kemasannya, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Ingat ya ... !!!Bulu berarti rambut babi dengan kata lain bulu babi!Sekali lagi, periksa ulang paket sikat gigi Anda saat Anda membelinya, jangan lupa dan menunda -nunda, lihat sebelumnya dan ketika Anda membeli sikat gigi yang akan Anda gunakan.Demikian pula pada sikat (penyebar roti), umumnya mencatat "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% china bristle".Teman dekat, silakan bagikan bahwa menyikat gigi dilakukan setiap hari, ada banyak jenis sikat gigi yang tersedia di supermarket atau pasar tradisional, dan ada juga banyak bahan yang digunakan dalam membuat sikat gigi ini.Sebagai Muslim, kita harus waspada dan berhati -hati dalam mengetahui beberapa bahan atau membuat sikat gigi yang telah digunakan untuk menyikat gigi.Th.Pada 2012 kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau kuas yang memiliki bulu babi sampai MUI mengeluarkan fatwa untuk tidak menggunakan sikat bulu babi, tetapi baru -baru ini ada informasi tentang sikat gigi yang mengandung bulu babi.Informasi untuk Anda kelompok Muslim untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan dari non-halal.Mari kita semua memeriksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti bahwa sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi dengan kata lain bulu babi!Jadi periksa paket sikat gigi Anda lagi saat Anda membelinya.Demikian pula pada sikat (penyebar roti), umumnya mencatat "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% china bristle".Apa bulu sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari? Bulu plastik atau babi? Berikut adalah beberapa langkah untuk memeriksa: menonton bungkus, jika direkam dari bulu, jadi terbuat dari landak laut. Tolong bakar bulu, jika baunya seperti aroma rambut yang terbakar, itu berarti tidak ada yang digunakan oleh plastik.Diterima, doa tidak diterima, dan neraka lebih layak (hadis).Selamatkan diri kita dan orang yang kita cintai.Seperti dalam memproses ayam panggang, roti, kue, serta berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Selain itu, sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, pakaian membersihkan, dan menggosok lantai.Tahukah Anda, dari mana kuas dan kuas yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar itu dari api!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia biasanya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor diproduksi menggunakan landak laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Bagi umat Islam, penggunaan landak laut jelas haram.Tidak peduli seberapa kecil, bahan dari daging babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan juga untuk aplikasi.(Istilah ini adalah sikat rambut babi/babi/babi/bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat seperti pasar tradisional, toko pasokan lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, toko kosmetik, salon kecantikan, dan lainnya.Apakah Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk.Hati-hati dengan kuas lukisan, kuas cat dinding, kuas make-up, sikat rambut, sikat pakaian, dan sebagainya.Berikut adalah beberapa tips yang menghindari penggunaan kuas babi dan kuas: 1. Gunakan sikat & sikat sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Ada kuas cat dinding dan sikat makan, yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.2. Gunakan alternatif lain kecuali kuas.Misalnya, cat rol untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk makeup, dan pisau & spatula untuk makanan berminyak.3. Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang memproses peralatan memasak dan membersihkan menggunakan kuas babi.4. Karakteristik sikat sikat babi, ketika dibakar akan memberikan daging guncang lainnya seperti lainnya.5. Biasanya sikat sikat babi dijual dalam warna putih & hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkan mereka dan kemudian mewarnai mereka, sehingga mereka terlihat seperti rambut binatang lainnya

berita: On social networks, there is a lot of information circulating that calls catfish the filthiest fish. In a mouthful of catfish meat, there are 3,000 cancer cells. The nickname as the filthiest fish refers to the nature of catfish who are fond of consuming all kinds of waste in the waters. Even an article that is quite viral on the internet mentions that human waste is also used as feed for a catfish cultivation in Haikou City, China. This fish is equipped with an additional breathing apparatus in the form of a labyrinth, so that it can survive in muddy or even polluted water conditions. Presumably, this is what raises the suspicion about the accumulation of carcinogenic toxins (cancer causing) in the body of catfish. Investigation: The catfish circulating in the market do not come from the wild. Many catfish are cultivated in ponds, which should be controlled so that they are free from pollution. The feed given can also be chosen, not having to rely on waste. The number of catfish production also continues to increase every year. Data from the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (KKP) shows that catfish production in 2013 reached 543,461 tons, an increase from 441,217 tons in 2012 and 337,577 tons in 2011. According to the Central Statistics Agency (BPS), catfish consumption was 29.98 kg/capita/year, up from 22.58 kg/capita/year in 2004. In Jakarta, no less than 6,000 pecel catfish stalls have been registered with the trunk Indonesian Street Vendors Association (APKLI). Regarding the nutritional content, it is undeniable that catfish is a cheap source of valuable protein. The fact that catfish is also low in cholesterol is likely to drown out accusations that catfish can cause cancer. Dr. Dradjat R Suardi, SpB(K)Onk, a cancer expert from the Indonesian Oncology Association, said that until now there has been no research that says eating catfish can trigger cancer.
berita_id: Di jejaring sosial, ada banyak informasi yang beredar yang menyebut ikan Catfish sebagai ikan paling kotor.Dalam seteguk daging lele, ada 3.000 sel kanker.Julukan sebagai ikan paling kotor mengacu pada sifat ikan lele yang suka mengonsumsi semua jenis limbah di perairan.Bahkan sebuah artikel yang cukup viral di internet menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan untuk budidaya ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina.Ikan ini dilengkapi dengan peralatan pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin, sehingga dapat bertahan hidup dalam kondisi air berlumpur atau bahkan tercemar.Agaknya, inilah yang menimbulkan kecurigaan tentang akumulasi racun karsinogenik (penyebab kanker) dalam tubuh ikan lele.Investigasi: Lele yang beredar di pasar tidak datang dari alam liar.Banyak ikan lele yang dibudidayakan di kolam, yang harus dikendalikan sehingga mereka bebas dari polusi.Pakan yang diberikan juga dapat dipilih, tidak harus mengandalkan limbah.Jumlah produksi ikan lele juga terus meningkat setiap tahun.Data from the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (KKP) shows that catfish production in 2013 reached 543,461 tons, an increase from 441,217 tons in 2012 and 337,577 tons in 2011. According to the Central Statistics Agency (BPS), catfish consumption was 29.98 kg/capita/year, up from 22.58 kg/capita/year in 2004. InJakarta, tidak kurang dari 6.000 kios ikan lele Pecel telah terdaftar di Asosiasi Pejabat Jalanan Indonesia (APKLI).Mengenai kandungan nutrisi, tidak dapat dipungkiri bahwa ikan lele adalah sumber protein berharga yang murah.Fakta bahwa ikan lele juga rendah kolesterol cenderung menenggelamkan tuduhan bahwa ikan lele dapat menyebabkan kanker.Dradjat R Suardi, SPB (K) Onk, seorang ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang belum ada penelitian yang mengatakan makan ikan lele dapat memicu kanker.

berita: The riots that occurred at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters Kelapa Dua, Depok, Friday (10/11) night, became a serious concern for the Police. The incident began because the terrorist prisoners did not receive their cell phones confiscated by officers. However, the police confirmed that during the riots there were no incidents of throwing the Koran. Therefore, the news is not true alias hoax. The Head of the Public Relations Division of fri the National Police Headquarters Inspector General Pol Setyo Wasisto said that his party would seek information who spread information regarding the throwing of the Koran during the riots at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters. "That (the issue of throwing the Koran) is a hoax, we will find the perpetrators," said Setyo Wasisto at the Police Headquarters Complex, Trunojoyo Street, South Jakarta, Monday (13/11). The hoax information appeared on social media after the riots at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters occurred. According to Setyo, the information is false and provocative so that it can trigger a commotion. "We'll find out who uploaded it later, provoking news is dangerous," said Setyo. In this regard, Setyo appealed to the public not to be easily provoked by information that is not true. "It can be destructive and you have to be careful," said Setyo.
berita_id: Kerusuhan yang terjadi di markas Mobile Brigade Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jumat (10/11) malam, menjadi perhatian serius bagi polisi.Insiden itu dimulai karena para tahanan teroris tidak menerima ponsel mereka yang disita oleh petugas.Namun, polisi mengkonfirmasi bahwa selama kerusuhan tidak ada insiden untuk melempar Alquran.Oleh karena itu, berita itu bukan tipuan alias yang benar.Kepala Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Jumat, Markas Besar Kepolisian Nasional, Inspektur Jenderal Pol Setyo Wasisto mengatakan bahwa partainya akan mencari informasi yang menyebarkan informasi mengenai pelemparan Alquran selama kerusuhan di markas Brigade Mobile."Itu (masalah melempar Alquran) adalah tipuan, kami akan menemukan pelaku," kata Setyo Wasisto di kompleks markas polisi, Trunojoyo Street, Jakarta Selatan, Senin (13/11).Informasi tipuan muncul di media sosial setelah kerusuhan di markas Brigade Mobile terjadi.Menurut Setyo, informasinya salah dan provokatif sehingga dapat memicu keributan."Kami akan mengetahui siapa yang mengunggahnya nanti, memprovokasi berita berbahaya," kata Setyo.Dalam hal ini, Setyo mengimbau publik untuk tidak mudah diprovokasi oleh informasi yang tidak benar."Ini bisa merusak dan Anda harus berhati -hati," kata Setyo.

berita: Recently, there has been news circulating stating that there will be a fantastic increase in the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia up to half a billion. stated that the news circulating regarding the recent increase in the salaries of the President and Vice President is untrue. It does not exist and has never been discussed, he told reporters at the Bogor Palace, while giving a statement regarding President Joko Widodo's meeting with the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank delegation. AIIB), Monday (12/03/18) Sri Mulyani explained that currently there is indeed a lot have of circulating information and documents that are made as if they came from government institutions What the Menpan said (in social media) is a hoax, that's how it is In the media Today's social media there is a lot of information and documents that are made similar to those of p In this issue, it is stated that the president will be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp. 553422694 per month. The vice president is said to be proposed to receive a salary of Rp. Rp 368948462 per month
berita_id: Baru -baru ini, ada berita yang beredar menyatakan bahwa akan ada peningkatan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia hingga setengah miliar.menyatakan bahwa berita yang beredar mengenai peningkatan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden baru -baru ini tidak benar.Itu tidak ada dan tidak pernah dibahas, dia mengatakan kepada wartawan di Istana Bogor, sambil memberikan pernyataan tentang pertemuan Presiden Joko Widodo dengan delegasi bank investasi infrastruktur Asia.AIIB), Senin (12/03/18) Sri Mulyani menjelaskan bahwa saat ini ada banyak memiliki informasi yang beredar dan dokumen yang dibuat seolah -olah mereka berasal dari lembaga pemerintah apa yang dikatakan Menpan (di media sosial) adalah hal yang ditempuh di media ini, ada banyak informasi yang dibuat oleh hal -hal yang ada di media saat ini.ke RP.553422694 per bulan.Wakil presiden dikatakan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji RP.RP 368948462 per bulan

berita: "In a mouthful of catfish meat, there are 3,000 cancer cells". The title of the article in recent days has inch become a hot topic of discussion on social media. However, for catfish farmers, the article is considered a threat to their business continuity. The East Java Maritime Affairs and Fisheries Service accommodated the complaints of catfish farming business people in East Java who were offended by the circulation of the article. "This article is a black campaign to bring down sales of the catfish market whose market prospects continue to improve," said the Head of the East Java Fisheries and Marine Service, Wednesday (28/10/2015). He is worried that the article, which actually describes a catfish cultivation in Haikou City, China, will have an impact on the catfish market in East Java. According to him, catfish consumers are fish consumers at level II. At level I are consumers of high-end fish such as tuna, snapper, grouper, and so on. "Class I consumers will not be shaken by the spread of any issue, but for class II consumers, this is still vulnerable to being shaken by issues. They may no longer eat catfish because they are afraid," he said. Heru said that East Java was the largest catfish producer nationally. From hundreds of catfish cultivators, in the last three years, catfish production in East Java continues to increase. In 2012 the production was recorded at 62,807 tons, increased in 2013 to 79,928 tons, while in 2014 it continued to increase to 96,830 tons. During 2014 production, 2,000 tons of which were exported abroad. Catfish production in East Java, said Heru, is produced in a healthy manner according to the standards of Good Fish Cultivation (CBIB) as regulated by the Government in Ministerial Decree No. 02/Men/2007. "CBIB requires catfish cultured feed with healthy feed that focuses on health and food safety," he said. Periodically, the East Java Marine and Fisheries Service also monitors residues on catfish by sampling. This year there were 379 samples taken from various catfish producing regions such as Sidoarjo, Mojokerto, Kediri, and Tulungagung. "As a result, the tested catfish commodities were free from residues of hormones, antibiotics, and heavy metals," he said. Heru suspected that the issue of catfish was deliberately raised by certain parties for the benefit of the fish business ahead of the 2015 MEA free market. "There are parties who want to seize the catfish market and replace it with other fish commodities," he said. Articles about the content of cancer cells are uploaded on a number of websites. The article was also followed by a number of online media for discussion. The article, which was posted on July 29, 2015, describes the confession of a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong, who supplies catfish to roadside markets and restaurants in Hainan Province. The media then investigated the fish by observing seven samples of catfish producer ponds. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken and pig coops, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of catfish, before the test results come out.
berita_id: "Dalam seteguk daging ikan lele, ada 3.000 sel kanker".Judul artikel dalam beberapa hari terakhir membuat inch menjadi topik diskusi di media sosial.Namun, bagi petani lele, artikel ini dianggap sebagai ancaman bagi kesinambungan bisnis mereka.Layanan Urusan Maritim dan Perikanan Java Timur mengakomodasi keluhan orang -orang bisnis petani lele di Jawa Timur yang tersinggung oleh sirkulasi artikel tersebut."Artikel ini adalah kampanye hitam untuk menurunkan penjualan pasar lele yang prospek pasar terus meningkat," kata kepala Perikanan dan Layanan Kelautan Java Timur, Rabu (28/10/2015).Dia khawatir bahwa artikel itu, yang sebenarnya menggambarkan budidaya ikan lele di Haikou City, Cina, akan berdampak pada pasar lele di Jawa Timur.Menurutnya, konsumen lele adalah konsumen ikan di Level II.Pada level I adalah konsumen ikan kelas atas seperti tuna, kakap, kerapu, dan sebagainya."Konsumen Kelas I tidak akan terguncang oleh penyebaran masalah apa pun, tetapi untuk konsumen Kelas II, ini masih rentan untuk dikocok oleh masalah. Mereka mungkin tidak lagi makan lele karena mereka takut," katanya.Heru mengatakan bahwa Jawa Timur adalah produsen ikan lele terbesar secara nasional.Dari ratusan budidaya lele, dalam tiga tahun terakhir, produksi ikan lele di Jawa Timur terus meningkat.Pada 2012 produksi dicatat pada 62.807 ton, meningkat pada 2013 menjadi 79.928 ton, sedangkan pada 2014 terus meningkat menjadi 96.830 ton.Selama produksi 2014, 2.000 ton di antaranya diekspor ke luar negeri.Produksi lele di Jawa Timur, kata Heru, diproduksi dengan cara yang sehat sesuai dengan standar penanaman ikan yang baik (CBIB) sebagaimana diatur oleh pemerintah dalam Keputusan Menteri No. 02/Men/2007."CBIB membutuhkan feed yang dikultur ikan lele dengan pakan sehat yang berfokus pada kesehatan dan keamanan pangan," katanya.Secara berkala, East Java Marine and Fisheries Service juga memantau residu pada ikan lele dengan pengambilan sampel.Tahun ini ada 379 sampel yang diambil dari berbagai daerah penghasil lele seperti Sidoarjo, Mojokerto, Kediri, dan Tulungagung."Akibatnya, komoditas ikan lele yang diuji bebas dari residu hormon, antibiotik, dan logam berat," katanya.Heru menduga bahwa masalah ikan lele sengaja dibesarkan oleh pihak -pihak tertentu untuk kepentingan bisnis ikan menjelang Pasar Bebas MEA 2015."Ada pihak yang ingin merebut pasar ikan lele dan menggantinya dengan komoditas ikan lainnya," katanya.Artikel tentang konten sel kanker diunggah di sejumlah situs web.Artikel ini juga diikuti oleh sejumlah media online untuk diskusi.Artikel itu, yang diposting pada 29 Juli 2015, menggambarkan pengakuan seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-Hong, yang memasok ikan lele ke pasar jalan dan restoran di provinsi Hainan.Media kemudian menyelidiki ikan dengan mengamati tujuh sampel kolam produsen ikan lele.Tujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sedangkan di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Para petani ikan disarankan untuk menangguhkan penjualan ikan lele, sebelum hasil tes keluar.

berita: to carry out actions to defend Islam and the State that will be carried out by the Muslim community, who are members of the Islamic Community Forum (FUI), who are already angry with president the behavior of the leaders of this country, where they should carry out the rules and laws firmly and correctly, but in reality this is not the case. This assumption led to the case of blasphemy against Islam carried out by the defendant Basuki Tjahaja Purnama alias Ahok, who is currently undergoing trial, it was not dismissed and the public considered that the reasons given seemed made up. Not even a few legal and state administration experts, including the former Chief Justice of the Constitutional Court, Mahfud MD, also criticized the government's attitude, especially the Minister of Home Affairs (Mendagri) Tjahjo Kumolo including President Joko Widodo alias Jokowi who was silent when Ahok was again given his seat as governor. While some regional heads actually experience the opposite. As a result, their demands in the action called the Action to Defend Islam and the State 212 will be carried out in front of the MPR building of the DPR RI, and apparently not a few participants came from several outside Jakarta. As a result, they tried to gather at the Istiqlal Mosque with the intention of carrying out the Fajr prayer in congregation, and also the weather conditions when this news was revealed were raining, as a result they tried to immediately enter shelter while waiting for the prayer time to enter. Apparently the fence of the Istiqlal Mosque is actually tightly closed, as received by this media, in the form of photos and descriptions, 5 minutes later when this news was revealed, the participants were also unable to enter to gather and perform the dawn prayer. "Istiqlal Mosque in Padlock ... no one can (may) pray Fajr .... What regime is this ... PKI challenges the Defenders of Islam .... Our war begins (Starts) ... Allahu Akbar .....!" Thus the contents of the text in the description of the photo sent to this media. It can be seen in the photo that the participants are gathering and hoping that the door will be opened soon. Their anger was directed at the government, because the Istiqlal Mosque is managed directly under the Ministry of Religion through the Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI). Where the management of BPPMI is appointed and inaugurated directly by the Minister of Religion who is also in the structure as Chairman of BPPMI. Meanwhile, the responsibility is directly to the President. Meanwhile, it is related to the statement that mentions the involvement of the PKI, due to the connection with the PDI-P as the ruling party and also the main supporter of President Jokowi and also the DKI Jakarta Paslon Ahok-Djarot. And in PDIP itself, it is known that many generations of PKI leaders from the 1960s have filled it. And do not cover themselves even boldly and proudly they admit it. As once said by Member of the Indonesian House of Representatives Commission IX from PDIP, Ribka Tjiptaning, when interviewed and published by one of the media, on September 30, 2015.
berita_id: Untuk melakukan tindakan untuk membela Islam dan negara yang akan dilakukan oleh komunitas Muslim, yang merupakan anggota Forum Komunitas Islam (FUI), yang sudah marah dengan Presiden perilaku para pemimpin negara ini, di mana mereka harus melaksanakan aturan dan hukum dengan tegas dan benar, tetapi dalam kenyataan ini bukan masalahnya.Asumsi ini mengarah pada kasus penistaan ​​terhadap Islam yang dilakukan oleh terdakwa Basuki Tjahaja Purnama alias Ahok, yang saat ini sedang menjalani persidangan, itu tidak diberhentikan dan publik mempertimbangkan bahwa alasan yang diberikan tampaknya dibuat.Bahkan beberapa pakar administrasi hukum dan negara bagian, termasuk mantan Ketua Pengadilan Konstitusi, Mahfud MD, juga mengkritik sikap pemerintah, terutama Menteri Dalam Negeri (Mendagri) Tjahjo Kumolo termasuk Presiden Joko Widodo Alias ​​Jokowi yang diam ketika Ahok lagi diberi kursi sebagai gubernur.Sementara beberapa kepala regional benar -benar mengalami sebaliknya.Akibatnya, tuntutan mereka dalam tindakan yang disebut tindakan untuk membela Islam dan Negara 212 akan dilakukan di depan gedung MPR DPR RI, dan tampaknya tidak sedikit peserta yang datang dari beberapa di luar Jakarta.Akibatnya, mereka mencoba berkumpul di masjid Istiqlal dengan maksud melaksanakan doa Fajr di jemaat, dan juga kondisi cuaca ketika berita ini terungkap hujan, sebagai akibatnya mereka mencoba untuk segera memasuki tempat berlindung sambil menunggu waktu sholat masuk.Rupanya pagar masjid Istiqlal sebenarnya ditutup rapat, seperti yang diterima oleh media ini, dalam bentuk foto dan deskripsi, 5 menit kemudian ketika berita ini terungkap, para peserta juga tidak dapat masuk untuk berkumpul dan melakukan doa fajar."Masjid Istiqlal di gembok ... tidak ada yang bisa (mungkin) berdoa fajr .... rezim apa ini ... PKI menantang para pembela Islam .... Perang kami dimulai (dimulai) ... Allahu Akbar .....!"Dengan demikian isi teks dalam deskripsi foto yang dikirim ke media ini.Dapat dilihat di foto bahwa para peserta berkumpul dan berharap pintu akan segera dibuka.Kemarahan mereka diarahkan pada pemerintah, karena masjid Istiqlal dikelola langsung di bawah Kementerian Agama melalui Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal (BPPMI).Di mana manajemen BPPMI ditunjuk dan diresmikan secara langsung oleh Menteri Agama yang juga berada dalam struktur sebagai ketua BPPMI.Sementara itu, tanggung jawabnya langsung kepada Presiden.Sementara itu, ini terkait dengan pernyataan yang menyebutkan keterlibatan PKI, karena hubungan dengan PDI-P sebagai partai yang berkuasa dan juga pendukung utama Presiden Jokowi dan juga DKI Jakarta Paslon Ahok-Djarot.Dan dalam PDIP sendiri, diketahui bahwa banyak generasi pemimpin PKI dari tahun 1960 -an telah mengisinya.Dan jangan menutupi diri mereka bahkan dengan berani dan bangga mereka mengakuinya.Seperti yang pernah dikatakan oleh anggota Komisi IX Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia dari PDIP, Ribka Tjiptaning, ketika diwawancarai dan diterbitkan oleh salah satu media, pada 30 September 2015.

berita: The Head of Protocol and Public Relations of the Jakarta Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam, responded to the news that the 212 volume II masses were not allowed to enter the mosque. He emphasized that the photos circulating on social media on Tuesday (21/2/17) morning were hoaxes or lies. "The news that there were 212 protesters unable to enter Istiqlal is a thousand percent hoax," said Abu, Tuesday (21/2/17). He explained that on Monday night after Isha there were three group buses that entered the Istiqlal Mosque. They claimed to be a group from Madura Island. The mosque administrators invited them to worship and clean themselves. Furthermore, the mosque administrator coordinated with the group leader who was accompanied by the police. After talking, they then voluntarily left the Istiqlal Mosque. Abu again explained that in accordance with the procedure, the Istiqlal Mosque outside the month of Ramadan was closed at 21.30 WIB and reopened one hour before the dawn prayer. Meanwhile, the photo of the congregation queuing at the gate of the mosque is a group of pilgrims from outside the city. Abu said they wanted to enter the mosque but the door only opened at 03.45 WIB. "In the morning before dawn, Tuesday, February 21 2017, there were several pilgrims from outside the city who were about to come with enter the Istiqlal Mosque and they arrived before the doors of the Istiqlal Mosque opened at 03.45 WIB. We apologize for this," said Abu.
berita_id: Kepala protokol dan hubungan masyarakat dari Masjid Jakarta Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam, menanggapi berita bahwa massa 212 Volume II tidak diizinkan memasuki masjid.Dia menekankan bahwa foto -foto yang beredar di media sosial pada hari Selasa (21/2/17) pagi adalah tipuan atau kebohongan."Berita bahwa ada 212 pengunjuk rasa yang tidak dapat memasuki Istiqlal adalah tipuan seribu persen," kata Abu, Selasa (21/2/17).Dia menjelaskan bahwa pada Senin malam setelah Isha ada tiga bus kelompok yang memasuki masjid Istiqlal.Mereka mengaku sebagai kelompok dari Pulau Madura.Administrator masjid mengundang mereka untuk beribadah dan membersihkan diri.Selain itu, administrator masjid berkoordinasi dengan pemimpin kelompok yang ditemani oleh polisi.Setelah berbicara, mereka kemudian secara sukarela meninggalkan masjid Istiqlal.Abu sekali lagi menjelaskan bahwa sesuai dengan prosedur, masjid Istiqlal di luar bulan Ramadhan ditutup pada 21.30 WIB dan dibuka kembali satu jam sebelum doa fajar.Sementara itu, foto jemaat yang antri di gerbang masjid adalah sekelompok peziarah dari luar kota.Abu mengatakan mereka ingin memasuki masjid tetapi pintu hanya dibuka pada 03.45 WIB."Di pagi hari sebelum fajar, Selasa, 21 Februari 2017, ada beberapa peziarah dari luar kota yang akan datang dengan memasuki masjid Istiqlal dan mereka tiba di depan pintu masjid Istiqlal dibuka pada 03.45 Wib. Kami mohon maaf untuk ini," kata Abu.

berita: News about the Traveloka application being blocked has surfaced recently. The call to uninstall this application has recently been widely discussed on social networks. Initially, this call emerged when a pianist named Ananda Sukarlan walked out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan delivered his speech. At that time Anies was delivering his speech in celebration of the 90th anniversary of Kanisius College at the Jakarta International Expo Kemayoran. It is well known that Ananda Sukarlan himself is one of the alumni of Kanisius College. With the action he did, namely by walking out when Anies gave a speech, it was also followed by a number of other alumni. One of the people who are said to support Ananda's walk out is the founder and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma. Derianto is considered to have supported Ananda's actions by shaking hands and congratulating him. The action taken by Derianto also resulted in the call to uninstall Traveloka and the company gave a response. Traveloka stated that one of the bosses did not attend the Kanisius College celebration because he was leaving the city. According to a clarification made by Traveloka, Derinato had planned to go overseas for several months and was unable to attend the Kanisius Alumni event. “We are proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from Aumni Kanisius. However, Mr. Derianto could not attend because he was on an official trip out of town and it had been planned several months ago,” said Traveloka. Meanwhile, the news circulating, namely Traveloka's CTO support for the pianist named Ananda, lotion was also clarified. Traveloka stated that the company always puts the values ​​of mutual respect for one another. This is also applied to all employees and leadership stakeholders. 'Traveloka is a company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian people who prioritize the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. We always apply these values ​​to all employees. This is at the same time responding to issues surrounding Anies' speech at the 90th Celebration of Kanisius College, which closed Traveloka.
berita_id: Berita tentang aplikasi Traveloka yang diblokir telah muncul baru -baru ini.Panggilan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi ini baru -baru ini telah dibahas secara luas di jejaring sosial.Awalnya, panggilan ini muncul ketika seorang pianis bernama Ananda Sukarlan berjalan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan menyampaikan pidatonya.Pada waktu itu Anies menyampaikan pidatonya untuk merayakan peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College di Jakarta International Expo Kemayoran.Sudah diketahui bahwa Ananda Sukarlan sendiri adalah salah satu alumni Kanisius College.Dengan tindakan yang dia lakukan, yaitu dengan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidato, itu juga diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lainnya.Salah satu orang yang dikatakan mendukung Ananda's Walk Out adalah pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma.DeRianto dianggap mendukung tindakan Ananda dengan berjabat tangan dan memberi selamat padanya.Tindakan yang diambil oleh DeRianto juga menghasilkan panggilan untuk menghapus instalan Traveloka dan perusahaan memberikan tanggapan.Traveloka menyatakan bahwa salah satu bos tidak menghadiri perayaan Kanisius College karena dia meninggalkan kota.Menurut klarifikasi yang dibuat oleh Traveloka, DeRinato telah merencanakan untuk pergi ke luar negeri selama beberapa bulan dan tidak dapat menghadiri acara alumni Kanisius.“Kami bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari Aumni Kanisius. Namun, Mr. DeRianto tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi di luar kota dan telah direncanakan beberapa bulan yang lalu,” kata Traveloka.Sementara itu, berita yang beredar, yaitu dukungan CTO Traveloka untuk pianis bernama Ananda, Lotion juga diklarifikasi.Traveloka menyatakan bahwa perusahaan selalu memberikan nilai -nilai saling menghormati satu sama lain.Ini juga diterapkan untuk semua karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan kepemimpinan.'Traveloka adalah perusahaan yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri orang -orang Indonesia yang memprioritaskan nilai -nilai saling menghormati, toleransi, dan inovasi.Kami selalu menerapkan nilai -nilai ini untuk semua karyawan.Ini pada saat yang sama menanggapi isu -isu seputar pidato anies di perayaan ke -90 Kanisius College, yang menutup Traveloka.

berita: Medan 13/02/2017, Responding to news in several print and online media about the circulation of Candy Dot which is suspected to contain drugs and other hazardous materials which was first discovered in Surabaya - East Java, so that it made the public nervous, especially those who have small children. In response to this, BB Pom Medan in collaboration with the North Sumatra BNN and feel the District / City Health Office carried out field supervision and from the results of the supervision that the bonbon dot was already circulating in several regions / districts in the North Sumatra region. Labfor Medan Branch has conducted an examination by taking samples from Langkat consisting of BB 1: Spray Candy, BB2: Candy Dot and BB3: White Powder, after being examined with GCMS and FTIR instruments, negative results were obtained for narcotics and psychotropic substances and after it was detected that the bonbon contained D-Glucose Monohydrate, Glucopur, Sweetener, D-Glucose, DL-Phenylalanie, Methy Ester, Methyl Stearate, Palmitic Acid and according to the Medan Branch of Labfor that all substances detected in the bonbon are generally used as sweeteners, not narcotics / psychotropics. . With the results from the Medan Branch Labfor Laboratory, it is appealed to the public not to panic, but so that people are wiser in consuming food products that have a distribution permit, and look at the expiration date so that it does not cause health.
berita_id: Medan 13/02/2017, menanggapi berita di beberapa media cetak dan online tentang sirkulasi permen yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan dan bahan berbahaya lainnya yang pertama kali ditemukan di Surabaya - Jawa Timur, sehingga membuat publik gugup, terutama mereka yang memiliki anak kecil.Menanggapi hal ini, BB Pom Medan bekerja sama dengan Sumatra Utara BNN dan merasa kantor kesehatan distrik / kota melakukan pengawasan lapangan dan dari hasil pengawasan bahwa titik bonbon sudah beredar di beberapa wilayah / distrik di wilayah Sumatra Utara.Labfor Medan Branch has conducted an examination by taking samples from Langkat consisting of BB 1: Spray Candy, BB2: Candy Dot and BB3: White Powder, after being examined with GCMS and FTIR instruments, negative results were obtained for narcotics and psychotropic substances and after it was detected that the bonbon contained D-Glucose Monohydrate, Glucopur, Sweetener, D-Glucose,DL-phenylalanie, mety ester, metil stearat, asam palmitat dan menurut cabang Medan laboratorium bahwa semua zat yang terdeteksi dalam bonbon umumnya digunakan sebagai pemanis, bukan narkotika / psikotropika..Dengan hasil dari laboratorium Medan Cabang Labfor, ia menarik bagi publik untuk tidak panik, tetapi sehingga orang lebih bijaksana dalam mengonsumsi produk makanan yang memiliki izin distribusi, dan melihat tanggal kedaluwarsa sehingga tidak menyebabkan kesehatan.

berita: JAKARTA - The thin body of the latest iPhone has raised the issue that the phone is easy to bend. This rumor plagued the iPhone 6 Plus when it was launched last year. The phone which has a thickness of 7.1 millimeters failed the curved test test. Yes, in some test tests uploaded on Youtube sharing videos, the phone's body is curved when testing. So what about the iPhone 6s Plus? Has a thickness that is 0.2 millimeters thicker than its predecessor, is it able to pass the bending test? In heaviness a video released by FoneFox on Youtube, Apple's latest flagship is apparently able to pass the bend test. The examiner performs the bending test by hand. By placing both thumbs in the center of the iPhone 6s Plus body, then pulling the other eight fingers to the opposite side, it turns out that the phone body does not change shape. Even though the tester issued 30 to 100 percent strength, the phone which has a thickness of 7.3 millimeters does not look curved and remains in its original position. It didn't stop there, the examiner then asked his friend for help to do the bending test again. As a result, the two testers were unable to bend the iPhone 6s Plus. As is known, Apple embeds the aluminum 7000 Series which is claimed by Apple to be very strong and stable to accommodate the hardware of this device.
