berita_id: JAKARTA - Tubuh tipis iPhone terbaru telah mengangkat masalah bahwa ponsel mudah ditekuk.Rumor ini mengganggu iPhone 6 Plus ketika diluncurkan tahun lalu.Telepon yang memiliki ketebalan 7,1 milimeter gagal uji uji melengkung.Ya, dalam beberapa tes tes yang diunggah di video berbagi YouTube, tubuh ponsel melengkung saat pengujian.Jadi bagaimana dengan iPhone 6s Plus?Apakah ketebalan yaitu 0,2 milimeter lebih tebal dari pendahulunya, apakah ia dapat lulus uji lentur?Dalam berat video yang dirilis oleh Fonefox di YouTube, andalan terbaru Apple tampaknya dapat lulus tes tikungan.Penguji melakukan tes lentur dengan tangan.Dengan menempatkan kedua jempol di tengah -tengah bodi iPhone 6s plus, kemudian menarik delapan jari lainnya ke sisi yang berlawanan, ternyata badan telepon tidak berubah bentuk.Meskipun penguji mengeluarkan kekuatan 30 hingga 100 persen, telepon yang memiliki ketebalan 7,3 milimeter tidak terlihat melengkung dan tetap berada dalam posisi aslinya.Itu tidak berhenti di situ, pemeriksa kemudian meminta bantuan temannya untuk melakukan tes tekukan lagi.Akibatnya, kedua penguji tidak dapat menekuk iPhone 6s Plus.Seperti diketahui, Apple menanamkan seri aluminium 7000 yang diklaim oleh Apple sangat kuat dan stabil untuk mengakomodasi perangkat keras perangkat ini.

berita: There is a bad habit of netizens that until now many are still infected. The habit is called talkative and lazy kroscek. In this era of social media, anyone can say anything, including irresponsible people. These people usually often provoke netizens with baseless hoax posts. Unfortunately, there are still many who are willing to spread it by reposting and retweeting. In fact, if you just want to check the truth of the news that you want to spread, you will certainly be safe from embarrassment when the real facts are later revealed. One of the most talked about lately is the meaning of pokemon. Along with the popularity of the game Pokemon Go, there are also fatwas and baseless posts about the meaning of pokemon. As expected, it was Muslims who were used as the butt of the hoax information. In fact, this could be part of a promotion or use of the momentum of the explosion of this game by certain parties, including site managers. From several posts spread on social media, it is said that pokemon means 'I am Jewish' in Syriac. Pikachu is said to mean 'be a Jew' and Charmander means 'God is weak'. Without tabayun and cross-check, many netizens are talkative and emotional. Those who feel disturbed by their Islam and feel manipulated by the game developer, then share or share online media links that contain this information. Who benefits the most in this situation? Of course, it was the site owner who spread the false news, because it was flooded with hot visitors. The most benefited is of course the game developer, who gets a free promotion. Also read: These are 5 Trending Phenomena Ahead of the National Examination, from Shari'a, Unique, to Shirk The question then is, is the information true or not? It turns out that Nintendo, the developer of this game, denied it. The LA Times called all of this a rumor that was completely unproven. As reported by Kotakgame.com, pokemon in English is an abbreviation of two words, namely Pocket Monster which means 'pocket monster'. You could say, these monsters called Pokemon have a small size and can be stored in the trainer's pocket. While Pikachu which is known as the icon of Pokemon time is also formed from two words, namely Pika (shining) and Chu (rat). From its shape alone it is clear that Pikachu is a mouse that glows or is armed with electric shocks. Finally, Charmander also has the meaning of burning fire, like the appearance of Charmander himself in the anime and Pokemon games. Also read: Consciously or not, it turns out that developing issues and hoaxes always lead to these 5 things A valuable lesson from things like this is that it is not easy to get emotional when receiving information. Digest first and precipitate in some time. If necessary, look for comparative information. Wait for more reliable information. Check the news source, credible or not. In the case of searching for meaning, there are many online dictionaries that can be used to check. I've also checked some dictionaries. One of them is almaany.com and in the Syriac language feature there is no word pokemon which means as spread by these hoax sites. Don't be easily provoked. Don't be too easy to click and share something whose truth needs to be doubted. If you do that, you won't be the target of the games of people who want to embarrass you.
berita_id: Ada kebiasaan buruk netizen yang sampai sekarang banyak yang masih terinfeksi.Kebiasaan itu disebut Kroscek yang banyak bicara dan malas.Di era media sosial ini, siapa pun dapat mengatakan apa pun, termasuk orang yang tidak bertanggung jawab.Orang -orang ini biasanya sering memancing netizen dengan posting tipuan yang tidak berdasar.Sayangnya, masih banyak yang bersedia menyebarkannya dengan memposting ulang dan me -retweet.Faktanya, jika Anda hanya ingin memeriksa kebenaran berita yang ingin Anda sebarkan, Anda pasti akan aman karena malu ketika fakta -fakta sebenarnya kemudian terungkap.Salah satu yang paling banyak dibicarakan akhir -akhir ini adalah arti Pokemon.Seiring dengan popularitas game Pokemon Go, ada juga fatwa dan posting yang tidak berdasar tentang arti Pokemon.Seperti yang diharapkan, umat Islam yang digunakan sebagai bokong informasi tipuan.Bahkan, ini bisa menjadi bagian dari promosi atau penggunaan momentum ledakan game ini oleh pihak -pihak tertentu, termasuk manajer situs.Dari beberapa posting yang tersebar di media sosial, dikatakan bahwa Pokemon berarti 'Saya Yahudi' di Syria.Pikachu dikatakan berarti 'menjadi orang Yahudi' dan Charmander berarti 'Tuhan itu lemah'.Tanpa Tabayun dan periksa silang, banyak netizen yang banyak bicara dan emosional.Mereka yang merasa terganggu oleh Islam mereka dan merasa dimanipulasi oleh pengembang game, kemudian berbagi atau berbagi tautan media online yang berisi informasi ini.Siapa yang paling menguntungkan dalam situasi ini?Tentu saja, pemilik situs yang menyebarkan berita palsu, karena dibanjiri oleh pengunjung panas.Yang paling diuntungkan tentu saja adalah pengembang game, yang mendapat promosi gratis.Baca juga: Ini adalah 5 fenomena tren di depan ujian nasional, dari syariah, unik, untuk melemahkan pertanyaan kemudian adalah, apakah informasinya benar atau tidak?Ternyata Nintendo, pengembang game ini, membantahnya.LA Times menyebut semua ini rumor yang sama sekali tidak terbukti.Seperti yang dilaporkan oleh Kotakgame.com, Pokemon dalam bahasa Inggris adalah singkatan dari dua kata, yaitu monster saku yang berarti 'monster saku'.Bisa dibilang, monster -monster yang disebut Pokemon ini memiliki ukuran kecil dan dapat disimpan di saku pelatih.Sementara Pikachu yang dikenal sebagai ikon waktu Pokemon juga terbentuk dari dua kata, yaitu pika (bersinar) dan chu (tikus).Dari bentuknya saja jelas bahwa Pikachu adalah tikus yang bersinar atau dipersenjatai dengan sengatan listrik.Akhirnya, Charmander juga memiliki arti membakar api, seperti penampilan Charmander sendiri di game anime dan pokemon.Baca Juga: Secara sadar atau tidak, ternyata mengembangkan masalah dan tipuan selalu menyebabkan 5 hal ini merupakan pelajaran berharga dari hal -hal seperti ini adalah bahwa tidak mudah untuk menjadi emosional ketika menerima informasi.Mencerna terlebih dahulu dan mengendap dalam beberapa waktu.Jika perlu, cari informasi komparatif.Tunggu informasi yang lebih andal.Periksa sumber berita, kredibel atau tidak.Dalam hal mencari makna, ada banyak kamus online yang dapat digunakan untuk memeriksa.Saya juga telah memeriksa beberapa kamus.Salah satunya adalah almaany.com dan dalam fitur bahasa Syria tidak ada kata pokemon yang berarti disebarkan oleh situs tipuan ini.Jangan mudah diprovokasi.Jangan terlalu mudah untuk mengklik dan berbagi sesuatu yang kebenarannya perlu diragukan.Jika Anda melakukannya, Anda tidak akan menjadi target permainan orang -orang yang ingin mempermalukan Anda.

berita: The raid on candy pacifiers indicated by drugs continues to be carried out by the Surabaya City government. There are three sub-district points that are moved by the Surabaya City Satpol PP to raid the green candy. Namely Genteng District, Rungkut District and Sawahan District. Sub-district Sawahan Surabaya City Yunus said raids had been carried out at three school points. "We raided SDN Pakis I, II, and IX on Jalan Pakistirtosari. The result was 20 teats," said Yunus. The pacifier is suspected to have drug content. Physically, the candy doesn't look like drugs, but rather like regular candy. "Those who sell it at street vendors around the school are immediately secured. We secure them and take them to the sub-district office," said Yunus. Not only pacifiers, but in the food and beverage raids at a number of elementary schools in Sawahan, a number of hard candies were also found. Namely candy that contains formaldehyde which  is dangerous if consumed by children. "For hard candy, there are 33 seeds and 17 packs of hard candy in tablet form. We also secure that," said Yunus.
berita_id: Penggerebekan dot permen yang ditunjukkan oleh narkoba terus dilakukan oleh pemerintah kota Surabaya.Ada tiga poin sub-distrik yang dipindahkan oleh Surabaya City Satpol PP untuk menyerang permen hijau.Yaitu Distrik Genteng, Distrik Rungkut dan Distrik Sawahan.Sub-distrik Sawahan Surabaya City Yunus mengatakan serangan telah dilakukan di tiga titik sekolah."Kami menggerebek Sdn Pakis I, II, dan IX di Jalan Pakistirtosari. Hasilnya adalah 20 dadah," kata Yunus.Dot diduga memiliki kandungan narkoba.Secara fisik, permen itu tidak terlihat seperti obat -obatan, tetapi lebih seperti permen biasa."Mereka yang menjualnya di pedagang kaki lima di sekitar sekolah segera diamankan. Kami mengamankannya dan membawanya ke kantor sub-distrik," kata Yunus.Tidak hanya dot, tetapi dalam serangan makanan dan minuman di sejumlah sekolah dasar di Sawahan, sejumlah permen keras juga ditemukan.Yaitu permen yang mengandung formaldehida yang berbahaya jika dikonsumsi oleh anak -anak."Untuk permen keras, ada 33 biji dan 17 bungkus permen keras dalam bentuk tablet. Kami juga mengamankannya," kata Yunus.

berita: Traveloka management spoke up in response to the bad news that hit the company. His party denied that there was a Walk Out (WO) action, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza said, Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders. "We are also proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from the Kanisius Alumni," said Busyra when confirmed by JawaPos.com, Tuesday (14/11). However, the news circulating on social media seems excessive. Because Busyra emphasized that although the founder received an award, Derianto was unable to attend. This is because Derianto is currently on an official trip that had been planned several months in advance. "He was unable to attend. However, this award further motivates us to increase our contribution to society by increasing mobility and improving the quality of life," he said. With this information, continued Busyra, Traveloka has firmly rejected the issues circulating on social media. "The statement already includes points that the public needs to know. We hope this can provide an explanation of the issues that are currently happening," he explained. Previously, Twitter social media was bustling with tweets of the Traveloka boycott. Even #UninstallTraveloka was at the top of Twitter's trending topic. The conversation emerged as a result of the Walk Out (WO) action of the famous Indonesian composer, Ananda ineffective Sukarlan when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech at the 90th anniversary of the establishment of Kanisius College at JIExpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Saturday (11/11). Rumors circulated, when Anies Baswedan gave a speech, Ananda suddenly stood up and then WO went out of the room. It is said that one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, who was present at the event, also greeted Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech. This was seen as support for Ananda's actions. However, the issue was finally clarified by Traveloka that Derianto was unable to attend at that time.
berita_id: Manajemen Traveloka berbicara sebagai tanggapan atas berita buruk yang menghantam perusahaan.Partainya membantah bahwa ada aksi Walk Out (WO), salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengatakan, Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi, dan inovasi.Nilai -nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal."Kami juga bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius," kata Busyra ketika dikonfirmasi oleh Jawapos.com, Selasa (14/11).Namun, berita yang beredar di media sosial tampaknya berlebihan.Karena Busyra menekankan bahwa meskipun pendiri menerima penghargaan, DeRianto tidak dapat hadir.Ini karena DeRianto saat ini sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya."Dia tidak dapat hadir. Namun, penghargaan ini semakin memotivasi kami untuk meningkatkan kontribusi kami kepada masyarakat dengan meningkatkan mobilitas dan meningkatkan kualitas hidup," katanya.Dengan informasi ini, lanjutan Busyra, Traveloka dengan tegas menolak masalah yang beredar di media sosial."Pernyataan itu sudah mencakup poin yang perlu diketahui publik. Kami berharap ini dapat memberikan penjelasan tentang masalah yang saat ini terjadi," jelasnya.Sebelumnya, media sosial Twitter ramai dengan tweet boikot Traveloka.Bahkan #uninstalltraveloka ada di puncak topik tren Twitter.Percakapan muncul sebagai akibat dari aksi Walk Out (WO) dari komposer Indonesia yang terkenal, Ananda tidak efektif Sukarlan ketika Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato pada peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius di Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakara, Sabtu, Sabtu.Rumor beredar, ketika Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato, Ananda tiba -tiba berdiri dan kemudian akan keluar dari ruangan.Dikatakan bahwa salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, yang hadir di acara tersebut, juga menyambut Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies.Ini dipandang sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Namun, masalah ini akhirnya diklarifikasi oleh Traveloka bahwa DeRianto tidak dapat hadir pada waktu itu.

berita: Not even a month, two of Apple's newest products, the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus, are already in doubt. Some iPhone 6 Plus users were beyond surprised when they found their favorite iPhone curved after being placed for a while in the back pocket of their pants. "Bendgate", is the term used by netizens to make fun of the weakness of Apple's latest iPhone. This reminds the tech-savvy public of the "antennagate" scandal that was popular among netizens in 2010. At that time, iPhone 4 users reported an antenna design error that caused frequent phone disconnections. Until this news was revealed, there has been no comment from Apple addition about the iPhone 6 Plus that can bend in the pocket. However, they announced they were investigating reports of problems found in the iOS 8 operating system (OS). In fact, Apple pulled the OS version 8.0.1. Based on observations on social media such as Facebook and Twitter, the problem of the iPhone 6 being curved makes jeans users worried. In fact, the phrase "Your pants are too tight for your phone" became popular and was mentioned over and over again.
berita_id: Bahkan tidak sebulan, dua produk terbaru Apple, iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus, sudah diragukan.Beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 Plus sangat terkejut ketika mereka menemukan iPhone favorit mereka melengkung setelah ditempatkan untuk sementara waktu di saku belakang celana mereka."Bendgate", adalah istilah yang digunakan oleh netizens untuk mengolok -olok kelemahan iPhone terbaru Apple.Ini mengingatkan publik yang paham teknologi tentang skandal "antena" yang populer di kalangan netizen pada tahun 2010. Pada waktu itu, pengguna iPhone 4 melaporkan kesalahan desain antena yang sering menyebabkan pemutusan telepon.Sampai berita ini terungkap, belum ada komentar dari tambahan Apple tentang iPhone 6 Plus yang dapat menekuk di saku.Namun, mereka mengumumkan bahwa mereka sedang menyelidiki laporan masalah yang ditemukan dalam Sistem Operasi IOS 8 (OS).Faktanya, Apple menarik OS versi 8.0.1.Berdasarkan pengamatan di media sosial seperti Facebook dan Twitter, masalah iPhone 6 yang melengkung membuat pengguna Jeans khawatir.Faktanya, frasa "celana Anda terlalu ketat untuk ponsel Anda" menjadi populer dan disebutkan berulang kali.

berita: The incident occurred in the terrorist detention room of the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters, Kelapa Dua, Depok. The commotion occurred after the prisoners entered after Friday prayers, November 10, 2017. The head of the Public Information Bureau of the National Police Public Relations Division, Brigadier General Rikwanto, said a number of prison facilities were damaged as a result of the incident. According to Rikwanto, the commotion started damage because of a search of cell phones in the detention room. As a result, four cell phones of detainees named Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam and Jumali were found. A number of prisoners did not accept it. One of the detainees deliberately provoked officers with provoking words and provoked other prisoners into action. Currently the situation can be subsided with the handling of picket officers. "Members of the picket from Sat-III Pioneers took action by shooting upwards to signal a commotion and to warn the inmates. Until now the atmosphere has been controlled by the Densus picket, after that members are on standby waiting for developments," he said.
berita_id: Peristiwa itu terjadi di ruang penahanan teroris dari markas Komando Brigade Seluler, Kelapa Dua, Depok.Keributan itu terjadi setelah para tahanan masuk setelah doa Jumat, 10 November 2017. Kepala Biro Informasi Publik Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Kepolisian Nasional, Brigadir Jenderal Rikwanto, mengatakan sejumlah fasilitas penjara rusak akibat insiden tersebut.Menurut Rikwanto, keributan mulai merusak karena pencarian ponsel di ruang penahanan.Akibatnya, empat ponsel tahanan bernama Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam dan Jumali ditemukan.Sejumlah tahanan tidak menerimanya.Salah satu tahanan dengan sengaja memprovokasi petugas dengan kata -kata yang memprovokasi dan memprovokasi tahanan lain untuk bertindak.Saat ini situasinya dapat mereda dengan penanganan petugas piket."Anggota piket dari Sat-III Pioneers mengambil tindakan dengan menembak ke atas untuk menandakan keributan dan untuk memperingatkan para narapidana. Sampai sekarang suasananya telah dikendalikan oleh piket Densus, setelah anggota itu sedang siaga menunggu perkembangan," katanya.

berita: Catfish is one type of fish that is a favorite in every dish on the food menu, it tastes good and the texture of the meat is soft, making this fish much recommended in culinary tours. But who would have thought that behind the delicious taste, it turns out that catfish has surprising facts. Catfish turns out to be the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. In one bite, catfish contains three thousand cancer cells. Really? The catfish pond is very dirty and surrounded by chicken coops and pigs. A catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he has supplied a lot of catfish to roadside markets and restaurants in Hainan province, to be precise in Haikou, which he harvests every 3 months. The number of complaints from the community made journalists try to find out about the fish from the local fisheries and marine department. They took pond samples from 7 ponds that housed the catfish. It turned out that the seven ponds were surrounded by chicken and pig cages, while in the middle of the ponds there were many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of their fish before the test results are out. Catfish is a fish that consumes waste Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places, by consuming animal waste such as chicken, cow and pig waste and even human waste. angle So it is possible catfish contains three thousand cancer cells that are harmful to the human body. Those are some facts about catfish in China, but conditions in China are different from those in Indonesia. In Indonesia, this fish is cultivated well by catfish farmers and for catfish food they do not use waste but pellets which are not harmful to health. So there is no need to hesitate to consume catfish in Indonesia, because cleanliness is guaranteed. Apart from all that, the health of consuming catfish depends on where the catfish breeds and what kind of food is given in cultivating it. Because it turns out that catfish also has substances that are beneficial to health, if the fish is cultivated properly. Here are 4 benefits of catfish: Healthy heart and brain Catfish contains omega-3 and omega-6 which are usually contained in expensive fish such as cod and salmon. The content of omega-3 and omega-6 can help heart and brain health activities, and it turns out that a serving of catfish contains 220 mg of omega-3 and 875 mg of omega-6. Contains protein with good quality In a serving of catfish contains 15.6 grams of protein which is very useful in the formation of muscle tissue and strengthens the immune system. Contains vitamin B-12 A serving of catfish contains vitamin B-12, which is about 40% of the body's needs. This vitamin is useful in helping to break down food into energy for the body, so consuming these foods can make the body stronger. Contains DHA Pregnant women are advised to eat catfish because this fish contains DHA which is good for the formation of the baby's nerves and also this fish has a very low mercury content so it is safe for consumption.
berita_id: Catfish adalah salah satu jenis ikan yang menjadi favorit di setiap hidangan di menu makanan, rasanya enak dan tekstur dagingnya lunak, membuat ikan ini sangat direkomendasikan dalam tur kuliner.Tetapi siapa yang akan berpikir bahwa di balik selera yang lezat, ternyata ikan lele memiliki fakta yang mengejutkan.Lele ternyata adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Dalam satu gigitan, ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker.Benar-benar?Kolam ikan lele sangat kotor dan dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi.Seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-hong mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele ke pasar jalan dan restoran di provinsi Hainan, tepatnya di haikou, yang ia panen setiap 3 bulan.Jumlah keluhan dari masyarakat membuat jurnalis mencoba mencari tahu tentang ikan dari perikanan dan departemen kelautan setempat.Mereka mengambil sampel kolam dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Ternyata ketujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sementara di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Para petani ikan disarankan untuk menangguhkan penjualan ikan mereka sebelum hasil tes keluar.Catfish adalah ikan yang mengkonsumsi limbah ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor, dengan mengonsumsi limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi dan limbah babi dan bahkan limbah manusia.Sudut sehingga mungkin ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Itu adalah beberapa fakta tentang ikan lele di Cina, tetapi kondisi di Cina berbeda dari yang ada di Indonesia.Di Indonesia, ikan ini dibudidayakan dengan baik oleh petani ikan lele dan untuk makanan lele mereka tidak menggunakan limbah tetapi pelet yang tidak berbahaya bagi kesehatan.Jadi tidak perlu ragu -ragu untuk mengonsumsi ikan lele di Indonesia, karena kebersihan dijamin.Terlepas dari semua itu, kesehatan mengonsumsi ikan lele tergantung pada di mana ikan lele berkembang biak dan jenis makanan apa yang diberikan dalam menanamnya.Karena ternyata ikan lele juga memiliki zat yang bermanfaat bagi kesehatan, jika ikan dibudidayakan dengan benar.Berikut adalah 4 manfaat ikan lele: Lelyal jantung dan otak yang sehat mengandung omega-3 dan omega-6 yang biasanya terkandung dalam ikan mahal seperti cod dan salmon.Isi omega-3 dan omega-6 dapat membantu kegiatan kesehatan jantung dan otak, dan ternyata sekumpulan ikan lele mengandung 220 mg omega-3 dan 875 mg omega-6.Mengandung protein dengan kualitas yang baik dalam porsi ikan lele mengandung 15,6 gram protein yang sangat berguna dalam pembentukan jaringan otot dan memperkuat sistem kekebalan tubuh.Mengandung vitamin B-12 Porsi ikan lele mengandung vitamin B-12, yang merupakan sekitar 40% dari kebutuhan tubuh.Vitamin ini berguna dalam membantu memecah makanan menjadi energi bagi tubuh, sehingga mengonsumsi makanan ini dapat membuat tubuh lebih kuat.Berisi wanita hamil DHA disarankan untuk makan lele karena ikan ini mengandung DHA yang baik untuk pembentukan saraf bayi dan juga ikan ini memiliki kandungan merkuri yang sangat rendah sehingga aman untuk dikonsumsi.

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia is confirmed to be a hoax. This certainty was revealed after the Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati confirmed this in front of journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace, West Java. ," he said. When giving information about President Joko Widodo's meeting with the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) delegation, he got a question about it. Menpan (in social media) it is a hoax, it is indeed like that. On social media today, there is a lot of information and documents that are made similar to those from the government and published," he said. Da In the issue, it is stated that offer the president will be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp. 553422694 per month. The vice president is said to be proposed to receive a salary of Rp. 368948462 per month.
berita_id: Berita yang beredar tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia dikonfirmasi menjadi tipuan.Kepastian ini terungkap setelah Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati mengkonfirmasi hal ini di depan jurnalis di Istana Presiden Bogor, Jawa Barat., "Dia berkata. Ketika memberikan informasi tentang pertemuan Presiden Joko Widodo dengan delegasi Bank Investasi Infrastruktur Asia (AIIB), ia mendapat pertanyaan tentang hal itu. Menpan (di media sosial) itu adalah tipuan, memang seperti itu. Di media sosial hari ini, ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan yang dipublikasikan dan dipublikasikan," katanya.DA Dalam masalah ini, dinyatakan bahwa penawaran presiden akan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji hingga RP.553422694 per bulan.Wakil presiden dikatakan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji RP.368948462 per bulan.

berita: Jakarta - iPhone 6 Plus has complained that a number of users have the disadvantage of being easy to bend if it is stored in a trouser pocket for too long. Apple is considered to have made a big mistake by choosing a metal-aluminum alloy mixture that is not too solid as the base material for the iPhone 6 Plus frame. For that weakness, Apple's new smartphone with a 5.5-inch jumbo sail is now reported to be the subject of ridicule on various social media. A number of Apple's competitors did not waste this opportunity to 'beat' Apple. According to the Business Insider page, Thursday (25/9/2014), the hashtag #bendgate, or what can be interpreted as the 'curvy scandal' of the iPhone 6Plus has become a hot topic on a number of social voyage media. Many users of Twitter, Path, and various other photo social networks mock the weakness of the iPhone 6 Plus. An example is what the snack brand's official Twitter account @KitKat did. The brand, which is indeed a partnership with Google, posted a photo insinuating how fragile the iPhone 6 handset frame is. They also tweeted, "We don't bend, we #break. #bendgate #iPhone6plus. There was also another internet user who posted photos to the Imgur website. The photo he posted is an imitation of the official Apple website. It describes a hoax feature belonging to the iPhone 6 Plus called 'Flex' It was stated that the curvature of the iPhone 6 Plus body was not a drawback, but indeed one of the special features that was deliberately embedded in the smartphone. This feature is useful for providing a better view of watching videos, just like LG's curved screen concept
berita_id: Jakarta - iPhone 6 Plus telah mengeluh bahwa sejumlah pengguna memiliki kelemahan mudah ditekuk jika disimpan dalam saku celana panjang terlalu lama.Apple dianggap telah membuat kesalahan besar dengan memilih campuran paduan logam-aluminium yang tidak terlalu padat sebagai bahan dasar untuk bingkai iPhone 6 Plus.Untuk kelemahan itu, smartphone baru Apple dengan layar jumbo 5,5 inci sekarang dilaporkan menjadi subjek ejekan di berbagai media sosial.Sejumlah pesaing Apple tidak menyia -nyiakan kesempatan ini untuk 'mengalahkan' Apple.Menurut halaman Business Insider, Kamis (25/9/2014), tagar #Bendgate, atau apa yang dapat ditafsirkan sebagai 'skandal melengkung' dari iPhone 6Plus telah menjadi topik hangat di sejumlah media perjalanan sosial.Banyak pengguna Twitter, Path, dan berbagai jejaring sosial foto lainnya mengejek kelemahan iPhone 6 Plus.Contohnya adalah apa yang dilakukan akun Twitter resmi merek Snack Brand.Merek, yang memang merupakan kemitraan dengan Google, memposting foto yang menyindir betapa rapuhnya bingkai handset iPhone 6.Mereka juga tweeted, "We Don't Bend, We #break. #BendGate #iPhone6plus. Ada juga pengguna internet lain yang memposting foto ke situs web Imgur. Foto yang dipostingnya adalah tiruan dari situs web Apple resmi. Ini menggambarkan fitur hoax yang dimiliki oleh iphone 6 yang disebut 'Flex' yang dinyatakan bahwa kelulusan iPhone 6 plus tidak ada aturan, tetapi adalah satu -satunya fitur yang ditambah, tetapi adalah satu -satunya fitur yang ditambah dengan iphone, tetapi tidak ada yang menarik, tidak ada fitur yang dikerjakan, tidak ada yang menarik, tidak ada latar belakang, tidak ada lewatnya, tidak ada latar belakang yang tidak ada.Fitur berguna untuk memberikan tampilan yang lebih baik tentang menonton video, seperti konsep layar melengkung LG

berita: The Pokemon Go fever in the community is accompanied by unpleasant rumors in cyberspace. The first time it appears the word Pokemon means 'I'm a Jew' while Pikachu means 'be a Jew'. While judaic the last Pokemon was developed because of anti-Islam, because there are many Pokemon in the mosque. Is that right? Budi Rahardjo, Lecturer at the School of Electrical and Informatics Engineering, ITB, assessed that the spotlight on Pokemon Go which was associated with religion was considered irrelevant and excessive. The uproar over the Pokemon Go phenomenon is quite off the mark, when it comes to religious issues. "Pokemon Go was developed by people who are anti-Islam? Wow, this is a far cry in theory. The reason is because there are many Pokemon in the mosque," said Budi in Bandung, Sunday (24/7). According to Budi, the database for the placement of Pokemon comes from the improvement of the Ingress game application developed by Niantic Labs, the company that makes the two applications. Ingress is a digital game based on mobile devices that challenges gamers to explore the world and dominate certain places as their territory. Both Ingress and Pokemon utilize augmented reality technology and are also based on location mapping with GPS, allowing users to seek virtual power in places such as museums, monuments and public open spaces. Ingress was released in 2013 for Android, followed by iOS in 2014. The mosque, continued Budi, happened to be a place where many people gathered and were registered in Ingress before. "Moreover, Indonesia is the largest Muslim country in the world. That's all, so there is no conspiracy here," said Budi. According to him, however, Niantic is a purely commercial private company. They really value the confidentiality of user data. Otherwise, the business will self-destruct. Large digital companies generally don't like to hand over this data to the government, although they sometimes sell this data for other business purposes such as advertising. "So in general, the Nintendo company doesn't cooperate with the CIA, even though the CIA is famous for wiretapping American companies as well. So it could be wiretapping, but without the company's knowledge. So there was spy-and-contra-spy between them. . Compete intelligence, "added Budi. 'I'm Jewish' Besides being associated with religious issues, Pokemon also has other negative news for its fans. For example, recently, there has been a link circulating on social media that says Pokemon has a negative meaning and corners one religion. Many circulating on social media that Pokemon actually in Syriac or Syriac means "I am Jewish". While Pikachu is said to mean "Be Jewish", and Charmander means "God is Weak". This of course raises the pros and cons and becomes a heated debate on social media. Many believe and share the rumor, many think it's just a fittology. When the Pokemon cartoons were on the rise in the early 2000s, the Los Angeles Times had issued a report on this issue in the April 24, 2001 issue. At that time, countries located in the Middle East had indeed had a problem with it. In the LA Times, it was stated that at that time in Middle Eastern countries such as Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Jordan, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia, rumors circulated that Pokemon games had connotations that promoted anti-Islamic behavior and believed in Judaism. Nintendo of course denied this, but the leaders of these countries still can not accept Pokemon. The rumors arose amid concerns Arab countries would assimilate the emerging culture. Sheik Abdel Monem abu Zent, ​​a former member of the Jordanian parliament said that this toy is part of a Jewish plan to corrupt the minds of our young generation because it offends blasphemous thoughts, mocks God and our moral values ​​so that it is very dangerous for the younger generation. Meanwhile, Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor from Al Azhar University, said that until now there was no strong evidence that confirmed the rumors that made parents forbid their children to play the Pokemon game. In a statement in Jordan's Amman newspaper, the Syriac Orthodox Christian Church denied allegations that Pokemon and other character names have roots in ancient Syriac and insult Islam. Church officials said they were surprised by the incoming letter stating that Pokemon contained a Jewish invitation. This of course causes anxiety. He said if he had even asked directly to the party who popularized Pokemon. Pokemon is actually just an abbreviation of Pocket Monster or pocket monster. Named Pocket Monster because this pokemon has a pocket ball that can be put in a pocket. Meanwhile Pikachu is a combination of the words Pika and Chu. Pika is the name of an animal that is still in the same family as rabbits, while Chu in Japanese means squeak.
berita_id: Pokemon Go Fever di komunitas disertai dengan rumor yang tidak menyenangkan di dunia maya.Pertama kali tampaknya kata pokemon berarti 'saya seorang Yahudi' sementara Pikachu berarti 'menjadi orang Yahudi'.Sementara Yudaus Pokemon terakhir dikembangkan karena anti-Islam, karena ada banyak Pokemon di masjid.Apakah itu benar?Budi Rahardjo, dosen di School of Electrical and Informatics Engineering, ITB, menilai bahwa sorotan pada Pokemon Go yang dikaitkan dengan agama dianggap tidak relevan dan berlebihan.Keributan atas fenomena Pokemon Go cukup jauh, ketika menyangkut masalah agama."Pokemon Go dikembangkan oleh orang-orang yang anti-Islam? Wow, ini jauh sekali dalam teori. Alasannya adalah karena ada banyak Pokemon di masjid," kata Budi di Bandung, Minggu (24/7).Menurut Budi, database untuk penempatan Pokemon berasal dari peningkatan aplikasi game Ingress yang dikembangkan oleh Niantic Labs, perusahaan yang membuat dua aplikasi.Ingress adalah permainan digital berdasarkan perangkat seluler yang menantang gamer untuk menjelajahi dunia dan mendominasi tempat -tempat tertentu sebagai wilayah mereka.Baik Ingress dan Pokemon menggunakan teknologi augmented reality dan juga didasarkan pada pemetaan lokasi dengan GPS, memungkinkan pengguna untuk mencari kekuatan virtual di tempat -tempat seperti museum, monumen dan ruang terbuka publik.Ingress dirilis pada 2013 untuk Android, diikuti oleh iOS pada tahun 2014. Masjid, lanjutan Budi, kebetulan menjadi tempat di mana banyak orang berkumpul dan terdaftar di Ingress sebelumnya."Selain itu, Indonesia adalah negara Muslim terbesar di dunia. Itu saja, jadi tidak ada konspirasi di sini," kata Budi.Namun, menurutnya, Niantic adalah perusahaan swasta yang murni komersial.Mereka benar -benar menghargai kerahasiaan data pengguna.Kalau tidak, bisnis akan menghancurkan diri sendiri.Perusahaan digital besar umumnya tidak suka menyerahkan data ini kepada pemerintah, meskipun kadang -kadang mereka menjual data ini untuk tujuan bisnis lain seperti iklan."Jadi secara umum, perusahaan Nintendo tidak bekerja sama dengan CIA, meskipun CIA juga terkenal dengan penyadapan perusahaan Amerika. Jadi itu bisa disisipkan, tetapi tanpa sepengetahuan perusahaan. Jadi ada mata-mata-dan-kontra di antara mereka ... bersaing intelijen," tambah Buda.'I'm Jewish' selain dikaitkan dengan masalah agama, Pokemon juga memiliki berita negatif lainnya untuk para penggemarnya.Sebagai contoh, baru -baru ini, ada tautan yang beredar di media sosial yang mengatakan Pokemon memiliki makna negatif dan menyentuh satu agama.Banyak yang beredar di media sosial bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya di Syria atau Syria berarti "Saya Yahudi".Sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi Yahudi", dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Ini tentu saja meningkatkan pro dan kontra dan menjadi perdebatan sengit di media sosial.Banyak yang percaya dan berbagi rumor, banyak yang berpikir itu hanya fitologi.Ketika kartun Pokemon sedang meningkat di awal 2000 -an, Los Angeles Times telah mengeluarkan laporan tentang masalah ini dalam edisi 24 April 2001.Pada saat itu, negara -negara yang berlokasi di Timur Tengah memang memiliki masalah dengannya.Di LA Times, dinyatakan bahwa pada waktu itu di negara-negara Timur Tengah seperti Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Yordania, Mesir, dan Arab Saudi, desas-desus beredar bahwa permainan Pokemon memiliki konotasi yang mempromosikan perilaku anti-Islam dan percaya pada Yudaisme.Nintendo tentu saja membantah ini, tetapi para pemimpin negara -negara ini masih tidak dapat menerima Pokemon.Rumor muncul di tengah kekhawatiran negara -negara Arab akan mengasimilasi budaya yang muncul.Sheik Abdel Monem Abu Zent, ​​mantan anggota parlemen Yordania mengatakan bahwa mainan ini adalah bagian dari rencana Yahudi untuk merusak pikiran generasi muda kita karena menyinggung pikiran yang menghembuskan pikiran, mengejek Tuhan dan nilai -nilai moral kita sehingga sangat berbahaya bagi generasi muda.Sementara itu, Mohammed Abu Laila, seorang profesor dari Universitas Al Azhar, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada bukti kuat yang mengkonfirmasi rumor yang membuat orang tua melarang anak -anak mereka untuk memainkan permainan Pokemon.Dalam sebuah pernyataan di surat kabar Amman Jordan, Gereja Kristen Syria Ortodoks membantah tuduhan bahwa Pokemon dan nama karakter lainnya berakar pada Syria kuno dan menghina Islam.Pejabat gereja mengatakan mereka terkejut dengan surat yang masuk yang menyatakan bahwa Pokemon berisi undangan Yahudi.Ini tentu saja menyebabkan kecemasan.Dia mengatakan apakah dia bahkan bertanya langsung kepada pesta yang mempopulerkan Pokemon.Pokemon sebenarnya hanya singkatan dari monster saku atau monster saku.Named Pocket Monster karena Pokemon ini memiliki bola saku yang dapat dimasukkan ke dalam saku.Sementara itu Pikachu adalah kombinasi dari kata -kata Pika dan Chu.Pika adalah nama hewan yang masih berada di keluarga yang sama dengan kelinci, sementara Chu dalam bahasa Jepang berarti mencicit.

berita: Some time ago, messages circulated on social media and through short messages about preventing strokes in times of emergency. Broadly speaking, the sound of the message suggests sticking a needle into the patient's fingers. The goal is for blood circulation to return smoothly so that a stroke does not occur. Is that right? A neurologist at Siloam Kebon Jeruk Hospital, Fandy Susatia, during Soho #BetterU, Tuesday (20/5/2014), said that basically a stroke does occur due to blockage of blood vessels. But the blockage only occurs in blood mansion vessels in the brain. So it's not true if sticking a needle can prevent a stroke. It's just a myth, he said. Such actions, he continued, could actually endanger themselves. If the finger of a diabetic is stabbed, the wound healing process will take place slowly so there is a risk of infection. Stroke treatment costs will increase because they have to buy antibiotics for wound healing, he said. This advice is just one of many myths related to stroke. Other myths as described by Fandy include strokes cannot be prevented and treated, only older people have strokes, the sign of stroke is pain, and strokes occur in the heart.
berita_id: Beberapa waktu yang lalu, pesan beredar di media sosial dan melalui pesan singkat tentang mencegah stroke di saat darurat.Secara umum, suara pesan menunjukkan memasukkan jarum ke jari pasien.Tujuannya adalah untuk sirkulasi darah kembali dengan lancar sehingga stroke tidak terjadi.Apakah itu benar?Seorang ahli saraf di Rumah Sakit Siloam Kebon Jeruk, Fandy Susatia, selama Soho #Betteru, Selasa (20/5/2014), mengatakan bahwa pada dasarnya stroke memang terjadi karena penyumbatan pembuluh darah.Tetapi penyumbatan hanya terjadi pada pembuluh darah darah di otak.Jadi tidak benar jika menempelkan jarum dapat mencegah stroke.Itu hanya mitos, katanya.Tindakan seperti itu, lanjutnya, benar -benar bisa membahayakan diri mereka sendiri.Jika jari penderita diabetes ditikam, proses penyembuhan luka akan berlangsung perlahan sehingga ada risiko infeksi.Biaya perawatan stroke akan meningkat karena mereka harus membeli antibiotik untuk penyembuhan luka, katanya.Saran ini hanyalah salah satu dari banyak mitos yang berkaitan dengan stroke.Mitos -mitos lain seperti yang dijelaskan oleh Fandy termasuk stroke tidak dapat dicegah dan dirawat, hanya orang yang lebih tua yang memiliki pukulan, tanda stroke adalah rasa sakit, dan goresan terjadi di jantung.

berita: The Kanisius College Alumni Association (PAKKJ) issued an official statement regarding the comments made by one of its alumni during the 90th Anniversary of Canisius College on November 11, 2017. "We respect freedom of expression. However, we regret that the statement was made at an inappropriate moment," said PAKKJ Chairperson Sharief Natanegara in Jakarta, Tuesday (11/14/2017). He explained that the presence of Governor Anies Baswedan in the event actually got the attention of the alumni and there were no group walk outs as reported on social media. The Canisius For Indonesia Festival is the culmination of a series of 90th Anniversary of Canisius College. The celebration which consists of three main parts, namely the nation's children's party, Prayer for the Nation, and the Canisius Symphony for Indonesia is a form of gratitude and an expression of commitment from all Kanisians, Alumni, Fathers, and Educators to spread the hope of building the nation amidst the diversity in society. the framework of the Unitary State of the Republic of Indonesia which is based on Pancasila. Kanisius College has been established and has become a part of the history of Indonesia for 90 years and has produced thousands of alumni with the spirit of "Man for request Others" who have dedicated their work to the beloved Indonesian nation. For this reason, Sharief requested that all parties not be provoked by things circulating on social media. One of the long traditions at Kanisius always prioritizes and respects everyone who is present in every activity carried out. "This has become part of the Kanisian values ​​that have been instilled since being a student at Kanisius College," concluded Sharief.
berita_id: Asosiasi Alumni Kanisius College (PakKJ) mengeluarkan pernyataan resmi mengenai komentar yang dibuat oleh salah satu alumninya selama peringatan 90 tahun Canisius College pada 11 November 2017. "Kami menghormati kebebasan berekspresi. Namun, kami menyesal bahwa pernyataan itu dibuat pada saat yang tidak pantas," kata Ketua Pakkj N Natanegara.Dia menjelaskan bahwa kehadiran Gubernur Anies Baswedan dalam acara tersebut benar -benar mendapat perhatian para alumni dan tidak ada jalan keluar kelompok seperti yang dilaporkan di media sosial.Festival Canisius untuk Indonesia adalah puncak dari serangkaian peringatan 90 tahun Canisius College.Perayaan yang terdiri dari tiga bagian utama, yaitu partai anak -anak bangsa, doa untuk bangsa, dan simfoni Canisius untuk Indonesia adalah bentuk rasa terima kasih dan ekspresi komitmen dari semua warga Kanada, alumni, ayah, dan pendidik untuk menyebarkan harapan untuk membangun bangsa di tengah keanekaragaman dalam masyarakat.Kerangka kerja kesatuan Republik Indonesia yang didasarkan pada Pancasila.Kanisius College telah didirikan dan telah menjadi bagian dari sejarah Indonesia selama 90 tahun dan telah menghasilkan ribuan alumni dengan semangat "manusia untuk meminta orang lain" yang telah mendedikasikan pekerjaan mereka untuk negara Indonesia yang dicintai.Untuk alasan ini, Sharief meminta agar semua pihak tidak diprovokasi oleh hal -hal yang beredar di media sosial.Salah satu tradisi panjang di Kanisius selalu memprioritaskan dan menghormati setiap orang yang hadir dalam setiap kegiatan yang dilakukan."Ini telah menjadi bagian dari nilai -nilai Kanisia yang telah ditanamkan sejak menjadi mahasiswa di Kanisius College," pungkas Sharief.

berita: A chain message about vigilance against toothbrushes made from pig come with bristles is spreading in the community. Because of this, there is the word bristle on the packaging of a global toothbrush brand. The message is not really new. The message was spread a year ago, but now it's crowded again. "Let's check the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the packaging, it means that the toothbrush contains pig bristles. Bristle means pig hair. As soon as the sound of the message fragments spread again through the chat application. Not only on toothbrushes, the message maker also suggested that people check the bread brushes. He said the brush usually says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". As with other hoax messages, the appeal was accompanied by a request to share the message with family and friends in the group so that more people would be spared from non-halal products. It turned out that the informant had misunderstood. Maybe, when he wrote the message, he had not had coffee. Because, the term bristle is not only used for sea urchins.
berita_id: Pesan rantai tentang kewaspadaan terhadap sikat gigi yang terbuat dari babi datang dengan bulu menyebar di masyarakat.Karena itu, ada kata bulu pada kemasan merek sikat gigi global.Pesannya tidak terlalu baru.Pesan itu tersebar setahun yang lalu, tapi sekarang sudah ramai lagi."Mari kita periksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan" berbulu "pada kemasannya, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi. Bulu berarti rambut babi. Begitu suara fragmen pesan menyebar lagi melalui aplikasi obrolan. Tidak hanya pada sikat gigi," Pacar juga menyarankan agar orang -orang memeriksa sikat roti.Banding itu disertai dengan permintaan untuk berbagi pesan dengan keluarga dan teman-teman dalam kelompok sehingga lebih banyak orang akan terhindar dari produk non-halal.

berita: A netizen shared news of the riots that occurred at the Mako Brimob Rutan, Depok. The news circulating take widely on social media said that the rioting started after the prison officers threw the Koran. There has been a riot at the Headquarters of Brimob Kelapa Dua, two depots where terrorist prisoners burned and destroyed the room because the guard Ahmad and his team threw the Koran and caused the prisoners to go berserk. The chronology of the beginning of the riots is also written. The cause of the incident that spread was that Karutan and Brimob came to the isolation rooms of the asatidz, then they ransacked the rooms of the clerics to look for cellphones even though there was a cleric who was sick and they didn't care. The peak of Ikhwah's anger was when Brimob shuffled books of monotheism and threw books and the Koran. Then the brothers who did not accept takbir because they did not accept the Brimob treatment that abused Asatidz and the Koran. After the ikhwah shouted takbir, the Brimob shouted YOU ALL DOG Then they beat some of our brothers, and that's where the anger of the brothers caused a riot in the prison. The riots at the detention center and Brimob had fired several warning shots at the brothers who were out of control because the Koran was being abused. POLRI'S OFFICIAL RESPONSE The rioting took place at the Brimob Mako Rutan, Depok, West Java, this afternoon. According to the police, the trigger was that there were prisoners who did not accept being examined and provoked a commotion. According to Karo Penmas, Police Public Relations Division, Brigadier General Rikwanto, a commotion occurred at the Mako Brimob terrorist detention center at the Salemba detention center, Depok, West Java, this afternoon at around 16.00 WIB, Friday (11/10/2017). Rikwanto explained that after Friday prayers, the detainees were put into their respective cells by the Densus 88 team. While carrying out these activities, the Densus 88 team conducted a search. There are 4 pieces of HP found. "Four cellphones were found. They belonged to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, and Jumali," he said. detikcom notes, they are convicts of terrorism cases. One of the detainees did not accept the search. According to Rikwanto, the detainee who was not named then made a provocation. "It is true that with the inspection activities, one of the prisoners did not accept it and provoked the officers with various words, then some members were provoked by their words and there were prisoners who were takbir loudly so that they provoked the prisoners of the next block," he explained. As a result, riots ensued. A number of facilities in the prison were damaged by the inmates. "The prison cell door was broken into, the gate of the block hallway, the window panes (in Block C and Block B)," said Rikwanto. But it didn't last long. The apparatus, according to Rikwanto, immediately took control of the situation. Rikwanto also denied that there was a wild issue on social media that said this incident was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by the authorities. "Hoax," he insisted.
berita_id: Netizen berbagi berita tentang kerusuhan yang terjadi di Mako Brimob Rutan, Depok.Berita yang beredar secara luas di media sosial mengatakan bahwa kerusuhan dimulai setelah petugas penjara melemparkan Alquran.Ada kerusuhan di markas Brimob Kelapa Dua, dua depot di mana tahanan teroris membakar dan menghancurkan ruangan itu karena penjaga Ahmad dan timnya melemparkan Alquran dan menyebabkan para tahanan mengamuk.Kronologi awal kerusuhan juga ditulis.Penyebab kejadian yang menyebar adalah bahwa Karutan dan Brimob datang ke ruang isolasi Asatidz, kemudian mereka menggeledah kamar -kamar ulama untuk mencari ponsel meskipun ada ulama yang sakit dan mereka tidak peduli.Puncak kemarahan Ikhwah adalah ketika Brimob mengocok buku -buku monoteisme dan melemparkan buku dan Alquran.Kemudian saudara -saudara yang tidak menerima Takbir karena mereka tidak menerima perlakuan Brimob yang melecehkan Asatidz dan Alquran.Setelah Ikhwah meneriakkan Takbir, brimob meneriakkan Anda semua anjing kemudian mereka mengalahkan beberapa saudara kita, dan di situlah kemarahan saudara -saudara menyebabkan kerusuhan di penjara.Kerusuhan di pusat penahanan dan Brimob telah menembakkan beberapa tembakan peringatan pada saudara -saudara yang di luar kendali karena Alquran dilecehkan.Tanggapan resmi Polri, kerusuhan itu terjadi di Brimob Mako Rutan, Depok, Jawa Barat, sore ini.Menurut polisi, pemicunya adalah bahwa ada tahanan yang tidak menerima diperiksa dan memicu keributan.Menurut Karo Penmas, Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Polisi, Brigadir Jenderal Rikwanto, keributan terjadi di Pusat Penahanan Teroris Mako Brimob di Pusat Penahanan Salemba, Depok, Jawa Barat, sore ini sekitar 16.00 WIB, Jumat (11/10/2017).Rikwanto menjelaskan bahwa setelah doa Jumat, para tahanan dimasukkan ke dalam sel masing -masing oleh tim Densus 88.Saat melakukan kegiatan ini, tim Densus 88 melakukan pencarian.Ada 4 potong HP yang ditemukan."Empat ponsel ditemukan. Mereka milik Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, dan Jumali," katanya.Detikcom mencatat, mereka adalah narapidana kasus terorisme.Salah satu tahanan tidak menerima pencarian.Menurut Rikwanto, tahanan yang tidak dinamai kemudian membuat provokasi."Memang benar bahwa dengan kegiatan inspeksi, salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan memprovokasi para petugas dengan berbagai kata, kemudian beberapa anggota diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka dan ada tahanan yang Takbir dengan keras sehingga mereka memicu tahanan blok berikutnya," jelasnya.Akibatnya, kerusuhan terjadi.Sejumlah fasilitas di penjara rusak oleh para tahanan."Pintu sel penjara dipecah, gerbang lorong blok, panel jendela (di blok C dan blok B)," kata Rikwanto.Tapi itu tidak bertahan lama.Peralatan, menurut Rikwanto, segera mengendalikan situasi.Rikwanto juga membantah bahwa ada masalah liar di media sosial yang mengatakan kejadian ini dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh pihak berwenang."Berbagai arah," tegasnya.

berita: Catfish is a fish that lives in fresh water, besides being a catfish farm fish, it also usually lives in lakes, swamps, muddy water and rivers. Catfish has a special characteristic in the form of a fairly long mustache and dark skin such as brown, gray to black. This fish is a very familiar fish, almost every food stall provides a menu of catfish. The dangers of eating catfish are still largely unknown to the general public because after consuming it, they have not felt any symptoms or complaints. Catfish is a favorite food for young and old because it has a savory and delicious taste and has very good nutritional content for the health of the body. Nutritional value Nutrient content in catfish: High protein around 18.7 11.2 g Iron 21.2 mgr Sodium 150.90 mgr Unsaturated fat 1.10.7 g Phosphorus 260.156 mgr Calcium 15.9 mg Vitamin B1 (Thiamine) 0.100.06 mgr Vitamin B2 (Riboflavin) 0.05 0.03 mgr Niacin around 2.0 1.2 mgr High protein around 18.7 11.2 g Getting to know catfish The basic properties possessed by catfish are surprising: Can survive in bad conditions and dirty containing household waste, namely with a low oxygen content capacity of 6 ppm, Co2 less than 12 ppm, a fairly stable temperature between 23 to 26 degrees, surviving in locations containing less than 1 ppm NH3. Catfish and African catfish are basically easy to adapt and like places that are relatively dirty, muddy, moist and tend to be dark. These conditions can cause the growth of new catfish to grow rapidly. Likes rotten food from any micro-organisms including animal and human waste. No wonder the catfish is listed as an omnivorous animal or an animal that eats almost the same thing as a broom fish. Catfish The Dirtiest Fish, One Mouth contains Three Thousand Cancer Cells, Here's the Explanation Catfish is one of the favorite food menus and even in every food stall this menu is always available because the price is quite cheap and delicious can be the main attraction for this one fish. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is that? The following is an explanation The catfish pond is very dirty and surrounded by chicken and pig coops According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he has supplied a lot of catfish to markets and roadside restaurants in Hainan province to be precise in Haikou which he harvested 3 months Because there are so many complaints from the community, the journalists searched about the fish from the local fisheries and marine department. The reporters took samples from the 7 ponds that housed the catfish. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken and pig cages, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of their fish before the test results are out. Catfish is a fish that consumes waste Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places because these fish consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pigs, even this fish can also consume human waste. So it is possible that in the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. The dangers of eating catfish: Hyperthyroidism Many breeders use animal carcasses, animal dung because they are close to livestock cages such as chickens, goats, pigs or cows and deliberately dispose of all household waste or waste which is suspected to contain heavy metals which if entered into the body. catfish and is consumed by humans in the long term, so the danger of eating catfish that will be experienced by consumers is in the form of disturbances in the thyroid gland around the neck. The neck will feel pain, swelling and inflammation and infection will occur. This condition is caused by increased fluid in the thyroid. Abnormal cell growth. Processing of catfish that uses used oil or that has been used repeatedly will contain free radicals in which there are solid saturated fatty acids and are chorinogenic triggers the appearance of abnormal cells in the body's DNA. Too often consume catfish fried in black cooking oil which contains the poison trans 2 hydroxyloktenal (HNE) which has been proven to have the potential to cause a person to develop liver cancer, stomach cancer and others. Did you know that the dangers of eating catfish that cause cancer have been proven to have happened a lot in neighboring China. Contains various kinds of active bacteria. Many catfish are kept in a bad way, for example, fish ponds are deliberately built where there are latrines for human waste disposal. Catfish is a type of fish that can survive in dirty water and contains mud which has been contaminated with bacteria, heavy metals and germs produced from rotting animal carcasses. Catfish will eat whatever is around it. Catfish that eat human waste can cause nutritional quality to be lost and contain a lot of bacteria including e-coli bacteria that cause stomach pain and diarrhea. Some contain metal. As long as catfish are kept in ponds and ponds that are far from livestock cages and latrines and use clean water and good feed, the condition of catfish meat will be protected from metals, bacteria and deposition of toxic waste particles that cause cancer and tumor growth. . When kept in a dirty place with indiscriminate food, the catfish will contain a lot of metal or mercury that causes cancer. Heart disease The condition of catfish that is kept with poor cultivation and then added with cooking methods using trans oil will multiply the danger to the body, including triggering blockages in the arteries of the heart which in the long run can cause heart disease. This heart disorder will not only attack adults but has the potential for young people regardless of consuming catfish that contains toxins that are fried in saturated oil or not. The danger of eating catfish is the emergence of heart disease consisting of coronary heart disease, heart failure and others which are the most dangerous threats. Contains Mercury In this modern era technology is increasingly advanced but environmental conditions are increasingly being neglected with a lot of environmental pollution. Almost all fish contain mercury, which is a substance that can harm your nervous system. But you don't need to worry because you can still eat catfish, except for catfish that grow on high mercury contamination. Most research reveals that catfish is a fish that contains very little mercury. The environmental watchdog also states that catfish is a fish that is safe for consumption. The best tips so that you can enjoy catfish that are rich in benefits without problems: Buy live catfish that are cared for and cultivated by farmers using clean water and special feed for catfish or healthy foods such as tofu, small fish, rice, cassava, sweet potato and others. At least the ponds or ponds used in the vicinity do not have livestock cages and are far from latrines or public toilets. Cook catfish at home with good oil to avoid the dangers of eating catfish in the form of free radical attacks generated from the air or avoid unsaturated fats that contain chorinogenic substances that trigger cancer cells which are usually used by naughty roadside traders. Consuming catfish should be combined with other nutritious foods so that the level of nutrition produced can be maximally absorbed by the body and improve health from day to day without problems. For example, eating catfish with eggs and tempeh so that we never experience the dangers of eating catfish. Do not eat catfish meat in a half-cooked state in order to avoid microorganisms that may take be in it even though the fish is kept in good cultivation. Cooking until cooked whatever meat we like is better than half cooked let alone raw. The process of boiling or frying allows all microorganisms present in catfish to be easily neutralized.

When Facebook Will Be Closed - Recently, there has been a lot of talk about Facebook being closed or frozen in the country, this is certainly very troubling for those who have been relying on Facebook as a medium of communication or also a medium for selling goods online. Actually, it is not without reason why the government wants to block Facebook, this is because of the misuse of leaked data on Facebook users, so it is feared that later it will endanger the stability of domestic security. Facebook itself has long been used by the Indonesian people as a medium of communication, on April 17, 2018, the DPR had a meeting with Facebook. The government itself still has the will and gives Facebook one month or thirty days to audit and report later, if within one month there is still no news on how it will continue, then the DPR will propose a temporary suspension of Facebook so that later we can't use facebook. Technology can sometimes be two-sided and sometimes it depends on how we use it, there are so many events or problems that are caused by provocations on social media, for that we need to respond to the development of the technology world in a positive way. So have you got an answer about when Facebook will be closed, isn't it, it's better if we wait for news from Facebook later, as for if the government decides to block Facebook then we have to get ready resolve to look for other social media that we can make as an option, maybe that's all to share a little rud-arsenio.com this time, have a nice day.
berita_id: Ketika Facebook akan ditutup - baru -baru ini, ada banyak pembicaraan tentang Facebook yang ditutup atau dibekukan di negara ini, ini tentu sangat meresahkan bagi mereka yang telah mengandalkan Facebook sebagai media komunikasi atau juga media untuk menjual barang secara online.Sebenarnya, bukan tanpa alasan mengapa pemerintah ingin memblokir Facebook, ini karena penyalahgunaan data yang bocor pada pengguna Facebook, sehingga dikhawatirkan bahwa nanti akan membahayakan stabilitas keamanan domestik.Facebook itu sendiri telah lama digunakan oleh orang -orang Indonesia sebagai media komunikasi, pada 17 April 2018, DPR mengadakan pertemuan dengan Facebook.Pemerintah itu sendiri masih memiliki surat wasiat dan memberikan Facebook satu bulan atau tiga puluh hari untuk mengaudit dan melaporkan nanti, jika dalam waktu satu bulan masih belum ada berita tentang bagaimana hal itu akan berlanjut, maka DPR akan mengusulkan penangguhan sementara Facebook sehingga nanti kita tidak dapat menggunakan Facebook.Teknologi kadang-kadang bisa dua sisi dan kadang-kadang tergantung pada bagaimana kita menggunakannya, ada begitu banyak peristiwa atau masalah yang disebabkan oleh provokasi di media sosial, untuk itu kita perlu menanggapi pengembangan dunia teknologi dengan cara yang positif.Jadi, apakah Anda mendapat jawaban tentang kapan Facebook akan ditutup, bukan, lebih baik jika kita menunggu berita dari Facebook nanti, karena jika pemerintah memutuskan untuk memblokir Facebook maka kita harus siap menyelesaikan untuk mencari media sosial lain yang bisa kita buat sebagai pilihan, mungkin itu saja untuk berbagi rud-arsenio.com kali ini, semoga harimu menyenangkan.

berita: There have been a lot of people's reactions to this very popular game, Pokemon Go. The scholars in Egypt and Arabia declared this game haram and un-Islamic because it made the players behave like drunk people and crazy to hunt pocket monsters (pocket monsters). Now on various social media in Indonesia, people are spreading information stating that Pokemon Go promotes Zionism and is a game that insults Islam. It is said that Pokemon actually in Syriac or Syriac means "I am a Jew", while Pikachu is said to mean "Be a Jew", and Charmander means "God is Weak". Apparently this accusation has been around for a long time. In 2001 when the popular Pokemon video game, rumors circulated that the game was a Jewish conspiracy to spread Zionism. In an article published on the LA Times news site, in that year various brochures circulated in the Middle East stating that Pokemon was a Jewish company and the names of the monsters in it insulted Islam. The brochure further states that Pokemon actually means "I'm Jewish". "The brochure, written in poor Arabic, states that Pikachu, the most popular and powerful character, means 'I am Jewish' in Japanese," said Abdel Rahman Mtowah, editor of Saudi Arabia's Al Sharq al Awsat newspaper. The allegation that Pokemon and Pikachu are of Syriac enounce or Syriac origin, the Aramaic dialect of Aramaic itself was debunked in 2001 when the rumors circulated. The Syriac Orthodox Christian Church in Jordan states that Pokemon and Pikachu are not of Syriac origin. A similar rebuttal was released by the Orthodox Christian church in Jerusalem. The Japanese Cultural Attache in Jordan in 2001 stated that many people asked him to tell them the Japanese word for "Jew". Jew in Japanese is "youdayajin", a far cry from the word Pokemon. "Pokemon itself stands for 'pocket monsters'. In Japan we use the word 'poke' which means something small. "Pokekom" means 'pocket computer'," Tahara told AFP. "I don't know Hebrew but as far as I know there are no foreign or hidden languages ​​in Pokemon," said Tahara. Pokemon itself was created by Satoshi Tajiri, Ken Sugimori and managed by The Pokemon Company, a combination of Nintendo, Game Freak and Creatures. The name Pokemon itself is an abbreviation of Pocket Monsters or pocket monsters. In Japanese it is called Poketto Monsuta. While Pikachu itself is a combination of two sounds in Japanese. Pika is the sound of electric sparks and chu is the sound that mice make.
berita_id: Ada banyak reaksi orang terhadap permainan yang sangat populer ini, Pokemon Go.Para sarjana di Mesir dan Arab menyatakan permainan ini Haram dan tidak Islami karena membuat para pemain berperilaku seperti orang mabuk dan gila untuk berburu monster saku (monster saku).Sekarang di berbagai media sosial di Indonesia, orang -orang menyebarkan informasi yang menyatakan bahwa Pokemon Go mempromosikan Zionisme dan merupakan permainan yang menghina Islam.Dikatakan bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya di Syria atau Syria berarti "Saya seorang Yahudi", sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi orang Yahudi", dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Rupanya tuduhan ini telah ada sejak lama.Pada tahun 2001 ketika video game Pokemon yang populer, rumor beredar bahwa permainan itu adalah konspirasi Yahudi untuk menyebarkan Zionisme.Dalam sebuah artikel yang diterbitkan di situs berita LA Times, pada tahun itu berbagai brosur yang diedarkan di Timur Tengah menyatakan bahwa Pokemon adalah perusahaan Yahudi dan nama -nama monster di dalamnya menghina Islam.Brosur lebih lanjut menyatakan bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya berarti "Saya orang Yahudi"."Brosur, yang ditulis dalam bahasa Arab miskin, menyatakan bahwa Pikachu, karakter paling populer dan kuat, berarti 'Saya Yahudi' dalam bahasa Jepang," kata Abdel Rahman Mtowah, editor surat kabar Al Sharq Al Awsat Arab Saudi.Tuduhan bahwa Pokemon dan Pikachu berasal dari Syria atau asal Syria, dialek bahasa Aram bahasa Aram itu sendiri dibantah pada tahun 2001 ketika rumor beredar.Gereja Kristen Ortodoks Syria di Yordania menyatakan bahwa Pokemon dan Pikachu tidak berasal dari Syria.Sanggahan serupa dibebaskan oleh Gereja Kristen Ortodoks di Yerusalem.Atas -uk budaya Jepang di Yordania pada tahun 2001 menyatakan bahwa banyak orang memintanya untuk memberi tahu mereka kata Jepang untuk "Yahudi".Orang Yahudi dalam bahasa Jepang adalah "YouDayajin", jauh dari kata Pokemon."Pokemon itu sendiri adalah singkatan dari 'Pocket Monsters'. Di Jepang kita menggunakan kata 'poke' yang berarti sesuatu yang kecil." Pokekom "berarti 'komputer saku'," kata Tahara kepada AFP."Saya tidak tahu bahasa Ibrani tetapi sejauh yang saya tahu tidak ada bahasa asing atau tersembunyi di Pokemon," kata Tahara.Pokemon sendiri diciptakan oleh Satoshi Tajiri, Ken Sugimori dan dikelola oleh Pokemon Company, kombinasi Nintendo, Game Freak dan Makhluk.Nama Pokemon itu sendiri adalah singkatan dari monster saku atau monster saku.Dalam bahasa Jepang itu disebut Poketto Monsuta.Sementara Pikachu sendiri adalah kombinasi dari dua suara dalam bahasa Jepang.Pika adalah suara percikan listrik dan Chu adalah suara yang dibuat tikus.

berita: The Pokemon Go game is currently booming among young people. Not a few people who have a pokemon fever and are willing to blusukan in search of Pokemon. However, this game made by Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, and Niantic Labs can't be separated from oblique issues. Recently, there have been many links circulating on social media stating that the game contains an invitation that cannot be tolerated by Islam. It is widely circulated on social media that Pokemon actually in Syriac or Syriac means "I am Jewish", while Pikachu is said to mean "Be Jewish", and Charmander means "God is Weak". The rumor has certainly become a heated debate on social media. Many believed and shared the rumor, many thought it was just something that was linked. So is that really the issue? The Los Angels Times in an article dated April 24, 2001 once reviewed this. In the LA Times, it was stated that at that time in Middle Eastern countries such as Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Jordan, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia, there were many rumors that the Pokemon game had connotations that promoted anti-Islamic behavior and believed in Judaism. This of course causes anxiety. The LA Times noted that despite Nintendo's denials, the leaders of those countries still couldn't accept Pokemon. The rumors arose amid concerns Arab countries would assimilate the emerging culture. Even so, many rumors were not proven at that time. "It has been proven that this toy is part of a Jewish plot to corrupt the minds of our young generation because it offends blasphemous thoughts, mocks God and our moral values ​​so that it is very dangerous for our young generation," said Sheik Abdel Monem abu Zent, ​​former member Jordanian parliament. Even so, in the LA Times article, he stated that there was no strong evidence that the Pokemon game did have connotations that were detrimental to terminus Islam. Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor from Al Azhar University, said that until now there was no solid evidence that confirmed the rumors that made parents forbid their children to play the Pokemon game. In a statement in Jordan's Amman newspaper, the Syriac Orthodox Christian Church denied allegations that Pokemon and other character names have roots in ancient Syriac and insult Islam. Church officials said they were surprised by the incoming letter stating that Pokemon contained a Jewish invitation. The article from the LA Times can be read at the following link. In the pokemondb.net site, the meaning of the Pokemon names and the names of the monsters is mentioned. On the site it is stated that Pokemon is a combination of the word "Pocket Monster" which means pocket monster. This term expresses how small these monsters are to fit in a pocket. Pikachu which is one of the most famous monsters is composed of the words Pika and Chu. Pika is the name for a small mouse, while Chu is a Japanese word which means to squeak. In the game, Pikachu is indeed a monster that looks like a mouse. Meanwhile, Charmander consists of the words Char and Salamander. Char means to burn, and Salamander means amphibious lizard.
berita_id: Permainan Pokemon Go saat ini sedang booming di kalangan anak muda.Tidak sedikit orang yang mengalami demam Pokemon dan bersedia untuk Blusukan untuk mencari Pokemon.Namun, game ini dibuat oleh Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, dan Niantic Labs tidak dapat dipisahkan dari masalah miring.Baru -baru ini, ada banyak tautan yang beredar di media sosial yang menyatakan bahwa permainan berisi undangan yang tidak dapat ditoleransi oleh Islam.Secara luas diedarkan di media sosial bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya di Syria atau Syria berarti "Saya Yahudi", sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi Yahudi", dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Rumor itu tentu saja menjadi perdebatan panas di media sosial.Banyak yang percaya dan berbagi rumor, banyak yang mengira itu hanya sesuatu yang terkait.Jadi apakah itu masalahnya?The Los Angels Times dalam sebuah artikel tertanggal 24 April 2001 pernah meninjau ini.Di LA Times, dinyatakan bahwa pada waktu itu di negara-negara Timur Tengah seperti Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Yordania, Mesir, dan Arab Saudi, ada banyak desas-desus bahwa permainan Pokemon memiliki konotasi yang mempromosikan perilaku anti-Islam dan percaya pada Yudaisme.Ini tentu saja menyebabkan kecemasan.The LA Times mencatat bahwa terlepas dari penolakan Nintendo, para pemimpin negara -negara itu masih tidak dapat menerima Pokemon.Rumor muncul di tengah kekhawatiran negara -negara Arab akan mengasimilasi budaya yang muncul.Meski begitu, banyak rumor tidak terbukti pada waktu itu."Telah terbukti bahwa mainan ini adalah bagian dari rencana Yahudi untuk merusak pikiran Laila, seorang profesor dari Universitas Al Azhar, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada bukti kuat yang mengkonfirmasi rumor yang membuat orang tua melarang anak -anak mereka untuk memainkan permainan Pokemon.Dalam sebuah pernyataan di surat kabar Amman Jordan, Gereja Kristen Syria Ortodoks membantah tuduhan bahwa Pokemon dan nama karakter lainnya berakar pada Syria kuno dan menghina Islam.Pejabat gereja mengatakan mereka terkejut dengan surat yang masuk yang menyatakan bahwa Pokemon berisi undangan Yahudi.Artikel dari LA Times dapat dibaca di tautan berikut.Di situs Pokemondb.net, arti nama Pokemon dan nama -nama monster disebutkan.Di situs tersebut dinyatakan bahwa Pokemon adalah kombinasi dari kata "monster saku" yang berarti monster saku.Istilah ini mengungkapkan betapa kecilnya monster ini agar muat di saku.Pikachu yang merupakan salah satu monster paling terkenal terdiri dari kata -kata Pika dan Chu.Pika adalah nama untuk tikus kecil, sedangkan Chu adalah kata Jepang yang berarti mencicit.Dalam permainan, Pikachu memang monster yang terlihat seperti tikus.Sementara itu, Charmander terdiri dari kata -kata Char dan Salamander.Char berarti membakar, dan salamander berarti kadal amfibi.

berita: Jakarta, Current stroke is not a rare disease considering the lifestyle of today's society. Stress, infrequent exercise, drinking alcoholic beverages, eating irregularly, and choosing fast food have become commonplace. And it turns out that these things trigger stroke. You also have to be aware of the symptoms. Fainting suddenly or experiencing a tilt of the mouth is one of the signs of a stroke. These people need to get first aid fast. However, it is not random. Because one-one can actually harm the patient. In an interview with detikHealth, Monday (18/3/2013), Dr. Ahmad Yanuar, SpS, said what actions should be taken immediately when someone has a stroke. The first thing to do is to take him straight to the hospital. The quick patient must receive reperfusion therapy. Reperfusion function to launch the clogged vessels earlier. In the nearest time after the incident took place, the patient must immediately take action to minimize the risk, explained the neurologist from the University of Indonesia. As is known, there are two causes of stroke, namely blockage and bleeding in the brain. This blockage must be addressed immediately to prevent a worse impact. The patient should immediately get a complete examination of his condition. So, a finger prick or puncture under the ear is not the right way because it will not remove the blockage or bleeding that occurs in the patient's brain. The same thing was confirmed by Dr. Fritz Sumantri, SpS. He said that patients should be taken directly to the hospital instead of being stabbed or just taken to the clinic. It is not true that patients should not be transferred anywhere, instead they must be immediately taken to the hospital. The danger of the needling method does not exist, it's just that if the patient is quickly taken to the hospital, the possibility of recovery will also be fast and the treatment will not be too late, he said. So, be wise in processing information and immediately treat the patient by taking him to the hospital. However, it would be better if you can prevent this disease by maintaining your lifestyle from now on because prevention is better than cure
berita_id: Jakarta, stroke saat ini bukanlah penyakit langka mengingat gaya hidup masyarakat saat ini.Stres, olahraga yang jarang, minum minuman beralkohol, makan secara tidak teratur, dan memilih makanan cepat saji telah menjadi hal biasa.Dan ternyata hal -hal ini memicu stroke.Anda juga harus menyadari gejalanya.Tiba -tiba pingsan atau mengalami kemiringan mulut adalah salah satu tanda stroke.Orang -orang ini perlu mendapatkan pertolongan pertama dengan cepat.Namun, itu tidak acak.Karena satu-satu sebenarnya dapat membahayakan pasien.Dalam sebuah wawancara dengan DetikHealth, Senin (18/3/2013), Dr. Ahmad Yanuar, SPS, mengatakan tindakan apa yang harus diambil segera ketika seseorang mengalami stroke.Hal pertama yang harus dilakukan adalah membawanya langsung ke rumah sakit.Pasien cepat harus menerima terapi reperfusi.Fungsi reperfusi untuk meluncurkan kapal yang tersumbat sebelumnya.Dalam waktu terdekat setelah insiden itu terjadi, pasien harus segera mengambil tindakan untuk meminimalkan risiko, jelas ahli saraf dari Universitas Indonesia.Seperti diketahui, ada dua penyebab stroke, yaitu penyumbatan dan pendarahan di otak.Penyumbatan ini harus segera
