ditangani untuk mencegah dampak yang lebih buruk.Pasien harus segera mendapatkan pemeriksaan lengkap dari kondisinya.Jadi, tusukan jari atau tusukan di bawah telinga bukanlah cara yang benar karena tidak akan menghilangkan penyumbatan atau pendarahan yang terjadi di otak pasien.Hal yang sama dikonfirmasi oleh Dr. Fritz Sumantri, SPS.Dia mengatakan bahwa pasien harus dibawa langsung ke rumah sakit alih -alih ditikam atau hanya dibawa ke klinik.Tidak benar bahwa pasien tidak boleh ditransfer ke mana pun, sebaliknya mereka harus segera dibawa ke rumah sakit.Bahaya metode tusuk jarum tidak ada, hanya saja jika pasien dengan cepat dibawa ke rumah sakit, kemungkinan pemulihan juga akan cepat dan perawatannya tidak akan terlambat, katanya.Jadi, jadilah bijaksana dalam memproses informasi dan segera rawat pasien dengan membawanya ke rumah sakit.Namun, akan lebih baik jika Anda dapat mencegah penyakit ini dengan mempertahankan gaya hidup Anda dari sekarang karena pencegahan lebih baik daripada penyembuhan

berita: The riot took place at the Brimob Mako Detention Center, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java. The commotion that occurred in the detention center for terrorists caused a number of prison facilities to be damaged. Mako Brimob Terrorist Prison This news was confirmed by the Head of the Public Information Bureau of the National Police Public Relations Division, general Brigadier General Rikwanto, who explained that the commotion occurred on Friday (11/10/2017), around 16.00 WIB. "On Friday, November 10 2017, at 16.00 WIB there was a commotion at the Mako Brimob terrorist detention center Salemba prison branch carried out by terrorist prisoners," said Rikwanto. A number of prison facilities, such as the door of the detention cell, the gate of the block hallway and the window panes in Block C and Block B were damaged. Rikwanto also added that the situation was now under control. Regarding the issue that had been spread which stated that the cause of the riot was because of the throwing of the Koran by officers, Rikwanto asserted that it was a hoax.
berita_id: Kerusuhan itu terjadi di Pusat Penahanan Brimob Mako, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat.Keributan yang terjadi di Pusat Penahanan untuk Teroris menyebabkan sejumlah fasilitas penjara rusak.Penjara Teroris Mako Brimob Berita ini dikonfirmasi oleh kepala Biro Informasi Publik Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Polisi Nasional, Jenderal Brigadir Jenderal Rikwanto, yang menjelaskan bahwa keributan itu terjadi pada hari Jumat (11/10/2017), sekitar 16.00 WIB."Pada hari Jumat, 10 November 2017, pukul 16.00 WIB ada keributan di Pusat Penahanan Teroris Mako Brimob Cabang Penjara Salemba yang dilakukan oleh para tahanan teroris," kata Rikwanto.Sejumlah fasilitas penjara, seperti pintu sel penahanan, gerbang lorong blok dan panel jendela di blok C dan blok B rusak.Rikwanto juga menambahkan bahwa situasinya sekarang terkendali.Mengenai masalah yang telah disebarkan yang menyatakan bahwa penyebab kerusuhan itu karena lemparan Alquran oleh petugas, Rikwanto menegaskan bahwa itu adalah tipuan.

berita: Invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application in the past two days have been circulating on social media timelines. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall aggravated D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. Ananda's action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka, including netizens from Banten. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. One of the netizens from Cilegon City who currently lives in Qatar, Rahmat (40) said that he did not agree with the attitude of Ananda and Derianto, the founder of Traveloka, who took the WO action at the Kanisius event. "Their attitude is intolerant because they mix politics and education," said Rahmat. The same thing was expressed by Rina (39), a garment entrepreneur from Tangerang who also uploaded her Facebook timeline. "From now on bye-bye Traveloka, it's better to buy tickets at neighboring travel," said Rina
berita_id: Undangan untuk menghapus aplikasi Traveloka dalam dua hari terakhir telah beredar di jadwal media sosial.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall memperburuk D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan Ananda diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lainnya.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka, termasuk netizen dari Banten.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.Salah satu netizen dari Cilegon City yang saat ini tinggal di Qatar, Rahmat (40) mengatakan bahwa ia tidak setuju dengan sikap Ananda dan DeRianto, pendiri Traveloka, yang mengambil tindakan WO di acara Kanisius."Sikap mereka tidak toleran karena mereka memadukan politik dan pendidikan," kata Rahmat.Hal yang sama diungkapkan oleh Rina (39), seorang pengusaha pakaian dari Tangerang yang juga mengunggah garis waktu Facebook -nya."Mulai sekarang di Bye-Bye Traveloka, lebih baik membeli tiket di tetangga perjalanan," kata Rina

berita: Information for you, especially Muslims, to be more careful and careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use materials from non-halal. If you buy a toothbrush, check the packaging, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair aka Pig Fur! Again, double-check the packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), Usually it says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". Share this info with your family and friends on Facebook so that more people can read it so you can peculiarly avoid products that are not halal.
berita_id: Informasi untuk Anda, terutama Muslim, untuk lebih berhati-hati dan hati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan dari non-halal.Jika Anda membeli sikat gigi, periksa kemasannya, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi alias bulu babi!Sekali lagi, periksa kembali kemasan sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), biasanya dikatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% china bristle".Bagikan info ini dengan keluarga dan teman -teman Anda di Facebook sehingga lebih banyak orang dapat membacanya sehingga Anda dapat menghindari produk yang tidak halal.

berita: IndexNews – The news that Facebook will be closed or blocked on April 24, 2018 is getting more and more viral. Many Indonesian social media users commented on Facebook, which was reported on April 24, 2018, which was no longer accessible. Even Facebook users flocked to post the status "Facebook will be closed", some also uploaded "before Facebook is closed post a status or photo first." The news of the closure of Facebook has also become the pros and cons among netizens. Even so, the rumors that went viral and circulated widely on social media, especially Facebook, were certainly not true or hoaxes. The government could indeed give strict sanctions to block Facebook, because the data of one million Indonesian users was also leaked in the Cambridge Analytica (CA) scandal. However, there is no certainty that on April 24 2018, Facebook will actually be blocked in Indonesia. Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara on various occasions never mentioned blocking Facebook. In fact, Rudiantara said that the Ministry of Communications and Informatics did not hesitate to block Facebook, but must follow procedures so that the steps are not rash. Rudiantara's only firm statement about blocking Facebook is if there is evidence that Facebook is used as a means of inciting or fighting. Rudiantara ensured that if investigators found an element of criminal suspicion in the leak of Facebook user data in Indonesia, the chances of blocking Facebook would be even greater. Meanwhile, these two things have not been proven yet, are still under investigation and awaiting the results of the audit. “If there are indications that Facebook in Indonesia is used for incitement, as happened in Myanmar. I have no qualms outflow about blocking," said Rudiantara, a few days ago. The Minister of Communication and Information has asked Facebook to conduct an audit, and submitted the results of the audit since a week after the announcement that data on Facebook users in Indonesia had been leaked in the CA scandal. The request was included in the first Warning Letter (SP) sent by the Ministry of Communication and Informatics. However, after the specified deadline arrived, Facebook has not yet submitted the results of the audit. Kominfo also issued a second warning letter. “Currently, it is SP II. We are waiting, later after SP II it can be upgraded to a temporary service termination if needed, "said Rudiantara. If the audit results are known later, the government can assess the potential problems that could arise from this data leak and take steps to address them.
berita_id: IndexNews - Berita bahwa Facebook akan ditutup atau diblokir pada 24 April 2018 semakin viral.Banyak pengguna media sosial Indonesia mengomentari Facebook, yang dilaporkan pada 24 April 2018, yang tidak lagi dapat diakses.Bahkan pengguna Facebook berbondong -bondong untuk memposting status "Facebook akan ditutup", beberapa juga diunggah "sebelum Facebook ditutup posting status atau foto terlebih dahulu."Berita penutupan Facebook juga telah menjadi pro dan kontra di antara netizen.Meski begitu, rumor yang menjadi viral dan beredar secara luas di media sosial, terutama Facebook, tentu saja tidak benar atau tipuan.Pemerintah memang dapat memberikan sanksi ketat untuk memblokir Facebook, karena data satu juta pengguna Indonesia juga bocor dalam skandal Cambridge Analytica (CA).Namun, tidak ada kepastian bahwa pada 24 April 2018, Facebook sebenarnya akan diblokir di Indonesia.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara pada berbagai kesempatan tidak pernah disebutkan memblokir Facebook.Faktanya, Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika tidak ragu untuk memblokir Facebook, tetapi harus mengikuti prosedur sehingga langkah -langkahnya tidak terburu -buru.Satu -satunya pernyataan perusahaan Rudiantara tentang memblokir Facebook adalah jika ada bukti bahwa Facebook digunakan sebagai sarana menghasut atau berkelahi.Rudiantara memastikan bahwa jika penyelidik menemukan unsur kecurigaan kriminal dalam kebocoran data pengguna Facebook di Indonesia, peluang memblokir Facebook akan lebih besar.Sementara itu, kedua hal ini belum terbukti, masih dalam penyelidikan dan menunggu hasil audit."Jika ada indikasi bahwa Facebook di Indonesia digunakan untuk penghasutan, seperti yang terjadi di Myanmar. Saya tidak punya alur keluar dari pemblokiran," kata Rudiiantara, beberapa hari yang lalu.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi telah meminta Facebook untuk melakukan audit, dan mengirimkan hasil audit sejak seminggu setelah pengumuman bahwa data di pengguna Facebook di Indonesia telah bocor dalam skandal CA.Permintaan tersebut dimasukkan dalam surat peringatan pertama (SP) yang dikirim oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika.Namun, setelah tenggat waktu yang ditentukan tiba, Facebook belum mengirimkan hasil audit.Kominfo juga mengeluarkan surat peringatan kedua."Saat ini, ini adalah SP II. Kami sedang menunggu, nanti setelah SP II dapat ditingkatkan ke penghentian layanan sementara jika diperlukan," kata Rudiantara.Jika hasil audit diketahui kemudian, pemerintah dapat menilai potensi masalah yang dapat timbul dari kebocoran data ini dan mengambil langkah -langkah untuk mengatasinya.

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia has the potential to experience a very significant increase to reach Rp. 6.6 billion a year or around Rp. 500 million per month. This can happen if the Draft Government Regulation (RPP) on the Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities of Civil Servants is passed. According to the RPP material, the president's salary is Rp 533 million. As for the tranquillize vice president, he receives an income of Rp. 368.9 million per month. The proposal for a salary increase if it is legalized is suspected to be inconsistent with the polemics that often occurred during the Jokowi regime. It's no secret that in the regime led by "Khalifah" Jokowi, there were various controversies such as the criminalization of ulama, the disbandment of mass organizations, the omission of hoax spreader accounts, and the failure to fulfill campaign promises. Previously, in 2017, the Executive Director of the Institute for Policy Studies (IPS) M. Tri Andika emphasized that many of Jokowi's promises were still being violated. Quoted from detik.com, broken promises such as the implementation of the e-Government system in just two weeks. "Maybe you still remember, don't you?," he said during the 3rd Jokowi-JK discussion at the Parliament Complex, Senayan, Jakarta, on Friday, (10/20/2017). Another promise that was denied was to choose a minister of education from among members of the Indonesian Teachers Association (PGRI). In fact, within three years of his administration, Jokowi appointed Anies Baswedan and Muhadjir Effendy who previously served as university rectors. Another thing that Jokowi-JK does not comply with in the field of education is canceling the National Examination for school students. Jokowi-JK also did not keep their promise when drafting the Working Cabinet, namely that they would not divide ministerial seats for their supporting parties. Meanwhile, in the agricultural sector, Jokowi-JK is considered to have failed to fulfill the promise of food self-sufficiency in three years. "(Promise) 7 percent economic growth is still far away," said Andika sadly. Should Jokowi, who is considered a caliph by Said Aqil Siradh, have a salary increase?
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia memiliki potensi untuk mengalami peningkatan yang sangat signifikan untuk mencapai RP.6,6 miliar setahun atau sekitar Rp.500 juta per bulan.Ini dapat terjadi jika rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) tentang gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas pegawai negeri disahkan.Menurut materi RPP, gaji presiden adalah Rp 533 juta.Adapun wakil presiden yang tenang, ia menerima pendapatan RP.368,9 juta per bulan.Proposal untuk kenaikan gaji jika dilegalkan diduga tidak konsisten dengan polemik yang sering terjadi selama rezim Jokowi.Bukan rahasia lagi bahwa dalam rezim yang dipimpin oleh jokowi "khalifah", ada berbagai kontroversi seperti kriminalisasi ulama, pembubaran organisasi massa, penghilangan akun penyebar tipuan, dan kegagalan untuk memenuhi janji kampanye.Sebelumnya, pada tahun 2017, direktur eksekutif Institute for Policy Studies (IPS) M. Tri Andika menekankan bahwa banyak janji Jokowi masih dilanggar.Dikutip dari Detik.com, janji-janji yang rusak seperti implementasi sistem e-government hanya dalam dua minggu."Mungkin Anda masih ingat, bukan?," Katanya selama diskusi Jokowi-JK ke-3 di kompleks parlemen, Senayan, Jakarta, pada hari Jumat, (10/20/2017).Janji lain yang ditolak adalah memilih Menteri Pendidikan dari antara anggota Asosiasi Guru Indonesia (PGRI).Bahkan, dalam waktu tiga tahun pemerintahannya, Jokowi menunjuk Anies Baswedan dan Muhadjir Effendy yang sebelumnya menjabat sebagai rektor universitas.Hal lain yang tidak dipatuhi oleh Jokowi-JK di bidang pendidikan adalah membatalkan ujian nasional untuk siswa sekolah.Jokowi-JK juga tidak menepati janji mereka ketika menyusun kabinet yang bekerja, yaitu bahwa mereka tidak akan membagi kursi menteri untuk pesta pendukung mereka.Sementara itu, di sektor pertanian, Jokowi-JK dianggap gagal memenuhi janji swasembada pangan dalam tiga tahun."(Janji) 7 persen pertumbuhan ekonomi masih jauh," kata Andika dengan sedih.Haruskah Jokowi, siapa yang dianggap khalifah oleh Aqil Siradh tersebut, memiliki kenaikan gaji?

berita: The Lampung Regional Police are conducting an investigation and anticipating the entry of new types of drugs, including candy in the form of a dot which is suspected to contain drug addictive substances. This new type of drug has recently been circulating on social media (online) and has been reported in several media on the island of Java. The ampere Head of the Lampung Regional Police, Inspector General of Police Sudjarno, said that information was circulating about the finding of children's food in the form of candy in the form of pacifiers suspected of containing drugs, which were recently circulated on the island of Java. Although no dangerous goods have been found in the Lampung area, it has become a special concern for the Lampung Police for an investigation. “I have ordered the Director of Drugs, the Chief of Police and their staff to immediately investigate. Is there any candy in the form of a teat that is suspected of containing drugs circulating in Lampung," he said during the destruction of evidence at the Bandarlampung Police Headquarters, Thursday (9/3/2017). He said officers were still investigating the items in the form of candy in the form of a pacifier, which were suspected to contain the drug. However, until now, his party has not received any information on the findings of these items circulating in Lampung. "Previously, a new type of drug that was successfully uncovered was gorilla tobacco," he said. According to him, until now, there have been no reports or findings regarding the candy in the form of pacifiers which allegedly contain drugs that are also circulating in Lampung. As a precaution, it will conduct inspections at certain routes. Such as at the port entrance, then at the airport, station, terminal and other alternative routes. "With the finding of candy pacifiers which are suspected to contain drugs on the island of Java, currently the central BNN is still conducting scientific examinations in the laboratory," he explained. As information circulated about the existence of a new type of drug in the form of pacifiers, the National Narcotics Agency (BNN) gave an appeal as stated in letter B/HB-01/III/2017/Humas dated March 8, 2017. BNN urges the public to always be aware of all forms of drugs so as not to consume food, drink, or other types of drugs that do not have a distribution permit. To prove that the candy pacifier is suspected to contain drugs, BNN is currently conducting a scientific examination of the candy sample at the National Narcotics Laboratory of the National Narcotics Agency. It is known that the circulation of pacifier-shaped candy imported from China has recently gone viral on social media (online) on the island of Java because it is suspected that it contains drugs. The pacifier candy, which is indicated to contain drug addictive substances, has long been sold in a number of schools in the city of Surabaya. The candy is packaged differently, to attract buyers like most other sweets. The shape of the candy, is a pink powder and wrapped in white paper. Then on the outside of the pack, there is a hard candy written on it and the powder package is put in a bottle which is closed with a dot shape. How to consume it, the powder must be mixed with water. If it is mixed with water, the powder will thicken and become like candy. Only after that is consumed, and the taste is sweet and sour (sour). The pacifier candy is quite in demand, because the price is cheap and the shape also attracts children to buy it. The revelation of the candy pacifier allegedly containing the drug, stems from the presence of colorful candies that attract potential buyers in the city of Surabaya and its surroundings. Then what made the officers suspicious, because the candy pacifier packaging did not include a label from the Ministry of Health. In addition, the packaging has hard candy written on it. Even though the candy is imported from abroad
berita_id: Polisi Daerah Lampung sedang melakukan penyelidikan dan mengantisipasi masuknya jenis obat baru, termasuk permen dalam bentuk titik yang diduga mengandung zat adiktif narkoba.Jenis obat baru ini baru -baru ini beredar di media sosial (online) dan telah dilaporkan di beberapa media di pulau Java.Kepala Ampere Kepolisian Regional Lampung, Inspektur Jenderal Polisi Sudjarno, mengatakan bahwa informasi beredar tentang penemuan makanan anak -anak dalam bentuk permen dalam bentuk dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan, yang baru -baru ini diedarkan di pulau Jawa.Meskipun tidak ada barang berbahaya yang ditemukan di daerah Lampung, itu telah menjadi perhatian khusus bagi polisi Lampung untuk penyelidikan."Saya telah memerintahkan Direktur Narkoba, Kepala Polisi dan staf mereka untuk segera menyelidiki. Apakah ada permen dalam bentuk dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan yang beredar di Lampung," katanya selama penghancuran bukti di markas polisi Bandarlampung, Kamis (9/3/2017).Dia mengatakan petugas masih menyelidiki barang -barang dalam bentuk permen dalam bentuk dot, yang diduga mengandung obat.Namun, sampai sekarang, partainya belum menerima informasi tentang temuan barang -barang ini yang beredar di Lampung."Sebelumnya, jenis obat baru yang berhasil ditemukan adalah gorila tembakau," katanya.Menurutnya, sampai sekarang, belum ada laporan atau temuan mengenai permen dalam bentuk dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan yang juga beredar di Lampung.Sebagai tindakan pencegahan, itu akan melakukan inspeksi di rute tertentu.Seperti di pintu masuk pelabuhan, lalu di bandara, stasiun, terminal, dan rute alternatif lainnya."Dengan temuan dot permen yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan di pulau Jawa, saat ini BNN pusat masih melakukan pemeriksaan ilmiah di laboratorium," jelasnya.Karena informasi yang diedarkan tentang keberadaan jenis obat baru dalam bentuk dot, Badan Narkotika Nasional (BNN) memberikan banding sebagaimana dinyatakan dalam huruf B/HB-01/III/2017/Humas tertanggal 8 Maret 2017. BNN mendesak publik untuk selalu mengetahui semua bentuk obat-obatan yang tidak memiliki obat lain yang tidak memiliki makanan, atau minuman, atau minuman lainnya, atau minum-minum, atau minuman lainnya. Atau minuman lainnya.Untuk membuktikan bahwa dot permen diduga mengandung obat -obatan, BNN saat ini sedang melakukan pemeriksaan ilmiah sampel permen di Laboratorium Narkotika Nasional Badan Narkotika Nasional.Diketahui bahwa sirkulasi permen berbentuk dot yang diimpor dari Tiongkok baru-baru ini menjadi viral di media sosial (online) di pulau Jawa karena diduga mengandung narkoba.Permen dot, yang diindikasikan mengandung zat adiktif narkoba, telah lama dijual di sejumlah sekolah di kota Surabaya.Permen ini dikemas secara berbeda, untuk menarik pembeli seperti kebanyakan permen lainnya.Bentuk permen, adalah bubuk merah muda dan dibungkus dengan kertas putih.Kemudian di bagian luar paket, ada permen keras yang ditulis di atasnya dan paket bubuk dimasukkan ke dalam botol yang ditutup dengan bentuk titik.Cara mengkonsumsinya, bubuk harus dicampur dengan air.Jika dicampur dengan air, bubuk akan menebal dan menjadi seperti permen.Hanya setelah itu dikonsumsi, dan rasanya manis dan asam (asam).Permen dot sangat diminati, karena harganya murah dan bentuknya juga menarik anak -anak untuk membelinya.Pengungkapan dot permen yang diduga mengandung obat, berasal dari keberadaan permen warna -warni yang menarik pembeli potensial di kota Surabaya dan sekitarnya.Lalu apa yang membuat petugas curiga, karena kemasan dot permen tidak termasuk label dari Kementerian Kesehatan.Selain itu, kemasan memiliki permen keras yang tertulis di atasnya.Meskipun permen diimpor dari luar negeri

berita: Information circulating in the world of social media about toothbrushes made from sea urchins has caused anxiety for netizens who have received the message. The explanation of the basic ingredients of sea urchins used as toothbrush bristles stems from the word bristle on the packaging of a global toothbrush brand. It is known, the message that has been spread reads: "Don't buy a toothbrush that has the writing on it like this" Bristle to be precise which means Pig Hair aka Pig Bristle! So double-check the packaging of your toothbrush when buying.” Not only on toothbrushes, the information also suggests that people should check bread brushes. What is explained is that the brush usually says “Bristle”, “Pure Bristle”, “100% China Bristle”. After checking through several online dictionaries such as: http://dictionary.cambridge.org/dictionary/english/bristle http://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/bristle http://www.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/english/bristle http://www.thesaurus.com/browse/bristle The meaning of the word "Bristle" is a strand that is smooth/thin and sturdy/strong. So it needs to be emphasized if the information circulating is a hoax or not true. In addition to ascertaining whether the fur comes from animal hair or synthetic materials by slightly burning it. If you smell hair, you can be sure that respective the fur comes from an animal. If it is made of synthetic material or coconut fiber, the smell will be different. It should also be added that currently manufacturers and consumers of modern toothbrushes prefer nylon toothbrushes.
berita_id: Informasi yang beredar di dunia media sosial tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah menyebabkan kecemasan bagi netizen yang telah menerima pesan tersebut.Penjelasan tentang bahan -bahan dasar landak laut yang digunakan sebagai bulu sikat gigi berasal dari kata bulu pada kemasan merek sikat gigi global.Diketahui, pesan yang telah disebarkan berbunyi: "Jangan membeli sikat gigi yang memiliki tulisan di atasnya seperti ini" Simpul yang tepat yang berarti rambut babi alias bulu babi!Jadi periksa kembali kemasan sikat gigi Anda saat membeli. "Tidak hanya pada sikat gigi, informasi tersebut juga menunjukkan bahwa orang harus memeriksa sikat roti.http://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/bristle http://www.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/english/bristle http://www.thesaurus.comInformasi yang beredar adalah tipuan atau tidak benar.

berita: Catfish is one type of fish that is a favorite in every dish on the food menu, it tastes good and the texture of the meat is soft, making this fish much recommended in culinary tours. But who would have thought that behind the delicious taste, it turns out that catfish has surprising facts. Catfish turns out to be the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. In one bite, catfish contains three thousand cancer cells. Really? the following is the explanation. The catfish pond is very dirty and surrounded by chicken coops and pigs. A catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he has supplied a lot of catfish to roadside markets and restaurants in Hainan province, to be precise in Haikou, which he harvests every 3 months. The number of complaints from the community made journalists try to find out about the fish from the local fisheries and marine department. They took pond samples from 7 ponds that housed the catfish. It turned out that the seven ponds were surrounded by chicken and pig cages, while in the middle of the ponds there were many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of their fish before the test results are out. Catfish is a fish that consumes waste Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places, by consuming animal waste such as chicken, cow and pig waste and even human waste. So it is possible catfish contains three thousand cancer cells that are harmful to the human body. Those are some facts about catfish in China, but conditions in China are different from those in Indonesia. In Indonesia, this fish is cultivated well by catfish farmers and for catfish food they do not use waste but pellets which are not harmful to health. So there is no need to hesitate to consume catfish in Indonesia, because cleanliness is guaranteed. Apart from all that, the health of consuming catfish depends on where the catfish breeds take and what kind of food is given in cultivating it. Because it turns out that catfish also has substances that are beneficial to health, if the fish is cultivated properly. Here are 4 benefits of catfish: Healthy heart and brain Catfish contains omega-3 and omega-6 which are usually contained in expensive fish such as cod and salmon. The content of omega-3 and omega-6 can help heart and brain health activities, and it turns out that a serving of catfish contains 220 mg of omega-3 and 875 mg of omega-6. Contains protein with good quality In a serving of catfish contains 15.6 grams of protein which is very useful in the formation of muscle tissue and strengthens the immune system. Contains vitamin B-12 A serving of catfish contains vitamin B-12, which is about 40% of the body's needs. This vitamin is useful in helping to break down food into energy for the body, so consuming these foods can make the body stronger. Contains DHA Pregnant women are advised to eat catfish because this fish contains DHA which is good for the formation of the baby's nerves and also this fish has a very low mercury content so it is safe for consumption.
berita_id: Catfish adalah salah satu jenis ikan yang menjadi favorit di setiap hidangan di menu makanan, rasanya enak dan tekstur dagingnya lunak, membuat ikan ini sangat direkomendasikan dalam tur kuliner.Tetapi siapa yang akan berpikir bahwa di balik selera yang lezat, ternyata ikan lele memiliki fakta yang mengejutkan.Lele ternyata adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Dalam satu gigitan, ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker.Benar-benar?Berikut ini adalah penjelasannya.Kolam ikan lele sangat kotor dan dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi.Seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-hong mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele ke pasar jalan dan restoran di provinsi Hainan, tepatnya di haikou, yang ia panen setiap 3 bulan.Jumlah keluhan dari masyarakat membuat jurnalis mencoba mencari tahu tentang ikan dari perikanan dan departemen kelautan setempat.Mereka mengambil sampel kolam dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Ternyata ketujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sementara di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Para petani ikan disarankan untuk menangguhkan penjualan ikan mereka sebelum hasil tes keluar.Catfish adalah ikan yang mengkonsumsi limbah ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor, dengan mengonsumsi limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi dan limbah babi dan bahkan limbah manusia.Jadi mungkin ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Itu adalah beberapa fakta tentang ikan lele di Cina, tetapi kondisi di Cina berbeda dari yang ada di Indonesia.Di Indonesia, ikan ini dibudidayakan dengan baik oleh petani ikan lele dan untuk makanan lele mereka tidak menggunakan limbah tetapi pelet yang tidak berbahaya bagi kesehatan.Jadi tidak perlu ragu -ragu untuk mengonsumsi ikan lele di Indonesia, karena kebersihan dijamin.Terlepas dari semua itu, kesehatan mengonsumsi ikan lele tergantung pada di mana ikan lele mengambil dan jenis makanan apa yang diberikan dalam menanamnya.Karena ternyata ikan lele juga memiliki zat yang bermanfaat bagi kesehatan, jika ikan dibudidayakan dengan benar.Berikut adalah 4 manfaat ikan lele: Lelyal jantung dan otak yang sehat mengandung omega-3 dan omega-6 yang biasanya terkandung dalam ikan mahal seperti cod dan salmon.Isi omega-3 dan omega-6 dapat membantu kegiatan kesehatan jantung dan otak, dan ternyata sekumpulan ikan lele mengandung 220 mg omega-3 dan 875 mg omega-6.Mengandung protein dengan kualitas yang baik dalam porsi ikan lele mengandung 15,6 gram protein yang sangat berguna dalam pembentukan jaringan otot dan memperkuat sistem kekebalan tubuh.Mengandung vitamin B-12 Porsi ikan lele mengandung vitamin B-12, yang merupakan sekitar 40% dari kebutuhan tubuh.Vitamin ini berguna dalam membantu memecah makanan menjadi energi bagi tubuh, sehingga mengonsumsi makanan ini dapat membuat tubuh lebih kuat.Berisi wanita hamil DHA disarankan untuk makan lele karena ikan ini mengandung DHA yang baik untuk pembentukan saraf bayi dan juga ikan ini memiliki kandungan merkuri yang sangat rendah sehingga aman untuk dikonsumsi.

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President presidential of the Republic of Indonesia is confirmed to be a hoax. This certainty was revealed after the Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati confirmed this in front of journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace, West Java. ” he said on Monday, March 12, 2018. While giving a statement regarding President Joko Widodo's meeting with the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) delegation, he received a question about it. from government institutions, as quoted from the release of the Deputy for Protocol, Press, and Media Secretariat, Bey Machmudin “What the Minister of Defense said (in social media) it was a hoax, it was indeed like that. from the government and published right," he said. Previously, it was widely circulated on social media regarding the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia. In this issue, it was stated that the president would be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp. 553422694 per month. 368948462 per month
berita_id: Berita yang beredar tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji Presiden dan Wakil Presiden Republik Indonesia dikonfirmasi menjadi tipuan.Kepastian ini terungkap setelah Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati mengkonfirmasi hal ini di depan jurnalis di Istana Presiden Bogor, Jawa Barat.Dia mengatakan pada hari Senin, 12 Maret 2018. Sambil memberikan pernyataan tentang pertemuan Presiden Joko Widodo dengan delegasi Bank Investasi Infrastruktur Asia (AIIB), ia menerima pertanyaan tentang hal itu. Dari lembaga -lembaga pemerintah, seperti yang dikutip dari rilis yang dikatakan oleh para wakil dari Protokol, pers sosial, itu adalah suatu wakil.dari pemerintah dan diterbitkan dengan benar, "katanya. Sebelumnya, itu secara luas diedarkan di media sosial mengenai rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji Presiden dan Wakil Presiden Republik Indonesia. Dalam masalah ini, dinyatakan bahwa Presiden akan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji hingga Rp. 553422694 per bulan. 36894862 per bulan.

berita: A Facebook account named Rudi Salam shocked netizens with the news of the Blocking of Facebook Indonesia and the information was uploaded through his personal account on Saturday (14/4). In the description of his upload, Rudi Salam said that Facebook Indonesia would be closed starting April 24, 2018. “Starting April 24, Facebook Indonesia will reciprocal be closed. Welcome back to the stone age. Say goodbye to your friends on Facebook before they close," wrote Rudi Salam in the caption of his upload. However, the Minister of Communications and Informatics Rudiantara himself has not specified the exact date of the blocking of Mark Zuckerberg's social media account. Rudiantara had previously stated that he would block Facebook if it was proven that there was a violation of the applicable rules, but there has been no decision to block Facebook so far. Rudiantara said that he did not hesitate to block Facebook if Facebook was not responsive in dealing with hate speech using its platform. “Facebook admits there is a technique that Facebook is used for the Rohingya case in Myanmar. I said that should not happen in Indonesia. He does not want to repeat the same incident as the SARA conflict in Myanmar that arose as a result of the spread of hoaxes on Facebook. If there is mutual incitement between groups and so on, I don't care (with Facebook). I have no doubts about blocking or shutdown (of Facebook) if there are indications in that direction," said Rudiantara. Facebook has just met with Commission I of the House of Representatives to discuss the issue of data misuse of 1 million users in Indonesia. In the meeting held on Tuesday (17/4), no decision has been made to block Facebook either, but Commission I of the DPR has given a one-month deadline for the social media giant to submit the results of its data audit if its services do not want to be temporarily suspended.
berita_id: Akun Facebook bernama Rudi Salam terkejut netizens dengan berita pemblokiran Facebook Indonesia dan informasinya diunggah melalui akun pribadinya pada hari Sabtu (14/4).Dalam deskripsi unggahannya, Rudi Salam mengatakan bahwa Facebook Indonesia akan ditutup mulai 24 April 2018. “Mulai 24 April, Facebook Indonesia akan ditutup. Selamat datang kembali ke Zaman Batu. Ucapkan selamat tinggal kepada teman -teman Anda di Facebook sebelum mereka tutup,” tulis Rudi Salam dalam judul unggahannya.Namun, Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika Rudiantara sendiri belum menentukan tanggal pasti pemblokiran akun media sosial Mark Zuckerberg.Rudiantara sebelumnya menyatakan bahwa ia akan memblokir Facebook jika terbukti bahwa ada pelanggaran aturan yang berlaku, tetapi belum ada keputusan untuk memblokir Facebook sejauh ini.Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa dia tidak ragu untuk memblokir Facebook jika Facebook tidak responsif dalam berurusan dengan pidato kebencian menggunakan platformnya.“Facebook mengakui ada teknik bahwa Facebook digunakan untuk kasus Rohingya di Myanmar. Saya mengatakan itu tidak boleh terjadi di Indonesia. Dia tidak ingin mengulangi insiden yang sama dengan konflik Sara di Myanmar yang muncul sebagai akibat dari penyebaran yang ada di Facebook. Jika ada cuti yang tidak ada di antara kelompok dan sebagainya, saya tidak peduli (dengan Facebook). Jika tidak ada cuti di antara kelompok -kelompok dan sebagainya, saya tidak peduli (dengan Facebook). Jika saya tidak ada yang terkena dakwaan antara kelompok dan sebagainya, saya tidak peduli (dengan Facebook).Arah, "kata Rudiantara.Facebook baru saja bertemu dengan Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat untuk membahas masalah penyalahgunaan data terhadap 1 juta pengguna di Indonesia.Dalam pertemuan yang diadakan pada hari Selasa (17/4), tidak ada keputusan yang dibuat untuk memblokir Facebook, tetapi Komisi I dari DPR telah memberikan tenggat waktu satu bulan bagi raksasa media sosial untuk mengirimkan hasil audit datanya jika layanannya tidak ingin ditangguhkan sementara.

berita: There are several myths about preventing stroke. One of them is sticking a needle. Dr. Frandy Susatia SpS said that this myth is something that can actually harm oneself. Moreover, if those who do it also suffer from diabetes. It is not true that to prevent stroke by inserting a needle. It's just a myth, he said in Jakarta. Apart from sticking a needle, another myth is flushing the skin when it's hot. But again, the doctor who practices at the Siloam Kebon Jeruk Hospital denied it. Not true. If it's hot, the blood vessels will spread, but it will be normal again when the heat is reduced. Only fainted, but not stroke, because the blood rip vessels are uploading, he concluded.
berita_id: Ada beberapa mitos tentang mencegah stroke.Salah satunya adalah menempelkan jarum.Frandy Susatia SPS mengatakan bahwa mitos ini adalah sesuatu yang benar -benar dapat membahayakan diri sendiri.Selain itu, jika mereka yang melakukannya juga menderita diabetes.Tidak benar untuk mencegah stroke dengan memasukkan jarum.Itu hanya mitos, katanya di Jakarta.Selain menempelkan jarum, mitos lain adalah menyiram kulit saat panas.Tetapi sekali lagi, Dokter yang berlatih di Rumah Sakit Siloam Kebon Jeruk membantahnya.Tidak benar.Jika panas, pembuluh darah akan menyebar, tetapi akan normal lagi ketika panas berkurang.Hanya pingsan, tetapi tidak stroke, karena pembuluh darah rip yang mengunggah, ia menyimpulkan.

berita: Stroke is a disorder of the blood vessels of the brain. Disturbances that occur can be in the form of blockage or in the form of rupture of blood vessels. Stroke needs to be treated immediately, because the initial time of stroke is the time that determines the next therapy. Is it true that if someone has a stroke, then we have to bleed from the fingertips? What are the early symptoms of a stroke? The brain is the driving force of the human body. If there is a disturbance in the brain, it can occur in various other organ systems. The initial symptom of a stroke is weakness in the body, generally on one side testing only. Stroke patients will complain of slurred speech, or the eyes cannot open. If a person has a hemorrhagic stroke, there will be an increase in pressure in the brain. This increase in pressure will cause a sudden, severe headache. Stroke survivors may also complain of nausea and vomiting. Is it necessary to bleed from the fingertips? The following page is the answer: Initial treatment for stroke is not by removing blood from the fingertips. Bleeding from all the fingertips has no benefit in healing stroke patients. In fact, if the needle used is not clean, stroke sufferers can develop an infection due to the puncture. Bleeding from the fingertips is a dangerous procedure and is not helpful in treating a stroke. What is the initial treatment for stroke? The initial treatment for stroke is to maintain a patent airway and stabilize the patient's blood circulation. If the patient is unconscious, make sure the patient is in a safe environment, lying in a safe place. Position the patient with the body facing the left side, to prevent the entry of fluids into the respiratory tract (recovery position). Immediately call for help to take the patient to the nearest emergency room. The exact treatment of stroke depends on the type of stroke that occurred. This can be confirmed by carrying out supporting examinations such as CT scans and MRIs.
berita_id: Stroke adalah kelainan pembuluh darah otak.Gangguan yang terjadi dapat dalam bentuk penyumbatan atau dalam bentuk pecahnya pembuluh darah.Stroke perlu segera dirawat, karena waktu awal stroke adalah waktu yang menentukan terapi berikutnya.Benarkah jika seseorang mengalami stroke, maka kita harus berdarah dari ujung jari?Apa gejala awal stroke?Otak adalah kekuatan pendorong tubuh manusia.Jika ada gangguan di otak, itu dapat terjadi di berbagai sistem organ lainnya.Gejala awal stroke adalah kelemahan dalam tubuh, umumnya hanya pada pengujian satu sisi.Pasien stroke akan mengeluh tentang ucapan yang tidak jelas, atau mata tidak bisa terbuka.Jika seseorang mengalami stroke hemoragik, akan ada peningkatan tekanan di otak.Peningkatan tekanan ini akan menyebabkan sakit kepala yang tiba -tiba dan parah.Korban stroke juga dapat mengeluh mual dan muntah.Apakah perlu berdarah dari ujung jari?Halaman berikut adalah jawabannya: Perawatan awal untuk stroke bukan dengan mengeluarkan darah dari ujung jari.Pendarahan dari semua ujung jari tidak memiliki manfaat pada pasien penyembuhan stroke.Bahkan, jika jarum yang digunakan tidak bersih, penderita stroke dapat mengembangkan infeksi karena tusukan.Pendarahan dari ujung jari adalah prosedur berbahaya dan tidak membantu dalam mengobati stroke.Apa pengobatan awal untuk stroke?Perawatan awal untuk stroke adalah mempertahankan jalan napas paten dan menstabilkan sirkulasi darah pasien.Jika pasien tidak sadar, pastikan pasien berada di lingkungan yang aman, berbaring di tempat yang aman.Posisikan pasien dengan tubuh menghadap sisi kiri, untuk mencegah masuknya cairan ke saluran pernapasan (posisi pemulihan).Segera hubungi bantuan untuk membawa pasien ke ruang gawat darurat terdekat.Perawatan stroke yang tepat tergantung pada jenis stroke yang terjadi.Ini dapat dikonfirmasi dengan melakukan pemeriksaan pendukung seperti CT scan dan MRI.

berita: In various local media, news spread widely that Mother Illiza (Mayor of Banda Aceh) forbade Pokemon Go. The reason is because it means 'I am Jewish'. This was obtained by the mother through various news related to the meaning of the word Pokemon which was shared with her through various online media. I came to know about this reason after Mother later apologized to the public regarding her statement that forbids Pokemon Go. "Sorry if anyone offended Pokemon GO fans. I didn't mean anything, I commented that because of the many news that was shared with me about the meaning of Pokemon," the mother requested. There is no point in exaggerating this matter. There is also no purpose to harass the Mother, let alone question the Mother's Indonesian spelling and grammar, which in my opinion there are still many mistakes here and there. I am quite appreciative of his apology. Because we rarely find leaders who voluntarily apologize if they are wrong. I remember very well reading an article about the meaning of the word Pokemon 3 months ago through an online media in Indonesia. This media quoted it from dailymirror. He said, in Iraq Pokemon cartoons were banned during the reign of Saddam Hussein. Furthermore, the media explained that the ban was revealed through an Iraqi state document confiscated by American troops in 2004. The document said that the ban was carried out because of its negative meaning in the Syriac language (Syrian language) used by that country. Still according to the document, Pokemon is said to be very similar to the same term in that language which if interpreted in Indonesian is 'I am Jewish'. Likewise with the characters Pikachu and Charmander. These two words respectively in Syriac mean 'Be a Jew' and 'God Is Weak'. That's why Saddam was "allergic" to the terms in this Pokemon cartoon that (still according to the document) he banned them to prevent Jewish influences from entering the nation's children and banning culture. I think this is where the initial news spread that Pokemon means "I'm Jewish". As a result, some people are against this term because they hate Jews (perhaps). Regardless of whether or not there is such a document or there is a “shrimp behind the dent” in the news by America, I try to find a common thread. I concluded then that there were some people who misunderstood the news. Either because I only heard from other people, just read the title, or misinterpreted it after reading it. Mistakes like that are commonplace because there is no ivory that is not cracked. However, it is very unfortunate because it can cause extraordinary commotion among the people due to the birth of a misleading "fatwa" without first crosschecking. If it is true that Saddam Husein banned Pokemon from showing in his country for reasons as quoted by the online media, we need to be careful to understand that he banned it because the word which is almost the same form is also in his language. It's just that coincidence has a negative meaning. So, in this case Saddam Husein compares the words produced by other countries (Japan as the country of Pokomen) with the language of his country. Attempts to interpret a word between one language and another because the form is the same, but the meaning is actually different in language review is commonplace and need not be a problem as long as it does not result in misunderstanding, let alone blind imitation. In fact, many of the world's language vocabularies have the same shape as other linguistic vocabularies, but have negative meanings, and this is not accidental. I remember exactly the largest car manufacturer in India, Tata Motors, changing the name of its newest car at that time, namely Zica. The reason, the name is similar to the name of a virus that is endemic in the United States. Likewise with the name of the Chevrolet Nova car made by General Motors which had to be replaced when it was sold in Spanish-speaking countries because it meant "not working". Likewise with the Mitsubishi Pajero. This car also does not sell well in Spanish-speaking countries because the Pajero in Spanish means 'lazy' or 'unreliable'. Even more ridiculous is the Mercedes Benz Vito. This car is guaranteed not to be sold in Sweden because "Vito" means 'female genitals'. So, because of the negative meaning of these words, many cars do not sell in the country of destination of the car manufacturer. All solely because of the negative meaning it carries. Perhaps there is a certain belief by the people who use the language if the car is purchased. Call it for example the Chevrolet Nova which means 'not working' or the Pajero 'lazy'. People who use this language may believe that if purchased, this car will not run or be tough in the field. However, in fact we do not see that. So, why did the car sell well in Indonesia, as well as in Aceh? Yes, of course because these words do not exist in our language. Now, after we know these names have negative meanings in Spanish, are we then reluctant to buy them or resell them to those who have already bought them? Of course not, not because these cars have proven to be tough in the field. Even if it is damaged or doesn't work, it's certainly not because of a negative meaning, but simply because of certain damage to the car. There is a similarity in the form of a word in a language with another language, but it has a negative meaning, of course, not only in the languages ​​of the world. We also have our language. Call it, for example, between the Acehnese language and the Gayo language. The Acehnese language has a utôh vocabulary which means 'builder'. However, when it comes to the Gayo language, words that are almost the same in form and pronunciation have negative meanings in that language. So, because of its negative meaning in the Gayo language, is it then forbidden to use the word utôh in the Acehnese language? Of course not not. The proof is that we still use it to this day and it doesn't need to be banned, it is said that it is again forbidden. Such cases do not only occur between languages, but also within a language. Call it the word ipôk (Acehnese language used by some people in the south-west region). In the Acehnese language in this area, ipôk means 'pocket', but will be laughed at by some Acehnese speakers in the eastern region because of its negative meaning in the Acehnese dialect of that area. Because of this, users of the Acehnese language in the south-west region certainly don't have to bother looking for other words or force themselves to use balum which is considered to have the same meaning as ipôk and does not seem negative. Likewise, the users of the Acehnese language in the eastern region. They certainly don't need to replace or use lumus to find another word for boh pik 'gambas' because of its negative meaning in the Acehnese language in the south-west region. The same case also occurs in Indonesian. We don't need to complain about finding a substitute for my word with another pronoun because the origin of the word is from sahaya which means 'slave'. Likewise, looking for a substitute for the word champion because of its negative initial meaning, namely the activity of fighting cocks. Of course it's pointless and pointless. Why did all that happen? The answer, of course, is that language has a close relationship with the culture of its speakers. The Acehnese language is very closely related to the culture of the Acehnese language user community itself. The same goes for the Spanish I mentioned above. This relationship, in my opinion, is one-way (only between the language and the user of that language). So, it can't be related to other people's cultures, which of course have different languages. Indonesian language associated with the Suriani language certainly does not "fit" because of its culture. Likewise, the word Pokemon used by Japan will never be compatible with the Suriani language, let alone with Indonesian. The Acehnese language associated with the Gayo language will also not be in sync, again because of the culture. It is unimaginable that quite a number of words must be replaced when two or more languages ​​are harmonized in meaning because of the same form and pronunciation. Even if it is forced, there will be a cultural clash that results in uproar in society. Therefore, be wise in language and understand the language. Remember, language can be a source of conflict if misused.

Currently, there is news about candy in the form of a pacifier circulating in Surabaya, East Java, which is suspected to contain drugs or other hazardous materials. The candy, which is known to be imported from a certain country, has gone viral on social media because it is accused of containing drugs. The National Narcotics Agency (BNN) as the focal point for drug problems in Indonesia, said that until now the East Java Provincial BNN and the Surabaya City BNN are bringing samples of the candy for scientific examination by the National Narcotics Laboratory of the National Narcotics Agency regarding the content of the candy. BNN urges the public to be patient while waiting for the results of the examination. It is hoped that parents and children will remain AWARE of all forms and types of drugs by not consuming food, agency drink, or drugs that do not have a distribution permit.
berita_id: Saat ini, ada berita tentang permen dalam bentuk dot yang beredar di Surabaya, Jawa Timur, yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan atau bahan berbahaya lainnya.Permen, yang diketahui diimpor dari negara tertentu, telah menjadi viral di media sosial karena dituduh mengandung obat -obatan.Badan Narkotika Nasional (BNN) sebagai titik fokus untuk masalah narkoba di Indonesia, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang BNN Provinsi Jawa Timur dan Kota Surabaya BNN membawa sampel permen untuk pemeriksaan ilmiah oleh Laboratorium Narkotika Nasional Badan Narkotika Nasional mengenai isi Candy.BNN mendesak masyarakat untuk bersabar sambil menunggu hasil pemeriksaan.Diharapkan bahwa orang tua dan anak -anak akan tetap menyadari semua bentuk dan jenis obat dengan tidak mengonsumsi makanan, minuman agensi, atau obat -obatan yang tidak memiliki izin distribusi.

berita: It is said that the salary of the Indonesian president will increase drastically from only Rp. 62 million to Rp. 553 million. The information circulating stated that this increase was conveyed by the Minister of State Apparatus Empowerment and Bureaucratic Reform. However, Finance Minister Sri Mulyani, as quoted by Antara, said that until now there has been no and there has been no discussion about the increase in the President's salary. His party has never discussed the increase in the president's salary. "It doesn't exist, and it has never been discussed," said Mulyani when answering reporters' questions at a press conference at the Bogor presidential palace, Monday (12/3). Meanwhile, regarding the information from the Minister of State Apparatus Empowerment and Bureaucratic Reform which mentioned the increase in the president's salary, Sri Mulyani emphasized that it was a hoax. "It's a hoax, because there are a lot of social media that produce information, make documents that are made similar to those of the government declared that are published. So we have no discussion about it, absolutely nothing," said Mulyani. Previously, news circulated that the president's basic salary, which is only around Rp. 30 million per month, is currently considered very small and is planning to increase it to Rp. 553 million per month. The simulation of the change in salary provisions for the president appeared in the RPP on the Salary and Allowances for Civil Servants (PNS) which was circulated recently. In the RPP, in addition to the president, the vice president and other high-ranking state officials will also experience a salary increase
berita_id: Dikatakan bahwa gaji presiden Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis hanya dari RP.62 juta hingga RP.553 juta.Informasi yang beredar menyatakan bahwa peningkatan ini disampaikan oleh Menteri Pemberdayaan Aparat Negara dan reformasi birokrasi.Namun, Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani, seperti dikutip oleh Antara, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada dan belum ada diskusi tentang peningkatan gaji presiden.Partainya tidak pernah membahas peningkatan gaji presiden."Itu tidak ada, dan itu tidak pernah dibahas," kata Mulyani ketika menjawab pertanyaan wartawan pada konferensi pers di Bogor Presidential Palace, Senin (12/3).Sementara itu, mengenai informasi dari Menteri Pemberdayaan Aparat Negara dan reformasi birokrasi yang menyebutkan peningkatan gaji presiden, Sri Mulyani menekankan bahwa itu adalah tipuan."Ini tipuan, karena ada banyak media sosial yang menghasilkan informasi, membuat dokumen yang dibuat serupa dengan yang dinyatakan oleh pemerintah yang diterbitkan. Jadi kami tidak berdiskusi tentang hal itu, sama sekali tidak ada," kata Mulyani.Sebelumnya, berita beredar bahwa gaji dasar presiden, yang hanya sekitar RP.30 juta per bulan, saat ini dianggap sangat kecil dan berencana untuk meningkatkannya menjadi RP.553 juta per bulan.Simulasi perubahan ketentuan gaji untuk presiden muncul di RPP tentang gaji dan tunjangan untuk pegawai negeri (PNS) yang diedarkan baru -baru ini.Di RPP, selain presiden, wakil presiden dan pejabat negara tinggi lainnya juga akan mengalami kenaikan gaji

berita: Chairman of the Regional Leadership Council (DPD) of the Bhayangkara Indonesia Narcotics Abuse Prevention Rehabilitation Institute (LRPPN) Tanjungbalai Syahrial Manurung SH told reporters on Sunday (19/3) asking parents to be more careful and always supervise children's snacks because it is suspected nowadays There are types of children's candy containing narcotics and harmful substances on the market. According to him, according to the results of field checks carried out by BPOM Medan and North Sumatra BNN officers, it was found that candy containing drugs was circulating. It is feared that in Tanjungbalai there will also be candy containing drugs circulating. "Therefore, it is requested that the Mayor of Tanjungbalai Mhd Syahrial SH MH together with the queer Tanjungbalai Police Chief AKBP Tri Setyadi Artono Sik can work together to carry out raids to prevent the circulation of sweets that endanger the community and children," he said. Separately, the Mayor of Tanjungbalai, Mhd Syahrial, said that as a regional head he remains responsible for whatever happens in his working area. Syahrial ordered the Disperindag to order the Tanjungbalai Disperindag to immediately conduct a raid on the market. "Report immediately if you find candy that is suspected of containing drugs," said Syahrial.
berita_id: Ketua Dewan Kepemimpinan Regional (DPD) dari Bhayangkara Indonesia Narkotika Pencegahan Pencegahan Rehabilitasi (LRPPN) Tanjungbalai Syahrial Manurung SH mengatakan kepada wartawan pada hari Minggu (19/3) yang menanyakan kepada orang tua dan selalu mengawasi camus anak -anak karena itu diduga dicurigai pada anak -anak.Menurutnya, menurut hasil pemeriksaan lapangan yang dilakukan oleh BPOM Medan dan petugas BNN Sumatra Utara, ditemukan bahwa permen yang mengandung obat -obatan beredar.Dikhawatirkan bahwa di Tanjungbalai juga akan ada permen yang mengandung obat yang beredar."Oleh karena itu, diminta agar walikota Tanjungbalai Mhd Syahrial Sh Mh bersama -sama dengan Kepala Kepolisian Tanjungbalai yang aneh AKBP Tri Setyadi Artono Sik dapat bekerja sama untuk melakukan penggerebekan untuk mencegah sirkulasi permen yang membahayakan masyarakat dan anak -anak," katanya.Secara terpisah, walikota Tanjungbalai, Mhd Syahrial, mengatakan bahwa sebagai kepala regional ia tetap bertanggung jawab atas apa pun yang terjadi di area kerjanya.Syahrial memerintahkan disperindag untuk memerintahkan Tanjungbalai Disperindag untuk segera melakukan serangan di pasar."Laporkan segera jika Anda menemukan permen yang diduga mengandung narkoba," kata Syahrial.

berita: The Indonesian Consul General in Davao City, Eko Hartono, admitted that the burning of reog art instruments was indeed carried out in Davao City, Philippines. This explanation was delivered by Eko when asked for clarification via e-mail. In his letter to the Secretary General of the Jabodetabek Reog Association, Agus Setiyoko, Eko gave the reason that the news about the burning of a number of reog art instruments by the local Consulate General staff was true. However, Consul General Eko Hartono, as quoted in an electronic message received by Agus, said that the burning had to be carried out because the 30-year-old art instrument was damaged and eaten by termites. "Mr. Eko as the Indonesian Consul General in Davao even said that they were grateful for being able to communicate (via e-mail) with the reog community in Indonesia so that they could ask for input for the procurement of a number of new reog identification number art instruments there," said Agus. However, Agus said, the reog art lovers and actors in the country still need an official and open explanation that can be read in the national media so as not to continue to trigger disappointment or even anger from the reog community in Indonesia. "The second letter that we submitted above is more of a reflection of the shock and disappointment of the Indonesian people, especially the reog artist community in the country over the incident of burning objects for the reog art," he said. On Sunday (1/11), news emerged that spread on a number of social media, news about the burning of a number of reog art properties, such as the gayor, dadak peacock mask and the place for the dragon's head gamelan appeared in a number of online media accompanied by photos of the burning of the peacock's mask. The arson was allegedly carried out in the courtyard of a house that also serves as the Indonesian Consulate General's office in Davao City, Philippines.
berita_id: Konsul Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao, Eko Hartono, mengakui bahwa pembakaran instrumen seni yang dirancang ulang memang dilakukan di Kota Davao, Filipina.Penjelasan ini disampaikan oleh EKO ketika diminta klarifikasi melalui email.Dalam suratnya kepada Sekretaris Jenderal Asosiasi Reog Jabodetabek, Agus Setiyoko, Eko memberikan alasan bahwa berita tentang pembakaran sejumlah instrumen seni reog oleh staf umum konsulat setempat adalah benar.Namun, Konsul Jenderal Eko Hartono, seperti dikutip dalam pesan elektronik yang diterima oleh Agus, mengatakan bahwa pembakaran harus dilakukan karena instrumen seni berusia 30 tahun itu rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap."Tn. Eko sebagai konsul jenderal Indonesia di Davao bahkan mengatakan bahwa mereka bersyukur karena dapat berkomunikasi (melalui email) dengan komunitas reog di Indonesia sehingga mereka dapat meminta masukan untuk pengadaan sejumlah instrumen seni identifikasi ulang baru di sana," kata AGUS.Namun, kata Agus, pecinta dan aktor seni yang reog di negara itu masih membutuhkan penjelasan resmi dan terbuka yang dapat dibaca di media nasional agar tidak terus memicu kekecewaan atau bahkan kemarahan dari komunitas reog di Indonesia."Surat kedua yang kami kirimkan di atas lebih merupakan cerminan dari keterkejutan dan kekecewaan orang -orang Indonesia, terutama komunitas seniman yang dirancang ulang di negara itu atas insiden objek yang membakar untuk seni reog," katanya.Pada hari Minggu (1/11), berita muncul yang menyebar di sejumlah media sosial, berita tentang pembakaran sejumlah properti seni yang dirancang ulang, seperti The Gayor, Dadak Peacock Mask dan tempat untuk kepala naga Gamelan muncul di sejumlah media online disertai dengan foto -foto topeng topeng mertua.Pembakaran itu diduga dilakukan di halaman sebuah rumah yang juga berfungsi sebagai kantor konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao, Filipina.

berita: The Head of the Public Information Bureau of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Brigadier General Rikwanto denied the rioting of prisoners at the Salemba Branch of the Mako Brimob Rutan in Kelapa Dua, Depok, on Friday afternoon, November 10, 2017 at 16.00 WIB, related to racial issues. "If there are wild rumors that this incident was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by officers, that doorway is not true," said Rikwanto in a written statement on Friday night, November 10, 2017. The truth is, said Rikwanto, that there are prisoners who do not accept being searched by the Special Detachment 88 Anti-terrorism. The prisoner was said to have provoked. As a result of the riots, said Rikwanto, there was a lot of damage to the detention center facilities, even the door of the detention cell was broken. "There are many facilities at the detention center that have been damaged, such as the door of the prison cell being broken into, the gate of the hallway block, the window panes (in block C and block B)," said Rikwanto. Rikwanto explained that after Friday prayers, the detainees were put into their respective cells by the Densus 88 team. From the results of the search, said Rikwanto, Densus 88 found and confiscated 4 cellular phones. "It belongs to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, and Jumali," said Rikwanto. According to Rikwanto, one of the detainees who did not accept the search, carried out provocations. "Provoking officers with various words," said Rikwanto. One of the members, said Rikwanto, was provoked by their words. "There is also a loud takbir, so that it provokes prisoners from the block next to it," said Rikwanto. According to Rikwanto, currently the riots at the location have been successfully handled by the authorities. The Mako Brimob detention center is where Basuki Tjahaja Purnama alias Ahok is currently serving a 2-year sentence in prison for blasphemy.
berita_id: Kepala Biro Informasi Publik Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Brigadir Jenderal Polisi Nasional Rikwanto membantah kerusuhan para tahanan di cabang Salemba dari Mako Brimob Rutan di Kelapa Dua, Depok, pada hari Jumat sore, 10 November 2017 di 16.00 WIB, terkait dengan masalah rasial."Jika ada desas-desus liar bahwa kejadian ini dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh petugas, pintu itu tidak benar," kata Rikwanto dalam sebuah pernyataan tertulis pada Jumat malam, 10 November 2017. Sebenarnya, kata Rikwanto, bahwa ada tahanan yang tidak menerima digeledah oleh pelepasan khusus 88 anti-parah.Tahanan itu dikatakan telah diprovokasi.Sebagai hasil dari kerusuhan, kata Rikwanto, ada banyak kerusakan pada fasilitas pusat penahanan, bahkan pintu sel penahanan rusak."Ada banyak fasilitas di pusat penahanan yang telah rusak, seperti pintu sel penjara yang dipecah, gerbang blok lorong, panel jendela (di blok C dan blok B)," kata Rikwanto.Rikwanto menjelaskan bahwa setelah doa Jumat, para tahanan dimasukkan ke dalam sel masing -masing oleh tim Densus 88.Dari hasil pencarian, kata Rikwanto, Densus 88 menemukan dan menyita 4 ponsel."Itu milik Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, dan Jumali," kata Rikwanto.Menurut Rikwanto, salah satu tahanan yang tidak menerima pencarian, melakukan provokasi."Petugas yang memprovokasi dengan berbagai kata," kata Rikwanto.Salah satu anggota, kata Rikwanto, diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka."Ada juga takbir yang keras, sehingga memicu tahanan dari blok di sebelahnya," kata Rikwanto.Menurut Rikwanto, saat ini kerusuhan di lokasi telah berhasil ditangani oleh pihak berwenang.Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob adalah tempat Basuki Tjahaja Purnama Alias ​​Ahok saat ini menjalani hukuman 2 tahun di penjara karena penistaan.

berita: Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara said that he would not block (close) Facebook permanently, but only temporarily. That is if the situation gets worse. This was conveyed by Rudiantara in response to Warganet who until now are still confused about the unclear information regarding the fate of Facebook in Indonesia. They also wonder whether Facebook will be closed in Indonesia or not. "We will see this situation first. If it gets worse, then we will temporarily close (block it)," said Minister of Communication and Information Rudiantara as quoted from Liputan6.com Friday, April 20 2018. Rudiantara was reluctant to talk about closing Facebook's operations permanently. He is more focused on monitoring Facebook to create data security and prevent the spread of hate speech. Meanwhile, the House of Representatives also had asked the Communications and Information Technology to be more strict with Facebook. "We and the government - the Ministry of Communication and Informatics - will talk again regarding the follow-up to Facebook's mistake. Personally, I am still open to sanctions, I do not rule out also suggesting a Facebook service moratorium," said Meutya Hafid, Member of the Commission. I DPR RI. Meutya estimates that the DPR RI put upon will wait for the results of Facebook's internal investigation for the next month. "We are waiting, I think a month should be enough time. We hope that the results of this investigation will not only blame who, but also there should be information, where this misused data went and what it was used for," he said. The controversy arose from the Cambridge Analytica scandal, which accused Facebook of leaking data. After being investigated, it turns out that "leaking" is not the right term. The data was not leaked, but rather misused by Cambridge Analytica, allegedly for political purposes.
berita_id: Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa ia tidak akan memblokir (menutup) Facebook secara permanen, tetapi hanya sementara.Itu jika situasinya semakin buruk.Ini disampaikan oleh Rudiantara dalam menanggapi Warganet yang sampai sekarang masih bingung tentang informasi yang tidak jelas mengenai nasib Facebook di Indonesia.Mereka juga bertanya -tanya apakah Facebook akan ditutup di Indonesia atau tidak."Kita akan melihat situasi ini terlebih dahulu. Jika menjadi lebih buruk, maka kita akan untuk sementara waktu akan menutup (memblokirnya)," kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi Rudiantara seperti yang dikutip dari LIPUTAN6.com Jumat, 20 April 2018. Rudiiantara enggan berbicara tentang menutup operasi Facebook secara permanen.Dia lebih fokus pada pemantauan Facebook untuk menciptakan keamanan data dan mencegah penyebaran pidato kebencian.Sementara itu, Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat juga telah meminta komunikasi dan teknologi informasi untuk lebih ketat dengan Facebook."Kami dan pemerintah - Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika - akan berbicara lagi mengenai tindak lanjut dari kesalahan Facebook. Secara pribadi, saya masih terbuka untuk sanksi, saya tidak mengesampingkan juga menyarankan moratorium layanan Facebook," kata Meutya Hafid, anggota komisi.I DPR RI.Meutya memperkirakan bahwa DPR RI akan menunggu hasil penyelidikan internal Facebook untuk bulan berikutnya."Kami sedang menunggu, saya pikir sebulan harus cukup waktu. Kami berharap hasil penyelidikan ini tidak hanya akan menyalahkan siapa, tetapi juga harus ada informasi, di mana data yang disalahgunakan ini pergi dan untuk apa itu digunakan," katanya.Kontroversi muncul dari skandal Cambridge Analytica, yang menuduh Facebook bocor data.Setelah diselidiki, ternyata "bocor" bukanlah istilah yang tepat.Data itu tidak bocor, melainkan disalahgunakan oleh Cambridge Analytica, yang diduga untuk tujuan politik.

berita: Head of the Protocol Section of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah, stated that the news about the locking of the mosque so that people could not pray Fajr was a hoax or a lie. According to him, the closure of the mosque is already a regulation or the protocol at Istiqlal. "The news is a thousand percent hoax, please check who wrote the news," said Hurairah, when contacted, Tuesday (21/2). Hurairah explained, outside the month of Ramadan, Istiqlal was closed after the Isha prayer, around 21.30 WIB, and was based on the law. Then it is reopened one hour before Fajr prayer. "On last night's incident, only five buses came from East Java. They entered after Isha, then they were given the opportunity to worship, clean up, talk nicely with the chairman, we gave understanding, and thank God they understood and left Istiqlal voluntarily," he said. In addition, he said, the group did not know that today's action would be as big as last December 2 and 411. Meanwhile, the group that was waiting in line at the mosque this morning because it was raining, was Walisongo's group, who came every grouping day.
berita_id: Kepala bagian Protokol Masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah, menyatakan bahwa berita tentang penguncian masjid sehingga orang tidak bisa berdoa Fajr adalah tipuan atau kebohongan.Menurutnya, penutupan masjid sudah menjadi peraturan atau protokol di ISTIQLAL."Berita itu adalah tipuan seribu persen, silakan periksa siapa yang menulis berita," kata Hurairah, ketika dihubungi, Selasa (21/2).Hurairah menjelaskan, di luar bulan Ramadhan, Istiqlal ditutup setelah doa Isha, sekitar 21.30 WIB, dan didasarkan pada hukum.Kemudian dibuka kembali satu jam sebelum doa Fajr."Pada insiden tadi malam, hanya lima bus yang datang dari Jawa Timur. Mereka masuk setelah Isha, maka mereka diberi kesempatan untuk beribadah, membersihkan, berbicara dengan baik dengan ketua, kami memberikan pengertian, dan berterima kasih kepada Tuhan mereka mengerti dan meninggalkan Istiqlal secara sukarela," katanya.Selain itu, katanya, kelompok itu tidak tahu bahwa tindakan hari ini akan sebesar 2 dan 411 Desember lalu. Sementara itu, kelompok yang mengantri di masjid pagi ini karena hujan, adalah kelompok Walisongo, yang datang setiap hari pengelompokan.

berita: The news that Facebook will be blocked in Indonesia on April 24, suddenly became widely shared on social media. This information, which has gone viral and circulated widely on social media, especially Facebook, is definitely not true, aka a hoax. The government can indeed take firm action to block Facebook because the data of one million Indonesian users was also leaked in the Cambridge Analytica (CA) scandal. However, there is no certainty that on April 24, Facebook will actually be blocked in Indonesia. As reported by Kompas.com, the Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara on various occasions never said he would block Facebook. Instead, Rudiantara said the Ministry of Communications and Informatics did not hesitate to block Facebook, but it must follow procedures so that the steps are not rash. Rudiantara's only firm statement regarding the blocking of Facebook is, if there is evidence that Facebook is used as a means of inciting. The Minister of Communication and Informatics also ensures that if investigators find elements of criminal suspicion in the leak of Facebook user data in Indonesia, the chances of Facebook blocking are even greater. At the moment, these two things cannot be proven, they are still under investigation and awaiting the results of the audit. "If there are indications that Facebook in Indonesia is used for incitement, as happened in Myanmar, I have no qualms about blocking it," said Rudiantara, Wednesday (11/4/2018), at the Kominfo Building, Medan Merdeka, Jakarta. Furthermore, since a week after the announcement that Facebook user data in Indonesia had been leaked in the CA scandal, Rudiantara had asked Facebook to conduct an audit, and submitted the results of the audit to Kominfo. The request was included in the first warning letter sent by the Ministry of Communication and Informatics. However, after the specified deadline arrived, Facebook help has not yet submitted the results of the audit. Kominfo also issued a second warning letter. “Currently, it is SP II. We wait, later after SP II it can be upgraded to a temporary service termination if needed," said Rudiantara last week (11/4/2018). If the audit results are known later, the government can assess the potential problems that could arise from this data leak and take steps to address them. In addition, the Deputy Chairman of Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives, Satya Widya Yudha in a hearing with Facebook today, Tuesday (17/4/2018), said that blocking Facebook is not a solution, considering that Facebook actually has many benefits. According to Satya, if Facebook does not have good intentions, then blocking can be considered. "Before going there (blocking), it must be understood first. Because Facebook is also useful for communication today," he said. The Cambridge Analytica scandal incident attracted global attention. This analyst firm itself is a political consultant who helped Donald Trump's winning campaign in the 2016 US Presidential Election. CA has stolen 87 million global Facebook user data. Indonesia occupies the third position as the country with the most user data victims
berita_id: Berita bahwa Facebook akan diblokir di Indonesia pada 24 April, tiba -tiba dibagikan secara luas di media sosial.Informasi ini, yang telah menjadi viral dan beredar secara luas di media sosial, terutama Facebook, jelas tidak benar, alias tipuan.Pemerintah memang dapat mengambil tindakan tegas untuk memblokir Facebook karena data satu juta pengguna Indonesia juga bocor dalam skandal Cambridge Analytica (CA).Namun, tidak ada kepastian bahwa pada 24 April, Facebook sebenarnya akan diblokir di Indonesia.Seperti dilansir Kompas.com, Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara pada berbagai kesempatan tidak pernah mengatakan dia akan memblokir Facebook.Sebaliknya, Rudiantara mengatakan Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika tidak ragu untuk memblokir Facebook, tetapi harus mengikuti prosedur sehingga langkah -langkahnya tidak terburu -buru.Satu -satunya pernyataan perusahaan Rudiantara mengenai pemblokiran Facebook adalah, jika ada bukti bahwa Facebook digunakan sebagai sarana menghasut.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika juga memastikan bahwa jika penyelidik menemukan unsur -unsur kecurigaan kriminal dalam kebocoran data pengguna Facebook di Indonesia, peluang pemblokiran Facebook bahkan lebih besar.Saat ini, kedua hal ini tidak dapat dibuktikan, mereka masih dalam penyelidikan dan menunggu hasil audit."Jika ada indikasi bahwa Facebook di Indonesia digunakan untuk penghasutan, seperti yang terjadi di Myanmar, saya tidak punya keraguan tentang memblokirnya," kata Rudiiantara, Rabu (11/4/2018), di gedung Kominfo, Medan Merdeka, Jakarta.Selain itu, sejak seminggu setelah pengumuman bahwa data pengguna Facebook di Indonesia telah bocor dalam skandal CA, Rudiantara telah meminta Facebook untuk melakukan audit, dan mengirimkan hasil audit ke Kominfo.Permintaan tersebut dimasukkan dalam surat peringatan pertama yang dikirim oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika.Namun, setelah tenggat waktu yang ditentukan tiba, bantuan Facebook belum mengirimkan hasil audit.Kominfo juga mengeluarkan surat peringatan kedua."Saat ini, ini adalah SP II.
