However, there is no certainty that on April 24, Facebook will actually be blocked in Indonesia.
berita_id: Pada awalnya, Facebook hanya terbiasa berteman, di Amerika, di Indonesia di mana pun ia digunakan untuk menemukan teman, sekarang orang Indonesia kreatif "Saya punya sepatu, saya hanya memakainya selama sebulan, saya ingin menjualnya, ah .. melalui Facebook, ibu yang suka memasak, sayuran, kreatif, atau apa pun yang ada di depan, menjualnya, menjualnya melalui Facebook, ya, mereka yang membuat pakaian kreatif, atau kreatifnya di atas pancaran, jual, jual Facebook, ya, mereka yang membuat pakaian kreatif, atau kreatifnya di atas pula -mula, tidak ada bilang facebook, tidak menjualnya pada Facebook, ya, mereka yang membuat pakaian kreatif, atau kreatif di facebook, tidak ada di facebook, tidak ada di Facebook, ya, mereka yang membuat pakaian kreatif, tidak ada bilang facebook, tidak menjualnya.MBA (Menteri Komunikasi dan Teknologi Informasi Republik Indonesia) dalam pertemuan komunitas TIK di Hotel Rinra, Tanjung Bunga, Kota Makassar, (13/4/18) sementara itu, netizen masih bingung tentang informasi yang tidak jelas mengenai nasib Facebook di Indonesia.Mereka juga bertanya -tanya, akankah Facebook ditutup di Indonesia atau tidak?Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa ia tidak akan memblokir (menutup) Facebook secara permanen, tetapi hanya sementara.Itu jika situasinya semakin buruk."Kami akan melihat situasi ini terlebih dahulu. Jika menjadi lebih buruk, maka kami akan untuk sementara waktu akan menutup (memblokirnya)," kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi Rudiantara.Rudiantara enggan berbicara tentang menutup operasi Facebook secara permanen.Dia lebih fokus pada pemantauan Facebook untuk menciptakan keamanan data dan mencegah penyebaran pidato kebencian.Awal kasus kontroversi dalam skandal Cambridge Analytica yang menuduh Facebook bocor data.Setelah diselidiki, ternyata "bocor" bukanlah istilah yang tepat.Data itu tidak bocor, melainkan disalahgunakan oleh Cambridge Analytica, yang diduga untuk tujuan politik.Data yang diambil juga bukan konten pesan, tetapi data yang terdaftar di depan umum pada profil seseorang.Mengenai masalah rumor viral yang beredar luas di media sosial, apakah FB ditutup, benar atau hanya tipuan.Namun, tidak ada kepastian bahwa pada 24 April, Facebook sebenarnya akan diblokir di Indonesia.

berita: Dozens of participants in the action to defend the ulama, led by the Presidium Alumni 212, gathered in the courtyard of the Istiqlal Mosque, Central Jakarta, Friday (9/6/2017) afternoon. Gathered around the door of Al Fattah, the masses listened to the speech using a car with loudspeakers. They chose to sit because there were many congregations who participated in routine activities organized by the Istiqlal Mosque management. As a result, the crowd could only give speeches and chant prayers outside the mosque, which was centered around their command car. In their speech, the masses said they would try to enter the Istiqlal Mosque and carry out their activities until the time for the Tarawih prayer. "Don't criminalize ulama, because they are religious broadcasters who continue the Prophet Muhammad SAW," said the orator of the top action on the command car.
berita_id: Lusinan peserta dalam aksi untuk mempertahankan ulama, yang dipimpin oleh Alumni Presidium 212, berkumpul di halaman Masjid Istiqlal, Jakarta Tengah, Jumat (9/6/2017) sore.Berkumpul di sekitar pintu Al Fattah, massa mendengarkan pidato menggunakan mobil dengan pengeras suara.Mereka memilih untuk duduk karena ada banyak sidang yang berpartisipasi dalam kegiatan rutin yang diselenggarakan oleh Manajemen Masjid ISTIQLAL.Akibatnya, orang banyak hanya bisa memberikan pidato dan doa nyanyian di luar masjid, yang berpusat di sekitar mobil komando mereka.Dalam pidato mereka, massa mengatakan mereka akan mencoba memasuki masjid Istiqlal dan melaksanakan kegiatan mereka sampai waktu untuk doa Tarawih."Jangan mengkriminalisasi Ulama, karena mereka adalah penyiar agama yang melanjutkan nabi Muhammad melihat," kata orator aksi tertinggi pada mobil komando.

berita: Facebook is again a byword in the world, including in Indonesia. In fact, Facebook is threatened with closure by the Indonesian government. The cause, especially if not an indication of the leakage of customer personal data to a third company, Cambridge Analytica. This leak is also very large. To date, there have been 87 million personal data leaked. The data that Facebook collects is even up to short messages (SMS) and cell phone records of Facebook account owners. In Indonesia, the Facebook data leak has also been in the spotlight of the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology. The Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara, said that Facebook could be threatened with administrative and criminal sanctions if it is proven to have violated the law. ministry Minister Rudiantara firmly emphasized that his party would not hesitate to close the social media Facebook. There are two serious violations committed by Facebook. First, about the data leak of 1 million account owners from Indonesia. Second, Mark Zuckerberg's social media is suspected of being one of the social media platforms for spreading hoax news and propaganda. As quoted from The Guardian, Facebook admits that its media is used as an anti-Rohing propaganda tool in Myanmar. "I take a position, I threaten to close Facebook and the government has no doubts if it has to close Facebook if it is used for hacking," said Minister Rudiantara. Don't Just Take Action Regarding the two alleged big mistakes by Facebook, the Ministry of Communication and Information will not just take action. The ministry will investigate together with the relevant agencies. The government's actions will have to be based on the right reasons. "I'm coordinating with the police. If I take legal action in cyberspace. Later, if it is processed, there will be a process at the police," said Rudiantara. Rudiantara added that regarding data leakage, Facebook could be subject to corporal sanctions of up to 12 years and a fine of up to Rp12 billion. The reprimand against Facebook is not the first time. In November 2016, the Directorate General of Taxes said that Facebook's tax debt in Indonesia reached IDR 3 trillion. Facebook was also reprimanded by the Ministry of Communication and Information about content that must comply with regulations in Indonesia. “All social media must be willing to participate in maintaining the stability of the country if they want to do business in Indonesia. If it destabilizes Indonesia, the government will act decisively," said the Minister of Communication and Informatics.
berita_id: Facebook sekali lagi menjadi kata bibir di dunia, termasuk di Indonesia.Bahkan, Facebook terancam penutupan oleh pemerintah Indonesia.Penyebabnya, terutama jika bukan indikasi kebocoran data pribadi pelanggan kepada perusahaan ketiga, Cambridge Analytica.Kebocoran ini juga sangat besar.Sampai saat ini, ada 87 juta data pribadi bocor.Data yang dikumpulkan Facebook bahkan hingga pesan pendek (SMS) dan catatan ponsel pemilik akun Facebook.Di Indonesia, kebocoran data Facebook juga menjadi sorotan dari Kementerian Komunikasi dan Teknologi Informasi.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara, mengatakan bahwa Facebook dapat diancam dengan sanksi administrasi dan pidana jika terbukti telah melanggar hukum.Menteri Kementerian Rudiantara dengan tegas menekankan bahwa partainya tidak akan ragu untuk menutup media sosial Facebook.Ada dua pelanggaran serius yang dilakukan oleh Facebook.Pertama, tentang kebocoran data 1 juta pemilik akun dari Indonesia.Kedua, media sosial Mark Zuckerberg dicurigai sebagai salah satu platform media sosial untuk menyebarkan berita dan propaganda tipuan.Seperti dikutip dari The Guardian, Facebook mengakui bahwa medianya digunakan sebagai alat propaganda anti-rok di Myanmar."Saya mengambil posisi, saya mengancam untuk menutup Facebook dan pemerintah tidak memiliki keraguan jika harus menutup Facebook jika digunakan untuk peretasan," kata Menteri Rudiantara.Jangan hanya mengambil tindakan mengenai dua dugaan kesalahan besar oleh Facebook, Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi tidak akan hanya mengambil tindakan.Kementerian akan menyelidiki bersama dengan lembaga yang relevan.Tindakan pemerintah harus didasarkan pada alasan yang tepat."Saya berkoordinasi dengan polisi. Jika saya mengambil tindakan hukum di dunia maya. Kemudian, jika diproses, akan ada proses di polisi," kata Rudiiantara.Rudiantara menambahkan bahwa mengenai kebocoran data, Facebook dapat dikenakan sanksi fisik hingga 12 tahun dan denda hingga Rp12 miliar.Reprimand terhadap Facebook bukan pertama kalinya.Pada November 2016, Direktorat Jenderal Pajak mengatakan bahwa utang pajak Facebook di Indonesia mencapai IDR 3 triliun.Facebook juga ditegur oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan informasi tentang konten yang harus mematuhi peraturan di Indonesia.“Semua media sosial harus bersedia untuk berpartisipasi dalam menjaga stabilitas negara jika mereka ingin melakukan bisnis di Indonesia. Jika itu mengacaukan Indonesia, pemerintah akan bertindak dengan tegas,” kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika.

berita: Not even a month since this virtual reality game application has been circulating in Indonesia, Pokemon Go has been labeled with the meaning "I am Jewish". Pokemon which is taken from the word Pocket Monster (pocket monster), is interpreted as freely as possible from the Old Syriac language. Even its icon, Pikachu, a yellow mouse monster, does not escape the perfunctory translation of “Be a Jew”. Long before the Pokemon Go application was released, in 2001, when the Pokemon animation was broadcast, Pokemon was considered as Jewish propaganda to keep Muslim children away from their religion. Pokemon Go has even become a topic that needs to be legalized at the PBNU Plenary Session in Cirebon, parallel to the discussion of the tax amnesty issue. Pokemon Go is just one of hundreds of games both online and offline that feel the need to be labeled with the word "Jewish". Other games that have been painstakingly labeled the illuminati/devil/freemason/devil's follower/deviant sect/other Islamic insults have also filled the list. Call it Devil May Cry, Resident Evil, Clash of Clans, Prince of Persia, Counter Strike, Come on Dance, even Angry Birds cannot be separated from these frills. This is certainly not something new. Of course, you can also get a pagan/Jewish/communist/liberal stamp for free. Not just one, but all at once. While we are still busy with the narrow division between Jews and Gentiles, the rest of the world is busy pursuing world peace and space exploration. Meanwhile, every year we still struggle with the discourse of boycotting products that are considered to support Israel. The shadow of a big conspiracy carried out by the Jews continues to follow and enlarges the distance of the possibility of diplomatic relations with Indonesia. But, what is not a Jewish conspiracy? Everything is the fault of the Jewish conspiracy. Economic failure is a Jewish conspiracy. After all, what escapes the Jewish frills? Coca Cola if it is twisted in such a way is Jewish. Jewish made Facebook. Like the painful PKI stamp, all Made in China products should be replaced with Jewish ones. What's the matter with the Jews and us? Anti-Judaism, Anti-Semitism, Anti-Zionism, and Why We Hate. What's different about the three? For us, it's all the same. Jews = Israel = Zionists. There is no need to differentiate. All three are the same. Those who believed in and condemned the negative prejudice against Islam in the American hemisphere are now proud to have the same hatred for Jews. What are the similarities between the two? Both consider people with certain characteristics to be hated (as much as they hate communists, liberals, and lesbians, gays, bisexuals, and transgender/LGBT). Why do we hate? Hatred of other groups makes the group and ourselves look good. We love to be good and work hard at it. Love for the group works not only when other groups are truly hated, but because of positive emotions such as pride, honor, sympathy, and trust in one's own group. This we reproduce continuously to other groups. We give in to the temptation to make ourselves look bigger by belittling others. We then imagine big things that don't make sense to be attached to the hatred that feeds our brains every day. Gordon Allport, in Anti-Semitism, A Social Disease (1946) called Judeophobia (negative prejudice against Jews) as a social disease that is contagious and is a complex crime. Simmel then even interpreted it as a mass psychosis that spreads like a virus. Like a possessed individual, this thought is highly irrational, massive, structured, and is a futile defensive attempt to balance a perceived weak identity and affiliation with delusions of power. We use negative prejudices to control our free-falling self-esteem. Unfortunately, our hatred doesn't stop there. We reproduce fears that are like snowballs, rolling and multiplying. We build a discourse in which the existence of the Jews will threaten our existence. To eliminate the thought of threat, we have an urgency to remove the source of the discomfort, by destroying others if we do not want to be destroyed by ourselves. The principle: “In order for us to breathe, you must be eliminated.” Not to mention our fear of the Jews, online games push us into new troubles. Those of us who are technology stutterers are also rushing to respond to augmented reality-based games. When did Islam as a religion emerge? The writer Damhuri Muhammad articulated it nicely in his opinion in Kompas (26/7/2016), that high technology which is now accessible to anyone has turned into a strange shock, addiction, and even hysteria. Although some of us understand that perhaps the discourses of fear of high-tech extremely games are mere humor and satire, we must realize that this is happening not on the other side of the world, but in the headrooms themselves and is taken seriously. Even that is driven by what has been echoed in our ears so far. We must become rigid by learning to study again and learn We are taught that it is wrong to play and have fun (except watching Uttaran from day to night, or watching gossip shows of artist life). However I say that the most effective English lessons are not in boring classrooms. To me, it came in the form of a Harvest Moon game when I had to open a dictionary to look up the meaning of the word basketball which I thought at the time was ball. And as an addict of online and offline games, I'll always be at the forefront of having fun, even if the consequences are “Being Jewish”.

In 2012 we were shocked by the emergence of brushes or brushes made from pig bristles to the point that the MUI issued a fatwa against using a pig bristle brush, but recently, information about toothbrushes made from pig bristles has resurfaced. Information for you Muslims to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use materials from non-halal. Come on, check the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains pig bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair aka Pig Fur! So double check the packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), it usually says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". “What are your toothbrush bristles made of? Plastic or Pig Hair? How to check: Look at the package, if it's made of bristles, then it's made of sea urchin. Please burn the bristles, if it smells like burning hair, it means it's from sea urchins. But if it melts and becomes hard, it means it is made of plastic and is safe to use. The risk of using what is haram: Worship is rejected, prayer is rejected, and hell is more worthy (hadith). Save ourselves and our loved ones. " In everyday life, we use various kinds of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint the house, grease cake pans, and spread food. Such as grilled chicken, bread, cakes, and various grilled or grilled meats and seafood. While the brush is useful when combing hair, cleaning hair at the salon or barbershop, washing clothes, and scrubbing floors. Do you know what the brushes & brushes you are using come from? Most likely From Sea urchins! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, generally come from China. These imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly Haram. No matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption and for application. (the term is PIG/BOAR/HOG/BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places, such as Markets, Painting Supplies Stores, Building Materials Stores, Make Up & Salon Tools Stores, Online Stores, etc. Are you familiar with the various shapes below? There are painting brushes, wall paint brushes, make up brushes, hair brushes, barber/barber brushes, clothes brushes, etc. Beware! Tips to Avoid Using Pig Bristle Brushes and Brushes: 1. Use 100% Synthetic Brushes & Brushes, Such As Nylon. Wall paint brushes and food brushes are available, with slightly more expensive prices. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. 2. Use Alternatives Other Than Brushes. For example, Roller Paint for Painting, Sponges & Cotton Buds For Makeup, And Knives & Spatula For Smearing Food. 3. Beware of Foods That Process Cooking And Cleaning The Tools exist Using A Pig Brush. 4. Characteristics of Pork Bristle Brush, When Burned Will Cause A Distinctive Odor Like Roasted Meat. 5. Usually Pig Bristle Brushes Are Sold In White & Black. However, Manufacturers Can Process Pig Hair By Bleaching And Coloring It, So It Looks Like Other Animal Hair. (and) Share this info with your family and friends so that more people can read it so you can avoid products that are not halal…hopefully it will be useful…
berita_id: Pada 2012 kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi hingga MUI mengeluarkan fatwa untuk tidak menggunakan sikat bulu babi, tetapi baru -baru ini, informasi tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah muncul kembali.Informasi untuk Anda Muslim untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan dari non-halal.Ayo, periksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi alias bulu babi!Jadi periksa kembali kemasan sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), biasanya mengatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% China Bristle".Terbuat dari bulu sikat gigi?Layak (Hadis).Selamatkan diri kita dan orang yang kita cintai. "Seperti ayam panggang, roti, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Sementara sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian, dan menggosok lantai.Tahukah Anda dari apa kuas & kuas yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar dari landak laut!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia, umumnya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor ini diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Bagi umat Islam, penggunaan landak laut jelas haram.Tidak peduli seberapa kecil, materi dari daging babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan untuk aplikasi.(Istilah ini adalah sikat rambut babi/babi/babi/bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat, seperti pasar, toko persediaan lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, toko alat make up & salon, toko online, dll. Apakah Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk di bawah ini?Ada kuas lukisan, kuas cat dinding, kuas make up, sikat rambut, kuas tukang cukur/tukang cukur, sikat pakaian, dll. Waspadalah!Tips yang harus dihindari menggunakan sikat bulu babi dan kuas: 1. Gunakan sikat & sikat sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Sikat cat dinding dan kuas makanan tersedia, dengan harga yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.2. Gunakan alternatif selain kuas.Misalnya, cat roller untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk makeup, dan pisau & spatula untuk mengolesi makanan.3. Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang memproses memasak dan membersihkan alat yang ada menggunakan sikat babi.4. Karakteristik sikat bulu babi, ketika dibakar akan menyebabkan bau khas seperti daging panggang.5. Biasanya sikat bulu babi dijual putih & hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses rambut babi dengan memutihkan dan mewarnai, jadi itu terlihat seperti rambut hewan lainnya.(dan) Bagikan info ini dengan keluarga dan teman Anda sehingga lebih banyak orang dapat membacanya sehingga Anda dapat menghindari produk yang tidak halal ... semoga akan berguna ...

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia will increase drastically to reach Rp. 500 million per month. Or Rp 6.6 billion per year. This increase occurs if the Draft Government Regulation on the Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities of Civil Servants is actually passed. The amount is stated in the RPP material. With the president's salary index of 96,000 points, it was found that the figure was Rp. 553 million. According to Article 2 of Law number 7 of 1978, the president's salary is 6 times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia (Chairman of the DPR, MA, and BPK). Meanwhile, in PP 75/2000, it is stated that the three officials receive a salary of Rp. 5040000 per month. Thus, the president's basic salary is IDR 30240000 per month. Presidential Decree 68/2001 also states that the allowance for the position of the President is Rp. 32500000. So that the total money received by the president each month is Rp. 62740000 or Rp. 752880000 per year. According to the palace, this number has not changed since 2001. The total salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia is relatively small compared to the leaders of the major countries in the world. Prime Minister (PM) of Singapore, Lee Hsien Loong recorded the highest salary of USD 2.2 million or equivalent to Rp. 30.3 billion per year. After Lee, there is Doris Leuthard, the President of Switzerland, who has a salary of USD 437000 or Rp. 6 billion per year. Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Trunbull followed with a salary of USD 403,700 or Rp. 5.5 billion per year. President Jokowi's salary is only higher than that of PRC President Xi Jinping, who is paid USD 20,500 or IDR 283 million per year. Meanwhile, US President Donald Trump recorded the smallest income, which was USD 1 per year. Of course this is Trump's personal request. The 45th president of the US has a personal fortune of around USD 3 billion. University of Indonesia (UI) public policy observer Lina Miftahul Jannah said it was very natural for the President to have a very large income index. So that the income received by the number one person in Indonesia is very high. "It makes sense too," he explained. He said that as head of state as well as head of government, the duties, responsibilities, and risks of a president are enormous. So, according to him, it is not natural for an official to be paid by the state budget, whose salary is greater than the president's. Instead, he said it would be dangerous if there were other government officials whose salaries were higher than the President. Meanwhile, the palace has not been able to comment further on the salary increase scheme for civil servants, presidents and other state officials. Presidential Spokesman Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo said his party had not received sufficient information about this. "I don't ruff have the information yet. I'll confirm it later," he said when confirmed. The former Acting Officer (Plt) of the KPK leadership has also not been able to confirm the progress of the RPP
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis untuk mencapai RP.500 juta per bulan.Atau Rp 6,6 miliar per tahun.Peningkatan ini terjadi jika rancangan peraturan pemerintah tentang gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas pegawai negeri sebenarnya disahkan.Jumlah tersebut dinyatakan dalam bahan RPP.Dengan indeks gaji presiden sebesar 96.000 poin, ditemukan bahwa angkanya adalah RP.553 juta.Menurut Pasal 2 Hukum Nomor 7 tahun 1978, gaji Presiden adalah 6 kali gaji dasar pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia (ketua DPR, MA, dan BPK).Sementara itu, dalam hal 75/2000, dinyatakan bahwa ketiga pejabat menerima gaji RP.5040000 per bulan.Dengan demikian, gaji pokok presiden adalah IDR 30240000 per bulan.Keputusan Presiden 68/2001 juga menyatakan bahwa tunjangan untuk posisi presiden adalah RP.32500000. Sehingga total uang yang diterima oleh presiden setiap bulan adalah RP.62740000 atau RP.752880000 per tahun.Menurut Istana, jumlah ini tidak berubah sejak tahun 2001. Gaji total Presiden Republik Indonesia relatif kecil dibandingkan dengan para pemimpin negara -negara besar di dunia.Perdana Menteri (PM) dari Singapura, Lee Hsien Loong mencatat gaji tertinggi USD 2,2 juta atau setara dengan RP.30,3 miliar per tahun.Setelah Lee, ada Doris Leuthard, presiden Swiss, yang memiliki gaji USD 437000 atau RP.6 miliar per tahun.Perdana Menteri Australia Malcolm Trunbull diikuti dengan gaji USD 403.700 atau RP.5,5 miliar per tahun.Gaji Presiden Jokowi hanya lebih tinggi dari Presiden RRC Xi Jinping, yang dibayar USD 20.500 atau IDR 283 juta per tahun.Sementara itu, Presiden AS Donald Trump mencatat pendapatan terkecil, yaitu USD 1 per tahun.Tentu saja ini adalah permintaan pribadi Trump.Presiden ke -45 AS memiliki kekayaan pribadi sekitar USD 3 miliar.Pengamat Kebijakan Publik University of Indonesia (UI) Lina Miftahul Jannah mengatakan sangat wajar bagi presiden untuk memiliki indeks pendapatan yang sangat besar.Sehingga pendapatan yang diterima oleh orang nomor satu di Indonesia sangat tinggi."Itu juga masuk akal," jelasnya.Dia mengatakan bahwa sebagai kepala negara serta kepala pemerintahan, tugas, tanggung jawab, dan risiko presiden sangat besar.Jadi, menurutnya, tidak wajar bagi seorang pejabat yang harus dibayar dengan anggaran negara, yang gajinya lebih besar dari presiden.Sebaliknya, dia mengatakan akan berbahaya jika ada pejabat pemerintah lain yang gaji yang gaji lebih tinggi dari presiden.Sementara itu, istana belum dapat berkomentar lebih lanjut tentang skema kenaikan gaji untuk pegawai negeri, presiden dan pejabat negara lainnya.Juru bicara presiden Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo mengatakan partainya belum menerima informasi yang cukup tentang hal ini."Aku belum memiliki informasi. Aku akan mengkonfirmasi nanti," katanya ketika dikonfirmasi.Mantan Penjabat Petugas (PLT) kepemimpinan KPK juga tidak dapat mengkonfirmasi kemajuan RPP

berita: For the past three days, the people of Surabaya and East Java have been shocked by the issue of pacifiers and hard candies, which are suspected to contain hazardous substances. It was even said to contain drugs. Whether the information is from the origin, suddenly joint officers involving the Satpol PP, the Police, the Narcotics Agency, and other related institutions, carry out operations on the goods that are consumed by the school children. On the first day of the raid, Tuesday (7/3), in Surabaya, the joint team managed to confiscate hundreds of pacifiers and hard candies. A number of officials appealed to residents, especially parents, to keep an eye on their children, and to avoid food that is rumored to be harmful to the students. That same day, the evidence of the findings was sent to BPOM for research and laboratory tests. Meanwhile, joint officers in several areas of East Java followed up on the raid. From the information from the Center for Drug and Food Control (BBPOM) in Surabaya, hard candy in the form of a dot is a foreign food from China and has an official code written from BPOM RI. That is, this food is legal. The laboratory test results released Friday (9/3) were negative. This means that the food is not proven to contain harmful ingredients or drugs. What is interesting to observe is that it is not clear how severe and how many children are victims of this case. Some admitted that there were those who felt their throats were hoarse, and coughed. Others said they felt dizzy after consuming these foods. Has an investigation been carried out, and deepened, that the complaint was really caused by consuming pacifiers or hard candy? What is rather odd is the confession of a trader, that he has been selling the product which is rumored to contain the drug for about 10 years. If indeed this food is dangerous, the impact should have been known long ago. Why is it just getting excited now? We appreciate the preventive efforts of officers, who anticipate and prevent early. However, officers should pay close attention to reports or information received accurately. Do not just carry out raids, without the support of evidence and facts that can be accounted for. They should consider various aspects. Hasn't the result of the raids and the spread of inaccurate information caused huge and fatal losses? The results of this laboratory are all clear. That food is legal, and harmless. have Relevant parties must immediately clarify. And it is appropriate to apologize to the traders and the aggrieved parties, who have suffered financial losses due to the emergence of this case. Not only that, the police must investigate the spread of the issue. Who and what is behind the issue?
berita_id: Selama tiga hari terakhir, orang -orang Surabaya dan Jawa Timur telah dikejutkan oleh masalah dot dan permen keras, yang diduga mengandung zat berbahaya.Bahkan dikatakan mengandung narkoba.Apakah informasi itu berasal dari asal, tiba -tiba petugas bersama yang melibatkan Satpol PP, polisi, Badan Narkotika, dan lembaga terkait lainnya, melakukan operasi pada barang -barang yang dikonsumsi oleh anak -anak sekolah.Pada hari pertama serangan itu, Selasa (7/3), di Surabaya, tim bersama berhasil menyita ratusan dot dan permen keras.Sejumlah pejabat memohon kepada penduduk, terutama orang tua, untuk mengawasi anak -anak mereka, dan untuk menghindari makanan yang dikabarkan berbahaya bagi para siswa.Pada hari yang sama, bukti temuan dikirim ke BPOM untuk tes penelitian dan laboratorium.Sementara itu, petugas bersama di beberapa daerah Jawa Timur menindaklanjuti serangan itu.Dari informasi dari Pusat Pengendalian Obat dan Makanan (BBPOM) di Surabaya, permen keras dalam bentuk titik adalah makanan asing dari Cina dan memiliki kode resmi yang ditulis dari BPOM RI.Artinya, makanan ini legal.Hasil tes laboratorium yang dirilis Jumat (9/3) negatif.Ini berarti bahwa makanan tidak terbukti mengandung bahan atau obat berbahaya.Yang menarik untuk diamati adalah tidak jelas seberapa parah dan berapa banyak anak menjadi korban dari kasus ini.Beberapa mengakui bahwa ada orang -orang yang merasa tenggorokan mereka serak, dan batuk.Yang lain mengatakan mereka merasa pusing setelah mengonsumsi makanan ini.Apakah penyelidikan telah dilakukan, dan diperdalam, bahwa pengaduan itu benar -benar disebabkan oleh mengonsumsi dot atau permen keras?Yang agak aneh adalah pengakuan pedagang, bahwa ia telah menjual produk yang dikabarkan mengandung obat selama sekitar 10 tahun.Jika memang makanan ini berbahaya, dampaknya seharusnya sudah lama diketahui.Mengapa sekarang semakin bersemangat?Kami menghargai upaya pencegahan petugas, yang mengantisipasi dan mencegah awal.Namun, petugas harus memperhatikan laporan atau informasi yang diterima secara akurat.Jangan hanya melakukan penggerebekan, tanpa dukungan bukti dan fakta yang dapat diperhitungkan.Mereka harus mempertimbangkan berbagai aspek.Bukankah hasil penggerebekan dan penyebaran informasi yang tidak akurat menyebabkan kerugian besar dan fatal?Hasil laboratorium ini semuanya jelas.Makanan itu legal, dan tidak berbahaya.Memiliki pihak yang relevan harus segera mengklarifikasi.Dan pantas untuk meminta maaf kepada para pedagang dan partai -partai yang dirugikan, yang telah menderita kerugian finansial karena munculnya kasus ini.Tidak hanya itu, polisi harus menyelidiki penyebaran masalah ini.Siapa dan apa yang ada di balik masalah ini?

berita: The Mojokerto City National Narcotics Agency (BNNK) and the Mojokerto City Health Office (Dinkes) East Java held a surprise inspection (sidak) of pacifiers suspected of containing hazardous materials, at a number of schools and snack food agents in Mojokerto City, Wednesday (08/3/2107 ). When conducting inspections at a number of schools, no candy sales were found. Next, the officers targeted a number of snack agents at the Tanjung Anyar Market, Mojokerto City. As a result, officers found candy with the same brand being sold freely at two snack food agencies. However, the type of candy found by the joint officers was different from the candy pacifier found in Surabaya. "Following up on the finding of candy allegedly containing drugs, today we conducted an inspection. As a result, we found candy with the same brand, namely "Hard Candy". But the shape is different," said Head of BNNK Mojokerto, AKBP Suharsi, Wednesday (08/3). /2017). In addition, officers also found candy pacifiers with different shapes. In Mojokerto, the candy pacifiers found resembled "kempeng". Officers also found imported sweets from China which were sold freely at a number of food agents at the Tanjung Anyar Market, take Mojokerto City. "Furthermore, we took samples of all the candies that we found, both candy with the "Hard Candy" brand and imported candies for laboratory testing. Even though these candies were equipped with a permit from the Food and Drug Administration (BPOM)," he said. .
berita_id: Badan Narkotika Nasional Kota Mojokerto (BNNK) dan Kantor Kesehatan Kota Mojokerto (Dinkes) Jawa Timur mengadakan inspeksi kejutan (SIDAK) dari dot yang diduga mengandung bahan berbahaya, di sejumlah sekolah dan agen makanan kudapan di Mocjokerto City, Rabu (08/3/2107).Saat melakukan inspeksi di sejumlah sekolah, tidak ada penjualan permen yang ditemukan.Selanjutnya, para petugas menargetkan sejumlah agen camilan di Pasar Tanjung Anyar, Mojokerto City.Akibatnya, petugas menemukan permen dengan merek yang sama dijual dengan bebas di dua agen makanan ringan.Namun, jenis permen yang ditemukan oleh petugas gabungan berbeda dari dot permen yang ditemukan di Surabaya."Menindaklanjuti temuan permen yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan, hari ini kami melakukan inspeksi. Akibatnya, kami menemukan permen dengan merek yang sama, yaitu" permen keras ". Tetapi bentuknya berbeda," kata kepala Bnnk Mojokerto, AKBP Suharsi, Rabu (08/3)./2017).Selain itu, petugas juga menemukan dot permen dengan bentuk yang berbeda.Di Mojokerto, dot permen menemukan "Kempeng".Petugas juga menemukan permen impor dari Cina yang dijual secara bebas di sejumlah agen makanan di pasar Tanjung Anyar, mengambil Kota Mojokerto."Selain itu, kami mengambil sampel dari semua permen yang kami temukan, keduanya permen dengan merek" permen keras "dan mengimpor permen untuk pengujian laboratorium. Meskipun permen ini dilengkapi dengan izin dari Food and Drug Administration (BPOM)," katanya..

berita: The hashtag #UninstallTraveloka is echoing on Twitter social media, Tuesday (14/11/2017). The call to uninstall was allegedly triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk-out action when Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan gave a speech last weekend. Precisely when, Ananda walked out during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11/2017) at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. According to information compiled by galamedianews.com, this event was also attended by one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma. At that time, he greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. Meanwhile, the Muhammadiyah Youth of DKI Jakarta Province assessed that the walkout (WO) carried out by Ananda Sukarlan and the Traveloka boss to Anies Baswedan was an intolerant attitude. Chairman of the Muhammadiyah Youth of DKI Jakarta Province, Syahrul Hasan, said that the WO action carried out by Ananda Sukarlan and several others illustrates the attitude of intolerance and poor morals as hosts in tuesday receiving guests. Where the presence of Anies Baswedan as a guest is at the official request of the host himself. "Ananda Sukarlan's walkout action accusing Anies Baswedan of winning the governor's seat is not in accordance with Kanisius' values ​​is far from being burned," Syahrul said in a release, Tuesday (11/14/2017). Syahrul explained, Anies Baswedan was part of the Muhammadiyah extended family, both structurally and culturally. Currently, he is entrusted with the advisory role of the Muhammadiyah Branch of Pondok Labu where Din Syamsudin MA serves as the head of the branch.
berita_id: Tagar #uninstalltraveloka bergema di media sosial Twitter, Selasa (14/11/2017).Panggilan untuk menghapus instalasi diduga dipicu oleh tindakan pianis Ananda Sukarlan ketika Gubernur Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato akhir pekan lalu.Tepatnya ketika, Ananda berjalan keluar selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11/2017) di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Menurut informasi yang disusun oleh Galamamedianews.com, acara ini juga dihadiri oleh salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma.Pada waktu itu, dia menyapa dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah berjalan keluar dan pidato anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Sementara itu, pemuda Muhammadiyah dari provinsi DKI Jakarta menilai bahwa pemogokan (WO) yang dilakukan oleh Ananda Sukarlan dan bos Traveloka ke Anies Baswedan adalah sikap yang tidak toleran.Ketua pemuda Muhammadiyah dari provinsi DKI Jakarta, Syahrul Hasan, mengatakan bahwa tindakan WO yang dilakukan oleh Ananda Sukarlan dan beberapa lainnya menggambarkan sikap intoleransi dan moral yang buruk sebagai tuan rumah pada hari Selasa menerima tamu.Di mana kehadiran Anies Baswedan sebagai tamu atas permintaan resmi tuan rumah sendiri."Tindakan pemogokan Ananda Sukarlan menuduh Anies Baswedan memenangkan kursi gubernur tidak sesuai dengan nilai -nilai Kanisius jauh dari dibakar," kata Syahrul dalam rilisnya, Selasa (11/14/2017).Syahrul menjelaskan, Anies Baswedan adalah bagian dari keluarga besar Muhammadiyah, baik secara struktural maupun budaya.Saat ini, ia dipercayakan dengan peran penasihat cabang Muhammadiyah dari Pondok Labu di mana Din Syamsudin Ma berfungsi sebagai kepala cabang.

berita: Catfish is said to contain 3000 cancer cells. The news circulated on social media. Freshwater fish are also considered the dirtiest fish because they eat all kinds of attractive force dirt. The news made catfish cultivators, catfish pecel stall owners, and freshwater fish connoisseurs offended and devastated. The reason is, catfish is one of the favorite food menus in Indonesia. Almost every food stall, especially in East Java and West Java, always provides this menu. Besides the price is quite cheap, this menu is also delicious, so it becomes a special attraction for consumers. The news that catfish contains 3000 cancer cells first appeared in China. An article that mentions dirty and dirty catfish ads has gone viral on social media. The article mentions that human waste is also used as feed at a catfish farm in China. The article states that catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. This is because catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places. Catfish consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chickens, cows and pigs, and humans. This allows catfish to contain 3000 cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. However, catfish connoisseurs are asked not to be influenced by this information. The reason is, catfish advertising in Indonesia is different from China. Catfish in the country are cultivated very well by catfish breeders. They use pellets as their food, not using waste which is very harmful to human health like in China. Poor catfish cultivators, they were offended and very upset by the news. The information that catfish contains 3000 cancer cells is not true, said Head of the East Java Province Fisheries and Marine Service, Heru Tjahjono, Saturday (31/10)
berita_id: Catfish dikatakan mengandung 3000 sel kanker.Berita itu beredar di media sosial.Ikan air tawar juga dianggap sebagai ikan paling kotor karena mereka memakan semua jenis kotoran yang menarik.Berita itu membuat para pembudidaya lele, pemilik kios Pecel lele, dan penikmat ikan air tawar tersinggung dan hancur.Alasannya adalah, ikan lele adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit di Indonesia.Hampir setiap kios makanan, terutama di Jawa Timur dan Jawa Barat, selalu menyediakan menu ini.Selain harganya cukup murah, menu ini juga lezat, sehingga menjadi daya tarik khusus bagi konsumen.Berita bahwa ikan lele berisi 3000 sel kanker pertama kali muncul di Cina.Sebuah artikel yang menyebutkan iklan lele yang kotor dan kotor telah beredar di media sosial.Artikel ini menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan di sebuah peternakan ikan lele di Cina.Artikel tersebut menyatakan bahwa ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Ini karena ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor.Ikan lele mengkonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi dan babi, dan manusia.Ini memungkinkan ikan lele mengandung 3000 sel kanker yang sangat berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Namun, penikmat lele diminta untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh informasi ini.Alasannya adalah, iklan lele di Indonesia berbeda dari Cina.Lele di negara ini dibudidayakan dengan sangat baik oleh peternak ikan lele.Mereka menggunakan pelet sebagai makanan mereka, bukan menggunakan limbah yang sangat berbahaya bagi kesehatan manusia seperti di Cina.Pengganti ikan lele yang malang, mereka tersinggung dan sangat kesal dengan berita itu.Informasi bahwa ikan lele berisi 3000 sel kanker tidak benar, kata Kepala Perikanan Provinsi Jawa Timur dan Layanan Laut, Heru Tjahjono, Sabtu (31/10)

berita: JAKARTA, the National Narcotics Agency (BNN) has released the test results of the pacifier candy sample. Previously, the snacks, which were sold for Rp. 1000, were suspected of containing drugs. In fact, since the first scene in the Surabaya area, East Java, it made many parents nervous. Not only that, the candy went viral on social media because it was accused of containing drugs. "After testing at the Narcotics Laboratory of the National Narcotics Agency, it was concluded that the candy sample was negative and did not contain narcotics or other psychoactive ingredients," said Head of the BNN Public Relations Section, Kombes Slamet Pribadi, Thursday (9/3/2017). Slamet said that several cases of food types were often used as a modus operandi by narcotics syndicates. But usually these products are sold illegally and at a price that is certainly different from the market price. "BNN urges the public to remain vigilant against various modes of illicit drug trafficking that are increasingly diverse," he continued. Slamet added that BNN also asked parents manoeuver to always monitor their sons and daughters' interactions. Likewise with other related parties, such as schools, neighborhood associations, neighborhood associations, to religious leaders, community leaders, traditional leaders, youth leaders to be able to help monitor the surrounding environment, in order to avoid the dangers of drug abuse.
berita_id: Jakarta, Badan Narkotika Nasional (BNN) telah merilis hasil tes sampel Permen PACIFIER.Sebelumnya, makanan ringan, yang dijual seharga RP.1000, diduga mengandung obat.Bahkan, sejak adegan pertama di daerah Surabaya, Jawa Timur, itu membuat banyak orang tua gugup.Tidak hanya itu, permen menjadi viral di media sosial karena dituduh mengandung obat -obatan."Setelah pengujian di Laboratorium Narkotika Badan Narkotika Nasional, disimpulkan bahwa sampel permen negatif dan tidak mengandung narkotika atau bahan -bahan psikoaktif lainnya," kata kepala bagian hubungan masyarakat BNN, Kombes Slamet Pribadi, Kamis (9/3/2017).Slamet mengatakan bahwa beberapa kasus jenis makanan sering digunakan sebagai modus operandi oleh sindikat narkotika.Tetapi biasanya produk -produk ini dijual secara ilegal dan dengan harga yang tentu saja berbeda dari harga pasar."BNN mendesak masyarakat untuk tetap waspada terhadap berbagai mode perdagangan narkoba yang semakin beragam," lanjutnya.Slamet menambahkan bahwa BNN juga meminta orang tua manuuver untuk selalu memantau interaksi putra dan putri mereka.Demikian juga dengan partai -partai terkait lainnya, seperti sekolah, asosiasi lingkungan, asosiasi lingkungan, kepada para pemimpin agama, pemimpin masyarakat, pemimpin tradisional, pemimpin pemuda yang dapat membantu memantau lingkungan sekitarnya, untuk menghindari bahaya penyalahgunaan narkoba.

berita: JAKARTA—Cianjur Regent Irvan Rivano Muchtar will ban Cianjur residents, especially young people, from playing the online game Pokemon Go. The reason is that the meaning contained in the game is contrary to the beliefs of the majority of the population of Cianjur and is considered dangerous. According to Irvan, one of the game applications on smartphones based on Android and Apple is indeed being loved by game lovers, especially young people. However, according to Irvan, the meaning of the word Pokemon in one language is I am Jewish. "Obviously this is an acknowledgment of people who oppress our brothers, such as the Palestinians. It is also against religious teachings," he said, Tuesday, July 19 2016. Irvan said the Cianjur Regency Government is currently only urging smartphone users not to play Pokemon Go, which was recently officially launched in America and will only be inaugurated in Indonesia in the near future. "Now it's just an appeal, but maybe later it will be banned if it doesn't educate and is dangerous," he said. Irvan added, from some of the news circulating, Pokemon Go can cause accidents. Games that require users to leave the house and walk to look for pokemon will disrupt concentration on the road. "Indeed there has been no research that is dangerous or not. But it is clear that it is better to anticipate before all these bad things happen," he said. The Commander of Military District 0608 Cianjur, Lieutenant Colonel Armed Imam Haryadi, has even issued a ban for his members from playing the Pokemon Go game, especially at only headquarters. According to him, the GPS-based game will record complete location data so that it is feared that it will be misused. Imam explained, the Pokemon Go game is three-dimensional and based on GPS. When used, it will record the location data for the monster's search. If the recorded data goes to other parties and is used for certain purposes, it is very dangerous. "So we forbid all members of the TNI, starting from the Kodim, Koramil, and below to play, especially in the TNI headquarters environment," said Armed.
berita_id: JAKARTA - Bupati Cianjur Irvan Rivano Muchtar akan melarang penduduk Cianjur, terutama orang -orang muda, dari memainkan permainan online Pokemon Go.Alasannya adalah bahwa makna yang terkandung dalam permainan ini bertentangan dengan keyakinan mayoritas populasi Cianjur dan dianggap berbahaya.Menurut Irvan, salah satu aplikasi game di smartphone berdasarkan Android dan Apple memang dicintai oleh pecinta game, terutama orang -orang muda.Namun, menurut Irvan, arti kata pokemon dalam satu bahasa adalah saya orang Yahudi."Jelas ini adalah pengakuan terhadap orang -orang yang menindas saudara -saudara kita, seperti Palestina. Ini juga bertentangan dengan ajaran agama," katanya, Selasa, 19 Juli 2016. Irvan mengatakan pemerintah Cianjur Regency saat ini hanya mendesak pengguna ponsel cerdas untuk tidak bermain Pokemon Go, yang baru -baru ini diluncurkan secara resmi di Amerika dan hanya akan hanya akan ada di Indonesia di Indonesia di The Losing, yang baru -baru ini diluncurkan secara resmi."Sekarang ini hanya banding, tapi mungkin nanti akan dilarang jika tidak mendidik dan berbahaya," katanya.Irvan menambahkan, dari beberapa berita yang beredar, Pokemon Go dapat menyebabkan kecelakaan.Game yang mengharuskan pengguna meninggalkan rumah dan berjalan untuk mencari Pokemon akan mengganggu konsentrasi di jalan."Memang belum ada penelitian yang berbahaya atau tidak. Tetapi jelas bahwa lebih baik mengantisipasi sebelum semua hal buruk ini terjadi," katanya.Komandan Distrik Militer 0608 Cianjur, Letnan Kolonel Bersenjata Imam Haryadi, bahkan telah mengeluarkan larangan bagi para anggotanya untuk memainkan permainan Pokemon Go, terutama di kantor pusat hanya.Menurutnya, game berbasis GPS akan merekam data lokasi yang lengkap sehingga ditakuti bahwa itu akan disalahgunakan.Imam menjelaskan, game Pokemon Go adalah tiga dimensi dan berdasarkan GPS.Saat digunakan, itu akan merekam data lokasi untuk pencarian monster.Jika data yang direkam pergi ke pihak lain dan digunakan untuk tujuan tertentu, itu sangat berbahaya."Jadi kami melarang semua anggota TNI, mulai dari Kodim, Koramil, dan di bawah untuk bermain, terutama di lingkungan markas TNI," kata Armed.

berita: One million Facebook accounts in Indonesia were reportedly leaked, angering the Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara. According to Rudiantara, the government is ready to turn off Facebook access in Indonesia if needed. The one million data on Facebook users in Indonesia was used by Cambridge Analytica. In addition to the leak of Facebook accounts, it had also exacerbated the massacre of the Rohingya in Myanmar. "I made a statement that if I had to shutdown, I would shutdown. So the government has no doubts about it if the facts are sufficient," said Rudiantara at the Presidential Palace Complex, Jakarta, Thursday, April 5 2018. Rudiantara added, in an interview. With international media, Facebook's role in Myanmar has take been recognized by its leader, Mark Zuckerberg. Facebook is used as a medium for spreading hate speech against the ethnic groups who were forced to flee to Bangladesh. Rudiantara said that the Ministry of Communication and Information held a meeting this afternoon with representatives of Facebook in Indonesia. The government will ask for direct clarification regarding the truth about the data leak, as well as the use of Facebook for bad things.
berita_id: Satu juta akun Facebook di Indonesia dilaporkan bocor, membuat marah Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara.Menurut Rudiantara, pemerintah siap untuk mematikan akses Facebook di Indonesia jika diperlukan.Data satu juta pada pengguna Facebook di Indonesia digunakan oleh Cambridge Analytica.Selain kebocoran akun Facebook, itu juga telah memperburuk pembantaian Rohingya di Myanmar."Saya membuat pernyataan bahwa jika saya harus menutup, saya akan menutup. Jadi pemerintah tidak memiliki keraguan tentang hal itu jika faktanya cukup," kata Rudiiantara di kompleks Istana Presiden, Jakarta, Kamis, 5 April 2018. Rudiantara menambahkan, dalam sebuah wawancara.Dengan media internasional, peran Facebook di Myanmar telah diakui oleh pemimpinnya, Mark Zuckerberg.Facebook digunakan sebagai media untuk menyebarkan pidato kebencian terhadap kelompok etnis yang terpaksa melarikan diri ke Bangladesh.Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi mengadakan pertemuan sore ini dengan perwakilan Facebook di Indonesia.Pemerintah akan meminta klarifikasi langsung mengenai kebenaran tentang kebocoran data, serta penggunaan Facebook untuk hal -hal buruk.

berita: The activity of brushing teeth is certainly carried out every day, there are many various forms of toothbrushes in supermarkets or traditional markets, and also many materials used in the manufacture of toothbrushes. As a Muslim, you must be careful and thorough in knowing the ingredients or making a toothbrush that is currently used for brushing your teeth. In 2012 we were shocked by the emergence of brushes or brushes made from pig bristles until the MUI issued a fatwa against using a pig bristle brush, but recently, information about toothbrushes made from pig bristles has emerged. Information for you Muslims to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use non-halal ingredients. Let's all examine the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the packaging, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair aka Pig Fur! So double check the packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), Generally it says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". "What are your toothbrush bristles made of? Plastic or Pig Bristle? Here are the steps to check it: Look at the package, if it is recorded from bristles, so it is made of sea urchins. Please burn the bristles, if it smells like burning hair, it means it's from pig bristles. However, if it melts and becomes hard, it means it is made of plastic and is safe to use. Risks when using what is forbidden: Worship is rejected, prayer is rejected, and hell is more worthy (hadith). Save ourselves and our loved ones. " In everyday life, we certainly use various types of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint the house, smear cake pans, to smear food. As in processing grilled chicken, bread, cakes, and various baked or grilled meats and seafood. Meanwhile, brushes are useful when combing hair, cleaning hair in salons or barbershops, washing clothes, and scrubbing floors. Do you know where the brushes and brushes you use come from? Most likely FROM A FIRE FUR! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, usually come from China. The imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly HARAM. No matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption and for application. (the term is PIG/BOAR/HOG/BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places such as traditional markets, painting supply stores, building materials stores, cosmetic shops, beauty salons, etc. Are you familiar with various forms. Beware of painting brushes, wall paint brushes, makeup brushes, hair brushes, clothes brushes, etc. HERE ARE SOME TIPS AVOIDING THE USE OF PIG BRUSHS AND BRUSHS: 1. USE 100% SYNTHETIC BRUSH & BRUSH, SUCH AS NYLON. There are wall paint brushes and food brushes, which are slightly more expensive. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. 2. USE OTHER ALTERNATIVES BUT THE BRUSH. For example, paint rollers for painting, sponges & cotton buds for applying makeup, and knives & spatulas for applying food. 3. BEWARE OF FOOD THAT PROCESSES COOKING AND CLEANING utensils USING A PIG BRUSH. 4. CHARACTERISTICS OF PIG BRUSH BRUSH, WHEN BURNED WILL GIVE A SPECIFIC OTHER LIKE ROCKED MEAT. 5. USUALLY PIG BRUSH BRUSHS SOLD IN WHITE & BLACK COLORS. However, producers can process sea urchins by bleaching them and then coloring them, so that it looks like the fur of other animals. (AND) Thus the explanation of the toothbrush or brush made of pig bristles. As a Muslim, be careful. Give this info to your family and friends skirmish so that more people can read it so that they are free from non-halal products. May be useful.
berita_id: Aktivitas menyikat gigi tentu saja dilakukan setiap hari, ada banyak bentuk sikat gigi di supermarket atau pasar tradisional, dan juga banyak bahan yang digunakan dalam pembuatan sikat gigi.Sebagai seorang Muslim, Anda harus berhati -hati dan menyeluruh dalam mengetahui bahan -bahannya atau membuat sikat gigi yang saat ini digunakan untuk menyikat gigi.Pada 2012 kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi sampai MUI mengeluarkan fatwa untuk tidak menggunakan sikat bulu babi, tetapi baru -baru ini, informasi tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah muncul.Informasi untuk Anda Muslim untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan non-halal.Mari kita semua memeriksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada kemasannya, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi alias bulu babi!Jadi periksa kembali kemasan sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), umumnya dikatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% China Bristle"."Apa bulu sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari? Bulu plastik atau babi? Berikut langkah -langkah untuk memeriksanya: lihat paket, jika direkam dari bulu, jadi terbuat dari landak laut. Tolong bakar bulu, jika baunya seperti itu, itu berarti digunakan untuk plastik.Ditolak, doa ditolak, dan neraka lebih layak (hadis) menyelamatkan diri kita dan orang yang kita cintai.Seperti dalam memproses ayam panggang, roti, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Sementara itu, sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian, dan menggosok lantai.Apakah Anda tahu dari mana kuas dan kuas yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar dari bulu api!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia, biasanya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Bagi umat Islam, penggunaan landak laut jelas haram.Tidak peduli seberapa kecil, materi dari daging babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan untuk aplikasi.(Istilah ini adalah kuas rambut babi/babi/babi/bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat seperti pasar tradisional, toko pasokan lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, toko kosmetik, salon kecantikan, dll. Apakah Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk.Waspadalah terhadap kuas lukisan, kuas cat dinding, sikat rias, sikat rambut, sikat pakaian, dll. Berikut adalah beberapa tips yang menghindari penggunaan kuas babi dan kuas: 1. Gunakan sikat sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Ada kuas cat dinding dan kuas makanan, yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.2. Gunakan alternatif lain kecuali kuas.Misalnya, cat rol untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk mengoleskan riasan, dan pisau & spatula untuk mengoleskan makanan.3. Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang memproses peralatan memasak dan membersihkan menggunakan kuas babi.4. Karakteristik sikat sikat babi, ketika dibakar akan memberikan daging guncang lainnya seperti lainnya.5. Biasanya sikat sikat babi dijual dalam warna putih & hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkan mereka dan kemudian mewarnai mereka, sehingga terlihat seperti bulu hewan lain.(Dan) dengan demikian penjelasan sikat gigi atau sikat yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Sebagai seorang Muslim, hati -hati.Berikan info ini kepada keluarga dan teman-teman Anda yang bertengkar sehingga lebih banyak orang dapat membacanya sehingga mereka bebas dari produk non-halal.Mungkin berguna.

berita: A number of members of the Ponorogo Reog Community (KRP) visited the Ministry of Foreign Affairs office to ask for clarification regarding the burning of reog in front of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. 15 KRP representatives gathered in front of the office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemlu). They brought reog, a banner that reads decisive action against burning reyog at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines and an open letter to the Minister of Foreign Affairs Retno Marsudi. Their arrival was related to the burning of reog that occurred at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao on 20 October. They also attached a picture showing the burning of the reog. We will not do any action or demo. "We just want to ask for information and clarification from the Minister and firm action against the government regarding this incident," Deputy Chairman of the KRP S Nojeng told reporters. After waiting for some time, 5 KRP representatives were received by the Director of Development of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs at 10.20 WIB. For 30 minutes they held a meeting and as a result the Ministry of Foreign Affairs promised to seek information related to the incident and notify KRP again. A protest banner to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs will later be clarified there why there could be an incident like this and will be notified again, said Nojeng who participated in the meeting. Meanwhile, in a press release from the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao which was published on its website, it was explained that on October 20, 2015 the Consulate General in Davao City was forced to destroy the Ponorogo reog which had been an asset of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City since 1988. The destruction by burning had to be carried out because the Ponorogo reog was already in a state of disrepair. damaged and eaten by termites. The burning was in no way an ministry attempt by the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City to damage or eliminate Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The destruction of these assets has been carried out carefully and with full respect for Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City also wants to emphasize that the burning has absolutely nothing to do with efforts to expel idols or spirits, he wrote. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City is currently communicating with parties in Indonesia to seek a new replacement for Reog Ponorogo, he continued.
berita_id: Sejumlah anggota Komunitas Reog Ponorogo (KRP) mengunjungi Kantor Kementerian Luar Negeri untuk meminta klarifikasi mengenai pembakaran reog di depan konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.15 Perwakilan KRP berkumpul di depan Kantor Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemlu).Mereka membawa Reog, sebuah spanduk yang membaca tindakan tegas terhadap pembakaran Reyog di Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina dan surat terbuka kepada Menteri Luar Negeri Retno Marsudi.Kedatangan mereka terkait dengan pembakaran reog yang terjadi di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao pada 20 Oktober.Mereka juga memasang gambar yang menunjukkan pembakaran reog.Kami tidak akan melakukan tindakan atau demo apa pun."Kami hanya ingin meminta informasi dan klarifikasi dari menteri dan tindakan tegas terhadap pemerintah mengenai insiden ini," kata wakil ketua KRP S Nojeng kepada wartawan.Setelah menunggu beberapa waktu, 5 perwakilan KRP diterima oleh Direktur Pengembangan Kementerian Luar Negeri di 10.20 WIB.Selama 30 menit mereka mengadakan pertemuan dan sebagai hasilnya, Kementerian Luar Negeri berjanji untuk mencari informasi yang terkait dengan insiden tersebut dan memberi tahu KRP lagi.Sebuah spanduk protes untuk Kementerian Luar Negeri kemudian akan diklarifikasi di sana mengapa mungkin ada insiden seperti ini dan akan diberitahu lagi, kata Nojeng yang berpartisipasi dalam pertemuan tersebut.Sementara itu, dalam siaran pers dari Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao yang diterbitkan di situs webnya, dijelaskan bahwa pada 20 Oktober 2015 Konsulat Jenderal di Kota Davao dipaksa untuk menghancurkan Ponorogo Reog yang telah menjadi aset yang sudah ada di Konsulat di Kota Davao sejak 1988. Kekurangannya oleh pembakaran yang sudah ada di dalam Konsulat di Davao sejak 1988. Kekurangan oleh pembakaran yang sudah ada di dalam Konsulat di Davao sejak 1988. Kekurangan oleh pembakaran yang sudah ada di dalam Konsulat di Davao sejak tahun 1988. Kekurangan oleh pembakaran yang akan menjadi cengkerog di Indonesian di Davao sejak 1988. Kekurangan oleh pembakaran yang akan menjadi cengkeru.rusak dan dimakan rayap.Pembakaran itu sama sekali bukan upaya kementerian oleh konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao untuk merusak atau menghilangkan reog Ponorogo sebagai aset budaya.Penghancuran aset -aset ini telah dilakukan dengan hati -hati dan dengan penuh rasa hormat terhadap Reog Ponorogo sebagai aset budaya.Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao juga ingin menekankan bahwa pembakaran sama sekali tidak ada hubungannya dengan upaya untuk mengeluarkan berhala atau roh, tulisnya.Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao saat ini sedang berkomunikasi dengan partai -partai di Indonesia untuk mencari pengganti baru untuk Reog Ponorogo, lanjutnya.

berita: The crowds were not seen in a number of mosques, such as the Istiqlal Mosque, Central Jakarta, and the Al Azhar Grand Mosque, South Jakarta, early Tuesday before dawn prayers, related to the planned peaceful demonstration of the 212 Volume II Action. This condition is also estimated to be the impact of heavy rains that have hit the DKI Jakarta area and its surroundings since around 03.00 WIB, which resulted in a number of roads being surrounded by puddles, as observed by Antara Tuesday morning. The participants of Action 212 volume II tried to gather at the Istiqlal Mosque with the intention of carrying out the Fajr prayer in congregation, and also the weather conditions when this news was revealed were raining, photo as a result they tried to immediately enter shelter while waiting for the time for prayer to come. Apparently the fence of the Istiqlal Mosque is actually tightly closed, as received by this media, in the form of photos and descriptions, 5 minutes later when this news was revealed, the participants were also unable to enter to gather and perform the dawn prayer.
berita_id: Kerumunan tidak terlihat di sejumlah masjid, seperti Masjid Istiqlal, Jakarta Tengah, dan Masjid Grand Al Azhar, Jakarta Selatan, Selasa pagi sebelum doa fajar, terkait dengan demonstrasi damai yang direncanakan dari aksi 212 Volume II.Kondisi ini juga diperkirakan merupakan dampak hujan lebat yang telah menghantam daerah DKI Jakarta dan sekitarnya sejak sekitar pukul 03.00 WIB, yang mengakibatkan sejumlah jalan dikelilingi oleh genangan air, seperti yang diamati oleh Antara Selasa pagi.Para peserta aksi 212 Volume II mencoba berkumpul di masjid Istiqlal dengan maksud untuk melaksanakan doa Fajr di jemaat, dan juga kondisi cuaca ketika berita ini terungkap hujan, foto sebagai hasilnya mereka mencoba untuk segera memasuki tempat berlindung sambil menunggu waktu untuk berdoa.Rupanya pagar masjid Istiqlal sebenarnya ditutup rapat, seperti yang diterima oleh media ini, dalam bentuk foto dan deskripsi, 5 menit kemudian ketika berita ini terungkap, para peserta juga tidak dapat masuk untuk berkumpul dan melakukan doa fajar.

berita: Toothbrushes are the most important thing in our daily lives, without a brush, we all might experience an unpleasant or unpleasant mouth. First, let's look at this information for you, especially "Muslims" to be more careful and vigilant in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use ingredients from non-halal ones. When you buy a toothbrush, check the packaging, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Remember Yes...!!! Bristle means Pig Hair in other words Pig Fur! Again, recheck your toothbrush package when you buy it, don't forget and procrastinate, look at it beforehand and when you buy the toothbrush you will use. Similarly on the brush (bread spreader), Generally noted "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". Close friends, please share that brushing teeth is done every day, there are many kinds of toothbrushes available in supermarkets or traditional markets, and there are also many materials used in making these toothbrushes. As Muslims, we must be vigilant and careful in knowing some of the ingredients or making toothbrushes that have been used for brushing teeth. Th. In 2012 we were shocked by the emergence of brushes or brushes that had some boar bristles until the MUI issued a fatwa against using a pig bristle brush, but recently there has been information about toothbrushes containing boar bristles. Information for you Muslim groups to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use materials from non-halal. Let's all examine the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair in other words Pig Fur! So check your toothbrush package again when you buy it. Similarly on the brush (bread spreader), Generally noted "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". "What are your toothbrush bristles made of? Plastic or Pig Bristle? Here are a few steps to check: Watch the wrap, if it's recorded from the bristles, so made of sea urchin. Please burn the bristles, if it smells like the smell of burning hair, it means it's from sea urchins. However, if it melts and becomes hard, it means sacrifice it is made of plastic and is safe to use. Possibility if using the haram: Worship is not accepted, prayer is not accepted, and hell is more worthy (hadith). Save ourselves and our loved ones. " In everyday life, we certainly use various types of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint homes, grease cake pans, to smear food. As in processing grilled chicken, bread, cakes, as well as a variety of grilled or grilled meat and seafood. Besides that, the brush is useful when combing hair, cleaning hair at a salon or barbershop, cleaning clothes, and scrubbing floors. Do you know, what do the brushes and brushes you use come from? Most likely it is FROM A FIRE! Brushes supplied in Indonesia usually come from China. Imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars that have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly HARAM. No matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption as well as for application. (the term is PIG/BOAR/HOG/BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places such as traditional markets, painting supply stores, building materials stores, cosmetic shops, beauty salons, and others. Are you familiar with the various forms. Be careful with painting brushes, wall paint brushes, make-up brushes, hair brushes, clothes brushes, and so on. HERE ARE SOME TIPS AVOIDING THE USE OF PIG BRUSHS AND BRUSHS: 1. USE 100% SYNTHETIC BRUSH & BRUSH, SUCH AS NYLON. There are wall paint brushes and feeding brushes, which are slightly more expensive. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. 2. USE OTHER ALTERNATIVES BUT THE BRUSH. For example, paint rollers for painting, sponges & cotton buds for makeup, and knives & spatulas for greasing food. 3. BEWARE OF FOOD THAT PROCESSES COOKING AND CLEANING utensils USING A PIG BRUSH. 4. CHARACTERISTICS OF PIG BRUSH BRUSH, WHEN BURNED WILL GIVE A SPECIFIC OTHER LIKE ROCKED MEAT. 5. USUALLY PIG BRUSH BRUSHS SOLD IN WHITE & BLACK COLORS. However, producers may process sea urchins by bleaching them and then coloring them, so that they look like other animal hairs
berita_id: Sikat gigi adalah hal terpenting dalam kehidupan kita sehari -hari, tanpa kuas, kita semua mungkin mengalami mulut yang tidak menyenangkan atau tidak menyenangkan.Pertama, mari kita lihat informasi ini untuk Anda, terutama "Muslim" untuk lebih berhati-hati dan waspada dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan-bahan dari yang non-halal.Saat Anda membeli sikat gigi, periksa kemasannya, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Ingat ya ... !!!Bulu berarti rambut babi dengan kata lain bulu babi!Sekali lagi, periksa ulang paket sikat gigi Anda saat Anda membelinya, jangan lupa dan menunda -nunda, lihat sebelumnya dan ketika Anda membeli sikat gigi yang akan Anda gunakan.Demikian pula pada sikat (penyebar roti), umumnya mencatat "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% china bristle".Teman dekat, silakan bagikan bahwa menyikat gigi dilakukan setiap hari, ada banyak jenis sikat gigi yang tersedia di supermarket atau pasar tradisional, dan ada juga banyak bahan yang digunakan dalam membuat sikat gigi ini.Sebagai Muslim, kita harus waspada dan berhati -hati dalam mengetahui beberapa bahan atau membuat sikat gigi yang telah digunakan untuk menyikat gigi.Th.Pada 2012 kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau kuas yang memiliki bulu babi sampai MUI mengeluarkan fatwa untuk tidak menggunakan sikat bulu babi, tetapi baru -baru ini ada informasi tentang sikat gigi yang mengandung bulu babi.Informasi untuk Anda kelompok Muslim untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan dari non-halal.Mari kita semua memeriksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti bahwa sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi dengan kata lain bulu babi!Jadi periksa paket sikat gigi Anda lagi saat Anda membelinya.Demikian pula pada sikat (penyebar roti), umumnya mencatat "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% china bristle".Apa bulu sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari? Bulu plastik atau babi? Berikut adalah beberapa langkah untuk memeriksa: menonton bungkus, jika direkam dari bulu, jadi terbuat dari landak laut. Tolong bakar bulu, jika baunya seperti aroma rambut yang terbakar, itu berarti tidak ada yang digunakan oleh plastik.Diterima, doa tidak diterima, dan neraka lebih layak (hadis).Selamatkan diri kita dan orang yang kita cintai.Seperti dalam memproses ayam panggang, roti, kue, serta berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Selain itu, sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, pakaian membersihkan, dan menggosok lantai.Tahukah Anda, dari mana kuas dan kuas yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar itu dari api!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia biasanya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor diproduksi menggunakan landak laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Bagi umat Islam, penggunaan landak laut jelas haram.Tidak peduli seberapa kecil, bahan dari daging babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan juga untuk aplikasi.(Istilah ini adalah sikat rambut babi/babi/babi/bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat seperti pasar tradisional, toko pasokan lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, toko kosmetik, salon kecantikan, dan lainnya.Apakah Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk.Hati-hati dengan kuas lukisan, kuas cat dinding, kuas make-up, sikat rambut, sikat pakaian, dan sebagainya.Berikut adalah beberapa tips yang menghindari penggunaan kuas babi dan kuas: 1. Gunakan sikat & sikat sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Ada kuas cat dinding dan sikat makan, yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.2. Gunakan alternatif lain kecuali kuas.Misalnya, cat rol untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk makeup, dan pisau & spatula untuk makanan berminyak.3. Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang memproses peralatan memasak dan membersihkan menggunakan kuas babi.4. Karakteristik sikat sikat babi, ketika dibakar akan memberikan daging guncang lainnya seperti lainnya.5. Biasanya sikat sikat babi dijual dalam warna putih & hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkan mereka dan kemudian mewarnai mereka, sehingga mereka terlihat seperti rambut binatang lainnya

berita: Following up on complaints from a number of users who said that the iPhone 6 Plus easily bends when kept in a trouser pocket for too long, the United States (US) consumer complaints agency, Consumer Reports, held a series of trials. Consumer Reports conducted tests on 6 smartphones, namely the iPhone 5, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, Samsung Galaxy Note 3, LG G3, and HTC One M8. All five were tested under load stresses ranging from 10 pounds (5 Kg) onwards until the device warped or even broke. According to a report published on the official consumerreports.org website, it is stated that the test results show that the two new iPhones, especially the iPhone 6 Plus, are not  as vulnerable as recently complained.
berita_id: Menindaklanjuti keluhan dari sejumlah pengguna yang mengatakan bahwa iPhone 6 Plus dengan mudah ditekuk ketika disimpan di saku celana terlalu lama, agen keluhan konsumen Amerika Serikat (AS), Consumer Reports, mengadakan serangkaian uji coba.Consumer Reports melakukan tes pada 6 smartphone, yaitu iPhone 5, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, Samsung Galaxy Note 3, LG G3, dan HTC One M8.Kelima diuji di bawah tekanan beban mulai dari 10 pound (5 kg) dan seterusnya sampai perangkat melengkung atau bahkan pecah.Menurut sebuah laporan yang diterbitkan di situs web resmi ConsumerReports.org, dinyatakan bahwa hasil tes menunjukkan bahwa dua iPhone baru, terutama iPhone 6 Plus, tidak rentan seperti yang baru -baru ini dikeluhkan.

berita: Some people believe that a needle prick in the ear is the first aid for a stroke. Turns out, the information was wrong. You may have read posts on social media or know information about the method of needling in the earlobe as first aid for stroke. This message even continues to be spread over and over and many still believe it. The message explains how the first action should be taken in stroke patients. If the patient falls like in the bathroom or bedroom, you are advised not to move him anywhere. Next, it is recommended that you take a needle and sterilize it and then insert it into your fingers. After that, spit out the victim's blood a drop or two. Still according to the message, if the patient's mouth is tilted, then pull the two earlobe until they are red and immediately pierce the bottom of the earlobe with a sterile needle until approximately 1-2 drops of blood comes out. This is believed to launch and help oxygen enter the body of stroke patients. What is the medical view regarding this information? Piercing the ear with a needle for a stroke is just a public belief, but has not been scientifically proven. We as nurses must be evidence based. I do not recommend it be done in stroke patients. Correct information must be conveyed, said Ns. Enny Mulyatsih, S.Kep, M.Kep, Sp. KMB, Head of Nursing at the National Brain Center Hospital, told Depok News after a Nursing Seminar and Workshop on Latest Effective Handling Innovations, Education and Home Care Opportunities for Stroke Patients by the Madaniah Health Training Center at the Nursing Sciences Clump, University of Indonesia, Saturday (22/8/ 2015). Ns. Dede Suhartini, S.Kep as the Head of the Stroke Unit of the RSCM also did not find a rational link between needling in the earlobe and stroke. What does this have to do with a stroke whose blood vessels free base are deprived of oxygen, and the blood is expelled? No data yet. If there is evidence based and results, we can do it, he said. Both emphasize, if you find a family member or someone having a stroke, immediately take first aid measures. Find a place that is roomy and safe, lie down with the patient's head at a 30-degree angle, and maintain a smooth airway by supporting the chin and not giving food or drink to prevent choking.
