berita: Toothbrush is the most important bath tool to remove dirt around the teeth so that dental health is maintained. However, using a toothbrush should not be careless, especially in choosing the toothbrush you use. And when you want to buy a toothbrush, you should pay attention to the code behind the packaging, don't let your toothbrush be made of pig bristles. Currently, a number of people are shocked by a toothbrush product that uses pig bristles. The use of the product refers to the writing in English, namely bristles on the packaging. There is one secret code which means your toothbrush is made of boar bristles. The Or** * brand toothbrush is clearly made of bristles. The product packaging clearly explains the product, "Super thin Bristles". Responding to this case, the Chairman of the Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta said, if it is true that the toothbrush is made of pig bristles, the toothbrush is haram. "In Al Surah Al Maidah verse 3, it is explained that derivatives from pigs are haram. We will investigate this prohibition, whether it is really from sea urchins or not," said Muhammad Hatta. However, the Medan City Health Service through the Secretary of the North Sumatra Health Office, Afwan Lubis, is not sure about the existence of a toothbrush made of pig bristles. He added that laboratory tests were carried out if there were reports from the public metropolis regarding the boar bristle toothbrush. If it really contains sea urchins, then it should not be circulated because there are elements that are not halal. "I don't think it's possible. But what about it? We can comment if there is a laboratory test first. Currently there is no laboratory test," Afwan said, as reported by Tribunnews.com
berita_id: Sikat gigi adalah alat mandi paling penting untuk menghilangkan kotoran di sekitar gigi sehingga kesehatan gigi dipertahankan.Namun, menggunakan sikat gigi tidak boleh ceroboh, terutama dalam memilih sikat gigi yang Anda gunakan.Dan ketika Anda ingin membeli sikat gigi, Anda harus memperhatikan kode di balik kemasannya, jangan biarkan sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari bulu babi.Saat ini, sejumlah orang terkejut oleh produk sikat gigi yang menggunakan bulu babi.Penggunaan produk mengacu pada penulisan dalam bahasa Inggris, yaitu meremehkan kemasan.Ada satu kode rahasia yang berarti sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari bulu babi.Sikat gigi merek atau *** jelas terbuat dari bulu.Kemasan produk dengan jelas menjelaskan produk, "bulu super tipis".Menanggapi kasus ini, ketua Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta berkata, jika benar bahwa sikat gigi terbuat dari bulu babi, sikat gigi adalah haram."Dalam Al Surah Al Maidah ayat 3, dijelaskan bahwa turunan dari babi adalah Haram. Kami akan menyelidiki larangan ini, apakah itu benar -benar dari bulu babi atau tidak," kata Muhammad Hatta.Namun, Layanan Kesehatan Kota Medan melalui Sekretaris Kantor Kesehatan Sumatra Utara, Afwan Lubis, tidak yakin tentang keberadaan sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Dia menambahkan bahwa tes laboratorium dilakukan jika ada laporan dari kota kecil tentang sikat gigi bulu babi.Jika benar -benar mengandung bulu babi, maka itu tidak boleh diedarkan karena ada elemen yang tidak halal."Saya tidak berpikir itu mungkin. Tapi bagaimana dengan itu? Kita bisa berkomentar jika ada tes laboratorium terlebih dahulu. Saat ini tidak ada tes laboratorium," kata Afwan, seperti dilaporkan oleh tribunnews.com

berita: Jakarta – After receiving constant criticism from iPhone 6 Plus users, because the device is very easy to bend. Over time, Apple was 'frustrated' by the quote complaints of its consumers and immediately gave information regarding the problem while at the same time refuting the quality of the fragile body of the iPhone 6 Plus. Apple does admit that there are iPhone 6 Plus users who experience a curved body, but there aren't many. According to his spokesman, the number who complained because of this problem was only 9 people as of Wednesday (24/9). "iPhone 6 has a strong unibody with extra strength. This smartphone also has stainless steel and titanium to protect its body parts. Including, using the strongest glass in the smartphone industry," said an Apple spokesman, as quoted by CNBC, Friday (26/9). ). Apple continued that their workers carried out many tests to test the strength of the iPhone 6 Plus. However, until now it is not known why the body of the iPhone 6 Plus bends so easily.
berita_id: Jakarta - Setelah menerima kritik terus -menerus dari pengguna iPhone 6 Plus, karena perangkat ini sangat mudah ditekuk.Seiring waktu, Apple 'frustrasi' oleh keluhan kutipan dari konsumennya dan segera memberikan informasi mengenai masalah tersebut sementara pada saat yang sama membantah kualitas tubuh rapuh iPhone 6 Plus.Apple memang mengakui bahwa ada iPhone 6 Plus pengguna yang mengalami tubuh melengkung, tetapi tidak ada banyak.Menurut juru bicaranya, jumlah yang mengeluh karena masalah ini hanya 9 orang pada hari Rabu (24/9)."IPhone 6 memiliki unibody yang kuat dengan kekuatan ekstra. Smartphone ini juga memiliki stainless steel dan titanium untuk melindungi bagian -bagian tubuhnya. Termasuk, menggunakan kaca terkuat di industri smartphone," kata seorang juru bicara Apple, seperti dikutip oleh CNBC, Jumat (26/9).).Apple melanjutkan bahwa pekerja mereka melakukan banyak tes untuk menguji kekuatan iPhone 6 Plus.Namun, sampai sekarang tidak diketahui mengapa tubuh iPhone 6 plus tikungan dengan mudah.

berita: A total of 345 candy pacifiers which were confiscated by the Surabaya City Government Satpol PP officers during a raid on street snacks some time ago, were returned to their owners. This follows an announcement issued by BPOM that the candy is negative for drugs. The Head of Public Relations of the Surabaya City Government Muhammad Fikser said that during a raid some time ago, the Satpol PP officers recorded the names of the sellers and the number of confiscated candies, so that the process of returning the confiscated goods would be easy. "It was returned to the merchant because it did not contain hazardous materials. The Satpol PP during the raid had data. Who was the seller and how many items were confiscated," said Fikser when confirmed by Okezone, Friday (10/3/2017). Satpol PP will also return sweets confiscated from several kelurahan. As is known, there are 14 sub-districts which are locations for the distribution of pacifiers in Surabaya. Most sellers are around Elementary Schools (SD) and Kindergartens (TK). Fikser explained, from the results of the Surabaya Health Service's examination, the pacifier only contained dye. "For candy comforter pacifiers, there are dyes but they are not dangerous," he said. Candy return will start tomorrow. "It's a pity for the traders if it is confiscated. They also buy to sell again," he added.
berita_id: Sebanyak 345 dot permen yang disita oleh pemerintah kota Surabaya Satpol PP Petugas selama penggerebekan pada camilan jalanan beberapa waktu lalu, dikembalikan ke pemiliknya.Ini mengikuti pengumuman yang dikeluarkan oleh BPOM bahwa permen negatif untuk obat -obatan.Kepala hubungan masyarakat dari pemerintah kota Surabaya, Muhammad Fikser mengatakan bahwa selama serangan beberapa waktu lalu, petugas PP Satpol mencatat nama -nama penjual dan jumlah permen yang disita, sehingga proses mengembalikan barang yang disita akan mudah."Itu dikembalikan ke pedagang karena tidak mengandung bahan berbahaya. Satpol PP selama serangan itu memiliki data. Siapa penjual dan berapa banyak barang yang disita," kata Fikser ketika dikonfirmasi oleh Okezone, Jumat (10/3/2017).Satpol PP juga akan mengembalikan permen yang disita dari beberapa Kelurahan.Seperti diketahui, ada 14 sub-distrik yang merupakan lokasi untuk distribusi dot di Surabaya.Sebagian besar penjual berada di sekitar sekolah dasar (SD) dan TK (TK).Fikser menjelaskan, dari hasil pemeriksaan Layanan Kesehatan Surabaya, dot hanya berisi pewarna."Untuk dot selimut permen, ada pewarna tetapi mereka tidak berbahaya," katanya.Permen kembali akan dimulai besok."Sangat disayangkan bagi para pedagang jika disita. Mereka juga membeli untuk menjual lagi," tambahnya.

berita: The Pokemon Go game, which is currently endemic in society, has made the game forget about time. Most of the fans are young people, in games that use it, also not a few people are met in certain places where they are looking for Pokemon. The slanted news circulating about Pokemon Go that had circulated on several social media, stated that the game released by Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, and Niantic Labs contained an invitation that the Islamic religion could not tolerate. Because many are circulating on social media that Pokemon Go actually has its own meaning. In Syriac or Syriac this Pokemon means "I am Jewish", while the Pokemon named Pikachu means as well "Be a Jew". While Charmander also has its own meaning, namely "God is Weak". The rumor has become a fierce debate on social media, because many people have their own opinions, some think that it is just something that is linked, and not a few also believe in the existence of these rumors. Because they felt it was the truth in the rumors. But the issue is still a big question mark, the Los Angel Times in its article on April 24, 2011 once reviewed Pokemon Go, in its news it said that at that time countries such as Qatar, Oman, Dubai, Jordan, Egypt and Saudi Arabia were also widely circulated. On this Pokemon Go rumor, many connotations emerged that the game promotes anti-Islamic behavior and believes in Judaism. And this made everyone in the country feel uneasy, and the things that were reported were also denied by the party from the game production. but the leaders of that country still can't accept Pokemon Go into their country. Rumors that emerged in Arab countries of cultural assimilation emerged amid concerns that had occurred, but there was no strong evidence for the circulation of these rumors at that time. in a statement in a Jordanian Amman newspaper. The Syriac Orthodox Christian Church denies this accusation, because in the ancient Syriac language the meaning of the word Pokemon does not have the meaning of insulting Islam. And church officials were also surprised by the arrival of a letter stating that Pokemon contained an invitation from the Jews.
berita_id: Game Pokemon Go, yang saat ini endemik di masyarakat, telah membuat permainan melupakan waktu.Sebagian besar penggemar adalah orang muda, dalam permainan yang menggunakannya, juga tidak sedikit orang yang bertemu di tempat -tempat tertentu di mana mereka mencari Pokemon.Berita miring yang beredar tentang Pokemon Go yang telah beredar di beberapa media sosial, menyatakan bahwa permainan yang dirilis oleh Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, dan Niantic Labs berisi undangan yang tidak dapat ditoleransi oleh agama Islam.Karena banyak yang beredar di media sosial bahwa Pokemon Go sebenarnya memiliki artinya sendiri.Di Syria atau Syria Pokemon ini berarti "Saya orang Yahudi", sedangkan Pokemon bernama Pikachu juga berarti "menjadi orang Yahudi".Sementara Charmander juga memiliki maknanya sendiri, yaitu "Tuhan itu lemah".Rumor telah menjadi perdebatan sengit di media sosial, karena banyak orang memiliki pendapat sendiri, beberapa orang berpikir bahwa itu hanyalah sesuatu yang terkait, dan tidak sedikit yang juga percaya pada adanya rumor ini.Karena mereka merasa itu adalah kebenaran dalam rumor.Tetapi masalah ini masih merupakan tanda tanya besar, Los Angel Times dalam artikelnya pada 24 April 2011 pernah meninjau Pokemon Go, dalam berita itu mengatakan bahwa pada waktu itu negara -negara seperti Qatar, Oman, Dubai, Jordan, Mesir dan Arab Saudi juga banyak diedarkan.Pada rumor Pokemon Go ini, banyak konotasi muncul bahwa permainan mempromosikan perilaku anti-Islam dan percaya pada Yudaisme.Dan ini membuat semua orang di negara itu merasa gelisah, dan hal -hal yang dilaporkan juga ditolak oleh partai dari produksi permainan.Tetapi para pemimpin negara itu masih tidak dapat menerima Pokemon masuk ke negara mereka.Rumor yang muncul di negara -negara Arab asimilasi budaya muncul di tengah kekhawatiran yang telah terjadi, tetapi tidak ada bukti kuat untuk sirkulasi rumor ini pada waktu itu.Dalam sebuah pernyataan di surat kabar Amman Yordania.Gereja Kristen Syria Ortodoks menyangkal tuduhan ini, karena dalam bahasa Syria kuno makna kata Pokemon tidak memiliki arti menghina Islam.Dan para pejabat gereja juga terkejut dengan kedatangan surat yang menyatakan bahwa Pokemon berisi undangan dari orang -orang Yahudi.

berita: Catfish is one type of fish that is rich in animal protein. Pecel catfish is one of the favorite food menus for some people because the price is quite cheap and delicious. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is it the dirtiest fish? that's what he said: a) Catfish live in very dirty ponds and are usually surrounded by chicken or pig coops. For those of you who are catfish admirers, indeed not all catfish live or are cultivated in ponds around which there is a chicken coop or pigsty. In Indonesia, many also keep catfish in public ponds. But why is it called the dirtiest fish, maybe because most catfish farmers feed their livestock with feed that comes from anything dirty including chicken carcasses etc. According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he had supplied a lot of catfish that he harvested every 3 months. once to the markets and restaurants on the roadside in Hainan province to be precise in Haikou. Frequent complaints from several people, a reporter from the local fisheries department investigated this fish. Several journalists took samples from the 7 ponds that store this catfish. Actually these seven ponds are all surrounded by chicken and pig coops, in the middle of these ponds there are many piles of garbage. According to Islamic jurisprudence, eating catfish is halal. But sometimes many catfish breeders in Indonesia keep catfish in ponds and are fed in the form of manure. If the conditions are like this, then catfish will be the same as jallalah animals, namely animals that consume dirty and unclean food until the law to consume it is haram. In order to become halal again, catfish must be quarantined mudcat or separated from dirty places and given clean food. For a minimum of 3 days quarantine. Danger lurks when you eat catfish, one mouthful of catfish contains 3000 cancer cells Catfish is a type of fish that consumes waste. Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty ponds, the fish can also consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pig manure, even fish can also consume human waste. Some time ago, news about the dangers of consuming fried catfish circulated. Reportedly once a doctor admitted that he often had patients with swollen thyroid disease and infections, with signs: swollen lower neck, around the neck something like a tumor, eyeballs like wanting to come out, heat around the neck, often coughing inside night is not there because. After being asked, in fact all patients often consume catfish and fried eel. This kind of thing can happen to the catfish skipper in Yogyakarta, the father, wife and child experience some of the symptoms as above. When this doctor asked one of the professors of doctors at Pluit, actually this catfish contains an easy poison, so that when it is fried, the clean oil will certainly turn black. Up to that point, it could be possible if the catfish's body contains three thousand cancer cells which are very likely for the human body. Friends for you catfish admirers, even though catfish is halal and not very worrying, as a wise customer you must and always be alert. You also don't understand when buying catfish in the market or in a food stall, is it quarantined before frying the fish or not? If you are in doubt, do not need to consume. Or if you believe in its cleanliness, please consume it. However, it is recommended not in large quantities through regular methods
berita_id: Lele adalah salah satu jenis ikan yang kaya akan protein hewani.Pecel Catfish adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit bagi sebagian orang karena harganya cukup murah dan lezat.Meskipun lezat dan murah, ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Mengapa ikan paling kotor?Itulah yang dia katakan: a) ikan lele hidup di kolam yang sangat kotor dan biasanya dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam atau babi.Bagi Anda yang pengagum lele, memang tidak semua ikan lele hidup atau dibudidayakan di kolam di sekitar yang ada kandang ayam atau babi.Di Indonesia, banyak yang juga menyimpan ikan lele di kolam publik.Tetapi mengapa itu disebut ikan paling kotor, mungkin karena sebagian besar petani lele memberi makan ternak mereka dengan pakan yang berasal dari sesuatu yang kotor termasuk bangkai ayam dll. Menurut seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-hong mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele yang ia hasilkan setiap 3 bulan.Sekali ke pasar dan restoran di pinggir jalan di provinsi Hainan tepatnya di haikou.Keluhan yang sering dari beberapa orang, seorang reporter dari departemen perikanan setempat menyelidiki ikan ini.Beberapa jurnalis mengambil sampel dari 7 kolam yang menyimpan ikan lele ini.Sebenarnya ketujuh kolam ini semuanya dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, di tengah -tengah kolam ini ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Menurut yurisprudensi Islam, makan lele adalah halal.Tetapi kadang -kadang banyak peternak lele di Indonesia menyimpan ikan lele di kolam dan diberi makan dalam bentuk kotoran.Jika kondisinya seperti ini, maka ikan lele akan sama dengan hewan jallalah, yaitu hewan yang mengonsumsi makanan kotor dan najis sampai hukum mengkonsumsinya adalah haram.Untuk menjadi halal lagi, ikan lele harus dikarantina mudcat atau terpisah dari tempat -tempat kotor dan diberi makanan bersih.Untuk minimal 3 hari karantina.Bahaya bersembunyi ketika Anda makan lele, satu seteguk ikan lele mengandung 3000 sel kanker ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang mengonsumsi limbah.Lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di kolam kotor, ikan juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi, dan pupuk babi, bahkan ikan juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah manusia.Beberapa waktu yang lalu, berita tentang bahaya mengonsumsi ikan lele goreng yang beredar.Dilaporkan begitu seorang dokter mengakui bahwa ia sering memiliki pasien dengan penyakit tiroid yang bengkak dan infeksi, dengan tanda -tanda: leher bawah bengkak, di sekitar leher seperti tumor, bola mata seperti ingin keluar, memanaskan di sekitar leher, sering batuk di dalam malam tidak ada di sana karena.Setelah ditanya, bahkan semua pasien sering mengonsumsi ikan lele dan belut goreng.Hal semacam ini dapat terjadi pada kapten lele di Yogyakarta, ayah, istri dan anak mengalami beberapa gejala seperti di atas.Ketika dokter ini bertanya kepada salah satu profesor dokter di Pluit, sebenarnya ikan lele ini mengandung racun yang mudah, sehingga ketika digoreng, minyak bersih tentu akan berubah menjadi hitam.Hingga saat itu, mungkin saja jika tubuh lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang sangat mungkin bagi tubuh manusia.Teman untuk Anda pengagum lele, meskipun ikan lele itu halal dan tidak terlalu mengkhawatirkan, sebagai pelanggan yang bijak Anda harus dan selalu waspada.Anda juga tidak mengerti saat membeli ikan lele di pasar atau di warung makanan, apakah itu dikarantina sebelum menggoreng ikan atau tidak?Jika Anda ragu, tidak perlu mengkonsumsi.Atau jika Anda percaya pada kebersihannya, silakan konsumsinya.Namun, disarankan tidak dalam jumlah besar melalui metode reguler

berita: In the aftermath of the iPhone Plus news that complained of bending easily, Apple responded by inviting several journalists to see the process of testing the strength of the psychometric test iPhone 6 Plus in its laboratory. In the latest iPhone testing video, Apple confirmed to make the latest iPhone, doing some testing. It's not enough just one time, but several times testing. This is to ensure as well as convince iPhone lovers, if Apple is not playing games in bringing innovation to the latest iPhone. Launching Recode.net, Friday, September 26 2014, the first test is called "sit test". At this stage, it is a test of the latest iPhone with a simulation of the device being loaded with a certain weight. Apple described this sit test, the iPhone 6 Plus was occupied by an adult. In the video, the iPhone 6 Plus looks reliable, without any flaws or damage. Apple's senior vice president of hardware engineering, Dan Riccio, said: "This test is one of the most relevant ways to demonstrate customer concerns that the iPhone will break easily when placed in a pocket. Riccio insists Apple conducted this test "thousands of times". Furthermore, the second test is called the three-point bend test. At this stage, the iPhone is loaded with a weight of up to 25 kilograms. Still the same, the iPhone is still strong, not bent. The next test is the pressure point test. At this stage, Apple weighed 10 kg on the iPhone at one point. Finally, Apple tests its products with a torsion or twist test. Seen in this test facility, the iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, and MacBook Pro rotate through both ends that have been locked.
berita_id: Setelah berita iPhone Plus yang mengeluh membungkuk dengan mudah, Apple merespons dengan mengundang beberapa jurnalis untuk melihat proses pengujian kekuatan uji psikometrik iPhone 6 Plus di laboratoriumnya.Dalam video pengujian iPhone terbaru, Apple mengkonfirmasi untuk membuat iPhone terbaru, melakukan beberapa pengujian.Ini tidak cukup hanya satu kali, tetapi beberapa kali pengujian.Ini untuk memastikan serta meyakinkan pecinta iPhone, jika Apple tidak bermain game dalam membawa inovasi ke iPhone terbaru.Meluncurkan Recode.net, Jumat, 26 September 2014, tes pertama disebut "tes duduk".Pada tahap ini, ini adalah uji iPhone terbaru dengan simulasi perangkat yang dimuat dengan bobot tertentu.Apple menggambarkan tes duduk ini, iPhone 6 Plus ditempati oleh orang dewasa.Dalam video, iPhone 6 Plus terlihat dapat diandalkan, tanpa kekurangan atau kerusakan.Wakil Presiden Senior Teknik Perangkat Keras Apple, Dan Riccio, mengatakan: "Tes ini adalah salah satu cara yang paling relevan untuk menunjukkan kekhawatiran pelanggan bahwa iPhone akan mudah rusak ketika ditempatkan di saku. Riccio menegaskan Apple melakukan tes ini" ribuan kali ". Tidak ada bobotnya.Tes berikutnya adalah Tes Titik Tekanan.

berita: In various countries, including Indonesia, the mobile game Pokemon Go continues to be bombarded with negative issues and news. Recently, the mobile game by Niantic was even declared an illegal game by the government of Saudi Arabia. However, it turns out that the haram fatwa on Pokemon Go that has been reported by the media today is a hoax. The Saudi Arabian government has denied that they have banned Pokemon Go. Abdulmohsen Alyas as the representative of the Ministry of Arab Culture and Information has confirmed that there is no haram fatwa from senior scholars related to the Pokemon Go game. The Saudi Arabian government is even currently urging international media to re-verify the news to the relevant ministries. As reported by Indogamers from the CNN page (22/7/2016). News about the illegal fatwa for the Pokemon Go game circulated on various websites including Reuters. Although it does not directly refer to the Pokemon Go game, the news states that the concept of characters in Pokemon is based on Charles Darwin's theory of evolution, which is contrary to the teachings of Islam. The fatwa also states that symbol the cards in the game contain religious symbols and deviant organizations such as Freemasonry, Zionists, Shintoism, and many others. Before the hoax issue regarding Pokemon Go's haram fatwa in Saudi Arabia, there was also news that was no less excited which said that Pokemon means "I am Jewish" in Syriac. Not only that, various characters in Pokemon are also said to have negative meanings such as Pikachu which means "Be Jewish", Charmander which means "God is Weak", and many others. Well, what do you think about the issues that hit this Pokemon Go game?
berita_id: Di berbagai negara, termasuk Indonesia, game mobile Pokemon Go terus dibombardir dengan masalah dan berita negatif.Baru -baru ini, permainan mobile oleh Niantic bahkan dinyatakan sebagai permainan ilegal oleh pemerintah Arab Saudi.Namun, ternyata Haram Fatwa di Pokemon Go yang telah dilaporkan oleh media hari ini adalah tipuan.Pemerintah Arab Saudi telah membantah bahwa mereka telah melarang Pokemon Go.Abdulmohsen Alyas sebagai perwakilan dari Kementerian Budaya dan Informasi Arab telah mengkonfirmasi bahwa tidak ada Haram Fatwa dari para sarjana senior yang terkait dengan permainan Pokemon Go.Pemerintah Arab Saudi bahkan saat ini mendesak media internasional untuk memverifikasi kembali berita tersebut kepada kementerian yang relevan.Seperti yang dilaporkan oleh Indogamers dari halaman CNN (22/7/2016).Berita tentang fatwa ilegal untuk game Pokemon Go yang diedarkan di berbagai situs web termasuk Reuters.Meskipun tidak secara langsung merujuk pada game Pokemon Go, berita menyatakan bahwa konsep karakter di Pokemon didasarkan pada teori evolusi Charles Darwin, yang bertentangan dengan ajaran Islam.Fatwa juga menyatakan bahwa simbol kartu -kartu dalam permainan berisi simbol -simbol agama dan organisasi yang menyimpang seperti Freemasonry, Zionis, Shintoisme, dan banyak lainnya.Sebelum masalah tipuan tentang Haram Fatwa dari Pokemon Go di Arab Saudi, ada juga berita yang tidak kalah bersemangat yang mengatakan bahwa Pokemon berarti "Saya Yahudi" di Syria.Tidak hanya itu, berbagai karakter di Pokemon juga dikatakan memiliki makna negatif seperti Pikachu yang berarti "menjadi Yahudi", Charmander yang berarti "Tuhan itu lemah", dan banyak lainnya.Nah, apa pendapat Anda tentang masalah yang menghantam game Pokemon Go ini?

berita: When it was first launched two years ago, the iPhone 6 and 6 Plus were heavily criticized for the 'bendgate' screen case. Now, the iPhone 6 and 6 Plus are again reported to have screen problems that are no less severe. Julia Bluff from iFixit, a leading gadget service provider, stated that many iPhone 6 lines that are almost two years old are affected by the 'Touch Disease' problem. iPhone 6 affected by Touch Disease, the touch screen is called not working. Unfortunately, while iFixit can perform repairs, most cases require users to replace their iPhones. iFixit explained that Touch Disease occurs because the two chips responsible for the touchscreen feature on the iPhone 6 are damaged or not connected to each other. Apparently, Touch Disease is said to be enounce related to the 'bendgate' problem. Yes, the body of the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus, which is weaker than other iPhone series, indirectly causes the circuit board to bend, making the chip or solder connection break. Ironically, Apple authorized stores and Apple authorized service centers are said to not have adequate equipment to carry out repairs. Because the Touch Disease problem requires the technician to disassemble the iPhone, and it's not an easy matter. Some 'victims' of Touch Disease on the Apple Forum also regret the difficulty of finding a warranty claim for this problem because the curved or bent iPhone is categorized as a user error. In order to get around this problem, there is a user who was forced to put a rubber band on his iPhone 6 Plus so that the screen can still work. As seen in the following image.
berita_id: Ketika pertama kali diluncurkan dua tahun lalu, iPhone 6 dan 6 Plus sangat dikritik untuk kasus layar 'Bendgate'.Sekarang, iPhone 6 dan 6 Plus dilaporkan memiliki masalah layar yang tidak kalah parah.Julia Bluff dari Ifixit, penyedia layanan gadget terkemuka, menyatakan bahwa banyak jalur iPhone 6 yang hampir dua tahun dipengaruhi oleh masalah 'penyakit sentuh'.iPhone 6 Dipengaruhi oleh penyakit sentuh, layar sentuh disebut tidak berfungsi.Sayangnya, sementara IFIXIT dapat melakukan perbaikan, kebanyakan kasus mengharuskan pengguna untuk mengganti iPhone mereka.Ifixit menjelaskan bahwa penyakit sentuh terjadi karena dua chip yang bertanggung jawab untuk fitur layar sentuh pada iPhone 6 rusak atau tidak terhubung satu sama lain.Rupanya, penyakit sentuh dikatakan berkaitan dengan masalah 'bendgate'.Ya, tubuh iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus, yang lebih lemah dari seri iPhone lainnya, secara tidak langsung menyebabkan papan sirkuit menekuk, membuat chip atau koneksi solder istirahat.Ironisnya, Apple Stores Resmi dan Pusat Layanan Resmi Apple dikatakan tidak memiliki peralatan yang memadai untuk melakukan perbaikan.Karena masalah penyakit sentuh membutuhkan teknisi untuk membongkar iPhone, dan itu bukan masalah yang mudah.Beberapa 'korban' penyakit sentuh di forum Apple juga menyesali kesulitan menemukan klaim garansi untuk masalah ini karena iPhone melengkung atau bengkok dikategorikan sebagai kesalahan pengguna.Untuk mengatasi masalah ini, ada pengguna yang terpaksa meletakkan karet gelang di iPhone 6 Plus sehingga layar masih bisa berfungsi.Seperti yang terlihat pada gambar berikut.

berita: The more rampant gamers play Pokemon Go, it turns out to cause pros and cons, especially in Indonesia. Moreover, recently heard the news that the game has an implied meaning that cannot be tolerated, especially for followers of the Islamic religion. From several links spread on social media, it is rearing discussed that Pokemon actually means "I am Jewish" in Syriac, while Pikachu is referred to as "Be Jewish" and Charmander means "God is Weak". That's where this problem started, some people immediately believed and redistributed the link to invite others to avoid Pokemon Go. There are also those who do not believe and think it is something made up. So, are these rumors true or not? It turns out that Nintendo denied it and the LA Times noted it, you could say all this is just a rumor that is not proven at all. Pokemon in English is an abbreviation of two words, namely Pocket Monster which means pocket monster. You could say, these monsters called Pokemon have a small size and can be stored in the trainer's pocket. While Pikachu which is known as the icon of Pokemon is also formed from two words, namely Pika (shining) and Chu (rat). From its shape alone it is clear that Pikachu is a mouse that glows or is armed with electric shocks. Finally, Charmander also has the meaning of burning fire, like the appearance of Charmander himself in the anime and Pokemon games.
berita_id: Gamer yang lebih merajalela memainkan Pokemon Go, ternyata menyebabkan pro dan kontra, terutama di Indonesia.Selain itu, baru -baru ini mendengar berita bahwa permainan memiliki makna tersirat yang tidak dapat ditoleransi, terutama bagi pengikut agama Islam.Dari beberapa tautan yang tersebar di media sosial, dibesarkan dibahas bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya berarti "Saya Yahudi" di Syria, sementara Pikachu disebut sebagai "menjadi Yahudi" dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Di situlah masalah ini dimulai, beberapa orang segera percaya dan mendistribusikan kembali tautan untuk mengundang orang lain untuk menghindari Pokemon Go.Ada juga orang -orang yang tidak percaya dan berpikir itu adalah sesuatu yang dibuat -buat.Jadi, apakah rumor ini benar atau tidak?Ternyata Nintendo membantahnya dan LA Times mencatatnya, Anda bisa mengatakan semua ini hanyalah rumor yang tidak terbukti sama sekali.Pokemon dalam bahasa Inggris adalah singkatan dari dua kata, yaitu monster saku yang berarti monster saku.Bisa dibilang, monster -monster yang disebut Pokemon ini memiliki ukuran kecil dan dapat disimpan di saku pelatih.Sementara Pikachu yang dikenal sebagai ikon Pokemon juga dibentuk dari dua kata, yaitu pika (bersinar) dan Chu (tikus).Dari bentuknya saja jelas bahwa Pikachu adalah tikus yang bersinar atau dipersenjatai dengan sengatan listrik.Akhirnya, Charmander juga memiliki arti membakar api, seperti penampilan Charmander sendiri di game anime dan pokemon.

berita: In everyday life, we use various kinds of brushes to make up, paint, clean dust, grouping paint the house, grease cake pans, to smear food such as grilled chicken, bread, cakes, and various baked or grilled meats and seafood. when combing hair, cleaning hair in salons or barbershops, washing clothes, and scrubbing floors Do you know what brushes and brushes you use come from? Most likely from sea urchins! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, generally from China. These imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than other animal hairs, such as squirrels, goats, civets, camels, and dogs. period January – June 2001, Indonesia imported “Boar Bristle and Pig or Boar Hair” amounting to 282,983 tons or USD 1713309 What's interesting? Just so you know, Anping is a company that has a history of 400 years in processing bristle and animal tail feathers. This company is the largest distribution center for animal tail feathers in the north of China. It is said that more than 50000 people are involved in the production process and have more than 1000 workshops spread all over the world. various countries The keyword that shows the identity of this white brush is the writing BRISTLE on the brush handle, which in the Webster Dictionary means PIG HAIR (boar bristle). or the other is done in a very easy and simple way Animal hair contains a protein called KERATIN Keratin is a group of proteins known as fiber proteins. Like protein, hair or fur that contains keratin when burned will cause a distinctive odor. it's the same when we c smell of roasted meat Meanwhile, if the brush is made of palm fiber, fiber, or plastic, then it will definitely not emit a specific smell other than the smell of burning ash. The brush is unclean, so if it is used to spread bread, then the bread is unclean. In short, it is unlawful to eat unclean objects. NOTE: This unclean brush is also widely used to apply seasonings to grilled corn, pecel catfish, grilled fish, grilled chicken, barbeque, etc. For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly HARAM, no matter how small, the material from pigs is forbidden to be consumed and to be applied. The illustrations in this article are examples of brushes and bristle brushes (the term is PIG or BOAR or HOG or BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places, such as markets, painting supply stores, building material stores, make-up shops and salons, online shops, etc ll Are you familiar with the various shapes below? There are painting brushes, wall paint brushes, makeup brushes, hair brushes, barber or barber brushes, clothes brushes, etc. BEWARE! TIPS AVOID THE USE OF BRUSHS AND BORN BRUSHS: Use 100% synthetic brushes and brushes, such as nylon. Wall paint brushes and food brushes are available, at slightly more expensive prices. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for toothbrushes. Use other alternatives than brushes. Examples of paint rollers for painting, sponges and cotton buds for applying make-up, as well as knives and spatulas for greasing food. Beware of foods that use a pig brush to cook and clean their tools Sea urchin brushes are sold in white and black. However, manufacturers can process sea urchins by bleaching them and then coloring them, so that they look like other animal hairs. Wallahu Ta'ala A'lam
berita_id: Dalam kehidupan sehari -hari, kami menggunakan berbagai jenis kuas untuk membuat, melukis, membersihkan debu, mengelompokkan cat rumah, wajan kue minyak, untuk mengolesi makanan seperti ayam panggang, roti, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian, dan menggosok lantai, apakah Anda tahu kuas dan sikat apa yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar dari landak laut!Sikat disediakan di Indonesia, umumnya dari Cina.Sikat impor ini diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada rambut hewan lainnya, seperti tupai, kambing, sipil, unta, dan anjing.Periode Januari - Juni 2001, Indonesia mengimpor "bulu babi dan rambut babi atau babi" sebesar 282.983 ton atau USD 1713309 Apa yang menarik?Asal tahu saja, Anping adalah perusahaan yang memiliki sejarah 400 tahun dalam memproses bulu dan bulu ekor hewan.Perusahaan ini adalah pusat distribusi terbesar untuk bulu ekor hewan di utara Cina.Dikatakan bahwa lebih dari 50000 orang terlibat dalam proses produksi dan memiliki lebih dari 1000 lokakarya yang tersebar di seluruh dunia.Berbagai negara Kata kunci yang menunjukkan identitas sikat putih ini adalah bulu tulisan pada pegangan sikat, yang dalam kamus Webster berarti rambut babi (bulu babi).Atau yang lain dilakukan dengan cara yang sangat mudah dan sederhana rambut hewan mengandung protein yang disebut keratin keratin adalah sekelompok protein yang dikenal sebagai protein serat.Seperti protein, rambut atau bulu yang mengandung keratin ketika dibakar akan menyebabkan bau yang khas.Itu sama ketika kita berbau daging panggang sementara itu, jika kuas terbuat dari serat kelapa, serat, atau plastik, maka pasti tidak akan memancarkan aroma tertentu selain bau abu yang terbakar.Sikatnya najis, jadi jika digunakan untuk menyebarkan roti, maka roti itu najis.Singkatnya, tidak sah untuk memakan benda najis.Catatan: Sikat najis ini juga banyak digunakan untuk mengoleskan bumbu pada jagung panggang, ikan lele pecel, ikan bakar, ayam panggang, barbeque, dll. Untuk umat Islam, penggunaan bulu babi jelas haram, tidak peduli seberapa kecil, bahan dari babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan diterapkan.Ilustrasi dalam artikel ini adalah contoh kuas dan sikat bulu (istilah ini adalah babi atau babi atau babi atau sikat rambut bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat, seperti pasar, toko pasokan lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, toko make-up dan salon, toko online, dll. Apakah Anda akrab dengan berbagai bentuk di bawah?Ada kuas lukisan, kuas cat dinding, sikat rias, sikat rambut, kuas tukang cukur atau tukang cukur, sikat pakaian, dll. Waspadalah!Kiat Hindari penggunaan kuas dan kuas yang lahir: Gunakan sikat dan kuas sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Sikat cat dinding dan kuas makanan tersedia, dengan harga yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.Gunakan alternatif lain selain kuas.Contoh rol cat untuk lukisan, spons dan cotton buds untuk mengoleskan make-up, serta pisau dan spatula untuk makanan yang berminyak.Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang menggunakan sikat babi untuk memasak dan membersihkan alat -alat mereka sikat landak laut dijual putih dan hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkannya dan kemudian mewarnai mereka, sehingga mereka terlihat seperti rambut hewan lainnya.Wallahu Ta'ala A'lam

berita: The Food and Drug Supervisory Agency (BPOM) declared the 'Penguin Brand' candy or teat candy free of drugs and psychotropic substances. Head of BPOM Penny Kusumastuti Lukito in a press conference political science on Thursday (9/3) revealed that laboratory tests had been carried out on the candy. He said of the 12 parameters tested, all of them showed negative results. "We have coordinated with the National Narcotics Agency and today it was concluded that pacifier candy does not contain narcotics," Penny explained on the sidelines of the 2017 BPOM National Conference in Batu. Testing on candy pacifiers was carried out at BPOM Surabaya as the place where these snacks were found. In addition to Surabaya, the candy pacifier test was also carried out at BPOM Bandar Lampung and Serang. All of them showed negative results for narcotics. Penny added that testing the content of rhodamine B and formalin in pacifiers also showed negative results. A negative result indicates that the candy can still be circulated and consumed. "We ask the public to be calm but remain vigilant about consuming any food because it could be contaminated or contaminated," he added. Based on BPOM research, the candy pacifier has obtained a distribution permit which will expire in 2018. Sweets imported from China are widely traded in the Surabaya school environment. However, Penny instructed all BPOM in the region to participate in checking the product in question. The Surabaya government through its entire staff raided candy pacifiers in a number of schools and markets. The issue of pacifier candy containing narcotics has been circulating in the mass media and social media since March 6. This issue arose after the Surabaya City Government suspected the presence of rhodamine-B and formalin.
berita_id: Badan Pengawas Makanan dan Obat (BPOM) menyatakan permen 'merek penguin' atau permen TEAT yang bebas dari narkoba dan zat psikotropika.Kepala BPOM Penny Kusumastuti Lukito dalam Ilmu Politik Konferensi Pers pada hari Kamis (9/3) mengungkapkan bahwa tes laboratorium telah dilakukan dengan permen.Dia mengatakan dari 12 parameter yang diuji, semuanya menunjukkan hasil negatif."Kami telah berkoordinasi dengan Badan Narkotika Nasional dan hari ini disimpulkan bahwa Candy Datang tidak mengandung narkotika," Penny menjelaskan di sela -sela Konferensi Nasional BPOM 2017 di Batu.Pengujian dot permen dilakukan di BPOM Surabaya sebagai tempat di mana makanan ringan ini ditemukan.Selain Surabaya, uji Candy Pacifier juga dilakukan di BPOM Bandar Lampung dan Serang.Semuanya menunjukkan hasil negatif untuk narkotika.Penny menambahkan bahwa menguji kandungan rhodamin B dan formalin pada dot juga menunjukkan hasil negatif.Hasil negatif menunjukkan bahwa permen masih dapat diedarkan dan dikonsumsi."Kami meminta masyarakat untuk tenang tetapi tetap waspada tentang mengonsumsi makanan apa pun karena itu bisa terkontaminasi atau terkontaminasi," tambahnya.Berdasarkan penelitian BPOM, dot permen telah memperoleh izin distribusi yang akan berakhir pada tahun 2018. Permen yang diimpor dari Cina diperdagangkan secara luas di lingkungan sekolah Surabaya.Namun, Penny menginstruksikan semua BPOM di wilayah tersebut untuk berpartisipasi dalam memeriksa produk tersebut.Pemerintah Surabaya melalui seluruh stafnya menggerebek dot permen di sejumlah sekolah dan pasar.Masalah permen dot yang mengandung narkotika telah beredar di media massa dan media sosial sejak 6 Maret. Masalah ini muncul setelah pemerintah kota Surabaya mencurigai keberadaan rhodamine-B dan formalin.

berita: Catfish is one type of fish that contains a lot of animal protein. Pecel catfish is one of the favorite food menus for many people because the price is quite cheap and delicious. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is it called the dirtiest fish? The following is an explanation: Catfish live in very dirty ponds and are usually surrounded by chicken or pig coops. For those of you who are catfish fans, not all catfish live or are bred in ponds around which there is a chicken coop or a pigsty. In Indonesia, many also keep catfish in ordinary ponds. But why is it called the dirtiest fish, maybe because most catfish farmers feed their livestock with feed that comes from anything dirty including chicken carcasses etc. According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he has supplied a lot of catfish that mudcat he harvests every 3 months to markets and roadside restaurants in Hainan province, to be precise in Haikou. Frequent complaints from the community, a reporter from the local fisheries department investigated the fish. The reporters took samples from the 7 ponds that housed the catfish. It turned out that the seven ponds were all surrounded by chicken and pig coops, while in the middle of the ponds there were many piles of garbage. According to Islamic jurisprudence, eating catfish is halal. But sometimes many catfish breeders in Indonesia keep catfish in ponds and are fed with manure. If the condition is like that, then the catfish becomes like a jallalah animal, that is, an animal that eats dirty and unclean food so that it is unlawful to eat it. In order to become halal again, catfish must be quarantined or separated from dirty places and given clean food. Minimum quarantine time is 3 days. Catfish is a type of fish that consumes waste. Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty ponds, this fish can also consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pig manure, even this fish can also consume human waste. Some time ago, news about the dangers of consuming fried catfish circulated. Reportedly, a doctor once admitted that he often had patients with swollen and infected thyroid disease, with symptoms: swelling of the lower neck, swelling around the neck that looked like a tumor, the eyeballs felt like they were about to come out, heat around the neck, frequent coughing in the middle of the night. without cause. After being asked, it turns out that all the patients often eat catfish and fried eel. This also happened to the catfish skipper in Yogyakarta, his father, wife and child experienced the symptoms as above. When the doctor asked one of the professors at Pluit, it turned out that the catfish contains a mild poison, so that if it is fried, the clean oil will turn black. So it is possible that in the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. Friends for those of you who are catfish fans, even though catfish is halal and not too worrying as a wise consumer you must and remain careful. You also don't know when you buy catfish in the market or in a food stall, is it quarantined before frying the fish or not? If you are in doubt, don't eat it. Or if you are sure of its cleanliness, please consume it. However, it is recommended not to use large amounts on a regular basis.
berita_id: Lele adalah salah satu jenis ikan yang mengandung banyak protein hewani.Pecel Catfish adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit bagi banyak orang karena harganya cukup murah dan lezat.Meskipun lezat dan murah, ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Mengapa disebut ikan paling kotor?Berikut ini adalah penjelasan: ikan lele hidup di kolam yang sangat kotor dan biasanya dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam atau babi.Bagi Anda yang merupakan penggemar lele, tidak semua ikan lele hidup atau dibiakkan di kolam di sekitar yang ada kandang ayam atau babi.Di Indonesia, banyak yang juga menyimpan ikan lele di kolam biasa.Tetapi mengapa itu disebut ikan paling kotor, mungkin karena sebagian besar petani lele memberi makan ternak mereka dengan pakan yang berasal dari apa pun yang kotor termasuk karkas ayam dll. Menurut seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-hong mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele yang ia panen setiap 3 bulan untuk dipasarkan dan restoran di pinggir jalan di Hainan, Hainan Hain.Keluhan yang sering dari masyarakat, seorang reporter dari departemen perikanan setempat menyelidiki ikan tersebut.Para wartawan mengambil sampel dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Ternyata ketujuh kolam semuanya dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sementara di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Menurut yurisprudensi Islam, makan lele adalah halal.Tetapi kadang -kadang banyak peternak lele di Indonesia menyimpan ikan lele di kolam dan diberi makan dengan pupuk kandang.Jika kondisinya seperti itu, maka ikan lele menjadi seperti binatang jallalah, yaitu hewan yang memakan makanan kotor dan najis sehingga tidak sah untuk memakannya.Untuk menjadi halal lagi, ikan lele harus dikarantina atau dipisahkan dari tempat -tempat kotor dan diberi makanan bersih.Waktu karantina minimum adalah 3 hari.Lele adalah jenis ikan yang mengonsumsi limbah.Lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di kolam kotor, ikan ini juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi, dan pupuk babi, bahkan ikan ini juga dapat mengkonsumsi limbah manusia.Beberapa waktu yang lalu, berita tentang bahaya mengonsumsi ikan lele goreng yang beredar.Dilaporkan, seorang dokter pernah mengakui bahwa ia sering menderita pasien dengan penyakit tiroid yang bengkak dan terinfeksi, dengan gejala: pembengkakan leher bawah, pembengkakan di sekitar leher yang tampak seperti tumor, bola mata terasa seperti akan keluar, memanaskan di sekitar leher, sering batuk di tengah malam.tanpa sebab.Setelah ditanya, ternyata semua pasien sering makan lele dan belut goreng.Ini juga terjadi pada kapten lele di Yogyakarta, ayah, istri dan anaknya mengalami gejala seperti di atas.Ketika dokter bertanya kepada salah satu profesor di Pluit, ternyata ikan lele berisi racun ringan, sehingga jika digoreng, minyak bersih akan berubah menjadi hitam.Jadi ada kemungkinan bahwa dalam tubuh ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang sangat berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Teman -teman untuk Anda yang penggemar lele, meskipun ikan lele itu halal dan tidak terlalu mengkhawatirkan sebagai konsumen yang bijak, Anda harus dan tetap berhati -hati.Anda juga tidak tahu kapan Anda membeli ikan lele di pasar atau di warung makanan, apakah itu dikarantina sebelum menggoreng ikan atau tidak?Jika Anda ragu, jangan memakannya.Atau jika Anda yakin akan kebersihannya, silakan konsumsinya.Namun, disarankan untuk tidak menggunakan jumlah besar secara teratur.

berita: Jakarta – The Reog Ponorogo Community (KRP) submitted files on the Reog Ponorogo burning incident at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao - Philippines to the Indonesian Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemlu), as a follow-up to an Open Letter submitted to the Indonesian Minister of Foreign Affairs (Menlu) on 2 November 2015 then. Upon the submission of the files, the Reog Ponorogo Community was immediately received by the Foreign Minister, Retno LP Marsudi. In the meeting which took place in the Foreign Minister's Meeting Room, Jalan Pejambon 6, Central Jakarta, the KRP submitted files in the form of photos of the procession of burning reog, photos of reog artists who appeared at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao in 2005, copies of the clarifications from the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia, copies of the apology from the Indonesian Consulate General staff, names of people which must be checked by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Team, and other files. "We will escort the team formed by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs so that it runs openly, transparently and with honesty. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs' sensitivity to the reog burning incident at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao is eagerly awaited by Reog activists and lovers," said Secretary of the Reog Ponorogo Community (KRP), M Syaiful Jihad here. Jakarta, Monday (9/11/2015), in a press release. According to Syaiful Jihad, the incident of burning National Cultural Heritage assets at the Consulate General in Davao must be resolved legally, both criminally and civilly, so that the "intellectual actor" is revealed. In addition, there must be protection and security guarantees for Indonesian citizens in Davao, especially Indonesian citizens who have exposed this incident. "The Ministry of Foreign Affairs must be held accountable," he said. On that occasion, Foreign Minister Retno LP Marsudi, accompanied by the Director General of Information and Public Diplomacy, Esti Andayani, asked the KRP to calm the reaction of the people who love Reog, and understand the spiritual atmosphere of reog lovers, as well as no attempt to disrespect culture because it has been inherent in diplomats. "An internal audit has been carried out by the Consulate General in Davao, while an external audit has been carried out by the Inspectorate General, in the form of a team to find out what actually happened at the Consulate General in Davao, the progress and results will be open and accessible to the public," said Retno, while asking to prioritize the principles presumption of innocence and carried out according to applicable procedures. "We also guarantee that Indonesian citizens who are in Davao City, including alien those who report the reog burning incident, will not happen, let alone violence. We guarantee their safety," concluded Foreign Minister Retno.
berita_id: Jakarta - Komunitas Reog Ponorogo (KRP) mengajukan file -file tentang insiden pembakaran Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao - Filipina ke Kementerian Luar Negeri Indonesia (Kemlu), sebagai tindak lanjut dari surat terbuka yang diajukan kepada Menteri Luar Negeri Indonesia (Menlu) pada 2 November 2015.Setelah pengajuan file, komunitas Reog Ponorogo segera diterima oleh Menteri Luar Negeri, Retno LP Marsudi.In the meeting which took place in the Foreign Minister's Meeting Room, Jalan Pejambon 6, Central Jakarta, the KRP submitted files in the form of photos of the procession of burning reog, photos of reog artists who appeared at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao in 2005, copies of the clarifications from the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia, copies of the apology from the Indonesian Consulate General staff, names of people which must beDiperiksa oleh tim Kementerian Luar Negeri, dan file lainnya."Kami akan mengawal tim yang dibentuk oleh Kementerian Luar Negeri sehingga berjalan secara terbuka, transparan, dan dengan kejujuran. Kejujuran Kementerian Luar Negeri terhadap insiden pembakaran yang ditentukan kembali di konsulat umum Indonesia di Davao dengan penuh semangat ditunggu -tunggu oleh aktivis dan kekasih yang reog," kata Sekretaris Reog Ponorogo (KRRP) di sini.Jakarta, Senin (9/11/2015), dalam siaran pers.Menurut Syaiful Jihad, insiden membakar aset warisan budaya nasional di konsulat jenderal di Davao harus diselesaikan secara hukum, baik secara kriminal maupun sipil, sehingga "aktor intelektual" terungkap.Selain itu, harus ada jaminan perlindungan dan keamanan untuk warga negara Indonesia di Davao, terutama warga negara Indonesia yang telah mengekspos insiden ini."Kementerian Luar Negeri harus dimintai pertanggungjawaban," katanya.Pada kesempatan itu, Menteri Luar Negeri Retno LP Marsudi, disertai oleh Direktur Jenderal Informasi dan Diplomasi Publik, Esti Andayani, meminta KRP untuk menenangkan reaksi orang -orang yang mencintai Reog, dan memahami suasana spiritual dari pecinta yang dirancang ulang, serta tidak ada upaya untuk tidak menghormati budaya karena telah melekat pada dipllomokat."Audit internal telah dilakukan oleh Konsulat Jenderal di Davao, sementara audit eksternal telah dilakukan oleh Jenderal Inspektorat, dalam bentuk tim untuk mengetahui apa yang sebenarnya terjadi di Konsulat Jenderal di Davao, kemajuan dan hasilnya akan terbuka dan diakses oleh publik," kata Retno, sementara meminta untuk memprioritaskan prinsip -prinsip Prinsip Penghancuran."Kami juga menjamin bahwa warga negara Indonesia yang berada di Kota Davao, termasuk orang asing yang melaporkan insiden pembakaran kembali, tidak akan terjadi, apalagi kekerasan. Kami menjamin keselamatan mereka," pungkas Menteri Luar Negeri Retno.

berita: Trending News – Who among you doesn't play Pokemon GO? This Nintendo game has managed to make every human being lower their head and focus their eyes on the smartphone they are holding while playing Pokemon GO. The Pokemon GO game does present a different experience and sensation compared to games that have existed before, so it's no wonder that this game is much loved even though it has not yet reached one month. Controversy regarding Pokemon GO is growing, especially in our own homeland, Indonesia. Yes, in this country, various controversies have occurred due to the presence of Pokemon GO in the world of mobile games. Not only civilians who spoke, even the vice president of Indonesia also voiced his opinion about Pokemon GO. In addition, recently there was news about the 'ban' Pokemon GO by MUI Indramayu. Curious? Is Pokemon GO Really Banned? The Indonesian Ulema Council or abbreviated as MUI is a non-governmental organization that accommodates ulama, zu'ama and Islamic scholars to guide Muslims in Indonesia. Well, it is reported that the MUI Indramayu, West Java Regency, has issued a fatwa that the Pokemon GO game is illegal. Wow, why is that so? Why is the Pokemon GO game banned? That's right, the MUI Indramayu has banned the Pokemon GO game. The reason is, playing Pokemon GO can indeed make you hypnotized. What does hypnotized mean? Yes, you can unknowingly trespass and break through a number of places just to look for Pokemon. Therefore, this is the reference for MUI Indramayu to forbid Pokemon GO. According to the deputy chairman of the MUI Indramayu, Sofyan Tsauri explained, "So the game is likened to a person who is drunk with alcohol so that he forgets his work and obligations." In addition, he also emphasized that it is not allowed to play Pokemon GO, even the game is forbidden. Because there have been many negative impacts, such as wasting time looking for Pokemon, even though there are many things that are more useful than hunting Pokemon. Sofyan gave a clear example, namely due to the Pokemon GO game, students are not studying and employees are not working even if they neglect to worship. Not only that, he also reiterated, "Allah SWT forbids wine because it is intoxicating like the Pokemon Go game, in the word of God in the letter Al Maidah verse 90 which reads, 'O you who believe, actually drinking wine (drunk) is an act of the devil'. ." It means, it can be concluded that according to Sofyan, playing Pokemon GO is an act of the devil, because the impact can be intoxicating. Some Say Pokemon Means "I'm Jewish", Really? Hearing the word Pokemon, right now your mindset will definitely run to the Pokemon GO game. Well, if you don't know, it turns out that there are rumors that reveal that the meaning of the word Pokemon is "I'm Jewish". This is interpreted through the Syriac language, or Syriac language which if translated will have such meaning. Wow, this can be proof that Pokemon GO is haram, right? There have been many incidents from Pokemon GO that ended up endangering lives Pokemon GO is a very popular game. However, because of the presence of Pokemon GO, many people are less aware of the surrounding situations and conditions. What is the impact? As previously discussed, the writer from JalanTikus himself had an unpleasant experience as a result of playing Pokemon GO, because the smartphone he used wanted to be snatched. The government is ready to block Pokemon GO if it proves to be unsafe A few days earlier, there was news that if it proved dangerous, the Pokemon GO game was ready to be blocked by the Ministry of Communication and Information The reason is, judging from standstill the fatwa of the MUI Indramayu and the events that have happened, it is possible that the government will actually block Pokemon GO from Indonesia. Things like this further support the banning of the game Pokemon GO. So, Playing Pokemon GO is Satanic and Haram? Actually, it depends on how you play Pokemon GO. According to the MUI Indramayu, they forbid it because Pokemon GO players neglect their duties and even forget to pray. In fact, if you can manage the time, you can finish your task first before playing Pokemon GO, complete your worship obligations first before playing Pokemon GO, maybe it won't be a problem. Thus, the government will not block access to Pokemon GO from Indonesia. In addition, Pokemon itself actually stands for Pocket Monsters which comes from Japanese ???????????? Poketto Monsuta. Then, Pokemon also refers to 721 fictional species that must appear in all Pokemon series. Therefore, there seems to be a misunderstanding in the meaning of the Syriac language. If it's true that Pokemon GO means "I'm Jewish" and should be left behind, will you also leave social media Facebook which in fact was created by Jews?
berita_id: Berita Trending - Siapa di antara Anda yang tidak bermain Pokemon Go?Game Nintendo ini telah berhasil membuat setiap manusia menundukkan kepala dan memfokuskan mata mereka pada smartphone yang mereka pegang saat bermain Pokemon Go.Game Pokemon Go memang menghadirkan pengalaman dan sensasi yang berbeda dibandingkan dengan game yang telah ada sebelumnya, jadi tidak heran bahwa game ini sangat dicintai meskipun belum mencapai satu bulan.Kontroversi tentang Pokemon Go sedang tumbuh, terutama di tanah air kita sendiri, Indonesia.Ya, di negara ini, berbagai kontroversi telah terjadi karena kehadiran Pokemon Go di dunia game mobile.Tidak hanya warga sipil yang berbicara, bahkan wakil presiden Indonesia juga menyuarakan pendapatnya tentang Pokemon Go.Selain itu, baru -baru ini ada berita tentang 'larangan' Pokemon Go oleh Mui Indramayu.Penasaran?Apakah Pokemon benar -benar dilarang?Dewan Ulama Indonesia atau disingkat sebagai MUI adalah organisasi non-pemerintah yang mengakomodasi ulama, Zu'ama dan para sarjana Islam untuk membimbing Muslim di Indonesia.Nah, dilaporkan bahwa MUI Indramayu, Kabupaten Java Barat, telah mengeluarkan fatwa bahwa permainan Pokemon Go adalah ilegal.Wow, kenapa begitu?Mengapa game Pokemon Go dilarang?Itu benar, MUI Indramayu telah melarang permainan Pokemon Go.Alasannya adalah, bermain Pokemon Go memang bisa membuat Anda terhipnotis.Apa arti dihipnotis?Ya, Anda dapat tanpa sadar melanggar dan menerobos sejumlah tempat hanya untuk mencari Pokemon.Oleh karena itu, ini adalah referensi untuk MUI Indramayu untuk melarang Pokemon Go.Menurut wakil ketua MUI Indramayu, Sofyan Tsauri menjelaskan, "Jadi permainan itu disamakan dengan seseorang yang mabuk dengan alkohol sehingga ia lupa pekerjaan dan kewajibannya."Selain itu, ia juga menekankan bahwa itu tidak diizinkan untuk bermain Pokemon Go, bahkan permainan dilarang.Karena ada banyak dampak negatif, seperti membuang -buang waktu mencari Pokemon, meskipun ada banyak hal yang lebih berguna daripada berburu Pokemon.Sofyan memberi contoh yang jelas, yaitu karena permainan Pokemon Go, siswa tidak belajar dan karyawan tidak bekerja bahkan jika mereka lalai untuk beribadah.Tidak hanya itu, ia juga menegaskan kembali, "Allah SWT melarang anggur karena memabukkan seperti permainan Pokemon Go, dalam firman Tuhan dalam huruf Al Maidah ayat 90 yang berbunyi, 'O Anda yang percaya, benar -benar minum anggur (mabuk) adalah tindakan iblis' ..."Artinya, dapat disimpulkan bahwa menurut Sofyan, bermain Pokemon Go adalah tindakan iblis, karena dampaknya bisa memabukkan.Ada yang bilang pokemon berarti "Aku orang Yahudi", sungguh?Mendengar kata Pokemon, sekarang pola pikir Anda pasti akan berjalan ke game Pokemon Go.Nah, jika Anda tidak tahu, ternyata ada desas -desus yang mengungkapkan bahwa arti kata Pokemon adalah "I'm Jewish".Ini ditafsirkan melalui bahasa Syria, atau bahasa Syria yang jika diterjemahkan akan memiliki makna seperti itu.Wow, ini bisa menjadi bukti bahwa Pokemon Go adalah Haram, kan?Ada banyak insiden dari Pokemon Go yang akhirnya membahayakan kehidupan Pokemon Go adalah permainan yang sangat populer.Namun, karena adanya Pokemon GO, banyak orang kurang sadar akan situasi dan kondisi di sekitarnya.Apa dampaknya?Seperti yang dibahas sebelumnya, penulis dari Jalankus sendiri memiliki pengalaman yang tidak menyenangkan sebagai hasil dari bermain Pokemon Go, karena smartphone yang ia gunakan ingin disambar.Pemerintah siap untuk memblokir Pokemon Go jika terbukti tidak aman beberapa hari sebelumnya, ada berita bahwa jika terbukti berbahaya, permainan Pokemon Go siap untuk diblokir oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi Alasannya adalah, menilai dari penghentian pemerintah MUI Indramayu dan peristiwa yang telah terjadi, dimungkinkan bahwa pemerintah akan benar -benar akan memblokir Pokon GO.Hal -hal seperti ini lebih lanjut mendukung pelarangan game Pokemon Go.Jadi, bermain pokemon go adalah setan dan haram?Sebenarnya, itu tergantung pada bagaimana Anda bermain Pokemon Go.Menurut MUI Indramayu, mereka melarangnya karena pemain Pokemon Go mengabaikan tugas mereka dan bahkan lupa untuk berdoa.Bahkan, jika Anda dapat mengatur waktu, Anda dapat menyelesaikan tugas Anda terlebih dahulu sebelum bermain Pokemon Go, selesaikan kewajiban ibadah Anda terlebih dahulu sebelum bermain Pokemon Go, mungkin itu tidak akan menjadi masalah.Dengan demikian, pemerintah tidak akan memblokir akses ke Pokemon pergi dari Indonesia.Selain itu, Pokemon itu sendiri benar -benar singkatan dari monster saku yang berasal dari bahasa Jepang ????????????Poketto Monsuta.Kemudian, Pokemon juga mengacu pada 721 spesies fiksi yang harus muncul di semua seri Pokemon.Karena itu, tampaknya ada kesalahpahaman dalam arti bahasa Syria.Jika benar bahwa Pokemon Go berarti "Saya orang Yahudi" dan harus ditinggalkan, apakah Anda juga akan meninggalkan Facebook media sosial yang sebenarnya dibuat oleh orang Yahudi?

berita: As we know, drugs are goods whose circulation is prohibited in Indonesia. However, in this modern era, there are just ideas for dealers to be able to disseminate these illicit goods. Not only adults, even children can't be separated from the targets of their operations. Recently found cases of drug trafficking in the form of candy. Of course, this case is reminiscent of what happened several years ago. The following are four candies that are known to contain drugs. pacifier candy One of the saddest cases in Indonesia is the circulation of pacifiers among minors. The candy is known to be very in demand in the school environment. Naturally, its cute shape is easy to attract minors. The case was first revealed after a student skipped school in the East Surabaya area. The child claimed to be dizzy after eating pacifier candy. The police also moved quickly by conducting raids on sweets suspected of containing drugs. The Satpol PP also cooperates with the local puskesmas to check every candy pacifier circulating in the stalls. However, after testing in the laboratory, it can be ascertained that the candy does not contain drugs. The BPOM has also held a press conference to clarify the issue of drug candy. 'Happy Feet' penguin candy No one would have guessed that this cute candy in the form of an animated sacrifice character turned out to be drugs. The prohibited item is a type of ecstasy with blue and pink colors. The owner of the cute candy is a 28-year-old woman. Initially, the police also believed that the item was ordinary candy. However, after conducting an inspection, it turned out that it was true that the candy contained MDMA preparations. The woman who peddled drug candy in Denpasar was arrested on July 10, 2015. From the arrest, it was revealed that he had a gang that circulated shabu not far from the Denpasar area. Finger Candy The discovery of the finger candy case began with the case of a child from Ciledug, Tangerang who fell asleep for five hours after enjoying the candy. Following up on the report, BPOM immediately checked the candy importer who came from China. The colorful candy is known to come from a Chinese company called Chaozhou Chaoan Wangging Foods China. The BPOM immediately took the initiative to monitor the products suspected of containing the drug. Chocolate wrap candy In 2008, there was a case where children in Kindergarten 5, South Jakarta got high after eating sweets given to them by friends. After being investigated by the police, their urine found Benzodiazepine drugs which have the same effect as tranquilizers or anesthetics. The candy is wrapped in brown paper. Each strip contains 10 seeds. After investigation, it turned out that the candy belonged to one of the fathers of TK 5 Jakarta students. Since then, parents have been advised to supervise their children so that they do not easily accept the sweets that people give them. The number of reports about the circulation of candy containing drugs is indeed worrying. Moreover, the candy is packaged so attractively. One of the anticipations to avoid drug candy can be done by choosing local candy that has been declared safe by the POM.
berita_id: Seperti yang kita ketahui, obat -obatan adalah barang yang sirkulasi dilarang di Indonesia.Namun, di era modern ini, hanya ada ide bagi dealer untuk dapat menyebarkan barang -barang terlarang ini.Tidak hanya orang dewasa, bahkan anak -anak tidak dapat dipisahkan dari target operasi mereka.Baru -baru ini menemukan kasus perdagangan narkoba dalam bentuk permen.Tentu saja, kasus ini mengingatkan pada apa yang terjadi beberapa tahun yang lalu.Berikut ini adalah empat permen yang diketahui mengandung obat -obatan.Permen dot salah satu kasus paling menyedihkan di Indonesia adalah sirkulasi dot di antara anak di bawah umur.Permen diketahui sangat diminati di lingkungan sekolah.Secara alami, bentuknya yang lucu mudah menarik di bawah umur.Kasus ini pertama kali terungkap setelah seorang siswa melewatkan sekolah di daerah Surabaya Timur.Anak itu mengaku pusing setelah makan permen dot.Polisi juga bergerak cepat dengan melakukan penggerebekan pada permen yang diduga mengandung narkoba.Satpol PP juga bekerja sama dengan Puskesmas lokal untuk memeriksa setiap dot permen yang beredar di kios.Namun, setelah pengujian di laboratorium, dapat dipastikan bahwa permen tidak mengandung obat.BPOM juga mengadakan konferensi pers untuk mengklarifikasi masalah permen narkoba.Permen Penguin 'Happy Feet', tidak ada yang menduga bahwa permen lucu ini dalam bentuk karakter pengorbanan animasi ternyata menjadi narkoba.Item terlarang adalah jenis ekstasi dengan warna biru dan merah muda.Pemilik permen yang lucu adalah seorang wanita berusia 28 tahun.Awalnya, polisi juga percaya bahwa barang itu adalah permen biasa.Namun, setelah melakukan inspeksi, ternyata memang benar bahwa permen berisi persiapan MDMA.Wanita yang menjajakan permen narkoba di Denpasar ditangkap pada 10 Juli 2015. Dari penangkapan, terungkap bahwa ia memiliki geng yang mengedarkan Shabu tidak jauh dari daerah Denpasar.Finger Candy Penemuan kasus permen jari dimulai dengan kasus seorang anak dari Ciledug, Tangerang yang tertidur selama lima jam setelah menikmati permen.Menindaklanjuti laporan itu, BPOM segera memeriksa importir permen yang datang dari Cina.Permen berwarna -warni diketahui berasal dari sebuah perusahaan Cina bernama Chaozhou Chaoan Wangging Foods China.BPOM segera mengambil inisiatif untuk memantau produk yang diduga mengandung obat.Permen Bungkus Cokelat pada tahun 2008, ada kasus di mana anak -anak di TK 5, Jakarta Selatan menjadi tinggi setelah makan permen yang diberikan kepada mereka oleh teman -teman.Setelah diselidiki oleh polisi, urin mereka menemukan obat benzodiazepine yang memiliki efek yang sama dengan penenang atau anestesi.Permen dibungkus dengan kertas cokelat.Setiap strip berisi 10 biji.Setelah diselidiki, ternyata permen itu milik salah satu ayah dari siswa Tk 5 Jakarta.Sejak itu, orang tua telah disarankan untuk mengawasi anak -anak mereka sehingga mereka tidak mudah menerima permen yang diberikan orang kepada mereka.Jumlah laporan tentang sirkulasi permen yang mengandung obat memang mengkhawatirkan.Selain itu, permen dikemas begitu menarik.Salah satu antisipasi untuk menghindari permen narkoba dapat dilakukan dengan memilih permen lokal yang telah dinyatakan aman oleh POM.

berita: The Pokemon GO game fever that has recently occurred, has in fact been able to attract a lot of attention from various circles, including high-ranking officials in this country. Even recently the Mayor of Banda Aceh, Illiza Sa'aduddin Djamal, instructed not to play the Pokemon GO game because it means I am Jewish. "And the pokemon have all been spread in electronic media, it turns out that it means that I am a Jew," said Illiza at a halal bi halal event with all officials and staff in the Banda Aceh City Government. Illiza Sa'aduddi Djamal's statement was not only conveyed in a halal bi halal event, he also tweeted on his Twitter account about the dangers of playing Pokemon GO which means I am Jewish. Suddenly, the tweet immediately got a lot of responses from Indonesian netizens who were famous for being critical. mayor of banda aceh “@Illizaa Ma'am, I'm a Muslim too. Mother's statement is not true, and it becomes slander, Mom. Iqra, Mrs. Read a lot. Mayor, you have to be wise," said the @risa_te account. “@Illizaa Pokemon means it's Pocket Monster boo. The Japanese say 'Poketo Monsuta' that's why there is no c in the 'poke'. Is this the mayor? chirping @jsoekahar. Banda Aceh Mayor Illiza Sa'aduddi is not the first person to raise the strange bin magic theory about the meaning of the Pokemon. Previously, there were many broadcast messages and Facebook links floating around the issue that I was a Jew from Pokemon. It was explained that Pokemon comes from Syriac or Syriac which means I am Jewish and Pikachu is be Jewish then Charmander means God is weak. What is Syriac, and does Pokemon really mean I'm Jewish? Although it is also known as the Syrian language, Syriac is not the official language of the country (Syria's official language is Arabic). Syriac is spoken mostly by the minority Syrian Christians living in eastern Turkey, northern Iraq and northeastern Syria. The first news about the meaning of the word Pokemon from Syriac or Syriac emerged when the LA Times reported rumors of Arab countries' concerns about the invasion of Pokemon and other foreign cultures on April 24, 2001. "It has been proven that this toy is part of a Jewish plan to corrupt the minds of generations it our youth for offending blasphemous thoughts, making fun of Allah and our moral values ​​so it is very dangerous for our young generation,” said Sheik Abdel Monem abu Zent, ​​a former member of the Jordanian parliament. The statement immediately received a rebuttal from the Syriac Orthodox Christian Church through the Jordanian Amman newspaper. It says that there is no connection between Syriac and the names of the characters in the Pokemon game, let alone to the point that it means I'm Jewish or be Jewish. As mentioned on the official website, Pokemon stands for Pocket Monster. Likewise with Pikachu which consists of two words, Pika and Chu, where Pika is the name for a small mouse and chu in Japanese means squeak. No wonder the most famous monster in Pokemon is in the form of a mouse. Or Charmander derived from Char (burning) and Salamander (amphibians such as lizards). It can be seen that the creators of this Pokemon only provide simple and easy to remember character names without the need to tire of learning Syriac or Syriac.
berita_id: Pokemon Go Game Fever yang baru-baru ini terjadi, sebenarnya mampu menarik banyak perhatian dari berbagai lingkaran, termasuk pejabat tinggi di negara ini.Bahkan baru -baru ini walikota Banda Aceh, Illiza Sa'aduddin Djamal, diperintahkan untuk tidak memainkan game Pokemon Go karena itu berarti saya Yahudi."Dan Pokemon semuanya telah tersebar di media elektronik, ternyata itu berarti bahwa saya seorang Yahudi," kata Illiza di acara halal halal halal dengan semua pejabat dan staf di pemerintah kota Banda Aceh.Pernyataan Illiza Sa'aduddi Djamal tidak hanya disampaikan dalam acara halal halal halal, ia juga tweet di akun Twitter -nya tentang bahaya bermain Pokemon Go yang berarti saya orang Yahudi.Tiba -tiba, tweet itu segera mendapat banyak tanggapan dari netizen Indonesia yang terkenal karena kritis.Walikota Banda Aceh “@illizaa Ma'am, saya juga seorang Muslim. Pernyataan ibu tidak benar, dan itu menjadi fitnah, Bu. Iqra, Ny. Baca banyak. Walikota, Anda harus bijaksana," kata akun @risa_te.“@Illizaa pokemon berarti monster saku boo. Jepang mengatakan 'poketo monsuta' itu sebabnya tidak ada c di 'poke'. Apakah ini walikota? Kicauan @jsoekahar. Banda Aceh Walikota Illiza Sa'Aduddi bukan orang pertama yang mengangkat teori Facebook tentang Facebook tentang The Strange Sihir tentang Makna Facebook.masalah saya adalah seorang Yahudi dari Pokemon.Orang -orang Kristen yang tinggal di Turki Timur, Irak Utara dan Suriah timur laut.Allah dan nilai -nilai moral kita sehingga sangat berbahaya bagi generasi muda kita, ”kata Sheik Abdel Monem Abu Zent, ​​mantan anggota Parlemen Yordania. Pernyataan itu segera menerima sanggahan dari poinnya yang tidak ada hubungannya dengan hal -hal yang tidak ada hubungannya.Di situs web resmi, Pokemon singkatan dari Pocket Monster.Pokemon hanya memberikan nama karakter yang sederhana dan mudah diingat tanpa perlu bosan belajar Syria atau Syria.

berita: The Secretary of the North Sumatra Health Service, Afwan Lubis, is not convinced by the existence cerebrate of a toothbrush made of pig bristles. "I don't think it's possible. But what about it? We can comment if there is a laboratory test first. Currently there is no laboratory test," he said via cellular, Monday (7/3/2016). about the boar-bristle toothbrush. If it really contains sea urchins, then it should not be circulated because there are elements that are not halal. Meanwhile, the Chairman of the Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta said, if it is true that the toothbrush is made of pig bristles, the toothbrush is haram. "In Al Surah Al Maidah verse 3 it is explained that derivatives from pigs are haram. We will explore this prohibition, really from sea urchins or not," he said via cellular. He added, if proven MUI will publish to the public so as not to use the toothbrush. In addition, MUI will withdraw the product from the market.
berita_id: Sekretaris Layanan Kesehatan Sumatra Utara, Afwan Lubis, tidak diyakinkan oleh keberadaan Cerebrate sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi."Saya tidak berpikir itu mungkin. Tapi bagaimana dengan itu? Kita bisa berkomentar jika ada tes laboratorium terlebih dahulu. Saat ini tidak ada tes laboratorium," katanya melalui Cellular, Senin (7/3/2016).tentang sikat gigi berbulu babi.Jika benar -benar mengandung bulu babi, maka itu tidak boleh diedarkan karena ada elemen yang tidak halal.Sementara itu, ketua Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta berkata, jika benar bahwa sikat gigi terbuat dari bulu babi, sikat gigi adalah haram."Dalam Al Surah Al Maidah, ayat 3 dijelaskan bahwa turunan dari babi adalah Haram. Kami akan mengeksplorasi larangan ini, benar -benar dari bulu babi atau tidak," katanya melalui seluler.Dia menambahkan, jika MUI yang terbukti akan menerbitkan kepada publik agar tidak menggunakan sikat gigi.Selain itu, MUI akan menarik produk dari pasar.

berita: Catfish is said to contain 3,000 cancer cells. The news circulated on social media. Freshwater fish are also considered the dirtiest fish because they eat all kinds of dirt. The news made catfish cultivators, catfish pecel stall owners, and freshwater fish connoisseurs offended and devastated. The reason is, catfish is one of the favorite food menus in Indonesia. Almost every food stall, especially in East Java and West Java, always provides this menu. Besides the price is quite cheap, this menu is also delicious, so it becomes a special attraction for consumers. The news that catfish contains 3,000 cancer cells first appeared in China. An article that mentions dirty and dirty catfish ads has gone viral on social media. The article mentions that human waste is also used as feed at a catfish farm in Haikou City, China. The article states that catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. This is because catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places. Catfish consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chickens, cows and pigs, and humans. This allows catfish to contain 3000 cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. However, catfish connoisseurs are asked not to be influenced by this information. The reason is, catfish advertising in Indonesia is different from China. Catfish in the country are cultivated very well by catfish breeders.
