They use pellets as their food, not using waste which is very harmful to human health like in China. enounce Poor catfish cultivators, they were offended and very upset by the news. The information that catfish contains 3,000 cancer cells is not true, said Head of the East Java Province Fisheries and Marine Service, Heru Tjahjono, Saturday (31/10)
berita_id: Catfish dikatakan mengandung 3.000 sel kanker.Berita itu beredar di media sosial.Ikan air tawar juga dianggap sebagai ikan paling kotor karena mereka memakan semua jenis kotoran.Berita itu membuat para pembudidaya lele, pemilik kios Pecel lele, dan penikmat ikan air tawar tersinggung dan hancur.Alasannya adalah, ikan lele adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit di Indonesia.Hampir setiap kios makanan, terutama di Jawa Timur dan Jawa Barat, selalu menyediakan menu ini.Selain harganya cukup murah, menu ini juga lezat, sehingga menjadi daya tarik khusus bagi konsumen.Berita bahwa ikan lele berisi 3.000 sel kanker pertama kali muncul di Cina.Sebuah artikel yang menyebutkan iklan lele yang kotor dan kotor telah beredar di media sosial.Artikel itu menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan di sebuah peternakan ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina.Artikel tersebut menyatakan bahwa ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Ini karena ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor.Ikan lele mengkonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi dan babi, dan manusia.Ini memungkinkan ikan lele mengandung 3000 sel kanker yang sangat berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Namun, penikmat lele diminta untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh informasi ini.Alasannya adalah, iklan lele di Indonesia berbeda dari Cina.Lele di negara ini dibudidayakan dengan sangat baik oleh peternak ikan lele.Mereka menggunakan pelet sebagai makanan mereka, bukan menggunakan limbah yang sangat berbahaya bagi kesehatan manusia seperti di Cina.Mengakhiri para pembudidaya lele yang malang, mereka tersinggung dan sangat kesal dengan berita itu.Informasi bahwa ikan lele berisi 3.000 sel kanker tidak benar, kata Kepala Perikanan Provinsi Jawa Timur dan Layanan Laut, Heru Tjahjono, Sabtu (31/10)

berita: Chaos broke out at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters Detention Center Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, Friday (11/10/2017) afternoon. The prisoners of terrorist cases went on a rampage by breaking through the door of the detention cell, and damaging other facilities, such as window panes, block hallway fences. "It's true that on Friday, November 10, at around 3 p.m. Western Indonesia Time, there was an upheaval by terrorist detainees at the Salemba Branch Detention Center in Kelapa Dua," said Head of the Public Information Section of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Commissioner of Police Martinus Sitompul, Friday (11/10/2017) . The detainees went berserk because they did not accept the officers koran to confiscate cell phones belonging to Block C detainees. "As a result of the turmoil, the detainees from Blocks B and C damaged the cell door so that it could no longer be used," said Martinus. He also denied rumors that the incident was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by the prison officials. "It is not true that there was a throwing of the Koran by the guard. What was there were the officers inspecting the books and objects in the cell," he said. He emphasized that currently the conditions of the detention house are conducive and the residents of the detention center have calmed down.
berita_id: Kekacauan pecah di pusat penahanan markas Brigade Mobile Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, Jumat (11/10/2017) sore.Para tahanan kasus teroris mengamuk dengan menerobos pintu sel penahanan, dan merusak fasilitas lain, seperti panel jendela, pagar lorong."Memang benar bahwa pada hari Jumat, 10 November, sekitar pukul 3 sore waktu Indonesia barat, ada pergolakan oleh tahanan teroris di Pusat Penahanan Cabang Salemba di Kelapa Dua," kata kepala bagian informasi publik divisi Public Relations dari Polisi Nasional Polisi Martinus Sitompul, Jumat (11/10/2017).Para tahanan mengamuk karena mereka tidak menerima petugas Alquran untuk menyita telepon seluler yang menjadi tahanan blok C."Sebagai akibat dari kekacauan, tahanan dari blok B dan C merusak pintu sel sehingga tidak bisa lagi digunakan," kata Martinus.Dia juga membantah desas -desus bahwa insiden itu dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh pejabat penjara."Tidak benar bahwa ada lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga. Apa yang ada petugas yang memeriksa buku -buku dan benda -benda di dalam sel," katanya.Dia menekankan bahwa saat ini kondisi rumah penahanan kondusif dan penduduk Pusat Penahanan telah tenang.

berita: The riot occurred at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters Detention Center, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, Friday (10/11) afternoon. A number of buildings were damaged. So far there are two versions of the cause of the event. Which one is true? The first version is circulating on social media. It was stated that the detainees who were charged with terrorism cases were angry to hear the news that there were guards who were suspected of harassing the Al-Qur'an and the books of the clerics belonging to the detainees. "Densus and the warden arrogantly entered the Ikhwan's room and the Koran was stepped on by Brimob, the warden and Densus finally caused the ikhwans to go on a rampage and destroy the Brimob mako detention room, the current situation is still tense..." The excerpt was released on social media as reported by from Panjimas. The second version came from the Head of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Public Relations Division, Kombes Martinus Sitompul. According to him, the issue of harassment of the Qur'an is a hoax. "It is not true that there was a throwing of the Koran by the guard officers, there were officers conducting an examination of the books and objects in the cell. Currently the condition of the detention house is conducive and the residents of the detention center are calm," he said as written by Detik. . The head of the Mobile Brigade Corps, Inspector General Murad Ismail, said the same thing. He said it was not true that there was throwing of the Koran. "Hoax," he said. According to Rikwanto, the reason is that there are prisoners who do not accept being examined and provoke a commotion. Rikwanto explained that after Friday prayers, the prisoners were put into their respective cells. While carrying out these activities, the Densus 88 team conducted a search. There are 4 pieces of HP found. "Four cellphones were found, belonging to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, and Jumali," he said. One of the detainees did not accept the search and made provocations. "It is true that with the inspection activity, one of the prisoners did not accept it and provoked the officers with various words, then some members were provoked by their words and there were prisoners who were takbir loudly so that they provoked the prisoners of the next block," he explained. Which version is correct? What is certain is that due to the riots, a number of facilities were damaged by the prisoners. "The prison cell door was broken into, the gate of the block hallway, the window panes (in block C and block B)," said Rikwanto. [wjd] THE HOAX VERSION OF THE QUESTION OF BURNING THE QURAN, TURNED OUT FOR THE SENTENCES OF SLUUT, CLEARLY NOT ABOUT WHO THE CURRENT. They belonged to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, and Jumali," he said. detikcom notes, they are convicts of terrorism cases. One of the detainees did not accept the search. According to Rikwanto (Seconds) pic.twitter.com/J8ikZQL2wC — Ary Prasetyo (@Aryprasetyo85) November 11, 2017 Even though it was clear that there was no rioting caused by the burning of the Qur'an.. Who was the first to make a fuss about this.. you can see above.. there are 2 groups, one wants to straighten out, one wants to lead an opinion that focuses on the burning of the Qur'an! ! - Hoax cases like this are dangerous - see the original chronology There was a commotion at the terrorist detention house at the Police Mobile Brigade Headquarters, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Friday (10/11/2017) evening. The commotion began when Detachment 88 officers conducted a sweep of the prisoners' cells and confiscated a number of cell phones. "Detachment officers carried out a search and found four cellphones belonging to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, and Jumali," said Head of the Public Information Bureau of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Brigadier General Pol Rikwanto in a written statement, Friday night. The confiscation of the cell phone made one of the inmates disapprove and provoked a commotion. He provoked the officers by issuing provocative remarks. The action succeeded in provoking the reactions of officers and detainees in other blocks. Riots are inevitable. Resistance was carried out by the prisoners against the officers, resulting in damage to the prison facilities, such as the door of the prison cell being broken and the glass breaking. The picket members fired shots upwards as a warning. "Until now the atmosphere has been eased by the Densus picket. After that, the members are on standby at the picket while waiting for developments," said Rikwanto. However, there are still prisoners who make realize provocations. Furthermore, the detention center coordinated with the Brimob Police to back up security at the Mako Brimob detention center

The Surabaya City government continues to carry out dot candy raids that indicate drugs. There are three sub-district points that are mobilized by the Surabaya City Satpol PP marketer to raid the green colored candy. They are Genteng District, Rungkut District and Sawahan District. The Head of Sawahan District of Surabaya City, Yunus said that raids had been carried out at three school points. "We raided SDN Pakis I, II, and IX on Jalan Pakistirtosari. The result was 20 teats," said Yunus. The candy pacifiers are suspected to contain drugs. Physically, the candy does not look like drugs but looks like ordinary candy. "Those who sell it at street vendors around the school are immediately secured. We secure them and take them to the sub-district office," said Yunus. Not only pacifiers, but in the food and beverage raids at a number of elementary schools in Sawahan, a number of hard candies were also found, namely candy containing formaldehyde which is dangerous if consumed by children. "For hard candy, there are 33 seeds and 17 packs of hard candy in tablet form. We also secure that," said Yunus
berita_id: Pemerintah Kota Surabaya terus melakukan serangan permen dot yang menunjukkan obat -obatan.Ada tiga poin sub-distrik yang dimobilisasi oleh pemasar Surabaya City Satpol PP untuk menyerang permen berwarna hijau.Mereka adalah Distrik Genteng, Distrik Rungkut dan Distrik Sawahan.Kepala distrik Sawahan di Kota Surabaya, Yunus mengatakan bahwa serangan telah dilakukan di tiga titik sekolah."Kami menggerebek Sdn Pakis I, II, dan IX di Jalan Pakistirtosari. Hasilnya adalah 20 dadah," kata Yunus.Permen dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Secara fisik, permen itu tidak terlihat seperti obat -obatan tetapi terlihat seperti permen biasa."Mereka yang menjualnya di pedagang kaki lima di sekitar sekolah segera diamankan. Kami mengamankannya dan membawanya ke kantor sub-distrik," kata Yunus.Tidak hanya dot, tetapi dalam serangan makanan dan minuman di sejumlah sekolah dasar di Sawahan, sejumlah permen keras juga ditemukan, yaitu permen yang mengandung formaldehida yang berbahaya jika dikonsumsi oleh anak -anak."Untuk permen keras, ada 33 biji dan 17 bungkus permen keras dalam bentuk tablet. Kami juga mengamankannya," kata Yunus

berita: Behind the boom of Pokemon GO there is always controversy that accompanies it. Some even made things worse by circulating hoax issues that the games were cornering a certain group. There is news that says that Pokemon when interpreted means "I am Jewish" in Syriac. This case began around 2001, the Iraqi government strictly prohibited the showing of Pokemon cartoons because they had forbidden language meanings, including the names of monsters in Pokemon. Quoting from various sources, in Syriac or Syriac, Pokemon means "I am Jewish", while Pikachu means "Be a Jew", and Charmander means "God is weak". You believe? However, many have denied the accusations. Because, there is no definite evidence that Pokemon if interpreted has a meaning that is considered insulting to Islam. So what does Pokemon demonstrate really mean? In fact, Pokemon GO is nothing more than adorable Animals. Reporting from Pokemondb.net, Pokemon and the names of the existing monsters are a combination of Pocket Monster which means pocket monster. In a broader sense, it shows that Pokemon monsters are so small that they can be put in a pocket. Pikachu is the most popular monster in Pokemon and consists of two words, namely Pika and Chu. Pika means mouse, while Chu comes from Japanese which means to squeak. As we know, Pikachu is similar to a mouse. Charmander also consists of two words, namely Cha which means burning, and Salamander which means amphibious lizard. So, Charmander is an amphibious lizard that can burn. So, you better find out the truth first, check various sources, before deciding to share information. Share this article so that your friends are not affected by Hoax news that develops and corners certain religions. Make sure you surf smartly with Loop Apps which you can access without limits.
berita_id: Di balik ledakan Pokemon pergi, selalu ada kontroversi yang menyertainya.Beberapa bahkan membuat segalanya lebih buruk dengan beredar masalah tipuan yang membuat game memojokkan kelompok tertentu.Ada berita yang mengatakan bahwa Pokemon ketika ditafsirkan berarti "Saya Yahudi" di Syria.Kasus ini dimulai sekitar tahun 2001, pemerintah Irak secara ketat melarang menunjukkan kartun Pokemon karena mereka memiliki makna bahasa yang dilarang, termasuk nama -nama monster di Pokemon.Mengutip dari berbagai sumber, di Syria atau Syria, Pokemon berarti "Saya Yahudi", sementara Pikachu berarti "menjadi orang Yahudi", dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Anda percaya?Namun, banyak yang membantah tuduhan itu.Karena, tidak ada bukti pasti bahwa Pokemon jika ditafsirkan memiliki makna yang dianggap menghina Islam.Jadi apa arti Pokemon yang sebenarnya ditunjukkan?Faktanya, Pokemon Go tidak lebih dari hewan yang menggemaskan.Pelaporan dari Pokemondb.net, Pokemon dan nama -nama monster yang ada adalah kombinasi monster saku yang berarti monster saku.Dalam arti yang lebih luas, ini menunjukkan bahwa monster Pokemon sangat kecil sehingga dapat dimasukkan ke dalam saku.Pikachu adalah monster paling populer di Pokemon dan terdiri dari dua kata, yaitu Pika dan Chu.Pika berarti tikus, sementara Chu berasal dari bahasa Jepang yang berarti mencicit.Seperti yang kita ketahui, Pikachu mirip dengan mouse.Charmander juga terdiri dari dua kata, yaitu Cha yang berarti membakar, dan salamander yang berarti kadal amfibi.Jadi, Charmander adalah kadal amfibi yang bisa terbakar.Jadi, Anda lebih baik mencari tahu kebenarannya terlebih dahulu, periksa berbagai sumber, sebelum memutuskan untuk berbagi informasi.Bagikan artikel ini sehingga teman -teman Anda tidak terpengaruh oleh berita tipuan yang mengembangkan dan menyentuh agama -agama tertentu.Pastikan Anda berselancar dengan cerdas dengan aplikasi loop yang dapat Anda akses tanpa batas.

berita: Catfish is a fish that lives in fresh avert water, besides being a catfish farm fish, it also usually lives in lakes, swamps, muddy water and rivers. Catfish has a special characteristic in the form of a fairly long mustache and dark skin such as brown, gray to black. This fish is a very familiar fish, almost every food stall provides a menu of catfish. Most people like to consume catfish because of its delicious taste, soft texture, nutritional content and economical price. However, others prefer to avoid catfish because of the assumption that catfish are dirty and not good for health. Which one do you like or avoid? To be clear, let's learn more about what content is in catfish. Worried about the dangers of catfish for health Catfish contain mercury? In this modern era technology is increasingly advanced but the environmental conditions are increasingly neglected with the amount of environmental pollution. Almost all fish contain mercury, which is a substance that can harm your nervous system. But you don't need to worry because you can still eat catfish, except for catfish that grow on high mercury contamination. Most research reveals that catfish is a fish that contains very little mercury. The environmental supervisory agency also stated that catfish is a safe fish for consumption. Catfish contains many bacteria that are harmful to health? Catfish are fish that can breed in dirty and low oxygen waters. There are even catfish farmers who place catfish ponds around the chicken coop. He did this because catfish are fish that can consume chicken manure and even human waste, making it easier for livestock business. This situation allows catfish to contain a lot of bacteria. Some of the bacteria commonly found in catfish are E.coli, Shigella and Salmonella, these bacteria can be removed by proper processing. Make sure you wash the catfish thoroughly and process it with proper heating because the bacteria on catfish can die from heating. Apart from these concerns, catfish have more nutritional content that is very beneficial for your health. Cancer Many catfish cultivators use dirty ponds such as under chicken or pig coops, remember catfish are also animals that consume waste and can live in various fields. and mud. Why catfish can cause cancer, following the "danger of cancer catfish" which is very dangerous Catfish live in very dirty ponds Catfish are fish that have very high immune systems, can live in very dirty environments and consume waste. Even to make it easier, many catfish farmers breed catfish under chicken coops. Can you imagine the bacteria that he consumes. Waste Consumption Like the danger of lizard meat, catfish is a fish that can consume waste (tai) from livestock, it is very easy to breed catfish, right? this is what causes it to be very dangerous because it is contaminated with bacteria. From the two characteristics above, both cages and consumption patterns of catfish, it is a type of animal that is very dangerous if raised in dirty media and with an improper diet. Benefits of catfish for health If catfish are bred cleanly, of course the dangers of catfish for health can be avoided and will not be dangerous if we consume. Helps brain development The brain is the central regulator of most systems in our body, it regulates thought, behavior, movement and homeostatic functions of the body such as pulse, heart rate, body temperature and fluid balance in the body. Given the important role of the brain in our bodies, we should be able to provide the best intake for our brains. In catfish contained omega-3 and vitamin A which is very good for our brain development. In addition, catfish also contains high protein which consists of more than 25 amino acids that play an important role in the process of sending messages from one brain cell to another. Good for heart health Good for the nervous system Helps weight loss diet Helps the wound healing process Helps maintain healthy bones and teeth Helps maintain blood pressure Tips for choosing fresh catfish Choose catfish whose skin is not moldy Catfish meat when pressed hard does not break No bad smell Catfish eyes clear, protruding or convex red catfish gills Catfish fins and skin are not easily torn Tips for healthy catfish processing Clean and wash catfish thoroughly under running water Process until cooked at the right heat to kill any bacteria that may be present If you avoid cholesterol it is better Process catfish by steaming / boiling and don't fry

berita: California - In recent days a number of complaints from iPhone 6 Plus users have enlivened the virtual world. The new 5.5-inch smartphone from Apple is reported to be easy to bend if it is stored in a trouser pocket for too long. Suddenly this news made Apple the monthly on various social media. Not only users, some of Apple's competitors did not waste this moment to 'beat up' the company bearing the bitten apple logo. And now Apple has finally spoken. According to a report published on the Wall Street Journal page, Apple representatives have explained that the issue of the iPhone 6 Plus being easy to bend is exaggerated. Apple claims that the company has so far only received 9 user complaints out of 10 million units of the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus that have been sold. This means, the defects on the iPhone 6 Plus do not occur in all units, but only a small part. "With normal use, a curved iPhone 6 Plus would be extremely rare," an Apple representative said. In addition, Jon Fort, editor of the news site CNBC also mentioned that Apple representatives have confirmed that only a small percentage of fallible consumers are experiencing the iPhone 6 Plus curved issue. It was also explained that the actual body frame of the iPhone 6 Plus is strong enough and meets Apple's standards. The new iPhones are steel/titanium-infused to strengthen a number of stress locations and use the strongest type of glass in the industry, an Apple representative said. The Business Insider page noted, this is Apple's fastest response in responding to oblique issues circulating wildly on the internet. Previously, Apple had always been 'ignorant' to various oblique issues that befell their products. Jakarta – Apple received bad news about its newest product, iPhone 6 Plus. This Apple-made phablet device is complained of by some users because it has a frail body that easily bends when inserted into the front pocket of the pants. This report comes from a user on Forum Macrumors named Hanzon, who said he put his iPhone 6 Plus in his front pants pocket for a long time, which is about 4 hours. Hanzon admitted that he did not take out his iPhone 6 Plus during his 4 hours of activity. And when he then took out his new smartphone, Hanzon was surprised to find his beloved iPhone 6 Plus curved. Seeing the increasing number of reports, a user tested the flexibility of the iPhone 6 Plus and uploaded it on YouTube. As a comparison, he also tested the flexibility of another smartphone, namely the Samsung Galaxy Note 3. In the video, you can see how the iPhone 6 Plus turns out to be very easy to bend. The user who posted the video also said that prior to testing his iPhone 6 Plus, it was already looking a little warped. The weak spot seems to be on the left side, just below the volume buttons. This curved body problem seems to only occur on the iPhone 6 Plus. While for the iPhone 6 which has a size of 4.7 inches, there are no reports of this curved body problem
berita_id: California - Dalam beberapa hari terakhir sejumlah keluhan dari iPhone 6 Plus pengguna telah menghidupkan dunia virtual.Smartphone 5,5 inci baru dari Apple dilaporkan mudah ditekuk jika disimpan dalam saku celana panjang terlalu lama.Tiba -tiba berita ini menjadikan Apple bulanan di berbagai media sosial.Tidak hanya pengguna, beberapa pesaing Apple tidak menyia -nyiakan momen ini untuk 'memukuli' perusahaan yang membawa logo Apple yang digigit.Dan sekarang Apple akhirnya berbicara.Menurut sebuah laporan yang diterbitkan di halaman Wall Street Journal, perwakilan Apple telah menjelaskan bahwa masalah iPhone 6 Plus mudah ditekuk dibesar -besarkan.Apple mengklaim bahwa perusahaan sejauh ini hanya menerima 9 keluhan pengguna dari 10 juta unit iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus yang telah terjual.Ini berarti, cacat pada iPhone 6 Plus tidak terjadi di semua unit, tetapi hanya sebagian kecil."Dengan penggunaan normal, iPhone 6 Plus melengkung akan sangat jarang," kata seorang perwakilan Apple.Selain itu, Jon Fort, editor situs berita CNBC juga menyebutkan bahwa Perwakilan Apple telah mengkonfirmasi bahwa hanya sebagian kecil konsumen yang dapat berubah yang mengalami masalah iPhone 6 plus melengkung.Juga dijelaskan bahwa kerangka tubuh yang sebenarnya dari iPhone 6 Plus cukup kuat dan memenuhi standar Apple.Iphone baru ini diresapi baja/titanium untuk memperkuat sejumlah lokasi stres dan menggunakan jenis kaca terkuat di industri ini, kata seorang perwakilan Apple.Halaman Business Insider mencatat, ini adalah respons tercepat Apple dalam menanggapi masalah miring yang beredar liar di internet.Sebelumnya, Apple selalu 'bodoh' untuk berbagai masalah miring yang menimpa produk mereka.Jakarta - Apple menerima kabar buruk tentang produk terbarunya, iPhone 6 Plus.Perangkat phablet buatan Apple ini dikeluhkan oleh beberapa pengguna karena memiliki badan lemah yang dengan mudah ditekuk saat dimasukkan ke dalam saku depan celana.Laporan ini berasal dari pengguna di forum macrumors bernama Hanzon, yang mengatakan ia menempatkan iPhone 6 -nya Plus di saku celana depannya untuk waktu yang lama, yaitu sekitar 4 jam.Hanzon mengakui bahwa dia tidak mengeluarkan iPhone 6 Plus selama 4 jam aktivitasnya.Dan ketika dia kemudian mengeluarkan smartphone barunya, Hanzon terkejut menemukan iPhone 6 Plus yang dicintainya.Melihat meningkatnya jumlah laporan, pengguna menguji fleksibilitas iPhone 6 Plus dan mengunggahnya di YouTube.Sebagai perbandingan, ia juga menguji fleksibilitas smartphone lain, yaitu Samsung Galaxy Note 3. Dalam video, Anda dapat melihat bagaimana iPhone 6 Plus ternyata sangat mudah untuk ditekuk.Pengguna yang memposting video juga mengatakan bahwa sebelum menguji iPhone 6 Plus -nya, itu sudah terlihat sedikit bengkok.Titik lemah tampaknya berada di sisi kiri, tepat di bawah tombol volume.Masalah tubuh melengkung ini tampaknya hanya terjadi pada iPhone 6 Plus.Sedangkan untuk iPhone 6 yang memiliki ukuran 4,7 inci, tidak ada laporan masalah tubuh melengkung ini

berita: Barong Reog Ponorogo and Hisan Naga on gamelan are burned general at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. The arson incident reportedly occurred on October 20 last. The information circulated among journalists from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemenlu). "The Ministry of Foreign Affairs has contacted the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao and is being handled according to procedures," said Public Relations staff of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Opi Sudarma, when asked about the truth of the news, Friday (10/30). This news is very surprising considering that the object is Indonesian culture. In fact, a neighboring country, Malaysia, claims it as their culture. Reportedly, the reason for the burning is related to idols and demons. It is not clear whether the perpetrators are Indonesian Nationals (WNI) or Filipinos.
berita_id: Barong Reog Ponorogo dan Hisan Naga di Gamelan dibakar Jenderal di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Insiden pembakaran dilaporkan terjadi pada 20 Oktober lalu.Informasi yang diedarkan di antara jurnalis dari Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemenlu)."Kementerian Luar Negeri telah menghubungi Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao dan sedang ditangani sesuai dengan prosedur," kata staf Hubungan Masyarakat dari Kementerian Luar Negeri, OPI Sudarma, ketika ditanya tentang kebenaran berita, Jumat (10/30).Berita ini sangat mengejutkan mengingat objeknya adalah budaya Indonesia.Bahkan, negara tetangga, Malaysia, mengklaimnya sebagai budaya mereka.Dilaporkan, alasan pembakaran terkait dengan berhala dan setan.Tidak jelas apakah pelaku adalah warga negara Indonesia (WNI) atau orang Filipina.

berita: In a mouthful of catfish meat, there are 3000 cancer cells. That's a chain of news circulating on social networks that call catfish the dirtiest fish. This news is 100 percent fake. Facts say catfish is low in cholesterol. Catfish circulating in the market are generally cultivated in ponds, which should be controlled so that they are free from pollution. Currently there is no research that states that eating catfish fact can trigger cancer, said Dr. Dradjat R Suardi, SpB(K)Onk, a cancer expert from the Indonesian Oncology Association.
berita_id: Dalam seteguk daging ikan lele, ada 3000 sel kanker.Itu adalah rantai berita yang beredar di jejaring sosial yang menyebut ikan kucing paling kotor.Berita ini 100 persen palsu.Fakta mengatakan ikan lele rendah kolesterol.Ikan lele yang beredar di pasar umumnya dibudidayakan di kolam, yang harus dikendalikan sehingga mereka bebas dari polusi.Saat ini tidak ada penelitian yang menyatakan bahwa makan fakta lele dapat memicu kanker, kata Dr. Dradjat R Suardi, SPB (K) Onk, seorang ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia.

Reportedly, the reason for the burning is related to idols and demons. It is not clear whether the perpetrators are Indonesian Nationals (WNI) or Filipinos.
berita_id: Davao Barong Reog Ponorogo dan Hisan Naga di Gamelan dibakar di Kementerian Umum Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Insiden pembakaran dilaporkan terjadi pada 20 Oktober lalu.Informasi yang diedarkan di antara jurnalis dari Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemenlu)."Kementerian Luar Negeri telah menghubungi Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao dan sedang ditangani sesuai dengan prosedur," kata staf Hubungan Masyarakat dari Kementerian Luar Negeri, OPI Sudarma, ketika ditanya tentang kebenaran berita, Jumat (10/30).Berita ini sangat mengejutkan mengingat objeknya adalah budaya Indonesia.Bahkan, negara tetangga, Malaysia, mengklaimnya sebagai budaya mereka.Dilaporkan, alasan pembakaran terkait dengan berhala dan setan.Tidak jelas apakah pelaku adalah warga negara Indonesia (WNI) atau orang Filipina.

berita: Masses from various regions on Thursday (1/12/2016) night began to visit the National Monument area, Central Jakarta, to prepare for the prayer together on Friday (2/12). A resident of Parung Panjang, Bogor Regency, Fajhulah, who was met in the Monas area admitted that he had arrived with eight colleagues at 22.00 WIB. However, the plan to enter the Monas area was canceled because the public prayer area was not allowed to be entered by the public until Friday (2/12) morning. People who came to Monas on Thursday night also came from other areas outside Greater Jakarta such as Tasikmalaya and Garut, West Java. The Monas area is currently sterile from the general public to prepare for the prayer together. In addition to security officers, some people who enter are only those with an interest in preparing event facilities. Several vehicles to provide drinking water, ablution water, medical equipment, security system and tactical vehicles appeared to arrive. A pedestal for communal prayer and congregational Friday prayers has also been held, complete with an ablution area that surrounds Monas. Security is carried out strictly by a joint apparatus of the TNI, Polri, and the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government. The joint prayer event on December 2, 2016 is planned to be held at Monas starting Friday morning with the reading of dhikr, prayers, and ending with Friday prayers in congregation.
berita_id: Massa dari berbagai daerah pada hari Kamis (1/12/2016) Malam mulai mengunjungi Area Monumen Nasional, Jakarta Tengah, untuk mempersiapkan doa bersama pada hari Jumat (2/12).Seorang penduduk Parung Panjang, Bogor Regency, Fajhulah, yang bertemu di daerah Monas mengakui bahwa ia telah tiba dengan delapan rekan kerja di 22.00 WIB.Namun, rencana untuk memasuki area Monas dibatalkan karena area doa publik tidak diizinkan untuk dimasukkan oleh publik sampai Jumat (2/12) pagi.Orang -orang yang datang ke Monas pada Kamis malam juga datang dari daerah lain di luar Greater Jakarta seperti Tasikmalaya dan Garut, Jawa Barat.Area Monas saat ini steril dari masyarakat umum untuk mempersiapkan doa bersama.Selain petugas keamanan, beberapa orang yang masuk hanyalah mereka yang tertarik untuk mempersiapkan fasilitas acara.Beberapa kendaraan untuk menyediakan air minum, air wudhu, peralatan medis, sistem keamanan dan kendaraan taktis tampaknya tiba.Alas untuk doa komunal dan doa Jumat jemaat juga telah diadakan, lengkap dengan area wudhu yang mengelilingi monas.Keamanan dilakukan secara ketat oleh peralatan bersama TNI, Polri, dan pemerintah provinsi DKI Jakarta.Acara doa bersama pada tanggal 2 Desember 2016 direncanakan akan diadakan di Monas mulai Jumat pagi dengan membaca Dhikr, doa, dan berakhir dengan doa Jumat di jemaat.

berita: A chain message about vigilance against toothbrushes made from pig bristles is spreading in the community. because there is the word bristle on the packaging of a global toothbrush brand. The message is not really new. The message was spread a year ago, but now it's crowded again. Let's check the toothbrush, if it says Bristle on the packaging, it means that the toothbrush contains pig hair. Bristle means pig hair. As soon as the sound of the message fragments spread again through the chat application. Not only on toothbrushes, the message maker also suggested that people check the bread brushes. He said that the brush usually says Bristle, Pure Bristle, 100% China Bristle. As with other hoax messages, the appeal was accompanied by a request to share the message with family and friends in the group so that more people would be spared from non-halal products. It turned out that the informant had misunderstood. Maybe, when he wrote the message, he had not had coffee. This is because the term bristle is not only used for sea urchins. According to the official website of the Indonesian Ulema Council (MUI), the term bristle is lexically a short, stiff hair, and fiber. So, all stiff hair fibers can be called bristle. In the industrial world, bristle is indeed used for making brushes or brushes (including toothbrushes). However, not all of them come from sea urchins. Bristle for brushes and brushes can be sourced from animal hair. Be it pigs, goats, horses, or camels. Apart from animal hair, for industrial purposes, bristle can also be made from synthetic materials, either nylon or silicone. Plant fiber has also been used as a brush or brush material. The fiber is commonly known as palm fiber. The MUI has firmly stated that if a brush or brush uses pork bristles, it is illegal. However, producers usually write down in ampere detail the raw material used for fur. Usually, for brushes or brushes with boar bristle material, it is written boar bristle brush. Boar itself is an English term that refers to a wild boar. Recognizing the raw material for a brush or toothbrush is not easy. However, you can determine whether the fur comes from animal hair or synthetic material by slightly burning it. If you smell hair, you can be sure that the fur comes from an animal. If it is made of synthetic material or coconut fiber, the smell will be different. Referring to a number of sources, the use of bristles on toothbrushes was first carried out by the Chinese in the 15th century. At that time, the feathers on the pig's neck were used. The brush was later brought to the European market. However, Europeans prefer horsehair because it is softer. The first modern toothbrush was introduced by William Addis in England around 1780. The handle was carved from cow bone. And, the fur is still made of sea urchin, only one big row. Furthermore, in 1844, a toothbrush with three rows of bristles was designed. Modern technology has finally found nylon can be used as bristles on brushes. The technology was introduced in 1938. Since 1950, the toothbrush industry has mostly used nylon bristles.
berita_id: Pesan rantai tentang kewaspadaan terhadap sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi menyebar di masyarakat.Karena ada kata bulu pada kemasan merek sikat gigi global.Pesannya tidak terlalu baru.Pesan itu tersebar setahun yang lalu, tapi sekarang sudah ramai lagi.Mari kita periksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan berbulu pada kemasan, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi rambut babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi.Segera setelah suara fragmen pesan menyebar lagi melalui aplikasi obrolan.Tidak hanya pada sikat gigi, pembuat pesan juga menyarankan agar orang memeriksa sikat roti.Dia mengatakan bahwa sikat biasanya mengatakan bulu, bulu murni, 100% China Bristle.Seperti halnya pesan tipuan lainnya, banding disertai dengan permintaan untuk berbagi pesan dengan keluarga dan teman-teman dalam grup sehingga lebih banyak orang akan terhindar dari produk non-halal.Ternyata informan telah disalahpahami.Mungkin, ketika dia menulis pesan itu, dia tidak minum kopi.Ini karena istilah bulu tidak hanya digunakan untuk bulu babi.Menurut situs web resmi Dewan Ulama Indonesia (MUI), istilah Bristle secara leksikal rambut pendek, kaku, dan serat.Jadi, semua serat rambut kaku dapat disebut bulu.Di dunia industri, Bristle memang digunakan untuk membuat sikat atau sikat (termasuk sikat gigi).Namun, tidak semua dari mereka berasal dari bulu babi.BRISTLE UNTUK Sikat dan kuas dapat bersumber dari rambut hewani.Baik itu babi, kambing, kuda, atau unta.Terlepas dari rambut hewan, untuk keperluan industri, bulu juga dapat dibuat dari bahan sintetis, baik nilon atau silikon.Serat tanaman juga telah digunakan sebagai bahan sikat atau sikat.Serat umumnya dikenal sebagai serat palem.MUI telah dengan kuat menyatakan bahwa jika kuas atau kuas menggunakan bulu babi, itu ilegal.Namun, produsen biasanya menuliskan dengan detail ampere bahan baku yang digunakan untuk bulu.Biasanya, untuk kuas atau kuas dengan bahan bulu babi, itu ditulis sikat bulu babi.Babi itu sendiri adalah istilah bahasa Inggris yang mengacu pada babi hutan.Mengenali bahan baku untuk sikat atau sikat gigi tidak mudah.Namun, Anda dapat menentukan apakah bulu itu berasal dari rambut hewani atau bahan sintetis dengan sedikit membakarnya.Jika Anda mencium bau rambut, Anda dapat yakin bahwa bulu itu berasal dari binatang.Jika terbuat dari bahan sintetis atau serat kelapa, baunya akan berbeda.Mengacu pada sejumlah sumber, penggunaan bulu pada sikat gigi pertama kali dilakukan oleh Cina pada abad ke -15.Pada saat itu, bulu -bulu di leher babi digunakan.Sikat itu kemudian dibawa ke pasar Eropa.Namun, orang Eropa lebih suka kuda karena lebih lembut.Sikat gigi modern pertama diperkenalkan oleh William Addis di Inggris sekitar tahun 1780. Pegangan itu diukir dari tulang sapi.Dan, bulunya masih terbuat dari landak laut, hanya satu baris besar.Selain itu, pada tahun 1844, sikat gigi dengan tiga baris bulu dirancang.Teknologi modern akhirnya menemukan nilon dapat digunakan sebagai bulu pada kuas.Teknologi ini diperkenalkan pada tahun 1938. Sejak 1950, industri sikat gigi sebagian besar menggunakan bulu nilon.

berita: Not yet finished the iPhone 5 was thrown into the market, Apple already has an idea for the 6th generation of their smartphone. Reportedly, Apple will introduce a new product with a curved touch screen democratic next year. The Californian company has contacted iPad and iPhone screen suppliers, Lens Technology, G-Tech and Fuji Crystal, and will supply them with equipment for polishing the indentation of the glass. The use of a touch screen with curved glass, according to some users feels more comfortable during phone calls. The indentation also protects the screen from scratches when the smartphone or tablet is placed face down. Corning, which provides scratch-resistant screens for a number of smartphones, has developed a curved version of their popular Gorilla Glass display. but it is not clear if this screen will be used in future Apple products. This is not the first time the design has been used on a smartphone device. Google and Samsung also provide the Nexus S smartphone with a concave screen. Dell has also played around with a curved display on the Venue Pro smartphone which has a Windows phone platform. Although the popularity of the concave screen seems to be increasing, some observers see the design as a temporary trend.
berita_id: Belum selesai iPhone 5 dilemparkan ke pasar, Apple sudah memiliki ide untuk generasi ke -6 dari smartphone mereka.Dilaporkan, Apple akan memperkenalkan produk baru dengan layar sentuh melengkung Demokrat tahun depan.Perusahaan California telah menghubungi pemasok layar iPad dan iPhone, teknologi lensa, G-Tech dan Fuji Crystal, dan akan memasok mereka dengan peralatan untuk memoles lekukan kaca.Penggunaan layar sentuh dengan kaca melengkung, menurut beberapa pengguna merasa lebih nyaman selama panggilan telepon.Indentasi juga melindungi layar dari goresan ketika smartphone atau tablet ditempatkan menghadap ke bawah.Corning, yang menyediakan layar tahan gores untuk sejumlah smartphone, telah mengembangkan versi melengkung dari tampilan kaca gorila populer mereka.Tetapi tidak jelas apakah layar ini akan digunakan dalam produk Apple di masa depan.Ini bukan pertama kalinya desain digunakan pada perangkat smartphone.Google dan Samsung juga menyediakan smartphone Nexus dengan layar cekung.Dell juga bermain -main dengan layar melengkung di smartphone Venue Pro yang memiliki platform Windows Phone.Meskipun popularitas layar cekung tampaknya meningkat, beberapa pengamat melihat desain sebagai tren sementara.

berita: Dozens of terrorism detainees at the Salemba detention center branch of the Mobile Brigade Headquarters Kelapa Dua went on a rampage Friday (10/11). This is call thought to have occurred because of the mobile phone raid on terrorism detainees. However, there is information circulating that there is a throwing of the Koran in the prison. There is a video circulating in the video that shows dozens of prisoners screaming. They came out of the holding cell. Several prisoners were seen clenching their fists. Screams were heard. In another video, several prisoners can be seen kicking at the cell door, some are carrying a wooden door that has been released. Some of the prisoners wore t-shirts. From outside the cell, a number of police officers were seen trying to calm the angry prisoners. It is possible that the video came from the prisoners' cellphones. Because, the angle of the video is in the detention cell. Not from outside the cell at the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters. Head of the General Information Section (Kabagpenum) of the National Police Divhumas Kombespol Martinus Sitompul said that the issue of the throwing of the Koran in the detention center was not true. "However, the cause of the riot was only the raid on cellphones owned by prisoners of terrorism cases," he explained. Initially, the officers examined the objects and books that were in the detention cell. That's when the prisoners went on a rampage because some of them had cellphones. During the rampage, the cell door was damaged, the turmoil was only in Blocks B and C," he explained. According to him, the current condition of the prison is conducive. The prisoners are already in a calm condition. "It doesn't continue, everything is safe," explained the former Head of the Polda Metro Jaya Head of Public Relations. It should be noted that most of the detainees in terrorism cases are being held at the Salemba Rutan at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters branch, Kelapa Dua. In fact, there is Amir Jamaah Ansharut Daulah (JAD) Aman Abdurrahman, who some time ago was immediately picked up by the Anti-Terror Detachment 88 when he was released from the Nusakambangan White Sand Prison.
berita_id: Lusinan tahanan terorisme di Cabang Pusat Penahanan Salemba dari Markas Besar Brigade Mobile Kelapa Dua mengamuk Jumat (10/11).Ini adalah panggilan yang dianggap terjadi karena serangan ponsel pada tahanan terorisme.Namun, ada informasi yang beredar bahwa ada lemparan Alquran di penjara.Ada video yang beredar dalam video yang menunjukkan lusinan tahanan berteriak.Mereka keluar dari sel penahan.Beberapa tahanan terlihat mengepal tinju mereka.Jeritan terdengar.Dalam video lain, beberapa tahanan terlihat menendang di pintu sel, beberapa membawa pintu kayu yang telah dilepaskan.Beberapa tahanan mengenakan t-shirt.Dari luar sel, sejumlah petugas polisi terlihat berusaha menenangkan para tahanan yang marah.Mungkin saja video itu berasal dari ponsel tahanan.Karena, sudut video ada di sel penahanan.Bukan dari luar sel di markas perintah brigade seluler.Kepala Bagian Informasi Umum (Kabagpenum) dari Kepolisian Nasional divhumas Kombespol Martinus Sitompul mengatakan bahwa masalah pelemparan Alquran di pusat penahanan tidak benar."Namun, penyebab kerusuhan hanyalah serangan di ponsel yang dimiliki oleh para tahanan kasus terorisme," jelasnya.Awalnya, para petugas memeriksa benda dan buku yang ada di sel penahanan.Saat itulah para tahanan mengamuk karena beberapa dari mereka memiliki ponsel.Selama mengamuk, pintu sel rusak, kekacauan itu hanya di blok B dan C, "jelasnya. Menurutnya, kondisi penjara saat ini kondusif. Para tahanan sudah dalam kondisi yang tenang." Tidak berlanjut, semuanya aman, "jelas mantan Kepala Polda yang di dalamnya, kepala detor di atas raih di atas.Cabang Markas Besar Brigade, Kelapa Dua.

berita: Stroke is a neurological disease that most often results in disability and death. Besides being ranked first among a class of neurological diseases that cause death, stroke is also one of the three main causes of death in general. These facts show that until now, stroke is still a major problem in the field of neurology and health in general. To overcome this crucial problem, a stroke prevention strategy is needed that includes preventive, rehabilitative, and promotive aspects. Actually, stroke cases have occurred long ago, this is evidenced by the existence of first aid in stroke cases based on traditional Chinese medicine with acupuncture techniques, but this technique has been forgotten, so the impact is getting bigger. As is known, people who get a STROKE attack, all the blood in the body will flow very fast to the blood vessels in the brain. If the rescue activity is given a little too late, then the blood vessels in the brain will not be strong enough to withstand the rush of blood flowing and will soon burst little by little. First Aid In Stroke (By bleeding on each fingertip and earlobe tip). There is one best way to provide first aid to a person who has a stroke. This method in addition to saving the life of the sufferer, also does not cause any side effects. This first aid is guaranteed to be an EMERGENCY help that can be 100% successful. In dealing with this situation, the family should not panic, but must be calm. The patient must remain in the original place where he fell (eg in the bathroom, bedroom, or anywhere else). DO NOT MOVE !!! because by moving the patient from the original place will accelerate the splitting of the fine blood vessels in the brain. The patient must be helped to take a good sitting position so as not to fall again, and at that time bleeding can be done. It's best to use a SYSTEM, but if there is none, then a SEWING NEEDLE / PIN needle / safety pin can be used by first sterilizing it by burning it over a fire. As soon as the needle is sterile, puncture the 10 FINGER ENDS. The puncture point is approximately 1mm from the tip patient role of the nail. Each finger is enough to be stabbed once with the hope that each finger will produce 1 drop of blood. Bleeding can also be helped by squeezing if the blood does not come out of the fingertips. In a period of approximately 10 minutes, the patient will immediately regain consciousness. If the patient's mouth looks slanted / abnormal, then the patient's BOTH EARS MUST be pulled out until they are reddish in color. After that, do 2 INSTALLING TIMES on each of the LOWER ENDS of the EARS so that 2 drops of blood come out from each end of the earlobe. Thus in a few minutes the patient's mouth will return to normal shape. After the patient's condition recovers and there are no significant abnormalities, then take the patient carefully to the nearest doctor or hospital for further help.
berita_id: Stroke adalah penyakit neurologis yang paling sering mengakibatkan kecacatan dan kematian.Selain peringkat pertama di antara kelas penyakit neurologis yang menyebabkan kematian, stroke juga merupakan salah satu dari tiga penyebab utama kematian secara umum.Fakta -fakta ini menunjukkan bahwa sampai sekarang, stroke masih merupakan masalah utama di bidang neurologi dan kesehatan secara umum.Untuk mengatasi masalah penting ini, strategi pencegahan stroke diperlukan yang mencakup aspek preventif, rehabilitasi, dan promosi.Sebenarnya, kasus stroke telah terjadi sejak lama, ini dibuktikan dengan adanya pertolongan pertama dalam kasus stroke berdasarkan obat tradisional Tiongkok dengan teknik akupunktur, tetapi teknik ini telah dilupakan, sehingga dampaknya semakin besar.Seperti diketahui, orang yang mendapatkan serangan stroke, semua darah dalam tubuh akan mengalir sangat cepat ke pembuluh darah di otak.Jika aktivitas penyelamatan diberikan sedikit terlambat, maka pembuluh darah di otak tidak akan cukup kuat untuk menahan aliran darah yang mengalir dan akan segera meledak sedikit demi sedikit.Pertolongan pertama dalam stroke (dengan pendarahan pada setiap ujung jari dan ujung telinga).Ada satu cara terbaik untuk memberikan pertolongan pertama kepada orang yang mengalami stroke.Metode ini selain menyelamatkan nyawa penderita, juga tidak menyebabkan efek samping apa pun.Pertolongan pertama ini dijamin akan menjadi bantuan darurat yang bisa 100% berhasil.Dalam berurusan dengan situasi ini, keluarga seharusnya tidak panik, tetapi harus tenang.Pasien harus tetap berada di tempat asli di mana ia jatuh (misalnya di kamar mandi, kamar tidur, atau di mana pun).JANGAN BERGERAK !!!Karena dengan memindahkan pasien dari tempat asli akan mempercepat pemisahan pembuluh darah halus di otak.Pasien harus dibantu untuk mengambil posisi duduk yang baik agar tidak jatuh lagi, dan pada saat itu pendarahan dapat dilakukan.Yang terbaik adalah menggunakan sistem, tetapi jika tidak ada, maka jarum jahit / pin pin / pin pengaman dapat digunakan dengan sterilisasi terlebih dahulu dengan membakarnya di atas api.Segera setelah jarum steril, menusuk ujung 10 jari.Titik tusukan sekitar 1mm dari ujung peran pasien kuku.Setiap jari sudah cukup untuk ditikam sekali dengan harapan bahwa setiap jari akan menghasilkan 1 tetes darah.Pendarahan juga dapat dibantu dengan meremas jika darah tidak keluar dari ujung jari.Dalam periode sekitar 10 menit, pasien akan segera mendapatkan kembali kesadaran.Jika mulut pasien terlihat miring / abnormal, maka kedua telinga pasien harus ditarik keluar sampai warnanya kemerahan.Setelah itu, lakukan 2 waktu pemasangan di masing -masing ujung bawah telinga sehingga 2 tetes darah keluar dari setiap ujung daun telinga.Jadi dalam beberapa menit mulut pasien akan kembali ke bentuk normal.Setelah kondisi pasien pulih dan tidak ada kelainan yang signifikan, kemudian bawa pasien dengan hati -hati ke dokter atau rumah sakit terdekat untuk bantuan lebih lanjut.

berita: Dream - The Muslim community was shocked by the news about a toothbrush made from pig bristles. One of the markers is the ingredient in the toothbrush, 'bristle', which is listed on the packaging. The word 'bristle' is then interpreted as 'sea urchin'. As a result, many Muslims are worried about using a toothbrush on the market. But, does 'bristle' really mean 'sea urchin'? Regarding this case, the Institute for the Study of Food, Drugs and Cosmetics, the Indonesian Ulema Council (LPPOM MUI) provided an explanation. Quoted from the halalmui.org page, LPPOM MUI explains the term 'bristle' means stiff hair or fiber. This definition refers to Webster's Dictionary, so all stiff hair, including stiff beards, palm fibers, pine leaves fall into the bristle category. In the industrial world, bristle is often used as a material for making brushes and brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle materials can come from animals such as pigs, horses, goats, or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. To emphasize what bristles are used on a toothbrush, usually the term bristle will be written in the product name. For care example, 'Boar Bristle Brush' which means 'Boar Bristle Brush. 'Boar' means 'boar' or 'boar'. If you find a toothbrush with the above sentence on the packaging, then the toothbrush is declared forbidden to use. "This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles. Toothbrushes can also use boar bristles," wrote LPPOM MUI, quoted from halalmui.org, Wednesday, November 2, 2016. However, not all toothbrushes that contain the term 'bristle' in the packaging must be made from pig bristles. There are already many manufacturers that use horse, goat, camel hair, as well as nylon and silicone fibers in their toothbrush products. "When there is no information on the source of the material, at least a simple method can be used. To determine whether it is made from animal hair or not, the method in question is to burn the material." "If it smells like burning hair or horns, it's better to leave it alone. Materials from plastic or coconut fiber don't give off that characteristic smell when burned." wrote LPPOM MUI.
berita_id: Dream - Komunitas Muslim terkejut dengan berita tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Salah satu penanda adalah bahan di sikat gigi, 'Bristle', yang tercantum pada kemasannya.Kata 'bristle' kemudian ditafsirkan sebagai 'landak laut'.Akibatnya, banyak Muslim khawatir menggunakan sikat gigi di pasaran.Tapi, apakah 'Bristle' benar -benar berarti 'landak laut'?Mengenai kasus ini, Institut untuk Studi Makanan, Obat -obatan dan Kosmetik, Dewan Ulama Indonesia (LPPOM MUI) memberikan penjelasan.Dikutip dari halaman halalmui.org, lppom mui menjelaskan istilah 'bulu' berarti rambut atau serat yang kaku.Definisi ini mengacu pada kamus Webster, jadi semua rambut kaku, termasuk janggut kaku, serat kelapa sawit, daun pinus termasuk dalam kategori bulu.Di dunia industri, bulu sering digunakan sebagai bahan untuk membuat sikat dan sikat, termasuk sikat gigi.Bahan bulu dapat berasal dari hewan seperti babi, kuda, kambing, atau serat sintetis seperti nilon dan silikon.Untuk menekankan bulu apa yang digunakan pada sikat gigi, biasanya istilah bulu akan ditulis dalam nama produk.Sebagai contoh, 'Boar Bristle Brush' yang berarti 'Boar Bristle Brush.'Babi' berarti 'babi hutan' atau 'babi hutan'.Jika Anda menemukan sikat gigi dengan kalimat di atas pada kemasan, maka sikat gigi dinyatakan dilarang digunakan."Ini berarti bahwa produk ini adalah kuas yang menggunakan bulu babi liar. Sikat gigi juga dapat menggunakan bulu babi," tulis LPPOM MUI, dikutip dari halalmui.org, Rabu, 2 November 2016. Namun, tidak semua sikat gigi yang mengandung istilah 'bristle' dalam kemasan harus dibuat dari Bristles babi.Sudah ada banyak produsen yang menggunakan kuda, kambing, rambut unta, serta serat nilon dan silikon dalam produk sikat gigi mereka."Ketika tidak ada informasi tentang sumber material, setidaknya metode sederhana dapat digunakan. Untuk menentukan apakah itu terbuat dari rambut hewani atau tidak, metode yang dimaksud adalah membakar material.""Jika baunya seperti rambut atau tanduk yang terbakar, lebih baik membiarkannya sendiri. Bahan -bahan dari plastik atau serat kelapa tidak mengeluarkan aroma khas saat dibakar."menulis lppom mui.

berita: The Traveloka application suddenly went viral on social media. Quoted from various existing sources, an invitation to uninstall the Traveloka application circulated on Twitter. This was triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. As we know, the walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday 11/11/2017, at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' mr speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. This information then spread and provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. Derianto and Ananda are two of the five outstanding Kanisius College alumni who received awards at this event. Besides the two, there were Father Magnis Suseno (a Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (a Scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). Meanwhile, Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. However, Derianto was unable to attend. "Actually, Mr. Deri (Derianto) was not present. He was on an official trip that day. So if you say Mr. Deri was there and it is said to provide support (to Ananda), he was not there," said Busyra.
berita_id: Aplikasi Traveloka tiba -tiba menjadi viral di media sosial.Dikutip dari berbagai sumber yang ada, undangan untuk menghapus pemasangan aplikasi Traveloka yang diedarkan di Twitter.Ini dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Seperti yang kita ketahui, walk out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu 11/11/2017, di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah berjalan dan pidato Mr, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Informasi ini kemudian menyebar dan memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.DeRianto dan Ananda adalah dua dari lima alumni Kanisius College yang luar biasa yang menerima penghargaan di acara ini.Selain keduanya, ada ayah Magnis Suseno (sosok Jesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (seorang pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farha).Sementara itu, manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Namun, DeRianto tidak dapat hadir."Sebenarnya, Tn. Deri (Derianto) tidak ada. Dia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi hari itu. Jadi jika Anda mengatakan Tuan Deri ada di sana dan dikatakan memberikan dukungan (kepada Ananda), dia tidak ada di sana," kata Busyra.

berita: The Surabaya City Government continues to raid pacifiers which are indicated to contain drugs. The raid on candy packaged in green targeted three sub-districts, namely Genteng District, Rungkut District, and Sawahan District. The Head of Sawahan, Surabaya City, Yunus said that the raids had been carried out on three schools. “We raided SDN Pakis I, SDN Pakis II, and germ SDN Pakis IX on Jalan Pakistirtosari. The result is 20 pacifiers," said Yunus, Tuesday (7/3/2017). The pacifier is suspected to contain drugs. Physically, the candy doesn't look like drugs, but rather like regular candy. “These candies were sold by street vendors around the school, and they were immediately confiscated. We confiscated it and took it to the sub-district office,” said Yunus. The officers who raided food and drinks at a number of elementary schools in Sawahan also found a number of hard candies. This candy is suspected to contain formaldehyde which is dangerous if consumed by children. “For hard candy, there are 33 seeds and 17 packs of hard candy in tablet form. We also confiscated it,” said Yunus.
berita_id: Pemerintah Kota Surabaya terus menyerang dot yang diindikasikan mengandung narkoba.Penggerebekan permen yang dikemas dalam warna hijau menargetkan tiga sub-distrik, yaitu Distrik Genteng, Distrik Rungkut, dan Distrik Sawahan.Kepala Sawahan, Kota Surabaya, Yunus mengatakan bahwa penggerebekan telah dilakukan di tiga sekolah."Kami menggerebek Sdn Pakis I, Sdn Pakis II, dan Germ Sdn Pakis IX di Jalan Pakistirtosari. Hasilnya adalah 20 dot," kata Yunus, Selasa (7/3/2017).Dot diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Secara fisik, permen itu tidak terlihat seperti obat -obatan, tetapi lebih seperti permen biasa."Permen ini dijual oleh pedagang kaki lima di sekitar sekolah, dan mereka segera disita. Kami menyitanya dan membawanya ke kantor sub-distrik," kata Yunus.Petugas yang menggerebek makanan dan minuman di sejumlah sekolah dasar di Sawahan juga menemukan sejumlah permen keras.Permen ini diduga mengandung formaldehyde yang berbahaya jika dikonsumsi oleh anak -anak."Untuk permen keras, ada 33 biji dan 17 bungkus permen keras dalam bentuk tablet. Kami juga menyitanya," kata Yunus.

berita: The Jabodetabek Reog Community sent an official letter to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines to ask for clarification on information on the burning of reog art tools by Indonesian Consulate General officials. "We want to get an official and written explanation, because in the previous clarification the Indonesian Consulate General confirmed the news on the pretext that the art equipment was damaged," said Secretary General of the Reog Jabodetabek (Jakarta, Bogor, Depok, Tangerang and Bekasi) associations, Agus Setiyoko, Monday ( 2/11). Agus revealed the three points of the request for clarification that they submitted to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. First, to ask for an official and written explanation regarding the case of the reog art instrument burning by the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. In addition to the written explanation, Agus continued, in the second point, his party also questioned the issue of spreading the news about the burning of the reog art instrument in a number of 'online' media which stated that the reason for the burning was because it was considered an idol. The last point that is no less important, Agus continued, is a request to the Indonesian Embassy or the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City, clearing Philippines to publish or broadcast clarifications on the issue of burning reog art objects in a number of national media. "We also demand that the Consulate General or through the Indonesian Embassy in the Philippines ask for the right of clarification from the media who brought up the news to avoid confusion in the news that developed in the country," he said. The letter, which was written on the letterhead of the Jabodetabek Reyog Association Number 023/PRPJ/X/2015, was not only sent via electronic message to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City, but also forwarded to the Indonesian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the Regent of Ponorogo. Separately, the Indonesian Consul General in Davao City, Eko Hartono, who had been asked for clarification via electronic mail, replied via a similar electronic message that the news of the burning of a number of reog art instruments by the local Consulate General staff was true. However, Consul General Eko Hartono, as quoted in an electronic message received by Agus Setiyoko, said the burning had to be carried out because the 30-year-old art instrument was damaged and eaten by termites. "Mr. Eko as the Indonesian Consul General in Davao even said that they were grateful for being able to communicate (via email) with the reog community in Indonesia so that they could ask for input for the procurement of a number of new reog art instruments there," said Agus. However, Agus said, the reog art lovers and actors in the country still need an official and open explanation that can be read in the national media so as not to continue to trigger disappointment or even anger from the reog community in Indonesia. "The second letter that we submitted above is more of a reflection of the shock and disappointment of the Indonesian people, especially the reog artist community in the country over the incident of burning objects for the reog art," he said. Previously, reports about the burning of a number of reog art properties such as gayor, peacock dadak masks and a dragon head gamelan appeared in a number of online media along with photos of the burning of a peacock mask in the yard of a house suspected of being the Indonesian Consulate General's office in Davao City, Philippines.
berita_id: Komunitas Reog Jabodetabek mengirim surat resmi kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina untuk meminta klarifikasi tentang informasi tentang pembakaran alat seni reog oleh pejabat umum konsulat Indonesia."Kami ingin mendapatkan penjelasan resmi dan tertulis, karena dalam klarifikasi sebelumnya Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia mengkonfirmasi berita dengan dalih bahwa peralatan seni rusak," kata Sekretaris Jenderal Asosiasi Reog Jabodetabek (Jakarta, Bogor, Depok, Tangerang dan Bekasi), Agus Setiyoko, Senin (2/11).Agus mengungkapkan tiga poin dari permintaan klarifikasi yang mereka sampaikan kepada Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Pertama, untuk meminta penjelasan resmi dan tertulis mengenai kasus instrumen seni reog yang dibakar oleh konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Selain penjelasan tertulis, Agus melanjutkan, pada poin kedua, partainya juga mempertanyakan masalah menyebarkan berita tentang pembakaran instrumen seni yang diobak di sejumlah media 'online' yang menyatakan bahwa alasan pembakaran adalah karena dianggap sebagai idola.Poin terakhir yang tidak kalah pentingnya, Agus melanjutkan, adalah permintaan ke Kedutaan Besar Indonesia atau Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao, membersihkan Filipina untuk menerbitkan atau menyiarkan klarifikasi tentang masalah pembakaran objek seni reog di sejumlah media nasional."Kami juga menuntut agar konsulat umum atau melalui kedutaan Indonesia di Filipina meminta hak klarifikasi dari media yang mengemukakan berita untuk menghindari kebingungan dalam berita yang berkembang di negara itu," katanya.Surat itu, yang ditulis di kop surat nomor Asosiasi Jabodetabek Reyog 023/PRPJ/X/2015, tidak hanya dikirim melalui pesan elektronik ke Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao, tetapi juga diteruskan ke Kementerian Luar Negeri Indonesia dan Bupati Ponorogo.Secara terpisah, Konsul Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao, Eko Hartono, yang telah diminta klarifikasi melalui surat elektronik, menjawab melalui pesan elektronik yang serupa bahwa berita pembakaran sejumlah instrumen seni reog oleh staf umum konsulat setempat benar.Namun, Konsul Jenderal Eko Hartono, seperti dikutip dalam pesan elektronik yang diterima oleh Agus Setiyoko, mengatakan pembakaran harus dilakukan karena instrumen seni berusia 30 tahun itu rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap."Tn. Eko sebagai Konsul Jenderal Indonesia di Davao bahkan mengatakan bahwa mereka bersyukur karena dapat berkomunikasi (melalui email) dengan komunitas reog di Indonesia sehingga mereka dapat meminta masukan untuk pengadaan sejumlah instrumen seni reog baru di sana," kata Agus.Namun, kata Agus, pecinta dan aktor seni yang reog di negara itu masih membutuhkan penjelasan resmi dan terbuka yang dapat dibaca di media nasional agar tidak terus memicu kekecewaan atau bahkan kemarahan dari komunitas reog di Indonesia."Surat kedua yang kami kirimkan di atas lebih merupakan cerminan dari keterkejutan dan kekecewaan orang -orang Indonesia, terutama komunitas seniman yang dirancang ulang di negara itu atas insiden objek yang membakar untuk seni reog," katanya.Sebelumnya, laporan tentang pembakaran sejumlah properti seni yang dirancang ulang seperti Gayor, Peacock Dadak Masker dan seekor naga kepala gamelan muncul di sejumlah media online bersama dengan foto -foto pembakaran topeng merak di halaman sebuah rumah yang diduga sebagai Konsulat Konsulat Jenderal di Davao City, Filipina.

berita: Jakarta - When Apple launched the iPhone 6 Plus as the largest iPhone with a screen size of 5.5 inches, many were worried that it would make it difficult for users to put it in their pants pockets. The fear was finally proven. Indeed, this is not a big part, but some iPhone 6 Plus users who put the device in their trouser pockets are forced to accept the fact that the curved part of their iPhone 6 Plus is. As told by a Macrumors Forum user named Hanzon. He admitted that it took him a long time to put the iPhone 6 Plus in his commit front trouser pocket. At least 4 hours the device is in the pocket. While in the pants, Hanzon did not take out the iPhone 6 Plus and continued his usual activities as usual. As a result, he found the middle of his new smartphone was a bit 'bent'. DevinPitcher also had a bad experience. He also put his iPhone 6 Plus in his front pocket. It's not clear how long he kept it, which was clear enough to make him warp. Thus quoted detikINET from Macrumors, Wednesday (24/9/2014). There has been no official confirmation from Apple regarding the issue. But what is clear is that this is the reason for iPhone 6 Plus users to be careful about placing their latest iDevice.
berita_id: Jakarta - Ketika Apple meluncurkan iPhone 6 Plus sebagai iPhone terbesar dengan ukuran layar 5,5 inci, banyak yang khawatir akan menyulitkan pengguna untuk memasukkannya ke dalam saku celana mereka.Ketakutan akhirnya terbukti.Memang, ini bukan bagian besar, tetapi beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 plus yang menempatkan perangkat di kantong celana mereka dipaksa untuk menerima fakta bahwa bagian melengkung dari iPhone 6 Plus mereka.Seperti yang diceritakan oleh pengguna forum MacRumors bernama Hanzon.Dia mengakui bahwa butuh waktu lama baginya untuk menempatkan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana depan komit.Setidaknya 4 jam perangkat ada di saku.Saat berada di celana, Hanzon tidak mengeluarkan iPhone 6 Plus dan melanjutkan kegiatannya yang biasa seperti biasa.Akibatnya, ia menemukan bagian tengah smartphone barunya sedikit 'bengkok'.Devinpitcher juga memiliki pengalaman buruk.Dia juga meletakkan iPhone 6 Plus di saku depannya.Tidak jelas berapa lama dia menyimpannya, yang cukup jelas untuk membuatnya melengkung.Demikian dikutip Detikinet dari Macrumors, Rabu (24/9/2014).Belum ada konfirmasi resmi dari Apple mengenai masalah ini.Tapi yang jelas adalah bahwa ini adalah alasan bagi pengguna iPhone 6 Plus untuk berhati -hati dalam menempatkan iDevice terbaru mereka.

berita: Terrorism observer Al-Chaidar assessed that the riot at the Mako Brimob detention house, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, Tuesday (08/05/2018) night was bigger than the explosions in Sarinah and Kampung Melayu, Jakarta, some time ago. . "This is a bigger incident than the Sarinah bombing and the Kampung Melayu bombing," said Chaidar, a lecturer at the Faculty of Social and Political Sciences, Malikussaleh University, Lhokseumawe, Aceh, who also lives permanently in Depok, to hidayatullah.com, last night, Wednesday. He considered that the riots occurred because the convicts of terrorism cases were offended by the authorities. "They are hurt by the police's actions to throw the Koran (in) November 2017," he said. Meanwhile, according to hidayatullah.com's monitoring last night, at locations around the Mobile Brigade Headquarters, the road leading to the Brimob Headquarters area was blocked by the police. Vehicles passing from Jl Raya Access UI to Jl Komjen Pol M Jasin, where the Mako Brimob complex is located, cannot go straight, they can only go to an intersection, go to Jl Nusantara, or to Jl Kelapa Dua Raya, or turn around. reader Traffic is congested around the intersection. Journalists who wanted to cover some of them were no longer allowed to enter the Mobile Brigade Headquarters via Jl Komjen Pol M Jasin. Journalists were also checked for press cards and personal identity cards (KTP), as well as the contents of their luggage. Some can enter after going through layers of security. Residents who want to pass are also not allowed, even though this media saw two people on motorbikes passing after being shouted "where are you going?" by officers. As previously reported, according to the Head of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Headquarters, M Iqbal, the rioting at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters was triggered when guards inspected food shipments from prisoners' families which took a long time, thus sparking the anger of the prisoners. "We have to verify food shipments according to the SOP, so that an incident occurs," said Iqbal at the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters
berita_id: Pengamat terorisme Al-Chaidar menilai bahwa kerusuhan di Mako Brimob Detention House, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, Selasa (08/05/2018) malam lebih besar daripada ledakan di Sarinah dan Kampung Melayu, Jakarta, beberapa waktu yang lalu.."Ini adalah insiden yang lebih besar daripada pemboman Sarinah dan pemboman Kampung Melayu," kata Chaidar, seorang dosen di Fakultas Ilmu Sosial dan Politik, Universitas Malikussaleh, Lhokseumawe, Aceh, yang juga tinggal secara permanen di Depok, untuk Hidayatullah.com, tadi malam, Rabu.Dia menganggap bahwa kerusuhan terjadi karena narapidana kasus -kasus terorisme tersinggung oleh pihak berwenang."Mereka terluka oleh tindakan polisi untuk melemparkan Alquran (dalam) November 2017," katanya.Sementara itu, menurut pemantauan Hidayatullah.com tadi malam, di lokasi -lokasi di sekitar markas brigade seluler, jalan menuju area markas Brimob diblokir oleh polisi.Kendaraan yang lewat dari JL Raya Access UI ke JL Komjen Pol M Jasin, di mana kompleks Mako Brimob berada, tidak bisa lurus, mereka hanya bisa pergi ke persimpangan, pergi ke JL Nusantara, atau ke Jl Kelapa Dua Raya, atau berbalik.Lalu lintas pembaca tersumbat di sekitar persimpangan.Wartawan yang ingin menutupi beberapa dari mereka tidak lagi diizinkan memasuki markas brigade seluler melalui JL Komjen Pol M Jasin.Wartawan juga diperiksa untuk kartu pers dan kartu identitas pribadi (KTP), serta isi bagasi mereka.Beberapa dapat masuk setelah melalui lapisan keamanan.Warga yang ingin lewat juga tidak diizinkan, meskipun media ini melihat dua orang dengan sepeda motor yang lewat setelah diteriakkan "Kemana Anda pergi?"oleh petugas.Seperti yang dilaporkan sebelumnya, menurut kepala Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Markas Kepolisian Nasional, M Iqbal, kerusuhan di markas Brigade Mobile dipicu ketika penjaga memeriksa pengiriman makanan dari keluarga tahanan yang membutuhkan waktu lama, sehingga memicu kemarahan para tahanan."Kami harus memverifikasi pengiriman makanan sesuai dengan SOP, sehingga suatu insiden terjadi," kata Iqbal di markas Komando Brigade Mobile

berita: The offer news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia is confirmed to be a hoax. This certainty was revealed after the Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati confirmed this in front of journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace, West Java. ” he said on Monday, March 12, 2018. While giving a statement regarding President Joko Widodo's meeting with the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) delegation, he received a question about it. from government institutions "What the Menpan said (in social media) was a hoax, it was indeed like that. In today's social media there is a lot of information and documents that are made similar to those from the government and published," he said. President's salary n and the Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia In this issue, it was stated that the president would be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp. 553422694 per month. The vice president was proposed to receive a salary of Rp. 368948462 per month.
berita_id: Berita penawaran yang beredar tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia dikonfirmasi menjadi tipuan.Kepastian ini terungkap setelah Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati mengkonfirmasi hal ini di depan jurnalis di Istana Presiden Bogor, Jawa Barat."Dia mengatakan pada hari Senin, 12 Maret 2018. Sambil memberikan pernyataan tentang pertemuan Presiden Joko Widodo dengan delegasi Bank Investasi Investasi Asia (AIIB), ia menerima pertanyaan tentang hal itu. Dari lembaga pemerintah" apa yang dikatakan Menpan (di media sosial) adalah tipuan, memang seperti itu.Di media sosial saat ini ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang dibuat serupa dengan yang dari pemerintah dan diterbitkan, "katanya. Gaji Presiden dan dan Wakil Presiden Republik Indonesia dalam edisi ini, dinyatakan bahwa presiden akan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji hingga Rp. 55342694 per bulan. Wakil Presiden diusulkan untuk menerima Rp.

berita: TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Surabaya Food and Drug Supervisory Agency (BBPOM) issued a report on the results of the lab test for pacifiers suspected of containing drugs. The candy dot was confiscated by the Civil Service Police Unit during a joint operation, and then handed over by the Surabaya City psychotropic Government for investigation. Apparently, the results of laboratory tests stated that the pacifier candy was negative. "The test results were negative for the parameters we tested," said acting Head of BBPOM Surabaya, Retno Kurpaningsih, when contacted by Tempo, Thursday, March 9, 2017. Retno said the candy samples from China produced by Xiamen Yang Wan Foodstuff passed four drug parameters. One example of a psychoactive substance with these parameters is amphetamine, which causes addiction. "Negative, does not contain amphetamine." The candies imported by PT Petrona Inti Chermindo in West Jakarta also do not contain rhodamine. In fact, it is officially registered as foreign food and has the BPOM RI label ML 224409003077. Even so, Retno refuses to conclude that there is a possibility of business competition behind the news that the candy is suspected to contain drugs. "That's not my domain," he said. The results of the laboratory tests will later be submitted to the Surabaya City Government. BPOM is still waiting for the results of laboratory tests for other types of candy submitted by the Surabaya City Government. In addition to the dot candy, there are also jelly stick candy and sheep-shaped candy. The Surabaya Satpol PP stated that it was conducting a raid on pacifiers suspected of containing addictive substances and disturbing the public because they went viral. On the orders of Mayor Tri Rismaharini, the Satpol PP has cooperated in combing elementary schools with the Sector Police (Polsek), puskesmas, and Koramil, since Monday, March 6 2017. From the joint operation, Satpol PP confiscated 345 bottles of candy.
berita_id: Tempo.co, Jakarta - Badan Pengawas Makanan dan Obat Surabaya (BBPOM) mengeluarkan laporan tentang hasil tes laboratorium untuk dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Permen DOT disita oleh Unit Kepolisian Layanan Sipil selama operasi bersama, dan kemudian diserahkan oleh Pemerintah Psikotropika Kota Surabaya untuk penyelidikan.Rupanya, hasil tes laboratorium menyatakan bahwa permen dot negatif."Hasil tes negatif untuk parameter yang kami uji," kata Penjabat Kepala BBPOM Surabaya, Retno Kurpaningsih, ketika dihubungi oleh Tempo, Kamis, 9 Maret 2017. Retno mengatakan sampel permen dari Cina yang diproduksi oleh Xiamen Yang Wan Foodstuff meloloskan empat parameter narkoba.Salah satu contoh zat psikoaktif dengan parameter ini adalah amfetamin, yang menyebabkan kecanduan."Negatif, tidak mengandung amfetamin."Permen yang diimpor oleh Pt Petrona Inti Chermindo di Jakarta Barat juga tidak mengandung rhodamine.Faktanya, secara resmi terdaftar sebagai makanan asing dan memiliki label BPOM RI ML 224409003077.
