Meski begitu, Retno menolak untuk menyimpulkan bahwa ada kemungkinan persaingan bisnis di balik berita bahwa permen diduga mengandung obat -obatan."Itu bukan domainku," katanya.Hasil tes laboratorium nantinya akan diserahkan kepada pemerintah kota Surabaya.BPOM masih menunggu hasil tes laboratorium untuk jenis permen lain yang diajukan oleh pemerintah kota Surabaya.Selain permen titik, ada juga permen tongkat jeli dan permen berbentuk domba.Surabaya Satpol PP menyatakan bahwa mereka melakukan penggerebekan pada dot yang diduga mengandung zat adiktif dan mengganggu masyarakat karena mereka menjadi viral.Atas perintah Walikota Tri Rismaharini, PP Satpol telah bekerja sama dalam menyisir sekolah -sekolah dasar dengan Polisi Sektor (Polsek), Puskesmas, dan Koramil, sejak Senin, 6 Maret 2017. Dari operasi bersama, Satpol PP menyita 345 botol permen.

berita: Rumors spread on social media that a number of terrorist detainees at the Mako Brimob Detention Center, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, on Friday (11/10/2017), went on a rampage and damaged the detention cells. It is not known exactly why. However, from information quoted by a social media account #Alfath Channel, it was stated that the riot that resulted in a room being damaged was because officers who were checking the room of a prisoner who was charged with terrorism had squad abused the holy book Al-Quran. "There has been a riot at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters, Kelapa Dua, Depok, the terrorist prisoners burned and destroyed the room because the guard Ahmad and his team threw the Koran and caused the prisoners to go berserk," reads the quote #Alfath Channel. The riots in the Mako Brimob detention center were clarified by the circulation of viral videos and several photos of the times when the vandalism took place. In the video, which is thought to have taken place at noon, the atmosphere of the Mako Brimob detention cell looks shattered, and there are broken glass caused by being hit by a hard object. Until this news was revealed, the Brimob Mako Detention Center had not issued an official clarification.
berita_id: Rumor menyebar di media sosial bahwa sejumlah tahanan teroris di Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, pada hari Jumat (11/10/2017), mengamuk dan merusak sel -sel penahanan.Tidak diketahui mengapa.Namun, dari informasi yang dikutip oleh akun media sosial #alfath Channel, dinyatakan bahwa kerusuhan yang mengakibatkan kamar yang rusak adalah karena petugas yang memeriksa kamar seorang tahanan yang didakwa dengan terorisme membuat pasukan melecehkan kitab suci al-Quran."Telah ada kerusuhan di markas Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua, Depok, para tahanan teroris membakar dan menghancurkan ruangan itu karena penjaga Ahmad dan timnya melemparkan Alquran dan menyebabkan para tahanan mengamuk," kata saluran kutipan #alfath.Kerusuhan di Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob diklarifikasi oleh sirkulasi video viral dan beberapa foto saat vandalisme terjadi.Dalam video itu, yang diperkirakan telah terjadi pada siang hari, atmosfer sel penahanan Mako Brimob terlihat hancur, dan ada pecahan kaca yang disebabkan oleh terkena benda keras.Sampai berita ini terungkap, pusat penahanan Brimob Mako belum mengeluarkan klarifikasi resmi.

berita: Lately, many people are worried about beauty brushes or toothbrushes made of bristle. Because they think the material is definitely made of sea urchins. So that the material becomes haram -- and also unclean -- when used. But actually, not all tools that use bristle refer to sea urchins. Although there are certain brush products with bristle material that use pig bristles. So, it is necessary to distinguish between the materials used, even if there is a bristle code or mark. The term bristle can mean stiff hair, short, fiber, and others. So all the hair, the stiff fiber, then the term will be referred to as bristle. Hair, stiff beard, can be categorized as bristle. Another example is the stiff fibers or pine leaves can also be referred to as bristle. In relation to this bristle, the Institute for the Study of Food, Drugs and Food, the Indonesian Ulema Council (LPPOM MUI) has provided an explanation. The following is an explanation of LPPOM MUI uploaded to the www.halalmui.org page: Lately, the virtual world has been making a fuss about brushes or toothbrushes/toothbrushes made of bristle because they are DEFINITELY made from pigs. Although we are required to be vigilant, not all bristle terms always refer to sea urchins. The lexical meaning of bristle is a short, stiff hair, fiber, etc (Webster's Dictionary). So all the hair, the stiff fiber, then the term will be referred to as bristle. Hair, stiff beard, can be categorized as bristle. Another example is the stiff fibers or pine leaves can also be referred to as bristle. So, how is its application in the industrial world? In the industrial world, bristle is indeed used as a material for making brushes or brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle can be sourced from animal hair or plant fibers as well or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. The animal hair used can be sourced from pigs, goats, horses, or camels. The plant fiber that has also been used as a brush or brush material is palm fiber. Nylon is also a synthetic fiber that is commonly used for brushes, brushes or toothbrushes. From the halal aspect, brushes and brushes, including toothbrushes derived from animal hair, are critical points. When the material is sea urchin then it should not be used because any material derived from pigs is both haram and unclean, either in dry or wet form. In addition, besides the prohibition of the substance, the MUI has issued a fatwa for anything derived from pork that is haram for its use (al-intifa') including the fur. But the problem is that not all brush or brush or toothbrush users are able to recognize whether the brush they are using is a brush or a brush that comes from pig bristles. One of the information that can be seen as a marker that the brush or brush comes from sea urchins is that it is written as the name of the product, for example “Boar Bristle Brush”. Boar is the English term for wild boar or wild boar. This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles. Toothbrush can also use this boar bristles. Amazon.com, a global online store also offers pig toothbrushes under the name “Fuchs Toothbrushes Pure Natural (Boar) Bristle Record V Adult Soft (Pack of 5)-Assorted colors by Fuchs Toothbrushes” (check this link) and brushes made from sea ​​urchin (#1 TRUSTED Wooden Boar Hair Bristle Beard Brush by Leven Rose - Perfect For a Beard Grooming Kit for Men - Made of Boars Hair Bristles and Firm Natural Wood). Please check here. However, brushes, brushes, or toothbrushes are not always made from pigs even though they have bristle written on them, because the term bristle is still a general term. There are several manufacturers who have used goat hair or camel or horse hair as brush material or made of nylon. The last group of materials is clearly acceptable. When there is no information on the source of the material, at least a simple method can be used. To determine whether it is made from animal hair or not, the method in question is to burn the material. If it smells like burning hair or horns, better leave it alone. Materials from plastic or coconut fiber do not emit such a distinctive odor when burned.
berita_id: Akhir -akhir ini, banyak orang khawatir tentang sikat kecantikan atau sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu.Karena mereka pikir bahannya pasti terbuat dari bulu babi.Sehingga materi menjadi haram - dan juga najis - bila digunakan.Tapi sebenarnya, tidak semua alat yang menggunakan Bristle merujuk pada bulu babi.Meskipun ada produk sikat tertentu dengan bahan bulu yang menggunakan bulu babi.Jadi, perlu untuk membedakan antara bahan yang digunakan, bahkan jika ada kode bulu atau tanda.Istilah bulu dapat berarti rambut kaku, pendek, serat, dan lainnya.Jadi semua rambut, serat kaku, maka istilah ini akan disebut sebagai bulu.Rambut, jenggot kaku, dapat dikategorikan sebagai bulu.Contoh lain adalah serat kaku atau daun pinus juga dapat disebut sebagai bulu.Sehubungan dengan bulu ini, Institute for Studies of Food, Obat dan Makanan, Dewan Ulama Indonesia (LPPOM MUI) telah memberikan penjelasan.Berikut ini adalah penjelasan LPPOM MUI yang diunggah ke halaman www.halalmui.org: Akhir -akhir ini, dunia virtual telah membuat keributan tentang sikat atau sikat gigi/sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu karena mereka pasti terbuat dari babi.Meskipun kami diharuskan waspada, tidak semua istilah bulu selalu merujuk pada bulu babi.Arti leksikal dari bulu adalah rambut pendek, kaku, serat, dll (Kamus Webster).Jadi semua rambut, serat kaku, maka istilah ini akan disebut sebagai bulu.Rambut, jenggot kaku, dapat dikategorikan sebagai bulu.Contoh lain adalah serat kaku atau daun pinus juga dapat disebut sebagai bulu.Jadi, bagaimana penerapannya di dunia industri?Di dunia industri, Bristle memang digunakan sebagai bahan untuk membuat kuas atau sikat, termasuk sikat gigi.BRISTLE dapat bersumber dari rambut hewani atau serat tanaman juga atau serat sintetis seperti nilon dan silikon.Rambut hewan yang digunakan dapat bersumber dari babi, kambing, kuda, atau unta.Serat tanaman yang juga telah digunakan sebagai sikat atau bahan sikat adalah serat kelapa sawit.Nylon juga merupakan serat sintetis yang biasanya digunakan untuk kuas, sikat atau sikat gigi.Dari aspek halal, sikat dan sikat, termasuk sikat gigi yang berasal dari rambut hewani, adalah titik kritis.Ketika bahannya adalah landak laut maka tidak boleh digunakan karena bahan apa pun yang berasal dari babi adalah haram dan najis, baik dalam bentuk kering atau basah.Selain itu, selain larangan zat, MUI telah mengeluarkan fatwa untuk apa pun yang berasal dari daging babi yang merupakan haram untuk penggunaannya (al-intifa ') termasuk bulu.Tetapi masalahnya adalah tidak semua sikat atau sikat atau sikat gigi dapat mengenali apakah kuas yang mereka gunakan adalah kuas atau kuas yang berasal dari bulu babi.Salah satu informasi yang dapat dilihat sebagai penanda bahwa kuas atau kuas berasal dari landak laut adalah bahwa itu ditulis sebagai nama produk, misalnya "Boar Bristle Brush".Babi adalah istilah bahasa Inggris untuk babi hutan atau babi hutan.Ini berarti bahwa produk adalah kuas yang menggunakan bulu babi liar.Sikat gigi juga dapat menggunakan bulu babi ini.Amazon.com, toko online global juga menawarkan sikat gigi pigi dengan nama “Fuchs Toothbrushes Pure Natural (Boar) Bristle Record v Dewasa Lembut (Paket 5) -sorpored Warna oleh Fuchs Toothbrushes” (periksa tautan ini) dan sikat yang terbuat dari landak (#Kayu).Silakan periksa di sini.Namun, kuas, sikat, atau sikat gigi tidak selalu terbuat dari babi meskipun mereka memiliki bulu yang tertulis di atasnya, karena istilah bulu masih merupakan istilah umum.Ada beberapa produsen yang menggunakan rambut kambing atau unta atau rambut kuda sebagai bahan sikat atau terbuat dari nilon.Kelompok material terakhir jelas dapat diterima.Ketika tidak ada informasi tentang sumber materi, setidaknya metode sederhana dapat digunakan.Untuk menentukan apakah itu terbuat dari rambut hewani atau tidak, metode yang dimaksud adalah membakar material.Jika baunya seperti rambut atau tanduk yang terbakar, lebih baik biarkan saja.Bahan dari plastik atau serat kelapa tidak memancarkan bau yang khas saat dibakar.

berita: Liputan6.com, California - In recent days a number of complaints from iPhone 6 Plus users have enlivened the virtual world. The new 5.5-inch smartphone from Apple is reported to be easy to bend if it is stored in a trouser pocket for too long. Suddenly this news made Apple the monthly on various social media. Not only users, some of Apple's competitors did not waste this moment to 'beat up' the company bearing the bitten apple logo. And now Apple has finally spoken. According to a report published on the Wall Street Journal page, Apple representatives have explained that the issue of the iPhone 6 Plus being easy to bend is exaggerated. Apple claims that the company has so far only received 9 user complaints out of 10 million addition units of the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus that have been sold. This means, the defects on the iPhone 6 Plus do not occur in all units, but only a small part. "With normal use, a curved iPhone 6 Plus would be extremely rare," an Apple representative said. In addition, Jon Fort, editor of the news site CNBC also mentioned that Apple representatives have confirmed that only a small percentage of consumers are experiencing the iPhone 6 Plus curved issue. It was also explained that the actual body frame of the iPhone 6 Plus is strong enough and meets Apple's standards. "The new iPhones are steel/titanium-infused to strengthen a number of stress locations and use the strongest type of glass in the industry," an Apple representative said. The Business Insider page noted, this is Apple's fastest response in responding to oblique issues circulating wildly on the internet. Previously, Apple had always been 'ignorant' to various oblique issues that befell their products.
berita_id: LIPUTAN6.com, California - Dalam beberapa hari terakhir sejumlah keluhan dari iPhone 6 Plus pengguna telah menghidupkan dunia virtual.Smartphone 5,5 inci baru dari Apple dilaporkan mudah ditekuk jika disimpan dalam saku celana panjang terlalu lama.Tiba -tiba berita ini menjadikan Apple bulanan di berbagai media sosial.Tidak hanya pengguna, beberapa pesaing Apple tidak menyia -nyiakan momen ini untuk 'memukuli' perusahaan yang membawa logo Apple yang digigit.Dan sekarang Apple akhirnya berbicara.Menurut sebuah laporan yang diterbitkan di halaman Wall Street Journal, perwakilan Apple telah menjelaskan bahwa masalah iPhone 6 Plus mudah ditekuk dibesar -besarkan.Apple mengklaim bahwa perusahaan sejauh ini hanya menerima 9 keluhan pengguna dari 10 juta unit tambahan iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus yang telah terjual.Ini berarti, cacat pada iPhone 6 Plus tidak terjadi di semua unit, tetapi hanya sebagian kecil."Dengan penggunaan normal, iPhone 6 Plus melengkung akan sangat jarang," kata seorang perwakilan Apple.Selain itu, Jon Fort, editor situs berita CNBC juga menyebutkan bahwa perwakilan Apple telah mengkonfirmasi bahwa hanya sebagian kecil konsumen yang mengalami masalah melengkung iPhone 6 plus.Juga dijelaskan bahwa kerangka tubuh yang sebenarnya dari iPhone 6 Plus cukup kuat dan memenuhi standar Apple."Iphone baru adalah baja/titanium yang diresapi untuk memperkuat sejumlah lokasi stres dan menggunakan jenis kaca terkuat di industri ini," kata seorang perwakilan Apple.Halaman Business Insider mencatat, ini adalah respons tercepat Apple dalam menanggapi masalah miring yang beredar liar di internet.Sebelumnya, Apple selalu 'bodoh' untuk berbagai masalah miring yang menimpa produk mereka.

berita: The government can indeed give strict sanctions to block Facebook, because the data of one million Indonesian users was also leaked in the Cambridge Analytica (CA) scandal. However, there is no certainty that on April 24, Facebook will actually be blocked in Indonesia. Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara on various occasions never mentioned blocking Facebook. In fact, Rudiantara said that the Ministry of Communications and Informatics did not hesitate to block Facebook, but must follow procedures so that the steps are not rash. Rudiantara's only firm statement about blocking Facebook is if there is evidence that Facebook is used as a means of inciting or fighting. Rudiantara ensured that if investigators found an element of criminal suspicion in the leak of Facebook user data in Indonesia, the proclamation chances of blocking Facebook would be even greater. Meanwhile, these two things have not been proven yet, are still under investigation and awaiting the results of the audit. "If there are indications that Facebook in Indonesia is being used for incitement, like what happened in Myanmar. I have no qualms about blocking it," said Rudiantara, a few days ago. The Minister of Communication and Information has asked Facebook to conduct an audit, and submitted the results of the audit since a week after the announcement that data on Facebook users in Indonesia had been leaked in the CA scandal.
berita_id: Pemerintah memang dapat memberikan sanksi ketat untuk memblokir Facebook, karena data satu juta pengguna Indonesia juga bocor dalam skandal Cambridge Analytica (CA).Namun, tidak ada kepastian bahwa pada 24 April, Facebook sebenarnya akan diblokir di Indonesia.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara pada berbagai kesempatan tidak pernah disebutkan memblokir Facebook.Faktanya, Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika tidak ragu untuk memblokir Facebook, tetapi harus mengikuti prosedur sehingga langkah -langkahnya tidak terburu -buru.Satu -satunya pernyataan perusahaan Rudiantara tentang memblokir Facebook adalah jika ada bukti bahwa Facebook digunakan sebagai sarana menghasut atau berkelahi.Rudiantara memastikan bahwa jika penyelidik menemukan unsur kecurigaan kriminal dalam kebocoran data pengguna Facebook di Indonesia, peluang proklamasi untuk memblokir Facebook akan lebih besar.Sementara itu, kedua hal ini belum terbukti, masih dalam penyelidikan dan menunggu hasil audit."Jika ada indikasi bahwa Facebook di Indonesia digunakan untuk hasutan, seperti apa yang terjadi di Myanmar. Saya tidak ragu -ragu memblokirnya," kata Rudiiantara, beberapa hari yang lalu.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi telah meminta Facebook untuk melakukan audit, dan mengirimkan hasil audit sejak seminggu setelah pengumuman bahwa data di pengguna Facebook di Indonesia telah bocor dalam skandal CA.

berita: Bitungnews – Reog Ponorogo culture is one of the cultural heritages of the Indonesian ancestors. This type of art has even been claimed seven times by neighboring countries, Malaysia, as their culture. The Indonesian people have always been reactive, protesting these claims. The incident at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao, Philippines was the opposite, if Malaysia claimed the nation's cultural arts, a number of elements in the Indonesian Consulate General actually burned Barong Reog Ponorogo, along with gamelan decorations. According to information compiled by bitungnews.com, the burning was carried out on Tuesday, October 20, 2015. The reason for the burning of Barong Reog Ponorogo, and the dragon decoration on the gamelan, is because there is a demon and it is an idol. Unfortunately, the Acting Consulate General, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, did not prevent the arson. In fact, Acting Consulate General Davao called a security guard named Santander to pour gas over the reog and 2 gamelan dragon snakes, the security guard was so surprised and surprised he said in Bisaya Tagalog: "Hadluk kaayu ko, dear kaayu ang dragon gwapo kaayu unya sunugon, kasayang sa reog pero gisugo man ko (I'm so scared, it's flying dragon a shame that the dragon is so good it keeps burning, the reog is too bad but how else can I be told)," said Santander. "When the Barong Reog and dragon gamelan decorations were burned, which are the inventory of the Indonesian Consulate General's cultural museum, none of the other Indonesian Consulate General staff knew about it," said a bitungnews.com source. "After this incident, the perpetrators were blasphemed by most of the Indonesian citizens in Davao, but the perpetrators still feel innocent because they think what they are doing is right in the eyes of God," added the source. An Indonesian citizen residing in Davao, stated that the Acting Consulate General in Davao was declared persona non grata, and asked the Indonesian government to withdraw the persons involved in the act of burning the nation's cultural heritage. Bitungnews.com tried to contact the Media and Information Service, Ministry of Foreign Affairs on 021 3813453, but until this news was published it was not picked up. And electronic messages to infomed@kemlu.go.id have not received a response either.
berita_id: Bitungnews - Budaya Reog Ponorogo adalah salah satu warisan budaya leluhur Indonesia.Jenis seni ini bahkan telah diklaim tujuh kali oleh negara -negara tetangga, Malaysia, sebagai budaya mereka.Rakyat Indonesia selalu reaktif, memprotes klaim ini.Insiden di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia di Davao, Filipina adalah sebaliknya, jika Malaysia mengklaim seni budaya negara itu, sejumlah elemen dalam konsulat Jenderal Indonesia benar -benar membakar Barong Reog Ponorogo, bersama dengan dekorasi gamelan.Menurut informasi yang disusun oleh Bitungnews.com, pembakaran dilakukan pada hari Selasa, 20 Oktober 2015. Alasan pembakaran Barong Reog Ponorogo, dan dekorasi naga di gamelan, adalah karena ada iblis dan itu adalah idola.Sayangnya, akting konsulat jenderal, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, tidak mencegah pembakaran.Faktanya, Konsulat Akting Jenderal Davao disebut penjaga keamanan bernama Santander untuk menuangkan gas di atas ular reog dan 2 gamelan naga, penjaga keamanan itu begitu terkejut dan terkejut katanya dalam bisaya tagalog: "Hadluk Kaayu, saya scasay soatu gwapo gwapo kaugon,Naga memalukan bahwa naga itu begitu baik sehingga terus membakar, reog itu terlalu buruk tetapi bagaimana lagi saya bisa diberitahu), "kata Santander."Ketika dekorasi Barong Reog dan Dragon Gamelan dibakar, yang merupakan inventaris museum budaya konsulat Jenderal Indonesia, tidak ada staf umum konsulat Indonesia lainnya yang mengetahuinya," kata sumber Bitungnews.com."Setelah kejadian ini, para pelaku dihujat oleh sebagian besar warga negara Indonesia di Davao, tetapi para pelaku masih merasa tidak bersalah karena mereka berpikir apa yang mereka lakukan adalah tepat di mata Tuhan," tambah sumber itu.Seorang warga negara Indonesia yang tinggal di Davao, menyatakan bahwa penjabat konsulat jenderal di Davao dinyatakan kepribadian non grata, dan meminta pemerintah Indonesia untuk menarik orang -orang yang terlibat dalam tindakan membakar warisan budaya negara.Bitungnews.com mencoba menghubungi Layanan Media dan Informasi, Kementerian Luar Negeri di 021 3813453, tetapi sampai berita ini diterbitkan tidak diambil.Dan pesan elektronik ke infomed@kemlu.go.id juga belum menerima tanggapan.

berita:
Just over a month game from .Niantic,Inc. The release has caused a lot of controversy. Whether it's polemic..facts.rational or just .polemic that is exhaled based on opinion and without a clear source. This makes the Pokemon Go game even more interesting to follow. Or even a ridiculous thing that can only be understood. The news that was spread, some of them were confused about the source. Even crazier is the existence of Pokemon Go which is associated with ISIS terrorists. Duh... A rational fact that often becomes a polemic is because of the many violations committed by .Pokemon Go players. starting from breaking through forbidden places, disrupting traffic, and accidents that often occur because players are ignorant of the surrounding environment, immersed in the excitement of the game. For this, it seems that a more serious study is needed. Considering the existence of these pokemon monsters, they are placed randomly and do not rule out the possibility in forbidden places or dangerous places such as on roads, train stations, or even the latest incident of a .Pokemon Trainer falling off a cliff due to chasing Pokemon on the edge of a cliff.
From the very beginning of the release of this Pokemon Go game, news has spread that Indonesia is in danger of being blocked from the Pokemon Go game distribution list. The reason is because although Niantic.Inc has not opened a download portal for the Indonesia Region, there are already many sites that provide offline Apk file installers for Pokemon Go. So that Android users in Indonesia can now play this game. For this one news until now still confusing. Hopefully this news is not true. Because after all, the enthusiasm of Pokemon fans in Indonesia is among the biggest. But the latest news circulating in the mass media (TV and newspapers), the solution to this problem is that Niantic.Inc will ask google to block the keyword ".Pokemon Go Apk. " on .search engines. Maybe this one is more logical.. (In my opinion....)
Second, is the news that is a little bit weird. Although some include news sources, but sometimes irrelevant sources. As is often spread on social media and becomes viral quickly. This hoax info sometimes makes people angry, or even laughs because of the silliness of this hoax news spreader. The following is a ridiculous hoax bin info circulating regarding Pokemon Go 1. Teenagers Kill Siblings Because of Pokemon Go It had shocked the virtual world, when news spread about a teenager from Florida, Timmy Richard (15) who had the heart to kill his 13-year-old brother because he "accidentally" deleted Pokemon Go data on his cellphone. After being traced, it turned out that the source of the news was from.CartellPress.com. A site known as .satire news and often made .hoax news to lure social media users to click on ads on this site. According to news circulating, this site has also clarified and apologized for an editorial error on one of its .pages. 2. Pokemon Go Is America's Spy Tool Until now, this news is still viral on BBM and Facebook social media. I do not know what underlies the spread of this news. Just take advantage of Pokemon Go's .uforia moments or have done a basic analysis. Because this news spread at this time. Meanwhile, the Augmented Reality technology used by Pokemon Go has been used in the previous .Niantic, Inc. game product, namely .Ingress, and has been refined to support the Pokemon Go game. If indeed the technology in the Pokemon Go game is a means of American spying, it means that it has been done for a long time. Because the game .Ingress (though not as popular as Pokemon Go) is also played by Android users in Indonesia. This hoax has even been reported on one television station with a source present Scientific explanations are also described on the .cissrec.org site. That Pokemon Go doesn't suggest/force users to install.run at startup which is the basis for..malware .in .hacking devices, including mobile phones. As for Pokemon Trainer itself, data from the user's device is directly sent to https://sso.pokemon.com/sso/ which is the official .server from the developer, not through a third party The third fact described by .cissrec.org is that the amount of data sent by mobile devices to the official .Niantic server .every time a player gets a monster .is not crippled more than 50 KB.. Logically, the transfer of data files of that size will not be enough to send images with good quality. It can be proven when we take pictures with mobile phones, the data files created range from up to 3 Mb. Very far when compared to the amount of data sent to the main server 3.Pokemon Equals "I'm Jewish" This is getting more and more eccentric, the news that spreads in chains through Facebook makes us shake our heads. How foreign languages ​​are played for certain purposes. Sometimes they don't even understand where the .hoax spreader gets the source. Actually this issue has long been exhaled and disappeared. Now this issue is spreading again for whatever purpose. The actual meaning of Pokemon is as follows: The word .Pokemon in English is an abbreviation of two words: namely the word (.Poke) which is an abbreviation of the word (.Pocket), which means ; Pockets/pockets. And the word (.Mon) which is an abbreviation of the word (.Monster), which means; Monsters. So it means pocket monster. The point is an expression of how small these monsters are to fit in a pocket. As for the name .Pikachu .who is a famous character in this cartoon, it is also formed from two words: (.Pika) in Japanese, which means shining. While the word (.Chu) is an expression of the sounds that come out of the mouth of a mouse. Why is it called Pikachu? Because (this character) is shaped like a mouse armed with an electric shock. The funny thing is, this news was spread by someone who is anti-certain group, through Facebook which incidentally was made by one of the people from the hated group. Despite everything, the existence of the Pokemon Go Game does bring problems and benefits. This game can indeed be said to have a dangerous element because it takes the user out of the house and makes the player's attention decrease due to the excitement of the game But on the other hand, this game is reported to be the latest therapeutic method that can motivate people with depression, spectrum disorders, anxiety disorders, paranoia, social phobias to do outdoor activities and stop confining themselves in their rooms. Whatever media we use, when we use it outside the limits of reasonableness, it will certainly be very detrimental to ourselves and others. But when we are able to control ourselves to use all media fairly in proportion, it will certainly provide reasonable benefits

The Muhammadiyah Youth of DKI Jakarta Province assessed that the walkout (WO) carried out by Ananda Sukarlan to Anies Baswedan was an intolerant attitude. Muhammadiyah Youth also issued a statement of stance, namely boycotting Traveloka because its owner, Derianto Kususma, allegedly supported the attitude of pianist Ananda Sukarlan who was WO when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Province, Anies Rasyid Baswedan gave a speech at the 90th Anniversary Event of Kanisius College in Jakarta. Derianto did WO following the attitude of pianist Ananda Sukarlan. Chairman of the Muhammadiyah Youth of DKI Jakarta Province, Syahrul Hasan, said that the WO piano player action carried out by Ananda Sukarlan and several others illustrates the attitude of intolerance and poor morals as hosts in receiving guests. Where the presence of Anies Baswedan as a guest is at the official request of the host himself. "Ananda Sukarlan's walkout action accusing Anies Baswedan of winning the governor's seat is not in accordance with Kanisius' values, this is far from being burned," Syahrul said in a release received by Republika.co.id, Tuesday (14/11). Syahrul explained, Anies Baswedan was part of the Muhammadiyah extended family, both structurally and culturally. Currently, he is entrusted with the advisory role of the Muhammadiyah Branch of Pondok Labu where Din Syamsudin MA serves as the head of the branch. When Din Syamsudin served as chairman of the Muhammadiyah Central Executive for the period 2005-2010 and 2010-2015, PP Muhammadiyah, whose office was on Jl Menteng Raya 62, was next to the Kanisius College building. "Muhammadiyah always provides parking space for Muhammadiyah Da'wah Building for activities carried out by the Kanisius College extended family as a real and authentic manifestation of the tolerance of the Muhammadiyah extended family. Anies Baswedan, of course, as part of the Muhammadiyah extended family has the same attitude in maintaining tolerance and unity among people religion that has been going well so far, because he is also the grandson of the founder of the Republic of Indonesia whom we both love," said Syahrul. He hopes that even though there are incidents like this, the harmony and unity between religious communities that have been well established so far can be maintained for the sake of upholding the Unitary State of the Republic of Indonesia. The management of PT Trinusa Travelindo or Traveloka denied the walkout attitude of Traveloka founder Derianto Kusuma during a speech by the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan in celebration of the 90th Kanisius College. Traveloka PR Manager, Busyra Oryza stated that Derianto Kusuma was unable to attend the event to receive the award from the Kanisius Alumni, so there was no walkout. "He was unable to attend because he was on a business trip that had been planned a few months earlier. He was not in Jakarta," said Busyra Oryza to Republika, Tuesday (14/11). Busyra stated that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values, said Busyra, are always applied to employees and external stakeholders. According to him, the award achieved by Derianto Kusuma motivates him to increase his contribution in society by increasing mobility and improving the quality of life.
berita_id: Pemuda Muhammadiyah dari provinsi DKI Jakarta menilai bahwa pemogokan (WO) yang dilakukan oleh Ananda Sukarlan ke Anies Baswedan adalah sikap yang tidak toleran.Pemuda Muhammadiyah juga mengeluarkan pernyataan sikap, yaitu memboikot Traveloka karena pemiliknya, DeRianto Kususma, diduga mendukung sikap pianis Ananda Sukarlan yang berada ketika gubernur provinsi Dki Jakarta, Anies Rasyid Baswedan memberikan pidato pada harian 90 tahun.DERIANTO MELAKUKAN WO mengikuti sikap pianis Ananda Sukarlan.Ketua pemuda Muhammadiyah dari provinsi DKI Jakarta, Syahrul Hasan, mengatakan bahwa aksi pemain piano WO yang dilakukan oleh Ananda Sukarlan dan beberapa lainnya menggambarkan sikap intoleransi dan moral yang buruk sebagai tuan rumah dalam menerima tamu.Di mana kehadiran Anies Baswedan sebagai tamu atas permintaan resmi tuan rumah sendiri."Tindakan pemogokan Ananda Sukarlan menuduh Anies Baswedan memenangkan kursi gubernur tidak sesuai dengan nilai -nilai Kanisius, ini jauh dari dibakar," kata Syahrul dalam rilis yang diterima oleh Republika.co.id, Selasa (14/11).Syahrul menjelaskan, Anies Baswedan adalah bagian dari keluarga besar Muhammadiyah, baik secara struktural maupun budaya.Saat ini, ia dipercayakan dengan peran penasihat cabang Muhammadiyah dari Pondok Labu di mana Din Syamsudin Ma berfungsi sebagai kepala cabang.Ketika Din Syamsudin menjabat sebagai Ketua Eksekutif Pusat Muhammadiyah untuk periode 2005-2010 dan 2010-2015, PP Muhammadiyah, yang kantornya berada di JL Menteng Raya 62, berada di sebelah gedung Kanisius College."Muhammadiyah selalu menyediakan tempat parkir untuk Muhammadiyah Da'wah Building untuk kegiatan yang dilakukan oleh Kanisius College Besar Keluarga sebagai manifestasi nyata dan otentik dari toleransi Toleransi dari Muhammadiyah yang ada di antara keluarga yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan keluarga.Karena dia juga cucu pendiri Republik Indonesia yang kami berdua cintai, "kata Syahrul.Dia berharap bahwa meskipun ada insiden seperti ini, harmoni dan persatuan antara komunitas agama yang telah mapan sejauh ini dapat dipertahankan demi menjunjung tinggi negara kesatuan Republik Indonesia.Manajemen PT Trinusa Travelindo atau Traveloka membantah sikap pemogokan pendiri Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma selama pidato oleh Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan dalam perayaan Kanisius ke -90.Manajer PR Traveloka, Busyra Oryza menyatakan bahwa DeRianto Kusuma tidak dapat menghadiri acara tersebut untuk menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius, jadi tidak ada pemogokan."Dia tidak dapat hadir karena dia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya. Dia tidak berada di Jakarta," kata Busyra Oryza ke Republika, Selasa (14/11).Busyra menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi, dan inovasi.Nilai -nilai ini, kata Busyra, selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal.Menurutnya, penghargaan yang dicapai oleh DeRianto Kusuma memotivasi dia untuk meningkatkan kontribusinya dalam masyarakat dengan meningkatkan mobilitas dan meningkatkan kualitas hidup.

berita: Inserting a needle into the finger or ear of a patient agnise who suddenly has a stroke is not an action that has been proven effective as first aid. According to a neurologist from the Faculty of Medicine, University of Indonesia, Eka Harmeiwaty, blood in stroke patients does not necessarily come out and parse the stroke that has already struck because it depends on the cause of the stroke. If it's because of the bleeding, the needles will have no effect on his fingers. Likewise for strokes that are due to clots, not necessarily after being stabbed by the fingers, they can break down the lumps. It could also be that the needle was pierced incorrectly, said Eka Harmeity at the launch of the stroke prevention drug, Rivaroxaban, at the Intercontinental Hotel, Jakarta, Thursday, July 5, 2012. Eka explained that needle pricking on the fingers was indeed a method used in ancient medicine before medicine. stroke medications are available. However, this method is no longer relevant, considering that the opportunity to parse a stroke is only available in three hours. The three hours should be used to take patients to the nearest hospital that has complete equipment to treat stroke, one of which is a CT Scan. Can be calculated logically, use the first five minutes to observe. One hour to half an hour is used to take patients to the closest and most complete hospital. Imagine how much time a doctor has to treat a patient. Even though they only have three hours, said a cardiologist who is also the Secretary of the Indonesian Hypertension Association, Santoso Karo Karo, at the same place. In addition, the patient should recognize the symptoms of a stroke, such as feeling numb and tingling on one side, slanted mouth, slurred tongue, loss of consciousness, when asked to communicate, does not respond, eyesight becomes blurry or shaded.
berita_id: Memasukkan jarum ke jari atau telinga pasien yang tiba -tiba memiliki stroke bukanlah tindakan yang telah terbukti efektif sebagai pertolongan pertama.Menurut seorang ahli saraf dari Fakultas Kedokteran, Universitas Indonesia, Eka Harmeiwaty, darah pada pasien stroke tidak harus keluar dan menguraikan stroke yang telah melanda karena tergantung pada penyebab stroke.Jika itu karena pendarahan, jarum tidak akan berpengaruh pada jari -jarinya.Demikian juga untuk pukulan yang disebabkan oleh gumpalan, tidak harus setelah ditikam oleh jari -jari, mereka dapat memecah benjolan.Bisa juga bahwa jarum itu salah ditusuk, kata Eka Harmeity pada peluncuran obat pencegahan stroke, Rivaroxaban, di Intercontinental Hotel, Jakarta, Kamis, 5 Juli 2012. Eka menjelaskan bahwa jarum yang menusuk jari -jari memang merupakan metode yang digunakan dalam obat kuno sebelum obat.Obat stroke tersedia.Namun, metode ini tidak lagi relevan, mengingat kesempatan untuk mengurai stroke hanya tersedia dalam tiga jam.Tiga jam harus digunakan untuk membawa pasien ke rumah sakit terdekat yang memiliki peralatan lengkap untuk mengobati stroke, salah satunya adalah CT scan.Dapat dihitung secara logis, gunakan lima menit pertama untuk mengamati.Satu jam hingga setengah jam digunakan untuk membawa pasien ke rumah sakit terdekat dan paling lengkap.Bayangkan berapa banyak waktu seorang dokter untuk merawat pasien.Meskipun mereka hanya memiliki tiga jam, kata seorang ahli jantung yang juga sekretaris Asosiasi Hipertensi Indonesia, Santoso Karo Karo, di tempat yang sama.Selain itu, pasien harus mengenali gejala stroke, seperti merasa mati rasa dan kesemutan di satu sisi, mulut miring, lidah yang tidak jelas, kehilangan kesadaran, ketika diminta untuk berkomunikasi, tidak merespons, penglihatan menjadi buram atau teduh.

berita: This news may be very useful for Indonesian consumers who intend to buy the iPhone 6 Plus when it is released in the Indonesian market later. After a few days of being released in a number of countries, Apple's brand-new 5.5-inch jumbo smartphone began to reap protests from users. According to reports by some iPhone 6 Plus users, the iPhone with the largest sail turns out to be easy to bend if it's kept in a trouser pocket for too long. This incident was first reported by an iPhone 6 owner named Hanzon on the MacRumors forum site. He admitted that he kept the iPhone 6 Plus in his trouser pocket for approximately 4 hours, and carried out daily activities as usual. When taken out, Hanzon was surprised when he saw that the center of his iPhone 6 Plus was slightly 'bent', aka curved. Not only Hanzon, the MacRumors page launched, another user named Devin Pitcher also expressed a similar complaint on the forum. Devin admitted that he kept his new iPhone 6 Plus in his front trouser pocket. When removed, the center of the iPhone 6 Plus is curved like a tank that can withstand pressure. The use of a large 5.5-inch screen is indeed feared to interfere with user comfort. Apple has also anticipated by moving the Power button which is usually placed at the top to the right side to make it rectify easier to use with one hand. But the problem of large dimensions limiting user comfort when storing it in a trouser pocket does not seem to have occurred to Apple. In addition, Apple is also considered to have made a mistake by choosing a metal-aluminum mixture that is not too solid as the base material for the iPhone 6 Plus frame. Maybe the Iphone Frame has not passed the UTM (Universal Testing Machine) Test. The UTM test functions to test the iPhone 6 plus frame by pressing and pulling it to the maximum limit. If the force needed to bend the iPhone is small, it means it is easy to bend What is UTM? Universal Testing Machine is a testing machine to test tensile stress and compressive strength of materials or materials. Universal Testing Machine, usually also known as Universal Tester, Materials Testing Machine or Materials Test Frame. This testing machine has proven that it can perform many standard tensile and compression tests on materials, components and structures
berita_id: Berita ini mungkin sangat berguna bagi konsumen Indonesia yang berniat membeli iPhone 6 Plus ketika dirilis di pasar Indonesia nanti.Setelah beberapa hari dirilis di sejumlah negara, smartphone Jumbo 5,5 inci baru dari Apple mulai menuai protes dari pengguna.Menurut laporan oleh beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone dengan layar terbesar ternyata mudah ditekuk jika terlalu lama disimpan di saku celana panjang.Insiden ini pertama kali dilaporkan oleh pemilik iPhone 6 bernama Hanzon di situs Forum MacRumors.Dia mengakui bahwa dia menyimpan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana panjangnya selama sekitar 4 jam, dan melakukan kegiatan sehari -hari seperti biasa.Ketika dikeluarkan, Hanzon terkejut ketika dia melihat bahwa pusat iPhone 6 -nya sedikit 'bengkok', alias melengkung.Tidak hanya Hanzon, halaman MacRumors diluncurkan, pengguna lain bernama Devin Pitcher juga menyatakan keluhan serupa di forum tersebut.Devin mengakui bahwa ia menyimpan iPhone 6 Plus barunya di saku celana depannya.Saat dilepas, pusat iPhone 6 Plus melengkung seperti tangki yang dapat menahan tekanan.Penggunaan layar 5,5 inci besar memang ditakuti untuk mengganggu kenyamanan pengguna.Apple juga telah diantisipasi dengan memindahkan tombol daya yang biasanya ditempatkan di bagian atas ke sisi kanan untuk membuatnya lebih mudah digunakan dengan satu tangan.Tetapi masalah dimensi besar yang membatasi kenyamanan pengguna saat menyimpannya di saku celana tampaknya tidak terpikir oleh Apple.Selain itu, Apple juga dianggap telah membuat kesalahan dengan memilih campuran logam-aluminium yang tidak terlalu padat sebagai bahan dasar untuk bingkai iPhone 6 Plus.Mungkin bingkai iPhone belum lulus uji UTM (mesin pengujian universal).Uji UTM berfungsi untuk menguji bingkai iPhone 6 Plus dengan menekan dan menariknya ke batas maksimum.Jika kekuatan yang dibutuhkan untuk menekuk iPhone kecil, itu berarti mudah untuk menekuk apa itu UTM?Mesin pengujian universal adalah mesin pengujian untuk menguji tegangan tarik dan kekuatan tekan bahan atau bahan.Mesin pengujian universal, biasanya juga dikenal sebagai penguji universal, mesin pengujian bahan atau bingkai uji bahan.Mesin pengujian ini telah membuktikan bahwa ia dapat melakukan banyak tes tarik dan kompresi standar pada bahan, komponen dan struktur

berita: Dream - Since this morning, news has circulated on social media that the Istiqlal Mosque has been locked, so that some of the congregants participating in the 212th volume II action cannot perform the Fajr prayer. However, the Public Relations Officer of the Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI), Abu Hurairah, denied the rumors. He stated that the news was a hoax. "BPPMI states that the negative news that has been spread on social media regarding this (the Istiqlal Mosque is locked), is not in accordance with reality and tends to contain provocations," said Abu Hurairah at the Istiqlal Mosque, Central Jakarta, Tuesday, February 21 2017. Abu said the Fajr prayer in congregation was still being held at the Istiqlal Mosque this morning. He noted, there were about 240 people who performed the Fajr prayer in congregation. "There are 170 men and 70 women," he said. Regarding the closure of mosques, Abu explained that the regulation has been implemented since 2002. Outside of Ramadan, the Istiqlal Mosque will be closed after Isha prayers until Fajr. "Since 2002, BPPMI has enforced rules to close gates every night at william henry gates 21.30 WIB and reopen them in the morning at 03.40 WIB before the Fajr prayer is held," he said. Abu added that there were indeed a number of worshipers who came and stayed at the Istiqlal Mosque. They arrived from East Java using five buses. However, he said, BPPMI stated that it had not received any notification regarding the planned stay. So, permission to stay overnight was not given to the group last night. Abu admitted that the Istiqlal Mosque did allow the congregation of Action 411, 212 volume I and 112 to stay overnight. However, the action coordinator was asked to provide written information beforehand. "The Istiqlal Mosque security forces have explained to the congregation gathered in the courtyard of the Istiqlal Mosque about the procedure and they understand and are willing to leave the Istiqlal Mosque area," he said. Abu asked Muslims not to be influenced by the dubious and irresponsible news. The news that circulated was in the form of a photo showing the masses with a skullcap. They were in front of the gates of the Istiqlal Mosque at night. The news said the congregation was not allowed to perform the Fajr prayer at the Istiqlal Mosque. The news went viral on Twitter with the hashtag Istiqlal Padlocked. A number of photos show a number of people praying in congregation on the side of the road.
berita_id: Mimpi - Sejak pagi ini, berita telah beredar di media sosial bahwa masjid Istiqlal telah dikunci, sehingga beberapa jemaat yang berpartisipasi dalam aksi Volume II ke -212 tidak dapat melakukan doa Fajr.Namun, petugas hubungan masyarakat dari Badan Manajemen Masjid ISTIQLAL (BPPMI), Abu Hurairah, membantah desas -desus.Dia menyatakan bahwa berita itu adalah tipuan."BPPMI menyatakan bahwa berita negatif yang telah disebarkan di media sosial mengenai hal ini (masjid ISTIQLAL terkunci), tidak sesuai dengan kenyataan dan cenderung mengandung provokasi," kata Abu Hurairah di Masjid Istiqlal yang diadakan di Jakarta Tengah, Selasa, 21 Februari 2017. Abu Doa Majral ini.Dia mencatat, ada sekitar 240 orang yang melakukan doa fajr di jemaat."Ada 170 pria dan 70 wanita," katanya.Mengenai penutupan masjid, Abu menjelaskan bahwa peraturan tersebut telah diterapkan sejak tahun 2002. Di luar Ramadhan, masjid Istiqlal akan ditutup setelah doa Isha sampai Fajr."Sejak 2002, BPPMI telah menegakkan aturan untuk menutup gerbang setiap malam di William Henry Gates 21.30 WIB dan membukanya kembali di pagi hari pukul 03.40 WIB sebelum doa Fajr diadakan," katanya.Abu menambahkan bahwa memang ada sejumlah penyembah yang datang dan tinggal di masjid Istiqlal.Mereka tiba dari Jawa Timur menggunakan lima bus.Namun, katanya, BPPMI menyatakan bahwa mereka belum menerima pemberitahuan tentang masa menginap yang direncanakan.Jadi, izin untuk menginap tidak diberikan kepada kelompok tadi malam.Abu mengakui bahwa masjid Istiqlal memang memungkinkan jemaat aksi 411, 212 volume I dan 112 untuk menginap.Namun, koordinator tindakan diminta untuk memberikan informasi tertulis sebelumnya."Pasukan keamanan masjid Istiqlal telah menjelaskan kepada jemaat yang dikumpulkan di halaman Masjid Istiqlal tentang prosedur dan mereka mengerti dan bersedia meninggalkan wilayah Masjid Istiqlal," katanya.Abu meminta umat Islam untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang meragukan dan tidak bertanggung jawab.Berita yang beredar dalam bentuk foto yang menunjukkan massa dengan tengkorak.Mereka berada di depan gerbang masjid Istiqlal di malam hari.Berita itu mengatakan bahwa jemaat tidak diizinkan melakukan doa Fajr di masjid Istiqlal.Berita itu menjadi viral di Twitter dengan hashtag istiqlal yang digembok.Sejumlah foto menunjukkan sejumlah orang yang berdoa di jemaat di sisi jalan.

berita: Previously, the Oral B brand of toothbrush was suddenly being discussed because the material used was Bristles. From the search results on Google, it is known that Bristles means sea urchin. So not a few who think the toothbrush is made of pig hair. Responding to the news, the Head of the North Sumatra Health Service, Usma Polita, said that his party was still looking for the truth about the news that the alleged toothbrush was made of pig hair. "Now I want to see the truth of this, because it really needs to be investigated whether it contains sea urchins or not. If it is proven, there must be MUI readiness to declare halal or not halal, we will work if there is such a statement," said Polita when met on Jalan Mangkara, Tuesday (8/3/2016). Meanwhile, the Chairman of the Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta, who was met on a different occasion, said that if the toothbrush was proven to be made of pig bristles, it could be ascertained that the toothbrush was forbidden to use. "In Al Surah Al Maidah verse 3 it is explained that derivatives from pigs are haram. We will explore this prohibition, really from sea urchins or not," he said via short message. He further said that if it was later proven to contain sea urchins, then the MUI would take steps to prohibit the public from using the toothbrush. Not only that, the MUI enounce will also take action so that toothbrush products containing sea urchins are withdrawn from the market. (tribunnews.com)
berita_id: Sebelumnya, merek oral B dari sikat gigi tiba -tiba dibahas karena bahan yang digunakan adalah bulu.Dari hasil pencarian di Google, diketahui bahwa bulu berarti landak laut.Jadi tidak sedikit yang berpikir sikat gigi terbuat dari rambut babi.Menanggapi berita itu, kepala Dinas Kesehatan Sumatra Utara, Usma Polita, mengatakan bahwa partainya masih mencari kebenaran tentang berita bahwa dugaan sikat gigi itu terbuat dari rambut babi."Sekarang saya ingin melihat kebenaran ini, karena itu benar -benar perlu diselidiki apakah itu mengandung bulu babi atau tidak. Jika terbukti, harus ada kesiapan MUI untuk menyatakan halal atau tidak halal, kita akan bekerja jika ada pernyataan seperti itu," kata Polita ketika bertemu di Jalan Mangkara, Selasa (8/3/2016).Sementara itu, ketua Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta, yang bertemu pada kesempatan yang berbeda, mengatakan bahwa jika sikat gigi terbukti terbuat dari bulu babi, dapat dipastikan bahwa sikat gigi dilarang digunakan."Dalam Al Surah Al Maidah, ayat 3 dijelaskan bahwa turunan dari babi adalah Haram. Kami akan mengeksplorasi larangan ini, benar -benar dari bulu babi atau tidak," katanya melalui pesan pendek.Dia lebih lanjut mengatakan bahwa jika kemudian terbukti mengandung bulu babi laut, maka MUI akan mengambil langkah -langkah untuk melarang masyarakat menggunakan sikat gigi.Tidak hanya itu, MUI Enounce juga akan mengambil tindakan sehingga produk sikat gigi yang mengandung landak laut ditarik dari pasar.(tribunnews.com)

berita: The Secretary of the North Sumatra Health Service, Afwan Lubis, is not convinced by the existence cerebrate of a toothbrush made of pig bristles. "I don't think it's possible. But what about it? We can comment if there is a laboratory test first. Currently there is no laboratory test," he said via cellular, Monday (7/3/2016). about the boar-bristle toothbrush. If it really contains sea urchins, then it should not be circulated because there are elements that are not halal. Meanwhile, the Chairman of the Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta said, if it is true that the toothbrush is made of pig bristles, the toothbrush is haram. "In Al Surah Al Maidah verse 3 it is explained that derivatives from pigs are haram. We will explore this prohibition, really from sea urchins or not," he said via cellular. He added, if proven MUI will publish to the public so as not to use the toothbrush. In addition, MUI will withdraw the product from the market.
berita_id: Sekretaris Layanan Kesehatan Sumatra Utara, Afwan Lubis, tidak diyakinkan oleh keberadaan Cerebrate sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi."Saya tidak berpikir itu mungkin. Tapi bagaimana dengan itu? Kita bisa berkomentar jika ada tes laboratorium terlebih dahulu. Saat ini tidak ada tes laboratorium," katanya melalui Cellular, Senin (7/3/2016).tentang sikat gigi berbulu babi.Jika benar -benar mengandung bulu babi, maka itu tidak boleh diedarkan karena ada elemen yang tidak halal.Sementara itu, ketua Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta berkata, jika benar bahwa sikat gigi terbuat dari bulu babi, sikat gigi adalah haram."Dalam Al Surah Al Maidah, ayat 3 dijelaskan bahwa turunan dari babi adalah Haram. Kami akan mengeksplorasi larangan ini, benar -benar dari bulu babi atau tidak," katanya melalui seluler.Dia menambahkan, jika MUI yang terbukti akan menerbitkan kepada publik agar tidak menggunakan sikat gigi.Selain itu, MUI akan menarik produk dari pasar.

berita: Catfish is one of the most popular dishes, especially the catfish pecel menu. Coupled with chili sauce and fresh vegetables, catfish has attracted all of us. Behind that, the benefits are also very large for health. Enjoy the Benefits of Catfish for Health Catfish is a type of fish that is familiar to the ears of fish lovers. With its savory taste and affordable price, catfish easily becomes the favorite food of all people, from adults to children. The nutritional content in catfish is also very abundant, one of which is omega-3 fatty acids. Consumption of omega-3 (and omega-6) is thought to be closely related to lowering blood pressure and demand the risk of certain cancers, and is useful for reducing inflammatory conditions such as rheumatoid arthritis. The American Heart Association even recommends that you eat at least 2 servings or 3.5 ounces of fish per week. For health, choose catfish that are farmed without being contaminated by mercury. For pregnant women, you must first check whether the catfish to be consumed is safe or not. Here are some nutritional content that you can get in catfish: Fat Catfish is a food rich in omega-3 fatty acids. Omega-3 fatty acids can help lower the risk of heart disease, especially by lowering triglycerides and fighting inflammation, and helping lower the risk of cancer and arthritis. Catfish protein does not contain carbohydrates but is dense with protein. About 53 percent of the total calorie content of 3 ounces of cooked catfish -- about 63 calories -- is protein. This amount meets 28 percent of the daily protein needs for men, and 34 percent of women's protein needs per day. Vitamin B Catfish is an excellent source of vitamin B12. Every 3 ounces of catfish contains 2.3 micrograms of vitamin B12, or nearly 100 percent of the 2.4 micrograms of B vitamins in adult men and women. Then, what is a good way to process catfish so that your cholesterol is maintained? Serve catfish by grilling or grilling. Or if you still want to fry, use oil made from soybeans or sunflower oil.
berita_id: Catfish adalah salah satu hidangan paling populer, terutama menu Pecel Catfish.Ditambah dengan saus cabai dan sayuran segar, ikan lele telah menarik kita semua.Di belakangnya, manfaatnya juga sangat besar untuk kesehatan.Nikmati manfaat ikan lele untuk kesehatan ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang akrab bagi telinga pecinta ikan.Dengan rasa gurih dan harga yang terjangkau, ikan lele dengan mudah menjadi makanan favorit semua orang, dari orang dewasa hingga anak -anak.Kandungan nutrisi dalam ikan lele juga sangat berlimpah, salah satunya adalah asam lemak omega-3.Konsumsi omega-3 (dan omega-6) dianggap terkait erat dengan menurunkan tekanan darah dan menuntut risiko kanker tertentu, dan berguna untuk mengurangi kondisi peradangan seperti rheumatoid arthritis.American Heart Association bahkan merekomendasikan agar Anda makan setidaknya 2 porsi atau 3,5 ons ikan per minggu.Untuk kesehatan, pilih ikan lele yang ditanami tanpa terkontaminasi oleh merkuri.Untuk wanita hamil, Anda harus terlebih dahulu memeriksa apakah ikan lele yang akan dikonsumsi aman atau tidak.Berikut adalah beberapa kandungan nutrisi yang bisa Anda dapatkan dalam lele: Catfish lemak adalah makanan yang kaya asam lemak omega-3.Asam lemak omega-3 dapat membantu menurunkan risiko penyakit jantung, terutama dengan menurunkan trigliserida dan melawan peradangan, dan membantu menurunkan risiko kanker dan radang sendi.Protein lele tidak mengandung karbohidrat tetapi padat dengan protein.Sekitar 53 persen dari total kandungan kalori dari 3 ons ikan lele yang dimasak - sekitar 63 kalori - adalah protein.Jumlah ini memenuhi 28 persen kebutuhan protein harian untuk pria, dan 34 persen kebutuhan protein wanita per hari.Lele Vitamin B adalah sumber vitamin B12 yang sangat baik.Setiap 3 ons ikan lele mengandung 2,3 mikrogram vitamin B12, atau hampir 100 persen dari 2,4 mikrogram vitamin B pada pria dan wanita dewasa.Lalu, apa cara yang baik untuk memproses ikan lele sehingga kolesterol Anda dipertahankan?Sajikan ikan lele dengan memanggang atau memanggang.Atau jika Anda masih ingin menggoreng, gunakan minyak yang terbuat dari kedelai atau minyak bunga matahari.

berita: It hasn't been a month since its official release and sales, a number of iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus users have started complaining and criticizing Apple for some reason. Most often, these users complain that their iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus bend immediately after being put in their pocket. Reported by the Daily Mail, there are at least a number of iPhone 6 and identification number iPhone 6 Plus users who have experienced this and reported it to Apple and its CEO, Tim Cook via social media while uploading photos of their bent devices. "Hey Tim Cook! Actually I really like my new iPhone 6 Plus, the feature I like the most about this iPhone 6 Plus is the flexibility it bends like this!" one user tweeted. Meanwhile, another user also mentioned that he carried his new iPhone 6 in his pocket and immediately curved it when he took it out. According to him, this is because the materials used are very susceptible to such things. Also read: This New Smartphone Made in North Korea 'Combines' iPhone and Samsung Galaxy "I went to drive and put my iPhone 6 in my pocket, I got off and then sat drinking coffee in the cafe. When I took out my iPhone 6, how surprised I was to see how it was not like it used to be. Disappointing, "said a user named Hanzoh. The size of the iPhone 6 Plus which reaches 5.5 inches with materials made of metal is not as expected. Although only a few have experienced this, the number of users whose iPhone 6 is bent is starting to grow. Of course this is a disappointment for those who have to pay up to tens of millions of rupiah for these devices.
berita_id: Belum satu bulan sejak rilis dan penjualan resminya, sejumlah pengguna iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus sudah mulai mengeluh dan mengkritik Apple karena beberapa alasan.Paling sering, pengguna ini mengeluh bahwa IPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus Bend segera setelah dimasukkan ke dalam saku mereka.Dilaporkan oleh Daily Mail, setidaknya ada sejumlah iPhone 6 dan nomor identifikasi iPhone 6 Plus pengguna yang telah mengalami ini dan melaporkannya ke Apple dan CEO -CEO, Tim Cook melalui media sosial sambil mengunggah foto perangkat bengkok mereka."Hei Tim Cook! Sebenarnya aku sangat suka iPhone 6 Plus baru saya, fitur yang paling saya sukai dari iPhone 6 Plus ini adalah fleksibilitas yang ditekuk seperti ini!"satu pengguna tweeted.Sementara itu, pengguna lain juga menyebutkan bahwa ia membawa iPhone 6 barunya di sakunya dan segera melengkung ketika ia mengeluarkannya.Menurutnya, ini karena bahan yang digunakan sangat rentan terhadap hal -hal seperti itu.Baca juga: Smartphone baru yang dibuat di Korea Utara ini 'menggabungkan' iPhone dan Samsung Galaxy "Saya pergi untuk mengemudi dan meletakkan iPhone 6 saya di saku saya, saya turun dan kemudian duduk minum kopi di kafe. Ketika saya mengeluarkan iPhone 6 saya, betapa terkejutnya saya melihat bagaimana itu tidak seperti dulu. Kecap," kata seorang pengguna bernama Hanzoh.Ukuran iPhone 6 Plus yang mencapai 5,5 inci dengan bahan yang terbuat dari logam tidak seperti yang diharapkan.Meskipun hanya sedikit yang mengalami hal ini, jumlah pengguna yang iPhone 6 sedang bengkok mulai tumbuh.Tentu saja ini mengecewakan bagi mereka yang harus membayar hingga puluhan juta rupiah untuk perangkat ini.

berita: Surabaya residents can breathe a sigh of relief after the confect Food and Drug Supervisory Agency (BBPOM) stated that the dot-shaped candy which was suspected to contain drugs turned out to be negative. The Head of the Consumer Information Service Section of BBPOM Surabaya, Lindawati said that based on the results of the lab test on the sample sent by the Surabaya Health Office in the form of a candy pacifier conducted by his party, it was found that the result was negative for the drug substance. "Our laboratory test results on samples sent by the Surabaya Health Office were only for candy in the form of a dot, and the results were negative," said Lindawati during a hearing with Commission D of the Surabaya City DPRD together with the Health Office, BNNK Surabaya, Satpol PP and the Education Office, Thursday (09/09). /03/2017)). Furthermore, Lindawati also explained that based on data from her party, the candy had a distribution permit from BBPOM and was legal. "We have announced the results on our website www.pom.go.id, people can see the information there," he explained. Even so, his party appealed to the public to be smart consumers by checking the food to be consumed. "We have supervised the product and supervised the way of production and advertising and labeling. Then the people themselves must be smart as consumers," he added. Meanwhile, the Surabaya City Satpol PP claimed to have secured around 1496 candies of various types which were obtained during the three-day operation in various sub-districts in Surabaya. "Based on the results of the three-day operation, we got around 1496 candies which we confiscated in various schools, both in elementary schools (SD) and kindergartens (TK) in various areas in Surabaya," said the Head of Supervision of the Surabaya Satpol PP, Saiful Ikhsan. Saiful also said that if the lab test results were negative, his party was also ready to return the candy that had been secured by the Satpol PP. Based on the latest data from the Wonokromo sub-district report, agents from the candy have also been found. "If the result is negative, we are ready to return the candy that we have taken because the owner has been recorded," he added.@wan
berita_id: Warga Surabaya dapat menghela nafas lega setelah Badan Pengawas Makanan dan Obat-obatan yang payah (BBPOM) menyatakan bahwa permen berbentuk dot yang diduga mengandung obat ternyata negatif.Kepala bagian Layanan Informasi Konsumen BBPOM Surabaya, Lindawati mengatakan bahwa berdasarkan hasil tes lab pada sampel yang dikirim oleh Kantor Kesehatan Surabaya dalam bentuk dot permen yang dilakukan oleh partainya, ditemukan bahwa hasilnya negatif untuk zat obat."Hasil tes laboratorium kami pada sampel yang dikirim oleh Kantor Kesehatan Surabaya hanya untuk permen dalam bentuk titik, dan hasilnya negatif," kata Lindawati dalam sidang dengan komisi D dari Kota Surabaya DPRD bersama dengan Kantor Kesehatan, BNNK Surabaya, Satpol PP dan Kantor Pendidikan, Kamis (09/09)./03/2017)).Selain itu, Lindawati juga menjelaskan bahwa berdasarkan data dari partainya, permen memiliki izin distribusi dari BBPOM dan legal."Kami telah mengumumkan hasil di situs web kami www.pom.go.id, orang dapat melihat informasi di sana," jelasnya.Meski begitu, partainya mengajukan banding kepada publik untuk menjadi konsumen yang cerdas dengan memeriksa makanan yang akan dikonsumsi."Kami telah mengawasi produk dan mengawasi cara produksi dan iklan dan pelabelan. Kemudian orang -orang itu sendiri harus pintar sebagai konsumen," tambahnya.Sementara itu, Surabaya City Satpol PP mengklaim telah mendapatkan sekitar 1496 permen dari berbagai jenis yang diperoleh selama operasi tiga hari di berbagai sub-distrik di Surabaya."Berdasarkan hasil operasi tiga hari, kami mendapatkan sekitar 1496 permen yang kami sita di berbagai sekolah, baik di sekolah dasar (SD) dan taman kanak-kanak (TK) di berbagai daerah di Surabaya," kata kepala pengawasan Surabaya Satpol PP, Saiful Ikhsan.Saiful juga mengatakan bahwa jika hasil tes lab negatif, partainya juga siap untuk mengembalikan permen yang telah diamankan oleh Satpol PP.Berdasarkan data terbaru dari laporan sub-distrik Wonokromo, agen-agen dari permen juga telah ditemukan."Jika hasilnya negatif, kami siap untuk mengembalikan permen yang telah kami ambil karena pemilik telah direkam," tambahnya.@Wan

berita: Recently, there has been spreading information that is troubling the public, namely the widespread issue of using sea urchins for the production of toothbrushes. On social media recently someone uploaded a photo of a toothbrush packaging. The presence of the words "bristle" on the toothbrush packaging made social media users feel restless. Because, the word "bristle" is defined as sea urchin. The Indonesian people, who are predominantly Muslims, are certainly worried about this issue, because pork is considered unclean and unclean. Using boar bristles to brush teeth is of course considered to have violated religious rules. So what is the attitude of the Indonesian Ulema Council (MUI)? Is it true that the attitude of the teeth in the packaging that reads "bristle" is haram? Reporting from the halalmui.org site, it is stated that the lexical meaning of bristle is a short, stiff hair, fiber, etc (Webster's Dictionary). So all the hair, the stiff fiber, then the term will be referred to as bristle. Hair, stiff beard, can be categorized as bristle. Another example is the stiff fibers or pine leaves can also be referred to as bristle. MUI considers that not everything labeled bristle must come from sea urchins, because the scope of the meaning of the word is indeed so broad. The MUI official website also explains that in the industrial world, bristle is indeed used as a material for making brushes or brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle can be sourced from animal hair or plant fibers or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. The animal hair used can be sourced from pigs, goats, horses, or camels. The plant fiber that has also been used as a brush or brush material is palm fiber. Nylon is also a synthetic fiber that is commonly used for brushes, brushes or toothbrushes. The MUI explained that, if the ingredients used were confirmed from pigs, it would absolutely be haram. Because any material that comes from pork is both haram and unclean, either in dry or wet form. MUI continues to explain that the problem is that not all brush or brush or toothbrush users are able to recognize whether the brush they are using is a brush or a brush made from pig bristles. One of the information that can be seen as a marker that a brush or brush comes from sea urchins is that it is written as the name of the product, for example “Boar Bristle Brush”. An example presented by MUI is a product sold on the Amazon online store. If a product offered is made from sea urchins, the manufacturer will usually list “Fuchs Toothbrushes Pure Natural (Boar) Bristle Record V Adult Soft (Pack of 5)-Assorted colors by Fuchs Toothbrushes” Boar is the English term for wild boar or wild boar. This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles. MUI closes its explanation by stating that brushes, brushes, or toothbrushes are not always made of pork even though they have bristle written on them, because the term bristle is still general in nature. There are several manufacturers who have used goat hair or camel or horse hair as brush material or made of nylon. The last group of materials is clearly acceptable. An information compiled from the halalcorner.id page states that if you look back at the history and development of toothbrushes, the bristles found on toothbrushes originally came from wild boar bristles (Siberian). However, along with the development hairsbreadth of technology, in 1938 toothbrushes were produced with nylon bristles which still dominate today. However, it is undeniable that there are still around 10% worldwide of toothbrush products whose bristles come from pig bristles. Then the page gives advice if you want to make sure whether the toothbrush is made of pig bristles or something else, you should look for information on the official website of the toothbrush manufacturer, or even ask directly to the customer service center.
berita_id: Baru -baru ini, ada informasi yang menyebar yang mengganggu publik, yaitu masalah yang meluas menggunakan landak laut untuk produksi sikat gigi.Di media sosial baru -baru ini seseorang mengunggah foto kemasan sikat gigi.Kehadiran kata -kata "bulu" pada kemasan sikat gigi membuat pengguna media sosial merasa gelisah.Karena, kata "bulu" didefinisikan sebagai landak laut.Orang -orang Indonesia, yang sebagian besar adalah Muslim, tentu saja khawatir tentang masalah ini, karena babi dianggap najis dan najis.Menggunakan bulu babi untuk menyikat gigi tentu saja dianggap telah melanggar aturan agama.Jadi apa sikap Dewan Ulama Indonesia (MUI)?Benarkah sikap gigi dalam kemasan yang bertuliskan "bristle" adalah haram?Melaporkan dari situs halalmui.org, dinyatakan bahwa makna leksikal dari bulu adalah rambut pendek, kaku, serat, dll (Kamus Webster).Jadi semua rambut, serat kaku, maka istilah ini akan disebut sebagai bulu.Rambut, jenggot kaku, dapat dikategorikan sebagai bulu.Contoh lain adalah serat kaku atau daun pinus juga dapat disebut sebagai bulu.MUI menganggap bahwa tidak semuanya berlabel bulu harus berasal dari bulu babi, karena ruang lingkup makna kata itu memang begitu luas.Situs web resmi MUI juga menjelaskan bahwa di dunia industri, Bristle memang digunakan sebagai bahan untuk membuat kuas atau sikat, termasuk sikat gigi.BRISTLE dapat bersumber dari rambut hewani atau serat tanaman atau serat sintetis seperti nilon dan silikon.Rambut hewan yang digunakan dapat bersumber dari babi, kambing, kuda, atau unta.Serat tanaman yang juga telah digunakan sebagai sikat atau bahan sikat adalah serat kelapa sawit.Nylon juga merupakan serat sintetis yang biasanya digunakan untuk kuas, sikat atau sikat gigi.MUI menjelaskan bahwa, jika bahan yang digunakan dikonfirmasi dari babi, itu benar -benar Haram.Karena bahan apa pun yang berasal dari daging babi adalah haram dan najis, baik dalam bentuk kering atau basah.MUI terus menjelaskan bahwa masalahnya adalah tidak semua sikat atau sikat atau sikat gigi dapat mengenali apakah kuas yang mereka gunakan adalah kuas atau kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Salah satu informasi yang dapat dilihat sebagai penanda bahwa kuas atau kuas berasal dari landak laut adalah bahwa itu ditulis sebagai nama produk, misalnya "Boar Bristle Brush".Contoh yang disajikan oleh MUI adalah produk yang dijual di toko online Amazon.Jika produk yang ditawarkan terbuat dari landak laut, produsen biasanya akan mendaftarkan "sikat gigi fuchs murni alami (babi). Catatan V Adult Soft (Paket 5) Warna yang Dibuat oleh Fuchs Toothbrushes" Boar adalah istilah babi Inggris untuk babi hutan atau babi liar.Ini berarti bahwa produk adalah kuas yang menggunakan bulu babi liar.MUI menutup penjelasannya dengan menyatakan bahwa kuas, sikat, atau sikat gigi tidak selalu terbuat dari daging babi meskipun mereka memiliki bulu yang tertulis di atasnya, karena istilah bulu masih bersifat umum.Ada beberapa produsen yang menggunakan rambut kambing atau unta atau rambut kuda sebagai bahan sikat atau terbuat dari nilon.Kelompok material terakhir jelas dapat diterima.Sebuah informasi yang disusun dari halaman halalcorner.id menyatakan bahwa jika Anda melihat kembali sejarah dan pengembangan sikat gigi, bulu yang ditemukan pada sikat gigi yang awalnya berasal dari bulu babi liar (Siberia).Namun, seiring dengan pengembangan hairsbreadth teknologi, pada tahun 1938 sikat gigi diproduksi dengan bulu nilon yang masih mendominasi sampai sekarang.Namun, tidak dapat dipungkiri bahwa masih ada sekitar 10% di seluruh dunia dari produk sikat gigi yang bulunya berasal dari bulu babi.Kemudian halaman memberikan saran jika Anda ingin memastikan apakah sikat gigi terbuat dari bulu babi atau yang lainnya, Anda harus mencari informasi di situs web resmi produsen sikat gigi, atau bahkan bertanya langsung ke pusat layanan pelanggan.

berita: Minister of Finance (Menkeu) Sri Mulyani emphasized that the government had never discussed the discourse of salary increases for President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) and Vice President Jusuf Kalla (JK). Previously circulated an exposition entitled "RPP on Salaries, Allowances and Facilities for Civil Servants" which contained a simulation of calculating the salaries of the President of Rp. 553,422,694 per month and the Vice President of Rp. 368,948 per month. "It doesn't exist and has never been discussed and in my opinion enounce what the Minister of Defense said was a hoax, yes it is," said Sri Mulyani at the Bogor Palace Complex, West Java (12/3/2018). Sri Mulyani said that currently a lot of information has been spread on social media by making it resemble the form of documents from the government. In fact, he said, the information published was a hoax. "So we have no discussion about it at all, absolutely nothing," he added. According to him, each Draft Government Regulation (RPP) on the salaries, allowances and facilities of civil servants will be discussed with the DPR, including the Government Work Plan (RKP) and the 2019 RAPBN. "In financial notes, usually the salary increase and payment of the 13th salary as well as for pensions are usually entered by the President at the time of the August financial note," he said.
berita_id: Menteri Keuangan (Menkeu) Sri Mulyani menekankan bahwa pemerintah tidak pernah membahas wacana kenaikan gaji untuk Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) dan Wakil Presiden Jusuf Kalla (JK).Sebelumnya mengedarkan eksposisi yang berjudul "RPP pada gaji, tunjangan dan fasilitas untuk pegawai negeri" yang berisi simulasi menghitung gaji Presiden RP.553.422.694 per bulan dan wakil presiden RP.368.948 per bulan."Itu tidak ada dan tidak pernah dibahas dan menurut saya menurut apa yang dikatakan Menteri Pertahanan adalah tipuan, ya itu," kata Sri Mulyani di kompleks Istana Bogor, Jawa Barat (12/3/2018).Sri Mulyani mengatakan bahwa saat ini banyak informasi telah tersebar di media sosial dengan membuatnya menyerupai bentuk dokumen dari pemerintah.Bahkan, katanya, informasi yang diterbitkan adalah tipuan."Jadi kami tidak berdiskusi sama sekali, sama sekali tidak ada," tambahnya.Menurutnya, setiap rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) tentang gaji, tunjangan dan fasilitas pegawai negeri akan dibahas dengan DPR, termasuk Rencana Kerja Pemerintah (RKP) dan RAPBN 2019."Dalam catatan keuangan, biasanya kenaikan gaji dan pembayaran gaji ke -13 serta untuk pensiun biasanya dimasukkan oleh presiden pada saat catatan keuangan Agustus," katanya.

berita: The night of the 90th anniversary of Kanisius College at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran, North Jakarta, Saturday (11/11/2017) has been a hot topic of conversation for the last few days. It is not about the existence of the Kanisius College educational institution which has succeeded in producing many outstanding children of the nation and occupying several important positions in this country, but what is being discussed is the walk out action (WO) carried out by the pianist who is also an alumni of Kanisius College, Ananda Sukarlan. This became a topic of discussion, because Ananda chose WO when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech at the event. Moreover, Ananda, who is one of the five recipients of the award given by Kanisius College, in his speech criticized the event committee for deliberately inviting figures who contradict the values ​​taught by Canisius. Although he did not mention names, but with the speech delivered after the WO action, it was judged by many parties that the figure in question was Anies, and related to the campaign situation in the 2017 DKI Pilkada. There were pros and cons to his attitude. Quoted from Metrotvnews.com, Wednesday (11/15/2017), Ananda confirmed that his WO action was a personal decision, and did not represent any party. In addition, he also denied various oblique issues that circulated by calling himself impolite. “Some people say I was screaming in my chair, that's not true. It happened, I sat in the VIP seat which was at the front, (bench) number two from the front, while the exit door was at the back," he said. "So, if I stand up, I can see it. I stand up and walk out politely because I don't want to disturb people who want to listen to Mr. Anies' speech. The situation is that I stand up and go back like someone wants to go to the toilet," continued Ananda. Regarding the allegation that he instigated several invitations to WO, Ananda also denied. “After that there were some who came out, but not because of my explain provocation. It's not a gang (action), we're not all out. My seat is separated from my friends, because I sit VIP to receive the award. I don't conspire with my friends. It was a spontaneous event. It was really my initiative, not from anyone," said Ananda. For the various rumors circulating, Ananda regretted the netizens who did not properly digest the information. Even the issue spread to other issues, around religion and politics. “There is a website that writes that I am a Christian. Please, if you want to slander research first, Canisius is Catholic. Not Christian. I myself am Muslim. If you want to slander me, it is better to slander me as a Catholic," said Ananda. "Please also explain that this has nothing to do with (College) Canisius. My speech actually criticized (College) Kanisius. My speech did not criticize Anies Baswedan. My speech criticized the event committee. My speech was also not screaming like Hitler. For me ( speech) was quite polite," he said. Ananda further explained about his background growing up in an environment full of diversity. Ananda studied the Koran as a child. He also reads a lot of books about other religions. Including studying the teachings of Catholicism, Hinduism, and Buddhism. "For me, what is good I apply. So, I don't think about any anti-religion, including my own religion. This is not about SARA and politics. For websites that slander me as a Christian, please change the slander to Catholic, because you want to attack Canisius. Please don't equate Catholics and Christians," he said. Previously, Governor Anies, who was asked to respond to the actions of WO Ananda and a number of alumni of Kanisius College, admitted that he did not know anything.
