But he insists that he has a good relationship with Kanisius. "I only found out after I was in the office. When I arrived this morning I didn't even know. I don't know. Because when I was in the room everyone was in there. In fact, Father Baskoro is my friend. He came here himself. Then Father Benny is a good friend," said Anies at Jakarta City Hall, Monday (11/13/2017). For what happened, Anies said, he respects any differences of opinion. He said everyone has the right to express their opinion in their own way. After all, he continued, as a leader, he has a duty to protect and greet all citizens, regardless of background. "I respect different views. I respect different views. And I give the right to anyone to express their way," said the former Minister of Education and Culture. "Our part is to greet everyone, protect everyone. So that's my responsibility as governor. So I will greet everyone and protect everyone if then there is a negative reaction, so that's just a bonus for me. There's nothing out of the ordinary. Relax," he concluded. . Interestingly, the pros and cons of this incident spread to the invitation to uninstall Traveloka in cyberspace. Reportedly, the invitation was triggered by the presence of one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, who greeted and congratulated Ananda for his actions. "Well, I think it's like this. We respect people with views. Respect different people. No need to uninstall and so on," said Anies in response to an invitation to uninstall Traveloka, Tuesday (14/11/2017). The reason, continued the former Chancellor of Paramadina University, the Traveloka application so far has provided benefits for the community. This invitation should not arise just because of differences of opinion. "Traveloka also provides benefits for many citizens. After all, it is a service that has great benefits for many people. So let's get used to different views in a healthy way, respecting each other without having to carry out punishments like that. So there's no need to uninstall all kinds of things. ," explained Anies.

Careful! Now circulating a toothbrush made of pig bristles. The way to find it is to look on the toothbrush package to see if it says “China Bristles” or “Bristles”. China Bristles is another name for sea urchins and is produced mostly by the Chinese region of China. We must know this because it is based on Imam Syafii's opinion that brushes made of sea urchins are unclean. Pig bristles are indeed the choice of toothbrush manufacturers because the price of the material is cheaper than synthetic bristles. Manufacturers only have to collect, clean and cut them. China is indeed a place that stocks a lot of pork skins because pork is considered halal by its people for consumption. It's not just a toothbrush that we have to watch out for, but a paint brush or a abound brush for greasing cakes must also be a concern for us as Muslims. A real example is the case of the brush brand Eterna which has been tested by LPPOM and the results are positive using sea urchins. Apart from looking at the packaging, there is another way to find out, namely by burning it. If the brush or brush smells bad, it's most likely using pig bristles. According to Imam Syafii, brushes made from pig bristles used to paint mosques will make the mosque covered with uncleanness and must be removed immediately. Moreover, if the sea urchin becomes a toothbrush that we use every day. Therefore, be careful and continue to be vigilant against various products that can bring harm to us as Muslims.
berita_id: Hati-hati!Sekarang mengedarkan sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Cara untuk menemukannya adalah dengan melihat paket sikat gigi untuk melihat apakah dikatakan "China Bristles" atau "bulu". Bulu Cina adalah nama lain untuk landak laut dan sebagian besar diproduksi oleh wilayah Cina di Tiongkok.Kita harus mengetahui hal ini karena didasarkan pada pendapat Imam Syafii bahwa kuas yang terbuat dari landak laut adalah najis.Babi babi memang merupakan pilihan produsen sikat gigi karena harga bahan lebih murah daripada bulu sintetis.Produsen hanya perlu mengumpulkan, membersihkan, dan memotongnya.China memang merupakan tempat yang menyediakan banyak kulit babi karena babi dianggap halal oleh orang -orangnya untuk dikonsumsi.Bukan hanya sikat gigi yang harus kita waspadai, tetapi sikat cat atau kuas yang berlimpah untuk kue yang berminyak juga harus menjadi perhatian bagi kita sebagai Muslim.Contoh nyata adalah kasus Brush Brand ETERNA yang telah diuji oleh LPPOM dan hasilnya positif menggunakan bulu babi.Selain melihat kemasannya, ada cara lain untuk mengetahuinya, yaitu dengan membakarnya.Jika kuas atau kuas berbau tidak enak, kemungkinan besar menggunakan bulu babi.Menurut Imam Syafii, kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi yang digunakan untuk melukis masjid akan membuat masjid ditutupi dengan kenajisan dan harus segera dihapus.Selain itu, jika landak laut menjadi sikat gigi yang kami gunakan setiap hari.Oleh karena itu, hati -hati dan terus waspada terhadap berbagai produk yang dapat membahayakan kita sebagai Muslim.

berita: The conversation emerged as a result of the Walk Out (WO) action of the famous Indonesian composer, Ananda Sukarlan when college the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech at the 90th anniversary of the establishment of Kanisius College at JIExpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Saturday (11/11). Rumors circulated, when Anies Baswedan gave a speech, Ananda suddenly stood up and then WO went out of the room. It is said that one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, who was present at the event, also greeted Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech. This was seen as support for Ananda's actions. However, the issue was finally clarified by Traveloka that Derianto was unable to attend at that time.
berita_id: Percakapan muncul sebagai akibat dari aksi Walk Out (WO) dari komposer Indonesia yang terkenal, Ananda Sukarlan ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato pada peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College di Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Sabtu/11/11.Rumor beredar, ketika Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato, Ananda tiba -tiba berdiri dan kemudian akan keluar dari ruangan.Dikatakan bahwa salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, yang hadir di acara tersebut, juga menyambut Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies.Ini dipandang sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Namun, masalah ini akhirnya diklarifikasi oleh Traveloka bahwa DeRianto tidak dapat hadir pada waktu itu.

berita: Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives finally reacted to the data jurisprudence leak of one million Facebook users in Indonesia. Facebook is considered to have violated applicable laws. Meutya Hafid, deputy chairman of the Golkar faction in Commission I, saw that Facebook had committed serious violations. Meutya cited Article 32 of the ITE Law as a rule that Facebook violated. "As a sovereign country, the law in Indonesia must be complied with and anyone who violates it will be subject to sanctions in accordance with the applicable laws ...," wrote Meutya when contacted via WhatsApp, Thursday (5/4). In addition, Meutya stated that the government could sue, impose sanctions, and close access to Facebook. He is worried that if the social network is not given any punishment, it will set a bad precedent for other internet companies in Indonesia. "Please the government can choose an option from the three." Meanwhile, Hanafi Rais from the PAN faction has proposed that Commission I of the DPR immediately summon Facebook Indonesia regarding the findings of the leaked data.
berita_id: Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia akhirnya bereaksi terhadap kebocoran yurisprudensi data satu juta pengguna Facebook di Indonesia.Facebook dianggap telah melanggar hukum yang berlaku.Meutya Hafid, wakil ketua faksi Golkar di Komisi I, melihat bahwa Facebook telah melakukan pelanggaran serius.Meutya mengutip Pasal 32 Hukum ITE sebagai aturan yang dilanggar Facebook."Sebagai negara yang berdaulat, undang -undang di Indonesia harus dipenuhi dan siapa pun yang melanggar itu akan dikenakan sanksi sesuai dengan hukum yang berlaku ...," tulis Meutya ketika dihubungi melalui WhatsApp, Kamis (5/4).Selain itu, Meutya menyatakan bahwa pemerintah dapat menuntut, menjatuhkan sanksi, dan mengakses akses dekat ke Facebook.Dia khawatir bahwa jika jejaring sosial tidak diberi hukuman apa pun, itu akan menetapkan preseden yang buruk untuk perusahaan internet lain di Indonesia."Tolong pemerintah dapat memilih opsi dari ketiganya."Sementara itu, Hanafi Rais dari faksi Pan telah mengusulkan agar Komisi I dari DPR segera memanggil Facebook Indonesia mengenai temuan data yang bocor.

berita: Metrotvnews.com, Jakarta: A reog Ponorogo at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao City, Philippines, was destroyed by burning on October 20, 2015. The Consulate General in Davao City emphasized that this burning was not an attempt to destroy or eliminate Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. Extermination is carried out with care and respect. "I have checked Davao. Reog and the dragon's interpreter head are damaged and infested with termites," Foreign Minister Retno Marsudi said via spokesperson Arrmanatha Nasir to Metrotvnews.com, Saturday (31/10/2015). "So, there is no intention of destroying cultural objects and has nothing to do with idols," he continued. Currently, the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City is communicating with parties in Indonesia to seek a new replacement for Ponorogo Reog.
berita_id: Metrotvnews.com, Jakarta: Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia di Kota Davao, Filipina, dihancurkan dengan membakar pada 20 Oktober 2015. Konsulat Jenderal di Kota Davao menekankan bahwa pembakaran ini bukanlah upaya untuk menghancurkan atau menghilangkan Reog Ponorogo sebagai sebuah asset budaya.Pemusnahan dilakukan dengan hati -hati dan hormat."Saya telah memeriksa Davao. Reog dan kepala penerjemah naga rusak dan terinfeksi rayap," kata Menteri Luar Negeri Retno Marsudi melalui juru bicara Arrmanatha Nasir ke Metrotvnews.com, Sabtu (31/10/2015)."Jadi, tidak ada niat untuk menghancurkan benda -benda budaya dan tidak ada hubungannya dengan berhala," lanjutnya.Saat ini, Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao berkomunikasi dengan partai -partai di Indonesia untuk mencari pengganti baru untuk Ponorogo Reog.

berita: iPhone 6 Plus is rumored to bend easily and bends easily when under pressure. Based on reports from a number of websites, a number of users of this sophisticated iPhone 6 Plus phablet have warped or bent the chassis after being put in the user's pocket. Why does the iPhone 6 Plus bend easily? Many speculate that the iPhone 6 Plus material is not strong enough. Not long ago a user uploaded a video showing the rumor iPhone 6 Plus chassis strength test which can be seen below this article. Based on the video, this sophisticated phablet iPhone 6 Plus looks so easy to bend or bend without spending much energy. The weak point of the iPhone 6 Plus is at the bottom of the volume rocker. There are several opinions regarding the reason why the iPhone 6 Plus is easy to bend apart from the material being less strong. The iPhone 6 Plus phablet is reportedly easy to bend because it is the 'victim' of the unibody aluminum casing design combined with a thin body. This may be the reason why the iPhone 6 Plus case looks less strong. This iPhone 6 Plus comes with a 5.5-inch touch screen with an HD resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels Retina HD which still uses an IPS technology panel with a screen density of 400 pixels per inch. Just like the iPhone 6, the iPhone 6 Plus screen is also protected by Ion-strengthened glass. iPhone 6 Plus running iOS 8. The iPhone 6 Plus is powered by a 64-bit dual-core Apple A8 processor which is claimed to be able to produce 25% faster performance than the Apple A7 used by the iPhone 5S. iPhone 6 Plus and iPhone 6 are powered by a quad-core PowerVR G6450 GPU (Graphics Processing Unit) graphics processor. So far, there has been no response from Apple regarding the problem of easily bending or bending the iPhone 6 Plus, as reported by GSM Arena (23/09/2014)
berita_id: iPhone 6 Plus dikabarkan akan menekuk dengan mudah dan menekuk dengan mudah saat berada di bawah tekanan.Berdasarkan laporan dari sejumlah situs web, sejumlah pengguna iPhone 6 plus phablet yang canggih ini telah melengkung atau menekuk sasis setelah dimasukkan ke dalam saku pengguna.Mengapa IPhone 6 Plus Mudah menekuk?Banyak yang berspekulasi bahwa materi iPhone 6 Plus tidak cukup kuat.Belum lama ini pengguna mengunggah video yang menunjukkan rumor iPhone 6 Plus Chassis Strength Test yang dapat dilihat di bawah artikel ini.Berdasarkan video, phablet iPhone 6 Plus yang canggih ini terlihat sangat mudah untuk ditekuk atau ditekuk tanpa menghabiskan banyak energi.Titik lemah iPhone 6 Plus adalah di bagian bawah volume rocker.Ada beberapa pendapat tentang alasan mengapa iPhone 6 Plus mudah untuk membungkuk terpisah dari materi yang kurang kuat.Phablet iPhone 6 Plus dilaporkan mudah ditekuk karena itu adalah 'korban' dari desain casing aluminium unibody yang dikombinasikan dengan tubuh yang tipis.Ini mungkin alasan mengapa case iPhone 6 Plus terlihat kurang kuat.IPhone 6 Plus ini hadir dengan layar sentuh 5,5 inci dengan resolusi HD 1920 x 1080 piksel Retina HD yang masih menggunakan panel teknologi IPS dengan kepadatan layar 400 piksel per inci.Sama seperti iPhone 6, layar iPhone 6 Plus juga dilindungi oleh kaca yang diperkuat ion.iPhone 6 Plus Running iOS 8. IPhone 6 Plus ditenagai oleh prosesor Apple A8 dual-core 64-bit yang diklaim dapat menghasilkan kinerja 25% lebih cepat daripada Apple A7 yang digunakan oleh iPhone 5s.iPhone 6 Plus dan iPhone 6 ditenagai oleh prosesor grafis PowerVR G6450 GPU (Unit Pemrosesan Grafis).Sejauh ini, belum ada tanggapan dari Apple mengenai masalah dengan mudah membungkuk atau menekuk iPhone 6 Plus, seperti yang dilaporkan oleh GSM Arena (23/09/2014)

berita: The GOVERNMENT has threatened to close social media and sharing sites, such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Youtube if they do not close accounts containing radicalism. A total of 11 Telegram domain name systems have even been asked to be blocked. The threat was voiced by the Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara, after attending the declaration of anti-radicalism at Padjadjaran University, Bandung, yesterday. The reason is that the government's request for them to close accounts containing radicalism agency has not been fully complied with. "Throughout 2016 to 2017, only 50% were fulfilled. This is very disappointing. During the fasting month, I sent the director general to visit (the platform provider). If there is no improvement, we will be serious," said Rudi. He added that the social media platform was reluctant to close all accounts containing radicalism because in their home countries they had to go through court. "However, they are here because of business. Advertisements are also from here. Therefore, it is necessary to comply with the regulations here." The Ministry of Communication and Informatics has made various efforts to prevent the spread of radicalism, including closing sites and blocking accounts on social media. However, account blocking needs to involve the platform. The Ministry of Communication and Informatics yesterday also asked internet service providers to block 11 domain name systems (DNS) belonging to Telegram. The 11 DNS are t.me, telegram.me, telegram.org, core.telegram.org, desktop.telegram.org, macos.telegram.org, web.telegram.org, venus.web.telegram.org, pluto.web.telegram.org, flora.web.telegram.org, and flora-1.web.telegram .org. As a result, the web version of the Telegram service cannot be accessed via a computer. "We are also preparing the process of closing the Telegram application completely in Indonesia if Telegram does not prepare standard operational procedures for handling unlawful content in their application. This can endanger state security," said Director General of Information Applications at the Ministry of Communication and Informatics Semuel A Pangerapan. Blocking must be done because many channels in the messaging service application contain propaganda of radicalism, terrorism, and hatred. There are also invitations or how to assemble bombs. Telegram has also become a favorite of terrorists, including the Islamic State, because of its high level of encryption so that its messages are difficult for the authorities to sniff out. Telegram's Chief Executive Officer (CEO), Pavel Durov, via tweet, expressed his astonishment as to why their service was blocked. "It's strange, we have never received a request/protest from the Indonesian government. We will investigate and make an announcement," Durov said on his Twitter account, @durov, replying to a netizen's tweet. Campus Declaration Universities in West Java agreed to reject radicalism. That commitment was stated in the Declaration on Anti-radicalism which was attended by 44 state and private universities in West Java at Unpad, yesterday. In addition to all university rectors, the event was attended by Minister of Research, Technology and Higher Education Mohamad Nasir, Minister of Communication and Information Rudiantara, West Java Governor Ahmad Heryawan.
berita_id: Pemerintah telah mengancam akan menutup media sosial dan berbagi situs, seperti Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, dan YouTube jika mereka tidak menutup akun yang berisi radikalisme.Sebanyak 11 sistem nama domain telegram bahkan telah diminta untuk diblokir.Ancaman itu disuarakan oleh Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara, setelah menghadiri Deklarasi Anti-Ladikalisme di Universitas Padjadjaran, Bandung, kemarin.Alasannya adalah bahwa permintaan pemerintah agar mereka menutup akun yang mengandung agen radikalisme belum sepenuhnya dipatuhi."Sepanjang 2016 hingga 2017, hanya 50% yang terpenuhi. Ini sangat mengecewakan. Selama bulan puasa, saya mengirim Direktur Jenderal untuk mengunjungi (penyedia platform). Jika tidak ada perbaikan, kami akan serius," kata Rudi.Dia menambahkan bahwa platform media sosial enggan untuk menutup semua akun yang mengandung radikalisme karena di negara asal mereka mereka harus melalui pengadilan."Namun, mereka ada di sini karena bisnis. Iklan juga dari sini. Oleh karena itu, perlu untuk mematuhi peraturan di sini."Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika telah melakukan berbagai upaya untuk mencegah penyebaran radikalisme, termasuk situs penutup dan memblokir akun di media sosial.Namun, pemblokiran akun perlu melibatkan platform.Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika kemarin juga meminta penyedia layanan internet untuk memblokir 11 Sistem Nama Domain (DNS) milik Telegram.11 DNS adalah T.Me, Telegram.Me, telegram.org, core.telegram.org, desktop.telegram.org, macos.telegram.org, web.telegram.org, venus.web.telegram.org, pluto.web.telegram.org.org.telegram.org, pluto.web.telegram.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org. yang ”yang”flora-1.web.telegram .org.Akibatnya, versi web layanan telegram tidak dapat diakses melalui komputer."Kami juga sedang mempersiapkan proses penutupan aplikasi telegram sepenuhnya di Indonesia jika Telegram tidak menyiapkan prosedur operasional standar untuk menangani konten yang melanggar hukum dalam aplikasi mereka. Ini dapat membahayakan keamanan negara," kata Direktur Jenderal Aplikasi Informasi di Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika Semuel A Pangerapan.Pemblokiran harus dilakukan karena banyak saluran dalam aplikasi layanan pesan berisi propaganda radikalisme, terorisme, dan kebencian.Ada juga undangan atau cara mengumpulkan bom.Telegram juga menjadi favorit teroris, termasuk Negara Islam, karena tingkat enkripsi yang tinggi sehingga pesannya sulit bagi pihak berwenang untuk mengendus.Chief Executive Officer Telegram (CEO), Pavel Durov, melalui tweet, menyatakan keheranannya mengapa layanan mereka diblokir."Aneh, kami tidak pernah menerima permintaan/protes dari pemerintah Indonesia. Kami akan menyelidiki dan membuat pengumuman," kata Durov di akun Twitter -nya, @Durov, membalas tweet netizen.Universitas deklarasi kampus di Jawa Barat setuju untuk menolak radikalisme.Komitmen itu dinyatakan dalam Deklarasi Anti-Radikalisme yang dihadiri oleh 44 universitas negara bagian dan swasta di Jawa Barat di Unpad, kemarin.Selain semua rektor universitas, acara ini dihadiri oleh Menteri Penelitian, Teknologi dan Pendidikan Tinggi Mohamad Nasir, Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi Rudiantara, Gubernur Jawa Barat Ahmad Heryawan.

berita: As someone who is active every day and meets many people, you need to know about first aid for stroke sufferers. Maybe you meet someone who has had a stroke, so you can help him and at least save his life. Stroke attacks occur suddenly without the knowledge of the sufferer even though sometimes the body has shown symptoms. A stroke can occur because blood flow to the brain is blocked due to blockage or narrowing of blood vessels. Because the brain lacks blood, it causes the death of cells in the brain. This condition makes stroke sufferers experience partial or complete paralysis when the attack comes. This disease is very serious and must be treated immediately. In the past, stroke only attacked the elderly, but now it's different. An irregular and healthy lifestyle makes children susceptible to stroke. If you have had a stroke, there will be a lot of suffering that a person faces both physically, mentally and financially. This condition will make the sufferer's spirit of life decreases and they don't want to fight to live anymore. Neither you nor the people around you want to have a stroke. Therefore, you must be aware of the symptoms of stroke that are shown by the body before the attack occurs. Take immediate action if you experience stroke symptoms. If you meet a stroke patient, give him or her first aid to save a stroke patient. There is a unique way that can save stroke sufferers, namely by using a needle. Needles that are usually used for sewing, but can treat several diseases including stroke. You must be familiar with the method of healing diseases with needles or acupuncture. The first aid method when a stroke occurs is using a needle, introduced by a professor from China. Before finally bringing the stroke patient to the hospital, apply a needle. This needle makes stroke sufferers can prevent the severity of stroke. When you are faced with a stroke sufferer, don't panic. Calm down and find the needle. Avoid moving or lifting the stroke sufferer from that place. Use any needles, whether sewing needles, syringes or safety pins. Then make sure the needle is sterile or you can sterilize it by burning it first, before applying it to stroke sufferers. Use the sterile needle to insert 10 fingers of stroke sufferers. Insert the needle slowly, but not too deep. Make sure the blood is flowing from the fingers you pricked. If it doesn't bleed, press firmly until it bleeds. After everything bleeds, let it sit for a few minutes. Hopefully the patient will wake up after getting first aid for this stroke sufferer. If the skin of the sufferer of a strike attack is discolored or sideways all you have to do is massage the ear until it turns red. Then, prick the ear with the soft skin with the needle until blood comes out. Do that way on both ears of stroke sufferers. Wait, until a few minutes and hopefully his mouth returns to normal. Take the patient to the nearest hospital, even if under normal circumstances or not. So that stroke patients get further examination and treatment. hold open This method has been proven to be able to save stroke sufferers and as a proper first aid for stroke sufferers. The discovery of this method can save people from sudden strokes. We are also no longer confused in dealing with someone who has a sudden stroke. Rest assured that you can help and do not hesitate to do the above treatment.
berita_id: Sebagai seseorang yang aktif setiap hari dan bertemu banyak orang, Anda perlu tahu tentang pertolongan pertama untuk penderita stroke.Mungkin Anda bertemu seseorang yang mengalami stroke, sehingga Anda dapat membantunya dan setidaknya menyelamatkan hidupnya.Serangan stroke terjadi tiba -tiba tanpa sepengetahuan penderita meskipun kadang -kadang tubuh telah menunjukkan gejala.Stroke dapat terjadi karena aliran darah ke otak diblokir karena penyumbatan atau penyempitan pembuluh darah.Karena otak kekurangan darah, itu menyebabkan kematian sel di otak.Kondisi ini membuat penderita stroke mengalami kelumpuhan parsial atau total ketika serangan itu terjadi.Penyakit ini sangat serius dan harus segera dirawat.Di masa lalu, stroke hanya menyerang orang tua, tetapi sekarang berbeda.Gaya hidup yang tidak teratur dan sehat membuat anak -anak rentan terhadap stroke.Jika Anda mengalami stroke, akan ada banyak penderitaan yang dihadapi seseorang baik secara fisik, mental dan finansial.Kondisi ini akan membuat semangat hidup penderita berkurang dan mereka tidak ingin berjuang untuk hidup lagi.Baik Anda maupun orang -orang di sekitar Anda ingin melakukan stroke.Karena itu, Anda harus menyadari gejala stroke yang ditunjukkan oleh tubuh sebelum serangan terjadi.Ambil tindakan segera jika Anda mengalami gejala stroke.Jika Anda bertemu dengan pasien stroke, berikan pertolongan pertama dia untuk menyelamatkan pasien stroke.Ada cara unik yang dapat menyelamatkan penderita stroke, yaitu dengan menggunakan jarum.Jarum yang biasanya digunakan untuk menjahit, tetapi dapat mengobati beberapa penyakit termasuk stroke.Anda harus terbiasa dengan metode penyembuhan penyakit dengan jarum atau akupunktur.Metode pertolongan pertama ketika stroke terjadi menggunakan jarum, diperkenalkan oleh profesor dari Cina.Sebelum akhirnya membawa pasien stroke ke rumah sakit, oleskan jarum.Jarum ini membuat penderita stroke dapat mencegah keparahan stroke.Saat Anda dihadapkan dengan penderita stroke, jangan panik.Tenang dan temukan jarum.Hindari memindahkan atau mengangkat penderita stroke dari tempat itu.Gunakan jarum apa pun, apakah jarum jahit, jarum suntik atau pin pengaman.Kemudian pastikan jarumnya steril atau Anda dapat mensterilkannya dengan membakarnya terlebih dahulu, sebelum mengoleskannya ke penderita stroke.Gunakan jarum steril untuk memasukkan 10 jari penderita stroke.Masukkan jarum perlahan, tetapi tidak terlalu dalam.Pastikan darah mengalir dari jari yang Anda tusukan.Jika tidak berdarah, tekan dengan kuat sampai berdarah.Setelah semuanya berdarah, diamkan selama beberapa menit.Semoga pasien akan bangun setelah mendapatkan pertolongan pertama untuk penderita stroke ini.Jika kulit penderita serangan mogok berubah warna atau menyamping yang harus Anda lakukan adalah memijat telinga sampai berubah merah.Kemudian, tusuk telinga dengan kulit lembut dengan jarum sampai darah keluar.Lakukan cara itu di kedua telinga penderita stroke.Tunggu, sampai beberapa menit dan semoga mulutnya kembali normal.Bawa pasien ke rumah sakit terdekat, bahkan jika dalam keadaan normal atau tidak.Sehingga pasien stroke mendapatkan pemeriksaan dan perawatan lebih lanjut.Tahan Buka Metode ini telah terbukti dapat menyelamatkan penderita stroke dan sebagai pertolongan pertama yang tepat untuk penderita stroke.Penemuan metode ini dapat menyelamatkan orang dari pukulan mendadak.Kami juga tidak lagi bingung dalam berurusan dengan seseorang yang mengalami stroke mendadak.Yakinlah bahwa Anda dapat membantu dan tidak ragu untuk melakukan perawatan di atas.

berita: Warganet is still confused about the unclear information regarding the fate of Facebook in Indonesia. There are even those who are desperate to do nude actions so that Facebook is not closed. Understandably, the article is that Facebook users in Indonesia have reached 140 million, and this platform has become a place for sharing among many people. Don't worry, because the Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara will not block (close) Facebook permanently, but only temporarily. That is if the situation gets worse. "We will see this situation first. If it gets worse, then we will temporarily close (block it)," said Minister of Communication and Information Rudiantara. Rudiantara is reluctant to talk about closing Facebook operations permanently, he is more focused on monitoring Facebook to create data security and prevent the spread of hate speech. The House of Representatives also had asked Kominfo to be more strict with Facebook. "We and the government - the Ministry of Communication and Information - will talk again regarding the follow-up to Facebook's mistake. Personally, I am still open to sanctions, it data point is also possible to - suggest - a Facebook service moratorium," said Meutya Hafid, a member of the Commission. I DPR RI. Meutya estimates that the DPR RI will wait for the results of Facebook's internal investigation for the next month. "We are waiting, I think a month should be enough time. We hope that the results of this investigation will not only blame who, but also there must be information, where this misused data is and what it is used for," he said. Case Beginning The controversy arose from the Cambridge Analytica scandal, which accused Facebook of leaking data. After being investigated, it turns out that "leaking" is not the right term. The data was not leaked, but rather misused by Cambridge Analytica, allegedly for political purposes. The data taken is also not the content of the message, but data that is publicly listed on a person's profile. Unfortunately, the rice has become porridge. There has been confusion about this, to the point that the DPR also summoned Facebook to ask for an explanation. As a result, the discourse of blocking Facebook arises. "That Facebook data is not leaked. If it leaks, the term is like a pipe with water, you don't know where the leak is, this data is compromised," said Rudiantara. Facebook has been given SP 2 The Ministry of Communication and Information has sent SP 2 to Facebook, but there is no information about SP 3 which means closing. When asked about the validity period of SP 2 to the next SP, Rudiantara has not yet given a definitive answer. "Yes, it could be a day, a month, see the situation first," concluded Rudiantara. He claimed to have received an explanation from the Irish Facebook office which manages Facebook in Indonesia. In a statement by Facebook Ireland to Rudiantara, they provided information on numbers related to misuse of data that afflicted users. Rudiantara also continues to monitor the development of Indonesian user data on Facebook.
berita_id: Warganet masih bingung tentang informasi yang tidak jelas mengenai nasib Facebook di Indonesia.Bahkan ada orang -orang yang sangat ingin melakukan tindakan telanjang sehingga Facebook tidak ditutup.Maklum, artikelnya adalah bahwa pengguna Facebook di Indonesia telah mencapai 140 juta, dan platform ini telah menjadi tempat untuk berbagi di antara banyak orang.Jangan khawatir, karena Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara tidak akan memblokir (menutup) Facebook secara permanen, tetapi hanya sementara.Itu jika situasinya semakin buruk."Kami akan melihat situasi ini terlebih dahulu. Jika menjadi lebih buruk, maka kami akan untuk sementara waktu akan menutup (memblokirnya)," kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi Rudiantara.Rudiantara enggan berbicara tentang menutup operasi Facebook secara permanen, ia lebih fokus pada pemantauan Facebook untuk menciptakan keamanan data dan mencegah penyebaran pidato kebencian.Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat juga telah meminta Kominfo untuk lebih ketat dengan Facebook."Kami dan pemerintah - Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi - akan berbicara lagi mengenai tindak lanjut dari kesalahan Facebook. Secara pribadi, saya masih terbuka untuk sanksi, titik data itu juga dimungkinkan untuk - menyarankan - moratorium layanan Facebook," kata Meutya Hafid, anggota komisi.I DPR RI.Meutya memperkirakan bahwa DPR RI akan menunggu hasil penyelidikan internal Facebook untuk bulan berikutnya."Kami sedang menunggu, saya pikir sebulan harus menjadi cukup waktu. Kami berharap hasil penyelidikan ini tidak hanya akan menyalahkan siapa, tetapi juga harus ada informasi, di mana data yang disalahgunakan ini dan untuk apa itu digunakan," katanya.Kasus yang memulai kontroversi muncul dari skandal Cambridge Analytica, yang menuduh Facebook bocor data.Setelah diselidiki, ternyata "bocor" bukanlah istilah yang tepat.Data itu tidak bocor, melainkan disalahgunakan oleh Cambridge Analytica, yang diduga untuk tujuan politik.Data yang diambil juga bukan konten pesan, tetapi data yang terdaftar di depan umum pada profil seseorang.Sayangnya, nasi telah menjadi bubur.Telah ada kebingungan tentang hal ini, sampai -sampai DPR juga memanggil Facebook untuk meminta penjelasan.Akibatnya, wacana memblokir Facebook muncul."Data Facebook itu tidak bocor. Jika bocor, istilahnya seperti pipa dengan air, Anda tidak tahu di mana bocornya, data ini dikompromikan," kata Rudiantara.Facebook telah diberikan SP 2 Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi telah mengirim SP 2 ke Facebook, tetapi tidak ada informasi tentang SP 3 yang berarti penutupan.Ketika ditanya tentang periode validitas SP 2 ke SP berikutnya, Rudiantara belum memberikan jawaban yang pasti."Ya, itu bisa jadi sehari, sebulan, melihat situasinya terlebih dahulu," pungkas Rudiantara.Dia mengaku telah menerima penjelasan dari kantor Facebook Irlandia yang mengelola Facebook di Indonesia.Dalam sebuah pernyataan oleh Facebook Irlandia ke Rudiantara, mereka memberikan informasi tentang angka -angka yang terkait dengan penyalahgunaan data yang pengguna yang menderita.Rudiantara juga terus memantau pengembangan data pengguna Indonesia di Facebook.

berita: DoctorSehat.Com Stroke is a neurological disease that most often results in disability and death. Besides being ranked first among a class of neurological diseases that cause death, stroke is also one of the three main causes of death in general. To overcome this crucial problem, a stroke prevention strategy is needed that includes preventive, rehabilitative, and promotive aspects. Actually, stroke have cases have occurred long ago, this is evidenced by the existence of first aid in stroke cases based on traditional Chinese medicine with acupuncture techniques, but this technique has been forgotten, so the impact is getting bigger. As is known, people who get a STROKE attack, all the blood in the body will flow very fast to the blood vessels in the brain. If the rescue activity is given a little too late, then the blood vessels in the brain will not be strong enough to withstand the rush of blood flowing and will soon burst little by little. The following first aid can be done Do not be moved If you move the patient from the place of origin / original place it will make the possibility of rupture of fine blood vessels in the brain will occur more quickly and of course this will be risky. Simply help the patient to take a sitting position so as not to fall again. Pull and prick the earlobe If the patient's mouth looks abnormal, you may have to try to tug on the patient's ears until they look a little red. Then, do 2 punctures on the lower end of the ear with a small needle that has been sterilized so that the blood drips 2 times from each earlobe. In a few minutes the patient's mouth will return to normal. Puncture the tips of the fingers with a needle It is recommended to use a syringe. But if you don't have one, you can use other needles that are not too big (ex: sewing needles, pins) and of course they must be in a sterile condition by burning. The point to be punctured is about 1 mm from the tip of the nail. Try to get at least a little blood dripping or 1 drop is enough. If you can't, press the finger. Within about 10 minutes, the patient will regain consciousness. Seek medical help when the patient's condition begins to recover, seek medical attention immediately. Take the patient to the nearest doctor or nearest hospital to get further action. Remember, before 6 hours since the attack, stroke sufferers must receive medical help. So some information and tips about First Aid for Stroke Patients, I hope you can provide help to those around you and help save a human life. Please leave your opinion Below!
berita_id: Stroke doctorsehat.com adalah penyakit neurologis yang paling sering mengakibatkan kecacatan dan kematian.Selain peringkat pertama di antara kelas penyakit neurologis yang menyebabkan kematian, stroke juga merupakan salah satu dari tiga penyebab utama kematian secara umum.Untuk mengatasi masalah penting ini, strategi pencegahan stroke diperlukan yang mencakup aspek preventif, rehabilitasi, dan promosi.Sebenarnya, stroke memiliki kasus telah terjadi sejak lama, ini dibuktikan dengan keberadaan pertolongan pertama dalam kasus stroke berdasarkan obat tradisional Tiongkok dengan teknik akupunktur, tetapi teknik ini telah dilupakan, sehingga dampaknya semakin besar.Seperti diketahui, orang yang mendapatkan serangan stroke, semua darah dalam tubuh akan mengalir sangat cepat ke pembuluh darah di otak.Jika aktivitas penyelamatan diberikan sedikit terlambat, maka pembuluh darah di otak tidak akan cukup kuat untuk menahan aliran darah yang mengalir dan akan segera meledak sedikit demi sedikit.Pertolongan pertama berikut dapat dilakukan, jangan dipindahkan jika Anda memindahkan pasien dari tempat asal / tempat asli itu akan membuat kemungkinan pecahnya pembuluh darah halus di otak akan terjadi lebih cepat dan tentu saja ini akan berisiko.Cukup bantu pasien untuk mengambil posisi duduk agar tidak jatuh lagi.Tarik dan tusuk telinga jika mulut pasien terlihat tidak normal, Anda mungkin harus mencoba menarik telinga pasien sampai mereka terlihat sedikit merah.Kemudian, lakukan 2 tusukan di ujung bawah telinga dengan jarum kecil yang telah disterilkan sehingga darah menetes 2 kali dari setiap daun telinga.Dalam beberapa menit mulut pasien akan kembali normal.Tusuk ujung jari dengan jarum yang disarankan untuk menggunakan jarum suntik.Tetapi jika Anda tidak memilikinya, Anda dapat menggunakan jarum lain yang tidak terlalu besar (mis: jarum menjahit, pin) dan tentu saja mereka harus dalam kondisi steril dengan membakar.Poin yang harus ditusuk adalah sekitar 1 mm dari ujung kuku.Cobalah untuk mendapatkan setidaknya sedikit darah yang menetes atau 1 tetes sudah cukup.Jika Anda tidak bisa, tekan jari.Dalam waktu sekitar 10 menit, pasien akan mendapatkan kembali kesadaran.Carilah bantuan medis ketika kondisi pasien mulai pulih, segera cari perhatian medis.Bawa pasien ke dokter terdekat atau rumah sakit terdekat untuk mendapatkan tindakan lebih lanjut.Ingat, sebelum 6 jam sejak serangan, penderita stroke harus menerima bantuan medis.Jadi beberapa informasi dan tips tentang pertolongan pertama untuk pasien stroke, saya harap Anda dapat memberikan bantuan kepada orang -orang di sekitar Anda dan membantu menyelamatkan hidup manusia.Silakan tinggalkan pendapat Anda di bawah!

berita: The Reog Ponorogo Community submitted files on the Reog Ponorogo burning incident at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao - Philippines to the Indonesian Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemlu), as a follow-up to an Open Letter submitted to the Indonesian Minister of Foreign Affairs (Menlu) on 2 roll in the hay November 2015. Upon the submission of the files, the Reog Ponorogo Community was immediately received by the Foreign Minister, Retno LP Marsudi. In the meeting which took place in the Foreign Minister's Meeting Room, Jalan Pejambon 6, Central Jakarta, the KRP submitted files in the form of photos of the procession of burning reog, photos of reog artists who appeared at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao in 2005, copies of the clarifications from the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia, copies of the apology from the Indonesian Consulate General staff, names of people which must be checked by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Team, and other files. We will supervise the team formed by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs so that it runs in an open, transparent and honest manner. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs' sensitivity to the reog burning incident at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao is eagerly awaited by Reog activists and lovers," said Secretary of the Reog Ponorogo Community (KRP), M Syaiful Jihad in Jakarta, Monday (9/11/2015), in a press release. Said Syaiful Jihad, the incident of burning National Cultural Heritage assets at the Consulate General in Davao must be resolved legally, both criminally and civilly, so that the intellectual actors are revealed. In addition, there must be protection and security guarantees for Indonesian citizens in Davao, especially Indonesian citizens who have exposed this incident. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs must take responsibility, he said. On that occasion, Foreign Minister Retno LP Marsudi, accompanied by the Director General of Information and Public Diplomacy, Esti Andayani, asked the KRP to calm the reaction of the people who love Reog, and understand the spiritual atmosphere of reog lovers, as well as no attempt to disrespect culture because it has been inherent in diplomats. An internal audit has been carried out by the Consulate General in Davao, while an external audit has been carried out by the Inspectorate General, in the form of a team to find out what actually happened at the Consulate General in Davao, the progress and results will be open and accessible to the public, "said Retno, while asking to put forward the principle of presumption. innocent and carried out according to applicable procedures. We also guarantee that Indonesian citizens residing in Davao City, including those who report incidents of burning reog, will not happen, let alone violence. We guarantee his safety, concluded Foreign Minister Retno

berita: The circulation of candy allegedly containing hazardous materials for children was raided by Pol PP along with other teams in 14 sub-districts in Surabaya, Tuesday (7/3/2017). A joint team consisting of Satpol PP, Puskesmas officers, Polsek and Koramil raided the stalls of hawker and snack vendors looking for the candy. Quoted from Suarasurabaya.net, Irvan Widyanto, Head of the Civil Service Police Unit (Kasatpol PP) of Surabaya City said that from the findings of candy snacks sold by food vendors near an elementary school in the Peneleh area, the packaging was confirmed to have a distribution permit. "Of the 3 types of candy that were raided (Hard candy, bottled candy in teat bottles and candy in the shape of a sheep) each package was equipped with a distribution permit, but it was suspected that the distribution permit was fake," said Irvan Widyanto to reporters who met him. From the findings in the field, the packaging of candy snacks in teat bottles is equipped with a distribution permit ML 224409003077. The writing on the distribution permit indicates the type of food from abroad and is produced by Xiamen Yang Wan Foodstuff, nestling China. As for the candy snacks with the brand of Hard Candy, and the Penguin brand, imported by PT. Petrona Inti Chemindo, West Jakarta, DKI Jakarta, with a distribution permit valid until 19-08-2018. Irvan added that the security for the hundreds of candy snacks will then be handed over to the Surabaya City Health Office (Dinkes) for laboratory testing at the Surabaya POM Center. "We want to know the content of hazardous materials in it. It will take approximately 1 week. Furthermore, the raids and security that we have started on Monday (6/3/2017) will be continued to 31 sub-districts throughout Surabaya," said Irvan Widyanto. Meanwhile, hazil security around 5 stalls of traders and 1 wholesaler of children's snacks in Wonokromo District, Tuesday (7/3/2017) found 340 bottles of candy with the brand "Permen Keras" which are included in the category that must be secured.(ss/j1)
berita_id: Sirkulasi permen yang diduga mengandung bahan berbahaya untuk anak-anak digerebek oleh Pol PP bersama dengan tim lain di 14 sub-distrik di Surabaya, Selasa (7/3/2017).Sebuah tim gabungan yang terdiri dari Satpol PP, Puskesmas Petugas, Polsek dan Koramil menggerebek kios penjaja dan penjual makanan ringan yang mencari permen.Dikutip dari Suarasurabaya.net, Irvan Widyanto, Kepala Unit Polisi Sipil (Kasatpol PP) dari Surabaya City mengatakan bahwa dari temuan camilan permen yang dijual oleh penjual makanan di dekat sekolah dasar di daerah Peneleh, kemasan dikonfirmasi memiliki izin distribusi."Dari 3 jenis permen yang digerebek (permen keras, permen botol dalam botol dot dan permen dalam bentuk domba) setiap paket dilengkapi dengan izin distribusi, tetapi diduga bahwa izin distribusi itu palsu," kata Irvan Widyanto kepada wartawan yang bertemu dengannya.Dari temuan di lapangan, pengemasan camilan permen dalam botol dot dilengkapi dengan izin distribusi ML 224409003077. Penulisan pada izin distribusi menunjukkan jenis makanan dari luar negeri dan diproduksi oleh Xiamen Yang Wan Fightuff, Nestling China.Adapun Candy Snacks dengan merek permen keras, dan merek penguin, diimpor oleh Pt.Petrona Ini Chemindo, Jakarta Barat, DKI Jakarta, dengan izin distribusi berlaku hingga 19-08-2018.Irvan menambahkan bahwa keamanan untuk ratusan camilan permen kemudian akan diserahkan ke Kantor Kesehatan Kota Surabaya (Dinkes) untuk pengujian laboratorium di Pusat Pom Surabaya."Kami ingin mengetahui kandungan bahan berbahaya di dalamnya. Butuh sekitar 1 minggu. Selain itu, penggerebekan dan keamanan yang telah kami mulai pada hari Senin (6/3/2017) akan dilanjutkan ke 31 sub-distrik di seluruh Surabaya," kata Irvan Widyanto.Sementara itu, keamanan hazil sekitar 5 kios pedagang dan 1 pedagang grosir anak -anak di distrik Wonokromo, Selasa (7/3/2017) menemukan 340 botol permen dengan merek "Permen Kera" yang termasuk dalam kategori yang harus diamankan. (SS/J1)

berita: Recently, netizens have been excited about the circulation of brushes or toothbrushes made from “bristle”, which means pig bristles. In fact, the term "bristle" does not always refer to sea urchins. The lexical meaning of bristle is a short, stiff hair, fiber. So all the hair, the stiff fiber, then the term will be referred to as bristle. Hair, stiff beard, can be categorized as bristle. Another example is fibers or stiff pine leaves that can be called bristle. In the industrial world, bristle is indeed used as a material for making brushes or brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle can be sourced from animal hair or plant fibers or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. The animal hair used can be sourced from pigs, goats, horses, or camels. Plant fibers that are usually made of brush or brush material include palm fiber. Other materials such as nylon are also often used to make brushes and brushes. From the unfounded halal aspect, brushes and brushes, including toothbrushes derived from animal hair, are critical points that need to be observed. When brushes and brushes are made from pork, they cannot be used because any material derived from pork is haram and najis, whether in dry or wet form. The MUI has also issued a fatwa that anything that comes from pigs, is forbidden to be used, including the fur. But the problem is, not all brush or brush/toothbrush users are able to recognize whether the brush they are using is a brush or a brush that comes from pig bristles or not. One of the information that can be seen as a marker that the brush or brush comes from sea urchins is the presence of writing such as “Boar Bristle Brush”. Boar is the English term for wild boar or wild boar. This means that the product is a toothbrush/toothbrush that uses wild boar bristles. Examples of toothbrush products made from pig bristles are those sold on Amazon.com. This online shop offers a pig toothbrush with the name Examples of brush products made from pig bristles include: But keep in mind that not all the words bristle means sea urchin. There are several manufacturers who use the term for other materials such as goat, camel, horse, and nylon hair. To determine whether the brush / brush product is made from animals or not, you can burn the material. If it smells like burning hair or horns, it's better to leave it alone, as reported by halalmui.org. Materials from plastic or coconut fiber do not emit such a distinctive odor when burned.
berita_id: Baru -baru ini, netizen telah bersemangat tentang sirkulasi sikat atau sikat gigi yang terbuat dari "bulu", yang berarti bulu babi.Bahkan, istilah "bulu" tidak selalu merujuk pada bulu babi.Arti leksikal dari bulu adalah rambut pendek, kaku, serat.Jadi semua rambut, serat kaku, maka istilah ini akan disebut sebagai bulu.Rambut, jenggot kaku, dapat dikategorikan sebagai bulu.Contoh rambut hewani atau serat tanaman atau serat sintetis seperti nilon dan silikon.Rambut hewan yang digunakan dapat bersumber dari babi, kambing, kuda, atau unta.Serat tanaman yang biasanya terbuat dari sikat atau bahan sikat termasuk serat kelapa sawit.Bahan -bahan lain seperti nilon juga sering digunakan untuk membuat kuas dan kuas.Dari aspek halal yang tidak berdasar, kuas dan kuas, termasuk sikat masalahnya adalah, tidak semua sikat atau sikat/sikat gigi dapat mengenali apakah kuas yang mereka gunakan adalah kuas atau kuas yang berasal dari bulu babi atau tidak.Salah satu informasi yang dapat bahwa produk tersebut adalah sikat gigi/sikat gigi yang menggunakan bulu babi liar.Contoh produk sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi adalah yang dijual di Amazon.com.Toko online ini menawarkan sikat gigi pigsi dengan nama contoh produk sikat yang terbuat dari bulu babi meliputi: tetapi perlu diingat bahwa tidak semua kata berbulu berarti landak laut.Ada beberapa produsen yang menggunakan istilah untuk bahan lain seperti kambing, unta, kuda, dan rambut nilon.Untuk menentukan apakah produk kuas / sikat terbuat dari hewan atau tidak, Anda dapat membakar material.Jika baunya seperti rambut atau tanduk yang terbakar, lebih baik membiarkannya, seperti yang dilaporkan oleh halalmui.org.Bahan dari plastik atau serat kelapa tidak memancarkan bau yang khas saat dibakar.

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia is confirmed to be a hoax or false news. This certainty was revealed after the Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati confirmed this in front of journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace, West Java. It does not exist and has never been discussed. he said on Monday, March 12, 2018 While giving a statement regarding President Joko Widodo's meeting with the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) delegation, he frailty received a question about it. "What the Minister of State has said (in social media) is a hoax, it is indeed like that. In today's social media, there is a lot of information and documents that are made similar to those of the government and published," he said. n The Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia In this issue, it is stated that the president will be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp. 553422694 per month. The vice president is said to be proposed to receive a salary of Rp. 368948462 per month.
berita_id: Berita yang beredar tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia dikonfirmasi menjadi tipuan atau berita palsu.Kepastian ini terungkap setelah Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati mengkonfirmasi hal ini di depan jurnalis di Istana Presiden Bogor, Jawa Barat.Itu tidak ada dan belum pernah dibahas.Dia mengatakan pada hari Senin, 12 Maret 2018 sambil memberikan pernyataan tentang pertemuan Presiden Joko Widodo dengan delegasi Bank Investasi Infrastruktur Asia (AIIB), ia dengan lemah menerima pertanyaan tentang hal itu."Apa yang dikatakan Menteri Negara (di media sosial) adalah tipuan, memang seperti itu. Di media sosial saat ini, ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan pemerintah dan diterbitkan," katanya.Di Wakil Presiden Republik Indonesia dalam masalah ini, dinyatakan bahwa Presiden akan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji hingga RP.553422694 per bulan.Wakil presiden dikatakan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji RP.368948462 per bulan.

berita: In everyday life, we use various kinds of brushes to make up, paint, clean dust, paint the house, grease cake pans, to smear food such as grilled masses chicken, bread, cakes, and various baked or grilled meats and seafood. when combing hair, cleaning hair in salons or barbershops, washing clothes, and scrubbing floors Do you know what brushes and brushes you use come from? Most likely from sea urchins! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, generally from China. These imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than other animal hairs, such as squirrels, goats, civets, camels, and dogs. January – June 2001 period, Indonesia imported 282,983 tons of Boar Bristle and Pig or Boar Hair or USD 1713309 What's interesting? Just so you know, Anping is a company that has a history of 400 years in processing bristle and animal tail feathers. This company is the largest distribution center for animal tail feathers in the north of China. It is said that more than 50000 people are involved in the production process and have more than 1000 workshops spread all over the world. various countries The keyword that shows the identity of this white brush is the writing BRISTLE on the brush handle, which in the Webster Dictionary means PIG HAIR (boar bristle). or the other is done in a very easy and simple way Animal hair contains a protein called KERATIN Keratin is a group of proteins known as fiber proteins. Like protein, hair or fur that contains keratin when burned will cause a distinctive odor. it's the same when we kiss m smell of roasted meat Meanwhile, if the brush is made of palm fiber, fiber, or plastic, it will definitely not emit a specific aroma other than the smell of burning ash. The brush is unclean, so if it is used to spread bread, then the bread is unclean. In short, it is unlawful to eat unclean objects. NOTE: This unclean brush is also widely used to apply seasonings to grilled corn, pecel catfish, grilled fish, grilled chicken, barbeque, etc. For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly HARAM, no matter how small, the material from pigs is forbidden to be consumed and to be applied. The illustrations in this article are examples of brushes and bristle brushes (the term is PIG or BOAR or HOG or BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places, such as markets, painting supply stores, building materials stores, make-up shops and salons, online shops, etc. A Are you familiar with the various shapes below? There are painting brushes, wall paint brushes, makeup brushes, hair brushes, barber or barber brushes, clothes brushes, etc. BEWARE! TIPS AVOID THE USE OF BRUSHS AND BORN BRUSHS: Use 100% synthetic brushes and brushes, such as nylon. Wall paint brushes and food brushes are available, at slightly more expensive prices. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for toothbrushes. Use other alternatives than brushes. Examples of paint rollers for painting, sponges and cotton buds for applying make-up, as well as knives and spatulas for greasing food. Beware of foods that use a pig brush to cook and clean their tools Sea urchin brushes are sold in white and black. However, manufacturers may process sea urchins by bleaching them and then dyeing them so that they look like other animal hairs.
berita_id: Dalam kehidupan sehari -hari, kami menggunakan berbagai jenis kuas untuk membuat, melukis, membersihkan debu, mengecat rumah, wajan kue minyak, untuk mengolesi makanan seperti massa panggang, roti, kue, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian, dan menggosok lantai, apakah Anda tahu kuas dan sikat apa yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar dari landak laut!Sikat disediakan di Indonesia, umumnya dari Cina.Sikat impor ini diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada rambut hewan lainnya, seperti tupai, kambing, sipil, unta, dan anjing.Januari - Juni 2001 Periode, Indonesia mengimpor 282.983 ton bulu babi dan rambut babi atau babi atau USD 1713309 Apa yang menarik?Asal tahu saja, Anping adalah perusahaan yang memiliki sejarah 400 tahun dalam memproses bulu dan bulu ekor hewan.Perusahaan ini adalah pusat distribusi terbesar untuk bulu ekor hewan di utara Cina.Dikatakan bahwa lebih dari 50000 orang terlibat dalam proses produksi dan memiliki lebih dari 1000 lokakarya yang tersebar di seluruh dunia.Berbagai negara Kata kunci yang menunjukkan identitas sikat putih ini adalah bulu tulisan pada pegangan sikat, yang dalam kamus Webster berarti rambut babi (bulu babi).Atau yang lain dilakukan dengan cara yang sangat mudah dan sederhana rambut hewan mengandung protein yang disebut keratin keratin adalah sekelompok protein yang dikenal sebagai protein serat.Seperti protein, rambut atau bulu yang mengandung keratin ketika dibakar akan menyebabkan bau yang khas.Itu sama ketika kita mencium bau daging panggang sementara itu, jika sikat terbuat dari serat kelapa sawit, serat, atau plastik, itu pasti tidak akan memancarkan aroma tertentu selain bau abu yang terbakar.Sikatnya najis, jadi jika digunakan untuk menyebarkan roti, maka roti itu najis.Singkatnya, tidak sah untuk memakan benda najis.Catatan: Sikat najis ini juga banyak digunakan untuk mengoleskan bumbu pada jagung panggang, ikan lele pecel, ikan bakar, ayam panggang, barbeque, dll. Untuk umat Islam, penggunaan bulu babi jelas haram, tidak peduli seberapa kecil, bahan dari babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan diterapkan.Ilustrasi dalam artikel ini adalah contoh kuas dan sikat bulu (istilah ini adalah babi atau babi atau babi atau sikat rambut bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat, seperti pasar, toko pasokan lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, toko make-up dan salon, toko online, dll. A Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk di bawah?Ada kuas lukisan, kuas cat dinding, sikat rias, sikat rambut, kuas tukang cukur atau tukang cukur, sikat pakaian, dll. Waspadalah!Kiat Hindari penggunaan kuas dan kuas yang lahir: Gunakan sikat dan kuas sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Sikat cat dinding dan kuas makanan tersedia, dengan harga yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.Gunakan alternatif lain selain kuas.Contoh rol cat untuk lukisan, spons dan cotton buds untuk mengoleskan make-up, serta pisau dan spatula untuk makanan yang berminyak.Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang menggunakan sikat babi untuk memasak dan membersihkan alat -alat mereka sikat landak laut dijual putih dan hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkannya dan kemudian mewarnai mereka sehingga mereka terlihat seperti rambut hewan lainnya.

berita: Finance Minister Sri Mulyani said that until now there has been no and there has been no discussion about the increase in the President's salary. "It doesn't exist, and it has never been discussed," said Mulyani when answering reporters' questions at a press conference at the Bogor presidential palace, Monday (12/3/2018), as reported by Antara. Previously, news circulated that the president's basic salary, which is only around Rp. 30 million per month, is currently considered very small and is planning to increase it to Rp. 553 million per month. Sri Mulyani emphasized that the news that the Minister for State Apparatus Empowerment and Bureaucratic Reform was a hoax or hoax. "It's a hoax, because there are a lot of social media that produce information, for documents that are made similar to those of the government that are published. So we don't have any discussion about it, absolutely nothing," said Mulyani. Regarding the salaries of civil servants (PNS), Sri Mulyani also conveyed that the 2018 draft government regulation (RPP) and the 2019 Revised State Revenue and Expenditure Budget (RAPBN) would be submitted in the same way as the government submitted to the DPR. "In the financial memorandum of salary increase, the provision of the 13th salary and pensioners will be included by the President in the financial note in August," said Mulyani. The simulation of the change in salary provisions for the president appeared in the RPP on the Salary and Allowances for Civil Servants (PNS) which was circulated recently. In provender the RPP, apart from the president, the vice president and other high-ranking state officials will also experience a salary increase.
berita_id: Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada dan belum ada diskusi tentang peningkatan gaji presiden."Itu tidak ada, dan tidak pernah dibahas," kata Mulyani ketika menjawab pertanyaan wartawan pada konferensi pers di Istana Presiden Bogor, Senin (12/3/2018), seperti dilansir Antara.Sebelumnya, berita beredar bahwa gaji dasar presiden, yang hanya sekitar RP.30 juta per bulan, saat ini dianggap sangat kecil dan berencana untuk meningkatkannya menjadi RP.553 juta per bulan.Sri Mulyani menekankan bahwa berita bahwa Menteri Pemberdayaan Aparat Negara dan reformasi birokrasi adalah tipuan atau tipuan."Ini tipuan, karena ada banyak media sosial yang menghasilkan informasi, untuk dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan pemerintah yang diterbitkan. Jadi kami tidak berdiskusi tentang hal itu, sama sekali tidak ada," kata Mulyani.Mengenai gaji pegawai negeri (PNS), Sri Mulyani juga menyampaikan bahwa rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) 2018 dan Revisi Pendapatan Negara 2019 dan Anggaran Pengeluaran (RAPBN) akan diajukan dengan cara yang sama seperti pemerintah yang diajukan ke DPR."Dalam nota keuangan kenaikan gaji, penyediaan gaji ke -13 dan pensiunan akan dimasukkan oleh presiden dalam catatan keuangan pada bulan Agustus," kata Mulyani.Simulasi perubahan ketentuan gaji untuk presiden muncul di RPP tentang gaji dan tunjangan untuk pegawai negeri (PNS) yang diedarkan baru -baru ini.Di Provender, RPP, terlepas dari Presiden, wakil presiden dan pejabat negara tinggi lainnya juga akan mengalami kenaikan gaji.

berita: Invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application are milling about on Twitter's timeline. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. But it can be ascertained that the news is just a hoax or not true. Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. But he was unable to attend. "Traveloka is proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from Kanisius alumni. However, he was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned several months earlier. to Ananda), he was not there," he said. "We state that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders," he continued. DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan regretted the invitation to uninstall Traveloka, which was previously busy milling about on Twitter's timeline. The call to uninstall Traveloka was triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. Related to this, Anies called on his supporters to respect differences. "Well, I think it's like this. We respect people with different views. Respect different people. There is no need to uninstall and so on," said Anies at the DKI Jakarta DPRD Building, Jalan Kebon Sirih, Gambir, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (14/11/2017). ). According to Anies, the Traveloka application has been providing benefits for the community. This invitation should not arise just because of differences of opinion. "Traveloka also provides benefits for many citizens. After all, it is a service that has great benefits for many people. So let's get used to different views in a healthy way, respecting each other without having to carry out punishments like that. So implement there's no need to uninstall all kinds of things. ," said Anies.
berita_id: Undangan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka sedang berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.Tetapi dapat dipastikan bahwa berita itu hanya tipuan atau tidak benar.Manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Tapi dia tidak bisa hadir."Traveloka bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya. Ke Ananda), ia tidak ada di sana," katanya."Kami menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi dan inovasi. Nilai-nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal," lanjutnya.Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan menyesali undangan untuk menghapus instalan Traveloka, yang sebelumnya sibuk berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Panggilan untuk menghapus instalasi Traveloka dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Terkait dengan ini, ANIES meminta para pendukungnya untuk menghormati perbedaan."Yah, saya pikir ini seperti ini. Kami menghormati orang -orang dengan pandangan yang berbeda. Hormati orang yang berbeda. Tidak perlu menghapus dan sebagainya," kata anies di gedung DKI Jakarta DPRD, Jalan Konal Sirih, Gambir, Jakarta Tengah, Selasa (14/11/2017).).Menurut ANIES, aplikasi Traveloka telah memberikan manfaat bagi masyarakat.Undangan ini seharusnya tidak muncul hanya karena perbedaan pendapat."Traveloka juga memberikan manfaat bagi banyak warga negara. Lagi pula, ini adalah layanan yang memiliki manfaat besar bagi banyak orang. Jadi mari kita terbiasa dengan pandangan yang berbeda dengan cara yang sehat, saling menghormati tanpa harus melakukan hukuman seperti itu. Jadi, terapkan tidak perlu menghapus semua jenis hal," kata Anies.

berita: Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives (DPR) responded to the leak of data from one million Facebook users in Indonesia. There is an assessment that Facebook has violated applicable laws. The deputy chairman of the Golkar faction in Commission I, Meutya Hafid, considers this a serious violation by Facebook. Facebook has violated the rules based on Article 32 of the ITE Law which was later quoted by Meutya. "As a sovereign country, the law in Indonesia must be complied with and anyone who violates it will be subject to sanctions in accordance with the applicable laws," wrote Meutya when contacted via WhatsApp, Thursday (5/4/2018), as reported by CNNIndonesia.com. Furthermore, Meutya also said that the government could sue, impose sanctions and close access to Facebook. He is worried that if there is no punishment for the social network, it could end badly for other internet companies in Indonesia. "Please the government can choose an option from the three." On the other hand, there has been a suggestion by Hanafi Rais from the PAN faction that Commission I of the DPR summons Facebook Indonesia immediately, in connection with the findings of the data leak. "We will meet internally and immediately send a letter to them officially," said Hanafi. It is not yet known when the summons will be. However, the agenda will be more directed to ask for clarification from Facebook, Hanafi emphasized. Previously, representatives of Facebook Indonesia had complied with the summons of the Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara. The call is an effort to clarify from the government regarding the leak of data belonging to one million Facebook users in Indonesia, out of a total of 87 million users worldwide. This is in connection with the Cambridge Analityca scandal. From the results of the meeting between Rudiantara and Facebook, the important point is to ask third-party applications on the formula Facebook platform to be temporarily closed. If Facebook does not comply with the government's request, Rudiantara, on that occasion, emphasized that he would not hesitate to close Facebook's services in Indonesia. "If (third-party applications) are not shutdown, do you want me to shutdown all of them?" he said.
berita_id: Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia (DPR) menanggapi kebocoran data dari satu juta pengguna Facebook di Indonesia.Ada penilaian bahwa Facebook telah melanggar hukum yang berlaku.Wakil Ketua Faksi Golkar dalam Komisi I, Meutya Hafid, menganggap ini pelanggaran serius oleh Facebook.Facebook telah melanggar aturan berdasarkan Pasal 32 Hukum ITE yang kemudian dikutip oleh Meutya."Sebagai negara yang berdaulat, undang -undang di Indonesia harus dipenuhi dan siapa pun yang melanggar itu akan dikenakan sanksi sesuai dengan hukum yang berlaku," tulis Meutya ketika dihubungi melalui WhatsApp, Kamis (5/4/2018), seperti dilaporkan oleh CNNindonesia.com.Selain itu, Meutya juga mengatakan bahwa pemerintah dapat menuntut, menjatuhkan sanksi dan mengakses akses dekat ke Facebook.Dia khawatir bahwa jika tidak ada hukuman untuk jejaring sosial, itu bisa berakhir buruk bagi perusahaan internet lain di Indonesia."Tolong pemerintah dapat memilih opsi dari ketiganya."Di sisi lain, ada saran oleh Hanafi Rais dari faksi Pan bahwa Komisi I dari DPR memanggil Facebook Indonesia segera, sehubungan dengan temuan kebocoran data."Kami akan bertemu secara internal dan segera mengirim surat kepada mereka secara resmi," kata Hanafi.Belum diketahui kapan panggilan akan.Namun, agenda akan lebih diarahkan untuk meminta klarifikasi dari Facebook, Hanafi menekankan.Sebelumnya, perwakilan Facebook Indonesia telah mematuhi panggilan Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara.Panggilan ini merupakan upaya untuk mengklarifikasi dari pemerintah mengenai kebocoran data milik satu juta pengguna Facebook di Indonesia, dari total 87 juta pengguna di seluruh dunia.Ini sehubungan dengan skandal Cambridge Analityca.Dari hasil pertemuan antara Rudiantara dan Facebook, poin penting adalah meminta aplikasi pihak ketiga pada platform Facebook Formula untuk ditutup sementara.Jika Facebook tidak mematuhi permintaan pemerintah, Rudiantara, pada kesempatan itu, menekankan bahwa ia tidak akan ragu untuk menutup layanan Facebook di Indonesia."Jika (aplikasi pihak ketiga) tidak mematikan, apakah Anda ingin saya mematikan semuanya?"katanya.

berita: The more rampant gamers play Pokemon Go, it turns out to cause pros and cons, especially in Indonesia. Moreover, recently heard the news that the game has an implied meaning that cannot be tolerated, especially for followers of the Islamic religion. From several links spread on social media, it is rearing discussed that Pokemon actually means "I am Jewish" in Syriac, while Pikachu is referred to as "Be Jewish" and Charmander means "God is Weak". That's where this problem started, some people immediately believed and redistributed the link to invite others to avoid Pokemon Go. There are also those who do not believe and think it is something made up. So, are these rumors true or not? It turns out that Nintendo denied it and the LA Times noted it, you could say all this is just a rumor that is not proven at all. Pokemon in English is an abbreviation of two words, namely Pocket Monster which means pocket monster. You could say, these monsters called Pokemon have a small size and can be stored in the trainer's pocket. While Pikachu which is known as the icon of Pokemon is also formed from two words, namely Pika (shining) and Chu (rat). From its shape alone it is clear that Pikachu is a mouse that glows or is armed with electric shocks. Finally, Charmander also has the meaning of burning fire, like the appearance of Charmander himself in the anime and Pokemon games.
berita_id: Gamer yang lebih merajalela memainkan Pokemon Go, ternyata menyebabkan pro dan kontra, terutama di Indonesia.Selain itu, baru -baru ini mendengar berita bahwa permainan memiliki makna tersirat yang tidak dapat ditoleransi, terutama bagi pengikut agama Islam.Dari beberapa tautan yang tersebar di media sosial, dibesarkan dibahas bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya berarti "Saya Yahudi" di Syria, sementara Pikachu disebut sebagai "menjadi Yahudi" dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Di situlah masalah ini dimulai, beberapa orang segera percaya dan mendistribusikan kembali tautan untuk mengundang orang lain untuk menghindari Pokemon Go.Ada juga orang -orang yang tidak percaya dan berpikir itu adalah sesuatu yang dibuat -buat.Jadi, apakah rumor ini benar atau tidak?Ternyata Nintendo membantahnya dan LA Times mencatatnya, Anda bisa mengatakan semua ini hanyalah rumor yang tidak terbukti sama sekali.Pokemon dalam bahasa Inggris adalah singkatan dari dua kata, yaitu monster saku yang berarti monster saku.Bisa dibilang, monster -monster yang disebut Pokemon ini memiliki ukuran kecil dan dapat disimpan di saku pelatih.Sementara Pikachu yang dikenal sebagai ikon Pokemon juga dibentuk dari dua kata, yaitu pika (bersinar) dan Chu (tikus).Dari bentuknya saja jelas bahwa Pikachu adalah tikus yang bersinar atau dipersenjatai dengan sengatan listrik.Akhirnya, Charmander juga memiliki arti membakar api, seperti penampilan Charmander sendiri di game anime dan pokemon.

berita: You may have heard the news that eating catfish can cause cancer. For those of you who like to eat catfish, news like this can certainly make you confused. Actually this issue is just a myth or fact, right? Come on, first check the truth of the issue of catfish that causes cancer below. Not all catfish cause cancer. Catfish are freshwater fish that contain a variety of important nutrients for the body, including protein, omega-3 fatty acids, and B-complex vitamins. So, catfish itself actually does not contain toxins or harmful substances that are cancer-causing (carcinogenic) in the human body. However, a number of studies reveal that certain catfish can indeed increase your risk of developing cancer. This is because the catfish has been contaminated with carcinogenic substances, not because of the natural content in the catfish itself. So, not all types of catfish cause cancer. Catfish from polluted waters can trigger the growth of cancer cells. Catfish can be contaminated with carcinogenic substances because they are cultivated in waters that have been contaminated with various types of pollutants (pollution-causing substances). A team of experts from the University of Pittsburgh School of the Health Sciences in the United States proved this in their research. Experts took extracts of catfish that grow in highly polluted waters. This extract is injected into breast cancer cells in the laboratory. The result, after being injected with contaminated catfish extract, it turns out that the cancer cells grow to multiply. After further investigation, it turns out that the catfish contains chemicals that are like the hormone estrogen in the human body. Estrogen levels that are too high in the body are known to increase the risk of breast cancer. The catfish tested by a team of experts was taken from waters that have been mixed with factory waste and human waste. So, this case is very similar to the case of mercury poisoning due to seafood consumption. The fish themselves are harmless. However, because water pollution has become so serious, the fish that live in these waters can also be polluted and eventually consumed by humans. So, can we mudcat still eat catfish? Don't be afraid, only catfish from polluted waters can increase the risk of cancer. Meanwhile, catfish obtained from catfish farms are safe for consumption by you and your family. Currently, catfish farming in Indonesia is regulated and supervised by the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries. The government itself already has special requirements for catfish cultivation, for example water sources, cleanliness of facilities, use of chemicals, catfish feed, and others. This requirement is regulated in CBIB (Good Fish Cultivation Method). So as long as the fish you choose comes from a farm that has a CBIB certificate, you don't have to worry about rumors from neighbors that catfish causes cancer Tips for safe eating catfish Even though catfish is considered safe for your health, sometimes it's difficult to determine which waters your catfish comes from. buy. Therefore, it never hurts to reduce the risk by limiting how often you eat catfish. In general, catfish is safe to eat two to three times a week. In addition, you can also remove the skin of the catfish before it is processed into food. The problem is, fish skin is usually the most easily polluted by pollutant substances in dirty waters. You should also vary your choice of side dishes each day. The more varied, the richer and more balanced the nutritional intake for your family's body.
berita_id: Anda mungkin pernah mendengar berita bahwa makan lele dapat menyebabkan kanker.Bagi Anda yang suka makan lele, berita seperti ini pasti bisa membuat Anda bingung.Sebenarnya masalah ini hanyalah mitos atau fakta, bukan?Ayo, pertama -tama periksa kebenaran masalah ikan lele yang menyebabkan kanker di bawah ini.Tidak semua ikan lele menyebabkan kanker.Ikan lele adalah ikan air tawar yang mengandung berbagai nutrisi penting untuk tubuh, termasuk protein, asam lemak omega-3, dan vitamin B-kompleks.Jadi, ikan lele itu sendiri sebenarnya tidak mengandung racun atau zat berbahaya yang menyebabkan kanker (karsinogenik) dalam tubuh manusia.Namun, sejumlah penelitian mengungkapkan bahwa ikan lele tertentu memang dapat meningkatkan risiko terkena kanker.Ini karena ikan lele telah
