terkontaminasi dengan zat karsinogenik, bukan karena kandungan alami dalam lele itu sendiri.Jadi, tidak semua jenis ikan lele menyebabkan kanker.Lele dari perairan yang tercemar dapat memicu pertumbuhan sel kanker.Lele dapat terkontaminasi dengan zat karsinogenik karena mereka dibudidayakan di perairan yang telah terkontaminasi dengan berbagai jenis polutan (zat penyebab polusi).Sebuah tim ahli dari University of Pittsburgh School of Health Sciences di Amerika Serikat membuktikan hal ini dalam penelitian mereka.Para ahli mengambil ekstrak ikan lele yang tumbuh di perairan yang sangat tercemar.Ekstrak ini disuntikkan ke dalam sel kanker payudara di laboratorium.Hasilnya, setelah disuntikkan dengan ekstrak ikan lele yang terkontaminasi, ternyata sel kanker tumbuh berkembang biak.Setelah penyelidikan lebih lanjut, ternyata ikan lele mengandung bahan kimia yang seperti estrogen hormon dalam tubuh manusia.Kadar estrogen yang terlalu tinggi di tubuh diketahui meningkatkan risiko kanker payudara.Lele yang diuji oleh tim ahli diambil dari perairan yang telah dicampur dengan limbah pabrik dan limbah manusia.Jadi, kasus ini sangat mirip dengan kasus keracunan merkuri karena konsumsi makanan laut.Ikan itu sendiri tidak berbahaya.Namun, karena polusi air telah menjadi begitu serius, ikan yang hidup di perairan ini juga dapat tercemar dan akhirnya dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Jadi, bisakah kita masih makan lele?Jangan takut, hanya ikan lele dari perairan yang tercemar yang dapat meningkatkan risiko kanker.Sementara itu, ikan lele yang diperoleh dari peternakan lele aman untuk dikonsumsi oleh Anda dan keluarga Anda.Saat ini, pertanian lele di Indonesia diatur dan diawasi oleh Kementerian Urusan Maritim dan Perikanan.Pemerintah sendiri sudah memiliki persyaratan khusus untuk budidaya ikan lele, misalnya sumber air, kebersihan fasilitas, penggunaan bahan kimia, pakan ikan lele, dan lainnya.Persyaratan ini diatur dalam CBIB (metode budidaya ikan yang baik).Jadi selama ikan yang Anda pilih berasal dari sebuah peternakan yang memiliki sertifikat CBIB, Anda tidak perlu khawatir tentang rumor dari tetangga bahwa ikan lele menyebabkan tips kanker untuk ikan lele yang aman meskipun ikan lele dianggap aman untuk kesehatan Anda, kadang -kadang sulit untuk menentukan air dari ikan lele Anda.membeli.Karena itu, tidak ada salahnya untuk mengurangi risiko dengan membatasi seberapa sering Anda makan lele.Secara umum, ikan lele aman untuk makan dua hingga tiga kali seminggu.Selain itu, Anda juga dapat menghilangkan kulit ikan lele sebelum diproses menjadi makanan.Masalahnya adalah, kulit ikan biasanya yang paling mudah tercemar oleh zat polutan di perairan kotor.Anda juga harus memvariasikan pilihan lauk pilihan Anda setiap hari.Semakin bervariasi, semakin kaya dan lebih seimbang asupan nutrisi untuk tubuh keluarga Anda.

berita: Lately, many people are worried about beauty brushes or toothbrushes made of bristle. Because they think the material is definitely made of sea urchins. So that the material becomes haram -- and also unclean -- when used. But actually, not all tools that use bristle refer to sea urchins. Although there are certain brush products with bristle material that use pig bristles. So, it is necessary to distinguish between the materials used, even if there is a bristle code or mark. The term bristle can mean stiff hair, short, fiber, and others. So all the hair, the stiff fiber, then the term will be referred to as bristle. Hair, stiff beard, can be categorized as bristle. Another example is the stiff fibers or pine leaves can also be referred to as bristle. In relation to this bristle, the Institute for the Study of Food, Drugs and Food, the Indonesian Ulema Council (LPPOM MUI) has provided an explanation. The following is an explanation of LPPOM MUI uploaded to the www.halalmui.org page: Lately, the virtual world has been making a fuss about brushes or toothbrushes/toothbrushes made of bristle because they are DEFINITELY made from pigs. Although we are required to be vigilant, not all bristle terms always refer to sea urchins. The lexical meaning of bristle is a short, stiff hair, fiber, etc (Webster's Dictionary). So all the hair, the stiff fiber, then the term will be referred to as bristle. Hair, stiff beard, can be categorized as bristle. Another example is the stiff fibers or pine leaves can also be referred to as bristle. So, how is its application in the industrial world? In the industrial world, bristle is indeed used as a material for making brushes or brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle can be sourced from animal hair or plant fibers as well or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. The animal hair used can be sourced from pigs, goats, horses, or camels. The plant fiber that has also been used as a brush or brush material is palm fiber. Nylon is also a synthetic fiber that is commonly used for brushes, brushes or toothbrushes. From the halal aspect, brushes and brushes, including toothbrushes derived from animal hair, are critical points. When the material is sea urchin then it should not be used because any material derived from pigs is both haram and unclean, either in dry or wet form. In addition, besides the prohibition of the substance, the MUI has issued a fatwa for anything derived from pork that is haram for its use (al-intifa') including the fur. But the problem is that not all brush or brush or toothbrush users are able to recognize whether the brush they are using is a brush or a brush that comes from pig bristles. One of the information that can be seen as a marker that the brush or brush comes from sea urchins is that it is written as the name of the product, for example “Boar Bristle Brush”. Boar is the English term for wild boar or wild boar. This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles. Toothbrush can also use this boar bristles. Amazon.com, a global online store also offers pig toothbrushes under the name “Fuchs Toothbrushes Pure Natural (Boar) Bristle Record V Adult Soft (Pack of 5)-Assorted colors by Fuchs Toothbrushes” (check this link) and brushes made from sea ​​urchin (#1 TRUSTED Wooden Boar Hair Bristle Beard Brush by Leven Rose - Perfect For a Beard Grooming Kit for Men - Made of Boars Hair Bristles and Firm Natural Wood). Please check here. However, brushes, brushes, or toothbrushes are not always made from pigs even though they have bristle written on them, because the term bristle is still a general term. There are several manufacturers who have used goat hair or camel or horse hair as brush material or made of nylon. The last group of materials is clearly acceptable. When there is no information on the source of the material, at least a simple method can be used. To determine whether it is made from animal hair or not, the method in question is to burn the material. If it smells like burning hair or horns, better leave it alone. Materials from plastic or coconut fiber do not emit such a distinctive odor when burned.
berita_id: Akhir -akhir ini, banyak orang khawatir tentang sikat kecantikan atau sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu.Karena mereka pikir bahannya pasti terbuat dari bulu babi.Sehingga materi menjadi haram - dan juga najis - bila digunakan.Tapi sebenarnya, tidak semua alat yang menggunakan Bristle merujuk pada bulu babi.Meskipun ada produk sikat tertentu dengan bahan bulu yang menggunakan bulu babi.Jadi, perlu untuk membedakan antara bahan yang digunakan, bahkan jika ada kode bulu atau tanda.Istilah bulu dapat berarti rambut kaku, pendek, serat, dan lainnya.Jadi semua rambut, serat kaku, maka istilah ini akan disebut sebagai bulu.Rambut, jenggot kaku, dapat dikategorikan sebagai bulu.Contoh lain adalah serat kaku atau daun pinus juga dapat disebut sebagai bulu.Sehubungan dengan bulu ini, Institute for Studies of Food, Obat dan Makanan, Dewan Ulama Indonesia (LPPOM MUI) telah memberikan penjelasan.Berikut ini adalah penjelasan LPPOM MUI yang diunggah ke halaman www.halalmui.org: Akhir -akhir ini, dunia virtual telah membuat keributan tentang sikat atau sikat gigi/sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu karena mereka pasti terbuat dari babi.Meskipun kami diharuskan waspada, tidak semua istilah bulu selalu merujuk pada bulu babi.Arti leksikal dari bulu adalah rambut pendek, kaku, serat, dll (Kamus Webster).Jadi semua rambut, serat kaku, maka istilah ini akan disebut sebagai bulu.Rambut, jenggot kaku, dapat dikategorikan sebagai bulu.Contoh lain adalah serat kaku atau daun pinus juga dapat disebut sebagai bulu.Jadi, bagaimana penerapannya di dunia industri?Di dunia industri, Bristle memang digunakan sebagai bahan untuk membuat kuas atau sikat, termasuk sikat gigi.BRISTLE dapat bersumber dari rambut hewani atau serat tanaman juga atau serat sintetis seperti nilon dan silikon.Rambut hewan yang digunakan dapat bersumber dari babi, kambing, kuda, atau unta.Serat tanaman yang juga telah digunakan sebagai sikat atau bahan sikat adalah serat kelapa sawit.Nylon juga merupakan serat sintetis yang biasanya digunakan untuk kuas, sikat atau sikat gigi.Dari aspek halal, sikat dan sikat, termasuk sikat gigi yang berasal dari rambut hewani, adalah titik kritis.Ketika bahannya adalah landak laut maka tidak boleh digunakan karena bahan apa pun yang berasal dari babi adalah haram dan najis, baik dalam bentuk kering atau basah.Selain itu, selain larangan zat, MUI telah mengeluarkan fatwa untuk apa pun yang berasal dari daging babi yang merupakan haram untuk penggunaannya (al-intifa ') termasuk bulu.Tetapi masalahnya adalah tidak semua sikat atau sikat atau sikat gigi dapat mengenali apakah kuas yang mereka gunakan adalah kuas atau kuas yang berasal dari bulu babi.Salah satu informasi yang dapat dilihat sebagai penanda bahwa kuas atau kuas berasal dari landak laut adalah bahwa itu ditulis sebagai nama produk, misalnya "Boar Bristle Brush".Babi adalah istilah bahasa Inggris untuk babi hutan atau babi hutan.Ini berarti bahwa produk adalah kuas yang menggunakan bulu babi liar.Sikat gigi juga dapat menggunakan bulu babi ini.Amazon.com, toko online global juga menawarkan sikat gigi pigi dengan nama “Fuchs Toothbrushes Pure Natural (Boar) Bristle Record v Dewasa Lembut (Paket 5) -sorpored Warna oleh Fuchs Toothbrushes” (periksa tautan ini) dan sikat yang terbuat dari landak (#Kayu).Silakan periksa di sini.Namun, kuas, sikat, atau sikat gigi tidak selalu terbuat dari babi meskipun mereka memiliki bulu yang tertulis di atasnya, karena istilah bulu masih merupakan istilah umum.Ada beberapa produsen yang menggunakan rambut kambing atau unta atau rambut kuda sebagai bahan sikat atau terbuat dari nilon.Kelompok material terakhir jelas dapat diterima.Ketika tidak ada informasi tentang sumber materi, setidaknya metode sederhana dapat digunakan.Untuk menentukan apakah itu terbuat dari rambut hewani atau tidak, metode yang dimaksud adalah membakar material.Jika baunya seperti rambut atau tanduk yang terbakar, lebih baik biarkan saja.Bahan dari plastik atau serat kelapa tidak memancarkan bau yang khas saat dibakar.

berita: The Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao City, Philippines, clarified the issue has been burning Reog Ponorogo related to the expulsion of idols or spirits. The objection was conveyed through a press release on its website which was updated this afternoon, Saturday, October 31, 2015. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City admitted that they had destroyed the reog ponorogo on October 20, 2015. Reog ponorogo is an asset they have had since 1988. So what is the real reason they destroy cultural objects by burning them? "The destruction by burning had to be carried out because the Ponorogo reog was already in a damaged condition and was eaten by termites," wrote the Indonesian Consulate manoeuver General in Davao. The Consulate General affirmed that the burning was not at all an attempt by the Consulate General in Davao City to damage or eliminate Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The destruction of these assets has been carried out carefully and with full respect for Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. "The Consulate General in Davao City also wants to emphasize that the burning has absolutely nothing to do with efforts to exorcise idols or spirits." The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City is currently communicating with parties in Indonesia to seek a new replacement for Reog Ponorogo. Previously, the Indonesian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Retno LP Marsudi, said that the news of a Reog Ponorogo being deliberately burned at the office of the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao, Philippines, was not entirely true. "Reog and gamelan decorations in the form of dragon heads were burned because they were damaged and infested with termites," said Retno via text message.
berita_id: Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia di Kota Davao, Filipina, mengklarifikasi masalah ini telah membakar Reog Ponorogo terkait dengan pengusiran berhala atau roh.Keberatan itu disampaikan melalui siaran pers di situs webnya yang diperbarui sore ini, Sabtu, 31 Oktober 2015. Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao mengakui bahwa mereka telah menghancurkan Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang pada 20 Oktober 2015. Reog Ponorogo adalah aset yang mereka miliki sejak tahun 1988."Penghancuran oleh pembakaran harus dilakukan karena Ponorogo Reog sudah dalam kondisi rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap," tulis jenderal manouver konsulat Indonesia di Davao.Konsulat Jenderal menegaskan bahwa pembakaran sama sekali tidak merupakan upaya oleh Konsulat Jenderal di Kota Davao untuk merusak atau menghilangkan Reog Ponorogo sebagai aset budaya.Penghancuran aset -aset ini telah dilakukan dengan hati -hati dan dengan penuh rasa hormat terhadap Reog Ponorogo sebagai aset budaya."Konsulat jenderal di Kota Davao juga ingin menekankan bahwa pembakaran sama sekali tidak ada hubungannya dengan upaya untuk mengusir idola atau roh."Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao saat ini berkomunikasi dengan pihak -pihak di Indonesia untuk mencari pengganti baru untuk Reog Ponorogo.Sebelumnya, Menteri Luar Negeri Indonesia, Retno LP Marsudi, mengatakan bahwa berita tentang Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang dengan sengaja dibakar di kantor Jenderal Konsulat Republik Indonesia (KJRI) di Davao, Filipina, tidak sepenuhnya benar."Dekorasi reog dan gamelan dalam bentuk kepala naga dibakar karena rusak dan terinfeksi rayap," kata Retno melalui pesan teks.

berita: The Governor of DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan was invited by Kanisius College to give a speech at the 90th anniversary event of Kanisius College, at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. On this occasion, there was an award presentation agenda to five alumni of Canisius College across generations. (For information, Canisius College is an educational institution owned by Catholics, which is devoted to men.) The five alumni are, firstly a pianist, Ananda Sukarlan, secondly Derianto Kusuma, founder of Traveloka, thirdly Father Magnis Suseno, a Jesuit figure, fourth Irwan Ismaun Soenggono, a Scout leader, and finally Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan, the founder of Kalbe Farma. However, when Anies was giving a speech, pianist Ananda Sukarlan suddenly left the room (Walk Out). Hundreds of alumni and attendees followed Ananda's footsteps. Apparently, about half an hour after Anies left the room, Ananda came back in. At that time, he took the award pinned to him. After receiving the award, Ananda then gave a sarcastic speech to Anies. He said Kanisius respects differences. "Yes, I did walk out in the middle of (Anies Baswedan's) speech," said Ananda when contacted by reportindonesia.com. (Monday) “You have invited someone with values ​​and integrity that go against what we have been taught,” said Ananda Ananda also admitted that he did not invite round of drinks his friends to go out. However, later, Ananda realized that the figures who came out a lot were his contemporaries, namely the 1986 class. Ananda Sukarlan was born on June 10, 1968 in Jakarta. He is the son of the couple Sukarlan and Poppy Kumudastuti. In Europe, Ananda's name is well known. Piano Petrof from the University of Hadford, Connecticut, United States in 1986. Graduated summa cum laude in 1993 under the guidance of Naum Grubert As in 2000, he was invited by Queen Sofia of Spain to fill a concert at the Queen Sofia Prize Gala Night in Madrid. In 2002, he reached the peak of his career by signing a contract to collaborate with the great French composer Pierre Boulez on a concert tour to 11 cities including Helsinkski, Oslo, Santiago and Paris. And the first Indonesian pianist to be recorded in The International Who's Who in Music book. On the other hand, when reportindonesia.com confirmed Anies Baswedan (Governor of DKI), he admitted that he did not know that any guests had left, one of them was Ananda Sukarlan. He even admitted that he was close to the Principal of Kanisius High School, Pater E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J.,. And to attend an invitation from the Canisius School was not the first. "And this is not the first time I've been to Kanisius, so when I heard it this morning, I remembered that someone had come out because I don't remember, I didn't see it," said Anies at the DKI Jakarta City Hall. (Monday). Because according to Anies, everyone has the right to express their opinion in their own way. Including people who criticize his speech. "If there is a negative reaction then that's a bonus for me," he said. According to the Big Indonesian Dictionary (KBBI) the definition of walk out is to leave the meeting room or trial of your own free will because you do not agree or refuse the discussion or the results of the trial. This turned out to have an impact on one of the Indonesian start-up companies, Traveloka. The movement to UNINSTALL THE TRAVELOKA APPLICATION is milling about on Twitter's timeline. There, Derianto Kusuma, co-founder and CTO of Traveloka, was also present. He greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech. Derianto's gesture was considered as support for Ananda's actions which were considered insulting to Governor Anies. Whereas in 2017, the online travel service provider Traveloka, received new funding for their operations in Indonesia and expanded the market in Southeast Asia. The new funding was obtained from Expedia from the United States amounting to 350 million US dollars, or around Rp. 4.6 trillion. In the past year, Traveloka has raised a total of 500 million US dollars or Rp. 6.6 trillion, which was obtained from investors in previous funding rounds such as East Ventures, Hillhouse Capital, Sequoia Capital, and Chinese e-commerce company, JD.com. I hope this doesn't happen again to anyone and anything.
berita_id: Gubernur DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan diundang oleh Kanisius College untuk memberikan pidato di acara peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College, di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Pada kesempatan ini, ada agenda presentasi penghargaan untuk lima alumni Canisius College lintas generasi.(For information, Canisius College is an educational institution owned by Catholics, which is devoted to men.) The five alumni are, firstly a pianist, Ananda Sukarlan, secondly Derianto Kusuma, founder of Traveloka, thirdly Father Magnis Suseno, a Jesuit figure, fourth Irwan Ismaun Soenggono, a Scout leader, and finally Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan, the founder ofKalbe Farha.Namun, ketika Anies memberikan pidato, pianis Ananda Sukarlan tiba -tiba meninggalkan ruangan (berjalan keluar).Ratusan alumni dan peserta mengikuti jejak Ananda.Rupanya, sekitar setengah jam setelah Anies meninggalkan ruangan, Ananda kembali. Pada waktu itu, ia menerima penghargaan yang disematkan kepadanya.Setelah menerima penghargaan, Ananda kemudian memberikan pidato sarkastik kepada Anies.Dia mengatakan Kanisius menghormati perbedaan."Ya, saya memang keluar di tengah pidato (anies Baswedan)," kata Ananda ketika dihubungi oleh ReportIndonesia.com.(Senin) "Anda telah mengundang seseorang dengan nilai -nilai dan integritas yang bertentangan dengan apa yang telah kami ajarkan," kata Ananda Ananda juga mengakui bahwa ia tidak mengundang minuman teman -temannya untuk keluar.Namun, kemudian, Ananda menyadari bahwa angka -angka yang banyak keluar adalah orang -orang sezamannya, yaitu kelas 1986.Ananda Sukarlan lahir pada 10 Juni 1968 di Jakarta.Dia adalah putra pasangan Sukarlan dan Poppy Kumudastuti.Di Eropa, nama Ananda terkenal.Piano Petrof dari University of Hadford, Connecticut, Amerika Serikat pada tahun 1986. Lulus summa cum laude pada tahun 1993 di bawah bimbingan Naum Grubert seperti pada tahun 2000, ia diundang oleh Ratu Sofia dari Spanyol untuk mengisi konser di Ratu Sofia Hadiah Gala Night di Madrid.Pada tahun 2002, ia mencapai puncak karirnya dengan menandatangani kontrak untuk berkolaborasi dengan komposer Prancis yang hebat Pierre Boulez dalam tur konser ke 11 kota termasuk Helsinkski, Oslo, Santiago dan Paris.Dan pianis Indonesia pertama yang direkam di International Who's Who in Music Book.Di sisi lain, ketika Reportindonesia.com mengkonfirmasi Anies Baswedan (Gubernur DKI), dia mengakui bahwa dia tidak tahu bahwa ada tamu yang pergi, salah satunya adalah Ananda Sukarlan.Dia bahkan mengakui bahwa dia dekat dengan kepala sekolah SMA Kanisius, Pater E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J.,.Dan untuk menghadiri undangan dari sekolah Canisius bukan yang pertama."Dan ini bukan pertama kalinya saya ke Kanisius, jadi ketika saya mendengarnya pagi ini, saya ingat seseorang telah keluar karena saya tidak ingat, saya tidak melihatnya," kata Anies di Balai Kota DKI Jakarta.(Senin).Karena menurut ANIES, setiap orang memiliki hak untuk mengekspresikan pendapat mereka dengan cara mereka sendiri.Termasuk orang yang mengkritik pidatonya."Jika ada reaksi negatif maka itu bonus untukku," katanya.Menurut Kamus Indonesia Besar (KBBI) Definisi Walk Out adalah meninggalkan ruang pertemuan atau persidangan atas kehendak bebas Anda sendiri karena Anda tidak setuju atau menolak diskusi atau hasil persidangan.Ini ternyata berdampak pada salah satu perusahaan pemula Indonesia, Traveloka.Gerakan untuk menghapus instalasi aplikasi Traveloka sedang berkeliaran di timeline Twitter.Di sana, DeRianto Kusuma, co-founder dan CTO dari Traveloka, juga hadir.Dia menyapa dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah berjalan keluar dan pidato anies.Gerakan DeRianto dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda yang dianggap menghina gubernur.Sedangkan pada 2017, penyedia layanan perjalanan online Traveloka, menerima dana baru untuk operasi mereka di Indonesia dan memperluas pasar di Asia Tenggara.Pendanaan baru diperoleh dari Expedia dari Amerika Serikat sebesar 350 juta dolar AS, atau sekitar RP.4,6 triliun.Pada tahun lalu, Traveloka telah mengumpulkan total 500 juta dolar AS atau RP.6,6 triliun, yang diperoleh dari investor dalam putaran pendanaan sebelumnya seperti East Ventures, Hillhouse Capital, Sequoia Capital, dan China E-Commerce Company, JD.com.Saya harap ini tidak terjadi lagi pada siapa pun dan apa pun.

berita: Ponorogo – Strong protests over the burning of rickety properties in the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines continue to roll in various areas. This time thousands of residents from various elements of society took to the streets. The thousands of Ponorogo residents staged the action, starting from aloons, then continuing in front of the district government office, and ending at the Ponorogo DPRD building. In addition to taking turns cursing the burning of traditional art tools and equipment typical of Ponorogo Regency, the protesters consisting of a combination of reog art lovers, students and community shops also held various reyog art attractions, to ward off the notion that reog is an idol as alleged. . "We are demonstrating this as a form of strong protest against the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao Philippines, who has burned the reyog art property, we demand that the people who set the fires be removed from their positions," said Eko Budi Setyawan, one of the artists of Reyog Ponorogo. Representatives from the demonstrators then held a hearing on the 2nd floor of the DPRD building on Jalan Aloon-Aloon Timur. They were accepted by elements of the leadership of the Council and Acting Regent of Ponorogo Maskur. From the meeting, it was agreed that the representatives of the people and the government of the Ponorogo district agreed to protest strongly against the reyog property that was burned at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. "As representatives of the people, we are concerned about the burning of Reyog properties, and hope fill that similar incidents will not happen again, Reyog art is a traditional art typical of our district, so we must protect and preserve it," said DPRD chairman Ali Mufthi.
berita_id: Ponorogo - Protes kuat atas pembakaran properti reyot di konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina terus bergulir di berbagai daerah.Kali ini ribuan penduduk dari berbagai elemen masyarakat turun ke jalan.Ribuan penduduk Ponorogo melakukan tindakan, mulai dari aloon, kemudian melanjutkan di depan kantor pemerintah distrik, dan berakhir di gedung Ponorogo DPRD.Selain bergiliran mengutuk pembakaran alat dan peralatan seni tradisional yang khas dari Kabupaten Ponorogo, para pengunjuk rasa yang terdiri dari kombinasi pecinta seni yang reog, siswa dan toko -toko komunitas juga memegang berbagai atraksi seni Reyog, untuk menangkal gagasan bahwa Reog adalah idola seperti yang diduga.."Kami menunjukkan ini sebagai bentuk protes kuat terhadap konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao Filipina, yang telah membakar properti seni Reyog, kami menuntut agar orang -orang yang menyalakan api dikeluarkan dari posisi mereka," kata Eko Budi Setyawan, salah satu seniman Reyog Ponorogo.Perwakilan dari para demonstran kemudian mengadakan sidang di lantai 2 gedung DPRD di Jalan Aloon-Aloon Timur.Mereka diterima oleh unsur -unsur kepemimpinan Dewan dan Penjabat Bupati Ponorogo Maskur.Dari pertemuan itu, disepakati bahwa perwakilan rakyat dan pemerintah distrik Ponorogo sepakat untuk memprotes dengan kuat terhadap properti Reyog yang dibakar di konsulat jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina."Sebagai perwakilan rakyat, kami khawatir tentang pembakaran properti Reyog, dan berharap mengisi bahwa insiden serupa tidak akan terjadi lagi, seni Reyog adalah seni tradisional yang khas dari distrik kami, jadi kami harus melindungi dan melestarikannya," kata Ketua DPRD Ali Mufthi.

berita: As someone who likes various processed catfish meats, I am curious about the amount of information circulating on social networks, which states that catfish is the filthiest and disgusting fish in the world. It is even said, in a piece of catfish meat there are 3000 cancer cells. Is that right? Catfish is indeed a fish that can eat anything (Omnivores) and is able to live in all kinds of waste in all the waters. Not infrequently we encounter household waste shelters, livestock waste channels, ditches or ditches that are used for catfish farming. Catfish or also known as Catfish are known as tough fish. In addition to breathing with gills, this fish also has an additional respiratory apparatus in the form of a labyrinth so that it can survive in muddy, dirty or even polluted water conditions. This fact is very likely to trigger the emergence of allegations about the accumulation of carcinogenic toxins (cancer causing) in the body of catfish. So that catfish is safe for consumption The issue that states that in a piece of catfish there are 3000 cancer cells is not all true. As long as the catfish is raised in waters that are not polluted by chemical waste or acute organic waste, then catfish is still safe for consumption. Some bacteria that are often found in the body of fish are E. coli, Shigella and Salmonella bacteria. These bacteria can be removed by proper processing. Make sure we wash the catfish meat and process it until it is completely cooked with proper heating. All bacteria in fish meat will die at a certain high temperature. We also need to be careful in buying catfish that we will process as cooking. Choose catfish whose skin is not moldy, the flesh is hard when pressed and is not damaged, does not smell bad, the eyes are clear and prominent, the gills are red and the fins and skin are not easily torn. Well, until here we don't have to worry about eating our favorite catfish meat. May be useful.
berita_id: Sebagai seseorang yang menyukai berbagai daging ikan lele olahan, saya ingin tahu tentang jumlah informasi yang beredar di jejaring sosial, yang menyatakan bahwa ikan lele adalah ikan yang paling kotor dan menjijikkan di dunia.Bahkan dikatakan, dalam sepotong daging ikan lele ada 3000 sel kanker.Apakah itu benar?Lele memang ikan yang bisa makan apa saja (omnivora) dan mampu hidup dalam semua jenis limbah di semua perairan.Tidak jarang kita menemukan tempat penampungan limbah rumah tangga, saluran limbah ternak, parit atau parit yang digunakan untuk pertanian ikan lele.Ikan lele atau juga dikenal sebagai ikan lele dikenal sebagai ikan tangguh.Selain bernafas dengan insang, ikan ini juga memiliki peralatan pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin sehingga dapat bertahan hidup dalam kondisi air berlumpur, kotor atau bahkan tercemar.Fakta ini sangat mungkin memicu kemunculan tuduhan tentang akumulasi racun karsinogenik (penyebab kanker) dalam tubuh ikan lele.Sehingga ikan lele aman untuk dikonsumsi masalah yang menyatakan bahwa dalam sepotong ikan lele ada 3000 sel kanker tidak semuanya benar.Selama ikan lele dibesarkan di perairan yang tidak tercemar oleh limbah kimia atau limbah organik akut, maka ikan lele masih aman untuk dikonsumsi.Beberapa bakteri yang sering ditemukan di tubuh ikan adalah bakteri E. coli, shigella dan salmonella.Bakteri ini dapat dihilangkan dengan pemrosesan yang tepat.Pastikan kami mencuci daging ikan lele dan memprosesnya sampai benar -benar dimasak dengan pemanasan yang tepat.Semua bakteri dalam daging ikan akan mati pada suhu tinggi tertentu.Kita juga perlu berhati -hati dalam membeli ikan lele yang akan kita proses sebagai memasak.Pilih ikan lele yang kulitnya tidak berjamur, dagingnya keras ketika ditekan dan tidak rusak, tidak berbau tidak enak, matanya jernih dan menonjol, insang berwarna merah dan sirip dan kulit tidak mudah robek.Nah, sampai di sini kita tidak perlu khawatir makan daging ikan lele favorit kita.Mungkin berguna.

berita: The government is asked to consider carefully if it intends to block social media Facebook and Youtube. The reason is, it is very likely that the blocking of the two social media (medsos) that are widely used in Indonesia will face rejection from the wider community. "It really needs to be thought out carefully, considering the good, the bad, the positive, the negative, as well as the pros and cons," said Idil Akbar, a political and government observer from Padjadjaran University to SINDOnews, Saturday, July 15 2017. Nevertheless, said Idil, the emphasis on this issue is how to find ways to control the "traffic" of content on Facebook and Youtube in response to concerns about the spread of ideas that are contrary to Pancasila and the 1945 Constitution. Idil does not agree if there is a perceived threat to block Facebook and Youtube because the government is panicking. He believes the government has certain considerations. (Also read: Kemenkominfo's plan to close social media is considered excessive) He believes the government has sufficient resources to overcome concerns about the spread of ideas that are considered contrary to Pancasila. "That is what needs to be optimally empowered. I think cyber intelligence is also important to prevent information that is suspected of being contrary to Pancasila and so on," he said. However, Idil emphasized that the government must really do a lot of consideration before blocking social media. According to him, it is not impossible that there will be a wave of protests against the closure of social media which will actually inconvenience the government. "Closing even though it is a solution, it is temporary because it will most likely be opposed by the public. Don't forget that Indonesia is one of the most users (Facebook and Youtube-ed) in the world," he said. As is known, the government threatens to block social media such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube if it does not close accounts charged with radicalism. Currently the Ministry of Communication and Information (Kemkominfo) has asked internet service providers explain (ISPs) to cut off access to Telegram's 11 domain name systems (DNS). “Our request on the platform to close accounts containing radicalism, during 2016 to 2017 was only 50% fulfilled. This is very disappointing," said Minister of Communication and Information Rudiantara after an anti-radicalism event at Padjadjaran University, Bandung, Friday, July 14 2017. Rudiantara requested that the social media meet the Indonesian government's request. If not, it will consider closing the platform. He explained that the platform was reluctant to close the account because in its home country it had to go through a court process. “But they are here because of business. The ads are also from here. Therefore, it is necessary to comply with the existing regulations here," he explained. The ministry, continued Rudiantara, has made various efforts to prevent the spread of radicalism. The way to do this is by closing the site and blocking accounts on social media. In blocking accounts on social media, it is necessary to involve the platform. "We have to move fast, we don't want the public to be exposed to radical content," he said. Rudi apologized if later his party was forced to close social media. The Minister of Research, Technology and Higher Education (Menristekdikti) Mohamad Nasir asked the chancellors to pay attention to the activities of each campus component.
berita_id: Pemerintah diminta untuk mempertimbangkan dengan cermat jika bermaksud untuk memblokir media sosial Facebook dan YouTube.Alasannya adalah, sangat mungkin bahwa pemblokiran dua media sosial (MEDSO) yang banyak digunakan di Indonesia akan menghadapi penolakan dari komunitas yang lebih luas."Ini benar -benar perlu dipikirkan dengan cermat, mengingat kebaikan, yang buruk, yang positif, negatif, serta pro dan kontra," kata Idil Akbar, seorang pengamat politik dan pemerintah dari Universitas Padjadjaran kepada Sindonews, Sabtu, 15 Juli 2017. Namun, tentang Idil, Penyebab Idil pada masalah ini adalah bagaimana cara menemukan cara untuk mengontrol "lalu lintas" tentang konten tentang konten "untuk mengontrol" lalu lintas ".ke Pancasila dan Konstitusi 1945.Idil tidak setuju jika ada ancaman yang dirasakan untuk memblokir Facebook dan YouTube karena pemerintah panik.Dia percaya pemerintah memiliki pertimbangan tertentu.;"Itulah yang perlu diberdayakan secara optimal. Saya pikir kecerdasan dunia maya juga penting untuk mencegah informasi yang diduga bertentangan dengan Pancasila dan sebagainya," katanya.Namun, Idil menekankan bahwa pemerintah harus benar -benar melakukan banyak pertimbangan sebelum memblokir media sosial.Menurutnya, bukan tidak mungkin bahwa akan ada gelombang protes terhadap penutupan media sosial yang benar -benar akan merepotkan pemerintah."Menutup meskipun ini adalah solusi, itu bersifat sementara karena kemungkinan besar akan ditentang oleh publik. Jangan lupa bahwa Indonesia adalah salah satu pengguna terbanyak (Facebook dan YouTube-ed) di dunia," katanya.Seperti diketahui, pemerintah mengancam untuk memblokir media sosial seperti Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, dan YouTube jika tidak menutup akun yang ditugasi radikalisme.Saat ini Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi (Kemkominfo) telah meminta penyedia layanan internet menjelaskan (ISP) untuk memotong akses ke 11 Sistem Nama Domain Telegram (DNS).“Permintaan kami pada platform untuk menutup akun yang mengandung radikalisme, selama 2016 hingga 2017 hanya terpenuhi 50%. Ini sangat mengecewakan,” kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi Rudiiantara setelah acara anti-radikalisme di Universitas Padjadjaran, Bandung, Jumat, 14 Juli 2017. Rudiantara meminta agar media sosial memenuhi permintaan pemerintah Indonesonia.Jika tidak, itu akan mempertimbangkan untuk menutup platform.Dia menjelaskan bahwa platform itu enggan untuk menutup akun karena di negara asalnya harus melalui proses pengadilan."Tapi mereka ada di sini karena bisnis. Iklan juga dari sini. Oleh karena itu, perlu untuk mematuhi peraturan yang ada di sini," jelasnya.Kementerian, Lanjutan Rudiiantara, telah melakukan berbagai upaya untuk mencegah penyebaran radikalisme.Cara melakukan ini adalah dengan menutup situs dan memblokir akun di media sosial.Dalam memblokir akun di media sosial, perlu melibatkan platform."Kami harus bergerak cepat, kami tidak ingin publik terpapar konten radikal," katanya.Rudi meminta maaf jika kemudian partainya dipaksa untuk menutup media sosial.Menteri Penelitian, Teknologi dan Pendidikan Tinggi (Menristekdikti) Mohamad Nasir meminta kanselir untuk memperhatikan kegiatan setiap komponen kampus.

berita: On social networks, there is a lot of information circulating that mentions catfish as the filthiest fish. In a mouthful of catfish meat, there are 3000 cancer cells. The news made catfish cultivators in East Java (East Java) offended and devastated. the nickname as the filthiest fish refers to the nature of catfish that likes to consume various types of waste in the waters. Even an article that is quite viral on the internet mentions that human waste is also used as feed for a catfish cultivation in Haikou City, China. That's not true. "Pity catfish farmers, they are offended and very saddened by the news," said Head of the Fisheries and Marine Service of East Java Province, Heru Tjahjono, Saturday (31/10/2015). He said that the news that actually describes catfish cultivation in Haikou City, China is not the same as catfish cultivation in East Java. The news could have an impact on the catfish market in East Java. The reason is, the catfish market is a consumer in the lower middle class level II. While snapper, tuna, mackerel, grouper at level I upper middle class. Heru said, consumers at level I division are difficult to shake with the issue of the fish they consume. This is different from the issue of fish such as catfish, gourami, mujahir, which are food for middle to lower-class level II consumers. For level I consumers, it is difficult to be shaken by issues. In contrast to level II consumers. If there is an issue, level II consumers can be afraid and don't want to consume, he said.
berita_id: Di jejaring sosial, ada banyak informasi yang beredar yang menyebutkan ikan lele sebagai ikan paling kotor.Dalam seteguk daging ikan lele, ada 3000 sel kanker.Berita itu membuat para pembudidaya lele di Jawa Timur (Jawa Timur) tersinggung dan hancur.Julukan sebagai ikan paling kotor mengacu pada sifat ikan lele yang suka mengonsumsi berbagai jenis limbah di perairan.Bahkan sebuah artikel yang cukup viral di internet menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan untuk budidaya ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina.Itu tidak benar."Kasihan petani lele, mereka tersinggung dan sangat sedih dengan berita itu," kata kepala perikanan dan layanan kelautan provinsi Jawa Timur, Heru Tjahjono, Sabtu (31/10/2015).Dia mengatakan bahwa berita yang benar -benar menggambarkan budidaya ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina tidak sama dengan budidaya ikan lele di Jawa Timur.Berita itu dapat berdampak pada pasar ikan lele di Jawa Timur.Alasannya adalah, pasar lele adalah konsumen di tingkat kelas menengah II.Sedangkan kakap, tuna, mackerel, kerapu di kelas menengah atas level I.Heru mengatakan, konsumen di divisi Level I sulit untuk dikocok dengan masalah ikan yang mereka konsumsi.Ini berbeda dari masalah ikan seperti ikan lele, gourami, mujahir, yang merupakan makanan untuk konsumen kelas menengah ke bawah.Untuk konsumen Level I, sulit untuk dikocok oleh masalah.Berbeda dengan konsumen Level II.Jika ada masalah, konsumen Level II bisa takut dan tidak ingin mengkonsumsi, katanya.

berita: Stroke is a condition in which the blood supply to the brain is cut off due to blockage of blood vessels. This condition can cause the death of cells in the brain. That is why stroke sufferers cannot move their body members when they have a stroke. Stroke is a serious disease, if not treated immediately can cause death. In the past, stroke only attacked the elderly, but now even young people can have a stroke. There are many burdens that have to be faced by stroke sufferers, ranging from physical, mental or financial limitations. This can make stroke sufferers decrease their enthusiasm for life. So heavy that must be lived by stroke patients. There is a unique way that is effective in dealing with strokes, namely using a needle. Needles are not only for sewing, but help overcome several diseases including stroke. You must have known that now there are many methods of healing diseases using needles called acupuncture. This first aid method of stroke with a needle was introduced by Professor from China. You can apply a needle to a stroke patient before being taken to the hospital. This is to make the patient better and prevent the symptoms of stroke from getting worse. When you are faced with someone who is having a stroke, don't panic. Do not lift or move the stroke patient from their position. Just take advantage of the needle, it can be a sewing needle, a safety pin or a syringe which is an important needle. However, make sure the needle is completely sterile or burn it before using it on stroke sufferers. Take a sterile needle and insert it into 10 fingers of a stroke patient. Prick into the patient's finger slowly, not too deep. Make sure the blood flows from the finger you pricked. If it doesn't bleed, press firmly until it bleeds out. After all the fingers are bleeding, wait a few minutes. After that, the patient should immediately regain consciousness. If the mouth of the sufferer has a sideways stroke or is oozing, you must massage the ear until it turns red. Then. Pierce the ear in the soft part of the skin with a needle until the blood comes out. Do this on both ears of the patient. Wait a few minutes, then the patient's mouth returns to normal. After the patient returns to normal, check his body for diagonal abnormalities or not. Take the stroke patient to the hospital for further examination and treatment. This method is proven to be effective in providing first aid to stroke sufferers when experiencing a stroke. With the discovery of this method, many people can be saved from sudden strokes. So, we are no longer confused when we meet people who have had a stroke. Do the treatment as above, don't hesitate and steady your heart to help stroke sufferers.
berita_id: Stroke adalah kondisi di mana suplai darah ke otak terputus karena penyumbatan pembuluh darah.Kondisi ini dapat menyebabkan kematian sel di otak.Itulah sebabnya penderita stroke tidak dapat menggerakkan anggota tubuh mereka ketika mereka mengalami stroke.Stroke adalah penyakit serius, jika tidak diobati segera dapat menyebabkan kematian.Di masa lalu, stroke hanya menyerang orang tua, tetapi sekarang bahkan orang muda dapat mengalami stroke.Ada banyak beban yang harus dihadapi oleh penderita stroke, mulai dari keterbatasan fisik, mental atau keuangan.Ini dapat membuat penderita stroke mengurangi antusiasme mereka untuk hidup.Begitu berat yang harus dijalani oleh pasien stroke.Ada cara unik yang efektif dalam menangani stroke, yaitu menggunakan jarum.Jarum tidak hanya untuk menjahit, tetapi membantu mengatasi beberapa penyakit termasuk stroke.Anda pasti tahu bahwa sekarang ada banyak metode penyembuhan penyakit menggunakan jarum yang disebut akupunktur.Metode pertolongan pertama stroke dengan jarum ini diperkenalkan oleh Profesor dari Cina.Anda dapat menggunakan jarum ke pasien stroke sebelum dibawa ke rumah sakit.Ini untuk membuat pasien lebih baik dan mencegah gejala stroke menjadi lebih buruk.Ketika Anda dihadapkan pada seseorang yang mengalami stroke, jangan panik.Jangan mengangkat atau memindahkan pasien stroke dari posisi mereka.Manfaatkan saja jarum, itu bisa menjadi jarum jahit, pin pengaman atau jarum suntik yang merupakan jarum penting.Namun, pastikan jarum benar -benar steril atau bakar sebelum menggunakannya pada penderita stroke.Ambil jarum steril dan masukkan ke dalam 10 jari pasien stroke.Tusuk ke jari pasien perlahan, tidak terlalu dalam.Pastikan darah mengalir dari jari yang Anda tusuk.Jika tidak berdarah, tekan dengan kuat sampai keluar.Setelah semua jari berdarah, tunggu beberapa menit.Setelah itu, pasien harus segera mendapatkan kembali kesadaran.Jika mulut penderita memiliki stroke menyamping atau mengalir, Anda harus memijat telinga sampai berubah merah.Kemudian.Tusuk telinga di bagian lembut kulit dengan jarum sampai darah keluar.Lakukan ini di kedua telinga pasien.Tunggu beberapa menit, lalu mulut pasien kembali normal.Setelah pasien kembali normal, periksa tubuhnya untuk kelainan diagonal atau tidak.Bawa pasien stroke ke rumah sakit untuk pemeriksaan dan perawatan lebih lanjut.Metode ini terbukti efektif dalam memberikan pertolongan pertama untuk penderita stroke ketika mengalami stroke.Dengan penemuan metode ini, banyak orang dapat diselamatkan dari pukulan mendadak.Jadi, kami tidak lagi bingung ketika kami bertemu orang -orang yang mengalami stroke.Lakukan perawatan seperti di atas, jangan ragu -ragu dan stabil jantung Anda untuk membantu penderita stroke.

berita: Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara said that currently there is a lot of negative content circulating on social media. According to him, the steps currently being taken by the Ministry of Communication and Informatics to overcome this are closing the accounts that spread the content. “Yesterday I met with Commission I, and the current content is a lot of negative things, damaging the relationship with one another. There is something bad on social media that gives us the authority, of information processing course closing the account," he said at a press conference in Jakarta on Monday (05/06). However, if negative content and accounts spreading bad content cannot be controlled, Facebook will be closed (blocked, red). Rudy assessed that the action was in accordance with the law. "But if necessary, Kominfo will close the organizers. If we now do account restrictions, it is possible that Facebook is closed. If it's needed later, then yes," he said. Furthermore, Rudy said he would establish a relationship with the Indonesian Ulema Council (MUI) regarding the recently issued social media fatwa. Because, the one who knows in detail about the fatwa is MUI. "God willing, I will return to MUI to jointly follow up on this fatwa," he said
berita_id: Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa saat ini ada banyak konten negatif yang beredar di media sosial.Menurutnya, langkah -langkah yang saat ini diambil oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika untuk mengatasi hal ini menutup akun yang menyebarkan konten."Kemarin saya bertemu dengan Komisi I, dan konten saat ini adalah banyak hal negatif, merusak hubungan satu sama lain. Ada sesuatu yang buruk di media sosial yang memberi kita otoritas, kursus pemrosesan informasi menutup akun," katanya pada konferensi pers di Jakarta pada hari Senin (05/06).Namun, jika konten negatif dan akun yang menyebarkan konten yang buruk tidak dapat dikendalikan, Facebook akan ditutup (diblokir, merah).Rudy menilai bahwa tindakan itu sesuai dengan hukum."Tetapi jika perlu, Kominfo akan menutup penyelenggara. Jika kita sekarang melakukan pembatasan akun, ada kemungkinan bahwa Facebook ditutup. Jika diperlukan nanti, maka ya," katanya.Selain itu, Rudy mengatakan dia akan menjalin hubungan dengan Dewan Ulama Indonesia (MUI) mengenai fatwa media sosial yang baru -baru ini dikeluarkan.Karena, orang yang tahu secara rinci tentang Fatwa adalah MUI."Bersedia Tuhan, saya akan kembali ke MUI untuk bersama -sama menindaklanjuti fatwa ini," katanya

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia is confirmed to be a hoax. This certainty was revealed after the Minister of Finance (Menkeu) Sri Mulyani Indrawati explained this in front of journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace, West Java, Monday (12/3/2018). "It doesn't exist and has never been discussed," said Sri Mulyani to a number of media crews. When giving information regarding the meeting of President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) with the delegation of the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB), the Minister of Finance received a question about it. And the Minister of Finance explained that currently, there are indeed a lot of circulating information and documents that are made as if they came from government institutions. "What the Menpan said (in social media) was a hoax, it was indeed like that. On social media today, there is a lot of information and documents that are made similar to those from the government and published," said Sri Mulyani. Previously, it was widely circulated on social media regarding the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia. In the issue, it is stated that the president will be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp 553,422,694 per month. The vice president is said to be proposed to receive a salary of Rp 368948462 per president month.
berita_id: Berita yang beredar tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia dikonfirmasi menjadi tipuan.Kepastian ini terungkap setelah Menteri Keuangan (Menkeu) Sri Mulyani Indrawati menjelaskan hal ini di depan jurnalis di Istana Presiden Bogor, Jawa Barat, Senin (12/3/2018)."Itu tidak ada dan tidak pernah dibahas," kata Sri Mulyani kepada sejumlah kru media.Ketika memberikan informasi mengenai pertemuan Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) dengan delegasi Bank Investasi Infrastruktur Asia (AIIB), Menteri Keuangan menerima pertanyaan tentang hal itu.Dan Menteri Keuangan menjelaskan bahwa saat ini, memang ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang beredar yang dibuat seolah -olah mereka berasal dari lembaga pemerintah."Apa yang dikatakan Menpan (di media sosial) adalah tipuan, memang seperti itu. Di media sosial hari ini, ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan yang dari pemerintah dan diterbitkan," kata Sri Mulyani.Sebelumnya, secara luas diedarkan di media sosial mengenai rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia.Dalam masalah ini, dinyatakan bahwa presiden akan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji hingga Rp 553.422.694 per bulan.Wakil presiden dikatakan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji Rp 368948462 per bulan presiden.

berita: Pianist and composer Ananda Sukarlan has been constantly criticized by a number of groups for protesting by leaving the event or walking out, when DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan made a speech in celebration of the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College, Jakarta, Saturday (11/11/2017). . On social media Twitter, there is a lot of debate between those who support his attitude and those who make fun of him. Musician and politician Erros Djarot even spoke up, regretting Ananda Sukarlan's attitude. Even writings circulating in the name of the clergy Frans Magnis Suseno on social media---although there was no confirmation from Father Frans-Magnis whether it was really his writing. Ananda was invited to attend the event because he received the Canisius Award along with four other Kanisius College alumni who sat in the VIP seats. His WO action attracted the attention of other guests, and several other alumni even participated. KBR journalist Asrul Dwi interviewed Ananda Sukarlan and talked about why he chose to leave the room during Anies Baswedan's speech. Why did you choose to walk out when Governor Anies Baswedan gave a speech? I have always disagreed with Anies Baswedan's method during the DKI Jakarta Pilkada campaign. Also what has he been doing for the past three weeks, where whatever the previous Governor of DKI, Ahok, has been countered. So I'm not really his pick. Then I walked out because I didn't want to hear more of his speech. You said that Anies Baswedan's integrity was in doubt. What does it mean? I was taught by my parents and school about the value of difference. From elementary to high school, I studied at a Catholic school. While I myself am Muslim. That's no problem and not exaggerated. My good friends are also from any ethnicity and any religion. That's no reason to divide. And, like my speech, we make a difference together to be better. Not to divide. Do you see Anies Baswedan still doing that? Yes, you just listen to his speech when he was governor. (During his inauguration as the Governor of DKI Jakarta, Monday, October 16 2017, Anies Baswedan delivered a speech, one of which touched on the indigenous issue. "Jakarta is one of the few places in Indonesia that has felt the presence of colonialists in everyday life for centuries. The indigenous people were oppressed and defeated by colonialism. Now that we are independent, it's time for us to be the host in our own country. Don't let Jakarta be like what is written in the Madura proverb, "Duck se atellor, ajam se ngeremmi." incubating. We are working hard to win independence, we are working hard to repel colonialism.") You are said to have failed to move on after the election for the new governor of Jakarta. Your response? Yes, I have moved on, that's why I don't want to hear his speech. Want anything else? He was democratically elected and I accepted him as governor. But if I had to listen to his speech, to be honest I was a bit lazy. On social media, there are more and more enemies about the DKI Jakarta election. Moreover, there is already polarization in society. Doesn't it make things worse? Of course. But it's not me that confuses me. That is, some start by making a website that I'm Christian, all sorts of things. I've uploaded on my Instagram about how to slander. If you want to slander me, don't say I'm Christian, just say Catholic. Because Canisius is a Catholic school. So if you want to slander, the research must be more correct. That's them in waves. Then I once made a joke on Twitter in English. It reads like this: Hey I'm guy and I'm fall in love with that guy in front of me. And then I realize, its a mirror. And it was retweeted by them hundreds of times. Then I thought he was gay. So here it is, now there is a google translate before slandering translate it first. Father Frans Magnis reportedly also commented and stated that he did not agree with your attitude. Your comments? It must be clarified to him (about writing on social media). Because Father Magnis came only for a short time and he was sick. Can't be bothered about this either. At that time he was kind enough to come to receive the award. So it's a bit difficult to explain. Recently, there have been calls for a boycott of the Traveloka application because the CEO supports your stance. The Traveloka CEO wasn't there. If you want to boycott Traveloka, you must first download the application. It's hard to boycott if you don't have an application. But I don't know how they boycotted it. Just don't slam the phone. How many people took part in the walk-out at that time? My age, class of 1986. Then we took pictures and immediately posted on Facebook. That's roughly wish how many. So don't think of walking out and riding a motorbike in the hall while carrying a flag. My walkout is very polite, like someone going to the toilet. And I don't want to bother other people. So I stood up, very silent, and walked out. I just happened to be sitting in the VIP seat. But how did it get so crowded in the first place? I don't know why it went viral. It was like I was talking on Facebook, and it went viral. That's why our generation made a statement that we came out on our own initiative. Not conspiracy. Nor in the name of Canisius. After all, I am in the same position as Anies Baswedan or Father Magnis, namely invited guests. In my speech, I criticized the organizing committee. No one else.

Toothbrush is the most important bath tool to remove dirt around the teeth so that dental health is maintained. However, using a toothbrush should not be careless, especially in choosing the toothbrush you use. And when you want to buy a toothbrush, you should pay attention to the code behind the packaging, don't let your toothbrush be made of pig bristles Currently, a number of people are shocked by a toothbrush product that uses pig bristles. The use of the product refers to the writing in English, namely bristles on the packaging There is one secret code which means your toothbrush is made of boar bristles. The Or** * brand toothbrush is clearly made of bristles. The product packaging clearly describes the product. Responding to this case, the Chairman of the Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta said, if it is true that the toothbrush is made of pig bristles, the toothbrush is haram. In Al Surah Al Maidah verse 3 it is explained that derivatives from pigs are haram. We will investigate this prohibition, research lab really from sea urchins or not," said Muhammad Hatta However, the Medan City Health Service through the Secretary of the North Sumatra Health Office, Afwan Lubis, is not sure about the existence of a toothbrush made of pig bristles. He added that laboratory tests were carried out if there were reports from the public regarding the boar bristle toothbrush. If it really contains sea urchins, then it should not be circulated because there are elements that are not halal I don't think it's possible. But how are you? We can comment if there is a laboratory test first. Currently there is no laboratory test," said Afwan, as quoted from Tribunnews.com (8/3)
berita_id: Sikat gigi adalah alat mandi paling penting untuk menghilangkan kotoran di sekitar gigi sehingga kesehatan gigi dipertahankan.Namun, menggunakan sikat gigi tidak boleh ceroboh, terutama dalam memilih sikat gigi yang Anda gunakan.Dan ketika Anda ingin membeli sikat gigi, Anda harus memperhatikan kode di balik kemasannya, jangan biarkan sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari bulu babi saat ini, sejumlah orang terkejut oleh produk sikat gigi yang menggunakan bulu babi.Penggunaan produk mengacu pada tulisan dalam bahasa Inggris, yaitu bulu pada kemasan ada satu kode rahasia yang berarti sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari bulu babi.Sikat gigi merek atau *** jelas terbuat dari bulu.Kemasan produk dengan jelas menggambarkan produk.Menanggapi kasus ini, ketua Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta berkata, jika benar bahwa sikat gigi terbuat dari bulu babi, sikat gigi adalah haram.Dalam Al Surah Al Maidah ayat 3 dijelaskan bahwa turunan dari babi adalah haram.Kami akan menyelidiki larangan ini, laboratorium penelitian yang benar -benar dari bulu babi atau tidak, ”kata Muhammad Hatta, namun, Layanan Kesehatan Kota Medan melalui Sekretaris Kantor Kesehatan Sumatra Utara, Afwan Lubis, tidak yakin tentang keberadaan sikat gigi yang tidak ada di bawah tanah yang tidak ada yang tidak ada di bawah.Diedarkan karena ada elemen yang tidak halal saya tidak berpikir itu mungkin.

berita: It is said that the salary of the Indonesian president will increase drastically from only Rp. 62 million to Rp. 553 million. The information circulating stated that this increase was conveyed by the Minister of State Apparatus Empowerment and Bureaucratic Reform. discussion about the increase in the president's salary His party has never discussed the increase in the president's salary. "It doesn't exist, and it has never been discussed," said Mulyani when answering reporters' questions at a press conference at the Bogor presidential palace, Monday (12/3). State and Bureaucratic Reform, who mentioned the increase in the president's salary, Sri Mulyani emphasized that it was a hoax. "It's a hoax, because there are many social media that produce information, for documents that are made similar to those of the government that are published," said Mulyani. mention the president's base salary g. The amount of only around Rp. 30 million per month is currently considered very small and it is planned to increase it to Rp. 553 million per month. The simulation of the change in salary provisions for the president appeared in the RP P on the Salaries and Benefits of Civil Servants (PNS) which was circulated recently. In this RP P, apart from the convey president, the vice president and other high-ranking state officials will also experience salary increases
berita_id: Dikatakan bahwa gaji presiden Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis hanya dari RP.62 juta hingga RP.553 juta.Informasi yang beredar menyatakan bahwa peningkatan ini disampaikan oleh Menteri Pemberdayaan Aparat Negara dan reformasi birokrasi.Diskusi tentang peningkatan gaji presiden partainya tidak pernah membahas peningkatan gaji presiden."Itu tidak ada, dan itu tidak pernah dibahas," kata Mulyani ketika menjawab pertanyaan wartawan pada konferensi pers di Bogor Presidential Palace, Senin (12/3).Reformasi negara bagian dan birokrasi, yang menyebutkan peningkatan gaji presiden, Sri Mulyani menekankan bahwa itu adalah tipuan."Ini tipuan, karena ada banyak media sosial yang menghasilkan informasi, untuk dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan pemerintah yang diterbitkan," kata Mulyani.Sebutkan gaji pokok presiden g.Jumlah hanya sekitar RP.30 juta per bulan saat ini dianggap sangat kecil dan direncanakan untuk meningkatkannya menjadi RP.553 juta per bulan.Simulasi perubahan dalam ketentuan gaji untuk presiden muncul di RP P pada gaji dan manfaat pegawai negeri (PNS) yang diedarkan baru -baru ini.Dalam RP P ini, selain dari Presiden Convey, Wakil Presiden dan pejabat negara tinggi lainnya juga akan mengalami kenaikan gaji

berita: Participants of Action 212 Volume 2 who came from outside the city had arrived at the Istiqlal Mosque, but they could not enter because the gate of the mosque was locked. According to observations, hundreds of mobs driving 5 bosses, including AD number plates (Solo and its surroundings) were stuck at the entrance of the Istiqlal mosque, Monday (20/2) night, as the mosque, which used to be the gathering place for the Defending Islam Action, was previously closed. Police officers on guard in front of the Istiqlal Mosque then directed the bus from the area to another place. It was not explained where the mass gathering place was diverted. Previously, the Islamic Community Forum (FUI) ensured that there would be no long march during the 212th volume II action, Tuesday (21/2) tomorrow. Action participants will be directed directly to the action concentration point in front of the DPR/MPR RI building. "Our scenario does not have a long march. So all participants are advised to go directly to the DPR/MPR RI building," said Ustaz Bernard Abdul Jabbar as coordinator of the 212 action volume II to reporters at the Metro Jaya Police Headquarters, Jakarta, Monday (20/2/2017) . Ustadz Bernard estimates that 10 thousand people will attend the action. People from outside Jakarta were asked manoeuver to park their vehicles in the parking lots that have been prepared. "And for those from areas who bring buses and vehicles, we then direct them to park at the Senayan East Parking if those from the south and east. Meanwhile, from the west we will direct them to (park vehicles) at Palmerah Station and at in front of the Forestry Department building," he explained. He added that his party also did not provide lodging facilities for action participants from outside the region. This means that those from outside the city of Jakarta are welcome to find a place to rest on their own.
berita_id: Peserta aksi 212 Volume 2 yang datang dari luar kota telah tiba di masjid Istiqlal, tetapi mereka tidak bisa masuk karena gerbang masjid terkunci.Menurut pengamatan, ratusan gerombolan yang mengendarai 5 bos, termasuk pelat nomor iklan (solo dan sekitarnya) terjebak di pintu masuk masjid Istiqlal, Senin (20/2) malam, sebagai masjid, yang dulunya adalah tempat berkumpul untuk aksi Islam yang bertahan, sebelumnya ditutup.Petugas polisi yang berjaga di depan masjid Istiqlal kemudian mengarahkan bus dari daerah ke tempat lain.Itu tidak dijelaskan di mana tempat pengumpulan massa dialihkan.Sebelumnya, Forum Komunitas Islam (FUI) memastikan bahwa tidak akan ada Maret yang panjang selama aksi Volume II ke -212, Selasa (21/2) besok.Peserta tindakan akan diarahkan langsung ke titik konsentrasi aksi di depan gedung DPR/MPR RI."Skenario kami tidak memiliki pawai panjang. Jadi semua peserta disarankan untuk langsung ke gedung DPR/MPR RI," kata Ustaz Bernard Abdul Jabbar sebagai koordinator 212 Action Volume II kepada wartawan di Markas Kepolisian Metro Jaya, Jakarta, Senin (20/2/2017).Ustadz Bernard memperkirakan bahwa 10 ribu orang akan menghadiri aksi tersebut.Orang -orang dari luar Jakarta diminta Manoeuver untuk memarkir kendaraan mereka di tempat parkir yang telah disiapkan."Dan bagi mereka dari daerah yang membawa bus dan kendaraan, kami kemudian mengarahkan mereka ke parkir di parkir Senayan Timur jika yang dari selatan dan timur. Sementara itu, dari barat kami akan mengarahkan mereka ke (kendaraan parkir) di stasiun Palmerah dan di depan gedung departemen kehutanan," jelasnya.Dia menambahkan bahwa partainya juga tidak menyediakan fasilitas penginapan bagi peserta tindakan dari luar wilayah.Ini berarti bahwa orang -orang dari luar kota Jakarta dipersilakan untuk menemukan tempat untuk beristirahat sendiri.

berita: Many people risk like to eat catfish because it tastes delicious, has a soft texture, and is affordable. But who would have thought that this fish turned out to have a danger to the health of the body. Catfish are fish that can live in dirty and low oxygen water. Therefore, many catfish are kept in a bad way, for example placing them under latrines. This can cause catfish to contain a lot of bacteria such as e-coli which causes stomach pain and diarrhea. It doesn't stop there, the negative effects of catfish that are kept in a bad way can be exacerbated by cooking methods that use trans oil. Alert! This Danger of Eating Catfish This has the potential to multiply the danger to the body, including triggering blockage of arteries, and causing heart disease. Processing catfish using used oil can also trigger the appearance of abnormal cells in DNA, and potentially cause a person to develop liver cancer and stomach cancer. However, as long as catfish are kept in ponds and ponds far from cattle pens and latrines, and use clean water and good food, then the fish are safe for consumption.
berita_id: Banyak orang berisiko seperti makan lele karena rasanya lezat, memiliki tekstur lembut, dan terjangkau.Tetapi siapa yang akan berpikir bahwa ikan ini ternyata memiliki bahaya bagi kesehatan tubuh.Lele adalah ikan yang bisa hidup dalam air oksigen yang kotor dan rendah.Oleh karena itu, banyak ikan lele disimpan dengan cara yang buruk, misalnya menempatkannya di bawah jamban.Hal ini dapat menyebabkan ikan lele mengandung banyak bakteri seperti E-coli yang menyebabkan sakit perut dan diare.Tidak berhenti di situ, efek negatif ikan lele yang disimpan dengan cara yang buruk dapat diperburuk dengan metode memasak yang menggunakan minyak trans.Peringatan!Bahaya makan lele ini memiliki potensi untuk melipatgandakan bahaya pada tubuh, termasuk memicu penyumbatan arteri, dan menyebabkan penyakit jantung.Memproses ikan lele menggunakan minyak bekas juga dapat memicu penampilan sel -sel abnormal dalam DNA, dan berpotensi menyebabkan seseorang mengembangkan kanker hati dan kanker lambung.Namun, selama ikan lele disimpan di kolam dan kolam jauh dari pena ternak dan jamban, dan menggunakan air bersih dan makanan yang baik, maka ikan aman untuk dikonsumsi.

berita: The Pokemon Go game is currently endemic, craze and increasingly popular with netizens throughout Indonesia and the world. A question was asked to our editor, "Is playing Pokemon Go Game according to Islam, halal or haram?" As an introduction, Pokemon Go is an augmented-reality-based game developed by the Pokemon Company in collaboration with Niantic and Nintendo. How to play, someone uses a smartphone, both Android and iOS to hunt Pokemon monsters. With Android or iOS smartphone devices, users can hunt Pokemon monsters in the real world, for example in rivers, mountains, streets, offices, markets, supermarkets, lakes, and other places. So, Pokemon monsters seem to exist and hide in the real world that can be seen through your cellphone screen. Users are also busy hunting Pokemon monsters around them. In fact, some of them deliberately venture here and there to places where there are Pokemon monsters, such as Pikachu, Bulbasaur, Charmander, Squirtle, and so on. game pokemon go according to islam Suddenly, many children, teenagers and adults are addicted to the Pokemon Go game and are pacing around, busy playing hunting monsters. In fact, there are journalists on the sidelines of their coverage, hunting Pokemon monsters before waiting for sources. Pokemon Go game according to Islam To answer this question, the editor of Islamcendekia.com held a study and limited discussion. From the results of this study, we state that the Pokemon Go game can be legal/permissible or illegal/prohibited. Here's the explanation. Sunni scholars agree that the main sources of Islamic law are the Qur'an and the Sunnah (Hadith of the Prophet). Meanwhile, the sources of law that are still being debated by scholars include ijma, qiyas, ijtihad, istihsan, urf, maslahah mursalah, and so on. Pokemon Go game is clearly not regulated in the Quran and Hadith. That way, we use the maslahah mursalah basis in answering the question of whether the game is haram or halal. From the aspect of its application, it is clear that the law was initially allowed. However, when the game appears harmful, has a bad impact on someone, then the law becomes haram or not allowed. In this context, for example, forgetting the obligation to pray because they are busy hunting Pokemon monsters or being lazy to work, decreased work productivity, children are reluctant to study, and so on. Because, being too busy playing the Pokemon Go Game, which wastes time, even interferes with the concentration of learning and children's development, is part of the devil. So, it is not wrong when an Ulema Council in Egypt forbids the game. As quoted from the Mirror, Deputy Head of Al Azhar Egypt, Abbas Shuman likened the Pokemon Go game to alcohol which is prohibited in Islam. Because, monster hunting activities are considered like drunk people on the streets. People become on the streets with their eyes glued to their cellphone screens looking for locations where imaginary Pokemon monsters are. They are masses also busy capturing something imaginary or imaginary. In fact, some people even neglect work to find imaginary monsters in the world of cellphone screens. Meanwhile, he left work to earn a living that could support him. Or for example, students, students, or college students, suddenly turn on their smartphones, then hunt monsters and forget their study assignments. If the condition is so severe, then the law in Islam is haram. The analysis carried out by the Deputy Head of Al Azhar Egypt, Abbas Shuman, is quite good. That is, Abbas uses the qiyas method in analyzing a problem. The game Pokemon Go is likened to alcohol which is forbidden in Islam. This is called qiyas, which is establishing the law of a new case that has not been regulated in the Qur'an or hadith, but there are similarities in terms of causes, benefits, dangers, and various other aspects. When mixed with alcohol, with the same effect when drinking intoxicating alcohol, it can be concluded that the Pokemon Go game is haram. It's different when the existence of the Pokemon Go game actually makes people happy and happy, still doesn't leave praying, working and studying as usual, then free time is used to play Pokemon with the intention and purpose of refreshing. So in this case it is permissible or halal. That is, if the existence of the Pokemon Go game, which is currently being flooded with many fans, turns out to be beneficial and good for the mind-health, because there are games that are refreshing and fun, then in the name of benefit, this game is halal. Or, the existence of Pokemon Go will provide skills, skills, and has the benefit of sharpening the right brain, so the law is okay. Thus, this conclusion can be drawn. The law of origin of the Pokemon Go game application according to Islam is permissible, because it is not regulated in the Shari'a, both in the Qur'an and hadith. If it turns out that the impact invites harm, is destructive, and brings bad consequences for users, then playing Pokemon Go is haram/forbidden. This is the answer from the editor of Islamcendekia.com related to questions from readers about playing the Pokemon Go Game according to Islam, halal or haram. Spread this news for our common good, for the future of the nation's children! May be useful.

The Head of the earpiece General Information Section (Kabagpenum) of the National Police, Kombes Pol. Martinus Sitompul, emphasized that the issue of the throwing of the holy Koran by the guard at the Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba Branch, Central Jakarta on Friday, was not true. "It is not true that the Koran was thrown by the guard," said Kombes Martinus in a short message, Friday (11/10/2017) night. Martinus explained that what happened was that the guard checked a number of books and objects in the detention cell. According to him, the riot that occurred on Friday afternoon was triggered by the inmates who did not accept the officers' search of their rooms. "The turmoil that occurred was a reaction to the actions taken by guard officers who confiscated cell phones belonging to Block C detainees," he said. During the search, four cell phones belonging to four terrorist convicts were found, namely Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam and Jumali. A number of angry Block B and Block C inmates then broke the cell door. Not only that, a number of facilities at the Salemba detention center were also damaged, including the gates of Block B and Block C hallways and their windows. Martinus added that the condition of the prison is now back to being conducive. "The detention center is conducive and the prisoners are calm," he said
berita_id: Kepala Bagian Informasi Umum Earpiece (Kabagpenum) dari Polisi Nasional, Kombes Pol.Martinus Sitompul, menekankan bahwa masalah lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga di cabang Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba, Jakarta Tengah pada hari Jumat, tidak benar."Tidak benar bahwa Alquran dilemparkan oleh penjaga," kata Kombes Martinus dalam sebuah pesan singkat, Jumat (11/10/2017) malam.Martinus menjelaskan bahwa apa yang terjadi adalah bahwa penjaga memeriksa sejumlah buku dan objek di sel penahanan.Menurutnya, kerusuhan yang terjadi pada hari Jumat sore dipicu oleh para tahanan yang tidak menerima pencarian petugas di kamar mereka."Gejolak yang terjadi adalah reaksi terhadap tindakan yang diambil oleh petugas penjaga yang menyita telepon seluler milik tahanan blok C," katanya.Selama pencarian, empat ponsel milik empat narapidana teroris ditemukan, yaitu Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam dan Jumali.Sejumlah narapidana Blok B dan Blok C kemudian memecahkan pintu sel.Tidak hanya itu, sejumlah fasilitas di Salemba Detention Center juga rusak, termasuk gerbang blok B dan lorong blok C dan jendela mereka.Martinus menambahkan bahwa kondisi penjara sekarang kembali menjadi kondusif."Pusat penahanan kondusif dan para tahanan tenang," katanya

berita: JAKARTA – After its release, Pokemon Go received a lot of response from people. However, this Pokemon Go mobile game raises the suspicion of many parties. The reason is, since 2001, Pokemon games and cartoons, which were banned by a number of scholars in the Middle East, have appeared again. According to them, the characters on Pokemon are un-Islamic and feature Zionist symbols. Some time ago, several Muslim clerics, among them Sheikh Yousef Qaradawi, said that Pokemon video games and card games were a waste of time and psychologically unhealthy for children. For penetrating Jewish names into children's memories. The real impact is, many pokemon players take to the streets in search of real-world digital monsters that are part of the game's gameplay. In America, the Pokemon Go fever that 'anesthetized' a number of smartphone users turned out to be quite disturbing the Holocaust Memorial Museum and Arlington National Cemetery in the United States. The reason, many players are hunting Pokemon in that place. In fact, the museum asked players not to catch Pokemon anymore when visiting the place. Pokemon before it was made into a game was a children's film. And pokemon movies have been banned in various countries. One of them is in Iraq. President Saddam Hussein at that time banned it because the name Pokemon was a Jewish mission. A document states that President Saddam Hussein received information about the film from the state intelligence agency. According to information, the names used in the Pokemon movies contain muslimism an invitation that cannot be tolerated. Apparently, the word Pokemon itself means "I'm Jewish". The name Pokemon is taken from the Syriac language, or the Syriac language which in Indonesian means 'I am Jewish'. Not only Pokemon that has this surprising meaning, but also in other characters, such as Pikachu, the main character in the Pokemon movie. Pikachu, means 'Be a Jew'. Charmander character, which also means: 'God is Weak'. Of course, the meaning is very offensive to adherents of religion, especially Islam and Christianity. Because, in Islam, it is clearly called Allahu Akbar (God is Great). And in Christianity it is called the Holy God
berita_id: Jakarta - Setelah dirilis, Pokemon Go menerima banyak tanggapan dari orang -orang.Namun, game mobile Pokemon Go ini menimbulkan kecurigaan banyak pihak.Alasannya adalah, sejak tahun 2001, Pokemon Games and Cartoons, yang dilarang oleh sejumlah sarjana di Timur Tengah, telah muncul lagi.Menurut mereka, karakter di Pokemon tidak islam dan fitur simbol Zionis.Beberapa waktu yang lalu, beberapa ulama Muslim, di antaranya Sheikh Yousef Qaradawi, mengatakan bahwa video game Pokemon dan permainan kartu adalah buang -buang waktu dan secara psikologis tidak sehat untuk anak -anak.Untuk menembus nama Yahudi ke dalam ingatan anak -anak.Dampak sebenarnya adalah, banyak pemain Pokemon turun ke jalan untuk mencari monster digital dunia nyata yang merupakan bagian dari gameplay game.Di Amerika, demam Pokemon Go yang 'membius' sejumlah pengguna smartphone ternyata cukup mengganggu Holocaust Memorial Museum dan Arlington National Cemetery di Amerika Serikat.Alasannya, banyak pemain berburu Pokemon di tempat itu.Bahkan, museum meminta pemain untuk tidak menangkap Pokemon lagi saat mengunjungi tempat itu.Pokemon sebelum dibuat menjadi permainan adalah film anak -anak.Dan film Pokemon telah dilarang di berbagai negara.Salah satunya di Irak.Presiden Saddam Hussein pada waktu itu melarangnya karena nama Pokemon adalah misi Yahudi.Sebuah dokumen menyatakan bahwa Presiden Saddam Hussein menerima informasi tentang film dari Badan Intelijen Negara.Menurut informasi, nama -nama yang digunakan dalam film -film Pokemon berisi undangan Muslimisme yang tidak dapat ditoleransi.Rupanya, kata pokemon itu sendiri berarti "aku orang Yahudi".Nama Pokemon diambil dari bahasa Syria, atau bahasa Syria yang dalam bahasa Indonesia berarti 'Saya Yahudi'.Tidak hanya Pokemon
