berita_id: Di jejaring sosial, ada banyak informasi yang beredar yang menyebutkan ikan lele sebagai ikan paling kotor.Dalam seteguk daging ikan lele, ada 3000 sel kanker.Berita itu membuat para pembudidaya lele di Jawa Timur (Jawa Timur) tersinggung dan hancur.Julukan sebagai ikan paling kotor mengacu pada sifat ikan lele yang suka mengonsumsi berbagai jenis limbah di perairan.Bahkan sebuah artikel yang cukup viral di internet menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan untuk budidaya ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina.Itu tidak benar."Kasihan petani lele, mereka tersinggung dan sangat sedih dengan berita itu," kata kepala perikanan dan layanan kelautan provinsi Jawa Timur, Heru Tjahjono, Sabtu (31/10/2015).Dia mengatakan bahwa berita yang benar -benar menggambarkan budidaya ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina tidak sama dengan budidaya ikan lele di Jawa Timur.Berita itu dapat berdampak pada pasar ikan lele di Jawa Timur.Alasannya adalah, pasar lele adalah konsumen di tingkat kelas menengah II.Sedangkan kakap, tuna, mackerel, kerapu di kelas menengah atas level I.Heru mengatakan, konsumen di divisi Level I sulit untuk dikocok dengan masalah ikan yang mereka konsumsi.Ini berbeda dari masalah ikan seperti ikan lele, gourami, mujahir, yang merupakan makanan untuk konsumen kelas menengah ke bawah.Untuk konsumen Level I, sulit untuk dikocok oleh masalah.Berbeda dengan konsumen Level II.Jika ada masalah, konsumen Level II bisa takut dan tidak ingin mengkonsumsi, katanya.

berita: Apple has finally officially given a statement in response to user complaints of bent iPhone 6 Plus. The Cupertino company denies that the device bends easily under normal use. For CEO Tim Cook's company, this "curvy" case is actually very rare and nothing to worry about. They make sure the smartphone has been tested from the model to the material. According to a report by The Verge, Apple only received nine complaints. "iPhone 6 and Plus meet and exceed all high quality standards to withstand everyday use," Apple wrote. "We chose the highest quality materials and built it with great care to make it strong and durable." "iPhone 6 has a strong unibody with extra strength. This smartphone also has stainless steel and titanium to protect the body," explained Apple. "Including, using the strongest glass in the smartphone industry." "With normal use, a bend in the iPhone is very rare," they continued. "During the first six days of sales, there were only nine customers who had contacted Apple with the curved iPhone 6 Plus." The past two weeks have been difficult for Steve Jobs' company. Not only is the problem with the Plus easy to bend, Apple also has to face complaints about iOS 8 which was just released last September 17. Apple had to re-release iOS 8.0.1, Wednesday (24/9), to solve this problem. But unfortunately, the operating system also still creates a number of problems for explain iDevices that install it. For that, Apple promises to release iOS 8.0.2 in the next few days
berita_id: Apple akhirnya secara resmi memberikan pernyataan sebagai tanggapan atas keluhan pengguna iPhone 6 Plus yang bengkok.Perusahaan Cupertino menyangkal bahwa perangkat tersebut menekuk dengan mudah dalam penggunaan normal.Untuk perusahaan CEO Tim Cook, kasus "melengkung" ini sebenarnya sangat jarang dan tidak ada yang perlu dikhawatirkan.Mereka memastikan smartphone telah diuji dari model ke materi.Menurut sebuah laporan oleh The Verge, Apple hanya menerima sembilan keluhan."IPhone 6 dan Plus bertemu dan melampaui semua standar kualitas tinggi untuk menahan penggunaan sehari -hari," tulis Apple."Kami memilih bahan berkualitas tinggi dan membangunnya dengan sangat hati -hati untuk membuatnya kuat dan tahan lama.""iPhone 6 memiliki unibody yang kuat dengan kekuatan ekstra. Smartphone ini juga memiliki stainless steel dan titanium untuk melindungi tubuh," jelas Apple."Termasuk, menggunakan kaca terkuat di industri smartphone.""Dengan penggunaan normal, tikungan di iPhone sangat jarang," lanjutnya."Selama enam hari pertama penjualan, hanya ada sembilan pelanggan yang telah menghubungi Apple dengan iPhone 6 Plus yang melengkung."Dua minggu terakhir sulit bagi perusahaan Steve Jobs.Tidak hanya masalah dengan plus yang mudah ditekuk, Apple juga harus menghadapi keluhan tentang iOS 8 yang baru saja dirilis 17 September lalu. Apple harus merilis ulang iOS 8.0.1, Rabu (24/9), untuk menyelesaikan masalah ini.Namun sayangnya, sistem operasi juga masih membuat sejumlah masalah untuk menjelaskan iDevices yang menginstalnya.Untuk itu, Apple berjanji untuk melepaskan iOS 8.0.2 dalam beberapa hari ke depan

berita: Jakarta - 212 Volume 2 demonstrations from outside the city have been arrived at the Istiqlal Mosque, but they couldn't entered because the gate of the mosque was locked. Hundreds of people using buses were stuck at the entrance of the  Istiqlal mosque, Monday (20/2/2017) night, the Istiqlal mosque which is usually the place for The previous gathering for the Defending Islam Action was closed. Police officers standing guard in front of the Istiqlal Mosque then direct the bus from that area to another place. Previously, the Islamic Ummah Forum (FUI) ensured that there was no long march during the 212 action volume II, Tuesday (21/2/2017). Action participants will be directed directly to the point of concentration action in front of the DPR/MPR RI building. “Our scenario is not having a long march. So all participants are advised to go directly to the DPR/MPR RI building," said Ustaz Bernard Abdul Jabbar as the coordinator of the 212 action volume II to reporters at the Metro Jaya Police Headquarters, Jakarta,
berita_id: Jakarta - 212 Volume 2 Demonstrasi dari luar kota telah tiba di masjid Istiqlal, tetapi mereka tidak bisa masuk karena gerbang masjid terkunci.Ratusan orang yang menggunakan bus terjebak di pintu masuk masjid Istiqlal, Senin (20/2/2017) malam, masjid Istiqlal yang biasanya merupakan tempat untuk pertemuan sebelumnya untuk aksi Islam yang bertahan ditutup.Petugas polisi yang berjaga di depan masjid Istiqlal kemudian mengarahkan bus dari daerah itu ke tempat lain.Sebelumnya, Forum Ummah Islam (FUI) memastikan bahwa tidak ada pawai yang lama selama 212 Action Volume II, Selasa (21/2/2017).Peserta tindakan akan diarahkan langsung ke titik aksi konsentrasi di depan gedung DPR/MPR RI."Skenario kami tidak memiliki pawai panjang. Jadi semua peserta disarankan untuk langsung pergi ke gedung DPR/MPR RI," kata Ustaz Bernard Abdul Jabbar sebagai koordinator 212 Action Volume II kepada wartawan di markas kepolisian Metro Jaya, Jakarta,

berita: A netizen shared news of the riots that occurred at the Mako Brimob Rutan, Depok. The news circulating take widely on social media said that the rioting started after the prison officers threw the Koran. There has been a riot at the Headquarters of Brimob Kelapa Dua, two depots where terrorist prisoners burned and destroyed the room because the guard Ahmad and his team threw the Koran and caused the prisoners to go berserk. The chronology of the beginning of the riots is also written. The cause of the incident that spread was that Karutan and Brimob came to the isolation rooms of the asatidz, then they ransacked the rooms of the clerics to look for cellphones even though there was a cleric who was sick and they didn't care. The peak of Ikhwah's anger was when Brimob shuffled books of monotheism and threw books and the Koran. Then the brothers who did not accept takbir because they did not accept the Brimob treatment that abused Asatidz and the Koran. After the ikhwah shouted takbir, the Brimob shouted YOU ALL DOG Then they beat some of our brothers, and that's where the anger of the brothers caused a riot in the prison. The riots at the detention center and Brimob had fired several warning shots at the brothers who were out of control because the Koran was being abused. POLRI'S OFFICIAL RESPONSE The rioting took place at the Brimob Mako Rutan, Depok, West Java, this afternoon. According to the police, the trigger was that there were prisoners who did not accept being examined and provoked a commotion. According to Karo Penmas, Police Public Relations Division, Brigadier General Rikwanto, a commotion occurred at the Mako Brimob terrorist detention center at the Salemba detention center, Depok, West Java, this afternoon at around 16.00 WIB, Friday (11/10/2017). Rikwanto explained that after Friday prayers, the detainees were put into their respective cells by the Densus 88 team. While carrying out these activities, the Densus 88 team conducted a search. There are 4 pieces of HP found. "Four cellphones were found. They belonged to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, and Jumali," he said. detikcom notes, they are convicts of terrorism cases. One of the detainees did not accept the search. According to Rikwanto, the detainee who was not named then made a provocation. "It is true that with the inspection activities, one of the prisoners did not accept it and provoked the officers with various words, then some members were provoked by their words and there were prisoners who were takbir loudly so that they provoked the prisoners of the next block," he explained. As a result, riots ensued. A number of facilities in the prison were damaged by the inmates. "The prison cell door was broken into, the gate of the block hallway, the window panes (in Block C and Block B)," said Rikwanto. But it didn't last long. The apparatus, according to Rikwanto, immediately took control of the situation. Rikwanto also denied that there was a wild issue on social media that said this incident was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by the authorities. "Hoax," he insisted.
berita_id: Netizen berbagi berita tentang kerusuhan yang terjadi di Mako Brimob Rutan, Depok.Berita yang beredar secara luas di media sosial mengatakan bahwa kerusuhan dimulai setelah petugas penjara melemparkan Alquran.Ada kerusuhan di markas Brimob Kelapa Dua, dua depot di mana tahanan teroris membakar dan menghancurkan ruangan itu karena penjaga Ahmad dan timnya melemparkan Alquran dan menyebabkan para tahanan mengamuk.Kronologi awal kerusuhan juga ditulis.Penyebab kejadian yang menyebar adalah bahwa Karutan dan Brimob datang ke ruang isolasi Asatidz, kemudian mereka menggeledah kamar -kamar ulama untuk mencari ponsel meskipun ada ulama yang sakit dan mereka tidak peduli.Puncak kemarahan Ikhwah adalah ketika Brimob mengocok buku -buku monoteisme dan melemparkan buku dan Alquran.Kemudian saudara -saudara yang tidak menerima Takbir karena mereka tidak menerima perlakuan Brimob yang melecehkan Asatidz dan Alquran.Setelah Ikhwah meneriakkan Takbir, brimob meneriakkan Anda semua anjing kemudian mereka mengalahkan beberapa saudara kita, dan di situlah kemarahan saudara -saudara menyebabkan kerusuhan di penjara.Kerusuhan di pusat penahanan dan Brimob telah menembakkan beberapa tembakan peringatan pada saudara -saudara yang di luar kendali karena Alquran dilecehkan.Tanggapan resmi Polri, kerusuhan itu terjadi di Brimob Mako Rutan, Depok, Jawa Barat, sore ini.Menurut polisi, pemicunya adalah bahwa ada tahanan yang tidak menerima diperiksa dan memicu keributan.Menurut Karo Penmas, Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Polisi, Brigadir Jenderal Rikwanto, keributan terjadi di Pusat Penahanan Teroris Mako Brimob di Pusat Penahanan Salemba, Depok, Jawa Barat, sore ini sekitar 16.00 WIB, Jumat (11/10/2017).Rikwanto menjelaskan bahwa setelah doa Jumat, para tahanan dimasukkan ke dalam sel masing -masing oleh tim Densus 88.Saat melakukan kegiatan ini, tim Densus 88 melakukan pencarian.Ada 4 potong HP yang ditemukan."Empat ponsel ditemukan. Mereka milik Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, dan Jumali," katanya.Detikcom mencatat, mereka adalah narapidana kasus terorisme.Salah satu tahanan tidak menerima pencarian.Menurut Rikwanto, tahanan yang tidak dinamai kemudian membuat provokasi."Memang benar bahwa dengan kegiatan inspeksi, salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan memprovokasi para petugas dengan berbagai kata, kemudian beberapa anggota diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka dan ada tahanan yang Takbir dengan keras sehingga mereka memicu tahanan blok berikutnya," jelasnya.Akibatnya, kerusuhan terjadi.Sejumlah fasilitas di penjara rusak oleh para tahanan."Pintu sel penjara dipecah, gerbang lorong blok, panel jendela (di blok C dan blok B)," kata Rikwanto.Tapi itu tidak bertahan lama.Peralatan, menurut Rikwanto, segera mengendalikan situasi.Rikwanto juga membantah bahwa ada masalah liar di media sosial yang mengatakan kejadian ini dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh pihak berwenang."Berbagai arah," tegasnya.

berita: Jakarta - Complaints from iPhone 6 Plus users that their handsets bend easily have been denied by Apple. According to Apple, as long as users are careful, the incident doesn't need to happen. Apple does admit that there are iPhone 6 Plus users who experience a curved body, but there aren't many. According to his spokesman, as of Wednesday (9/24/2014), only 9 people had complained about this issue. iPhone 6 has a strong unibody with extra strength. This smartphone also has stainless steel and titanium to protect the body. Including, using the strongest glass in the smartphone industry, said an Apple spokesman, as quoted from CNBC, Friday (26/9/2014). Apple continued that their workers carried out many tests to test the strength of the iPhone 6 Plus. The iPhone 6 Plus easy to bend problem has been reported by several users, complete with photos. As told by a Macrumors Forum user named Hanzon. He admitted that it took him a long time to put the iPhone 6 Plus in his front trouser pocket. At least 4 hours the device is in the pocket. While in the pants, Hanzon did not take out the iPhone 6 Plus and continued his usual activities as usual. As a result, newly he found the center of his new smartphone slightly bent. DevinPitcher also had a bad experience. He also put his iPhone 6 Plus in his front pocket. It's not clear how long he's been putting it on, but it's clearly quite warped.
berita_id: JAKARTA - Keluhan dari iPhone 6 Plus pengguna yang mudah ditekuk handset mereka dengan mudah ditolak oleh Apple.Menurut Apple, selama pengguna berhati -hati, insiden itu tidak perlu terjadi.Apple memang mengakui bahwa ada iPhone 6 Plus pengguna yang mengalami tubuh melengkung, tetapi tidak ada banyak.Menurut juru bicaranya, pada hari Rabu (9/24/2014), hanya 9 orang yang mengeluh tentang masalah ini.iPhone 6 memiliki unibody yang kuat dengan kekuatan ekstra.Smartphone ini juga memiliki stainless steel dan titanium untuk melindungi tubuh.Termasuk, menggunakan kaca terkuat di industri smartphone, kata juru bicara Apple, seperti dikutip dari CNBC, Jumat (26/9/2014).Apple melanjutkan bahwa pekerja mereka melakukan banyak tes untuk menguji kekuatan iPhone 6 Plus.Masalah iPhone 6 Plus Easy to Bend telah dilaporkan oleh beberapa pengguna, lengkap dengan foto.Seperti yang diceritakan oleh pengguna forum MacRumors bernama Hanzon.Dia mengakui bahwa butuh waktu lama baginya untuk menempatkan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana depannya.Setidaknya 4 jam perangkat ada di saku.Saat berada di celana, Hanzon tidak mengeluarkan iPhone 6 Plus dan melanjutkan kegiatannya yang biasa seperti biasa.Akibatnya, baru ia menemukan pusat smartphone barunya sedikit bengkok.Devinpitcher juga memiliki pengalaman buruk.Dia juga meletakkan iPhone 6 Plus di saku depannya.Tidak jelas berapa lama dia mengenakannya, tapi jelas cukup bengkok.

berita: A number of terrorist prisoners at the Kelapa Dua Detention Center, Depok, West Java were involved in a commotion, which caused damage to a number of facilities at the detention center. Rumors circulated that the commotion was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by officers from Densus 88 Anti-terror. This news was denied by the Head of the Public Information Division of the Public Relations Division of the Police Headquarters, Martinus Sitompul. The former Head of Public Relations of the Polda Metro Jaya confirmed that the commotion was suspected to be a search by officers of a number of apparel terrorist prisoners. "It is not true that there was a throwing of the Koran by the guard," said Martinus in a written statement, Friday, November 10 2017. At the time of the incident, said Martinus, what the officers did was to check the books and objects in the cell. ''What is there is that the officers conducted an examination of the books and objects in the cell,'' he said. Previously, information was circulating on social networks that this commotion was suspected to have been caused by the throwing of the Koran by officers. Because of that, the prisoners then went on a rampage and damaged a number of detention facilities. "There has been a riot at the Headquarters of Brimob Kelapa Dua, Depok, where the terrorist prisoners burned and destroyed the room because the guard Ahmad and his team threw the Koran and caused the prisoners to go berserk," according to pieces of information that were allegedly hoaxes circulating in the public. Security Tightened Meanwhile, since the commotion in the area of ​​Blocks C and B of the Mobile Brigade Headquarters, Kelapa Dua Depok, at the location until Friday night, several officers were seen on guard. A Baracuda car and a number of motorized police officers dressed in all black were seen entering the Mobile Brigade Headquarters, Kelapa Dua Depok, on guard. There is no explanation about the tightening of this security by the police. The officers on standby even asked the media crew to stay away from the location. "Go away, not here," said an officer while asking a number of media crews who were at the main gate of the Mobile Brigade Headquarters Depok to leave.
berita_id: Sejumlah tahanan teroris di Pusat Penahanan Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat terlibat dalam keributan, yang menyebabkan kerusakan pada sejumlah fasilitas di pusat penahanan.Rumor beredar bahwa keributan dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh petugas dari Densus 88 Anti-teror.Berita ini ditolak oleh kepala Divisi Informasi Publik Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat dari Markas Besar Kepolisian, Martinus Sitompul.Mantan kepala hubungan masyarakat Metro Polda Jaya mengkonfirmasi bahwa keributan itu dicurigai sebagai pencarian oleh petugas dari sejumlah tahanan teroris pakaian."Tidak benar bahwa ada lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga," kata Martinus dalam sebuah pernyataan tertulis, Jumat, 10 November 2017. Pada saat insiden itu, kata Martinus, apa yang dilakukan petugas adalah memeriksa buku dan benda di dalam sel.'' Apa yang ada bahwa para petugas melakukan pemeriksaan buku dan benda -benda di dalam sel, '' katanya.Sebelumnya, informasi beredar di jejaring sosial bahwa keributan ini diduga disebabkan oleh pelemparan Alquran oleh petugas.Karena itu, para tahanan kemudian mengamuk dan merusak sejumlah fasilitas penahanan."Telah ada kerusuhan di markas Brimob Kelapa Dua, Depok, di mana para tahanan teroris membakar dan menghancurkan ruangan itu karena penjaga Ahmad dan timnya melemparkan Alquran dan menyebabkan para tahanan mengamuk," menurut informasi yang diduga beredar di publik.Sementara itu, keamanan diperketat, karena keributan di area blok C dan B dari markas Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua Depok, di lokasi hingga Jumat malam, beberapa petugas terlihat berjaga -jaga.Sebuah mobil Baracuda dan sejumlah petugas polisi bermotor yang berpakaian hitam terlihat memasuki markas Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua Depok, berjaga -jaga.Tidak ada penjelasan tentang pengetatan keamanan ini oleh polisi.Para petugas siaga bahkan meminta kru media untuk menjauh dari lokasi."Pergi, tidak di sini," kata seorang petugas sambil meminta sejumlah kru media yang berada di gerbang utama markas brigade seluler Depok untuk pergi.

berita: The Head of the Public Information Section of the National Police, Kombes Pol. Martinus Sitompul, emphasized that the issue of the throwing good afternoon of the holy book of the Koran by the guard at the Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba Branch, Central Jakarta on Friday, was not true. "It is not true that the Koran was thrown by the guard," said Kombes Martinus in a text message, Friday night. Martinus explained that what happened was that the guard checked a number of books and objects in the detention cell. According to him, the riot that occurred on Friday afternoon was triggered by the inmates who did not accept the officers' search of their rooms. "The turmoil that occurred was a reaction to the actions taken by guard officers who confiscated cell phones belonging to Block C detainees," he said. During the search, four cell phones belonging to four terrorist convicts were found, namely Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam and Jumali. A number of angry Block B and Block C inmates then broke the cell door. Not only that, a number of facilities at the Salemba detention center were also damaged, including the gates of Block B and Block C hallways and their windows. Martinus added, "The detention center is conducive and the prisoners are calm," he said.
berita_id: Kepala Bagian Informasi Publik Polisi Nasional, Kombes Pol.Martinus Sitompul, menekankan bahwa masalah pelemparan sore yang baik dari kitab suci Alquran oleh penjaga di cabang Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba, Jakarta Tengah pada hari Jumat, tidak benar."Tidak benar bahwa Alquran dilemparkan oleh penjaga," kata Kombes Martinus dalam sebuah pesan teks, Jumat malam.Martinus menjelaskan bahwa apa yang terjadi adalah bahwa penjaga memeriksa sejumlah buku dan objek di sel penahanan.Menurutnya, kerusuhan yang terjadi pada hari Jumat sore dipicu oleh para tahanan yang tidak menerima pencarian petugas di kamar mereka."Gejolak yang terjadi adalah reaksi terhadap tindakan yang diambil oleh petugas penjaga yang menyita telepon seluler milik tahanan blok C," katanya.Selama pencarian, empat ponsel milik empat narapidana teroris ditemukan, yaitu Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam dan Jumali.Sejumlah narapidana Blok B dan Blok C kemudian memecahkan pintu sel.Tidak hanya itu, sejumlah fasilitas di Salemba Detention Center juga rusak, termasuk gerbang blok B dan lorong blok C dan jendela mereka.Martinus menambahkan, "Pusat penahanan kondusif dan para tahanan tenang," katanya.

berita: It's been a week since the launch of the sophisticated smartphone made by Apple. However, there are a lot of comments about Apple products with the latest iPhone 6 Plus. Did Apple in designing and choosing the body material of the iPhone 6 Plus have an error, or is it a feature provided on the iPhone 6 Plus? What makes the public in an uproar about the iPhone 6 Plus is easily curved. Check out the following reviews about the iPhone 6 Plus product. The case of the iPhone 6 Plus bends easily This case began with one of the owners untarnished of the latest iPhone 6 Plus who uploaded a photo on social networks of his iPhone which bends easily after he put the iPhone in his pants for 4 full hours. An owner named Hanzon, the owner of the new iPhone, found out after taking it out of his pocket that the iPhone's body was bent. Not only the case of Hanzon's iPhone, another iPhone 6 Plus owner named Devin Pitcher also expressed the same complaint about his latest iPhone in line with the case experienced by Hanzon. After Devin put his iPhone 6 Plus in the front pocket of his pants, when Devin took it out of his pocket, he found that the iPhone 6 Plus was bent in the middle, as if it couldn't withstand the pressure so that the iPhone 6 Plus easily curved. Why iPhone 6 Plus is easy to bend Apple also admits that some of the products sold have a curve in the body of the new product. However, said the Apple, it has materialized the iPhone 6 Plus with stainless steel and titanium as a protective body for the newest iPhone. The iPhone 6 Plus is also made of the strongest glass in the smartphone industry, and Apple workers have also tested it many times with many tests to test the durability of the body and other devices. However, some opinions from someone who does not want to be named, gives his opinion about the iPhone 6 Plus being easy to bend. If one of the materials for making the body from Apple is deemed not strong enough, or Apple is wrong in choosing the material with the size of the iPhone 6 Plus which is large enough to measure up to 5.5 ". Not comparable between the size and body of the iPhone 6 Plus. If the size is still in the 4.5” range, it may still be able to withstand bending.
berita_id: Sudah seminggu sejak peluncuran smartphone canggih yang dibuat oleh Apple.Namun, ada banyak komentar tentang produk Apple dengan iPhone 6 Plus terbaru.Apakah Apple dalam merancang dan memilih bahan tubuh iPhone 6 Plus memiliki kesalahan, atau apakah fitur yang disediakan di iPhone 6 Plus?Apa yang membuat publik dalam kegemparan tentang iPhone 6 Plus mudah melengkung.Lihatlah ulasan berikut tentang produk iPhone 6 Plus.Kasus iPhone 6 Plus dengan mudah membungkuk dengan mudah, kasus ini dimulai dengan salah satu pemilik yang tidak ternoda dari iPhone 6 Plus terbaru yang mengunggah foto di jejaring sosial iPhone -nya yang berbelok dengan mudah setelah ia memasukkan iPhone di celananya selama 4 jam penuh.Seorang pemilik bernama Hanzon, pemilik iPhone baru, menemukan setelah mengeluarkannya dari sakunya bahwa tubuh iPhone bengkok.Tidak hanya kasus iPhone Hanzon, pemilik iPhone 6 plus lain bernama Devin Pitcher juga menyatakan keluhan yang sama tentang iPhone terbarunya sesuai dengan kasus yang dialami Hanzon.Setelah Devin meletakkan iPhone 6 Plus di saku depan celananya, ketika Devin mengeluarkannya dari sakunya, ia menemukan bahwa iPhone 6 Plus ditekuk di tengah, seolah -olah itu tidak dapat menahan tekanan sehingga iPhone 6 Plus dengan mudah melengkung.Mengapa iPhone 6 Plus mudah untuk menekuk Apple juga mengakui bahwa beberapa produk yang dijual memiliki kurva di tubuh produk baru.Namun, kata apel, itu telah mewujudkan iPhone 6 Plus dengan stainless steel dan titanium sebagai badan pelindung untuk iPhone terbaru.IPhone 6 Plus juga terbuat dari kaca terkuat di industri ponsel cerdas, dan pekerja Apple juga telah mengujinya berkali -kali dengan banyak tes untuk menguji daya tahan tubuh dan perangkat lainnya.Namun, beberapa pendapat dari seseorang yang tidak ingin disebutkan namanya, memberikan pendapatnya tentang iPhone 6 Plus mudah ditekuk.Jika salah satu bahan untuk membuat tubuh dari Apple dianggap tidak cukup kuat, atau Apple salah dalam memilih materi dengan ukuran iPhone 6 Plus yang cukup besar untuk mengukur hingga 5,5 ". Tidak sebanding antara ukuran dan tubuh iPhone 6 Plus. Jika ukurannya masih dalam kisaran 4.5”, mungkin masih dapat dengan melengkung.

berita: Needle sticks cure stroke, information about this has circulated on the internet. Of course this made a scene online, where if it was true, then not a few people would use this method. But is the method true or is it just a trick? Just news seeking thrills? Let's find the answer now. Mentioned through a video that is widely circulated on the internet with the following steps to cure a stroke: Needles are sterilized using alcohol liquid The tips of the fingers are pierced with a needle to drip blood Is it that easy to overcome a stroke? It is stated in the video that a stroke is an attack that occurs due to disturbances inch and blockages in the blood path. It also mentions why pricking the finger using a sterilized needle, according to the video, the reason is to make the blood vessels in the body not clogged. For a layman it might be a reasonable argument, but it turns out that from a medical point of view, it is just fake news. Nervous health is important. Do not let you neglect the health of your nerves. Tips for you, take Neurotropic vitamins (B12, B6, B1) and exercise regularly. Mentioned if viewed from a medical point of view, then the theory is just a hoax or made up. Indeed, the information on the internet, especially regarding health, should be filtered before use. Moreover, the information is related to health. Blockage of Blood Vessels Causes Stroke The blockage that occurs for a long period of time, where cholesterol and fat deposits have accumulated and accumulated. Therefore, blockages will occur in the blood vessels and capillaries, which is the source of the problem. And the blockage can not be treated just by sticking a needle in the finger. This is not a trivial problem but has accumulated over the years. The dangers of the finger pricking method using a needle for stroke. In fact, if you carry out the method mentioned in the video and spread it can increase the risk to your health. Risk if you get infection. And if someone really has a stroke, the wrong treatment will slow the sufferer to get the right treatment. Even though it is known that stroke should not be treated too late, because the effects can be permanent. Moreover, the scattered procedures are clearly not in accordance with the procedures given by the doctor. How to deal with stroke sufferers The right way is to run the FAST method. F. Face. Face. Look at the patient's face, if it becomes tilted in his expression or turns away, it is a sign that the person has had a stroke. Because a stroke attacks the nerves. A. Arm. Arm. Try to raise the patient's hand, both hands. Then ask the patient to hold his hand in front of him. If the person is unable to hold both, let alone one of them, it is a symptom of a stroke on both sides, while for one hand it means a half stroke. S. Speech. Saying. The third is speech. A stroke patient will become slurred when speaking, because the patient's mouth turns into a slurred. This is a fairly obvious symptom. T. Time. Time. Last is time or time. If you have had a stroke, the sooner you get treatment at the hospital, the better, don't let it be too late. The single best method is to get the stroke patient to the hospital as soon as possible. Don't use any other method, because it doesn't exist. Call an ambulance or use a private car. So many articles about curing strokes with acupuncture are not true, hopefully it will be useful.
berita_id: Tongkat jarum penyembuhan stroke, informasi tentang ini telah beredar di internet.Tentu saja ini membuat adegan secara online, di mana jika itu benar, maka tidak sedikit orang yang akan menggunakan metode ini.Tetapi apakah metodenya benar atau hanya trik?Hanya berita mencari sensasi?Mari kita temukan jawabannya sekarang.Disebutkan melalui video yang secara luas diedarkan di internet dengan langkah -langkah berikut untuk menyembuhkan stroke: jarum disterilkan menggunakan cairan alkohol, ujung -ujung jari ditusuk dengan jarum untuk meneteskan darah, apakah mudah untuk mengatasi stroke?Dinyatakan dalam video bahwa stroke adalah serangan yang terjadi karena gangguan inci dan penyumbatan di jalur darah.Ini juga menyebutkan mengapa menusuk jari menggunakan jarum yang disterilkan, menurut video, alasannya adalah untuk membuat pembuluh darah dalam tubuh tidak tersumbat.Untuk orang awam itu mungkin merupakan argumen yang masuk akal, tetapi ternyata dari sudut pandang medis, itu hanya berita palsu.Kesehatan gugup itu penting.Jangan biarkan Anda mengabaikan kesehatan saraf Anda.Tips untuk Anda, ambil vitamin neurotropik (B12, B6, B1) dan berolahraga secara teratur.Disebutkan jika dilihat dari sudut pandang medis, maka teorinya hanya tipuan atau dibuat -buat.Memang, informasi di internet, terutama mengenai kesehatan, harus disaring sebelum digunakan.Selain itu, informasi tersebut terkait dengan kesehatan.Penyumbatan pembuluh darah menyebabkan stroke penyumbatan yang terjadi untuk jangka waktu yang lama, di mana kolesterol dan endapan lemak telah menumpuk dan menumpuk.Oleh karena itu, penyumbatan akan terjadi pada pembuluh darah dan kapiler, yang merupakan sumber masalah.Dan penyumbatan tidak dapat diobati hanya dengan menempelkan jarum di jari.Ini bukan masalah sepele tetapi telah terakumulasi selama bertahun -tahun.Bahaya metode tusukan jari menggunakan jarum untuk stroke.Bahkan, jika Anda melakukan metode yang disebutkan dalam video dan menyebar, itu dapat meningkatkan risiko kesehatan Anda.Berisiko jika Anda mengalami infeksi.Dan jika seseorang benar -benar mengalami stroke, perawatan yang salah akan memperlambat penderita untuk mendapatkan perawatan yang tepat.Meskipun diketahui bahwa stroke tidak boleh diperlakukan terlambat, karena efeknya bisa permanen.Selain itu, prosedur yang tersebar jelas tidak sesuai dengan prosedur yang diberikan oleh dokter.Cara menangani penderita stroke dengan cara yang benar adalah dengan menjalankan metode cepat.F. Wajah.Menghadapi.Lihatlah wajah pasien, jika dimiringkan dalam ekspresinya atau berpaling, itu adalah tanda bahwa orang tersebut mengalami stroke.Karena stroke menyerang saraf.A. lengan.Lengan.Cobalah untuk mengangkat tangan pasien, kedua tangan.Kemudian minta pasien untuk memegang tangannya di depannya.Jika orang tersebut tidak dapat menahan keduanya, apalagi salah satunya, itu adalah gejala stroke di kedua sisi, sedangkan untuk satu tangan itu berarti setengah stroke.Pidato S.Pepatah.Yang ketiga adalah pidato.Pasien stroke akan menjadi tidak jelas ketika berbicara, karena mulut pasien berubah menjadi cadel.Ini adalah gejala yang cukup jelas.T. Waktu.Waktu.Terakhir adalah waktu atau waktu.Jika Anda mengalami stroke, semakin cepat Anda mendapatkan perawatan di rumah sakit, semakin baik, jangan biarkan sudah terlambat.Metode tunggal terbaik adalah membawa pasien stroke ke rumah sakit sesegera mungkin.Jangan gunakan metode lain, karena tidak ada.Hubungi ambulans atau gunakan mobil pribadi.Begitu banyak artikel tentang penyembuhan sapuan dengan akupunktur tidak benar, semoga akan berguna.

berita: The Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao, Philippines, received protests from the public regarding the reog and gamelan decorations that were burned there. Therefore, the Consulate General in Davao gave an explanation regarding the burning that was carried out. "On October 20, 2015, the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City was forced to destroy Ponorogo reog which has been an asset of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao since 1988. The destruction by burning had to be carried out because Ponorogo reog was in a damaged condition and eaten by termites," as written in a statement by the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao that received by merdeka.com, this morning, Saturday (31/10). Minister of Foreign Affairs Retno L. P. Marsudi also confirmed that the burning was carried out because it was already and infested with termites. "Reog and gamelan decorations in the form of dragon heads were burned because they were damaged and full of termites," said Foreign Minister Retno in a short message. Several media had reported about the burning of these cultural assets. There are even media who say that the burning of cultural assets is because it is considered an idol corrode and the procession of exorcising spirits. The Consulate General in Davao himself said that the burning that was carried out was not an attempt by the Consulate General in Davao to damage or even eliminate cultural assets. "The destruction of these assets has been carried out carefully and with full respect for Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The Consulate General in Davao City also wants to emphasize that the burning has absolutely nothing to do with efforts to expel idols or spirits," continued the statement from the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao. The statement also stated that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao was communicating with parties in Indonesia to seek a new Ponorogo reog.
berita_id: Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia di Davao, Filipina, menerima protes dari publik mengenai dekorasi reog dan gamelan yang dibakar di sana.Oleh karena itu, konsulat jenderal di Davao memberikan penjelasan tentang pembakaran yang dilakukan."On October 20, 2015, the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City was forced to destroy Ponorogo reog which has been an asset of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao since 1988. The destruction by burning had to be carried out because Ponorogo reog was in a damaged condition and eaten by termites," as written in a statement by the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao that received by merdeka.com, this morning, Saturday(31/10).Menteri Luar Negeri Retno L. P. Marsudi juga mengkonfirmasi bahwa pembakaran dilakukan karena sudah dan terinfeksi rayap."Dekorasi reog dan gamelan dalam bentuk kepala naga dibakar karena mereka rusak dan penuh rayap," kata Menteri Luar Negeri Retno dalam pesan singkat.Beberapa media telah melaporkan tentang pembakaran aset budaya ini.Bahkan ada media yang mengatakan bahwa pembakaran aset budaya adalah karena dianggap sebagai korode idola dan prosesi pengusiran roh.Konsulat jenderal di Davao sendiri mengatakan bahwa pembakaran yang dilakukan bukanlah upaya oleh konsulat jenderal di Davao untuk merusak atau bahkan menghilangkan aset budaya."Penghancuran aset -aset ini telah dilakukan dengan hati -hati dan dengan rasa hormat penuh terhadap Reog Ponorogo sebagai aset budaya. Konsulat jenderal di Kota Davao juga ingin menekankan bahwa pembakaran sama sekali tidak ada hubungannya dengan upaya untuk mengeluarkan berhala atau roh," lanjut pernyataan dari konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao.Pernyataan itu juga menyatakan bahwa Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao berkomunikasi dengan partai -partai di Indonesia untuk mencari Ponorogo Reog baru.

berita: Riots broke out at the Salemba detention center branch of the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, which housed terrorism convicts. However, the police confirmed that there was no throwing of the Koran in the incident. The incident atomic number  occurred because of the prisoner's reaction when officers confiscated his cell phone in Block C detention. He emphasized that there was no throwing of the Koran by the guard. However, the officers did check the books belonging to the cell occupants. "What is there is that the officers conducted an examination of the books and objects in the cell," said Martinus. According to him, terrorist prisoners damaged a number of prison facilities during the riots. For example, the prison cell door, the gate of the hallway block, and the window pane. "The riots were carried out by terrorist prisoners which resulted in the destruction of prison facilities, such as the door of the prison cell being broken down, the gate of the hallway block, the window panes (in block C and block B)," Rikwanto explained. The atmosphere in the detention center was gradually controlled by the Densus members who were at the location. However, there are still prisoners who say takbir which triggers others. "Furthermore, the steps taken by AKP Ahmat as Kaur Wartah are coordinating with Brimob colleagues to back up security at the Salemba detention center," concluded Rikwanto.
berita_id: Kerusuhan pecah di Cabang Pusat Penahanan Salemba dari Markas Komando Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, yang menampung narapidana terorisme.Namun, polisi mengkonfirmasi bahwa tidak ada lemparan Alquran dalam insiden itu.Nomor atom insiden terjadi karena reaksi tahanan ketika petugas menyita ponselnya di blok C penahanan.Dia menekankan bahwa tidak ada lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga.Namun, para petugas memang memeriksa buku -buku milik penghuni sel."Apa yang ada bahwa para petugas melakukan pemeriksaan buku dan benda -benda di dalam sel," kata Martinus.Menurutnya, tahanan teroris merusak sejumlah fasilitas penjara selama kerusuhan.Misalnya, pintu sel penjara, gerbang blok lorong, dan panel jendela."Kerusuhan dilakukan oleh para tahanan teroris yang mengakibatkan penghancuran fasilitas penjara, seperti pintu sel penjara yang dipecah, gerbang blok lorong, panel jendela (di blok C dan blok B)," Rikwanto menjelaskan.Suasana di pusat penahanan secara bertahap dikendalikan oleh anggota densus yang berada di lokasi.Namun, masih ada tahanan yang mengatakan takbir yang memicu orang lain."Selain itu, langkah -langkah yang diambil oleh AKP Ahmat ketika Kaur Wartah berkoordinasi dengan rekan -rekan Brimob untuk mendukung keamanan di Pusat Penahanan Salemba," pungkas Rikwanto.

berita: This one news may be very useful for consumers who intend to buy the iPhone 6 Plus when it is released in the Indonesian market. After a few days of being released in a number of countries, Apple's new smartphone 5.5-inch jumbo sail that began to reap protests from users. According to reports by some iPhone 6 Plus users, The biggest screen iPhone turns out to be easy to bend when stored for too long in the trouser pocket. This incident was first reported by an owner The iPhone 6 is named Hanzon on the MacRumors forum site. He claimed to keep the iPhone 6 Plus in a trouser pocket for approximately 4 hours, and perform daily activities as usual. When taken out, Hanzon was surprised when he saw the middle His iPhone 6 Plus is slightly 'bent', aka curved. Not only Hanzon, another user named Devin Pitcher also boundary expressed a similar complaint on the forum. Devin claims to keep the new iPhone 6 Plus his in his front trouser pocket. When removed, even the middle of the iPhone 6 Plus bent like a tank can withstand the pressure. The use of a large 5.5-inch screen is indeed feared to interfere with user comfort. However, the problem of large dimensions limits the user's comfort when storing it in the pocket pants seems unthinkable to Apple. In addition, Apple is also considered to have mistakes by choosing a metal-aluminum mixture that is not too solid as a material iPhone 6 Plus frame base material. Maybe the Iphone Frame has not passed the UTM (Universal Testing Machine) Test. UTM Test serves to test the framework of the iPhone 6 plus by pressing and pulling to the maximum limit. If the force needed to bend the iPhone is small, it means it is easy to bend
berita_id: Berita yang satu ini mungkin sangat berguna bagi konsumen yang berniat membeli iPhone 6 Plus ketika dirilis di pasar Indonesia.Setelah beberapa hari dirilis di sejumlah negara, smartphone baru Smartphone 5,5 inci berlayar Jumbo yang mulai menuai protes dari pengguna.Menurut laporan oleh beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone layar terbesar ternyata mudah ditekuk saat disimpan terlalu lama di saku celana.Insiden ini pertama kali dilaporkan oleh pemilik iPhone 6 bernama Hanzon di situs Forum MacRumors.Dia mengaku menyimpan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana selama sekitar 4 jam, dan melakukan kegiatan sehari -hari seperti biasa.Ketika dikeluarkan, Hanzon terkejut ketika dia melihat bagian tengah iPhone 6 -nya sedikit 'bengkok', alias melengkung.Tidak hanya Hanzon, pengguna lain bernama Devin Pitcher juga Boundary menyatakan keluhan serupa di forum.Devin mengklaim menyimpan iPhone 6 baru ditambahnya di saku celana depannya.Saat dilepas, bahkan tengah iPhone 6 plus bengkok seperti tangki dapat menahan tekanan.Penggunaan layar 5,5 inci besar memang ditakuti untuk mengganggu kenyamanan pengguna.Namun, masalah dimensi besar membatasi kenyamanan pengguna saat menyimpannya di celana saku tampaknya tidak terpikirkan oleh Apple.Selain itu, Apple juga dianggap memiliki kesalahan dengan memilih campuran logam-aluminium yang tidak terlalu padat sebagai bahan bingkai bingkai iPhone 6 plus material.Mungkin bingkai iPhone belum lulus uji UTM (mesin pengujian universal).Tes UTM berfungsi untuk menguji kerangka kerja iPhone 6 Plus dengan menekan dan menarik ke batas maksimum.Jika kekuatan yang diperlukan untuk menekuk iPhone kecil, itu berarti mudah untuk menekuk

berita: News Social media this morning was enlivened by the circulation of photos of participants from the 212th volume 2 action unable to enter the Istiqlal Mosque. In the photo that spreads, it can be seen that a group is queuing in front of the Istiqlal entrance gate. The Head of Protocol and Public Relations of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam said that the news of the mass 212 volume 2 being stuck at the gate was a hoax. "The news that there are 212 mass demonstrations unable to enter Istiqlal is a thousand percent hoax," said Abu when he was confirmed on Tuesday (21/2/2017). According to Abu, indeed on Monday night, after Isha there were three group buses that entered the Istiqlal Mosque. They claimed to be a group from Madura Island. Mosque administrators, said Abu, invited them to worship and clean themselves. The Istiqlal Mosque administrator then coordinated with the group leader accompanied by the police. "After speaking they then voluntarily left Istiqlal," said Abu. Then according to the procedure, the Istiqlal mosque, outside the month of Ramadan, is closed at 21.30 WIB. "Just according to the SOP, the Istiqlal Mosque is closed daily at 09.30 WIB and reopens one hour before the dawn prayer, approximately 3.45 WIB," said Abu. Regarding the photo that there was a queue of worshipers at the Istiqlal gate, Abu said it was a group of pilgrims from outside the city who would enter Istiqlal. The manager also apologizes if they queue in front of the gate, because the door was only opened at 03.45 WIB or one hour before the Fajr prayer. "In the morning before dawn, Tuesday, February 21 2017, there were many pilgrims from outside the city who would enter the Istiqlal Mosque and they arrived before the door of the Istiqlal Mosque opened at 3.45 WIB. We apologize for this, ' said Abu. The Fajr prayer process at the Istiqlal mosque Mosque today, said Abu, went well, with the imam, Mr. Ust. Salim Ghazali. The number of worshipers is approximately 240 people, consisting of 170 men and 70 women.
berita_id: Berita Media Sosial Pagi ini dimeriahkan oleh sirkulasi foto peserta dari aksi Volume 2 ke -212 yang tidak dapat memasuki masjid Istiqlal.Dalam foto yang menyebar, dapat dilihat bahwa suatu kelompok mengantri di depan gerbang masuk Istiqlal.Kepala protokol dan hubungan masyarakat dari masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam mengatakan bahwa berita tentang massa 212 Volume 2 terjebak di gerbang adalah tipuan."Berita bahwa ada 212 demonstrasi massa yang tidak dapat memasuki Istiqlal adalah tipuan seribu persen," kata Abu ketika ia dikonfirmasi pada hari Selasa (21/2/2017).Menurut Abu, memang pada Senin malam, setelah Isha ada tiga bus kelompok yang memasuki masjid Istiqlal.Mereka mengaku sebagai kelompok dari Pulau Madura.Administrator masjid, kata Abu, mengundang mereka untuk beribadah dan membersihkan diri.Administrator Masjid Istiqlal kemudian berkoordinasi dengan pemimpin kelompok yang disertai oleh polisi."Setelah berbicara, mereka kemudian secara sukarela meninggalkan Istiqlal," kata Abu.Kemudian menurut prosedur, masjid Istiqlal, di luar bulan Ramadhan, ditutup pada 21.30 WIB."Hanya menurut SOP, masjid Istiqlal ditutup setiap hari pada pukul 09.30 WIB dan dibuka kembali satu jam sebelum doa fajar, sekitar 3,45 WIB," kata Abu.Mengenai foto bahwa ada antrian penyembah di gerbang Istiqlal, Abu mengatakan itu adalah sekelompok peziarah dari luar kota yang akan memasuki Istiqlal.Manajer juga meminta maaf jika mereka mengantri di depan gerbang, karena pintunya hanya dibuka pada 03.45 WIB atau satu jam sebelum doa Fajr."Di pagi hari sebelum fajar, Selasa, 21 Februari 2017, ada banyak peziarah dari luar kota yang akan memasuki masjid Istiqlal dan mereka tiba di depan pintu masjid Istiqlal dibuka pada 3,45 wib. Kami meminta maaf untuk ini, kata Abu, dengan sumur faU, dengan sumur m -mosque.Ghazali.

berita: This afternoon the Makobrimob was tense, due to the Seizing and Throwing of Al-Qur'ans by Unscrupulous Members of the Mobile Brigade Headquarters Prison this afternoon. It is known that the perpetrator of the throwing of the Qur'an is a prison officer who is known to be cruel to Muslim prisoners. violent disorder Even this news was published by CNN Indonesia, but unfortunately this news was published in a piece, and was also twisted by the CNN Indonesia Editor. CNN Indonesia reported that prisoners who went on a rampage because their cellphones were confiscated, even though the rampage began when Brimob Prison Officers threw the detainees' Al-Qur'an. Prisoners are also willing to have their cellphones confiscated, but the prisoners are not willing to have their Holy Books and Al-Qur'ans thrown into the trash by prison officers.
berita_id: Sore ini Makobrimob tegang, karena perebutan dan melempar al-Qur'ans oleh anggota yang tidak bermoral dari penjara markas brigade seluler sore ini.Diketahui bahwa pelaku lemparan Al -Qur'an adalah seorang perwira penjara yang dikenal kejam terhadap tahanan Muslim.Gangguan kekerasan Bahkan berita ini diterbitkan oleh CNN Indonesia, tetapi sayangnya berita ini diterbitkan dalam sebuah karya, dan juga dipelintir oleh editor CNN Indonesia.CNN Indonesia melaporkan bahwa para tahanan yang mengamuk karena ponsel mereka disita, meskipun mengamuk dimulai ketika petugas penjara Brimob melemparkan al-Qur'an dari tahanan.Tahanan juga bersedia melakukan ponsel mereka, tetapi para tahanan tidak bersedia memiliki kitab suci dan al-Qur'ans yang dilemparkan ke tempat sampah oleh petugas penjara.

berita: Participants of Action 212 Volume 2 who came from outside the city had arrived at the Istiqlal Mosque, but they could not enter because the gate of the mosque was locked. According to observations, hundreds of people driving 5 buses, including AD number plates (Solo and its surroundings) were stuck at the entrance of the Istiqlal mosque, Monday (20/2) night, due to the closure of the mosque, which used to be a gathering place for the Defending Islam Action. (read: Istiqlal door is closed, 5 buses participating in 212 action cannot enter) Police officers on guard in front of the Istiqlal Mosque then directed the bus from the area to another place. It was not explained where the mass gathering place was diverted. For last night's case, there were five buses from East Java. They claimed to come from Madura. Participants enter the mosque after Isha time. The mosque provides opportunities for worship and cleaning. The group from East Java understood rhode island and understood. The mosque management waited for them to leave the Istiqlal Mosque voluntarily. Then at 03.40 WIB the mosque was reopened. Previously, the Islamic Community Forum (FUI) ensured that there would be no long march during the 212th volume II action, Tuesday (21/2) tomorrow. Action participants will be directed directly to the action concentration point in front of the DPR/MPR RI building. "Our scenario does not have a long march. So all participants are advised to go directly to the DPR/MPR RI building," said Ustaz Bernard Abdul Jabbar as coordinator of the 212 action volume II to reporters at the Metro Jaya Police Headquarters, Jakarta, Monday (20/2/2017) . Ustadz Bernard estimates that 10 thousand people will attend the action. People from outside Jakarta were asked to park their vehicles in the parking lots that have been prepared. "And for those from areas who bring buses and vehicles, we then direct them to park at the Senayan East Parking if those from the south and east. Meanwhile, from the west we will direct them to (park vehicles) at Palmerah Station and at in front of the Forestry Department building," he explained. He added that his party also did not provide lodging facilities for action participants from outside the region. This means that those from outside the city of Jakarta are welcome to find a place to rest on their own.
berita_id: Peserta aksi 212 Volume 2 yang datang dari luar kota telah tiba di masjid Istiqlal, tetapi mereka tidak bisa masuk karena gerbang masjid terkunci.Menurut pengamatan, ratusan orang yang mengendarai 5 bus, termasuk pelat nomor iklan (solo dan sekitarnya) terjebak di pintu masuk masjid Istiqlal, Senin (20/2) malam, karena penutupan masjid, yang dulunya merupakan tempat berkumpul untuk aksi Islam yang bertahan.(Baca: pintu ISTIQLAL ditutup, 5 bus yang berpartisipasi dalam 212 Action Can't masuk) Petugas polisi yang berjaga di depan masjid Istiqlal kemudian mengarahkan bus dari area ke tempat lain.Itu tidak dijelaskan di mana tempat pengumpulan massa dialihkan.Untuk kasus tadi malam, ada lima bus dari Jawa Timur.Mereka mengaku datang dari Madura.Peserta memasuki masjid setelah waktu Isha.Masjid ini memberikan kesempatan untuk beribadah dan membersihkan.Kelompok dari Jawa Timur memahami Rhode Island dan memahami.Manajemen masjid menunggu mereka meninggalkan masjid Istiqlal secara sukarela.Kemudian pada 03.40 WIB masjid dibuka kembali.Sebelumnya, Forum Komunitas Islam (FUI) memastikan bahwa tidak akan ada Maret yang panjang selama aksi Volume II ke -212, Selasa (21/2) besok.Peserta tindakan akan diarahkan langsung ke titik konsentrasi aksi di depan gedung DPR/MPR RI."Skenario kami tidak memiliki pawai panjang. Jadi semua peserta disarankan untuk langsung ke gedung DPR/MPR RI," kata Ustaz Bernard Abdul Jabbar sebagai koordinator 212 Action Volume II kepada wartawan di Markas Kepolisian Metro Jaya, Jakarta, Senin (20/2/2017).Ustadz Bernard memperkirakan bahwa 10 ribu orang akan menghadiri aksi tersebut.Orang -orang dari luar Jakarta diminta memarkir kendaraan mereka di tempat parkir yang telah disiapkan."Dan bagi mereka dari daerah yang membawa bus dan kendaraan, kami kemudian mengarahkan mereka ke parkir di parkir Senayan Timur jika yang dari selatan dan timur. Sementara itu, dari barat kami akan mengarahkan mereka ke (kendaraan parkir) di stasiun Palmerah dan di depan gedung departemen kehutanan," jelasnya.Dia menambahkan bahwa partainya juga tidak menyediakan fasilitas penginapan bagi peserta tindakan dari luar wilayah.Ini berarti bahwa orang -orang dari luar kota Jakarta dipersilakan untuk menemukan tempat untuk beristirahat sendiri.

berita: Jakarta, An article that is quite viral on the internet says that catfish contains 3,000 cancer cells. Many argue, because in fact catfish actually contains many important nutrients. The nutritional content in catfish includes protein and omega three fatty acids, which are said to be equivalent to salmon. Given the large number of nutrients in catfish, the relationship between catfish and the risk of cancer is questionable. It's different if you use oil that is used many times, it can trigger cancer. But it's not from fish but from the oil, said Dr. Dradjat R Suardi, SpB(K)Onk, a cancer expert from the Indonesian really Oncology Association when contacted by detikHealth, Friday (23/10/2015). The relationship between repeated use of oil and the risk of cancer itself is debatable. During this time, trans oils that are formed due to repeated heating are more often associated with the risk of heart and blood vessel disease. The allegation that catfish can trigger cancer is based on the nature of the fish that likes to consume waste. Also because it is able to survive in muddy and polluted waters, it is thought that many carcinogenic toxins are contained in this fish. Currently there is no research that states that eating catfish can trigger cancer, said Dr. Dradjat.
berita_id: Jakarta, sebuah artikel yang cukup viral di internet mengatakan bahwa ikan lele berisi 3.000 sel kanker.Banyak yang berpendapat, karena sebenarnya ikan lele sebenarnya mengandung banyak nutrisi penting.Kandungan nutrisi dalam ikan lele termasuk protein dan asam lemak omega tiga, yang dikatakan setara dengan salmon.Mengingat sejumlah besar nutrisi dalam ikan lele, hubungan antara ikan lele dan risiko kanker dipertanyakan.Berbeda jika Anda menggunakan minyak yang digunakan berkali -kali, dapat memicu kanker.Tapi itu bukan dari ikan tetapi dari minyak, kata Dr. Dradjat R Suardi, SPB (k) Onk, seorang ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia ketika dihubungi oleh DetikHealth, Jumat (23/10/2015).Hubungan antara penggunaan minyak berulang dan risiko kanker itu sendiri dapat diperdebatkan.Selama waktu ini, minyak trans yang terbentuk karena pemanasan berulang lebih sering dikaitkan dengan risiko penyakit jantung dan pembuluh darah.Tuduhan bahwa ikan lele dapat memicu kanker didasarkan pada sifat ikan yang suka mengonsumsi limbah.Juga karena mampu bertahan hidup di perairan berlumpur dan tercemar, diperkirakan banyak racun karsinogenik yang terkandung dalam ikan ini.Saat ini tidak ada penelitian yang menyatakan bahwa makan lele dapat memicu kanker, kata Dr. Dradjat.

berita: The issue of the iPhone 6 Plus which users claim is easy to bend has attracted great attention from the world. However, according to an American magazine, Consumer Reports, this issue is actually too exaggerated. According to a Ubergizmo report, Consumer Reports has conducted a self-test to test the iPhone 6 Plus. They also included other devices namely the iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, LG G3, Samsung Galaxy Note 3 and HTC One M8 for comparison. The experiment was carried out with an Instron compression machine which puts pressure on the center of the device with various pressure variations. As a result, HTC One M8 and iPhone 6 were found to be the weakest devices. They are only able to withstand a load of 31.7 kg as well before bending. Then, the iPhone 6 Plus followed with the ability to hold 40.8 kg. The strongest were the LG G3 and Galaxy Note 3 which held up to 59 kg and 68 kg respectively. Based on this discovery, Consumer Reports dares to state that the iPhone 6 and Plus are not as bad as the news circulating. "They may not be the strongest phones on the market, but concerns about serious structural design errors in the iPhone 6 and Plus seem overblown," said Consumer Reports. Previously, Apple had also shown a test facility at its factory to ease the rumors that were being talked about through the hashtag #BendGate on various social media. They have also explained that the iPhone 6 and Plus are made of strong steel or titanium inserts. The Cupertino company itself has also formulated the aluminum it uses with glass ions to make it stronger.
berita_id: Masalah iPhone 6 Plus yang diklaim pengguna mudah ditekuk telah menarik perhatian besar dari dunia.Namun, menurut sebuah majalah Amerika, Consumer melaporkan, masalah ini sebenarnya terlalu berlebihan.Menurut laporan Ubergizmo, Consumer Reports telah melakukan tes swadaya untuk menguji iPhone 6 Plus.Mereka juga memasukkan perangkat lain yaitu iPhone 5S, iPhone 6, LG G3, Samsung Galaxy Note 3 dan HTC One M8 untuk perbandingan.Eksperimen dilakukan dengan mesin kompresi instron yang memberi tekanan pada pusat perangkat dengan berbagai variasi tekanan.Akibatnya, HTC One M8 dan iPhone 6 ditemukan sebagai perangkat terlemah.Mereka hanya mampu menahan beban 31,7 kg juga sebelum membungkuk.Kemudian, iPhone 6 Plus diikuti dengan kemampuan untuk menahan 40,8 kg.Yang terkuat adalah LG G3 dan Galaxy Note 3 yang masing -masing menampung hingga 59 kg dan 68 kg.Berdasarkan penemuan ini, Laporan Konsumen berani menyatakan bahwa iPhone 6 dan Plus tidak seburuk berita yang beredar."Mereka mungkin bukan ponsel terkuat di pasaran, tetapi kekhawatiran tentang kesalahan desain struktural yang serius di iPhone 6 dan plus tampak berlebihan," kata Consumer melaporkan.Sebelumnya, Apple juga telah menunjukkan fasilitas uji di pabriknya untuk memudahkan rumor yang sedang dibicarakan melalui tagar #Bendgate di berbagai media sosial.Mereka juga telah menjelaskan bahwa iPhone 6 dan Plus terbuat dari sisipan baja atau titanium yang kuat.Perusahaan Cupertino itu sendiri juga telah merumuskan aluminium yang digunakannya dengan ion kaca untuk membuatnya lebih kuat.

berita: Catfish is a fish that is quite popular in Indonesia. But recently there has been a lot of news that eating catfish is harmful to the body. Then is it true? Many news circulating on social networks say that catfish is the filthiest fish. There is an article entitled In a mouthful of catfish, there are 3000 cancer cells. The title of the article made a hot topic of conversation on social media. The news made catfish farmers nervous, because it could threaten the continuity of their business. The article posted on July 29, 2015 describes the confession of a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong, who is a supplier of catfish to markets and roadside restaurants in Hainan Province. The media then investigated the catfish and tried to observe seven samples of catfish producer ponds. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken and pig coops, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. As reported by kompas.com (28/10/2015), the article was a black campaign to bring down sales of the catfish market whose market prospects continued to increase, said the Head of the East Java Fisheries and Marine Service. Basically catfish that are dangerous to eat are catfish that live in dirty environments. Catfish that live in a dirty environment have the potential to be exposed to very dangerous chemical compounds such as metals and substances that can be polluted through water pollutants. The most dangerous chemical compound that catfish can possibly eat is mercury. Mercury itself is an organic chemical compound that is very toxic and can damage the human nervous system when consumed. But you don't have to worry about the widespread rumor that catfish contain cancer cells. In Indonesia, generally the catfish that are marketed are not those from the wild, but catfish that are cultivated in ponds that have been treated and protected from pollution. The food for catfish also comes from non-waste feed, so it is not exposed to harmful chemical compounds. According to detik.com (23/10/2015), currently there is no research that states that consuming catfish can trigger cancer, said Dr. Dradjat R Suardi, SpB(K)Onk, a cancer expert from the Indonesian Oncology Association. Quoted from alodokter.com, every 100 grams of catfish contains 229 kilocalories of energy. Catfish protein with this portion is about 18 grams, carbohydrates as much as 8 grams, fiber 0.7 grams and fat as much as 13 grams. Catfish also contains various vitamins and minerals such as vitamins A, C, D, B complex, calcium, phosphorus, magnesium, sodium, potassium, and zinc. mudcat For those of you who believed the news yesterday, from now on, you already know. There are a lot of useful content in catfish. From now on, don't hesitate to eat catfish.
berita_id: Catfish adalah ikan yang cukup populer di Indonesia.Namun baru -baru ini ada banyak berita bahwa makan lele itu berbahaya bagi tubuh.Lalu apakah itu benar?Banyak berita yang beredar di jejaring sosial mengatakan bahwa ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor.Ada sebuah artikel yang berjudul dalam seteguk ikan lele, ada 3000 sel kanker.Judul artikel membuat topik hangat percakapan di media sosial.Berita itu membuat petani lele gugup, karena itu bisa mengancam kesinambungan bisnis mereka.Artikel yang diposting pada 29 Juli 2015 menjelaskan pengakuan seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-Hong, yang merupakan pemasok ikan lele ke pasar dan restoran pinggir jalan di provinsi Hainan.Media kemudian menyelidiki ikan lele dan mencoba mengamati tujuh sampel kolam produsen lele.Tujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sedangkan di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Seperti yang dilaporkan oleh Kompas.com (28/10/2015), artikel itu adalah kampanye hitam untuk menurunkan penjualan pasar lele yang prospek pasar terus meningkat, kata kepala perikanan Java Timur dan layanan kelautan.Pada dasarnya lele yang berbahaya untuk dimakan adalah ikan lele yang hidup di lingkungan yang kotor.Ikan lele yang hidup di lingkungan yang kotor memiliki potensi untuk terpapar senyawa kimia yang sangat berbahaya seperti logam dan zat yang dapat tercemar melalui polutan air.Senyawa kimia paling berbahaya yang bisa dimakan ikan lele adalah merkuri.Merkuri sendiri adalah senyawa kimia organik yang sangat beracun dan dapat merusak sistem saraf manusia saat dikonsumsi.Tetapi Anda tidak perlu khawatir tentang rumor yang meluas bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker.Di Indonesia, umumnya ikan lele yang dipasarkan bukanlah yang dari alam liar, tetapi ikan lele yang dibudidayakan di kolam yang telah diperlakukan dan dilindungi dari polusi.Makanan untuk ikan lele juga berasal dari pakan non-limbah, sehingga tidak terpapar senyawa kimia yang berbahaya.Menurut Detik.com (23/10/2015), saat ini tidak ada penelitian yang menyatakan bahwa mengkonsumsi ikan lele dapat memicu kanker, kata Dr. Dradjat R Suardi, SPB (K) Onk, seorang ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia.Dikutip dari Alodokter.com, setiap 100 gram ikan lele mengandung 229 kilokalori energi.Protein lele dengan bagian ini sekitar 18 gram, karbohidrat sebanyak 8 gram, serat 0,7 gram dan lemak sebanyak 13 gram.Lele juga mengandung berbagai vitamin dan mineral seperti vitamin A, C, D, kompleks B, kalsium, fosfor, magnesium, natrium, kalium, dan seng.Mudcat bagi Anda yang mempercayai berita kemarin, mulai sekarang, Anda sudah tahu.Ada banyak konten yang berguna dalam lele.Mulai sekarang, jangan ragu untuk makan lele.

berita: Traveloka raises its voice regarding the boycott of its mobile application which was echoed on Twitter. This boycott is the aftermath of the walk out action carried out by composer and pianist Ananda Sukarlan when DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan delivered an opening speech at the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College at JIExpo Kemayoran, Central Jakarta, Saturday (11/11). The online travel agency company confirmed that its founder, Derianto Kusuma was on the list of recipients of the award from the Kanisius Alumni with Ananda Sukarlan and was scheduled to attend the event. "We are also proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from the Kanisius Alumni. However, he was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned several months earlier," said Traveloka PR Manager, Busyra Oryza, when contacted by CNNIndonesia. com, Tuesday (14/11). This statement also denies reports that Derianto attended and left the event in the middle of a speech by the Governor of DKI Anies Baswedan. "In response to the issue surrounding Anies' speech at the 90th Celebration of Kanisius College, we stated that the person concerned (Derianto) was out of town to attend an event laurels that had been planned a few months earlier," continued Busyra. Today's Twitter timeline was enlivened by a boycott of the Traveloka application because the founder reportedly walked out and was seen as an insult to Anies as a democratically elected governor. This online tourism provider company claims that it has never discredited other parties and prioritizes the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. According to CNNIndonesia.com observations as of 16.00, Tuesday (14/11), the topic #UninstallTraveloka has been tweeted 2.7 thousand times. This topic is at the top of the most talked about topics netizens in Indonesia
berita_id: Traveloka mengangkat suaranya mengenai boikot aplikasi selulernya yang digemakan di Twitter.Boikot ini adalah akibat dari aksi walk out yang dilakukan oleh komposer dan pianis Ananda Sukarlan ketika Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan menyampaikan pidato pembukaan pada peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius di Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakarta Tengah, Sabtu 11/11).Perusahaan agen perjalanan online mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendirinya, DeRianto Kusuma ada dalam daftar penerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius dengan Ananda Sukarlan dan dijadwalkan untuk menghadiri acara tersebut."Kami juga bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya," kata manajer PR Traveloka, Busyra Oryza, ketika dihubungi oleh CNNindonesia.com, Selasa (14/11).Pernyataan ini juga membantah laporan bahwa DeRianto hadir dan meninggalkan acara di tengah pidato oleh Gubernur DKI Anies Baswedan."Menanggapi masalah seputar pidato anies di perayaan ke -90 Kanisius College, kami menyatakan bahwa orang yang bersangkutan (Derianto) berada di luar kota untuk menghadiri sebuah acara kemenangan yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya," lanjut Busyra.Garis waktu Twitter hari ini dimeriahkan oleh boikot aplikasi Traveloka karena pendiri dilaporkan berjalan keluar dan dipandang sebagai penghinaan terhadap anies sebagai gubernur yang terpilih secara demokratis.Perusahaan penyedia pariwisata online ini mengklaim bahwa mereka tidak pernah mendiskreditkan pihak lain dan memprioritaskan nilai -nilai saling menghormati, toleransi, dan inovasi.Menurut pengamatan cnnindonesia.com pada 16,00, Selasa (14/11), topik #uninstalltraveloka telah dit -tweet 2,7 ribu kali.Topik ini berada di puncak topik netizen yang paling banyak dibicarakan di Indonesia

berita: In 2012 we were shocked by the emergence of brushes or brushes made of some boar bristles until the MUI issued a fatwa that it is forbidden to use a pig bristle brush, but recently, information about toothbrushes made from pig bristles has emerged. Info for you Muslims to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use ingredients from non-halal. Come on, check the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair in other words Pig Fur! So check your toothbrush package again when you buy it. Similarly on the brush (bread spreader), Generally noted "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". "What are your toothbrush bristles made of? Plastic or Pig Bristle? Steps to check: Watch the wrap, if it's made of bristles, then it's made of sea urchin. Please burn the bristles, if it smells like the smell of burning hair, it means it's from sea urchins. However, if it melts and becomes hard, it means it is made of plastic and is safe to use. Possibility of using the forbidden: Worship is not accepted, prayer is not accepted, and hell is more worthy (hadith). Save ourselves and our loved ones. " In everyday life, we use various types of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint homes, grease cake tins, to smear food. Such as grilled chicken, bread, cakes, as well as a variety of grilled or grilled meat and seafood. While the brush is useful when combing hair, cleaning hair at a salon or barbershop, cleaning clothes, and scrubbing floors. Do you know, what do the brushes & brushes you use come from? Most likely it is FROM PIGS! Brushes supplied in Indonesia usually come from China. Imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars that have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. For Muslims, the use of clear sea urchins is HARAM. No in all probability matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption as well as for application. (the term is PIG/BOAR/HOG/BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places, SUCH AS MARKETS, PAINTING TOOLS SHOP, BUILDING MATERIALS STORE, MAKE UP TOOLS & SALON SHOP, ONLINE STORE, ETC. ARE YOU FAMILIAR WITH THE MULTIPLE FORMS BELOW? THERE ARE PAINTING BRUSH, WALL PAINT BRUSH, MAKE UP BRUSH, HAIR BRUSH, BARBER/BARBER BRUSH, CLOTHING BRUSH, ETC. BEWARE! TIPS AVOID USE BRUSHS AND BONES BRUSHS: 1. USE 100% SYNTHETIC BRUSH & BRUSH, SUCH AS NYLON. There are wall paint brushes and feeding brushes, which are slightly more expensive. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. 2. USE OTHER ALTERNATIVES BUT THE BRUSH. For example, paint rollers for painting, sponges & cotton buds for makeup, and knives & spatulas for greasing food. 3. BEWARE OF FOOD THAT THE PROCESS OF COOKING AND CLEANING Utensils USING A PIG BRUSH. 4. CHARACTERISTICS OF PIG BRUSH BRUSH, WHEN BURNED WILL GIVE A SPECIFIC OTHER LIKE ROCKED MEAT. 5. USUALLY PIG BRUSH BRUSHS SOLD IN WHITE & BLACK COLORS. However, producers may process sea urchins by bleaching them and then coloring them, so that they look like other animal hairs. (AND) Reference: Reality in the field & some literature on the internet. Please share this information with your family and friends so that more people will read it so that they are free from products that are not halal…hopefully it will be useful…
berita_id: Pada 2012 kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi sampai MUI mengeluarkan fatwa yang dilarang menggunakan sikat bulu babi, tetapi baru -baru ini, informasi tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah muncul.Info untuk Anda Muslim untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan-bahan dari non-halal.Ayo, periksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi dengan kata lain bulu babi!Jadi periksa paket sikat gigi Anda lagi saat Anda membelinya.Demikian pula pada sikat (penyebar roti), umumnya mencatat "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% china bristle".Apa bulu sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari? Bulu plastik atau babi? Langkah -langkah untuk memeriksa: Perhatikan bungkusnya, jika terbuat dari bulu, maka itu terbuat dari landak laut. Tolong bakar bulu, jika baunya seperti bau rambut yang terbakar, itu berarti tidak ada yang aman.Diterima, dan neraka lebih layak (Hadis).Seperti ayam panggang, roti, kue, serta berbagai daging panggang atau makanan laut.Sementara sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, membersihkan pakaian, dan menggosok lantai.Tahukah Anda, dari mana kuas & kuas yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar itu dari babi!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia biasanya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor diproduksi menggunakan landak laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Bagi umat Islam, penggunaan landak laut yang jernih adalah Haram.Tidak ada probabilitas apa pun yang kecil, materi dari babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi serta untuk aplikasi.(Istilah ini adalah sikat rambut babi/babi/babi/bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat, seperti pasar, toko lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, alat make up & toko salon, toko online, dll.Apakah Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk di bawah ini?Ada kuas lukisan, sikat cat dinding, kuas make up, sikat rambut, kuas tukang cukur/tukang cukur, sikat pakaian, dll.AWAS!Tips Hindari menggunakan kuas dan tulang sikat: 1. Gunakan sikat & sikat sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Ada kuas cat dinding dan sikat makan, yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.2. Gunakan alternatif lain kecuali kuas.Misalnya, cat rol untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk makeup, dan pisau & spatula untuk makanan berminyak.3. Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang proses memasak dan membersihkan peralatan menggunakan sikat babi.4. Karakteristik sikat sikat babi, ketika dibakar akan memberikan daging guncang lainnya seperti lainnya.5. Biasanya sikat sikat babi dijual dalam warna putih & hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkannya dan kemudian mewarnai mereka, sehingga mereka terlihat seperti rambut binatang lainnya.(Dan) referensi: Realitas di lapangan & beberapa literatur di internet.Silakan bagikan informasi ini dengan keluarga dan teman -teman Anda sehingga lebih banyak orang akan membacanya sehingga mereka bebas dari produk yang tidak halal ... semoga akan berguna ...

berita: The rampant circulation of "DOT" candy which is suspected to contain drugs was apparently circulating in Depok City. Even the circulation of candy with a container resembling a baby's milk bottle has been circulating in a number of schools. One of the elementary students in the Sukmajaya area, YZ admitted that he had bought the candy several times before being banned. "The shape is like a dot, the taste is sweet, in the bottle there is a sour taste powder," YZ said to Radar Depok (Pojoksatu.id Group), Friday (10/03/2017). YZ continued, candy is usually sold by accessories sellers with carts. However, at this time the merchant was nowhere to be seen at the school. "Usually, they are sold by the tongs, now they're not there. I haven't seen them in a long time. The last one was in fourth grade, about a year ago," said YZ. Another student with the initials DM admitted that he had tried 'Dot' candy. The candy at the top which is red and a combination of orange, pink and white powder, makes him interested in buying candy. "I've tried it, so there's powder in the bottle, then the candy is red. If you mix it all up, it's sour, but it doesn't make you addicted, it's normal. Usually it's also at the tongs, agents are also available, I've seen it," said DM to Radar Depok (Pojoksatu.id Group). Meanwhile, Yadi, one of the school canteen guards, revealed that he once sold 'DOT' candy. Although currently banned because it is indicated to contain drugs, he is no longer selling initial the candy. "Last year I was selling it, now I'm not selling it anymore, it's said in the news it's no longer allowed so I'm not selling it anymore. There were children who bought it. At that time, many were looking for it too, but now they may have forgotten, right? " he said. Not only at school, even this candy was sold by food agents around Depok. When met separately, one of the food agents in the Tapos area with the initials T said his shop once sold 'DOT' candy. However, at this time the shop is no longer selling it.
berita_id: Sirkulasi yang merajalela dari permen "titik" yang diduga mengandung obat tampaknya beredar di Depok City.Bahkan sirkulasi permen dengan wadah yang menyerupai botol susu bayi telah beredar di sejumlah sekolah.Salah satu siswa sekolah dasar di daerah Sukmajaya, YZ mengakui bahwa ia telah membeli permen beberapa kali sebelum dilarang."Bentuknya seperti titik, rasanya manis, dalam botol ada bubuk rasa asam," kata Yz kepada Radar Depok (kelompok pojoksatu.id), Jumat (10/03/2017).YZ melanjutkan, permen biasanya dijual oleh penjual aksesoris dengan gerobak.Namun, pada saat ini pedagang tidak terlihat di sekolah."Biasanya, mereka dijual oleh penjepit, sekarang mereka tidak ada di sana. Saya sudah lama tidak melihatnya. Yang terakhir berada di kelas empat, sekitar setahun yang lalu," kata YZ.Siswa lain dengan inisial DM mengakui bahwa ia telah mencoba permen 'Dot'.Permen di bagian atas yang berwarna merah dan kombinasi bubuk oranye, merah muda dan putih, membuatnya tertarik untuk membeli permen."Saya sudah mencobanya, jadi ada bubuk dalam botol, maka permennya merah. Jika Anda mencampur semuanya, itu asam, tetapi itu tidak membuat Anda kecanduan, itu normal. Biasanya itu juga di penjepit, agen juga tersedia, saya pernah melihatnya," kata DM ke Radar Depok (Pojoksatu.id Group).Sementara itu, Yadi, salah satu penjaga kantin sekolah, mengungkapkan bahwa ia pernah menjual permen 'Dot'.Meskipun saat ini dilarang karena diindikasikan mengandung obat -obatan, ia tidak lagi menjual permen awal."Tahun lalu saya menjualnya, sekarang saya tidak menjualnya lagi, dikatakan dalam berita itu tidak lagi diizinkan jadi saya tidak menjualnya lagi. Ada anak -anak yang membelinya. Pada saat itu, banyak yang mencarinya juga, tetapi sekarang mereka mungkin lupa, kan?" Katanya.Tidak hanya di sekolah, bahkan permen ini dijual oleh agen makanan di sekitar Depok.Ketika bertemu secara terpisah, salah satu agen makanan di area tapos dengan inisial t mengatakan tokonya pernah menjual permen 'titik'.Namun, saat ini toko tidak lagi menjualnya.

berita: When people face the fact that medical treatment, especially for serious illnesses, costs a lot, then alternative medicine is really an option. In addition to affordable costs, alternative medicine does not require medical actions which for some people are very scary, such as having to undergo surgery.
