Now there are many treatments that rely on eastern medicine, one of which is Drs H Ahmad Baraas, MSi on Jl Nuansa Timur Number 6, Nuansa Kori Housing, Ubung Kaja, Denpasar. The man who is also a journalist opens a practice for the treatment of various diseases by using the methods of pulling needles, acupuncture, cupping, traditional herbal medicine, electro-magnetic and bio-electric. Baraas studied alternative medicine a dozen years ago. At first he learned acupressure or massage with his hands, but his skills were only used to help his fellow journalists whose health was disturbed when they were doing the coverage together. Passionate about helping others and wanting to provide maximum therapeutic results, he then learned how to treat with cupping, treating diseases by stimulating nerve points. The man who was born in Jembrana, Bali was also dissatisfied with his therapeutic knowledge, so he pursued treatment using acupuncture, electro-magnetic and bio-electric methods. The electro magnetic technique treatment method is also known as the needle pull technique. Baraas studied acupuncture, needle pulling and bio-electricity from a therapist from Sumenep, Madura, Drs Firman Taufiq. It was from the caretaker of Padepokan Citra Sumekar that he also learned about Madurese medicines and concoctions. Baraas mixes some of the ingredients, combined with Balinese herbs and spices. In between his busy schedule as a journalist, Baraas always spends his time treating people who need help for therapy and he usually treats patients after carrying out his reporting duties as a journalist. The results of the therapy are recognized by a number of patients with maq pain, stomach ulcers, hemorrhoids, hernias, prostate, knee pain, high blood pressure, stroke, insomnia, sprains or wrong veins, chronic tingling, diabetes and others. For minor ailments such as fever, flu or headaches, usually with a spread of the herb on the head, the patient can be cured in a few moments. However, I am only an intermediary, God heals, he said. Talking about his experience being treated by Baraas, H Martiono (65) stated that he had previously been treated in a number of places, including receiving acupuncture therapy for a week at an alternative medicine clinic in Jakarta. But again, the trouble sleeping disorder can't go away. But when he tried to go to Baraas for treatment, he only had one therapy, now he can sleep for five hours a day. Previously I only slept an hour a day, from 11 pm to 12 pm. I've had that for years. Alhamdulillah, now I can sleep until dawn, said the owner of the electrical installation business. Another patient, Suarjaya (35), said he would take one of his family members to Baraas' residence, which is where the treatment is given. But he admitted that he had to call first, because he wanted to come during the day. The man from Karangasem Regency, Bali admitted that treatment at night was hit by a long distance, while the Karangasem-Denpasar transportation, which was about 90 kilometers away, was still not smooth. suarjaya narrates that he accidentally met Baraas. At that time he had a fever and caught influenza and Baraas who was nearby offered to help and it turned out that by rubbing a mixture on his head, his fever could be cured. That's why I will take my sick family for treatment to Haji Baraas, he said. The method of treatment given by Baraas is indeed different from other alternative treatments. He combines various methods, ranging from reflexology, cupping, gurah, needling, pulling the needle to bio-electric. This is realized because each method has weaknesses to treat patients with certain diseases. By using the combined method, the various weaknesses can be covered with each other. For example, for some diseases, it is not enough to only be treated with acupuncture, but also with cupping and needle pulling. masses Thus, the treatment can really reach the source of the disease completely, he said.
berita_id: Ketika orang menghadapi kenyataan bahwa perawatan medis, terutama untuk penyakit serius, harganya banyak, maka obat alternatif benar -benar menjadi pilihan.Selain biaya yang terjangkau, pengobatan alternatif tidak memerlukan tindakan medis yang bagi sebagian orang sangat menakutkan, seperti harus menjalani operasi.Sekarang ada banyak perawatan yang mengandalkan pengobatan timur, salah satunya adalah Drs H Ahmad Baraas, MSI di Jl Nuansa Timur Nomor 6, Nuansa Kori Housing, Ubung Kaja, Denpasar.Pria yang juga seorang jurnalis membuka praktik untuk pengobatan berbagai penyakit dengan menggunakan metode menarik jarum, akupunktur, cupping, obat herbal tradisional, elektro-magnetik dan bio-listrik.Baraas mempelajari kedokteran alternatif selusin tahun yang lalu.Pada awalnya ia belajar akupresur atau pijatan dengan tangannya, tetapi keterampilannya hanya digunakan untuk membantu sesama jurnalis yang kesehatannya terganggu ketika mereka melakukan liputan bersama.Bergairah membantu orang lain dan ingin memberikan hasil terapi maksimum, ia kemudian belajar bagaimana merawat dengan bekam, mengobati penyakit dengan merangsang titik saraf.Pria yang lahir di Jembrana, Bali juga tidak puas dengan pengetahuan terapeutiknya, jadi ia mengejar pengobatan menggunakan metode akupunktur, elektro-magnetik dan bio-listrik.Metode perawatan teknik magnetik elektro juga dikenal sebagai teknik tarik jarum.Baraas mempelajari akupunktur, penarik jarum dan bio-listrik dari terapis dari Sumenep, Madura, Drs Firman Taufiq.Dari penjaga Padepokan Citra Sumekar, ia juga belajar tentang obat -obatan dan ramuan Madure.Baraas mencampur beberapa bahan, dikombinasikan dengan ramuan dan rempah -rempah Bali.Di antara jadwalnya yang sibuk sebagai jurnalis, Baraas selalu menghabiskan waktunya merawat orang -orang yang membutuhkan bantuan untuk terapi dan dia biasanya merawat pasien setelah melaksanakan tugas pelaporannya sebagai jurnalis.Hasil terapi dikenali oleh sejumlah pasien dengan nyeri MAQ, bisul lambung, wasir, hernia, prostat, nyeri lutut, tekanan darah tinggi, stroke, insomnia, keseleo atau vena yang salah, kesemutan kronis, diabetes dan lainnya.Untuk penyakit ringan seperti demam, flu atau sakit kepala, biasanya dengan penyebaran ramuan di kepala, pasien dapat disembuhkan dalam beberapa saat.Namun, saya hanya perantara, Tuhan menyembuhkan, katanya.Berbicara tentang pengalamannya dirawat oleh Baraas, H Martiono (65) menyatakan bahwa ia sebelumnya telah dirawat di sejumlah tempat, termasuk menerima terapi akupunktur selama seminggu di klinik kedokteran alternatif di Jakarta.Tapi sekali lagi, gangguan tidur masalah tidak bisa hilang.Tetapi ketika dia mencoba pergi ke Baraas untuk perawatan, dia hanya menjalani satu terapi, sekarang dia bisa tidur selama lima jam sehari.Sebelumnya saya hanya tidur satu jam sehari, dari jam 11 malam sampai jam 12 siang.Saya sudah memilikinya selama bertahun -tahun.Alhamdulillah, sekarang saya bisa tidur sampai fajar, kata pemilik bisnis instalasi listrik.Pasien lain, Suarjaya (35), mengatakan dia akan membawa salah satu anggota keluarganya ke kediaman Baraas, yang merupakan tempat perawatan diberikan.Tetapi dia mengakui bahwa dia harus menelepon terlebih dahulu, karena dia ingin datang pada siang hari.Pria dari Kabupaten Karangasem, Bali mengakui bahwa perawatan di malam hari dilanda jarak jauh, sementara transportasi Karangasem-Denpasar, yang berjarak sekitar 90 kilometer, masih tidak halus.Suarjaya menceritakan bahwa dia secara tidak sengaja bertemu Baraas.Pada waktu itu dia mengalami demam dan menangkap influenza dan baraas yang di dekatnya ditawarkan untuk membantu dan ternyata dengan menggosok campuran di kepalanya, demamnya bisa disembuhkan.Itu sebabnya saya akan membawa keluarga saya yang sakit untuk perawatan ke Haji Baraas, katanya.Metode pengobatan yang diberikan oleh Baraas memang berbeda dari perawatan alternatif lainnya.Dia menggabungkan berbagai metode, mulai dari refleksi, bekam, gurah, tusuk jarum, menarik jarum ke bio-listrik.Ini direalisasikan karena setiap metode memiliki kelemahan untuk mengobati pasien dengan penyakit tertentu.Dengan menggunakan metode gabungan, berbagai kelemahan dapat ditutupi satu sama lain.Misalnya, untuk beberapa penyakit, tidak cukup hanya diobati dengan akupunktur, tetapi juga dengan bekam dan penarikan jarum.Misa dengan demikian, pengobatan ini benar -benar dapat mencapai sumber penyakit sepenuhnya, katanya.

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia will increase drastically to reach Rp. 500 million per month or Rp. 6.6 billion per year. This increase will occur if the Draft Government Regulation on Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities for Civil Servants is actually ratified. amounting to 96,000 points, found the figure of Rp 553 million According to Article 2 of Law number 7 of president 1978, the president's salary is 6 times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia (Chairman of the DPR, MA, and BPK). salary of IDR 5040000 per month Thus, the basic salary of the president is IDR 30240000 per month Presidential Decree 68/2001 also states that the allowance for the position of the President is IDR 32500000 So the total money received by the president each month is IDR 62740000 or IDR 752880000 per year According to the palace, this amount has not changed since 2001 The total salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia is relatively small compared to the leaders of the major countries in the world, the salary of President of the Republic of Indonesia Jokowi's identity is only higher than PRC President Xi Jinping who is paid USD 20,500 or IDR 283 million per year While the President of the United States Donald Trump has the smallest income, which is USD 1 per year Of course this is Trump's personal request. USD 3 billion University of Indonesia (UI) public policy observer Lina Miftahul Jannah said it was very natural for the President to have a very large income index. So the income received by the number one person in Indonesia was very high. "It makes sense too," she explained. At the same time as head of government, the duties, responsibilities, and risks of a President are very large. So according to him, it is not natural for an official to be paid a salary from the State Budget, whose salary is greater than the President. the palace has not been able to comment further It is a salary increase scheme for civil servants, the president and other state officials. Presidential spokesman Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo said his party had not received sufficient information about it. "I haven't received the information. The KPK leadership has also not been able to confirm the progress of the RPP
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis untuk mencapai RP.500 juta per bulan atau RP.6,6 miliar per tahun.Peningkatan ini akan terjadi jika rancangan peraturan pemerintah tentang gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas untuk pegawai negeri sebenarnya diratifikasi.Jumlah 96.000 poin, menemukan angka Rp 553 juta menurut Pasal 2 Hukum Nomor 7 dari Presiden 1978, gaji presiden adalah 6 kali gaji dasar pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia (ketua DPR, MA, dan BPK).Gaji IDR 5040000 per bulan dengan demikian, gaji dasar presiden adalah IDR 30240000 per bulan Keputusan Presiden 68/2001 juga menyatakan bahwa tunjangan untuk posisi presiden adalah IDR 32500000 sehingga total uang yang diterima oleh Presiden setiap bulan adalah PALACE Sejak 2001 yang tidak diubah sejak itu, No. IDR 752880000 per tahun, NOTE PALACE, PALACE, PALOCE Sejak 2001 atau IDR 75880000 per tahun, NOW IDR Sejak 2001 atau IDR 75280000 per tahun menurut PALACE, PALACE, PALACE, Sejak 2001 atau IDR 75880000 per tahun menurut PALACE, NOW IDR Sejak 2001 atau IDR NOW IDR Sejak 2001, NO NOW IDR Sejak 2001,Indonesia relatif kecil dibandingkan dengan para pemimpin negara -negara utama di dunia, gaji Presiden Republik Republik Indonesia Jokowi hanya lebih tinggi dari Presiden RRC Xi Jinping yang dibayar USD 20.500 atau IDR 283 juta per tahun ini sementara Presiden Amerika Serikat Donald memiliki pendapatan terkecil, yang merupakan USD 1 per tahun ini adalah kursus ini.USD 3 miliar University of Indonesia (UI) Pengamat Kebijakan Publik Lina Miftahul Jannah mengatakan sangat wajar bagi presiden untuk memiliki indeks pendapatan yang sangat besar.Jadi pendapatan yang diterima oleh orang nomor satu di Indonesia sangat tinggi."Itu juga masuk akal," jelasnya.Pada saat yang sama dengan kepala pemerintahan, tugas, tanggung jawab, dan risiko presiden sangat besar.Jadi menurutnya, tidak wajar bagi seorang pejabat untuk dibayar gaji dari anggaran negara, yang gajinya lebih besar dari presiden.Istana belum dapat berkomentar lebih lanjut bahwa ini adalah skema kenaikan gaji untuk pegawai negeri, presiden dan pejabat negara lainnya.Juru bicara presiden Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo mengatakan partainya belum menerima informasi yang cukup tentang hal itu."Saya belum menerima informasi. Kepemimpinan KPK juga tidak dapat mengkonfirmasi kemajuan RPP

berita: Head of the Press, Media and Information Bureau of the Presidential Secretariat (Setpres) Bey Machmudin denied that reports that President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) had received a salary increase were not true. Law Number 7 of 1978 express concerning Financial/Administrative Rights of the President and Vice President and Former Presidents and Vice Presidents, said Bey in a press release, Wednesday (28/6/2017) afternoon. The Presidential Decree states, in Article 2 of the Law, it is stated that the basic salary of the President is six times the highest basic salary of an official in Indonesia other than the President and Vice President. According to Government Regulation No. 75 of 2000, the highest basic salary of a state official (Chairman of the DPR, MA, BPK) is Thus, the amount of the President's Basic Salary per month is six times the salary, which is Rp. 30240000. Meanwhile, the Vice President's Basic Salary is four times that of the salary, which is Rp. 20160000, explained Bey. According to Bey, the Vice President every month, in accordance with Presidential Decree No. 68/2001, which is Rp. 32500000 for the President and Rp. 22000000 for the Vice-President. Thus, the amount of income received by the President and Vice President has not changed since 2001, said Bey.
berita_id: Kepala Biro Pers, Media dan Informasi Sekretariat Presiden (Setpres) Bey Machmudin membantah bahwa laporan bahwa Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) telah menerima kenaikan gaji tidak benar.Hukum Nomor 7 dari 1978 Express tentang hak keuangan/administrasi presiden dan wakil presiden dan mantan presiden dan wakil presiden, kata Bey dalam siaran pers, Rabu (28/6/2017) sore.Dekrit presiden menyatakan, dalam Pasal 2 hukum, dinyatakan bahwa gaji dasar presiden enam kali lipat gaji dasar tertinggi dari seorang pejabat di Indonesia selain presiden dan wakil presiden.Menurut Peraturan Pemerintah No. 75 tahun 2000, gaji dasar tertinggi dari seorang pejabat negara (ketua DPR, MA, BPK) dengan demikian, jumlah gaji pokok presiden per bulan adalah enam kali gaji, yaitu RP.30240000. Sementara itu, gaji dasar Wakil Presiden adalah empat kali lipat dari gaji, yaitu RP.20160000, jelas Bey.Menurut Bey, wakil presiden setiap bulan, sesuai dengan Keputusan Presiden No. 68/2001, yang merupakan Rp.32500000 untuk Presiden dan RP.22000000 untuk Wakil Presiden.Dengan demikian, jumlah pendapatan yang diterima oleh Presiden dan Wakil Presiden tidak berubah sejak tahun 2001, kata Bey.

berita: In 2012 we were shocked by the emergence of brushes or brushes made of some boar bristles until the MUI issued a fatwa that it is forbidden to use a pig bristle brush, but recently, information about toothbrushes made from pig bristles has emerged. Info for you Muslims to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use ingredients from non-halal. Come on, check the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair in other words Pig Fur! So check your toothbrush package again when you buy it. Similarly on the brush (bread spreader), Generally noted "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". "What are your toothbrush bristles made of? Plastic or Pig Bristle? Steps to check: Watch the wrap, if it's made of bristles, then it's made of sea urchin. Please burn the bristles, if it smells like the smell of burning hair, it means it's from sea urchins. However, if it melts and becomes hard, it means it is made of plastic and is safe to use. Possibility of using the forbidden: Worship is not accepted, prayer is not accepted, and hell is more worthy (hadith). Save ourselves and our loved ones. " In everyday life, we use various types of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint homes, grease cake tins, to smear food. Such as grilled chicken, bread, cakes, as well as a variety of grilled or grilled meat and seafood. While the brush is useful when combing hair, cleaning hair at a salon or barbershop, cleaning clothes, and scrubbing floors. Do you know, what do the brushes & brushes you use come from? Most likely it is FROM PIGS! Brushes supplied in Indonesia usually come from China. Imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars that have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. For Muslims, the use of clear sea urchins is HARAM. No in all probability matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption as well as for application. (the term is PIG/BOAR/HOG/BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places, SUCH AS MARKETS, PAINTING TOOLS SHOP, BUILDING MATERIALS STORE, MAKE UP TOOLS & SALON SHOP, ONLINE STORE, ETC. ARE YOU FAMILIAR WITH THE MULTIPLE FORMS BELOW? THERE ARE PAINTING BRUSH, WALL PAINT BRUSH, MAKE UP BRUSH, HAIR BRUSH, BARBER/BARBER BRUSH, CLOTHING BRUSH, ETC. BEWARE! TIPS AVOID USE BRUSHS AND BONES BRUSHS: 1. USE 100% SYNTHETIC BRUSH & BRUSH, SUCH AS NYLON. There are wall paint brushes and feeding brushes, which are slightly more expensive. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. 2. USE OTHER ALTERNATIVES BUT THE BRUSH. For example, paint rollers for painting, sponges & cotton buds for makeup, and knives & spatulas for greasing food. 3. BEWARE OF FOOD THAT THE PROCESS OF COOKING AND CLEANING Utensils USING A PIG BRUSH. 4. CHARACTERISTICS OF PIG BRUSH BRUSH, WHEN BURNED WILL GIVE A SPECIFIC OTHER LIKE ROCKED MEAT. 5. USUALLY PIG BRUSH BRUSHS SOLD IN WHITE & BLACK COLORS. However, producers may process sea urchins by bleaching them and then coloring them, so that they look like other animal hairs. (AND) Reference: Reality in the field & some literature on the internet. Please share this information with your family and friends so that more people will read it so that they are free from products that are not halal…hopefully it will be useful…
berita_id: Pada 2012 kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi sampai MUI mengeluarkan fatwa yang dilarang menggunakan sikat bulu babi, tetapi baru -baru ini, informasi tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah muncul.Info untuk Anda Muslim untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan-bahan dari non-halal.Ayo, periksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi dengan kata lain bulu babi!Jadi periksa paket sikat gigi Anda lagi saat Anda membelinya.Demikian pula pada sikat (penyebar roti), umumnya mencatat "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% china bristle".Apa bulu sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari? Bulu plastik atau babi? Langkah -langkah untuk memeriksa: Perhatikan bungkusnya, jika terbuat dari bulu, maka itu terbuat dari landak laut. Tolong bakar bulu, jika baunya seperti bau rambut yang terbakar, itu berarti tidak ada yang aman.Diterima, dan neraka lebih layak (Hadis).Seperti ayam panggang, roti, kue, serta berbagai daging panggang atau makanan laut.Sementara sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, membersihkan pakaian, dan menggosok lantai.Tahukah Anda, dari mana kuas & kuas yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar itu dari babi!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia biasanya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor diproduksi menggunakan landak laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Bagi umat Islam, penggunaan landak laut yang jernih adalah Haram.Tidak ada probabilitas apa pun yang kecil, materi dari babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi serta untuk aplikasi.(Istilah ini adalah sikat rambut babi/babi/babi/bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat, seperti pasar, toko lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, alat make up & toko salon, toko online, dll.Apakah Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk di bawah ini?Ada kuas lukisan, sikat cat dinding, kuas make up, sikat rambut, kuas tukang cukur/tukang cukur, sikat pakaian, dll.AWAS!Tips Hindari menggunakan kuas dan tulang sikat: 1. Gunakan sikat & sikat sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Ada kuas cat dinding dan sikat makan, yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.2. Gunakan alternatif lain kecuali kuas.Misalnya, cat rol untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk makeup, dan pisau & spatula untuk makanan berminyak.3. Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang proses memasak dan membersihkan peralatan menggunakan sikat babi.4. Karakteristik sikat sikat babi, ketika dibakar akan memberikan daging guncang lainnya seperti lainnya.5. Biasanya sikat sikat babi dijual dalam warna putih & hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkannya dan kemudian mewarnai mereka, sehingga mereka terlihat seperti rambut binatang lainnya.(Dan) referensi: Realitas di lapangan & beberapa literatur di internet.Silakan bagikan informasi ini dengan keluarga dan teman -teman Anda sehingga lebih banyak orang akan membacanya sehingga mereka bebas dari produk yang tidak halal ... semoga akan berguna ...

berita: All Muslims who read this article need to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush brand. Recently, one type of dental cleaner has been found that contains non-halal ingredients. The material is known to contain sea urchins and is used as an ingredient in the manufacture of toothbrushes. To find out whether the toothbrush contains the forbidden ingredients or not is easy. Check the packaging and abound look for the words 'BRISTLE'. If the material is contained in the package, it means that the manufacturer has used pig bristles as one of the ingredients in the toothbrush. So it's best to re-check the packaging of the goods you buy and identify the names of haram ingredients which are usually disguised to trick consumers. The term Bristle means Pig Hair or sea urchins. In addition to toothbrushes, Bristle ingredients are also found in bread brushes (bread spreaders). The writing form is usually different, sometimes just 'Bristle', sometimes 'Pure Bristle' or '100% China Bristle'. Avoid using ingredients that Bristle is made of. Spread this information to other family and friends so that more people know and avoid this non-halal product.
berita_id: Semua Muslim yang membaca artikel ini harus lebih berhati -hati dalam memilih merek sikat gigi.Baru-baru ini, satu jenis pembersih gigi telah ditemukan yang mengandung bahan-bahan non-halal.Bahan ini diketahui mengandung bulu babi dan digunakan sebagai bahan dalam pembuatan sikat gigi.Untuk mengetahui apakah sikat gigi mengandung bahan terlarang atau tidak mudah.Periksa kemasannya dan lihat kata -kata 'bulu'.Jika bahan terkandung dalam paket, itu berarti bahwa pabrikan telah menggunakan bulu babi sebagai salah satu bahan di sikat gigi.Jadi yang terbaik adalah memeriksa ulang kemasan barang yang Anda beli dan mengidentifikasi nama-nama bahan haram yang biasanya menyamar untuk menipu konsumen.Istilah bulu berarti rambut babi atau landak laut.Selain sikat gigi, bahan -bahan bulu juga ditemukan dalam sikat roti (penyebar roti).Bentuk penulisan biasanya berbeda, kadang -kadang hanya 'bulu', kadang -kadang 'bulu murni' atau '100% china bristle'.Hindari menggunakan bahan -bahan yang terbuat dari bulu.Sebarkan informasi ini ke keluarga dan teman-teman lain sehingga lebih banyak orang tahu dan hindari produk non-halal ini.

berita: People are shocked by toothbrush products that use pig bristles as the basic material used to clean our teeth every day. The use of the product refers to the writing in English, namely bristles on the packaging. As explained on the Wikipedia site, bristles products are obtained from pig derivatives in the form of feathers. These bristles are often used by industry as a cleaning tool for teeth, toilet brushes, household cleaning tools. The use of pig body parts, including the fur, is forbidden in Islam. As stated by the Chairman of the Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta said, if it is true that the toothbrush is made of pig bristles, the toothbrush is haram. "In Al Surah Al Maidah verse 3 it is explained that derivatives from pigs are haram. We will explore this prohibition, really from sea urchins or not," he said via cellular, Monday (7/3/2016) He added, if proven MUI will publish to the public so as not to use the toothbrush. In addition, MUI will withdraw the product from the market. Armed with this information, the Tribune then traced the written report truth of the use of sea urchins in dental cleaning products. As found in the minimarket on Jalan Denai, the toothbrush brand Or** * is clearly made of bristles. The product packaging clearly explains the product, "Super thin Bristles". Meanwhile, regarding this, the Medan City Health Service through the Secretary of the North Sumatra Health Office, Afwan Lubis, is not sure about the existence of a toothbrush made of pig bristles. "I don't think it's possible. But what about it? We can comment if there is a laboratory test first. Currently there is no laboratory test," he said via cellular, Monday (7/3/2016) He added that laboratory tests were carried out if there were reports from the public regarding the boar bristle toothbrush. If it really contains sea urchins, then it should not be circulated because there are elements that are not halal.
berita_id: Orang -orang terkejut dengan produk sikat gigi yang menggunakan bulu babi sebagai bahan dasar yang digunakan untuk membersihkan gigi kita setiap hari.Penggunaan produk mengacu pada penulisan dalam bahasa Inggris, yaitu meremehkan kemasan.Seperti yang dijelaskan di situs Wikipedia, produk Bristles diperoleh dari turunan babi dalam bentuk bulu.Bulu -bulu ini sering digunakan oleh industri sebagai alat pembersih untuk gigi, kuas toilet, alat pembersih rumah tangga.Penggunaan bagian tubuh babi, termasuk bulu, dilarang dalam Islam.Seperti yang dinyatakan oleh ketua Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta berkata, jika benar bahwa sikat gigi terbuat dari bulu babi, sikat gigi adalah haram."Dalam Al Surah Al Maidah, ayat 3 dijelaskan bahwa turunan dari babi adalah Haram. Kami akan mengeksplorasi larangan ini, benar -benar dari bulu babi atau tidak," katanya melalui seluler, Senin (7/3/2016) ia menambahkan, jika MUI yang terbukti akan diterbitkan kepada publik agar tidak menggunakan sikat gigi.Selain itu, MUI akan menarik produk dari pasar.Berbekal informasi ini, Tribune kemudian melacak laporan tertulis kebenaran tentang penggunaan bulu babi dalam produk pembersih gigi.Seperti yang ditemukan di Minimarket di Jalan Denai, merek sikat gigi atau *** jelas terbuat dari bulu.Kemasan produk dengan jelas menjelaskan produk, "bulu super tipis".Sementara itu, mengenai hal ini, Layanan Kesehatan Kota Medan melalui Sekretaris Kantor Kesehatan Sumatra Utara, Afwan Lubis, tidak yakin tentang keberadaan sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi."Saya tidak berpikir itu mungkin. Tapi bagaimana dengan itu? Kita bisa berkomentar jika ada tes laboratorium terlebih dahulu. Saat ini tidak ada tes laboratorium," katanya melalui Cellular, Senin (7/3/2016) dia menambahkan bahwa tes laboratorium dilakukan jika ada laporan dari publik mengenai sikat gigi bulu babi.Jika benar -benar mengandung bulu babi, maka itu tidak boleh diedarkan karena ada elemen yang tidak halal.

berita: A riot occurred at the Brimob Mako Prison, Kelapa Dua, Depok, on Friday afternoon, November 10, 2017 News of the riot mako was heard outside the prison walls because it was recorded in a video that went viral on social media shortly after the riot took place. The detainees were reported to have been damaged by being broken into by angry detainees, and some of the glass and windows were also reported to have been damaged. The police denied reports that the riot was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by the officers on duty at the detention center. four cellphones belonging to prisoners of terrorism cases Luckily the riot didn't last long The guard immediately coordinated with the Brimob Unit to defuse tensions It's conducive, the residents have calmed down, said Head of the National Police Headquarters, Kombes Martinus Sitompul via text message, Saturday, 11 November 2017 Here are the facts -collected facts by Criminology in the riot Occurred in the Block of Terrorist Detainees The riot that occurred at the Brimob Mako Rutan, Kelapa Dua, Depok on Friday afternoon, November 10, 2017 at around 1600 WIB, occurred in the terrorist detainee block. It started with an inspection carried out by the Rutan guards on goods and reading books in the detention cells occupied by prisoners of terrorist cases in block C. The protest because of the inspection then spread to block B. Ricuh Triggered by Mobile Phone Raids. It was rumored that the riot was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by the prison guards during the conduct of the crime. However, this was denied by the police, the Head of the National Police Headquarters, Kombes Martinus Sitompul, said that it was not true that there was a throwing of the Koran by the guard officer. find four mili cell phones The convicts of terrorism cases occupying block C, namely Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam, and Jumali. The confiscation of cell phones was what Martinus said was the trigger for the riots. Prisoners' cells were destroyed. The anger of the detainees can be seen from breaking down cell doors, breaking glass and windows. Even a table tennis board has become the target of inmates' tantrums. In a video uploaded on social media that depicts the atmosphere in a detention cell during a riot, broken glass can be seen scattered and the cell door was broken down There was an ISIS flag rioting in the terrorist detention block at the Mako Brimob detention center. It was recorded in a video that went viral on social media. In addition to showing the situation in the detention cell when the rioting occurred, two black ISIS flags were attached to the wall. Viral detention cell on Social Media al The incident of the riot in the terrorist detention block of the Mako Brimob detention center was widely broadcast because it was recorded in a video that went viral on social media. Several accounts on social media such as Aswaja Garis Lurus, Lone Wolf, and Uky449MuslimCyber ​​uploaded the video. In less than 24 hours, The video has been watched by more than 10 thousand visitors and has been distributed more than 1000 times
berita_id: Kerusuhan terjadi di penjara Brimob Mako, Kelapa Dua, Depok, pada hari Jumat sore, 10 November 2017 Berita kerusuhan Mako terdengar di luar tembok penjara karena direkam dalam sebuah video yang menjadi viral di media sosial tak lama setelah kerusuhan itu terjadi.Para tahanan dilaporkan telah rusak karena dipecah oleh tahanan yang marah, dan beberapa kaca dan jendela juga dilaporkan telah rusak.Polisi membantah laporan bahwa kerusuhan itu dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh petugas yang bertugas di pusat penahanan.Empat ponsel milik tahanan kasus terorisme yang untungnya kerusuhan itu tidak bertahan lama penjaga segera berkoordinasi dengan unit Brimob untuk meredakan ketegangan yang kondusif, penduduknya telah tenang, kata kepala markas polisi nasional, Kombes yang ditabrak oleh pidana di dalam pidana di dalam pujian di dalam panci, Sabtu, 11 November 2017 di sini adalah fakta -fakta yang dikumpulkan oleh fakta -fakta oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang ditoleksi oleh fakta -fakta yang ditoleksi oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang ditoleksi oleh fakta -fakta yang ditoleksi oleh fakta.Terjadi di Brimob Mako Rutan, Kelapa Dua, Depok pada Jumat sore, 10 November 2017 di sekitar 1600 WIB, terjadi di blok tahanan teroris.Itu dimulai dengan inspeksi yang dilakukan oleh penjaga Rutan tentang barang -barang dan membaca buku -buku di sel -sel penahanan yang ditempati oleh para tahanan kasus teroris di blok C. Protes karena inspeksi kemudian disebarkan untuk memblokir B. ricuh yang dipicu oleh penggerebekan ponsel.Dikabarkan bahwa kerusuhan itu dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga penjara selama melakukan kejahatan.Namun, ini ditolak oleh polisi, kepala markas polisi nasional, Kombes Martinus Sitompul, mengatakan bahwa itu tidak benar bahwa ada lemparan Alquran oleh petugas penjaga.Temukan empat ponsel Mili, narapidana kasus terorisme yang menempati Blok C, yaitu Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam, dan Jumali.Penyitaan ponsel adalah apa yang dikatakan Martinus adalah pemicu kerusuhan.Sel -sel tahanan dihancurkan.Kemarahan tahanan dapat dilihat dari memecah pintu sel, memecahkan kaca dan jendela.Bahkan papan tenis meja telah menjadi target amukan narapidana.Dalam sebuah video yang diunggah di media sosial yang menggambarkan atmosfer di sel penahanan selama kerusuhan, pecahan kaca dapat terlihat tersebar dan pintu sel dipecah ada kerusuhan bendera ISIS di blok penahanan teroris di pusat penahanan Mako Brimob.Itu direkam dalam video yang menjadi viral di media sosial.Selain menunjukkan situasi di sel penahanan ketika kerusuhan terjadi, dua bendera ISIS hitam melekat pada dinding.Sel penahanan viral di media sosial di dekatnya kerusuhan di blok penahanan teroris dari Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob secara luas disiarkan karena direkam dalam sebuah video yang menjadi viral di media sosial.Beberapa akun di media sosial seperti Aswaja Garis Lurus, Lone Wolf, dan UKY449MusLimCyber ​​mengunggah video.Dalam waktu kurang dari 24 jam, video telah ditonton oleh lebih dari 10 ribu pengunjung dan telah didistribusikan lebih dari 1000 kali

berita: Komuniras Reog Ponorogo (KRP) plans to hold a demonstration at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Office on Jalan Pejambon, Central Jakarta, Monday (2/11/2015) tomorrow at 09.30. "Our main visit to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs is to clarify the incident of the Reog Ponorogo property burning at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Southern Philippines," said Deputy Chairperson of the Greater Jakarta electrocution KRP, S Nojeng to Surya, Sunday (1/11/2015). As previously reported, the Reog Ponorogo property which consisted of a sudden peacock, barong and gayor carved with a dragon was burned by the staff of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines on Tuesday (20/10/2015). The reason for the burning is because barong reog, dadak peacock and gayor carved dragon snakes, to exorcise demons and dragon carvings for idols. However, the news circulating in online media was clarified and confirmed on Saturday (30/10/2015) by the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao. The destruction by burning had to be carried out because Ponorogo reog was in a damaged condition and eaten by termites, wrote the Indonesian Consulate General Davao considering the age of reog has existed since 1988. But apart from that, all KRP will still clarify the extent of the truth, and the actual chronology of the events that. We want to solve this problem immediately and don't let the problem drag on. Moreover, Reog Ponorogo has become part of the arts in Indonesia which has gone global, said Nojeng. According to Jojeng, this problem also disturbed friends in the Reog Ponorogo community. Even the reog art community in Ponorogo, East Java itself, as well as outside Jakarta and Ponorogo, many have questioned about the arson incident. According to the man who was born in Tambakbayan, Ponorogo City, he said that there are several things that will be done at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs later, including: Requesting information and clarification as well as the actual chronology of the incident. Placing banners in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs area. and gayor Doing testimony of artist Reog Ponorogo who has performed in Davao in 2007.
berita_id: Komuniras Reog Ponorogo (KRP) berencana untuk mengadakan demonstrasi di Kantor Urusan Luar Negeri di Jalan Pejambon, Jakarta Tengah, Senin (2/11/2015) besok pukul 09.30."Kunjungan utama kami ke Kementerian Luar Negeri adalah untuk mengklarifikasi insiden properti Reog Ponorogo yang terbakar di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina Selatan," kata Wakil Ketua dari Greater Jakarta Electricution KRP, S Nojeng ke Surya, Minggu (1/11/2015).Seperti yang dilaporkan sebelumnya, properti Reog Ponorogo yang terdiri dari merak tiba -tiba, Barong dan Gayor yang diukir dengan naga dibakar oleh staf Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina pada hari Selasa (20/10/2015).Alasan pembakaran adalah karena Barong Reog, Dadak Peacock dan Gayor mengukir naga ular, untuk mengusir setan dan ukiran naga untuk berhala.Namun, berita yang beredar di media online diklarifikasi dan dikonfirmasi pada hari Sabtu (30/10/2015) oleh Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao.Penghancuran oleh Burning harus dilakukan karena Ponorogo Reog dalam kondisi yang rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap, menulis konsulat Indonesia Jenderal Davao mengingat zaman Reog telah ada sejak 1988. Tetapi terlepas dari itu, semua KRP masih akan mengklarifikasi sejauh mana kebenaran, dan kronologi aktual dari peristiwa itu.Kami ingin menyelesaikan masalah ini dengan segera dan tidak membiarkan masalah berlarut -larut.Selain itu, Reog Ponorogo telah menjadi bagian dari seni di Indonesia yang telah menjadi global, kata Nojeng.Menurut Jojeng, masalah ini juga mengganggu teman -teman di komunitas Reog Ponorogo.Bahkan komunitas seni reog di Ponorogo, Java Timur sendiri, serta di luar Jakarta dan Ponorogo, banyak yang mempertanyakan tentang insiden pembakaran.Menurut pria yang lahir di Tambakbayan, Ponorogo City, ia mengatakan bahwa ada beberapa hal yang akan dilakukan di Kementerian Luar Negeri nanti, termasuk: meminta informasi dan klarifikasi serta kronologi aktual dari insiden tersebut.Menempatkan spanduk di wilayah Urusan Luar Negeri.dan Gayor melakukan kesaksian artis Reog Ponorogo yang telah tampil di Davao pada tahun 2007.

berita: It hasn't been a month since its official release and sales, a number of iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus users have started complaining and criticizing Apple for some reason. Most often, these users complain that their iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus bend immediately after being put in their pocket. Reported by the Daily Mail, there are at least a number of iPhone 6 and identification number iPhone 6 Plus users who have experienced this and reported it to Apple and its CEO, Tim Cook via social media while uploading photos of their bent devices. "Hey Tim Cook! Actually I really like my new iPhone 6 Plus, the feature I like the most about this iPhone 6 Plus is the flexibility it bends like this!" one user tweeted. Meanwhile, another user also mentioned that he carried his new iPhone 6 in his pocket and immediately curved it when he took it out. According to him, this is because the materials used are very susceptible to such things. Also read: This New Smartphone Made in North Korea 'Combines' iPhone and Samsung Galaxy "I went to drive and put my iPhone 6 in my pocket, I got off and then sat drinking coffee in the cafe. When I took out my iPhone 6, how surprised I was to see how it was not like it used to be. Disappointing, "said a user named Hanzoh. The size of the iPhone 6 Plus which reaches 5.5 inches with materials made of metal is not as expected. Although only a few have experienced this, the number of users whose iPhone 6 is bent is starting to grow. Of course this is a disappointment for those who have to pay up to tens of millions of rupiah for these devices.
berita_id: Belum satu bulan sejak rilis dan penjualan resminya, sejumlah pengguna iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus sudah mulai mengeluh dan mengkritik Apple karena beberapa alasan.Paling sering, pengguna ini mengeluh bahwa IPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus Bend segera setelah dimasukkan ke dalam saku mereka.Dilaporkan oleh Daily Mail, setidaknya ada sejumlah iPhone 6 dan nomor identifikasi iPhone 6 Plus pengguna yang telah mengalami ini dan melaporkannya ke Apple dan CEO -CEO, Tim Cook melalui media sosial sambil mengunggah foto perangkat bengkok mereka."Hei Tim Cook! Sebenarnya aku sangat suka iPhone 6 Plus baru saya, fitur yang paling saya sukai dari iPhone 6 Plus ini adalah fleksibilitas yang ditekuk seperti ini!"satu pengguna tweeted.Sementara itu, pengguna lain juga menyebutkan bahwa ia membawa iPhone 6 barunya di sakunya dan segera melengkung ketika ia mengeluarkannya.Menurutnya, ini karena bahan yang digunakan sangat rentan terhadap hal -hal seperti itu.Baca juga: Smartphone baru yang dibuat di Korea Utara ini 'menggabungkan' iPhone dan Samsung Galaxy "Saya pergi untuk mengemudi dan meletakkan iPhone 6 saya di saku saya, saya turun dan kemudian duduk minum kopi di kafe. Ketika saya mengeluarkan iPhone 6 saya, betapa terkejutnya saya melihat bagaimana itu tidak seperti dulu. Kecap," kata seorang pengguna bernama Hanzoh.Ukuran iPhone 6 Plus yang mencapai 5,5 inci dengan bahan yang terbuat dari logam tidak seperti yang diharapkan.Meskipun hanya sedikit yang mengalami hal ini, jumlah pengguna yang iPhone 6 sedang bengkok mulai tumbuh.Tentu saja ini mengecewakan bagi mereka yang harus membayar hingga puluhan juta rupiah untuk perangkat ini.

berita: One million Facebook accounts in Indonesia were reportedly leaked, angering the Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara. According to Rudiantara, the government is ready to turn off Facebook access in Indonesia if needed. The one million data on Facebook users in Indonesia was used by Cambridge Analytica. In addition to the leak of Facebook accounts, it had also exacerbated the massacre of the Rohingya in Myanmar. "I made a statement that if I had to shutdown, I would shutdown. So the government has no doubts about it if the facts are sufficient," said Rudiantara at the Presidential Palace Complex, Jakarta, Thursday, April 5 2018. Rudiantara added, in an interview. With international media, Facebook's role in Myanmar has take been recognized by its leader, Mark Zuckerberg. Facebook is used as a medium for spreading hate speech against the ethnic groups who were forced to flee to Bangladesh. Rudiantara said that the Ministry of Communication and Information held a meeting this afternoon with representatives of Facebook in Indonesia. The government will ask for direct clarification regarding the truth about the data leak, as well as the use of Facebook for bad things.
berita_id: Satu juta akun Facebook di Indonesia dilaporkan bocor, membuat marah Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara.Menurut Rudiantara, pemerintah siap untuk mematikan akses Facebook di Indonesia jika diperlukan.Data satu juta pada pengguna Facebook di Indonesia digunakan oleh Cambridge Analytica.Selain kebocoran akun Facebook, itu juga telah memperburuk pembantaian Rohingya di Myanmar."Saya membuat pernyataan bahwa jika saya harus menutup, saya akan menutup. Jadi pemerintah tidak memiliki keraguan tentang hal itu jika faktanya cukup," kata Rudiiantara di kompleks Istana Presiden, Jakarta, Kamis, 5 April 2018. Rudiantara menambahkan, dalam sebuah wawancara.Dengan media internasional, peran Facebook di Myanmar telah diakui oleh pemimpinnya, Mark Zuckerberg.Facebook digunakan sebagai media untuk menyebarkan pidato kebencian terhadap kelompok etnis yang terpaksa melarikan diri ke Bangladesh.Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi mengadakan pertemuan sore ini dengan perwakilan Facebook di Indonesia.Pemerintah akan meminta klarifikasi langsung mengenai kebenaran tentang kebocoran data, serta penggunaan Facebook untuk hal -hal buruk.

berita: Currently the government is preparing a draft government regulation (RPP) on salaries, benefits, and facilities for civil servants. If the RPP is actually ratified, the salary of the president of the Republic of Indonesia will increase drastically. Reaching Rp 500 million per month or Rp 6.6 billion per year. The amount is stated in the RPP material. With a presidential salary index of 96,000 points, the president's salary reaches Rp 553 million. The highest when compared to other high-ranking officials who are paid by the state budget. What is the current salary of the president of the Republic of Indonesia? The government has never released exact figures. However, looking at the regulations regarding the president's salary, the amount is very far from the Rp 500 million figure. according to Article 2 of Law Number 7 of 1978, the president's salary is 6 times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia (chairman of the DPR, MA, and BPK). Meanwhile, in PP No. 75/2000 it is stated that the three officials receive a salary of IDR 5,040,000 per month. Thus, the president's basic salary is Rp. 30,240,000 per month. Presidential Decree No. 68/2001 also states that the amount of allowance for the office of president is Rp. 32,500,000. So, the total money that the president receives every month is IDR 62,740,000 or IDR 752,880,000 per year. According to the palace's statement, that number has not changed since 2001. With this figure, the salary of the president of the Republic of Indonesia is relatively small when compared to the leaders of major countries in the world. Singapore Prime Minister (PM) Lee Hsien Loong's salary was the highest, at USD 2.2 million or equivalent to Rp. 30.3 billion per year. After Lee, there is Doris Leuthard, president of Switzerland, with a salary of USD 437,000 or Rp 6 billion per year. Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Trunbull followed with a salary of USD 403,700 or Rp 5.5 billion per year. President Jokowi's salary is only higher than China's President Xi Jinping of USD 20,500 or IDR 283 million per year. University of Indonesia (UI) public policy observer Lina Miftahul Jannah stated that it is very natural for the president to have a very large income index. Thus, the income received by the number one person in Indonesia is very high. "That makes sense," he said. He explained that as head of state as well as  head of government, the duties, responsibilities, and risks of the president are enormous. Therefore, according to him, it is not natural that the salaries of officials who are paid from the state budget are greater than the president's. He emphasized that it would be dangerous if there were other government officials whose salaries were higher than the president.
berita_id: Saat ini pemerintah sedang mempersiapkan rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) tentang gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas untuk pegawai negeri sipil.Jika RPP sebenarnya diratifikasi, gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis.Mencapai Rp 500 juta per bulan atau RP 6,6 miliar per tahun.Jumlah tersebut dinyatakan dalam bahan RPP.Dengan indeks gaji presiden sebesar 96.000 poin, gaji presiden mencapai Rp 553 juta.Yang tertinggi jika dibandingkan dengan pejabat tinggi lainnya yang dibayar dengan anggaran negara.Berapa gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia saat ini?Pemerintah tidak pernah merilis angka yang tepat.Namun, melihat peraturan tentang gaji presiden, jumlahnya sangat jauh dari angka Rp 500 juta.Menurut Pasal 2 Hukum Nomor 7 tahun 1978, gaji Presiden adalah 6 kali gaji dasar pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia (ketua DPR, MA, dan BPK).Sementara itu, dalam PP No. 75/2000 dinyatakan bahwa ketiga pejabat menerima gaji IDR 5.040.000 per bulan.Dengan demikian, gaji dasar presiden adalah RP.30.240.000 per bulan.Keputusan Presiden No. 68/2001 juga menyatakan bahwa jumlah tunjangan untuk Kantor Presiden adalah RP.32.500.000.Jadi, total uang yang diterima presiden setiap bulan adalah IDR 62.740.000 atau IDR 752.880.000 per tahun.Menurut pernyataan Istana, jumlah itu tidak berubah sejak tahun 2001. Dengan angka ini, gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia relatif kecil jika dibandingkan dengan para pemimpin negara -negara besar di dunia.Gaji Perdana Menteri Singapura (PM) Lee Hsien Loong adalah yang tertinggi, di USD 2,2 juta atau setara dengan RP.30,3 miliar per tahun.Setelah Lee, ada Doris Leuthard, presiden Swiss, dengan gaji USD 437.000 atau Rp 6 miliar per tahun.Perdana Menteri Australia Malcolm Trunbull diikuti dengan gaji USD 403.700 atau RP 5,5 miliar per tahun.Gaji Presiden Jokowi hanya lebih tinggi dari Presiden China Xi Jinping dari USD 20.500 atau IDR 283 juta per tahun.Pengamat Kebijakan Publik University of Indonesia (UI) Lina Miftahul Jannah menyatakan bahwa sangat wajar bagi presiden untuk memiliki indeks pendapatan yang sangat besar.Dengan demikian, pendapatan yang diterima oleh orang nomor satu di Indonesia sangat tinggi."Itu masuk akal," katanya.Dia menjelaskan bahwa sebagai kepala negara serta kepala pemerintahan, tugas, tanggung jawab, dan risiko presiden sangat besar.Oleh karena itu, menurutnya, tidak wajar bahwa gaji pejabat yang dibayar dari anggaran negara lebih besar dari presiden.Dia menekankan bahwa akan berbahaya jika ada pejabat pemerintah lain yang gaji yang gaji lebih tinggi daripada presiden.

berita: tirto.id - Kanisius College held an award night to commemorate its 90th anniversary at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran, North Jakarta, Saturday (11/11). The award was given to five alumni across generations. One of them, the famous pianist, Ananda Sukarlan. In the award, the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan was also present. Anies was also lined up to give a speech. When Anies was giving a speech, Ananda Sukarlan suddenly stood up and immediately walked out of the room. In fact, Ananda had originally received the award with Derianto Kusuma (the founder of Traveloka), Father Magnis Suseno (a Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (a Scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). Ananda's action was followed by hundreds of alumni and other attendees. However, the incident did not last long. After Anies finished giving his speech and left the event, Ananda and a number of alumni who had walked out returned to their seats. Ananda then gave a speech after receiving the award. In his speech, the composer of Rapsodia Nusantara explained his attitude in leaving the room. Ananda criticized the committee for inviting Anies to attend the event. "You have invited someone with values ​​and integrity that are contrary to what we have been taught," Ananda said in a written statement received by Tirto, Monday (11/13/2017). When contacted by the Editor of Tirto, Ananda did not deny the incident and his statement. He explained the chronology of himself leaving the room where the event was taking place. “Just when Anies talked about the development of Jakarta. What kind of building, is Tanah Abang so chaotic. If it's chaotic, it's not development," said Ananda. At that time, according to Ananda, he was sitting in the second row walk of seats. When he stood up and walked to the exit at the back, he admitted, many people saw him. When he walked out, said Ananda, a number of alumni of Kanisius College also followed him. Ananda admitted that he did not invite his friends to go out. However, later, Ananda realized that the figures who came out a lot were his classmates, namely the class of 1986. "I came back in half an hour after Anies left," said Ananda. Ananda reiterated that his attitude was not a form of personal hatred. According to him, the move is a criticism of the committee. However, he didn't care if Anies was offended. "There is no personal grudge. This is a critique to the committee. Why invite someone who gets his position is different from the values ​​taught. Not (hatred) on Anies," said Ananda. This incident was also circulated in a video uploaded on Facebook. However, Governor Anies Baswedan even admitted that he did not know that there was a famous composer who walked out when he gave a speech. Anies revealed that he only found out about the incident after arriving at the office. Anies was relaxed in response to that. "According to Eros Djarot, that does not reflect Kanisius' attitude," said Anies at City Hall, Central Jakarta, Monday afternoon. The former Minister of Education and Culture admitted that he respects differences in attitudes and views. Anies also said that he gave the right to anyone to express themselves in their own way. Anies also mentioned the obligation of a governor to protect his citizens. "If then there is a negative reaction, that's just a bonus," he said.
berita_id: TIRTO.ID - Kanisius College mengadakan malam penghargaan untuk memperingati ulang tahun ke -90nya di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakarta Utara, Sabtu (11/11).Penghargaan tersebut diberikan kepada lima alumni lintas generasi.Salah satunya, pianis terkenal, Ananda Sukarlan.Dalam penghargaan tersebut, gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan juga hadir.Anies juga berbaris untuk memberikan pidato.Ketika Anies memberikan pidato, Ananda Sukarlan tiba -tiba berdiri dan segera berjalan keluar dari ruangan.Faktanya, Ananda awalnya menerima penghargaan itu dengan DeRianto Kusuma (pendiri Traveloka), Pastor Magnis Suseno (seorang tokoh Yesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (seorang pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Farma Kalbe).Tindakan Ananda diikuti oleh ratusan alumni dan peserta lainnya.Namun, insiden itu tidak bertahan lama.Setelah Anies selesai memberikan pidatonya dan meninggalkan acara tersebut, Ananda dan sejumlah alumni yang telah keluar kembali ke tempat duduk mereka.Ananda kemudian memberikan pidato setelah menerima penghargaan.Dalam pidatonya, komposer Rapsodia Nusantara menjelaskan sikapnya meninggalkan ruangan.Ananda mengkritik komite karena mengundang anies untuk menghadiri acara tersebut."Anda telah mengundang seseorang dengan nilai -nilai dan integritas yang bertentangan dengan apa yang telah kami ajarkan," kata Ananda dalam pernyataan tertulis yang diterima oleh Tirto, Senin (11/13/2017).Ketika dihubungi oleh editor Tirto, Ananda tidak menyangkal kejadian dan pernyataannya.Dia menjelaskan kronologi dirinya meninggalkan ruangan tempat acara itu berlangsung."Tepat ketika Anies berbicara tentang perkembangan Jakarta. Bangunan seperti apa, Tanah Abang begitu kacau. Jika kacau, itu bukan pengembangan," kata Ananda.Pada waktu itu, menurut Ananda, dia duduk di jalan setapak kursi kedua.Ketika dia berdiri dan berjalan ke pintu keluar di belakang, dia mengakui, banyak orang melihatnya.Ketika dia berjalan keluar, kata Ananda, sejumlah alumni Kanisius College juga mengikutinya.Ananda mengakui bahwa dia tidak mengundang teman -temannya untuk keluar.Namun, kemudian, Ananda menyadari bahwa angka -angka yang keluar banyak adalah teman sekelasnya, yaitu kelas tahun 1986. "Saya kembali dalam setengah jam setelah Anies pergi," kata Ananda.Ananda menegaskan bahwa sikapnya bukanlah bentuk kebencian pribadi.Menurutnya, langkah itu adalah kritik terhadap komite.Namun, dia tidak peduli jika Anies tersinggung."Tidak ada dendam pribadi. Ini adalah kritik bagi komite. Mengapa mengundang seseorang yang mendapatkan posisinya berbeda dari nilai -nilai yang diajarkan. Bukan (kebencian) pada anies," kata Ananda.Kejadian ini juga diedarkan dalam video yang diunggah di Facebook.Namun, Gubernur Anies Baswedan bahkan mengakui bahwa dia tidak tahu bahwa ada seorang komposer terkenal yang berjalan keluar ketika dia memberikan pidato.Anies mengungkapkan bahwa dia hanya mengetahui tentang insiden itu setelah tiba di kantor.Anies santai dalam menanggapi itu."Menurut Eros Djarot, itu tidak mencerminkan sikap Kanisius," kata Anies di City Hall, Central Jakarta, Senin sore.Mantan Menteri Pendidikan dan Budaya mengakui bahwa ia menghormati perbedaan sikap dan pandangan.Anies juga mengatakan bahwa dia memberikan hak kepada siapa pun untuk mengekspresikan diri dengan cara mereka sendiri.Anies juga menyebutkan kewajiban seorang gubernur untuk melindungi warganya."Jika kalau begitu ada reaksi negatif, itu hanya bonus," katanya.

berita: Last week, reports emerged that the iPhone 6 Plus could bend easily if kept in the pocket for too long. A number of videos of the iPhone 6 Plus body endurance test immediately appeared on YouTube. The majority of them came to the same conclusion, the iPhone 6 Plus bends easily! Since then the case has been known as the 'Bendgate' or 'curved scandal', and has become a hot topic of debate on social media. To prove the truth, a talk show on Bloomberg TV also invited several expert sources to reveal the truth. One of the experts who was given the opportunity to explain was Lewis Hilsenteger, owner of the Unbox Therapy channel on YouTube, who is suspected of being the first uploader of the trial video for bending the body of the iPhone 6 Plus. Speaking live via web cam with Bloomberg Tv, Hilsenteger said, "The fact is that I tried not only to bend one iPhone 6 Plus, but respective several. This was in order to make the published video show convincing results." He further explained that from the several units he tried to bend, there was one identical feature. "I've tried bending 3 units, all curved in the same location, which is just below the volume buttons," said Hilsenteger.
berita_id: Pekan lalu, laporan muncul bahwa iPhone 6 Plus dapat menekuk dengan mudah jika disimpan di saku terlalu lama.Sejumlah video uji daya tahan body iPhone 6 Plus segera muncul di YouTube.Mayoritas dari mereka sampai pada kesimpulan yang sama, iPhone 6 plus tikungan dengan mudah!Sejak itu kasus ini telah dikenal sebagai 'bendgate' atau 'skandal melengkung', dan telah menjadi topik panas perdebatan di media sosial.Untuk membuktikan kebenaran, acara bincang -bincang di Bloomberg TV juga mengundang beberapa sumber ahli untuk mengungkapkan kebenaran.Salah satu ahli yang diberi kesempatan untuk menjelaskan adalah Lewis Hilsenteger, pemilik saluran terapi Unbox di YouTube, yang diduga sebagai pengunggah pertama dari video uji coba untuk menekuk tubuh iPhone 6 Plus.Berbicara langsung melalui web cam dengan Bloomberg TV, Hilsenteger mengatakan, "Faktanya adalah saya mencoba tidak hanya untuk menekuk satu iPhone 6 Plus, tetapi masing -masing beberapa. Ini untuk membuat video yang dipublikasikan meyakinkan hasil yang meyakinkan."Dia lebih lanjut menjelaskan bahwa dari beberapa unit yang dia coba tekuk, ada satu fitur yang identik."Saya sudah mencoba membengkokkan 3 unit, semuanya melengkung di lokasi yang sama, yang tepat di bawah tombol volume," kata Hilsenteger.

berita: In the past, there has been a massive issue that has even become a trending topic on world twitter (TTWW) with the hashtag #bendgate. The issue explicitly mentions that the iPhone 6 product has changed its physical shape which becomes curved on the screen or becomes bent. Netizens and competitors from the Apple company are flocking to turn parody the iPhone 6 product by comparing it with their smart phone or making funny cartoons that indirectly satirize the phone made by Apple which is easy to bend physically. iphone 6 bent Apple itself claims that the iPhone 6 product has the largest shape when compared to the previous Iphone series but with the support of a solid material on its physical body so that it has a small chance of experiencing bending or deformation of the device body. As observed by Itproportal media on Friday (10/10/2014) that the crooked issue, which has become a world trending topic, has been responded to by the CEO and Founder of Foxcon, who is known as a manufacturer for assembling gadget products, which is the exclusive partner of the technology company Apple. . The CEO of Foxcon is of the opinion that the issue of the curved iPhone 6 product on his device has indeed been designed and disseminated by rivals from Apple vendors. He stated that the issue of "bendgate" which was spread massly on social media regarding a bent iPhone 6 greatly affected the image of the product in public evaluation. How can a smart phone be bent? this is nothing but the result of distortion from competing vendors, never listen to that,” said Terry Gou. But in trials that tested the durability of smartphones, it was seen that the iPhone 6 smartphone did not pass the endurance test with the shape of the device that turned out to be curved. This becomes a little strange because the physical body of the iPhone 6 by Apple vendors has implanted an aluminum metal body material on the handset. But what is still an unanswered question is why the iPhone 6 can easily experience bending in its physical which destroys the image of the product. This condition is not only experienced by the iPhone 6, but also on smart phones made by the HTC One M8 series, which also undergoes bending in a physical endurance test of the device.
berita_id: Di masa lalu, ada masalah besar yang bahkan telah menjadi topik yang sedang tren di Twitter dunia (TTWW) dengan tagar #Bendgate.Masalah ini secara eksplisit menyebutkan bahwa produk iPhone 6 telah mengubah bentuk fisiknya yang menjadi melengkung di layar atau menjadi bengkok.Netizen dan pesaing dari perusahaan Apple berbondong -bondong untuk mengubah parodi produk iPhone 6 dengan membandingkannya dengan ponsel pintar mereka atau membuat kartun lucu yang secara tidak langsung menyindir ponsel yang dibuat oleh Apple yang mudah ditekuk secara fisik.iPhone 6 Bent Apple sendiri mengklaim bahwa produk iPhone 6 memiliki bentuk terbesar jika dibandingkan dengan seri iPhone sebelumnya tetapi dengan dukungan bahan padat pada tubuh fisiknya sehingga memiliki peluang kecil untuk mengalami pembengkokan atau deformasi tubuh perangkat.Seperti yang diamati oleh ITProportal Media pada hari Jumat (10/10/2014) bahwa masalah bengkok, yang telah menjadi topik tren dunia, telah ditanggapi oleh CEO dan pendiri Foxcon, yang dikenal sebagai produsen untuk merakit produk gadget, yang merupakan mitra eksklusif perusahaan teknologi Apple..CEO FOXCON berpendapat bahwa masalah produk iPhone 6 melengkung di perangkatnya memang telah dirancang dan disebarluaskan oleh saingan dari vendor Apple.Dia menyatakan bahwa masalah "Bendgate" yang tersebar secara besar -besaran di media sosial mengenai iPhone 6 yang bengkok sangat mempengaruhi citra produk dalam evaluasi publik.Bagaimana ponsel pintar bisa ditekuk?Ini tidak lain adalah hasil dari distorsi dari vendor yang bersaing, tidak pernah mendengarkan itu, ”kata Terry Gou. Tetapi dalam uji coba yang menguji daya tahan smartphone, terlihat bahwa smartphone iPhone 6 tidak lulus uji ketahanan dengan bentuk perangkat yang ternyata ada.Pertanyaan yang tidak terjawab adalah mengapa iPhone 6 dapat dengan mudah mengalami pembengkokan dalam fisiknya yang menghancurkan citra produk ini.

berita: A number of members of the Ponorogo Reyog Community (KRP) visited the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemlu) office to ask for information and clarification regarding the burning of reyog at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao himself said that the burned reyog had been damaged and eaten by termites. 18 KRP representatives gathered in front of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemlu) office, Jl Pejambon, Central Jakarta, Monday (2/10/2015). They brought 2 sudden peacocks, a barong, and a gayor with a picture of a dragon, a banner that reads "Resolute Action on Burning Reyog at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao Philippines" and an open letter to Foreign Minister Retno LP Marsudi. Their arrival was related to the burning of reog that occurred at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao on 20 October. They also attached a picture showing the reyog burning. "Our visit is to officially ask the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, which is the "superior" of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao - Philippines to convey information and clarification honestly and transparently regarding the burning of Reyog Ponorogo's property," said KRP Chairman, Suyatno to Suarajakarta.co, Monday (2/11). ). Suyatno was accompanied, among others, by the Deputy Chairperson of the KRP Suparno Nojeng, the Secretary of the KRP M Syaiful Jihad, the Treasurer of the KRP Agus Susanto, the leader of the reyog group Singo Wiro Yudho, Eko Prasetyo and the reyog artist who had performed in Davao Philippines in 2005, Suyono Gendon. After waiting for some time, 6 KRP representatives were received by Siti Sofia Sudarma, Director of Information and Media at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs at 10.20 squad WIB. For 30 minutes they held a meeting and as a result the Ministry of Foreign Affairs promised to seek information related to the incident by forming a team to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao in the near future. "The team will further clarify the incident and we will convey the results to the KRP," said Sofia. Explanation of the Consulate General in Davao Meanwhile, in a press release from the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao which was published on its website, it was explained that on October 20, 2015 the Consulate General in Davao City was forced to destroy the Ponorogo reog which had been an asset of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City since 1988. The destruction by burning had to be carried out because the Ponorogo reog was already in a state of disrepair. damaged and eaten by termites. "The arson was in no way an attempt by the Consulate General in Davao City to damage or eliminate the reog of Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The destruction of these assets has been carried out carefully and with full respect for the reog of Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The Consulate General in Davao City would also like to emphasize that the burning has absolutely nothing to do with efforts to exorcise idols or spirits," he wrote. "The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City is currently communicating with parties in Indonesia to seek a new replacement for Reog Ponorogo," he continued.
berita_id: Sejumlah anggota komunitas Ponorogo Reyog (KRP) mengunjungi kantor Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemlu) untuk meminta informasi dan klarifikasi mengenai pembakaran Reyog di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao sendiri mengatakan bahwa Reyog yang terbakar telah rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.18 Perwakilan KRP berkumpul di depan kantor Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemlu), JL Pejambon, Jakarta Tengah, Senin (2/10/2015).Mereka membawa 2 burung merak yang tiba -tiba, sebuah barong, dan seorang Gayor dengan gambar naga, spanduk yang bertuliskan "Tindakan tegas tentang membakar Reyog di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao Filipina" dan surat terbuka kepada Menteri Luar Negeri Retno LP Marsudi.Kedatangan mereka terkait dengan pembakaran reog yang terjadi di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao pada 20 Oktober.Mereka juga memasang gambar yang menunjukkan Reyog terbakar."Kunjungan kami adalah secara resmi bertanya kepada Kementerian Luar Negeri, yang merupakan" atasan "konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao - Filipina untuk menyampaikan informasi dan klarifikasi secara jujur ​​dan transparan mengenai pembakaran properti Reyog Ponorogo," kata Ketua KRP, Suyatno ke Suarajakarta.co (2).).Suyatno ditemani, antara lain, oleh wakil ketua KRP Sarno Nojeng, sekretaris jihad KRP M Syaiful, bendahara KRP Agus Susanto, pemimpin Reyog Group Wiro Yudho, Eko Prasetyo dan REYOG REYOG.Setelah menunggu beberapa waktu, 6 KRP Perwakilan diterima oleh Siti Sofia Sudarma, Direktur Informasi dan Media di Kementerian Luar Negeri di 10.20 Skuad WIB.Selama 30 menit mereka mengadakan pertemuan dan sebagai hasilnya, Kementerian Luar Negeri berjanji untuk mencari informasi yang terkait dengan insiden tersebut dengan membentuk tim ke Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao dalam waktu dekat."Tim akan lebih mengklarifikasi insiden tersebut dan kami akan menyampaikan hasilnya kepada KRP," kata Sofia.Penjelasan Konsulat Jenderal di Davao sementara itu, dalam siaran pers dari Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao yang diterbitkan di situs webnya, dijelaskan bahwa pada 20 Oktober 2015 Konsulat Jenderal di Kota Davao dipaksa untuk menghancurkan Ponorogo Reog yang telah menjadi Asset dari Konsulat Indonesia yang telah menjadi Ponorogo.sudah dalam keadaan rusak.rusak dan dimakan rayap.Pembakaran itu sama sekali tidak merupakan upaya oleh konsulat jenderal di Kota Davao untuk merusak atau menghilangkan reog Ponorogo sebagai aset budaya. Penghancuran aset ini telah dilakukan dengan hati -hati dan dengan rasa hormat penuh terhadap ponorogo sebagai hal yang benar -benar terjadi pada petak yang benar -benar terjadi pada ponorogo yang sama -sama.menulis."Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao saat ini berkomunikasi dengan partai -partai di Indonesia untuk mencari pengganti baru untuk Reog Ponorogo," lanjutnya.

berita: Cianjur Regent Irvan Rivano Muchtar said, from several articles he read on the internet, the meaning of the word Pokemon itself in one language is I am Jewish. “Obviously this is an admission of you who oppress our brothers like Palestine. It is also against the teachings," he said. According to him, the district government is currently only urging smartphone users not to play Pokemon Go, which was recently officially launched in America and will only be inaugurated in Indonesia in the near future. "Now it's just an appeal, but maybe later it will be banned if it doesn't educate and is dangerous," he said. According to Irvan, from some news circulating if Pokemon Go can cause accidents. The reason is a it game that requires users to leave the house and walk to look for this pokemon will interfere with concentration on the road. “Indeed, there has been no research, whether it is dangerous or not. But it's definitely better to anticipate before all the bad things happen. So don't focus too much on the game. When on the road look around. Don't let your busy playing learning games be neglected, everything must be balanced," he said.
berita_id: Bupati Cianjur Irvan Rivano Muchtar mengatakan, dari beberapa artikel yang ia baca di internet, arti kata pokemon itu sendiri dalam satu bahasa adalah saya orang Yahudi."Jelas ini adalah pengakuan Anda yang menindas saudara -saudara kita seperti Palestina. Ini juga bertentangan dengan ajaran," katanya.Menurutnya, pemerintah distrik saat ini hanya mendesak pengguna ponsel cerdas untuk tidak bermain Pokemon Go, yang baru -baru ini diluncurkan secara resmi di Amerika dan hanya akan diresmikan di Indonesia dalam waktu dekat."Sekarang ini hanya banding, tapi mungkin nanti akan dilarang jika tidak mendidik dan berbahaya," katanya.Menurut Irvan, dari beberapa berita yang beredar jika Pokemon Go dapat menyebabkan kecelakaan.Alasannya adalah permainan IT yang mengharuskan pengguna meninggalkan rumah dan berjalan untuk mencari Pokemon ini akan mengganggu konsentrasi di jalan."Memang, belum ada penelitian, apakah itu berbahaya atau tidak. Tapi pasti lebih baik untuk mengantisipasi sebelum semua hal buruk terjadi. Jadi jangan terlalu fokus pada permainan. Ketika di jalan melihat -lihat. Jangan biarkan Anda bermain game yang sibuk diabaikan, semuanya harus seimbang," katanya.

berita: Stroke is a neurological disease that most often results in disability and death. Besides being ranked first among a class of neurological diseases that cause death, stroke is also one of the three main causes of death in general. doctorhealth-stroke-brain-vessel-blood From these various facts show that until now, stroke is still a major problem in the field of neurology and health in general. To overcome this crucial problem, a stroke prevention strategy is needed that includes preventive, rehabilitative, and promotive aspects. Actually, stroke cases have occurred long ago, this is evidenced by the existence of first aid in stroke cases based on traditional Chinese medicine with acupuncture techniques, but this technique has been forgotten, so the impact is getting bigger. As is known, people who get a STROKE attack, all the blood in the body will flow very fast to the blood vessels in the brain. If the rescue activity is given a little too late, then the blood vessels in the brain will not be strong enough to withstand the rush of blood flowing and will soon burst little by little. The following first aid can be done: Do not be moved If you move the patient from the place of origin or the original place it will make the possibility of rupture of fine blood vessels in the brain will occur more quickly and of course this will be risky. Simply help the patient to take a sitting position so as not to fall again. Pull and prick the earlobe If the patient's mouth looks abnormal, you may have to try to tug on the patient's ears until they look a little red. Then, do 2 punctures on the lower end of the ear with a small needle that has been sterilized so that the blood drips 2 times from each earlobe. In a few minutes the patient's mouth will return to normal. Puncture the tips of the fingers with a needle It is recommended to use a syringe. But if you don't have one, you can use other needles that are not too big (ex: sewing needles, pins) and of course they must be in a sterile condition by burning. The point to be punctured is about 1 mm from the tip of the nail. Try to get at least a little blood dripping or 1 drop is enough. If you can't, press the finger. Within about 10 minutes, the patient will regain consciousness. Seek care medical help when the patient's condition begins to recover, seek medical attention immediately. Take the patient to the nearest doctor or nearest hospital to get further action. Remember, before 6 hours since the attack, stroke sufferers must receive medical help. So some information and tips about First Aid for Stroke Patients, I hope you can provide help to those around you and help save a human life. Please leave your opinion Below!
berita_id: Stroke adalah penyakit neurologis yang paling sering mengakibatkan kecacatan dan kematian.Selain peringkat pertama di antara kelas penyakit neurologis yang menyebabkan kematian, stroke juga merupakan salah satu dari tiga penyebab utama kematian secara umum.Doktor-Stroke-Brain-Blood-Blood dari berbagai fakta ini menunjukkan bahwa sampai sekarang, stroke masih menjadi masalah besar di bidang neurologi dan kesehatan secara umum.Untuk mengatasi masalah penting ini, strategi pencegahan stroke diperlukan yang mencakup aspek preventif, rehabilitasi, dan promosi.Sebenarnya, kasus stroke telah terjadi sejak lama, ini dibuktikan dengan adanya pertolongan pertama dalam kasus stroke berdasarkan obat tradisional Tiongkok dengan teknik akupunktur, tetapi teknik ini telah dilupakan, sehingga dampaknya semakin besar.Seperti diketahui, orang yang mendapatkan serangan stroke, semua darah dalam tubuh akan mengalir sangat cepat ke pembuluh darah di otak.Jika aktivitas penyelamatan diberikan sedikit terlambat, maka pembuluh darah di otak tidak akan cukup kuat untuk menahan aliran darah yang mengalir dan akan segera meledak sedikit demi sedikit.Pertolongan pertama berikut dapat dilakukan: Jangan dipindahkan jika Anda memindahkan pasien dari tempat asal atau tempat aslinya akan membuat kemungkinan pecahnya pembuluh darah halus di otak akan terjadi lebih cepat dan tentu saja ini akan berisiko.Cukup bantu pasien untuk mengambil posisi duduk agar tidak jatuh lagi.Tarik dan tusuk telinga jika mulut pasien terlihat tidak normal, Anda mungkin harus mencoba menarik telinga pasien sampai mereka terlihat sedikit merah.Kemudian, lakukan 2 tusukan di ujung bawah telinga dengan jarum kecil yang telah disterilkan sehingga darah menetes 2 kali dari setiap daun telinga.Dalam beberapa menit mulut pasien akan kembali normal.Tusuk ujung jari dengan jarum yang disarankan untuk menggunakan jarum suntik.Tetapi jika Anda tidak memilikinya, Anda dapat menggunakan jarum lain yang tidak terlalu besar (mis: jarum menjahit, pin) dan tentu saja mereka harus dalam kondisi steril dengan membakar.Poin yang harus ditusuk adalah sekitar 1 mm dari ujung kuku.Cobalah untuk mendapatkan setidaknya sedikit darah yang menetes atau 1 tetes sudah cukup.Jika Anda tidak bisa, tekan jari.Dalam waktu sekitar 10 menit, pasien akan mendapatkan kembali kesadaran.Carilah bantuan medis ketika kondisi pasien mulai pulih, segera cari perhatian medis.Bawa pasien ke dokter terdekat atau rumah sakit terdekat untuk mendapatkan tindakan lebih lanjut.Ingat, sebelum 6 jam sejak serangan, penderita stroke harus menerima bantuan medis.Jadi beberapa informasi dan tips tentang pertolongan pertama untuk pasien stroke, saya harap Anda dapat memberikan bantuan kepada orang -orang di sekitar Anda dan membantu menyelamatkan hidup manusia.Silakan tinggalkan pendapat Anda di bawah!

berita: The Surabaya City Government clarified the results of laboratory tests on pacifiers which were declared free of narcotics and other dangerous substances. The municipal government claims to have never said that pacifiers contain drugs. The city government said that food and beverage raids were held regularly every month to protect Surabaya residents from harmful substances. Head of the Surabaya City Health Office, Febria Rachmanita, said that the Surabaya City Government supervised food and beverages circulating in schools, street vendors (PKL), markets and supermarkets. Checks and supervision are carried out regularly every month. The raid on candy pacifiers sold around the school is considered a routine activity. In addition to candy, the city government also supervises other foods. "We already have an SOP, whether it's a complaint or not, it's the municipal government's obligation to supervise food and beverages. Once a month we go to the field, last February around 200 locations, "said the Head of Health Office in a press conference at the Public Relations Office of the Surabaya City Government, Tuesday (14/3). The dentist, who is familiarly called Feni, explained that when taking samples not only from one location, but at random in several locations. In addition, there are several types of food that muhammad are sampled for inspection to the BBPOM. Therefore, he was surprised by the news about the candy pacifier raid which was considered too excessive. “The city government never said it (pacifier candy) contained drugs. But the task of the City Government is to anticipate food circulating in elementary schools, markets, street vendors and supermarkets. If you suspect that there is food that contains dangerous substances and drugs, it is an obligation,” explained Feni. (Importer of Somasi Dot Candy Surabaya City Government). The head of the Surabaya City Civil Service Police Unit (Satpol PP), Irvan Widyanto, said the dot candy which was raided last week had been returned to the traders. The return of goods is carried out after the results of the BPOM laboratory test are negative for narcotics and other dangerous substances. The Head of Public Relations of the Surabaya City Government, Muhammad Fikser, emphasized that the raids and supervision of food and beverages did not intend to drop certain products.
