This is because raids and surveillance are carried out on various types of food and beverages. In addition to the operation of food and beverage products, the operation also targets traders and cleaners. "This is not the first time. We don't want to drop a certain product. We just obey the rules. The city government has no intention of going there, only protecting children and the community so that the food they consume is truly safe,” added Fikser. This clarification came after the importer of pacifier candy, PT Petrona Inti Chemindo, summoned the Surabaya City Government to immediately apologize and rehabilitate his good name. This is related to the actions of the Satpol PP who raided the pacifiers suspected of containing drugs. "If within 14 days from now the City Government does not have good ethics, then we have prepared the next legal step," said Prihadi Saputra's attorney for the candy dot importer during a press conference in Surabaya, Monday (13/3). In addition, he said, his party demanded that the reputation be restored through the media. He said the product imported by his client was safe because two stages of testing had been carried out by the Food and Drug Supervisory Agency (BPOM). The first test, candy has passed the four parameter level test. In the second test, he continued, the candy has passed the 16 parameter level test. For that, he hopes that the public will not worry about this candy pacifier.
berita_id: Pemerintah Kota Surabaya mengklarifikasi hasil tes laboratorium pada dot yang dinyatakan bebas dari narkotika dan zat berbahaya lainnya.Pemerintah kota mengklaim tidak pernah mengatakan bahwa dot memiliki narkoba.Pemerintah kota mengatakan bahwa serangan makanan dan minuman diadakan secara teratur setiap bulan untuk melindungi penduduk Surabaya dari zat berbahaya.Kepala Kantor Kesehatan Kota Surabaya, Febria Rachmanita, mengatakan bahwa pemerintah kota Surabaya mengawasi makanan dan minuman yang beredar di sekolah, pedagang kaki lima (PKL), pasar dan supermarket.Cek dan pengawasan dilakukan secara teratur setiap bulan.Penggerebekan dot permen yang dijual di sekitar sekolah dianggap sebagai kegiatan rutin.Selain permen, pemerintah kota juga mengawasi makanan lain."Kami sudah memiliki SOP, apakah itu keluhan atau tidak, itu adalah kewajiban pemerintah kota untuk mengawasi makanan dan minuman. Sekali sebulan kami pergi ke lapangan, Februari lalu sekitar 200 lokasi," kata kepala kantor kesehatan dalam konferensi pers di Kantor Publikasi Pemerintah Kota Surabaya, Selasa (14/3).Dokter gigi, yang akrab bernama Feni, menjelaskan bahwa ketika mengambil sampel tidak hanya dari satu lokasi, tetapi secara acak di beberapa lokasi.Selain itu, ada beberapa jenis makanan yang diambil oleh Muhammad untuk diperiksa ke BBPOM.Oleh karena itu, ia terkejut dengan berita tentang serangan dot permen yang dianggap terlalu berlebihan."Pemerintah kota tidak pernah mengatakannya (dot permen) berisi obat -obatan. Tetapi tugas pemerintah kota adalah untuk mengantisipasi makanan yang beredar di sekolah dasar, pasar, pedagang kaki lima dan supermarket. Jika Anda curiga ada makanan yang mengandung zat dan obat -obatan berbahaya, itu adalah kewajiban," jelas Feni.(Importir Pemerintah Kota Somasi Dot Candy Surabaya).Kepala Unit Kepolisian Sipil Kota Surabaya (Satpol PP), Irvan Widyanto, mengatakan permen DOT yang digerebek pekan lalu telah dikembalikan ke para pedagang.Pengembalian barang dilakukan setelah hasil tes laboratorium BPOM negatif untuk narkotika dan zat berbahaya lainnya.Kepala Hubungan Masyarakat Pemerintah Kota Surabaya, Muhammad Fikser, menekankan bahwa penggerebekan dan pengawasan makanan dan minuman tidak bermaksud untuk menjatuhkan produk tertentu.Ini karena penggerebekan dan pengawasan dilakukan pada berbagai jenis makanan dan minuman.Selain pengoperasian produk makanan dan minuman, operasi ini juga menargetkan pedagang dan pembersih."Ini bukan pertama kalinya. Kami tidak ingin menjatuhkan produk tertentu. Kami hanya mematuhi aturan. Pemerintah kota tidak memiliki niat untuk pergi ke sana, hanya melindungi anak -anak dan masyarakat sehingga makanan yang mereka konsumsi benar -benar aman," tambah Fikser.Klarifikasi ini terjadi setelah importir permen dot, Pt Petrona inti Chemindo, memanggil pemerintah kota Surabaya untuk segera meminta maaf dan merehabilitasi nama baiknya.Ini terkait dengan tindakan Satpol PP yang menggerebek dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan."Jika dalam 14 hari dari sekarang pemerintah kota tidak memiliki etika yang baik, maka kami telah menyiapkan langkah hukum berikutnya," kata pengacara Prihadi Saputra untuk importir permen selama konferensi pers di Surabaya, Senin (13/3).Selain itu, katanya, partainya menuntut agar reputasi dipulihkan melalui media.Dia mengatakan produk yang diimpor oleh kliennya aman karena dua tahap pengujian telah dilakukan oleh Badan Pengawas Makanan dan Obat (BPOM).Tes pertama, Candy telah lulus uji level empat parameter.Dalam tes kedua, ia melanjutkan, permen telah lulus uji level parameter 16.Untuk itu, ia berharap publik tidak akan khawatir tentang dot permen ini.

berita: The call to uninstall the Traveloka application has recently been widely discussed on social networks. This started when a pianist named Ananda Sukarlan walked out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan delivered his speech in celebration of the 90th anniversary of Kanisius College at the Jakarta International Expo Kemayoran. Ananda Sukarlan himself is one of the alumni of Kanisius College. His action to walk out was also reportedly attended by several other alumni. One of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, is said to have supported Ananda's walk out by shaking hands and congratulating him. The action that resulted in the call to uninstall Traveloka also received a response from the company. Traveloka stated that one of the bosses did not attend the Kanisius College celebration because he was leaving the city. “We are proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from the Kanisius Alumni. However, he was unable to attend because he was on a business trip that had been planned several months in advance," Traveloka said in a statement received by Okezone. Meanwhile, regarding the support that Traveloka CTO reportedly gave to the pianist, Traveloka stated that the company prioritizes the values ​​of mutual respect that are applied to all of its employees. “Responding to the issue surrounding Anies' speech at the Kanisius College 90th Celebration event, we state respective that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders,” explained the company
berita_id: Panggilan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka baru -baru ini telah dibahas secara luas di jejaring sosial.Ini dimulai ketika seorang pianis bernama Ananda Sukarlan berjalan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan menyampaikan pidatonya dalam perayaan peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College di Jakarta International Expo Kemayoran.Ananda Sukarlan sendiri adalah salah satu alumni dari Kanisius College.Tindakannya untuk keluar juga dilaporkan dihadiri oleh beberapa alumni lainnya.Salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, dikatakan telah mendukung perjalanan Ananda dengan berjabat tangan dan memberi selamat padanya.Tindakan yang mengakibatkan panggilan untuk menghapus instalasi Traveloka juga menerima tanggapan dari perusahaan.Traveloka menyatakan bahwa salah satu bos tidak menghadiri perayaan Kanisius College karena dia meninggalkan kota."Kami bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya," kata Traveloka dalam sebuah pernyataan yang diterima oleh Okezone.Sementara itu, mengenai dukungan yang dilaporkan diberikan oleh Traveloka CTO kepada pianis, Traveloka menyatakan bahwa perusahaan memprioritaskan nilai -nilai rasa saling menghormati yang diterapkan pada semua karyawannya.Menanggapi masalah seputar pidato anies di acara perayaan Kanisius College ke-90, kami menyatakan masing-masing bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi, dan inovasi. Nilai-nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal, "jelas perusahaan itu.

berita: The National Narcotics Agency (BNN) has appealed to residents to be aware of the circulation of candy-shaped pacifiers in Surabaya, East Java, which are suspected of containing drugs or other hazardous materials. The candy, which is known to be imported from a certain country, is known to have gone viral on social media because it was accused of containing drugs. "The National Narcotics Agency (BNN) as the vocal point of drug problems in Indonesia, said that until now the East Java Provincial BNN and Surabaya enounce City BNN are bringing samples of the candy for scientific examination by the National Narcotics Laboratory of the National Narcotics Agency regarding the content of the candy," he said. Head of Public Relations of BNN Slamet Pribadi via short message, Wednesday (8/3/2017). Slamet said, BNN appealed to the public to be patient in waiting for the results of the examination. "It is hoped that parents and children will remain vigilant against all forms and types of drugs by not consuming food, drinks, or drugs that do not have a distribution permit," Slamet said.
berita_id: Badan Narkotika Nasional (BNN) telah mengimbau penduduk untuk mengetahui sirkulasi dot-dot berbentuk permen di Surabaya, Jawa Timur, yang diduga mengandung obat-obatan atau bahan berbahaya lainnya.Permen, yang diketahui diimpor dari negara tertentu, diketahui telah menjadi viral di media sosial karena dituduh mengandung obat -obatan."Badan Narkotika Nasional (BNN) sebagai titik vokal dari masalah narkoba di Indonesia, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang BNN Provinsi Java Timur dan Surabaya Enounce City BNN membawa sampel permen untuk pemeriksaan ilmiah oleh Laboratorium Narkotika Nasional Badan Narkotika Nasional mengenai isi permen," katanya.Kepala Hubungan Masyarakat BNN Slamet Pribadi melalui pesan pendek, Rabu (8/3/2017).Slamet mengatakan, BNN mengimbau publik untuk bersabar dalam menunggu hasil pemeriksaan."Diharapkan bahwa orang tua dan anak -anak akan tetap waspada terhadap semua bentuk dan jenis obat dengan tidak mengonsumsi makanan, minuman, atau obat -obatan yang tidak memiliki izin distribusi," kata Slamet.

berita: The burning of Reog Ponorogo by the Consulate area General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao City, Philippines, is considered not a trivial matter. The consulate general should not burn the reog even though it has been damaged by age. The chairman of the Reog Ponorogo Association throughout Indonesia, Begug Purnomosidi, said that the Consul General should have thought about it before being burned. What is burned, this is your own culture, don't burn it, let alone disseminate it. This is an insult, he told Republika.co.id, Monday (2/11). This act is said to be associated with the extermination of idols. Although this has been denied by the Indonesian Consulate General, the burning still leaves its own disappointment for reog lovers. That's the same as Indonesians abroad insulting their own culture, that's not true, he said. Begug and his friends just landed in Jakarta today. Tomorrow, they plan to meet with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemenlu) to resolve this issue. Initially, Reog Ponorogo art lovers in the regions wanted to flock to Jakarta to convey their disappointment to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. But the intention was prevented by Begung. Should be resolved internally with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. If there is a problem, it can be a long story, he said. The Reog Ponorogo Association throughout Indonesia wants the Foreign Minister to take action against his subordinates. We want the Foreign Minister to discipline Indonesians abroad, especially her subordinates, to respect the nation. REPUBLIKA.CO.ID, JAKARTA – The burning of Reog Ponorogo by the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao City, Philippines, is considered not a trivial matter. The consulate general should not burn the reog even though it has been damaged by age. The chairman of the Reog Ponorogo Association throughout Indonesia, Begug Purnomosidi, said that the Consul General should have thought about it before being burned. What is burned, this is your own culture, don't burn it, let alone disseminate it. This is an insult, he told Republika.co.id, Monday (2/11). This act is said to be associated with the extermination of idols. Although this has been denied by the Indonesian Consulate General, the burning still leaves its own disappointment for reog lovers. That's the same as Indonesians abroad insulting their own culture, that's not true, he said. Begug and his friends just landed in Jakarta today. Tomorrow, they plan to meet with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemenlu) to resolve this issue. Initially, Reog Ponorogo art lovers in the regions wanted to flock to Jakarta to convey their disappointment to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. But the intention was prevented by Begung. Should be resolved internally with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. If there is a problem, it can be a long story, he said. The Reog Ponorogo Association throughout Indonesia wants the Foreign Minister to take action against his subordinates. We want the Foreign Minister to discipline Indonesians abroad, especially her subordinates, to respect the nation. Don't even hit it from the inside, said Begug.
berita_id: Pembakaran Reog Ponorogo oleh Area Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) di Kota Davao, Filipina, dianggap bukan masalah sepele.Konsulat Jenderal tidak boleh membakar reog meskipun telah rusak karena usia.Ketua Asosiasi Reog Ponorogo di seluruh Indonesia, Purnomosidi Begug, mengatakan bahwa konsul jenderal seharusnya memikirkannya sebelum dibakar.Apa yang dibakar, ini adalah budaya Anda sendiri, jangan membakarnya, apalagi menyebarkannya.Ini adalah penghinaan, katanya kepada Republika.co.id, Senin (2/11).Tindakan ini dikatakan terkait dengan pemusnahan idola.Meskipun ini telah ditolak oleh Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia, pembakaran masih meninggalkan kekecewaannya sendiri untuk pecinta Reog.Itu sama dengan orang Indonesia di luar negeri menghina budaya mereka sendiri, itu tidak benar, katanya.Begug dan teman -temannya baru saja mendarat di Jakarta hari ini.Besok, mereka berencana untuk bertemu dengan Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemenlu) untuk menyelesaikan masalah ini.Awalnya, pecinta seni Reog Ponorogo di daerah ingin berbondong -bondong ke Jakarta untuk menyampaikan kekecewaan mereka kepada Kementerian Luar Negeri.Tetapi niat itu dicegah oleh Begung.Harus diselesaikan secara internal dengan Kementerian Luar Negeri.Jika ada masalah, itu bisa menjadi cerita panjang, katanya.Asosiasi Reog Ponorogo di seluruh Indonesia ingin Menteri Luar Negeri mengambil tindakan terhadap bawahannya.Kami ingin Menteri Luar Negeri mendisiplinkan orang Indonesia di luar negeri, terutama bawahannya, untuk menghormati bangsa.Republika.co.id, Jakarta - Pembakaran Reog Ponorogo oleh Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) di Kota Davao, Filipina, dianggap bukan masalah sepele.Konsulat Jenderal tidak boleh membakar reog meskipun telah rusak karena usia.Ketua Asosiasi Reog Ponorogo di seluruh Indonesia, Purnomosidi Begug, mengatakan bahwa konsul jenderal seharusnya memikirkannya sebelum dibakar.Apa yang dibakar, ini adalah budaya Anda sendiri, jangan membakarnya, apalagi menyebarkannya.Ini adalah penghinaan, katanya kepada Republika.co.id, Senin (2/11).Tindakan ini dikatakan terkait dengan pemusnahan idola.Meskipun ini telah ditolak oleh Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia, pembakaran masih meninggalkan kekecewaannya sendiri untuk pecinta Reog.Itu sama dengan orang Indonesia di luar negeri menghina budaya mereka sendiri, itu tidak benar, katanya.Begug dan teman -temannya baru saja mendarat di Jakarta hari ini.Besok, mereka berencana untuk bertemu dengan Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemenlu) untuk menyelesaikan masalah ini.Awalnya, pecinta seni Reog Ponorogo di daerah ingin berbondong -bondong ke Jakarta untuk menyampaikan kekecewaan mereka kepada Kementerian Luar Negeri.Tetapi niat itu dicegah oleh Begung.Harus diselesaikan secara internal dengan Kementerian Luar Negeri.Jika ada masalah, itu bisa menjadi cerita panjang, katanya.Asosiasi Reog Ponorogo di seluruh Indonesia ingin Menteri Luar Negeri mengambil tindakan terhadap bawahannya.Kami ingin Menteri Luar Negeri mendisiplinkan orang Indonesia di luar negeri, terutama bawahannya, untuk menghormati bangsa.Bahkan jangan memukulnya dari dalam, kata Begug.

berita: California - In recent days a number of complaints from iPhone 6 Plus users have enlivened the virtual world. The new 5.5-inch smartphone from Apple is reported to be easy to bend if it is stored in a trouser pocket for too long. Suddenly this news made Apple the monthly on various social media. Not only users, some of Apple's competitors did not waste this moment to 'beat up' the company bearing the bitten apple logo. And now Apple has finally spoken. According to a report published on the Wall Street Journal page, Apple representatives have explained that the issue of the iPhone 6 Plus being easy to bend is exaggerated. Apple claims that the company has so far only received 9 user complaints out of 10 million units of the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus that have been sold. This means, the defects on the iPhone 6 Plus do not occur in all units, but only a small part. "With normal use, a curved iPhone 6 Plus would be extremely rare," an Apple representative said. In addition, Jon Fort, editor of the news site CNBC also mentioned that Apple representatives have confirmed that only a small percentage of fallible consumers are experiencing the iPhone 6 Plus curved issue. It was also explained that the actual body frame of the iPhone 6 Plus is strong enough and meets Apple's standards. The new iPhones are steel/titanium-infused to strengthen a number of stress locations and use the strongest type of glass in the industry, an Apple representative said. The Business Insider page noted, this is Apple's fastest response in responding to oblique issues circulating wildly on the internet. Previously, Apple had always been 'ignorant' to various oblique issues that befell their products. Jakarta – Apple received bad news about its newest product, iPhone 6 Plus. This Apple-made phablet device is complained of by some users because it has a frail body that easily bends when inserted into the front pocket of the pants. This report comes from a user on Forum Macrumors named Hanzon, who said he put his iPhone 6 Plus in his front pants pocket for a long time, which is about 4 hours. Hanzon admitted that he did not take out his iPhone 6 Plus during his 4 hours of activity. And when he then took out his new smartphone, Hanzon was surprised to find his beloved iPhone 6 Plus curved. Seeing the increasing number of reports, a user tested the flexibility of the iPhone 6 Plus and uploaded it on YouTube. As a comparison, he also tested the flexibility of another smartphone, namely the Samsung Galaxy Note 3. In the video, you can see how the iPhone 6 Plus turns out to be very easy to bend. The user who posted the video also said that prior to testing his iPhone 6 Plus, it was already looking a little warped. The weak spot seems to be on the left side, just below the volume buttons. This curved body problem seems to only occur on the iPhone 6 Plus. While for the iPhone 6 which has a size of 4.7 inches, there are no reports of this curved body problem
berita_id: California - Dalam beberapa hari terakhir sejumlah keluhan dari iPhone 6 Plus pengguna telah menghidupkan dunia virtual.Smartphone 5,5 inci baru dari Apple dilaporkan mudah ditekuk jika disimpan dalam saku celana panjang terlalu lama.Tiba -tiba berita ini menjadikan Apple bulanan di berbagai media sosial.Tidak hanya pengguna, beberapa pesaing Apple tidak menyia -nyiakan momen ini untuk 'memukuli' perusahaan yang membawa logo Apple yang digigit.Dan sekarang Apple akhirnya berbicara.Menurut sebuah laporan yang diterbitkan di halaman Wall Street Journal, perwakilan Apple telah menjelaskan bahwa masalah iPhone 6 Plus mudah ditekuk dibesar -besarkan.Apple mengklaim bahwa perusahaan sejauh ini hanya menerima 9 keluhan pengguna dari 10 juta unit iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus yang telah terjual.Ini berarti, cacat pada iPhone 6 Plus tidak terjadi di semua unit, tetapi hanya sebagian kecil."Dengan penggunaan normal, iPhone 6 Plus melengkung akan sangat jarang," kata seorang perwakilan Apple.Selain itu, Jon Fort, editor situs berita CNBC juga menyebutkan bahwa Perwakilan Apple telah mengkonfirmasi bahwa hanya sebagian kecil konsumen yang dapat berubah yang mengalami masalah iPhone 6 plus melengkung.Juga dijelaskan bahwa kerangka tubuh yang sebenarnya dari iPhone 6 Plus cukup kuat dan memenuhi standar Apple.Iphone baru ini diresapi baja/titanium untuk memperkuat sejumlah lokasi stres dan menggunakan jenis kaca terkuat di industri ini, kata seorang perwakilan Apple.Halaman Business Insider mencatat, ini adalah respons tercepat Apple dalam menanggapi masalah miring yang beredar liar di internet.Sebelumnya, Apple selalu 'bodoh' untuk berbagai masalah miring yang menimpa produk mereka.Jakarta - Apple menerima kabar buruk tentang produk terbarunya, iPhone 6 Plus.Perangkat phablet buatan Apple ini dikeluhkan oleh beberapa pengguna karena memiliki badan lemah yang dengan mudah ditekuk saat dimasukkan ke dalam saku depan celana.Laporan ini berasal dari pengguna di forum macrumors bernama Hanzon, yang mengatakan ia menempatkan iPhone 6 -nya Plus di saku celana depannya untuk waktu yang lama, yaitu sekitar 4 jam.Hanzon mengakui bahwa dia tidak mengeluarkan iPhone 6 Plus selama 4 jam aktivitasnya.Dan ketika dia kemudian mengeluarkan smartphone barunya, Hanzon terkejut menemukan iPhone 6 Plus yang dicintainya.Melihat meningkatnya jumlah laporan, pengguna menguji fleksibilitas iPhone 6 Plus dan mengunggahnya di YouTube.Sebagai perbandingan, ia juga menguji fleksibilitas smartphone lain, yaitu Samsung Galaxy Note 3. Dalam video, Anda dapat melihat bagaimana iPhone 6 Plus ternyata sangat mudah untuk ditekuk.Pengguna yang memposting video juga mengatakan bahwa sebelum menguji iPhone 6 Plus -nya, itu sudah terlihat sedikit bengkok.Titik lemah tampaknya berada di sisi kiri, tepat di bawah tombol volume.Masalah tubuh melengkung ini tampaknya hanya terjadi pada iPhone 6 Plus.Sedangkan untuk iPhone 6 yang memiliki ukuran 4,7 inci, tidak ada laporan masalah tubuh melengkung ini

berita: Warganet is still confused about the unclear information regarding the fate of Facebook in Indonesia. There are even those who are desperate to do nude actions so that Facebook is not closed. Understandably, the article is that Facebook users in Indonesia have reached 140 million, and this platform has become a place for sharing among many people. Don't worry, because the Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara will not block (close) Facebook permanently, but only temporarily. That is if the situation gets worse. "We will see this situation first. If it gets worse, then we will temporarily close (block it)," said Minister of Communication and Information Rudiantara. Rudiantara is reluctant to talk about closing Facebook operations permanently, he is more focused on monitoring Facebook to create data security and prevent the spread of hate speech. The House of Representatives also had asked Kominfo to be more strict with Facebook. "We and the government - the Ministry of Communication and Information - will talk again regarding the follow-up to Facebook's mistake. Personally, I am still open to sanctions, it data point is also possible to - suggest - a Facebook service moratorium," said Meutya Hafid, a member of the Commission. I DPR RI. Meutya estimates that the DPR RI will wait for the results of Facebook's internal investigation for the next month. "We are waiting, I think a month should be enough time. We hope that the results of this investigation will not only blame who, but also there must be information, where this misused data is and what it is used for," he said. Case Beginning The controversy arose from the Cambridge Analytica scandal, which accused Facebook of leaking data. After being investigated, it turns out that "leaking" is not the right term. The data was not leaked, but rather misused by Cambridge Analytica, allegedly for political purposes. The data taken is also not the content of the message, but data that is publicly listed on a person's profile. Unfortunately, the rice has become porridge. There has been confusion about this, to the point that the DPR also summoned Facebook to ask for an explanation. As a result, the discourse of blocking Facebook arises. "That Facebook data is not leaked. If it leaks, the term is like a pipe with water, you don't know where the leak is, this data is compromised," said Rudiantara. Facebook has been given SP 2 The Ministry of Communication and Information has sent SP 2 to Facebook, but there is no information about SP 3 which means closing. When asked about the validity period of SP 2 to the next SP, Rudiantara has not yet given a definitive answer. "Yes, it could be a day, a month, see the situation first," concluded Rudiantara. He claimed to have received an explanation from the Irish Facebook office which manages Facebook in Indonesia. In a statement by Facebook Ireland to Rudiantara, they provided information on numbers related to misuse of data that afflicted users. Rudiantara also continues to monitor the development of Indonesian user data on Facebook.
berita_id: Warganet masih bingung tentang informasi yang tidak jelas mengenai nasib Facebook di Indonesia.Bahkan ada orang -orang yang sangat ingin melakukan tindakan telanjang sehingga Facebook tidak ditutup.Maklum, artikelnya adalah bahwa pengguna Facebook di Indonesia telah mencapai 140 juta, dan platform ini telah menjadi tempat untuk berbagi di antara banyak orang.Jangan khawatir, karena Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara tidak akan memblokir (menutup) Facebook secara permanen, tetapi hanya sementara.Itu jika situasinya semakin buruk."Kami akan melihat situasi ini terlebih dahulu. Jika menjadi lebih buruk, maka kami akan untuk sementara waktu akan menutup (memblokirnya)," kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi Rudiantara.Rudiantara enggan berbicara tentang menutup operasi Facebook secara permanen, ia lebih fokus pada pemantauan Facebook untuk menciptakan keamanan data dan mencegah penyebaran pidato kebencian.Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat juga telah meminta Kominfo untuk lebih ketat dengan Facebook."Kami dan pemerintah - Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi - akan berbicara lagi mengenai tindak lanjut dari kesalahan Facebook. Secara pribadi, saya masih terbuka untuk sanksi, titik data itu juga dimungkinkan untuk - menyarankan - moratorium layanan Facebook," kata Meutya Hafid, anggota komisi.I DPR RI.Meutya memperkirakan bahwa DPR RI akan menunggu hasil penyelidikan internal Facebook untuk bulan berikutnya."Kami sedang menunggu, saya pikir sebulan harus menjadi cukup waktu. Kami berharap hasil penyelidikan ini tidak hanya akan menyalahkan siapa, tetapi juga harus ada informasi, di mana data yang disalahgunakan ini dan untuk apa itu digunakan," katanya.Kasus yang memulai kontroversi muncul dari skandal Cambridge Analytica, yang menuduh Facebook bocor data.Setelah diselidiki, ternyata "bocor" bukanlah istilah yang tepat.Data itu tidak bocor, melainkan disalahgunakan oleh Cambridge Analytica, yang diduga untuk tujuan politik.Data yang diambil juga bukan konten pesan, tetapi data yang terdaftar di depan umum pada profil seseorang.Sayangnya, nasi telah menjadi bubur.Telah ada kebingungan tentang hal ini, sampai -sampai DPR juga memanggil Facebook untuk meminta penjelasan.Akibatnya, wacana memblokir Facebook muncul."Data Facebook itu tidak bocor. Jika bocor, istilahnya seperti pipa dengan air, Anda tidak tahu di mana bocornya, data ini dikompromikan," kata Rudiantara.Facebook telah diberikan SP 2 Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi telah mengirim SP 2 ke Facebook, tetapi tidak ada informasi tentang SP 3 yang berarti penutupan.Ketika ditanya tentang periode validitas SP 2 ke SP berikutnya, Rudiantara belum memberikan jawaban yang pasti."Ya, itu bisa jadi sehari, sebulan, melihat situasinya terlebih dahulu," pungkas Rudiantara.Dia mengaku telah menerima penjelasan dari kantor Facebook Irlandia yang mengelola Facebook di Indonesia.Dalam sebuah pernyataan oleh Facebook Irlandia ke Rudiantara, mereka memberikan informasi tentang angka -angka yang terkait dengan penyalahgunaan data yang pengguna yang menderita.Rudiantara juga terus memantau pengembangan data pengguna Indonesia di Facebook.

berita: Apple set a record sales of 10 million units in the first week of the launch of its iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus. However, some recent reports claim that the series easily "bends" in the user's pocket. Reports of slightly bent iPhone 6 devices surfaced on several Apple forums, hinting that some items started to warp after being kept in the front pocket for a while. A member of the MacRumors forum posted a photo of his iPhone 6 Plus after a few hours of putting it in his front pocket while driving. Other photos have also appeared on Apple's French MacBidouille forum and other websites. This report was initially met with joking and skepticism. But according to MacRumors, the bending or warping of the device actually makes sense from an organic point of view. First of all, Apple uses aluminum to house their phones, which is very soft and bendable. In addition, the iPhone 6 and iPhone Plus are also thinner than the previous series. So if the user puts pressure on the device, there is a possibility that the pressure will change the shape of their phone. This problem has even been experienced by previous Apple series, as well as Sony Xperia phones. MacRumors advises users not to keep  their iPhone in their pocket. Some users choose to give a case to their new phone. However, this might make some potential buyers rethink. So far, there has been no explanation from Apple regarding this phenomenon.
berita_id: Apple menetapkan rekor penjualan 10 juta unit pada minggu pertama peluncuran iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus.Namun, beberapa laporan terbaru mengklaim bahwa seri ini dengan mudah "membungkuk" di saku pengguna.Laporan perangkat iPhone 6 yang sedikit bengkok muncul di beberapa forum Apple, mengisyaratkan bahwa beberapa item mulai melengkung setelah disimpan di saku depan untuk sementara waktu.Seorang anggota Forum Macrumors memposting foto iPhone 6 Plus -nya setelah beberapa jam meletakkannya di saku depannya saat mengemudi.Foto -foto lain juga muncul di Forum Macbidouille Prancis Apple dan situs web lainnya.Laporan ini awalnya bertemu dengan bercanda dan skeptis.Tetapi menurut Macrumors, pembengkokan atau warping perangkat sebenarnya masuk akal dari sudut pandang organik.Pertama -tama, Apple menggunakan aluminium untuk menampung ponsel mereka, yang sangat lembut dan bisa ditekuk.Selain itu, iPhone 6 dan iPhone Plus juga lebih tipis dari seri sebelumnya.Jadi jika pengguna memberi tekanan pada perangkat, ada kemungkinan bahwa tekanan akan mengubah bentuk ponsel mereka.Masalah ini bahkan telah dialami oleh seri Apple sebelumnya, serta ponsel Sony Xperia.MacRumor menyarankan pengguna untuk tidak menyimpan iPhone mereka di saku mereka.Beberapa pengguna memilih untuk memberikan kasing ke ponsel baru mereka.Namun, ini mungkin membuat beberapa pembeli potensial memikirkan kembali.Sejauh ini, belum ada penjelasan dari Apple mengenai fenomena ini.

berita: The basic salary of the president, which is only around Rp. 30 million per month, is currently considered very low. The government plans to propose an increase in the president's salary to become Rp. 553 million per month. In the RPP, apart from the president, the vice president and other high-ranking state officials will also experience salary increases. The president's salary has skyrocketed because the calculation is based on an index of 1:12698 between the salaries of the lowest rank civil servants and the highest The income index for the president is simulated to reach 96000, so he will earn IDR 553.4 million per month. Meanwhile, the vice president (wapres) will receive an income of IDR 368.9 million per month from the previous basic salary of IDR 20 million. income 64000 With p With this salary change, the monthly income of the president of the Republic of Indonesia will compete with leaders in other countries. In the RPP there are also new salary proposals for the Ministers, Attorney General, Commander of the Indonesian National Armed Forces, Chief of Police, Chairman of the MPR, Chairman of the DPR, Chairman of the DPD, and Chairman of the KPK. , Chairman of the BPK, Chairman of the Supreme Court and Chairman of the Constitutional Court With an index calculation of 16000, their income is Rp. 92.2 million per month. Then for the Deputy Chairs of the MPR, DPR, DPD, KPK, BPK, MA and MK, they have an income index of 15333 and receive income IDR 88.3 million per month. Meanwhile, Deputy Ministers, Deputy Chief of Police, DPR Members, DPD Members, BPK Members, and Supreme Court Justices per month earn IDR 80.7 million with an income index of 14,000. Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (KemenPAN) -RB) acknowledged the issue of the circulation of this RPP, although he stated that the proposal was not yet ripe. The Head of the Legal, Communication and Public Information Bureau of KemenPAN-RB, Herman Suryatman said that the information The RPP organization is not yet valid. Herman said that the RPP was sourced from the discussion material that was held last year. "Those are simulation numbers that are not valid. 11/3/2018) As is known, the RPP for the Salaries and Benefits of Civil Servants is a technical rule of the Law on State Civil Apparatus (ASN). According to Herman, the explanation contains a simulation of the income of civil servants and other state officials. requires further study. "Not only contains a simulation of the income of state officials, but also a simulation of the income of civil servants. Please don't be misunderstood," he asked. regions such as governors, regents, mayors, provincial DPRD and DPRD regencies or cities will also experience an increase Where for governors will earn Rp. 76.8 million per month with an index of 13333 Then for deputy governors, regents/mayors, and chairman of the Provincial DPRD will earn income of Rp. 73.2 million with an income index of 12698. The deputy regent/mayor, deputy chairman of the provincial DPRD, the chairman of the regency/municipal DPRD have a salary of Rp. Rp. 66.3 million. Finally, for district/city DPRD members, the salary that will be obtained is Rp. 63.3 million with an income index of 10969. Public Policy Expert at the University of Padjadjaran (Unpad), Yogi Suprayogi, assessed that although it is only a simulation, the increase in state officials is irrelevant. obtained by state officials is now enough "It's enough because there is an additional operating allowance al It's big It's what he likes No need to grow up It's irrelevant," he explained According to him, if there must be an increase, the salaries of the president and central officials must be adjusted to the inflation rate. "We are also not a developed country. billion," he said. Yogi said that compared to the salaries of state officials, improving the salaries of civil servants is considered more important at this time. According to him, the material for the RPP for the salaries and benefits of handmaiden civil servants currently circulating is one of the scenarios that are simulated by the government. the technical rules of the ASN Law, one of which is the RPP Salary and Allowance Yogi emphasizes the importance of changing the salary scheme of civil servants. enlarged compared to the performance allowance. Currently the basic salary is smaller so that There are many civil servants going here and there to increase the performance allowance. Expensive allowance must be greater than the other two so that teachers are willing to be placed in remote areas. In addition, he also highlighted that the performance allowance must be based on performance. He reminded that no state should pay salaries based on education level. in some countries it is also partly performance-based In the United States, the salary of a civil servant in the State Department ranges from USD88000 to USD96000 per year However, the lowest government employee salary is USD18785 per year The number of civil servants in Uncle Sama's country reaches 2.79 million people. US president around USD400000 The presidential salary increase was very drastic in 2001 Previously the president's salary was only USD200000 Malaysian Prime Minister (PM) Najib Razak gave an annual bonus in 2018 to government employees amounting to 1.6 million In addition, he also provided a pension of 1000 ringgit per month y Those who have served for 25 years The salary of Malaysian civil servants who serve 1-4 years is around 36000 ringgit and those who have served for more than 10-19 years earn 70753 ringgit. The salary of civil servants who have just worked in Singapore is 3000 Singapore dollars per month. For a manager position, the salary is around SGD 8000. The number of employees in Singapore is 84,000. According to Thomas Friedman of the New York Times, public servants in Singapore are among the most efficient and uncorruptible bureaucrats. "They have high standards of discipline and accountability," said Friedman.

A reog Ponorogo at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao City, Philippines, was destroyed by burning on October 20, 2015. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City emphasized that this burning was not an attempt to destroy or eliminate Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. Extermination is carried out with care and respect. "I have checked Davao. Reog and the dragon's head are damaged and infested with termites," Foreign Minister Retno Marsudi said via spokesperson Arrmanatha Nasir to Metrotvnews.com, Saturday (31/10/2015). "So, there is no intention of destroying cultural objects and has nothing to do with idols," he continued. Currently, the Indonesian Consulate General put down in Davao City is communicating with parties in Indonesia to seek a new replacement for Ponorogo Reog.
berita_id: Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia di Kota Davao, Filipina, dihancurkan oleh pembakaran pada 20 Oktober 2015. Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao menekankan bahwa pembakaran ini bukanlah upaya untuk menghancurkan atau menghilangkan Reog Ponorogo sebagai asset budaya.Pemusnahan dilakukan dengan hati -hati dan hormat."Saya telah memeriksa Davao. Reog dan kepala naga rusak dan terinfeksi rayap," kata Menteri Luar Negeri Retno Marsudi melalui juru bicara Arrmanatha Nasir ke Metrotvnews.com, Sabtu (31/10/2015)."Jadi, tidak ada niat untuk menghancurkan benda -benda budaya dan tidak ada hubungannya dengan berhala," lanjutnya.Saat ini, Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia yang diletakkan di Kota Davao berkomunikasi dengan partai -partai di Indonesia untuk mencari pengganti baru untuk Ponorogo Reog.

berita: Currently circulating a toothbrush that turns out to be made from one part of the pig's body, namely the fur. The way to find it is to look on the toothbrush package to see if it says "China Bristles" or "Bristles". punk China Bristles is another name for sea urchins and is produced mostly by the Chinese region of China. We must know this because it is based on Imam Syafii's opinion that brushes made of sea urchins are unclean. Pig bristles are indeed the choice of toothbrush manufacturers because the price of the material is cheaper than synthetic bristles. Manufacturers only have to collect, clean and cut them. China is indeed a place that stocks a lot of pork skins because pork is considered halal by its people for consumption. It's not just a toothbrush that we have to watch out for, but a paint brush or a brush for greasing cakes must also be a concern for us as Muslims. A real example is the case of the Eterna brand brush which has been tested by LPPOM and the results are positive using sea urchins. Apart from looking at the packaging, there is another way to find out, namely by burning it. If the brush or brush smells bad, it's most likely using pig bristles. According to Imam Syafii, brushes made from pig bristles used to paint mosques will make the mosque covered with uncleanness and must be removed immediately. Moreover, if the sea urchin becomes a toothbrush that we use every day. Therefore, be careful and continue to be vigilant against various products that can bring harm to us as Muslims.
berita_id: Saat ini mengedarkan sikat gigi yang ternyata dibuat dari satu bagian tubuh babi, yaitu bulu.Cara untuk menemukannya adalah dengan melihat paket sikat gigi untuk melihat apakah dikatakan "bulu Cina" atau "bulu".Punk China Bristles adalah nama lain untuk landak laut dan sebagian besar diproduksi oleh wilayah Cina di Tiongkok.Kita harus mengetahui hal ini karena didasarkan pada pendapat Imam Syafii bahwa kuas yang terbuat dari landak laut adalah najis.Babi babi memang merupakan pilihan produsen sikat gigi karena harga bahan lebih murah daripada bulu sintetis.Produsen hanya perlu mengumpulkan, membersihkan, dan memotongnya.China memang merupakan tempat yang menyediakan banyak kulit babi karena babi dianggap halal oleh orang -orangnya untuk dikonsumsi.Bukan hanya sikat gigi yang harus kita waspadai, tetapi sikat cat atau kuas untuk kue yang berminyak juga harus menjadi perhatian bagi kita sebagai Muslim.Contoh nyata adalah kasus kuas merek Eterna yang telah diuji oleh LPPOM dan hasilnya positif menggunakan bulu babi.Selain melihat kemasannya, ada cara lain untuk mengetahuinya, yaitu dengan membakarnya.Jika kuas atau kuas berbau tidak enak, kemungkinan besar menggunakan bulu babi.Menurut Imam Syafii, kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi yang digunakan untuk melukis masjid akan membuat masjid ditutupi dengan kenajisan dan harus segera dihapus.Selain itu, jika landak laut menjadi sikat gigi yang kami gunakan setiap hari.Oleh karena itu, hati -hati dan terus waspada terhadap berbagai produk yang dapat membahayakan kita sebagai Muslim.

berita: Rumors circulated in cyberspace that there were toothbrush products that used pig bristles. It is mentioned that Muslim consumers should be careful of brushes with the words 'bristle' written on the packaging because it means sea urchin. Is this news true? The Institute for the Study of Food, Drugs and Cosmetics, the Indonesian Ulema Council (LPPOM MUI) on its official website, tries to explain that bristle does not always mean sea urchin. The meaning of the word bristle in general can mean all hair or stiff fibers. "Hair, stiff beard, can be categorized as bristle. Another example is fibers or stiff pine leaves that can be called bristle," wrote LPPOM MUI quoted on Tuesday (1/11/2016). "One of the information that can be seen as a sign that a brush or brush comes from sea urchins is that it is written as a product name, for example 'Boar Bristle Brush'. Boar is an English term for wild boar or wild boar. This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles ," continued LPPOM MUI. drg Eva Fauziah from the Indonesian Pediatric Dentist Association (IDGAI) commented that the toothbrush in the market generally uses nylon bristles. Nylon as it is ache known is a synthetic fiber made from plastic. "Toothbrush bristles are usually made of nylon," said drg Eva when detikHealth met. If someone is suspicious of a toothbrush product, there are ways that can be done to determine whether the brush is made of animal hair or other materials. Simply burn the tip of the brush and smell if it smells like burning hair or horns. "If it smells like burning hair or horns, it's better to leave it alone. Materials from plastic or coconut fiber don't give off a distinctive smell like that when burned," closed LPPOM MUI. In the broadcast circulating through WhatsApp groups and social media, a picture of the back of the toothbrush product packaging is included. However, it seems that the product is not marketed for the Indonesian market. The broadcaster circled the word bristles in the toothbrush packaging while explaining its meaning.
berita_id: Rumor yang diedarkan di dunia maya bahwa ada produk sikat gigi yang menggunakan bulu babi.Disebutkan bahwa konsumen Muslim harus berhati -hati dengan sikat dengan kata -kata 'bulu' yang ditulis pada kemasan karena itu berarti landak laut.Apakah berita ini benar?Institut untuk studi tentang makanan, obat -obatan dan kosmetik, Dewan Ulama Indonesia (LPPOM MUI) di situs web resminya, mencoba menjelaskan bahwa Bristle tidak selalu berarti landak laut.Arti kata bulu secara umum dapat berarti semua rambut atau serat kaku."Rambut, jenggot kaku, dapat dikategorikan sebagai bulu. Contoh lain adalah serat atau daun pinus kaku yang dapat disebut bristle," tulis LPPOM MUI yang dikutip pada hari Selasa (1/11/2016)."Salah satu informasi yang dapat dilihat sebagai tanda bahwa kuas atau kuas berasal dari landak laut adalah bahwa itu ditulis sebagai nama produk, misalnya 'Babi Belas Bulu'. Boar adalah istilah bahasa Inggris untuk babi hutan atau babi hutan. Ini berarti bahwa produk adalah sikat yang menggunakan bulu babi liar," lanjut LPPOM MUI.DRG Eva Fauziah dari Asosiasi Dokter Gigi Anak Indonesia (IDGAI) berkomentar bahwa sikat gigi di pasar umumnya menggunakan bulu nilon.Nylon seperti yang diketahui adalah serat sintetis yang terbuat dari plastik."Bulu sikat gigi biasanya terbuat dari nilon," kata Drg Eva ketika Detikhealth bertemu.Jika seseorang curiga terhadap produk sikat gigi, ada cara yang dapat dilakukan untuk menentukan apakah sikat terbuat dari rambut hewani atau bahan lainnya.Cukup bakar ujung sikat dan bau jika baunya seperti rambut atau tanduk yang terbakar."Jika baunya seperti rambut atau tanduk yang terbakar, lebih baik membiarkannya sendiri. Bahan -bahan dari plastik atau serat kelapa tidak mengeluarkan aroma khas seperti itu ketika dibakar," tutup LPPOM MUI.Dalam siaran yang beredar melalui grup WhatsApp dan media sosial, gambar bagian belakang kemasan produk sikat gigi disertakan.Namun, tampaknya produk tersebut tidak dipasarkan untuk pasar Indonesia.Penyiar itu mengelilingi kata bulu -bulu dalam kemasan sikat gigi sambil menjelaskan maknanya.

berita: The National Police emphasized that the trigger for the rioting of terrorist prisoners at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters, Depok, West Java, was because prisoners did not accept having their cell phones raided. The police pull someones leg will pursue the perpetrators who spread hoax news about the throwing of the Koran. "That (the issue of throwing the Koran) is a hoax. We will find (the perpetrator)," said Head of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Inspector General Setyo Wasisto at the National Police Headquarters, Jalan Trunojoyo, Kebayoran Baru, South Jakarta, Monday (11/13/2017). The hoax news through the chain message circulated on Friday (10/11) after the riot at the Brimob Mako Prison occurred. Setyo said the fake news was provocative and dangerous. "We'll find out who uploaded it later. If it's the news that provokes the danger," said Setyo. Setyo appealed to the public not to be easily provoked by fake news. "This can damage, cause noise, and even cause victims if you are not careful," said Setyo. The Head of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Public Relations Division, Kombes Martinus Sitompul, explained that the riot at the Brimob Headquarters was because the detainees did not receive their cellphones, which were secured by officers. In fact, it is the rule that detainees are not allowed to bring communication devices. "It's just that they are psychologically dissatisfied because their communication tools were taken. Already the SOP for communication tools is not there," explained Martinus.
berita_id: Polisi Nasional menekankan bahwa pemicu kerusuhan para tahanan teroris di markas Brigade Mobile, Depok, Jawa Barat, adalah karena para tahanan tidak menerima ponsel mereka digerebek.Polisi menarik kaki seseorang akan mengejar pelaku yang menyebarkan berita tipuan tentang lemparan Alquran."Itu (masalah melempar Alquran) adalah tipuan. Kami akan menemukan (pelaku)," kata kepala divisi hubungan masyarakat dari Inspektur Jenderal Kepolisian Nasional Setyo Wasisto di markas kepolisian nasional, Jalan Trunojoyo, Kebayoran Baru, Jakarta Selatan, Senin (11/13/2017).Berita tipuan melalui pesan rantai yang diedarkan pada hari Jumat (10/11) setelah kerusuhan di penjara Brimob Mako terjadi.Setyo mengatakan berita palsu itu provokatif dan berbahaya."Kami akan mengetahui siapa yang mengunggahnya nanti. Jika itu adalah berita yang memicu bahaya," kata Setyo.Setyo memohon kepada publik untuk tidak mudah diprovokasi oleh berita palsu."Ini dapat merusak, menyebabkan kebisingan, dan bahkan menyebabkan korban jika Anda tidak hati -hati," kata Setyo.Kepala Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Kepolisian Nasional, Kombes Martinus Sitompul, menjelaskan bahwa kerusuhan di markas Brimob adalah karena tahanan tidak menerima ponsel mereka, yang diamankan oleh petugas.Bahkan, itu adalah aturan bahwa tahanan tidak diizinkan membawa perangkat komunikasi."Hanya saja mereka secara psikologis tidak puas karena alat komunikasi mereka diambil. Sudah SOP untuk alat komunikasi tidak ada di sana," jelas Martinus.

berita: This news may be very useful for Indonesian consumers who intend to buy the iPhone 6 Plus when it is released in the Indonesian market later. After a few days of being released in a number of countries, Apple's brand-new 5.5-inch jumbo smartphone began to reap protests from users. According to reports by some iPhone 6 Plus users, the iPhone with the largest sail turns out to be easy to bend if it's kept in a trouser pocket for too long. This incident was first reported by an iPhone 6 owner named Hanzon on the MacRumors forum site. He admitted that he kept the iPhone 6 Plus in his trouser pocket for approximately 4 hours, and carried out daily activities as usual. When taken out, Hanzon was surprised when he saw that the center of his iPhone 6 Plus was slightly 'bent', aka curved. Not only Hanzon, the MacRumors page launched, another user named Devin Pitcher also expressed a similar complaint on the forum. Devin admitted that he kept his new iPhone 6 Plus in his front trouser pocket. When removed, the center of the iPhone 6 Plus is curved like a tank that can withstand pressure. The use of a large 5.5-inch screen is indeed feared to interfere with user comfort. Apple has also anticipated by moving the Power button which is usually placed at the top to the right side to make it rectify easier to use with one hand. But the problem of large dimensions limiting user comfort when storing it in a trouser pocket does not seem to have occurred to Apple. In addition, Apple is also considered to have made a mistake by choosing a metal-aluminum mixture that is not too solid as the base material for the iPhone 6 Plus frame. Maybe the Iphone Frame has not passed the UTM (Universal Testing Machine) Test. The UTM test functions to test the iPhone 6 plus frame by pressing and pulling it to the maximum limit. If the force needed to bend the iPhone is small, it means it is easy to bend What is UTM? Universal Testing Machine is a testing machine to test tensile stress and compressive strength of materials or materials. Universal Testing Machine, usually also known as Universal Tester, Materials Testing Machine or Materials Test Frame. This testing machine has proven that it can perform many standard tensile and compression tests on materials, components and structures
berita_id: Berita ini mungkin sangat berguna bagi konsumen Indonesia yang berniat membeli iPhone 6 Plus ketika dirilis di pasar Indonesia nanti.Setelah beberapa hari dirilis di sejumlah negara, smartphone Jumbo 5,5 inci baru dari Apple mulai menuai protes dari pengguna.Menurut laporan oleh beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone dengan layar terbesar ternyata mudah ditekuk jika terlalu lama disimpan di saku celana panjang.Insiden ini pertama kali dilaporkan oleh pemilik iPhone 6 bernama Hanzon di situs Forum MacRumors.Dia mengakui bahwa dia menyimpan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana panjangnya selama sekitar 4 jam, dan melakukan kegiatan sehari -hari seperti biasa.Ketika dikeluarkan, Hanzon terkejut ketika dia melihat bahwa pusat iPhone 6 -nya sedikit 'bengkok', alias melengkung.Tidak hanya Hanzon, halaman MacRumors diluncurkan, pengguna lain bernama Devin Pitcher juga menyatakan keluhan serupa di forum tersebut.Devin mengakui bahwa ia menyimpan iPhone 6 Plus barunya di saku celana depannya.Saat dilepas, pusat iPhone 6 Plus melengkung seperti tangki yang dapat menahan tekanan.Penggunaan layar 5,5 inci besar memang ditakuti untuk mengganggu kenyamanan pengguna.Apple juga telah diantisipasi dengan memindahkan tombol daya yang biasanya ditempatkan di bagian atas ke sisi kanan untuk membuatnya lebih mudah digunakan dengan satu tangan.Tetapi masalah dimensi besar yang membatasi kenyamanan pengguna saat menyimpannya di saku celana tampaknya tidak terpikir oleh Apple.Selain itu, Apple juga dianggap telah membuat kesalahan dengan memilih campuran logam-aluminium yang tidak terlalu padat sebagai bahan dasar untuk bingkai iPhone 6 Plus.Mungkin bingkai iPhone belum lulus uji UTM (mesin pengujian universal).Uji UTM berfungsi untuk menguji bingkai iPhone 6 Plus dengan menekan dan menariknya ke batas maksimum.Jika kekuatan yang dibutuhkan untuk menekuk iPhone kecil, itu berarti mudah untuk menekuk apa itu UTM?Mesin pengujian universal adalah mesin pengujian untuk menguji tegangan tarik dan kekuatan tekan bahan atau bahan.Mesin pengujian universal, biasanya juga dikenal sebagai penguji universal, mesin pengujian bahan atau bingkai uji bahan.Mesin pengujian ini telah membuktikan bahwa ia dapat melakukan banyak tes tarik dan kompresi standar pada bahan, komponen dan struktur

berita: Wakoka.Co.Id – The demonstration was held today in Ponorogo square, Tuesday (10/11/2015), by several elements of the Ponorogo community consisting of Reyog Artists, Reyog Community, Reyog Pandemen and Ponorogo Citizens Association. This demonstration was carried out in connection with the reyog burning case at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines some time ago. In the demonstration, apart from giving speeches, the demonstrators also brought along several Reyog groups to enliven the action. As previously reported, the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao on October 20, 2015 burned the Ponorogo reyog art equipment stored in the Indonesian Consulate General's building. Although the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao issued a statement that the destruction of the Ponorogo reog by burning was carried out because its condition had been damaged and eaten by termites. However, the photos that circulated virally sealed and have even been distributed by local online media Bitung News, show that there was a certain ritual before the burning. One of the photos also shows that before being burned, the Ponorogo reog was stored in a glass cabinet and appeared to be in good condition. Apart from the reog, in another photo, it appears that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao removed the dragon ornaments on the gamelan set and then also burned it. Representatives of the demonstrators were then met by PJ Regent of Ponorogo, and Chairman of the Ponorogo Regency DPRD on the 2nd floor of the Ponorogo DPRD building to convey their aspirations. Several representatives of the demonstrators then delivered a statement of attitude that strongly condemned the burning of reyog art instruments at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao. The demonstrators also demanded the removal of the individuals involved in the incident and demanded the government through the tourism office and the Ponorogo DPRD to thoroughly investigate the case. Responding to this, PJ Regent of Ponorogo, Ir. Maskur, MM said that the Regency Government had coordinated with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemlu). The Ministry of Foreign Affairs will replace the Reyog device that has been burned and is currently investigating the case through the Special Team. Previously, the Jabodetabek Reog Community had also sent an official letter to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines, asking for clarification on information on the burning of reyog art instruments by Indonesian Consulate General officials.
berita_id: Wakoka.co.id - Demonstrasi diadakan hari ini di Ponorogo Square, Selasa (10/11/2015), oleh beberapa elemen komunitas Ponorogo yang terdiri dari seniman Reyog, komunitas Reyog, Reyog Pandemen dan Ponorogo Citizens Association.Demonstrasi ini dilakukan sehubungan dengan kasus Reyog Burning di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina beberapa waktu lalu.Dalam demonstrasi, selain memberikan pidato, para demonstran juga membawa beberapa kelompok Reyog untuk menghidupkan tindakan tersebut.Seperti yang dilaporkan sebelumnya, Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao pada 20 Oktober 2015 membakar peralatan seni Ponorogo Reyog yang disimpan di gedung Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia.Meskipun Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao mengeluarkan pernyataan bahwa penghancuran Ponorogo Reog dengan pembakaran dilakukan karena kondisinya telah rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Namun, foto -foto yang beredar disegel secara virus dan bahkan telah didistribusikan oleh media online Bitung News, menunjukkan bahwa ada ritual tertentu sebelum pembakaran.Salah satu foto juga menunjukkan bahwa sebelum dibakar, Ponorogo Reog disimpan dalam lemari kaca dan tampak dalam kondisi baik.Terlepas dari reog, di foto lain, tampaknya konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao menghapus ornamen naga pada set gamelan dan kemudian juga membakarnya.Perwakilan dari para demonstran kemudian dipenuhi oleh PJ Bupati Ponorogo, dan ketua DPRD Kabupaten Ponorogo di lantai 2 gedung Ponorogo DPRD untuk menyampaikan aspirasi mereka.Beberapa perwakilan dari para demonstran kemudian menyampaikan pernyataan sikap yang sangat mengutuk pembakaran instrumen seni Reyog di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao.Para demonstran juga menuntut penghapusan orang -orang yang terlibat dalam insiden tersebut dan menuntut pemerintah melalui kantor pariwisata dan Ponorogo DPRD untuk menyelidiki kasus tersebut secara menyeluruh.Menanggapi ini, PJ Bupati Ponorogo, Ir.Maskur, MM mengatakan bahwa pemerintah Kabupaten telah berkoordinasi dengan Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemlu).Kementerian Luar Negeri akan menggantikan perangkat Reyog yang telah dibakar dan saat ini sedang menyelidiki kasus ini melalui tim khusus.Sebelumnya, komunitas Reog Jabodetabek juga telah mengirim surat resmi kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina, meminta klarifikasi tentang informasi tentang pembakaran instrumen seni Reyog oleh pejabat umum konsulat Indonesia.

berita: Jakarta - Social media this morning was enlivened by the circulation of photos of participants from the 212th volume 2 demonstration unable to enter the Istiqlal Mosque. In the scattered photos, it looks like there is a group lining up in front of the Istiqlal entrance gate. The Head of Protocol and Public Relations of handler the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam, said that the news that the 212 volume 2 crowd was stuck at the gate was a hoax. "The news that there were 212 protesters unable to enter Istiqlal is a thousand percent hoax," said Abu when confirmed by AFP on Tuesday (21/2/2017). According to Abu, indeed on Monday night, after Isha there were three group buses that entered the Istiqlal Mosque. They claimed to be a group from Madura Island. Mosque administrators, said Abu, invited them to worship and clean themselves. The Istiqlal Mosque administrator then coordinated with the group leader accompanied by the police. "After talking that they then voluntarily left Istiqlal," said Abu. Then according to the procedure, the Istiqlal mosque, outside the month of Ramadan, is closed at 21.30 WIB. "According to the SOP, the Istiqlal Mosque is closed every day at 09.30 WIB and reopens one hour before the dawn prayer, at around 3:45 WIB," said Abu. Regarding the photo, there was a queue of worshipers at the Istiqlal gate, Abu said it was a group of pilgrims from outside the city who were about to enter Istiqlal. The manager also apologized if they were queuing at the gate, because the door was only opened at 03.45 WIB or an hour before the Fajr prayer. "In the morning before dawn, Tuesday, February 21 2017, there were several pilgrims from outside the city who were about to enter the Istiqlal Mosque and they arrived before the doors of the Istiqlal Mosque opened at 3:45 WIB. We apologize for this," said Abu. The implementation of the Fajr prayer at the Istiqlal Mosque today, said Abu, went well, with the imam, Mr. Ust. Salim Ghazali. The number of worshipers is about 240 people, consisting of, 170 men and 70 women.
berita_id: JAKARTA - Media sosial pagi ini dimeriahkan oleh sirkulasi foto peserta dari demonstrasi Volume 2 ke -212 yang tidak dapat memasuki masjid Istiqlal.Dalam foto -foto yang tersebar, sepertinya ada grup yang berbaris di depan gerbang masuk ISTIQLAL.Kepala protokol dan hubungan masyarakat dari pawang masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam, mengatakan bahwa berita bahwa kerumunan Volume 2 yang macet di gerbang itu adalah tipuan."Berita bahwa ada 212 pengunjuk rasa yang tidak dapat memasuki Istiqlal adalah tipuan seribu persen," kata Abu ketika dikonfirmasi oleh AFP pada hari Selasa (21/2/2017).Menurut Abu, memang pada Senin malam, setelah Isha ada tiga bus kelompok yang memasuki masjid Istiqlal.Mereka mengaku sebagai kelompok dari Pulau Madura.Administrator masjid, kata Abu, mengundang mereka untuk beribadah dan membersihkan diri.Administrator Masjid Istiqlal kemudian berkoordinasi dengan pemimpin kelompok yang disertai oleh polisi."Setelah berbicara bahwa mereka kemudian secara sukarela meninggalkan Istiqlal," kata Abu.Kemudian menurut prosedur, masjid Istiqlal, di luar bulan Ramadhan, ditutup pada 21.30 WIB."Menurut SOP, masjid Istiqlal ditutup setiap hari pada pukul 09.30 WIB dan dibuka kembali satu jam sebelum doa fajar, sekitar pukul 3:45 WIB," kata Abu.Mengenai foto itu, ada antrian para penyembah di gerbang Istiqlal, Abu mengatakan itu adalah sekelompok peziarah dari luar kota yang akan memasuki Istiqlal.Manajer juga meminta maaf jika mereka mengantri di gerbang, karena pintunya hanya dibuka pada 03.45 WIB atau satu jam sebelum doa Fajr."Di pagi hari sebelum fajar, Selasa, 21 Februari 2017, ada beberapa peziarah dari luar kota yang akan memasuki masjid Istiqlal dan mereka tiba di depan pintu masjid Istiqlal dibuka pada pukul 3:45 Wib. Kami meminta maaf untuk ini," kata Abu.Implementasi Doa Fajr di Masjid Istiqlal hari ini, kata Abu, berjalan dengan baik, dengan Imam, Tuan Ust.Salim Ghazali.Jumlah penyembah adalah sekitar 240 orang, terdiri dari, 170 pria dan 70 wanita.

berita: The riot took place at the Brimob Mako Detention Center, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java. The commotion that occurred in the detention center for terrorists caused a number of prison facilities to be damaged. Mako Brimob Terrorist Prison This news was confirmed by the Head of the Public Information Bureau of the National Police Public Relations Division, general Brigadier General Rikwanto, who explained that the commotion occurred on Friday (11/10/2017), around 16.00 WIB. "On Friday, November 10 2017, at 16.00 WIB there was a commotion at the Mako Brimob terrorist detention center Salemba prison branch carried out by terrorist prisoners," said Rikwanto. A number of prison facilities, such as the door of the detention cell, the gate of the block hallway and the window panes in Block C and Block B were damaged. Rikwanto also added that the situation was now under control. Regarding the issue that had been spread which stated that the cause of the riot was because of the throwing of the Koran by officers, Rikwanto asserted that it was a hoax.
berita_id: Kerusuhan itu terjadi di Pusat Penahanan Brimob Mako, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat.Keributan yang terjadi di Pusat Penahanan untuk Teroris menyebabkan sejumlah fasilitas penjara rusak.Penjara Teroris Mako Brimob Berita ini dikonfirmasi oleh kepala Biro Informasi Publik Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Polisi Nasional, Jenderal Brigadir Jenderal Rikwanto, yang menjelaskan bahwa keributan itu terjadi pada hari Jumat (11/10/2017), sekitar 16.00 WIB."Pada hari Jumat, 10 November 2017, pukul 16.00 WIB ada keributan di Pusat Penahanan Teroris Mako Brimob Cabang Penjara Salemba yang dilakukan oleh para tahanan teroris," kata Rikwanto.Sejumlah fasilitas penjara, seperti pintu sel penahanan, gerbang lorong blok dan panel jendela di blok C dan blok B rusak.Rikwanto juga menambahkan bahwa situasinya sekarang terkendali.Mengenai masalah yang telah disebarkan yang menyatakan bahwa penyebab kerusuhan itu karena lemparan Alquran oleh petugas, Rikwanto menegaskan bahwa itu adalah tipuan.

berita: The news that participants cannot enter Istiqlal because they are locked is a HOAX Posted on February 21, 2017 by RD liberty Related Post HTI is often opposed by Anshor and NU, this is Ustaz Bachtiar Nasir's comment Some Accidents in Ansor Day Festival This is the preparation for the arrival of Habib Rizieq to Siak Din Syamsuddin Asked To Prepare To Lead People's Resistance If Ahok Is Free Ahok Team Slandered Muslims as Rioters "Destroyed China", Aa Gym Protests Strongly Photos of participants of Action 212 Volume Two circulated on social media who could not enter the Istiqlal Mosque this morning because the mosque doors were closed. According to the mosque management, the rumors circulating are not true. "It's a thousand percent hoax," said Head of the Protocol Section of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam to Republika.co.id Tuesday (21/2) morning. He explained, the rules at the Istiqlal Mosque other than the month of Ramadan, the mosque closes at 21.30 WIB. Opened again one hour before Fajr time. In the month of Ramadan, the mosque is open 24 hours. He said, for last night's case, there were indeed five bus participants who came from East Java. They claimed to come from Madura. Participants enter the mosque after Isha time. The mosque provides opportunities for worship and cleaning. "After approaching 10 (evening), we met with the head of his entourage, we announced to his entourage that the rules at Istiqlal, this mosque will be closed and will be opened again one hour before Fajr," he said. Abu explained, the group from East Java understood and understood. The mosque management waited for them to leave the Istiqlal Mosque voluntarily. Then at 03.40 WIB the mosque was reopened. "And what's in the photo, it looks like people are queuing to enter, it's the Wali Songo pilgrimage group and school children, that's normal, they go to stopping point Istiqlal every day," he explained. He emphasized that the conclusion was that the news circulating on Instagram, Twitter and other social media was a lie.
berita_id: Berita bahwa peserta tidak dapat memasuki istiqlal karena mereka terkunci adalah tipuan yang diposting pada 21 Februari 2017 oleh pos RD Liberty Terkait HTI sering ditentang oleh Anshor dan Nu, ini adalah Komentar Ustaz Bachtiar Nasir yang diminta oleh Syam.Tim Ahok memfitnah umat Islam sebagai perusuh "menghancurkan Cina", AA Gym memprotes foto -foto peserta aksi 212 volume dua yang beredar di media sosial yang tidak bisa memasuki masjid Istiqlal pagi ini karena pintu masjid ditutup.Menurut manajemen masjid, rumor yang beredar tidak benar."Ini adalah tipuan seribu persen," kata kepala bagian protokol dari masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam ke Republika.co.id Selasa (21/2) pagi.Dia menjelaskan, aturan di Masjid Istiqlal selain bulan Ramadhan, masjid ditutup pada 21,30 WIB.Dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum waktu Fajr.Di bulan Ramadhan, masjid buka 24 jam.Dia mengatakan, untuk kasus tadi malam, memang ada lima peserta bus yang datang dari Jawa Timur.Mereka mengaku datang dari Madura.Peserta memasuki masjid setelah waktu Isha.Masjid ini memberikan kesempatan untuk beribadah dan membersihkan."Setelah mendekati 10 (malam), kami bertemu dengan kepala rombongannya, kami mengumumkan kepada rombongannya bahwa aturan di Istiqlal, masjid ini akan ditutup dan akan dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum Fajr," katanya.Abu menjelaskan, kelompok dari Jawa Timur memahami dan memahami.Manajemen masjid menunggu mereka meninggalkan masjid Istiqlal secara sukarela.Kemudian pada 03.40 WIB masjid dibuka kembali."Dan apa yang ada di foto, sepertinya orang -orang mengantri untuk masuk, itu adalah kelompok ziarah Wali Songo dan anak -anak sekolah, itu normal, mereka pergi ke titik berhenti Istiqlal setiap hari," jelasnya.Dia menekankan bahwa kesimpulannya adalah bahwa berita yang beredar di Instagram, Twitter dan media sosial lainnya adalah bohong.

berita: A number of terrorist prisoners at the Kelapa Dua Detention Center, Depok, West Java were involved in a commotion, which caused damage to a number of facilities at the detention center. Rumors circulated that the commotion was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by officers from Densus 88 Anti-terror. This news was denied by the Head of the Public Information Division of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Headquarters, Senior Commissioner Martinus Sitompul. The former Head of Public Relations of the Polda Metro Jaya confirmed that the commotion was suspected to be a search by officers of a number of terrorist prisoners. "It is not true that there was a throwing of the Koran by the guard," said Martinus in a written statement, Friday, November 10 2017. At the time of the incident, said Martinus, what the officers did was to check the books and objects in the cell. ''What is there is that the officers conducted an examination of the books and objects in the cell,'' he said. Previously, information was circulating on social networks that this commotion was suspected to put down have been caused by the throwing of the Koran by officers. Because of that, the prisoners then went on a rampage and damaged a number of detention facilities. "There has been a riot at the Headquarters of Brimob Kelapa Dua, two depots where terrorist prisoners burned and destroyed the room because the guard Ahmad and his team threw the Koran and caused the prisoners to go berserk," reads a fragment of information that is suspected to be a hoax, circulating in the public. Security Tightened Meanwhile, since the commotion in the area of ​​Blocks C and B of the Mobile Brigade Headquarters, Kelapa Dua Depok, at the location until Friday night, several officers were seen on guard. A Baracuda car and a number of motorized police officers dressed in all black were seen entering the Mobile Brigade Headquarters, Kelapa Dua Depok, on guard. There is no explanation about the tightening of this security by the police. The officers on standby even asked the media crew to stay away from the location. ''Go, not here,'' said an officer while asking a number of media crew who were at the main gate of Mako Brimob Depok to leave.
berita_id: Sejumlah tahanan teroris di Pusat Penahanan Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat terlibat dalam keributan, yang menyebabkan kerusakan pada sejumlah fasilitas di pusat penahanan.Rumor beredar bahwa keributan dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh petugas dari Densus 88 Anti-teror.Berita ini ditolak oleh kepala Divisi Informasi Publik Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat dari Markas Kepolisian Nasional, Komisaris Senior Martinus Sitompul.Mantan kepala hubungan masyarakat Metro Polda Jaya mengkonfirmasi bahwa keributan itu dicurigai sebagai pencarian oleh petugas dari sejumlah tahanan teroris."Tidak benar bahwa ada lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga," kata Martinus dalam sebuah pernyataan tertulis, Jumat, 10 November 2017. Pada saat insiden itu, kata Martinus, apa yang dilakukan petugas adalah memeriksa buku dan benda di dalam sel.'' Apa yang ada bahwa para petugas melakukan pemeriksaan buku dan benda -benda di dalam sel, '' katanya.Sebelumnya, informasi beredar di jejaring sosial yang diduga keributan ini disebabkan oleh lemparan Alquran oleh petugas.Karena itu, para tahanan kemudian mengamuk dan merusak sejumlah fasilitas penahanan."Telah ada kerusuhan di markas Brimob Kelapa Dua, dua depot di mana tahanan teroris membakar dan menghancurkan ruangan itu karena penjaga Ahmad dan timnya melemparkan Alquran dan menyebabkan para tahanan mengamuk," membaca sebuah fragmen informasi yang diduga menjadi tipuan, beredar di publik.Sementara itu, keamanan diperketat, karena keributan di area blok C dan B dari markas Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua Depok, di lokasi hingga Jumat malam, beberapa petugas terlihat berjaga -jaga.Sebuah mobil Baracuda dan sejumlah petugas polisi bermotor yang berpakaian hitam terlihat memasuki markas Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua Depok, berjaga -jaga.Tidak ada penjelasan tentang pengetatan keamanan ini oleh polisi.Para petugas siaga bahkan meminta kru media untuk menjauh dari lokasi.'' Pergi, tidak di sini, '' kata seorang petugas sambil meminta sejumlah kru media yang berada di gerbang utama Mako Brimob Depok untuk pergi.

berita: Jakarta - When Apple launched the iPhone 6 Plus as the largest iPhone with a screen size of 5.5 inches, many were worried that it would make it difficult for users to put it in their pants pockets. The fear was finally proven. Indeed, this is not a big part, but some iPhone 6 Plus users who put the device in their trouser pockets are forced to accept the fact that the curved part of their iPhone 6 Plus is. As told by a Macrumors Forum user named Hanzon. He admitted that it took him a long time to put the iPhone 6 Plus in his commit front trouser pocket. At least 4 hours the device is in the pocket. While in the pants, Hanzon did not take out the iPhone 6 Plus and continued his usual activities as usual. As a result, he found the middle of his new smartphone was a bit 'bent'. DevinPitcher also had a bad experience. He also put his iPhone 6 Plus in his front pocket. It's not clear how long he kept it, which was clear enough to make him warp. Thus quoted detikINET from Macrumors, Wednesday (24/9/2014). There has been no official confirmation from Apple regarding the issue. But what is clear is that this is the reason for iPhone 6 Plus users to be careful about placing their latest iDevice.
berita_id: Jakarta - Ketika Apple meluncurkan iPhone 6 Plus sebagai iPhone terbesar dengan ukuran layar 5,5 inci, banyak yang khawatir akan menyulitkan pengguna untuk memasukkannya ke dalam saku celana mereka.Ketakutan akhirnya terbukti.Memang, ini bukan bagian besar, tetapi beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 plus yang menempatkan perangkat di kantong celana mereka dipaksa untuk menerima fakta bahwa bagian melengkung dari iPhone 6 Plus mereka.Seperti yang diceritakan oleh pengguna forum MacRumors bernama Hanzon.Dia mengakui bahwa butuh waktu lama baginya untuk menempatkan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana depan komit.Setidaknya 4 jam perangkat ada di saku.Saat berada di celana, Hanzon tidak mengeluarkan iPhone 6 Plus dan melanjutkan kegiatannya yang biasa seperti biasa.Akibatnya, ia menemukan bagian tengah smartphone barunya sedikit 'bengkok'.Devinpitcher juga memiliki pengalaman buruk.Dia juga meletakkan iPhone 6 Plus di saku depannya.Tidak jelas berapa lama dia menyimpannya, yang cukup jelas untuk membuatnya melengkung.Demikian dikutip Detikinet dari Macrumors, Rabu (24/9/2014).Belum ada konfirmasi resmi dari Apple mengenai masalah ini.Tapi yang jelas adalah bahwa ini adalah alasan bagi pengguna iPhone 6 Plus untuk berhati -hati dalam menempatkan iDevice terbaru mereka.

berita: If the iPhone 4s has a fatal problem in the form of a decrease in antenna function, then the latest iPhone series is threatened with problems in terms of design. One iPhone 6 Plus consumer reported that his favorite iPhone looks curved after some time of use. Almost a week after the first wave of iPhone 6 Plus entered the market and began to be used around the world, a technology news portal writer, Russel Holly admitted that his iPhone 6 Plus was caught curving at the front of the screen. The complaint from Holly was filed after several similar complaints appeared in a virtual world forum, Ars Technica (24/09). Based on the analysis results from Holly's report, it is very likely that his iPhone 6 Plus is curved due to pressure from the pocket and exposure to body heat that makes the smartphone body expand. The combination of these two factors is claimed to make it easier for the iPhone 6 Plus which does have wide and thin dimensions to curve. Several other reports state that their iPhone 6 Plus bends after being put in a back pocket and used for activities such as complaint sitting to dancing. Only a dozen hours later, the iPhone 6 Plus looks curved but can still be used smoothly. Apple itself has not issued their official confirmation regarding the potential for the iPhone 6 or iPhone 6 Plus to bend after a certain period of use. Not a few parties claim that it could be a design error that makes the iPhone 6 bent. The issue of the curved iPhone 6 Plus will give Apple a bad image if later this case becomes an 'epidemic' among its users. The company led by Tim Cook certainly doesn't want the case of mass damage to the iPhone 4s antenna to repeat itself in one of the best products made under the era of the new CEO of Apple.
