berita_id: Jika iPhone 4S memiliki masalah fatal dalam bentuk penurunan fungsi antena, maka seri iPhone terbaru terancam dengan masalah dalam hal desain.Satu konsumen iPhone 6 Plus melaporkan bahwa iPhone favoritnya terlihat melengkung setelah beberapa saat digunakan.Hampir seminggu setelah gelombang pertama iPhone 6 Plus memasuki pasar dan mulai digunakan di seluruh dunia, seorang penulis portal berita teknologi, Russel Holly mengakui bahwa iPhone 6 Plus -nya tertangkap melengkung di bagian depan layar.Keluhan dari Holly diajukan setelah beberapa keluhan serupa muncul di forum dunia virtual, ARS Technica (24/09).Berdasarkan hasil analisis dari laporan Holly, sangat mungkin bahwa iPhone 6 Plus -nya melengkung karena tekanan dari saku dan paparan panas tubuh yang membuat tubuh smartphone mengembang.Kombinasi dari kedua faktor ini diklaim memudahkan iPhone 6 Plus yang memang memiliki dimensi lebar dan tipis untuk melengkung.Beberapa laporan lain menyatakan bahwa iPhone 6 mereka ditambah tikungan setelah dimasukkan ke dalam saku belakang dan digunakan untuk kegiatan seperti keluhan yang duduk untuk menari.Hanya selusin jam kemudian, iPhone 6 Plus terlihat melengkung tetapi masih dapat digunakan dengan lancar.Apple sendiri belum mengeluarkan konfirmasi resmi mereka mengenai potensi iPhone 6 atau iPhone 6 Plus untuk menekuk setelah periode penggunaan tertentu.Tidak sedikit pihak yang mengklaim bahwa itu bisa menjadi kesalahan desain yang membuat iPhone 6 ditekuk.Masalah iPhone 6 Plus yang melengkung akan memberi Apple gambar yang buruk jika nanti kasus ini menjadi 'epidemi' di antara penggunanya.Perusahaan yang dipimpin oleh Tim Cook tentu tidak ingin kasus kerusakan massa pada antena iPhone 4S mengulangi sendiri di salah satu produk terbaik yang dibuat di bawah era CEO baru Apple.

berita: The Head of the General Information Section (Kabagpenum) of the National Police, Kombes Pol. Martinus Sitompul, denied the issue of the throwing of the Koran by the guard at the Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba Branch, Central Jakarta, Friday (11/10/2017). The Mako Brimob Prison Salemba Branch riots. "It is not true that the Koran was thrown by the guard," said Kombes Martinus in a text message, Friday night. Martinus precondition explained that what happened was that the guard checked a number of books and objects in the detention cell. According to him, the riot that occurred on Friday afternoon was triggered by the inmates who did not accept the officers' search of their rooms. "The turmoil that occurred was a reaction to the actions taken by guard officers who confiscated cell phones belonging to Block C detainees," he said. During the search, four cell phones belonging to four terrorist convicts were found, namely Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam and Jumali. A number of angry Block B and Block C inmates then broke the cell door. Not only that, a number of facilities at the Salemba detention center were also damaged, including the gates of Block B and Block C hallways and their windows. Martinus added that the condition of the prison is now back to being conducive. "The detention center is conducive and the prisoners are calm," he said
berita_id: Kepala Bagian Informasi Umum (Kabagpenum) dari Polisi Nasional, Kombes Pol.Martinus Sitompul, membantah masalah pelemparan Alquran oleh penjaga di cabang Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba, Jakarta Tengah, Jumat (11/10/2017).Penjara Mako Brimob kerusuhan cabang Salemba."Tidak benar bahwa Alquran dilemparkan oleh penjaga," kata Kombes Martinus dalam sebuah pesan teks, Jumat malam.Martinus Precondition menjelaskan bahwa apa yang terjadi adalah bahwa penjaga memeriksa sejumlah buku dan objek di sel penahanan.Menurutnya, kerusuhan yang terjadi pada hari Jumat sore dipicu oleh para tahanan yang tidak menerima pencarian petugas di kamar mereka."Gejolak yang terjadi adalah reaksi terhadap tindakan yang diambil oleh petugas penjaga yang menyita telepon seluler milik tahanan blok C," katanya.Selama pencarian, empat ponsel milik empat narapidana teroris ditemukan, yaitu Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam dan Jumali.Sejumlah narapidana Blok B dan Blok C kemudian memecahkan pintu sel.Tidak hanya itu, sejumlah fasilitas di Salemba Detention Center juga rusak, termasuk gerbang blok B dan lorong blok C dan jendela mereka.Martinus menambahkan bahwa kondisi penjara sekarang kembali menjadi kondusif."Pusat penahanan kondusif dan para tahanan tenang," katanya

berita: A number of street vendors (PKL) selling candy snacks in schools were raided by the Surabaya City Satpol-PP. The raids were carried out at schools in 31 sub-districts, Tuesday giddy (7/3). Head of Surabaya City Satpol PP, Irvan Widiyanto, said the control operation was carried out because previously candy "The candy is feared to contain substances that are not good for consumption, especially children," he explained at the Surabaya City Satpol PP office. Irvan admitted that the raid on snacks was carried out starting Monday (6/3) with Involving the ranks of the Health Service and related agencies From the results of operations in 14 sub-districts yesterday, his party has secured as many as 345 bottles of candy. "We comb it in schools, especially elementary schools," he said. and others. The candy is produced in China and sold at a price of Rp. 1000 per seed. The name is hard candy," he said briefly. The presence of candy containing hazardous substances stems from the operation to control the PP Satpol against elementary school students who skipped school in Ploso, Tambaksari One of the students caught in the operation while at the internet cafe admitted that his head was dizzy after consuming candy After hearing the news, the Mayor of Surabaya Tri Rismaharini ordered Satpol PP to carry out candy snacks at school
berita_id: Sejumlah pedagang kaki lima (PKL) yang menjual camilan permen di sekolah-sekolah digerebek oleh Surabaya City Satpol-PP.Penggerebekan dilakukan di sekolah-sekolah di 31 sub-distrik, Selasa Giddy (7/3).Kepala Surabaya City Satpol PP, Irvan Widiyanto, mengatakan operasi kontrol dilakukan karena sebelumnya permen "permen itu dikhawatirkan mengandung zat yang tidak baik untuk dikonsumsi, terutama anak -anak," jelasnya di kantor Surabaya City Satpol PP.Irvan mengakui bahwa serangan pada makanan ringan dilakukan mulai Senin (6/3) dengan melibatkan jajaran layanan kesehatan dan lembaga terkait dari hasil operasi di 14 sub-distrik kemarin, partainya telah mendapatkan sebanyak 345 botol permen."Kami menyisirnya di sekolah, terutama sekolah dasar," katanya.dan lainnya.Permen diproduksi di Cina dan dijual dengan harga RP.1000 per biji.Nama itu permen yang keras, "katanya sebentar. Kehadiran permen yang mengandung zat berbahaya berasal dari operasi untuk mengendalikan PP Satpol terhadap siswa sekolah dasar yang melewatkan sekolah di Ploso, Tambaksari salah satu siswa yang terjebak dalam operasi di kafe internet mengakui bahwa kepalanya merasa pusing setelah mengkonsumsi permen setelah mendengar berita, Mayor dari The Mayor.Camilan di sekolah

berita: There are several myths about preventing stroke. One of them is sticking a needle. Dr. Frandy Susatia SpS said that this myth is something that can actually harm oneself. Moreover, if those who do it also suffer from diabetes. It is not true that to prevent stroke by inserting a needle. It's just a myth, he said in Jakarta recently. In addition to sticking a needle, another myth is flushing the skin when it's hot. But again, the doctor who practices at the Siloam Kebon Jeruk Hospital denied it. Not true. If it's hot, the blood vessels will spread, but it will be normal again when the accession heat is reduced. Only fainted, but not stroke, because the blood vessels are uploading, he concluded.
berita_id: Ada beberapa mitos tentang mencegah stroke.Salah satunya adalah menempelkan jarum.Frandy Susatia SPS mengatakan bahwa mitos ini adalah sesuatu yang benar -benar dapat membahayakan diri sendiri.Selain itu, jika mereka yang melakukannya juga menderita diabetes.Tidak benar untuk mencegah stroke dengan memasukkan jarum.Itu hanya mitos, katanya di Jakarta baru -baru ini.Selain menempelkan jarum, mitos lain adalah menyiram kulit saat panas.Tetapi sekali lagi, Dokter yang berlatih di Rumah Sakit Siloam Kebon Jeruk membantahnya.Tidak benar.Jika panas, pembuluh darah akan menyebar, tetapi akan normal lagi ketika panas aksesi berkurang.Hanya pingsan, tetapi tidak stroke, karena pembuluh darah mengunggah, ia menyimpulkan.

berita: JAKARTA—Cianjur Regent Irvan Rivano Muchtar will ban Cianjur residents, especially young people, from playing the online game Pokemon Go. The reason is that the meaning contained in the game is contrary to the beliefs of the majority of the population of Cianjur and is considered dangerous. According to Irvan, one of the game applications on smartphones based on Android and Apple is indeed being loved by game lovers, especially young people. However, according to Irvan, the meaning of the word Pokemon in one language is I am Jewish. "Obviously this is an acknowledgment of people who oppress our brothers, such as the Palestinians. It is also against religious teachings," he said, Tuesday, July 19 2016. Irvan said the Cianjur Regency Government is currently only urging smartphone users not to play Pokemon Go, which was recently officially launched in America and will only be inaugurated in Indonesia in the near future. "Now it's just an appeal, but maybe later it will be banned if it doesn't educate and is dangerous," he said. Irvan added, from some of the news circulating, Pokemon Go can cause accidents. Games that require users to leave the house and walk to look for pokemon will disrupt concentration on the road. "Indeed there has been no research that is dangerous or not. But it is clear that it is better to anticipate before all these bad things happen," he said. The Commander of Military District 0608 Cianjur, Lieutenant Colonel Armed Imam Haryadi, has even issued a ban for his members from playing the Pokemon Go game, especially at only headquarters. According to him, the GPS-based game will record complete location data so that it is feared that it will be misused. Imam explained, the Pokemon Go game is three-dimensional and based on GPS. When used, it will record the location data for the monster's search. If the recorded data goes to other parties and is used for certain purposes, it is very dangerous. "So we forbid all members of the TNI, starting from the Kodim, Koramil, and below to play, especially in the TNI headquarters environment," said Armed.
berita_id: JAKARTA - Bupati Cianjur Irvan Rivano Muchtar akan melarang penduduk Cianjur, terutama orang -orang muda, dari memainkan permainan online Pokemon Go.Alasannya adalah bahwa makna yang terkandung dalam permainan ini bertentangan dengan keyakinan mayoritas populasi Cianjur dan dianggap berbahaya.Menurut Irvan, salah satu aplikasi game di smartphone berdasarkan Android dan Apple memang dicintai oleh pecinta game, terutama orang -orang muda.Namun, menurut Irvan, arti kata pokemon dalam satu bahasa adalah saya orang Yahudi."Jelas ini adalah pengakuan terhadap orang -orang yang menindas saudara -saudara kita, seperti Palestina. Ini juga bertentangan dengan ajaran agama," katanya, Selasa, 19 Juli 2016. Irvan mengatakan pemerintah Cianjur Regency saat ini hanya mendesak pengguna ponsel cerdas untuk tidak bermain Pokemon Go, yang baru -baru ini diluncurkan secara resmi di Amerika dan hanya akan hanya akan ada di Indonesia di Indonesia di The Losing, yang baru -baru ini diluncurkan secara resmi."Sekarang ini hanya banding, tapi mungkin nanti akan dilarang jika tidak mendidik dan berbahaya," katanya.Irvan menambahkan, dari beberapa berita yang beredar, Pokemon Go dapat menyebabkan kecelakaan.Game yang mengharuskan pengguna meninggalkan rumah dan berjalan untuk mencari Pokemon akan mengganggu konsentrasi di jalan."Memang belum ada penelitian yang berbahaya atau tidak. Tetapi jelas bahwa lebih baik mengantisipasi sebelum semua hal buruk ini terjadi," katanya.Komandan Distrik Militer 0608 Cianjur, Letnan Kolonel Bersenjata Imam Haryadi, bahkan telah mengeluarkan larangan bagi para anggotanya untuk memainkan permainan Pokemon Go, terutama di kantor pusat hanya.Menurutnya, game berbasis GPS akan merekam data lokasi yang lengkap sehingga ditakuti bahwa itu akan disalahgunakan.Imam menjelaskan, game Pokemon Go adalah tiga dimensi dan berdasarkan GPS.Saat digunakan, itu akan merekam data lokasi untuk pencarian monster.Jika data yang direkam pergi ke pihak lain dan digunakan untuk tujuan tertentu, itu sangat berbahaya."Jadi kami melarang semua anggota TNI, mulai dari Kodim, Koramil, dan di bawah untuk bermain, terutama di lingkungan markas TNI," kata Armed.

berita: Participants of Action 212 Volume 2 who came from outside the city had arrived at the Istiqlal Mosque, but they could not enter because the gate of the mosque was locked. According to observations, hundreds of people driving 5 buses, including AD number plates (Solo and its surroundings) were stuck at the entrance of the Istiqlal mosque, Monday (20/2) night, due to the closure of the mosque, which used to be a gathering place for the Defending Islam Action. (read: Istiqlal door is closed, 5 buses participating in 212 action cannot enter) Police officers on guard in front of the Istiqlal Mosque then directed the bus from the area to another place. It was not explained where the mass gathering place was diverted. For last night's case, there were five buses from East Java. They claimed to come from Madura. Participants enter the mosque after Isha time. The mosque provides opportunities for worship and cleaning. The group from East Java understood rhode island and understood. The mosque management waited for them to leave the Istiqlal Mosque voluntarily. Then at 03.40 WIB the mosque was reopened. Previously, the Islamic Community Forum (FUI) ensured that there would be no long march during the 212th volume II action, Tuesday (21/2) tomorrow. Action participants will be directed directly to the action concentration point in front of the DPR/MPR RI building. "Our scenario does not have a long march. So all participants are advised to go directly to the DPR/MPR RI building," said Ustaz Bernard Abdul Jabbar as coordinator of the 212 action volume II to reporters at the Metro Jaya Police Headquarters, Jakarta, Monday (20/2/2017) . Ustadz Bernard estimates that 10 thousand people will attend the action. People from outside Jakarta were asked to park their vehicles in the parking lots that have been prepared. "And for those from areas who bring buses and vehicles, we then direct them to park at the Senayan East Parking if those from the south and east. Meanwhile, from the west we will direct them to (park vehicles) at Palmerah Station and at in front of the Forestry Department building," he explained. He added that his party also did not provide lodging facilities for action participants from outside the region. This means that those from outside the city of Jakarta are welcome to find a place to rest on their own.
berita_id: Peserta aksi 212 Volume 2 yang datang dari luar kota telah tiba di masjid Istiqlal, tetapi mereka tidak bisa masuk karena gerbang masjid terkunci.Menurut pengamatan, ratusan orang yang mengendarai 5 bus, termasuk pelat nomor iklan (solo dan sekitarnya) terjebak di pintu masuk masjid Istiqlal, Senin (20/2) malam, karena penutupan masjid, yang dulunya merupakan tempat berkumpul untuk aksi Islam yang bertahan.(Baca: pintu ISTIQLAL ditutup, 5 bus yang berpartisipasi dalam 212 Action Can't masuk) Petugas polisi yang berjaga di depan masjid Istiqlal kemudian mengarahkan bus dari area ke tempat lain.Itu tidak dijelaskan di mana tempat pengumpulan massa dialihkan.Untuk kasus tadi malam, ada lima bus dari Jawa Timur.Mereka mengaku datang dari Madura.Peserta memasuki masjid setelah waktu Isha.Masjid ini memberikan kesempatan untuk beribadah dan membersihkan.Kelompok dari Jawa Timur memahami Rhode Island dan memahami.Manajemen masjid menunggu mereka meninggalkan masjid Istiqlal secara sukarela.Kemudian pada 03.40 WIB masjid dibuka kembali.Sebelumnya, Forum Komunitas Islam (FUI) memastikan bahwa tidak akan ada Maret yang panjang selama aksi Volume II ke -212, Selasa (21/2) besok.Peserta tindakan akan diarahkan langsung ke titik konsentrasi aksi di depan gedung DPR/MPR RI."Skenario kami tidak memiliki pawai panjang. Jadi semua peserta disarankan untuk langsung ke gedung DPR/MPR RI," kata Ustaz Bernard Abdul Jabbar sebagai koordinator 212 Action Volume II kepada wartawan di Markas Kepolisian Metro Jaya, Jakarta, Senin (20/2/2017).Ustadz Bernard memperkirakan bahwa 10 ribu orang akan menghadiri aksi tersebut.Orang -orang dari luar Jakarta diminta memarkir kendaraan mereka di tempat parkir yang telah disiapkan."Dan bagi mereka dari daerah yang membawa bus dan kendaraan, kami kemudian mengarahkan mereka ke parkir di parkir Senayan Timur jika yang dari selatan dan timur. Sementara itu, dari barat kami akan mengarahkan mereka ke (kendaraan parkir) di stasiun Palmerah dan di depan gedung departemen kehutanan," jelasnya.Dia menambahkan bahwa partainya juga tidak menyediakan fasilitas penginapan bagi peserta tindakan dari luar wilayah.Ini berarti bahwa orang -orang dari luar kota Jakarta dipersilakan untuk menemukan tempat untuk beristirahat sendiri.

berita: Catfish is a fish that lives in fresh water, besides being a catfish farm fish, it also usually lives in lakes, swamps, muddy water and rivers. Catfish has a special characteristic in the form of a fairly long mustache and dark skin such as brown, gray to black. This fish is a very familiar fish, almost every food stall provides a menu of catfish. The dangers of eating catfish are still largely unknown to the general public because after consuming it, they have not felt any symptoms or complaints. Catfish is a favorite food for young and old because it has a savory and delicious taste and has very good nutritional content for the health of the body. Nutritional value Nutrient content in catfish: High protein around 18.7 11.2 g Iron 21.2 mgr Sodium 150.90 mgr Unsaturated fat 1.10.7 g Phosphorus 260.156 mgr Calcium 15.9 mg Vitamin B1 (Thiamine) 0.100.06 mgr Vitamin B2 (Riboflavin) 0.05 0.03 mgr Niacin around 2.0 1.2 mgr High protein around 18.7 11.2 g Getting to know catfish The basic properties possessed by catfish are surprising: Can survive in bad conditions and dirty containing household waste, namely with a low oxygen content capacity of 6 ppm, Co2 less than 12 ppm, a fairly stable temperature between 23 to 26 degrees, surviving in locations containing less than 1 ppm NH3. Catfish and African catfish are basically easy to adapt and like places that are relatively dirty, muddy, moist and tend to be dark. These conditions can cause the growth of new catfish to grow rapidly. Likes rotten food from any micro-organisms including animal and human waste. No wonder the catfish is listed as an omnivorous animal or an animal that eats almost the same thing as a broom fish. Catfish The Dirtiest Fish, One Mouth contains Three Thousand Cancer Cells, Here's the Explanation Catfish is one of the favorite food menus and even in every food stall this menu is always available because the price is quite cheap and delicious can be the main attraction for this one fish. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is that? The following is an explanation The catfish pond is very dirty and surrounded by chicken and pig coops According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he has supplied a lot of catfish to markets and roadside restaurants in Hainan province to be precise in Haikou which he harvested 3 months Because there are so many complaints from the community, the journalists searched about the fish from the local fisheries and marine department. The reporters took samples from the 7 ponds that housed the catfish. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken and pig cages, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of their fish before the test results are out. Catfish is a fish that consumes waste Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places because these fish consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pigs, even this fish can also consume human waste. So it is possible that in the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. The dangers of eating catfish: Hyperthyroidism Many breeders use animal carcasses, animal dung because they are close to livestock cages such as chickens, goats, pigs or cows and deliberately dispose of all household waste or waste which is suspected to contain heavy metals which if entered into the body. catfish and is consumed by humans in the long term, so the danger of eating catfish that will be experienced by consumers is in the form of disturbances in the thyroid gland around the neck. The neck will feel pain, swelling and inflammation and infection will occur. This condition is caused by increased fluid in the thyroid. Abnormal cell growth. Processing of catfish that uses used oil or that has been used repeatedly will contain free radicals in which there are solid saturated fatty acids and are chorinogenic triggers the appearance of abnormal cells in the body's DNA. Too often consume catfish fried in black cooking oil which contains the poison trans 2 hydroxyloktenal (HNE) which has been proven to have the potential to cause a person to develop liver cancer, stomach cancer and others. Did you know that the dangers of eating catfish that cause cancer have been proven to have happened a lot in neighboring China. Contains various kinds of active bacteria. Many catfish are kept in a bad way, for example, fish ponds are deliberately built where there are latrines for human waste disposal. Catfish is a type of fish that can survive in dirty water and contains mud which has been contaminated with bacteria, heavy metals and germs produced from rotting animal carcasses. Catfish will eat whatever is around it. Catfish that eat human waste can cause nutritional quality to be lost and contain a lot of bacteria including e-coli bacteria that cause stomach pain and diarrhea. Some contain metal. As long as catfish are kept in ponds and ponds that are far from livestock cages and latrines and use clean water and good feed, the condition of catfish meat will be protected from metals, bacteria and deposition of toxic waste particles that cause cancer and tumor growth. . When kept in a dirty place with indiscriminate food, the catfish will contain a lot of metal or mercury that causes cancer. Heart disease The condition of catfish that is kept with poor cultivation and then added with cooking methods using trans oil will multiply the danger to the body, including triggering blockages in the arteries of the heart which in the long run can cause heart disease. This heart disorder will not only attack adults but has the potential for young people regardless of consuming catfish that contains toxins that are fried in saturated oil or not. The danger of eating catfish is the emergence of heart disease consisting of coronary heart disease, heart failure and others which are the most dangerous threats. Contains Mercury In this modern era technology is increasingly advanced but environmental conditions are increasingly being neglected with a lot of environmental pollution. Almost all fish contain mercury, which is a substance that can harm your nervous system. But you don't need to worry because you can still eat catfish, except for catfish that grow on high mercury contamination. Most research reveals that catfish is a fish that contains very little mercury. The environmental watchdog also states that catfish is a fish that is safe for consumption. The best tips so that you can enjoy catfish that are rich in benefits without problems: Buy live catfish that are cared for and cultivated by farmers using clean water and special feed for catfish or healthy foods such as tofu, small fish, rice, cassava, sweet potato and others. At least the ponds or ponds used in the vicinity do not have livestock cages and are far from latrines or public toilets. Cook catfish at home with good oil to avoid the dangers of eating catfish in the form of free radical attacks generated from the air or avoid unsaturated fats that contain chorinogenic substances that trigger cancer cells which are usually used by naughty roadside traders. Consuming catfish should be combined with other nutritious foods so that the level of nutrition produced can be maximally absorbed by the body and improve health from day to day without problems. For example, eating catfish with eggs and tempeh so that we never experience the dangers of eating catfish. Do not eat catfish meat in a half-cooked state in order to avoid microorganisms that may take be in it even though the fish is kept in good cultivation. Cooking until cooked whatever meat we like is better than half cooked let alone raw. The process of boiling or frying allows all microorganisms present in catfish to be easily neutralized.

Quoted from beritasatu.com, Rudiantara admitted that his ministry is ready to block Facebook and a number of other social media that are actively used in Indonesia. According to him, this step needs to be taken if Facebook and other social media cannot be invited to work together. "It's not only the account whose access is limited, but figure out also the organizers can be closed. That's why we ask the organizers of social media or OTT in general to work together to provide service levels," said Rudiantara in the socialization of the Fatwa of the Indonesian Ulema Council (MUI) related to the Law and Guidelines for Bermuamalah. Through Social Media at the Kominfo Building, Monday (5/6). The cooperation he means is that if the government asks Facebook to block an account, Facebook must comply. It is not clear whether the Ministry of Communication and Informatics will announce what measures are used to determine that an account is eligible to be blocked. "If the government asks for certain treatment for an account, yes, please do it. Don't block things that don't have to be blocked, like Afi's case, or those that should be blocked don't," he added. Afi himself is a high school student who recently rose to fame due to his personal Facebook post about religious tolerance.
berita_id: Dikutip dari Beritasatu.com, Rudiantara mengakui bahwa pelayanannya siap untuk memblokir Facebook dan sejumlah media sosial lainnya yang secara aktif digunakan di Indonesia.Menurutnya, langkah ini perlu diambil jika Facebook dan media sosial lainnya tidak dapat diundang untuk bekerja sama."Ini bukan hanya akun yang aksesnya terbatas, tetapi juga mencari tahu juga penyelenggara dapat ditutup. Itu sebabnya kami meminta penyelenggara media sosial atau OTT secara umum untuk bekerja sama untuk memberikan tingkat layanan," kata Rudiantara dalam sosialisasi fatwa Dewan Ulama Indonesia (MUI) yang terkait dengan hukum dan pedoman untuk Bermuamalah.Melalui media sosial di gedung Kominfo, Senin (5/6).Kerjasama yang ia maksud adalah bahwa jika pemerintah meminta Facebook untuk memblokir akun, Facebook harus mematuhi.Tidak jelas apakah Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika akan mengumumkan langkah -langkah apa yang digunakan untuk menentukan bahwa suatu akun memenuhi syarat untuk diblokir."Jika pemerintah meminta perlakuan tertentu untuk suatu akun, ya, tolong lakukan. Jangan memblokir hal -hal yang tidak harus diblokir, seperti kasus AFI, atau yang harus diblokir tidak," tambahnya.AFI sendiri adalah seorang siswa sekolah menengah yang baru -baru ini menjadi terkenal karena posting Facebook pribadinya tentang toleransi agama.

berita: Ahok is not dismissed as Governor of DKI Jakarta due to his status as a defendant in the case of blasphemy against Islam, shows how difficult the law in this country is to enforce. How can you seek brave out justice if the law is a tool to seek justice alone is difficult to enforce. Not a few legal and state administration experts, including former Constitutional Court Justice Mahfud MD, criticized the steps taken by the government, especially the Minister of Home Affairs Tjahyo Kumolo and President Joko Widodo who remained silent when Ahok returned to the governorship, while several other regional heads were dismissed when their status was accused of an act. criminal. This eventually led to the demands of law enforcement through the actions of defending Islam and Defending the State carried out by the Muslim community who joined the FUI (Islamic Community Forum) today (Tuesday, 21/02/2017). In addition to the masses from FUI, there were also a number of students who were members of the student movement for people's defense. Their demands include dismissing the governor who is a suspect, stopping the criminalization of ulama, stopping the arrest of student activists, restoring the nation's sovereignty and returning it to the original 1945 Constitution. The action, which was held in front of the DPR-MPR Building, turned out to be attracting people from outside Jakarta. They tried to gather at the Istiqlal Mosque to pray Fajr in congregation and also at that time the weather was raining. Apparently the fence of the Istiqlal mosque was tightly closed, even though it was approaching Fajr time. As a result, the Action congregation had to get rained on, some of them chose to lie down on the street while waiting for Fajr time. According to a report from one of the gabbarberita.com contributors in the field, the new mosque opened at around 04.00 WIB. Previously where were the BPPMI management and were appointed and inaugurated directly by the Minister of Religion who was also in the structure as the Chairman of BPPMI.
berita_id: Ahok tidak dipecat sebagai gubernur DKI Jakarta karena statusnya sebagai terdakwa dalam kasus penistaan ​​terhadap Islam, menunjukkan betapa sulitnya hukum di negara ini untuk menegakkan.Bagaimana Anda bisa mencari keadilan yang berani jika hukum adalah alat untuk mencari keadilan saja sulit untuk ditegakkan.Tidak sedikit pakar administrasi hukum dan negara bagian, termasuk mantan pengadilan konstitusional Mahfud MD, mengkritik langkah -langkah yang diambil oleh pemerintah, terutama Menteri Dalam Negeri Tjahyo Kumolo dan Presiden Joko Widodo yang tetap diam ketika Ahok kembali ke gubernur, sementara beberapa kepala regional lainnya diberhentikan ketika status mereka ditimbulkan oleh sebuah tindakan.pidana.Hal ini akhirnya mengarah pada tuntutan penegakan hukum melalui tindakan membela Islam dan mempertahankan negara yang dilakukan oleh komunitas Muslim yang bergabung dengan FUI (Forum Komunitas Islam) hari ini (Selasa, 21/02/2017).Selain massa dari Fui, ada juga sejumlah siswa yang merupakan anggota gerakan siswa untuk pertahanan rakyat.Tuntutan mereka termasuk memecat gubernur yang merupakan tersangka, menghentikan kriminalisasi ulama, menghentikan penangkapan aktivis mahasiswa, memulihkan kedaulatan negara dan mengembalikannya ke konstitusi asli 1945.Aksi, yang diadakan di depan gedung DPR-MPR, ternyata menarik orang dari luar Jakarta.Mereka mencoba berkumpul di masjid Istiqlal untuk berdoa Fajr di jemaat dan juga pada waktu itu cuaca sedang hujan.Rupanya pagar masjid Istiqlal tertutup rapat, meskipun mendekati waktu fajr.Akibatnya, jemaat aksi harus dihujani, beberapa dari mereka memilih untuk berbaring di jalan sambil menunggu waktu Fajr.Menurut laporan dari salah satu kontributor Gabbarberita.com di lapangan, masjid baru dibuka pada sekitar pukul 04.00 WIB.Sebelumnya di mana manajemen BPPMI dan ditunjuk dan diresmikan secara langsung oleh Menteri Agama yang juga berada dalam struktur sebagai ketua BPPMI.

berita: Barong Reog Ponorogo and Hisan Naga on gamelan are burned general at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. The arson incident reportedly occurred on October 20 last. The information circulated among journalists from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemenlu). "The Ministry of Foreign Affairs has contacted the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao and is being handled according to procedures," said Public Relations staff of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Opi Sudarma, when asked about the truth of the news, Friday (10/30). This news is very surprising considering that the object is Indonesian culture. In fact, a neighboring country, Malaysia, claims it as their culture. Reportedly, the reason for the burning is related to idols and demons. It is not clear whether the perpetrators are Indonesian Nationals (WNI) or Filipinos.
berita_id: Barong Reog Ponorogo dan Hisan Naga di Gamelan dibakar Jenderal di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Insiden pembakaran dilaporkan terjadi pada 20 Oktober lalu.Informasi yang diedarkan di antara jurnalis dari Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemenlu)."Kementerian Luar Negeri telah menghubungi Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao dan sedang ditangani sesuai dengan prosedur," kata staf Hubungan Masyarakat dari Kementerian Luar Negeri, OPI Sudarma, ketika ditanya tentang kebenaran berita, Jumat (10/30).Berita ini sangat mengejutkan mengingat objeknya adalah budaya Indonesia.Bahkan, negara tetangga, Malaysia, mengklaimnya sebagai budaya mereka.Dilaporkan, alasan pembakaran terkait dengan berhala dan setan.Tidak jelas apakah pelaku adalah warga negara Indonesia (WNI) atau orang Filipina.

berita: Catfish are freshwater fish, which usually live in critical places such as rice fields, dirty and muddy fish ponds and swamps. Many catfish live in places that lack oxygen. These fish are also known as carnivores, because they eat small shrimp and worms. Catfish are also known as tough fish species, because they are equipped with an additional respiratory apparatus in the form of a labyrinth, which allows catfish to survive in polluted and dirty water conditions. This way of living and growing in such a dirty place has led to accusations that catfish contain cancer cells. However, currently, the catfish circulating in the market are not catfish that live in the wild. Currently, there are many catfish farming in ponds, by providing good quality feed and controlling the cleanliness of the pond so that it is free from pollution. According to data from the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (KKP), catfish production in 2013 reached 543,461 tons, an increase from 441,217 tons in 2012 and 337,577 tons in 2011. Meanwhile, catfish consumption according to the Central Statistics Agency (BPS) was recorded at 29.98 kg / capita / year, up from 22.58 kg/capita/year in 2004. In Jakarta no less than 6,000 pecel catfish stalls have been registered with the Indonesian Street Vendors Association (APKLI). The popularity of catfish always increases every year. This is inseparable from the myriad benefits of this murmured fish meat. The nutritional content found in catfish is a cheap source of valuable protein. As we know protein is very necessary for the growth of the fetus in the womb. Even the nutrition contained in 2.5 kg of catfish is equivalent to the nutrition of 1 kg of beef. The high phosphorus in catfish meat adds to the benefits of the fish, especially for pregnant women and their fetuses. In addition to phosphorus, potassium and sodium in catfish are also useful as the best food source for the heart and blood vessels. By regularly consuming catfish, it helps the heart work in pregnant women so that the blood will be pumped properly. The allegation that there are cancer cells in catfish cannot be believed to be true, this is reinforced by the statement of cancer experts from the Indonesian Oncology Association. Currently there is no research that states that eating catfish can choice trigger cancer, said dr.Dradjat R Suardi, SpB (K) Onk, a cancer expert from the Indonesian Oncology Association.
berita_id: Ikan lele adalah ikan air tawar, yang biasanya tinggal di tempat -tempat kritis seperti sawah, kolam ikan yang kotor dan berlumpur dan rawa -rawa.Banyak ikan lele tinggal di tempat -tempat yang kekurangan oksigen.Ikan -ikan ini juga dikenal sebagai karnivora, karena mereka makan udang kecil dan cacing.Ikan lele juga dikenal sebagai spesies ikan yang tangguh, karena mereka dilengkapi dengan peralatan pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin, yang memungkinkan ikan lele untuk bertahan hidup dalam kondisi air yang tercemar dan kotor.Cara hidup dan tumbuh di tempat yang begitu kotor ini telah menyebabkan tuduhan bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker.Namun, saat ini, ikan lele yang beredar di pasar bukanlah ikan lele yang hidup di alam liar.Saat ini, ada banyak pertanian ikan lele di kolam, dengan memberikan pakan berkualitas baik dan mengendalikan kebersihan kolam sehingga bebas dari polusi.Menurut data dari Kementerian Urusan Maritim dan Perikanan (KKP), produksi ikan lele pada tahun 2013 mencapai 543.461 ton, peningkatan dari 441.217 ton pada 2012 dan 337.577 ton pada tahun 2011. Sementara itu, Capfish Consumption menurut Badan Statistik Sentral (bps) direkam di 29.9.KG/Capita/Tahun pada tahun 2004. Di Jakarta tidak kurang dari 6.000 kios lele PECEL telah terdaftar di Indonesian Street Vendors Association (APKLI).Popularitas ikan lele selalu meningkat setiap tahun.Ini tidak dapat dipisahkan dari berbagai manfaat daging ikan yang bergumam ini.Kandungan nutrisi yang ditemukan dalam ikan lele adalah sumber protein berharga yang murah.Seperti yang kita ketahui, protein sangat diperlukan untuk pertumbuhan janin di dalam rahim.Bahkan nutrisi yang terkandung dalam 2,5 kg ikan lele setara dengan nutrisi 1 kg daging sapi.Tingginya fosfor dalam daging ikan lele menambah manfaat ikan, terutama untuk wanita hamil dan janinnya.Selain fosfor, kalium dan natrium dalam lele juga berguna sebagai sumber makanan terbaik untuk pembuluh jantung dan darah.Dengan mengonsumsi ikan lele secara teratur, itu membantu jantung bekerja pada wanita hamil sehingga darah akan dipompa dengan benar.Tuduhan bahwa ada sel kanker dalam ikan lele tidak dapat diyakini benar, ini diperkuat oleh pernyataan para ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia.Saat ini tidak ada penelitian yang menyatakan bahwa makan ikan lele dapat memicu kanker, kata Dr.Dradjat R Suardi, SPB (K) Onk, seorang ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia.

berita: Cianjur Regent Irvan Rivano Muchtar said, from several articles he read on the internet, the meaning of the word Pokemon itself in one language is I am Jewish. “Obviously this is an admission of you who oppress our brothers like Palestine. It is also against the teachings," he said. According to him, the district government is currently only urging smartphone users not to play Pokemon Go, which was recently officially launched in America and will only be inaugurated in Indonesia in the near future. "Now it's just an appeal, but maybe later it will be banned if it doesn't educate and is dangerous," he said. According to Irvan, from some news circulating if Pokemon Go can cause accidents. The reason is a it game that requires users to leave the house and walk to look for this pokemon will interfere with concentration on the road. “Indeed, there has been no research, whether it is dangerous or not. But it's definitely better to anticipate before all the bad things happen. So don't focus too much on the game. When on the road look around. Don't let your busy playing learning games be neglected, everything must be balanced," he said.
berita_id: Bupati Cianjur Irvan Rivano Muchtar mengatakan, dari beberapa artikel yang ia baca di internet, arti kata pokemon itu sendiri dalam satu bahasa adalah saya orang Yahudi."Jelas ini adalah pengakuan Anda yang menindas saudara -saudara kita seperti Palestina. Ini juga bertentangan dengan ajaran," katanya.Menurutnya, pemerintah distrik saat ini hanya mendesak pengguna ponsel cerdas untuk tidak bermain Pokemon Go, yang baru -baru ini diluncurkan secara resmi di Amerika dan hanya akan diresmikan di Indonesia dalam waktu dekat."Sekarang ini hanya banding, tapi mungkin nanti akan dilarang jika tidak mendidik dan berbahaya," katanya.Menurut Irvan, dari beberapa berita yang beredar jika Pokemon Go dapat menyebabkan kecelakaan.Alasannya adalah permainan IT yang mengharuskan pengguna meninggalkan rumah dan berjalan untuk mencari Pokemon ini akan mengganggu konsentrasi di jalan."Memang, belum ada penelitian, apakah itu berbahaya atau tidak. Tapi pasti lebih baik untuk mengantisipasi sebelum semua hal buruk terjadi. Jadi jangan terlalu fokus pada permainan. Ketika di jalan melihat -lihat. Jangan biarkan Anda bermain game yang sibuk diabaikan, semuanya harus seimbang," katanya.

berita: Thousands of Reog Ponorogo artists held a demonstration, Tuesday (10/11/2015), as a form of protest over the burning of Reog properties at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) Davao in the Philippines. Based on information compiled by Madiunpos.com, the artist's demonstration of the reog burning incident was not only carried out by artists from Ponorogo. Also seen taking to the streets are artists from various cities or regencies in Indonesia. The thousands of artists held demonstrations by giving speeches, unfurling banners bearing a number of demands, and also performing reog around Ponorogo Square. After carrying out a series of activities in protest against the burning of property at the Consulate General in Davao, representatives of the demonstrators were then allowed to attend a hearing on the second floor of the Ponorogo Regency DPRD Building, Jl. East Square. Representatives of the participants in the demonstration were received by elements of the leadership of the Ponorogo DPRD along with the Acting Regent of Ponorogo Maskur. "We do not accept the burning of reog that was carried out at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao some time ago. Our demand is that they immediately apologize to the people of Ponorogo as the owner of this reog art," said the reog artist representing the Community Pandemen Reyog (Kompag) Ponorogo, Grendo, as quoted by Madiunpos.com from the Facebook fanpage wall All About Ponorogo, Tuesday. Reog Pemeriksaan Checkup Meanwhile, Spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Arrmanatha Nasir, said that his party was conducting an internal inspection regarding the burning of reog at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. "Essentially, there has been an official statement from the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao regarding the reog issue and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs also has an internal process to ensure that the goods are state agency assets," said Arrmanatha Nasir in Jakarta, as reported by Antara News Agency, Sunday (8/8). /11/2015). On 20 October 2015, the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao issued an official statement that the destruction of Ponorogo reog by burning was carried out because its condition had been damaged and eaten by termites. However, the photos that have gone viral and have even been distributed by local online media, Bitung News, show that there is a certain ritual before the burning. In Good Condition One of the photos also shows that before being burned, the Ponorogo reog was stored in a glass cabinet and appeared to be in good condition. Apart from the reog, in another photo, it can be seen that Indonesian Consulate General Davao removed the dragon ornaments ministry on the gamelan set and then burned it. Related to this, Arrmanatha conveyed that the Ministry of Foreign Affairs would carry out inspections according to the processes in accordance with existing standards. " Periodically there are internal inspections , " he said . Domestic reactions related to the burning of Reog Ponorogo at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, were conveyed by the Jabodetabek Reog Community. The community sent an official letter to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines, asking for clarification on information on the burning of reog art instruments by Indonesian Consulate General officials. Secretary General of the Jabodetabek Reog Association, Agus Setiyoko, said that his party hoped that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, apart from providing a detailed explanation of the burning of reog, could also broadcast clarifications on the burning of reog art objects in a number of national media.
berita_id: Ribuan seniman Reog Ponorogo mengadakan demonstrasi, Selasa (10/11/2015), sebagai bentuk protes atas pembakaran properti reog di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) Davao di Filipina.Berdasarkan informasi yang disusun oleh madiunpos.com, demonstrasi artis tentang insiden pembakaran yang di -reog tidak hanya dilakukan oleh seniman dari Ponorogo.Juga terlihat turun ke jalan adalah seniman dari berbagai kota atau daerah di Indonesia.Ribuan seniman mengadakan demonstrasi dengan memberikan pidato, membentangkan spanduk yang memiliki sejumlah tuntutan, dan juga melakukan reog di sekitar Ponorogo Square.Setelah melakukan serangkaian kegiatan sebagai protes terhadap pembakaran properti di Jenderal Konsulat di Davao, perwakilan para demonstran kemudian diizinkan untuk menghadiri sidang di lantai dua gedung DPRD Kabupaten Ponorogo, JL.Lapangan Timur.Perwakilan peserta dalam demonstrasi diterima oleh unsur -unsur kepemimpinan Ponorogo DPRD bersama dengan akting bupati Ponorogo Maskur."Kami tidak menerima pembakaran reog yang dilakukan di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao beberapa waktu yang lalu. Permintaan kami adalah bahwa mereka segera meminta maaf kepada orang -orang Ponorogo sebagai pemilik seni reog ini," kata artis reog yang mewakili pandemen pandemen dari pandemen facebook (kompag) ponorogo, grendo, seperti yang dikutip oleh MADOOG.Sementara itu, pemeriksaan kembali Pemeriksaan, juru bicara Kementerian Luar Negeri, Arrmanatha Nasir, mengatakan bahwa partainya sedang melakukan inspeksi internal mengenai pembakaran reog di konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina."Pada dasarnya, telah ada pernyataan resmi dari konsulat jenderal Indonesia di Davao mengenai masalah yang dirancang ulang dan Kementerian Luar Negeri juga memiliki proses internal untuk memastikan bahwa barang tersebut adalah aset agen negara," kata Arrmanatha Nasir di Jakarta, seperti dilaporkan oleh Antara News Agency, Minggu (8/8)./11/2015).Pada tanggal 20 Oktober 2015, konsulat umum Indonesia di Davao mengeluarkan pernyataan resmi bahwa penghancuran Ponorogo Reog dengan pembakaran dilakukan karena kondisinya telah rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Namun, foto -foto yang telah menjadi viral dan bahkan telah didistribusikan oleh media online lokal, Bitung News, menunjukkan bahwa ada ritual tertentu sebelum pembakaran.Dalam kondisi baik, salah satu foto juga menunjukkan bahwa sebelum dibakar, Ponorogo Reog disimpan di lemari kaca dan tampak dalam kondisi baik.Terlepas dari reog, di foto lain, dapat dilihat bahwa konsulat Indonesia Jenderal Davao menghapus pelayanan Ornamen Naga di set Gamelan dan kemudian membakarnya.Terkait dengan ini, Arrmanatha menyampaikan bahwa Kementerian Luar Negeri akan melakukan inspeksi sesuai dengan proses sesuai dengan standar yang ada."Secara berkala ada inspeksi internal," katanya.Reaksi domestik yang berkaitan dengan pembakaran Ponorogo Reog di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, disampaikan oleh komunitas Reog Jabodetabek.Komunitas mengirim surat resmi kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina, meminta klarifikasi tentang informasi tentang pembakaran instrumen seni reog oleh pejabat umum konsulat Indonesia.Sekretaris Jenderal Asosiasi Reog Jabodetabek, Agus Setiyoko, mengatakan bahwa partainya berharap bahwa Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, selain memberikan penjelasan terperinci tentang pembakaran Reog, juga dapat menyiarkan klarifikasi tentang pembakaran benda -benda seni yang digunakan kembali di sejumlah media nasional.

berita: Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara said that currently there is a lot of negative content circulating on social media. According to him, the steps currently being taken by the Ministry of Communication and Informatics to overcome this are closing the accounts that spread the content. “Yesterday I met with Commission I, and the current content is a lot of negative things, damaging the relationship with one another. There is something bad on social media that gives us the authority, of course closing the account," he said at a press conference in Jakarta on Monday (05/06/2017) quoted from Qibla However, if negative content and bad content spreader accounts cannot be controlled, Facebook will be closed and blocked, he judged that this action was in accordance with the law. "But if necessary, Kominfo will close the organizers. If we now do account restrictions, it is possible that Facebook is closed. If it is needed later, yes, it must be," he said. Furthermore, Rudy said he would establish a relationship with the Indonesian Ulema Council (MUI) regarding the recently issued social media fatwa. Because, the one who knows in detail about the fatwa great deal is MUI. "God willing, I will return to MUI to jointly follow up on this fatwa," he concluded.[]
berita_id: Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa saat ini ada banyak konten negatif yang beredar di media sosial.Menurutnya, langkah -langkah yang saat ini diambil oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika untuk mengatasi hal ini menutup akun yang menyebarkan konten."Kemarin saya bertemu dengan Komisi I, dan konten saat ini adalah banyak hal negatif, merusak hubungan satu sama lain. Ada sesuatu yang buruk di media sosial yang memberi kita wewenang, tentu saja menutup akun," katanya pada konferensi pers di Jakarta pada hari Senin (05/06/2017 yang dikendalikan oleh qibla, jika konten negatif dan konten yang buruk tidak dapat dikendalikan, tidak dapat dikendalikan oleh qibla, jika konten negatif dan konten yang buruk tidak dapat disebarkan, konten yang buruk tidak dapat dikendalikan, Facebook, jika konten negatif dan konten yang buruk tidak dapat dikendalikan oleh Qibla."Tetapi jika perlu, Kominfo akan menutup penyelenggara. Jika kita sekarang melakukan pembatasan akun, ada kemungkinan bahwa Facebook ditutup. Jika diperlukan nanti, ya, itu pasti," katanya.Selain itu, Rudy mengatakan dia akan menjalin hubungan dengan Dewan Ulama Indonesia (MUI) mengenai fatwa media sosial yang baru -baru ini dikeluarkan.Karena, orang yang tahu secara rinci tentang Fatwa yang sangat besar adalah MUI."Bersedia Tuhan, saya akan kembali ke MUI untuk bersama -sama menindaklanjuti fatwa ini," pungkasnya. []

berita: Information for you, especially Muslims, to be more careful and careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use materials from non-halal. If you buy a toothbrush, check the packaging, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Sea urchin! Again, double-check the double check packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), Usually it says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". Share this info with your family and friends on Facebook so that more people can read it so you can avoid products that are not halal.
berita_id: Informasi untuk Anda, terutama Muslim, untuk lebih berhati-hati dan hati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan dari non-halal.Jika Anda membeli sikat gigi, periksa kemasannya, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti landak laut!Sekali lagi, periksa kembali kemasan cek ganda sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), biasanya dikatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% china bristle".Bagikan info ini dengan keluarga dan teman Anda di Facebook sehingga lebih banyak orang dapat membacanya sehingga Anda dapat menghindari produk yang tidak halal.

berita: The recent events of the curved iPhone 6 have filled the internet, prompting T-Mobile CEO John Legere to respond strongly to this. Reporting from Ubergizmo, Monday (6/10/2014), the famous CEO is always outspoken in expressing his opinion, decided to look at this wisely. "Video depicting a man who can do it (make iPhone 6 bend) - and if you look at his face, he's probably already turning purple. The veins are showing through his  fingers. Are you ***?" He also responded to people who complained that just by putting it in their pocket, their iPhone 6 immediately curved. "What do you know, 9 people sitting on their phones, first of all they need the jeans to really fit, because otherwise the jeans you're wearing can cut your phone in half. Take your laptop, do a handstand with it and throw it at the wall. All that stuff ***** ******," he said. Legere added, even though Apple was engulfed in the scandal of the weak durability of the iPhone 6, all of that did not make the demand for Apple's latest mobile phone weak. As is known, some time ago, a total of nine people complained about the durability of the iPhone 6 which was weak and easily curved. This is contrary to tests conducted by Consumer Reports, and managed to prove the durability of the iPhone 6 is not as weak as complained.
berita_id: Peristiwa baru-baru ini dari iPhone 6 melengkung telah mengisi internet, mendorong CEO T-Mobile John Legere untuk merespons dengan kuat terhadap hal ini.Melaporkan dari Ubergizmo, Senin (6/10/2014), CEO terkenal selalu blak -blakan dalam mengekspresikan pendapatnya, memutuskan untuk melihat ini dengan bijak."Video yang menggambarkan seorang pria yang bisa melakukannya (membuat IPhone 6 Bend) - dan jika Anda melihat wajahnya, dia mungkin sudah berubah ungu. Vena itu terlihat melalui jari -jarinya. Apakah Anda ***?"Dia juga menanggapi orang -orang yang mengeluh bahwa hanya dengan memasukkannya ke dalam saku mereka, iPhone 6 mereka segera melengkung."Apa yang Anda ketahui, 9 orang duduk di telepon mereka, pertama -tama mereka membutuhkan jeans agar benar -benar pas, karena jika tidak, jeans yang Anda kenakan dapat memotong telepon Anda menjadi dua. Ambil laptop Anda, lakukan handstand dengan itu dan lempar ke dinding. Semua barang ***** ******," katanya.Legere menambahkan, meskipun Apple dilalap dalam skandal daya tahan yang lemah dari iPhone 6, semuanya tidak membuat permintaan untuk ponsel terbaru Apple lemah.Seperti diketahui, beberapa waktu yang lalu, total sembilan orang mengeluh tentang daya tahan iPhone 6 yang lemah dan mudah melengkung.Ini bertentangan dengan tes yang dilakukan oleh Consumer Reports, dan berhasil membuktikan daya tahan iPhone 6 tidak setenang yang dikeluhkan.

berita: Riots broke out at the Salemba detention center branch of the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, which housed terrorism convicts. However, the police confirmed that there was no throwing of the Koran in the incident. The incident occurred because of the prisoner's reaction when officers confiscated his cell phone mobile phone in Block C detention. He emphasized that there was no throwing of the Koran by the guard. However, the officers did check the books belonging to the cell occupants. "What is there is that the officers conducted an examination of the books and objects in the cell," said Martinus.
berita_id: Kerusuhan pecah di Cabang Pusat Penahanan Salemba dari Markas Komando Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, yang menampung narapidana terorisme.Namun, polisi mengkonfirmasi bahwa tidak ada lemparan Alquran dalam insiden itu.Peristiwa itu terjadi karena reaksi tahanan ketika petugas menyita ponselnya di ponsel di blok C penahanan.Dia menekankan bahwa tidak ada lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga.Namun, para petugas memang memeriksa buku -buku milik penghuni sel."Apa yang ada bahwa para petugas melakukan pemeriksaan buku dan benda -benda di dalam sel," kata Martinus.

berita: DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan regrets the invitation to uninstall Traveloka, which was previously busy milling about on Twitter timeline. The invitation to uninstall Traveloka was triggered by the pianist's walk out action Ananda Sukarlan when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. "Well, I think it's like this. We respect people with views. Respect different people. No need to uninstall and others," Anies said at the DKI Jakarta DPRD Building According to Anies, the Traveloka application has been providing benefits to society. That invitation shouldn't be arise only because of differences of opinion. "Traveloka also provides benefits for many residents. After all, it is a service that has great benefits for many people. So let's get used to different views in a healthy way respect each other without having to carry out punishments like that. So there is no need to uninstall everything," said Anies. Invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application are milling about on Twitter's timeline. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk-out action when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan make a speech. The walk out took place at the 90th anniversary event Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on the information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders is present at the same time Traveloka CTO Derianto Kusuma greeted and congratulated to Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to carry out a boycott of Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. But it can be ascertained that the news is just a hoax or not true. Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that the founder and Traveloka CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. But he was unable to attend. "Traveloka is proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from the alumni of Canisius. However, he was unable to attend because atomic number  he was on a business trip that had been planned a few months in advance. So if you say Pak Deri is there and it is called providing support (to Ananda), he was not there," he said. "We state that Traveloka is a company based on technology founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders." he continued.
berita_id: Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan menyesali undangan untuk menghapus instalan Traveloka, yang sebelumnya sibuk berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Undangan untuk menghapus instalasi Traveloka dipicu oleh aksi walk out pianis Ananda Sukarlan ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta anies Baswedan memberikan pidato."Yah, saya pikir ini seperti ini. Kami menghormati orang -orang dengan pandangan. Hormati orang yang berbeda. Tidak perlu menghapus instalasi dan yang lainnya," kata Anies di gedung DKI Jakarta DPRD menurut ANIES, aplikasi Traveloka telah memberikan manfaat bagi masyarakat.Undangan itu seharusnya tidak muncul hanya karena perbedaan pendapat."Traveloka juga memberikan manfaat bagi banyak penduduk. Lagi pula, ini adalah layanan yang memiliki manfaat besar bagi banyak orang. Jadi mari kita terbiasa dengan pandangan yang berbeda dengan cara yang sehat satu sama lain tanpa harus melakukan hukuman seperti itu. Jadi tidak perlu menghapus segalanya," kata Anies.Undangan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka sedang berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh aksi pianis Ananda Sukarlan ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta anies Baswedan berpidato.Walk Out berlangsung di acara peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri hadir pada saat yang sama Traveloka CTO DERIANTO KUSUMA menyapa dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato Walk Out dan Anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan atas tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk melakukan boikot dari Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.Tetapi dapat dipastikan bahwa berita itu hanya tipuan atau tidak benar.Manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri dan Traveloka CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Tapi dia tidak bisa hadir."Traveloka bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Canisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena nomor atom ia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya. Jadi jika Anda mengatakan Pak Deri ada di sana dan itu dipanggil memberikan dukungan (kepada Ananda), ia tidak ada di sana," katanya."Kami menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan yang didasarkan pada teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai -nilai saling menghormati, toleransi dan inovasi. Nilai -nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal."Dia melanjutkan.

berita: Apple previously stated that curved iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus are extremely rare and only 9 users have experienced it. Apple's statement also received support from Consumer Reports which said that the issue of the curved iPhone was excessive. To prove that the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus don't bend easily, Consumer Reports conducted a test using a special compression engine called Instron. The results obtained show that the iPhone 6 and iPhone Plus are once again not easily bent. In the video, Consumer Reports not only tests both iPhone 6 models, but also uses the iPhone 5s and Android smartphones, such as the Galaxy Note 3, LG G3, and HTC One M8 for comparison. The test showed the HTC One M8 to be the most vulnerable and in last consumer place and the Galaxy Note 3 the most powerful with a pressure of 150 pounds (68.04kg). In fifth place is the iPhone 6. With the same weight pressure as the HTC One M8, the iPhone 6 can bend under 70 pounds (31.75kg). But the new iPhone 6 case can separate under the pressure of 100 pounds (45.36kg). While the iPhone 6 Plus is fourth, Apple's phablet can bend at 90 pounds (40.82kg) and the case can't withstand 110 pounds (49.90kg). It seems that the issue of curved iPhone is not a problem anymore. Consumer Reports concluded that the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus and other smartphones can be used for everyday use. So, are you sure about this result? You now don't have to worry anymore or fail to buy an iPhone 6 or iPhone Plus. Apple has even carried out a series of rigorous tests to ensure the latest iPhone is strong enough for normal use.
berita_id: Apple sebelumnya menyatakan bahwa iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus yang melengkung sangat jarang dan hanya 9 pengguna yang mengalaminya.Pernyataan Apple juga menerima dukungan dari laporan konsumen yang mengatakan bahwa masalah iPhone melengkung berlebihan.Untuk membuktikan bahwa iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus jangan menekuk dengan mudah, Consumer Reports melakukan tes menggunakan mesin kompresi khusus yang disebut Instron.Hasil yang diperoleh menunjukkan bahwa iPhone 6 dan iPhone Plus sekali lagi tidak mudah ditekuk.Dalam video tersebut, konsumen melaporkan tidak hanya menguji kedua model iPhone 6, tetapi juga menggunakan smartphone iPhone 5S dan Android, seperti Galaxy Note 3, LG G3, dan HTC One M8 untuk perbandingan.Tes menunjukkan HTC One M8 menjadi yang paling rentan dan di tempat konsumen terakhir dan Galaxy Note 3 yang paling kuat dengan tekanan 150 pound (68,04kg).Di tempat kelima adalah iPhone 6. Dengan tekanan berat yang sama dengan HTC One M8, iPhone 6 dapat menekuk di bawah 70 pound (31,75kg).Tetapi case iPhone 6 baru dapat terpisah di bawah tekanan 100 pound (45,36kg).Sementara iPhone 6 Plus berada di urutan keempat, phablet Apple dapat menekuk pada 90 pound (40,82kg) dan kasingnya tidak dapat menahan 110 pound (49,90kg).Tampaknya masalah iphone melengkung tidak menjadi masalah lagi.Consumer Reports menyimpulkan bahwa iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus dan smartphone lainnya dapat digunakan untuk penggunaan sehari -hari.Jadi, apakah Anda yakin tentang hasil ini?Anda sekarang tidak perlu khawatir lagi atau gagal membeli iPhone 6 atau iPhone Plus.Apple bahkan telah melakukan serangkaian tes ketat untuk memastikan iPhone terbaru cukup kuat untuk penggunaan normal.

berita: On Tuesday morning, news circulated on social media about closing the gates of the Istiqlal Mosque to visitors. The Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI) felt the need to provide clarification. In an official statement received by the secretary of the Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI), Rusli Effendi clarified that what had been circulating so far did not result in misunderstandings. BPPMI also appeals to all Muslims not to be influenced by news that cannot be accounted for. The news about the locking of the mosque so that people cannot pray Fajr is a hoax or a lie. The closing of the mosque is already a regulation or procedure at Istiqlal. And here's the explanation: The Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency since 2002 has enforced a rule (SOP), closing the gates every night at 21.30. The mosque was reopened in the morning at 03.40, ahead of the Fajr prayer service. This rule (SOP) was enforced in order to optimize mosque security at night. All pilgrims are not allowed to stay in the Istiqlal Mosque area, except under certain conditions and with the permission societal of the security forces and the leadership of BPPMI. Regarding the conditions at night from 20 to the early hours of February 21 2017, the Istiqlal Mosque security forces have explained to the worshipers gathered in the courtyard of the Istiqlal Mosque about the procedure and they understand and are willing to leave the Istiqlal Mosque area. BPPMI did not receive notification from any party regarding the plans for the congregation to stay overnight as in the previous conditions when Muslims held 411, 212 or 112 actions. There was also no special communication from the authorities regarding this matter. The Istiqlal Mosque always serves the people and strives for national unity and unity, and always maintains the comfort of worship. BPPMI stated that the negative news that had been spread on social media regarding the above matters did not correspond to reality and tended to contain provocations. BPPMI appeals to all Muslims to be asked not to be influenced by news that cannot be accounted for. The implementation of the Fajr prayer at the Istiqlal Mosque today went well and smoothly, led by Ustaz Salim Ghazali. The number of worshipers is about 240 people (170 men and 70 women).
berita_id: Pada hari Selasa pagi, berita beredar di media sosial tentang menutup gerbang masjid Istiqlal kepada pengunjung.Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal (BPPMI) merasa perlu untuk memberikan klarifikasi.Dalam pernyataan resmi yang diterima oleh Sekretaris Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal (BPPMI), Rusli Effendi mengklarifikasi bahwa apa yang telah beredar sejauh ini tidak mengakibatkan kesalahpahaman.BPPMI juga menarik bagi semua Muslim untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak dapat diperhitungkan.Berita tentang penguncian masjid sehingga orang tidak dapat berdoa fajr adalah tipuan atau kebohongan.Penutupan masjid sudah menjadi peraturan atau prosedur di ISTIQLAL.Dan inilah penjelasannya: Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal sejak tahun 2002 telah menegakkan aturan (SOP), menutup gerbang setiap malam pukul 21.30.Masjid dibuka kembali di pagi hari pukul 03.40, di depan Layanan Doa Fajr.Aturan ini (SOP) ditegakkan untuk mengoptimalkan keamanan masjid di malam hari.Semua peziarah tidak diizinkan untuk tinggal di wilayah masjid Istiqlal, kecuali dalam kondisi tertentu dan dengan izin masyarakat pasukan keamanan dan kepemimpinan BPPMI.Mengenai kondisi pada malam hari dari 20 hingga jam awal 21 Februari 2017, pasukan keamanan masjid Istiqlal telah menjelaskan kepada para penyembah yang berkumpul di halaman masjid Istiqlal tentang prosedur dan mereka mengerti dan bersedia meninggalkan daerah masjid Istiqlal.BPPMI tidak menerima pemberitahuan dari pihak mana pun mengenai rencana untuk jemaat untuk menginap seperti dalam kondisi sebelumnya ketika Muslim mengadakan tindakan 411, 212 atau 112.Juga tidak ada komunikasi khusus dari pihak berwenang mengenai masalah ini.Masjid Istiqlal selalu melayani orang -orang dan berjuang untuk persatuan dan persatuan nasional, dan selalu mempertahankan kenyamanan ibadah.BPPMI menyatakan bahwa berita negatif yang telah tersebar di media sosial mengenai hal -hal di atas tidak sesuai dengan kenyataan dan cenderung mengandung provokasi.BPPMI menarik semua Muslim untuk diminta untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak dapat diperhitungkan.Implementasi Doa Fajr di Masjid Istiqlal hari ini berjalan dengan baik dan lancar, dipimpin oleh Ustaz Salim Ghazali.Jumlah penyembah adalah sekitar 240 orang (170 pria dan 70 wanita).

berita: Alarmed by rumors that the Pokemon video game has elements of Jewish religion and culture, a Muslim asks a rabbi from Jerusalem to find out. According to Ben Abrahamson, founder of the Al Sadiqin Organization, a center for the study of Islamic and Jewish history, Pokemon has no meaning in Jewish culture. "It has no meaning in our culture," explained Ben on his personal Facebook page. "It comes from Japan and comes from Japanese video game culture, most of its symbols and writing appear in Japanese animation." However, Ben admits that there are also many people who don't like Pokemon. "A lot of people don't like it because it's a waste of time, it's selfish, and it makes one go wild astray on the internet," he replied, when told that Pokemon caused a lot of trouble among Muslims. In the comment section, Ben also quoted verse 6, Surah Al-Hujurat from the Quran to answer the rumors posted on the internet. The verse advises Muslims to research any news to determine its truth so that undesirable things do not befall a race and lead to regret. According to his website, Ben and Al Sadiqin find and explain the common heritage of Islam and Judaism, and reject the notion that the two religions have been enemies since time immemorial. For years, the rumor that Pokemon is a Jewish invention and has religious elements has been spread to Muslims through social media and the internet. According to the baseless accusation, "Pokemon" means "I am Jewish" in Syriac, while the creature's names "Pikachu" and "Charmander" mean "be a Jew", and "God is weak". "Pokemon" is published by the Nintendo company, and its name is an abbreviation of the word "Pocket Monsters", referring to the 722 cute creatures that players collect in the video game. Recently, Perak Mufti Tan Sri Harussani Zakaria has suggested that Malaysia ban the "augmented reality" game application Pokemon Go because it is considered gambling. Pahang Mufti Datuk Seri Abdul Rahman Osman also thinks it should be banned if it is proven to contain elements of gambling.
berita_id: Khawatir oleh desas -desus bahwa video game Pokemon memiliki unsur -unsur agama dan budaya Yahudi, seorang Muslim meminta seorang rabi dari Yerusalem untuk mengetahuinya.Menurut Ben Abrahamson, pendiri Organisasi Al Sadiqin, sebuah pusat studi tentang sejarah Islam dan Yahudi, Pokemon tidak memiliki arti dalam budaya Yahudi."Tidak ada arti dalam budaya kita," jelas Ben di halaman Facebook pribadinya."Itu berasal dari Jepang dan berasal dari budaya video game Jepang, sebagian besar simbol dan tulisannya muncul dalam animasi Jepang."Namun, Ben mengakui bahwa ada juga banyak orang yang tidak suka Pokemon."Banyak orang tidak menyukainya karena buang -buang waktu, itu egois, dan itu membuat seseorang tersesat liar di internet," jawabnya, ketika diberitahu bahwa Pokemon menyebabkan banyak masalah di kalangan Muslim.Di bagian komentar, Ben juga mengutip ayat 6, Surah al-Hujurat dari Al-Quran untuk menjawab rumor yang diposting di internet.Ayat ini menyarankan umat Islam untuk meneliti berita apa pun untuk menentukan kebenarannya sehingga hal -hal yang tidak diinginkan tidak menimpa perlombaan dan mengarah pada penyesalan.Menurut situs webnya, Ben dan Al Sadiqin menemukan dan menjelaskan warisan umum Islam dan Yudaisme, dan menolak anggapan bahwa kedua agama telah menjadi musuh sejak dahulu kala.Selama bertahun -tahun, desas -desus bahwa Pokemon adalah penemuan Yahudi dan memiliki unsur -unsur agama telah menyebar ke Muslim melalui media sosial dan internet.Menurut tuduhan yang tidak berdasar, "Pokemon" berarti "Saya orang Yahudi" di Syria, sementara nama makhluk itu "Pikachu" dan "Charmander" berarti "menjadi seorang Yahudi", dan "Tuhan itu lemah"."Pokemon" diterbitkan oleh Nintendo Company, dan namanya adalah singkatan dari kata "monster saku", merujuk pada 722 makhluk lucu yang dikumpulkan pemain dalam video game.Baru -baru ini, Perak Mufti Tan Sri Harussani Zakaria telah menyarankan agar Malaysia melarang aplikasi game "augmented reality" Pokemon Go karena dianggap perjudian.Pahang mufti datuk seri Abdul Rahman Osman juga berpikir itu harus dilarang jika terbukti mengandung elemen perjudian.

berita: The rampant sales of pacifiers suspected of containing drug substances made the public uneasy, especially the circulation of pacifiers suspected of containing drug addictive substances began to spread and was found in remote rural areas, Malang Regency. One of the residents of Rt.30 / Rw.06 Krebet village, Bululawang District, Mujib Idris, admitted that he found the pacifiers sold in front of a Kindergarten (TK) school consumed by kindergarten-aged children in Bulupanyung hamlet, Krebet Village, Bululawang District. "I found out from one of the parents who at that time had bought their child, one candy had been opened and the other had not been opened," explained Mujib Idris. Due to the growing news that the candy pacifier was suspected of containing addictive ingredients, his party chose to secure the candy. Now the public is restless with the circulation of the pacifier candy which allegedly contains the drug. Moreover, the news in a number of candy media is dangerous. Therefore, his party asked the government authorities to calm the public by conducting raids. He explained that the candy pacifier was shaped like a bottle for a baby to drink which contained white powder. Therefore, his party asked the government to immediately provide clarity to the public, whether the candy is really dangerous or not for consumption. "If it is really dangerous, we are asked to immediately conduct a sweeping of the number of candy sellers in schools, at this time we as parents are quite nervous," he complained. Information that has been collected in the field, various reports are developing, the pacifier candy is still waiting for the results of the laboratory test in Surabaya to determine whether the ingredients for the pacifier are dangerous or not, because the candy is reportedly registered with BPOM with the code BPOM RI ML 22 440 900 3077. Separately, one of the parents of a resident of Jl Malik Dalam Kelurahan or Kedungkandang Sub-district, Malang city, Galuh Ayu also admitted that she was worried about the circulation of the candy which allegedly contained the addictive substance. He said that when he received the news that the pacifier was dangerous, his party forwarded the information to his relatives. "Supervision of children in consuming school snacks must be tightened. This has been circulating in the community through TV, Radio, Online and even Print, thank you. People must be more vigilant," he added. Meanwhile, the Head of Reskba Polres Malang AKP. Syamsul Hidayat when confirmed via his cell phone admitted that his party was still waiting for the results of laboratory tests from BPOM regarding the alleged presence of take drug additives in the children's candy. "We are still waiting for the results. If it is proven positive (drugs), of course action will be taken," said Syamsul
berita_id: Penjualan dot yang merajalela yang diduga mengandung zat obat membuat publik tidak nyaman, terutama sirkulasi dot yang diduga mengandung zat adiktif narkoba mulai menyebar dan ditemukan di daerah pedesaan terpencil, Kabupaten Malang.Salah satu penghuni Desa Rt.30 / RW.06 Krebet, Distrik Bululawang, Mujib Idris, mengakui bahwa ia menemukan dot yang dijual di depan sekolah TK) yang dikonsumsi oleh anak-anak berusia TK di Dusun Bulupanyung, desa Krebet, distrik Bululawang."Saya mengetahui dari salah satu orang tua yang pada waktu itu telah membeli anak mereka, satu permen telah dibuka dan yang lain belum dibuka," jelas Mujib Idris.Karena berita yang berkembang bahwa dot permen diduga mengandung bahan -bahan adiktif, partainya memilih untuk mengamankan permen.Sekarang publik gelisah dengan sirkulasi permen dot yang diduga mengandung obat.Selain itu, berita di sejumlah media permen berbahaya.Karena itu, partainya meminta otoritas pemerintah untuk menenangkan masyarakat dengan melakukan penggerebekan.Dia menjelaskan bahwa dot permen berbentuk seperti botol untuk minum bayi yang berisi bubuk putih.Oleh karena itu, partainya meminta pemerintah untuk segera memberikan kejelasan kepada publik, apakah permen itu benar -benar berbahaya atau tidak untuk dikonsumsi."Jika itu benar -benar berbahaya, kami diminta untuk segera melakukan menyapu jumlah penjual permen di sekolah, pada saat ini kami sebagai orang tua cukup gugup," keluhnya.Informasi yang telah dikumpulkan di lapangan, berbagai laporan sedang berkembang, permen dot masih menunggu hasil uji laboratorium di Surabaya untuk menentukan apakah bahan -bahan untuk dot itu berbahaya atau tidak, karena permen tersebut dilaporkan terdaftar dengan BPOM dengan Kode Bpom Ri Ml 22 440 900 3077.Sub-District Kedungk-District, Kota Malang, Gang Ayu juga mengakui bahwa dia khawatir tentang sirkulasi permen yang diduga mengandung zat adiktif.Dia mengatakan bahwa ketika dia menerima berita bahwa dot itu berbahaya, partainya meneruskan informasi itu kepada kerabatnya."Pengawasan anak -anak dalam mengonsumsi makanan ringan sekolah harus dikencangkan. Ini telah beredar di komunitas melalui TV, radio, online dan bahkan mencetak, terima kasih. Orang -orang pasti lebih waspada," tambahnya.Sementara itu, kepala Reskba Polres Malang AKP.Syamsul Hididesy ketika dikonfirmasi melalui ponselnya mengakui bahwa partainya masih menunggu hasil tes laboratorium dari BPOM mengenai dugaan keberadaan Take Drug Aditif dalam permen anak -anak."Kami masih menunggu hasilnya. Jika terbukti positif (obat -obatan), tentu saja tindakan akan diambil," kata Syamsul

berita: The Pokemon Go game fever is being experienced by several countries, including Indonesia. Recently there has been an issue regarding the meaning of the word Pikachu which in Syriac means Be a Jew. Not a few sites provocative people spread this fake news. Worse yet, there's something using Muslim frills and so on. Is this true? Let us see the following explanation. Pikachu comes from Japanese and not Syriac. Pika comes from the word pikapika taken from the Japanese onomatopoeia which means: sparkling. In context this, it means the sparkle of an electric spark being struck.
