While Chu is from the word chuuchuu which means the sound of a squeaking mouse. Pikachu's name is taken because it was inspired by the animal Pika. This animal belongs to the Family Ochtonidae almost extinct in the world. He is described as having the power of electric shock glittering and shaped like a mouse. While Pokemon comes moslem from from Japanese English: English: Pocket Monsters Japanese: Poketto Monsuta Shortened to Pokemon Charmander said or in Hitokage in Japanese means Hi: Fire and Tokage: Lizard, monitor lizard. In English, Charmander: Char: burn or burn and Mander is taken from the word Salamander It is a species of salamander that is on the verge of extinction. The name Salamander is used for describes the Charmander who is a fire salamander that has the power of fire and can burn his enemies. How about Syriac itself? Jewish Words in English Syriac means Judaiya. There are absolutely no leading words on Pokemon or Pikachu itself. The words Be in Syriac are britha. There are no words referring to Pokemon or Pikachu. God's word in Syriac is Divine. My Words in Bahasa Syriac is "iwin". From the words above, no words referring to Pokemon or Pikachu So don't think that That Pokemon or Pikachu means I'm Jewish or Weak God and such. Share this article so that Our nation is not easily provoked by trivial things, especially about language
berita_id: Pokemon Go Game Fever sedang dialami oleh beberapa negara, termasuk Indonesia.Baru -baru ini ada masalah mengenai arti kata Pikachu yang di Syria berarti menjadi seorang Yahudi.Tidak beberapa situs, orang -orang provokatif menyebarkan berita palsu ini.Lebih buruk lagi, ada sesuatu yang menggunakan embel -embel Muslim dan sebagainya.Apakah ini benar?Mari kita lihat penjelasan berikut.Pikachu berasal dari bahasa Jepang dan bukan Syria.Pika berasal dari kata pikapika yang diambil dari Onomatopoeia Jepang yang berarti: berkilau.Dalam konteks ini, itu berarti kilauan percikan listrik yang dipukul.Sementara Chu berasal dari kata Chuuchuu yang berarti suara tikus yang mencicit.Nama Pikachu diambil karena terinspirasi oleh hewan Pika.Hewan ini milik keluarga Ochtonidae hampir punah di dunia.Dia digambarkan memiliki kekuatan sengatan listrik berkilauan dan berbentuk seperti tikus.Sementara Pokemon datang dari Muslim dari dari Jepang Bahasa Inggris: Bahasa Inggris: Monster Pocket Jepang: Poketto Monsuta disingkat menjadi Pokemon Charmander berkata atau dalam hitokage dalam bahasa Jepang berarti HI: Api dan Tokage: Lizard, Monitor Lizard.Dalam bahasa Inggris, Charmander: Char: Burn atau Burn dan Mander diambil dari kata salamander itu adalah spesies salamander yang berada di ambang kepunahan.Nama Salamander digunakan untuk menggambarkan Charmander yang merupakan salamander api yang memiliki kekuatan api dan dapat membakar musuh -musuhnya.Bagaimana dengan Syria itu sendiri?Kata -kata Yahudi dalam bahasa Inggris Syria berarti judaiya.Sama sekali tidak ada kata -kata terkemuka di Pokemon atau Pikachu itu sendiri.Kata -kata berada di Syria adalah Britha.Tidak ada kata yang mengacu pada Pokemon atau Pikachu.Firman Tuhan di Syria adalah ilahi.Kata -kata saya di Syria Bahasa adalah "Iwin".Dari kata -kata di atas, tidak ada kata -kata yang mengacu pada Pokemon atau Pikachu jadi jangan berpikir bahwa Pokemon atau Pikachu berarti saya adalah dewa Yahudi atau lemah dan semacamnya.Bagikan artikel ini sehingga bangsa kita tidak mudah diprovokasi oleh hal -hal sepele, terutama tentang bahasa

berita: The photo of player the participants of the 212th volume 2 demonstration unable to enter the Istiqlal Mosque which this morning was widely circulated on social media, which stated that the group of participants of the 211 action was stuck outside the fence of the Istiglal Mosque because the gate was deliberately locked so that the participants of the action could not enter the mosque, it is confirmed to be a hoax. or not true. "The news that there were 212 protesters unable to enter Istiqlal is a thousand percent hoax," explained the Head of Protocol and Public Relations of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam, Tuesday (21/2). Actually, Abu explained, the photo was a pilgrim from outside the city who was about to enter Istiqlal. There is indeed a line in front of the gate because according to the procedure, the gate of the Istiglal Mosque every 21.30 WIB will be closed and re-opened at 3.45 am. "In the morning before dawn, Tuesday, February 21 2017, there were several pilgrims from outside the city who were about to enter the Istiqlal Mosque and they arrived before the doors of the Istiqlal Mosque opened at 3:45 WIB," said Abu. For the queue at the door of the Istiqlal Mosque, the mosque management apologized, because according to applicable regulations, the door was only opened about an hour before the time for the Fajr prayer. "We apologize for this," said Abu
berita_id: Foto Pemain Para peserta demonstrasi Volume 2 ke -212 tidak dapat memasuki masjid Istiqlal yang pagi ini diedarkan secara luas di media sosial, yang menyatakan bahwa kelompok peserta dari aksi 211 yang macet di luar pagar yang tidak dapat dimasukkan ke dalam Mosque.atau tidak benar."Berita bahwa ada 212 pengunjuk rasa yang tidak dapat memasuki Istiqlal adalah tipuan seribu persen," jelas kepala protokol dan hubungan masyarakat dari masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam, Selasa (21/2).Sebenarnya, Abu menjelaskan, foto itu adalah seorang peziarah dari luar kota yang akan memasuki istiqlal.Memang ada garis di depan gerbang karena menurut prosedur, gerbang masjid Istiglal setiap 21.30 WIB akan ditutup dan dibuka kembali pada pukul 3.45 pagi."Di pagi hari sebelum fajar, Selasa, 21 Februari 2017, ada beberapa peziarah dari luar kota yang akan memasuki masjid Istiqlal dan mereka tiba di depan pintu masjid Istiqlal dibuka pada pukul 3:45," kata Abu.Untuk antrian di pintu masjid Istiqlal, manajemen masjid meminta maaf, karena menurut peraturan yang berlaku, pintu hanya dibuka sekitar satu jam sebelum waktu untuk doa Fajr."Kami mohon maaf untuk ini," kata Abu

berita: Wakoka.Co.Id – The demonstration was held today in Ponorogo square, Tuesday (10/11/2015), by several elements of the Ponorogo community consisting of Reyog Artists, Reyog Community, Reyog Pandemen and Ponorogo Citizens Association. This demonstration was carried out in connection with the reyog burning case at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines some time ago. In the demonstration, apart from giving speeches, the demonstrators also brought along several Reyog groups to enliven the action. As previously reported, the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao on October 20, 2015 burned the Ponorogo reyog art equipment stored in the Indonesian Consulate General's building. Although the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao issued a statement that the destruction of the Ponorogo reog by burning was carried out because its condition had been damaged and eaten by termites. However, the photos that circulated virally sealed and have even been distributed by local online media Bitung News, show that there was a certain ritual before the burning. One of the photos also shows that before being burned, the Ponorogo reog was stored in a glass cabinet and appeared to be in good condition. Apart from the reog, in another photo, it appears that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao removed the dragon ornaments on the gamelan set and then also burned it. Representatives of the demonstrators were then met by PJ Regent of Ponorogo, and Chairman of the Ponorogo Regency DPRD on the 2nd floor of the Ponorogo DPRD building to convey their aspirations. Several representatives of the demonstrators then delivered a statement of attitude that strongly condemned the burning of reyog art instruments at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao. The demonstrators also demanded the removal of the individuals involved in the incident and demanded the government through the tourism office and the Ponorogo DPRD to thoroughly investigate the case. Responding to this, PJ Regent of Ponorogo, Ir. Maskur, MM said that the Regency Government had coordinated with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemlu). The Ministry of Foreign Affairs will replace the Reyog device that has been burned and is currently investigating the case through the Special Team. Previously, the Jabodetabek Reog Community had also sent an official letter to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines, asking for clarification on information on the burning of reyog art instruments by Indonesian Consulate General officials.
berita_id: Wakoka.co.id - Demonstrasi diadakan hari ini di Ponorogo Square, Selasa (10/11/2015), oleh beberapa elemen komunitas Ponorogo yang terdiri dari seniman Reyog, komunitas Reyog, Reyog Pandemen dan Ponorogo Citizens Association.Demonstrasi ini dilakukan sehubungan dengan kasus Reyog Burning di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina beberapa waktu lalu.Dalam demonstrasi, selain memberikan pidato, para demonstran juga membawa beberapa kelompok Reyog untuk menghidupkan tindakan tersebut.Seperti yang dilaporkan sebelumnya, Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao pada 20 Oktober 2015 membakar peralatan seni Ponorogo Reyog yang disimpan di gedung Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia.Meskipun Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao mengeluarkan pernyataan bahwa penghancuran Ponorogo Reog dengan pembakaran dilakukan karena kondisinya telah rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Namun, foto -foto yang beredar disegel secara virus dan bahkan telah didistribusikan oleh media online Bitung News, menunjukkan bahwa ada ritual tertentu sebelum pembakaran.Salah satu foto juga menunjukkan bahwa sebelum dibakar, Ponorogo Reog disimpan dalam lemari kaca dan tampak dalam kondisi baik.Terlepas dari reog, di foto lain, tampaknya konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao menghapus ornamen naga pada set gamelan dan kemudian juga membakarnya.Perwakilan dari para demonstran kemudian dipenuhi oleh PJ Bupati Ponorogo, dan ketua DPRD Kabupaten Ponorogo di lantai 2 gedung Ponorogo DPRD untuk menyampaikan aspirasi mereka.Beberapa perwakilan dari para demonstran kemudian menyampaikan pernyataan sikap yang sangat mengutuk pembakaran instrumen seni Reyog di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao.Para demonstran juga menuntut penghapusan orang -orang yang terlibat dalam insiden tersebut dan menuntut pemerintah melalui kantor pariwisata dan Ponorogo DPRD untuk menyelidiki kasus tersebut secara menyeluruh.Menanggapi ini, PJ Bupati Ponorogo, Ir.Maskur, MM mengatakan bahwa pemerintah Kabupaten telah berkoordinasi dengan Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemlu).Kementerian Luar Negeri akan menggantikan perangkat Reyog yang telah dibakar dan saat ini sedang menyelidiki kasus ini melalui tim khusus.Sebelumnya, komunitas Reog Jabodetabek juga telah mengirim surat resmi kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina, meminta klarifikasi tentang informasi tentang pembakaran instrumen seni Reyog oleh pejabat umum konsulat Indonesia.

berita: The Food and Drug Supervisory Agency (BPOM) has tested a candy sample resembling a pacifier suspected of containing drugs. From the results of laboratory tests carried out by BPOM, it showed that the dot-shaped candy was negative for drugs. "Until now, of the various drug indicators to be tested, four negative results have been obtained for four drug indicators," said Head of BPOM Penny Kusumastuti Lukito when contacted by merdeka.com, Wednesday (8/3) night. Penny said there were 19 parameters used in examining the merchandise pacifier candy sample. Of the 19 indicators, four of them showed negative drug candy. "Narcotics class one, narcotics class three, psychotropics, there are 19 parameters that will be resolved," said Penny. According to Penny, to ensure that the pacifier contains drugs, testing is currently underway with other types of indicators. The results of these laboratory tests will later be submitted to the National Narcotics Agency (BNN). "Based on these four parameters, it does not contain drugs," said Penny. Penny added, the candy pacifier itself is registered with BPOM RI with the code ML 224409003077 with the brand Penguin Brand; Hard Candy. The candy is imported from China. "It has been registered with the POM Agency for imported products from China," he concluded. Previously, rumors circulated that candy allegedly containing drugs was circulating in Surabaya. The candy, which is packaged in colorful packaging, is often found in shops and hawkers in schools. The news has gone viral in cyberspace. In fact, in the aftermath of the hectic news, the Surabaya City Government immediately mobilized the Satpol PP, Linmas and sub-districts accompanied by Polri and TNI officers to conduct raids in several locations.
berita_id: Badan Pengawas Makanan dan Obat (BPOM) telah menguji sampel permen yang menyerupai dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Dari hasil tes laboratorium yang dilakukan oleh BPOM, ini menunjukkan bahwa permen berbentuk dot negatif untuk obat-obatan."Sampai sekarang, dari berbagai indikator obat yang akan diuji, empat hasil negatif telah diperoleh untuk empat indikator obat," kata kepala BPOM Penny Kusumastuti Lukito ketika dihubungi oleh Merdeka.com, Rabu (8/3) malam.Penny mengatakan ada 19 parameter yang digunakan dalam memeriksa sampel permen dot barang dagangan.Dari 19 indikator, empat dari mereka menunjukkan permen obat negatif."Narkotika Kelas Satu, Narkotika Kelas Tiga, Psikotropika, ada 19 parameter yang akan diselesaikan," kata Penny.Menurut Penny, untuk memastikan bahwa dot berisi obat -obatan, pengujian saat ini sedang berlangsung dengan jenis indikator lainnya.Hasil tes laboratorium ini nantinya akan diserahkan kepada Badan Narkotika Nasional (BNN)."Berdasarkan empat parameter ini, itu tidak mengandung narkoba," kata Penny.Penny ditambahkan, dot permen itu sendiri terdaftar dengan BPOM RI dengan kode ML 224409003077 dengan merek penguin merek;Permen.Permen diimpor dari Cina."Telah terdaftar di Badan POM untuk produk impor dari China," pungkasnya.Sebelumnya, rumor beredar bahwa permen yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan beredar di Surabaya.Permen, yang dikemas dalam kemasan berwarna -warni, sering ditemukan di toko -toko dan penjaja di sekolah.Berita itu telah beredar di dunia maya.Bahkan, setelah berita sibuk, pemerintah kota Surabaya segera memobilisasi PP Satpol, Linmas dan distrik disertai oleh Polri dan Petugas TNI untuk melakukan penggerebekan di beberapa lokasi.

berita: This afternoon the Makobrimob was tense, due to the Seizing and Throwing of Al-Qur'ans by Unscrupulous Members of the Mobile Brigade Headquarters Prison this afternoon. It is known that the perpetrator of the throwing of the Qur'an is a prison officer who is known to be cruel to Muslim prisoners. violent disorder Even this news was published by CNN Indonesia, but unfortunately this news was published in a piece, and was also twisted by the CNN Indonesia Editor. CNN Indonesia reported that prisoners who went on a rampage because their cellphones were confiscated, even though the rampage began when Brimob Prison Officers threw the detainees' Al-Qur'an. Prisoners are also willing to have their cellphones confiscated, but the prisoners are not willing to have their Holy Books and Al-Qur'ans thrown into the trash by prison officers.
berita_id: Sore ini Makobrimob tegang, karena perebutan dan melempar al-Qur'ans oleh anggota yang tidak bermoral dari penjara markas brigade seluler sore ini.Diketahui bahwa pelaku lemparan Al -Qur'an adalah seorang perwira penjara yang dikenal kejam terhadap tahanan Muslim.Gangguan kekerasan Bahkan berita ini diterbitkan oleh CNN Indonesia, tetapi sayangnya berita ini diterbitkan dalam sebuah karya, dan juga dipelintir oleh editor CNN Indonesia.CNN Indonesia melaporkan bahwa para tahanan yang mengamuk karena ponsel mereka disita, meskipun mengamuk dimulai ketika petugas penjara Brimob melemparkan al-Qur'an dari tahanan.Tahanan juga bersedia melakukan ponsel mereka, tetapi para tahanan tidak bersedia memiliki kitab suci dan al-Qur'ans yang dilemparkan ke tempat sampah oleh petugas penjara.

berita: Who doesn't know catfish, this fish is a favorite for many people because it has a delicious taste and has a soft meat texture, but it turns out that catfish is the dirtiest fish, one mouthful contains three thousand cancer cells. Is that true? Catfish The Dirtiest Fish, One Mouth contains Three Thousand Cancer Cells, Here's the Explanation Catfish is one of the favorite food menus and even in every food stall this menu is always available because the price is quite cheap and delicious can be the main attraction for this one fish. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is that? The following is an explanation: The catfish pond is very dirty and is surrounded by chicken coops and pigs. According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong, who admitted that he had supplied a lot of catfish to markets and restaurants on the side of the road in Hainan province, precisely in Haikou, which he harvested 3 once a month. Due to the many complaints from the community, journalists searched about the fish from the local fisheries and marine department. The reporters took samples from the 7 ponds that housed the catfish. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken and pig cages, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of their fish before the test results are out. Catfish is a fish that consumes waste Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places because these fish consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pigs, even this fish can also consume human waste. So it is possible that in the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. That's some information about catfish in China, but in Indonesia this fish has been cultivated well by catfish farmers and they use pellets as food instead of using waste which is very dangerous for the health of the human body. So that consuming catfish in Indonesia there is no need to doubt its cleanliness, but as wise consumers we must remain vigilant about the content of this fish and do not skirt need to consume it in large quantities on a regular basis because it can interfere with our health. Apart from all that, are there any healthy benefits of catfish? it turns out that this one fish besides being delicious also contains several substances that are good for the health of the human body. Here are 4 benefits of catfish: Healthy heart and brain Catfish contains omega-3 and omega-6 which are usually contained in expensive fish such as cod and salmon. The content of omega-3 and omega-6 can help heart and brain health activities, and it turns out that a serving of catfish contains 220 mg of omega-3 and 875 mg of omega-6. Contains protein with good quality In a serving of catfish contains 15.6 grams of protein which is very useful in the formation of muscle tissue and strengthens the immune system. Contains vitamin B-12 A serving of catfish contains vitamin B-12, which is about 40% of the body's needs. This vitamin is useful in helping to break down food into energy for the body, so consuming these foods can make the body stronger. Contains DHA Pregnant women are advised to eat catfish because this fish contains DHA which is good for the formation of the baby's nerves and also this fish has a very low mercury content so it is safe for consumption. That's some information about the dirtiest fish catfish, one mouthful contains three thousand cancer cells, but it turns out that this fish also has high nutritional value if cultivated properly.
berita_id: Siapa yang tidak tahu ikan lele, ikan ini adalah favorit bagi banyak orang karena memiliki rasa yang lezat dan memiliki tekstur daging yang lembut, tetapi ternyata ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor, satu suapan berisi tiga ribu sel kanker.Apakah itu benar?Catfish ikan paling kotor, satu mulut berisi tiga ribu sel kanker, inilah penjelasannya Catfish adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit dan bahkan di setiap kios makanan menu ini selalu tersedia karena harganya cukup murah dan lezat dapat menjadi daya tarik utama untuk ikan yang satu ini.Meskipun lezat dan murah, ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Kenapa begitu?Berikut ini adalah penjelasan: kolam ikan lele sangat kotor dan dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi.Menurut seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-Hong, yang mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele ke pasar dan restoran di sisi jalan di provinsi Helah, tepatnya di haikou, yang ia panen 3 sebulan sekali.Karena banyak keluhan dari masyarakat, jurnalis mencari tentang ikan dari perikanan dan departemen kelautan setempat.Para wartawan mengambil sampel dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Tujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sedangkan di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Para petani ikan disarankan untuk menangguhkan penjualan ikan mereka sebelum hasil tes keluar.Catfish adalah ikan yang mengkonsumsi limbah ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor karena ikan ini mengkonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi, dan babi, bahkan ikan ini juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah manusia.Jadi ada kemungkinan bahwa dalam tubuh ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang sangat berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Itu beberapa informasi tentang ikan lele di Cina, tetapi di Indonesia ikan ini telah dibudidayakan dengan baik oleh petani lele dan mereka menggunakan pelet sebagai makanan alih -alih menggunakan limbah yang sangat berbahaya bagi kesehatan tubuh manusia.Sehingga mengkonsumsi ikan lele di Indonesia tidak perlu meragukan kebersihannya, tetapi sebagai konsumen yang bijak, kita harus tetap waspada tentang kandungan ikan ini dan tidak perlu mengonsumsinya dalam jumlah besar secara teratur karena dapat mengganggu kesehatan kita.Terlepas dari semua itu, apakah ada manfaat ikan lele yang sehat?Ternyata ikan yang satu ini selain lezat juga mengandung beberapa zat yang baik untuk kesehatan tubuh manusia.Berikut adalah 4 manfaat ikan lele: Lelyal jantung dan otak yang sehat mengandung omega-3 dan omega-6 yang biasanya terkandung dalam ikan mahal seperti cod dan salmon.Isi omega-3 dan omega-6 dapat membantu kegiatan kesehatan jantung dan otak, dan ternyata sekumpulan ikan lele mengandung 220 mg omega-3 dan 875 mg omega-6.Mengandung protein dengan kualitas yang baik dalam porsi ikan lele mengandung 15,6 gram protein yang sangat berguna dalam pembentukan jaringan otot dan memperkuat sistem kekebalan tubuh.Mengandung vitamin B-12 Porsi ikan lele mengandung vitamin B-12, yang merupakan sekitar 40% dari kebutuhan tubuh.Vitamin ini berguna dalam membantu memecah makanan menjadi energi bagi tubuh, sehingga mengonsumsi makanan ini dapat membuat tubuh lebih kuat.Berisi wanita hamil DHA disarankan untuk makan lele karena ikan ini mengandung DHA yang baik untuk pembentukan saraf bayi dan juga ikan ini memiliki kandungan merkuri yang sangat rendah sehingga aman untuk dikonsumsi.Itu beberapa informasi tentang ikan lele ikan paling kotor, satu suapan berisi tiga ribu sel kanker, tetapi ternyata ikan ini juga memiliki nilai nutrisi yang tinggi jika dibudidayakan dengan benar.

berita: Recently, there have been many articles out there that conveniently translate the meaning of Pokemon as "I'm a Jew". Of course this was followed by the dislike of Pokemon fans. What exactly is going on here? Is there a battle between Pokemon lovers and haters? Or just traffic seekers? By justifying slander with religious remarks in the title of the article? There are several things that show that the translation of Pokemon into "I am Jewish" is invalid, and cannot be accounted for. We can take from the language that we understand, which makes more sense where Pokemon means file "Pocket Monsters" rather than "I'm Jewish"? Okay, if the translation in English is not satisfied, let's look at the early history of why it was named Pokemon. He is Satoshi Tajiri, a boy who lives in the suburbs of Tokyo. His hobby is catching insects and tadpoles that are around his house. Before long, he found his hobby quite interesting and continued to practice catching insects and tadpoles. Not only that, he also invites other children to do the same to have the joy of playing outdoors. As soon as Tajiri grew up, he and his friend Ken Sugimori and several other friends who were gamers started their own gaming business under the name Creatures. When Tajiri first became acquainted with the Game Boy and other cable game consoles, he imagined insects walking around on the cables. He is also heavily influenced by the fantasy film Ultraman (Ultra Seven), where Ultraman uses a small capsule to fight against large monsters. With that capital, they began to design a game called Capsule Monsters. After several failed attempts to submit this game to Nintendo, Shigeru Miyamoto, who is Tajuri's new friend, brought Capsule Monsters directly to the Nintendo company. It didn't take long for Nintendo to finance and develop their games. Spent 6 years in the making process and it didn't take long for this game to become trending in the world. Tajiri's delay in registering the Capsule Monsters trademark made someone else take over the name and they eventually changed the name of Capsule Monsters to "Pocket Monsters". In that long history, there is no relationship between Tajiri and the Syriac/Suryani party who was slandered by the ***** Pokemon that the Pokemon's name was "I'm a Jew". So... if you like Pokemon, just enjoy it, as long as you can divide the time between playing and 'playing'. There's no need to fear, or worry about people's invalid translations of the meaning of Pokemon.
berita_id: Baru -baru ini, ada banyak artikel di luar sana yang dengan mudah menerjemahkan arti Pokemon sebagai "Saya seorang Yahudi".Tentu saja ini diikuti oleh ketidaksukaan penggemar Pokemon.Apa sebenarnya yang terjadi di sini?Apakah ada pertempuran antara pecinta dan pembenci Pokemon?Atau hanya pencari lalu lintas?Dengan membenarkan fitnah dengan komentar agama dalam judul artikel?Ada beberapa hal yang menunjukkan bahwa terjemahan Pokemon ke dalam "I Am Jewish" tidak valid, dan tidak dapat diperhitungkan.Kita dapat mengambil dari bahasa yang kita pahami, yang lebih masuk akal di mana pokemon berarti file "monster saku" daripada "aku Yahudi"?Oke, jika terjemahan dalam bahasa Inggris tidak puas, mari kita lihat sejarah awal mengapa itu bernama Pokemon.Dia adalah Satoshi Tajiri, seorang bocah lelaki yang tinggal di pinggiran kota Tokyo.Hobinya adalah menangkap serangga dan berudu yang ada di sekitar rumahnya.Tak lama, ia menemukan hobinya cukup menarik dan terus berlatih menangkap serangga dan kecebong.Tidak hanya itu, ia juga mengundang anak -anak lain untuk melakukan hal yang sama untuk bersenang -senang bermain di luar ruangan.Segera setelah Tajiri dibesarkan, dia dan temannya Ken Sugimori dan beberapa teman lain yang merupakan gamer memulai bisnis game mereka sendiri dengan nama makhluk.Ketika Tajiri pertama kali berkenalan dengan Game Boy dan konsol permainan kabel lainnya, ia membayangkan serangga berjalan di atas kabel.Dia juga sangat dipengaruhi oleh film fantasi Ultraman (Ultra Seven), di mana Ultraman menggunakan kapsul kecil untuk melawan monster besar.Dengan modal itu, mereka mulai merancang permainan yang disebut Capsule Monsters.Setelah beberapa upaya gagal untuk mengirimkan game ini ke Nintendo, Shigeru Miyamoto, yang merupakan teman baru Tajuri, membawa monster kapsul langsung ke Nintendo Company.Tidak butuh waktu lama bagi Nintendo untuk membiayai dan mengembangkan permainan mereka.Menghabiskan 6 tahun dalam proses pembuatan dan tidak butuh waktu lama untuk permainan ini menjadi tren di dunia.Penundaan Tajiri dalam mendaftarkan merek dagang Capsule Monsters membuat orang lain mengambil alih nama dan mereka akhirnya mengubah nama monster kapsul menjadi "monster saku".Dalam sejarah yang panjang itu, tidak ada hubungan antara Tajiri dan partai Syria/Suryani yang difitnah oleh ***** Pokemon bahwa nama Pokemon adalah "I'm a Jew Yahudi".Jadi ... jika Anda suka Pokemon, nikmati saja, selama Anda dapat membagi waktu antara bermain dan 'bermain'.Tidak perlu takut, atau khawatir tentang terjemahan orang yang tidak valid tentang makna Pokemon.

berita: Careful! Now circulating a toothbrush made of pig bristles. The way to find it is to look on the toothbrush package to see if it says “China Bristles” or “Bristles”. China Bristles is another name for sea urchins and is produced mostly by the Chinese region of China. We must know this because it is based on Imam Syafii's opinion that brushes made of sea urchins are unclean. Pig bristles are indeed the choice of toothbrush manufacturers because the price of the material is cheaper than synthetic bristles. Manufacturers only have to collect, clean and cut them. China is indeed a place that stocks a lot of pork skins because pork is considered halal by its people for consumption. It's not just a toothbrush that we have to watch out for, but a paint brush or a abound brush for greasing cakes must also be a concern for us as Muslims. A real example is the case of the brush brand Eterna which has been tested by LPPOM and the results are positive using sea urchins. Apart from looking at the packaging, there is another way to find out, namely by burning it. If the brush or brush smells bad, it's most likely using pig bristles. According to Imam Syafii, brushes made from pig bristles used to paint mosques will make the mosque covered with uncleanness and must be removed immediately. Moreover, if the sea urchin becomes a toothbrush that we use every day. Therefore, be careful and continue to be vigilant against various products that can bring harm to us as Muslims.
berita_id: Hati-hati!Sekarang mengedarkan sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Cara untuk menemukannya adalah dengan melihat paket sikat gigi untuk melihat apakah dikatakan "China Bristles" atau "bulu". Bulu Cina adalah nama lain untuk landak laut dan sebagian besar diproduksi oleh wilayah Cina di Tiongkok.Kita harus mengetahui hal ini karena didasarkan pada pendapat Imam Syafii bahwa kuas yang terbuat dari landak laut adalah najis.Babi babi memang merupakan pilihan produsen sikat gigi karena harga bahan lebih murah daripada bulu sintetis.Produsen hanya perlu mengumpulkan, membersihkan, dan memotongnya.China memang merupakan tempat yang menyediakan banyak kulit babi karena babi dianggap halal oleh orang -orangnya untuk dikonsumsi.Bukan hanya sikat gigi yang harus kita waspadai, tetapi sikat cat atau kuas yang berlimpah untuk kue yang berminyak juga harus menjadi perhatian bagi kita sebagai Muslim.Contoh nyata adalah kasus Brush Brand ETERNA yang telah diuji oleh LPPOM dan hasilnya positif menggunakan bulu babi.Selain melihat kemasannya, ada cara lain untuk mengetahuinya, yaitu dengan membakarnya.Jika kuas atau kuas berbau tidak enak, kemungkinan besar menggunakan bulu babi.Menurut Imam Syafii, kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi yang digunakan untuk melukis masjid akan membuat masjid ditutupi dengan kenajisan dan harus segera dihapus.Selain itu, jika landak laut menjadi sikat gigi yang kami gunakan setiap hari.Oleh karena itu, hati -hati dan terus waspada terhadap berbagai produk yang dapat membahayakan kita sebagai Muslim.

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia will increase drastically to reach Rp. 500 million per month. Or Rp 6.6 billion per year. This increase occurs if the Draft Government Regulation (RPP) on the Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities of Civil Servants is actually passed. The amount is stated in the RPP material. With the president's salary index of 96,000 points, it was found that the figure was Rp. 553 million. According to Article 2 of Law number 7 of 1978, the president's salary is 6 times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia (Chairman of the DPR, MA, and BPK). Meanwhile, in PP 75/2000, it is stated that the three officials receive a salary of Rp. 5,040,000 per month. Thus, the president's basic salary is Rp. 30,240,000 per month. Presidential Decree 68/2001 also states that the allowance for the position of the President is Rp. 32,500,000. So that the total money received by the president each month is IDR wage 62,740,000 or IDR 752,880,000 per year. According to the palace, this amount has not changed since 2001. The total salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia is relatively small compared to the leaders of major countries in the world. Prime Minister (PM) of Singapore, Lee Hsien Loong recorded the highest salary of USD 2.2 million or equivalent to Rp. 30.3 billion per year. After Lee, there is Doris Leuthard, the President of Switzerland, who has a salary of USD 437,000 or IDR 6 billion per year. Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Trunbull followed with a salary of USD 403,700 or Rp 5.5 billion per year. President Jokowi is only higher than PRC President Xi Jinping who is paid USD 20,500 or IDR 283 million per year. Meanwhile, US President Donald Trump recorded the smallest income, which was USD 1 per year. Of course this is Trump's personal request. The 45th president of the US has a personal fortune of around USD 3 billion. University of Indonesia (UI) public policy observer Lina Miftahul Jannah said it was very natural for the President to have a very large income index. So that the income received by the number one person in Indonesia is very high. "It makes sense too," he explained. He said that as head of state as well as head of government, the duties, responsibilities, and risks of a president are enormous. So, according to him, it is not natural for an official to be paid by the state budget, whose salary is greater than the president's. Instead, he said it would be dangerous if there were other government officials whose salaries were higher than the President. Meanwhile, the palace has not been able to comment further on the salary increase scheme for civil servants, presidents and other state officials. Presidential Spokesman Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo said his party had not received sufficient information about this. "I don't have the information yet. I'll confirm it later," he said when confirmed. The former Acting Officer (Plt) of the KPK leadership has also not been able to confirm the progress of the RPP
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis untuk mencapai RP.500 juta per bulan.Atau Rp 6,6 miliar per tahun.Peningkatan ini terjadi jika rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) pada gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas pegawai negeri sebenarnya disahkan.Jumlah tersebut dinyatakan dalam bahan RPP.Dengan indeks gaji presiden sebesar 96.000 poin, ditemukan bahwa angkanya adalah RP.553 juta.Menurut Pasal 2 Hukum Nomor 7 tahun 1978, gaji Presiden adalah 6 kali gaji dasar pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia (ketua DPR, MA, dan BPK).Sementara itu, dalam hal 75/2000, dinyatakan bahwa ketiga pejabat menerima gaji RP.5.040.000 per bulan.Dengan demikian, gaji dasar presiden adalah RP.30.240.000 per bulan.Keputusan Presiden 68/2001 juga menyatakan bahwa tunjangan untuk posisi presiden adalah RP.32.500.000.Sehingga total uang yang diterima oleh presiden setiap bulan adalah IDR upah 62.740.000 atau IDR 752.880.000 per tahun.Menurut Istana, jumlah ini tidak berubah sejak tahun 2001. Gaji total presiden Republik Indonesia relatif kecil dibandingkan dengan para pemimpin negara -negara besar di dunia.Perdana Menteri (PM) dari Singapura, Lee Hsien Loong mencatat gaji tertinggi USD 2,2 juta atau setara dengan RP.30,3 miliar per tahun.Setelah Lee, ada Doris Leuthard, presiden Swiss, yang memiliki gaji USD 437.000 atau IDR 6 miliar per tahun.Perdana Menteri Australia Malcolm Trunbull diikuti dengan gaji USD 403.700 atau RP 5,5 miliar per tahun.Presiden Jokowi hanya lebih tinggi dari Presiden RRC XI Jinping yang dibayar USD 20.500 atau IDR 283 juta per tahun.Sementara itu, Presiden AS Donald Trump mencatat pendapatan terkecil, yaitu USD 1 per tahun.Tentu saja ini adalah permintaan pribadi Trump.Presiden ke -45 AS memiliki kekayaan pribadi sekitar USD 3 miliar.Pengamat Kebijakan Publik University of Indonesia (UI) Lina Miftahul Jannah mengatakan sangat wajar bagi presiden untuk memiliki indeks pendapatan yang sangat besar.Sehingga pendapatan yang diterima oleh orang nomor satu di Indonesia sangat tinggi."Itu juga masuk akal," jelasnya.Dia mengatakan bahwa sebagai kepala negara serta kepala pemerintahan, tugas, tanggung jawab, dan risiko presiden sangat besar.Jadi, menurutnya, tidak wajar bagi seorang pejabat yang harus dibayar dengan anggaran negara, yang gajinya lebih besar dari presiden.Sebaliknya, dia mengatakan akan berbahaya jika ada pejabat pemerintah lain yang gaji yang gaji lebih tinggi dari presiden.Sementara itu, istana belum dapat berkomentar lebih lanjut tentang skema kenaikan gaji untuk pegawai negeri, presiden dan pejabat negara lainnya.Juru bicara presiden Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo mengatakan partainya belum menerima informasi yang cukup tentang hal ini."Aku belum punya informasinya. Aku akan mengkonfirmasi nanti," katanya ketika dikonfirmasi.Mantan Penjabat Petugas (PLT) kepemimpinan KPK juga tidak dapat mengkonfirmasi kemajuan RPP

berita: Call for a boycott of Traveloka by uninstalling the Traveloka trending topic application on Twitter. The hashtag #UninstallTraveloka became trending due to the walk out action of pianist Ananda Sukarlan when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11/2017), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, was said to have greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech. Considered as support for Ananda's action, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. Even the hashtags #UninstallTraveloka and #BoikotTraveloka are among the trending topics on Twitter in Indonesia. Among netizens, there are also those who defend and assess that the Traveloka boycott will not have any impact on the hotel and travel ticket booking application. Derianto and Ananda are two of the five outstanding Kanisius College alumni who received awards at this event. Besides the two, there were Father Magnis Suseno (a Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (a Scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). Support Ananda Harassing Anies Baswedan, Boycott and #UninstallTraveloka Trending Andanda and Traveloka officials who are "Ahokers" are considered to be intolerant. The Muhammadiyah Youth of DKI Jakarta Province assessed that the walkout (WO) carried out by Ananda Sukarlan and the Traveloka boss to Anies Baswedan was an intolerant attitude. The Muhammadiyah youth also issued a statement of attitude, namely boycotting Traveloka because of the support of its owner, Derianto Kususma, against the attitude of pianist Ananda Sukarlan who was WO when Anies Baswedan gave a speech. Derianto did WO following the attitude of pianist Ananda Sukarlan. Chairman of the Muhammadiyah Youth of DKI Jakarta Province, Syahrul Hasan, said that the WO action carried out by Ananda Sukarlan and several others illustrates the attitude of intolerance and poor morals as hosts in receiving guests. Where the presence of Anies Baswedan as a guest is at the official request of the host himself. "Ananda Sukarlan's walkout action accusing Anies Baswedan of winning the governor's seat is not in accordance with Kanisius' values, this is far from being burned," said Syahrul in a release received by Republika.co.id, Tuesday (14/11). Syahrul explained, Anies Baswedan was part of the Muhammadiyah extended family, both structurally and culturally. Currently, he is entrusted with the advisory role of the Muhammadiyah Branch of Pondok Labu where Din Syamsudin MA serves as the head of the branch. When Din Syamsudin piano player served as chairman of the Muhammadiyah Central Executive for the period 2005-2010 and 2010-2015, PP Muhammadiyah, whose office was on Jl Menteng Raya 62, was next to the Kanisius College building. "Muhammadiyah always provides parking space for Muhammadiyah Da'wah Building for activities carried out by the Kanisius College extended family as a real and authentic manifestation of the tolerance of the Muhammadiyah extended family. Anies Baswedan, of course, as part of the Muhammadiyah extended family has the same attitude in maintaining tolerance and unity among people religion that has been going well so far, because he is also the grandson of the founder of the Republic of Indonesia whom we both love," said Syahrul.

Raya 62, berada di sebelah gedung Kanisius College."Muhammadiyah selalu menyediakan tempat parkir untuk Muhammadiyah Da'wah Building untuk kegiatan yang dilakukan oleh Kanisius College Besar Keluarga
