berita: Fact: The following is the MUI explanation of the above problem taken from the halalmui.org page, the link is below: “Lately, the virtual world has been making a fuss about brushes or toothbrushes/toothbrushes made of 'bristle' because they are DEFINITELY made from pigs. Although we are required to be vigilant, not all bristle terms always refer to sea urchins. The lexical meaning of bristle is a short, stiff hair, fiber, etc (Webster's Dictionary). So all the hair, the stiff fiber, then the term will be referred to as bristle. Hair, stiff beard, can be categorized as bristle. Another example is the stiff fibers or pine leaves can also be referred to as bristle. So, how is its application in the industrial world? In the industrial world, bristle is indeed used as a material for making brushes or brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle can be sourced from animal hair or plant fibers or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. The animal hair used can be sourced from pigs, goats, horses, or camels. The plant fiber that has also been used as a brush or brush material is palm fiber. Nylon is also a synthetic fiber that is commonly used for brushes, brushes or toothbrushes. From the halal aspect, brushes and brushes, including toothbrushes derived from animal hair, are critical points. When the material is sea urchin then it should not be used because any material derived from pigs is both haram and unclean, either in dry or wet form. In addition, besides the prohibition of the substance, the MUI has issued a fatwa for anything derived from pork that is haram for its use (al-intifa') including the fur. But the problem is that not all brush or brush or toothbrush users are able to recognize whether the brush they are using is a brush or a brush that comes from pig bristles. One of the information that can be seen as a marker that a brush or brush comes from sea urchins is to write it down as a product name for example “Boar Bristle Brush”. Boar is the English term for wild boar or wild boar. This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles. Toothbrush can also use this boar bristles. amazon.com, The global online shop also offers pig toothbrushes under the name “Fuchs Toothbrushes Pure Natural (Boar) Bristle Record V Adult Soft (Pack of 5)-Assorted colors by Fuchs Toothbrushes” However, brushes, brushes, or toothbrushes are not always made from pigs even though they put out have bristle written on them, because the term bristle is still a general term. There are several manufacturers who have used goat hair or camel or horse hair as brush material or made of nylon. The last group of materials is clearly acceptable. When there is no information on the source of the material, at least a simple method can be used. To determine whether it is made from animal hair or not, the method in question is to burn the material. If it smells like burning hair or horns, better leave it alone. Materials from plastic or coconut fiber do not emit such a distinctive odor when burned.
berita_id: Fakta: Berikut ini adalah penjelasan MUI tentang masalah di atas yang diambil dari halaman halalmui.org, tautannya di bawah ini: “Akhir -akhir ini, dunia virtual telah membuat keributan tentang sikat atau sikat gigi/sikat gigi yang terbuat dari sikat laut, tidak selalu ada pada babi.fiber, etc (Webster's Dictionary). So all the hair, the stiff fiber, then the term will be referred to as bristle. Hair, stiff beard, can be categorized as bristle. Another example is the stiff fibers or pine leaves can also be referred to as bristle. So, how is its application in the industrial world? In the industrial world, bristle is indeed used as a material for making brushes or brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristledapat bersumber dari rambut hewan atau serat tanaman atau serat sintetis seperti nilon dan silikon.Rambut, adalah titik-titik kritis.Menggunakan sikat atau kuas yang berasal dari bulu babi.Di bawah nama “Fuchs Toothbrushes Pure Natural (Boar) Bristle Record v Dewasa Lembut (Paket 5) Warna-warna yang ditimbulkan oleh sikat gigi Fuchs” Namun, kuas, sikat, atau sikat gigi tidak selalu terbuat dari pabrikan atau pabrikan yang ditulis pada merekaKelompok material dapat diterima.

berita: Pokemon means "I'm Jewish". Thus the broadcast circulating on social media, along with the excitement of the Pokemon Go game. According to the broadcast, pokemon comes from Syriac or Syriac which means "I'm Jewish". While Pikachu is said to mean "be a Jew". Actually, the polemic about the meaning of Pokemon has been sticking out since 2001, when Saudi Arabian clerics banned Pokemon because it was considered campaigning theory of evolution and is considered Jewish propaganda to keep Muslim children away from their religion. Soon after, Pokemon comics and toys were taken to store shelves and orders were cancelled. Pokemon haram fatwas were also issued by scholars in Qatar, Dubai, Jordan and Egypt. Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor at Egypt's Al Azhar University, found no evidence that Pokemon comes from Syriac and means "I am Jewish". and there is no forth valid evidence that pikachu means “be a jew.” However, he agrees that Pokemon games spread atheist ideas and distance themselves from God. "From a parent's point of view, this game keeps children away from God, and spread atheist ideas," he was quoted as saying by the Los Angeles Times on April 24, 2001.
berita_id: Pokemon berarti "Saya orang Yahudi".Dengan demikian siaran yang beredar di media sosial, bersama dengan kegembiraan game Pokemon Go.Menurut siaran, Pokemon berasal dari Syria atau Syria yang berarti "Saya orang Yahudi".Sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi orang Yahudi".Sebenarnya, polemik tentang makna Pokemon telah mencuat sejak tahun 2001, ketika ulama Arab Saudi melarang Pokemon karena dianggap sebagai teori evolusi kampanye dan dianggap sebagai propaganda Yahudi untuk menjauhkan anak -anak Muslim dari agama mereka.Segera setelah itu, komik dan mainan Pokemon dibawa ke rak toko dan pesanan dibatalkan.Fatwa Pokemon Haram juga dikeluarkan oleh para sarjana di Qatar, Dubai, Jordan dan Mesir.Mohammed Abu Laila, seorang profesor di Universitas Al Azhar di Mesir, tidak menemukan bukti bahwa Pokemon berasal dari Syria dan berarti "Saya Yahudi".Dan tidak ada bukti yang valid bahwa Pikachu berarti "menjadi orang Yahudi."Namun, dia setuju bahwa game Pokemon menyebarkan ide -ide ateis dan menjauhkan diri dari Tuhan."Dari sudut pandang orang tua, permainan ini menjauhkan anak -anak dari Tuhan, dan menyebarkan ide -ide ateis," katanya seperti dikutip oleh Los Angeles Times pada 24 April 2001.

berita: The current Pokemon Go game has attracted so much interest from the world community. The game fever has also been disturbed by negative news about the game. There are links circulating on social media that say Pokemon has a negative meaning and corners one religion. Many circulating on social media that Pokemon actually in Syriac or Syriac means "I am Jewish". While Pikachu is said to mean "Be Jewish", and Charmander means "God is Weak". The rumor has certainly box become a heated debate on social media. Many believed and shared the rumor, many thought it was just something that was linked. Reporting from the Los Angeles Times edition of April 24, 2001, countries located in the Middle East region have indeed had problems with this. In the LA Times, it was stated that at that time in Middle Eastern countries such as Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Jordan, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia, rumors circulated that Pokemon games had connotations that promoted anti-Islamic behavior and believed in Judaism. This of course causes anxiety. The LA Times noted that despite Nintendo's denials, the leaders of those countries still couldn't accept Pokemon. The rumors arose amid concerns Arab countries would assimilate the emerging culture. Even so, many rumors were not proven at that time. Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor from Al Azhar University, said that until now there was no solid evidence to confirm the rumors. He said if he had even asked directly to the party who popularized Pokemon. Pokemon is actually just an abbreviation of Pocket Monster or pocket monster. Named Pocket Monster because this pokemon has a pocket ball that can be put in a pocket. Meanwhile Pikachu is a combination of the words Pika and Chu. Pika is the name of an animal that is still in the same family as rabbits, while Chu in Japanese means squeak. So the naming of Pokemon and Pikachu actually has nothing to do with religion at all. Especially to corner certain religions.
berita_id: Game Pokemon Go saat ini telah menarik begitu banyak minat dari komunitas dunia.Game Fever juga terganggu oleh berita negatif tentang permainan.Ada tautan yang beredar di media sosial yang mengatakan Pokemon memiliki makna negatif dan sudut satu agama.Banyak yang beredar di media sosial bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya di Syria atau Syria berarti "Saya Yahudi".Sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi Yahudi", dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Rumor itu tentu saja menjadi debat panas di media sosial.Banyak yang percaya dan berbagi rumor, banyak yang mengira itu hanya sesuatu yang terkait.Pelaporan dari Los Angeles Times edisi 24 April 2001, negara -negara yang berlokasi di Wilayah Timur Tengah memang memiliki masalah dengan ini.Di LA Times, dinyatakan bahwa pada waktu itu di negara-negara Timur Tengah seperti Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Yordania, Mesir, dan Arab Saudi, desas-desus beredar bahwa permainan Pokemon memiliki konotasi yang mempromosikan perilaku anti-Islam dan percaya pada Yudaisme.Ini tentu saja menyebabkan kecemasan.The LA Times mencatat bahwa terlepas dari penolakan Nintendo, para pemimpin negara -negara itu masih tidak dapat menerima Pokemon.Rumor muncul di tengah kekhawatiran negara -negara Arab akan mengasimilasi budaya yang muncul.Meski begitu, banyak rumor tidak terbukti pada waktu itu.Mohammed Abu Laila, seorang profesor dari Universitas Al Azhar, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada bukti kuat untuk mengkonfirmasi rumor tersebut.Dia mengatakan apakah dia bahkan bertanya langsung kepada pesta yang mempopulerkan Pokemon.Pokemon sebenarnya hanya singkatan dari monster saku atau monster saku.Named Pocket Monster karena Pokemon ini memiliki bola saku yang dapat dimasukkan ke dalam saku.Sementara itu Pikachu adalah kombinasi dari kata -kata Pika dan Chu.Pika adalah nama hewan yang masih berada di keluarga yang sama dengan kelinci, sementara Chu dalam bahasa Jepang berarti mencicit.Jadi penamaan Pokemon dan Pikachu sebenarnya tidak ada hubungannya dengan agama sama sekali.Terutama untuk menyudutkan agama -agama tertentu.

berita: The Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI) straightened out the information circulating on social media regarding the closing of the gates for visitors the night before the 212 Action. According escritoire to the Secretary of BPPMI KH Rusli Effendi, since 2002 his party has enforced rules to close all gates every night at 21.30 WIB and reopened at 03.40 WIB before the Fajr prayer. "All pilgrims are not allowed to stay in the mosque area except under certain conditions and with permission from the security forces and the leadership of BPPMI," said Rusli in Jakarta, Tuesday (21/2). Regarding the conditions at night from 20 until the early hours of February 21, the security of the Istiqlal Mosque had explained to the congregation (participants of the 212 action) who had gathered in the mosque's courtyard about the procedure. "They understand and are willing to leave the mosque area," he said. According to Rusli, BPPMI did not receive notification from any party regarding the plans for the congregation to stay overnight as in the previous conditions when Muslims held 411, 212 or 112 actions. There was also no special communication from the authorities regarding this matter. "The Istiqlal Mosque is always devoted to the people and strives for national unity and unity and always maintains the comfort of worship. We urge all Muslims not to be influenced by news that cannot be accounted for," he concluded. , there are pictures circulating in cyberspace, especially on social media, which report that the Istiqlal Mosque is closed with a padlock and given barbed wire, so that the masses who will take part in the action cannot enter and sleep on the streets. The head of the Protocol Section for the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah, immediately denied the accusation, and declared it a hoax. Because, according to Hurairah, his party has never banned the action and has never locked the door of the mosque. "A thousand percent hoax," said Abu when contacted by reporters on Tuesday (21/2). Then, after the hoax image was circulated, two more images of police (snipers) holding weapons were circulated, where one was at a bus stop spying on the highway and the other was in a room spying on the DPR building. Not only that, the two edited images (pictures of police snipers) have metamorphosed into meme images. The two images were combined with the hoax image of the locking of the Istiqlal Mosque for the masses of the 212th Volume II Action. The image is edited and arranged vertically (top-bottom). In the image above, it is captioned: "The door of the Istiqlal mosque is locked and barbed wire." Meanwhile, in the lower image, it is captioned: "Snipers are prepared in the capitol building. Oh God, are we already considered enemies in our own country?" The question is, is the information in the image below true? If you pay attention to the issue of the locking of the Istiqlal mosque which has been declared a hoax, it is not impossible that the picture (police sniper) was also a hoax. Moreover, from the circulating photos, there is no real evidence to show that the sniper police were stalking the masses of action. This case is similar to the issue that had circulated some time before the 411 action was held at the end of 2016. At that time, the police were also accused of the same thing: they would prepare snipers to secure the action. Responding to this, the Head of Public Relations of the Polda Metro Jaya Kombes Pol Awi Setiyono emphasized that his party would not deploy snipers or snipers during the 411th action related to the alleged blasphemy committed by Basuki Tjahaja Purnama alias Ahok. "Nothing, nothing," said Awi at the Metro Jaya Police Headquarters, Thursday, November 3, 2016.
berita_id: Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal (BPPMI) meluruskan informasi yang beredar di media sosial mengenai penutupan gerbang bagi pengunjung malam sebelum aksi 212.Menurut Escritoire kepada Sekretaris Bppmi Kh Rusli Effendi, sejak tahun 2002 partainya telah menegakkan aturan untuk menutup semua gerbang setiap malam pukul 21.30 WIB dan dibuka kembali pada 03.40 WIB sebelum doa Fajr."Semua peziarah tidak diizinkan untuk tinggal di daerah masjid kecuali dalam kondisi tertentu dan dengan izin dari pasukan keamanan dan kepemimpinan BPPMI," kata Rusli di Jakarta, Selasa (21/2).Mengenai kondisi di malam hari dari 20 hingga jam awal 21 Februari, keamanan masjid Istiqlal telah menjelaskan kepada jemaat (peserta aksi 212) yang telah berkumpul di halaman masjid tentang prosedur tersebut."Mereka mengerti dan bersedia meninggalkan daerah masjid," katanya.Menurut Rusli, BPPMI tidak menerima pemberitahuan dari pihak mana pun mengenai rencana jemaat untuk menginap seperti dalam kondisi sebelumnya ketika Muslim memegang 411, 212 atau 112 tindakan.Juga tidak ada komunikasi khusus dari pihak berwenang mengenai masalah ini."Masjid Istiqlal selalu dikhususkan untuk orang -orang dan berusaha untuk persatuan dan persatuan nasional dan selalu mempertahankan kenyamanan ibadah. Kami mendesak semua Muslim untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak dapat diperhitungkan," pungkasnya., ada gambar yang beredar di dunia maya, terutama di media sosial, yang melaporkan bahwa masjid Istiqlal ditutup dengan gembok dan diberi kawat berduri, sehingga massa yang akan mengambil bagian dalam aksi tidak dapat masuk dan tidur di jalanan.Kepala bagian protokol untuk masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah, segera membantah tuduhan itu, dan menyatakan itu tipuan.Karena, menurut Hurairah, partainya tidak pernah melarang aksinya dan tidak pernah mengunci pintu masjid."Seribu persen tipuan," kata Abu ketika dihubungi oleh wartawan pada hari Selasa (21/2).Kemudian, setelah gambar tipuan diedarkan, dua gambar polisi (penembak jitu) yang memegang senjata diedarkan, di mana satu di halte bus memata -matai di jalan raya dan yang lainnya berada di sebuah ruangan yang memata -matai di gedung DPR.Tidak hanya itu, dua gambar yang diedit (gambar penembak jitu polisi) telah bermetamorfosis menjadi gambar meme.Dua gambar dikombinasikan dengan gambar tipuan dari penguncian masjid Istiqlal untuk massa aksi Volume II ke -212.Gambar diedit dan diatur secara vertikal (top-bottom).Pada gambar di atas, itu ditulis: "Pintu masjid Istiqlal terkunci dan kawat berduri."Sementara itu, dalam gambar yang lebih rendah, itu ditulis: "Penembak jitu disiapkan di gedung Capitol. Ya Tuhan, apakah kita sudah dianggap musuh di negara kita sendiri?"Pertanyaannya adalah, apakah informasi pada gambar di bawah ini benar?Jika Anda memperhatikan masalah penguncian masjid Istiqlal yang telah dinyatakan tipuan, bukan tidak mungkin gambar (penembak jitu polisi) juga berupa tipuan.Selain itu, dari foto yang beredar, tidak ada bukti nyata yang menunjukkan bahwa polisi Sniper menguntit massa tindakan.Kasus ini mirip dengan masalah yang telah beredar beberapa waktu sebelum tindakan 411 diadakan pada akhir 2016. Pada waktu itu, polisi juga dituduh melakukan hal yang sama: mereka akan mempersiapkan penembak jitu untuk mengamankan tindakan tersebut.Menanggapi hal ini, kepala hubungan masyarakat Metro Polda Jaya Kombes Pol Awi Setiyono menekankan bahwa partainya tidak akan mengerahkan penembak jitu atau penembak jitu selama tindakan ke -411 yang terkait dengan dugaan penistaan ​​yang dilakukan oleh Basuki Tjahaja Purnama Ahok."Tidak ada, tidak ada," kata Awi di markas polisi Metro Jaya, Kamis, 3 November 2016.

berita: The discourse of the Minister of Communication and Informatics Rudiantara to stop social media services is the last step taken if there is no change from them giving space to spread hoax content. "Actually, Indonesia does not intend to close, but if it is too late, we can close wish it," said Rudiantara in Jakarta, last weekend. The man who is familiarly called Chief RA demanded that social media platforms move actively to help the government overcome the negative content milling about. However, differences in policies make the government's wishes often hampered. He gave an example of the obstacles that occur with Facebook. As the most popular social media in the country with 110 million users, Facebook is a fertile field for those who like to promote hate content and fake news. Rudiantara admitted that his ministry often asked Facebook to withdraw such content in a short time. However, because Facebook's policy requires that requests coming from the government be discussed with its legal team in the United States, it will take a long time. Meanwhile, the government doubts Facebook's US policy towards its requests can understand the context of the national situation. "I respect their policies, but this is happening in Indonesia, so you should follow the rules here," Rudiantara continued. He wants Facebook and other social media that are quite popular in the community to have representatives in Indonesia. This is intended so that coordination can run faster. Nukman Luthfie, a social media activist, admits that the distance factor is an obstacle to efforts to counteract negative content on social media. According to him, the adoption of a country's law is faster if the social media company has a representative office in the country concerned. "The handling of content on Twitter is better because they have representatives here," admits Nukman. The statement to close social media was first made by Rudiantara when he introduced the MUI fatwa regarding the use of social media. At that time he would firmly hold social media companies responsible for the content they have.
berita_id: Wacana Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika Rudiantara untuk menghentikan layanan media sosial adalah langkah terakhir yang diambil jika tidak ada perubahan dari mereka yang memberikan ruang untuk menyebarkan konten tipuan."Sebenarnya, Indonesia tidak bermaksud untuk menutup, tetapi jika sudah terlambat, kita bisa menutup berharap itu," kata Rudiiantara di Jakarta, akhir pekan lalu.Pria yang akrab bernama Chief Ra menuntut agar platform media sosial bergerak aktif untuk membantu pemerintah mengatasi konten negatif yang berseliweran.Namun, perbedaan dalam kebijakan membuat keinginan pemerintah sering terhambat.Dia memberi contoh hambatan yang terjadi dengan Facebook.Sebagai media sosial paling populer di negara ini dengan 110 juta pengguna, Facebook adalah bidang subur bagi mereka yang suka mempromosikan konten kebencian dan berita palsu.Rudiantara mengakui bahwa kementeriannya sering meminta Facebook untuk menarik konten tersebut dalam waktu singkat.Namun, karena kebijakan Facebook mensyaratkan bahwa permintaan yang datang dari pemerintah dibahas dengan tim hukumnya di Amerika Serikat, itu akan memakan waktu lama.Sementara itu, pemerintah meragukan kebijakan AS Facebook terhadap permintaannya dapat memahami konteks situasi nasional."Saya menghormati kebijakan mereka, tetapi ini terjadi di Indonesia, jadi Anda harus mengikuti aturan di sini," lanjut Rudiantara.Dia ingin Facebook dan media sosial lainnya yang cukup populer di masyarakat memiliki perwakilan di Indonesia.Ini dimaksudkan sehingga koordinasi dapat berjalan lebih cepat.Nukman Luthfie, seorang aktivis media sosial, mengakui bahwa faktor jarak adalah hambatan bagi upaya untuk menangkal konten negatif di media sosial.Menurutnya, adopsi hukum suatu negara lebih cepat jika perusahaan media sosial memiliki kantor perwakilan di negara yang bersangkutan."Penanganan konten di Twitter lebih baik karena mereka memiliki perwakilan di sini," aku Nukman.Pernyataan untuk menutup media sosial pertama kali dibuat oleh Rudiantara ketika ia memperkenalkan MUI Fatwa mengenai penggunaan media sosial.Pada saat itu ia akan dengan tegas meminta perusahaan media sosial yang bertanggung jawab atas konten yang mereka miliki.

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia will increase drastically to reach Rp. 500 million per month or Rp. 6.6 billion per year. This increase will occur if the Draft Government Regulation (RPP) on Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities for Civil Servants is actually approved. The amount is stated in the RPP material. the presidential wage salary index of 96,000 points, found the figure of Rp 553 million According to Article 2 of Law No. 7 of 1978, the president's salary is 6 times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia (Chairman of the DPR, MA, and BPK). The official receives a salary of Rp. 5040000 per month. Thus, the president's basic salary is Rp. 30240000 per month. Presidential Decree 68/2001 also states that the allowance for the position of the President is Rp. 32500000. , this amount has not changed since 2001. The amount of the salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia is relatively small compared to the leaders of the big countries in the world Singapore's Minister (PM), Lee Hsien Loong recorded the highest salary of USD 2.2 million or equivalent to Rp. 30.3 billion per year after Lee, there was Doris Leuthard, President of Switzerland who recorded a salary of USD 437,000 or Rp. 6 billion per year. Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Trunbull with a salary of USD 403700 or Rp. 5.5 billion per year President Jokowi's salary is only higher than PRC President Xi Jinping is paid USD 20,500 or Rp. 283 million per year While the President of the United States Donald Trump recorded the smallest income, which was USD 1 per year. Of course, this is Trump's personal request. The 45th president of the US has a personal wealth of around USD 3 billion. Public policy observer from the University of Indonesia (UI) Lina Miftahul Jannah said it was very natural for the President to have a very large income index. Indonesia is very high. "It makes sense too," he explained. He said that as head of state as well as head of The government, duties, responsibilities, and risks of a President are very large. According to him, it is not natural for an official to be paid a salary from the State Budget, whose salary is greater than the President. the palace has not been able to comment further on the civil servant salary increase scheme, the president and other state officials Presidential spokesman Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo said his party had not received sufficient information about it. The former Acting Officer (Plt) of the KPK leadership has also not been able to confirm the progress of the RPP
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis untuk mencapai RP.500 juta per bulan atau RP.6,6 miliar per tahun.Peningkatan ini akan terjadi jika rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) pada gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas untuk pegawai negeri sipil sebenarnya disetujui.Jumlah tersebut dinyatakan dalam bahan RPP.Indeks gaji upah presiden sebesar 96.000 poin, menemukan angka RP 553 juta menurut Pasal 2 Hukum No. 7 tahun 1978, gaji presiden adalah 6 kali gaji dasar pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia (ketua DPR, MA, dan BPK).Pejabat itu menerima gaji RP.5040000 per bulan.Dengan demikian, gaji dasar presiden adalah RP.30240000 per bulan.Keputusan Presiden 68/2001 juga menyatakan bahwa tunjangan untuk posisi presiden adalah RP.32500000., Jumlah ini tidak berubah sejak tahun 2001. Jumlah gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia relatif kecil dibandingkan dengan para pemimpin negara -negara besar di Dunia Menteri Singapura (PM), Lee Hsien Loong mencatat gaji tertinggi USD 2,2 juta atau setara dengan RP.30,3 miliar per tahun setelah Lee, ada Doris Leuthard, presiden Swiss yang mencatat gaji USD 437.000 atau RP.6 miliar per tahun.Perdana Menteri Australia Malcolm Trunbull dengan gaji USD 403700 atau RP.5,5 miliar per tahun gaji Presiden Jokowi hanya lebih tinggi dari Presiden RRC XI Jinping dibayar USD 20.500 atau RP.283 juta per tahun sementara presiden Amerika Serikat Donald Trump mencatat pendapatan terkecil, yaitu USD 1 per tahun.Tentu saja, ini adalah permintaan pribadi Trump.Presiden ke -45 AS memiliki kekayaan pribadi sekitar USD 3 miliar.Pengamat Kebijakan Publik dari University of Indonesia (UI) Lina Miftahul Jannah mengatakan sangat wajar bagi presiden untuk memiliki indeks pendapatan yang sangat besar.Indonesia sangat tinggi."Itu juga masuk akal," jelasnya.Dia mengatakan bahwa sebagai kepala negara serta kepala pemerintah, tugas, tanggung jawab, dan risiko presiden sangat besar.Menurutnya, tidak wajar bagi seorang pejabat untuk dibayar gaji dari anggaran negara, yang gajinya lebih besar dari presiden.Istana belum dapat mengomentari lebih lanjut tentang skema kenaikan gaji pegawai negeri, presiden dan juru bicara presiden pejabat negara lainnya Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo mengatakan partainya belum menerima informasi yang cukup tentang hal itu.Mantan Penjabat Petugas (PLT) kepemimpinan KPK juga tidak dapat mengkonfirmasi kemajuan RPP

berita: DKI Jakarta Governor Anies express Baswedan regretted the invitation to uninstall Traveloka, which was previously busy milling about on Twitter's timeline. The call to uninstall Traveloka was triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. "Well, I think it's like this. We respect people with different views. Respect different people. There is no need to uninstall and so on," said Anies at the DKI Jakarta DPRD Building, Jalan Kebon Sirih, Gambir, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (14/11/2017). ). According to Anies, the Traveloka application has been providing benefits for the community. This invitation should not arise just because of differences of opinion. "Traveloka also provides benefits for many citizens. After all, it is a service that has great benefits for many people. So let's get used to different views in a healthy way, respecting each other without having to carry out punishments like that. So there's no need to uninstall all kinds of things. ," said Anies. Invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application are milling about on Twitter's timeline. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. But it can be ascertained that the news is just a hoax or not true. Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. But he was unable to attend. "Traveloka is proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from Kanisius alumni. However, he was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned several months earlier. to Ananda), he was not there," he said. "We state that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders," he continued.
berita_id: Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Express Baswedan menyesali undangan untuk menghapus instalan Traveloka, yang sebelumnya sibuk berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Panggilan untuk menghapus instalasi Traveloka dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato."Yah, saya pikir ini seperti ini. Kami menghormati orang -orang dengan pandangan yang berbeda. Hormati orang yang berbeda. Tidak perlu menghapus dan sebagainya," kata anies di gedung DKI Jakarta DPRD, Jalan Konal Sirih, Gambir, Jakarta Tengah, Selasa (14/11/2017).).Menurut ANIES, aplikasi Traveloka telah memberikan manfaat bagi masyarakat.Undangan ini seharusnya tidak muncul hanya karena perbedaan pendapat."Traveloka juga memberikan manfaat bagi banyak warga negara. Lagi pula, ini adalah layanan yang memiliki manfaat besar bagi banyak orang. Jadi mari kita terbiasa dengan pandangan yang berbeda dengan cara yang sehat, saling menghormati tanpa harus melakukan hukuman seperti itu. Jadi tidak perlu menghapus semua jenis hal," kata ANIES.Undangan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka sedang berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.Tetapi dapat dipastikan bahwa berita itu hanya tipuan atau tidak benar.Manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Tapi dia tidak bisa hadir."Traveloka bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya. Ke Ananda), ia tidak ada di sana," katanya."Kami menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi dan inovasi. Nilai-nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal," lanjutnya.

berita: Head of the East Java Provincial Narcotics Agency (BNNP), Brigadier General Pol Fatkhur Rahman, appealed to the public not to worry about the circulation of pacifiers suspected of containing drugs. Met after the 36th Narotama University Anniversary event in Surabaya, Thursday (9/3), Fatkhur deemed it take necessary to convey this because the National Narcotics Agency (BNN) Narcotics Laboratory Center and the central Food and Drug Supervisory Agency (BPOM) have stated no found narcotic substances in the candy. "The results of this lab test are valid, that the pacifier candy which was a shocker in Surabaya does not contain drugs. So, people should not be too worried about the issue of pacifier candy containing drugs," he said. Even though it does not contain drugs, Fatkhur still appeals to parents to monitor the snacks their children buy. He said parents should be aware of the very conspicuous coloring content in pacifiers. According to him, it would be nice for parents to bring lunch from home for their sons and daughters. Fatkhur added that the lab results from the BNN and the central BPOM can be justified. But once again, he hopes that parents who have sons and daughters can control their children's snacks, especially on food coloring. "Even though it doesn't contain drugs, parents must be aware of the coloring matter in pacifiers and children's snacks," said Fatkhur. Asked about the results of the lab tests conducted by the Forensic Laboratory Center (Puslabfor) at the Surabaya branch of the National Police at Polda Jatim, he admitted that there were no results from the Puslabfor lab tests. However, his party admitted that the lab test results from the National Narcotics Agency and the central BPOM were sufficient and representative. "The lab results from the National Narcotics Agency and the central BPOM alone are quite valid and can be used as a benchmark that this pacifier does not contain drugs," he said.
berita_id: Kepala Badan Narkotika Provinsi Jawa Timur (BNNP), Brigadir Jenderal Pol Fatkhur Rahman, mengimbau publik untuk tidak khawatir tentang sirkulasi dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Bertemu setelah acara ulang tahun Narotama University ke -36 di Surabaya, Kamis (9/3), Fatkhur dianggap perlu untuk menyampaikan ini karena Pusat Laboratorium Narkotika Narkotika Nasional (BNN) dan Badan Pengawas Makanan dan Obat Pusat (BPOM) telah menyatakan tidak ada zat narkotik yang ditemukan di kandy."Hasil tes lab ini valid, bahwa permen dot yang mengejutkan di Surabaya tidak mengandung narkoba. Jadi, orang tidak terlalu khawatir tentang masalah permen dot yang mengandung obat -obatan," katanya.Meskipun tidak mengandung narkoba, Fatkhur masih menarik bagi orang tua untuk memantau makanan ringan yang dibeli anak -anak mereka.Dia mengatakan orang tua harus menyadari konten mewarnai yang sangat mencolok di dot.Menurutnya, akan menyenangkan bagi orang tua untuk membawa makan siang dari rumah untuk putra dan putri mereka.Fatkhur menambahkan bahwa lab hasil dari BNN dan BPOM pusat dapat dibenarkan.Tapi sekali lagi, dia berharap bahwa orang tua yang memiliki putra dan putri dapat mengendalikan makanan ringan anak -anak mereka, terutama pada pewarna makanan."Meskipun tidak mengandung narkoba, orang tua harus menyadari materi mewarnai pada dot dan makanan ringan anak -anak," kata Fatkhur.Ditanya tentang hasil tes laboratorium yang dilakukan oleh Pusat Laboratorium Forensik (Puslabfor) di cabang Surabaya dari Polisi Nasional di Polda Jatim, ia mengakui bahwa tidak ada hasil dari tes laboratorium Puslabfor.Namun, partainya mengakui bahwa tes lab hasil dari Badan Narkotika Nasional dan BPOM pusat cukup dan representatif."Hasil lab dari Badan Narkotika Nasional dan BPOM pusat saja cukup valid dan dapat digunakan sebagai tolok ukur yang tidak mengandung obat -obatan ini," katanya.

berita: Jakarta (ANTARA News) - The Head of the Criminal Investigation Unit of the National Police Komjen Pol Ari Dono Sukmanto said that the National Police still needed information from representatives of Facebook Indonesia user to complete the police investigation into the alleged leak of Facebook user data. The police are also likely to call the FB representative again for questioning. "We want to find information from several more people, there are representatives from FB," said Komjen Ari Dono at the National Police Headquarters, Jakarta, Thursday. Previously, on Wednesday (18/4), Ruben Hattari, Head of Public Policy at Facebook Indonesia, was questioned by investigators from the Directorate of Cyber ​​Crime at the Criminal Investigation Department of the National Police for five hours regarding the alleged leak of Facebook user data. According to Ruben, Facebook Indonesia is currently conducting an internal audit regarding the alleged leak of one million Facebook user data in Indonesia. He ensured that he would be transparent in reporting the results of the audit to Dittipidsiber investigators, the Ministry of Communication and Information and the DPR. However, he could not confirm when the audit would be completed. The case of the alleged leak of FB user data is currently still under police investigation. Ari added that until now there have been no users of the Facebook social network in Indonesia whose data was stolen for certain purposes. The police have yet to receive reports from the public regarding the leak of FB user data. There are indications of the leak of one million Facebook user data from Indonesia in the Cambridge Analytica case. The number of Facebook users in Indonesia who access social media every month is estimated at more than 115 million people, from 2.07 billion people who access Facebook every month worldwide.
berita_id: JAKARTA (Antara News) - Kepala unit investigasi kriminal Kepolisian Nasional Komjen Pol Ari Dono Sukmanto mengatakan bahwa polisi nasional masih membutuhkan informasi dari perwakilan pengguna Facebook Indonesia untuk menyelesaikan penyelidikan polisi atas dugaan data pengguna Facebook.Polisi juga cenderung memanggil perwakilan FB lagi untuk ditanyai."Kami ingin menemukan informasi dari beberapa orang lagi, ada perwakilan dari FB," kata Komjen Ari Dono di markas Kepolisian Nasional, Jakarta, Kamis.Sebelumnya, pada hari Rabu (18/4), Ruben Hattari, kepala kebijakan publik di Facebook Indonesia, ditanyai oleh penyelidik dari Direktorat Kejahatan Cyber ​​di Departemen Investigasi Kriminal Polisi Nasional selama lima jam mengenai dugaan kebocoran data pengguna Facebook.Menurut Ruben, Facebook Indonesia saat ini sedang melakukan audit internal mengenai dugaan kebocoran satu juta data pengguna Facebook di Indonesia.Dia memastikan bahwa dia akan transparan dalam melaporkan hasil audit kepada penyelidik DittipidSiber, Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi dan DPR.Namun, dia tidak bisa mengkonfirmasi kapan audit akan selesai.Kasus dugaan kebocoran data pengguna FB saat ini masih dalam penyelidikan polisi.Ari menambahkan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada pengguna jejaring sosial Facebook di Indonesia yang datanya dicuri untuk tujuan tertentu.Polisi belum menerima laporan dari publik mengenai kebocoran data pengguna FB.Ada indikasi kebocoran satu juta data pengguna Facebook dari Indonesia dalam kasus Cambridge Analytica.Jumlah pengguna Facebook di Indonesia yang mengakses media sosial setiap bulan diperkirakan lebih dari 115 juta orang, dari 2,07 miliar orang yang mengakses Facebook setiap bulan di seluruh dunia.

berita: Catfish is a fish that lives in fresh avert water, besides being a catfish farm fish, it also usually lives in lakes, swamps, muddy water and rivers. Catfish has a special characteristic in the form of a fairly long mustache and dark skin such as brown, gray to black. This fish is a very familiar fish, almost every food stall provides a menu of catfish. Most people like to consume catfish because of its delicious taste, soft texture, nutritional content and economical price. However, others prefer to avoid catfish because of the assumption that catfish are dirty and not good for health. Which one do you like or avoid? To be clear, let's learn more about what content is in catfish. Worried about the dangers of catfish for health Catfish contain mercury? In this modern era technology is increasingly advanced but the environmental conditions are increasingly neglected with the amount of environmental pollution. Almost all fish contain mercury, which is a substance that can harm your nervous system. But you don't need to worry because you can still eat catfish, except for catfish that grow on high mercury contamination. Most research reveals that catfish is a fish that contains very little mercury. The environmental supervisory agency also stated that catfish is a safe fish for consumption. Catfish contains many bacteria that are harmful to health? Catfish are fish that can breed in dirty and low oxygen waters. There are even catfish farmers who place catfish ponds around the chicken coop. He did this because catfish are fish that can consume chicken manure and even human waste, making it easier for livestock business. This situation allows catfish to contain a lot of bacteria. Some of the bacteria commonly found in catfish are E.coli, Shigella and Salmonella, these bacteria can be removed by proper processing. Make sure you wash the catfish thoroughly and process it with proper heating because the bacteria on catfish can die from heating. Apart from these concerns, catfish have more nutritional content that is very beneficial for your health. Cancer Many catfish cultivators use dirty ponds such as under chicken or pig coops, remember catfish are also animals that consume waste and can live in various fields. and mud. Why catfish can cause cancer, following the "danger of cancer catfish" which is very dangerous Catfish live in very dirty ponds Catfish are fish that have very high immune systems, can live in very dirty environments and consume waste. Even to make it easier, many catfish farmers breed catfish under chicken coops. Can you imagine the bacteria that he consumes. Waste Consumption Like the danger of lizard meat, catfish is a fish that can consume waste (tai) from livestock, it is very easy to breed catfish, right? this is what causes it to be very dangerous because it is contaminated with bacteria. From the two characteristics above, both cages and consumption patterns of catfish, it is a type of animal that is very dangerous if raised in dirty media and with an improper diet. Benefits of catfish for health If catfish are bred cleanly, of course the dangers of catfish for health can be avoided and will not be dangerous if we consume. Helps brain development The brain is the central regulator of most systems in our body, it regulates thought, behavior, movement and homeostatic functions of the body such as pulse, heart rate, body temperature and fluid balance in the body. Given the important role of the brain in our bodies, we should be able to provide the best intake for our brains. In catfish contained omega-3 and vitamin A which is very good for our brain development. In addition, catfish also contains high protein which consists of more than 25 amino acids that play an important role in the process of sending messages from one brain cell to another. Good for heart health Good for the nervous system Helps weight loss diet Helps the wound healing process Helps maintain healthy bones and teeth Helps maintain blood pressure Tips for choosing fresh catfish Choose catfish whose skin is not moldy Catfish meat when pressed hard does not break No bad smell Catfish eyes clear, protruding or convex red catfish gills Catfish fins and skin are not easily torn Tips for healthy catfish processing Clean and wash catfish thoroughly under running water Process until cooked at the right heat to kill any bacteria that may be present If you avoid cholesterol it is better Process catfish by steaming / boiling and don't fry
berita_id: Catfish adalah ikan yang hidup di air yang segar, selain menjadi ikan peternakan ikan lele, biasanya juga tinggal di danau, rawa, air berlumpur dan sungai.Catfish memiliki karakteristik khusus dalam bentuk kumis yang cukup panjang dan kulit gelap seperti coklat, abu -abu hingga hitam.Ikan ini adalah ikan yang sangat akrab, hampir setiap kios makanan menyediakan menu ikan lele.Kebanyakan orang suka mengonsumsi ikan lele karena rasanya yang lezat, tekstur lembut, kandungan gizi dan harga ekonomis.Namun, yang lain lebih suka menghindari ikan lele karena asumsi bahwa ikan lele itu kotor dan tidak baik untuk kesehatan.Mana yang Anda suka atau hindari?Untuk lebih jelasnya, mari kita pelajari lebih lanjut tentang konten apa yang ada dalam lele.Khawatir tentang bahaya ikan merkuri, yang merupakan zat yang dapat membahayakan sistem saraf Anda.Tetapi Anda tidak perlu khawatir karena Anda masih bisa makan ikan lele, kecuali ikan lele yang tumbuh pada kontaminasi merkuri yang tinggi.Sebagian besar penelitian mengungkapkan bahwa ikan lele adalah ikan yang mengandung sangat sedikit merkuri.Badan Pengawas Lingkungan juga menyatakan bahwa ikan lele adalah ikan yang aman untuk dikonsumsi.Ikan lele mengandung banyak bakteri yang berbahaya bagi kesehatan?Lele adalah ikan yang dapat berkembang biak di perairan oksigen yang kotor dan rendah.Bahkan ada petani lele yang menempatkan kolam ikan lele di sekitar kandang ayam.Dia melakukan ini karena ikan lele adalah ikan yang dapat mengonsumsi kotoran ayam dan bahkan limbah manusia, membuatnya lebih mudah untuk bisnis ternak.Situasi ini memungkinkan ikan lele mengandung banyak bakteri.Beberapa bakteri yang biasa ditemukan dalam ikan lele adalah E.Coli, Shigella dan Salmonella, bakteri ini dapat dihilangkan dengan pemrosesan yang tepat.Pastikan Anda mencuci ikan lele secara menyeluruh dan memprosesnya dengan pemanasan yang tepat karena bakteri pada ikan lele bisa mati karena pemanasan.Terlepas dari kekhawatiran ini, ikan lele memiliki lebih banyak kandungan nutrisi yang sangat bermanfaat bagi kesehatan Anda.Kanker Banyak budidaya lele menggunakan kolam kotor seperti di bawah kandang ayam atau babi, ingat ikan lele juga hewan yang mengonsumsi limbah dan dapat hidup di berbagai bidang.dan lumpur.Mengapa ikan lele dapat menyebabkan kanker, mengikuti "bahaya kanker ikan lele" yang merupakan lele yang sangat berbahaya hidup di kolam yang sangat kotor, ikan lele adalah ikan yang memiliki sistem kekebalan yang sangat tinggi, dapat hidup di lingkungan yang sangat kotor dan mengonsumsi limbah.Bahkan untuk membuatnya lebih mudah, banyak petani lele membiakkan ikan lele di bawah kandang ayam.Dapatkah Anda membayangkan bakteri yang ia konsumsi.Konsumsi limbah seperti bahaya daging kadal, ikan lele adalah ikan yang dapat mengonsumsi limbah (tai) dari ternak, sangat mudah untuk membiakkan ikan lele, bukan?Inilah yang menyebabkannya sangat berbahaya karena terkontaminasi dengan bakteri.Dari dua karakteristik di atas, baik kandang dan pola konsumsi ikan lele, itu adalah jenis hewan yang sangat berbahaya jika dibesarkan dalam media kotor dan dengan diet yang tidak tepat.Manfaat ikan lele untuk kesehatan jika ikan lele dibiakkan dengan bersih, tentu saja bahaya ikan lele untuk kesehatan dapat dihindari dan tidak akan berbahaya jika kita mengkonsumsi.Membantu Pengembangan Otak Otak adalah cairan dalam tubuh.Mengingat peran penting otak dalam tubuh kita, kita harus dapat memberikan asupan terbaik untuk otak kita.Dalam lele yang mengandung omega-3 dan vitamin A yang sangat baik untuk berita: Pokemon means "I'm Jewish". Thus the broadcast circulating on social media, along with the excitement of the Pokemon Go game. According to the broadcast, pokemon comes from Syriac or Syriac which means "I'm Jewish". While Pikachu is said to mean "be a Jew". Actually, the polemic about the meaning of Pokemon has been sticking out since 2001, when Saudi Arabian clerics banned Pokemon because it was considered campaigning theory of evolution and is considered Jewish propaganda to keep Muslim children away from their religion. Soon after, Pokemon comics and toys were taken to store shelves and orders were cancelled. Pokemon haram fatwas were also issued by scholars in Qatar, Dubai, Jordan and Egypt. Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor at Egypt's Al Azhar University, found no evidence that Pokemon comes from Syriac and means "I am Jewish". and there is no forth valid evidence that pikachu means “be a jew.” However, he agrees that Pokemon games spread atheist ideas and distance themselves from God. "From a parent's point of view, this game keeps children away from God, and spread atheist ideas," he was quoted as saying by the Los Angeles Times on April 24, 2001.
berita_id: Pokemon berarti "Saya orang Yahudi".Dengan demikian siaran yang beredar di media sosial, bersama dengan kegembiraan game Pokemon Go.Menurut siaran, Pokemon berasal dari Syria atau Syria yang berarti "Saya orang Yahudi".Sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi orang Yahudi".Sebenarnya, polemik tentang makna Pokemon telah mencuat sejak tahun 2001, ketika ulama Arab Saudi melarang Pokemon karena dianggap sebagai teori evolusi kampanye dan dianggap sebagai propaganda Yahudi untuk menjauhkan anak -anak Muslim dari agama mereka.Segera setelah itu, komik dan mainan Pokemon dibawa ke rak toko dan pesanan dibatalkan.Fatwa Pokemon Haram juga dikeluarkan oleh para sarjana di Qatar, Dubai, Jordan dan Mesir.Mohammed Abu Laila, seorang profesor di Universitas Al Azhar di Mesir, tidak menemukan bukti bahwa Pokemon berasal dari Syria dan berarti "Saya Yahudi".Dan tidak ada bukti yang valid bahwa Pikachu berarti "menjadi orang Yahudi."Namun, dia setuju bahwa game Pokemon menyebarkan ide -ide ateis dan menjauhkan diri dari Tuhan."Dari sudut pandang orang tua, permainan ini menjauhkan anak -anak dari Tuhan, dan menyebarkan ide -ide ateis," katanya seperti dikutip oleh Los Angeles Times pada 24 April 2001.

berita: After a hearing (RDP) meeting with Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives in Senayan, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (17/4/2018), it was rumored that Facebook Indonesia would be closed. It is planned that the closing will be held on April 24, 2018. A few days before the news of the closure occurred, Netizens, especially Facebook users, posted the status "Facebook will be closed", some also uploaded "before Facebook is closed, post a status or photo first." The news that Facebook will be closed is of course a pro and contra among netizens. Even so, the rumors that went viral and circulated widely on social media, especially Facebook, were certainly not true or hoaxes. The government can indeed give strict sanctions to block Facebook, because the data of one million Indonesian users was also leaked in the Cambridge Analytica (CA) scandal. However, there is no certainty that on April 24, Facebook will actually be blocked in Indonesia. Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara on various occasions never mentioned blocking Facebook. In fact, Rudiantara said that the Ministry of Communications and Informatics did not hesitate to block Facebook, but must follow procedures so that the steps are not rash. Rudiantara's only firm statement about blocking Facebook as well is if there is evidence that Facebook is used as a means of inciting or fighting. Rudiantara ensured that if investigators found an element of criminal suspicion in the leak of Facebook user data in Indonesia, the chances of blocking Facebook would be even greater. Meanwhile, these two things have not been proven yet, are still under investigation and awaiting the results of the audit. "If there are indications that Facebook in Indonesia is being used for incitement, like what happened in Myanmar. I have no qualms about blocking it," said Rudiantara, a few days ago. The Minister of Communication and Information has asked Facebook to conduct an audit, and submitted the results of the audit since a week after the announcement that data on Facebook users in Indonesia had been leaked in the CA scandal. The request was included in the first Warning Letter (SP) sent by the Ministry of Communication and Informatics. However, after the specified deadline arrived, Facebook has not yet submitted the results of the audit. Kominfo also issued a second warning letter. "Currently, it is SP II. We are waiting, later after SP II it can be upgraded to a temporary service termination if needed," said Rudiantara again. If the audit results are known later, the government can assess the potential problems that could arise from this data leak and take steps to address them. Meanwhile, Head of Public Policy for Facebook Indonesia, Ruben Hattari, emphasized that the recent data leaks from users were not in the form of breaching the security system of Facebook users. In front of the leadership of the House of Representatives Commission I, Ruben explained that the data leak was caused by the abuse of authority given by Facebook to application providers or so-called third parties.
berita_id: Setelah pertemuan sidang (RDP) dengan Komisi I Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia di Senayan, Jakarta Tengah, Selasa (17/4/2018), dikabarkan bahwa Facebook Indonesia akan ditutup.Direncanakan bahwa penutupan akan diadakan pada 24 April 2018. Beberapa hari sebelum berita penutupan terjadi, netizen, terutama pengguna Facebook, memposting status "Facebook akan ditutup", beberapa juga diunggah "sebelum Facebook ditutup, memposting status atau foto terlebih dahulu."Berita bahwa Facebook akan ditutup tentu saja merupakan pro dan kontra di antara netizen.Meski begitu, rumor yang menjadi viral dan beredar secara luas di media sosial, terutama Facebook, tentu saja tidak benar atau tipuan.Pemerintah memang dapat memberikan sanksi ketat untuk memblokir Facebook, karena data satu juta pengguna Indonesia juga bocor dalam skandal Cambridge Analytica (CA).Namun, tidak ada kepastian bahwa pada 24 April, Facebook sebenarnya akan diblokir di Indonesia.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara pada berbagai kesempatan tidak pernah disebutkan memblokir Facebook.Faktanya, Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika tidak ragu untuk memblokir Facebook, tetapi harus mengikuti prosedur sehingga langkah -langkahnya tidak terburu -buru.Satu -satunya pernyataan perusahaan Rudiantara tentang memblokir Facebook juga adalah jika ada bukti bahwa Facebook digunakan sebagai cara menghasut atau berkelahi.Rudiantara memastikan bahwa jika penyelidik menemukan unsur kecurigaan kriminal dalam kebocoran data pengguna Facebook di Indonesia, peluang memblokir Facebook akan lebih besar.Sementara itu, kedua hal ini belum terbukti, masih dalam penyelidikan dan menunggu hasil audit."Jika ada indikasi bahwa Facebook di Indonesia digunakan untuk hasutan, seperti apa yang terjadi di Myanmar. Saya tidak ragu -ragu memblokirnya," kata Rudiiantara, beberapa hari yang lalu.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi telah meminta Facebook untuk melakukan audit, dan mengirimkan hasil audit sejak seminggu setelah pengumuman bahwa data di pengguna Facebook di Indonesia telah bocor dalam skandal CA.Permintaan tersebut dimasukkan dalam surat peringatan pertama (SP) yang dikirim oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika.Namun, setelah tenggat waktu yang ditentukan tiba, Facebook belum mengirimkan hasil audit.Kominfo juga mengeluarkan surat peringatan kedua."Saat ini, ini adalah SP II. Kami sedang menunggu, nanti setelah SP II dapat ditingkatkan ke penghentian layanan sementara jika diperlukan," kata Rudiantara lagi.Jika hasil audit diketahui kemudian, pemerintah dapat menilai potensi masalah yang dapat timbul dari kebocoran data ini dan mengambil langkah -langkah untuk mengatasinya.Sementara itu, Kepala Kebijakan Publik untuk Facebook Indonesia, Ruben Hattari, menekankan bahwa data baru -baru ini kebocoran dari pengguna tidak dalam bentuk melanggar sistem keamanan pengguna Facebook.Di depan kepemimpinan Komisi Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat I, Ruben menjelaskan bahwa kebocoran data disebabkan oleh penyalahgunaan wewenang yang diberikan oleh Facebook kepada penyedia aplikasi atau yang disebut pihak ketiga.

berita: If Malaysia wants to control Reog Ponorogo, but in Davao the Philippines is different. Barongan and suddenly peacock which were part of the Reog Ponorogo apparatus were burned by a number of Indonesian Consulate General staff in Davao, Southern Philippines, Tuesday (20/10/2015). As reported by the bitungnews.com site, he explained that the arson was actually carried out by a number of the Indonesian Consulate General's staff themselves. Another device that was burned was an ornament depicting a dragon on a gong (musical instrument) supporting pole to accompany Reog Ponorogo. It is said that the reason for sorry the burning of Barongan Reog Ponorogo, and the dragon decoration on the gamelan, is because there is a devil and is an idol. Unfortunately, the Acting Consulate General, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, did not prevent the arson. Instead, Acting Consulate General Davao summoned a security guard named Santander to pour gas over the reog and 2 gamelan dragons. Even the security guard who was ordered was so surprised and surprised. "Hadluk kaayu ko, dear kaayu ang dragon gwapo kaayu unya sunugon, kasayang sa reog pero gisugo man ko (I'm so scared, it's a shame that the dragon snake is so good it wants to be burned, the reog is too bad but how else can I be told)," said Santander. "Barong Reog and the burnt gamelan dragon ornaments are the inventory of the Indonesian Consulate General's cultural museum. However, none of the other Indonesian Consulate General staff knew when the arson took place," said a source from bitungnews.com. However, after this incident, most of the perpetrators were blasphemed by Indonesian citizens who were in Davao, but the perpetrators still felt innocent because according to them what they were doing was right in the eyes of God. An Indonesian citizen residing in Davao, stated that the Acting Consulate General in Davao was declared persona non grata, and asked the Indonesian government to withdraw the persons involved in the act of burning the nation's cultural heritage. Bitungnews.com tried to contact the Media and Information Service, Ministry of Foreign Affairs on 021 3813453, but until this news was published it was not picked up. And an electronic message to infomed@kemlu.go.id got an answer. Stupid action The act of burning Barong Reog Ponorogo and the Gamelan Dragon Ornament, at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) Davao, Philippines, was criticized by International Political Observer Sam Ratulangi University, Manado, Dr. Michael Mamentu. "One of the duties of diplomats is to introduce national culture in other countries, this is a bad precedent for our diplomacy world, I can even say it is a 'stupid action' for the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao," said Michael Mamentu, to bitungnews.com. According to Dr. Michael Mamentu, the Acting Consulate should have been more prudent in dealing with this problem, because the notion of being an idol or a devil in the decoration of the nation's culture, does not have to burn or destroy these items as a solution. This is an irony, other countries claim our cultural heritage, while at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao it burned it, the Acting Consulate General should have sent the equipment home, to be replaced with other cultural displays because Indonesia is rich with noble culture, added Mamentu. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs must investigate the case of asset burning at the Consulate General, and those involved in the action should be sent home to be replaced with wiser diplomats, he concluded.
berita_id: Jika Malaysia ingin mengendalikan Reog Ponorogo, tetapi di Davao Filipina berbeda.Barongan dan tiba -tiba merak yang merupakan bagian dari peralatan Reog Ponorogo dibakar oleh sejumlah staf umum konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina Selatan, Selasa (20/10/2015).Seperti yang dilaporkan oleh situs Bitungnews.com, ia menjelaskan bahwa pembakaran itu sebenarnya dilakukan oleh sejumlah staf konsulat Jenderal Indonesia itu sendiri.Perangkat lain yang dibakar adalah ornamen yang menggambarkan naga pada tiang pendukung gong (alat musik) untuk menemani Reog Ponorogo.Dikatakan bahwa alasan untuk menyesal pembakaran Barongan Reog Ponorogo, dan dekorasi naga di gamelan, adalah karena ada iblis dan merupakan idola.Sayangnya, akting konsulat jenderal, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, tidak mencegah pembakaran.Sebaliknya, akting Konsulat Jenderal Davao memanggil seorang penjaga keamanan bernama Santander untuk menuangkan gas di atas reog dan 2 gamelan naga.Bahkan penjaga keamanan yang diperintahkan begitu terkejut dan terkejut."Hadluk Kaayu Ko, Kaayu Ang Dragon Gwapo Kaayu Unya Sunugon, Kasayang sa Reog Pero Gisugo Man Ko (Saya sangat takut, sungguh memalukan bahwa ular naga itu begitu baik sehingga ingin dibakar, yang diulangnya terlalu buruk tetapi bagaimana lagi saya bisa diceritakan)," kata Sant."Barong Reog dan ornamen Gamelan Dragon yang terbakar adalah inventaris museum budaya Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia. Namun, tidak ada staf umum konsulat Indonesia lainnya yang tahu ketika pembakaran itu terjadi," kata seorang sumber dari Bitungnews.com.Namun, setelah kejadian ini, sebagian besar pelaku dihujat oleh warga negara Indonesia yang berada di Davao, tetapi para pelaku masih merasa tidak bersalah karena menurut mereka apa yang mereka lakukan tepat di mata Tuhan.Seorang warga negara Indonesia yang tinggal di Davao, menyatakan bahwa penjabat konsulat jenderal di Davao dinyatakan kepribadian non grata, dan meminta pemerintah Indonesia untuk menarik orang -orang yang terlibat dalam tindakan membakar warisan budaya negara.Bitungnews.com mencoba menghubungi Layanan Media dan Informasi, Kementerian Luar Negeri di 021 3813453, tetapi sampai berita ini diterbitkan tidak diambil.Dan pesan elektronik ke infomed@kemlu.go.id mendapat jawaban.Tindakan bodoh Tindakan Barong Reog Ponorogo dan ornamen Dragon Gamelan, di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) Davao, Filipina, dikritik oleh pengamat politik internasional Sam Ratulangi University, Manado, Dr. Michael Mamentu."Salah satu tugas para diplomat adalah memperkenalkan budaya nasional di negara -negara lain, ini adalah preseden yang buruk bagi dunia diplomasi kita, saya bahkan dapat mengatakan itu adalah 'tindakan bodoh' bagi konsulat umum Indonesia di Davao," kata Michael Mamentu, kepada Bitungnews.com.Menurut Dr. Michael Mamentu, konsulat akting seharusnya lebih bijaksana dalam menangani masalah ini, karena gagasan menjadi idola atau iblis dalam dekorasi budaya bangsa, tidak harus membakar atau menghancurkan barang -barang ini sebagai solusi.Ini adalah ironi, negara -negara lain mengklaim warisan budaya kita, sementara di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao membakarnya, penjabat konsulat jenderal seharusnya mengirim ke rumah peralatan, untuk digantikan dengan tampilan budaya lainnya karena Indonesia kaya dengan budaya mulia, menambahkan Mamentus.Kementerian Luar Negeri harus menyelidiki kasus pembakaran aset di Konsulat Jenderal, dan mereka yang terlibat dalam tindakan tersebut harus dikirim pulang untuk diganti dengan diplomat yang lebih bijak, ia menyimpulkan.

berita: The GOVERNMENT has threatened to close social media and sharing sites, such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Youtube if they do not close accounts containing radicalism. A total of 11 Telegram domain name systems have even been asked to be blocked. The threat was voiced by the Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara, after attending the declaration of anti-radicalism at Padjadjaran University, Bandung, yesterday. The reason is that the government's request for them to close accounts containing radicalism agency has not been fully complied with. "Throughout 2016 to 2017, only 50% were fulfilled. This is very disappointing. During the fasting month, I sent the director general to visit (the platform provider). If there is no improvement, we will be serious," said Rudi. He added that the social media platform was reluctant to close all accounts containing radicalism because in their home countries they had to go through court. "However, they are here because of business. Advertisements are also from here. Therefore, it is necessary to comply with the regulations here." The Ministry of Communication and Informatics has made various efforts to prevent the spread of radicalism, including closing sites and blocking accounts on social media. However, account blocking needs to involve the platform. The Ministry of Communication and Informatics yesterday also asked internet service providers to block 11 domain name systems (DNS) belonging to Telegram. The 11 DNS are t.me, telegram.me, telegram.org, core.telegram.org, desktop.telegram.org, macos.telegram.org, web.telegram.org, venus.web.telegram.org, pluto.web.telegram.org, flora.web.telegram.org, and flora-1.web.telegram .org. As a result, the web version of the Telegram service cannot be accessed via a computer. "We are also preparing the process of closing the Telegram application completely in Indonesia if Telegram does not prepare standard operational procedures for handling unlawful content in their application. This can endanger state security," said Director General of Information Applications at the Ministry of Communication and Informatics Semuel A Pangerapan. Blocking must be done because many channels in the messaging service application contain propaganda of radicalism, terrorism, and hatred. There are also invitations or how to assemble bombs. Telegram has also become a favorite of terrorists, including the Islamic State, because of its high level of encryption so that its messages are difficult for the authorities to sniff out. Telegram's Chief Executive Officer (CEO), Pavel Durov, via tweet, expressed his astonishment as to why their service was blocked. "It's strange, we have never received a request/protest from the Indonesian government. We will investigate and make an announcement," Durov said on his Twitter account, @durov, replying to a netizen's tweet. Campus Declaration Universities in West Java agreed to reject radicalism. That commitment was stated in the Declaration on Anti-radicalism which was attended by 44 state and private universities in West Java at Unpad, yesterday. In addition to all university rectors, the event was attended by Minister of Research, Technology and Higher Education Mohamad Nasir, Minister of Communication and Information Rudiantara, West Java Governor Ahmad Heryawan.
berita_id: Pemerintah telah mengancam akan menutup media sosial dan berbagi situs, seperti Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, dan YouTube jika mereka tidak menutup akun yang berisi radikalisme.Sebanyak 11 sistem nama domain telegram bahkan telah diminta untuk diblokir.Ancaman itu disuarakan oleh Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara, setelah menghadiri Deklarasi Anti-Ladikalisme di Universitas Padjadjaran, Bandung, kemarin.Alasannya adalah bahwa permintaan pemerintah agar mereka menutup akun yang mengandung agen radikalisme belum sepenuhnya dipatuhi."Sepanjang 2016 hingga 2017, hanya 50% yang terpenuhi. Ini sangat mengecewakan. Selama bulan puasa, saya mengirim Direktur Jenderal untuk mengunjungi (penyedia platform). Jika tidak ada perbaikan, kami akan serius," kata Rudi.Dia menambahkan bahwa platform media sosial enggan untuk menutup semua akun yang mengandung radikalisme karena di negara asal mereka mereka harus melalui pengadilan."Namun, mereka ada di sini karena bisnis. Iklan juga dari sini. Oleh karena itu, perlu untuk mematuhi peraturan di sini."Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika telah melakukan berbagai upaya untuk mencegah penyebaran radikalisme, termasuk situs penutup dan memblokir akun di media sosial.Namun, pemblokiran akun perlu melibatkan platform.Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika kemarin juga meminta penyedia layanan internet untuk memblokir 11 Sistem Nama Domain (DNS) milik Telegram.11 DNS adalah T.Me, Telegram.Me, telegram.org, core.telegram.org, desktop.telegram.org, macos.telegram.org, web.telegram.org, venus.web.telegram.org, pluto.web.telegram.org.org.telegram.org, pluto.web.telegram.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org.org. yang ”yang”flora-1.web.telegram .org.Akibatnya, versi web layanan telegram tidak dapat diakses melalui komputer."Kami juga sedang mempersiapkan proses penutupan aplikasi telegram sepenuhnya di Indonesia jika Telegram tidak menyiapkan prosedur operasional standar untuk menangani konten yang melanggar hukum dalam aplikasi mereka. Ini dapat membahayakan keamanan negara," kata Direktur Jenderal Aplikasi Informasi di Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika Semuel A Pangerapan.Pemblokiran harus dilakukan karena banyak saluran dalam aplikasi layanan pesan berisi propaganda radikalisme, terorisme, dan kebencian.Ada juga undangan atau cara mengumpulkan bom.Telegram juga menjadi favorit teroris, termasuk Negara Islam, karena tingkat enkripsi yang tinggi sehingga pesannya sulit bagi pihak berwenang untuk mengendus.Chief Executive Officer Telegram (CEO), Pavel Durov, melalui tweet, menyatakan keheranannya mengapa layanan mereka diblokir."Aneh, kami tidak pernah menerima permintaan/protes dari pemerintah Indonesia. Kami akan menyelidiki dan membuat pengumuman," kata Durov di akun Twitter -nya, @Durov, membalas tweet netizen.Universitas deklarasi kampus di Jawa Barat setuju untuk menolak radikalisme.Komitmen itu dinyatakan dalam Deklarasi Anti-Radikalisme yang dihadiri oleh 44 universitas negara bagian dan swasta di Jawa Barat di Unpad, kemarin.Selain semua rektor universitas, acara ini dihadiri oleh Menteri Penelitian, Teknologi dan Pendidikan Tinggi Mohamad Nasir, Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi Rudiantara, Gubernur Jawa Barat Ahmad Heryawan.

berita: The circulation of candy allegedly containing hazardous materials for children was raided by Pol PP along with other teams in 14 sub-districts in Surabaya, Tuesday (7/3/2017). A joint team consisting of Satpol PP, Puskesmas officers, Polsek and Koramil raided the stalls of hawker and snack vendors looking for the candy. Quoted from Suarasurabaya.net, Irvan Widyanto, Head of the Civil Service Police Unit (Kasatpol PP) of Surabaya City said that from the findings of candy snacks sold by food vendors near an elementary school in the Peneleh area, the packaging was confirmed to have a distribution permit. "Of the 3 types of candy that were raided (Hard candy, bottled candy in teat bottles and candy in the shape of a sheep) each package was equipped with a distribution permit, but it was suspected that the distribution permit was fake," said Irvan Widyanto to reporters who met him. From the findings in the field, the packaging of candy snacks in teat bottles is equipped with a distribution permit ML 224409003077. The writing on the distribution permit indicates the type of food from abroad and is produced by Xiamen Yang Wan Foodstuff, nestling China. As for the candy snacks with the brand of Hard Candy, and the Penguin brand, imported by PT. Petrona Inti Chemindo, West Jakarta, DKI Jakarta, with a distribution permit valid until 19-08-2018. Irvan added that the security for the hundreds of candy snacks will then be handed over to the Surabaya City Health Office (Dinkes) for laboratory testing at the Surabaya POM Center. "We want to know the content of hazardous materials in it. It will take approximately 1 week. Furthermore, the raids and security that we have started on Monday (6/3/2017) will be continued to 31 sub-districts throughout Surabaya," said Irvan Widyanto. Meanwhile, hazil security around 5 stalls of traders and 1 wholesaler of children's snacks in Wonokromo District, Tuesday (7/3/2017) found 340 bottles of candy with the brand "Permen Keras" which are included in the category that must be secured.(ss/j1)
berita_id: Sirkulasi permen yang diduga mengandung bahan berbahaya untuk anak-anak digerebek oleh Pol PP bersama dengan tim lain di 14 sub-distrik di Surabaya, Selasa (7/3/2017).Sebuah tim gabungan yang terdiri dari Satpol PP, Puskesmas Petugas, Polsek dan Koramil menggerebek kios penjaja dan penjual makanan ringan yang mencari permen.Dikutip dari Suarasurabaya.net, Irvan Widyanto, Kepala Unit Polisi Sipil (Kasatpol PP) dari Surabaya City mengatakan bahwa dari temuan camilan permen yang dijual oleh penjual makanan di dekat sekolah dasar di daerah Peneleh, kemasan dikonfirmasi memiliki izin distribusi."Dari 3 jenis permen yang digerebek (permen keras, permen botol dalam botol dot dan permen dalam bentuk domba) setiap paket dilengkapi dengan izin distribusi, tetapi diduga bahwa izin distribusi itu palsu," kata Irvan Widyanto kepada wartawan yang bertemu dengannya.Dari temuan di lapangan, pengemasan camilan permen dalam botol dot dilengkapi dengan izin distribusi ML 224409003077. Penulisan pada izin distribusi menunjukkan jenis makanan dari luar negeri dan diproduksi oleh Xiamen Yang Wan Fightuff, Nestling China.Adapun Candy Snacks dengan merek permen keras, dan merek penguin, diimpor oleh Pt.Petrona Ini Chemindo, Jakarta Barat, DKI Jakarta, dengan izin distribusi berlaku hingga 19-08-2018.Irvan menambahkan bahwa keamanan untuk ratusan camilan permen kemudian akan diserahkan ke Kantor Kesehatan Kota Surabaya (Dinkes) untuk pengujian laboratorium di Pusat Pom Surabaya."Kami ingin mengetahui kandungan bahan berbahaya di dalamnya. Butuh sekitar 1 minggu. Selain itu, penggerebekan dan keamanan yang telah kami mulai pada hari Senin (6/3/2017) akan dilanjutkan ke 31 sub-distrik di seluruh Surabaya," kata Irvan Widyanto.Sementara itu, keamanan hazil sekitar 5 kios pedagang dan 1 pedagang grosir anak -anak di distrik Wonokromo, Selasa (7/3/2017) menemukan 340 botol permen dengan merek "Permen Kera" yang termasuk dalam kategori yang harus diamankan. (SS/J1)

berita: Participants of Action 212 Volume 2 who came from outside the city had arrived at the Istiqlal Mosque, but they could not enter because the gate of the mosque was locked. According to observations, hundreds of mobs driving 5 bosses, including AD number plates (Solo and its surroundings) were stuck at the entrance of the Istiqlal mosque, Monday (20/2) night, as the mosque, which used to be the gathering place for the Defending Islam Action, was previously closed. Police officers on guard in front of the Istiqlal Mosque then directed the bus from the area to another place. It was not explained where the mass gathering place was diverted. Previously, the Islamic Community Forum (FUI) ensured that there would be no long march during the 212th volume II action, Tuesday (21/2) tomorrow. Action participants will be directed directly to the action concentration point in front of the DPR/MPR RI building. "Our scenario does not have a long march. So all participants are advised to go directly to the DPR/MPR RI building," said Ustaz Bernard Abdul Jabbar as coordinator of the 212 action volume II to reporters at the Metro Jaya Police Headquarters, Jakarta, Monday (20/2/2017) . Ustadz Bernard estimates that 10 thousand people will attend the action. People from outside Jakarta were asked manoeuver to park their vehicles in the parking lots that have been prepared. "And for those from areas who bring buses and vehicles, we then direct them to park at the Senayan East Parking if those from the south and east. Meanwhile, from the west we will direct them to (park vehicles) at Palmerah Station and at in front of the Forestry Department building," he explained. He added that his party also did not provide lodging facilities for action participants from outside the region. This means that those from outside the city of Jakarta are welcome to find a place to rest on their own.
berita_id: Peserta aksi 212 Volume 2 yang datang dari luar kota telah tiba di masjid Istiqlal, tetapi mereka tidak bisa masuk karena gerbang masjid terkunci.Menurut pengamatan, ratusan gerombolan yang mengendarai 5 bos, termasuk pelat nomor iklan (solo dan sekitarnya) terjebak di pintu masuk masjid Istiqlal, Senin (20/2) malam, sebagai masjid, yang dulunya adalah tempat berkumpul untuk aksi Islam yang bertahan, sebelumnya ditutup.Petugas polisi yang berjaga di depan masjid Istiqlal kemudian mengarahkan bus dari daerah ke tempat lain.Itu tidak dijelaskan di mana tempat pengumpulan massa dialihkan.Sebelumnya, Forum Komunitas Islam (FUI) memastikan bahwa tidak akan ada Maret yang panjang selama aksi Volume II ke -212, Selasa (21/2) besok.Peserta tindakan akan diarahkan langsung ke titik konsentrasi aksi di depan gedung DPR/MPR RI."Skenario kami tidak memiliki pawai panjang. Jadi semua peserta disarankan untuk langsung ke gedung DPR/MPR RI," kata Ustaz Bernard Abdul Jabbar sebagai koordinator 212 Action Volume II kepada wartawan di Markas Kepolisian Metro Jaya, Jakarta, Senin (20/2/2017).Ustadz Bernard memperkirakan bahwa 10 ribu orang akan menghadiri aksi tersebut.Orang -orang dari luar Jakarta diminta Manoeuver untuk memarkir kendaraan mereka di tempat parkir yang telah disiapkan."Dan bagi mereka dari daerah yang membawa bus dan kendaraan, kami kemudian mengarahkan mereka ke parkir di parkir Senayan Timur jika yang dari selatan dan timur. Sementara itu, dari barat kami akan mengarahkan mereka ke (kendaraan parkir) di stasiun Palmerah dan di depan gedung departemen kehutanan," jelasnya.Dia menambahkan bahwa partainya juga tidak menyediakan fasilitas penginapan bagi peserta tindakan dari luar wilayah.Ini berarti bahwa orang -orang dari luar kota Jakarta dipersilakan untuk menemukan tempat untuk beristirahat sendiri.

berita: The Muslim community was shocked by the news about toothbrushes made of boar bristles. One of the markers is the content of the toothbrush, bristle, which is listed on the packaging. The word bristle is then interpreted as a sea urchin. As a result, many Muslims are worried about using a toothbrush on the market. Quoted from the halalmui.org page, LPPOM MUI explains the term bristle means stiff hair or fiber. This definition refers to the Websters Dictionary, so all stiff hair, including stiff beards, palm fibers, pine leaves fall into the bristle category. In the industrial world, bristle is often used as a material for making brushes and brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle materials can come from animals such as pigs, horses, goats, considerably or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. To emphasize what bristles are used on a toothbrush, usually the term bristle will be written in the product name. For example, Boar Bristle Brush which means Pig Bristle Brush. Boar means wild boar or wild boar. If you find a toothbrush with the above sentence on the packaging, then the toothbrush is declared forbidden to use.
