However, it needs to have a replacement solution," said Pratama who is also the Head of the Communication and Information System Security Research Center (CISSReC) in Semarang, Thursday (12/4). /2018). According to Pratama, there are risks if the government blocks Facebook. In fact, the risk could spread to politics and cause instability in the country. The Facebook blocking discourse is related to the alleged data theft by Cambridge Analytica of 87 million FB user data in the world. Of these, 1,096,666 of them are Indonesian netizens. Pratama argues that Indonesia's position is weak because infrastructure does not have an alternative to local social media. Unlike China, which vertebral column blocks Facebook, Google, and WhatsApp, they have prepared alternative applications, such as QQ, Weibo, and WeChat. This is because, he continued, social media has grown to be more than just a place to meet old friends. However, it has further become a place to earn a living for many people. In fact, relatively many micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) use Facebook for their promotional tools. "This should be a lesson so that in the future the government can see this as a priority to build social media platforms and other internet services," said Pratama. According to him, the cases of data leakage of Facebook users also occurred on other platforms with different amounts, could be smaller or more. "Privacy issues in our country also need to get a legal umbrella through the Personal Data Protection Law. This must also be resolved by the government," said Pratama, who was once the Acting Director (Plt.) of the Signal Security Director of the State Crypto Agency (Lemsaneg). Touching back on the Facebook case, he argued that the government's threat to block Facebook on the one hand wanted to show the government's side with the people. However, that's not enough.
berita_id: Pakar cybersecurity, dokter Pratama Persadha mengatakan bahwa dia tidak yakin pemerintah telah memblokir Facebook, karena pengguna media sosial ini di Indonesia mencapai 130 juta pengguna."Jika Facebook masih rewel, saya pikir itu perlu diblokir. Namun, itu perlu memiliki solusi pengganti," kata Pratama yang juga kepala Pusat Penelitian Keamanan Sistem Komunikasi dan Informasi (CISSREC) di Semarang, Kamis (12/4)./2018).Menurut Pratama, ada risiko jika pemerintah memblokir Facebook.Faktanya, risikonya dapat menyebar ke politik dan menyebabkan ketidakstabilan di negara ini.Wacana pemblokiran Facebook terkait dengan dugaan pencurian data oleh Cambridge Analytica dari 87 juta data pengguna FB di dunia.Dari jumlah tersebut, 1.096.666 di antaranya adalah netizen Indonesia.Pratama berpendapat bahwa posisi Indonesia lemah karena infrastruktur tidak memiliki alternatif untuk media sosial lokal.Tidak seperti Cina, kolom vertebral yang memblokir Facebook, Google, dan WhatsApp, mereka telah menyiapkan aplikasi alternatif, seperti QQ, Weibo, dan WeChat.Ini karena, ia melanjutkan, media sosial telah berkembang menjadi lebih dari sekadar tempat untuk bertemu teman lama.Namun, lebih lanjut telah menjadi tempat untuk mencari nafkah bagi banyak orang.Bahkan, relatif banyak usaha mikro, kecil dan menengah (MSMS) menggunakan Facebook untuk alat promosi mereka."Ini harus menjadi pelajaran sehingga di masa depan pemerintah dapat melihat ini sebagai prioritas untuk membangun platform media sosial dan layanan internet lainnya," kata Pratama.Menurutnya, kasus -kasus kebocoran data pengguna Facebook juga terjadi pada platform lain dengan jumlah yang berbeda, bisa lebih kecil atau lebih."Masalah privasi di negara kita juga perlu mendapatkan payung hukum melalui undang -undang perlindungan data pribadi. Ini juga harus diselesaikan oleh pemerintah," kata Pratama, yang pernah menjadi direktur penjabat (PLT) dari Direktur Keamanan Sinyal Badan Crypto Negara (Lemsaneg).Menyentuh kembali pada kasus Facebook, ia berpendapat bahwa ancaman pemerintah untuk memblokir Facebook di satu sisi ingin menunjukkan sisi pemerintah kepada rakyat.Namun, itu tidak cukup.

berita: Social media this morning was enlivened by the circulation of photos of participants from the 212th volume 2 demonstration unable to enter the Istiqlal Mosque. In the scattered photos, it can be enounce seen that there are groups lining up in front of the Istiqlal entrance gate. The Head of Protocol and Public Relations of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam, said that the news that the 212 volume 2 crowd was stuck at the gate was a hoax. "The news that there were 212 protesters unable to enter Istiqlal is a thousand percent hoax," said Abu when confirmed, Tuesday (21/2/2017). According to Abu, indeed on Monday night, after Isha there were three group buses that entered the Istiqlal Mosque. They claimed to be a group from Madura Island. Mosque administrators, said Abu, invited them to worship and clean themselves. The Istiqlal Mosque administrator then coordinated with the group leader accompanied by the police. "After talking that they then voluntarily left Istiqlal," said Abu. Then according to the procedure, the Istiqlal mosque, outside the month of Ramadan, is closed at 21.30 WIB. "According to the SOP, the Istiqlal Mosque is closed every day at 09.30 WIB and reopens one hour before the dawn prayer, at around 3:45 WIB," said Abu. Regarding the photo, there was a queue of worshipers at the Istiqlal gate, Abu said it was a group of pilgrims from outside the city who were about to enter Istiqlal. The manager also apologized if they were queuing at the gate, because the door was only opened at 03.45 WIB or an hour before the Fajr prayer. "In the morning before dawn, Tuesday, February 21 2017, there were several pilgrims from outside the city who were about to enter the Istiqlal Mosque and they arrived before the doors of the Istiqlal Mosque opened at 3:45 WIB. We apologize for this," said Abu. The implementation of the Fajr prayer at the Istiqlal Mosque today, said Abu, went well, with the imam, Mr. Ust. Salim Ghazali. The number of worshipers is about 240 people, consisting of, 170 men and 70 women.
berita_id: Media sosial pagi ini dimeriahkan oleh sirkulasi foto -foto peserta dari demonstrasi Volume 2 ke -212 yang tidak dapat memasuki masjid Istiqlal.Dalam foto -foto yang tersebar, dapat dilihat bahwa ada kelompok yang berbaris di depan gerbang masuk ISTIQLAL.Kepala protokol dan hubungan masyarakat dari masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam, mengatakan bahwa berita bahwa kerumunan Volume 2 yang macet di gerbang itu adalah tipuan."Berita bahwa ada 212 pengunjuk rasa yang tidak dapat memasuki Istiqlal adalah tipuan seribu persen," kata Abu ketika dikonfirmasi, Selasa (21/2/2017).Menurut Abu, memang pada Senin malam, setelah Isha ada tiga bus kelompok yang memasuki masjid Istiqlal.Mereka mengaku sebagai kelompok dari Pulau Madura.Administrator masjid, kata Abu, mengundang mereka untuk beribadah dan membersihkan diri.Administrator Masjid Istiqlal kemudian berkoordinasi dengan pemimpin kelompok yang disertai oleh polisi."Setelah berbicara bahwa mereka kemudian secara sukarela meninggalkan Istiqlal," kata Abu.Kemudian menurut prosedur, masjid Istiqlal, di luar bulan Ramadhan, ditutup pada 21.30 WIB."Menurut SOP, masjid Istiqlal ditutup setiap hari pada pukul 09.30 WIB dan dibuka kembali satu jam sebelum doa fajar, sekitar pukul 3:45 WIB," kata Abu.Mengenai foto itu, ada antrian para penyembah di gerbang Istiqlal, Abu mengatakan itu adalah sekelompok peziarah dari luar kota yang akan memasuki Istiqlal.Manajer juga meminta maaf jika mereka mengantri di gerbang, karena pintunya hanya dibuka pada 03.45 WIB atau satu jam sebelum doa Fajr."Di pagi hari sebelum fajar, Selasa, 21 Februari 2017, ada beberapa peziarah dari luar kota yang akan memasuki masjid Istiqlal dan mereka tiba di depan pintu masjid Istiqlal dibuka pada pukul 3:45 Wib. Kami meminta maaf untuk ini," kata Abu.Implementasi Doa Fajr di Masjid Istiqlal hari ini, kata Abu, berjalan dengan baik, dengan Imam, Tuan Ust.Salim Ghazali.Jumlah penyembah adalah sekitar 240 orang, terdiri dari, 170 pria dan 70 wanita.

berita: Two or more words that have the same form, but have different meanings in different languages ​​cannot be underestimated (see also: Nokia Lumia What is the Meaning?). Many consequences arise due to the difference in meaning. There are quite a few examples. In Iraq, for example, Pokemon cartoons were banned during Saddam Hussein's reign. The cartoon was made in Japan and was broadcast in Indonesia through the television station MNC TV. The fact of the ban was revealed through an Iraqi state document confiscated by US troops in 2004. Serambinews.com, as quoted from the dailymirror, said that the reason for the ban was solely because of its negative meaning in the language in Iraq. In the document, Saddam received advice from the state intelligence agency that the names used in the Pokemon films could not be tolerated in underestimate Iraq. In Syriac, or in Indonesia it is better known as Syriac, the word 'Pokemon' is very similar to the same term in that language which means: 'I am Jewish'. Some of the characters in the Pokemon movies, when translated into Syriac, also have meanings that Saddam cannot accept. The main character of the Pokemon movie, namely Pikachu, has the meaning: 'Be a Jew'. Then, the character Charmander, has the meaning: 'God is Weak', in contrast to the holy word Allahu Akbar in Islam. As a result, the Pokemon movie is considered to be infiltrated with messages against religious teachings. The document also states that the banning of Pokemon in Iraq was carried out as a measure to prevent the entry of Jewish influences into the nation's children and culture. From Wikipedia, Syriac or Syrian is a language used by the Christian community in the Middle East. Syriac is different from Syrian dialect Arabic although Syriac influences Arabic. Syrian Christian minorities living in eastern Turkey, northern Iraq and northeastern Syria, are among those who speak this language.
berita_id: Dua atau lebih kata yang memiliki bentuk yang sama, tetapi memiliki makna yang berbeda dalam bahasa yang berbeda tidak dapat diremehkan (lihat juga: Nokia Lumia Apa artinya?).Banyak konsekuensi muncul karena perbedaan makna.Ada beberapa contoh.Di Irak, misalnya, kartun Pokemon dilarang selama masa pemerintahan Saddam Hussein.Kartun itu dibuat di Jepang dan disiarkan di Indonesia melalui stasiun televisi MNC TV.Fakta larangan itu diungkapkan melalui dokumen negara Irak yang disita oleh pasukan AS pada tahun 2004. Serambinews.com, seperti dikutip dari Dailymirror, mengatakan bahwa alasan larangan itu semata -mata karena makna negatifnya dalam bahasa di Irak.Dalam dokumen tersebut, Saddam menerima saran dari Badan Intelijen Negara bahwa nama -nama yang digunakan dalam film -film Pokemon tidak dapat ditoleransi dalam meremehkan Irak.Di Syria, atau di Indonesia lebih dikenal sebagai Syria, kata 'pokemon' sangat mirip dengan istilah yang sama dalam bahasa yang berarti: 'Saya Yahudi'.Beberapa karakter dalam film Pokemon, ketika diterjemahkan ke dalam Syria, juga memiliki makna yang tidak dapat diterima Saddam.Karakter utama film Pokemon, yaitu Pikachu, memiliki artinya: 'Jadilah orang Yahudi'.Kemudian, karakter Charmander, memiliki arti: 'Tuhan itu lemah', berbeda dengan Firman Suci Allahu Akbar dalam Islam.Akibatnya, film Pokemon dianggap diinfiltrasi dengan pesan -pesan yang menentang ajaran agama.Dokumen itu juga menyatakan bahwa pelarangan Pokemon di Irak dilakukan sebagai langkah untuk mencegah masuknya pengaruh Yahudi ke dalam anak -anak dan budaya negara.Dari Wikipedia, Syria atau Suriah adalah bahasa yang digunakan oleh komunitas Kristen di Timur Tengah.Syria berbeda dari dialek Suriah Arab meskipun Syria memengaruhi bahasa Arab.Minoritas Kristen Suriah yang tinggal di Turki Timur, Irak utara dan Suriah timur laut, adalah di antara mereka yang berbicara bahasa ini.

berita: The Pokemon Go game is currently booming among young people. Not a few people who have a pokemon fever and are willing to blusukan in search of Pokemon. However, this game made by Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, and Niantic Labs can't be separated from oblique issues. Recently, there have been many links circulating on social media stating that the game contains an invitation that cannot be tolerated by Islam. It is widely circulated on social media that Pokemon actually in Syriac or Syriac means "I am Jewish", while Pikachu is said to mean "Be Jewish", and Charmander means "God is Weak". The rumor has certainly become a heated debate on social media. Many believed and shared the rumor, many febricity thought it was just something that was linked. So is that really the issue? The Los Angels Times in an article dated April 24, 2001 once reviewed this. In the LA Times, it was stated that at that time in Middle Eastern countries such as Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Jordan, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia, there were many rumors that the Pokemon game had connotations that promoted anti-Islamic behavior and believed in Judaism. This of course causes anxiety. The LA Times noted that despite Nintendo's denials, the leaders of those countries still couldn't accept Pokemon. The rumors arose amid concerns Arab countries would assimilate the emerging culture. Even so, many rumors were not proven at that time. "It has been proven that this toy is part of a Jewish plot to corrupt the minds of our young generation because it offends blasphemous thoughts, mocks God and our moral values ​​so that it is very dangerous for our young generation," said Sheik Abdel Monem abu Zent, ​​former member Jordanian parliament. Even so, in the LA Times article, he stated that there was no strong evidence that the Pokemon game did have connotations that were detrimental to Islam. Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor from Al Azhar University, said that until now there was no solid evidence that confirmed the rumors that made parents forbid their children to play the Pokemon game. In a statement in Jordan's Amman newspaper, the Syriac Orthodox Christian Church denied allegations that Pokemon and other character names have roots in ancient Syriac and insult Islam. Church officials said they were surprised by the incoming letter stating that Pokemon contained a Jewish invitation. The article from the LA Times can be read at the following link.
berita_id: Permainan Pokemon Go saat ini sedang booming di kalangan anak muda.Tidak sedikit orang yang mengalami demam Pokemon dan bersedia untuk Blusukan untuk mencari Pokemon.Namun, game ini dibuat oleh Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, dan Niantic Labs tidak dapat dipisahkan dari masalah miring.Baru -baru ini, ada banyak tautan yang beredar di media sosial yang menyatakan bahwa permainan berisi undangan yang tidak dapat ditoleransi oleh Islam.Secara luas diedarkan di media sosial bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya di Syria atau Syria berarti "Saya Yahudi", sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi Yahudi", dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Rumor itu tentu saja menjadi perdebatan panas di media sosial.Banyak yang percaya dan berbagi desas -desus, banyak febricity mengira itu hanya sesuatu yang terkait.Jadi apakah itu masalahnya?The Los Angels Times dalam sebuah artikel tertanggal 24 April 2001 pernah meninjau ini.Di LA Times, dinyatakan bahwa pada waktu itu di negara-negara Timur Tengah seperti Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Yordania, Mesir, dan Arab Saudi, ada banyak desas-desus bahwa permainan Pokemon memiliki konotasi yang mempromosikan perilaku anti-Islam dan percaya pada Yudaisme.Ini tentu saja menyebabkan kecemasan.The LA Times mencatat bahwa terlepas dari penolakan Nintendo, para pemimpin negara -negara itu masih tidak dapat menerima Pokemon.Rumor muncul di tengah kekhawatiran negara -negara Arab akan mengasimilasi budaya yang muncul.Meski begitu, banyak rumor tidak terbukti pada waktu itu."Telah terbukti bahwa mainan ini adalah bagian dari rencana Yahudi untuk merusak pikiran generasi muda kita karena menyinggung pikiran menghujat, mengejek Tuhan dan nilai -nilai moral kita sehingga sangat berbahaya bagi generasi muda kita," kata Sheik Abdel Monem Abu Zent, ​​mantan anggota parlemen Yordania.Meski begitu, dalam artikel LA Times, ia menyatakan bahwa tidak ada bukti kuat bahwa permainan Pokemon memang memiliki konotasi yang merugikan Islam.Mohammed Abu Laila, seorang profesor dari Universitas Al Azhar, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada bukti kuat yang mengkonfirmasi rumor yang membuat orang tua melarang anak -anak mereka untuk memainkan permainan Pokemon.Dalam sebuah pernyataan di surat kabar Amman Jordan, Gereja Kristen Syria Ortodoks membantah tuduhan bahwa Pokemon dan nama karakter lainnya berakar pada Syria kuno dan menghina Islam.Pejabat gereja mengatakan mereka terkejut dengan surat yang masuk yang menyatakan bahwa Pokemon berisi undangan Yahudi.Artikel dari LA Times dapat dibaca di tautan berikut.

berita: It has been a long time since the issue of boar bristles has been used as a material for toothbrushes, but until now there are still many who do not know about it. Therefore, in this paper, this problem will be presented. The Rise of the Pig Hair Issue Around 2009 the issue had circulated but was dimmed because no facts were found. In 2012 the issue had resurfaced, but only in certain circles. we are shocked by the emergence of brushes or toothbrushes made from pig bristles. To the extent that the MUI issued a fatwa that it is forbidden to use a pig bristle brush. But recently, information about toothbrushes made from pig bristles has resurfaced. Information, especially for Muslims, to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use non-halal ingredients. Features of the Pig Bristle Toothbrush From the information provided by the manufacturer itself, it is stated that there are toothbrushes made from sea urchins. Indeed, toothbrushes like this are very rare in Indonesia. But abroad, there are quite a lot of boar-bristle toothbrushes, with quite expensive prices. It is said that the toothbrush that comes from pig bristles is actually softer. The way to distinguish sea urchins from synthetic/plastic materials is to burn them. If burned with fire smells like burning horns, then it comes from the hair or hair of an animal, usually a pig. While the plastic material does not produce odors. (HALAL Journal No. 62/X/2006) Get to know the product before buying Dear readers, you can check the toothbrush to be purchased, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains Pig Bristle. Bristle means Pig Hair aka Pig Fur So double check the packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), it usually says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". Once again make sure the packaging if it's from bristles, then it's made from sea urchins. Feel free to prove that the bristles are burned, if it smells like burnt hair, it means it's from pig bristles. But if it melts and becomes hard, it means it is made of plastic and is safe to use. slam Forbids Its Use For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly Haram. No matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption and for application. The risks of using it for Muslims are Haram: Worship is rejected, Prayers are rejected, and Hell is more it deserving (hadith). Daily Activities Related to the Use of Brushes and Brushes In everyday life, we use various kinds of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint the house, grease cake pans, and spread food. Such as grilled chicken, bread, cakes, and various grilled or grilled meats and seafood. While the brush is useful when combing hair, cleaning hair at the salon or barbershop, washing clothes, and scrubbing floors. Did you know that the brushes & toothbrushes you are currently using come from? Most likely it is made from Sea urchin! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, generally come from China. These imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. There are other terms for Sea urchins, including: PIG, BOAR, HOG, BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH. Some Ways to Avoid Brushes or Toothbrushes Made from Pig Bristle: Use 100% natural brushes and brushes such as siwak root or synthetic materials, such as nylon. Wall paint brushes and food brushes are available, with slightly more expensive prices. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. Use an alternative to brushes. For example, paint rollers for painting, sponges & cotton buds for makeup, as well as knives & spatulas for greasing food. Be aware of the type of food whose cooking process and cleaning the tools using a pig brush. The characteristics of the Pig Bristle Brush, when burned, will cause a distinctive smell like burning meat. Usually Pig Bristle Brushes are sold in white and black. But it is possible for manufacturers to process the coloring by bleaching it, as if it were any other animal's fur. May be useful
berita_id: Sudah lama sejak masalah bulu babi telah digunakan sebagai bahan untuk sikat gigi, tetapi sampai sekarang masih ada banyak yang tidak mengetahuinya.Karena itu, dalam makalah ini, masalah ini akan disajikan.Munculnya masalah rambut babi sekitar tahun 2009 masalah ini telah beredar tetapi redup karena tidak ada fakta yang ditemukan.Pada 2012 masalah telah muncul kembali, tetapi hanya di kalangan tertentu.Kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Sejauh MUI mengeluarkan fatwa yang dilarang menggunakan sikat bulu babi.Namun baru -baru ini, informasi tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah muncul kembali.Informasi, terutama bagi umat Islam, untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan-bahan non-halal.Fitur sikat gigi bulu babi dari informasi yang disediakan oleh pabrikan itu sendiri, dinyatakan bahwa ada sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Memang, sikat gigi seperti ini sangat jarang di Indonesia.Tapi di luar negeri, ada cukup banyak sikat gigi berbulu babi, dengan harga yang cukup mahal.Dikatakan bahwa sikat gigi yang berasal dari bulu babi sebenarnya lebih lembut.Cara membedakan bulu babi dari bahan sintetis/plastik adalah dengan membakarnya.Jika dibakar dengan bau api seperti tanduk yang terbakar, maka itu berasal dari rambut atau rambut binatang, biasanya seekor babi.Sementara bahan plastik tidak menghasilkan bau.(Jurnal Halal No. 62/x/2006) Kenali produk sebelum membeli pembaca yang budiman, Anda dapat memeriksa sikat gigi yang akan dibeli, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi alias bulu babi jadi periksa kembali kemasan sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), biasanya mengatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% China Bristle".Sekali lagi pastikan kemasannya jika itu dari bulu, maka itu terbuat dari bulu babi.Jangan ragu untuk membuktikan bahwa bulu dibakar, jika baunya seperti rambut yang terbakar, itu berarti itu dari bulu babi.Tetapi jika meleleh dan menjadi sulit, itu berarti terbuat dari plastik dan aman untuk digunakan.Slam melarang penggunaannya untuk umat Islam, penggunaan bulu babi jelas haram.Tidak peduli seberapa kecil, materi dari daging babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan untuk aplikasi.Risiko menggunakannya untuk umat Islam adalah haram: ibadah ditolak, doa ditolak, dan neraka lebih layak (hadis).Kegiatan harian yang terkait dengan penggunaan kuas dan kuas dalam kehidupan sehari -hari, kami menggunakan berbagai jenis kuas untuk mengoleskan riasan, cat, debu bersih, mengecat rumah, wajan kue minyak, dan menyebarkan makanan.Seperti ayam panggang, roti, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Sementara sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian, dan menggosok lantai.Tahukah Anda bahwa sikat & sikat gigi yang Anda gunakan saat ini berasal?Kemungkinan besar itu terbuat dari landak laut!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia, umumnya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor ini diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Ada istilah lain untuk bulu babi laut, termasuk: babi, babi hutan, babi, sikat rambut bulu.Beberapa cara untuk menghindari sikat atau sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi: Gunakan sikat dan kuas alami 100% seperti akar siwak atau bahan sintetis, seperti nilon.Sikat cat dinding dan kuas makanan tersedia, dengan harga yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.Gunakan alternatif untuk sikat.Misalnya, cat rol untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk makeup, serta pisau & spatula untuk makanan berminyak.Waspadai jenis makanan yang proses memasaknya dan membersihkan alat menggunakan sikat babi.Karakteristik sikat bulu babi, ketika dibakar, akan menyebabkan aroma khas seperti daging yang terbakar.Biasanya sikat bulu babi dijual putih dan hitam.Tetapi mungkin bagi produsen untuk memproses pewarnaan dengan memutihkannya, seolah -olah itu adalah bulu hewan lainnya.Mungkin berguna

berita: Thousands of people who were going to take part in the 212 Action, from various areas, were detained in front of the courtyard of the Istiqlal mosque in Central Jakarta. Our monitoring Tuesday at 04.00. Wib (21/2/2017) saw dozens of inter-city buses parked on the side of the bull field in front of the Istiqlal mosque fence which dropped thousands of participants from the 212 Action. They felt strange because they were not allowed to enter the mosque even though they were going to perform the Fajr prayer. One of the participants of Action 212 from Madura named Solihin, we had an interview "We all here as Muslims feel intimidated, it is forbidden to worship in the mosque gently with the lock on the gate of the mosque, the mosque is the house of Allah so we as devout Muslims must carry out worship , try to think that the mosque inside is empty, we have to pray in front of the gate, it doesn't make sense," said Solihin to us in a high tone. The 212 Defend Islam Action Volume 2 will be held at the dawn prayer, the participants of the action began to arrive who are planning to walk to the DPR building, it is estimated that player around 50,000 people or even more. Polda Metro Jaya has given permission for the 212 Action today starting at 07.00 until 18.00.Wib, thousands of Police and TNI personnel were deployed to secure this action.
berita_id: Ribuan orang yang akan mengambil bagian dalam aksi 212, dari berbagai daerah, ditahan di depan halaman Masjid Istiqlal di Jakarta Tengah.Pemantauan kami Selasa pukul 04.00.WIB (21/2/2017) melihat lusinan bus antar kota yang diparkir di sisi lapangan banteng di depan pagar masjid Istiqlal yang menjatuhkan ribuan peserta dari aksi 212.Mereka merasa aneh karena mereka tidak diizinkan memasuki masjid meskipun mereka akan melakukan doa Fajr.One of the participants of Action 212 from Madura named Solihin, we had an interview "We all here as Muslims feel intimidated, it is forbidden to worship in the mosque gently with the lock on the gate of the mosque, the mosque is the house of Allah so we as devout Muslims must carry out worship , try to think that the mosque inside is empty, we have to pray in front of the gate, it doesn't make sense," said Solihin tokami dengan nada tinggi.The 212 Defend Islam Action Volume 2 akan diadakan pada doa fajar, para peserta tindakan mulai berdatangan yang berencana berjalan ke gedung DPR, diperkirakan bahwa pemain sekitar 50.000 orang atau bahkan lebih.Polda Metro Jaya telah memberikan izin untuk 212 tindakan hari ini mulai pukul 07.00 hingga 18.00.WIB, ribuan polisi dan personel TNI dikerahkan untuk mengamankan tindakan ini.

berita: Catfish is a food that is quite popular in Indonesia. However, recently, news has spread that eating catfish is harmful to the health of the body. It is reported that one bite of catfish contains hundreds or even thousands of cancer cell triggers. Really? Let's get to know a little more about the ins and outs of catfish. Catfish (Clarias spp.) is a type of fish that lives in fresh water. The characteristics of the catfish are easily recognizable from its slippery body, slightly flattened lengthwise, and having something like a long mustache, which sticks out from around the mouth. The catfish's habitat is generally in rivers with slow currents, swamps, lakes, reservoirs, flooded/muddy rice fields. , sewers and sewers. The ability of catfish to live in a dirty and polluted environment is influenced by an additional breathing apparatus in the form of a labyrinth that functions as a filter for dirt from the environment where the catfish live. Catfish is also known as the dirtiest fish. This refers to the nature of the catfish that likes to consume all kinds of waste in the waters where it lives. Every 100 grams of catfish meat contains 229 kilocalories of energy. The protein content of catfish with that portion is about 18 grams, carbohydrates about 8 grams, fiber 0.7 grams and fat by 13 grams. Catfish also contains various vitamins and minerals such as vitamin C, vitamin A, vitamin B complex, vitamin B12, as well as calcium, magnesium, phosphorus, potassium, sodium, and zinc. Catfish is also rich in vitamin D. Catfish meat also contains 220 mg of omega 3 fatty acids and 875 mg of omega 6 and there are approximately 15.6 grams of protein in 1 catfish. The nutrients contained in catfish are closely related to good growth, especially in children who are in their infancy and are useful for maintaining heart and brain health. Based on exposure to the nutritional content of catfish, it can be concluded that catfish is very rich in benefits for the human body. Then why should people worry about eating catfish? Basically a dirty environment that can trigger catfish to be dangerous for consumption. Catfish that live in a dirty water environment have the potential to be exposed to hazardous chemical compounds such as heavy metals and pollutants found in water pollutants. The most dangerous chemical compound that catfish may consume is mercury. Mercury (Hg) is a highly toxic organic chemical compound that can disrupt the human nervous system when consumed. But we don't need to worry too much about the issue of catfish which is said to have the potential to trigger cancer. Catfish that are generally on  the market are not catfish that come from the wild but are catfish that have been cultivated in ponds and have been controlled to be free from pollution. The feed given to cultured catfish is also generally non-waste feed so that the catfish is not exposed to harmful chemical compounds. Cultivated catfish even contain high enough amino acids. High levels of this amino acid itself can reduce the risk of certain types of cancer and rheumatoid arthritis inflammation. In addition, there is no official research that states that eating catfish can trigger cancer. However, we also have to be careful about everything we consume. To obtain the benefits of catfish while preventing the risk, it is better to limit catfish consumption. In addition, it is better to vary the intake of fish from other types so that the nutritional adequacy of fish commodities can be more fulfilled. One thing that is no less important to eat catfish is to cook catfish in the right and healthy way so that the catfish we eat is really good, halal and beneficial for our bodies.
berita_id: Catfish adalah makanan yang cukup populer di Indonesia.Namun, baru -baru ini, berita telah menyebar bahwa makan lele itu berbahaya bagi kesehatan tubuh.Dilaporkan bahwa satu gigitan ikan lele mengandung ratusan atau bahkan ribuan pemicu sel kanker.Benar-benar?Mari kita ketahui lebih banyak tentang seluk beluk ikan lele.Catfish (Clarias spp.) Adalah jenis ikan yang hidup di air tawar.Karakteristik ikan lele mudah dikenali dari tubuhnya yang licin, sedikit rata memanjang, dan memiliki sesuatu seperti kumis panjang, yang menonjol dari sekitar mulut.Habitat lele umumnya berada di sungai dengan arus lambat, rawa, danau, reservoir, sawah banjir/berlumpur., selokan dan selokan.Kemampuan ikan lele untuk hidup di lingkungan yang kotor dan tercemar dipengaruhi oleh peralatan pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin yang berfungsi sebagai filter untuk kotoran dari lingkungan tempat ikan lele tinggal.Lele juga dikenal sebagai ikan paling kotor.Ini mengacu pada sifat ikan lele yang suka mengkonsumsi semua jenis limbah di perairan tempat tinggalnya.Setiap 100 gram daging ikan lele mengandung 229 kilokalori energi.Kandungan protein ikan lele dengan porsi itu adalah sekitar 18 gram, karbohidrat sekitar 8 gram, serat 0,7 gram dan lemak dengan 13 gram.Lele juga mengandung berbagai vitamin dan mineral seperti vitamin C, vitamin A, kompleks vitamin B, vitamin B12, serta kalsium, magnesium, fosfor, kalium, natrium, dan seng.Lele juga kaya akan vitamin D. Daging lele juga mengandung 220 mg asam lemak omega 3 dan 875 mg omega 6 dan ada sekitar 15,6 gram protein dalam 1 lele.Nutrisi yang terkandung dalam ikan lele terkait erat dengan pertumbuhan yang baik, terutama pada anak -anak yang masih dalam masa pertumbuhan dan berguna untuk menjaga kesehatan jantung dan otak.Berdasarkan paparan kandungan nutrisi ikan lele, dapat disimpulkan bahwa ikan lele sangat kaya akan manfaat bagi tubuh manusia.Lalu mengapa orang khawatir makan ikan lele?Pada dasarnya lingkungan kotor yang dapat memicu ikan lele menjadi berbahaya untuk dikonsumsi.Ikan lele yang hidup di lingkungan air yang kotor berpotensi terpapar senyawa kimia berbahaya seperti logam berat dan polutan yang ditemukan dalam polutan air.Senyawa kimia paling berbahaya yang mungkin dikonsumsi lele adalah merkuri.Merkuri (HG) adalah senyawa kimia organik yang sangat beracun yang dapat mengganggu sistem saraf manusia saat dikonsumsi.Tetapi kita tidak perlu terlalu khawatir tentang masalah ikan lele yang dikatakan memiliki potensi untuk memicu kanker.Lele yang umumnya di pasaran bukanlah ikan lele yang berasal dari alam liar tetapi lele yang telah dibudidayakan di kolam dan telah dikendalikan untuk bebas dari polusi.Pakan yang diberikan untuk ikan lele yang dikultur juga umumnya merupakan pakan non-limbah sehingga ikan lele tidak terpapar senyawa kimia yang berbahaya.Ikan lele yang dibudidayakan bahkan mengandung asam amino yang cukup tinggi.Tingkat tinggi asam amino ini sendiri dapat mengurangi risiko jenis kanker dan radang sendi rheumatoid tertentu.Selain itu, tidak ada penelitian resmi yang menyatakan bahwa makan ikan lele dapat memicu kanker.Namun, kita juga harus berhati -hati tentang semua yang kita konsumsi.Untuk mendapatkan manfaat ikan lele sambil mencegah risiko, lebih baik membatasi konsumsi ikan lele.Selain itu, lebih baik untuk memvariasikan asupan ikan dari jenis lain sehingga kecukupan nutrisi komoditas ikan dapat lebih terpenuhi.Satu hal yang tidak kalah penting untuk makan lele adalah memasak ikan lele dengan cara yang benar dan sehat sehingga ikan lele yang kita makan benar -benar baik, halal dan bermanfaat bagi tubuh kita.

berita: Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives will finally react to the data leak of 1 million Facebook users in Indonesia. Facebook is considered to have violated applicable laws. Meutya Hafid, deputy chairman of the Golkar faction in Commission I, saw Facebook had committed serious violations. Meutya cites Article 32 of the ITE Law as a rule that Facebook has violated. "As a sovereign country, the laws that exist in Indonesia must be fulfilled and anyone who violates them will be subject to sanctions in accordance with applicable legal regulations ...," Meutya chirped when contacted via WhatsApp, on Thursday (5/4/2018) ). In addition, Meutya explained that the government could sue, impose sanctions, and close access to Facebook. He is very worried that if the social network is not given any punishment, it will set a bad precedent for other internet companies in Indonesia. "Please the government can choose from the three options." Meanwhile, time lag Hanafi Rais from the PAN faction has also proposed that Commission I of the DPR immediately summon Facebook Indonesia regarding the findings of the leaked data. "We will hold an internal meeting and will immediately send an official letter to them," said Hanafi. The time for the summons is still unknown, but Hanafi emphasized that the agenda was more directed at asking for clarification from Facebook. Previously, representatives of Facebook Indonesia had met the summons of the Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara. The call is an effort to clarify the government's disclosure of the data of 1 million Facebook users in Indonesia from a total of 87 million users worldwide related to the Cambridge Analytica scandal. An important outcome of the meeting between Rudiantara and Facebook was to ask third-party applications running on the Facebook platform to be temporarily closed. On this occasion, Rudiantara emphasized that he would not hesitate to close Facebook services in Indonesia if they stubbornly did not comply with the government's request. “If the third party app is not shut down, want me to shut it down completely?” he said.
berita_id: Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia akhirnya akan bereaksi terhadap kebocoran data 1 juta pengguna Facebook di Indonesia.Facebook dianggap telah melanggar hukum yang berlaku.Meutya Hafid, wakil ketua faksi Golkar di Komisi I, melihat Facebook telah melakukan pelanggaran serius.Meutya mengutip Pasal 32 Hukum ITE sebagai aturan yang dilanggar Facebook."Sebagai negara berdaulat, undang -undang yang ada di Indonesia harus dipenuhi dan siapa pun yang melanggar mereka akan dikenakan sanksi sesuai dengan peraturan hukum yang berlaku ...," Meutya berkicau ketika dihubungi melalui WhatsApp, Kamis (5/4/2018)).Selain itu, Meutya menjelaskan bahwa pemerintah dapat menuntut, menjatuhkan sanksi, dan mengakses akses dekat ke Facebook.Dia sangat khawatir bahwa jika jejaring sosial tidak diberi hukuman apa pun, itu akan menjadi preseden yang buruk bagi perusahaan internet lain di Indonesia."Tolong pemerintah dapat memilih dari tiga opsi."Sementara itu, Time Lag Hanafi Rais dari faksi Pan juga telah mengusulkan agar Komisi I dari DPR segera memanggil Facebook Indonesia mengenai temuan data yang bocor."Kami akan mengadakan pertemuan internal dan akan segera mengirim surat resmi kepada mereka," kata Hanafi.Waktu untuk panggilan masih belum diketahui, tetapi Hanafi menekankan bahwa agenda lebih diarahkan untuk meminta klarifikasi dari Facebook.Sebelumnya, perwakilan Facebook Indonesia telah memenuhi panggilan Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara.Panggilan ini merupakan upaya untuk mengklarifikasi pengungkapan pemerintah terhadap data 1 juta pengguna Facebook di Indonesia dari total 87 juta pengguna di seluruh dunia terkait dengan skandal Cambridge Analytica.Hasil penting dari pertemuan antara Rudiantara dan Facebook adalah meminta aplikasi pihak ketiga yang berjalan di platform Facebook untuk sementara ditutup.Pada kesempatan ini, Rudiantara menekankan bahwa dia tidak akan ragu untuk menutup layanan Facebook di Indonesia jika mereka dengan keras kepala tidak memenuhi permintaan pemerintah.“Jika aplikasi pihak ketiga tidak ditutup, ingin saya menutupnya sepenuhnya?”katanya.

berita: The Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara, said that currently there is a lot of negative content circulating on social media. According to him, the steps currently being taken by the Ministry of Communication and Informatics to overcome this are closing the accounts that spread the content. “Yesterday I met with Commission I, and the current content is a lot of negative things, damaging the relationship with one another. There is something bad on social media that gives us the authority, of course closing the account," he said at a press conference in Jakarta, yesterday. However, if negative content and accounts spreading bad content cannot be controlled, Facebook will be closed (blocked, ed). Rudy unfold assessed that the action was in accordance with the law. “But if necessary, Kominfo will close the organizers. If we now do account restrictions, it is possible that Facebook is closed. If it is needed later, yes, it must be," he added. Rudy added, his party will establish a relationship with the Indonesian Ulema Council (MUI) regarding the recently issued social media fatwa. Because, the one who knows in detail about the fatwa is MUI. "God willing, I will return to MUI to jointly follow up on this fatwa," he concluded.
berita_id: Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara, mengatakan bahwa saat ini ada banyak konten negatif yang beredar di media sosial.Menurutnya, langkah -langkah yang saat ini diambil oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika untuk mengatasi hal ini menutup akun yang menyebarkan konten."Kemarin saya bertemu dengan Komisi I, dan konten saat ini adalah banyak hal negatif, merusak hubungan satu sama lain. Ada sesuatu yang buruk di media sosial yang memberi kita otoritas, tentu saja menutup akun," katanya pada konferensi pers di Jakarta, kemarin.Namun, jika konten negatif dan akun yang menyebarkan konten yang buruk tidak dapat dikendalikan, Facebook akan ditutup (diblokir, ed).Rudy terungkap menilai bahwa tindakan itu sesuai dengan hukum."Tetapi jika perlu, Kominfo akan menutup penyelenggara. Jika kita sekarang melakukan pembatasan akun, ada kemungkinan bahwa Facebook ditutup. Jika diperlukan nanti, ya, itu pasti," tambahnya.Rudy menambahkan, partainya akan menjalin hubungan dengan Dewan Ulama Indonesia (MUI) mengenai fatwa media sosial yang baru -baru ini dikeluarkan.Karena, orang yang tahu secara rinci tentang Fatwa adalah MUI."Bersedia Tuhan, aku akan kembali ke MUI untuk bersama -sama menindaklanjuti fatwa ini," pungkasnya.

berita: Warganet is still confused about the unclear information regarding the fate of Facebook in Indonesia. They also wonder, whether Facebook will be closed in Indonesia or not? Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara said that he would not block (close) Facebook permanently, but only temporarily. That is if the situation gets worse. "We will see this situation first. If it gets worse, then we will temporarily close (block it)," said Minister of Communication and Information Rudiantara. Rudiantara was reluctant to talk about closing Facebook's operations permanently. He is more focused on monitoring Facebook to create data security and prevent the spread of hate speech. The House of Representatives also had asked Kominfo to be more strict with Facebook. "We and the government - the Ministry of Communication and Information - will talk again regarding the follow-up to Facebook's mistake. Personally, I'm still open to sanctions, it's also possible to suggest a Facebook service moratorium," said Meutya Hafid, Member of Commission I DPR RI. Meutya estimates that the DPR RI will wait for the results of Facebook's internal investigation for the next month. "We are waiting, I think a month should be enough time. We hope that the results of this investigation will not only blame who, but also spring up there should be information, where this misused data went and what it was used for," he said. Case Beginning The controversy arose from the Cambridge Analytica scandal, which accused Facebook of leaking data. After being investigated, it turns out that "leak" is not the right term. The data was not leaked, but rather misused by Cambridge Analytica, allegedly for political purposes. The data taken is also not the content of the message, but data that is publicly listed on a person's profile. Unfortunately, the rice has become porridge. There has been confusion about this, to the point that the DPR also summoned Facebook to ask for an explanation. As a result, the discourse of blocking Facebook arises. "That Facebook data is not leaked. If it leaks, the term is like a pipe with water, you don't know where the leak is, this data is compromised," said Rudiantara. Facebook has been given SP 2 The Ministry of Communication and Information has sent SP 2 to Facebook, but there is no information about SP 3 which means closing. When asked about the validity period of SP 2 to the next SP, Rudiantara has not yet given a definitive answer. "Yes, it could be a day, a month, see the situation first," concluded Rudiantara. He claimed to have received an explanation from the Irish Facebook office which manages Facebook in Indonesia. In a statement by Facebook Ireland to Rudiantara, they provided information on numbers related to misuse of data that afflicted users. Rudiantara also continues to monitor the development of Indonesian user data on Facebook.
berita_id: Warganet masih bingung tentang informasi yang tidak jelas mengenai nasib Facebook di Indonesia.Mereka juga bertanya -tanya, apakah Facebook akan ditutup di Indonesia atau tidak?Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa ia tidak akan memblokir (menutup) Facebook secara permanen, tetapi hanya sementara.Itu jika situasinya semakin buruk."Kami akan melihat situasi ini terlebih dahulu. Jika menjadi lebih buruk, maka kami akan untuk sementara waktu akan menutup (memblokirnya)," kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi Rudiantara.Rudiantara enggan berbicara tentang menutup operasi Facebook secara permanen.Dia lebih fokus pada pemantauan Facebook untuk menciptakan keamanan data dan mencegah penyebaran pidato kebencian.Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat juga telah meminta Kominfo untuk lebih ketat dengan Facebook."Kami dan pemerintah - Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi - akan berbicara lagi mengenai tindak lanjut kesalahan Facebook. Secara pribadi, saya masih terbuka untuk sanksi, juga mungkin untuk menyarankan moratorium layanan Facebook," kata Meutya Hafid, anggota Komisi I DPR RI.Meutya memperkirakan bahwa DPR RI akan menunggu hasil penyelidikan internal Facebook untuk bulan berikutnya."Kami sedang menunggu, saya pikir sebulan harus ada waktu yang cukup. Kami berharap bahwa hasil penyelidikan ini tidak hanya akan menyalahkan siapa, tetapi juga muncul di atas harus ada informasi, di mana data yang disalahgunakan ini pergi dan untuk apa itu digunakan," katanya.Kasus yang memulai kontroversi muncul dari skandal Cambridge Analytica, yang menuduh Facebook bocor data.Setelah diselidiki, ternyata "bocor" bukanlah istilah yang tepat.Data itu tidak bocor, melainkan disalahgunakan oleh Cambridge Analytica, yang diduga untuk tujuan politik.Data yang diambil juga bukan konten pesan, tetapi data yang terdaftar di depan umum pada profil seseorang.Sayangnya, nasi telah menjadi bubur.Telah ada kebingungan tentang hal ini, sampai -sampai DPR juga memanggil Facebook untuk meminta penjelasan.Akibatnya, wacana memblokir Facebook muncul."Data Facebook itu tidak bocor. Jika bocor, istilahnya seperti pipa dengan air, Anda tidak tahu di mana bocornya, data ini dikompromikan," kata Rudiantara.Facebook telah diberikan SP 2 Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi telah mengirim SP 2 ke Facebook, tetapi tidak ada informasi tentang SP 3 yang berarti penutupan.Ketika ditanya tentang periode validitas SP 2 ke SP berikutnya, Rudiantara belum memberikan jawaban yang pasti."Ya, itu bisa jadi sehari, sebulan, melihat situasinya terlebih dahulu," pungkas Rudiantara.Dia mengaku telah menerima penjelasan dari kantor Facebook Irlandia yang mengelola Facebook di Indonesia.Dalam sebuah pernyataan oleh Facebook Irlandia ke Rudiantara, mereka memberikan informasi tentang angka -angka yang terkait dengan penyalahgunaan data yang pengguna yang menderita.Rudiantara juga terus memantau pengembangan data pengguna Indonesia di Facebook.

berita: Netizens are busy talking about social media, Facebook in Indonesia will be closed on April 24, 2018. We tried to find out the truth of the news, it turned out to be a hoax or not true. So far, there has been no firm statement from the Ministry of Communication and Information (Kemenkominfo) confirming that Facebook Indonesia will be blocked or closed on April 24, 2018. However, the Ministry of Communication and Information does not hesitate to block Facebook in Indonesia like Telegram, if it is proven that there is a criminal element in the leakage of Facebook user data in Indonesia. If indeed Facebook Indonesia will be blocked, even then it will only be temporary and if the situation gets worse. "We will see this situation first. If it gets worse, we will close temporarily," said Minister of Communication and Informatics Rudiantara, Wednesday (11/4/2018) at the Kominfo Building, Medan Merdeka, Jakarta. "If there are indications that Facebook in Indonesia is being used for incitement, as happened in Myanmar, I have no qualms about blocking it," closed in added Rudiantara. Reported by CNN Indonesia, the Facebook data leak scandal in Indonesia recorded as many as 1,095,918 users who could potentially be affected by data abuse. From November 2013 to 2015 there were 748 people in Indonesia who installed thisisyourdigitallife application. The application, which is a personality test quiz, is known to use Facebook account access. "There are a total of 1,096,666 people in Indonesia or around 1.26 percent of the total number of people affected globally," explained Facebook Indonesia's Head of Public Policy Ruben Hattari during a Hearing Meeting (RDP) with members of Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives in Jakarta. According to Ruben, the figure is known to not include people who have downloaded the application, but then deleted their Facebook account. The company owned by Mark Zuckerberg claims not to store the data of individual users who download the application. To note, there are about 87 million global Facebook user data stolen by Cambridge Analytica (CA). Indonesia occupies the third position as the country with the most user data victims.
berita_id: Netizen sibuk berbicara tentang media sosial, Facebook di Indonesia akan ditutup pada 24 April 2018. Kami mencoba mencari tahu kebenaran berita, ternyata bohong atau tidak benar.Sejauh ini, belum ada pernyataan tegas dari Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi (Kemenkominfo) yang mengkonfirmasi bahwa Facebook Indonesia akan diblokir atau ditutup pada 24 April 2018. Namun, Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi tidak ragu untuk memblokir Facebook di Indonesia seperti Telegram, jika terbukti ada elemen kriminal dalam kebocoran data pengguna Facebook.Jika memang Facebook Indonesia akan diblokir, meskipun itu hanya akan bersifat sementara dan jika situasinya semakin buruk."Kami akan melihat situasi ini terlebih dahulu. Jika semakin buruk, kami akan menutup sementara," kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika Rudiantara, Rabu (11/4/2018) di gedung Kepomo, Medan Merdeka, Jakarta."Jika ada indikasi bahwa Facebook di Indonesia digunakan untuk hasutan, seperti yang terjadi di Myanmar, saya tidak punya keraguan tentang memblokirnya," tutup di tambahan Rudiantara.Dilaporkan oleh CNN Indonesia, skandal kebocoran data Facebook di Indonesia mencatat sebanyak 1.095.918 pengguna yang berpotensi dipengaruhi oleh penyalahgunaan data.Dari November 2013 hingga 2015 ada 748 orang di Indonesia yang memasang aplikasi ThisisyyourDigitallife.Aplikasi, yang merupakan kuis tes kepribadian, diketahui menggunakan akses akun Facebook."Ada total 1.096.666 orang di Indonesia atau sekitar 1,26 persen dari jumlah total orang yang terkena dampak global," jelas kepala kebijakan publik Ruben Hattari di Facebook Indonesia selama pertemuan pendengaran (RDP) dengan anggota Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia di Jakarta.Menurut Ruben, angka tersebut diketahui tidak termasuk orang yang telah mengunduh aplikasi, tetapi kemudian menghapus akun Facebook mereka.Perusahaan yang dimiliki oleh Mark Zuckerberg mengklaim tidak menyimpan data pengguna individu yang mengunduh aplikasi.Untuk dicatat, ada sekitar 87 juta data pengguna Global Facebook yang dicuri oleh Cambridge Analytica (CA).Indonesia menempati posisi ketiga sebagai negara dengan korban data pengguna terbanyak.

berita: Ahok is not dismissed as Governor of DKI Jakarta due to his status as a defendant in the case of blasphemy against Islam, shows how difficult the law in this country is to enforce. How can you seek justice if the law is a tool to seek justice alone is difficult to enforce. Not a few legal and state administration experts, including former Constitutional Court Justice Mahfud MD, criticized the steps taken by the government, especially the Minister of Home Affairs Tjahyo Kumolo and President Joko Widodo who remained silent when Ahok returned to the governorship, while several other regional heads were dismissed when their status was persist accused of an act. criminal. This eventually led to the demands of law enforcement through the actions of defending Islam and Defending the State carried out by the Muslim community who joined the FUI (Islamic Community Forum) today (Tuesday, 21/02/2017). In addition to the masses from FUI, there were also a number of students who were members of the student movement for people's defense. Their demands include dismissing the governor who is a suspect, stopping the criminalization of ulama, stopping the arrest of student activists, restoring the nation's sovereignty and returning it to the original 1945 Constitution. The action, which was held in front of the DPR-MPR Building, turned out to be attracting people from outside Jakarta. They tried to gather at the Istiqlal Mosque to pray Fajr in congregation and also when the weather was raining. Apparently the fence of the Istiqlal mosque was tightly closed, even though it was approaching Fajr time. Fajr time. According to a report from one of the gabbarberita.com contributors in the field, the new mosque opened at around 04.00 WIB. Previously where were the BPPMI management and were appointed and inaugurated directly by the Minister of Religion who was also in the structure as the Chairman of BPPMI.
berita_id: Ahok tidak dipecat sebagai gubernur DKI Jakarta karena statusnya sebagai terdakwa dalam kasus penistaan ​​terhadap Islam, menunjukkan betapa sulitnya hukum di negara ini untuk menegakkan.Bagaimana Anda bisa mencari keadilan jika hukum adalah alat untuk mencari keadilan saja sulit untuk ditegakkan.Tidak sedikit pakar administrasi hukum dan negara bagian, termasuk mantan pengadilan konstitusional Mahfud MD, mengkritik langkah -langkah yang diambil oleh pemerintah, terutama Menteri Dalam Negeri Tjahyo Kumolo dan Presiden Joko Widodo yang tetap diam ketika Ahok kembali ke gubernur, sementara beberapa kepala regional lainnya diberhentikan ketika status mereka tetap diduga sebagai sebuah tindakan.pidana.Hal ini akhirnya mengarah pada tuntutan penegakan hukum melalui tindakan membela Islam dan mempertahankan negara yang dilakukan oleh komunitas Muslim yang bergabung dengan FUI (Forum Komunitas Islam) hari ini (Selasa, 21/02/2017).Selain massa dari Fui, ada juga sejumlah siswa yang merupakan anggota gerakan siswa untuk pertahanan rakyat.Tuntutan mereka termasuk memecat gubernur yang merupakan tersangka, menghentikan kriminalisasi ulama, menghentikan penangkapan aktivis mahasiswa, memulihkan kedaulatan negara dan mengembalikannya ke konstitusi asli 1945.Aksi, yang diadakan di depan gedung DPR-MPR, ternyata menarik orang dari luar Jakarta.Mereka mencoba berkumpul di masjid Istiqlal untuk berdoa Fajr di jemaat dan juga ketika cuaca hujan.Rupanya pagar masjid Istiqlal tertutup rapat, meskipun mendekati waktu fajr.Waktu fajr.Menurut laporan dari salah satu kontributor Gabbarberita.com di lapangan, masjid baru dibuka pada sekitar pukul 04.00 WIB.Sebelumnya di mana manajemen BPPMI dan ditunjuk dan diresmikan secara langsung oleh Menteri Agama yang juga berada dalam struktur sebagai ketua BPPMI.

berita: There are several myths about preventing stroke, namely sticking a needle, Dr. Frandy Susatia SpS said that this myth is something that can actually harm yourself. Especially if the person who does it also has diabetes. It's not true that you can prevent stroke by inserting a needle. In addition to sticking a needle, another myth is flushing the skin when it's hot. But again, the doctor who practices at Siloam Hospital, Kebon Jeruk, denies it. Not true. If the heat of the blood vessels will spread but it will be normal again when the heat subsides. Only fainted cleave but not stroke because of the blood vessels. the lid is uploading
berita_id: Ada beberapa mitos tentang mencegah stroke, yaitu menempelkan jarum, Dr. Frandy Susatia SPS mengatakan bahwa mitos ini adalah sesuatu yang benar -benar dapat membahayakan diri sendiri.Terutama jika orang yang melakukannya juga menderita diabetes.Tidak benar bahwa Anda dapat mencegah stroke dengan memasukkan jarum.Selain menempelkan jarum, mitos lain adalah menyiram kulit saat panas.Tetapi sekali lagi, Doctor Who berlatih di Rumah Sakit Siloam, Kebon Jeruk, menyangkalnya.Tidak benar.Jika panas pembuluh darah akan menyebar tetapi akan normal lagi ketika panas mereda.Hanya celah pingsan tetapi tidak stroke karena pembuluh darah.Tutupnya mengunggah

berita: The president's salary, which is only around Rp. 62 million per month, is currently considered very low. The government plans to propose an increase in the president's salary so that it is worth Rp. 553 million per month. In the RPP, apart from the president, the vice president and other high-ranking state officials will also experience salary increases. The president's salary has skyrocketed because the calculation is based on an index of 1:12698 between the salaries of the lowest rank civil servants and those of the lowest rank civil servants. The highest income index for the president is simulated to reach 96000 so that he will earn an income of IDR 553.4 million per month. Meanwhile, the vice president (wapres) will receive an income of IDR 368.9 million per month from the previous basic salary of IDR 20 million. vice president salary based on income index 64000 With pe With this salary change, the monthly income of the president of the Republic of Indonesia will compete with the salaries of leaders in other countries. The extent of the salary comparison is in the info graphic. In the RPP, new salary proposals also appear for ministers, attorney general, commander of the TNI, chief of police, chairman of the MPR, chairman of the DPR, chairman of the DPD, chairman of the KPK, chairman of the BPK, chairman of the Supreme Court, and chairman of the Constitutional Court With an index calculation of 16000, their income is IDR 92.2 million per month Then for the deputy chairman of the MPR, DPR, DPD, KPK, BPK , MA, and MK, the income index is 15,333 and receives an income of Rp. 88.3 million per month. As for the deputy minister, deputy head of the National Police, members of the DPR, DPD members, BPK members, and Supreme Court justices, per month, they earn Rp. 80.7 million. With an income index of 14000, the Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (Kemenpan RB) acknowledged the issue of the circulation of this RPP even though he stated that the proposal was not yet ripe. The Head of the Legal, Communication and Information Bureau Public Ormation Ke Menpan RB Herman Suryatman said that the information on the RPP was not valid. Herman said that the RPP was sourced from the discussion material held last year. "Those are simulation numbers that are not valid. 2017," he said in Jakarta yesterday. As is known, the RPP on the Salaries and Benefits of Civil Servants is a technical regulation of the Law on State Civil Apparatus (ASN). According to Herman, the presentation contains a simulation of the income of civil servants and other state officials. still needs further study. "Not only does it contain a simulation of the income of state officials, but also a lieutenant simulation of the income of civil servants. Please don't be misunderstood," he said. Using a calculation index of 1:12698, the income of civil servants, both central and regional, will increase. regional officials such as governors governors, regents, mayors, provincial DPRD, and city regency DPRDs will also experience an increase. The governor will earn an income of IDR 76.8 million per month with an index of 13333 Then the deputy governor, regent mayor, and chairman of the provincial DPRD will earn income Rp. 73.2 million with an income index of 12698. Meanwhile, the deputy regent/mayor, deputy chairman of the provincial DPRD, and the chairman of the Regency/City DPRD have a salary of Rp. 69.7 million per month with an income index of 12094. The province which has an income index of 11518 has a monthly salary of Rp. 66.3 million. Lastly, for members of the district and city DPRD, the salary to be earned is Rp. 63.3 million with an income index of 10969. Public policy expert at the University of Padjadjaran (Unpad) Yogi Suprayogi assessed, even though it is only a simulation, the salary increase for state officials is irrelevant. He said the current salary earned by state officials is sufficient. There is an additional operational allowance. That's big. It's what he likes. No need to grow it. It's irrelevant," he said. According to him, if there must be an increase, the salaries of the president and central officials must be adjusted to the inflation rate. "We are also not a developed country. Singapore could reach Rp 10 billion," he said. Yogi said, rather than an increase in the salaries of state officials, improving the salaries of civil servants is considered more important at this time. currently still discussing the technical rules of the ASN Law, one of which is the RPP on Salaries and Allowances Yogi emphasized the importance of changing the salary scheme of civil servants. Among the three things, Yogi requested that the basic salary be increased more than and performance allowances Currently the basic salary is smaller so that many civil servants go here and there to increase their performance allowances. Expensive allowances must be greater than the other two components so that teachers are willing to be placed in remote areas. In addition, he also highlighted that performance allowances must be based on performance. He warned not to other countries pay salaries based on level of education Salary provision in some countries is also partly based on performance In the United States, the salary of civil servants in the Department of State ranges from USD88000 to USD96000 per year However, the lowest government employee salary is USD18785 per year Fri There are 2.79 million civil servants in Uncle Sam's country. The salary of the US president is around USD 400,000. The presidential salary increase was very drastic in 2001. Previously, the president's salary was only USD 200,000. Malaysian Prime Minister (PM) Najib Razak gave an annual bonus in 2018 to government employees who In addition, he provides a pension of 1000 ringgit per month for those who have served for 25 years. The salary of Malaysian civil servants who serve 14 years is around 36000 ringgit and those who have served for more than 1019 years get an income of 70753 ringgit. new civil servants working in Singapore reach 3,000 Singapore dollars per month For managerial positions earn around 8,000 Singapore dollars The number of employees in Singapore reaches 84,000 people According to Thomas Friedman of the New York Times, civil servants in Singapore are among the most efficient and uncorruptible bureaucrats “They have high standards of discipline and accountability,” said Friedman

Rumors circulated that there had been a riot at the Mako Brimob Detention Center, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, on Friday (11/10/2017). From the information compiled, as quoted by a social media channel, it was stated that the detainees who were charged with terrorism cases were outraged by the news that the wardens were suspected of harassing the Qur'an and the books of the clerics belonging to the detainees. "Densus and the warden arrogantly entered the Ikhwan's room and the Koran was stepped on by Brimob, the warden and Densus finally caused the ikhwans to go on a rampage and destroy the Brimob mako detention room, the current situation is still tense ..." That's the excerpt from the release of #AlfathChannel, which spread on social media. In addition, viral videos and photos were also circulated during the riots and the detainees waving the monotheism flag. In the video, the atmosphere of the Mako Brimbob detention cell looks shattered, there are also broken glass and wood that the prisoners break down. Meanwhile, the screams of takbir of the prisoners resounded. However, there were also other prisoners who tried to calm the atmosphere. After the riots, it was reported that the atmosphere was starting to become conducive, the warden of the Mako Brimob Detention Center was reported to have made efforts to invite the detainees to negotiate. Until this news was revealed, clearing there has been no release of clarification from the Mako Brimob Detention Center
berita_id: Rumor beredar bahwa telah terjadi kerusuhan di Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, pada hari Jumat (11/10/2017).Dari informasi yang disusun, seperti dikutip oleh saluran media sosial, dinyatakan bahwa tahanan yang didakwa dengan kasus -kasus terorisme marah oleh berita bahwa para penjaga diduga melecehkan Al -Qur'an dan buku -buku ulama milik para tahanan."Densus dan sipir dengan sombong memasuki kamar Ikhwan dan Alquran diinjak oleh Brimob, sipir dan Densus akhirnya menyebabkan Ikhwan mengamuk dan menghancurkan ruang penahanan Brimob Mako, situasi saat ini masih tegang ..." Itu adalah kutukan dari rilis #fathchannel, mana yang disebar sosial. "Selain itu, video viral dan foto juga diedarkan selama kerusuhan dan tahanan mengibarkan bendera monoteisme.Dalam video itu, suasana sel penahanan Mako Brimbob terlihat hancur, ada juga pecahan kaca dan kayu yang dihancurkan oleh para tahanan.Sementara itu, teriakan takbir para tahanan bergema.Namun, ada juga tahanan lain yang mencoba menenangkan suasana.Setelah kerusuhan, dilaporkan bahwa atmosfer mulai menjadi kondusif, sipir Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob dilaporkan telah melakukan upaya untuk mengundang tahanan untuk bernegosiasi.Sampai berita ini terungkap, kliring belum ada rilis klarifikasi dari Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob

berita: When Facebook Will Be Closed - Recently, there has been a lot of talk about Facebook being closed or frozen in the country, this is certainly very troubling for those who have been relying on Facebook as a medium of communication or also a medium for selling goods online. Actually, it is not without reason why the government wants to block Facebook, this is because of the misuse of leaked data on Facebook users, so it is feared that later it will endanger the stability of domestic security. Facebook itself has long been used by the Indonesian people as a medium of communication, on April 17, 2018, the DPR had a meeting with Facebook. The government itself still has the will and gives Facebook one month or thirty days to audit and report later, if within one month there is still no news on how it will continue, then the DPR will propose a temporary suspension of Facebook so that later we can't use facebook. Technology can sometimes be two-sided and sometimes it depends on how we use it, there are so many events or problems that are caused by provocations on social media, for that we need to respond to the development of the technology world in a positive way. So have you got an answer about when Facebook will be closed, isn't it, it's better if we wait for news from Facebook later, as for if the government decides to block Facebook then we have to get ready resolve to look for other social media that we can make as an option, maybe that's all to share a little rud-arsenio.com this time, have a nice day.
berita_id: Ketika Facebook akan ditutup - baru -baru ini, ada banyak pembicaraan tentang Facebook yang ditutup atau dibekukan di negara ini, ini tentu sangat meresahkan bagi mereka yang telah mengandalkan Facebook sebagai media komunikasi atau juga media untuk menjual barang secara online.Sebenarnya, bukan tanpa alasan mengapa pemerintah ingin memblokir Facebook, ini karena penyalahgunaan data yang bocor pada pengguna Facebook, sehingga dikhawatirkan bahwa nanti akan membahayakan stabilitas keamanan domestik.Facebook itu sendiri telah lama digunakan oleh orang -orang Indonesia sebagai media komunikasi, pada 17 April 2018, DPR mengadakan pertemuan dengan Facebook.Pemerintah itu sendiri masih memiliki surat wasiat dan memberikan Facebook satu bulan atau tiga puluh hari untuk mengaudit dan melaporkan nanti, jika dalam waktu satu bulan masih belum ada berita tentang bagaimana hal itu akan berlanjut, maka DPR akan mengusulkan penangguhan sementara Facebook sehingga nanti kita tidak dapat menggunakan Facebook.Teknologi kadang-kadang bisa dua sisi dan kadang-kadang tergantung pada bagaimana kita menggunakannya, ada begitu banyak peristiwa atau masalah yang disebabkan oleh provokasi di media sosial, untuk itu kita perlu menanggapi pengembangan dunia teknologi dengan cara yang positif.Jadi, apakah Anda mendapat jawaban tentang kapan Facebook akan ditutup, bukan, lebih baik jika kita menunggu berita dari Facebook nanti, seperti jika pemerintah memutuskan untuk memblokir Facebook maka kita harus siap menyelesaikan untuk mencari media sosial lain yang bisa kita buat sebagai pilihan, mungkin itu saja untuk berbagi rud-arsenio.com kali ini, semoga harimu menyenangkan.

berita: Surely the residents of Malang City have heard or read articles about catfish which have 3000 cancer cells. The messages and writings stated that a mouthful of catfish meat was eaten, residents also swallowed the 3000 cancer cells. The message and writing also stated that catfish contain cancer cells because catfish live in a dirty way. The reason for the filthiest fish is what the readers emphasize the most. The message also explained that the nature of catfish that likes to consume all kinds of waste in the waters makes this fish unfit for consumption. Even an article that is quite viral on the internet mentions that human waste is also used as feed for a catfish cultivation in Haikou City, China. Meanwhile in its natural habitat, catfish is also known as a very tough fish species. This fish is equipped with an additional breathing apparatus in the form of a labyrinth, so that it can survive in muddy or even polluted water conditions. These facts have led to allegations of accumulation of carcinogenic toxins (cancer causing) in the body of catfish. This fact is not entirely true and can be trusted. Dr. Dradjat R Suardi, SpB(K) Onk, a cancer expert from the Indonesian Oncology Association, explained that to prove whether catfish have cancer cells or not, research is necessary. Currently there grouping is no research that states if eating catfish can trigger cancer, he stressed. Meanwhile, most of the catfish sold and consumed in Malang City are cultivated in a catfish farming pond. Head of Fish Processing and Marketing Group at Sarangan Fish Supermarket, Malang City, Dm. Bambang S explained this. He said that when he wanted to supply fish, such as catfish and milkfish, he must supply them from a catfish farm. Although there are few ponds in Malang City, he takes supplies from ponds in the Sidoarjo area. Don't pick up the river. It must be from fresh water ponds where it is cultivated, he said. According to the data collected, the nutritional content of catfish is centered on high protein levels. Like freshwater fish in general. There has been no official research that states that catfish contain cancer cells like the information that has been spread so far.
berita_id: Tentunya penduduk Kota Malang telah mendengar atau membaca artikel tentang ikan lele yang memiliki 3000 sel kanker.Pesan dan tulisan menyatakan bahwa seteguk daging ikan lele dimakan, penduduk juga menelan 3000 sel kanker.Pesan dan penulisan juga menyatakan bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker karena ikan lele hidup dengan cara yang kotor.Alasan ikan paling kotor adalah apa yang paling ditekankan oleh pembaca.Pesan itu juga menjelaskan bahwa sifat ikan lele yang suka mengkonsumsi semua jenis limbah di perairan membuat ikan ini tidak layak untuk dikonsumsi.Bahkan sebuah artikel yang cukup viral di internet menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan untuk budidaya ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina.Sementara itu di habitat aslinya, ikan lele juga dikenal sebagai spesies ikan yang sangat keras.Ikan ini dilengkapi dengan peralatan pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin, sehingga dapat bertahan hidup dalam kondisi air berlumpur atau bahkan tercemar.Fakta -fakta ini telah menyebabkan tuduhan akumulasi racun karsinogenik (penyebab kanker) dalam tubuh ikan lele.Fakta ini tidak sepenuhnya benar dan dapat dipercaya.Dradjat R Suardi, SPB (K) Onk, seorang ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia, menjelaskan bahwa untuk membuktikan apakah ikan lele memiliki sel kanker atau tidak, diperlukan penelitian.Saat ini pengelompokan tidak ada penelitian yang menyatakan jika makan lele dapat memicu kanker, ia menekankan.Sementara itu, sebagian besar ikan lele yang dijual dan dikonsumsi di Kota Malang dibudidayakan di kolam peternakan ikan lele.Kepala Pemrosesan Ikan dan Kelompok Pemasaran di Supermarket Ikan Sarangan, Kota Malang, DM.Bambang S menjelaskan hal ini.Dia mengatakan bahwa ketika dia ingin memasok ikan, seperti ikan lele dan susu, dia harus memasok mereka dari peternakan ikan lele.Meskipun ada beberapa kolam di Kota Malang, ia mengambil persediaan dari kolam di daerah Sidoarjo.Jangan mengambil sungai.Pasti dari kolam air tawar di mana ia dibudidayakan, katanya.Menurut data yang dikumpulkan, kandungan nutrisi ikan lele berpusat pada kadar protein tinggi.Seperti ikan air tawar pada umumnya.Belum ada penelitian resmi yang menyatakan bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker seperti informasi yang telah tersebar sejauh ini.

berita: Do you believe that catfish is the dirtiest fish in the world? Believe it or not but this is the fact. Catfish are the dirtiest fish in the world, really like waste water, have a penchant for eating carrion, even in the catfish's body there are various types of parasites, really like garbage fish, right? Do you still dare to eat this type of fish? But you should avoid this type of freshwater fish. It's true, after cooking catfish, it will look very tasty and will even tempt our appetite, but before you eat it, let's take a look at the following reviews. Zhang Ri-hong, one of the catfish breeders who gave information, that this herd of catfish will be harvested about once every 3 months, and in one pond tens of thousands of catfish can be collected and marketed directly, especially to restaurants located in Haikou, province Hainan, China, as well as to several food stalls on the side of the road. Due to the large amount of news circulating from the community, local journalists tried to keep track of this situation in order to obtain information from the fishery department and from the marine of the city of Haikou who directly visited the farm site to investigate and take samples of pond water on the farm, feed and fish in the 7 catfish ponds. In fact, the Hainan fisheries department has asked farmers not angle to suspend the sale of the catfish before the relevant test results come out. On Po-Xiang Street, Haikou City, Hainan Province, there is a very simple path. When we walk about 50 meters, then in it there are 7 fish ponds that have a small size as well as a large size. Unfortunately, around the catfish pond there is a pigsty as well as a chicken coop, meanwhile in the middle of the pond there is a pile of floating garbage, which is accompanied by a very pungent smell. And in the pond, a flock of scattered catfish swam back and forth with agility in the middle of the pond. The catfish pond has been around for decades, the feces from the farmer's toilet and chicken and pig manure are immediately dumped into the pond. Well, after you see the explanation above, and you see a number of the pictures above, surely you will feel that you have seen such a sight. This scene is one of the news that has been widely circulated among the public, and the environment of catfish being cultivated is truly disgusting.
berita_id: Apakah Anda percaya bahwa ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di dunia?Percaya atau tidak tapi ini faktanya.Lele adalah ikan paling kotor di dunia, benar -benar seperti air limbah, memiliki kecenderungan makan bangkai, bahkan di tubuh lele itu ada berbagai jenis parasit, benar -benar seperti ikan sampah, bukan?Apakah Anda masih berani makan jenis ikan ini?Tetapi Anda harus menghindari jenis ikan air tawar ini.Memang benar, setelah memasak ikan lele, itu akan terlihat sangat lezat dan bahkan akan menggoda nafsu makan kita, tetapi sebelum Anda memakannya, mari kita lihat ulasan berikut.Zhang Ri-hong, salah satu peternak lele yang memberikan informasi, bahwa kawanan ikan lele ini akan dipanen sekitar setiap 3 bulan sekali, dan dalam satu kolam puluhan ribu ikan lele dapat dikumpulkan dan dipasarkan secara langsung, terutama ke restoran yang terletak di haikou, Provinsi Hainan, Cina, serta ke beberapa tempat makanan di sisi jalan.Karena sejumlah besar berita yang beredar dari masyarakat, jurnalis lokal mencoba melacak situasi ini untuk mendapatkan informasi dari departemen perikanan dan dari laut kota Haikou yang secara langsung mengunjungi lokasi pertanian untuk menyelidiki dan mengambil sampel air kolam di pertanian, memberi makan dan ikan di 7 kolam ikan lele.Faktanya, Departemen Perikanan Hainan telah meminta petani untuk tidak menangguhkan penjualan ikan lele sebelum hasil tes yang relevan keluar.Di Po-Xiang Street, Haikou City, Provinsi Hainan, ada jalan yang sangat sederhana.Ketika kami berjalan sekitar 50 meter, maka ada 7 kolam ikan yang memiliki ukuran kecil serta ukuran besar.Sayangnya, di sekitar kolam ikan lele ada babi dan juga kandang ayam, sementara di tengah kolam ada tumpukan sampah mengambang, yang disertai dengan aroma yang sangat pedas.Dan di kolam, kawanan ikan lele yang tersebar berenang bolak -balik dengan kelincahan di tengah kolam.Kolam ikan lele telah ada selama beberapa dekade, kotoran dari toilet petani dan kotoran ayam dan babi segera dibuang ke kolam.Nah, setelah Anda melihat penjelasan di atas, dan Anda melihat sejumlah gambar di atas, tentunya Anda akan merasa bahwa Anda telah melihat pemandangan seperti itu.Adegan ini adalah salah satu berita yang telah diedarkan secara luas di antara masyarakat, dan lingkungan ikan lele yang dibudidayakan benar -benar menjijikkan.

berita: Photos of participants of Action 212 Volume Two circulated on social media who could not enter the Istiqlal Mosque this morning because the mosque doors were closed. According to the mosque management, the rumors circulating are not true. "It's a thousand percent hoax," said the Head of the Protocol Section of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam to Republika.co.id Tuesday (21/2) morning. He explained, the rules at the Istiqlal Mosque other than the month of Ramadan, the mosque closes at 21.30 photo WIB. Opened again one hour before Fajr time. In the month of Ramadan, the mosque is open 24 hours. He said, for last night's case, there were indeed five bus participants who came from East Java. They claimed to come from Madura.
