Participants enter the mosque after Isha time. The mosque provides opportunities for worship and cleaning. "After approaching 10 (at night), we met with the head of his entourage, we announced to his entourage that the rules at Istiqlal, this mosque will be closed and will be opened again one hour before Fajr," he said. Abu explained, the group from East Java understood and understood. The mosque management waited for them to leave the Istiqlal Mosque voluntarily. Then at 03.40 WIB the mosque was reopened "And what's in the photo, it looks like people are queuing up to enter, it's the Wali Songo pilgrimage group and school children, that's normal, they go to Istiqlal every day," he explained. He emphasized that in conclusion, the news circulating on Instagram, Twitter and other social media was a lie.
berita_id: Foto -foto peserta aksi 212 Volume Dua beredar di media sosial yang tidak bisa memasuki masjid Istiqlal pagi ini karena pintu masjid ditutup.Menurut manajemen masjid, rumor yang beredar tidak benar."Ini adalah tipuan seribu persen," kata kepala bagian protokol dari masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam ke Republika.co.id Selasa (21/2) pagi.Dia menjelaskan, aturan di Masjid Istiqlal selain bulan Ramadhan, masjid ditutup pada 21.30 foto WIB.Dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum waktu Fajr.Di bulan Ramadhan, masjid buka 24 jam.Dia mengatakan, untuk kasus tadi malam, memang ada lima peserta bus yang datang dari Jawa Timur.Mereka mengaku datang dari Madura.Peserta memasuki masjid setelah waktu Isha.Masjid ini memberikan kesempatan untuk beribadah dan membersihkan."Setelah mendekati 10 (di malam hari), kami bertemu dengan kepala rombongannya, kami mengumumkan kepada rombongannya bahwa aturan di ISTIQLAL, masjid ini akan ditutup dan akan dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum Fajr," katanya.Abu menjelaskan, kelompok dari Jawa Timur memahami dan memahami.Manajemen masjid menunggu mereka meninggalkan masjid Istiqlal secara sukarela.Kemudian pada pukul 03.40 dengan masjid dibuka kembali "dan apa yang ada di foto, sepertinya orang -orang mengantri untuk masuk, itu adalah kelompok ziarah Wali Songo dan anak -anak sekolah, itu normal, mereka pergi ke Istiqlal setiap hari," jelasnya.Dia menekankan bahwa sebagai kesimpulan, berita yang beredar di Instagram, Twitter dan media sosial lainnya adalah kebohongan.

berita: Here's a photo of the easily curved iPhone 6 circulating on the Internet. As quoted from Mashable, Wednesday (24/9/2014), a member of the MacRumors forum shared a photo of his curved iPhone 6 Plus. Hanzon, the member's name, admitted that he kept the iPhone 6 Plus in his front trouser pocket while driving. After a few hours of pocketing, Hanzon found the iPhone 6 had changed shape, the center was slightly curved. A similar case was also reported by a member of the MacRumors forum, DevinPitcher. He said that his colleague's iPhone 6 Plus also curved after being pocketed in the front pocket of his pants. A photo of the curved iPhone 6 was also posted by Devin in a thread. A post on the picture French forum, MacBidouille, also reported a similar case. Members of this forum also included a photo of a colleague's iPhone 6 that was bent just because it was placed in the front pocket of his pants. This crooked case is not the first to happen. Earlier this year, several iPhone 5S owners reported that their phones were curved even though they weren't impacted and also didn't sit in their back pockets or sit down. Meanwhile, in 2012, several iPhone 5 users claimed to experience such cases on their devices.
berita_id: Berikut adalah foto iPhone 6 yang mudah melengkung yang beredar di internet.Seperti dikutip dari Mashable, Rabu (24/9/2014), seorang anggota Forum Macrumors membagikan foto iPhone 6 Plus yang melengkung.Hanzon, nama anggota, mengakui bahwa ia menyimpan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana depannya saat mengemudi.Setelah beberapa jam mengantongi, Hanzon menemukan iPhone 6 telah berubah bentuk, pusatnya sedikit melengkung.Kasus serupa juga dilaporkan oleh anggota Forum Macrumors, Devinpitcher.Dia mengatakan bahwa iPhone 6 Plus rekannya juga melengkung setelah dikenakan di saku depan celananya.Foto iPhone 6 melengkung juga diposting oleh Devin di utas.Sebuah posting di Forum Prancis Picture, MacBidouille, juga melaporkan kasus serupa.Anggota forum ini juga menyertakan foto iPhone 6 kolega yang ditekuk hanya karena ditempatkan di saku depan celananya.Kasus bengkok ini bukan yang pertama terjadi.Awal tahun ini, beberapa pemilik iPhone 5S melaporkan bahwa ponsel mereka melengkung meskipun mereka tidak terpengaruh dan juga tidak duduk di saku belakang atau duduk.Sementara itu, pada tahun 2012, beberapa pengguna iPhone 5 mengklaim mengalami kasus seperti itu di perangkat mereka.

berita: Catfish is one type of fish that contains a lot of animal protein. Pecel catfish is one of the favorite food menus for many people because the price is quite cheap and delicious. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is it called the dirtiest fish? The following is an explanation: Catfish live in very dirty ponds and are usually surrounded by chicken or pig coops. For those of you who are catfish fans, not all catfish live or are bred in ponds around which there is a chicken coop or a pigsty. In Indonesia, many also keep catfish in ordinary ponds. But why is it called the dirtiest fish, maybe because most catfish farmers feed their livestock with feed that isaac mayer wise comes from anything dirty including chicken carcasses etc. According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he has supplied a lot of catfish that he harvests every 3 months to markets and roadside restaurants in Hainan province, to be precise in Haikou. Frequent complaints from the community, a reporter from the local fisheries department investigated the fish. The reporters took samples from the 7 ponds that housed the catfish. It turned out that the seven ponds were all surrounded by chicken and pig coops, while in the middle of the ponds there were many piles of garbage. According to Islamic jurisprudence, eating catfish is halal. But sometimes many catfish breeders in Indonesia keep catfish in ponds and are fed with manure. If the condition is like that, then the catfish becomes like a jallalah animal, that is, an animal that eats dirty and unclean food so that it is unlawful to eat it. In order to become halal again, catfish must be quarantined or separated from dirty places and given clean food. Minimum quarantine time is 3 days. danger lurks you if you consume catfish, one mouthful of catfish contains 3000 cancer cells. Catfish is a type of fish that consumes waste. Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty ponds, this fish can also consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pig manure, even this fish can also consume human waste. Some time ago, news about the dangers of consuming fried catfish circulated. Reportedly, a doctor once admitted that he often had patients with swollen and infected thyroid disease, with symptoms: swelling of the lower neck, swelling around the neck that looked like a tumor, the eyeballs felt like they were about to come out, heat around the neck, frequent coughing in the middle of the night. without cause. After being asked, it turns out that all the patients often eat catfish and fried eel. This also happened to the catfish skipper in Yogyakarta, his father, wife and child experienced the symptoms as above. When the doctor asked one of the professors at Pluit, it turned out that the catfish contains a mild poison, so that if it is fried, the clean oil will turn black. So it is possible that in the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. Friends for those of you who are catfish fans, even though catfish is halal and not too worrying as a wise consumer you must and remain careful. You also don't know when you buy catfish in the market or in a food stall, is it quarantined before frying the fish or not? If you are in doubt, don't eat it. Or if you are sure of its cleanliness, please consume it. However, it is recommended not to use large amounts on a regular basis.
berita_id: Lele adalah salah satu jenis ikan yang mengandung banyak protein hewani.Pecel Catfish adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit bagi banyak orang karena harganya cukup murah dan lezat.Meskipun lezat dan murah, ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Mengapa disebut ikan paling kotor?Berikut ini adalah penjelasan: ikan lele hidup di kolam yang sangat kotor dan biasanya dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam atau babi.Bagi Anda yang merupakan penggemar lele, tidak semua ikan lele hidup atau dibiakkan di kolam di sekitar yang ada kandang ayam atau babi.Di Indonesia, banyak yang juga menyimpan ikan lele di kolam biasa.Tetapi mengapa itu disebut ikan paling kotor, mungkin karena sebagian besar petani lele memberi makan ternak mereka dengan pakan bahwa Isaac Mayer Wise berasal dari apa pun yang kotor termasuk bangkai ayam dll. Menurut seorang petani lele dari China yang bernama Zhang Ri-hong mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele yang akan diproversi oleh Haiku.Keluhan yang sering dari masyarakat, seorang reporter dari departemen perikanan setempat menyelidiki ikan tersebut.Para wartawan mengambil sampel dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Ternyata ketujuh kolam semuanya dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sementara di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Menurut yurisprudensi Islam, makan lele adalah halal.Tetapi kadang -kadang banyak peternak lele di Indonesia menyimpan ikan lele di kolam dan diberi makan dengan pupuk kandang.Jika kondisinya seperti itu, maka ikan lele menjadi seperti binatang jallalah, yaitu hewan yang memakan makanan kotor dan najis sehingga tidak sah untuk memakannya.Untuk menjadi halal lagi, ikan lele harus dikarantina atau dipisahkan dari tempat -tempat kotor dan diberi makanan bersih.Waktu karantina minimum adalah 3 hari.Bahaya mengintai Anda jika Anda mengonsumsi ikan lele, satu seteguk ikan lele berisi 3000 sel kanker.Lele adalah jenis ikan yang mengonsumsi limbah.Lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di kolam kotor, ikan ini juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi, dan pupuk babi, bahkan ikan ini juga dapat mengkonsumsi limbah manusia.Beberapa waktu yang lalu, berita tentang bahaya mengonsumsi ikan lele goreng yang beredar.Dilaporkan, seorang dokter pernah mengakui bahwa ia sering menderita pasien dengan penyakit tiroid yang bengkak dan terinfeksi, dengan gejala: pembengkakan leher bawah, pembengkakan di sekitar leher yang tampak seperti tumor, bola mata terasa seperti akan keluar, memanaskan di sekitar leher, sering batuk di tengah malam.tanpa sebab.Setelah ditanya, ternyata semua pasien sering makan lele dan belut goreng.Ini juga terjadi pada kapten lele di Yogyakarta, ayah, istri dan anaknya mengalami gejala seperti di atas.Ketika dokter bertanya kepada salah satu profesor di Pluit, ternyata ikan lele berisi racun ringan, sehingga jika digoreng, minyak bersih akan berubah menjadi hitam.Jadi ada kemungkinan bahwa dalam tubuh ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang sangat berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Teman -teman untuk Anda yang penggemar lele, meskipun ikan lele itu halal dan tidak terlalu mengkhawatirkan sebagai konsumen yang bijak, Anda harus dan tetap berhati -hati.Anda juga tidak tahu kapan Anda membeli ikan lele di pasar atau di warung makanan, apakah itu dikarantina sebelum menggoreng ikan atau tidak?Jika Anda ragu, jangan memakannya.Atau jika Anda yakin akan kebersihannya, silakan konsumsinya.Namun, disarankan untuk tidak menggunakan jumlah besar secara teratur.

berita: The reog ponorogo art community in Jabodetabek, Monday (2/11) met with Indonesian Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemenlu) officials to ask about the burning of reog instruments at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao City, Philippines. Director of Information and Media at the Indonesian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Siti Sofia Sudarma, said that as many as six reog Ponorogo administrators met with her party to express their disappointment regarding the burning. During the meeting, the community also said that the burning hurt the feelings of the Reog Ponorogo community and was a form of destruction of cultural assets that became Indonesian cultural heritage. “They also gave a letter to the Foreign Minister and asked the Foreign Ministry to clarify this case, starting from the chronology, motive, to the perpetrators. We accommodate all their concerns and will convey the letter to the Minister of Foreign Affairs (Retno Marsudi)," he told Republika.co.id, Tuesday (3/11). Siti admitted that she had actually clear up clarified to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City by telephone. The Consul General, he said, admitted that he had committed the arson. He added that the burning had to be carried out because the 30-year-old art instrument was damaged and eaten by termites. When Siti said the reason, one of the community members who donated the equipment to the Consulate General denied it. Members of the community said the equipment was made in 2007 and was judged not to be too fragile. Siti in the near future will send a team to review directly to the field. This step also clarifies the burning of reog equipment. "We don't know when the team will go there, but what is clear is as soon as possible. We are just waiting for orders from the leadership," he said.
berita_id: Komunitas seni Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang di Jabodetabek, Senin (2/11) bertemu dengan para pejabat Kementerian Luar Negeri Indonesia (Kemenlu) untuk bertanya tentang pembakaran instrumen reog di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) di Kota Davao, Filipina.Direktur Informasi dan Media di Kementerian Luar Negeri Indonesia, Siti Sofia Sudarma, mengatakan bahwa sebanyak enam administrator Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang bertemu dengan partainya untuk mengungkapkan kekecewaan mereka mengenai pembakaran.Selama pertemuan itu, masyarakat juga mengatakan bahwa pembakaran melukai perasaan komunitas Ponorogo yang reog dan merupakan bentuk penghancuran aset budaya yang menjadi warisan budaya Indonesia."Mereka juga memberikan surat kepada Menteri Luar Negeri dan meminta Kementerian Luar Negeri untuk mengklarifikasi kasus ini, mulai dari kronologi, motif, kepada para pelaku. Kami mengakomodasi semua keprihatinan mereka dan akan menyampaikan surat itu kepada Menteri Luar Negeri (Retno Marsudi)," katanya kepada Republika.co.id, Selasa (3/11).Siti mengakui bahwa dia benar -benar telah membersihkan yang diklarifikasi kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Kota Davao melalui telepon.Konsul Jenderal, katanya, mengakui bahwa dia telah melakukan pembakaran.Dia menambahkan bahwa pembakaran harus dilakukan karena instrumen seni berusia 30 tahun rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Ketika Siti mengatakan alasannya, salah satu anggota masyarakat yang menyumbangkan peralatan kepada Konsulat Jenderal membantahnya.Anggota masyarakat mengatakan peralatan itu dibuat pada tahun 2007 dan dinilai tidak terlalu rapuh.Siti dalam waktu dekat akan mengirim tim untuk ditinjau langsung ke lapangan.Langkah ini juga mengklarifikasi pembakaran peralatan reog."Kami tidak tahu kapan tim akan pergi ke sana, tetapi yang jelas adalah sesegera mungkin. Kami hanya menunggu perintah dari kepemimpinan," katanya.

berita: Thousands of Masses who will take part in the 212 Action, from various areas are detained in front of the courtyard Central Jakarta Istiqlal Mosque. Our monitoring Tuesday at 04.00. Wib seen dozens of parked inter-city buses on the edge of the bull field in front of the Istiqlal mosque fence that lowers thousands of participants of Action 212 felt strange because they were not allowed to enter the mosque even though they will perform the dawn prayer. One of the participants of Action 212 from Madura named Solihin, we had an interview " We all here as Muslims feel intimidated, prohibited from worshiping in the mosque subtly with the lock on the gate of the mosque, the mosque is the house of Allah so we are As a devout Muslim, you must carry out worship, try to think about the mosque in Indonesia In empty we have to pray in front of the gate, it doesn't make sense," said Solihin to us in a high pitched voice. The 212 Islamic Defense Action Volume 2 will be held at the dawn prayer, estimated at around 50,000 masses or even more. Polda Metro Jaya has given permission for the 212 Action boundary today starting at 07.00 until 18.00.Wib, thousands of Police and TNI personnel were deployed to secure this action.
berita_id: Ribuan massa yang akan mengambil bagian dalam aksi 212, dari berbagai daerah ditahan di depan masjid Jakarta Istiqlal pusat halaman.Pemantauan kami Selasa pukul 04.00.WIB melihat lusinan bus antar-kota yang diparkir di tepi lapangan banteng di depan pagar masjid Istiqlal yang menurunkan ribuan peserta aksi 212 terasa aneh karena mereka tidak diizinkan memasuki masjid meskipun mereka akan melakukan doa fajar.One of the participants of Action 212 from Madura named Solihin, we had an interview " We all here as Muslims feel intimidated, prohibited from worshiping in the mosque subtly with the lock on the gate of the mosque, the mosque is the house of Allah so we are As a devout Muslim, you must carry out worship, try to think about the mosque in Indonesia In empty we have to pray in front of the gate, it doesn't make sense,"kata Solihin kepada kami dengan suara bernada tinggi.212 Volume Aksi Pertahanan Islam 2 akan diadakan di Dawn Prayer, diperkirakan sekitar 50.000 massa atau bahkan lebih.Polda Metro Jaya telah memberikan izin untuk batas aksi 212 hari ini mulai pukul 07.00 hingga 18.00.Wib, ribuan polisi dan personel TNI dikerahkan untuk mengamankan tindakan ini.

berita: Social media in enounce Indonesia, especially Twitter, is currently being flooded a call to uninstall the Traveloka application. According to netizens, the CTO who is also one of the founders of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, said to support the walk out DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan is giving a speech at Canisius College school anniversary event. The news angered the netizens who said Derianto did not respect Anies and decided to many people uninstall the Traveloka application from their smart phones. I don't know where this information originally circulated, because it turned out to be just a hoax. Traveloka has confirmed that Derianto was not present at the event 90th anniversary of Canisius last Saturday (11/11). Is known, Derianto was invited to attend the event because he received an award as one of the outstanding alumni of Canisius. However, he was unable to attend because he was doing a business trip that had been planned several months in advance," write Traveloka's official statement. This means what is being rumored on social media about support Derianto about the walk out action is not true. Regarding the details of the action, according to the official statement of Colossians Canisius, conveyed that when Anies gave a speech, one of the alumni who is also a famous pianist Ananda Sukarlan decided to get up from his VIP seat and walk out. This action was then followed by hundreds of alumni and other invited guests who attended. After Anies finished giving his speech and left the place, the people who walked out earlier re-entered the room. Ananda Sukarlan himself became another alumnus who received the award in this event because they are considered outstanding in the field of music. This is evidence for the umpteenth time that hoaxes have succeeded affect the wider community in a short time. Without correct facts and information, people still easy to believe what is trending topic in social media without searching for the truth first.
berita_id: Media sosial di Enounce Indonesia, terutama Twitter, saat ini dibanjiri panggilan untuk menghapus aplikasi Traveloka.Menurut Netizens, CTO yang juga merupakan salah satu pendiri Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, yang dikatakan mendukung Walk Out Out DKI Jakarta Gubernur Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato di acara ulang tahun Sekolah Canisius College.Berita itu membuat marah para netizen yang mengatakan DeRianto tidak menghormati anies dan memutuskan untuk banyak orang menghapus aplikasi Traveloka dari ponsel pintar mereka.Saya tidak tahu di mana informasi ini awalnya beredar, karena ternyata hanya tipuan.Traveloka telah mengkonfirmasi bahwa DeRianto tidak hadir di acara 90th Anniversary of Canisius Sabtu lalu (11/11).Dikenal, Derianto diundang untuk menghadiri acara tersebut karena ia menerima penghargaan sebagai salah satu alumni Canisius yang luar biasa.Namun, dia tidak dapat hadir karena dia melakukan perjalanan bisnis yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya, "Tulis pernyataan resmi Traveloka. Ini berarti apa yang dikabarkan pada media sosial tentang dukungan Deriianto tentang tindakan berjalan itu tidak benar. Mengenai rincian aksi, menurut Pernyataan Resmi dari Kolose Canisius, yang menyampaikan bahwa ketika Anies memberikan pidato, salah satu alumni yang ada di Kolose, siapa yang disampaikan bahwa Anies, ketika Anies memberikan pidato, salah satu alumia, siapa yang disampaikan oleh Anies.Kursi dan berjalan.Informasi, orang masih mudah dipercayai apa itu topik tren di media sosial tanpa mencari kebenaran terlebih dahulu.

berita: The Pokemon Go game, which is currently a new craze in the community, has made the players forget the time. If you look, the most lovers of this game are young people. In some crowds you will see some young people pressing their smart phones, occasionally they also seem to run around as if chasing something. Read more at DIY Deputy Governor Asking Parents to Watch Pokemon Go Games The slanted news that has been circulating about the Pokemon Go game has also spread in several social media, the rumor states that the game released by Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, and also Niantic Labs contains various invitations that cannot be tolerated by Islam. Because of the many rumors circulating on social media that Pokemon Go actually has its own meaning that is less fun. "In Syriac or Syriac this Pokemon means I am Jewish, while the Pokemon named Pikachu means "Be a Jew". While Charmander also demonstrate has its own meaning, namely "God is Weak". That's one of the rumors circulating on social media so far about the meaning of words in Pokemon (both animation and games). The rumor has even become a very heated debate on social media, because many people have their own opinions. There are those who have the opinion that it is just something that is linked, and not a few who really believe in the existence of these rumors. Because those who believe in these rumors feel that there is truth present in these rumors. Read also National Police Chief: Police Members Are Prohibited from Playing Pokemon Go While Working Until now the issue is still a big question mark, the Los Angeles Times in its article on April 24, 2011 also reviewed about this Pokemon. In the news, it was stated that at that time countries such as Qatar, Oman, Dubai, Jordan, Egypt and Saudi Arabia also circulated a lot about this Pokemon Go rumor. Many connotations emerged that the game was promoting anti-Islamic behavior and then believing in Judaism. This then made everyone in the country restless, and the things that were reported were also later denied by the Pokemon party. But the leaders of the country still can't take it for granted if Pokemon Go enters their country. The rumors continue to appear in Arab countries with cultural assimilation in the midst of ongoing concerns, but there is no solid evidence for the rumors circulating at the time, Jordan's Amman newspaper said in a statement. While the Syriac Orthodox Christian Church has denied the allegations, because in the ancient Syriac language the meaning of the word Pokemon has no meaning to insult Islam. Meanwhile, church officials were also very surprised by the arrival of a letter stating that Pokemon contained an invitation from the Jews. Let's wait for the truth of the rumors. But what is certain is that Pokemon Go has been loved by people all over the world. Pokemon Go, which is based on Augmented Reality (AR), always creates a stir, the positive side of this game is that it can make people like exercising and even heal people from depression. Read more on Pokemon GO Turns Out Good For People With Mental Disorders Even so, Pokemon Go also brings a lot of disadvantages for those of you who can't manage yourself because of the fun of playing this game. Read more in Apart from getting people fired, this is the negative impact of playing Pokemon Go
berita_id: Game Pokemon Go, yang saat ini merupakan kegemaran baru di komunitas, telah membuat para pemain melupakan waktu.Jika Anda melihat, paling pecinta dari game ini adalah orang -orang muda.Di beberapa orang banyak Anda akan melihat beberapa orang muda menekan ponsel pintar mereka, kadang -kadang mereka juga tampaknya berlarian seolah mengejar sesuatu.Baca lebih lanjut di Deputi Gubernur DIY yang meminta orang tua untuk menonton Pokemon Go Games berita miring yang telah beredar tentang game Pokemon Go juga telah menyebar di beberapa media sosial, rumor menyatakan bahwa permainan yang dirilis oleh Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, dan juga Niantic Labs berisi berbagai undangan yang tidak dapat ditoleransi oleh Islam.Karena banyak rumor yang beredar di media sosial bahwa Pokemon Go sebenarnya memiliki maknanya sendiri yang kurang menyenangkan."Di Syria atau Syria Pokemon ini berarti saya orang Yahudi, sementara Pokemon bernama Pikachu berarti" Jadilah seorang Yahudi ". Sementara Charmander juga menunjukkan maknanya sendiri, yaitu" Tuhan itu lemah ". Itu salah satu rumor yang beredar di media sosial yang ada di sana telah menjadi makna kata -kata dalam pokemon (baik animasi maupun permainan). Rumor yang ada di sana telah menjadi yang telah menjadi panasnya.Pendapat bahwa itu adalah sesuatu yang terkait, dan tidak sedikit yang benar -benar percaya pada keberadaan rumor ini.Qatar, Oman, Dubai, Jordan, Mesir dan Arab Saudi juga beredar tentang rumor Pokemon Go ini.Rumor terus muncul di negara -negara Arab dengan asimilasi budaya di tengah -tengah kekhawatiran yang sedang berlangsung, tetapi tidak ada bukti kuat untuk rumor yang beredar pada saat itu, surat kabar Amman Jordan mengatakan dalam sebuah pernyataan.Surat yang menyatakan bahwa Pokemon berisi undangan dari orang -orang Yahudi.Juga membawa banyak kelemahan bagi Anda yang tidak dapat mengatur diri sendiri karena kesenangan bermain game ini.

berita: Recently, there has been information that has been troubling the public, namely the issue of using sea urchins for the production of toothbrushes. On social media recently someone uploaded a photo of a toothbrush packaging. The presence of the words "bristle" on the toothbrush packaging made social media users feel restless. Because, the word "bristle" is defined as sea urchin. The Indonesian people, who are predominantly Muslims, are certainly worried about this issue, because pork is considered unclean and unclean. Using boar bristles to brush teeth is of course considered to have violated religious rules. So what is the attitude of the Indonesian Ulema Council (MUI)? Is it true that the attitude of the teeth in the packaging that reads "bristle" is haram? Reporting from the halalmui.org site, it is stated that the lexical meaning of bristle is a short, stiff hair, fiber, etc (Webster's Dictionary). So all the hair, the stiff fiber, then the term will be referred to as bristle. Hair, stiff beard, can be categorized as bristle. Another example is the stiff fibers or pine leaves can also be referred to as bristle. MUI considers that not everything labeled bristle must come from sea urchins, because the scope of the meaning of the word is indeed so broad. The MUI official website also explains that in the industrial world, bristle is indeed used as a material for making brushes or brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle can be sourced from animal hair or plant fibers or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. The animal hair used can be sourced from pigs, goats, horses, or camels. The plant fiber that has also been used as a brush or brush material is palm fiber. Nylon is also a synthetic fiber that is commonly used for brushes, brushes or toothbrushes. The MUI explained that, if the ingredients used were confirmed from pigs, it would absolutely be haram. Because any material that comes from pork is both haram and unclean, either in dry or wet form. MUI continues to explain that the problem is that not all brush or brush or toothbrush users are able to recognize whether the brush they are using is a brush or a brush made from pig bristles. One of the information that can be seen as a marker that a brush or brush comes from sea urchins is that it is written as the name of the product, for example “Boar Bristle Brush”. An example presented by MUI is a product sold on the Amazon online store. If a product offered is made from sea urchins, the manufacturer will usually list “Fuchs Toothbrushes Pure Natural (Boar) Bristle Record V Adult Soft (Pack of 5)-Assorted colors by Fuchs Toothbrushes” Boar is the English term for wild boar or wild boar. This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles. MUI closes its explanation by stating that brushes, brushes, or toothbrushes are not always made of pork even though they have bristle written on them, because the term bristle is still general in nature. There are several manufacturers who have used goat hair or camel or horse hair as brush material or made of nylon. The last group of materials is clearly acceptable. slob An information compiled from the halalcorner.id page states that if you look back at the history and development of toothbrushes, the bristles found on toothbrushes originally came from wild boar bristles (Siberian). However, along with the development of technology, in 1938 toothbrushes were produced with nylon bristles which still dominate today. However, it is undeniable that there are still around 10% worldwide of toothbrush products whose bristles come from pig bristles. Then the page gives advice if you want to make sure whether the toothbrush is made of pig bristles or something else, you should look for information on the official website of the toothbrush manufacturer, or even ask directly to the customer service center.
berita_id: Baru -baru ini, ada informasi yang telah meresahkan publik, yaitu masalah menggunakan landak laut untuk produksi sikat gigi.Di media sosial baru -baru ini seseorang mengunggah foto kemasan sikat gigi.Kehadiran kata -kata "bulu" pada kemasan sikat gigi membuat pengguna media sosial merasa gelisah.Karena, kata "bulu" didefinisikan sebagai landak laut.Orang -orang Indonesia, yang sebagian besar adalah Muslim, tentu saja khawatir tentang masalah ini, karena babi dianggap najis dan najis.Menggunakan bulu babi untuk menyikat gigi tentu saja dianggap telah melanggar aturan agama.Jadi apa sikap Dewan Ulama Indonesia (MUI)?Benarkah sikap gigi dalam kemasan yang bertuliskan "bristle" adalah haram?Melaporkan dari situs halalmui.org, dinyatakan bahwa makna leksikal dari bulu adalah rambut pendek, kaku, serat, dll (Kamus Webster).Jadi semua rambut, serat kaku, maka istilah ini akan disebut sebagai bulu.Rambut, jenggot kaku, dapat dikategorikan sebagai bulu.Contoh lain adalah serat kaku atau daun pinus juga dapat disebut sebagai bulu.MUI menganggap bahwa tidak semuanya berlabel bulu harus berasal dari bulu babi, karena ruang lingkup makna kata itu memang begitu luas.Situs web resmi MUI juga menjelaskan bahwa di dunia industri, Bristle memang digunakan sebagai bahan untuk membuat kuas atau sikat, termasuk sikat gigi.BRISTLE dapat bersumber dari rambut hewani atau serat tanaman atau serat sintetis seperti nilon dan silikon.Rambut hewan yang digunakan dapat bersumber dari babi, kambing, kuda, atau unta.Serat tanaman yang juga telah digunakan sebagai sikat atau bahan sikat adalah serat kelapa sawit.Nylon juga merupakan serat sintetis yang biasanya digunakan untuk kuas, sikat atau sikat gigi.MUI menjelaskan bahwa, jika bahan yang digunakan dikonfirmasi dari babi, itu benar -benar Haram.Karena bahan apa pun yang berasal dari daging babi adalah haram dan najis, baik dalam bentuk kering atau basah.MUI terus menjelaskan bahwa masalahnya adalah tidak semua sikat atau sikat atau sikat gigi dapat mengenali apakah kuas yang mereka gunakan adalah kuas atau kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Salah satu informasi yang dapat dilihat sebagai penanda bahwa kuas atau kuas berasal dari landak laut adalah bahwa itu ditulis sebagai nama produk, misalnya "Boar Bristle Brush".Contoh yang disajikan oleh MUI adalah produk yang dijual di toko online Amazon.Jika produk yang ditawarkan terbuat dari landak laut, produsen biasanya akan mendaftarkan "sikat gigi fuchs murni alami (babi). Catatan V Adult Soft (Paket 5) Warna yang Dibuat oleh Fuchs Toothbrushes" Boar adalah istilah babi Inggris untuk babi hutan atau babi liar.Ini berarti bahwa produk adalah kuas yang menggunakan bulu babi liar.MUI menutup penjelasannya dengan menyatakan bahwa kuas, sikat, atau sikat gigi tidak selalu terbuat dari daging babi meskipun mereka memiliki bulu yang tertulis di atasnya, karena istilah bulu masih bersifat umum.Ada beberapa produsen yang menggunakan rambut kambing atau unta atau rambut kuda sebagai bahan sikat atau terbuat dari nilon.Kelompok material terakhir jelas dapat diterima.Slob sebuah informasi yang disusun dari halaman halalcorner.ID menyatakan bahwa jika Anda melihat kembali sejarah dan pengembangan sikat gigi, bulu yang ditemukan pada sikat gigi yang awalnya berasal dari bulu babi liar (Siberia).Namun, seiring dengan pengembangan teknologi, pada tahun 1938 sikat gigi diproduksi dengan bulu nilon yang masih mendominasi sampai sekarang.Namun, tidak dapat dipungkiri bahwa masih ada sekitar 10% di seluruh dunia dari produk sikat gigi yang bulunya berasal dari bulu babi.Kemudian halaman memberikan saran jika Anda ingin memastikan apakah sikat gigi terbuat dari bulu babi atau yang lainnya, Anda harus mencari informasi di situs web resmi produsen sikat gigi, atau bahkan bertanya langsung ke pusat layanan pelanggan.

berita: Social medical activists (netizens) suspect that the riot at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters Detention Center Kelapa Dua, Depok, was just a fabrication with a specific purpose. This suspicion arose because it was judged that there were several irregularities in the incident. "The location of the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters: there are at least 4 irregularities. 1. There is a Tawheed Flag, 2. There are cellphones, 3. Riots or selfies, 4. Most of them cover their faces," tweeted the owner of the @Cinaisasi account as quoted by dailyumum.com, Sunday (12/02/2020). 11/2017). More extreme suspicions were conveyed by the owner of the @localhost911 account. The account owner said this; "Yes Mako Brimob Deliberately Diverted the Issue.. So that AHOK Sipenista Al-Qur'an can be transferred for security reasons, so Ahok can be under house arrest. Why are riots made up. Take selfies with all these terrorists. Hey, Muslims, don't be fooled by their plays". Another suspicion was based on the fact that the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters was one of the most closed locations in Indonesia, so that not just anyone could enter there, including journalists. However, related to the incident, the video when the riots occurred, was able to spread widely. Suspicion related to this was revealed by the account owner @mang_ulibdg. He said; "Then can the video be widely spread? "It should be suspected that there was engineering to divert issues," greeted the account owner @ArekBoyo45, responding to @mang_ulibdg's tweet. As is known, on Friday (10/11/2017) afternoon the Brimob Mako Prison was in chaos. According to information circulating on social media, the riot broke out because the warden and the Densus 88 officers who were on duty threw away and trampled on the Qur'an and books belonging to detainees for terrorism crimes. There were no casualties in the incident, but a number of prison facilities, including windows, were damaged. However, the Karo Penmas of the Public Relations Division of the Police Headquarters, Brigadier General Pol Rikwanto, denied that the cause of the rioting was inappropriate actions against the Qur'an. He said the riots occurred because there were prisoners in terrorism cases who did not accept that their detainee detention rooms were searched and provoked. "It is not true that there was throwing of the Qur'an," he said. Along with the spread of information about the rioting case, a number of photos were also circulated on social media, some of which showed a group of people taking pictures with some of them wearing face coverings and unfurling the Tawhid flag.
berita_id: Aktivis Medis Sosial (Netizens) mencurigai bahwa kerusuhan di pusat penahanan markas Brigade Mobile Kelapa Dua, Depok, hanyalah sebuah fabrikasi dengan tujuan tertentu.Kecurigaan ini muncul karena dinilai bahwa ada beberapa penyimpangan dalam insiden itu."Lokasi Markas Komando Brigade Seluler: Ada setidaknya 4 penyimpangan. 1. Ada bendera tawheed, 2. Ada ponsel, 3. Kerusuhan atau selfie, 4. Sebagian besar dari mereka menutupi wajah mereka," tweet dari akun @cinaisi seperti yang dikutip oleh Dailyumum.com, Minggu (12/02/20).11/2017).Kecurigaan yang lebih ekstrem disampaikan oleh pemilik akun @localhost911.Pemilik akun mengatakan ini;"Ya, Mako, Brimob dengan sengaja mengalihkan masalah ini .. sehingga Ahok Sipenista al-Qur'an dapat ditransfer karena alasan keamanan, sehingga Ahok dapat ditahan di rumah. Mengapa kerusuhan dibuat-buat. Ambil selfie dengan semua teroris ini. Hei, Muslim, jangan tertipu oleh permainan mereka".Kecurigaan lain didasarkan pada fakta bahwa markas komando brigade seluler adalah salah satu lokasi paling tertutup di Indonesia, sehingga tidak sembarang orang bisa masuk ke sana, termasuk jurnalis.Namun, terkait dengan insiden itu, video ketika kerusuhan terjadi, mampu menyebar secara luas.Kecurigaan yang terkait dengan ini diungkapkan oleh pemilik akun @mang_ulibdg.Dia berkata;"Lalu dapatkah video itu tersebar luas?" Harus dicurigai bahwa ada teknik untuk mengalihkan masalah, "kata pemilik akun @arekboyo45, menanggapi @mang_ulibdg's tweet.dan buku -buku yang diinjak -injak dan buku -buku yang dimiliki oleh para tahanan untuk kejahatan terorisme.Karena ada tahanan dalam kasus -kasus terorisme yang tidak menerima bahwa ruang penahanan tahanan mereka dicari dan diprovokasi.

berita: The document states that President Saddam Hussein received information about the film from the state intelligence agency. According to information, the names used in the Pokemon movies contain an invitation that cannot be tolerated. Reporting from neutrality (13/4/16), it was revealed a fact that the word Pokemon itself means "I am Jewish". The name Pokemon is taken from the Syriac language, or the Syriac language, which in Indonesian means: 'I am Jewish'. Meaning of Pikachu in gens Syriac: "Be a Jew" Also reported from neutrality (13/4/16), it was revealed that the word Pikachu, a type of monster icon in Pokemon, means "Be Jewish". The name Pikachu is taken from the Syriac language, or Syriac, which in Indonesian means 'Be a Jew'. Then it was revealed a fact that the word Charmender, one of the iconic types of monsters in pokemon which means "God is Weak". The name Charmender is taken from the Syriac, or Syriac language which in Indonesian means 'God is Weak.' Of course, the meaning is very offensive to adherents of religion, especially Islam and Christianity. Because, in Islam, it is clearly called Allahu Akbar (God is Great). and in Christianity it is called the Holy God. The reason for the ban, as stated in the document, was to prevent the entry of Jewish influences into the children and the nation's culture. Pokemon cartoons were banned in Iraq by President Saddam Hussein. Of course, the prohibition is not just a ban without a reason. There are good reasons why Saddam Hussein was so adamant in boycotting these children's cartoons. In a state document confiscated by US troops, during a coup in 2004, it was revealed that there were "uncommendable" actions or negative messages behind the film. The document states that President Saddam Hussein received information about the film from the state intelligence agency. According to information, the names used in the Pokemon movies contain an invitation that cannot be tolerated.
berita_id: Dokumen tersebut menyatakan bahwa Presiden Saddam Hussein menerima informasi tentang film dari Badan Intelijen Negara.Menurut informasi, nama -nama yang digunakan dalam film Pokemon berisi undangan yang tidak dapat ditoleransi.Pelaporan dari Netralitas (13/4/16), terungkap fakta bahwa kata Pokemon itu sendiri berarti "Saya Yahudi".Nama Pokemon diambil dari bahasa Syria, atau bahasa Syria, yang dalam bahasa Indonesia berarti: 'Saya Yahudi'.Makna Pikachu di Gens Syria: "Jadilah seorang Yahudi" juga dilaporkan dari netralitas (13/4/16), terungkap bahwa kata Pikachu, sejenis ikon monster di Pokemon, berarti "menjadi Yahudi".Nama Pikachu diambil dari bahasa Syria, atau Syria, yang dalam bahasa Indonesia berarti 'menjadi orang Yahudi'.Kemudian terungkap fakta bahwa kata charmender, salah satu jenis monster ikonik di Pokemon yang berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Nama Charmender diambil dari bahasa Syria, atau bahasa Syria yang dalam bahasa Indonesia berarti 'Tuhan itu lemah.'Tentu saja, artinya sangat menyinggung penganut agama, terutama Islam dan Kekristenan.Karena, dalam Islam, itu jelas disebut Allahu Akbar (Tuhan itu hebat).dan dalam agama Kristen itu disebut Allah yang Kudus.Alasan larangan tersebut, sebagaimana dinyatakan dalam dokumen, adalah untuk mencegah masuknya pengaruh Yahudi ke dalam anak -anak dan budaya bangsa.Kartun Pokemon dilarang di Irak oleh Presiden Saddam Hussein.Tentu saja, larangan ini bukan hanya larangan tanpa alasan.Ada alasan bagus mengapa Saddam Hussein begitu bersikeras memboikot kartun anak -anak ini.Dalam sebuah dokumen negara yang disita oleh pasukan AS, selama kudeta pada tahun 2004, terungkap bahwa ada tindakan "tidak menyenangkan" atau pesan negatif di balik film tersebut.Dokumen tersebut menyatakan bahwa Presiden Saddam Hussein menerima informasi tentang film dari Badan Intelijen Negara.Menurut informasi, nama -nama yang digunakan dalam film Pokemon berisi undangan yang tidak dapat ditoleransi.

berita: MOST of the world's people are now loving Pokémon. Pokemon is a media franchise owned by the video game company Nintendo and created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1995. Originally, Pokémon was a video game series that was identical to the Game Boy console. That's Wikipedia data. Reported by the BBC, Pokemon Go is an augmented reality game on smartphones using the Global Positioning System (GPS). You play by walking around in the real world catching adorable virtual monsters, like Pikachu and Jigglypuff, in places near your phone's location and training them to compete. These monsters first became popular in the 90s when the Nintendo Game Boy appeared. A piece of information is circulating on social media: the word Pokemon means "I'm Jewish". It is said that the name Pokemon is taken from the Syriac language (Syrian language) which in Indonesian means "I am Jewish". Syriac or Syrian language (in English: Syriac language), the language currently spoken by the minority Syrian Christians living in eastern Turkey, northern Iraq and northeastern Syria. (Wikipedia). In a statement in Jordan's Amman newspaper, the Syriac Orthodox Christian Church denied allegations that Pokemon and other character names have reality roots in ancient Syriac and insult Islam. Church officials said they were surprised by the incoming letter stating that Pokemon contained a Jewish invitation. (LA Times). According to Sheikh Muhammed Salih Al-Munajjid of the Q&A Islamic Q&A site, the correct meaning of Pokemon is an abbreviation of "Pocket monster", which is an animal small enough to fit in a pocket. According to the Oxford English dictionary, Pokemon (Pronunciation: /'poki?män/) is a video game featuring Japanese cartoon characters. Originally, Pokemon was the name of a Japanese video game from the word "pocket monster". On the Reference page, the word "Pokemon" in Japanese comes from the words "Poketto" and "Monsut" or "Pocket Monsters" in English. Wallahu a'lam.
berita_id: Sebagian besar orang di dunia sekarang mencintai Pokémon.Pokemon adalah waralaba media yang dimiliki oleh perusahaan video game Nintendo dan dibuat oleh Satoshi Tajiri pada tahun 1995. Awalnya, Pokémon adalah seri video game yang identik dengan Game Boy Console.Itu data Wikipedia.Dilaporkan oleh BBC, Pokemon Go adalah permainan augmented reality pada smartphone menggunakan Global Positioning System (GPS).Anda bermain dengan berjalan -jalan di dunia nyata menangkap monster virtual yang menggemaskan, seperti Pikachu dan Jigglypuff, di tempat -tempat di dekat lokasi ponsel Anda dan melatih mereka untuk bersaing.Monster -monster ini pertama kali menjadi populer di tahun 90 -an ketika Nintendo Game Boy muncul.Sepotong informasi beredar di media sosial: kata pokemon berarti "Saya orang Yahudi".Dikatakan bahwa nama Pokemon diambil dari bahasa Syria (bahasa Suriah) yang dalam bahasa Indonesia berarti "Saya Yahudi".Bahasa Syria atau Suriah (dalam bahasa Inggris: Bahasa Syria), bahasa yang saat ini digunakan oleh orang -orang Kristen Suriah minoritas yang tinggal di Turki Timur, Irak Utara dan Suriah timur laut.(Wikipedia).Dalam sebuah pernyataan di surat kabar Amman Jordan, Gereja Kristen Syria Ortodoks membantah tuduhan bahwa Pokemon dan nama karakter lainnya memiliki akar realitas di Syria kuno dan menghina Islam.Pejabat gereja mengatakan mereka terkejut dengan surat yang masuk yang menyatakan bahwa Pokemon berisi undangan Yahudi.(LA Times).Menurut Sheikh Muhammed Salih al-Munajjid dari situs Q&A Q&A Islamic, makna Pokemon yang benar adalah singkatan dari "monster saku", yang merupakan hewan yang cukup kecil untuk muat di saku.Menurut Oxford English Dictionary, Pokemon (pengucapan: /'Poki? Män /) adalah video game yang menampilkan karakter kartun Jepang.Awalnya, Pokemon adalah nama video game Jepang dari kata "saku monster".Di halaman referensi, kata "pokemon" dalam bahasa Jepang berasal dari kata "poketto" dan "monsut" atau "monster saku" dalam bahasa Inggris.Wallahu a'lam.

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia is confirmed to be a hoax. This certainty was revealed after the Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati confirmed this in front of journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace, West Java. ," he said, Monday (12/3/2018), as quoted in an official statement by the Minister of Finance explaining that currently there are indeed many circulating information and documents that are made as if they came from a government institution. It's like that. On social media nowadays, there is a lot of information and documents that are made similar to those from the government and published," he said. salary up to Rp 553422694 per month As for representatives the president is proposed to have receive a salary of Rp 368948462 per month
berita_id: Berita yang beredar tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia dikonfirmasi menjadi tipuan.Kepastian ini terungkap setelah Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati mengkonfirmasi hal ini di depan jurnalis di Istana Presiden Bogor, Jawa Barat., "katanya, Senin (12/3/2018), seperti dikutip dalam pernyataan resmi oleh Menteri Keuangan yang menjelaskan bahwa saat ini ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang beredar yang dibuat seolah -olah mereka berasal dari lembaga pemerintah. Ini seperti itu. Di media sosial saat ini, ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan yang dari pemerintah dan dipublikasikan," katanya.Gaji hingga Rp 553422694 per bulan untuk perwakilan Presiden diusulkan untuk menerima gaji Rp 368948462 per bulan

berita: Traveloka management explained, Chief Technology Officer (CTO) Derianto Kusuma was not present at the 90th Anniversary of Kanisius College on Saturday night, November 11 2017, because he was on a business trip. In the event, Ananda Sukarlan had time to walk out. "He was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned a few months earlier," said Traveloka Public Relations Manager Busyra Oryza, Tuesday, valuate November 14 2017. The explanation was given by Busyra because the hashtag #UninstallTraveloka became a trending topic on Twitter on Tuesday. On social media, rumors spread that Derianto Kusuma, who is an alumnus of Kanisius High School, congratulated pianist Ananda Sukarlan. The pianist walked out of the room when DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan gave a speech at the 90th Anniversary of Kanisius College. Ananda did protest against the committee by walking out for inviting Anies. He considers Anies's figure to be contrary to the value of pluralism, which is taught at Canisius College. Spokesman for the Jakarta Kanisius College Alumni Association, Affan Alamudi, clarified that Derianto did not attend the event because he was in America. In the event that took place in Kemayoran, Kanisius College gave awards to alumni who were considered outstanding and contributed to the nation's work. Recipients of the award include Ananda Sukarlan (composer and pianist), Derianto Kusuma (founder of Traveloka), Father Magnis Suseno (Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (scout leader), and Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). In the award ceremony, Derianto was represented by his mother. "We are quite shocked. These are lies. How could he walk out. Not even in Indonesia," Affan told Tempo, Tuesday, regarding WO Ananda Sukarlan.
berita_id: Traveloka Management menjelaskan, Chief Technology Officer (CTO) DeRianto Kusuma tidak hadir pada peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College pada Sabtu malam, 11 November 2017, karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis.Dalam acara tersebut, Ananda Sukarlan punya waktu untuk keluar."Dia tidak dapat hadir karena dia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya," kata manajer hubungan masyarakat Traveloka Busyra Oryza, Selasa, nilai 14 November 2017. Penjelasan itu diberikan oleh Busyra karena tagar #uninstalltraveloka menjadi topik tren di Twitter pada hari Selasa.Di media sosial, rumor menyebar bahwa Derianto Kusuma, yang merupakan alumnus Sekolah Menengah Kanisius, memberi selamat kepada pianis Ananda Sukarlan.Pianis itu berjalan keluar dari ruangan ketika Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato di peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College.Ananda melakukan protes terhadap komite dengan berjalan keluar karena mengundang Anies.Dia menganggap sosok Anies bertentangan dengan nilai pluralisme, yang diajarkan di Canisius College.Juru Bicara Asosiasi Alumni Jakarta Kanisius College, Affan Alamudi, mengklarifikasi bahwa DeRianto tidak menghadiri acara tersebut karena ia berada di Amerika.Dalam acara yang terjadi di Kemayoran, Kanisius College memberikan penghargaan kepada alumni yang dianggap luar biasa dan berkontribusi pada pekerjaan negara.Penerima penghargaan termasuk Ananda Sukarlan (komposer dan pianis), DeRianto Kusuma (pendiri Traveloka), Pastor Magnis Suseno (Figure Jesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (Pemimpin Pramuka), dan Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farma).Dalam upacara penghargaan, DeRianto diwakili oleh ibunya."Kami cukup terkejut. Ini adalah kebohongan. Bagaimana dia bisa keluar. Bahkan di Indonesia," kata Affan kepada Tempo, Selasa, mengenai Wo Ananda Sukarlan.

berita: The recent events of the curved iPhone 6 have filled the internet, prompting T-Mobile CEO John Legere to respond strongly to this. Reporting from Ubergizmo, Monday (6/10/2014), the famous CEO is always outspoken in expressing his opinion, decided to look at this wisely. "Video depicting a man who can do it (make iPhone 6 bend) - and if you look at his face, he's probably already turning purple. The veins are showing through his  fingers. Are you ***?" He also responded to people who complained that just by putting it in their pocket, their iPhone 6 immediately curved. "What do you know, 9 people sitting on their phones, first of all they need the jeans to really fit, because otherwise the jeans you're wearing can cut your phone in half. Take your laptop, do a handstand with it and throw it at the wall. All that stuff ***** ******," he said. Legere added, even though Apple was engulfed in the scandal of the weak durability of the iPhone 6, all of that did not make the demand for Apple's latest mobile phone weak. As is known, some time ago, a total of nine people complained about the durability of the iPhone 6 which was weak and easily curved. This is contrary to tests conducted by Consumer Reports, and managed to prove the durability of the iPhone 6 is not as weak as complained.
berita_id: Peristiwa baru-baru ini dari iPhone 6 melengkung telah mengisi internet, mendorong CEO T-Mobile John Legere untuk merespons dengan kuat terhadap hal ini.Melaporkan dari Ubergizmo, Senin (6/10/2014), CEO terkenal selalu blak -blakan dalam mengekspresikan pendapatnya, memutuskan untuk melihat ini dengan bijak."Video yang menggambarkan seorang pria yang bisa melakukannya (membuat IPhone 6 Bend) - dan jika Anda melihat wajahnya, dia mungkin sudah berubah ungu. Vena itu terlihat melalui jari -jarinya. Apakah Anda ***?"Dia juga menanggapi orang -orang yang mengeluh bahwa hanya dengan memasukkannya ke dalam saku mereka, iPhone 6 mereka segera melengkung."Apa yang Anda ketahui, 9 orang duduk di telepon mereka, pertama -tama mereka membutuhkan jeans agar benar -benar pas, karena jika tidak, jeans yang Anda kenakan dapat memotong telepon Anda menjadi dua. Ambil laptop Anda, lakukan handstand dengan itu dan lempar ke dinding. Semua barang ***** ******," katanya.Legere menambahkan, meskipun Apple dilalap dalam skandal daya tahan yang lemah dari iPhone 6, semuanya tidak membuat permintaan untuk ponsel terbaru Apple lemah.Seperti diketahui, beberapa waktu yang lalu, total sembilan orang mengeluh tentang daya tahan iPhone 6 yang lemah dan mudah melengkung.Ini bertentangan dengan tes yang dilakukan oleh Consumer Reports, dan berhasil membuktikan daya tahan iPhone 6 tidak setenang yang dikeluhkan.

berita: Having circulated on the Internet both via YouTube and Social Media, a video show on stroke treatment that looks convincing and doesn't seem to be widely trusted by the public can heal people who suddenly have a stroke. In the video, it is explained - dealing with stroke sufferers by: First sterilizing a needle with alcohol. then the tips of the fingers are pierced with a needle to drip blood. The argument presented that stroke is caused by disruption and blockage of the blood path, by dripping blood on the tips of the fingers makes the blood vessels in the body not clogged. This argument does seem reasonable to ordinary people, but from a medical point of view, it turns out that the above argument is not true at all, it is even thought to exist. Blockage of human blood vessels occurs for a long period of time, fat and cholesterol deposits will accumulate, accumulating in the capillaries and blood vessels after several years until the time comes – blockages occur in blood vessels leading to the brain will cause the brain to no longer be able to give signals. commands to the limbs to move or other activities. Because the blockage of the blood vessels that have been cultivated for years, of course, will not go away on their own in a short time just by shedding blood, this has nothing to do with it. Doctors can't agree with the method above because there is no authentic evidence about the truth of this feel method, even if it is feared that it will actually infect the patient's blood. The above method makes ordinary people unable to determine whether the patient has had a stroke or not, other dangers can arise because the handler is not in accordance with the type of illness. If it is indeed a stroke, there will be a risk of a more severe attack due to handling that is not in accordance with standard medical procedures. So what is the right way to handle a stroke patient when someone suddenly falls or is unable to move due to a stroke, the right way is to apply the FAST method: F-Face (face): Pay attention to whether the patient's face becomes tilted or tilted -his expression. This is one sign of a stroke. A – Arm (Arm): Try to raise both hands of the patient, then try to ask him to hold his hands forward. If you can't do both or one of them, it's a sign of a two-sided stroke or a half stroke. S - Speech (Speech): Talk to the patient, try to make the patient want to talk, a stroke makes the patient's tongue / mouth become slurred and his pronunciation becomes slurred. T – Time (time): If some of the signs of a stroke above are present in the patient, then the fourth and final method is Time, meaning that the sooner he is taken to the hospital, the better, so that early treatment before it gets worse is possible to be given immediately. In this step, ordinary people must realize that there is not much that can be done other than taking the stroke patient immediately to the nearest hospital, either by calling an ambulance or using a private car. Thus Sharing via IndoSister.com - How to deal with sufferers who have a sudden stroke, the hoax vs the correct version. Be careful and realize that news via youtube and social media is not always correct. Don't immediately believe and practice something that involves one's health and safety without checking and consulting with those who know better in their field.
berita_id: Setelah beredar di internet baik melalui YouTube dan media sosial, sebuah acara video tentang perawatan stroke yang terlihat meyakinkan dan tampaknya tidak dipercaya secara luas oleh publik dapat menyembuhkan orang -orang yang tiba -tiba mengalami stroke.Dalam video itu, dijelaskan - berurusan dengan penderita stroke dengan: pertama mensterilkan jarum dengan alkohol.Kemudian ujung jari ditusuk dengan jarum untuk meneteskan darah.Argumen yang disajikan bahwa stroke disebabkan oleh gangguan dan penyumbatan jalur darah, dengan meneteskan darah di ujung jari membuat pembuluh darah dalam tubuh tidak tersumbat.Argumen ini tampaknya masuk akal bagi orang -orang biasa, tetapi dari sudut pandang medis, ternyata argumen di atas tidak benar sama sekali, bahkan dianggap ada.Penyumbatan pembuluh darah manusia terjadi untuk jangka waktu yang lama, deposit lemak dan kolesterol akan menumpuk, menumpuk di kapiler dan pembuluh darah setelah beberapa tahun sampai saatnya tiba - penyumbatan terjadi pada pembuluh darah yang mengarah ke otak akan menyebabkan otak tidak lagi dapat memberikan sinyal.Perintah ke anggota badan untuk bergerak atau kegiatan lainnya.Karena penyumbatan pembuluh darah yang telah dibudidayakan selama bertahun -tahun, tentu saja, tidak akan hilang sendiri dalam waktu singkat hanya dengan menumpahkan darah, ini tidak ada hubungannya dengan itu.Dokter tidak dapat setuju dengan metode di atas karena tidak ada bukti otentik tentang kebenaran metode perasaan ini, bahkan jika ditakuti bahwa itu benar -benar akan menginfeksi darah pasien.Metode di atas membuat orang biasa tidak dapat menentukan apakah pasien mengalami stroke atau tidak, bahaya lain dapat muncul karena pawang tidak sesuai dengan jenis penyakit.Jika memang stroke, akan ada risiko serangan yang lebih parah karena penanganan yang tidak sesuai dengan prosedur medis standar.Jadi apa cara yang tepat untuk menangani pasien stroke ketika seseorang tiba -tiba jatuh atau tidak dapat bergerak karena stroke, cara yang benar adalah dengan menerapkan metode cepat: face (wajah): Perhatikan apakah wajah pasien menjadi miring atau miring -miringnya.Ini adalah salah satu tanda stroke.A - ARM (ARM): Cobalah untuk mengangkat kedua tangan pasien, lalu cobalah untuk memintanya untuk memegang tangannya ke depan.Jika Anda tidak dapat melakukan keduanya atau salah satunya, itu adalah tanda stroke dua sisi atau setengah stroke.S - Bicara (wicara): Bicaralah dengan pasien, cobalah untuk membuat pasien ingin berbicara, stroke membuat lidah / mulut pasien menjadi tidak jelas dan pengucapannya menjadi tidak jelas.T - Waktu (Waktu): Jika beberapa tanda stroke di atas hadir pada pasien, maka metode keempat dan terakhir adalah waktu, yang berarti bahwa semakin cepat ia dibawa ke rumah sakit, semakin baik, sehingga perawatan dini sebelum menjadi lebih buruk dimungkinkan untuk segera diberikan.Pada langkah ini, orang biasa harus menyadari bahwa tidak banyak yang dapat dilakukan selain membawa pasien stroke segera ke rumah sakit terdekat, baik dengan memanggil ambulans atau menggunakan mobil pribadi.Dengan demikian berbagi melalui indoSister.com - cara menangani penderita yang mengalami stroke mendadak, tipuan vs versi yang benar.Hati -hati dan sadari bahwa berita melalui YouTube dan media sosial tidak selalu benar.Jangan segera percaya dan mempraktikkan sesuatu yang melibatkan kesehatan dan keselamatan seseorang tanpa memeriksa dan berkonsultasi dengan mereka yang tahu lebih baik di bidangnya.

berita: The walk out (WO) of pianist Ananda Sukarlan when DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan gave a speech at the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran, turned out to have a long tail and tended to lead to strange slander. Ananda's action was followed by a crowd calling for the removal of the Traveloka application. What caused this walk out action to be followed by an invitation with the hashtag #uninstallTraveloka? Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Incidentally, in this event, the Canisius Awards will be presented to 5 alumni from various generations. A total of 5 alumni were screened from the 95 finalists who became candidates. They are Ananda Sukarlan (composer & pianist), Derianto Kusuma (founder of Traveloka), Father Magnis Suseno (Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). Based on the news circulating on the timeline, Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. This information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. Traveloka to detikinet responded to the news about the call to boycott its services. This hotel and travel ticket booking application also provides clarification regarding the events at the Canisius College event. Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. But he was unable to attend. "Actually, Mr. Deri (Derianto) was not present. He was on a business trip that day. So if it is said that Mr. Deri is there and it is called to provide support (to Ananda), he is not there," said Busyra. Tribunnews also observed that, after getting off the stage, Ananda was greeted and praised by the award recipients, including former minister Ir. Sarwono Kusumaatmaja and Father E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J., Principal of Kanisius High School. It was not written, Traveloka CTO Derianto Kusuma came and congratulated him. When receiving the award, Ananda also had the opportunity to deliver a 10-minute speech. “You have invited someone with values ​​and integrity that go against what we were taught. Although you may have to invite him because of his position, but next time we have to see the person as well. He obtained his position in ways that were inconsistent with Canisius' values. I'm not talking about politics, this is a matter of conscience and human values," he said. Ananda Sukarlan's attitude and statement may indeed spark debate, pros and cons. The problem is, why is there news that the Traveloka boss greets everything, won't the Deriyanto come? If we follow this hashtag about Traveloka, some even enter it into the realm of jihad. Wow! "This is the easiest jihad, just use your thumb to uninstall Traveloka". beget That's about the tweet on twitter. It seems that we must learn to be wise, not to enjoy the emotions that surround the mind. If it's like this, I even remember the Madura proverb: Duck is attellor, ajam is ngeremme' ducks that lay eggs, chickens that incubate. Ananda who is a WO, Traveloka, who must be stiff in dealing with problems.
berita_id: Walk Out (WO) pianis Ananda Sukarlan ketika Gubernur Dki Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato pada peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran, ternyata memiliki ekor panjang dan cenderung memimpin untuk memimpin.Tindakan Ananda diikuti oleh kerumunan yang menyerukan penghapusan aplikasi Traveloka.Apa yang menyebabkan tindakan berjalan ini diikuti oleh undangan dengan tagar #uninstalltraveloka?Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Kebetulan, dalam acara ini, Canisius Awards akan diberikan kepada 5 alumni dari berbagai generasi.Sebanyak 5 alumni disaring dari 95 finalis yang menjadi kandidat.Mereka adalah Ananda Sukarlan (komposer & pianis), DeRianto Kusuma (pendiri Traveloka), Pastor Magnis Suseno (Jesuit Figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farma).Berdasarkan berita yang beredar di timeline, pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma menyapa dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Informasi ini kemudian memicu beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.Traveloka ke Detikinet menanggapi berita tentang panggilan untuk memboikot layanannya.Aplikasi pemesanan hotel dan tiket perjalanan ini juga memberikan klarifikasi mengenai acara di acara Canisius College.Manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Tapi dia tidak bisa hadir."Sebenarnya, Tuan Deri (Derianto) tidak ada. Dia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis hari itu. Jadi jika dikatakan bahwa Tuan Deri ada di sana dan dipanggil untuk memberikan dukungan (kepada Ananda), dia tidak ada di sana," kata Busyra.Tribunnews juga mengamati bahwa, setelah turun dari panggung, Ananda disambut dan dipuji oleh penerima penghargaan, termasuk mantan Menteri IR.Sarwono Kusumaatmaja dan Pastor E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J., Kepala Sekolah Menengah Kanisius.Itu tidak ditulis, Traveloka CTO DERIANTO KUSUMA datang dan memberi selamat kepadanya.Saat menerima penghargaan, Ananda juga memiliki kesempatan untuk menyampaikan pidato 10 menit."Anda telah mengundang seseorang dengan nilai -nilai dan integritas yang bertentangan dengan apa yang kami ajarkan. Meskipun Anda mungkin harus mengundangnya karena posisinya, tetapi lain kali kita harus melihat orang itu juga. Dia memperoleh posisinya dengan cara yang tidak konsisten dengan nilai -nilai Canisius. Saya tidak berbicara tentang politik, ini adalah masalah hati nurani dan nilai -nilai manusia," katanya.Sikap dan pernyataan Ananda Sukarlan mungkin memang memicu debat, pro, dan kontra.Masalahnya adalah, mengapa ada berita bahwa bos Traveloka menyapa semuanya, tidakkah deriyanto datang?Jika kita mengikuti tagar ini tentang Traveloka, beberapa bahkan memasukkannya ke ranah jihad.Wow!"Ini adalah jihad termudah, cukup gunakan ibu jari Anda untuk menghapus instalan Traveloka".Lakukan itu tentang tweet di Twitter.Tampaknya kita harus belajar bijak, bukan untuk menikmati emosi yang mengelilingi pikiran.Jika seperti ini, saya bahkan ingat pepatah Madura: Bebek adalah Attellor, Ajam adalah bebek Ngeremme yang bertelur, ayam yang diinkubasi.Ananda yang merupakan WO, Traveloka, yang harus kaku dalam menangani masalah.

berita: Catfish is one type of fish that is a favorite in every dish on the food menu, it tastes good and the texture of the meat is soft, making this fish much recommended in culinary tours. But who would have thought that behind the delicious taste, it turns out that catfish has surprising facts. Catfish turns out to be the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. In one bite, catfish contains three thousand cancer cells. Really? The catfish pond is very dirty and surrounded by chicken coops and pigs. A catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he has supplied a lot of catfish to roadside markets and restaurants in Hainan province, to be precise in Haikou, which he harvests every 3 months. The number of complaints from the community made journalists try to find out about the fish from the local fisheries and marine department. They took pond samples from 7 ponds that housed the catfish. It turned out that the seven ponds were surrounded by chicken and pig cages, while in the middle of the ponds there were many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of their fish before the test results are out. Catfish is a fish that consumes waste Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places, by consuming animal waste such as chicken, cow and pig waste and even human waste. angle So it is possible catfish contains three thousand cancer cells that are harmful to the human body. Those are some facts about catfish in China, but conditions in China are different from those in Indonesia. In Indonesia, this fish is cultivated well by catfish farmers and for catfish food they do not use waste but pellets which are not harmful to health. So there is no need to hesitate to consume catfish in Indonesia, because cleanliness is guaranteed. Apart from all that, the health of consuming catfish depends on where the catfish breeds and what kind of food is given in cultivating it. Because it turns out that catfish also has substances that are beneficial to health, if the fish is cultivated properly. Here are 4 benefits of catfish: Healthy heart and brain Catfish contains omega-3 and omega-6 which are usually contained in expensive fish such as cod and salmon. The content of omega-3 and omega-6 can help heart and brain health activities, and it turns out that a serving of catfish contains 220 mg of omega-3 and 875 mg of omega-6. Contains protein with good quality In a serving of catfish contains 15.6 grams of protein which is very useful in the formation of muscle tissue and strengthens the immune system. Contains vitamin B-12 A serving of catfish contains vitamin B-12, which is about 40% of the body's needs. This vitamin is useful in helping to break down food into energy for the body, so consuming these foods can make the body stronger. Contains DHA Pregnant women are advised to eat catfish because this fish contains DHA which is good for the formation of the baby's nerves and also this fish has a very low mercury content so it is safe for consumption.
berita_id: Catfish adalah salah satu jenis ikan yang menjadi favorit di setiap hidangan di menu makanan, rasanya enak dan tekstur dagingnya lunak, membuat ikan ini sangat direkomendasikan dalam tur kuliner.Tetapi siapa yang akan berpikir bahwa di balik selera yang lezat, ternyata ikan lele memiliki fakta yang mengejutkan.Lele ternyata adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Dalam satu gigitan, ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker.Benar-benar?Kolam ikan lele sangat kotor dan dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi.Seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-hong mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele ke pasar jalan dan restoran di provinsi Hainan, tepatnya di haikou, yang ia panen setiap 3 bulan.Jumlah keluhan dari masyarakat membuat jurnalis mencoba mencari tahu tentang ikan dari perikanan dan departemen kelautan setempat.Mereka mengambil sampel kolam dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Ternyata ketujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sementara di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Para petani ikan disarankan untuk menangguhkan penjualan ikan mereka sebelum hasil tes keluar.Catfish adalah ikan yang mengkonsumsi limbah ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor, dengan mengonsumsi limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi dan limbah babi dan bahkan limbah manusia.Sudut sehingga mungkin ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Itu adalah beberapa fakta tentang ikan lele di Cina, tetapi kondisi di Cina berbeda dari yang ada di Indonesia.Di Indonesia, ikan ini dibudidayakan dengan baik oleh petani ikan lele dan untuk makanan lele mereka tidak menggunakan limbah tetapi pelet yang tidak berbahaya bagi kesehatan.Jadi tidak perlu ragu -ragu untuk mengonsumsi ikan lele di Indonesia, karena kebersihan dijamin.Terlepas dari semua itu, kesehatan mengonsumsi ikan lele tergantung pada di mana ikan lele berkembang biak dan jenis makanan apa yang diberikan dalam menanamnya.Karena ternyata ikan lele juga memiliki zat yang bermanfaat bagi kesehatan, jika ikan dibudidayakan dengan benar.Berikut adalah 4 manfaat ikan lele: Lelyal jantung dan otak yang sehat mengandung omega-3 dan omega-6 yang biasanya terkandung dalam ikan mahal seperti cod dan salmon.Isi omega-3 dan omega-6 dapat membantu kegiatan kesehatan jantung dan otak, dan ternyata sekumpulan ikan lele mengandung 220 mg omega-3 dan 875 mg omega-6.Mengandung protein dengan kualitas yang baik dalam porsi ikan lele mengandung 15,6 gram protein yang sangat berguna dalam pembentukan jaringan otot dan memperkuat sistem kekebalan tubuh.Mengandung vitamin B-12 Porsi ikan lele mengandung vitamin B-12, yang merupakan sekitar 40% dari kebutuhan tubuh.Vitamin ini berguna dalam membantu memecah makanan menjadi energi bagi tubuh, sehingga mengonsumsi makanan ini dapat membuat tubuh lebih kuat.Berisi wanita hamil DHA disarankan untuk makan lele karena ikan ini mengandung DHA yang baik untuk pembentukan saraf bayi dan juga ikan ini memiliki kandungan merkuri yang sangat rendah sehingga aman untuk dikonsumsi.

berita: After a few weeks on the market and becoming the most sought after item by premium class gadget lovers, it turns out that there are some iPhone 6 users who feel disappointed with the product they bought at a fairly expensive price. There are some iPhone users who feel that the quality of the device they buy is far below the standard because they feel the iPhone 6 is soft and bends easily. The above is not just an issue or gossip. If you put your new iPhone in a trouser pocket without a protective case or try to squeeze it a little like you want to break a chocolate bar, you'll soon find out that the iPhone 6's body bends easily. If you don't feel willing to bend your own iPhone, there are many videos and pictures that you can download and view from the internet that show Apple's weakness. Due to the outpouring of disappointment from iPhone 6 users that is widely uploaded on YouTube and also reports that enter Apple, which says the body of the latest iPhone is much softer than its predecessor, Apple had to swallow the bitter pill by experiencing a decline in the value of Apple's shares by 3.8%. Apple's stock price dropped after a video of the bent iPhone went viral on YouTube. In addition, the video showing that the iPhone 6 is flabby and easy to bend is also exacerbated by the many reports stating that there are many errors in the iOS update from iOS 7 to iOS 8. The problems encountered include intermittent updates and also users of more than 5GB of space are only for updates, so many iPhone users have to delete some of the photo and video files they have. To avoid a wider issue, Apple then made a claim that the damage that occurred to the iPhone 6 which was claimed to be soft and easy to bend was rare when used normally. Apple claims that in 6 days of sale, there were only 9 consumers who contacted the iPhone because their product was bent, but Apple forgot that iPhones are sold worldwide and there are more users who don't know who to contact to get their iPhone replaced because indeed the damage is not included. warranty. Another issue related to the iPhone 6 flaccid and easy to bend issue is the iOS 8 update which is otherwise problematic. Many consumers are calling because they find an error detecting their fingerprint. Because of this, Apple then discontinued the distribution of iOS and released a new one a day later. When compared with competitors, the strength of the iPhone 6 is only half that of competing products such as Samsung and LG. Of the Galaxy Note 3, LG G3, HTC One M8, and iPHone, tested at 4.5KG, the ones that bring out curled right up were the iPhone 6 and M8, reports Consumer Reports.
berita_id: Setelah beberapa minggu di pasar dan menjadi yang paling dicari oleh pecinta gadget kelas premium, ternyata ada beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 yang merasa kecewa dengan produk yang mereka beli dengan harga yang cukup mahal.Ada beberapa pengguna iPhone yang merasa bahwa kualitas perangkat yang mereka beli jauh di bawah standar karena mereka merasa iPhone 6 mudah dan berbelok dengan mudah.Di atas bukan hanya masalah atau gosip.Jika Anda meletakkan iPhone baru Anda ke dalam saku celana tanpa kotak pelindung atau mencoba memerasnya sedikit seperti Anda ingin memecahkan cokelat, Anda akan segera mengetahui bahwa tubuh iPhone 6 dengan mudah membungkuk.Jika Anda tidak merasa mau menekuk iPhone Anda sendiri, ada banyak video dan gambar yang dapat Anda unduh dan lihat dari internet yang menunjukkan kelemahan Apple.Karena curahan kekecewaan dari pengguna iPhone 6 yang secara luas diunggah di YouTube dan juga melaporkan bahwa masuk Apple, yang mengatakan tubuh iPhone terbaru jauh lebih lembut daripada pendahulunya, Apple harus menelan pil pahit dengan mengalami penurunan nilai saham Apple sebesar 3,8%.Harga saham Apple turun setelah video iPhone bengkok menjadi viral di YouTube.Selain itu, video yang menunjukkan bahwa iPhone 6 lembek dan mudah ditekuk juga diperburuk oleh banyak laporan yang menyatakan bahwa ada banyak kesalahan dalam pembaruan iOS dari iOS 7 ke iOS 8.
