Masalah yang dihadapi termasuk pembaruan yang terputus -putus dan juga pengguna lebih dari 5GB ruang yang hanya untuk pembaruan, banyak pengguna iPhone harus menghapus beberapa file dan video yang dimiliki.Untuk menghindari masalah yang lebih luas, Apple kemudian membuat klaim bahwa kerusakan yang terjadi pada iPhone 6 yang diklaim lembut dan mudah ditekuk jarang terjadi jika digunakan secara normal.Apple mengklaim bahwa dalam 6 hari penjualan, hanya ada 9 konsumen yang menghubungi iPhone karena produk mereka bengkok, tetapi Apple lupa bahwa iPhone dijual di seluruh dunia dan ada lebih banyak pengguna yang tidak tahu siapa yang harus dihubungi untuk mengganti iPhone mereka karena memang kerusakan tidak termasuk.jaminan.Masalah lain yang terkait dengan iPhone 6 lembek dan masalah yang mudah ditekuk adalah pembaruan iOS 8 yang merupakan masalah.Banyak konsumen menelepon karena mereka menemukan kesalahan mendeteksi sidik jari mereka.Karena itu, Apple kemudian menghentikan distribusi iOS dan merilis yang baru sehari kemudian.Jika dibandingkan dengan pesaing, kekuatan iPhone 6 hanya setengah dari produk yang bersaing seperti Samsung dan LG.Dari Galaxy Note 3, LG G3, HTC One M8, dan iPhone, diuji pada 4,5kg, yang mengeluarkan keriting tepat adalah iPhone 6 dan M8, lapor konsumen.

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia has the potential to experience a very significant increase to reach Rp. 6.6 billion a year or around Rp. 500 million per month. This can happen if the Draft Government Regulation (RPP) on the Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities of Civil Servants is passed. According to the RPP material, the president's salary is Rp 533 million. As for the tranquillize vice president, he receives an income of Rp. 368.9 million per month. The proposal for a salary increase if it is legalized is suspected to be inconsistent with the polemics that often occurred during the Jokowi regime. It's no secret that in the regime led by "Khalifah" Jokowi, there were various controversies such as the criminalization of ulama, the disbandment of mass organizations, the omission of hoax spreader accounts, and the failure to fulfill campaign promises. Previously, in 2017, the Executive Director of the Institute for Policy Studies (IPS) M. Tri Andika emphasized that many of Jokowi's promises were still being violated. Quoted from detik.com, broken promises such as the implementation of the e-Government system in just two weeks. "Maybe you still remember, don't you?," he said during the 3rd Jokowi-JK discussion at the Parliament Complex, Senayan, Jakarta, on Friday, (10/20/2017). Another promise that was denied was to choose a minister of education from among members of the Indonesian Teachers Association (PGRI). In fact, within three years of his administration, Jokowi appointed Anies Baswedan and Muhadjir Effendy who previously served as university rectors. Another thing that Jokowi-JK does not comply with in the field of education is canceling the National Examination for school students. Jokowi-JK also did not keep their promise when drafting the Working Cabinet, namely that they would not divide ministerial seats for their supporting parties. Meanwhile, in the agricultural sector, Jokowi-JK is considered to have failed to fulfill the promise of food self-sufficiency in three years. "(Promise) 7 percent economic growth is still far away," said Andika sadly. Should Jokowi, who is considered a caliph by Said Aqil Siradh, have a salary increase?
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia memiliki potensi untuk mengalami peningkatan yang sangat signifikan untuk mencapai RP.6,6 miliar setahun atau sekitar Rp.500 juta per bulan.Ini dapat terjadi jika rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) tentang gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas pegawai negeri disahkan.Menurut materi RPP, gaji presiden adalah Rp 533 juta.Adapun wakil presiden yang tenang, ia menerima pendapatan RP.368,9 juta per bulan.Proposal untuk kenaikan gaji jika dilegalkan diduga tidak konsisten dengan polemik yang sering terjadi selama rezim Jokowi.Bukan rahasia lagi bahwa dalam rezim yang dipimpin oleh jokowi "khalifah", ada berbagai kontroversi seperti kriminalisasi ulama, pembubaran organisasi massa, penghilangan akun penyebar tipuan, dan kegagalan untuk memenuhi janji kampanye.Sebelumnya, pada tahun 2017, direktur eksekutif Institute for Policy Studies (IPS) M. Tri Andika menekankan bahwa banyak janji Jokowi masih dilanggar.Dikutip dari Detik.com, janji-janji yang rusak seperti implementasi sistem e-government hanya dalam dua minggu."Mungkin Anda masih ingat, bukan?," Katanya selama diskusi Jokowi-JK ke-3 di kompleks parlemen, Senayan, Jakarta, pada hari Jumat, (10/20/2017).Janji lain yang ditolak adalah memilih Menteri Pendidikan dari antara anggota Asosiasi Guru Indonesia (PGRI).Bahkan, dalam waktu tiga tahun pemerintahannya, Jokowi menunjuk Anies Baswedan dan Muhadjir Effendy yang sebelumnya menjabat sebagai rektor universitas.Hal lain yang tidak dipatuhi oleh Jokowi-JK di bidang pendidikan adalah membatalkan ujian nasional untuk siswa sekolah.Jokowi-JK juga tidak menepati janji mereka ketika menyusun kabinet yang bekerja, yaitu bahwa mereka tidak akan membagi kursi menteri untuk pesta pendukung mereka.Sementara itu, di sektor pertanian, Jokowi-JK dianggap gagal memenuhi janji swasembada pangan dalam tiga tahun."(Janji) 7 persen pertumbuhan ekonomi masih jauh," kata Andika dengan sedih.Haruskah Jokowi, siapa yang dianggap khalifah oleh Aqil Siradh tersebut, memiliki kenaikan gaji?

berita: Minister of Communication and Information (Kominfo) Rudiantara threatened to block Facebook and other social media if various negative content including pornography, hoaxes and hate speech were allowed to circulate. Rudiantara stated that the blocking of accounts spreading negative content had indeed been carried out. However, in reality, hoaxes and various hate speech are still widespread. "Blocking the focus is not only on those with Facebook accounts, but on the organizers," said Rudiantara in a discussion at the National Gallery, write up Jakarta, Friday (9/6). He added, "Platforms are also responsible, Facebook is also responsible?" Rudiantara assessed that social media such as Facebook and Twitter have a responsibility to keep their platforms from becoming a place for negative content to emerge. "Indonesia has no intention of closing the platform, but if it is too much for the country, we will close it," he said. Rudiantara said that the government only wants social media platform providers to provide a good level of service when running their business in Indonesia. So far this year, the government has frozen 49 Twitter accounts. In January 2017, 18 accounts were frozen, 24 accounts in February 2017, 1 account in March 2017. Then, 3 each in April and May 2017. As for Facebook, the government has frozen 105 accounts in January 2017, 97 accounts in February 2017, 13 accounts in March 2017. And, 3 accounts in April 2017 and 52 accounts in May 2017. For Youtube, there were 18 accounts frozen in January 2017, 45 accounts in February 2017. Then, 7 accounts in March 2017, 2 accounts in April 2017, and 2 accounts in May 2017. The government has also closed more than four million negative content, including 64 percent containing pornographic nuances and 4 percent containing ethnic, religious, racial, and intergroup (SARA) sentiments. The suspension of social media accounts and the closure of negative content was carried out after 25,179 reports were received by the Ministry of Communication and Information.
berita_id: Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Kominfo) Rudiantara mengancam akan memblokir Facebook dan media sosial lainnya jika berbagai konten negatif termasuk pornografi, tipuan dan pidato kebencian diizinkan untuk diedarkan.Rudiantara menyatakan bahwa pemblokiran akun yang menyebarkan konten negatif memang telah dilakukan.Namun, pada kenyataannya, tipuan dan berbagai ucapan kebencian masih tersebar luas."Memblokir fokus tidak hanya pada mereka yang memiliki akun Facebook, tetapi pada penyelenggara," kata Rudiantara dalam sebuah diskusi di Galeri Nasional, tulis Jakarta, Jumat (9/6).Dia menambahkan, "Platform juga bertanggung jawab, Facebook juga bertanggung jawab?"Rudiantara menilai bahwa media sosial seperti Facebook dan Twitter memiliki tanggung jawab untuk menjaga platform mereka dari menjadi tempat untuk konten negatif muncul."Indonesia tidak memiliki niat untuk menutup platform, tetapi jika terlalu banyak untuk negara, kami akan menutupnya," katanya.Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa pemerintah hanya ingin penyedia platform media sosial memberikan tingkat layanan yang baik saat menjalankan bisnis mereka di Indonesia.Sejauh tahun ini, pemerintah telah membekukan 49 akun Twitter.Pada bulan Januari 2017, 18 akun dibekukan, 24 akun pada bulan Februari 2017, 1 akun pada bulan Maret 2017. Kemudian, masing -masing 3 pada bulan April dan Mei 2017. Adapun untuk Facebook, pemerintah telah membekukan 105 akun pada Januari 2017, 97 akun di Februari 2017, 13 Mei 2017. Di sana, 3 tahun.Pada bulan Februari 2017. Maka, 7 akun pada bulan Maret 2017, 2 akun pada bulan April 2017, dan 2 akun pada Mei 2017. Pemerintah juga telah menutup lebih dari empat juta konten negatif, termasuk 64 persen yang berisi nuansa pornografi dan 4 persen yang mengandung sentimen etnis, agama, rasial, dan intergroup (SARA).Penangguhan akun media sosial dan penutupan konten negatif dilakukan setelah 25.179 laporan diterima oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi.

berita: Stroke is a condition in which the blood supply to the brain is cut off due to blockage of blood vessels. This condition can cause the death of cells in the brain. That is why stroke sufferers cannot move their body members when they have a stroke. Stroke is a serious disease, if not treated immediately can cause death. In the past, stroke only attacked the elderly, but now even young people can have a stroke. There are many burdens that have to be faced by stroke sufferers, ranging from physical, mental or financial limitations. This can make stroke sufferers decrease their enthusiasm for life. So heavy that must be lived by stroke patients. There is a unique way that is effective in dealing with strokes, namely using a needle. Needles are not only for sewing, but help overcome several diseases including stroke. You must have known that now there are many methods of healing diseases using needles called acupuncture. This first aid method of stroke with a needle was introduced by Professor from China. You can apply a needle to a stroke patient before being taken to the hospital. This is to make the patient better and prevent the symptoms of stroke from getting worse. When you are faced with someone who is having a stroke, don't panic. Do not lift or move the stroke patient from their position. Just take advantage of the needle, it can be a sewing needle, a safety pin or a syringe which is an important needle. However, make sure the needle is completely sterile or burn it before using it on stroke sufferers. Take a sterile needle and insert it into 10 fingers of a stroke patient. Prick into the patient's finger slowly, not too deep. Make sure the blood flows from the finger you pricked. If it doesn't bleed, press firmly until it bleeds out. After all the fingers are bleeding, wait a few minutes. After that, the patient should immediately regain consciousness. If the mouth of the sufferer has a sideways stroke or is oozing, you must massage the ear until it turns red. Then. Pierce the ear in the soft part of the skin with a needle until the blood comes out. Do this on both ears of the patient. Wait a few minutes, then the patient's mouth returns to normal. After the patient returns to normal, check his body for diagonal abnormalities or not. Take the stroke patient to the hospital for further examination and treatment. This method is proven to be effective in providing first aid to stroke sufferers when experiencing a stroke. With the discovery of this method, many people can be saved from sudden strokes. So, we are no longer confused when we meet people who have had a stroke. Do the treatment as above, don't hesitate and steady your heart to help stroke sufferers.
berita_id: Stroke adalah kondisi di mana suplai darah ke otak terputus karena penyumbatan pembuluh darah.Kondisi ini dapat menyebabkan kematian sel di otak.Itulah sebabnya penderita stroke tidak dapat menggerakkan anggota tubuh mereka ketika mereka mengalami stroke.Stroke adalah penyakit serius, jika tidak diobati segera dapat menyebabkan kematian.Di masa lalu, stroke hanya menyerang orang tua, tetapi sekarang bahkan orang muda dapat mengalami stroke.Ada banyak beban yang harus dihadapi oleh penderita stroke, mulai dari keterbatasan fisik, mental atau keuangan.Ini dapat membuat penderita stroke mengurangi antusiasme mereka untuk hidup.Begitu berat yang harus dijalani oleh pasien stroke.Ada cara unik yang efektif dalam menangani stroke, yaitu menggunakan jarum.Jarum tidak hanya untuk menjahit, tetapi membantu mengatasi beberapa penyakit termasuk stroke.Anda pasti tahu bahwa sekarang ada banyak metode penyembuhan penyakit menggunakan jarum yang disebut akupunktur.Metode pertolongan pertama stroke dengan jarum ini diperkenalkan oleh Profesor dari Cina.Anda dapat menggunakan jarum ke pasien stroke sebelum dibawa ke rumah sakit.Ini untuk membuat pasien lebih baik dan mencegah gejala stroke menjadi lebih buruk.Ketika Anda dihadapkan pada seseorang yang mengalami stroke, jangan panik.Jangan mengangkat atau memindahkan pasien stroke dari posisi mereka.Manfaatkan saja jarum, itu bisa menjadi jarum jahit, pin pengaman atau jarum suntik yang merupakan jarum penting.Namun, pastikan jarum benar -benar steril atau bakar sebelum menggunakannya pada penderita stroke.Ambil jarum steril dan masukkan ke dalam 10 jari pasien stroke.Tusuk ke jari pasien perlahan, tidak terlalu dalam.Pastikan darah mengalir dari jari yang Anda tusuk.Jika tidak berdarah, tekan dengan kuat sampai keluar.Setelah semua jari berdarah, tunggu beberapa menit.Setelah itu, pasien harus segera mendapatkan kembali kesadaran.Jika mulut penderita memiliki stroke menyamping atau mengalir, Anda harus memijat telinga sampai berubah merah.Kemudian.Tusuk telinga di bagian lembut kulit dengan jarum sampai darah keluar.Lakukan ini di kedua telinga pasien.Tunggu beberapa menit, lalu mulut pasien kembali normal.Setelah pasien kembali normal, periksa tubuhnya untuk kelainan diagonal atau tidak.Bawa pasien stroke ke rumah sakit untuk pemeriksaan dan perawatan lebih lanjut.Metode ini terbukti efektif dalam memberikan pertolongan pertama untuk penderita stroke ketika mengalami stroke.Dengan penemuan metode ini, banyak orang dapat diselamatkan dari pukulan mendadak.Jadi, kami tidak lagi bingung ketika kami bertemu orang -orang yang mengalami stroke.Lakukan perawatan seperti di atas, jangan ragu -ragu dan stabil jantung Anda untuk membantu penderita stroke.

berita: Is it true that every bite of catfish meat can trigger 3000 cancer cells in our body? Catfish are freshwater fish, which usually live in critical places such as rice fields, dirty and muddy fish ponds and swamps. Many catfish live in places that lack oxygen. These fish are also known as carnivores, because they eat small shrimp and worms. Catfish are also known as tough fish species, because they are equipped with an additional respiratory apparatus in the form of a labyrinth, which allows catfish to survive in polluted and dirty water conditions. This way of living and growing in such a dirty place has led to accusations that catfish contain cancer cells. However, currently, the catfish circulating in the market are not catfish that live in the wild. Currently, there are many catfish farming in ponds, by providing good quality feed and controlling the cleanliness of the pond so that it is free from pollution. According to data from the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (KKP), catfish production in 2013 reached 543,461 tons, an increase from 441,217 tons in 2012 and 337,577 tons in 2011. Meanwhile, catfish consumption according to the Central Statistics Agency (BPS) was 29.98 kg/capita/ year, up from 22.58 kg/capita/year in 2004. In Jakarta no less than 6,000 pecel catfish stalls have been registered with the Indonesian Street Vendors Association (APKLI). The popularity of catfish always increases every year. This is inseparable from the myriad benefits of this murmured fish meat. The nutritional content found in catfish is a cheap source of valuable protein. As we know protein is very necessary for the growth of the fetus in the womb. Even the nutrition contained in 2.5 kg of catfish is equivalent to the nutrition of 1 kg of beef. The high phosphorus in catfish meat adds to the benefits of the fish, especially for pregnant women and their fetuses. In addition to phosphorus, potassium and sodium in catfish are also useful as the best food source for the heart and blood vessels. By regularly consuming catfish, it helps the heart work in pregnant mudcat women so that the blood will be pumped properly. The allegation that there are cancer cells in catfish cannot be believed to be true, this is reinforced by the statement of cancer experts from the Indonesian Oncology Association. Currently there is no research that states that eating catfish can trigger cancer, said dr.Dradjat R Suardi, SpB (K) Onk, a cancer expert from the Indonesian Oncology Association.
berita_id: Benarkah setiap gigitan daging ikan lele dapat memicu 3000 sel kanker dalam tubuh kita?Ikan lele adalah ikan air tawar, yang biasanya tinggal di tempat -tempat kritis seperti sawah, kolam ikan yang kotor dan berlumpur dan rawa -rawa.Banyak ikan lele tinggal di tempat -tempat yang kekurangan oksigen.Ikan -ikan ini juga dikenal sebagai karnivora, karena mereka makan udang kecil dan cacing.Ikan lele juga dikenal sebagai spesies ikan yang tangguh, karena mereka dilengkapi dengan peralatan pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin, yang memungkinkan ikan lele untuk bertahan hidup dalam kondisi air yang tercemar dan kotor.Cara hidup dan tumbuh di tempat yang begitu kotor ini telah menyebabkan tuduhan bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker.Namun, saat ini, ikan lele yang beredar di pasar bukanlah ikan lele yang hidup di alam liar.Saat ini, ada banyak pertanian ikan lele di kolam, dengan memberikan pakan berkualitas baik dan mengendalikan kebersihan kolam sehingga bebas dari polusi.Menurut data dari Kementerian Urusan Maritim dan Perikanan (KKP), produksi ikan lele pada tahun 2013 mencapai 543.461 ton, meningkat dari 441.217 ton pada 2012 dan 337.577 ton pada tahun 2011. Sementara itu, Capfish Konsumsi Menurut Badan Statistik Sentral (bps) adalah 29,98 KG/CAPIT, sesuai dengan statistik sentral (bps) 29,98 KG/tahun, CapiT dari Badan Statistik Sentral (bps) adalah 29,98 KG/CAPIT, menurut statistik sentral (bps) 29,98 KG/KG.2004. Di Jakarta tidak kurang dari 6.000 kios ikan lele Pecel telah terdaftar di Indonesian Street Vendors Association (APKLI).Popularitas ikan lele selalu meningkat setiap tahun.Ini tidak dapat dipisahkan dari berbagai manfaat daging ikan yang bergumam ini.Kandungan nutrisi yang ditemukan dalam ikan lele adalah sumber protein berharga yang murah.Seperti yang kita ketahui, protein sangat diperlukan untuk pertumbuhan janin di dalam rahim.Bahkan nutrisi yang terkandung dalam 2,5 kg ikan lele setara dengan nutrisi 1 kg daging sapi.Tingginya fosfor dalam daging ikan lele menambah manfaat ikan, terutama untuk wanita hamil dan janinnya.Selain fosfor, kalium dan natrium dalam lele juga berguna sebagai sumber makanan terbaik untuk pembuluh jantung dan darah.Dengan mengonsumsi ikan lele secara teratur, itu membantu jantung bekerja pada wanita mudcat hamil sehingga darah akan dipompa dengan benar.Tuduhan bahwa ada sel kanker dalam ikan lele tidak dapat diyakini benar, ini diperkuat oleh pernyataan para ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia.Saat ini tidak ada penelitian yang menyatakan bahwa makan lele dapat memicu kanker, kata Dr.Dradjat R Suardi, SPB (K) Onk, seorang ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia.

berita: The Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao City, Philippines, was forced to destroy Ponorogo reog which has been an asset since 1988 on 20 October 2015. The destruction by burning had to be done because Ponorogo reog was in a damaged condition and eaten by termites. In a release received by Metrotvnews.com, Saturday (31/10/2015), the burning was not at all an attempt by the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City to damage or eliminate Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The extermination was carried out carefully and with full respect for Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The Consulate General in Davao City would like to emphasize that the burning has absolutely nothing to do with efforts to expel idols extinction or spirits. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City is currently communicating with parties in Indonesia to seek a new replacement for Ponorogo Reog.
berita_id: Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia di Kota Davao, Filipina, terpaksa menghancurkan Ponorogo Reog yang telah menjadi aset sejak 1988 pada 20 Oktober 2015. Penghancuran oleh pembakaran harus dilakukan karena Ponorogo Reog berada dalam kondisi yang rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Dalam rilis yang diterima oleh Metrotvnews.com, Sabtu (31/10/2015), pembakaran sama sekali tidak merupakan upaya oleh konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao untuk merusak atau menghilangkan Reog Ponorogo sebagai aset budaya.Pemusnahan dilakukan dengan hati -hati dan dengan rasa hormat penuh terhadap Reog Ponorogo sebagai aset budaya.Konsulat Jenderal di Kota Davao ingin menekankan bahwa pembakaran sama sekali tidak ada hubungannya dengan upaya untuk mengeluarkan kepunahan atau roh berhala.Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao saat ini berkomunikasi dengan pihak -pihak di Indonesia untuk mencari pengganti baru untuk Ponorogo Reog.

berita: In a mouthful of catfish meat, there are 3,000 cancer cells. The title of the article in recent days has become a hot topic of discussion on social media. However, for catfish farmers, the article is considered a threat to their business continuity. The East Java Maritime Affairs and Fisheries Service accommodated the complaints of catfish farming business people in East Java who were offended by the circulation of the article. The article is a black campaign to bring down sales of the catfish market, whose market prospects continue to improve, said Head of the East Java Fisheries and Marine Service. According to him, catfish consumers are fish consumers at level II. At level I are consumers of high-end fish such as tuna, snapper, grouper, and so on. Class I consumers will not be shaken by the spread of any issue, but for class II consumers, this is still vulnerable to being shaken by issues. They may no longer eat catfish out of fear, he said. Heru said that East Java was the largest catfish producer nationally. From hundreds of catfish cultivators, in the last three years, catfish production in East Java continues to increase. In 2012 the production was recorded at 62,807 tons, increased in 2013 to 79,928 tons, while in 2014 it continued to increase to 96,830 tons. During 2014 production, 2,000 tons of which were exported abroad. Catfish production in East Java, said Heru, is produced in a healthy manner according to the standards of Good Fish Cultivation (CBIB) as regulated by the Government in Ministerial Decree No. 02/Men/2007. CBIB requires catfish cultured feed with healthy feed that focuses on health and food safety, he said. Periodically, the East Java Marine and Fisheries Service also monitors residues on catfish by sampling. this year there were 379 samples taken from various catfish producing regions such as Sidoarjo, Mojokerto, Kediri, and Tulungagung. As a result, the tested catfish commodities were free from residues of hormones, antibiotics, and heavy metals, he said. Heru suspected that the issue of catfish was deliberately raised by certain parties for the benefit of the fish business ahead of the 2015 MEA free market. There are parties who want to seize the catfish market and replace it with other fish commodities, he said. Articles about the content of cancer cells are uploaded on a number of websites. The article was also followed by a number of online media for discussion. The article, which was posted on July 29, 2015, describes the confession of a mobile phone catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong, who supplies catfish to roadside markets and restaurants in Hainan Province. The media then investigated the fish by observing seven samples of catfish producer ponds. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken and pig coops, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of catfish, before the test results come out.
berita_id: Dalam seteguk daging lele, ada 3.000 sel kanker.Judul artikel dalam beberapa hari terakhir telah menjadi topik panas diskusi di media sosial.Namun, bagi petani lele, artikel ini dianggap sebagai ancaman bagi kesinambungan bisnis mereka.Layanan Urusan Maritim dan Perikanan Java Timur mengakomodasi keluhan orang -orang bisnis petani lele di Jawa Timur yang tersinggung oleh sirkulasi artikel tersebut.Artikel ini adalah kampanye hitam untuk menurunkan penjualan pasar lele, yang prospek pasarnya terus meningkat, kata kepala perikanan Java Timur dan layanan kelautan.Menurutnya, konsumen lele adalah konsumen ikan di Level II.Pada level I adalah konsumen ikan kelas atas seperti tuna, kakap, kerapu, dan sebagainya.Konsumen Kelas I tidak akan terguncang oleh penyebaran masalah apa pun, tetapi untuk konsumen Kelas II, ini masih rentan untuk dikocok oleh masalah.Mereka mungkin tidak lagi makan lele karena takut, katanya.Heru mengatakan bahwa Jawa Timur adalah produsen ikan lele terbesar secara nasional.Dari ratusan budidaya lele, dalam tiga tahun terakhir, produksi ikan lele di Jawa Timur terus meningkat.Pada 2012 produksi dicatat pada 62.807 ton, meningkat pada 2013 menjadi 79.928 ton, sedangkan pada 2014 terus meningkat menjadi 96.830 ton.Selama produksi 2014, 2.000 ton di antaranya diekspor ke luar negeri.Produksi lele di Jawa Timur, kata Heru, diproduksi dengan cara yang sehat sesuai dengan standar penanaman ikan yang baik (CBIB) sebagaimana diatur oleh pemerintah dalam Keputusan Menteri No. 02/Men/2007.CBIB membutuhkan feed yang dikultur ikan lele dengan pakan sehat yang berfokus pada kesehatan dan keamanan pangan, katanya.Secara berkala, East Java Marine and Fisheries Service juga memantau residu pada ikan lele dengan pengambilan sampel.Tahun ini ada 379 sampel yang diambil dari berbagai daerah penghasil lele seperti Sidoarjo, Mojokerto, Kediri, dan Tulungagung.Akibatnya, komoditas ikan lele yang diuji bebas dari residu hormon, antibiotik, dan logam berat, katanya.Heru menduga bahwa masalah ikan lele sengaja dibesarkan oleh pihak -pihak tertentu untuk kepentingan bisnis ikan menjelang Pasar Bebas MEA 2015.Ada pihak yang ingin merebut pasar lele dan menggantinya dengan komoditas ikan lainnya, katanya.Artikel tentang konten sel kanker diunggah di sejumlah situs web.Artikel ini juga diikuti oleh sejumlah media online untuk diskusi.Artikel, yang diposting pada 29 Juli 2015, menggambarkan pengakuan petani ikan lele ponsel dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-Hong, yang memasok ikan lele ke pasar jalan dan restoran di provinsi Hainan.Media kemudian menyelidiki ikan dengan mengamati tujuh sampel kolam produsen ikan lele.Tujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sedangkan di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Para petani ikan disarankan untuk menangguhkan penjualan ikan lele, sebelum hasil tes keluar.

berita: It went viral with the Call for Netizens to uninstall the Traveloka application. This invitation was observed milling about on social media sharing Tuesday (11/14/2017). This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. KepriNews.co.id was monitored on Tuesday (14/11/2017) on social media Twitter the hashtag #uninstalltraveloka was trending first on Twitter Indonesia. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up enounce from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtags #BoikotTraveloka and #uninstalltraveloka have become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. Derianto and Ananda are two of the five outstanding Kanisius College alumni who received awards at this event. Besides the two, there were Father Magnis Suseno (a Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (a Scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). As reported by KepriNews.co.id from the Detik.com page Tuesday (14/11/2017) When contacted, Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. But he was unable to attend. "Actually, Mr. Deri (Derianto) was not present. He was on a business trip that day. So if it is said that Mr. Deri is there and it is called to provide support (to Ananda), he is not there," said Busyra.
berita_id: Itu menjadi viral dengan panggilan netizens untuk menghapus aplikasi Traveloka.Undangan ini diamati penggilingan tentang pembagian media sosial Selasa (11/14/2017).Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Keprinews.co.id dipantau pada hari Selasa (14/11/2017) di media sosial Twitter Tagar #uninstalltraveloka tren pertama di Twitter Indonesia.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri ENOUNCE dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka dan #uninstalltraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.DeRianto dan Ananda adalah dua dari lima alumni Kanisius College yang luar biasa yang menerima penghargaan di acara ini.Selain keduanya, ada ayah Magnis Suseno (sosok Jesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (seorang pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farha).Seperti yang dilaporkan oleh Keprinews.co.id dari halaman Detik.com Selasa (14/11/2017) ketika dihubungi, manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Tapi dia tidak bisa hadir."Sebenarnya, Tuan Deri (Derianto) tidak ada. Dia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis hari itu. Jadi jika dikatakan bahwa Tuan Deri ada di sana dan dipanggil untuk memberikan dukungan (kepada Ananda), dia tidak ada di sana," kata Busyra.

berita: In various local media, news spread widely that Mother Illiza (Mayor of Banda Aceh) forbade Pokemon Go. The reason is because it means 'I am Jewish'. This was obtained by the mother through various news related to the meaning of the word Pokemon which was shared with her through various online media. I came to know about this reason after Mother later apologized to the public regarding her statement that forbids Pokemon Go. "Sorry if anyone offended Pokemon GO fans. I didn't mean anything, I commented that because of the many news that was shared with me about the meaning of Pokemon," the mother requested. There is no point in exaggerating this matter. There is also no purpose to harass the Mother, let alone question the Mother's Indonesian spelling and grammar, which in my opinion there are still many mistakes here and there. I am quite appreciative of his apology. Because we rarely find leaders who voluntarily apologize if they are wrong. I remember very well reading an article about the meaning of the word Pokemon 3 months ago through an online media in Indonesia. This media quoted it from dailymirror. He said, in Iraq Pokemon cartoons were banned during the reign of Saddam Hussein. Furthermore, the media explained that the ban was revealed through an Iraqi state document confiscated by American troops in 2004. The document said that the ban was carried out because of its negative meaning in the Syriac language (Syrian language) used by that country. Still according to the document, Pokemon is said to be very similar to the same term in that language which if interpreted in Indonesian is 'I am Jewish'. Likewise with the characters Pikachu and Charmander. These two words respectively in Syriac mean 'Be a Jew' and 'God Is Weak'. That's why Saddam was "allergic" to the terms in this Pokemon cartoon that (still according to the document) he banned them to prevent Jewish influences from entering the nation's children and banning culture. I think this is where the initial news spread that Pokemon means "I'm Jewish". As a result, some people are against this term because they hate Jews (perhaps). Regardless of whether or not there is such a document or there is a “shrimp behind the dent” in the news by America, I try to find a common thread. I concluded then that there were some people who misunderstood the news. Either because I only heard from other people, just read the title, or misinterpreted it after reading it. Mistakes like that are commonplace because there is no ivory that is not cracked. However, it is very unfortunate because it can cause extraordinary commotion among the people due to the birth of a misleading "fatwa" without first crosschecking. If it is true that Saddam Husein banned Pokemon from showing in his country for reasons as quoted by the online media, we need to be careful to understand that he banned it because the word which is almost the same form is also in his language. It's just that coincidence has a negative meaning. So, in this case Saddam Husein compares the words produced by other countries (Japan as the country of Pokomen) with the language of his country. Attempts to interpret a word between one language and another because the form is the same, but the meaning is actually different in language review is commonplace and need not be a problem as long as it does not result in misunderstanding, let alone blind imitation. In fact, many of the world's language vocabularies have the same shape as other linguistic vocabularies, but have negative meanings, and this is not accidental. I remember exactly the largest car manufacturer in India, Tata Motors, changing the name of its newest car at that time, namely Zica. The reason, the name is similar to the name of a virus that is endemic in the United States. Likewise with the name of the Chevrolet Nova car made by General Motors which had to be replaced when it was sold in Spanish-speaking countries because it meant "not working". Likewise with the Mitsubishi Pajero. This car also does not sell well in Spanish-speaking countries because the Pajero in Spanish means 'lazy' or 'unreliable'. Even more ridiculous is the Mercedes Benz Vito. This car is guaranteed not to be sold in Sweden because "Vito" means 'female genitals'. So, because of the negative meaning of these words, many cars do not sell in the country of destination of the car manufacturer. All solely because of the negative meaning it carries. Perhaps there is a certain belief by the people who use the language if the car is purchased. Call it for example the Chevrolet Nova which means 'not working' or the Pajero 'lazy'. People who use this language may believe that if purchased, this car will not run or be tough in the field. However, in fact we do not see that. So, why did the car sell well in Indonesia, as well as in Aceh? Yes, of course because these words do not exist in our language. Now, after we know these names have negative meanings in Spanish, are we then reluctant to buy them or resell them to those who have already bought them? Of course not, not because these cars have proven to be tough in the field. Even if it is damaged or doesn't work, it's certainly not because of a negative meaning, but simply because of certain damage to the car. There is a similarity in the form of a word in a language with another language, but it has a negative meaning, of course, not only in the languages ​​of the world. We also have our language. Call it, for example, between the Acehnese language and the Gayo language. The Acehnese language has a utôh vocabulary which means 'builder'. However, when it comes to the Gayo language, words that are almost the same in form and pronunciation have negative meanings in that language. So, because of its negative meaning in the Gayo language, is it then forbidden to use the word utôh in the Acehnese language? Of course not not. The proof is that we still use it to this day and it doesn't need to be banned, it is said that it is again forbidden. Such cases do not only occur between languages, but also within a language. Call it the word ipôk (Acehnese language used by some people in the south-west region). In the Acehnese language in this area, ipôk means 'pocket', but will be laughed at by some Acehnese speakers in the eastern region because of its negative meaning in the Acehnese dialect of that area. Because of this, users of the Acehnese language in the south-west region certainly don't have to bother looking for other words or force themselves to use balum which is considered to have the same meaning as ipôk and does not seem negative. Likewise, the users of the Acehnese language in the eastern region. They certainly don't need to replace or use lumus to find another word for boh pik 'gambas' because of its negative meaning in the Acehnese language in the south-west region. The same case also occurs in Indonesian. We don't need to complain about finding a substitute for my word with another pronoun because the origin of the word is from sahaya which means 'slave'. Likewise, looking for a substitute for the word champion because of its negative initial meaning, namely the activity of fighting cocks. Of course it's pointless and pointless. Why did all that happen? The answer, of course, is that language has a close relationship with the culture of its speakers. The Acehnese language is very closely related to the culture of the Acehnese language user community itself. The same goes for the Spanish I mentioned above. This relationship, in my opinion, is one-way (only between the language and the user of that language). So, it can't be related to other people's cultures, which of course have different languages. Indonesian language associated with the Suriani language certainly does not "fit" because of its culture. Likewise, the word Pokemon used by Japan will never be compatible with the Suriani language, let alone with Indonesian. The Acehnese language associated with the Gayo language will also not be in sync, again because of the culture. It is unimaginable that quite a number of words must be replaced when two or more languages ​​are harmonized in meaning because of the same form and pronunciation. Even if it is forced, there will be a cultural clash that results in uproar in society. Therefore, be wise in language and understand the language. Remember, language can be a source of conflict if misused.

The reog ponorogo art community in Jabodetabek, Monday (2/11) met with Indonesian Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemenlu) officials to ask about the burning of reog instruments at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao City, Philippines. Director of Information and Media at the Indonesian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Siti Sofia Sudarma, said that as many as six reog Ponorogo administrators met with her party to express their disappointment regarding the burning. During the meeting, the community also said that the burning hurt the feelings of the Reog Ponorogo community and was a form of destruction of cultural assets that became Indonesian cultural heritage. “They also gave a letter to the Foreign Minister and asked the Foreign Ministry to clarify this case, starting from the chronology, motive, to the perpetrators. We accommodate all their concerns and will convey the letter to the Minister of Foreign Affairs (Retno Marsudi)," he told Republika.co.id, Tuesday (3/11). Siti admitted that she had actually clear up clarified to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City by telephone. The Consul General, he said, admitted that he had committed the arson. He added that the burning had to be carried out because the 30-year-old art instrument was damaged and eaten by termites. When Siti said the reason, one of the community members who donated the equipment to the Consulate General denied it. Members of the community said the equipment was made in 2007 and was judged not to be too fragile. Siti in the near future will send a team to review directly to the field. This step also clarifies the burning of reog equipment. "We don't know when the team will go there, but what is clear is as soon as possible. We are just waiting for orders from the leadership," he said.
berita_id: Komunitas seni Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang di Jabodetabek, Senin (2/11) bertemu dengan para pejabat Kementerian Luar Negeri Indonesia (Kemenlu) untuk bertanya tentang pembakaran instrumen reog di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) di Kota Davao, Filipina.Direktur Informasi dan Media di Kementerian Luar Negeri Indonesia, Siti Sofia Sudarma, mengatakan bahwa sebanyak enam administrator Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang bertemu dengan partainya untuk mengungkapkan kekecewaan mereka mengenai pembakaran.Selama pertemuan itu, masyarakat juga mengatakan bahwa pembakaran melukai perasaan komunitas Ponorogo yang reog dan merupakan bentuk penghancuran aset budaya yang menjadi warisan budaya Indonesia."Mereka juga memberikan surat kepada Menteri Luar Negeri dan meminta Kementerian Luar Negeri untuk mengklarifikasi kasus ini, mulai dari kronologi, motif, kepada para pelaku. Kami mengakomodasi semua keprihatinan mereka dan akan menyampaikan surat itu kepada Menteri Luar Negeri (Retno Marsudi)," katanya kepada Republika.co.id, Selasa (3/11).Siti mengakui bahwa dia benar -benar telah membersihkan yang diklarifikasi kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Kota Davao melalui telepon.Konsul Jenderal, katanya, mengakui bahwa dia telah melakukan pembakaran.Dia menambahkan bahwa pembakaran harus dilakukan karena instrumen seni berusia 30 tahun rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Ketika Siti mengatakan alasannya, salah satu anggota masyarakat yang menyumbangkan peralatan kepada Konsulat Jenderal membantahnya.Anggota masyarakat mengatakan peralatan itu dibuat pada tahun 2007 dan dinilai tidak terlalu rapuh.Siti dalam waktu dekat akan mengirim tim untuk ditinjau langsung ke lapangan.Langkah ini juga mengklarifikasi pembakaran peralatan reog."Kami tidak tahu kapan tim akan pergi ke sana, tetapi yang jelas adalah sesegera mungkin. Kami hanya menunggu perintah dari kepemimpinan," katanya.

berita: Jakarta, to carry out actions to defend Islam and the State that will be carried out by the Muslim community, is a member of the Islamic Community Forum (FUI), which is already stifled by the behavior of the leaders of this country, where they should carry out the rules and laws firmly and correctly, but in reality they do not. thereby. This assumption led to the case of blasphemy against Islam carried out by the defendant Basuki Tjahaja Purnama alias Ahok, who is currently undergoing trial, it was not dismissed and the public considered that the reasons given seemed made up. Not even a few legal and state administration experts, including the former Chief Justice of the Constitutional Court, Mahfud MD, also criticized the government's attitude, especially the Minister of Home Affairs (Mendagri) Tjahjo Kumolo including President Joko Widodo alias Jokowi who was silent when Ahok was again given his seat as governor. While some regional heads actually experience the opposite. As a result, their demands in the action called the Action to Defend Islam and the State 212 will be carried out in front of the MPR building of the DPR RI, and apparently not a few participants came from several outside Jakarta. As a result, they tried to gather at the Istiqlal Mosque with the intention of carrying out the Fajr prayer in congregation, and also the weather conditions when this news was revealed were raining, as a result they tried to immediately enter shelter while waiting for the prayer time to enter. Apparently the fence of the Istiqlal Mosque is actually tightly closed, as received by this media, in the form of photos and descriptions, 5 minutes later when this news was revealed, the participants were also unable to enter to gather and perform the dawn prayer. "Istiqlal Mosque in Padlock…… no one can (may) fill pray Fajr…. What regime is this….. PKI challenges the Defenders of Islam….our war begins (Starts)… Allahu Akbar…..!” Thus the contents of the text in the description of the photo sent to this media. It can be seen in the photo that the participants are gathering and hoping that the door will be opened soon. Their anger was directed at the government, because the Istiqlal Mosque is managed directly under the Ministry of Religion through the Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI). Where the management of BPPMI is appointed and inaugurated directly by the Minister of Religion who is also in the structure as Chairman of BPPMI. Meanwhile, the responsibility is directly to the President. Meanwhile, it is related to the statement that mentions the involvement of the PKI, due to the connection with the PDI-P as the ruling party and also the main supporter of President Jokowi and also the DKI Jakarta Paslon Ahok-Djarot. And in PDIP itself, it is known that many generations of PKI leaders from the 1960s have filled it. And do not cover themselves even boldly and proudly they admit it. As once said by Member of the Indonesian House of Representatives Commission IX from PDIP, Ribka Tjiptaning, when interviewed and published by one of the media, on September 30, 2015.
berita_id: Jakarta, untuk melakukan tindakan untuk membela Islam dan negara yang akan dilakukan oleh komunitas Muslim, adalah anggota Forum Komunitas Islam (FUI), yang sudah tertahan oleh perilaku para pemimpin negara ini, di mana mereka harus melaksanakan aturan dan hukum dengan kuat dan benar, tetapi pada kenyataannya mereka tidak melakukannya.dengan demikian.Asumsi ini mengarah pada kasus penistaan ​​terhadap Islam yang dilakukan oleh terdakwa Basuki Tjahaja Purnama alias Ahok, yang saat ini sedang menjalani persidangan, itu tidak diberhentikan dan publik mempertimbangkan bahwa alasan yang diberikan tampaknya dibuat.Bahkan beberapa pakar administrasi hukum dan negara bagian, termasuk mantan Ketua Pengadilan Konstitusi, Mahfud MD, juga mengkritik sikap pemerintah, terutama Menteri Dalam Negeri (Mendagri) Tjahjo Kumolo termasuk Presiden Joko Widodo Alias ​​Jokowi yang diam ketika Ahok lagi diberi kursi sebagai gubernur.Sementara beberapa kepala regional benar -benar mengalami sebaliknya.Akibatnya, tuntutan mereka dalam tindakan yang disebut tindakan untuk membela Islam dan Negara 212 akan dilakukan di depan gedung MPR DPR RI, dan tampaknya tidak sedikit peserta yang datang dari beberapa di luar Jakarta.Akibatnya, mereka mencoba berkumpul di masjid Istiqlal dengan maksud melaksanakan doa Fajr di jemaat, dan juga kondisi cuaca ketika berita ini terungkap hujan, sebagai akibatnya mereka mencoba untuk segera memasuki tempat berlindung sambil menunggu waktu sholat masuk.Rupanya pagar masjid Istiqlal sebenarnya ditutup rapat, seperti yang diterima oleh media ini, dalam bentuk foto dan deskripsi, 5 menit kemudian ketika berita ini terungkap, para peserta juga tidak dapat masuk untuk berkumpul dan melakukan doa fajar."Masjid Istiqlal di gembok …… Tidak ada yang bisa (mungkin) mengisi doa fajr .... rezim apa ini ..... PKI menantang para pembela Islam .... Perang kita dimulai (dimulai) ... Allahu Akbar ...!"Dengan demikian isi teks dalam deskripsi foto yang dikirim ke media ini.Dapat dilihat di foto bahwa para peserta berkumpul dan berharap pintu akan segera dibuka.Kemarahan mereka diarahkan pada pemerintah, karena masjid Istiqlal dikelola langsung di bawah Kementerian Agama melalui Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal (BPPMI).Di mana manajemen BPPMI ditunjuk dan diresmikan secara langsung oleh Menteri Agama yang juga berada dalam struktur sebagai ketua BPPMI.Sementara itu, tanggung jawabnya langsung kepada Presiden.Sementara itu, ini terkait dengan pernyataan yang menyebutkan keterlibatan PKI, karena hubungan dengan PDI-P sebagai partai yang berkuasa dan juga pendukung utama Presiden Jokowi dan juga DKI Jakarta Paslon Ahok-Djarot.Dan dalam PDIP sendiri, diketahui bahwa banyak generasi pemimpin PKI dari tahun 1960 -an telah mengisinya.Dan jangan menutupi diri mereka bahkan dengan berani dan bangga mereka mengakuinya.Seperti yang pernah dikatakan oleh anggota Komisi IX Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia dari PDIP, Ribka Tjiptaning, ketika diwawancarai dan diterbitkan oleh salah satu media, pada 30 September 2015.

berita: Maybe some of the readers have read articles circulating on social media about needling as first aid for stroke patients as shown in the image below. Is this true or just a hoax / myth? Stroke is a neurological emergency characterized by symptoms such as weakness on one side of the body, a tilted face to one side, and difficulty speaking. These symptoms generally appear suddenly. This disorder in general can be caused patient role by a blockage in a blood vessel in the brain (ischemic stroke) or a rupture of a blood vessel in the brain (hemorrhagic stroke). Stroke Relief. If you feel or find a relative with symptoms of a stroke, you must immediately be taken to the hospital. As much as possible, the destination hospital at least has CT Scan facilities. With the CT Scan, medical personnel can determine the type of stroke experienced by the patient. This is very important because the treatment for ischemic stroke and hemorrhagic stroke is different. In ischemic stroke, the goal of help is to destroy the blood clot that is blocking the blood vessels of the brain. The method that is commonly done is with drugs, it can also be with endovascular procedures. Meanwhile, in hemorrhagic stroke, the main goal of treatment is to stop the bleeding. Needlestick in Stroke Aid There is no official reference that recommends this method for first aid in stroke patients. In ischemic stroke patients, this method is clearly not useful for destroying the blockage in the brain because there is no relationship at all. In the case of hemorrhagic stroke, it is true that patients generally have high blood pressure so that the brain blood vessels burst. However, bleeding through the fingertips cannot lower blood pressure and stop bleeding in the brain. This is because the blood that is removed by inserting the needle in the fingertip is very little so that it does not have a significant effect on blood pressure. In addition, the human brain gets 20% of its blood supply from the heart pump and the body will always try to maintain this amount. So, even though we have removed the patient's blood, the heart will still pump blood to the brain. Dangers of Needling in Stroke Aid In addition to not providing good benefits to patients, it turns out that needling also has a negative impact on patients. The bad impact is that the patient is late in getting the right help because time is wasted on sterilizing needles and performing punctures. The stabbing process causes wounds and can cause infection. Conclusion It can be concluded that finger pricking with a needle in stroke patients is not beneficial and can actually harm the patient. If you find a patient with symptoms of a stroke, the help we can provide is to take the patient as quickly as possible to the hospital.
berita_id: Mungkin beberapa pembaca telah membaca artikel yang beredar di media sosial tentang tusuk jarum sebagai pertolongan pertama untuk pasien stroke seperti yang ditunjukkan pada gambar di bawah ini.Apakah ini benar atau hanya tipuan / mitos?Stroke adalah keadaan darurat neurologis yang ditandai dengan gejala seperti kelemahan di satu sisi tubuh, wajah miring ke satu sisi, dan kesulitan berbicara.Gejala -gejala ini umumnya muncul tiba -tiba.Gangguan ini secara umum dapat disebabkan peran pasien dengan penyumbatan pada pembuluh darah di otak (stroke iskemik) atau pecahnya pembuluh darah di otak (stroke hemoragik).Bantuan stroke.Jika Anda merasakan atau menemukan kerabat dengan gejala stroke, Anda harus segera dibawa ke rumah sakit.Sebisa mungkin, rumah sakit tujuan setidaknya memiliki fasilitas CT scan.Dengan CT scan, tenaga medis dapat menentukan jenis stroke yang dialami oleh pasien.Ini sangat penting karena pengobatan untuk stroke iskemik dan stroke hemoragik berbeda.Dalam stroke iskemik, tujuan bantuan adalah untuk menghancurkan gumpalan darah yang menghalangi pembuluh darah otak.Metode yang biasanya dilakukan adalah dengan obat -obatan, itu juga bisa dengan prosedur endovaskular.Sementara itu, dalam stroke hemoragik, tujuan utama pengobatan adalah untuk menghentikan pendarahan.Needlestick in Stroke Aid Tidak ada referensi resmi yang merekomendasikan metode ini untuk pertolongan pertama pada pasien stroke.Pada pasien stroke iskemik, metode ini jelas tidak berguna untuk menghancurkan penyumbatan di otak karena tidak ada hubungan sama sekali.Dalam kasus stroke hemoragik, memang benar bahwa pasien umumnya memiliki tekanan darah tinggi sehingga pembuluh darah otak meledak.Namun, pendarahan melalui ujung jari tidak dapat menurunkan tekanan darah dan menghentikan pendarahan di otak.Ini karena darah yang dihilangkan dengan memasukkan jarum di ujung jari sangat sedikit sehingga tidak memiliki efek signifikan pada tekanan darah.Selain itu, otak manusia mendapat 20% dari suplai darahnya dari pompa jantung dan tubuh akan selalu berusaha mempertahankan jumlah ini.Jadi, meskipun kami telah menghilangkan darah pasien, jantung masih akan memompa darah ke otak.Bahaya tusuk jarum dalam bantuan stroke selain tidak memberikan manfaat yang baik bagi pasien, ternyata tusuk jarum juga memiliki dampak negatif pada pasien.Dampak buruknya adalah bahwa pasien terlambat mendapatkan bantuan yang tepat karena waktu terbuang sia -sia pada jarum sterilisasi dan melakukan tusukan.Proses penikaman menyebabkan luka dan dapat menyebabkan infeksi.Kesimpulan Dapat disimpulkan bahwa tusukan jari dengan jarum pada pasien stroke tidak menguntungkan dan benar -benar dapat membahayakan pasien.Jika Anda menemukan pasien dengan gejala stroke, bantuan yang dapat kami berikan adalah membawa pasien secepat mungkin ke rumah sakit.

berita: Surabaya (SI Online) -Surabaya City Government officials conducted raids on the circulation and trade of candy packed with baby pacifiers, throughout elementary schools. The excitement was triggered by the circulation of news that immediately went viral on social media networks, revealing the confession of a number of children feeling dizzy after consuming pacifiers. Allegedly, this type of candy contains drugs. “It is not yet known whether it contains drugs or other dangerous substances; We still need research in the laboratory,” said an officer from the Surabaya City Civil Service Police Unit (Satpol PP), after conducting a raid recently. Candy pacifiers, packaged differently from most candy. In the form of a whitish powder that tends to be pink, wrapped in paper. On the outside of the wrapper or packaging, it says Hard Candy. Likewise, on the box packaging containing 20 packs of pacifiers, it also reads hard candy. How to consume; The powder is put into a bottle, and given water according to the amount stated in the manufacturer's instructions. The bottle is then closed with a lid equipped with a rubber teat (like a baby pacifier). The bottle is daughter then shaken gently, until the mixture thickens and is ready to be consumed by sucking from the tip of the teat, like a baby or toddler drinking milk. “The way this is made is so much fun. The powder is put in a bottle and then given water. The lid with the pacifier is attached tightly, then shaken, like a mother making milk for a sister. The powder that has been mixed with water thickens and is ready to be sucked through the tip of the teat,” said one of the fifth grade students of an elementary school by revealing that this candy tastes sweet and has a sour taste. Another student said that this type of candy had been traded in the school environment for a long time. Not in the school canteen, but by traders outside the school's front yard fence. “The price is a pack of a thousand elephant dolls. While the one with a picture of a swan, one thousand can get two packs,” he said and added, this candy is in great demand. Because the price is cheap, the shape is attractive, as well as how to prepare the candy until it is consumed, it is very fun. Previously, about the circulation of this candy had been widely circulated on social media networks, especially on Whatsapp (WA) and others on Facebook and even Instagram. Called, candy is widely circulated in elementary schools. Some of them even revealed the confession of a number of children, after consuming pacifiers they felt dizzy. Among posting photos on social media networks, a member of the Satpol PP is holding a candy pacifier. Followed by writing; "DOT candy, allegedly contains drugs. Please help spread this information, mother, so that our sons / daughters are protected from dangerous snacks." The People's Welfare Section (Kesra) of a number of sub-district offices, together with officers from the Kelurahan level, Trantibbang and supported by Satpol PP, acts as if simultaneously working with the support of police officers, observing the circulation of this candy. Even then take a number of samples to be investigated further about the substance content of the candy which is said to cause dizziness. The social media network also mentions the raids that have been carried out by officers in the city center and four corners of the city of Surabaya; covers 14 districts. In the District of Pabean Cantikan at SD Krembangan Utara 2/57. Wiyung District at SDN 1 Balas klumprik and SDN Babatan IV, V. Karang-Pilang sub-district at SDN Begongin Kedurus I, SDN 1 Karang-Pilang and TK Darma Praja. The sub-district of the field at SDN Petemon. Sambikerep District in SDN Sambikerep 1 and 5. Sukolilo District on Jalan Kejawen VIII and Pasar Keputih Lama. Tambaksari District at SDN Gading VII and SDN Tambaksari 1. Then in the District of Trenggilis Mejoyo at SDN Kedangsari 8, SDN Trenggilis Mejoyo and SDN Panjangjiwo. Jambangan District in SDN Kebonsari 10, SDN Pagesangan, and Komplek Komplek Kebonsari and Pag3esangan IV RT 3. In Tandes Subdistrict, Romli Thammim Elementary School and Al Faruq Bulak Rukem Kindergarten. Gubeng District at Mojo Elementary School, Mojoklangru Kidul Street. Simokerto District in Simokerto VI/139 Elementary School and YPPI Elementary School. Gununganyar District in Al Islah Elementary School and Mifta'ul Ulum Elementary School. In addition, raids were also carried out in a number of other elementary schools, including SD Yapita, SDN 245, all SD Muhammadiyah and SD Bunga Bangsa.
berita_id: Surabaya (SI Online) -Pejabat pemerintah Kota Surabaya melakukan penggerebekan pada sirkulasi dan perdagangan permen yang dikemas dengan dot bayi, di seluruh sekolah dasar.Kegembiraan itu dipicu oleh sirkulasi berita yang segera menjadi viral di jaringan media sosial, mengungkapkan pengakuan sejumlah anak merasa pusing setelah mengonsumsi dot.Diduga, permen jenis ini berisi obat -obatan."Belum diketahui apakah mengandung obat -obatan atau zat berbahaya lainnya; kami masih membutuhkan penelitian di laboratorium," kata seorang petugas dari Unit Polisi Polisi Sipil Kota Surabaya (Satpol PP), setelah melakukan serangan baru -baru ini.Permen dot, dikemas secara berbeda dari kebanyakan permen.Dalam bentuk bubuk keputihan yang cenderung merah muda, dibungkus kertas.Di bagian luar pembungkus atau kemasan, katanya permen keras.Demikian juga, pada kemasan kotak yang berisi 20 paket dot, itu juga membaca permen keras.Cara mengkonsumsi;Bubuk dimasukkan ke dalam botol, dan diberi air sesuai dengan jumlah yang dinyatakan dalam instruksi pabrik.Botol kemudian ditutup dengan tutup yang dilengkapi dengan dot karet (seperti dot bayi).Botolnya adalah anak perempuan kemudian terguncang dengan lembut, sampai campuran mengental dan siap dikonsumsi dengan mengisap dari ujung dot, seperti bayi atau balita minum susu.“The way this is made is so much fun. The powder is put in a bottle and then given water. The lid with the pacifier is attached tightly, then shaken, like a mother making milk for a sister. The powder that has been mixed with water thickens and is ready to be sucked through the tip of the teat,” said one of the fifth grade students of an elementary school by revealing that this candy tastes sweet and has a sour taste.Siswa lain mengatakan bahwa permen jenis ini telah diperdagangkan di lingkungan sekolah sejak lama.Bukan di kantin sekolah, tetapi oleh pedagang di luar pagar halaman depan sekolah."Harganya adalah sebungkus seribu boneka gajah. Sementara yang memiliki gambar angsa, seribu bisa mendapatkan dua bungkus," katanya dan menambahkan, permen ini sangat diminati.Karena harganya murah, bentuknya menarik, serta bagaimana menyiapkan permen sampai dikonsumsi, sangat menyenangkan.Sebelumnya, tentang sirkulasi permen ini telah diedarkan secara luas di jaringan media sosial, terutama di WhatsApp (WA) dan lainnya di Facebook dan bahkan Instagram.Disebut, permen secara luas diedarkan di sekolah dasar.Beberapa dari mereka bahkan mengungkapkan pengakuan sejumlah anak, setelah mengonsumsi dot mereka merasa pusing.Di antara memposting foto di jaringan media sosial, anggota SATPOL PP memegang dot permen.Diikuti dengan menulis;"Dot Candy, diduga mengandung narkoba. Tolong bantu menyebarkan informasi ini, ibu, sehingga putra / putri kita terlindungi dari makanan ringan yang berbahaya."Bagian Kesejahteraan Rakyat (Kesra) dari sejumlah kantor sub-distrik, bersama dengan petugas dari tingkat Kelurahan, Trantibbang dan didukung oleh Satpol PP, bertindak seolah-olah bekerja secara bersamaan dengan dukungan petugas polisi, mengamati peredaran permen ini.Bahkan kemudian mengambil sejumlah sampel untuk diselidiki lebih lanjut tentang kandungan zat permen yang dikatakan menyebabkan pusing.Jaringan media sosial juga menyebutkan penggerebekan yang telah dilakukan oleh petugas di pusat kota dan empat sudut kota Surabaya;mencakup 14 distrik.Di distrik Pabean Canyikan di Sd Krembangan Utara 2/57.Distrik Wiyung di Sdn 1 Balas Klumprik dan Sdn Babatan IV, V. Karang-Pilan Sub-distrik di Sdn Begongin Kedurus I, Sdn 1 Karang-Pilang dan Tk Darma Praja.Sub-distrik lapangan di SDN Petemon.Distrik Sambikerep di SDN Sambikerep 1 dan 5. Distrik Sukolilo di Jalan Kejawen VIII dan Pasar KEPUTIH LAMA.Distrik Tambaksari di Sdn Gading VII dan Sdn Tambaksari 1. Kemudian di distrik Trenggilis Mejoyo di Sdn Kedangsari 8, Sdn Trenggilis Mejoyo dan Sdn Panjangjiwo.Distrik Jambangan di SDN Kebonsari 10, Sdn Pagesangan, dan Komplek Komplek Kebonsari dan Pag3esangan IV Rt 3. Di Tandes Subdistrict, Sekolah Dasar Romli Thammim dan Al Faruq Bulak Rukem TK.Distrik Gubeng di Sekolah Dasar Mojo, Mojoklangru Kidul Street.Distrik Simokerto di Simokerto VI/139 Sekolah Dasar dan Sekolah Dasar YPPI.Distrik Gununganyar di Sekolah Dasar Al Islah dan Sekolah Dasar Mifta'ul Ulum.Selain itu, penggerebekan juga dilakukan di sejumlah sekolah dasar lainnya, termasuk SD Yapita, SDN 245, semua SD Muhammadiyah dan SD Bunga Bangsa.

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia will increase drastically to reach Rp. 500 million per month or Rp. 6.6 billion per year. This increase will occur if the Draft Government Regulation on Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities for Civil Servants is actually ratified. amounting to 96,000 points, found the figure of Rp 553 million According to Article 2 of Law number 7 of president 1978, the president's salary is 6 times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia (Chairman of the DPR, MA, and BPK). salary of IDR 5040000 per month Thus, the basic salary of the president is IDR 30240000 per month Presidential Decree 68/2001 also states that the allowance for the position of the President is IDR 32500000 So the total money received by the president each month is IDR 62740000 or IDR 752880000 per year According to the palace, this amount has not changed since 2001 The total salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia is relatively small compared to the leaders of the major countries in the world, the salary of President of the Republic of Indonesia Jokowi's identity is only higher than PRC President Xi Jinping who is paid USD 20,500 or IDR 283 million per year While the President of the United States Donald Trump has the smallest income, which is USD 1 per year Of course this is Trump's personal request. USD 3 billion University of Indonesia (UI) public policy observer Lina Miftahul Jannah said it was very natural for the President to have a very large income index. So the income received by the number one person in Indonesia was very high. "It makes sense too," she explained. At the same time as head of government, the duties, responsibilities, and risks of a President are very large. So according to him, it is not natural for an official to be paid a salary from the State Budget, whose salary is greater than the President. the palace has not been able to comment further It is a salary increase scheme for civil servants, the president and other state officials. Presidential spokesman Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo said his party had not received sufficient information about it. "I haven't received the information. The KPK leadership has also not been able to confirm the progress of the RPP
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis untuk mencapai RP.500 juta per bulan atau RP.6,6 miliar per tahun.Peningkatan ini akan terjadi jika rancangan peraturan pemerintah tentang gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas untuk pegawai negeri sebenarnya diratifikasi.Jumlah 96.000 poin, menemukan angka Rp 553 juta menurut Pasal 2 Hukum Nomor 7 dari Presiden 1978, gaji presiden adalah 6 kali gaji dasar pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia (ketua DPR, MA, dan BPK).Gaji IDR 5040000 per bulan dengan demikian, gaji dasar presiden adalah IDR 30240000 per bulan Keputusan Presiden 68/2001 juga menyatakan bahwa tunjangan untuk posisi presiden adalah IDR 32500000 sehingga total uang yang diterima oleh Presiden setiap bulan adalah PALACE Sejak 2001 yang tidak diubah sejak itu, No. IDR 752880000 per tahun, NOTE PALACE, PALACE, PALOCE Sejak 2001 atau IDR 75880000 per tahun, NOW IDR Sejak 2001 atau IDR 75280000 per tahun menurut PALACE, PALACE, PALACE, Sejak 2001 atau IDR 75880000 per tahun menurut PALACE, NOW IDR Sejak 2001 atau IDR NOW IDR Sejak 2001, NO NOW IDR Sejak 2001,Indonesia relatif kecil dibandingkan dengan para pemimpin negara -negara utama di dunia, gaji Presiden Republik Republik Indonesia Jokowi hanya lebih tinggi dari Presiden RRC Xi Jinping yang dibayar USD 20.500 atau IDR 283 juta per tahun ini sementara Presiden Amerika Serikat Donald memiliki pendapatan terkecil, yang merupakan USD 1 per tahun ini adalah kursus ini.USD 3 miliar University of Indonesia (UI) Pengamat Kebijakan Publik Lina Miftahul Jannah mengatakan sangat wajar bagi presiden untuk memiliki indeks pendapatan yang sangat besar.Jadi pendapatan yang diterima oleh orang nomor satu di Indonesia sangat tinggi."Itu juga masuk akal," jelasnya.Pada saat yang sama dengan kepala pemerintahan, tugas, tanggung jawab, dan risiko presiden sangat besar.Jadi menurutnya, tidak wajar bagi seorang pejabat untuk dibayar gaji dari anggaran negara, yang gajinya lebih besar dari presiden.Istana belum dapat berkomentar lebih lanjut bahwa ini adalah skema kenaikan gaji untuk pegawai negeri, presiden dan pejabat negara lainnya.Juru bicara presiden Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo mengatakan partainya belum menerima informasi yang cukup tentang hal itu."Saya belum menerima informasi. Kepemimpinan KPK juga tidak dapat mengkonfirmasi kemajuan RPP

berita: BeritaTeknologi.com Smartphones with curved screens, such as the Galaxy Round and G Flex, have not achieved significant results in leave the market. Especially with the very expensive price. However, this reportedly did not stop other smartphone companies from producing phones with curved screens. Apple's latest iPhone in 2014 was reportedly not left behind by using a curved screen. In a report written by Bloomberg, Apple's iPhone 6 will come with a major upgrade compared to the iPhone 5S. Sources from Bloomberg say that the iPhone 6 will not only come with a curved screen design. Apple is also said to be using additional sensors that can detect different pressure levels. In addition, Apple is also said to be preparing two iPhone 6 models, one of which will come with a 5.5-inch screen while the other will have a 4.7-inch screen. Both iPhone 6 models will come with a curved screen design.
berita_id: Smartphone BERITITKNOLOGI.com dengan layar melengkung, seperti Galaxy Round dan G Flex, belum mencapai hasil yang signifikan dalam meninggalkan pasar.Apalagi dengan harga yang sangat mahal.Namun, ini dilaporkan tidak menghentikan perusahaan smartphone lain dari memproduksi ponsel dengan layar melengkung.IPhone terbaru Apple pada tahun 2014 dilaporkan tidak tertinggal dengan menggunakan layar melengkung.Dalam sebuah laporan yang ditulis oleh Bloomberg, iPhone 6 Apple akan datang dengan peningkatan besar dibandingkan dengan iPhone 5s.Sumber dari Bloomberg mengatakan bahwa iPhone 6 tidak hanya akan datang dengan desain layar melengkung.Apple juga dikatakan menggunakan sensor tambahan yang dapat mendeteksi tingkat tekanan yang berbeda.Selain itu, Apple juga dikatakan menyiapkan dua model iPhone 6, salah satunya akan datang dengan layar 5,5 inci sementara yang lain akan memiliki layar 4,7 inci.Kedua model iPhone 6 akan datang dengan desain layar melengkung.

berita: Dental hygiene is a major factor in maintaining healthy teeth and mouth. You are required to clean your teeth using a toothbrush at least twice a day, after eating and before going to bed. Beware, the Issue of write up Toothbrushes Made of Pig Bristle has been circulating. related to toothbrushes Some toothbrush products are said to use pig bristles as the main ingredient. One of the accounts on the social network Facebook uploaded a brand of brush and wrote that the toothbrush came from boar bristles. In fact, the status has been shared more than 1000 times by his friends. with the name Hamirudin Hamzah said, if he was reprimanded by the cashier of a supermarket that the toothbrush he bought contained sea urchins. In the composition of the toothbrush there was the word Bristles, which is the hair of one of the animals. However, there is an account called Mindy Chin, which explains more about what it is bristles He wrote: This is so funny Bristles ad one of the toothbrush compositions, but not all of them come from pigs, it could be from other animals, Wednesday (5/10/2016) Therefore, not all toothbrushes that we use come from pig bristles. Be careful and choose a really halal toothbrush
berita_id: Kebersihan gigi adalah faktor utama dalam mempertahankan gigi dan mulut yang sehat.Anda diharuskan membersihkan gigi menggunakan sikat gigi setidaknya dua kali sehari, setelah makan dan sebelum tidur.Waspadalah, masalah penulisan sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah beredar.Terkait dengan sikat gigi beberapa produk sikat gigi dikatakan menggunakan bulu babi sebagai bahan utama.Salah satu akun di jejaring sosial Facebook mengunggah merek kuas dan menulis bahwa sikat gigi berasal dari bulu babi.Bahkan, statusnya telah dibagikan lebih dari 1000 kali oleh teman -temannya.Dengan nama Hamirudin Hamzah berkata, jika dia ditegur oleh kasir supermarket yang dibeli sikat gigi yang dibelinya berisi landak laut.Dalam komposisi sikat gigi ada kata bulu, yang merupakan rambut salah satu hewan.Namun, ada akun yang disebut Mindy Chin, yang menjelaskan lebih banyak tentang apa yang ditulisnya: Ini sangat lucu, dan salah satu komposisi sikat gigi, tetapi tidak semuanya berasal dari babi, itu bisa dari hewan lain, Rabu (5/10/2016) karena itu, tidak semua sikat gigi yang kami gunakan berasal dari Bristles babi.Hati -hati dan pilih sikat gigi yang benar -benar halal

berita: Rumors circulated in the world of social media, that there was a riot at the Mako Brimob Detention Center, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, on Friday (11/10/2017) at around 16.00 Wib. On Twitter, the riots were widely discussed. The owner of the Grand Duke of Condet Twitter account? @CondetWarrior wrote: Mako Brimob rioted this afternoon. Reportedly 3 blocks of the detention room caught fire & the doors were destroyed. According to my source, the reason was because a group of Police there threw the Al-Qur'an and hadith books belonging to the detainees. To complete the story, this account completes its tweet with a video that the owner of the account says the source sent him. The video shows a number of people who appear to be convicted of terrorism, making gestures that indicate that they are in a tense atmosphere, and then the camera, which appears to be from a cell phone, moves to reveal a shattered window. Grand captive Duke of Condet? @CondetWarrior : Just now my intelligence said it was a deliberate riot so that Ahok could be transferred from the Mobile Brigade Headquarters to be under house arrest. All possibilities exist, but what is clear is that if it is true that the police threw the Qur'an, then it is your business with the entire Muslim Ummah! While the LaskarPribumi account? @anggarabatubata mentions: viral & spread in the group that in mako there is a riot between ikhwah aseer vs Brimob. The cause of the incident that spread was that the Danbrimob detention center came to the isolation rooms of the asatidz then they randomly scrambled the rooms of the clerics to look for cellphones even though there was an ustad who was sick and they didn't care. NET public? @publik_net: riots at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters, Kelapa Dua, depok, terrorist prisoners set fire to and destroyed the room. because the guard ahmad and his team threw the Koran and caused the prisoners to go berserk. Quoted from Panjimas, it was stated that a social media channel reported that the riots occurred because the prisoners who were charged with terrorism cases were angry when they heard the news that there were guards who were suspected of harassing the Koran and the books of the clerics belonging to the prisoners. "Densus and the warden arrogantly entered the Ikhwan's room and the Koran was stepped on by Brimob, the warden and Densus finally caused the ikhwans to go on a rampage and destroy the Brimob mako detention room, the current situation is still tense ...," reads an excerpt from #AlfathChannel which is spread throughout the world. social media.
berita_id: Rumor beredar di dunia media sosial, bahwa ada kerusuhan di Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, pada hari Jumat (11/10/2017) di sekitar 16.00 WIB.Di Twitter, kerusuhan dibahas secara luas.Pemilik akun Grand Duke of Condet Twitter?@CondetWarrior menulis: Mako Brimob Rioted sore ini.Dilaporkan 3 blok ruang penahanan terbakar & pintu dihancurkan.Menurut sumber saya, alasannya adalah karena sekelompok polisi di sana melemparkan buku-buku al-Qur'an dan Hadits milik para tahanan.Untuk melengkapi cerita, akun ini melengkapi tweetnya dengan video bahwa pemilik akun mengatakan sumber mengirimnya.Video ini menunjukkan sejumlah orang yang tampaknya dihukum karena terorisme, membuat gerakan yang menunjukkan bahwa mereka berada dalam suasana tegang, dan kemudian kamera, yang tampaknya berasal dari ponsel, bergerak untuk mengungkapkan jendela yang hancur.Grand Captive Duke of Condet?@CondetWarrior: Baru saja kecerdasan saya mengatakan itu adalah kerusuhan yang disengaja sehingga Ahok dapat ditransfer dari markas brigade seluler yang ditahan di rumah.Semua kemungkinan ada, tetapi yang jelas adalah bahwa jika benar bahwa polisi melemparkan Al -Qur'an, maka itu adalah bisnis Anda dengan seluruh umat Muslim!Sedangkan akun Laskarpribumi?@ANGGARABATUBATA menyebutkan: viral & menyebar dalam kelompok bahwa di Mako ada kerusuhan antara ikhwah aseer vs brimob.Penyebab kejadian yang menyebar adalah bahwa pusat penahanan Danbrimob datang ke ruang isolasi Asatidz kemudian mereka secara acak mengacak -acak kamar para ulama untuk mencari ponsel meskipun ada Ustad yang sakit dan mereka tidak peduli.Net publik?@publik_net: Kerusuhan di markas Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua, Depok, tahanan teroris membakar dan menghancurkan ruangan.Karena penjaga Ahmad dan timnya melemparkan Alquran dan menyebabkan para tahanan mengamuk.Dikutip dari Panjimas, dinyatakan bahwa saluran media sosial melaporkan bahwa kerusuhan terjadi karena para tahanan yang didakwa dengan kasus -kasus terorisme marah ketika mereka mendengar berita bahwa ada penjaga yang diduga melecehkan Alquran dan buku -buku para ulama milik para tahanan."Densus dan sipir dengan sombong memasuki kamar Ikhwan dan Alquran diinjak oleh Brimob, sipir dan Densus akhirnya menyebabkan Ikhwan mengamuk dan menghancurkan ruang penahanan Brimob Mako di seluruh dunia yang tersebar di seluruh dunia.media sosial.

berita: Lately the virtual world has been making a fuss about brushes or brushes/toothbrushes made of "bristle" because they are DEFINITELY from pigs. Although we are required to be vigilant, not all bristle terms always refer to sea urchins. The lexical meaning of bristle is a short, stiff hair, fiber, etc (Webster's Dictionary). So all the hair, the stiff fiber, then the term will be referred to as bristle. Hair, stiff beard, can be categorized as bristle. Another example is the stiff fibers or pine leaves can also be referred to as bristle. So, how is its application in the industrial world? In the industrial world, bristle is indeed used as a material for making brushes or brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle can be sourced from animal hair or plant fibers or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. The animal hair used can be sourced from pigs, goats, horses, or camels. The plant fiber that has also been used as a brush or brush material is palm fiber. Nylon is also a synthetic fiber that is commonly used for brushes, brushes or toothbrushes. From the halal aspect, brushes and brushes, including toothbrushes derived from animal hair, are critical points. When the material is sea urchin then it should not be used because any material derived from pigs is both haram and unclean, either in dry or wet form.
