In addition, besides the prohibition of the substance, the MUI has issued a fatwa for anything derived from pork that is haram for its use (al-intifa') including the fur. But the problem is that not all brush or brush or toothbrush users are able to recognize whether the brush they are using is a brush or a brush that comes from pig bristles. One of the information that can be seen as a sign that the brush or brush is made of sea urchin is written as the product name, for example "Boar Bristle Brush". Boar is the English term for wild boar or wild boar. This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles. Toothbrush can also use this boar bristles. Amazon.com, a global online store also offers pig toothbrushes with the name "Fuchs Toothbrushes Pure Natural (Boar) Bristle Record V Adult Soft (Pack of 5)-Assorted colors by Fuchs Toothbrushes" (check this url http://www. .amazon.com/Fuchs-Toothbrushes-Natural-Bristle-Assorted/dp/B018IWRZ9K/ref=sr_1_3?s=beauty&ie=UTF8&qid=1455426484&sr=1-3&keywords=boar+bristle+toothbrush) and brush 1 TRUSTED Wooden Boar Hair Bristle Beard Brush by Leven Rose - Perfect For a Beard Grooming Kit for Men - Made of Boars Hair Bristles and Firm Natural Wood). Please check the url of this link http://www.amazon.com/dp/B0152BO0F2?psc=1. However, brushes, brushes, or toothbrushes are not always made from pigs even though they have electrocution bristle written on them, because the term bristle is still a general term. There are several manufacturers who have used goat hair or camel or horse hair as brush material or made of nylon. The last group of materials is clearly acceptable. When there is no information on the source of the material, at least a simple method can be used. To determine whether it is made from animal hair or not, the method in question is to burn the material. If it smells like burning hair or horns, better leave it alone. Materials from plastic or coconut fiber do not emit such a distinctive odor when burned.
berita_id: Akhir -akhir ini dunia virtual telah membuat keributan tentang sikat atau sikat/sikat gigi yang terbuat dari "bulu" karena mereka pasti dari babi.Meskipun kami diharuskan waspada, tidak semua istilah bulu selalu merujuk pada bulu babi.Arti leksikal dari bulu adalah rambut pendek, kaku, serat, dll (Kamus Webster).Jadi semua rambut, serat kaku, maka istilah ini akan disebut sebagai bulu.Rambut, jenggot kaku, dapat dikategorikan sebagai bulu.Contoh lain adalah serat kaku atau daun pinus juga dapat disebut sebagai bulu.Jadi, bagaimana penerapannya di dunia industri?Di dunia industri, Bristle memang digunakan sebagai bahan untuk membuat kuas atau sikat, termasuk sikat gigi.BRISTLE dapat bersumber dari rambut hewani atau serat tanaman atau serat sintetis seperti nilon dan silikon.Rambut hewan yang digunakan dapat bersumber dari babi, kambing, kuda, atau unta.Serat tanaman yang juga telah digunakan sebagai sikat atau bahan sikat adalah serat kelapa sawit.Nylon juga merupakan serat sintetis yang biasanya digunakan untuk kuas, sikat atau sikat gigi.Dari aspek halal, sikat dan sikat, termasuk sikat gigi yang berasal dari rambut hewani, adalah titik kritis.Ketika bahannya adalah landak laut maka tidak boleh digunakan karena bahan apa pun yang berasal dari babi adalah haram dan najis, baik dalam bentuk kering atau basah.Selain itu, selain larangan zat, MUI telah mengeluarkan fatwa untuk apa pun yang berasal dari daging babi yang merupakan haram untuk penggunaannya (al-intifa ') termasuk bulu.Tetapi masalahnya adalah tidak semua sikat atau sikat atau sikat gigi dapat mengenali apakah kuas yang mereka gunakan adalah kuas atau kuas yang berasal dari bulu babi.Salah satu informasi yang dapat dilihat sebagai tanda bahwa sikat atau kuas terbuat dari landak laut ditulis sebagai nama produk, misalnya "Boar Bristle Brush".Babi adalah istilah bahasa Inggris untuk babi hutan atau babi hutan.Ini berarti bahwa produk adalah kuas yang menggunakan bulu babi liar.Sikat gigi juga dapat menggunakan bulu babi ini.Amazon.com, toko online global juga menawarkan sikat gigi pigsi dengan nama "Fuchs Toothbrushes Pure Natural (Boar) Bristle Record v Dewasa Lembut (Paket 5) Warna-warna yang disebabkan oleh sikat gigi Fuchs" (periksa url ini http: // www..amazon.com/Fuchs-Toothbrushes-Natural-Bristle-Assorted/dp/B018IWRZ9K/ref=sr_1_3?s=beauty&ie=UTF8&qid=1455426484&sr=1-3&keywords=boar+bristle+toothbrush) and brush 1 TRUSTED Wooden Boar Hair Bristle Beard Brush by Leven Rose - Perfect For aKit Perawatan Jenggot untuk Pria - Terbuat dari bulu babi dan kayu alami yang kencang).Silakan periksa URL tautan ini http://www.amazon.com/dp/b0152bo0f2?psc=1.Namun, kuas, sikat, atau sikat gigi tidak selalu terbuat dari babi meskipun mereka memiliki bulu listrik yang tertulis di atasnya, karena istilah bulu masih merupakan istilah umum.Ada beberapa produsen yang menggunakan rambut kambing atau unta atau rambut kuda sebagai bahan sikat atau terbuat dari nilon.Kelompok material terakhir jelas dapat diterima.Ketika tidak ada informasi tentang sumber materi, setidaknya metode sederhana dapat digunakan.Untuk menentukan apakah itu terbuat dari rambut hewani atau tidak, metode yang dimaksud adalah membakar material.Jika baunya seperti rambut atau tanduk yang terbakar, lebih baik biarkan saja.Bahan dari plastik atau serat kelapa tidak memancarkan bau yang khas saat dibakar.

berita: Information for you, especially Muslims, to be more careful and careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use materials from non-halal. If you buy a toothbrush, check the packaging, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Sea urchin! Again, double-check the double check packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), Usually it says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". Share this info with your family and friends on Facebook so that more people can read it so you can avoid products that are not halal.
berita_id: Informasi untuk Anda, terutama Muslim, untuk lebih berhati-hati dan hati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan dari non-halal.Jika Anda membeli sikat gigi, periksa kemasannya, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti landak laut!Sekali lagi, periksa kembali kemasan cek ganda sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), biasanya dikatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% china bristle".Bagikan info ini dengan keluarga dan teman Anda di Facebook sehingga lebih banyak orang dapat membacanya sehingga Anda dapat menghindari produk yang tidak halal.

berita: Invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application are milling about on Twitter's timeline. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. There, the co-founder and CEO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, was also present. He greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech. Derianto's gesture was considered as support for Ananda's actions which were considered insulting to Governor Anies. I don't know who started it, this incident then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. Among netizens, there are also those who defend and assess that the Traveloka boycott will not have any impact on the hotel and travel ticket booking application. Derianto and Ananda are two of the five outstanding Kanisius College alumni who received awards at this event. regulator Besides the two, there were Father Magnis Suseno (a Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (a Scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma)
berita_id: Undangan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka sedang berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Di sana, salah satu pendiri dan CEO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, juga hadir.Dia menyapa dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah berjalan keluar dan pidato anies.Gerakan DeRianto dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda yang dianggap menghina gubernur.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, kejadian ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Di antara netizen, ada juga orang -orang yang membela dan menilai bahwa boikot Traveloka tidak akan berdampak pada aplikasi pemesanan tiket hotel dan perjalanan.DeRianto dan Ananda adalah dua dari lima alumni Kanisius College yang luar biasa yang menerima penghargaan di acara ini.Regulator Selain keduanya, ada ayah Magnis Suseno (sosok Jesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (seorang pemimpin pramuka) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farma)

berita: The virtual universe was shocked by Ananda Sukarlan's Walk Out (WO) action. The famous composer and pianist came out when DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan read a welcoming speech commemorating the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College, Saturday (11/11). The news immediately went viral in cyberspace. Not a few of the netizens who poured spicy comments. Recently, the hashtag uninstall Traveloka has become a trending topic. Why? Netizens consider Ananda Sukarlan's WO action to be intolerant. This includes actions taken by Traveloka boss Derianto Kusuma, who followed in Ananda's footsteps. From INDOPOS's observation, many accounts invite and post to uninstall the Traveloka application. As posted by the Instagram account @wollessunda. In the photo that was posted on his account, there was an image that  minutes read "In the act of harassment carried out by Ananda Sukarlan against Pa Anies Baswedan, the Muslim Governor of DKI Jakarta was also supported by Derianto Kusuma, the founder of Traveloka. Elo sell me buy". Connected with an invitation to delete the Traveloka application below. The same thing was also posted by the Instagram account @conan_back.911. The account owner posted a photo with the Traveloka logo. With the addition of the words "WO-Kan Traveloka". It doesn't just end there. INDOPOS's monitoring on the trends24.in site, the hashtag uninstall traveloka has become a trending topic since 1 hour ago. The trending topic ranking site in Indonesia wrote that #uninstalltraveloka was the most talked about one hour ago. Until this news was published, there has been no official clarification by Traveloka or Derianto Kusuma, as CTO and co-founder of Traveloka.
berita_id: Alam semesta virtual dikejutkan oleh tindakan Ananda Sukarlan (WO).Komposer dan pianis terkenal keluar ketika Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan membaca pidato yang menyambut untuk memperingati peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College, Sabtu (11/11).Berita itu segera menjadi viral di dunia maya.Tidak sedikit netizen yang menuangkan komentar pedas.Baru -baru ini, tagar uninstall Traveloka telah menjadi topik yang sedang tren.Mengapa?Netizen menganggap tindakan Ananda Sukarlan tidak toleran.Ini termasuk tindakan yang diambil oleh bos Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, yang mengikuti jejak Ananda.Dari pengamatan Indopos, banyak akun mengundang dan memposting untuk menghapus aplikasi Traveloka.Seperti yang diposting oleh akun Instagram @wollessunda.Dalam foto yang diposting di akunnya, ada gambar yang dibacakan menit "Dalam tindakan pelecehan yang dilakukan oleh Ananda Sukarlan terhadap Pa Anies Baswedan, gubernur Muslim DKI Jakarta juga didukung oleh DeRianto Kusuma, pendiri Traveloka. Elo menjual saya membeli".Terhubung dengan undangan untuk menghapus aplikasi Traveloka di bawah ini.Hal yang sama juga diposting oleh akun Instagram @conan_back.911.Pemilik akun memposting foto dengan logo Traveloka.Dengan tambahan kata "wo-kan traveloka".Itu tidak hanya berakhir di sana.Pemantauan Indopos di Situs Trends24. Di, tagar uninstall Traveloka telah menjadi topik yang sedang tren sejak 1 jam yang lalu.Situs peringkat topik tren di Indonesia menulis bahwa #uninstalltraveloka adalah yang paling banyak dibicarakan sekitar satu jam yang lalu.Sampai berita ini diterbitkan, belum ada klarifikasi resmi oleh Traveloka atau DeRianto Kusuma, sebagai CTO dan salah satu pendiri Traveloka.

berita: US troops have seized classified documents showing former Iraqi President Saddam Hussein suspected Pokemon. The suspicion arose when the Pokemon TV series was popular among children, in 2001, to be exact. Reporting from the Mirror page, the document says Saddam Hussein banned Pokemon from showing because it confiscate means 'I am a Jew'. The following notes in the document; We have become aware of a rapidly spreading phenomenon in the Muslim world and among our children. Our children have become attached to this phenomenon. The names in this phenomenon have many meanings, such as: Pokemon: Means 'I am a Jew'. Charmander: Means 'God is weak'. Pikachu: Means 'Be a Jew'.
berita_id: Pasukan AS telah menyita dokumen rahasia yang menunjukkan mantan presiden Irak Saddam Hussein tersangka Pokemon.Kecurigaan muncul ketika serial TV Pokemon populer di kalangan anak -anak, pada tahun 2001, tepatnya.Melaporkan dari halaman Mirror, dokumen itu mengatakan Saddam Hussein melarang Pokemon karena disita berarti 'Saya seorang Yahudi'.Catatan berikut dalam dokumen;Kami telah menyadari fenomena yang menyebar dengan cepat di dunia Muslim dan di antara anak -anak kami.Anak -anak kita telah terikat pada fenomena ini.Nama -nama dalam fenomena ini memiliki banyak makna, seperti: Pokemon: berarti 'Saya seorang Yahudi'.Charmander: Berarti 'Tuhan itu lemah'.Pikachu: Berarti 'menjadi orang Yahudi'.

berita: One of the minimarkets on Jalan Denai, Tribune, got an Oral B brand toothbrush made of Bristles. From the search results on google Bristles means sea urchin. Knowing this, the tribune went to the North Sumatra Health Office, but the Head of the Health Office was not present and the head of the division was also not present, the other staff did not want to be interviewed about whether or not Bristles were sea urchins. Meanwhile, the Chairman of the Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta said, if it is true that the toothbrush is made of pig bristles, the toothbrush is haram. "In Al Surah Al Maidah verse 3 it is explained that derivatives from pigs are haram. We will explore this prohibition, really from sea urchins or not," he said via cellular, Monday (7/3/2016) He added, if proven MUI will publish to the public so as not to use the toothbrush. In addition, MUI will withdraw the product from inch the market.
berita_id: Salah satu minimarket di Jalan Denai, Tribune, mendapat sikat gigi merek B yang terbuat dari bulu.Dari hasil pencarian di Google Bristles berarti landak laut.Mengetahui hal ini, Tribune pergi ke Kantor Kesehatan Sumatra Utara, tetapi kepala Kantor Kesehatan tidak ada dan kepala divisi juga tidak ada, staf lain tidak ingin diwawancarai tentang apakah bulu landak laut atau tidak.Sementara itu, ketua Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta berkata, jika benar bahwa sikat gigi terbuat dari bulu babi, sikat gigi adalah haram."Dalam Al Surah Al Maidah, ayat 3 dijelaskan bahwa turunan dari babi adalah Haram. Kami akan mengeksplorasi larangan ini, benar -benar dari bulu babi atau tidak," katanya melalui seluler, Senin (7/3/2016) ia menambahkan, jika MUI yang terbukti akan diterbitkan kepada publik agar tidak menggunakan sikat gigi.Selain itu, MUI akan menarik produk dari Inch the Market.

berita: JAKARTA, During the 212 action on Tuesday (21/2/2017) yesterday, a photo of the Istiqlal Mosque was circulated which was closed so that participants could not enter. Regarding this, the manager emphasized that this was not true. "In player the early morning (red Tuesday) there were five bus participants who came from Madura. They entered the mosque after Isha time," explained the Head of Protocol Section of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam. as reported by Republika After approaching 10 (evening), Abu explained, he met with the head of his entourage, he announced to his entourage the rules at Istiqlal, this mosque will be closed and will be reopened later an hour before Shubuh Abu explained, the group from East Java understood and understand. The mosque management waited for them to leave the Istiqlal Mosque voluntarily. Then at 03.40 WIB the mosque was reopened "And what is in the photo, it looks like people are lining up to enter, it's the Wali Songo pilgrimage group and school children, that's normal, they go to Istiqlal every day," he explained. He emphasized that in conclusion, the news circulating on Instagram, Twitter and other social media was a lie.
berita_id: Jakarta, selama aksi 212 pada hari Selasa (21/2/2017) kemarin, sebuah foto masjid Istiqlal diedarkan yang ditutup sehingga peserta tidak bisa masuk.Mengenai hal ini, manajer menekankan bahwa ini tidak benar."Pada pemain pagi hari (Selasa merah) ada lima peserta bus yang datang dari Madura. Mereka memasuki masjid setelah waktu Isha," jelas kepala bagian protokol masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam.Seperti yang dilaporkan oleh Republika setelah mendekati 10 (malam), Abu menjelaskan, ia bertemu dengan kepala rombongannya, ia mengumumkan kepada rombongannya aturan di Istiqlal, masjid ini akan ditutup dan akan dibuka kembali nanti satu jam sebelum Shubuh Abu menjelaskan, kelompok dari Jawa Timur yang dipahami dan dipahami.Manajemen masjid menunggu mereka meninggalkan masjid Istiqlal secara sukarela.Kemudian pada pukul 03.40 dengan masjid dibuka kembali "dan apa yang ada di foto, sepertinya orang -orang berbaris untuk masuk, itu adalah kelompok ziarah Wali Songo dan anak -anak sekolah, itu normal, mereka pergi ke Istiqlal setiap hari," jelasnya.Dia menekankan bahwa sebagai kesimpulan, berita yang beredar di Instagram, Twitter dan media sosial lainnya adalah kebohongan.

berita: Thousands of Reog Ponorogo artists held a demonstration, Tuesday (10/11/2015), as a form of protest over the burning of Reog properties at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) Davao in the Philippines. Based on information compiled by Madiunpos.com, the artist's demonstration of the reog burning incident was not only carried out by artists from Ponorogo. Also seen taking to the streets are artists from various cities or regencies in Indonesia. The thousands of artists held demonstrations by giving speeches, unfurling banners bearing a number of demands, and also performing reog around Ponorogo Square. After carrying out a series of activities in protest against the burning of property at the Consulate General in Davao, representatives of the demonstrators were then allowed to attend a hearing on the second floor of the Ponorogo Regency DPRD Building, Jl. East Square. Representatives of the participants in the demonstration were received by elements of the leadership of the Ponorogo DPRD along with the Acting Regent of Ponorogo Maskur. "We do not accept the burning of reog that was carried out at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao some time ago. Our demand is that they immediately apologize to the people of Ponorogo as the owner of this reog art," said the reog artist representing the Community Pandemen Reyog (Kompag) Ponorogo, Grendo, as quoted by Madiunpos.com from the Facebook fanpage wall All About Ponorogo, Tuesday. Reog Pemeriksaan Checkup Meanwhile, Spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Arrmanatha Nasir, said that his party was conducting an internal inspection regarding the burning of reog at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. "Essentially, there has been an official statement from the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao regarding the reog issue and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs also has an internal process to ensure that the goods are state agency assets," said Arrmanatha Nasir in Jakarta, as reported by Antara News Agency, Sunday (8/8). /11/2015). On 20 October 2015, the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao issued an official statement that the destruction of Ponorogo reog by burning was carried out because its condition had been damaged and eaten by termites. However, the photos that have gone viral and have even been distributed by local online media, Bitung News, show that there is a certain ritual before the burning. In Good Condition One of the photos also shows that before being burned, the Ponorogo reog was stored in a glass cabinet and appeared to be in good condition. Apart from the reog, in another photo, it can be seen that Indonesian Consulate General Davao removed the dragon ornaments ministry on the gamelan set and then burned it. Related to this, Arrmanatha conveyed that the Ministry of Foreign Affairs would carry out inspections according to the processes in accordance with existing standards. " Periodically there are internal inspections , " he said . Domestic reactions related to the burning of Reog Ponorogo at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, were conveyed by the Jabodetabek Reog Community. The community sent an official letter to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines, asking for clarification on information on the burning of reog art instruments by Indonesian Consulate General officials. Secretary General of the Jabodetabek Reog Association, Agus Setiyoko, said that his party hoped that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, apart from providing a detailed explanation of the burning of reog, could also broadcast clarifications on the burning of reog art objects in a number of national media.
berita_id: Ribuan seniman Reog Ponorogo mengadakan demonstrasi, Selasa (10/11/2015), sebagai bentuk protes atas pembakaran properti reog di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) Davao di Filipina.Berdasarkan informasi yang disusun oleh madiunpos.com, demonstrasi artis tentang insiden pembakaran yang di -reog tidak hanya dilakukan oleh seniman dari Ponorogo.Juga terlihat turun ke jalan adalah seniman dari berbagai kota atau daerah di Indonesia.Ribuan seniman mengadakan demonstrasi dengan memberikan pidato, membentangkan spanduk yang memiliki sejumlah tuntutan, dan juga melakukan reog di sekitar Ponorogo Square.Setelah melakukan serangkaian kegiatan sebagai protes terhadap pembakaran properti di Jenderal Konsulat di Davao, perwakilan para demonstran kemudian diizinkan untuk menghadiri sidang di lantai dua gedung DPRD Kabupaten Ponorogo, JL.Lapangan Timur.Perwakilan peserta dalam demonstrasi diterima oleh unsur -unsur kepemimpinan Ponorogo DPRD bersama dengan akting bupati Ponorogo Maskur."Kami tidak menerima pembakaran reog yang dilakukan di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao beberapa waktu yang lalu. Permintaan kami adalah bahwa mereka segera meminta maaf kepada orang -orang Ponorogo sebagai pemilik seni reog ini," kata artis reog yang mewakili pandemen pandemen dari pandemen facebook (kompag) ponorogo, grendo, seperti yang dikutip oleh MADOOG.Sementara itu, pemeriksaan kembali Pemeriksaan, juru bicara Kementerian Luar Negeri, Arrmanatha Nasir, mengatakan bahwa partainya sedang melakukan inspeksi internal mengenai pembakaran reog di konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina."Pada dasarnya, telah ada pernyataan resmi dari konsulat jenderal Indonesia di Davao mengenai masalah yang dirancang ulang dan Kementerian Luar Negeri juga memiliki proses internal untuk memastikan bahwa barang tersebut adalah aset agen negara," kata Arrmanatha Nasir di Jakarta, seperti dilaporkan oleh Antara News Agency, Minggu (8/8)./11/2015).Pada tanggal 20 Oktober 2015, konsulat umum Indonesia di Davao mengeluarkan pernyataan resmi bahwa penghancuran Ponorogo Reog dengan pembakaran dilakukan karena kondisinya telah rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Namun, foto -foto yang telah menjadi viral dan bahkan telah didistribusikan oleh media online lokal, Bitung News, menunjukkan bahwa ada ritual tertentu sebelum pembakaran.Dalam kondisi baik, salah satu foto juga menunjukkan bahwa sebelum dibakar, Ponorogo Reog disimpan di lemari kaca dan tampak dalam kondisi baik.Terlepas dari reog, di foto lain, dapat dilihat bahwa konsulat Indonesia Jenderal Davao menghapus pelayanan Ornamen Naga di set Gamelan dan kemudian membakarnya.Terkait dengan ini, Arrmanatha menyampaikan bahwa Kementerian Luar Negeri akan melakukan inspeksi sesuai dengan proses sesuai dengan standar yang ada."Secara berkala ada inspeksi internal," katanya.Reaksi domestik yang berkaitan dengan pembakaran Ponorogo Reog di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, disampaikan oleh komunitas Reog Jabodetabek.Komunitas mengirim surat resmi kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina, meminta klarifikasi tentang informasi tentang pembakaran instrumen seni reog oleh pejabat umum konsulat Indonesia.Sekretaris Jenderal Asosiasi Reog Jabodetabek, Agus Setiyoko, mengatakan bahwa partainya berharap bahwa Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, selain memberikan penjelasan terperinci tentang pembakaran Reog, juga dapat menyiarkan klarifikasi tentang pembakaran benda -benda seni yang digunakan kembali di sejumlah media nasional.

berita: The basic salary of the president, which is only around Rp. 30 million per month, is currently considered very low. The government plans to propose an increase in the president's salary to become Rp. 553 million per month. In the RPP, apart from the president, the vice president and other high-ranking state officials will also experience salary increases. The president's salary has skyrocketed because the calculation is based on an index of 1:12698 between the salaries of the lowest rank civil servants and the highest The income index for the president is simulated to reach 96000, so he will earn IDR 553.4 million per month. Meanwhile, the vice president (wapres) will receive an income of IDR 368.9 million per month from the previous basic salary of IDR 20 million. income 64000 With p With this salary change, the monthly income of the president of the Republic of Indonesia will compete with leaders in other countries. In the RPP there are also new salary proposals for the Ministers, Attorney General, Commander of the Indonesian National Armed Forces, Chief of Police, Chairman of the MPR, Chairman of the DPR, Chairman of the DPD, and Chairman of the KPK. , Chairman of the BPK, Chairman of the Supreme Court and Chairman of the Constitutional Court With an index calculation of 16000, their income is Rp. 92.2 million per month. Then for the Deputy Chairs of the MPR, DPR, DPD, KPK, BPK, MA and MK, they have an income index of 15333 and receive income IDR 88.3 million per month. Meanwhile, Deputy Ministers, Deputy Chief of Police, DPR Members, DPD Members, BPK Members, and Supreme Court Justices per month earn IDR 80.7 million with an income index of 14,000. Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (KemenPAN) -RB) acknowledged the issue of the circulation of this RPP, although he stated that the proposal was not yet ripe. The Head of the Legal, Communication and Public Information Bureau of KemenPAN-RB, Herman Suryatman said that the information The RPP organization is not yet valid. Herman said that the RPP was sourced from the discussion material that was held last year. "Those are simulation numbers that are not valid. 11/3/2018) As is known, the RPP for the Salaries and Benefits of Civil Servants is a technical rule of the Law on State Civil Apparatus (ASN). According to Herman, the explanation contains a simulation of the income of civil servants and other state officials. requires further study. "Not only contains a simulation of the income of state officials, but also a simulation of the income of civil servants. Please don't be misunderstood," he asked. regions such as governors, regents, mayors, provincial DPRD and DPRD regencies or cities will also experience an increase Where for governors will earn Rp. 76.8 million per month with an index of 13333 Then for deputy governors, regents/mayors, and chairman of the Provincial DPRD will earn income of Rp. 73.2 million with an income index of 12698. The deputy regent/mayor, deputy chairman of the provincial DPRD, the chairman of the regency/municipal DPRD have a salary of Rp. Rp. 66.3 million. Finally, for district/city DPRD members, the salary that will be obtained is Rp. 63.3 million with an income index of 10969. Public Policy Expert at the University of Padjadjaran (Unpad), Yogi Suprayogi, assessed that although it is only a simulation, the increase in state officials is irrelevant. obtained by state officials is now enough "It's enough because there is an additional operating allowance al It's big It's what he likes No need to grow up It's irrelevant," he explained According to him, if there must be an increase, the salaries of the president and central officials must be adjusted to the inflation rate. "We are also not a developed country. billion," he said. Yogi said that compared to the salaries of state officials, improving the salaries of civil servants is considered more important at this time. According to him, the material for the RPP for the salaries and benefits of handmaiden civil servants currently circulating is one of the scenarios that are simulated by the government. the technical rules of the ASN Law, one of which is the RPP Salary and Allowance Yogi emphasizes the importance of changing the salary scheme of civil servants. enlarged compared to the performance allowance. Currently the basic salary is smaller so that There are many civil servants going here and there to increase the performance allowance. Expensive allowance must be greater than the other two so that teachers are willing to be placed in remote areas. In addition, he also highlighted that the performance allowance must be based on performance. He reminded that no state should pay salaries based on education level. in some countries it is also partly performance-based In the United States, the salary of a civil servant in the State Department ranges from USD88000 to USD96000 per year However, the lowest government employee salary is USD18785 per year The number of civil servants in Uncle Sama's country reaches 2.79 million people. US president around USD400000 The presidential salary increase was very drastic in 2001 Previously the president's salary was only USD200000 Malaysian Prime Minister (PM) Najib Razak gave an annual bonus in 2018 to government employees amounting to 1.6 million In addition, he also provided a pension of 1000 ringgit per month y Those who have served for 25 years The salary of Malaysian civil servants who serve 1-4 years is around 36000 ringgit and those who have served for more than 10-19 years earn 70753 ringgit. The salary of civil servants who have just worked in Singapore is 3000 Singapore dollars per month. For a manager position, the salary is around SGD 8000. The number of employees in Singapore is 84,000. According to Thomas Friedman of the New York Times, public servants in Singapore are among the most efficient and uncorruptible bureaucrats. "They have high standards of discipline and accountability," said Friedman.

The statement from the Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara threatened to close Facebook, Twitter and Youtube if they did not follow government rules in preventing radicalism. For our social media users, ''I apologize for those who use Facebook, or Youtube if it is forced to be closed, because the government is in charge of maintaining the state's conduciveness,'' said Rudiantara after following the Declaration on Anti Radicalism Friday (14/7/2017) at Universities in West Java. at Padjadjaran University, Bandung City. Indonesian government on international social media platform policies. This is because the government's request to crack down on malicious accounts has not been fully heeded. He explained that in 2016 international social media platforms only closed 50 percent of the accounts requested by the Ministry of Communication and Information to be prosecuted. "In 2016, the government asked to take down accounts on social media and video file sharing, only 50 percent were carried out by international social media platform providers. Obviously, this is very disappointing for us, so we ask for it to be corrected,” Rudiantara explained that the spread of radicalism through cyberspace was getting worse. Radical understanding is inserted online so as to facilitate the infiltration of harmful doctrines. Obviously, ''Rudiantara, the spread of radical content in cyberspace is divided through websites and social media. He explained that it is easier to take action against sites that play a role in spreading radicalism content because the government can directly block them, and for social media, the government must communicate with these service providers. To that end, Rudiantara has sent representatives to communicate with companies providing social media and video sharing services. To follow our rules, the government will take a firm stance if societal there is absolutely no improvement in limiting accounts containing radicalism. The closure of this social media will be carried out in stages, First, by prohibiting Indonesian advertisements that are displayed on social media, because the main business of social media platforms is to serve advertisements. .
berita_id: Pernyataan dari Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara mengancam akan menutup Facebook, Twitter, dan YouTube jika mereka tidak mengikuti aturan pemerintah dalam mencegah radikalisme.Untuk pengguna media sosial kami, '' Saya minta maaf bagi mereka yang menggunakan Facebook, atau YouTube jika dipaksa untuk ditutup, karena pemerintah bertugas mempertahankan kondusif negara, '' kata Rudiiantara setelah mengikuti deklarasi anti radikalisme Jumat (14/7/2017) di universitas di Java Barat.di Universitas Padjadjaran, Bandung City.Pemerintah Indonesia tentang kebijakan platform media sosial internasional.Ini karena permintaan pemerintah untuk menindak akun berbahaya belum sepenuhnya diperhatikan.Dia menjelaskan bahwa pada tahun 2016 platform media sosial internasional hanya menutup 50 persen dari akun yang diminta oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan informasi yang akan dituntut."Pada tahun 2016, pemerintah meminta untuk menjatuhkan akun di media sosial dan berbagi file video, hanya 50 persen yang dilakukan oleh penyedia platform media sosial internasional. Jelas, ini sangat mengecewakan bagi kami, jadi kami meminta untuk diperbaiki," Rudiantara menjelaskan bahwa penyebaran radikalisme melalui ruang maya semakin buruk.Pemahaman radikal dimasukkan secara online untuk memfasilitasi infiltrasi doktrin berbahaya.Jelas, '' Rudiantara, penyebaran konten radikal di dunia maya dibagi melalui situs web dan media sosial.Dia menjelaskan bahwa lebih mudah untuk mengambil tindakan terhadap situs yang berperan dalam menyebarkan konten radikalisme karena pemerintah dapat secara langsung memblokir mereka, dan untuk media sosial, pemerintah harus berkomunikasi dengan penyedia layanan ini.Untuk itu, Rudiantara telah mengirim perwakilan untuk berkomunikasi dengan perusahaan yang menyediakan layanan media sosial dan video berbagi.Untuk mengikuti aturan kami, pemerintah akan mengambil sikap tegas jika masyarakat sama sekali tidak ada peningkatan dalam membatasi akun yang mengandung radikalisme.Penutupan media sosial ini akan dilakukan secara bertahap, pertama, dengan melarang iklan Indonesia yang ditampilkan di media sosial, karena bisnis utama platform media sosial adalah melayani iklan..

berita: The Head of the General Information Section (Kabagpenum) of the National Police, Kombes Pol. Martinus Sitompul, emphasized that the issue of the throwing of the holy Koran by the guard at the Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba Branch, Central Jakarta on Friday, was not true. "It is not true that the Koran was thrown by the guard," said Kombes Martinus in a text message, Friday night. Martinus explained that what happened was that the guard checked a number of books and objects in the detention cell. According to him, the riot that occurred on Friday take afternoon was triggered by the inmates who did not accept the officers' search of their rooms. "The turmoil that occurred was a reaction to the actions taken by guard officers who confiscated cell phones belonging to Block C detainees," he said. During the search, four cell phones belonging to four terrorist convicts were found, namely Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam and Jumali. A number of angry Block B and Block C inmates then broke the cell door. Not only that, a number of facilities at the Salemba detention center were also damaged, including the gates of Block B and Block C hallways and their windows. Martinus added that the condition of the prison is now back to being conducive. "The detention center is conducive and the residents of the detention center have calmed down," he said.
berita_id: Kepala Bagian Informasi Umum (Kabagpenum) dari Polisi Nasional, Kombes Pol.Martinus Sitompul, menekankan bahwa masalah lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga di cabang Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba, Jakarta Tengah pada hari Jumat, tidak benar."Tidak benar bahwa Alquran dilemparkan oleh penjaga," kata Kombes Martinus dalam sebuah pesan teks, Jumat malam.Martinus menjelaskan bahwa apa yang terjadi adalah bahwa penjaga memeriksa sejumlah buku dan objek di sel penahanan.Menurutnya, kerusuhan yang terjadi pada hari Jumat mengambil sore dipicu oleh para tahanan yang tidak menerima pencarian petugas di kamar mereka."Gejolak yang terjadi adalah reaksi terhadap tindakan yang diambil oleh petugas penjaga yang menyita telepon seluler milik tahanan blok C," katanya.Selama pencarian, empat ponsel milik empat narapidana teroris ditemukan, yaitu Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam dan Jumali.Sejumlah narapidana Blok B dan Blok C kemudian memecahkan pintu sel.Tidak hanya itu, sejumlah fasilitas di Salemba Detention Center juga rusak, termasuk gerbang blok B dan lorong blok C dan jendela mereka.Martinus menambahkan bahwa kondisi penjara sekarang kembali menjadi kondusif."Pusat penahanan kondusif dan penduduk Pusat Penahanan telah tenang," katanya.

berita: The activity of brushing teeth is certainly carried out every day, there are many various forms of toothbrushes in supermarkets or traditional markets, and also many materials used in the manufacture of toothbrushes. As a Muslim, you must be careful and thorough in knowing the ingredients or making a toothbrush that is currently used for brushing your teeth. In 2012 we were shocked by the emergence of brushes or brushes made from pig bristles until the MUI issued a fatwa against using a pig bristle brush, but recently, information about toothbrushes made from pig bristles has emerged. Information for you Muslims to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use non-halal ingredients. Let's all examine the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the packaging, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair aka Pig Fur! So double check the packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), Generally it says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". "What are your toothbrush bristles made of? Plastic or Pig Bristle? Here are the steps to check it: Look at the package, if it is recorded from bristles, so it is made of sea urchins. Please burn the bristles, if it smells like burning hair, it means it's from pig bristles. However, if it melts and becomes hard, it means it is made of plastic and is safe to use. Risks when using what is forbidden: Worship is rejected, prayer is rejected, and hell is more worthy (hadith). Save ourselves and our loved ones. " In everyday life, we certainly use various types of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint the house, smear cake pans, to smear food. As in processing grilled chicken, bread, cakes, and various baked or grilled meats and seafood. Meanwhile, brushes are useful when combing hair, cleaning hair in salons or barbershops, washing clothes, and scrubbing floors. Do you know where the brushes and brushes you use come from? Most likely FROM A FIRE FUR! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, usually come from China. The imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly HARAM. No matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption and for application. (the term is PIG/BOAR/HOG/BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places such as traditional markets, painting supply stores, building materials stores, cosmetic shops, beauty salons, etc. Are you familiar with various forms. Beware of painting brushes, wall paint brushes, makeup brushes, hair brushes, clothes brushes, etc. HERE ARE SOME TIPS AVOIDING THE USE OF PIG BRUSHS AND BRUSHS: 1. USE 100% SYNTHETIC BRUSH & BRUSH, SUCH AS NYLON. There are wall paint brushes and food brushes, which are slightly more expensive. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. 2. USE OTHER ALTERNATIVES BUT THE BRUSH. For example, paint rollers for painting, sponges & cotton buds for applying makeup, and knives & spatulas for applying food. 3. BEWARE OF FOOD THAT PROCESSES COOKING AND CLEANING utensils USING A PIG BRUSH. 4. CHARACTERISTICS OF PIG BRUSH BRUSH, WHEN BURNED WILL GIVE A SPECIFIC OTHER LIKE ROCKED MEAT. 5. USUALLY PIG BRUSH BRUSHS SOLD IN WHITE & BLACK COLORS. However, producers can process sea urchins by bleaching them and then coloring them, so that it looks like the fur of other animals. (AND) Thus the explanation of the toothbrush or brush made of pig bristles. As a Muslim, be careful. Give this info to your family and friends skirmish so that more people can read it so that they are free from non-halal products. May be useful.
berita_id: Aktivitas menyikat gigi tentu saja dilakukan setiap hari, ada banyak bentuk sikat gigi di supermarket atau pasar tradisional, dan juga banyak bahan yang digunakan dalam pembuatan sikat gigi.Sebagai seorang Muslim, Anda harus berhati -hati dan menyeluruh dalam mengetahui bahan -bahannya atau membuat sikat gigi yang saat ini digunakan untuk menyikat gigi.Pada 2012 kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi sampai MUI mengeluarkan fatwa untuk tidak menggunakan sikat bulu babi, tetapi baru -baru ini, informasi tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah muncul.Informasi untuk Anda Muslim untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan non-halal.Mari kita semua memeriksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada kemasannya, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi alias bulu babi!Jadi periksa kembali kemasan sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), umumnya dikatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% China Bristle"."Apa bulu sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari? Bulu plastik atau babi? Berikut langkah -langkah untuk memeriksanya: lihat paket, jika direkam dari bulu, jadi terbuat dari landak laut. Tolong bakar bulu, jika baunya seperti itu, itu berarti digunakan untuk plastik.Ditolak, doa ditolak, dan neraka lebih layak (hadis) menyelamatkan diri kita dan orang yang kita cintai.Seperti dalam memproses ayam panggang, roti, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Sementara itu, sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian, dan menggosok lantai.Apakah Anda tahu dari mana kuas dan kuas yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar dari bulu api!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia, biasanya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Bagi umat Islam, penggunaan landak laut jelas haram.Tidak peduli seberapa kecil, materi dari daging babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan untuk aplikasi.(Istilah ini adalah kuas rambut babi/babi/babi/bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat seperti pasar tradisional, toko pasokan lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, toko kosmetik, salon kecantikan, dll. Apakah Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk.Waspadalah terhadap kuas lukisan, kuas cat dinding, sikat rias, sikat rambut, sikat pakaian, dll. Berikut adalah beberapa tips yang menghindari penggunaan kuas babi dan kuas: 1. Gunakan sikat sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Ada kuas cat dinding dan kuas makanan, yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.2. Gunakan alternatif lain kecuali kuas.Misalnya, cat rol untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk mengoleskan riasan, dan pisau & spatula untuk mengoleskan makanan.3. Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang memproses peralatan memasak dan membersihkan menggunakan kuas babi.4. Karakteristik sikat sikat babi, ketika dibakar akan memberikan daging guncang lainnya seperti lainnya.5. Biasanya sikat sikat babi dijual dalam warna putih & hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkan mereka dan kemudian mewarnai mereka, sehingga terlihat seperti bulu hewan lain.(Dan) dengan demikian penjelasan sikat gigi atau sikat yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Sebagai seorang Muslim, hati -hati.Berikan info ini kepada keluarga dan teman-teman Anda yang bertengkar sehingga lebih banyak orang dapat membacanya sehingga mereka bebas dari produk non-halal.Mungkin berguna.

berita: Invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application are milling about on Twitter's timeline. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall look at D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics.
berita_id: Undangan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka sedang berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Walk out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall melihat D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.

berita: For the first time, Apple was quick to respond to complaints about the curved iPhone 6 Plus, when it was stored in the front pocket. Under normal use, a curved iPhone is a rare occurrence, Apple told the Wall Street Journal. They also replied to CNBC, that the new iPhone features orchard apple tree steel or titanium inserts to strengthen the circumference of the phone body. In fact, to further strengthen it is also used the strongest glass. The response from Apple this time, is the fastest. Looking back, if there are complaints from customers, this company from Uncle Sam's country does not respond. Apple CEO Tim Cook appears to have changed the company's communications policy. This phenomenon is by far the clearest example of such change. For information, this complaint had enlivened the virtual world. Complaints that came to Apple as many as nine customers, related to their iPhone 6 Plus phones that were curved. So far, Apple has sold more than 10 million iPhone 6 Plus since launch. So that the nine complaints that come in, can be said to be a small part of those sold.
berita_id: Untuk pertama kalinya, Apple dengan cepat menanggapi keluhan tentang iPhone 6 Plus yang melengkung, ketika disimpan di saku depan.Dalam penggunaan normal, iPhone melengkung adalah kejadian yang langka, Apple mengatakan kepada Wall Street Journal.Mereka juga menjawab CNBC, bahwa iPhone baru fitur Orchard Apple Tree Steel atau Titanium Inserts untuk memperkuat keliling badan telepon.Bahkan, untuk lebih memperkuat itu juga digunakan kaca terkuat.Respons dari Apple kali ini, adalah yang tercepat.Melihat ke belakang, jika ada keluhan dari pelanggan, perusahaan dari negara Paman Sam ini tidak merespons.CEO Apple Tim Cook tampaknya telah mengubah kebijakan komunikasi perusahaan.Fenomena ini sejauh ini merupakan contoh paling jelas dari perubahan tersebut.Sebagai informasi, keluhan ini telah menghidupkan dunia virtual.Keluhan yang datang ke Apple sebanyak sembilan pelanggan, terkait dengan ponsel iPhone 6 Plus mereka yang melengkung.Sejauh ini, Apple telah menjual lebih dari 10 juta iPhone 6 Plus sejak diluncurkan.Sehingga sembilan keluhan yang masuk, dapat dikatakan sebagai bagian kecil dari mereka yang dijual.

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia is confirmed to be a hoax. This certainty was revealed after Finance Minister Sri Mulyani doubtfulness Indrawati confirmed this in front of journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace. On Monday while giving a statement regarding President Joko Widodo's meeting with the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) delegation, he received a question about it. The Minister of Finance explained that currently there are many circulating information and documents that are made as if they came from government institutions. in social media) it is a hoax, that's how it is. In today's social media there is a lot of information and documents that are made similar to those from the government and published," he said. According to the issue, it is said that the president will be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp. 553422694 per month. Meanwhile, the vice president is said to be proposed to receive a salary of Rp. 368948462 per month.
berita_id: Berita yang beredar tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia dikonfirmasi menjadi tipuan.Kepastian ini terungkap setelah Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani, Donfidulness Indrawati mengkonfirmasi hal ini di depan jurnalis di Istana Presiden Bogor.Pada hari Senin saat memberikan pernyataan tentang pertemuan Presiden Joko Widodo dengan delegasi Bank Investasi Investasi Asia (AIIB), ia menerima pertanyaan tentang hal itu.Menteri Keuangan menjelaskan bahwa saat ini ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang beredar yang dibuat seolah -olah mereka berasal dari lembaga pemerintah.di media sosial) Ini adalah tipuan, begitulah adanya.Di media sosial saat ini ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang dibuat serupa dengan yang dari pemerintah dan diterbitkan, "katanya. Menurut masalah ini, dikatakan bahwa presiden akan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji hingga Rp. 553422694 per bulan. Sementara itu, Wakil Presiden dikatakan untuk menerima hadiah RP. 36894.

berita: The appearance of the game Pokemon Go at this time really took everyone's eyes off. In fact, not a few people are willing to quit their jobs just to play this game developed by Nintendo, Pokemon Corps and Niantic Labs. No wonder this game is used by people who are not right to spread oblique rumors. Like the news circulating recently. Also Read: Beware of Fake Pokemon Go Applications Roaming the PlayStore In the social media link, it is stated that Pokemon actually in Syriac (Suryani) means 'I am Jewish'. While Pikachu is said to mean 'Be a Jew', and Charmander means 'God is Weak'. Suddenly, Muslims in all corners of the world were infuriated by this news. So, is it true that Pokemon contains elements of words like that? Also Read: How to Play Pokemon Go In a statement to Jordan's Amman newspaper, the Syriac Orthodox Christian Church denied allegations that Pokemon and other character names are of ancient Syriac origin and have insulting Islamic meanings. In fact, church officials were surprised when they read a letter that said that Pokemon contained a Jewish invitation. So, it can be ascertained that the meanings of the word Pokemon characters do not have connotations that damage Islam. Also Read: DOWNLOAD THE GAME POKEMON GO This statement was also approved by a professor from Al Azhar University, Mohammed Abu Laila. "Until now, there is no strong evidence that justifies the rumors that make parents forbid their children to play the Pokemon Go game," he said. Then, what is the convey true meaning of Pokemon? Based on information from the Pokemondb.net site, Pokemon is a combination of the word "Pocket Monster" which means pocket monster. This term expresses how small these monsters are to fit in a pocket. Also Read: Pokemon Go Will Add New Features Then, said from Pikachu. This famous cute monster is composed of the words Pika and Chu. Pika is the name for a small mouse, while Chu is a Japanese word which means to squeak. As we can see, Pikachu's shape does resemble a mouse. And lastly, Charmander which consists of the words Char and Salamander. Char means to burn, and Salamander means amphibious lizard. Well, that's the true meaning of the word monster - Pokemon monster. Hopefully this explanation can make the hearts of Muslims in the world relieved. If you found this article useful, please share it!
berita_id: Penampilan permainan Pokemon Go saat ini benar -benar mengalihkan pandangan semua orang.Faktanya, tidak sedikit orang yang mau berhenti dari pekerjaan mereka hanya untuk memainkan permainan yang dikembangkan oleh Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, dan Niantic Labs ini.Tidak heran game ini digunakan oleh orang -orang yang tidak benar untuk menyebarkan rumor miring.Seperti berita yang beredar baru -baru ini.Baca juga: Waspadalah terhadap aplikasi Pokemon Go palsu yang berkeliaran di Playstore di tautan media sosial, dinyatakan bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya di Syria (Suryani) berarti 'Saya Yahudi'.Sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti 'menjadi orang Yahudi', dan Charmander berarti 'Tuhan itu lemah'.Tiba -tiba, umat Islam di semua penjuru dunia marah dengan berita ini.Jadi, benarkah Pokemon berisi elemen kata -kata seperti itu?Baca juga: Cara Memainkan Pokemon GO dalam sebuah pernyataan ke surat kabar Amman Jordan, Gereja Kristen Syria Ortodoks membantah tuduhan bahwa Pokemon dan nama karakter lainnya berasal dari Syria kuno dan memiliki makna Islam yang menghina.Bahkan, para pejabat gereja terkejut ketika mereka membaca surat yang mengatakan bahwa Pokemon berisi undangan Yahudi.Jadi, dapat dipastikan bahwa makna kata -karakter kata pokemon tidak memiliki konotasi yang merusak Islam.Baca juga: Unduh game Pokemon Go Pernyataan ini juga disetujui oleh seorang profesor dari Universitas Al Azhar, Mohammed Abu Laila."Sampai sekarang, tidak ada bukti kuat yang membenarkan rumor yang membuat orang tua melarang anak -anak mereka untuk memainkan permainan Pokemon Go," katanya.Lalu, apa yang disampaikan makna Pokemon yang sebenarnya?Berdasarkan informasi dari situs Pokemondb.net, Pokemon adalah kombinasi dari kata "monster saku" yang berarti monster saku.Istilah ini mengungkapkan betapa kecilnya monster ini agar muat di saku.Baca juga: Pokemon Go akan menambahkan fitur baru kemudian, kata Pikachu.Monster lucu yang terkenal ini terdiri dari kata -kata Pika dan Chu.Pika adalah nama untuk tikus kecil, sedangkan Chu adalah kata Jepang yang berarti mencicit.Seperti yang bisa kita lihat, bentuk Pikachu memang menyerupai tikus.Dan terakhir, Charmander yang terdiri dari kata -kata Char dan Salamander.Char berarti membakar, dan salamander berarti kadal amfibi.Nah, itulah arti sebenarnya dari kata monster - monster pokemon.Semoga penjelasan ini dapat membuat hati Muslim di dunia lega.Jika Anda menemukan artikel ini bermanfaat, silakan bagikan!

berita: Rumors that catfish contain cancer cells in social networks and word of mouth continue to spread. The impact of this issue is that mothers are reluctant to provender buy catfish. Waspada Online managed to summarize the comments of mothers who usually buy catfish for regular consumption as a side dish. Circulation of information that states that catfish contain cancer in pisu because of the life of catfish that can live in very dirty places though. The nickname as the filthiest fish refers to the nature of catfish that likes to consume various types of waste in the waters. In fact, an article that is quite vital on the internet mentions that human waste is also used as feed for a catfish cultivation in Haikou City, China. Based on these issues, in a mouthful of catfish meat, there are 3000 cancer cells. The issue quickly spread on social media and word of mouth. However, this issue has not dampened the sale of catfish in Medan and is still stable and has no effect. According to a number of traders in Medan and catfish farmers in the surrounding Medan, there is no effect of the issue on the consumption and sale of catfish. As admitted by Br Manalu, a catfish trader at Sukaramai Market, Medan. According to him, the sale of catfish remains stable and is not affected by the impact, related to the news, many people still consume catfish. Sales of catfish remained normal and the price of catfish was also stable at Rp. 18000 per kilo, and it is very unfortunate with the news that it is said that catfish contain cancer cells, obviously this makes catfish farmers offended and we as traders will clearly find it difficult to find catfish supplies," he explained, Monday (16/11). A catfish farmer in the Medan Marelan area, Pujiono admitted that he did not affect the demand for catfish from his pond. Even the recent fish harvest has not been able to meet the market, the majority of which are sent to Aceh and Medan markets. Regarding catfish containing cancer cells, Community Nutrition Expert and Professor of Food and Nutrition at the Bogor Agricultural University (IPB), Prof. Dr. Ir Ali Khemsan MS, when confirmed via cellular, Monday (16/11) denied the issue. He deeply regretted the news about cancer cell bacteria contained in catfish. "I don't think the news is true, in fact it makes catfish cultivators feel offended and devastated, because from there they can fulfill their daily needs," he explained. Instead, he said, the trigger for cancer cells was catfish frying oil. "It is precisely what makes and causes cancer cells in the community who fry something or even the catfish themselves to sell using used cooking oil (used oil), that can trigger cancer. Therefore, it is hoped that all people will be more careful when buying food that is fried in oil," he concluded
berita_id: Rumor bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker di jejaring sosial dan dari mulut ke mulut terus menyebar.Dampak dari masalah ini adalah bahwa ibu enggan untuk membeli ikan lele.Waspada Online berhasil meringkas komentar para ibu yang biasanya membeli ikan lele untuk konsumsi rutin sebagai lauk.Sirkulasi informasi yang menyatakan bahwa ikan lele mengandung kanker di Pisu karena kehidupan lele yang dapat hidup di tempat yang sangat kotor.Julukan sebagai ikan paling kotor mengacu pada sifat ikan lele yang suka mengonsumsi berbagai jenis limbah di perairan.Faktanya, sebuah artikel yang cukup vital di internet menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan untuk budidaya ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina.Berdasarkan masalah ini, dalam seteguk daging ikan lele, ada 3000 sel kanker.Masalahnya dengan cepat menyebar di media sosial dan dari mulut ke mulut.Namun, masalah ini belum mengurangi penjualan ikan lele di Medan dan masih stabil dan tidak berpengaruh.Menurut sejumlah pedagang di petani medan dan ikan lele di medan sekitarnya, tidak ada efek masalah pada konsumsi dan penjualan ikan lele.Seperti yang diakui oleh BR Manalu, seorang pedagang lele di Sukaramai Market, Medan.Menurutnya, penjualan ikan lele tetap stabil dan tidak terpengaruh oleh dampaknya, terkait dengan berita, banyak orang masih mengonsumsi ikan lele.Penjualan ikan lele tetap normal dan harga ikan lele juga stabil di RP.18000 per kilo, dan sangat disayangkan dengan berita bahwa dikatakan bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel -sel kanker, jelas ini membuat petani lele tersinggung dan kami sebagai pedagang akan dengan jelas akan sulit menemukan pasokan ikan lele, "ia menjelaskan, Senin (16/11) yang bisa dipengaruhi oleh petani Catfish dari daerah Pondan, Pujiono, yang tidak dapat dipengaruhi oleh Petfish.Pasar, yang sebagian besar dikirim ke pasar Aceh dan Medan.Sebenarnya itu membuat para pembudidaya lele merasa tersinggung dan hancur, karena dari sana mereka dapat memenuhi kebutuhan sehari -hari mereka, "jelasnya. Sebaliknya, katanya, pemicu sel kanker adalah minyak goreng ikan lele." Justru itulah yang membuat dan menyebabkan sel kanker dalam komunitas yang dapat menggoreng sesuatu atau bahkan ikan lele sendiri untuk menjual minyak yang menggunakan minyak bekas), minyak bekas itu.Oleh karena itu, diharapkan bahwa semua orang akan lebih berhati -hati saat membeli makanan yang digoreng dalam minyak, "pungkasnya

berita: Jurnaldigital.com – Cianjur Regent Irvan Rivano Muchtar will prohibit Cianjur residents, especially young people, from playing the online game Pokemon Go. The reason is that the meaning contained in the game is contrary to the beliefs of wish the majority of the population of Cianjur and is considered dangerous. According to Irvan, one of the game applications on smartphones based on Android and Apple is indeed being loved by game lovers, especially young people. However, according to Irvan, the meaning of the word Pokemon in one language is I am Jewish. “Obviously this is an acknowledgment of people who oppress our brothers, like the Palestinians. It also contradicts religious teachings," he said, Tuesday, July 19 2016. Irvan said the Cianjur Regency Government is currently only urging smartphone users not to play Pokemon Go, which was recently officially launched in America and will only be inaugurated in Indonesia in the near future. "Now it's just an appeal, but maybe later it will be banned if it doesn't educate and is dangerous," he said. Irvan added, from some of the news circulating, Pokemon Go can cause accidents. Games that require users to leave the house and walk to look for pokemon will disrupt concentration on the road. “Indeed, there has been no research on whether it is dangerous or not. But what is clear is that it is better to anticipate before all these bad things happen,” he said. The Commander of Military District 0608 Cianjur, Lieutenant Colonel Armed Imam Haryadi, has even issued a ban for his members from playing the Pokemon Go game, especially at headquarters. According to him, the GPS-based game will record complete location data so that it is feared that it will be misused. Imam explained, the Pokemon Go game is three-dimensional and based on GPS. When used, it will record the location data for the monster's search. If the recorded data goes to other parties and is used for certain purposes, it is very dangerous. "So we forbid all members of the TNI, starting from the Kodim, Koramil, and below to play, especially in the TNI headquarters environment," said Armed
berita_id: Jurnaldigital.com - Bupati Cianjur Irvan Rivano Muchtar akan melarang penduduk Cianjur, terutama orang -orang muda, dari memainkan game online Pokemon Go.Alasannya adalah bahwa makna yang terkandung dalam permainan ini bertentangan dengan keyakinan harapan mayoritas populasi Cianjur dan dianggap berbahaya.Menurut Irvan, salah satu aplikasi game di smartphone berdasarkan Android dan Apple memang dicintai oleh pecinta game, terutama orang -orang muda.Namun, menurut Irvan, arti kata pokemon dalam satu bahasa adalah saya orang Yahudi."Jelas ini adalah pengakuan terhadap orang -orang yang menindas saudara -saudara kita, seperti orang -orang Palestina. Ini juga bertentangan dengan ajaran agama," katanya, Selasa, 19 Juli 2016. Irvan mengatakan bahwa pemerintah Kabupaten Cianjur saat ini hanya akan mendesak pengguna ponsel cerdas untuk tidak bermain di Pokemon Go, yang baru -baru ini diluncurkan secara resmi di Amerika dan hanya akan hanya akan ada di Indonesia di Indonesia, yang baru -baru ini diluncurkan secara resmi di Amerika dan hanya akan hanya ada di Indonesia di Indonesia di THOD, yang baru -baru ini secara resmi diluncurkan di Amerika dan hanya akan hanya akan disalahgunakan di Indonesia di Indonesia."Sekarang ini hanya banding, tapi mungkin nanti akan dilarang jika tidak mendidik dan berbahaya," katanya.Irvan menambahkan, dari beberapa berita yang beredar, Pokemon Go dapat menyebabkan kecelakaan.Game yang mengharuskan pengguna meninggalkan rumah dan berjalan untuk mencari Pokemon akan mengganggu konsentrasi di jalan."Memang, belum ada penelitian apakah itu berbahaya atau tidak. Tapi yang jelas adalah bahwa lebih baik mengantisipasi sebelum semua hal buruk ini terjadi," katanya.Komandan Distrik Militer 0608 Cianjur, Letnan Kolonel Bersenjata Imam Haryadi, bahkan telah mengeluarkan larangan bagi para anggotanya untuk memainkan permainan Pokemon Go, terutama di markas besar.Menurutnya, game berbasis GPS akan merekam data lokasi yang lengkap sehingga ditakuti bahwa itu akan disalahgunakan.Imam menjelaskan, game Pokemon Go adalah tiga dimensi dan berdasarkan GPS.Saat digunakan, itu akan merekam data lokasi untuk pencarian monster.Jika data yang direkam pergi ke pihak lain dan digunakan untuk tujuan tertentu, itu sangat berbahaya."Jadi kami melarang semua anggota TNI, mulai dari Kodim, Koramil, dan di bawah untuk bermain, terutama di lingkungan markas TNI," kata bersenjata

berita: Minister of Finance (Menkeu) Sri Mulyani emphasized that the government did not prepare a plan to increase the president's salary. In fact, according to him, the government did not discuss the plan to increase the president's salary at all. "It does not exist and has never been plan discussed. So, we have no discussion about it at all, absolutely nothing," said Sri Mulyani at the Presidential Palace Complex, Bogor, West Java, Monday (12/3). Sri Mulyani said, in the current technology era, there are so many people who spread information that is not necessarily true. "In the current era of social media, a lot of information is produced, and documents that are made seem to be similar to the government, then published," he explained. the salary of civil servants, the Minister of Finance said that the government would prepare it according to the note on the report submitted to the DPR. In the 2019 RKP and 2019 RAPBN, we will design according to what we have conveyed to the council," he said. month and vice president is Rp. 368948462 per month. The current salary of the president is known to be very far from the figure of Rp. 500 million. The current basic salary of the president is only around Rp. 30240000 per month. This is in accordance with Article 2 of Law Number 7 of 1978, which states that the president's salary is six times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia (chairman of the DPR, MA, and BPK) Meanwhile, in PP No. 75/2000 it is stated that the three officials receive a salary of Rp. 5040000 per month. president, which reached Rp. 32500000 Thus, the president received a salary of Rp. 62740000 per month
berita_id: Menteri Keuangan (Menkeu) Sri Mulyani menekankan bahwa pemerintah tidak menyiapkan rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden.Bahkan, menurutnya, pemerintah tidak membahas rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden sama sekali."Itu tidak ada dan tidak pernah direncanakan dibahas. Jadi, kami tidak berdiskusi sama sekali, sama sekali tidak ada," kata Sri Mulyani di Kompleks Istana Presiden, Bogor, Jawa Barat, Senin (12/3).Sri Mulyani mengatakan, di era teknologi saat ini, ada begitu banyak orang yang menyebarkan informasi yang belum tentu benar."Di era media sosial saat ini, banyak informasi diproduksi, dan dokumen yang dibuat tampaknya mirip dengan pemerintah, kemudian diterbitkan," jelasnya.Gaji pegawai negeri, Menteri Keuangan mengatakan bahwa pemerintah akan menyiapkannya sesuai dengan catatan pada laporan yang diajukan ke DPR.Dalam RKP 2019 dan RAPBN 2019, kami akan merancang sesuai dengan apa yang telah kami sampaikan kepada dewan, "katanya. Bulan dan wakil presiden adalah Rp. 368948462 per bulan. Gaji presiden saat ini diketahui sangat jauh dari angka 700 dari 500 juta ini.Gaji Presiden adalah enam kali lipat dari pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia (ketua DPR, MA, dan BPK) sementara itu, di PP No.75/2000 dinyatakan bahwa tiga pejabat menerima gaji RP 5040000 per bulan

berita: circulating on social media about needling as first aid for stroke patients as shown in the image below. Is this true or just a hoax or a myth? Causes of Stroke Stroke is a neurological emergency characterized by symptoms such as weakness on one side of the body, a tilted face to one side, and difficulty speaking. These symptoms generally appear suddenly. This disorder in general can be caused by a blockage in a blood vessel in the brain (ischemic stroke) or a rupture of a blood vessel in the brain (hemorrhagic stroke). Help for Stroke If you feel or find a relative with symptoms of a stroke, you must immediately be taken to the hospital. As much as possible, the destination hospital at least has CT Scan facilities. With the CT Scan, medical personnel can determine the type of stroke experienced by the patient. This is very important because the treatment for ischemic stroke and hemorrhagic stroke is different. In ischemic stroke, the goal of help is to destroy the blood clot that is blocking the blood vessels of the brain. The method that is commonly done is with drugs, it can also be with endovascular procedures. Meanwhile, in hemorrhagic stroke, the main goal of treatment is to stop the bleeding. There is no official reference that recommends this method for first aid in stroke patients. In ischemic stroke patients, this method is clearly not useful look alike for destroying the blockage in the brain because there is no relationship at all. In the case of hemorrhagic stroke, it is true that patients generally have high blood pressure so that the brain blood vessels burst. However, bleeding through the fingertips cannot lower blood pressure and stop bleeding in the brain. This is because the blood that is removed by inserting the needle in the fingertip is very little so that it does not have a significant effect on blood pressure. In addition, the human brain gets 20% of its blood supply from the heart pump and the body will always try to maintain this amount. So, even though we have removed the patient's blood, the heart will still pump blood to the brain. Dangers of Needling in Stroke Aid In addition to not providing good benefits to patients, it turns out that needling also has a negative impact on patients. The bad impact is that the patient is late in getting the right help because time is wasted on sterilizing the needle and performing the puncture. The stabbing process causes wounds and can cause infection. Conclusion It can be concluded that pricking the finger with a needle in stroke patients is not useful and can actually harm the patient. If you find a patient with symptoms of a stroke, the help we can provide is to take the patient as quickly as possible to the hospital.
berita_id: beredar di media sosial tentang tusuk jarum sebagai pertolongan pertama untuk pasien stroke seperti yang ditunjukkan pada gambar di bawah ini.Apakah ini benar atau hanya tipuan atau mitos?Penyebab stroke stroke adalah keadaan darurat neurologis yang ditandai oleh gejala seperti kelemahan di satu sisi tubuh, wajah miring ke satu sisi, dan kesulitan berbicara.Gejala -gejala ini umumnya muncul tiba -tiba.Gangguan ini secara umum dapat disebabkan oleh penyumbatan pada pembuluh darah di otak (stroke iskemik) atau pecahnya pembuluh darah di otak (stroke hemoragik).Bantuan untuk stroke jika Anda merasakan atau menemukan kerabat dengan gejala stroke, Anda harus segera dibawa ke rumah sakit.Sebisa mungkin, rumah sakit tujuan setidaknya memiliki fasilitas CT scan.Dengan CT scan, tenaga medis dapat menentukan jenis stroke yang dialami oleh pasien.Ini sangat penting karena pengobatan untuk stroke iskemik dan stroke hemoragik berbeda.Dalam stroke iskemik, tujuan bantuan adalah untuk menghancurkan gumpalan darah yang menghalangi pembuluh darah otak.Metode yang biasanya dilakukan adalah dengan obat -obatan, itu juga bisa dengan prosedur endovaskular.Sementara itu, dalam stroke hemoragik, tujuan utama pengobatan adalah untuk menghentikan pendarahan.Tidak ada referensi resmi yang merekomendasikan metode ini untuk pertolongan pertama pada pasien stroke.Pada pasien stroke iskemik, metode ini jelas tidak berguna sama untuk menghancurkan penyumbatan di otak karena tidak ada hubungan sama sekali.Dalam kasus stroke hemoragik, memang benar bahwa pasien umumnya memiliki tekanan darah tinggi sehingga pembuluh darah otak meledak.Namun, pendarahan melalui ujung jari tidak dapat menurunkan tekanan darah dan menghentikan pendarahan di otak.Ini karena darah yang dihilangkan dengan memasukkan jarum di ujung jari sangat sedikit sehingga tidak memiliki efek signifikan pada tekanan darah.Selain itu, otak manusia mendapat 20% dari suplai darahnya dari pompa jantung dan tubuh akan selalu berusaha mempertahankan jumlah ini.Jadi, meskipun kami telah menghilangkan darah pasien, jantung masih akan memompa darah ke otak.Bahaya tusuk jarum dalam bantuan stroke selain tidak memberikan manfaat yang baik bagi pasien, ternyata tusuk jarum juga memiliki dampak negatif pada pasien.Dampaknya yang buruk adalah bahwa pasien terlambat mendapatkan bantuan yang tepat karena waktu terbuang untuk sterilisasi jarum dan melakukan tusukan.Proses penikaman menyebabkan luka dan dapat menyebabkan infeksi.Kesimpulan Dapat disimpulkan bahwa menusuk jari dengan jarum pada pasien stroke tidak berguna dan benar -benar dapat membahayakan pasien.Jika Anda menemukan pasien dengan gejala stroke, bantuan yang dapat kami berikan adalah membawa pasien secepat mungkin ke rumah sakit.

berita: The Head of the Protocol Section for the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam, stated that the news circulating idolize on social media that the participants of the 212th Volume Two Action could not enter the Istiqlal Mosque early this morning because the mosque doors were closed was not true. "It's a thousand percent hoax," said Abdul Salam to Republika.co.id, Tuesday (21/2) morning. Abdul Salam explained that the rules at the Istiqlal Mosque in addition to the month of Ramadan, the mosque closed at 21.30 WIB. Opened again one hour before Fajr time. "In the month of Ramadan, the mosque is open 24 hours," he explained. For last night's case, Abdul Salam said, there were indeed five bus participants who came from East Java. They claimed to come from Madura. Participants enter the mosque after Isha time. The mosque provides opportunities for worship and cleaning. "After approaching 10 (evening), we met with the head of his entourage, we announced to his entourage that the rules at Istiqlal, this mosque will be closed and will be opened again one hour before Fajr," he explained. Abdul Salam emphasized that the group from East Java understood and understood. The mosque management waited for them to leave the Istiqlal Mosque voluntarily. Then at 03.40 WIB the mosque was reopened. "And what's in the photo, it looks like people are queuing up to enter, it's the Wali Songo pilgrimage group and school children, that's normal, they go to Istiqlal every day," he explained. He emphasized that the conclusion was that the news circulating on Instagram, Twitter and other social media was a lie
berita_id: Kepala bagian protokol untuk masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam, menyatakan bahwa berita yang beredar mengidolakan di media sosial bahwa para peserta aksi volume ke -212 tidak dapat memasuki masjid Istiqlal pagi ini karena pintu -pintu masjid ditutup tidak benar."Ini adalah tipuan seribu persen," kata Abdul Salam kepada Republika.co.id, Selasa (21/2) pagi.Abdul Salam menjelaskan bahwa aturan di masjid Istiqlal selain bulan Ramadhan, masjid ditutup pada 21,30 WIB.Dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum waktu Fajr."Di bulan Ramadhan, masjid buka 24 jam," jelasnya.Untuk kasus tadi malam, Abdul Salam mengatakan, memang ada lima peserta bus yang datang dari Jawa Timur.Mereka mengaku datang dari Madura.Peserta memasuki masjid setelah waktu Isha.Masjid ini memberikan kesempatan untuk beribadah dan membersihkan."Setelah mendekati 10 (malam), kami bertemu dengan kepala rombongannya, kami mengumumkan kepada rombongannya bahwa aturan di Istiqlal, masjid ini akan ditutup dan akan dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum Fajr," jelasnya.Abdul Salam menekankan bahwa kelompok dari Jawa Timur memahami dan memahami.Manajemen masjid menunggu mereka meninggalkan masjid Istiqlal secara sukarela.Kemudian pada 03.40 WIB masjid dibuka kembali."Dan apa yang ada di foto, sepertinya orang -orang mengantri untuk masuk, itu adalah kelompok ziarah Wali Songo dan anak -anak sekolah, itu normal, mereka pergi ke Istiqlal setiap hari," jelasnya.Dia menekankan bahwa kesimpulannya adalah bahwa berita yang beredar di Instagram, Twitter dan media sosial lainnya adalah kebohongan

berita: On social networks, there is a lot of information circulating that mentions catfish as the filthiest fish. In a mouthful of catfish meat, there are 3,000 cancer cells. The news made catfish cultivators in East Java (East Java) offended and devastated. The nickname as the filthiest fish refers to the nature of catfish that likes to consume various types of waste in the waters. Even an article that is quite viral on the internet mentions that human waste is also used as feed for a catfish cultivation in Haikou City, China. That's not true. "Pity catfish farmers, they are offended and very saddened by the news," said Head of the Fisheries and Marine Service of East Java Province, Heru Tjahjono, Saturday (31/10/2015). He said that the news that actually describes catfish cultivation in Haikou City, China is not the same as catfish cultivation in East Java. The news could have an impact on the catfish market in East Java. The reason is, the catfish market is a consumer in the lower middle class level II. While snapper, tuna, mackerel, grouper at level I upper middle class. Heru said, consumers at level I are difficult to shake with the issue of the fish they consume.
