This is different from the issue of fish such as catfish, gourami, mujahir, which are food for middle to lower-class level II consumers. if level I consumers are difficult to shake with issues. In contrast to level II consumers. If there is an issue, level II consumers can be afraid and don't want to consume, he said. Heru said that there was already a certification of Good Fish Cultivation (CBIB) and Good Fish Hatchery (CPIB) certification, which were applied to the hatchery business unit For in East Java. In order to achieve quality assurance and security of national and international fishery products, it is deemed necessary to regulate good fish farming methods, said Heru. The Ministry of Marine Affairs and Fisheries stipulates Decree No. KEP.02/MEN/2007 on Good Fish Cultivation Methods. For in East Java, from thousands of catfish cultivation, currently 266 cultivation business units have been certified. Meanwhile, for hatcheries, there are 20 hatchery business units that already have CPIB certification. "We are targeting that there are 900 business units of all cultivated commodities in East Java that meet the certification," he explained. Heru added that the government continues to monitor fish farming and domesticate hatchery units. Data for monitoring the residue of catfish in 2015 was 379 samples. Parameters tested were levels of hormones, antibiotics, and heavy metals. The sampling locations for monitoring catfish residues included cultivation units in Lamongan, Sidoarjo, Pasuruan, Gresik, Tulungagung, Jombang, Mojokerto, Kediri, Blitar, Malang, Pamekasan, Magetan, Probolinggo, and Probolinggo regencies. Until the third quarter, the results of catfish samples that have been tested negative (free) of hormone residues, antibiotics, and heavy metals, he said.
berita_id: Di jejaring sosial, ada banyak informasi yang beredar yang menyebutkan ikan lele sebagai ikan paling kotor.Dalam seteguk daging lele, ada 3.000 sel kanker.Berita itu membuat para pembudidaya lele di Jawa Timur (Jawa Timur) tersinggung dan hancur.Julukan sebagai ikan paling kotor mengacu pada sifat ikan lele yang suka mengonsumsi berbagai jenis limbah di perairan.Bahkan sebuah artikel yang cukup viral di internet menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan untuk budidaya ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina.Itu tidak benar."Kasihan petani lele, mereka tersinggung dan sangat sedih dengan berita itu," kata kepala perikanan dan layanan kelautan provinsi Jawa Timur, Heru Tjahjono, Sabtu (31/10/2015).Dia mengatakan bahwa berita yang benar -benar menggambarkan budidaya ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina tidak sama dengan budidaya ikan lele di Jawa Timur.Berita itu dapat berdampak pada pasar ikan lele di Jawa Timur.Alasannya adalah, pasar lele adalah konsumen di tingkat kelas menengah II.Sedangkan kakap, tuna, mackerel, kerapu di kelas menengah atas level I.Heru berkata, konsumen di level I sulit untuk mengguncang masalah ikan yang mereka konsumsi.Ini berbeda dari masalah ikan seperti ikan lele, gourami, mujahir, yang merupakan makanan untuk konsumen kelas menengah ke bawah.Jika konsumen Level I sulit untuk diguncang dengan masalah.Berbeda dengan konsumen Level II.Jika ada masalah, konsumen Level II bisa takut dan tidak ingin mengkonsumsi, katanya.Heru mengatakan bahwa sudah ada sertifikasi Budidaya Ikan yang Baik (CBIB) dan sertifikasi Good Fish Hatchery (CPIB), yang diterapkan pada Unit Bisnis Penetasan untuk di Jawa Timur.Untuk mencapai jaminan kualitas dan keamanan produk perikanan nasional dan internasional, dianggap perlu untuk mengatur metode pertanian ikan yang baik, kata Heru.Kementerian Urusan Kelautan dan Perikanan menetapkan Keputusan No. Kep.02/Men/2007 tentang metode penanaman ikan yang baik.Karena di Jawa Timur, dari ribuan budidaya ikan lele, saat ini 266 unit bisnis budidaya telah disertifikasi.Sementara itu, untuk penetasan, ada 20 unit bisnis penetasan yang sudah memiliki sertifikasi CPIB."Kami menargetkan bahwa ada 900 unit bisnis dari semua komoditas yang dibudidayakan di Jawa Timur yang memenuhi sertifikasi," jelasnya.Heru menambahkan bahwa pemerintah terus memantau pertanian ikan dan domestik unit penetasan.Data untuk memantau residu ikan lele pada tahun 2015 adalah 379 sampel.Parameter yang diuji adalah kadar hormon, antibiotik, dan logam berat.Lokasi pengambilan sampel untuk memantau residu ikan lele termasuk unit budidaya di Lamongan, Sidoarjo, Pasuruan, Gresik, Tulungagung, Jombang, Mojokerto, Kediri, Blitar, Malang, Pamekasan, Magetan, Probolinggo, dan Regensgo.Sampai kuartal ketiga, hasil sampel ikan lele yang telah diuji negatif (bebas) residu hormon, antibiotik, dan logam berat, katanya.

berita: Netizens are busy talking about social media, Facebook in Indonesia will be closed on April 24, 2018. Is that right? We tried to find out the truth of the news, it turned out to be a hoax or not true. So far, there has been no firm statement from the Ministry of user Communication and Information (Kemenkominfo) confirming that Facebook Indonesia will be blocked or closed on April 24, 2018. However, the Ministry of Communication and Information does not hesitate to block Facebook in Indonesia like Telegram, if it is proven that there is a criminal element in the leakage of Facebook user data in Indonesia. If indeed Facebook Indonesia will be blocked, even then it will only be temporary and if the situation gets worse. "We will see this situation first. If it gets worse, we will close temporarily," said Minister of Communication and Informatics Rudiantara, Wednesday (11/4/2018) at the Kominfo Building, Medan Merdeka, Jakarta. "If there are indications that Facebook in Indonesia is being used for incitement, as happened in Myanmar, I have no qualms about blocking it," added Rudiantara. Reported by CNN Indonesia, the Facebook data leak scandal in Indonesia recorded as many as 1,095,918 users who could potentially be affected by data abuse. From November 2013 to 2015 there were 748 people in Indonesia who installed thisisyourdigitallife application. The application, which is a personality test quiz, is known to use Facebook account access. "There are a total of 1,096,666 people in Indonesia or around 1.26 percent of the total number of people affected globally," explained Facebook Indonesia's Head of Public Policy Ruben Hattari during a Hearing Meeting (RDP) with members of Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives in Jakarta, Tuesday (17/4). According to Ruben, the figure is known to not include people who have downloaded the application, but then deleted their Facebook account. The company owned by Mark Zuckerberg claims not to store the data of individual users who download the application. To note, there are about 87 million global Facebook user data stolen by Cambridge Analytica (CA). Indonesia occupies the third position as the country with the most user data victims.
berita_id: Netizen sibuk berbicara tentang media sosial, Facebook di Indonesia akan ditutup pada 24 April 2018. Apakah itu benar?Kami mencoba mencari tahu kebenaran berita itu, ternyata itu adalah tipuan atau tidak benar.Sejauh ini, belum ada pernyataan tegas dari Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi Pengguna (Kemenkominfo) yang mengkonfirmasi bahwa Facebook Indonesia akan diblokir atau ditutup pada 24 April 2018. Namun, Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi tidak ragu untuk memblokir Facebook di Indonesia seperti Telegram, jika terbukti bahwa ada elemen kriminal dalam leahage di Facebook di Facebook.Jika memang Facebook Indonesia akan diblokir, meskipun itu hanya akan bersifat sementara dan jika situasinya semakin buruk."Kami akan melihat situasi ini terlebih dahulu. Jika semakin buruk, kami akan menutup sementara," kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika Rudiantara, Rabu (11/4/2018) di gedung Kepomo, Medan Merdeka, Jakarta."Jika ada indikasi bahwa Facebook di Indonesia digunakan untuk hasutan, seperti yang terjadi di Myanmar, saya tidak punya keraguan tentang memblokirnya," tambah Rudiantara.Dilaporkan oleh CNN Indonesia, skandal kebocoran data Facebook di Indonesia mencatat sebanyak 1.095.918 pengguna yang berpotensi dipengaruhi oleh penyalahgunaan data.Dari November 2013 hingga 2015 ada 748 orang di Indonesia yang memasang aplikasi ThisisyyourDigitallife.Aplikasi, yang merupakan kuis tes kepribadian, diketahui menggunakan akses akun Facebook."Ada total 1.096.666 orang di Indonesia atau sekitar 1,26 persen dari jumlah total orang yang terkena dampak global," jelas kepala kebijakan publik Ruben Hattari di Indonesia di Indonesia selama pertemuan pendengaran (RDP) dengan anggota Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia di Jakarta, Selasa (17/4).Menurut Ruben, angka tersebut diketahui tidak termasuk orang yang telah mengunduh aplikasi, tetapi kemudian menghapus akun Facebook mereka.Perusahaan yang dimiliki oleh Mark Zuckerberg mengklaim tidak menyimpan data pengguna individu yang mengunduh aplikasi.Untuk dicatat, ada sekitar 87 juta data pengguna Global Facebook yang dicuri oleh Cambridge Analytica (CA).Indonesia menempati posisi ketiga sebagai negara dengan korban data pengguna terbanyak.

berita: There was a commotion at the terrorist detention house of the Brimob Command Headquarters Salemba branch, Depok, Friday (10/11). A number of detainees damaged the prison facilities. The incident began when the guard asked the prisoners to enter after Friday prayers. However, there was friction between the detainees and the officers until other prisoners joined in the noise. Karo Penmas, Police Public Relations Division, Brigadier General Rikwanto, asserted that the rioting in the terrorist detention center of the Mobile Brigade Headquarters, Kelapa Dua Depok, was not caused by the throwing of the Koran by the officers there. However, according to Rikwanto, the riot was triggered by the attitude of the detainees who tried to provoke a commotion. From the results of the initial examination, the riot began when officers put the detainees into their respective cells after performing Friday prayers. Apart from leading as well them in, officers also checked the detainees and found four cell phones. The four telephone units belonged to prisoners of terrorism with the initials Jum, Sa, Juh, and KA. The phone was later confiscated. However, one of the prisoners objected and tried to cause trouble. He then provoked by provoking the officer's emotions. The situation escalated when other prisoners were also provoked. In the end, riots were inevitable. Detainees then broke down the cell door, as well as a number of other facilities. "Now we have the situation under control," said Rikwanto, Friday night
berita_id: Ada keributan di rumah penahanan teroris dari Markas Besar Brimob Cabang Salemba, Depok, Jumat (10/11).Sejumlah tahanan merusak fasilitas penjara.Insiden itu dimulai ketika penjaga meminta para tahanan untuk masuk setelah doa Jumat.Namun, ada gesekan antara tahanan dan petugas sampai tahanan lain bergabung dalam kebisingan.Karo Penmas, Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Polisi, Brigadir Jenderal Rikwanto, menegaskan bahwa kerusuhan di pusat penahanan teroris di markas Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua Depok, tidak disebabkan oleh lemparan Alquran oleh para petugas di sana.Namun, menurut Rikwanto, kerusuhan itu dipicu oleh sikap para tahanan yang mencoba memancing keributan.Dari hasil pemeriksaan awal, kerusuhan dimulai ketika petugas memasukkan tahanan ke dalam sel masing -masing setelah melakukan doa Jumat.Selain memimpin mereka juga, petugas juga memeriksa tahanan dan menemukan empat ponsel.Keempat unit telepon itu milik tahanan terorisme dengan inisial Jum, SA, JUH, dan KA.Telepon kemudian disita.Namun, salah satu tahanan keberatan dan mencoba menimbulkan masalah.Dia kemudian diprovokasi dengan memprovokasi emosi petugas.Situasi meningkat ketika tahanan lain juga diprovokasi.Pada akhirnya, kerusuhan tidak bisa dihindari.Tahanan kemudian menghancurkan pintu sel, serta sejumlah fasilitas lainnya."Sekarang kita memiliki situasi di bawah kendali," kata Rikwanto, Jumat malam

berita: DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan attended the 90th anniversary of the establishment of the Kanisius College educational institution, at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Saturday (11/11) night. On that occasion Anies was given time to make a speech in front of the invited guests. However, while giving a speech there were some guests who walked out of the room. When confirmed, Anies admitted that he did not know that any guests had left, one of them was Ananda Sukarlan. He even admitted that he was close to the Principal of Kanisius High School, Pater E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho. And to attend an invitation from the Canisius School was not the first. "And this is not the first time I've been to Kanisius, so when I heard it this morning, I remembered that someone had come out because I don't remember it, I didn't see it," said Anies at the DKI Jakarta City Hall, Monday (11/13). Even so, Anies admitted to respecting and appreciating all opinions and views from all parties towards him. Because as the governor of Jakarta, he must greet all his citizens without any difference, protecting all parties is the duty of a governor. Because according to Anies, everyone has the right to express their opinion in their own way. Including people who criticize his speech. "If there is a negative reaction then that's a bonus for me," he said. Previously, in a video circulating on social media, pianist Ananda Sukarlan, who is an alumni of the picture Kanisius school, protested the presence of Governor Anies Baswedan. There was also a press release from the Kanisius 86 Alumni Association, which was sent by Ananda Sukarlan, which contained the following: In commemoration of the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College, this school which has been consistent until now only for boys located in Menteng Raya for the first time gave the Canisius Awards to 5 alumni from various generations. These 5 alumni were screened from the 95 finalists who became candidates. They are Ananda Sukarlan (composer & pianist), Derianto Kusuma (founder of Traveloka), Father Magnis Suseno (Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (scout leader) and Dr Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). Present and giving the opening speech at the grand event at JIFest which was attended by thousands of Kanisius alumni yesterday, Saturday, November 11, was the governor of Jakarta, Anies Baswedan. When he gave a speech, Ananda Sukarlan stood up from his VIP seat and walked out showing his disapproval of Anies' speech. This action was followed by hundreds of alumni and other members of the audience. After giving his speech which was greeted coldly by the remaining audience, Anies Baswedan left the venue. The audience who had walked out entered the room again. During the awarding of these 5 figures, Ananda got a turn for a 10-minute speech. In the speech after he said thank you, he also criticized the organizing committee. "You have invited someone with values ​​and integrity that are contrary to what we have been taught. Although you may have to invite him because of his position, but next time we have to look at the person as well. He got his position in ways that are not in accordance with the values -Canisius values. I'm not talking about politics, this is a matter of conscience and human values," he said. After getting off the stage, Ananda was greeted and praised by the nominees for the award, including former minister Ir. Sarwono Kusumaatmaja and Father E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J., Principal of Kanisius High School.
berita_id: Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan menghadiri peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Lembaga Pendidikan Kanisius College, di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Sabtu (11/11) malam.Pada kesempatan itu Anies diberi waktu untuk berpidato di depan para tamu yang diundang.Namun, saat memberikan pidato ada beberapa tamu yang keluar dari ruangan.Ketika dikonfirmasi, Anies mengakui bahwa dia tidak tahu bahwa ada tamu yang pergi, salah satunya adalah Ananda Sukarlan.Dia bahkan mengakui bahwa dia dekat dengan kepala sekolah SMA Kanisius, Pater E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho.Dan untuk menghadiri undangan dari sekolah Canisius bukan yang pertama."Dan ini bukan pertama kalinya saya ke Kanisius, jadi ketika saya mendengarnya pagi ini, saya ingat bahwa seseorang telah keluar karena saya tidak mengingatnya, saya tidak melihatnya," kata Anies di Balai Kota DKI Jakarta, Senin (11/13).Meski begitu, Anies mengaku menghormati dan menghargai semua pendapat dan pandangan dari semua pihak kepadanya.Karena sebagai gubernur Jakarta, ia harus menyapa semua warganya tanpa perbedaan, melindungi semua pihak adalah tugas seorang gubernur.Karena menurut ANIES, setiap orang memiliki hak untuk mengekspresikan pendapat mereka dengan cara mereka sendiri.Termasuk orang yang mengkritik pidatonya."Jika ada reaksi negatif maka itu bonus untukku," katanya.Sebelumnya, dalam sebuah video yang beredar di media sosial, pianis Ananda Sukarlan, yang merupakan alumni dari gambar Sekolah Kanisius, memprotes kehadiran Gubernur Anies Baswedan.Ada juga siaran pers dari Asosiasi Alumni Kanisius 86, yang dikirim oleh Ananda Sukarlan, yang berisi yang berikut: dalam peringatan peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College, sekolah ini yang konsisten sampai sekarang untuk anak laki -laki yang berlokasi di berbagai generasi.5 alumni ini disaring dari 95 finalis yang menjadi kandidat.Mereka adalah Ananda Sukarlan (Komposer & Pianis), DeRianto Kusuma (pendiri Traveloka), Pastor Magnis Suseno (Jesuit Figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr Boenjamin setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farma).Hadir dan memberikan pidato pembukaan di acara besar di Jifest yang dihadiri oleh ribuan alumni Kanisius kemarin, Sabtu, 11 November, adalah gubernur Jakarta, Anies Baswedan.Ketika dia memberikan pidato, Ananda Sukarlan berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar menunjukkan ketidaksetujuannya terhadap pidato anies.Tindakan ini diikuti oleh ratusan alumni dan anggota audiensi lainnya.Setelah memberikan pidatonya yang disambut dengan dingin oleh penonton yang tersisa, Anies Baswedan meninggalkan tempat itu.Penonton yang berjalan keluar memasuki ruangan lagi.Selama pemberian 5 angka ini, Ananda mendapat giliran untuk pidato 10 menit.Dalam pidatonya setelah dia mengucapkan terima kasih, dia juga mengkritik komite pengorganisasian."Anda telah mengundang seseorang dengan nilai -nilai dan integritas yang bertentangan dengan apa yang telah kami ajarkan. Meskipun Anda mungkin harus mengundangnya karena posisinya, tetapi lain kali kita harus melihat orang itu juga. Dia mendapatkan posisinya dengan cara yang tidak sesuai dengan nilai -nilai -Nilai -nilai Canisius. Saya tidak berbicara tentang politik, ini adalah masalah hati nilainya dan nilai -nilai manusia," katanya.Setelah turun dari panggung, Ananda disambut dan dipuji oleh nominasi untuk penghargaan tersebut, termasuk mantan Menteri IR.Sarwono Kusumaatmaja dan Pastor E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J., Kepala Sekolah Menengah Kanisius.

berita: Jurnaldigital.com – Cianjur Regent Irvan Rivano Muchtar will prohibit Cianjur residents, especially young people, from playing the online game Pokemon Go. The reason is that the meaning contained in the game is contrary to the beliefs of wish the majority of the population of Cianjur and is considered dangerous. According to Irvan, one of the game applications on smartphones based on Android and Apple is indeed being loved by game lovers, especially young people. However, according to Irvan, the meaning of the word Pokemon in one language is I am Jewish. “Obviously this is an acknowledgment of people who oppress our brothers, like the Palestinians. It also contradicts religious teachings," he said, Tuesday, July 19 2016. Irvan said the Cianjur Regency Government is currently only urging smartphone users not to play Pokemon Go, which was recently officially launched in America and will only be inaugurated in Indonesia in the near future. "Now it's just an appeal, but maybe later it will be banned if it doesn't educate and is dangerous," he said. Irvan added, from some of the news circulating, Pokemon Go can cause accidents. Games that require users to leave the house and walk to look for pokemon will disrupt concentration on the road. “Indeed, there has been no research on whether it is dangerous or not. But what is clear is that it is better to anticipate before all these bad things happen,” he said. The Commander of Military District 0608 Cianjur, Lieutenant Colonel Armed Imam Haryadi, has even issued a ban for his members from playing the Pokemon Go game, especially at headquarters. According to him, the GPS-based game will record complete location data so that it is feared that it will be misused. Imam explained, the Pokemon Go game is three-dimensional and based on GPS. When used, it will record the location data for the monster's search. If the recorded data goes to other parties and is used for certain purposes, it is very dangerous. "So we forbid all members of the TNI, starting from the Kodim, Koramil, and below to play, especially in the TNI headquarters environment," said Armed
berita_id: Jurnaldigital.com - Bupati Cianjur Irvan Rivano Muchtar akan melarang penduduk Cianjur, terutama orang -orang muda, dari memainkan game online Pokemon Go.Alasannya adalah bahwa makna yang terkandung dalam permainan ini bertentangan dengan keyakinan harapan mayoritas populasi Cianjur dan dianggap berbahaya.Menurut Irvan, salah satu aplikasi game di smartphone berdasarkan Android dan Apple memang dicintai oleh pecinta game, terutama orang -orang muda.Namun, menurut Irvan, arti kata pokemon dalam satu bahasa adalah saya orang Yahudi."Jelas ini adalah pengakuan terhadap orang -orang yang menindas saudara -saudara kita, seperti orang -orang Palestina. Ini juga bertentangan dengan ajaran agama," katanya, Selasa, 19 Juli 2016. Irvan mengatakan bahwa pemerintah Kabupaten Cianjur saat ini hanya akan mendesak pengguna ponsel cerdas untuk tidak bermain di Pokemon Go, yang baru -baru ini diluncurkan secara resmi di Amerika dan hanya akan hanya akan ada di Indonesia di Indonesia, yang baru -baru ini diluncurkan secara resmi di Amerika dan hanya akan hanya ada di Indonesia di Indonesia di THOD, yang baru -baru ini secara resmi diluncurkan di Amerika dan hanya akan hanya akan disalahgunakan di Indonesia di Indonesia."Sekarang ini hanya banding, tapi mungkin nanti akan dilarang jika tidak mendidik dan berbahaya," katanya.Irvan menambahkan, dari beberapa berita yang beredar, Pokemon Go dapat menyebabkan kecelakaan.Game yang mengharuskan pengguna meninggalkan rumah dan berjalan untuk mencari Pokemon akan mengganggu konsentrasi di jalan."Memang, belum ada penelitian apakah itu berbahaya atau tidak. Tapi yang jelas adalah bahwa lebih baik mengantisipasi sebelum semua hal buruk ini terjadi," katanya.Komandan Distrik Militer 0608 Cianjur, Letnan Kolonel Bersenjata Imam Haryadi, bahkan telah mengeluarkan larangan bagi para anggotanya untuk memainkan permainan Pokemon Go, terutama di markas besar.Menurutnya, game berbasis GPS akan merekam data lokasi yang lengkap sehingga ditakuti bahwa itu akan disalahgunakan.Imam menjelaskan, game Pokemon Go adalah tiga dimensi dan berdasarkan GPS.Saat digunakan, itu akan merekam data lokasi untuk pencarian monster.Jika data yang direkam pergi ke pihak lain dan digunakan untuk tujuan tertentu, itu sangat berbahaya."Jadi kami melarang semua anggota TNI, mulai dari Kodim, Koramil, dan di bawah untuk bermain, terutama di lingkungan markas TNI," kata bersenjata

berita: Confirmation that this method is not appropriate was also expressed by a cardiologist from Harapan Kita Hospital, dr. Dicky Armein Hanafy, SpJP (K), FIHA. He even said this method did not bring any results. No use at all. There is a risk of infection, especially if the needles are not sterile or clean, he said. Instead of providing first aid at home, these two specialists suggest that we immediately rush the patient to the hospital to get help immediately. The family must immediately take him to the hospital, about said Yuda. Stroke occurs due to blocked blood vessels or bleeding in the brain. Some of the recognizable signs include sudden severe headache, weakness, numbness, vision problems, confusion, difficulty walking or speaking, dizziness, and slurred speech.
berita_id: Konfirmasi bahwa metode ini tidak tepat juga diungkapkan oleh ahli jantung dari Rumah Sakit Harapan Kita, DR.Dicky Armein Hanafy, SPJP (K), Fiha.Dia bahkan mengatakan metode ini tidak membawa hasil apa pun.Tidak ada gunanya sama sekali.Ada risiko infeksi, terutama jika jarum tidak steril atau bersih, katanya.Alih -alih memberikan pertolongan pertama di rumah, kedua spesialis ini menyarankan agar kami segera terburu -buru pasien ke rumah sakit untuk mendapatkan bantuan segera.Keluarga harus segera membawanya ke rumah sakit, tentang Yuda tersebut.Stroke terjadi karena pembuluh darah yang terhalang atau pendarahan di otak.Beberapa tanda yang dapat dikenali termasuk sakit kepala mendadak yang tiba -tiba, kelemahan, mati rasa, masalah penglihatan, kebingungan, kesulitan berjalan atau berbicara, pusing, dan pidato yang tidak jelas.

berita: Buleleng Police Narcotics Unit officers together with the Buleleng Industry and Trade Office conducted raids on several candy traders in schools in the Singaraja city area, on Thursday (9/3) morning. This raid was based on the rising circulation of issues on social media stating that candy shaped like a baby pacifier, containing drugs is currently ab initio circulating throughout Indonesia. The allegation of the pacifier containing drugs initially occurred in Central Java. This information suddenly made the Buleleng Police officer furious. To prove the reality, they also conducted raids while socializing in several locations such as SDN 3 and 4 Banjar Jawa, SDN 1 Banjar Tegal, SDN 1, 2, and 5 Banyuasri. The Head of Narcotics at the Buleleng Police, AKP I Ketut Adnyana, said that until now, candy pacifiers in Buleleng had not been found. However, it still asks all students, school teachers and the community to remain vigilant. “If anyone sees a candy pacifier that says hard candy, please let us know immediately. This is because the dot-shaped candy contains a drug substance, which if consumed will cause addiction. If it is found, we will immediately take it for a lab check,” he explained in front of all the students of SDN 3 and 4 Banjar Jawa, Singaraja. From field observations, until 10.32 WITA, alert notices had been posted in school canteens by officers from the Buleleng Police Narcotics Unit and the Buleleng Industry and Trade Office.
berita_id: Petugas Unit Narkotika Polisi Buleleng bersama -sama dengan industri Buleleng dan kantor perdagangan melakukan penggerebekan pada beberapa pedagang permen di sekolah -sekolah di daerah Kota Singaraja, pada hari Kamis (9/3) pagi.Penggerebekan ini didasarkan pada meningkatnya sirkulasi masalah di media sosial yang menyatakan bahwa permen berbentuk seperti dot bayi, yang mengandung obat -obatan saat ini beredar di seluruh Indonesia.Tuduhan dot yang mengandung obat -obatan awalnya terjadi di Jawa Tengah.Informasi ini tiba -tiba membuat petugas polisi Buleleng marah.Untuk membuktikan kenyataan, mereka juga melakukan penggerebekan sambil bersosialisasi di beberapa lokasi seperti SDN 3 dan 4 Banjar Jawa, Sdn 1 Banjar Tegal, Sdn 1, 2, dan 5 Banyuasri.Kepala narkotika di Polisi Buleleng, AKP I Ketut Adnyana, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang, dot permen di Buleleng belum ditemukan.Namun, masih meminta semua siswa, guru sekolah dan masyarakat untuk tetap waspada."Jika ada yang melihat dot permen yang mengatakan permen keras, tolong beri tahu kami segera. Ini karena permen berbentuk titik berisi zat obat, yang jika dikonsumsi akan menyebabkan kecanduan. Jika ditemukan, kami akan segera menerimanya untuk pemeriksaan lab," jelasnya di depan semua siswa SDN 3 dan 4 Banjar Jawa, Singaraja.Dari pengamatan lapangan, hingga 10.32 Wita, pemberitahuan peringatan telah diposting di kantin sekolah oleh petugas dari Unit Narkotika Polisi Buleleng dan industri dan kantor perdagangan Buleleng.

berita: The Presidential Palace stated that the salaries of the President and Vice President did not increase. The statement was issued because there were rumors that President Joko Widodo was getting a salary increase. "There are reports that President Joko Widodo received a salary increase is not true," said the official statement received by Katadata, Wednesday (28/6). According to the Palace, until now, the President and Vice President still receive salaries in accordance with Law Number 7 of 1978 concerning the Financial/Administrative Rights of the President and Vice President as well as wage the Former Presidents and Vice Presidents. In Article 2 of the Law, it is stated that the basic salary of the President is six times the base salary of the highest official in Indonesia other than the President and Vice President. On the other hand, the base salary of the Vice President is four times the base salary of the highest official other than the President and Vice President. Meanwhile, according to Government Regulation no. 75 of 2000, the highest basic salary for state officials, namely the Chairman of the House of Representatives (DPR), the Supreme Court (MA), and the Supreme Audit Agency (BPK) is Rp 5.04 million per month. That way, the president's basic salary is six times or Rp 30.24 million per month. Meanwhile, the base salary of the Vice President is four times, which is Rp. 20.16 million per month. Meanwhile, the amount of office allowance received by the President is Rp. 32.5 million and the Vice President is Rp. 22 million per month. The provisions regarding this allowance are in accordance with Presidential Decree Number 68 of 2001. "Thus, the amount of income received by the President and Vice President has not changed since 2001," it was written. (Also read: Ministry of Finance Proposes Tax Employee Performance Allowance According to Workload) With this calculation, Jokowi's income from salary and office allowances is IDR 62.74 million per month. Meanwhile, Jusuf Kalla's income was IDR 42.16 million.
berita_id: Istana Presiden menyatakan bahwa gaji presiden dan wakil presiden tidak meningkat.Pernyataan itu dikeluarkan karena ada desas -desus bahwa Presiden Joko Widodo mendapatkan kenaikan gaji."Ada laporan bahwa Presiden Joko Widodo menerima kenaikan gaji tidak benar," kata pernyataan resmi yang diterima oleh Katadata, Rabu (28/6).Menurut Istana, sampai sekarang, presiden dan wakil presiden masih menerima gaji sesuai dengan hukum nomor 7 tahun 1978 mengenai hak keuangan/administrasi presiden dan wakil presiden serta upah mantan presiden dan wakil presiden.Dalam Pasal 2 Hukum, dinyatakan bahwa gaji dasar Presiden adalah enam kali gaji pokok pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia selain Presiden dan Wakil Presiden.Di sisi lain, gaji pokok wakil presiden empat kali lipat gaji pokok pejabat tertinggi selain presiden dan wakil presiden.Sementara itu, menurut peraturan pemerintah no.75 tahun 2000, gaji dasar tertinggi untuk pejabat negara, yaitu Ketua Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat (DPR), Mahkamah Agung (MA), dan Badan Audit Tertinggi (BPK) adalah RP 5,04 juta per bulan.Dengan begitu, gaji pokok presiden adalah enam kali atau Rp 30,24 juta per bulan.Sementara itu, gaji pokok Wakil Presiden adalah empat kali, yaitu RP.20,16 juta per bulan.Sementara itu, jumlah tunjangan kantor yang diterima oleh Presiden adalah RP.32,5 juta dan wakil presiden adalah RP.22 juta per bulan.Ketentuan tentang tunjangan ini sesuai dengan Keputusan Presiden Nomor 68 tahun 2001. "Dengan demikian, jumlah pendapatan yang diterima oleh Presiden dan Wakil Presiden tidak berubah sejak tahun 2001," itu ditulis.(Juga baca: Kementerian Keuangan mengusulkan tunjangan kinerja karyawan pajak sesuai dengan beban kerja) dengan perhitungan ini, pendapatan Jokowi dari gaji dan tunjangan kantor adalah IDR 62,74 juta per bulan.Sementara itu, pendapatan Jusuf Kalla adalah IDR 42,16 juta.

berita: Public concerns regarding the circulation of pacifiers suspected of containing dangerous chemicals have finally been answered. After conducting laboratory tests, the National Narcotics Agency (BNN) of East Java Province ensured that the teat candy was safe for consumption. Laboratory tests were carried out by the East Java BNNP on samples of pacifiers that had been troubling the public because they were suspected of containing dangerous chemicals or drugs. The results of laboratory tests surmise show that pacifiers do not contain narcotics or psychotropic substances, so they are suitable for consumption. However, if consumed in the long term, this candy will have the potential to cause cancer. That's because pacifiers contain chemical dyes and preservatives. For complete information, including an explanation from the East Java BNNP, see the video above.
berita_id: Kekhawatiran publik mengenai sirkulasi dot yang diduga mengandung bahan kimia berbahaya akhirnya dijawab.Setelah melakukan tes laboratorium, Badan Narkotika Nasional (BNN) dari Provinsi Jawa Timur memastikan bahwa permen TEAT aman untuk dikonsumsi.Tes laboratorium dilakukan oleh Java BNNP Timur pada sampel dot yang telah mengganggu publik karena mereka diduga mengandung bahan kimia atau obat -obatan berbahaya.Hasil tes laboratorium menduga menunjukkan bahwa dot tidak mengandung narkotika atau zat psikotropika, sehingga mereka cocok untuk dikonsumsi.Namun, jika dikonsumsi dalam jangka panjang, permen ini akan memiliki potensi untuk menyebabkan kanker.Itu karena dot mengandung pewarna dan pengawet kimia.Untuk informasi lengkap, termasuk penjelasan dari Java BNNP Timur, lihat video di atas.

berita: In the 212th action volume II which was conducted on Tuesday (21/2/2017) morning, news circulated on various social media regarding the closing of the gates of the Istiqlal Mosque for visitors. Regarding this, the Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI) felt the need to provide clarification. In an official statement on Tuesday (21/2/2017), the Secretary of the Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency, Rusli Effendi, gave clarification regarding this matter. Clarification needs to be done so that the news circulating so far does not become a misleading misunderstanding. BPPMI also urges all Muslims not to influence news that cannot be properly accounted for. Meanwhile, the news that the mosque has been locked so that people cannot pray Fajr is a hoax or a mere hoax. The closure of the mosque has indeed become a regulation or procedure for Istiqlal. This is the clarification that was officially delivered by BPPMI as stated on Republika.co.id. The Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency since 2002 has enforced a rule (SOP), closing the gates every night at 21.30. The mosque was reopened in the morning at 03.40, ahead of the Fajr prayer service. This rule (SOP) was enforced in order to optimize mosque security at night. All pilgrims are not allowed to stay in the Istiqlal Mosque area, except under certain conditions and with the permission of the security forces and the leadership of BPPMI. Regarding the conditions at night from 20 to the early hours of February 21 2017, the Istiqlal Mosque security forces have explained to the worshipers gathered in the courtyard of the Istiqlal Mosque all about the procedure and they understand and are willing to leave the Istiqlal Mosque area. BPPMI did not receive notification from any party regarding the plans for the congregation to stay overnight as in the previous conditions when Muslims held 411, 212 or 112 actions. There was also no special communication from the authorities regarding this matter. The Istiqlal Mosque always serves the people and strives for national unity and unity, and always maintains the comfort of worship. BPPMI stated that the negative news that had been spread on social media regarding the above matters did not correspond to reality and tended to contain provocations. BPPMI appeals to all Muslims to be asked not to be influenced by news that cannot be accounted for. The implementation of the Fajr prayer at the Istiqlal Mosque today went well and smoothly, led by Ustaz Salim Ghazali. The number of worshipers is about 240 people (170 men and 70 women).
berita_id: Dalam aksi ke -212 Volume II yang dilakukan pada hari Selasa (21/2/2017) pagi, berita beredar di berbagai media sosial mengenai penutupan gerbang masjid Istiqlal untuk pengunjung.Mengenai ini, Badan Manajemen Masjid ISTIQLAL (BPPMI) merasa perlu untuk memberikan klarifikasi.Dalam sebuah pernyataan resmi pada hari Selasa (21/2/2017), Sekretaris Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal, Rusli Effendi, memberikan klarifikasi mengenai masalah ini.Klarifikasi perlu dilakukan sehingga berita yang beredar sejauh ini tidak menjadi kesalahpahaman yang menyesatkan.BPPMI juga mendesak semua Muslim untuk tidak mempengaruhi berita yang tidak dapat diperhitungkan dengan benar.Sementara itu, berita bahwa masjid telah dikunci sehingga orang tidak dapat berdoa fajr adalah tipuan atau hanya tipuan.Penutupan masjid memang telah menjadi peraturan atau prosedur untuk istiqlal.Ini adalah klarifikasi yang secara resmi disampaikan oleh BPPMI sebagaimana dinyatakan pada Republika.co.id.Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal sejak tahun 2002 telah menegakkan aturan (SOP), menutup gerbang setiap malam pukul 21.30.Masjid dibuka kembali di pagi hari pukul 03.40, di depan Layanan Doa Fajr.Aturan ini (SOP) ditegakkan untuk mengoptimalkan keamanan masjid di malam hari.Semua peziarah tidak diizinkan untuk tinggal di daerah Masjid Istiqlal, kecuali dalam kondisi tertentu dan dengan izin pasukan keamanan dan kepemimpinan BPPMI.Mengenai kondisi di malam hari dari 20 hingga jam awal 21 Februari 2017, pasukan keamanan masjid Istiqlal telah menjelaskan kepada para penyembah yang berkumpul di halaman masjid Istiqlal semua tentang prosedur dan mereka mengerti dan bersedia untuk meninggalkan daerah masjid Istiqlal.BPPMI tidak menerima pemberitahuan dari pihak mana pun mengenai rencana untuk jemaat untuk menginap seperti dalam kondisi sebelumnya ketika Muslim mengadakan tindakan 411, 212 atau 112.Juga tidak ada komunikasi khusus dari pihak berwenang mengenai masalah ini.Masjid Istiqlal selalu melayani orang -orang dan berjuang untuk persatuan dan persatuan nasional, dan selalu mempertahankan kenyamanan ibadah.BPPMI menyatakan bahwa berita negatif yang telah tersebar di media sosial mengenai hal -hal di atas tidak sesuai dengan kenyataan dan cenderung mengandung provokasi.BPPMI menarik semua Muslim untuk diminta untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak dapat diperhitungkan.Implementasi Doa Fajr di Masjid Istiqlal hari ini berjalan dengan baik dan lancar, dipimpin oleh Ustaz Salim Ghazali.Jumlah penyembah adalah sekitar 240 orang (170 pria dan 70 wanita).

berita: Is it true that catfish contain cancer cells? There are many rumors about this delicious fish, that there are about 3000 cancer cells located in the body of catfish. Let's peel in depth according to Dr. Oz Indonesia. Who does not know this one fish? Surely all countries know it because the meat is very soft and has a very high nutritional value. Catfish is a type of fish that is classified as very strong and can live even in wastewater. If you are in Indonesia, you will definitely not miss the name of catfish cuisine, there are many preparations that can be made with catfish ingredients including catfish pecel, tongseng, basil, spicy catfish sauce, and many more. Why Many Public Opinion That Catfish Contain Cancer Cells, Is That True? This public opinion had become viral and even became a scene in the world of news information, and this has also been revealed by the television program Dr. Oz Indonesia. Then is it true that this catfish when consumed by someone can cause cancer? According to Dr. Oz Indonesia has been revealed and has been explained to conclude that there are 2 things that cause this catfish to have thousands of cancer cells, including: Where is the Place for Catfish Cultivated? What's Worth? The presence of this opinion made the fisheries service participate in conducting research and the results revealed that some of the sample catfish contained cancer cells and some were negative. After being investigated by various catfish farmers, it turned out that the cause was the place where the catfish were cultivated. There are some catfish that live in ponds with waste that is not fit for consumption and some live in fresh water. The catfish farmers admitted that the catfish's ability to live in murky water was even in piles of garbage or pig manure, so that the farmers did not have to bother draining their pond water. This is what makes the catfish very toxic, the catfish is directly contaminated with liquids that are classified as having a bad impact on the consumer. Do Catfish Consuming Dirt or Waste According to doctor Oz Indonesia in his video, it has been stated that something from above can sink so that the catfish consumes it. What about poop droppings like chicken, bird or even pig? Of course, it's clear, isn't it, that catfish is one type of fish that eats dirt. Currently, many catfish farmers can use alternative feeds such as cow dung, poultry, humans and so on. This indeed provides a distinct advantage for catfish farmers, to reap 2x profits, the manufacturing process is very simple, for example, cow dung: Put cow dung into a barrel or container that can be closed, Mix waste such as tofu dregs, Stir until mixed, Leave it open the barrel or container, to invite flies to lay eggs, sugar or honey can be added, leave it for one week, so that the larvae or worms can come out and are ready to be harvested. If you look at it, it is very disgusting, the catfish that is consumed turns out to be used from worm feed. Not to mention, feed from human waste because this is precisely what is very dangerous because the worms that grow are hard to destroy even though they have been cooked, as a result the eggs settle in the catfish's body and enter the bodies of other humans. One of the most common examples is pinworms, which can survive approximately 3 weeks in even open areas. However, Dr. Oz said that not all breeders do this, that's why we have to be smart in choosing the right catfish market. Keep catfish clean and try to cook catfish food very thoroughly. Why Can Catfish Survive In Muddy Water, sum And Mixed With Dirt? Catfish are indeed equipped with the advantage of being able to survive in cloudy and dirty water because this type of fish is equipped with labyrinthine respiration. What is a maze? The labyrinth is an additional breathing apparatus for fish whose function is to take air above the surface and store it for a long time, so don't be surprised if the catfish rises to the surface only briefly but can last a long time under murky water that is poor in oxygen even if it is mixed with dirt. Benefits of Catfish Vs Salmon Many say that the content of catfish is equivalent to the content in salmon, according to Dr. Oz this is true because catfish contains omega 3 and omega 6 just like salmon. The difference is how to consume it, if the salmon can be swallowed raw, but the catfish does not have to be cooked first to reduce the bacteria present. Some of the benefits that can be obtained from health, including: Helping nourish the brain Omega 3 fats and omega 6 fats are fats that are good for the body, which are HDL (good fats) which help the body fulfill brain nutrition. Rich in protein, it is very beneficial for a child who is growing and developing, building muscle mass and bone density. The content of B12, just a portion of catfish can help meet the needs of B12 in the body, B12 is very influential on the body that is often tired. It is recommended if your body feels tired, try to eat catfish. Consuming catfish is also beneficial for curing anemia, the body is easily tired and difficulty in remembering something. Phosphorus for the formation of bones and teeth. Catfish does contain a lot of phosphorus, not only from milk, it turns out that catfish is also useful for meeting the needs of bones and teeth. Phosphorus in the human body is essentially absorbed around 70% will be digested by the body and used to support healthy teeth and bones. Lowers blood pressure. This type of fish is very helpful in lowering high blood pressure, omega 3 in fish is fat (HDL) which is very good in fighting bad fats (LDL). People tend not to know that high cholesterol is closely related to the narrowing of blood vessels that causes hypertension (high blood pressure). You can reduce this hypertension by consuming catfish 3 times a day.

PT Petrona Inti Chemindo (PIC) as a company that imports hard candy or known as candy dot regrets the Surabaya City Government's steps in raiding its products in the market. "What we need is the restoration of good name," said PT PIC's attorney, Prihadi Saputro at a press conference held at the JW Marriott Hotel, Surabaya, Monday (13/3/2017). Although it regrets the action which is considered unprocedural, PT PIC will not sue the Surabaya City Government. They just want the Surabaya City Government to rehabilitate or restore the name of the candy pacifier which has been declared by the BNN and the Surabaya BBPOM that it does not contain drugs. "No need to reply," said Prihadi. The trick, said Prihadi, is through socialization carried out by the Surabaya City Government. Because the polemic of the dot candy goes viral every day, PT PIC asks that the socialization be carried out every day as well. Socialization can be done through advertisements or directly to traders. "Prepare a re-socialization which essentially explains to the public that pacifier candy is safe and does not contain harmful ingredients, let alone drugs. We give 14 days from today to do the socialization," continued Prihadi. Prihadi added that there was no reason why the Surabaya City Government refused to socialize because based on the results of the BBPOM laboratory test, pacifiers were proven to be safe. When tested at BBPOM, the candy with the Penguin Brand trademark has gone through two stages of testing. The first test, candy has passed the four parameter level test. While in the second test, the candy has passed the 16 parameter level test. In addition to not containing hazardous materials, Prihadi said that administratively, PT PIC has obtained an approval for the registration of processed food issued by BPOM RI. "We have pocketed the approval since 2008-2013, then we extended it from August 19, 2013 to August 19, 2018. Meanwhile, our import permits are still long, until 2021," explained Prihadi. Prihadi did not deny the losses suffered by his client. This case indeed started in Surabaya, but its impact then spread nationwide due to the viral news in various news and social media. "As a result of this virus, traders who are our leading partners in Bekasi, West Java, Jakarta and assorted many other cities have suffered material losses," said Prihadi. Although he said he had suffered material losses, Prihadi did not mention the figures. He only mentions billions as the nominal loss suffered by his client. But the material loss, he said, was not the essence of resolving the case. "We don't really look at the money because we don't expect the Surabaya City Government to return it. What is important is name rehabilitation, restoration of good name. Why don't we sue, because we don't want drama. The important thing is we can work," said Prihadi. The Satpol PP and the sub-districts in Surabaya who took the early prevention steps immediately returned the candy that was secured after the results of the BBPOM and BNN lab tests declared it safe. In addition to returning to the traders who were recorded at the beginning of the raid, the dot-type candies that were brought were also purchased by the sub-district.
berita_id: PT Petrona Ini Chemindo (PIC) sebagai perusahaan yang mengimpor permen keras atau dikenal sebagai Candy Dot menyesali langkah -langkah pemerintah Kota Surabaya dalam menggerebek produknya di pasar."Yang kami butuhkan adalah pemulihan nama baik," kata pengacara PT Pic, Prihadi Saputro pada konferensi pers yang diadakan di JW Marriott Hotel, Surabaya, Senin (13/3/2017).Meskipun menyesali tindakan yang dianggap tidak terdeprok, PT PIC tidak akan menuntut pemerintah Kota Surabaya.Mereka hanya ingin pemerintah Kota Surabaya merehabilitasi atau mengembalikan nama dot permen yang telah dinyatakan oleh BNN dan BBPOM Surabaya yang tidak mengandung obat -obatan."Tidak perlu membalas," kata Prihadi.Triknya, kata Prihadi, adalah melalui sosialisasi yang dilakukan oleh pemerintah Kota Surabaya.Karena polemik permen titik menjadi viral setiap hari, Pt Pic meminta agar sosialisasi dilakukan setiap hari juga.Sosialisasi dapat dilakukan melalui iklan atau langsung ke pedagang."Siapkan sosialisasi ulang yang pada dasarnya menjelaskan kepada publik bahwa permen dot aman dan tidak mengandung bahan-bahan berbahaya, apalagi narkoba. Kami memberi 14 hari dari hari ini untuk melakukan sosialisasi," lanjut Prihadi.Prihadi menambahkan bahwa tidak ada alasan mengapa pemerintah kota Surabaya menolak untuk bersosialisasi karena berdasarkan hasil tes laboratorium BBPOM, dot terbukti aman.Ketika diuji di BBPOM, permen dengan merek dagang merek Penguin telah melalui dua tahap pengujian.Tes pertama, Candy telah lulus uji level empat parameter.Sementara dalam tes kedua, permen telah lulus uji level parameter 16.Selain tidak mengandung bahan berbahaya, Prihadi mengatakan bahwa secara administratif, PT PIC telah memperoleh persetujuan untuk pendaftaran makanan olahan yang dikeluarkan oleh BPOM RI."Kami telah mengantongi persetujuan sejak 2008-2013, lalu kami memperpanjangnya dari 19 Agustus 2013 hingga 19 Agustus 2018. Sementara itu, izin impor kami masih panjang, hingga 2021," jelas Prihadi.Prihadi tidak menyangkal kerugian yang diderita kliennya.Kasus ini memang dimulai di Surabaya, tetapi dampaknya kemudian menyebar secara nasional karena berita viral di berbagai berita dan media sosial."Sebagai hasil dari virus ini, pedagang yang merupakan mitra terkemuka kami di Bekasi, Jawa Barat, Jakarta dan berbagai macam kota lain menderita kerugian material," kata Prihadi.Meskipun dia mengatakan dia menderita kerugian materi, Prihadi tidak menyebutkan angka -angka itu.Dia hanya menyebutkan miliaran karena kerugian nominal yang diderita kliennya.Tetapi kehilangan materi, katanya, bukanlah inti dari menyelesaikan kasus ini."Kami tidak benar -benar melihat uang itu karena kami tidak mengharapkan pemerintah kota Surabaya untuk mengembalikannya. Yang penting adalah rehabilitasi nama, pemulihan nama baik. Mengapa kami tidak menuntut, karena kami tidak ingin drama. Yang penting adalah kami dapat bekerja," kata Prihadi.Satpol PP dan sub-distrik di Surabaya yang mengambil langkah pencegahan awal segera mengembalikan permen yang diamankan setelah hasil tes laboratorium BBPOM dan BNN menyatakannya aman.Selain kembali ke para pedagang yang direkam pada awal serangan, permen tipe dot yang dibawa juga dibeli oleh sub-distrik.

berita: Stroke is a disease that must be treated as soon as avert possible. Otherwise, the patient's hope for recovery will be smaller. The patient's brain can be damaged and can even lead to death. Therefore, first aid for stroke needs to be done carefully. Mishandling the consequences can be fatal. inserting a needle into the tip of the finger This fact is very wrong. If the needle is not sterile, it can cause infection (such as tetanus) Especially if the person has diabetes. One of the risk factors for stroke is diabetes. This means that diabetic patients are more susceptible to infection and the healing phase is also longer. in stroke patients, blockage or bleeding occurs in the blood vessels in the brain, not in the fingers. Anatomically, the finger is far from the brain, so sticking a needle will not help. The most important thing in dealing with a stroke is to recognize the symptoms. speech is not clear, sudden paralysis, difficulty walking, fainting until loss of consciousness, immediately take to the hospital if you see the above symptoms, especially in the first three hours, which is called the golden period. At that time, the patient is still very likely to avoid a stroke (if immediately treated) correctly) More severe stroke conditions can also be prevented. Therefore, avoid taking any measures as first aid, including inserting a needle into the finger. Take him to the hospital immediately before it is too late.
berita_id: Stroke adalah penyakit yang harus dirawat sesegera mungkin.Kalau tidak, harapan pasien untuk pemulihan akan lebih kecil.Otak pasien dapat rusak dan bahkan dapat menyebabkan kematian.Karena itu, pertolongan pertama untuk stroke perlu dilakukan dengan hati -hati.Salah menangani konsekuensinya bisa berakibat fatal.Memasukkan jarum ke ujung jari fakta ini sangat salah.Jika jarum tidak steril, itu dapat menyebabkan infeksi (seperti tetanus) terutama jika orang tersebut menderita diabetes.Salah satu faktor risiko stroke adalah diabetes.Ini berarti bahwa pasien diabetes lebih rentan terhadap infeksi dan fase penyembuhan juga lebih lama.Pada pasien stroke, penyumbatan atau perdarahan terjadi pada pembuluh darah di otak, bukan di jari.Secara anatomis, jari jauh dari otak, jadi menempelkan jarum tidak akan membantu.Hal terpenting dalam menangani stroke adalah mengenali gejalanya.Pidato tidak jelas, kelumpuhan mendadak, kesulitan berjalan, pingsan sampai kehilangan kesadaran, segera turun ke rumah sakit jika Anda melihat gejala di atas, terutama dalam tiga jam pertama, yang disebut periode emas.Pada saat itu, pasien masih sangat mungkin untuk menghindari stroke (jika segera diobati dengan benar) dengan benar) kondisi stroke yang lebih parah juga dapat dicegah.Oleh karena itu, hindari mengambil tindakan apa pun sebagai pertolongan pertama, termasuk memasukkan jarum ke jari.Bawa dia ke rumah sakit segera sebelum terlambat.

berita: News about Pokemon being a Jewish product became a trending topic on the Muslim Journal's Fanpage. Four posts titled Pokemon topped the list as the most read posts in mid-July. Here are some titles of articles that have had many viewers in the last few days on the Muslim Journal website as of 19/7/16: 1. Meaning of Pokemon in Syriac: "I'm Jewish," with 152,269 views by blogger. (Read the article here) clause 2. Did you know? Pokemon Products Are Jewish Missions, Contains Defamatory Elements of Islam with views reaching 110,028 by blogger. (Read the article here) 3. Game 'Pokemon Go' fever is spreading, this is the positive and negative impact, with viewers reaching 85,707 by blogger. (Read the article here) 4. Meaning of Pikachu in Syriac: "Be a Jew," with 76,887 views by blogger. (Read the article here) The popularity of the above articles has become the subject of discussion by many netizens, especially social media users such as Facebook, Twitter, etc. The reason is, the article that talks about the relationship between Jews and Pokemon reaps the pros and cons. A few hours ago there were several electronic letters that entered the Muslim Journal contact, either via Facebook or Email, as we have provided contact information on the Jurnalmuslim.com website. Some of them asked the validity of the articles mentioned above. There were even some who stated that the article was a hoax and the Muslim Journal website was accused of spreading slander. The link between Judaism and Pokemon Movies is an old 'issue' Our team of journalists, Nisyi, is motivated to raise the issue of the relationship between Pokemon and Jews because of the recent boom in Niantic's game product, Pokemon Go. When we clarified his motivation and reason for writing the article, he replied that it was an old issue that was brought up again. The issue of a link between Jews and Pokemon has existed since the Pokemon movie was broadcast on private televisions, namely in 2001 and was first broadcast by SCTV (Read about Pokemon for the first time airing on private television: wikipedia). "There were many leaflets about the relationship between Pokemon and Jews that were distributed in several cities when the Pokemon Movie was shown on the screen. Not only Pokemon, but several children's TV series were also included in the content of the leaflets. All of which talked about the existence of Jewish elements in children's cartoon series at the time." Nishi said. Muslim Journalists never post articles/news unless they include the source Because the data from the opinion of the relationship between Jews and Pokemon is no longer available. Our journalist, nisyi, tries to retrieve the data through the Internet. And indeed, a lot of writings that talk about the topic of Jews and Pokemon. Here are some articles that discuss the relationship between Jews and Pokemon: Article about Pokemon and Jews by Reika on her blog, posted in 2013 Article about Pokemon and Jews by smzblog on his blog, posted in 2008 Article about Pokemon and Jews by Dudung on his website, posted in 2011 It can be seen that the issue between Jews and Pokemon existed in the years before the Pokemon Go game was released. From here, our journalists take their opinion from an article sourced from the neutralitas.com site. For those who want to know about the neteritas.com website profile, please read here. In full, sources of opinion writing about Pokemon and Jews can be found here. The pros and cons of the issue of the connection between Jews and Pokemon is also an old issue In the article about Judaism and Pokemon, there are sensitive matters concerning Religion, especially Islam. That is about the meaning of Pokemon and some names of monsters in the Pokemon TV series. For example, it is stated that the Syriac meaning of Pokemon is "I am Jewish." Unfortunately, that statement is an opinion, and there are many pros and cons of that meaning. Among those who dispute this statement is an article quoted by a web developer who is also a Division of Information Technology at Bank BTPN Head Office, Dudung, on his website dudung.net, taken from the source ia-wutsqo. It was stated that leaflets about the relationship between Jews and Pokemon as well as several children's cartoons were not only spread in Indonesia, but also in Saudi, Jordan, Egypt and several other Middle Eastern regions. However, it was also mentioned that after being confirmed by a number of linguists, they generally rejected the notion that the word Pokemon and some of the monsters in Pokemon had a relationship with the Syriac language. Which means that the assumptions contained in the leaflet itself are not necessarily true. Reporting from solo.tribunnews (18/7/16), the LA Times news noted that Nintendo refuted the perception of the connection between Pokemon and Judaism. It is said that Pokemon is actually just an abbreviation of Pocket Monster or pocket monster. Named Pocket Monster because this pokemon has a pocket ball that can be put in a pocket. (Read here) What is interesting here is that it was informed on the dudung.net and tribune sites that Pokemon shows in several countries, such as Jordan, had attracted the attention of residents and even the local government. Quoted by Dudung, that a number of youths and children in Jordan have carried out mass arson actions against goods containing images of Pokemon. The problem is not only related to the meanings that are not necessarily true, but the Pokemon game has had quite a negative impact on children. The full article can be read here (posted in 2001). Regardless of the pros and cons of that perception, in this post, the editor of the Muslim Journal will clarify an article about the relationship between Pokemon and Jews by our journalist, Nisyi, a few days ago. That the article is the opinion of several writings in several media, be it leaflets, or other electronic media. Each of these articles has been given a clear source, and is not just a made-up opinion without any reference review. In this post, we as the editors thank you for the suggestions, input, and constructive criticism submitted through our contact information on the Jurnalmuslim.com site. We will definitely respond to suggestions, input and constructive criticism and are always used as material for evaluation for the Muslim Journal site. May Allah open the hearts of His servants to be able to receive guidance. Al Haq min rabbika falaa takunanna minal mumtarin, the truth is from your Lord Allah and do not be of those who doubt.

In 2012 we were shocked by the emergence of brushes or brushes made from pig bristles to the point that the MUI issued a fatwa against using a pig bristle brush, but recently, information about toothbrushes made from pig bristles has resurfaced. Information for you Muslims to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use materials from non-halal. Come on, check the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair aka Pig Fur! So double check the packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), Usually it says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". "What are your toothbrush bristles made of? Plastic or Pig Bristle? How to check: Look at the package, if it's made of bristles, then it's made of sea urchin. Please burn the bristles, if it smells like burning hair, it means it's from sea urchins. But if it melts and becomes hard, it means it is made of plastic and is safe to use. The risk of using what is haram: Worship is rejected, prayer is rejected, and hell is more worthy (hadith). Save ourselves and our loved ones. " In everyday life, we use various kinds of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint the house, grease cake pans, and spread food. Such as grilled chicken, bread, cakes, and various grilled or grilled meats and seafood. While the brush is useful when combing hair, cleaning hair at the salon or barbershop, washing skirmish clothes, and scrubbing floors. Do you know what the brushes & brushes you are using come from? Most likely FROM A FIRE FUR! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, generally come from China. These imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly HARAM. No matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption and for application. (the term is PIG/BOAR/HOG/BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places, SUCH AS MARKETS, PAINTING TOOLS SHOP, BUILDING MATERIALS STORE, MAKE UP TOOLS & SALON SHOP, ONLINE STORE, ETC. ARE YOU FAMILIAR WITH THE MULTIPLE FORMS BELOW? THERE ARE PAINTING BRUSH, WALL PAINT BRUSH, MAKE UP BRUSH, HAIR BRUSH, BARBER/BARBER BRUSH, CLOTHING BRUSH, ETC. BEWARE! TIPS AVOID USE BRUSHS AND BONES BRUSHS: 1. USE 100% SYNTHETIC BRUSH & BRUSH, SUCH AS NYLON. Wall paint brushes and food brushes are available, with slightly more expensive prices. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. 2. USE OTHER ALTERNATIVES BUT THE BRUSH. For example, paint rollers for painting, sponges & cotton buds for makeup, as well as knives & spatulas for greasing food. 3. BEWARE OF FOOD THAT THE PROCESS OF COOKING AND CLEANING Utensils USING A PIG BRUSH. 4. CHARACTERISTICS OF PIG BRUSH BRUSH, WHEN BURNED WILL GIVE A SPECIFIC OTHER LIKE ROCKED MEAT. 5. Usually, pig hair brushes are sold in WHITE & BLACK COLORS. However, manufacturers may process sea urchins by bleaching them and then dyeing them, so it looks like the hair of other animals. (AND) Share this info with your family and friends so that more people can read it so you can avoid products that are not halal…hopefully it will be useful
berita_id: Pada 2012 kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi hingga MUI mengeluarkan fatwa untuk tidak menggunakan sikat bulu babi, tetapi baru -baru ini, informasi tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah muncul kembali.Informasi untuk Anda Muslim untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan dari non-halal.Ayo, periksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi alias bulu babi!Jadi periksa kembali kemasan sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), biasanya dikatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% china bristle"."Apa bulu sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari? Bulu plastik atau babi? Bagaimana cara memeriksa: Lihatlah paket itu, jika terbuat dari bulu, maka itu terbuat dari landak laut. Tolong bakar bulu, jika baunya seperti rambut yang terbakar, itu berarti doa dan doa yang disingkirkan. TETAP RAIK. Tapi jika ada yang meleleh dan menjadi keras, itu berarti itu berarti itu digunakan dan ada yang aman.lebih layak (hadis).Selamatkan diri kita dan orang -orang yang kita cintai.Seperti ayam panggang, roti, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Sementara sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian pertempuran, dan menggosok lantai.Tahukah Anda dari apa kuas & kuas yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar dari bulu api!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia, umumnya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor ini diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Bagi umat Islam, penggunaan landak laut jelas haram.Tidak peduli seberapa kecil, materi dari daging babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan untuk aplikasi.(Istilah ini adalah sikat rambut babi/babi/babi/bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat, seperti pasar, toko lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, alat make up & toko salon, toko online, dll.Apakah Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk di bawah ini?Ada kuas lukisan, sikat cat dinding, kuas make up, sikat rambut, kuas tukang cukur/tukang cukur, sikat pakaian, dll.AWAS!Tips Hindari menggunakan kuas dan tulang sikat: 1. Gunakan sikat & sikat sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Sikat cat dinding dan kuas makanan tersedia, dengan harga yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.2. Gunakan alternatif lain kecuali kuas.Misalnya, cat rol untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk makeup, serta pisau & spatula untuk makanan berminyak.3. Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang proses memasak dan membersihkan peralatan menggunakan sikat babi.4. Karakteristik sikat sikat babi, ketika dibakar akan memberikan daging guncang lainnya seperti lainnya.5. Biasanya, kuas rambut babi dijual dalam warna putih & hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkan mereka dan kemudian mewarnai mereka, jadi sepertinya rambut hewan lain.(Dan) bagikan info ini dengan keluarga dan teman Anda sehingga lebih banyak orang dapat membacanya sehingga Anda dapat menghindari produk yang tidak halal ... semoga bermanfaat

berita: BEING INSPIRED for the burning of property on October 20, 2015, making thousands of Reog Ponorogo artists hold a demonstration, Tuesday (10/11/2015). Photo Text: Reog artists protest (ist) Photo Text: Reog artists protest (ist) The artists took action by giving speeches, unfurling banners bearing a number of demands, and also performing reog around Ponorogo Square. After carrying out a series of activities in protest against the burning of property at the Consulate General in Davao, representatives of the mass demonstrations were then allowed to attend an audience at the Ponorogo Regency DPRD Building, Second Floor, located on Jl. East Square, Ponorogo, East Java. Representatives of the mass of action termite were received by the leadership of the Ponorogo DPRD along with the Acting Regent of Ponorogo Maskur. The protesters were not only from Ponorogo, but also from surrounding cities, some even came directly from Jakarta to join this action. Not only that, dozens of reog groups also took part in the action. Photo test: Reog Ponorogo artists demonstrate (ist) Photo test: Reog Ponorogo artists demonstrate (ist) "We do not accept the reyog burning that occurred at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao some time ago," said Grendo, one of the Reyog artists who are members of the Ponorogo Reog Pandemen Community. Grendo, who is from Mlarak, continued, so that the perpetrators immediately apologized to the people of Ponorogo. "Our demand is that they immediately apologize to the people of Ponorogo as the owner of this reyog art," he said. Meanwhile, the Technical section for the staging of the Reog Ponorogo Community (KRP) Suyono, who came directly from Jakarta, said the perpetrators must be investigated and dealt with according to the existing law. "We demand accountability, and what was the motive for the arson!" he said after hearings with the Ponorogo DPRD and Acting Regent Maskur at the DPRD Building. After hearing about the burning of the reog, Suyono and several members of the KRP immediately went to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, who then after the discussion asked the ministry to write a letter in which the Ministry of Foreign Affairs would clarify and form an investigation team. The letter was directly delivered by Suyono to Ponorogo to be handed over to the Acting Regent of Ponorogo Maskur. Suyono admitted that he and his friends brought a set of reog property to Davao around 2005. He denied that the reog was burned there because of the damaged condition. If the bamboo from here is impossible for termites to eat, wong is stored neatly in the glass, he said in an annoyed tone
berita_id: Terinspirasi untuk pembakaran properti pada 20 Oktober 2015, membuat ribuan seniman Reog Ponorogo mengadakan demonstrasi, Selasa (10/11/2015).Teks Foto: Reog Artists Protes (IST) Teks Foto: Reog Artists Protes (IST) Para seniman mengambil tindakan dengan memberikan pidato, membentangkan spanduk yang membawa sejumlah tuntutan, dan juga melakukan reog di sekitar Ponorogo Square.Setelah melakukan serangkaian kegiatan sebagai protes terhadap pembakaran properti di Konsulat Jenderal di Davao, perwakilan demonstrasi massa kemudian diizinkan untuk menghadiri audiensi di gedung DPRD Kabupaten Ponorogo, lantai dua, yang terletak di JL.East Square, Ponorogo, Jawa Timur.Perwakilan dari massa rayap aksi diterima oleh kepemimpinan Ponorogo DPRD bersama dengan akting bupati Ponorogo Maskur.Para pengunjuk rasa tidak hanya dari Ponorogo, tetapi juga dari kota -kota di sekitarnya, beberapa bahkan datang langsung dari Jakarta untuk bergabung dengan tindakan ini.Tidak hanya itu, lusinan kelompok Reog juga mengambil bagian dalam aksi tersebut.Tes Foto: Reog Ponorogo Artists Demonstrasi (IST) Tes Foto: Reog Ponorogo Artists Demonstrasi (IST) "Kami tidak menerima pembakaran Reyog yang terjadi di konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao beberapa waktu yang lalu," kata Grendo, salah satu seniman Reyog yang merupakan anggota Ponorogo Pandemo Pandemo.Grendo, yang berasal dari Mlarak, melanjutkan, sehingga para pelaku segera meminta maaf kepada orang -orang Ponorogo."Tuntutan kami adalah bahwa mereka segera meminta maaf kepada orang -orang Ponorogo sebagai pemilik seni Reyog ini," katanya.Sementara itu, bagian teknis untuk pementasan komunitas Reog Ponorogo (KRP) Suyono, yang datang langsung dari Jakarta, mengatakan para pelaku harus diselidiki dan ditangani sesuai dengan hukum yang ada."Kami menuntut akuntabilitas, dan apa motif pembakaran!"Dia mengatakan setelah audiensi dengan Ponorogo DPRD dan bertindak sebagai Bupati Maskur di gedung DPRD.Setelah mendengar tentang pembakaran Reog, Suyono dan beberapa anggota KRP segera pergi ke Kementerian Luar Negeri, yang kemudian setelah diskusi meminta kementerian untuk menulis surat di mana Kementerian Luar Negeri akan mengklarifikasi dan membentuk tim investigasi.Surat itu langsung dikirim oleh Suyono ke Ponorogo untuk diserahkan kepada akting bupati Ponorogo Maskur.Suyono mengakui bahwa dia dan teman -temannya membawa serangkaian properti reog ke Davao sekitar tahun 2005. Dia membantah bahwa reog dibakar di sana karena kondisi yang rusak.Jika bambu dari sini tidak mungkin untuk dimakan rayap, Wong disimpan dengan rapi di gelas, katanya dengan nada kesal

berita: Surabaya (SI Online) -Surabaya City Government officials conducted raids on the circulation and trade of candy packed with baby pacifiers, throughout elementary schools. The excitement was triggered by the circulation of news that immediately went viral on social media networks, revealing the confession of a number of children feeling dizzy after consuming pacifiers. Allegedly, this type of candy contains drugs. “It is not yet known whether it contains drugs or other dangerous substances; We still need research in the laboratory,” said an officer from the Surabaya City Civil Service Police Unit (Satpol PP), after conducting a raid recently. Candy pacifiers, packaged differently from most candy. In the form of a whitish powder that tends to be pink, wrapped in paper. On the outside of the wrapper or packaging, it says Hard Candy. Likewise, on the box packaging containing 20 packs of pacifiers, it also reads hard candy. How to consume; The powder is put into a bottle, and given water according to the amount stated in the manufacturer's instructions. The bottle is then closed with a lid equipped with a rubber teat (like a baby pacifier). The bottle is daughter then shaken gently, until the mixture thickens and is ready to be consumed by sucking from the tip of the teat, like a baby or toddler drinking milk. “The way this is made is so much fun. The powder is put in a bottle and then given water. The lid with the pacifier is attached tightly, then shaken, like a mother making milk for a sister. The powder that has been mixed with water thickens and is ready to be sucked through the tip of the teat,” said one of the fifth grade students of an elementary school by revealing that this candy tastes sweet and has a sour taste. Another student said that this type of candy had been traded in the school environment for a long time. Not in the school canteen, but by traders outside the school's front yard fence. “The price is a pack of a thousand elephant dolls. While the one with a picture of a swan, one thousand can get two packs,” he said and added, this candy is in great demand. Because the price is cheap, the shape is attractive, as well as how to prepare the candy until it is consumed, it is very fun. Previously, about the circulation of this candy had been widely circulated on social media networks, especially on Whatsapp (WA) and others on Facebook and even Instagram. Called, candy is widely circulated in elementary schools. Some of them even revealed the confession of a number of children, after consuming pacifiers they felt dizzy. Among posting photos on social media networks, a member of the Satpol PP is holding a candy pacifier. Followed by writing; "DOT candy, allegedly contains drugs. Please help spread this information, mother, so that our sons / daughters are protected from dangerous snacks." The People's Welfare Section (Kesra) of a number of sub-district offices, together with officers from the Kelurahan level, Trantibbang and supported by Satpol PP, acts as if simultaneously working with the support of police officers, observing the circulation of this candy. Even then take a number of samples to be investigated further about the substance content of the candy which is said to cause dizziness. The social media network also mentions the raids that have been carried out by officers in the city center and four corners of the city of Surabaya; covers 14 districts. In the District of Pabean Cantikan at SD Krembangan Utara 2/57. Wiyung District at SDN 1 Balas klumprik and SDN Babatan IV, V. Karang-Pilang sub-district at SDN Begongin Kedurus I, SDN 1 Karang-Pilang and TK Darma Praja. The sub-district of the field at SDN Petemon. Sambikerep District in SDN Sambikerep 1 and 5. Sukolilo District on Jalan Kejawen VIII and Pasar Keputih Lama. Tambaksari District at SDN Gading VII and SDN Tambaksari 1. Then in the District of Trenggilis Mejoyo at SDN Kedangsari 8, SDN Trenggilis Mejoyo and SDN Panjangjiwo. Jambangan District in SDN Kebonsari 10, SDN Pagesangan, and Komplek Komplek Kebonsari and Pag3esangan IV RT 3. In Tandes Subdistrict, Romli Thammim Elementary School and Al Faruq Bulak Rukem Kindergarten. Gubeng District at Mojo Elementary School, Mojoklangru Kidul Street. Simokerto District in Simokerto VI/139 Elementary School and YPPI Elementary School. Gununganyar District in Al Islah Elementary School and Mifta'ul Ulum Elementary School. In addition, raids were also carried out in a number of other elementary schools, including SD Yapita, SDN 245, all SD Muhammadiyah and SD Bunga Bangsa.
berita_id: Surabaya (SI Online) -Pejabat pemerintah Kota Surabaya melakukan penggerebekan pada sirkulasi dan perdagangan permen yang dikemas dengan dot bayi, di seluruh sekolah dasar.Kegembiraan itu dipicu oleh sirkulasi berita yang segera menjadi viral di jaringan media sosial, mengungkapkan pengakuan sejumlah anak merasa pusing setelah mengonsumsi dot.Diduga, permen jenis ini berisi obat -obatan."Belum diketahui apakah mengandung obat -obatan atau zat berbahaya lainnya; kami masih membutuhkan penelitian di laboratorium," kata seorang petugas dari Unit Polisi Polisi Sipil Kota Surabaya (Satpol PP), setelah melakukan serangan baru -baru ini.Permen dot, dikemas secara berbeda dari kebanyakan permen.Dalam bentuk bubuk keputihan yang cenderung merah muda, dibungkus kertas.Di bagian luar pembungkus atau kemasan, katanya permen keras.Demikian juga, pada kemasan kotak yang berisi 20 paket dot, itu juga membaca permen keras.Cara mengkonsumsi;Bubuk dimasukkan ke dalam botol, dan diberi air sesuai dengan jumlah yang dinyatakan dalam instruksi pabrik.Botol kemudian ditutup dengan tutup yang dilengkapi dengan dot karet (seperti dot bayi).Botolnya adalah anak perempuan kemudian terguncang dengan lembut, sampai campuran mengental dan siap dikonsumsi dengan mengisap dari ujung dot, seperti bayi atau balita minum susu.“The way this is made is so much fun. The powder is put in a bottle and then given water. The lid with the pacifier is attached tightly, then shaken, like a mother making milk for a sister. The powder that has been mixed with water thickens and is ready to be sucked through the tip of the teat,” said one of the fifth grade students of an elementary school by revealing that this candy tastes sweet and has a sour taste.Siswa lain mengatakan bahwa permen jenis ini telah diperdagangkan di lingkungan sekolah sejak lama.Bukan di kantin sekolah, tetapi oleh pedagang di luar pagar halaman depan sekolah."Harganya adalah sebungkus seribu boneka gajah. Sementara yang memiliki gambar angsa, seribu bisa mendapatkan dua bungkus," katanya dan menambahkan, permen ini sangat diminati.Karena harganya murah, bentuknya menarik, serta bagaimana menyiapkan permen sampai dikonsumsi, sangat menyenangkan.Sebelumnya, tentang sirkulasi permen ini telah diedarkan secara luas di jaringan media sosial, terutama di WhatsApp (WA) dan lainnya di Facebook dan bahkan Instagram.Disebut, permen secara luas diedarkan di sekolah dasar.Beberapa dari mereka bahkan mengungkapkan pengakuan sejumlah anak, setelah mengonsumsi dot mereka merasa pusing.Di antara memposting foto di jaringan media sosial, anggota SATPOL PP memegang dot permen.Diikuti dengan menulis;"Dot Candy, diduga mengandung narkoba.
