berita_id: Media sosial di Indonesia, terutama Twitter, saat ini dibanjiri panggilan untuk menghapus aplikasi Traveloka.Menurut Netizens, CTO yang juga merupakan salah satu pendiri Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, dikatakan telah mendukung perjalanan ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato di acara peringatan Sekolah Sekolah Kanisius.Berita itu membuat netizen yang mengatakan Deriianto tidak menghormati Anies dan memutuskan untuk mengambil aplikasi Traveloka dari ponsel cerdasnya.Saya tidak tahu di mana informasi ini awalnya beredar, karena ternyata hanya tipuan.Traveloka telah mengkonfirmasi bahwa DeRianto tidak hadir pada peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius pada hari Sabtu (11/11).Diketahui bahwa DeRianto memang diundang untuk menghadiri acara tersebut karena ia menerima penghargaan sebagai salah satu alumni Kanisius yang luar biasa."Kami juga bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena ia berseimbalan dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya," tulis pernyataan resmi Traveloka.Ini berarti bahwa apa yang dikabarkan di media sosial tentang dukungan DeRianto untuk Walk Out tidak benar.Mengenai rincian tindakan tersebut, menurut pernyataan resmi dari Kolose Kanisius, dinyatakan bahwa ketika Anies memberikan pidato, salah satu alumni yang juga seorang pianis terkenal Ananda Sukarlan memutuskan untuk berdiri dari kursi VIP-nya dan keluar.Tindakan ini kemudian diikuti oleh ratusan alumni dan tamu undangan lainnya yang hadir.Setelah Anies selesai memberikan pidatonya dan meninggalkan tempat itu, orang -orang yang telah keluar sebelumnya kembali ke kamar.Ananda Sukarlan sendiri menjadi alumni lain yang menerima penghargaan dalam acara ini karena ia dianggap unggul di bidang musik.Ini adalah bukti untuk kesekian kalinya bahwa tipuan telah berhasil mempengaruhi komunitas yang lebih luas dalam waktu singkat.Tanpa fakta dan informasi yang benar, orang masih mudah percaya apa yang menjadi topik tren di media sosial tanpa mencari kebenaran terlebih dahulu.

berita: The Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (Consul General RI) in Davao City, Eko Hartono admitted, the issue of burning reog art instruments was indeed carried out in Davao City, Philippines. However, the burning had to be carried out because the 30-year-old art instrument was damaged and eaten by termites. This was explained by Eko Hartono when asked for clarification via electronic mail, as quoted through an electronic message received by Agus. In fact, in his letter to the Secretary General of the Jabodetabek Reog Association, Agus Setiyoko, the Indonesian Consul General gave the reason that the news of the burning of a number of reog art instruments by the local Consulate General staff was true. "Mr. Eko tidings as the Indonesian Consul General in Davao even said that he was grateful for being able to communicate (via e-mail) with the reog community in Indonesia, so they could ask for input for the procurement of a number of new reog art instruments there," said Agus Setiyoko. Agus said, reog art lovers and actors in the country still need an official and open explanation that can be read in the national media, so as not to trigger disappointment or even anger from the reog community in Indonesia. As is known, on Sunday (11/1/2015), several news spread on a number of social media reports regarding the burning of a number of reog art properties, such as gayor, dadak peacock masks and dragon head gamelan venues in a number of online media accompanied by photos of burning peacock masks. The arson was allegedly carried out in the courtyard of a house that also serves as the Indonesian Consulate General's Office in Davao City, Philippines
berita_id: Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (Konsul Jenderal RI) di Kota Davao, Eko Hartono mengakui, masalah pembakaran instrumen seni reog memang dilakukan di Kota Davao, Filipina.Namun, pembakaran harus dilakukan karena instrumen seni berusia 30 tahun rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Ini dijelaskan oleh Eko Hartono ketika diminta klarifikasi melalui surat elektronik, seperti dikutip melalui pesan elektronik yang diterima oleh Agus.Faktanya, dalam suratnya kepada Sekretaris Jenderal Asosiasi Reog Jabodetabek, Agus Setiyoko, konsul jenderal Indonesia memberikan alasan bahwa berita tentang pembakaran sejumlah instrumen seni reog oleh staf umum konsulat setempat adalah benar."Mr. Eko memberi kabar sebagai konsul jenderal Indonesia di Davao bahkan mengatakan bahwa ia bersyukur karena dapat berkomunikasi (melalui email) dengan komunitas reog di Indonesia, sehingga mereka dapat meminta masukan untuk pengadaan sejumlah instrumen seni baru di sana," kata Agus Setiyoko.Kata Agus, pecinta dan aktor seni reog di negara itu masih membutuhkan penjelasan resmi dan terbuka yang dapat dibaca di media nasional, agar tidak memicu kekecewaan atau bahkan kemarahan dari komunitas reog di Indonesia.Seperti diketahui, pada hari Minggu (11/1/2015), beberapa berita tersebar di sejumlah laporan media sosial mengenai pembakaran sejumlah properti seni yang dirancang ulang, seperti Gayor, Masker Dadak Peacock dan tempat -tempat gamelan kepala naga di sejumlah media online disertai dengan foto topeng merdam yang membakar.Pembakaran itu diduga dilakukan di halaman sebuah rumah yang juga berfungsi sebagai kantor konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao, Filipina

berita: Some time ago, social media was enlivened by a status shared by a netizen about a toothbrush that was allegedly made of sea urchins. What caught the attention of the netizens was the words "bristle" on the toothbrush packaging which in cash made netizens ask whether it is true that the toothbrush cannot be said to be a halal product??? This stems from an article about a previously circulated sea urchin brush, which can be seen on the LPPOM MUI website: The article states that “the handles of boar-bristle brushes often have the words: Bristle, PureBristle, 100% China Bristle, and so on. One of the meanings of the word Bristle is Pig Hair or sea urchins (Webster's Dictionary) which are unclean when wet." The use of the word ONE in the article turned out to be misunderstood by some netizens who generalized the notion of "bristle" with sea urchins. In fact, if we explore further, the notion of "bristle" is much more general than just sea portion out urchins. Bristle is a stiff/strong fiber or fur, either natural derived from plant fibers and animal hair or artificial (synthetic). From this definition, the word "bristle" on the toothbrush packaging does not necessarily make the toothbrush come from sea urchins. This means that the toothbrush could have come from other animal hair, plant fibers or even synthetic bristles. If we look back at the history and development of toothbrushes, the bristles found on toothbrushes originally came from wild boar bristles (Siberian). However, along with the development of technology, in 1938 toothbrushes were produced with nylon bristles which still dominate today. However, it is undeniable that there are still around 10% worldwide of toothbrush products whose bristles come from pig bristles. After we understand the true definition of bristle, then how do we know whether the toothbrush comes from non-halal fibers/bristles? A simple way is to look for information on the official website of the toothbrush manufacturer, or even ask directly to the customer service center. The rapid flow of information on social media makes us have to be more careful in disseminating information. If we have not been able to find valid information, it would be better if the information is asked in a forum that is related to the information. Information about the halalness of a product, of course, not only food/beverage/cosmetic but also lifestyle and thought, becomes a very important part in the life of a Muslim because it has an impact on matters of worship and the hereafter. Indeed, halal and haram matters are not only the responsibility of the MUI or the government but our business as Muslims. Therefore, Halal Corner invites Muslims to join the community of halal fighters. Halal Corner is a community that was established as a forum for active communication / sharing about various halal products, especially in the local area as well as providing halal counseling and education for Muslims in the form of training, halal campaigns, and educational activities that build public awareness of the importance of halal products. .
berita_id: Beberapa waktu yang lalu, media sosial dimeriahkan oleh status yang dibagikan oleh netizen tentang sikat gigi yang diduga terbuat dari bulu babi.Yang menarik perhatian para netizen adalah kata -kata "bulu" pada kemasan sikat gigi yang secara tunai membuat netizen bertanya apakah benar bahwa sikat gigi tidak dapat dikatakan sebagai produk halal ???Ini berasal dari sebuah artikel tentang sikat landak laut yang sebelumnya beredar, yang dapat dilihat di situs web LPPOM MUI: artikel tersebut menyatakan bahwa “pegangan sikat-sikat sepoi-babi sering memiliki kata-kata: bulu, purristle, 100% china briis, dan sebagainya. Salah satu makna dari kata-kata yang tidak ada di bawah.Penggunaan kata satu dalam artikel itu ternyata disalahpahami oleh beberapa netizen yang menggeneralisasi gagasan "bulu" dengan landak laut.Faktanya, jika kita mengeksplorasi lebih lanjut, gagasan "bulu" jauh lebih umum daripada sekadar bagian laut dari bulu babi.Bristle adalah serat atau bulu yang kaku/kuat, baik yang berasal dari serat tanaman dan rambut hewan atau buatan (sintetis).Dari definisi ini, kata "bulu" pada kemasan sikat gigi tidak selalu membuat sikat gigi berasal dari bulu babi.Ini berarti bahwa sikat gigi bisa berasal dari rambut hewan lain, serat tanaman atau bahkan bulu sintetis.Jika kita melihat kembali sejarah dan pengembangan sikat gigi, bulu yang ditemukan pada sikat gigi awalnya berasal dari bulu babi liar (Siberian).Namun, seiring dengan pengembangan teknologi, pada tahun 1938 sikat gigi diproduksi dengan bulu nilon yang masih mendominasi sampai sekarang.Namun, tidak dapat dipungkiri bahwa masih ada sekitar 10% di seluruh dunia dari produk sikat gigi yang bulunya berasal dari bulu babi.Setelah kita memahami definisi bulu yang sebenarnya, lalu bagaimana kita tahu apakah sikat gigi berasal dari serat/bulu non-halal?Cara sederhana adalah mencari informasi di situs web resmi produsen sikat gigi, atau bahkan meminta langsung ke pusat layanan pelanggan.Aliran informasi yang cepat di media sosial membuat kita harus lebih berhati -hati dalam menyebarkan informasi.Jika kami belum dapat menemukan informasi yang valid, akan lebih baik jika informasi ditanyakan di forum yang terkait dengan informasi tersebut.Informasi tentang hal halnya suatu produk, tentu saja, tidak hanya makanan/minuman/kosmetik tetapi juga gaya hidup dan pemikiran, menjadi bagian yang sangat penting dalam kehidupan seorang Muslim karena memiliki dampak pada masalah ibadah dan akhirat.Memang, hal -hal halal dan haram bukan hanya tanggung jawab MUI atau pemerintah tetapi juga bisnis kita sebagai Muslim.Oleh karena itu, halal Corner mengundang umat Islam untuk bergabung dengan komunitas pejuang halal.Halal Corner adalah komunitas yang didirikan sebagai forum untuk komunikasi aktif / berbagi tentang berbagai produk halal, terutama di daerah setempat serta menyediakan konseling halal dan pendidikan untuk umat Islam dalam bentuk pelatihan, kampanye halal, dan kegiatan pendidikan yang membangun kesadaran publik tentang pentingnya produk halal..

berita: Analysis of the Great Cultural Begawan Prabu: No termites or porous. A woman praying in a certain religion, residential district burning has absolutely nothing to do with the expulsion of idols or spirits, is a LIE. A woman supports prayer no. 2 Accompanying praise/prayer in the context of the destruction of objects that are not acceptable in the eyes of God. Bitungnews – A wave of protests over the burning of Reog Ponorogo and the decoration of the dragon gamelan at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) Davao, Philippines, occurred both domestically and abroad. The Reog Ponorogo Community (KRP) throughout Greater Jakarta, held a protest in front of the Office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. Likewise in Ponorogo, the area of ​​origin of this exotic culture and art. Hundreds of Reog Ponorogo artists held Reog performances at the Ponorogo District Square, and continued to the local DPRD office. Abroad, especially in Davao City, Southern Philippines, Indonesian citizens living in the 'Packman' country, raised a petition urging the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to take action against the perpetrators of burning the assets of the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (LP) in the House of Indonesia (HOI). Because until now the fact finding team of the reog burning case and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs have not disclosed the results of the investigation. "We don't know about the arrival of the fact-finding team from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Davao, but reportedly on last November 10, strangely, none of the Indonesian citizens were visited by the team," said an Indonesian citizen in Davao. Foreign Ministry spokesman Arrmanatha Nasir, as quoted from merdeka.com, said that the investigation into the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao was related to the ownership of the burned equipment. As inventory whose source is APBN, deposit, grant or private property. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs also does not guarantee that the results of the examination will be published. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao previously denied that the burning of reog and dragon head gamelan ornaments was not due to certain religious rituals to exorcise demons. But because Reog and the dragon's head have been eaten by termites. Magelang culturalist, T. Agung Nugroho, better known as Agung Begawan Prabu, spearheaded a petition on the change.org website, to save reog, stop fooling the public. The petition was addressed to the Minister of Foreign Affairs, the President of the Republic of Indonesia, the Minister of Education and Culture, and the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao. As of today, Wednesday 2/12/2015, the petition has been signed by 1326 supporters. To quell the protests of Indonesian citizens in the Philippines and at home, it is reported that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao will hold a reog show, on December 10, 2015. The Reog Group from the Ponorogo Police will be selected to perform in Davao, Philippines.
berita_id: Analisis Budaya Budaya Budaya Prabu: Tidak ada rayap atau berpori.Seorang wanita yang berdoa dalam agama tertentu, pembakaran distrik perumahan sama sekali tidak ada hubungannya dengan pengusiran berhala atau roh, adalah bohong.Seorang wanita mendukung doa no.2 Pujian/doa yang menyertainya dalam konteks penghancuran benda -benda yang tidak dapat diterima di mata Tuhan.Bitungnews - Gelombang protes atas pembakaran Reog Ponorogo dan dekorasi naga gamelan di konsulat jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) Davao, Filipina, terjadi baik di dalam maupun di luar negeri.Komunitas Reog Ponorogo (KRP) di seluruh Greater Jakarta, mengadakan protes di depan kantor Kementerian Luar Negeri.Demikian juga di Ponorogo, bidang asal budaya dan seni eksotis ini.Ratusan seniman Reog Ponorogo mengadakan pertunjukan reog di Lapangan Distrik Ponorogo, dan melanjutkan ke kantor DPRD setempat.Di luar negeri, terutama di Kota Davao, Filipina Selatan, warga negara Indonesia yang tinggal di negara 'Packman', mengangkat petisi yang mendesak Kementerian Luar Negeri untuk mengambil tindakan terhadap para pelaku membakar aset -aset konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (LP) di Dewan Indonesia (Hoi).Karena sampai sekarang tim menemukan tim dari kasus pembakaran reog dan Kementerian Luar Negeri belum mengungkapkan hasil penyelidikan."Kami tidak tahu tentang kedatangan tim pencari fakta dari Kementerian Luar Negeri di Davao, tetapi dilaporkan pada 10 November lalu, anehnya, tidak ada warga negara Indonesia yang dikunjungi oleh tim," kata seorang warga negara Indonesia di Davao.Juru bicara Kementerian Luar Negeri Arrmanatha Nasir, sebagaimana dikutip dari Merdeka.com, mengatakan bahwa penyelidikan terhadap konsulat umum Indonesia di Davao terkait dengan kepemilikan peralatan yang terbakar.Sebagai inventaris yang sumbernya adalah APBN, setoran, hibah atau properti pribadi.Kementerian Luar Negeri juga tidak menjamin bahwa hasil pemeriksaan akan dipublikasikan.Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao sebelumnya menyangkal bahwa pembakaran ornamen Gamelan Head Reog dan Dragon bukan karena ritual keagamaan tertentu untuk mengusir setan.Tetapi karena Reog dan kepala naga telah dimakan oleh rayap.Budaya Magelang, T. Agung Nugroho, lebih dikenal sebagai Agung Begawan Prabu, mempelopori petisi di situs web Change.org, untuk menyimpan Reog, berhenti membodohi masyarakat.Petisi itu ditujukan kepada Menteri Luar Negeri, Presiden Republik Indonesia, Menteri Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan, dan Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao.Pada hari ini, Rabu 2/12/2015, petisi telah ditandatangani oleh 1326 pendukung.Untuk memadamkan protes warga Indonesia di Filipina dan di rumah, dilaporkan bahwa konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao akan mengadakan pertunjukan reog, pada 10 Desember 2015. Kelompok reog dari polisi Ponorogo akan dipilih untuk tampil di Davao, Filipina.

berita: Pokemon is a media franchise owned by the video game company Nintendo and created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1995. A piece of information is circulating on social media: the word Pokemon means "I'm Jewish". It is said that the name Pokemon is taken from the Syriac language (Syrian language) which in Indonesian means "I am Jewish". However, this is disputed, according to Sheikh Muhammed Salih Al-Munajjid of the Q&A Islamic Q&A site, the correct understanding of Pokemon is an abbreviation of "Pocket monster", which is an animal small enough to fit in a pocket. The correct view is that this is a name that comes from Japan. It is taken from the (English) words “Pocket monster” and means an animal that is small enough to fit in one's pocket. “Pokemon” is an abbreviation of these two words. (Islamic Q&A) According to the Oxford English dictionary, Pokemon (Pronunciation: /'poki?män/) is a video game featuring Japanese cartoon characters. Originally, Pokemon was the name of a Japanese video game from the word "pocket monster". On the Reference page, create the word "Pokemon" in Japanese comes from the words "Poketto" and "Monsut" or "Pocket Monsters" in English.
berita_id: Pokemon adalah waralaba media yang dimiliki oleh perusahaan video game Nintendo dan dibuat oleh Satoshi Tajiri pada tahun 1995. Sepotong informasi beredar di media sosial: kata Pokemon berarti "I'm Jewish".Dikatakan bahwa nama Pokemon diambil dari bahasa Syria (bahasa Suriah) yang dalam bahasa Indonesia berarti "Saya Yahudi".Namun, ini diperdebatkan, menurut Sheikh Muhammed Salih al-Munajjid dari situs Q&A Q&A, pemahaman yang benar tentang Pokemon adalah singkatan dari "monster saku", yang merupakan hewan yang cukup kecil untuk muat di saku.Pandangan yang benar adalah bahwa ini adalah nama yang berasal dari Jepang.Ini diambil dari kata -kata (bahasa Inggris) "monster saku" dan berarti binatang yang cukup kecil untuk dimasukkan ke dalam saku seseorang."Pokemon" adalah singkatan dari dua kata ini.(T&J Islam) Menurut Kamus Bahasa Inggris Oxford, Pokemon (pengucapan: /'Poki? Män /) adalah video game yang menampilkan karakter kartun Jepang.Awalnya, Pokemon adalah nama video game Jepang dari kata "saku monster".Di halaman referensi, buat kata "pokemon" dalam bahasa Jepang berasal dari kata "poketto" dan "monsut" atau "monster saku" dalam bahasa Inggris.

berita: Member of Commission III of the House of Representatives, Taufiqulhadi, asked the public not to be consumed by misleading news or hoaxes related to the commotion at the Brimob Command Headquarters detention, Kelapa Dua Depok, West Java, last Friday, November 10 2017. Be "I hope the public will not be easily provoked. Because there is an insult to the Koran that is a hoax," said Taufiqulhadi on the sidelines of a discussion at Gado-Gado Boplo, Menteng, Jakarta, Saturday, November 11 2017. There are sympathizers of certain groups who spread the hoax issue. So he asked the public not to be consumed by the false news. He said the commotion was caused by a cellphone that was confiscated by the authorities. "The officers' cellphones were secured. And I think that's true. For example, if the officers didn't mobile phone protect the terrorists' cellphones, the idea of ​​terrorism could be released from detention," he said. So, it was the right step from security to immediately confiscate the cell phones belonging to the detainees. Taufiqulhadi supports the security measures. "And we hope for a more firm attitude to secure those inside," he continued. A number of prison facilities were damaged. The Head of the Public Information Bureau of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Brigadier General Rikwanto confirmed this commotion, Friday (11/10/2017). "On Friday, November 10 2017, at 16.00 WIB there was a commotion at the Mako Brimob terrorist detention center Salemba prison branch carried out by terrorist prisoners," said Rikwanto. According to Rikwanto, the commotion caused damage to the prison facilities. These included the breaking down of the prison cell door and the damage to the gate of the hallway block and window panes, namely in Block C and Block B. The KPK Officially Names Setya Novanto as a Suspect in the E-KTP Corruption Case Again According to him, the situation at the location has been successfully handled by the authorities. He also denied that there were wild rumors that this incident was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by officers. “It is not true that there is throwing of the Koran. It's a hoax," he said. According to the police, the trigger was that there were prisoners who did not accept being examined and provoked a commotion. Rikwanto explained, after Friday prayers, the detainees were put into their respective cells by the Densus 88 Team. While carrying out these activities, the Densus 88 Team conducted a search. There are 4 pieces of HP found. “Found 4 HP. It belongs to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, and Jumali, who are prisoners of terrorism cases," he said. One of the detainees did not accept the search. According to Rikwanto, the detainee who was not named then made a provocation. Remembering Heroes' Services, Police Use Fighter Costumes in Operation Zebra Anoa "It is true that with the inspection activity, one of the detainees did not accept it and provoked the officers with various words, then some members were provoked by their words and there were other prisoners who did takbir aloud so that it provoked the prisoner of the next block," he explained. As a result, riots ensued. A number of facilities in the prison were damaged by the inmates. "The prison cell door was broken into, the gate of the block hallway, the window panes (in Block C and Block B)," said Rikwanto. But it didn't last long. The apparatus, according to Rikwanto, immediately took control of the situation. Currently the situation is reported to be conducive. There were no casualties in the incident. Nothing," said Rikwanto.
berita_id: Anggota Komisi III dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat, Taufiqulhadi, meminta publik untuk tidak dikonsumsi oleh berita yang menyesatkan atau tipuan terkait dengan keributan di penahanan markas besar Komando Brimob, saya berharap akan tidak mudah diprovisi, Jumat, Jumat lalu, itu adalah "November 2017. Saya berharap publik tidak akan mudah diproversikan.Taufiqulhadi di sela-sela diskusi di Gado-Gado Boplo, Menteng, Jakarta, Sabtu, 11 November 2017. Ada simpatisan kelompok tertentu yang menyebarkan masalah tipuan.Jadi dia meminta publik untuk tidak dikonsumsi oleh berita palsu.Dia mengatakan keributan itu disebabkan oleh ponsel yang disita oleh pihak berwenang."Ponsel petugas diamankan. Dan saya pikir itu benar. Misalnya, jika petugas tidak bergerak ponsel melindungi ponsel teroris, gagasan terorisme dapat dilepaskan dari penahanan," katanya.Jadi, itu adalah langkah yang tepat dari keamanan untuk segera menyita ponsel yang termasuk dalam tahanan.Taufiqulhadi mendukung langkah -langkah keamanan."Dan kami berharap sikap yang lebih kuat untuk mengamankan orang -orang di dalam," lanjutnya.Sejumlah fasilitas penjara rusak.Kepala Biro Informasi Publik Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Brigadir Jenderal Polisi Nasional Rikwanto mengkonfirmasi keributan ini, Jumat (11/10/2017)."Pada hari Jumat, 10 November 2017, pukul 16.00 WIB ada keributan di Pusat Penahanan Teroris Mako Brimob Cabang Penjara Salemba yang dilakukan oleh para tahanan teroris," kata Rikwanto.Menurut Rikwanto, keributan menyebabkan kerusakan pada fasilitas penjara.Ini termasuk kehabisan pintu sel penjara dan kerusakan pada gerbang blok lorong dan panel jendela, yaitu di Blok C dan Blok B. KPK secara resmi menyebutkan Setya Novanto sebagai tersangka dalam kasus korupsi e-KTP lagi menurutnya, situasi di lokasi telah berhasil ditangani oleh pihak berwenang.Dia juga membantah bahwa ada desas -desus liar bahwa kejadian ini dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh petugas."Tidak benar bahwa ada lemparan Alquran. Ini tipuan," katanya.Menurut polisi, pemicunya adalah bahwa ada tahanan yang tidak menerima diperiksa dan memicu keributan.Rikwanto menjelaskan, setelah doa Jumat, para tahanan dimasukkan ke dalam sel masing -masing oleh tim Densus 88.Saat melakukan kegiatan ini, tim Densus 88 melakukan pencarian.Ada 4 potong HP yang ditemukan."Ditemukan 4 hp. Itu milik Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, dan Jumali, yang merupakan tahanan kasus terorisme," katanya.Salah satu tahanan tidak menerima pencarian.Menurut Rikwanto, tahanan yang tidak dinamai kemudian membuat provokasi.Mengingat Layanan Pahlawan, polisi menggunakan kostum pejuang dalam operasi Zebra Anoa "Memang benar bahwa dengan kegiatan inspeksi, salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan memicu petugas dengan berbagai kata, kemudian beberapa anggota diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka dan ada tahanan lain yang melakukan Takbir dengan keras sehingga memicu tahanan blok berikutnya," ia menjelaskan.Akibatnya, kerusuhan terjadi.Sejumlah fasilitas di penjara rusak oleh para tahanan."Pintu sel penjara dipecah, gerbang lorong blok, panel jendela (di blok C dan blok B)," kata Rikwanto.Tapi itu tidak bertahan lama.Peralatan, menurut Rikwanto, segera mengendalikan situasi.Saat ini situasinya dilaporkan kondusif.Tidak ada korban dalam insiden itu.Tidak ada, "kata Rikwanto.

berita: The walk out action by Kanisius College alumni including well-known composer Ananda Sukarlan and Traveloka owner Derianto Kusuma when Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan gave a speech turned out to be a long one. So the public spotlight, now netizens are busy calling for an invitation to delete or uninstall the Traveloka application from their smartphones. The invitation to uninstall it echoed on Twitter's timeline, even becoming one of the trending topics on Twitter Indonesia. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11/2017), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from the VIP seat provided for him and walked out when Anies gave a speech. Unfortunately, the action was followed by a number of other alumni. Judging from the information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies Baswedan's speech. Of course this is considered as support for Ananda's walk out. After the incident, we don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott the Traveloka application. The hashtags #BoikotTraveloka and #UninstallTraveloka echoed and continued to grow along with the widespread invitation of netizens to delete the hotel and transportation booking application. Peeking at the Twitter timeline, the owner of the @dimasprakbar account tweeted the reason the hashtag was crowded. “The hashtag #UninstallTraveloka is a follow-up to the participation of the Traveloka boss in the walkout when the governor of DKI Jakarta gave a speech. Break even," he tweeted. Netizens with the @hizzatullah account wrote something similar. According to him, the owner of Traveloka has exemplified the dishonorable act of walking out at Kanisius. He also said that the price discount provided by Traveloka was not worth the honor. Instead of many Twitter users inviting other netizens to delete the Traveloka application, it turned out that there were also funny replies from other netizens, like my owner @ardeks. He said users who deleted the transportation user application but could still use the service through the website.
berita_id: Tindakan Walk Out oleh alumni Kanisius College termasuk komposer terkenal Ananda Sukarlan dan pemilik Traveloka Dantu Kusuma ketika Gubernur Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato ternyata panjang.Jadi sorotan publik, sekarang netizen sibuk meminta undangan untuk menghapus atau menghapus aplikasi Traveloka dari smartphone mereka.Undangan untuk menghapus instalannya bergema di timeline Twitter, bahkan menjadi salah satu topik tren di Twitter Indonesia.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11/2017), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP yang disediakan untuknya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidato.Sayangnya, aksinya diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lainnya.Dilihat dari informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah berjalan keluar dan pidato Anies Baswedan.Tentu saja ini dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk perjalanan Ananda.Setelah insiden itu, kami tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot aplikasi Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka dan #uninstalltraveloka bergema dan terus tumbuh seiring dengan undangan luas netizen untuk menghapus aplikasi hotel dan pemesanan transportasi.Mengintip di timeline Twitter, pemilik akun @Dimasprakbar tweeted alasan tagar itu ramai."Tagar #uninstalltraveloka adalah tindak lanjut dari partisipasi bos Traveloka di pemogokan ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta memberikan pidato. Break Even," ia tweeted.Netizens dengan akun @hizzatullah menulis sesuatu yang serupa.Menurutnya, pemilik Traveloka telah mencontohkan tindakan berjalan yang tidak terhormat di Kanisius.Dia juga mengatakan bahwa diskon harga yang diberikan oleh Traveloka tidak sebanding dengan kehormatannya.Alih -alih banyak pengguna Twitter yang mengundang netizen lain untuk menghapus aplikasi Traveloka, ternyata ada juga balasan lucu dari netizen lain, seperti pemilik saya @ardeks.Dia mengatakan pengguna yang menghapus aplikasi pengguna transportasi tetapi masih bisa menggunakan layanan melalui situs web.

berita: MALANGTIMES - For almost a week, residents' anxiety over the circulation of pacifiers suspected of containing drugs in various regions has finally come to light. The test results at the National Narcotics manoeuver Agency's (BNN) Drug Laboratory released a teat candy with the brand of Hard Candy, which is a foreign food produced in China with the BPOM distribution permit number 224409003077, no narcotics and psychotropic substances were found, as has been widely reported on social media this week. . "Negatively, no narcotics content was found. This is the result of an official test and was reported directly by the Central BNN Public Relations with a clarification letter number B/BK-1/III/2017/Humas dated March 9, 2017," explained the Head of Malang Regency BNN, AKBP. I Made Arjana via telephone, Thursday (09/03) evening to MALANGTIMES. Laboratory test results only found sugar and other food ingredients in the form of Dextrose Monohydrate, D-Sorbitol, Sucrose, D-Mannitol, Palmitate Compounds, Calcium and Methyl Stearate and Beta Lactose. The results of the Central BNN Drug Laboratory test can be said to be the same as the results from the Labfor. Surabaya branch, but there is additional content in the pacifier candy which is tested for BHT as an anti-oxidant. "Hopefully the results of the two tests will make the public calm and no longer worry about the alleged pacifier containing drugs," said I Made, who continued that the candy is safe for consumption. Although the candy dot case has found a bright spot, the Malang Regency BNN still appeals to the public to be aware of the various modes of illicit drug trafficking that are increasingly diverse. "The mode of drug trafficking is indeed increasingly sophisticated, even in some cases the type of food is often used as a mode by narcotics syndicates," he said. He also added, but usually these products are sold illegally and at prices that are certainly different from the market price, such as the case of a lot of candy pacifiers being sold at affordable prices for children. BNN also asked parents to always monitor their children's interactions. Likewise with other related parties, such as schools, RT neighborhoods, RW neighborhoods, to religious leaders, community leaders, traditional leaders, youth leaders to be able to help monitor the surrounding environment, in order to avoid the dangers of drug abuse. "It is mandatory to unite to fight drugs," said I Made, who also appealed for the pacifier case so that school children would bring their own food and drink from their respective homes.
berita_id: MALANGTIMES - Selama hampir seminggu, kecemasan warga atas sirkulasi dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan di berbagai daerah akhirnya terungkap.Hasil tes di Laboratorium Obat Narkotika Narkotika Narkotika Manoeuver (BNN) merilis permen TEAT dengan merek permen keras, yang merupakan makanan asing yang diproduksi di Cina dengan nomor izin distribusi BPOM 224409003077, tidak ada narkotika dan zat psikotropika yang ditemukan, seperti yang telah dilaporkan secara luas pada media sosial minggu ini.."Secara negatif, tidak ada konten narkotika yang ditemukan. Ini adalah hasil dari tes resmi dan dilaporkan secara langsung oleh hubungan masyarakat BNN pusat dengan nomor surat klarifikasi B/BK-1/III/2017/Humas tertanggal 9 Maret 2017," jelas kepala Malang Regency BNN, AKBP.Saya membuat Arjana melalui telepon, Kamis (09/03) malam ke Malangtimes.Hasil uji laboratorium hanya menemukan gula dan bahan makanan lainnya dalam bentuk dekstrosa monohidrat, D-sorbitol, sukrosa, D-mannitol, senyawa palmitat, kalsium dan metil starat dan laktosa beta.Hasil tes laboratorium obat BNN pusat dapat dikatakan sama dengan hasil dari labfor.Cabang Surabaya, tetapi ada konten tambahan dalam permen dot yang diuji BHT sebagai anti-oksidan."Mudah -mudahan hasil dari dua tes akan membuat publik tenang dan tidak lagi khawatir tentang dugaan dot yang mengandung obat -obatan," kata saya membuat, yang melanjutkan bahwa permen aman untuk dikonsumsi.Meskipun kasus Candy Dot telah menemukan titik terang, Kabupaten Malang masih menarik bagi publik untuk menyadari berbagai mode perdagangan narkoba yang semakin beragam."Mode perdagangan narkoba memang semakin canggih, bahkan dalam beberapa kasus jenis makanan sering digunakan sebagai mode oleh sindikat narkotika," katanya.Dia juga menambahkan, tetapi biasanya produk -produk ini dijual secara ilegal dan dengan harga yang tentu saja berbeda dari harga pasar, seperti kasus banyak dot permen yang dijual dengan harga terjangkau untuk anak -anak.BNN juga meminta orang tua untuk selalu memantau interaksi anak -anak mereka.Demikian juga dengan partai -partai terkait lainnya, seperti sekolah, lingkungan RT, lingkungan RW, bagi para pemimpin agama, pemimpin masyarakat, pemimpin tradisional, pemimpin pemuda yang dapat membantu memantau lingkungan sekitarnya, untuk menghindari bahaya penyalahgunaan narkoba."Adalah wajib untuk bersatu untuk melawan narkoba," kata saya membuat, yang juga mengimbau kasus dot sehingga anak -anak sekolah akan membawa makanan dan minuman mereka sendiri dari rumah masing -masing.

berita: Davao - Philippines, at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao, a number of individuals burned Reog Ponorogo and its equipment. This burning took place last Tuesday [20/10] as reported by bitungnews.com The reason they burned Reog and its Gamelan was because they thought there was a devil in them and considered idols. Unfortunately, the Acting Consulate General, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, did not prevent the arson. When the Reog was burned, which is one of the inventory of the Indonesian Consulate General's cultural museum, no one from the Indonesian Consulate General's staff knew about it. As a result of this incident, the perpetrators were bombarded with insults and blasphemy by Indonesian citizens in Davao, but the perpetrators still felt innocent because according to them what they were doing was right in the eyes of God.  said bitungnews.com Until now there has been no specific clarification from the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao Philippines. Indonesian citizens in Davao asked the Indonesian Consulate General to withdraw the persons involved in this arson.
berita_id: Davao - Filipina, di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia di Davao, sejumlah orang membakar Reog Ponorogo dan peralatannya.Pembakaran ini terjadi Selasa lalu [20/10] seperti yang dilaporkan oleh Bitungnews.com alasan mereka membakar Reog dan gamelannya adalah karena mereka mengira ada iblis di dalamnya dan dianggap sebagai berhala.Sayangnya, akting konsulat jenderal, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, tidak mencegah pembakaran.Ketika Reog dibakar, yang merupakan salah satu inventaris museum budaya Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia, tidak ada seorang pun dari staf Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia tentang hal itu.Sebagai akibat dari kejadian ini, para pelaku dibombardir dengan penghinaan dan penistaan ​​oleh warga negara Indonesia di Davao, tetapi para pelaku masih merasa tidak bersalah karena menurut mereka apa yang mereka lakukan tepat di mata Tuhan.kata bitungnews.com Sampai sekarang belum ada klarifikasi khusus dari konsulat jenderal Indonesia di Davao Filipina.Warga negara Indonesia di Davao meminta konsulat Jenderal Indonesia untuk menarik orang -orang yang terlibat dalam pembakaran ini.

berita: The candy packed with pacifiers was unexpected, it turned out that the cute and attractive candy was a very dangerous snack. he received information from the national police chief this afternoon, that the candy pacifier contained a drug-type powder. It had been tested in the laboratory for several samples and there were results that said it contained drugs. because it was suspected, when we eat the candy it makes us down sleepy. Not only is it suspected that there are drugs in it. There is an article that states that there is a dangerous formaldehyde that can cause cancer when consumed. Indeed, not all of these sweets contain formalin, even drugs! We never know which one which is healthy and which is not. You should be aware of your sons and daughters so as not to buy snacks carelessly, warn your friends not to consume pacifier-shaped candy. the !
berita_id: Permen yang dikemas dengan dot tidak terduga, ternyata permen yang lucu dan menarik itu adalah camilan yang sangat berbahaya.Dia menerima informasi dari kepala polisi nasional sore ini, bahwa dot permen berisi bubuk tipe narkoba.Itu telah diuji di laboratorium untuk beberapa sampel dan ada hasil yang mengatakan itu berisi obat -obatan.Karena dicurigai, ketika kita makan permen itu membuat kita mengantuk.Tidak hanya dicurigai ada obat -obatan di dalamnya.Ada sebuah artikel yang menyatakan bahwa ada formaldehida berbahaya yang dapat menyebabkan kanker saat dikonsumsi.Memang, tidak semua permen ini mengandung formalin, bahkan obat -obatan!Kami tidak pernah tahu mana yang sehat dan mana yang tidak.Anda harus menyadari putra dan putri Anda agar tidak membeli makanan ringan dengan ceroboh, memperingatkan teman-teman Anda untuk tidak mengonsumsi permen berbentuk dat.The!

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia will increase drastically to reach Rp. 500 million per month. Or Rp 6.6 billion per year. This increase occurs if the Draft Government Regulation on the Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities of Civil Servants is actually passed. The amount is stated in the RPP material. With the president's salary index of 96,000 points, it was found that the figure was Rp. 553 million. According to Article 2 of Law number 7 of 1978, the president's salary is 6 times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia (Chairman of the DPR, MA, and BPK). Meanwhile, in PP 75/2000, it is stated that the three officials receive a salary of Rp. 5040000 per month. Thus, the president's basic salary is IDR 30240000 per month. Presidential Decree 68/2001 also states that the allowance for the position of the President is Rp. 32500000. So that the total money received by the president each month is Rp. 62740000 or Rp. 752880000 per year. According to the palace, this number has not changed since 2001. The total salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia is relatively small compared to the leaders of the major countries in the world. Prime Minister (PM) of Singapore, Lee Hsien Loong recorded the highest salary of USD 2.2 million or equivalent to Rp. 30.3 billion per year. After Lee, there is Doris Leuthard, the President of Switzerland, who has a salary of USD 437000 or Rp. 6 billion per year. Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Trunbull followed with a salary of USD 403,700 or Rp. 5.5 billion per year. President Jokowi's salary is only higher than that of PRC President Xi Jinping, who is paid USD 20,500 or IDR 283 million per year. Meanwhile, US President Donald Trump recorded the smallest income, which was USD 1 per year. Of course this is Trump's personal request. The 45th president of the US has a personal fortune of around USD 3 billion. University of Indonesia (UI) public policy observer Lina Miftahul Jannah said it was very natural for the President to have a very large income index. So that the income received by the number one person in Indonesia is very high. "It makes sense too," he explained. He said that as head of state as well as head of government, the duties, responsibilities, and risks of a president are enormous. So, according to him, it is not natural for an official to be paid by the state budget, whose salary is greater than the president's. Instead, he said it would be dangerous if there were other government officials whose salaries were higher than the President. Meanwhile, the palace has not been able to comment further on the salary increase scheme for civil servants, presidents and other state officials. Presidential Spokesman Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo said his party had not received sufficient information about this. "I don't ruff have the information yet. I'll confirm it later," he said when confirmed. The former Acting Officer (Plt) of the KPK leadership has also not been able to confirm the progress of the RPP
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis untuk mencapai RP.500 juta per bulan.Atau Rp 6,6 miliar per tahun.Peningkatan ini terjadi jika rancangan peraturan pemerintah tentang gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas pegawai negeri sebenarnya disahkan.Jumlah tersebut dinyatakan dalam bahan RPP.Dengan indeks gaji presiden sebesar 96.000 poin, ditemukan bahwa angkanya adalah RP.553 juta.Menurut Pasal 2 Hukum Nomor 7 tahun 1978, gaji Presiden adalah 6 kali gaji dasar pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia (ketua DPR, MA, dan BPK).Sementara itu, dalam hal 75/2000, dinyatakan bahwa ketiga pejabat menerima gaji RP.5040000 per bulan.Dengan demikian, gaji pokok presiden adalah IDR 30240000 per bulan.Keputusan Presiden 68/2001 juga menyatakan bahwa tunjangan untuk posisi presiden adalah RP.32500000. Sehingga total uang yang diterima oleh presiden setiap bulan adalah RP.62740000 atau RP.752880000 per tahun.Menurut Istana, jumlah ini tidak berubah sejak tahun 2001. Gaji total Presiden Republik Indonesia relatif kecil dibandingkan dengan para pemimpin negara -negara besar di dunia.Perdana Menteri (PM) dari Singapura, Lee Hsien Loong mencatat gaji tertinggi USD 2,2 juta atau setara dengan RP.30,3 miliar per tahun.Setelah Lee, ada Doris Leuthard, presiden Swiss, yang memiliki gaji USD 437000 atau RP.6 miliar per tahun.Perdana Menteri Australia Malcolm Trunbull diikuti dengan gaji USD 403.700 atau RP.5,5 miliar per tahun.Gaji Presiden Jokowi hanya lebih tinggi dari Presiden RRC Xi Jinping, yang dibayar USD 20.500 atau IDR 283 juta per tahun.Sementara itu, Presiden AS Donald Trump mencatat pendapatan terkecil, yaitu USD 1 per tahun.Tentu saja ini adalah permintaan pribadi Trump.Presiden ke -45 AS memiliki kekayaan pribadi sekitar USD 3 miliar.Pengamat Kebijakan Publik University of Indonesia (UI) Lina Miftahul Jannah mengatakan sangat wajar bagi presiden untuk memiliki indeks pendapatan yang sangat besar.Sehingga pendapatan yang diterima oleh orang nomor satu di Indonesia sangat tinggi."Itu juga masuk akal," jelasnya.Dia mengatakan bahwa sebagai kepala negara serta kepala pemerintahan, tugas, tanggung jawab, dan risiko presiden sangat besar.Jadi, menurutnya, tidak wajar bagi seorang pejabat yang harus dibayar dengan anggaran negara, yang gajinya lebih besar dari presiden.Sebaliknya, dia mengatakan akan berbahaya jika ada pejabat pemerintah lain yang gaji yang gaji lebih tinggi dari presiden.Sementara itu, istana belum dapat berkomentar lebih lanjut tentang skema kenaikan gaji untuk pegawai negeri, presiden dan pejabat negara lainnya.Juru bicara presiden Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo mengatakan partainya belum menerima informasi yang cukup tentang hal ini."Aku belum memiliki informasi. Aku akan mengkonfirmasi nanti," katanya ketika dikonfirmasi.Mantan Penjabat Petugas (PLT) kepemimpinan KPK juga tidak dapat mengkonfirmasi kemajuan RPP

berita: Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Remember the crooked cellphone phenomenon that happened to the iPhone 6 Plus? Galaxy S6 Edge owners can also experience the same thing. The initial launch of the iPhone 6 Plus was immediately hit by an unpleasant issue, namely the body of the cellphone which turned out to be easy to bend when pressed. This apparently also happened to the latest Samsung phones. SquareTrade, an electronics company, conducted tests on the iPhone 6 Plus, Galaxy S6 Edge and HTC One M9. All three try to be pressed with the same machine. From the results of these tests, it can be  seen that the iPhone 6 Plus starts to bend when it receives a pressure of 50 Kg, and looks broken when pressed up to 81 Kg. While the Galaxy S6 Edge turns out to have the same resistance. The screen and body look completely damaged when under pressure weighing 81 Kg. "Is this the second bendgate issue? No. Samsung fans will experience worse, they will not find a bent phone, but a broken glass in their pocket," said the voice actor in the video. As for the HTC One M9. The screen already looks bent when it takes 54 kg of pressure, and because the power button is right in the middle, the damage prevents the phone from working at all. Here is a video of the testing done by SquareTrade From the results of these tests, it can be seen that the scathing criticism directed at Apple about the iPhone 6 Plus being easily bent was also experienced by its competitors, the Galaxy S6 Edge and HTC One M9. But it should also be noted. Even to make the three phones curved is not easy, because it requires quite hard pressure at one point.
berita_id: JAKARTA, CNN Indonesia - Ingat fenomena ponsel bengkok yang terjadi pada iPhone 6 Plus?Pemilik Galaxy S6 Edge juga dapat mengalami hal yang sama.Peluncuran awal iPhone 6 Plus segera dilanda masalah yang tidak menyenangkan, yaitu tubuh ponsel yang ternyata mudah ditekuk saat ditekan.Ini tampaknya juga terjadi pada ponsel Samsung terbaru.Squaretrade, sebuah perusahaan elektronik, melakukan tes pada iPhone 6 Plus, Galaxy S6 Edge dan HTC One M9.Ketiganya mencoba ditekan dengan mesin yang sama.Dari hasil tes ini, dapat dilihat bahwa iPhone 6 Plus mulai menekuk ketika menerima tekanan 50 kg, dan terlihat rusak ketika ditekan hingga 81 kg.Sementara Galaxy S6 Edge ternyata memiliki resistensi yang sama.Layar dan tubuh terlihat benar -benar rusak ketika di bawah tekanan dengan berat 81 kg."Apakah ini masalah Bendgate kedua? Tidak. Penggemar Samsung akan mengalami lebih buruk, mereka tidak akan menemukan telepon bengkok, tetapi pecahan gelas di saku mereka," kata aktor suara dalam video.Adapun HTC One M9.Layar sudah terlihat bengkok ketika mengambil tekanan 54 kg, dan karena tombol daya tepat di tengah, kerusakan mencegah ponsel bekerja sama sekali.Berikut adalah video pengujian yang dilakukan oleh Squaretrade dari hasil tes ini, dapat dilihat bahwa kritik pedas yang diarahkan pada Apple tentang iPhone 6 Plus yang mudah ditekuk juga dialami oleh para pesaingnya, Galaxy S6 Edge dan HTC One M9.Tapi itu juga harus dicatat.Bahkan untuk membuat tiga ponsel melengkung tidak mudah, karena membutuhkan tekanan yang cukup keras pada satu titik.

berita: The Pokemon Go game, which is currently a new craze in the community, has made the players forget the time. If you look, the most lovers of this game are young people. In some crowds you will see some young people pressing their smart phones, occasionally they also seem to run around as if chasing something. Read more at DIY Deputy Governor Asking Parents to Watch Pokemon Go Games The slanted news that has been circulating about the Pokemon Go game has also spread in several social media, the rumor states that the game released by Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, and also Niantic Labs contains various invitations that cannot be tolerated by Islam. Because of the many rumors circulating on social media that Pokemon Go actually has its own meaning that is less fun. "In Syriac or Syriac this Pokemon means I am Jewish, while the Pokemon named Pikachu means "Be a Jew". While Charmander also demonstrate has its own meaning, namely "God is Weak". That's one of the rumors circulating on social media so far about the meaning of words in Pokemon (both animation and games). The rumor has even become a very heated debate on social media, because many people have their own opinions. There are those who have the opinion that it is just something that is linked, and not a few who really believe in the existence of these rumors. Because those who believe in these rumors feel that there is truth present in these rumors. Read also National Police Chief: Police Members Are Prohibited from Playing Pokemon Go While Working Until now the issue is still a big question mark, the Los Angeles Times in its article on April 24, 2011 also reviewed about this Pokemon. In the news, it was stated that at that time countries such as Qatar, Oman, Dubai, Jordan, Egypt and Saudi Arabia also circulated a lot about this Pokemon Go rumor. Many connotations emerged that the game was promoting anti-Islamic behavior and then believing in Judaism. This then made everyone in the country restless, and the things that were reported were also later denied by the Pokemon party. But the leaders of the country still can't take it for granted if Pokemon Go enters their country. The rumors continue to appear in Arab countries with cultural assimilation in the midst of ongoing concerns, but there is no solid evidence for the rumors circulating at the time, Jordan's Amman newspaper said in a statement. While the Syriac Orthodox Christian Church has denied the allegations, because in the ancient Syriac language the meaning of the word Pokemon has no meaning to insult Islam. Meanwhile, church officials were also very surprised by the arrival of a letter stating that Pokemon contained an invitation from the Jews. Let's wait for the truth of the rumors. But what is certain is that Pokemon Go has been loved by people all over the world. Pokemon Go, which is based on Augmented Reality (AR), always creates a stir, the positive side of this game is that it can make people like exercising and even heal people from depression. Read more on Pokemon GO Turns Out Good For People With Mental Disorders Even so, Pokemon Go also brings a lot of disadvantages for those of you who can't manage yourself because of the fun of playing this game. Read more in Apart from getting people fired, this is the negative impact of playing Pokemon Go
berita_id: Game Pokemon Go, yang saat ini merupakan kegemaran baru di komunitas, telah membuat para pemain melupakan waktu.Jika Anda melihat, paling pecinta dari game ini adalah orang -orang muda.Di beberapa orang banyak Anda akan melihat beberapa orang muda menekan ponsel pintar mereka, kadang -kadang mereka juga tampaknya berlarian seolah mengejar sesuatu.Baca lebih lanjut di Deputi Gubernur DIY yang meminta orang tua untuk menonton Pokemon Go Games berita miring yang telah beredar tentang game Pokemon Go juga telah menyebar di beberapa media sosial, rumor menyatakan bahwa permainan yang dirilis oleh Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, dan juga Niantic Labs berisi berbagai undangan yang tidak dapat ditoleransi oleh Islam.Karena banyak rumor yang beredar di media sosial bahwa Pokemon Go sebenarnya memiliki maknanya sendiri yang kurang menyenangkan."Di Syria atau Syria Pokemon ini berarti saya orang Yahudi, sementara Pokemon bernama Pikachu berarti" Jadilah seorang Yahudi ". Sementara Charmander juga menunjukkan maknanya sendiri, yaitu" Tuhan itu lemah ". Itu salah satu rumor yang beredar di media sosial yang ada di sana telah menjadi makna kata -kata dalam pokemon (baik animasi maupun permainan). Rumor yang ada di sana telah menjadi yang telah menjadi panasnya.Pendapat bahwa itu adalah sesuatu yang terkait, dan tidak sedikit yang benar -benar percaya pada keberadaan rumor ini.Qatar, Oman, Dubai, Jordan, Mesir dan Arab Saudi juga beredar tentang rumor Pokemon Go ini.Rumor terus muncul di negara -negara Arab dengan asimilasi budaya di tengah -tengah kekhawatiran yang sedang berlangsung, tetapi tidak ada bukti kuat untuk rumor yang beredar pada saat itu, surat kabar Amman Jordan mengatakan dalam sebuah pernyataan.Surat yang menyatakan bahwa Pokemon berisi undangan dari orang -orang Yahudi.Juga membawa banyak kelemahan bagi Anda yang tidak dapat mengatur diri sendiri karena kesenangan bermain game ini.

berita: Stroke is one of the diseases that lurk after Eid lollygag This is due to not maintaining a diet with a menu that is high in salt and fat so that it makes blood pressure rise suddenly There are two types of stroke that can occur, namely mild stroke and severe stroke Mild stroke occurs due to blockage Blood vessels in the brain The main symptom is slurred speech, slanted lips and one side of the body feels weak and can't move. Meanwhile, a severe stroke occurs due to bleeding due to rupture of a blood vessel in the brain. A severe stroke can cause the sufferer to become unconscious, faint and die Dr. Rocksy Fransisca SpS from Siloam Hospital said the first aid for stroke patients is to lie down. This is intended so that the body's metabolism slows down and does not increase. Next, put a pillow under the head with a slope of 30 degrees. After that, immediately take the patient to the hospital for further examination because the golden period for stroke treatment is 3 to 6 hours from the onset of the attack. The risk is for sure permanent disability that cannot be repaired, especially if it is blocked. But if the bleeding is already damaged, if the blockage passes through the golden period, it will (cause) permanent disability even though speech acts have been carried out dr Muhammad Rhadian Arief SpBS from Medistra Hospital Avoid sticking needles into fingers because doctors say there is no benefit Inserting needles into fingers is not beneficial for patients and instead slows down patients from getting the first aid they need It's not true that we pierce ears or fingers until they bleed so that the stroke disappeared, said Dr. Frandy Susatia SpS from Siloam Hospital, Kebon Jeruk in a recent conversation with detikHealth

berita: US troops have seized classified documents showing former Iraqi President Saddam Hussein suspected Pokemon. The suspicion arose when the Pokemon TV series was popular among children, in 2001, to be exact. Reporting from the Mirror page, the document says Saddam Hussein banned Pokemon from showing because it confiscate means 'I am a Jew'. The following notes in the document; We have become aware of a rapidly spreading phenomenon in the Muslim world and among our children. Our children have become attached to this phenomenon. The names in this phenomenon have many meanings, such as: Pokemon: Means 'I am a Jew'. Charmander: Means 'God is weak'. Pikachu: Means 'Be a Jew'.
berita_id: Pasukan AS telah menyita dokumen rahasia yang menunjukkan mantan presiden Irak Saddam Hussein tersangka Pokemon.Kecurigaan muncul ketika serial TV Pokemon populer di kalangan anak -anak, pada tahun 2001, tepatnya.Melaporkan dari halaman Mirror, dokumen itu mengatakan Saddam Hussein melarang Pokemon karena disita berarti 'Saya seorang Yahudi'.Catatan berikut dalam dokumen;Kami telah menyadari fenomena yang menyebar dengan cepat di dunia Muslim dan di antara anak -anak kami.Anak -anak kita telah terikat pada fenomena ini.Nama -nama dalam fenomena ini memiliki banyak makna, seperti: Pokemon: berarti 'Saya seorang Yahudi'.Charmander: Berarti 'Tuhan itu lemah'.Pikachu: Berarti 'menjadi orang Yahudi'.

berita: Hoax messages are also circulating on social media about sticking needles in the fingers of stroke patients and bleeding one or two endeavour drops of blood. The puncture is usually in the area under the earlobe or fingers. It is said that he can launch and help oxygen enter the body. Even though a stroke can occur because there is a blockage or even a blood vessel burst. Of course, if this information is true, many people will be able to recover from a stroke in an inexpensive way. If this information is wrong, then you are hurting other people and doing useless things. Until there is a video on how to insert a needle into a stroke patient's body. Maybe his intentions are good, considering that stroke is a disease that should not be treated too late and must be treated as soon as possible. Because the effects of a stroke are permanent. There are also those who believe that if you have been stabbed, the blood will come out, it will help improve blood flow. But when it's that easy, with a needle can make a stroke person recover. It's not possible right? Ladies and gentlemen, blood clots are not as imagined and trivial. Needle sticking is just to keep the patient awake and book first aid for stroke patients. Instead of helping people who are in trouble, they add new problems. This method of stabbing with a needle can actually harm people having a stroke. If it is true that you have had a stroke, don't pretend to know if you don't know. Immediately take him to the hospital for proper treatment. Sticking a needle under the ear or finger actually slows down the treatment time for a more competent medical team. Not to belittle it, but just look for it to be safe! So that you don't take the wrong action and don't be weird, make sure it's the FAST way. What is FAST? Let's first look at F (Face), pay attention to the person's face. If the face becomes turned or tilted, this is a sign that someone has had a stroke. Stroke is a disease that attacks the nerves. A (Arm), try to raise the hand of the person who had a stroke. If he is unable to hold his hand forward, then the person is likely to have a stroke. If that person can't hold both hands, after you let go, or maybe only one of them, it's to determine the symptoms of a stroke only on one side (half) or on both sides. S (Speech), pay attention when speaking whether slurred. If he suddenly has difficulty speaking and is slurred, he may have a stroke. Physically it can be seen if the person's mouth turns slanted, this is a clear symptom too. T (Time), if seen from the physical characteristics there are changes as above, the faster the handling will be the better. Until now there has been no official reference that suggests the needling method as first aid in stroke patients. Strokes that are not treated immediately can even worsen the condition. Moreover, just silenced without treatment. If you have had a stroke, you may experience slurred, difficult limbs to move. This kind of pain is certainly inconvenient and uncomfortable. It would be better if you can prevent this stroke by maintaining a lifestyle from now on. What is certain is that prevention is better than cure. Always make sure it's in good health
berita_id: Pesan tipuan juga beredar di media sosial tentang menempelkan jarum di jari -jari pasien stroke dan berdarah satu atau dua tetes darah usaha.Tusukan biasanya berada di daerah di bawah daun telinga atau jari.Dikatakan bahwa ia dapat meluncurkan dan membantu oksigen memasuki tubuh.Meskipun stroke dapat terjadi karena ada penyumbatan atau bahkan pembuluh darah meledak.Tentu saja, jika informasi ini benar, banyak orang akan dapat pulih dari stroke dengan cara yang murah.Jika informasi ini salah, maka Anda menyakiti orang lain dan melakukan hal -hal yang tidak berguna.Sampai ada video tentang cara memasukkan jarum ke dalam tubuh pasien stroke.Mungkin niatnya baik, mengingat stroke adalah penyakit yang tidak boleh diobati terlambat dan harus dirawat sesegera mungkin.Karena efek stroke bersifat permanen.Ada juga orang -orang yang percaya bahwa jika Anda ditikam, darah akan keluar, itu akan membantu meningkatkan aliran darah.Tetapi ketika semudah itu, dengan jarum dapat membuat orang stroke pulih.Itu tidak mungkin kan?Hadirin sekalian, gumpalan darah tidak seperti yang dibayangkan dan sepele.Menempel jarum hanya untuk menjaga pasien tetap terjaga dan memesan pertolongan pertama untuk pasien stroke.Alih -alih membantu orang yang bermasalah, mereka menambahkan masalah baru.Metode penikaman dengan jarum ini benar -benar dapat membahayakan orang yang mengalami stroke.Jika benar Anda mengalami stroke, jangan berpura -pura tahu jika Anda tidak tahu.Segera bawa dia ke rumah sakit untuk perawatan yang tepat.Menempelkan jarum di bawah telinga atau jari sebenarnya memperlambat waktu perawatan untuk tim medis yang lebih kompeten.Bukan untuk meremehkannya, tapi hanya mencari itu untuk aman!Sehingga Anda tidak mengambil tindakan yang salah dan jangan aneh, pastikan itu cara yang cepat.Apa itu cepat?Pertama -tama mari kita lihat f (wajah), perhatikan wajah orang tersebut.Jika wajah menjadi berbalik atau miring, ini adalah tanda bahwa seseorang mengalami stroke.Stroke adalah penyakit yang menyerang saraf.A (lengan), cobalah untuk mengangkat tangan orang yang mengalami stroke.Jika dia tidak dapat memegang tangannya ke depan, maka orang tersebut cenderung mengalami stroke.Jika orang itu tidak dapat memegang kedua tangan, setelah Anda melepaskan, atau mungkin hanya satu dari mereka, itu untuk menentukan gejala stroke hanya di satu sisi (setengah) atau di kedua sisi.S (pidato), perhatikan saat berbicara apakah tidak jelas.Jika dia tiba -tiba mengalami kesulitan berbicara dan tidak bersalah, dia mungkin mengalami stroke.Secara fisik dapat dilihat jika mulut orang itu berubah miring, ini juga merupakan gejala yang jelas.T (waktu), jika dilihat dari karakteristik fisik ada perubahan seperti di atas, semakin cepat penanganannya akan lebih baik.Sampai sekarang belum ada referensi resmi yang menunjukkan metode tusuk jarum sebagai pertolongan pertama pada pasien stroke.Stroke yang tidak dirawat segera bahkan dapat memperburuk kondisinya.Apalagi dibungkam tanpa perawatan.Jika Anda mengalami stroke, Anda mungkin mengalami cadel, anggota tubuh yang sulit untuk bergerak.Rasa sakit semacam ini tentu saja tidak nyaman dan tidak nyaman.Akan lebih baik jika Anda dapat mencegah stroke ini dengan mempertahankan gaya hidup dari sekarang.Yang pasti adalah pencegahan lebih baik daripada Cure.Selalu pastikan itu dalam kesehatan yang baik

berita: The rise of the hashtag (hash sign) Uninstall Traveloka made the Management open their voices. Traveloka Public Relations Manager Busyra Oryza explained, Chief Technology Officer (CTO) Derianto Kusuma was not present at the 90th Anniversary of Kanisius College on Saturday night, November 11 2017, because he was on a business trip. "He was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned a few months earlier," said Traveloka Public Relations Manager Busyra Oryza, Tuesday, November 14 2017. The explanation was given by Busyra because the hashtag #UninstallTraveloka became a trending topic on Twitter on Tuesday. On social media, rumors spread that Derianto Kusuma, who is an alumnus of Kanisius High School, congratulated pianist Ananda Sukarlan. The pianist walked out of the room when DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan gave a speech at the 90th Anniversary of Kanisius College. Ananda did protest against the committee by walking out for inviting Anies. He considers Anies's figure to be contrary to the value of pluralism, which is taught at Canisius College. Spokesman for the Jakarta Kanisius College Alumni Association, Affan Alamudi, clarified that Derianto did not attend the event because he was in America. In the event that took place in Kemayoran, Kanisius College gave awards to alumni who were considered outstanding and contributed to the nation's work. Recipients of the award include Ananda Sukarlan (composer and pianist), Derianto Kusuma (founder of Traveloka), Father Magnis Suseno (Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (scout leader), and Boenjamin clarify Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). In the award ceremony, Derianto was represented by his mother. "We are quite shocked. These are lies. How could he walk out. Not even in Indonesia," Affan told Tempo, Tuesday, regarding WO Ananda Sukarlan.
berita_id: Bangkitnya tagar (tanda hash) menghapus instalan Traveloka membuat manajemen membuka suara mereka.Manajer Hubungan Masyarakat Traveloka Busyra Oryza menjelaskan, Chief Technology Officer (CTO) DeRianto Kusuma tidak hadir pada peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College pada Sabtu malam, 11 November 2017, karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis."Dia tidak dapat hadir karena dia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya," kata manajer hubungan masyarakat Traveloka Busyra Oryza, Selasa, 14 November 2017. Penjelasan itu diberikan oleh Busyra karena tagar #uninstalltraveloka menjadi topik yang sedang tren di Twitter pada hari Selasa.Di media sosial, rumor menyebar bahwa Derianto Kusuma, yang merupakan alumnus Sekolah Menengah Kanisius, memberi selamat kepada pianis Ananda Sukarlan.Pianis itu berjalan keluar dari ruangan ketika Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato di peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College.Ananda melakukan protes terhadap komite dengan berjalan keluar karena mengundang Anies.Dia menganggap sosok Anies bertentangan dengan nilai pluralisme, yang diajarkan di Canisius College.Juru Bicara Asosiasi Alumni Jakarta Kanisius College, Affan Alamudi, mengklarifikasi bahwa DeRianto tidak menghadiri acara tersebut karena ia berada di Amerika.Dalam acara yang terjadi di Kemayoran, Kanisius College memberikan penghargaan kepada alumni yang dianggap luar biasa dan berkontribusi pada pekerjaan negara.Penerima penghargaan termasuk Ananda Sukarlan (komposer dan pianis), DeRianto Kusuma (pendiri Traveloka), Pastor Magnis Suseno (figur Jesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (Pemimpin Scout), dan Boenjamin mengklarifikasi Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farma).Dalam upacara penghargaan, DeRianto diwakili oleh ibunya."Kami cukup terkejut. Ini adalah kebohongan. Bagaimana dia bisa keluar. Bahkan di Indonesia," kata Affan kepada Tempo, Selasa, mengenai Wo Ananda Sukarlan.

berita: The Surabaya City Government continues to raid pacifiers which are indicated to contain drugs. The raid on candy packaged in green targeted three sub-districts, namely Genteng District, Rungkut District, and Sawahan District. The Head of Sawahan, Surabaya City, Yunus said that the raids had been carried out on three schools. “We raided SDN Pakis I, SDN Pakis II, and germ SDN Pakis IX on Jalan Pakistirtosari. The result is 20 pacifiers," said Yunus, Tuesday (7/3/2017). The pacifier is suspected to contain drugs. Physically, the candy doesn't look like drugs, but rather like regular candy. “These candies were sold by street vendors around the school, and they were immediately confiscated. We confiscated it and took it to the sub-district office,” said Yunus. The officers who raided food and drinks at a number of elementary schools in Sawahan also found a number of hard candies. This candy is suspected to contain formaldehyde which is dangerous if consumed by children. “For hard candy, there are 33 seeds and 17 packs of hard candy in tablet form. We also confiscated it,” said Yunus.
berita_id: Pemerintah Kota Surabaya terus menyerang dot yang diindikasikan mengandung narkoba.Penggerebekan permen yang dikemas dalam warna hijau menargetkan tiga sub-distrik, yaitu Distrik Genteng, Distrik Rungkut, dan Distrik Sawahan.Kepala Sawahan, Kota Surabaya, Yunus mengatakan bahwa penggerebekan telah dilakukan di tiga sekolah."Kami menggerebek Sdn Pakis I, Sdn Pakis II, dan Germ Sdn Pakis IX di Jalan Pakistirtosari. Hasilnya adalah 20 dot," kata Yunus, Selasa (7/3/2017).Dot diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Secara fisik, permen itu tidak terlihat seperti obat -obatan, tetapi lebih seperti permen biasa."Permen ini dijual oleh pedagang kaki lima di sekitar sekolah, dan mereka segera disita. Kami menyitanya dan membawanya ke kantor sub-distrik," kata Yunus.Petugas yang menggerebek makanan dan minuman di sejumlah sekolah dasar di Sawahan juga menemukan sejumlah permen keras.Permen ini diduga mengandung formaldehyde yang berbahaya jika dikonsumsi oleh anak -anak."Untuk permen keras, ada 33 biji dan 17 bungkus permen keras dalam bentuk tablet. Kami juga menyitanya," kata Yunus.

berita: The crowds were not seen in a number of mosques, such as the Istiqlal Mosque, Central Jakarta, and the Al Azhar Grand Mosque, South Jakarta, early Tuesday before dawn prayers, related to the planned peaceful demonstration of the 212 Volume II Action. This condition is also estimated to be the impact of heavy rains that have hit the DKI Jakarta area and its surroundings since around 03.00 WIB, which resulted in a number of roads being surrounded by puddles, as observed by Antara Tuesday morning. The participants of Action 212 volume II tried to gather at the Istiqlal Mosque with the intention of carrying out the Fajr prayer in congregation, and also the weather conditions when this news was revealed were raining, photo as a result they tried to immediately enter shelter while waiting for the time for prayer to come. Apparently the fence of the Istiqlal Mosque is actually tightly closed, as received by this media, in the form of photos and descriptions, 5 minutes later when this news was revealed, the participants were also unable to enter to gather and perform the dawn prayer.
berita_id: Kerumunan tidak terlihat di sejumlah masjid, seperti Masjid Istiqlal, Jakarta Tengah, dan Masjid Grand Al Azhar, Jakarta Selatan, Selasa pagi sebelum doa fajar, terkait dengan demonstrasi damai yang direncanakan dari aksi 212 Volume II.Kondisi ini juga diperkirakan merupakan dampak hujan lebat yang telah menghantam daerah DKI Jakarta dan sekitarnya sejak sekitar pukul 03.00 WIB, yang mengakibatkan sejumlah jalan dikelilingi oleh genangan air, seperti yang diamati oleh Antara Selasa pagi.Para peserta aksi 212 Volume II mencoba berkumpul di masjid Istiqlal dengan maksud untuk melaksanakan doa Fajr di jemaat, dan juga kondisi cuaca ketika berita ini terungkap hujan, foto sebagai hasilnya mereka mencoba untuk segera memasuki tempat berlindung sambil menunggu waktu untuk berdoa.Rupanya pagar masjid Istiqlal sebenarnya ditutup rapat, seperti yang diterima oleh media ini, dalam bentuk foto dan deskripsi, 5 menit kemudian ketika berita ini terungkap, para peserta juga tidak dapat masuk untuk berkumpul dan melakukan doa fajar.

berita: Invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application are milling about on Twitter's timeline. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. But it can be ascertained that the news is just a hoax or not true. Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. But he was unable to attend. "Traveloka is proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from Kanisius alumni. However, he was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned several months earlier. to Ananda), he was not there," he said. "We state that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders," he continued. DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan regretted the invitation to uninstall Traveloka, which was previously busy milling about on Twitter's timeline. The call to uninstall Traveloka was triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. Related to this, Anies called on his supporters to respect differences. "Well, I think it's like this. We respect people with different views. Respect different people. There is no need to uninstall and so on," said Anies at the DKI Jakarta DPRD Building, Jalan Kebon Sirih, Gambir, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (14/11/2017). ). According to Anies, the Traveloka application has been providing benefits for the community. This invitation should not arise just because of differences of opinion. "Traveloka also provides benefits for many citizens. After all, it is a service that has great benefits for many people. So let's get used to different views in a healthy way, respecting each other without having to carry out punishments like that. So implement there's no need to uninstall all kinds of things. ," said Anies.
berita_id: Undangan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka sedang berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.Tetapi dapat dipastikan bahwa berita itu hanya tipuan atau tidak benar.Manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Tapi dia tidak bisa hadir."Traveloka bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya. Ke Ananda), ia tidak ada di sana," katanya."Kami menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi dan inovasi. Nilai-nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal," lanjutnya.Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan menyesali undangan untuk menghapus instalan Traveloka, yang sebelumnya sibuk berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Panggilan untuk menghapus instalasi Traveloka dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Terkait dengan ini, ANIES meminta para pendukungnya untuk menghormati perbedaan."Yah, saya pikir ini seperti ini. Kami menghormati orang -orang dengan pandangan yang berbeda. Hormati orang yang berbeda. Tidak perlu menghapus dan sebagainya," kata anies di gedung DKI Jakarta DPRD, Jalan Konal Sirih, Gambir, Jakarta Tengah, Selasa (14/11/2017).).Menurut ANIES, aplikasi Traveloka telah memberikan manfaat bagi masyarakat.Undangan ini seharusnya tidak muncul hanya karena perbedaan pendapat."Traveloka juga memberikan manfaat bagi banyak warga negara. Lagi pula, ini adalah layanan yang memiliki manfaat besar bagi banyak orang. Jadi mari kita terbiasa dengan pandangan yang berbeda dengan cara yang sehat, saling menghormati tanpa harus melakukan hukuman seperti itu. Jadi, terapkan tidak perlu menghapus semua jenis hal," kata Anies.

berita: Not yet finished the iPhone 5 was thrown into the market, Apple already has an idea for the 6th generation of their smartphone. Reportedly, Apple will introduce a new product with a curved touch screen democratic next year. The Californian company has contacted iPad and iPhone screen suppliers, Lens Technology, G-Tech and Fuji Crystal, and will supply them with equipment for polishing the indentation of the glass. The use of a touch screen with curved glass, according to some users feels more comfortable during phone calls. The indentation also protects the screen from scratches when the smartphone or tablet is placed face down. Corning, which provides scratch-resistant screens for a number of smartphones, has developed a curved version of their popular Gorilla Glass display. but it is not clear if this screen will be used in future Apple products. This is not the first time the design has been used on a smartphone device. Google and Samsung also provide the Nexus S smartphone with a concave screen. Dell has also played around with a curved display on the Venue Pro smartphone which has a Windows phone platform. Although the popularity of the concave screen seems to be increasing, some observers see the design as a temporary trend.
