berita_id: Belum selesai iPhone 5 dilemparkan ke pasar, Apple sudah memiliki ide untuk generasi ke -6 dari smartphone mereka.Dilaporkan, Apple akan memperkenalkan produk baru dengan layar sentuh melengkung Demokrat tahun depan.Perusahaan California telah menghubungi pemasok layar iPad dan iPhone, teknologi lensa, G-Tech dan Fuji Crystal, dan akan memasok mereka dengan peralatan untuk memoles lekukan kaca.Penggunaan layar sentuh dengan kaca melengkung, menurut beberapa pengguna merasa lebih nyaman selama panggilan telepon.Indentasi juga melindungi layar dari goresan ketika smartphone atau tablet ditempatkan menghadap ke bawah.Corning, yang menyediakan layar tahan gores untuk sejumlah smartphone, telah mengembangkan versi melengkung dari tampilan kaca gorila populer mereka.Tetapi tidak jelas apakah layar ini akan digunakan dalam produk Apple di masa depan.Ini bukan pertama kalinya desain digunakan pada perangkat smartphone.Google dan Samsung juga menyediakan smartphone Nexus dengan layar cekung.Dell juga bermain -main dengan layar melengkung di smartphone Venue Pro yang memiliki platform Windows Phone.Meskipun popularitas layar cekung tampaknya meningkat, beberapa pengamat melihat desain sebagai tren sementara.

berita: Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara said that he would not block (close) Facebook permanently, but only temporarily. That is if the situation gets worse. This was conveyed by Rudiantara in response to Warganet who until now are still confused about the unclear information regarding the fate of Facebook in Indonesia. They also wonder whether Facebook will be closed in Indonesia or not. "We will see this situation first. If it gets worse, then we will temporarily close (block it)," said Minister of Communication and Information Rudiantara as quoted from Liputan6.com Friday, April 20 2018. Rudiantara was reluctant to talk about closing Facebook's operations permanently. He is more focused on monitoring Facebook to create data security and prevent the spread of hate speech. Meanwhile, the House of Representatives also had asked the Communications and Information Technology to be more strict with Facebook. "We and the government - the Ministry of Communication and Informatics - will talk again regarding the follow-up to Facebook's mistake. Personally, I am still open to sanctions, I do not rule out also suggesting a Facebook service moratorium," said Meutya Hafid, Member of the Commission. I DPR RI. Meutya estimates that the DPR RI put upon will wait for the results of Facebook's internal investigation for the next month. "We are waiting, I think a month should be enough time. We hope that the results of this investigation will not only blame who, but also there should be information, where this misused data went and what it was used for," he said. The controversy arose from the Cambridge Analytica scandal, which accused Facebook of leaking data. After being investigated, it turns out that "leaking" is not the right term. The data was not leaked, but rather misused by Cambridge Analytica, allegedly for political purposes.
berita_id: Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa ia tidak akan memblokir (menutup) Facebook secara permanen, tetapi hanya sementara.Itu jika situasinya semakin buruk.Ini disampaikan oleh Rudiantara dalam menanggapi Warganet yang sampai sekarang masih bingung tentang informasi yang tidak jelas mengenai nasib Facebook di Indonesia.Mereka juga bertanya -tanya apakah Facebook akan ditutup di Indonesia atau tidak."Kita akan melihat situasi ini terlebih dahulu. Jika menjadi lebih buruk, maka kita akan untuk sementara waktu akan menutup (memblokirnya)," kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi Rudiantara seperti yang dikutip dari LIPUTAN6.com Jumat, 20 April 2018. Rudiiantara enggan berbicara tentang menutup operasi Facebook secara permanen.Dia lebih fokus pada pemantauan Facebook untuk menciptakan keamanan data dan mencegah penyebaran pidato kebencian.Sementara itu, Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat juga telah meminta komunikasi dan teknologi informasi untuk lebih ketat dengan Facebook."Kami dan pemerintah - Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika - akan berbicara lagi mengenai tindak lanjut dari kesalahan Facebook. Secara pribadi, saya masih terbuka untuk sanksi, saya tidak mengesampingkan juga menyarankan moratorium layanan Facebook," kata Meutya Hafid, anggota komisi.I DPR RI.Meutya memperkirakan bahwa DPR RI akan menunggu hasil penyelidikan internal Facebook untuk bulan berikutnya."Kami sedang menunggu, saya pikir sebulan harus cukup waktu. Kami berharap hasil penyelidikan ini tidak hanya akan menyalahkan siapa, tetapi juga harus ada informasi, di mana data yang disalahgunakan ini pergi dan untuk apa itu digunakan," katanya.Kontroversi muncul dari skandal Cambridge Analytica, yang menuduh Facebook bocor data.Setelah diselidiki, ternyata "bocor" bukanlah istilah yang tepat.Data itu tidak bocor, melainkan disalahgunakan oleh Cambridge Analytica, yang diduga untuk tujuan politik.

berita: Who doesn't know catfish, this fish is a favorite for many people because it has a delicious taste and has a soft meat texture, but it turns out that catfish is the dirtiest fish, one mouthful contains three thousand cancer cells. Is that true? Catfish The Dirtiest Fish, One Mouth contains Three Thousand Cancer Cells, Here's the Explanation Catfish is one of the favorite food menus and even in every food stall this menu is always available because the price is quite cheap and delicious can be the main attraction for this one fish. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is that? The following is an explanation: The catfish pond is very dirty and is surrounded by chicken coops and pigs. According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong, who admitted that he had supplied a lot of catfish to markets and restaurants on the side of the road in Hainan province, precisely in Haikou, which he harvested 3 once a month. Due to the many complaints from the community, journalists searched about the fish from the local fisheries and marine department. The reporters took samples from the 7 ponds that housed the catfish. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken and pig cages, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of their fish before the test results are out. Catfish is a fish that consumes waste Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places because these fish consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pigs, even this fish can also consume human waste. So it is possible that in the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. That's some information about catfish in China, but in Indonesia this fish has been cultivated well by catfish farmers and they use pellets as food instead of using waste which is very dangerous for the health of the human body. So that consuming catfish in Indonesia there is no need to doubt its cleanliness, but as wise consumers we must remain vigilant about the content of this fish and do not skirt need to consume it in large quantities on a regular basis because it can interfere with our health. Apart from all that, are there any healthy benefits of catfish? it turns out that this one fish besides being delicious also contains several substances that are good for the health of the human body. Here are 4 benefits of catfish: Healthy heart and brain Catfish contains omega-3 and omega-6 which are usually contained in expensive fish such as cod and salmon. The content of omega-3 and omega-6 can help heart and brain health activities, and it turns out that a serving of catfish contains 220 mg of omega-3 and 875 mg of omega-6. Contains protein with good quality In a serving of catfish contains 15.6 grams of protein which is very useful in the formation of muscle tissue and strengthens the immune system. Contains vitamin B-12 A serving of catfish contains vitamin B-12, which is about 40% of the body's needs. This vitamin is useful in helping to break down food into energy for the body, so consuming these foods can make the body stronger. Contains DHA Pregnant women are advised to eat catfish because this fish contains DHA which is good for the formation of the baby's nerves and also this fish has a very low mercury content so it is safe for consumption. That's some information about the dirtiest fish catfish, one mouthful contains three thousand cancer cells, but it turns out that this fish also has high nutritional value if cultivated properly.
berita_id: Siapa yang tidak tahu ikan lele, ikan ini adalah favorit bagi banyak orang karena memiliki rasa yang lezat dan memiliki tekstur daging yang lembut, tetapi ternyata ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor, satu suapan berisi tiga ribu sel kanker.Apakah itu benar?Catfish ikan paling kotor, satu mulut berisi tiga ribu sel kanker, inilah penjelasannya Catfish adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit dan bahkan di setiap kios makanan menu ini selalu tersedia karena harganya cukup murah dan lezat dapat menjadi daya tarik utama untuk ikan yang satu ini.Meskipun lezat dan murah, ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Kenapa begitu?Berikut ini adalah penjelasan: kolam ikan lele sangat kotor dan dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi.Menurut seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-Hong, yang mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele ke pasar dan restoran di sisi jalan di provinsi Helah, tepatnya di haikou, yang ia panen 3 sebulan sekali.Karena banyak keluhan dari masyarakat, jurnalis mencari tentang ikan dari perikanan dan departemen kelautan setempat.Para wartawan mengambil sampel dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Tujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sedangkan di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Para petani ikan disarankan untuk menangguhkan penjualan ikan mereka sebelum hasil tes keluar.Catfish adalah ikan yang mengkonsumsi limbah ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor karena ikan ini mengkonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi, dan babi, bahkan ikan ini juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah manusia.Jadi ada kemungkinan bahwa dalam tubuh ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang sangat berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Itu beberapa informasi tentang ikan lele di Cina, tetapi di Indonesia ikan ini telah dibudidayakan dengan baik oleh petani lele dan mereka menggunakan pelet sebagai makanan alih -alih menggunakan limbah yang sangat berbahaya bagi kesehatan tubuh manusia.Sehingga mengkonsumsi ikan lele di Indonesia tidak perlu meragukan kebersihannya, tetapi sebagai konsumen yang bijak, kita harus tetap waspada tentang kandungan ikan ini dan tidak perlu mengonsumsinya dalam jumlah besar secara teratur karena dapat mengganggu kesehatan kita.Terlepas dari semua itu, apakah ada manfaat ikan lele yang sehat?Ternyata ikan yang satu ini selain lezat juga mengandung beberapa zat yang baik untuk kesehatan tubuh manusia.Berikut adalah 4 manfaat ikan lele: Lelyal jantung dan otak yang sehat mengandung omega-3 dan omega-6 yang biasanya terkandung dalam ikan mahal seperti cod dan salmon.Isi omega-3 dan omega-6 dapat membantu kegiatan kesehatan jantung dan otak, dan ternyata sekumpulan ikan lele mengandung 220 mg omega-3 dan 875 mg omega-6.Mengandung protein dengan kualitas yang baik dalam porsi ikan lele mengandung 15,6 gram protein yang sangat berguna dalam pembentukan jaringan otot dan memperkuat sistem kekebalan tubuh.Mengandung vitamin B-12 Porsi ikan lele mengandung vitamin B-12, yang merupakan sekitar 40% dari kebutuhan tubuh.Vitamin ini berguna dalam membantu memecah makanan menjadi energi bagi tubuh, sehingga mengonsumsi makanan ini dapat membuat tubuh lebih kuat.Berisi wanita hamil DHA disarankan untuk makan lele karena ikan ini mengandung DHA yang baik untuk pembentukan saraf bayi dan juga ikan ini memiliki kandungan merkuri yang sangat rendah sehingga aman untuk dikonsumsi.Itu beberapa informasi tentang ikan lele ikan paling kotor, satu suapan berisi tiga ribu sel kanker, tetapi ternyata ikan ini juga memiliki nilai nutrisi yang tinggi jika dibudidayakan dengan benar.

berita: DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan attended the 90th anniversary of the establishment of the Kanisius College educational institution, at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Saturday (11/11) night. On that occasion Anies was given time to make a speech in front of the invited guests. However, while giving a speech there were some guests who walked out of the room. When confirmed, Anies admitted that he did not know that any guests had left, one of them was Ananda Sukarlan. He even admitted that he was close to the Principal of Kanisius High School, Pater E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho. And to attend an invitation from the Canisius School was not the first. "And this is not the first time I've been to Kanisius, so when I heard it this morning, I remembered that someone had come out because I don't remember it, I didn't see it," said Anies at the DKI Jakarta City Hall, Monday (11/13). Even so, Anies admitted to respecting and appreciating all opinions and views from all parties towards him. Because as the governor of Jakarta, he must greet all his citizens without any difference, protecting all parties is the duty of a governor. Because according to Anies, everyone has the right to express their opinion in their own way. Including people who criticize his speech. "If there is a negative reaction then that's a bonus for me," he said. Previously, in a video circulating on social media, pianist Ananda Sukarlan, who is an alumni of the picture Kanisius school, protested the presence of Governor Anies Baswedan. There was also a press release from the Kanisius 86 Alumni Association, which was sent by Ananda Sukarlan, which contained the following: In commemoration of the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College, this school which has been consistent until now only for boys located in Menteng Raya for the first time gave the Canisius Awards to 5 alumni from various generations. These 5 alumni were screened from the 95 finalists who became candidates. They are Ananda Sukarlan (composer & pianist), Derianto Kusuma (founder of Traveloka), Father Magnis Suseno (Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (scout leader) and Dr Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). Present and giving the opening speech at the grand event at JIFest which was attended by thousands of Kanisius alumni yesterday, Saturday, November 11, was the governor of Jakarta, Anies Baswedan. When he gave a speech, Ananda Sukarlan stood up from his VIP seat and walked out showing his disapproval of Anies' speech. This action was followed by hundreds of alumni and other members of the audience. After giving his speech which was greeted coldly by the remaining audience, Anies Baswedan left the venue. The audience who had walked out entered the room again. During the awarding of these 5 figures, Ananda got a turn for a 10-minute speech. In the speech after he said thank you, he also criticized the organizing committee. "You have invited someone with values ​​and integrity that are contrary to what we have been taught. Although you may have to invite him because of his position, but next time we have to look at the person as well. He got his position in ways that are not in accordance with the values -Canisius values. I'm not talking about politics, this is a matter of conscience and human values," he said. After getting off the stage, Ananda was greeted and praised by the nominees for the award, including former minister Ir. Sarwono Kusumaatmaja and Father E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J., Principal of Kanisius High School.
berita_id: Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan menghadiri peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Lembaga Pendidikan Kanisius College, di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Sabtu (11/11) malam.Pada kesempatan itu Anies diberi waktu untuk berpidato di depan para tamu yang diundang.Namun, saat memberikan pidato ada beberapa tamu yang keluar dari ruangan.Ketika dikonfirmasi, Anies mengakui bahwa dia tidak tahu bahwa ada tamu yang pergi, salah satunya adalah Ananda Sukarlan.Dia bahkan mengakui bahwa dia dekat dengan kepala sekolah SMA Kanisius, Pater E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho.Dan untuk menghadiri undangan dari sekolah Canisius bukan yang pertama."Dan ini bukan pertama kalinya saya ke Kanisius, jadi ketika saya mendengarnya pagi ini, saya ingat bahwa seseorang telah keluar karena saya tidak mengingatnya, saya tidak melihatnya," kata Anies di Balai Kota DKI Jakarta, Senin (11/13).Meski begitu, Anies mengaku menghormati dan menghargai semua pendapat dan pandangan dari semua pihak kepadanya.Karena sebagai gubernur Jakarta, ia harus menyapa semua warganya tanpa perbedaan, melindungi semua pihak adalah tugas seorang gubernur.Karena menurut ANIES, setiap orang memiliki hak untuk mengekspresikan pendapat mereka dengan cara mereka sendiri.Termasuk orang yang mengkritik pidatonya."Jika ada reaksi negatif maka itu bonus untukku," katanya.Sebelumnya, dalam sebuah video yang beredar di media sosial, pianis Ananda Sukarlan, yang merupakan alumni dari gambar Sekolah Kanisius, memprotes kehadiran Gubernur Anies Baswedan.Ada juga siaran pers dari Asosiasi Alumni Kanisius 86, yang dikirim oleh Ananda Sukarlan, yang berisi yang berikut: dalam peringatan peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College, sekolah ini yang konsisten sampai sekarang untuk anak laki -laki yang berlokasi di Menteng Raya untuk pertama kalinya memberi Canisius Awarder dari 5 alumni dari berbagai alumni.5 alumni ini disaring dari 95 finalis yang menjadi kandidat.Mereka adalah Ananda Sukarlan (Komposer & Pianis), DeRianto Kusuma (pendiri Traveloka), Pastor Magnis Suseno (Jesuit Figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr Boenjamin setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farma).Hadir dan memberikan pidato pembukaan di acara besar di Jifest yang dihadiri oleh ribuan alumni Kanisius kemarin, Sabtu, 11 November, adalah gubernur Jakarta, Anies Baswedan.Ketika dia memberikan pidato, Ananda Sukarlan berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar menunjukkan ketidaksetujuannya terhadap pidato anies.Tindakan ini diikuti oleh ratusan alumni dan anggota audiensi lainnya.Setelah memberikan pidatonya yang disambut dengan dingin oleh penonton yang tersisa, Anies Baswedan meninggalkan tempat itu.Penonton yang berjalan keluar memasuki ruangan lagi.Selama pemberian 5 angka ini, Ananda mendapat giliran untuk pidato 10 menit.Dalam pidatonya setelah dia mengucapkan terima kasih, dia juga mengkritik komite pengorganisasian."Anda telah mengundang seseorang dengan nilai -nilai dan integritas yang bertentangan dengan apa yang telah kami ajarkan. Meskipun Anda mungkin harus mengundangnya karena posisinya, tetapi lain kali kita harus melihat orang itu juga. Dia mendapatkan posisinya dengan cara yang tidak sesuai dengan nilai -nilai -Nilai -nilai Canisius. Saya tidak berbicara tentang politik, ini adalah masalah hati nilainya dan nilai -nilai manusia," katanya.Setelah turun dari panggung, Ananda disambut dan dipuji oleh nominasi untuk penghargaan tersebut, termasuk mantan Menteri IR.Sarwono Kusumaatmaja dan Pastor E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J., Kepala Sekolah Menengah Kanisius.

berita: There are several myths about preventing stroke. One of them is sticking a needle. Dr. Frandy Susatia SpS said that this myth is something that can actually harm oneself. Moreover, if those who do it also suffer from diabetes. It is not true that to prevent stroke by inserting a needle. It's just a myth, he said in Jakarta recently. In addition to sticking a needle, another myth is flushing the skin when it's hot. But again, the doctor who practices at the Siloam Kebon Jeruk Hospital denied it. Not true. If it's hot, the blood vessels will spread, but it will be normal again when the accession heat is reduced. Only fainted, but not stroke, because the blood vessels are uploading, he concluded.
berita_id: Ada beberapa mitos tentang mencegah stroke.Salah satunya adalah menempelkan jarum.Frandy Susatia SPS mengatakan bahwa mitos ini adalah sesuatu yang benar -benar dapat membahayakan diri sendiri.Selain itu, jika mereka yang melakukannya juga menderita diabetes.Tidak benar untuk mencegah stroke dengan memasukkan jarum.Itu hanya mitos, katanya di Jakarta baru -baru ini.Selain menempelkan jarum, mitos lain adalah menyiram kulit saat panas.Tetapi sekali lagi, Dokter yang berlatih di Rumah Sakit Siloam Kebon Jeruk membantahnya.Tidak benar.Jika panas, pembuluh darah akan menyebar, tetapi akan normal lagi ketika panas aksesi berkurang.Hanya pingsan, tetapi tidak stroke, karena pembuluh darah mengunggah, ia menyimpulkan.

berita: Apple is reportedly developing a new iPhone that will carry a larger screen size with curved glass. That's what someone close to this business said. The source told Bloomberg, Sunday (11/10/2013), two new iPhones, we call it iPhone 6, with a curved screen is planned to be released in the second half of 2014. Apple spokeswoman Natali Kerris declined to comment on this news. Not yet known for sure the shape of the curved screen that will be made by Apple. The source only said that the next iPhone screen has two different sizes, namely 4.7 inches and 5.5 inches. Also mentioned, there is a pressure detection sensor that can later distinguish heavy or light touches on the screen. Two of Apple's competitors, namely Samsung and LG, have launched Android-based smartphones with curved screens. Samsung, with Galaxy Round, designed a curved screen commercialize on the right and left sides of the screen, while LG with G Flex designed a curved screen on the top and bottom sides of the screen. However, the screen is not flexible so it cannot be folded or rolled up. Apple currently has the latest iPhone 5S and iPhone 5C products. The phone that targets the premium market segment, the iPhone 5S, has a fingerprint sensor on the home button as a security feature. This company from Cupertino, California, United States, also plans to provide sapphire material in its products. Last week, Apple said it would open a new factory in the Arizona area, which will partner with GT Advanced Technologies, a company that specializes in making mineral crystal materials.
berita_id: Apple dilaporkan mengembangkan iPhone baru yang akan membawa ukuran layar yang lebih besar dengan kaca melengkung.Itulah yang dikatakan seseorang yang dekat dengan bisnis ini.Sumber itu memberi tahu Bloomberg, Minggu (11/10/2013), dua iPhone baru, kami menyebutnya iPhone 6, dengan layar melengkung direncanakan akan dirilis pada paruh kedua 2014. Juru bicara Apple Natali Kerris menolak berkomentar tentang berita ini.Belum diketahui pasti bentuk layar melengkung yang akan dibuat oleh Apple.Sumber hanya mengatakan bahwa layar iPhone berikutnya memiliki dua ukuran berbeda, yaitu 4,7 inci dan 5,5 inci.Juga disebutkan, ada sensor deteksi tekanan yang nantinya dapat membedakan sentuhan berat atau ringan di layar.Dua pesaing Apple, yaitu Samsung dan LG, telah meluncurkan smartphone berbasis Android dengan layar melengkung.Samsung, dengan Galaxy Round, merancang layar melengkung dikomersialkan di sisi kanan dan kiri layar, sementara LG dengan G Flex merancang layar melengkung di sisi atas dan bawah layar.Namun, layar tidak fleksibel sehingga tidak dapat dilipat atau digulung.Apple saat ini memiliki produk iPhone 5S dan iPhone 5C terbaru.Ponsel yang menargetkan segmen pasar premium, iPhone 5s, memiliki sensor sidik jari pada tombol beranda sebagai fitur keamanan.Perusahaan ini dari Cupertino, California, Amerika Serikat, juga berencana untuk menyediakan bahan safir dalam produknya.Pekan lalu, Apple mengatakan akan membuka pabrik baru di daerah Arizona, yang akan bermitra dengan GT Advanced Technologies, sebuah perusahaan yang berspesialisasi dalam membuat bahan kristal mineral.

berita: Recently, quite horrendous news circulated regarding toothbrushes. Some toothbrush products are said to use pig bristles as the main ingredient. One of the accounts on the Facebook social network uploaded a brand of brush and wrote that the toothbrush came from boar bristles. In fact, the status is already shared more than 1000 times by his friends An account with the name Hamirudin Hamzah said, if he was reprimanded by the cashier of a supermarket that the toothbrush he bought contained sea urchins. an account named Mindy Chin, who explains more about what bristles are. He wrote: "It's very funny that Bristles are one of the compositions of toothbrushes, but not ocean all of them come from pigs, it could be from other animals," Wednesday (5/10/2016) By Therefore, not all toothbrushes we use come from sea urchins. However, as a Muslim you need to be careful and choose a really halal toothbrush
berita_id: Baru -baru ini, berita yang cukup mengerikan beredar mengenai sikat gigi.Beberapa produk sikat gigi dikatakan menggunakan bulu babi sebagai bahan utama.Salah satu akun di jaringan sosial Facebook mengunggah merek kuas dan menulis bahwa sikat gigi berasal dari bulu babi.Faktanya, statusnya sudah dibagikan lebih dari 1000 kali oleh teman -temannya sebuah akun dengan nama Hamirudin Hamzah mengatakan, jika dia ditegur oleh kasir supermarket yang dibeli oleh sikat gigi yang dibelinya berisi bulu babi.Akun bernama Mindy Chin, yang menjelaskan lebih banyak tentang apa itu bulu.Dia menulis: "Sangat lucu bahwa bulu adalah salah satu komposisi sikat gigi, tetapi tidak lautan semuanya berasal dari babi, itu bisa dari hewan lain," Rabu (5/10/2016) oleh karena itu, tidak semua sikat gigi yang kita gunakan berasal dari bulu babi.Namun, sebagai seorang Muslim Anda perlu berhati -hati dan memilih sikat gigi yang benar -benar halal

berita: A news regarding the commotion at the Head of the Mobile Brigade Headquarters terrorist detention center, Salemba branch, in Depok on Friday (11/10) was spread in messaging application groups. The news said that the commotion was still going on and caused 3 blocks in the prison to catch fire. The news also stated that the trigger for the commotion was the throwing of the Koran by the guard. Responding to the news, the Karo Penmas Public Relations of the National Police Brigadier General Rikwanto spoke up. He confirmed that the news was a hoax. "It's a hoax," explained Rikwanto, Saturday (11/11). Rikwanto explained that currently the condition of the terrorist detention center is conducive. There was no arson or fire in the commotion. "(The commotion) resulted in damage to the prison facilities, such as the door of the prison cell being broken, the gate of the hallway block, broken windows in block C and block B," he explained. Meanwhile, the trigger for the commotion was the presence of a prisoner who did not captive accept it when the officers conducted a search. During the search, officers found 4 cell phones. "One of the prisoners did not accept it and provoked the officers with various words. Then there were members who were provoked by their words and there were prisoners who were takbir loudly so that they provoked prisoners from the block next to them," said Rikwanto. The police then fired warning shots to warn the detainees. Fortunately, the commotion was suppressed by the police. Now, the situation in the terrorist prison is back to normal.
berita_id: Sebuah berita tentang keributan di kepala pusat penahanan teroris Mobile Brigade Mobile Brigade, Cabang Salemba, di Depok pada hari Jumat (11/10) tersebar dalam kelompok aplikasi pesan.Berita itu mengatakan bahwa keributan masih terjadi dan menyebabkan 3 blok di penjara terbakar.Berita itu juga menyatakan bahwa pemicu keributan adalah lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga.Menanggapi berita tersebut, Hubungan Masyarakat Karo Penmas dari Brigadir Jenderal Kepolisian Nasional Rikwanto berbicara.Dia mengkonfirmasi bahwa berita itu adalah tipuan."Ini tipuan," jelas Rikwanto, Sabtu (11/11).Rikwanto menjelaskan bahwa saat ini kondisi pusat penahanan teroris kondusif.Tidak ada pembakaran atau tembakan dalam keributan."(Keributan) mengakibatkan kerusakan pada fasilitas penjara, seperti pintu sel penjara yang rusak, gerbang blok lorong, jendela yang rusak di blok C dan blok B," jelasnya.Sementara itu, pemicu keributan adalah kehadiran seorang tahanan yang tidak menawan menerimanya ketika petugas melakukan pencarian.Selama pencarian, petugas menemukan 4 ponsel."Salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan memicu petugas dengan berbagai kata. Lalu ada anggota yang diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka dan ada tahanan yang Takbir keras sehingga mereka memicu tahanan dari blok di sebelah mereka," kata Rikwanto.Polisi kemudian menembakkan tembakan peringatan untuk memperingatkan para tahanan.Untungnya, keributan itu ditekan oleh polisi.Sekarang, situasi di penjara teroris kembali normal.

berita: The iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus were rumored to be easy to bend or bend some time ago, and this has become the subject of ridicule for their competitors, namely BlackBerry and LG. The high sales of the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus seem to be bothered by news of their bodies being able to bend easily, especially in the area around the volume buttons. Some iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus users through several forums on the internet have complained that their smartphones are bent or curved when they are put in their pockets. This news is exacerbated by the upload of a video that proves that Apple's latest smartphone is indeed easy to bend, even using only your bare hands. LG recently used the news as a mockery to attack two iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus via its official Twitter account using the hashtag #bendgate. LG also showcased the LG G Flex smartphone which does feature a curved screen in comparison and says our phones were curved before it was a trend. As we know, the LG G Flex is indeed a smartphone equipped with a curved screen and body. Not only that, the LG G Flex also has good flexibility to accommodate pressure when stored in a pocket. The back case of this unique smartphone is also equipped with self-healing technology that is able to remove scratches. BlackBerry, which has just released the Passport sophisticated smartphone, also doesn't want to lose by launching an attack on the case of the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus easy to bend. John Chen, CEO of BlackBerry challenges anyone to bend the BlackBerry Passport which is made of plastic and stainless steel. John Chen added that the Passport will not be easily bent or bent. As reported by Phone Arena (24/09/2014), until now there has been no response or response from Apple regarding the problem of the curved iPhone 6 and iPhone engineering 6 Plus which is currently being discussed.
berita_id: IPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus dikabarkan mudah ditekuk atau ditekuk beberapa waktu yang lalu, dan ini telah menjadi subjek ejekan bagi pesaing mereka, yaitu BlackBerry dan LG.Tingginya penjualan iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus tampaknya diganggu oleh berita tentang tubuh mereka yang dapat menekuk dengan mudah, terutama di area di sekitar tombol volume.Beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus melalui beberapa forum di internet mengeluh bahwa smartphone mereka bengkok atau melengkung ketika mereka dimasukkan ke dalam saku mereka.Berita ini diperburuk oleh unggahan video yang membuktikan bahwa smartphone terbaru Apple memang mudah ditekuk, bahkan hanya menggunakan tangan telanjang Anda.LG baru -baru ini menggunakan berita sebagai ejekan untuk menyerang dua iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus melalui akun Twitter resminya menggunakan tagar #Bendgate.LG juga memamerkan smartphone LG G Flex yang menampilkan layar melengkung sebagai perbandingan dan mengatakan ponsel kami melengkung sebelum menjadi tren.Seperti yang kita ketahui, LG G Flex memang smartphone yang dilengkapi dengan layar dan tubuh melengkung.Tidak hanya itu, LG G Flex juga memiliki fleksibilitas yang baik untuk mengakomodasi tekanan saat disimpan di saku.Kasing belakang smartphone unik ini juga dilengkapi dengan teknologi penyembuhan diri yang mampu menghilangkan goresan.BlackBerry, yang baru saja merilis smartphone canggih paspor, juga tidak ingin kalah dengan meluncurkan serangan terhadap kasus iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus Mudah untuk ditekuk.John Chen, CEO BlackBerry menantang siapa pun untuk menekuk paspor blackberry yang terbuat dari plastik dan stainless steel.John Chen menambahkan bahwa paspor tidak akan mudah ditekuk atau ditekuk.Seperti yang dilaporkan oleh Telepon Arena (24/09/2014), sampai sekarang belum ada respons atau respons dari Apple mengenai masalah iPhone 6 melengkung dan Iphone Engineering 6 Plus yang saat ini sedang dibahas.

berita: The iPhone 6 Plus turns out to be easy to bend, this is experienced by some users who only realize that they have been in their pockets for too long. Regarding the occurrence of this case, Apple as the manufacturer's vendor was considered careless in choosing a mixture of metal-aluminum alloy materials that were not too solid to be used as the basic material for the iPhone 6 Plus frame. The easy-to-curve case of the iPhone 6 Plus is still being talked about, considering that this Apple-made software was only released to the market last Friday (19/9/2014). Of course, this is reminiscent of the case of the iPhone 4, which was released in 2010. At that time, the tech-savvy public called it the "antennagate" scandal because in the iPhone 4 design an error occurred in the antenna section, which caused frequent disconnections when in use on a call. Responding to the excitement of the iPhone 6 Plus case, which bends easily when placed in a pocket. Apple has not made an official statement yet. However, they announced they were investigating reports of problems found in the iOS 8 operating system (OS). In fact, Apple pulled the OS version 8.0.1. Of course, this case will be made by rival vendors as a means of attack. The latest Blackberry on the sidelines of the announcement of the launch of the BlackBerry Passport also satirized this case. This was revealed caseful by BlackBerry CEO John Chen who also attacked the weaknesses of the iPhone 6 plus. "No matter how hard you try, you won't be able to bend the BlackBerry Passport," Chen said
berita_id: IPhone 6 Plus ternyata mudah ditekuk, ini dialami oleh beberapa pengguna yang hanya menyadari bahwa mereka telah berada di saku mereka terlalu lama.Mengenai terjadinya kasus ini, Apple sebagai vendor pabrikan dianggap ceroboh dalam memilih campuran bahan paduan logam-aluminium yang tidak terlalu padat untuk digunakan sebagai bahan dasar untuk bingkai iPhone 6 Plus.Kasus iPhone 6 Plus yang mudah dikurung masih sedang dibicarakan, mengingat perangkat lunak buatan Apple ini hanya dirilis ke pasar Jumat lalu (19/9/2014).Tentu saja, ini mengingatkan pada kasus iPhone 4, yang dirilis pada 2010. Pada waktu itu, publik yang paham teknologi menyebutnya skandal "antenagat" karena dalam desain iPhone 4 terjadi kesalahan di bagian antena, yang sering menyebabkan pemutusan ketika digunakan pada panggilan.Menanggapi kegembiraan case iPhone 6 Plus, yang menekuk dengan mudah saat ditempatkan di saku.Apple belum membuat pernyataan resmi.Namun, mereka mengumumkan bahwa mereka sedang menyelidiki laporan masalah yang ditemukan dalam Sistem Operasi IOS 8 (OS).Faktanya, Apple menarik OS versi 8.0.1.Tentu saja, kasus ini akan dibuat oleh vendor saingan sebagai sarana serangan.Blackberry terbaru di sela -sela pengumuman peluncuran Blackberry Passport juga menyindir kasus ini.Ini terungkap berkasel oleh CEO Blackberry John Chen yang juga menyerang kelemahan iPhone 6 Plus."Tidak peduli seberapa keras Anda mencoba, Anda tidak akan bisa menekuk paspor blackberry," kata Chen

berita: The Pokemon Go game is currently booming among young people. Not a few people who have a pokemon fever and are willing to blusukan in search of Pokemon. However, this game made by Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, and Niantic Labs can't be separated from oblique issues. Recently, there have been many links circulating on social media stating that the game contains an invitation that cannot be tolerated by Islam. It is widely circulated on social media that Pokemon actually in Syriac or Syriac means "I am Jewish", while Pikachu is said to mean "Be Jewish", and Charmander means "God is Weak". The rumor has certainly become a heated debate on social media. Many believed and shared the rumor, many febricity thought it was just something that was linked. So is that really the issue? The Los Angels Times in an article dated April 24, 2001 once reviewed this. In the LA Times, it was stated that at that time in Middle Eastern countries such as Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Jordan, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia, there were many rumors that the Pokemon game had connotations that promoted anti-Islamic behavior and believed in Judaism. This of course causes anxiety. The LA Times noted that despite Nintendo's denials, the leaders of those countries still couldn't accept Pokemon. The rumors arose amid concerns Arab countries would assimilate the emerging culture. Even so, many rumors were not proven at that time. "It has been proven that this toy is part of a Jewish plot to corrupt the minds of our young generation because it offends blasphemous thoughts, mocks God and our moral values ​​so that it is very dangerous for our young generation," said Sheik Abdel Monem abu Zent, ​​former member Jordanian parliament. Even so, in the LA Times article, he stated that there was no strong evidence that the Pokemon game did have connotations that were detrimental to Islam. Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor from Al Azhar University, said that until now there was no solid evidence that confirmed the rumors that made parents forbid their children to play the Pokemon game. In a statement in Jordan's Amman newspaper, the Syriac Orthodox Christian Church denied allegations that Pokemon and other character names have roots in ancient Syriac and insult Islam. Church officials said they were surprised by the incoming letter stating that Pokemon contained a Jewish invitation. The article from the LA Times can be read at the following link.
berita_id: Permainan Pokemon Go saat ini sedang booming di kalangan anak muda.Tidak sedikit orang yang mengalami demam Pokemon dan bersedia untuk Blusukan untuk mencari Pokemon.Namun, game ini dibuat oleh Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, dan Niantic Labs tidak dapat dipisahkan dari masalah miring.Baru -baru ini, ada banyak tautan yang beredar di media sosial yang menyatakan bahwa permainan berisi undangan yang tidak dapat ditoleransi oleh Islam.Secara luas diedarkan di media sosial bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya di Syria atau Syria berarti "Saya Yahudi", sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi Yahudi", dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Rumor itu tentu saja menjadi perdebatan panas di media sosial.Banyak yang percaya dan berbagi desas -desus, banyak febricity mengira itu hanya sesuatu yang terkait.Jadi apakah itu masalahnya?The Los Angels Times dalam sebuah artikel tertanggal 24 April 2001 pernah meninjau ini.Di LA Times, dinyatakan bahwa pada waktu itu di negara-negara Timur Tengah seperti Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Yordania, Mesir, dan Arab Saudi, ada banyak desas-desus bahwa permainan Pokemon memiliki konotasi yang mempromosikan perilaku anti-Islam dan percaya pada Yudaisme.Ini tentu saja menyebabkan kecemasan.The LA Times mencatat bahwa terlepas dari penolakan Nintendo, para pemimpin negara -negara itu masih tidak dapat menerima Pokemon.Rumor muncul di tengah kekhawatiran negara -negara Arab akan mengasimilasi budaya yang muncul.Meski begitu, banyak rumor tidak terbukti pada waktu itu."Telah terbukti bahwa mainan ini adalah bagian dari rencana Yahudi untuk merusak pikiran generasi muda kita karena menyinggung pikiran menghujat, mengejek Tuhan dan nilai -nilai moral kita sehingga sangat berbahaya bagi generasi muda kita," kata Sheik Abdel Monem Abu Zent, ​​mantan anggota parlemen Yordania.Meski begitu, dalam artikel LA Times, ia menyatakan bahwa tidak ada bukti kuat bahwa permainan Pokemon memang memiliki konotasi yang merugikan Islam.Mohammed Abu Laila, seorang profesor dari Universitas Al Azhar, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada bukti kuat yang mengkonfirmasi rumor yang membuat orang tua melarang anak -anak mereka untuk memainkan permainan Pokemon.Dalam sebuah pernyataan di surat kabar Amman Jordan, Gereja Kristen Syria Ortodoks membantah tuduhan bahwa Pokemon dan nama karakter lainnya berakar pada Syria kuno dan menghina Islam.Pejabat gereja mengatakan mereka terkejut dengan surat yang masuk yang menyatakan bahwa Pokemon berisi undangan Yahudi.Artikel dari LA Times dapat dibaca di tautan berikut.

berita: The current Pokemon Go has attracted so much interest from the world community. The game fever has also been disturbed by negative news about the game. There are links circulating on social media that say Pokemon has a negative meaning and corners one religion. But is it true? Here's the explanation. Many circulating on social media that Pokemon actually in Syriac or Syriac means "I am Jewish". While Pikachu is said to mean "Be Jewish", and Charmander means "God is Weak". The rumor has certainly become a heated debate on social media. Many believed and shared the rumor, many thought it was just something that was linked. word Reporting from the Los Angeles Times edition of April 24, 2001, countries located in the Middle East region have indeed had problems with this. In the LA Times, it was stated that at that time in Middle Eastern countries such as Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Jordan, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia, rumors circulated that Pokemon games had connotations that promoted anti-Islamic behavior and believed in Judaism. This of course causes anxiety. The LA Times noted that despite Nintendo's denials, the leaders of those countries still couldn't accept Pokemon. The rumors arose amid concerns Arab countries would assimilate the emerging culture. Even so, many rumors were not proven at that time. Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor from Al Azhar University, said that until now there was no solid evidence to confirm the rumors. He said if he had even asked directly to the party who popularized Pokemon. Pokemon is actually just an abbreviation of Pocket Monster or pocket monster. Named Pocket Monster because this pokemon has a pocket ball that can be put in a pocket. Meanwhile Pikachu is a combination of the words Pika and Chu. But whatever it means, we as Muslims should leave things that are useless or not useful, like the words of the Prophet SAW
berita_id: Pokemon Go saat ini telah menarik begitu banyak minat dari komunitas dunia.Game Fever juga terganggu oleh berita negatif tentang permainan.Ada tautan yang beredar di media sosial yang mengatakan Pokemon memiliki makna negatif dan sudut satu agama.Tapi apakah itu benar?Inilah penjelasannya.Banyak yang beredar di media sosial bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya di Syria atau Syria berarti "Saya Yahudi".Sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi Yahudi", dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Rumor itu tentu saja menjadi perdebatan panas di media sosial.Banyak yang percaya dan berbagi rumor, banyak yang mengira itu hanya sesuatu yang terkait.Pelaporan kata dari Los Angeles Times edisi 24 April 2001, negara -negara yang berlokasi di Wilayah Timur Tengah memang memiliki masalah dengan ini.Di LA Times, dinyatakan bahwa pada waktu itu di negara-negara Timur Tengah seperti Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Yordania, Mesir, dan Arab Saudi, desas-desus beredar bahwa permainan Pokemon memiliki konotasi yang mempromosikan perilaku anti-Islam dan percaya pada Yudaisme.Ini tentu saja menyebabkan kecemasan.The LA Times mencatat bahwa terlepas dari penolakan Nintendo, para pemimpin negara -negara itu masih tidak dapat menerima Pokemon.Rumor muncul di tengah kekhawatiran negara -negara Arab akan mengasimilasi budaya yang muncul.Meski begitu, banyak rumor tidak terbukti pada waktu itu.Mohammed Abu Laila, seorang profesor dari Universitas Al Azhar, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada bukti kuat untuk mengkonfirmasi rumor tersebut.Dia mengatakan apakah dia bahkan bertanya langsung kepada pesta yang mempopulerkan Pokemon.Pokemon sebenarnya hanya singkatan dari monster saku atau monster saku.Named Pocket Monster karena Pokemon ini memiliki bola saku yang dapat dimasukkan ke dalam saku.Sementara itu Pikachu adalah kombinasi dari kata -kata Pika dan Chu.Tapi apa pun artinya, kita sebagai Muslim harus meninggalkan hal -hal yang tidak berguna atau tidak berguna, seperti kata -kata yang dilihat Nabi

berita: Stroke is a neurological disease that most often results in disability and death. Besides being ranked first among a class of neurological diseases that cause death, stroke is also one of the three main causes of death in general. doctorhealth-stroke-brain-vessel-blood From these various facts show that until now, stroke is still a major problem in the field of neurology and health in general. To overcome this crucial problem, a stroke prevention strategy is needed that includes preventive, rehabilitative, and promotive aspects. Actually, stroke cases have occurred long ago, this is evidenced by the existence of first aid in stroke cases based on traditional Chinese medicine with acupuncture techniques, but this technique has been forgotten, so the impact is getting bigger. As is known, people who get a STROKE attack, all the blood in the body will flow very fast to the blood vessels in the brain. If the rescue activity is given a little too late, then the blood vessels in the brain will not be strong enough to withstand the rush of blood flowing and will soon burst little by little. The following first aid can be done: Do not be moved If you move the patient from the place of origin or the original place it will make the possibility of rupture of fine blood vessels in the brain will occur more quickly and of course this will be risky. Simply help the patient to take a sitting position so as not to fall again. Pull and prick the earlobe If the patient's mouth looks abnormal, you may have to try to tug on the patient's ears until they look a little red. Then, do 2 punctures on the lower end of the ear with a small needle that has been sterilized so that the blood drips 2 times from each earlobe. In a few minutes the patient's mouth will return to normal. Puncture the tips of the fingers with a needle It is recommended to use a syringe. But if you don't have one, you can use other needles that are not too big (ex: sewing needles, pins) and of course they must be in a sterile condition by burning. The point to be punctured is about 1 mm from the tip of the nail. Try to get at least a little blood dripping or 1 drop is enough. If you can't, press the finger. Within about 10 minutes, the patient will regain consciousness. Seek care medical help when the patient's condition begins to recover, seek medical attention immediately. Take the patient to the nearest doctor or nearest hospital to get further action. Remember, before 6 hours since the attack, stroke sufferers must receive medical help. So some information and tips about First Aid for Stroke Patients, I hope you can provide help to those around you and help save a human life. Please leave your opinion Below!
berita_id: Stroke adalah penyakit neurologis yang paling sering mengakibatkan kecacatan dan kematian.Selain peringkat pertama di antara kelas penyakit neurologis yang menyebabkan kematian, stroke juga merupakan salah satu dari tiga penyebab utama kematian secara umum.Doktor-Stroke-Brain-Blood-Blood dari berbagai fakta ini menunjukkan bahwa sampai sekarang, stroke masih menjadi masalah besar di bidang neurologi dan kesehatan secara umum.Untuk mengatasi masalah penting ini, strategi pencegahan stroke diperlukan yang mencakup aspek preventif, rehabilitasi, dan promosi.Sebenarnya, kasus stroke telah terjadi sejak lama, ini dibuktikan dengan adanya pertolongan pertama dalam kasus stroke berdasarkan obat tradisional Tiongkok dengan teknik akupunktur, tetapi teknik ini telah dilupakan, sehingga dampaknya semakin besar.Seperti diketahui, orang yang mendapatkan serangan stroke, semua darah dalam tubuh akan mengalir sangat cepat ke pembuluh darah di otak.Jika aktivitas penyelamatan diberikan sedikit terlambat, maka pembuluh darah di otak tidak akan cukup kuat untuk menahan aliran darah yang mengalir dan akan segera meledak sedikit demi sedikit.Pertolongan pertama berikut dapat dilakukan: Jangan dipindahkan jika Anda memindahkan pasien dari tempat asal atau tempat aslinya akan membuat kemungkinan pecahnya pembuluh darah halus di otak akan terjadi lebih cepat dan tentu saja ini akan berisiko.Cukup bantu pasien untuk mengambil posisi duduk agar tidak jatuh lagi.Tarik dan tusuk telinga jika mulut pasien terlihat tidak normal, Anda mungkin harus mencoba menarik telinga pasien sampai mereka terlihat sedikit merah.Kemudian, lakukan 2 tusukan di ujung bawah telinga dengan jarum kecil yang telah disterilkan sehingga darah menetes 2 kali dari setiap daun telinga.Dalam beberapa menit mulut pasien akan kembali normal.Tusuk ujung jari dengan jarum yang disarankan untuk menggunakan jarum suntik.Tetapi jika Anda tidak memilikinya, Anda dapat menggunakan jarum lain yang tidak terlalu besar (mis: jarum menjahit, pin) dan tentu saja mereka harus dalam kondisi steril dengan membakar.Poin yang harus ditusuk adalah sekitar 1 mm dari ujung kuku.Cobalah untuk mendapatkan setidaknya sedikit darah yang menetes atau 1 tetes sudah cukup.Jika Anda tidak bisa, tekan jari.Dalam waktu sekitar 10 menit, pasien akan mendapatkan kembali kesadaran.Carilah bantuan medis ketika kondisi pasien mulai pulih, segera cari perhatian medis.Bawa pasien ke dokter terdekat atau rumah sakit terdekat untuk mendapatkan tindakan lebih lanjut.Ingat, sebelum 6 jam sejak serangan, penderita stroke harus menerima bantuan medis.Jadi beberapa informasi dan tips tentang pertolongan pertama untuk pasien stroke, saya harap Anda dapat memberikan bantuan kepada orang -orang di sekitar Anda dan membantu menyelamatkan hidup manusia.Silakan tinggalkan pendapat Anda di bawah!

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia is confirmed to be a hoax. This certainty was revealed after Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati confirmed this in front of journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace, West Java. It does not exist and has never been discussed, he said on Monday. , March 12, 2018 While giving a statement regarding President Joko Widodo's meeting with the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) delegation, he received a question about it. The Minister of Finance explained that currently there are indeed many circulating information and documents that are made as if they came from government institutions. "Menpan (in social media) it is a hoax, that's what it is. In today's social media there is a lot program of information and documents that are made similar to those of the government and published," he said. I In this issue, it is stated that the president will be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp. 553422694 per month. Meanwhile, the vice president is said to be proposed to receive a salary of Rp. 368948462 per month.
berita_id: Berita yang beredar tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia dikonfirmasi menjadi tipuan.Kepastian ini terungkap setelah Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati mengkonfirmasi hal ini di depan jurnalis di Istana Presiden Bogor, Jawa Barat.Itu tidak ada dan belum pernah dibahas, katanya pada hari Senin., 12 Maret 2018 sambil memberikan pernyataan tentang pertemuan Presiden Joko Widodo dengan delegasi Bank Investasi Investasi Asia (AIIB), ia menerima pertanyaan tentang hal itu.Menteri Keuangan menjelaskan bahwa saat ini memang ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang beredar yang dibuat seolah -olah mereka berasal dari lembaga pemerintah."Menpan (di media sosial) itu adalah tipuan, itulah adanya. Di media sosial saat ini ada banyak program informasi dan dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan pemerintah dan diterbitkan," katanya.Saya dalam edisi ini, dinyatakan bahwa Presiden akan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji hingga RP.553422694 per bulan.Sementara itu, wakil presiden dikatakan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji RP.368948462 per bulan.

berita: The call to uninstall the Traveloka application has recently been widely discussed on social networks. This started when a pianist named Ananda Sukarlan walked out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan delivered his speech in celebration of the 90th anniversary of Kanisius College at the Jakarta International Expo Kemayoran. Ananda Sukarlan himself is one of the alumni of Kanisius College. His action to walk out was also reportedly attended by several other alumni. One declared of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, is said to have supported Ananda's walk out by shaking hands and congratulating him. The action that resulted in the call to uninstall Traveloka also received a response from the company. Traveloka stated that one of the bosses did not attend the Kanisius College celebration because he was leaving the city. “We are proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from the Kanisius Alumni. However, he was unable to attend because he was on a business trip that had been planned several months in advance," Traveloka said in a statement received by Okezone. Meanwhile, regarding the support that Traveloka CTO reportedly gave to the pianist, Traveloka stated that the company prioritizes the values ​​of mutual respect that are applied to all of its employees. “Responding to the issue surrounding Anies' speech at the Kanisius College 90th Celebration, we state that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders,” explained the company.
berita_id: Panggilan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka baru -baru ini telah dibahas secara luas di jejaring sosial.Ini dimulai ketika seorang pianis bernama Ananda Sukarlan berjalan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan menyampaikan pidatonya dalam perayaan peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College di Jakarta International Expo Kemayoran.Ananda Sukarlan sendiri adalah salah satu alumni dari Kanisius College.Tindakannya untuk keluar juga dilaporkan dihadiri oleh beberapa alumni lainnya.Salah satu yang dinyatakan sebagai pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, dikatakan telah mendukung perjalanan Ananda dengan berjabat tangan dan memberi selamat padanya.Tindakan yang mengakibatkan panggilan untuk menghapus instalasi Traveloka juga menerima tanggapan dari perusahaan.Traveloka menyatakan bahwa salah satu bos tidak menghadiri perayaan Kanisius College karena dia meninggalkan kota."Kami bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya," kata Traveloka dalam sebuah pernyataan yang diterima oleh Okezone.Sementara itu, mengenai dukungan yang dilaporkan diberikan oleh Traveloka CTO kepada pianis, Traveloka menyatakan bahwa perusahaan memprioritaskan nilai -nilai rasa saling menghormati yang diterapkan pada semua karyawannya.“Menanggapi masalah seputar pidato anies di perayaan Kanisius College ke-90, kami menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi dan inovasi. Nilai-nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal,” jelas perusahaan.

berita: The Presidential Palace emphasized that the salaries of the President and Vice President did not increase because both of them were still receiving salaries according to Law Number 7 of 1978 concerning Financial or Administrative Rights of the President and Vice President as well as Former Presidents and Vice Presidents. Bey Machmudin in a written statement in Jakarta, Wednesday (28/6/2017) Bey emphasized that the news that President Joko Widodo received a salary increase is not true because until now, President Joko Widodo and Vice President Jusuf Kalla still receive salaries according to the law. Number 7 of 1978 In Article 2 of the Law, it is stated that the basic salary of the President jurisprudence is six times the highest basic salary of an official in Indonesia other than the President and Vice President. according to Government Regulation No. 75 of 2000, salary The highest principal of state officials (Chairman of DPR, MA, BPK) is IDR 5040000 per month
berita_id: Istana presiden menekankan bahwa gaji presiden dan wakil presiden tidak meningkat karena keduanya masih menerima gaji menurut hukum nomor 7 tahun 1978 mengenai hak keuangan atau administrasi presiden dan wakil presiden serta mantan presiden dan wakil presiden.Bey Machmudin dalam sebuah pernyataan tertulis di Jakarta, Rabu (28/6/2017) Bey menekankan bahwa berita bahwa Presiden Joko Widodo menerima kenaikan gaji tidak benar karena sampai sekarang, Presiden Joko Widodo dan Wakil Presiden Jusuf Kalla masih menerima gaji menurut undang -undang.Nomor 7 tahun 1978 dalam Pasal 2 Hukum, dinyatakan bahwa gaji dasar yurisprudensi Presiden adalah enam kali lipat gaji dasar tertinggi dari seorang pejabat di Indonesia selain presiden dan wakil presiden.Menurut Peraturan Pemerintah No. 75 tahun 2000, Gaji Kepala Pejabat Negara Tertinggi (Ketua DPR, MA, BPK) adalah IDR 5040000 per bulan

berita: The handling of Facebook (FB) user data leaks in Indonesia is still being handled. Parliament and Government are paying attention to this issue. Recently, the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology held a closed meeting with Facebook officials, including the Vice President of Public Policy Asia Pacific, Simon Miller, at the Ministry of Communications and Informatics Office in Jakarta, Monday (07/5). After the meeting, the Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara and Simon, revealed three recent developments related to the leak of Facebook user data in Indonesia. First, Simon explained that Facebook is still waiting for the results of an audit from the UK Information Commissioner Office (ICO) against Cambridge Analytica. In this case, the British government went directly to investigate Cambridge Analytica. Regarding this, Rudiantara said that Kominfo has asked Facebook not to just wait for the results of the ICO in the UK. Facebook, he continued, must look for other efforts in parallel so that similar incidents do not happen again in the future. "So Facebook is now in parallel, while waiting for the UK authorities to ensure, especially from 2014," said Rudiantara. Second, manage negative content. According to Rudiantara, negative content management is still a information homework that must be completed by Facebook with the Indonesian government. This is part of Kominfo's assessment of Facebook in dealing with negative content. Rudiantara admits that there have been improvements in the field, but there is still much to be done. “I always say that Facebook's performance is half as much as requested and only 50 percent until the end of 2017. But now it has increased to 60 percent. However, there is still PR, so we still have to continue to encourage this management, and this will also be part of the evaluation of the assessment by Kominfo on how Facebook's cooperation deals with content that is considered negative," he explained. Third, resolving the leak of Facebook user data. Will Facebook be shut down in Indonesia? Rudiantara did not explicitly disclose the issue of closing Facebook in Indonesia. He only emphasized that the settlement of this case requires a fairly long process. Kominfo only complies with administrative sanctions with a system of updating each other on case developments, especially the management of negative content and policies. Kominfo also cooperates with the police in the context of negative content management. "Definitely a question, friends, where is Facebook going, when do you want to turn off Facebook? Do you want to turn it off? I am like this, Kominfo does not stand alone, because this process is also not just Kominfo, Kominfo is subject to administrative sanctions, it's the process of updating each other to what extent. So, please don't say that it's just ended here, it's not a continuous effort, one that is negative content management, and is also related to policy," he added. For policy, Rudiantara acknowledged the importance of the Personal Data Protection Law which is currently included in the Prolegnas list. Currently, the discussion on the Personal Data Protection Law is still in the process of harmonization. Meanwhile, from a practical point of view, Kominfo reminded all provider providers to protect the personal data of customers or users. If it violates, then there are two sanctions that are already waiting, namely administrative and criminal sanctions.
berita_id: Penanganan data pengguna Facebook (FB) bocor di Indonesia masih ditangani.Parlemen dan pemerintah memperhatikan masalah ini.Baru -baru ini, Kementerian Komunikasi dan Teknologi Informasi mengadakan pertemuan tertutup dengan pejabat Facebook, termasuk wakil presiden kebijakan publik Asia Pasifik, Simon Miller, di Kantor Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika di Jakarta, Senin (07/5).Setelah pertemuan, Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara dan Simon, mengungkapkan tiga perkembangan terkini terkait dengan kebocoran data pengguna Facebook di Indonesia.Pertama, Simon menjelaskan bahwa Facebook masih menunggu hasil audit dari Kantor Komisaris Informasi Inggris (ICO) melawan Cambridge Analytica.Dalam hal ini, pemerintah Inggris langsung menyelidiki Cambridge Analytica.Mengenai hal ini, Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa Kominfo telah meminta Facebook untuk tidak hanya menunggu hasil ICO di Inggris.Facebook, lanjutnya, harus mencari upaya lain secara paralel sehingga insiden serupa tidak terjadi lagi di masa depan."Jadi Facebook sekarang secara paralel, sambil menunggu otoritas Inggris untuk memastikan, terutama dari 2014," kata Rudiantara.Kedua, kelola konten negatif.Menurut Rudiantara, manajemen konten negatif masih merupakan pekerjaan rumah informasi yang harus diselesaikan oleh Facebook dengan pemerintah Indonesia.Ini adalah bagian dari penilaian Facebook Kominfo dalam menangani konten negatif.Rudiantara mengakui bahwa ada perbaikan di lapangan, tetapi masih banyak yang harus dilakukan.“Saya selalu mengatakan bahwa kinerja Facebook adalah setengah sebanyak yang diminta dan hanya 50 persen hingga akhir 2017. Tetapi sekarang telah meningkat menjadi 60 persen. Namun, masih ada PR, jadi kami masih harus terus mendorong manajemen ini, dan ini juga akan menjadi bagian dari evaluasi penilaian oleh Kominfo tentang bagaimana kesepakatan kerja sama Facebook dengan konten yang dianggap negatif,” ia menjelaskan.Ketiga, menyelesaikan kebocoran data pengguna Facebook.Akankah Facebook ditutup di Indonesia?Rudiantara tidak secara eksplisit mengungkapkan masalah penutupan Facebook di Indonesia.Dia hanya menekankan bahwa penyelesaian kasus ini membutuhkan proses yang cukup panjang.Kominfo hanya mematuhi sanksi administratif dengan sistem memperbarui satu sama lain pada perkembangan kasus, terutama pengelolaan konten dan kebijakan negatif.Kominfo juga bekerja sama dengan polisi dalam konteks manajemen konten negatif.Pasti sebuah pertanyaan, teman -teman, kemana perginya Facebook, kapan Anda ingin mematikan Facebook? Apakah Anda ingin mematikannya? Saya seperti ini, Kominfo tidak berdiri sendiri, karena proses ini juga bukan hanya Kominfo, Kominfo tunduk pada sanksi administrasi, itu juga merupakan proses yang tidak ada yang dapat diaktifkan.ditambahkan.Untuk kebijakan, Rudiantara mengakui pentingnya undang -undang perlindungan data pribadi yang saat ini termasuk dalam daftar Prolegnas.Saat ini, diskusi tentang undang -undang perlindungan data pribadi masih dalam proses harmonisasi.Sementara itu, dari sudut pandang praktis, Kominfo mengingatkan semua penyedia penyedia untuk melindungi data pribadi pelanggan atau pengguna.Jika melanggar, maka ada dua sanksi yang sudah menunggu, yaitu sanksi administrasi dan pidana.

berita: Rumors circulated that there had been a riot at the Mako Brimob Detention Center, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, on Friday (11/10/2017). From the information compiled, as quoted by a social media channel, it was stated that the detainees who were charged with terrorism cases were outraged by the news that the wardens were suspected of harassing the Qur'an and the books of the clerics belonging to the detainees. "Densus and the warden arrogantly entered the Ikhwan's room and the Koran was stepped on by Brimob, the warden and Densus finally caused the ikhwans to go on a rampage and destroy the Brimob mako detention room, the current situation is still tense ..." That's the excerpt from the release of #AlfathChannel, which spread on social media. In addition, viral videos and photos were also circulated during the riots and the detainees waving the monotheism flag. In the video, the atmosphere of the Mako Brimbob detention cell looks shattered, there are also broken glass and wood that the prisoners break down. Meanwhile, the screams of takbir of the prisoners resounded. However, there were also other prisoners who tried to calm the atmosphere. After the riots, it was reported that the atmosphere was starting to become conducive, the warden of the Mako Brimob Detention Center was reported to have made efforts to invite the detainees to negotiate. Until this news was revealed, clearing there has been no release of clarification from the Mako Brimob Detention Center
berita_id: Rumor beredar bahwa telah terjadi kerusuhan di Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, pada hari Jumat (11/10/2017).Dari informasi yang disusun, seperti dikutip oleh saluran media sosial, dinyatakan bahwa tahanan yang didakwa dengan kasus -kasus terorisme marah oleh berita bahwa para penjaga diduga melecehkan Al -Qur'an dan buku -buku ulama milik para tahanan."Densus dan sipir dengan sombong memasuki kamar Ikhwan dan Alquran diinjak oleh Brimob, sipir dan Densus akhirnya menyebabkan Ikhwan mengamuk dan menghancurkan ruang penahanan Brimob Mako, situasi saat ini masih tegang ..." Itu adalah kutukan dari rilis #fathchannel, mana yang disebar sosial. "Selain itu, video viral dan foto juga diedarkan selama kerusuhan dan tahanan mengibarkan bendera monoteisme.Dalam video itu, suasana sel penahanan Mako Brimbob terlihat hancur, ada juga pecahan kaca dan kayu yang dihancurkan oleh para tahanan.Sementara itu, teriakan takbir para tahanan bergema.Namun, ada juga tahanan lain yang mencoba menenangkan suasana.Setelah kerusuhan, dilaporkan bahwa atmosfer mulai menjadi kondusif, sipir Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob dilaporkan telah melakukan upaya untuk mengundang tahanan untuk bernegosiasi.Sampai berita ini terungkap, kliring belum ada rilis klarifikasi dari Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob

berita: Apple's newest product, the iPhone 6 Plus, is often complained by a number of users. This is because this product has the disadvantage of being easy to bend, if it is stored in a trouser pocket for too long. Apple in making the iPhone 6 Plus, is considered to have made a big mistake by choosing a metal-aluminum alloy mixture that is not too solid as the base material for the iPhone 6 Plus frame. That makes it easy to bend. For that weakness, Apple's new smartphone with a 5.5-inch jumbo sail has now become the subject of ridicule on various social media. A number of Apple's competitors did not waste this opportunity to 'beat' Apple. According to news reported by the Business Insider page, Tuesday (21/10/2014), the hashtag #bendgate, or what can be interpreted as the iPhone 6 Plus 'curvy scandal', has become a hot topic on a number of social media. Many users of Twitter, Path, and various other photo social networks mock the weakness of the iPhone 6 Plus. For example, what the official Twitter account for the snack brand @KitKat did. The brand, which is indeed a partnership with bemock Google, posted a photo that satirized how fragile the iPhone 6 handset frame is. They also tweeted, “We don't bend, we #break. #bendgate #iPhone6plus.
berita_id: Produk terbaru Apple, iPhone 6 Plus, sering dikeluhkan oleh sejumlah pengguna.Ini karena produk ini memiliki kelemahan karena mudah ditekuk, jika disimpan dalam saku celana panjang terlalu lama.Apple dalam membuat iPhone 6 Plus, dianggap telah membuat kesalahan besar dengan memilih campuran paduan logam-aluminium yang tidak terlalu solid sebagai bahan dasar untuk bingkai iPhone 6 Plus.Itu membuatnya mudah ditekuk.Untuk kelemahan itu, smartphone baru Apple dengan layar jumbo 5,5 inci kini telah menjadi subjek ejekan di berbagai media sosial.Sejumlah pesaing Apple tidak menyia -nyiakan kesempatan ini untuk 'mengalahkan' Apple.Menurut berita yang dilaporkan oleh Business Insider Page, Selasa (21/10/2014), tagar #Bendgate, atau apa yang dapat ditafsirkan sebagai 'skandal lengkung' iPhone 6 Plus, telah menjadi topik hangat di sejumlah media sosial.Banyak pengguna Twitter, Path, dan berbagai jejaring sosial foto lainnya mengejek kelemahan iPhone 6 Plus.Misalnya, apa yang dilakukan akun Twitter resmi untuk merek snack @kitkat.Merek, yang memang merupakan kemitraan dengan Bemock Google, memposting foto yang menyindir betapa rapuhnya bingkai handset iPhone 6.Mereka juga tweeted, “Kami tidak menekuk, kami #break. #Bendgate #iPhone6plus.

berita: In the midst of high consumer demand for the latest smartphone Apple iPhone 6 Plus, unpleasant news circulated. A small number of iPhone 6 Plus big screen mobile phone users reportedly complain because their smartphone is easy to bend or bend when placed in a pocket. (Read: Sales of Apple iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus Reach 10 Million Units) Some users have reported the issue via forums on the internet complete with photos of the iPhone 6 Plus curving, generally in the middle to the top of the handset, according to a report published by ZD Net (24/9/2014). The folding of the iPhone 6 Plus which is equipped with a 5.5-inch screen is predicted because of the pressure when the user sits when the cellphone is in the back pocket wandering of his pants. However, through the MacRumors forum, one of the owners of the iPhone 6 Plus with the name 'hanzoh' claimed that his cellphone was damaged (bent) after being stored in the front pocket of his pants for about 18 hours. (Read: Launches Galaxy Note 4, Samsung: iPhone 6 Plus Just Mimics) iPhone 6 Plus is by far the slimmest smartphone from Apple with a thickness of about 7.1 mm and a length of about 16cm. Some owners of these cellphones speculate that the iPhone 6 Plus bends easily because its body is too thin. So far, Apple has not been willing to comment.
berita_id: Di tengah -tengah permintaan konsumen tinggi untuk smartphone terbaru Apple iPhone 6 Plus, berita yang tidak menyenangkan beredar.Sejumlah kecil iPhone 6 ditambah pengguna ponsel layar lebar dilaporkan mengeluh karena smartphone mereka mudah ditekuk atau ditekuk saat ditempatkan di saku.(Baca: Penjualan Apple iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus mencapai 10 juta unit) Beberapa pengguna telah melaporkan masalah ini melalui forum di internet lengkap dengan foto -foto IPhone 6 Plus Curving, umumnya di tengah ke atas handset, menurut laporan yang diterbitkan oleh ZD Net (24/9/2014).Lipat iPhone 6 Plus yang dilengkapi dengan layar 5,5 inci diprediksi karena tekanan ketika pengguna duduk ketika ponsel berada di saku belakang berkeliaran di celananya.Namun, melalui Forum Macrumors, salah satu pemilik iPhone 6 Plus dengan nama 'Hanzoh' mengklaim bahwa ponselnya rusak (bengkok) setelah disimpan di saku depan celananya selama sekitar 18 jam.(Baca: Meluncurkan Galaxy Note 4, Samsung: iPhone 6 Plus Just Mimics) iPhone 6 Plus sejauh ini merupakan smartphone paling ramping dari Apple dengan ketebalan sekitar 7,1 mm dan panjang sekitar 16cm.Beberapa pemilik ponsel ini berspekulasi bahwa iPhone 6 Plus dengan mudah membungkuk karena tubuhnya terlalu tipis.Sejauh ini, Apple belum mau berkomentar.

berita: A chain message about being aware of the presence of a toothbrush made of boar bristle is spreading in the community. Because of this, there is the word bristle on the packaging of a global toothbrush brand. The message is not really new. The message was spread a year ago, but now it's crowded again. "Come on, check the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the packaging, it means that the toothbrush contains pig bristles. Bristle means pig hair. As soon as the sound of the message fragments spread again through the chat application. Not only on toothbrushes, the message maker also suggested that people check the bread brushes. He said the brush usually says “Bristle”, “Pure Bristle”, “100% China Bristle”. As with other hoax messages, the appeal was accompanied by a request to share the message with family and friends in the group so that more people would be spared from non-halal products. It turned out that the informant had misunderstood. Maybe, when he wrote the message, he had not had coffee. Because, the term bristle is not only used for sea urchins. According to the official website of the Indonesian Ulema Council (MUI) Food, Drug and Cosmetic Research Institute, the term bristle is lexically a short, stiff hair, and fiber. So, all stiff commonly hair fibers can be called bristle. In the industrial world, bristle is indeed used for making brushes or brushes (including toothbrushes). However, not all of them come from sea urchins. Bristle for brushes and brushes can be sourced from animal hair. Be it pigs, goats, horses, or camels. Apart from animal hair, for industrial purposes, bristle can also be made from synthetic materials, either nylon or silicone. Plant fiber has also been used as a brush or brush material. The fiber is commonly known as palm fiber. The MUI has firmly stated that if a brush or brush uses pork bristles, it is unlawful. However, manufacturers usually write down in detail the raw material used for fur. Usually, for brushes or brushes with boar bristle material, it is written boar bristle brush. Boar itself is an English term that refers to a wild boar. Recognizing the raw material for a brush or toothbrush is not easy. However, you can determine whether the fur comes from animal hair or synthetic material by slightly burning it. If you smell hair, you can be sure that the fur comes from an animal. If it is made of synthetic material or coconut fiber, the smell will be different. Referring to a number of sources, the use of bristles on toothbrushes was first carried out by the Chinese in the 15th century. At that time, the hair on the pig's neck was used. The brush was later brought to the European market. However, Europeans prefer horsehair because it is softer. The first modern toothbrush was introduced by William Addis in England around 1780. The handle was carved from cow bone. The fur is still made of sea urchin, only one big row. Furthermore, in 1844, a toothbrush with three rows of bristles was designed. Modern technology has finally found nylon can be used as bristles on brushes. The technology was introduced in 1938. Since 1950, the toothbrush industry has mostly used nylon bristles. So, don't be in a hurry to think of the bristle writing on your toothbrush packaging as a sea urchin. FACT The word bristle on the toothbrush packaging does not mean a boar. Almost all toothbrush products currently use synthetic materials.
berita_id: Pesan rantai tentang menyadari keberadaan sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi menyebar di masyarakat.Karena itu, ada kata bulu pada kemasan merek sikat gigi global.Pesannya tidak terlalu baru.Pesan itu tersebar setahun yang lalu, tapi sekarang sudah ramai lagi."Ayo, periksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan" berbulu "pada kemasannya, itu berarti bahwa sikat gigi berisi bulu babi. Bulu berarti rambut babi. Segera setelah suara fragmen pesan menyebar lagi melalui aplikasi obrolan. At that time, the hair on the pig's neck was used. The brush was later brought to the European market. However, Europeans prefer horsehair because it is softer. The first modern toothbrush was introduced by William Addis in England around 1780. The handle was carved from cow bone. The fur is still made of sea urchin, only one big row. Furthermore, in 1844, a toothbrush with three rows of bristles was designed. Modern technology hasAkhirnya nilon dapat digunakan sebagai bulu pada kuas.

berita: The news that Facebook will be closed or blocked makes social media users shocked by the news. One of them is netizens who use Facebook a lot of posting statuses that "Facebook will be closed" and some even post "before Facebook is closed post status or photos first" According to the news that the closure of Facebook is a contra and a pro among netizens. Even so, rumors that are viral and widely circulated on social media, especially Facebook, will certainly not be blocked or hoaxes. The government can indeed give strict sanctions to block Facebook, because the data of one million Indonesian users was also leaked in the Cambridge Analytica (CA) scandal. However, there is no certainty that on April 24, Facebook will actually be blocked in Indonesia. Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara on various occasions never mentioned blocking Facebook. In fact, Rudiantara said that the Ministry of Communications and Informatics did not hesitate to block Facebook, but must follow procedures so that the steps are not rash. Rudiantara's only firm statement about blocking Facebook is if there is evidence that Facebook is used as a means of inciting or fighting. Rudiantara ensured that if investigators found an element of criminal suspicion in the leak of Facebook user data in Indonesia, the chances of blocking Facebook would be even greater. Meanwhile, these two things have not been proven yet, are still under investigation and awaiting the results of the audit. “If there are indications that assorted Facebook in Indonesia is used for incitement, as happened in Myanmar. I have no qualms about blocking," said Rudiantara, a few days ago. The Minister of Communication and Information has asked Facebook to conduct an audit, and submitted the results of the audit since a week after the announcement that data on Facebook users in Indonesia had been leaked in the CA scandal. The request was included in the first Warning Letter (SP) sent by the Ministry of Communication and Informatics. However, after the specified deadline arrived, Facebook has not yet submitted the results of the audit. Kominfo also issued a second warning letter. “Currently, it is SP II. We are waiting, later after SP II it can be upgraded to a temporary service termination if needed," said Rudiantara, Wednesday (11/4/2018). If the audit results are known later, the government can assess the potential problems that could arise from this data leak and take steps to address them. Looks like we just need to wait until Facebook is closed.
