berita_id: Berita bahwa Facebook akan ditutup atau diblokir membuat pengguna media sosial terkejut dengan berita tersebut.Salah satunya adalah netizen yang menggunakan Facebook banyak status posting yang "Facebook akan ditutup" dan beberapa pos bahkan "sebelum Facebook ditutup status pos atau foto terlebih dahulu" menurut berita bahwa penutupan Facebook adalah kontra dan pro di antara netizen.Meski begitu, rumor yang viral dan beredar luas di media sosial, terutama Facebook, tentu tidak akan diblokir atau hoax.Pemerintah memang dapat memberikan sanksi ketat untuk memblokir Facebook, karena data satu juta pengguna Indonesia juga bocor dalam skandal Cambridge Analytica (CA).Namun, tidak ada kepastian bahwa pada 24 April, Facebook sebenarnya akan diblokir di Indonesia.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara pada berbagai kesempatan tidak pernah disebutkan memblokir Facebook.Faktanya, Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika tidak ragu untuk memblokir Facebook, tetapi harus mengikuti prosedur sehingga langkah -langkahnya tidak terburu -buru.Satu -satunya pernyataan perusahaan Rudiantara tentang memblokir Facebook adalah jika ada bukti bahwa Facebook digunakan sebagai sarana menghasut atau berkelahi.Rudiantara memastikan bahwa jika penyelidik menemukan unsur kecurigaan kriminal dalam kebocoran data pengguna Facebook di Indonesia, peluang memblokir Facebook akan lebih besar.Sementara itu, kedua hal ini belum terbukti, masih dalam penyelidikan dan menunggu hasil audit."Jika ada indikasi bahwa berbagai macam Facebook di Indonesia digunakan untuk penghasutan, seperti yang terjadi di Myanmar. Saya tidak punya keraguan tentang pemblokiran," kata Rudiiantara, beberapa hari yang lalu.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi telah meminta Facebook untuk melakukan audit, dan mengirimkan hasil audit sejak seminggu setelah pengumuman bahwa data di pengguna Facebook di Indonesia telah bocor dalam skandal CA.Permintaan tersebut dimasukkan dalam surat peringatan pertama (SP) yang dikirim oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika.Namun, setelah tenggat waktu yang ditentukan tiba, Facebook belum mengirimkan hasil audit.Kominfo juga mengeluarkan surat peringatan kedua."Saat ini, ini adalah SP II. Kami sedang menunggu, nanti setelah SP II dapat ditingkatkan ke penghentian layanan sementara jika diperlukan," kata Rudiantara, Rabu (11/4/2018).Jika hasil audit diketahui kemudian, pemerintah dapat menilai potensi masalah yang dapat timbul dari kebocoran data ini dan mengambil langkah -langkah untuk mengatasinya.Sepertinya kita hanya perlu menunggu sampai Facebook ditutup.

berita: Mustajab suddenly became talkative, commenting on the fuss over the Pokemon Go game. Frankly, I'm a little surprised, it's not usually my friend who is interested in 'talking' about Android application games. Every time we met, the topic of conversation was always serious; I feel Jokowi, make fun of officials, sometimes talk agomo, occasionally discuss shamanism, if you don't have any material, then talk about bojo problems. "Have you downloaded the Pokemon game? If you haven't, give it a try, just make it fun," as he opened the conversation that night while fiddling with his gadget, then shifted his body to pour ginger milk - not concubine coffee as usual. "I'm not interested, Jab," I replied simply. He chuckled and said, "You should know, because of this Pokemon, it's said that now a lot of people are diligent in going to places of worship. So worship is while hunting Pokemon. That's good, isn't it?" I'm not really interested in responding to the 'provocation'. Tajab instead told his neighbor, Mamat, who was suddenly diligent in exercising in the morning, Pak Harjo who used to play cassava at the security guard post, suddenly diligently went to the mosque, Anwar, who was usually reluctant to go to the fields, suddenly diligently visited the fields. "This Pokemon Go has a positive influence. People who play it become diligent in anything," he said. So the point is this, Mustajab is back to talking, everything that humans make on earth is not value-free. Including matters of technology, application games and the nitty-gritty. Again he provoked, "Come on, instead of having nothing to do, being unemployed, now it's better to just download it, then let's find Pokemon together." "Playing pokemon trains our instincts, trains the sharpness of our eyes, trains the leg muscles, the body becomes healthy because it keeps going, the thumbs become strong. There are many benefits," he continued. "They said Pokemon made in Judaism, what's that like?" I'm just talking. "Says who? Don't swallow the information raw, check it first. Now there is a thin difference between people who understand and don't understand. Today, they still believe in unclear information on social media," Mustajab lectured. He continued, worrying okay, but don't overdo it. Indeed, there are now more people on social media sharing posts that say Pokemon is a covert attempt by the Jews. Pokemon is associated with Syriac or Syriac when translated into Indonesian it means: I am Jewish. "Do they really understand Syriac? It's an ancient language, you know, and even Kromo Inggil doesn't understand why it's alluding to Syriac." Try checking on the internet, Mustajab then look around looking for his smartphone. "There are many articles about Syriac," he said. Then he read it out loud. The Syriac language, he said, was the East Aramaic language that was spoken in most of the Fertile Crescent and Eastern Arabia. But it is widely spoken by various Christian communities in the Middle East. The Syriac language is written with the Syriac Alphabet. The Syriac language is now spoken by minority Syrian Christians living in eastern Turkey, northern Iraq and northeastern Syria. Syriac is also the liturgical language of several Syrian/Syrian churches: the Syrian Orthodox Church, the Syrian Catholic Church, the Maronite Church, the Chaldean Catholic Church, the Assyrian Church of the East and the Old Eastern Church. It is said that the remaining speakers of this language are about three million people. They live in Syria, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Turkey. Some became immigrants because of the genocide and persecution, and now they live in the USA, Latin America, Australia and Europe. "But it's not important anyway. The more you think about it the more dizzy," he said, changing his sitting position again. "Here is another article," Mustajab added. The Jordanian newspaper 'ad-Dustur' Monday edition 8 Muharam 1422 H, quoted several doctors of Syriac linguists at Yarmuk University and the Syrian Social Institute in Jordan. They said the words Pokemon, Pikachu and other names in Pokemon cartoons, had absolutely nothing to do with Syriac, even the names were foreign to Syriac. Pokemon is an acronym for Pocket Monster. The explanation, the word (Poke) is an abbreviation of the word (Pocket), which means; Pockets/pockets. And the word (Mon) is an abbreviation of the word (Monster), which means; Monsters. So it means pocket monster. The point is an expression of how small these monsters are to fit in a pocket. Mustajab then shifted his body back, leaning against the wall. Think about it, he said, when someone uses Jewish products, does that mean he automatically becomes a Jew. "If you think so narrowly, it's very dangerous," this time his tone was serious as he shook his head. But, he continued, if the reason you don't play Pokemon mon Go is because of danger considerations, making people wander off the streets when hunting Pokemon, or worrying about your cellphone battery running out quickly and getting hot, worrying about not concentrating on your work, afraid of being scolded by your boss because there is a ban on hunting Pokemon in the office, that's another matter. I'm still pretending to be listening. Then I joked. "So the conclusion is Pokemon wasn't made by this Jew?" "I don't think so," he said simply. Next he went back to browsing. Mustajab then read an article, Pokemon Go was made by Niantic, a software development company splinter from Google. The company was founded by John Hanke in 2010 in San Francisco, California, United States. Last year Niantic left Google. Niantic then worked with the Pokemon Company, the owner of the Pokemon license. One-third of the Pokemon Company's shares are owned by Nintendo, the video game company founded by Fusajiro Yamauchi in Tokyo, Japan, on September 23, 1889. Suddenly Mustajab stopped reading and looked thoughtful. Then he looked at me. "So what makes Pokemon Japanese, how come there are Japanese people who are Jews?" he said briefly. He continued reading, Pokemon Company has been developing a franchise business (franchise). Pokemon has its roots in comics, anime movies, video games, cards, tazos, and other merchandise. Since the 90s until now, there have been six generations of Pokemon. The total number of Pokemon species from the six generations has reached 721 species. "Many also turned out to be a species of monster Pokemon." I immediately interrupted. "By the way, how many Pokemon have you got?" Mustajab just smirked as if baring his bared teeth. I'm guessing he doesn't have time to hunt Pokemon. He's an app game enthusiast, but for the past few weeks he's stopped because his wife scolded him.

The Reog Ponorogo Association throughout Indonesia assessed that the burning of reog carried out by the connexion Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao City, Philippines, could not be justified. The reason is there are other ways that can be taken to deal with the obsolete reog. "If he is old, can't he be put in a museum for learning, that should be the case," said Chairman of the Reog Ponorogo Association throughout Indonesia, Begug Purnomosidi when contacted by Republika.co.id, Monday (2/11). The Indonesian people should respect their own arts and culture. Neighboring countries, Begug said, want to make Reog Ponorogo as an art. "We who have Reog Ponorogo are even like that, this is not right," he said. The association will immediately find out what the real reason is and what responsibility the Ministry of Foreign Affairs has given regarding this incident. "We feel uncomfortable, which is clearly offended," he said. . Tomorrow, Begug and his colleagues will meet with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to clarify the problem. In addition, the Consulate General in Davao City must apologize to the Indonesian people, especially the Reog Ponorogo lovers for their actions. Begug himself learned of the arson incident from his friends and Youtube on Saturday (31/10). He hopes that Reog Ponorogo can be recognized internationally as Indonesia's cultural heritage so that it is not recognized by other countries. "We will fight so that Reog Ponorogo is recognized by Unesco as a nation's heritage, just like batik," he said.
berita_id: Asosiasi Reog Ponorogo di seluruh Indonesia menilai bahwa pembakaran reog yang dilakukan oleh Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) di Kota Davao, Filipina, tidak dapat dibenarkan.Alasannya adalah ada cara lain yang dapat diambil untuk menangani reog yang sudah usang."Jika dia sudah tua, tidak bisakah dia dimasukkan ke dalam museum untuk belajar, itu seharusnya terjadi," kata ketua Asosiasi Reog Ponorogo di seluruh Indonesia, Purnomosidi Begug ketika dihubungi oleh Republika.co.id, Senin (2/11).Orang -orang Indonesia harus menghormati seni dan budaya mereka sendiri.Negara -negara tetangga, kata Begug, ingin menjadikan Reog Ponorogo sebagai seni."Kami yang telah reog Ponorogo bahkan seperti itu, ini tidak benar," katanya.Asosiasi akan segera mencari tahu apa alasan sebenarnya dan tanggung jawab apa yang diberikan oleh Kementerian Luar Negeri mengenai insiden ini."Kami merasa tidak nyaman, yang jelas tersinggung," katanya..Besok, Begug dan rekan -rekannya akan bertemu dengan Kementerian Luar Negeri untuk mengklarifikasi masalahnya.Selain itu, Konsulat Jenderal di Kota Davao harus meminta maaf kepada rakyat Indonesia, terutama pecinta Ponorogo yang reog atas tindakan mereka.Begug sendiri mengetahui insiden pembakaran dari teman -temannya dan YouTube pada hari Sabtu (31/10).Dia berharap bahwa Reog Ponorogo dapat diakui secara internasional sebagai warisan budaya Indonesia sehingga tidak diakui oleh negara lain."Kami akan bertarung sehingga Reog Ponorogo diakui oleh UNESCO sebagai warisan bangsa, seperti Batik," katanya.

berita: Recently, there fix has been a change in the information community regarding the handling of stroke symptoms, starting with the method of pricking the fingertips using a needle. is this method correct? not true. even the pain response from needling can elevate blood pressure and risk worsening the stroke. said neurologist Dr. FK Unika Atma Jaya Dr. dr. Yuda Turana, Sp.S told Antara News in Jakarta, Thursday. Confirmation that this method is not appropriate was also expressed by a cardiologist at Harapan Kita Hospital, dr. dicky armein hanafy, SpJP(K), FIHA. he even said this way is useless it's totally useless. there is a risk of infection, especially if the needle is not sterile or clean. "Instead of providing first aid at home, these two doctors recommend that we immediately take the patient to the hospital to get help immediately," he said. The family must immediately take them to the hospital, said Yuda. A similar statement was also conveyed by a cardiologist from Harapan Kita Hospital, dr. Siska S. Danny, SpJP. He explained that the cause of stroke comes from two things, namely bleeding in the brain or blockage of brain blood vessels, so the therapy must be based on the cause. Finger pricking using a needle is not one of the recommended ways. Stroke blockage therapy is blood thinning drugs. And conversely bleeding strokes should not be given blood thinners. The first action that must be taken for a patient suspected of having a stroke is to be taken to the hospital and confirm the type of stroke. So there is no place for finger pricking, he said in an e-mail. Some of the recognizable signs include sudden severe headache, weakness, numbness, vision problems, confusion, difficulty walking or speaking, dizziness and slurred speech. Health experts agree that stroke can be prevented, one of which is by adopting a healthy lifestyle. As reported by the Medical Daily at least there are a number of ways you can do to get rid of a stroke. First, stop smoking. In addition to stroke, smoking is also associated with a number of health problems such as cancer, heart disease and others. This habit can increase triglycerides in the blood, lower levels of good cholesterol (HDL), damage the lining of the blood stream and block blood flow. Second, exercise regularly. A study found that walking two hours per day can reduce women's risk of suffering a stroke by about 50 percent. Moreover, being active in physical activity can improve cardiovascular health and lower blood pressure -- both of which are closely related to stroke risk. Third, maintain weight. healthy because it is associated with the risk of diabetes, heart disease and stroke. Therefore, maintain your ideal body weight. In addition, eating healthy foods and keeping yourself relaxed is also another effort to get rid of the risk of having a stroke. Besides that, eating healthy foods and keeping yourself relaxed is also another effort to get rid of it. -Remote the risk of having a stroke
berita_id: Baru -baru ini, Fix telah ada perubahan dalam komunitas informasi mengenai penanganan gejala stroke, dimulai dengan metode menusuk ujung jari menggunakan jarum.Apakah metode ini benar?tidak benar.Bahkan respons nyeri dari tusuk jarum dapat meningkatkan tekanan darah dan risiko memperburuk stroke.kata ahli saraf Dr. FK Unika Atma Jaya Dr. Dr.Yuda Tura, Sp.S mengatakan kepada Antara News di Jakarta, Kamis.Konfirmasi bahwa metode ini tidak tepat juga diungkapkan oleh ahli jantung di Rumah Sakit Harapan Kita, DR.Dicky Armein Hanafy, SPJP (K), Fiha.Dia bahkan mengatakan cara ini tidak berguna itu sama sekali tidak berguna.Ada risiko infeksi, terutama jika jarum tidak steril atau bersih."Alih -alih memberikan pertolongan pertama di rumah, kedua dokter ini merekomendasikan agar kami segera membawa pasien ke rumah sakit untuk segera mendapatkan bantuan," katanya.Keluarga harus segera membawa mereka ke rumah sakit, kata Yuda.Pernyataan serupa juga disampaikan oleh ahli jantung dari Rumah Sakit Harapan Kita, DR.Siska S. Danny, SPJP.Dia menjelaskan bahwa penyebab stroke berasal dari dua hal, yaitu pendarahan di otak atau penyumbatan pembuluh darah otak, sehingga terapi harus didasarkan pada penyebabnya.Tusukan jari menggunakan jarum bukanlah salah satu cara yang disarankan.Terapi penyumbatan stroke adalah obat pengencer darah.Dan sebaliknya sapuan pendarahan tidak boleh diberikan pengencer darah.Tindakan pertama yang harus diambil untuk pasien yang diduga mengalami stroke harus dibawa ke rumah sakit dan mengkonfirmasi jenis stroke.Jadi tidak ada tempat untuk menusuk jari, katanya dalam email.Beberapa tanda yang dapat dikenali termasuk sakit kepala mendadak yang tiba -tiba, kelemahan, mati rasa, masalah penglihatan, kebingungan, kesulitan berjalan atau berbicara, pusing dan pidato yang tidak jelas.Pakar kesehatan setuju bahwa stroke dapat dicegah, salah satunya dengan mengadopsi gaya hidup sehat.Seperti yang dilaporkan oleh Medical Daily setidaknya ada sejumlah cara yang dapat Anda lakukan untuk menghilangkan stroke.Pertama, berhenti merokok.Selain stroke, merokok juga dikaitkan dengan sejumlah masalah kesehatan seperti kanker, penyakit jantung dan lainnya.Kebiasaan ini dapat meningkatkan trigliserida dalam darah, kadar kolesterol baik (HDL) yang lebih rendah, merusak lapisan aliran darah dan memblokir aliran darah.Kedua, berolahraga secara teratur.Sebuah studi menemukan bahwa berjalan dua jam per hari dapat mengurangi risiko wanita menderita stroke sekitar 50 persen.Selain itu, menjadi aktif dalam aktivitas fisik dapat meningkatkan kesehatan kardiovaskular dan menurunkan tekanan darah - keduanya terkait erat dengan risiko stroke.Ketiga, pertahankan berat badan.Sehat karena dikaitkan dengan risiko diabetes, penyakit jantung dan stroke.Karena itu, pertahankan berat badan ideal Anda.Selain itu, makan makanan sehat dan menjaga diri Anda santai juga merupakan upaya lain untuk menghilangkan risiko stroke.Selain itu, makan makanan sehat dan menjaga diri Anda santai juga merupakan upaya lain untuk menyingkirkannya.-Memosikan risiko mengalami stroke

berita: Candy in the form supervisory of milk teats or hard candy suspected of containing narcotics has been tested by the Surabaya City Food and Drug Supervisory Agency (BBPOM) laboratory. The result, the candy is negative for narcotics. The Acting BBPOM for the City of Surabaya, Retno Kurpaningsih, said there were 16 items tested to determine the presence or absence of addictive substances. The results are all negative. "We tested whether there was amphetamine and methamphetamine content," he said, in Surabaya, Thursday, March 9 2017. To the public, Retno said that the hard candy money that was raided by the Satpol PP on Monday, March 7 2017 was not dangerous. BBPOM Friday, March 10 will submit the results of this laboratory test to the Surabaya City Health Office as an applicant for laboratory tests. It was also informed that there were students who after consuming hard candy experienced coughing and hoarseness in their throats. However, Retno still does not know about the new findings. "I don't know yet. Meanwhile, what we do know is that one student felt dizzy after consuming it. We will investigate again later," he said. Retno promised to investigate again and to carry out laboratory tests even though there were samples that had been tested. Unfortunately, Retno has not announced what will be investigated next. Satpol PP raided milk candy or hard candy around elementary and kindergarten in 14 sub-districts in the city of Surabaya. The confiscation step was taken after the officer found one elementary school student who felt dizzy after consuming hard candy.
berita_id: Permen dalam bentuk pengawasan dot susu atau permen keras yang diduga mengandung narkotika telah diuji oleh Laboratorium Badan Pengawas Pangan dan Pengawas Obat -obatan (BBPOM).Hasilnya, permen negatif untuk narkotika.Penjabat BBPOM untuk Kota Surabaya, Retno Kurpaningsih, mengatakan ada 16 item yang diuji untuk menentukan ada atau tidak adanya zat adiktif.Hasilnya semuanya negatif."Kami menguji apakah ada kandungan amfetamin dan metamfetamin," katanya, di Surabaya, Kamis, 9 Maret 2017. Kepada publik, Retno mengatakan bahwa uang permen keras yang digerebek oleh Satpol PP pada hari Senin, 7 Maret 2017 tidak berbahaya.BBPOM Jumat, 10 Maret akan menyerahkan hasil tes laboratorium ini ke Kantor Kesehatan Kota Surabaya sebagai pelamar untuk tes laboratorium.Juga diberitahu bahwa ada siswa yang setelah mengkonsumsi permen keras mengalami batuk dan serak di tenggorokan mereka.Namun, Retno masih belum tahu tentang temuan baru."Saya belum tahu. Sementara itu, yang kami tahu adalah bahwa seorang siswa merasa pusing setelah mengkonsumsinya. Kami akan menyelidiki lagi nanti," katanya.Retno berjanji untuk menyelidiki lagi dan melakukan tes laboratorium meskipun ada sampel yang telah diuji.Sayangnya, Retno belum mengumumkan apa yang akan diselidiki selanjutnya.Satpol PP menggerebek permen susu atau permen keras di sekitar dasar dan taman kanak-kanak di 14 sub-distrik di kota Surabaya.Langkah penyitaan diambil setelah petugas menemukan seorang siswa sekolah dasar yang merasa pusing setelah mengkonsumsi permen keras.

berita: Thousands of Masses who will take part in the 212 Action, from various areas are detained in front of the courtyard Central Jakarta Istiqlal Mosque. Our monitoring Tuesday at 04.00. Wib seen dozens of parked inter-city buses on the edge of the bull field in front of the Istiqlal mosque fence that lowers thousands of participants of Action 212 felt strange because they were not allowed to enter the mosque even though they will perform the dawn prayer. One of the participants of Action 212 from Madura named Solihin, we had an interview " We all here as Muslims feel intimidated, prohibited from worshiping in the mosque subtly with the lock on the gate of the mosque, the mosque is the house of Allah so we are As a devout Muslim, you must carry out worship, try to think about the mosque in Indonesia In empty we have to pray in front of the gate, it doesn't make sense," said Solihin to us in a high pitched voice. The 212 Islamic Defense Action Volume 2 will be held at the dawn prayer, estimated at around 50,000 masses or even more. Polda Metro Jaya has given permission for the 212 Action boundary today starting at 07.00 until 18.00.Wib, thousands of Police and TNI personnel were deployed to secure this action.
berita_id: Ribuan massa yang akan mengambil bagian dalam aksi 212, dari berbagai daerah ditahan di depan masjid Jakarta Istiqlal pusat halaman.Pemantauan kami Selasa pukul 04.00.WIB melihat lusinan bus antar-kota yang diparkir di tepi lapangan banteng di depan pagar masjid Istiqlal yang menurunkan ribuan peserta aksi 212 terasa aneh karena mereka tidak diizinkan memasuki masjid meskipun mereka akan melakukan doa fajar.One of the participants of Action 212 from Madura named Solihin, we had an interview " We all here as Muslims feel intimidated, prohibited from worshiping in the mosque subtly with the lock on the gate of the mosque, the mosque is the house of Allah so we are As a devout Muslim, you must carry out worship, try to think about the mosque in Indonesia In empty we have to pray in front of the gate, it doesn't make sense,"kata Solihin kepada kami dengan suara bernada tinggi.212 Volume Aksi Pertahanan Islam 2 akan diadakan di Dawn Prayer, diperkirakan sekitar 50.000 massa atau bahkan lebih.Polda Metro Jaya telah memberikan izin untuk batas aksi 212 hari ini mulai pukul 07.00 hingga 18.00.Wib, ribuan polisi dan personel TNI dikerahkan untuk mengamankan tindakan ini.

berita: In various countries, including Indonesia, the mobile game Pokemon Go continues to be bombarded with negative issues and news. Recently, the mobile game by Niantic was even declared an illegal game by the government of Saudi Arabia. However, it turns out that the haram fatwa on Pokemon Go that has been reported by the media today is a hoax. The Saudi Arabian government has denied that they have banned Pokemon Go. Pokemon Go Haram Fatwa in Saudi Arabia Turns Hoax! Abdulmohsen Alyas as the representative of the Ministry of Arab Culture and Information has confirmed that there is no haram fatwa from senior scholars related to the Pokemon Go game. The Saudi Arabian government is even currently urging international media to re-verify the news to the relevant ministries. As reported by Indogamers from the CNN page (22/7/2016). News about the illegal fatwa for the Pokemon Go game circulated on various websites including Reuters. Although it does not directly refer to the Pokemon Go game, the news states tidings that the concept of characters in Pokemon is based on Charles Darwin's theory of evolution, which is contrary to the teachings of Islam. The fatwa also states that the cards in the game contain religious symbols and deviant organizations such as Freemasonry, Zionists, Shintoism, and many others. Before the hoax issue regarding Pokemon Go's haram fatwa in Saudi Arabia, there was also news that was no less excited which said that Pokemon means "I am Jewish" in Syriac. Not only that, various characters in Pokemon are also said to have negative meanings such as Pikachu which means "Be Jewish", Charmander which means "God is Weak", and many others. Well, what do you think about the issues that hit this Pokemon Go game?
berita_id: Di berbagai negara, termasuk Indonesia, game mobile Pokemon Go terus dibombardir dengan masalah dan berita negatif.Baru -baru ini, permainan mobile oleh Niantic bahkan dinyatakan sebagai permainan ilegal oleh pemerintah Arab Saudi.Namun, ternyata Haram Fatwa di Pokemon Go yang telah dilaporkan oleh media hari ini adalah tipuan.Pemerintah Arab Saudi telah membantah bahwa mereka telah melarang Pokemon Go.Pokemon Go Haram Fatwa di Arab Saudi berubah menjadi tipuan!Abdulmohsen Alyas sebagai perwakilan dari Kementerian Budaya dan Informasi Arab telah mengkonfirmasi bahwa tidak ada Haram Fatwa dari para sarjana senior yang terkait dengan permainan Pokemon Go.Pemerintah Arab Saudi bahkan saat ini mendesak media internasional untuk memverifikasi kembali berita tersebut kepada kementerian yang relevan.Seperti yang dilaporkan oleh Indogamers dari halaman CNN (22/7/2016).Berita tentang fatwa ilegal untuk game Pokemon Go yang diedarkan di berbagai situs web termasuk Reuters.Meskipun tidak secara langsung merujuk pada permainan Pokemon Go, berita menyatakan bahwa konsep karakter di Pokemon didasarkan pada teori evolusi Charles Darwin, yang bertentangan dengan ajaran Islam.Fatwa juga menyatakan bahwa kartu -kartu dalam permainan berisi simbol -simbol agama dan organisasi yang menyimpang seperti Freemasonry, Zionis, Shintoisme, dan banyak lainnya.Sebelum masalah tipuan tentang Haram Fatwa dari Pokemon Go di Arab Saudi, ada juga berita yang tidak kalah bersemangat yang mengatakan bahwa Pokemon berarti "Saya Yahudi" di Syria.Tidak hanya itu, berbagai karakter di Pokemon juga dikatakan memiliki makna negatif seperti Pikachu yang berarti "menjadi Yahudi", Charmander yang berarti "Tuhan itu lemah", dan banyak lainnya.Nah, apa pendapat Anda tentang masalah yang menghantam game Pokemon Go ini?

berita: In 2012 we were shocked by the emergence of brushes or brushes made from pig bristles to the point that the MUI issued a fatwa against using a pig bristle brush, but recently, information about toothbrushes made from pig bristles has resurfaced. Information for you Muslims to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use materials from non-halal. Come on, check the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains pig bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair aka Pig Fur! So double check the packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), it usually says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". “What are your toothbrush bristles made of? Plastic or Pig Hair? How to check: Look at the package, if it's made of bristles, then it's made of sea urchin. Please burn the bristles, if it smells like burning hair, it means it's from sea urchins. But if it melts and becomes hard, it means it is made of plastic and is safe to use. The risk of using what is haram: Worship is rejected, prayer is rejected, and hell is more worthy (hadith). Save ourselves and our loved ones. " In everyday life, we use various kinds of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint the house, grease cake pans, and spread food. Such as grilled chicken, bread, cakes, and various grilled or grilled meats and seafood. While the brush is useful when combing hair, cleaning hair at the salon or barbershop, washing clothes, and scrubbing floors. Do you know what the brushes & brushes you are using come from? Most likely From Sea urchins! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, generally come from China. These imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly Haram. No matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption and for application. (the term is PIG/BOAR/HOG/BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places, such as Markets, Painting Supplies Stores, Building Materials Stores, Make Up & Salon Tools Stores, Online Stores, etc. Are you familiar with the various shapes below? There are painting brushes, wall paint brushes, make up brushes, hair brushes, barber/barber brushes, clothes brushes, etc. Beware! Tips to Avoid Using Pig Bristle Brushes and Brushes: 1. Use 100% Synthetic Brushes & Brushes, Such As Nylon. Wall paint brushes and food brushes are available, with slightly more expensive prices. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. 2. Use Alternatives Other Than Brushes. For example, Roller Paint for Painting, Sponges & Cotton Buds For Makeup, And Knives & Spatula For Smearing Food. 3. Beware of Foods That Process Cooking And Cleaning The Tools exist Using A Pig Brush. 4. Characteristics of Pork Bristle Brush, When Burned Will Cause A Distinctive Odor Like Roasted Meat. 5. Usually Pig Bristle Brushes Are Sold In White & Black. However, Manufacturers Can Process Pig Hair By Bleaching And Coloring It, So It Looks Like Other Animal Hair. (and) Share this info with your family and friends so that more people can read it so you can avoid products that are not halal…hopefully it will be useful…
berita_id: Pada 2012 kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi hingga MUI mengeluarkan fatwa untuk tidak menggunakan sikat bulu babi, tetapi baru -baru ini, informasi tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah muncul kembali.Informasi untuk Anda Muslim untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan dari non-halal.Ayo, periksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi alias bulu babi!Jadi periksa kembali kemasan sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), biasanya mengatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% China Bristle".Terbuat dari bulu sikat gigi?Layak (Hadis).Selamatkan diri kita dan orang yang kita cintai. "Seperti ayam panggang, roti, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Sementara sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian, dan menggosok lantai.Tahukah Anda dari apa kuas & kuas yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar dari landak laut!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia, umumnya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor ini diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Bagi umat Islam, penggunaan landak laut jelas haram.Tidak peduli seberapa kecil, materi dari daging babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan untuk aplikasi.(Istilah ini adalah sikat rambut babi/babi/babi/bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat, seperti pasar, toko persediaan lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, toko alat make up & salon, toko online, dll. Apakah Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk di bawah ini?Ada kuas lukisan, kuas cat dinding, kuas make up, sikat rambut, kuas tukang cukur/tukang cukur, sikat pakaian, dll. Waspadalah!Tips yang harus dihindari menggunakan sikat bulu babi dan kuas: 1. Gunakan sikat & sikat sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Sikat cat dinding dan kuas makanan tersedia, dengan harga yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.2. Gunakan alternatif selain kuas.Misalnya, cat roller untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk makeup, dan pisau & spatula untuk mengolesi makanan.3. Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang memproses memasak dan membersihkan alat yang ada menggunakan sikat babi.4. Karakteristik sikat bulu babi, ketika dibakar akan menyebabkan bau khas seperti daging panggang.5. Biasanya sikat bulu babi dijual putih & hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses rambut babi dengan memutihkan dan mewarnai, jadi itu terlihat seperti rambut hewan lainnya.(dan) Bagikan info ini dengan keluarga dan teman Anda sehingga lebih banyak orang dapat membacanya sehingga Anda dapat menghindari produk yang tidak halal ... semoga akan berguna ...

berita: Barong Reog Ponorogo and Hisan Naga on gamelan are burned at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. The arson incident reportedly occurred on October 20 last. The information circulated among journalists from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemlu). "The Ministry of Foreign Affairs has contacted the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao and it is being handled according to procedures," said Public Relations staff of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Opi Sudarma to reporters when asked about the truth of the news, Friday (30/10). This news is very surprising considering that the object is Indonesian culture. Even neighboring countries, Malaysia claim it as their culture. Reportedly, the reason for the burning was related fri to idols and demons. It is not clear whether the perpetrators are Indonesian Nationals (WNI) or Filipinos.
berita_id: Barong Reog Ponorogo dan Hisan Naga di Gamelan dibakar di Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Insiden pembakaran dilaporkan terjadi pada 20 Oktober lalu.Informasi yang diedarkan di antara jurnalis dari Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemlu)."Kementerian Luar Negeri telah menghubungi Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao dan sedang ditangani sesuai dengan prosedur," kata staf Hubungan Masyarakat dari Kementerian Luar Negeri, OPI Sudarma kepada wartawan ketika ditanya tentang kebenaran berita, Jumat (30/10).Berita ini sangat mengejutkan mengingat objeknya adalah budaya Indonesia.Bahkan negara -negara tetangga, Malaysia mengklaimnya sebagai budaya mereka.Dilaporkan, alasan pembakaran adalah Jumat terkait dengan idola dan setan.Tidak jelas apakah pelaku adalah warga negara Indonesia (WNI) atau orang Filipina.

berita: Trending News – Who among you doesn't play Pokemon GO? This Nintendo game has managed to make every human being lower their head and focus their eyes on the smartphone they are holding while playing Pokemon GO. The Pokemon GO game does present a different experience and sensation compared to games that have existed before, so it's no wonder that this game is much loved even though it has not yet reached one month. Controversy regarding Pokemon GO is growing, especially in our own homeland, Indonesia. Yes, in this country, various controversies have occurred due to the presence of Pokemon GO in the world of mobile games. Not only civilians who spoke, even the vice president of Indonesia also voiced his opinion about Pokemon GO. In addition, recently there was news about the 'ban' Pokemon GO by MUI Indramayu. Curious? Is Pokemon GO Really Banned? The Indonesian Ulema Council or abbreviated as MUI is a non-governmental organization that accommodates ulama, zu'ama and Islamic scholars to guide Muslims in Indonesia. Well, it is reported that the MUI Indramayu, West Java Regency, has issued a fatwa that the Pokemon GO game is illegal. Wow, why is that so? Why is the Pokemon GO game banned? That's right, the MUI Indramayu has banned the Pokemon GO game. The reason is, playing Pokemon GO can indeed make you hypnotized. What does hypnotized mean? Yes, you can unknowingly trespass and break through a number of places just to look for Pokemon. Therefore, this is the reference for MUI Indramayu to forbid Pokemon GO. According to the deputy chairman of the MUI Indramayu, Sofyan Tsauri explained, "So the game is likened to a person who is drunk with alcohol so that he forgets his work and obligations." In addition, he also emphasized that it is not allowed to play Pokemon GO, even the game is forbidden. Because there have been many negative impacts, such as wasting time looking for Pokemon, even though there are many things that are more useful than hunting Pokemon. Sofyan gave a clear example, namely due to the Pokemon GO game, students are not studying and employees are not working even if they neglect to worship. Not only that, he also reiterated, "Allah SWT forbids wine because it is intoxicating like the Pokemon Go game, in the word of God in the letter Al Maidah verse 90 which reads, 'O you who believe, actually drinking wine (drunk) is an act of the devil'. ." It means, it can be concluded that according to Sofyan, playing Pokemon GO is an act of the devil, because the impact can be intoxicating. Some Say Pokemon Means "I'm Jewish", Really? Hearing the word Pokemon, right now your mindset will definitely run to the Pokemon GO game. Well, if you don't know, it turns out that there are rumors that reveal that the meaning of the word Pokemon is "I'm Jewish". This is interpreted through the Syriac language, or Syriac language which if translated will have such meaning. Wow, this can be proof that Pokemon GO is haram, right? There have been many incidents from Pokemon GO that ended up endangering lives Pokemon GO is a very popular game. However, because of the presence of Pokemon GO, many people are less aware of the surrounding situations and conditions. What is the impact? As previously discussed, the writer from JalanTikus himself had an unpleasant experience as a result of playing Pokemon GO, because the smartphone he used wanted to be snatched. The government is ready to block Pokemon GO if it proves to be unsafe A few days earlier, there was news that if it proved dangerous, the Pokemon GO game was ready to be blocked by the Ministry of Communication and Information The reason is, judging from standstill the fatwa of the MUI Indramayu and the events that have happened, it is possible that the government will actually block Pokemon GO from Indonesia. Things like this further support the banning of the game Pokemon GO. So, Playing Pokemon GO is Satanic and Haram? Actually, it depends on how you play Pokemon GO. According to the MUI Indramayu, they forbid it because Pokemon GO players neglect their duties and even forget to pray. In fact, if you can manage the time, you can finish your task first before playing Pokemon GO, complete your worship obligations first before playing Pokemon GO, maybe it won't be a problem. Thus, the government will not block access to Pokemon GO from Indonesia. In addition, Pokemon itself actually stands for Pocket Monsters which comes from Japanese ???????????? Poketto Monsuta. Then, Pokemon also refers to 721 fictional species that must appear in all Pokemon series. Therefore, there seems to be a misunderstanding in the meaning of the Syriac language. If it's true that Pokemon GO means "I'm Jewish" and should be left behind, will you also leave social media Facebook which in fact was created by Jews?
berita_id: Berita Trending - Siapa di antara Anda yang tidak bermain Pokemon Go?Game Nintendo ini telah berhasil membuat setiap manusia menundukkan kepala dan memfokuskan mata mereka pada smartphone yang mereka pegang saat bermain Pokemon Go.Game Pokemon Go memang menghadirkan pengalaman dan sensasi yang berbeda dibandingkan dengan game yang telah ada sebelumnya, jadi tidak heran bahwa game ini sangat dicintai meskipun belum mencapai satu bulan.Kontroversi tentang Pokemon Go sedang tumbuh, terutama di tanah air kita sendiri, Indonesia.Ya, di negara ini, berbagai kontroversi telah terjadi karena kehadiran Pokemon Go di dunia game mobile.Tidak hanya warga sipil yang berbicara, bahkan wakil presiden Indonesia juga menyuarakan pendapatnya tentang Pokemon Go.Selain itu, baru -baru ini ada berita tentang 'larangan' Pokemon Go oleh Mui Indramayu.Penasaran?Apakah Pokemon benar -benar dilarang?Dewan Ulama Indonesia atau disingkat sebagai MUI adalah organisasi non-pemerintah yang mengakomodasi ulama, Zu'ama dan para sarjana Islam untuk membimbing Muslim di Indonesia.Nah, dilaporkan bahwa MUI Indramayu, Kabupaten Java Barat, telah mengeluarkan fatwa bahwa permainan Pokemon Go adalah ilegal.Wow, kenapa begitu?Mengapa game Pokemon Go dilarang?Itu benar, MUI Indramayu telah melarang permainan Pokemon Go.Alasannya adalah, bermain Pokemon Go memang bisa membuat Anda terhipnotis.Apa arti dihipnotis?Ya, Anda dapat tanpa sadar melanggar dan menerobos sejumlah tempat hanya untuk mencari Pokemon.Oleh karena itu, ini adalah referensi untuk MUI Indramayu untuk melarang Pokemon Go.Menurut wakil ketua MUI Indramayu, Sofyan Tsauri menjelaskan, "Jadi permainan itu disamakan dengan seseorang yang mabuk dengan alkohol sehingga ia lupa pekerjaan dan kewajibannya."Selain itu, ia juga menekankan bahwa itu tidak diizinkan untuk bermain Pokemon Go, bahkan permainan dilarang.Karena ada banyak dampak negatif, seperti membuang -buang waktu mencari Pokemon, meskipun ada banyak hal yang lebih berguna daripada berburu Pokemon.Sofyan memberi contoh yang jelas, yaitu karena permainan Pokemon Go, siswa tidak belajar dan karyawan tidak bekerja bahkan jika mereka lalai untuk beribadah.Tidak hanya itu, ia juga menegaskan kembali, "Allah SWT melarang anggur karena memabukkan seperti permainan Pokemon Go, dalam firman Tuhan dalam huruf Al Maidah ayat 90 yang berbunyi, 'O Anda yang percaya, benar -benar minum anggur (mabuk) adalah tindakan iblis' ..."Artinya, dapat disimpulkan bahwa menurut Sofyan, bermain Pokemon Go adalah tindakan iblis, karena dampaknya bisa memabukkan.Ada yang bilang pokemon berarti "Aku orang Yahudi", sungguh?Mendengar kata Pokemon, sekarang pola pikir Anda pasti akan berjalan ke game Pokemon Go.Nah, jika Anda tidak tahu, ternyata ada desas -desus yang mengungkapkan bahwa arti kata Pokemon adalah "I'm Jewish".Ini ditafsirkan melalui bahasa Syria, atau bahasa Syria yang jika diterjemahkan akan memiliki makna seperti itu.Wow, ini bisa menjadi bukti bahwa Pokemon Go adalah Haram, kan?Ada banyak insiden dari Pokemon Go yang akhirnya membahayakan kehidupan Pokemon Go adalah permainan yang sangat populer.Namun, karena adanya Pokemon GO, banyak orang kurang sadar akan situasi dan kondisi di sekitarnya.Apa dampaknya?Seperti yang dibahas sebelumnya, penulis dari Jalankus sendiri memiliki pengalaman yang tidak menyenangkan sebagai hasil dari bermain Pokemon Go, karena smartphone yang ia gunakan ingin disambar.Pemerintah siap untuk memblokir Pokemon Go jika terbukti tidak aman beberapa hari sebelumnya, ada berita bahwa jika terbukti berbahaya, permainan Pokemon Go siap untuk diblokir oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi Alasannya adalah, menilai dari penghentian pemerintah MUI Indramayu dan peristiwa yang telah terjadi, dimungkinkan bahwa pemerintah akan benar -benar akan memblokir Pokon GO.Hal -hal seperti ini lebih lanjut mendukung pelarangan game Pokemon Go.Jadi, bermain pokemon go adalah setan dan haram?Sebenarnya, itu tergantung pada bagaimana Anda bermain Pokemon Go.Menurut MUI Indramayu, mereka melarangnya karena pemain Pokemon Go mengabaikan tugas mereka dan bahkan lupa untuk berdoa.Bahkan, jika Anda dapat mengatur waktu, Anda dapat menyelesaikan tugas Anda terlebih dahulu sebelum bermain Pokemon Go, selesaikan kewajiban ibadah Anda terlebih dahulu sebelum bermain Pokemon Go, mungkin itu tidak akan menjadi masalah.Dengan demikian, pemerintah tidak akan memblokir akses ke Pokemon pergi dari Indonesia.Selain itu, Pokemon itu sendiri benar -benar singkatan dari monster saku yang berasal dari bahasa Jepang ????????????Poketto Monsuta.Kemudian, Pokemon juga mengacu pada 721 spesies fiksi yang harus muncul di semua seri Pokemon.Karena itu, tampaknya ada kesalahpahaman dalam arti bahasa Syria.Jika benar bahwa Pokemon Go berarti "Saya orang Yahudi" dan harus ditinggalkan, apakah Anda juga akan meninggalkan Facebook media sosial yang sebenarnya dibuat oleh orang Yahudi?

berita: The fever of the game "Pokemon Go" has spread to all corners of the world. Indonesia is no exception, this game really distracts almost everyone. There are also those who have to be willing to stop their work for the sake of this one game. The game "Pokemon Go" developed by Nintendo, Pokemon Corps and Niantic Labs has claimed many victims. Some even had accidents because of this game. Pokemon GO has not been officially released in Indonesia, but this game is very loved by people from children to adults even to the point of causing addiction. All gamers' eyes are fixed on the screen of their smart phone regardless of the surrounding conditions and even tend to endanger themselves, not a few become victims of this game there was an accident plunged into the sea and then drowned and some fell from a height to death and some were trapped in underground caves and not a few were caught going into other people's residential areas and their military agencies were caught, this is all because to follow the ambition of hunting down the pokemon monster figures they want. The word Pokemon in English is an abbreviation of two words, namely the word (Poke) which is an abbreviation of the word (Pocket), which means pocket or pocket. And the word (Mon) which stands for the word (Monster), means Monster. So it means pocket monster. The point is an expression of how small these monsters are to fit in a pocket. The name Pikachu, who is a famous character in this cartoon, is also formed from two words (Pika) in Japanese which show the meaning of shining. While the word (Chu) is an expression of the sounds that come out of the mouth of a mouse. Why is it called Pikachu? Because (this character) is shaped like a mouse armed with an electric shock. The words (Charmander) show the meaning: a burning fire. Taken from the English word (Char). While the word (Amander) is a word that gives a signal to an animal such as a lizard that resembles a burning fire. This information was mentioned by the Japanese Cultural Attaché in Jordan; Kuji Taharo, as written by the Jordanian newspaper ar-Rayu in its 4/4/2001 edition. From this description, it appears that people are mistaken in assuming that the meaning of Pokemon according to the Syriac language is "I am Jewish", or other similar meanings. Syriac is the language used by some Syrians, although it is not an official language, Syrians usually use this language for daily communication as a second language after Arabic. The New York Times magazine in its March 26, 2001 issue stated the statement of a spokesman for this cartoon producer in Tokyo whose identity was withheld: "That he denies that the company uses religious symbols in its products". The Jordanian newspaper "ad-Dustur" Monday edition 8 Muharam 1422 H. also mentions the statements of several Syriac linguists at Yarmuk University, as well as the statement of the Syrian Social Institute in Jordan, that the words Pokemon, Pikachu and other names in Pokemon cartoons, absolutely nothing to do with Syriac, even the names are foreign to Syriac. The same thing is also believed that the names are in Japanese. Similarly, the assumption that it uses Hebrew. ORIGIN OF POKEMON The Pokemon cartoon doll came from the idea of ​​a Japanese boy named Satushi Tajiri. He is a person who likes to collect insects. Then he fantasized that the world would be invaded by these insects and by strange animals from outer space in great numbers and later discovered by humans. Continue in turn these animals develop and improve to be more perfect with the release of new limbs. Then a giant Japanese company called Nintendo adopted the idea by producing electronic toys and developing them into (cartoon) small, pocket-sized monsters that (according to their idea of ​​a pen) had magical powers to fight. Then these toys spread significantly in the late nineties to dominate all corners of the world in the form of electronic toys, cartoons, live films, comics, story journals and (even up) on websites. Internet. POKEMON GAME It's been spread among children, pocket games, especially with Pokemon characters. This game takes place using certain rules and guidelines, which from there form various kinds of games. Some of them are complicated because they use dice as well as pictorial tools and certain tables. This game takes time to learn. It is based on the principle of collecting pictures of small monsters (terrible animals), then training them in fighting and fighting techniques. Each monster (considered) has certain strengths and privileges, and is divided into ten factions. The winner of the game is the person who is not only able to collect a large number of images of the monster, but also can make good use of the privileges of each image of the monster, can train it well and classify it; to be developed in his battle against the enemy. Among the games again there are easy ones, which conclude in mastering special cards that contain (pictures of) certain monsters with certain magical powers. The objective (of this game) is to gain profit by collecting as many cards as possible. Meanwhile, cards containing monsters that have more abilities and are dangerous (as opposed to the contents of their specially numbered pictures, codes and cues), are sold at a higher price. Small children compete and compete to get it. The child who wins is the one who is considered to be able to beat his opponent's card. Then he is entitled to his opponent's cards, or the opponent must redeem them with money. (Victory in the second kind of game) this happens purely by fate and chance, no skill is needed other than being able to pay the price of the card. This game (Pokemon) will never end unless God wills, because there are always renewals and developments of new monster characters and new playing fields are always created, on a large scale. THINGS THAT IS PROHIBITED IN SHARIA IN POKEMON 1. Shirk and Damaging Muslim Aqeedah There is no need to doubt that there are fictitious imaginary living creatures, let alone possessing extraordinary and miraculous features and abilities, including the most corrupted ideas (thoughts) that can poison children's minds. Even there there is propaganda for the existence of extraordinary things that match and even surpass the miracles of the prophets. This will make a child believe in this miraculous power and provide a defense against the existence of that power. All of this clearly includes the destruction of the aqidah of children who are still fitrah and straight. There, in addition, there is also an element of challenge to the power of al-Khaliq k and wanting to compete with the provisions of Allah Subhanahu wa Ta'ala. Naudzu billah. This all clearly contradicts the authentic Islamic Aqeedah and contradicts the straight educational manhaj. 2. Lying blatantly to a small child and making something harmful to him. It happens through the appearance of a fictional being who has magical abilities, but who doesn't actually exist. This will encourage and motivate children to believe such things. And that is clearly a blatant lie and is a disservice to children's minds and imaginations. Basically children's toys, that the children themselves determine (control) the toys. But that's not the case with Pokemon. In fact the opposite happened. Because (in Pokemon) it is Pokemon that determine, control and direct children. What is also worrying and even more dangerous is that toys, forever show something of culture. Pokemon also offers a culture. But it is an imaginary culture that is sweeping away children all over the world. It is a culture that is far from the nature of non-Muslim children, and far from the aqidah and culture of Muslim children. So it is a form of cultural miniature, because with the rampant Pokemon cartoons throughout the world, it will make children think with the same mindset and will play with the same form of toys. It's as if Pokemon is preparing children and then fostering realize them towards the same behaviors and values. It's a form of experimental mania that ignores a lot of other things, so you see Pokemon cartoons that can bind parents and take their children's toys out of their control. This in turn removes the barrier between Pokemon and children. And so finally these cartoons control them. 3. The False Theory of Evolution Understood through the evolutionary development of these little monsters that had this magical ability all by themselves. This is in line with Darwin's theory of kufr and vanity, which states that there is a development and improvement of creatures by themselves, and negates the involvement of al-Khaliq in that development. And this is clear disbelief.

Stroke is a condition in which the blood supply to the brain is cut off due to blockage of blood vessels. This condition can cause the death of cells in the brain. That is why stroke sufferers cannot move their body members when they have a stroke. Stroke is a serious disease, if not treated immediately can cause death. In the past, stroke only attacked the elderly, but now even young people can have a stroke. There are many burdens that have to be faced by stroke sufferers, ranging from physical, mental or financial limitations. This can make stroke sufferers decrease their enthusiasm for life. So heavy that must be lived by stroke patients. first aid for stroke sufferers How to save a stroke by a needle There is a unique and powerful way to deal with a stroke by using a needle. Needles are not only for sewing, but help overcome several diseases including stroke. You must have known that now there are many methods of curing diseases using needles called acupuncture. This method of first aid for stroke attacks with needles was introduced by a Professor from China. You can apply a needle to a stroke patient before being taken to the hospital. This is to make the patient better and prevent the symptoms of stroke from getting worse. When you are faced with someone who is having a stroke, don't panic. Do not lift or move the stroke patient from their position. Just take advantage of the needle, it can be a sewing needle, a safety pin or a syringe which is an important needle. employ However, make sure the needle is completely sterile or burn it before using it on stroke sufferers. Take a sterile needle and insert it into 10 fingers of a stroke patient. Prick into the patient's finger slowly, not too deep. Make sure the blood flows from the finger you pricked. If it doesn't bleed, press firmly until it bleeds out. After all the fingers are bleeding, wait a few minutes. After that, the patient should immediately regain consciousness. If the mouth of the sufferer has a sideways stroke or is oozing, you must massage the ear until it turns red. Then. Pierce the ear in the soft part of the skin with a needle until the blood comes out. Do this on both ears of the patient. Wait a few minutes, then the patient's mouth returns to normal. After the patient returns to normal, check his body for abnormalities or not. Take the stroke patient to the hospital for further examination and treatment. This method is proven to be effective in providing first aid to stroke sufferers when experiencing a stroke. With the discovery of this method, many people can be saved from sudden strokes. So, we are no longer confused when we meet people who have had a stroke. Do the treatment as above, don't hesitate and steady your heart to help stroke sufferers.
berita_id: Stroke adalah kondisi di mana suplai darah ke otak terputus karena penyumbatan pembuluh darah.Kondisi ini dapat menyebabkan kematian sel di otak.Itulah sebabnya penderita stroke tidak dapat menggerakkan anggota tubuh mereka ketika mereka mengalami stroke.Stroke adalah penyakit serius, jika tidak diobati segera dapat menyebabkan kematian.Di masa lalu, stroke hanya menyerang orang tua, tetapi sekarang bahkan orang muda dapat mengalami stroke.Ada banyak beban yang harus dihadapi oleh penderita stroke, mulai dari keterbatasan fisik, mental atau keuangan.Ini dapat membuat penderita stroke mengurangi antusiasme mereka untuk hidup.Begitu berat yang harus dijalani oleh pasien stroke.Pertolongan pertama untuk penderita stroke bagaimana menghemat stroke dengan jarum ada cara yang unik dan kuat untuk menangani stroke dengan menggunakan jarum.Jarum tidak hanya untuk menjahit, tetapi membantu mengatasi beberapa penyakit termasuk stroke.Anda pasti tahu bahwa sekarang ada banyak metode menyembuhkan penyakit menggunakan jarum yang disebut akupunktur.Metode pertolongan pertama untuk serangan stroke dengan jarum ini diperkenalkan oleh seorang profesor dari Cina.Anda dapat menggunakan jarum ke pasien stroke sebelum dibawa ke rumah sakit.Ini untuk membuat pasien lebih baik dan mencegah gejala stroke menjadi lebih buruk.Ketika Anda dihadapkan pada seseorang yang mengalami stroke, jangan panik.Jangan mengangkat atau memindahkan pasien stroke dari posisi mereka.Manfaatkan saja jarum, itu bisa menjadi jarum jahit, pin pengaman atau jarum suntik yang merupakan jarum penting.Namun mempekerjakan, pastikan jarum benar -benar steril atau bakar sebelum menggunakannya pada penderita stroke.Ambil jarum steril dan masukkan ke dalam 10 jari pasien stroke.Tusuk ke jari pasien perlahan, tidak terlalu dalam.Pastikan darah mengalir dari jari yang Anda tusuk.Jika tidak berdarah, tekan dengan kuat sampai keluar.Setelah semua jari berdarah, tunggu beberapa menit.Setelah itu, pasien harus segera mendapatkan kembali kesadaran.Jika mulut penderita memiliki stroke menyamping atau mengalir, Anda harus memijat telinga sampai berubah merah.Kemudian.Tusuk telinga di bagian lembut kulit dengan jarum sampai darah keluar.Lakukan ini di kedua telinga pasien.Tunggu beberapa menit, lalu mulut pasien kembali normal.Setelah pasien kembali normal, periksa tubuhnya untuk kelainan atau tidak.Bawa pasien stroke ke rumah sakit untuk pemeriksaan dan perawatan lebih lanjut.Metode ini terbukti efektif dalam memberikan pertolongan pertama untuk penderita stroke ketika mengalami stroke.Dengan penemuan metode ini, banyak orang dapat diselamatkan dari pukulan mendadak.Jadi, kami tidak lagi bingung ketika kami bertemu orang -orang yang mengalami stroke.Lakukan perawatan seperti di atas, jangan ragu -ragu dan stabil jantung Anda untuk membantu penderita stroke.

berita: This one news may be very useful for consumers who intend to buy the iPhone 6 Plus when it is released in the Indonesian market. After a few days of being released in a number of countries, Apple's new smartphone 5.5-inch jumbo sail that began to reap protests from users. According to reports by some iPhone 6 Plus users, The biggest screen iPhone turns out to be easy to bend when stored for too long in the trouser pocket. This incident was first reported by an owner The iPhone 6 is named Hanzon on the MacRumors forum site. He claimed to keep the iPhone 6 Plus in a trouser pocket for approximately 4 hours, and perform daily activities as usual. When taken out, Hanzon was surprised when he saw the middle His iPhone 6 Plus is slightly 'bent', aka curved. Not only Hanzon, another user named Devin Pitcher also boundary expressed a similar complaint on the forum. Devin claims to keep the new iPhone 6 Plus his in his front trouser pocket. When removed, even the middle of the iPhone 6 Plus bent like a tank can withstand the pressure. The use of a large 5.5-inch screen is indeed feared to interfere with user comfort. However, the problem of large dimensions limits the user's comfort when storing it in the pocket pants seems unthinkable to Apple. In addition, Apple is also considered to have mistakes by choosing a metal-aluminum mixture that is not too solid as a material iPhone 6 Plus frame base material. Maybe the Iphone Frame has not passed the UTM (Universal Testing Machine) Test. UTM Test serves to test the framework of the iPhone 6 plus by pressing and pulling to the maximum limit. If the force needed to bend the iPhone is small, it means it is easy to bend
berita_id: Berita yang satu ini mungkin sangat berguna bagi konsumen yang berniat membeli iPhone 6 Plus ketika dirilis di pasar Indonesia.Setelah beberapa hari dirilis di sejumlah negara, smartphone baru Smartphone 5,5 inci berlayar Jumbo yang mulai menuai protes dari pengguna.Menurut laporan oleh beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone layar terbesar ternyata mudah ditekuk saat disimpan terlalu lama di saku celana.Insiden ini pertama kali dilaporkan oleh pemilik iPhone 6 bernama Hanzon di situs Forum MacRumors.Dia mengaku menyimpan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana selama sekitar 4 jam, dan melakukan kegiatan sehari -hari seperti biasa.Ketika dikeluarkan, Hanzon terkejut ketika dia melihat bagian tengah iPhone 6 -nya sedikit 'bengkok', alias melengkung.Tidak hanya Hanzon, pengguna lain bernama Devin Pitcher juga Boundary menyatakan keluhan serupa di forum.Devin mengklaim menyimpan iPhone 6 baru ditambahnya di saku celana depannya.Saat dilepas, bahkan tengah iPhone 6 plus bengkok seperti tangki dapat menahan tekanan.Penggunaan layar 5,5 inci besar memang ditakuti untuk mengganggu kenyamanan pengguna.Namun, masalah dimensi besar membatasi kenyamanan pengguna saat menyimpannya di celana saku tampaknya tidak terpikirkan oleh Apple.Selain itu, Apple juga dianggap memiliki kesalahan dengan memilih campuran logam-aluminium yang tidak terlalu padat sebagai bahan bingkai bingkai iPhone 6 plus material.Mungkin bingkai iPhone belum lulus uji UTM (mesin pengujian universal).Tes UTM berfungsi untuk menguji kerangka kerja iPhone 6 Plus dengan menekan dan menarik ke batas maksimum.Jika kekuatan yang diperlukan untuk menekuk iPhone kecil, itu berarti mudah untuk menekuk

berita: For culinary connoisseurs with catfish as the basic ingredient, this news is very sad, how not, this very delicious fish is considered a source of disease. Some of mobile phone the information we received from the public stated that catfish contained 3000 cancer cells. Catfish have a high enough life ability, it is equipped with an additional breathing apparatus called a labyrinth, so that the ability to live exceeds other fish. Catfish live in dirty, muddy and dirty places, catfish also eat waste and dirt, so public opinion says that catfish causes cancer. But for now, catfish cultivation is no longer carried out in dirty and dirty places, now catfish cultivation has been carried out in clean ponds, synthetic ponds with clean water, and the supply of food for catfish is also more secure. When viewed from the way of cooking / how to process it, catfish will taste more delicious if fried, but most of the catfish sellers use cooking oil to fry catfish, they use cooking oil repeatedly. Cooking oil that is used repeatedly until it is black in color will cause cancer. Therefore, it is not only catfish that causes cancer, any food if fried using used cooking oil will cause cancer cells in the human body. So the conclusion: who thinks that catfish contains cancer cells is not true, catfish does not cause cancer cells, but how to process it using used cooking oil is what causes cancer cells in the human body.
berita_id: Untuk penikmat kuliner dengan ikan lele sebagai bahan dasar, berita ini sangat menyedihkan, bagaimana tidak, ikan yang sangat lezat ini dianggap sebagai sumber penyakit.Beberapa ponsel informasi yang kami terima dari publik menyatakan bahwa ikan lele berisi 3000 sel kanker.Lele memiliki kemampuan hidup yang cukup tinggi, dilengkapi dengan alat pernapasan tambahan yang disebut labirin, sehingga kemampuan untuk hidup melebihi ikan lain.Lele hidup di tempat -tempat kotor, berlumpur dan kotor, ikan lele juga makan limbah dan kotoran, jadi opini publik mengatakan bahwa ikan lele menyebabkan kanker.Tetapi untuk saat ini, budidaya ikan lele tidak lagi dilakukan di tempat -tempat kotor dan kotor, sekarang budidaya ikan lele telah dilakukan di kolam bersih, kolam sintetis dengan air bersih, dan pasokan makanan untuk ikan lele juga lebih aman.Jika dilihat dari cara memasak / cara memprosesnya, ikan lele akan terasa lebih lezat jika digoreng, tetapi sebagian besar penjual ikan lele menggunakan minyak goreng untuk menggoreng ikan lele, mereka menggunakan minyak goreng berulang kali.Minyak goreng yang digunakan berulang kali sampai berwarna hitam akan menyebabkan kanker.Oleh karena itu, bukan hanya ikan lele yang menyebabkan kanker, makanan apa pun jika digoreng menggunakan minyak goreng bekas akan menyebabkan sel kanker dalam tubuh manusia.Jadi kesimpulannya: siapa yang berpikir bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker tidak benar, ikan lele tidak menyebabkan sel kanker, tetapi bagaimana memprosesnya menggunakan minyak goreng bekas adalah yang menyebabkan sel kanker dalam tubuh manusia.

berita: Bitungnews – Reog Ponorogo culture is one of the cultural heritages of the Indonesian ancestors. This type of art has even been claimed seven times by neighboring countries, Malaysia, as their culture. The Indonesian people have always been reactive, protesting these claims. The incident at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao, Philippines was the opposite, if Malaysia claimed the nation's cultural arts, a number of elements in the Indonesian Consulate General actually burned Barong Reog Ponorogo, along with gamelan decorations. According to information compiled by bitungnews.com, the burning was carried out on Tuesday, October 20, 2015. The reason for the burning of Barong Reog Ponorogo, and the dragon decoration on the gamelan, is because there is a demon and it is an idol. Unfortunately, the Acting Consulate General, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, did not prevent the arson. In fact, Acting Consulate General Davao called a security guard named Santander to pour gas over the reog and 2 gamelan dragon snakes, the security guard was so surprised and surprised he said in Bisaya Tagalog: "Hadluk kaayu ko, dear kaayu ang dragon gwapo kaayu unya sunugon, kasayang sa reog pero gisugo man ko (I'm so scared, it's flying dragon a shame that the dragon is so good it keeps burning, the reog is too bad but how else can I be told)," said Santander. "When the Barong Reog and dragon gamelan decorations were burned, which are the inventory of the Indonesian Consulate General's cultural museum, none of the other Indonesian Consulate General staff knew about it," said a bitungnews.com source. "After this incident, the perpetrators were blasphemed by most of the Indonesian citizens in Davao, but the perpetrators still feel innocent because they think what they are doing is right in the eyes of God," added the source. An Indonesian citizen residing in Davao, stated that the Acting Consulate General in Davao was declared persona non grata, and asked the Indonesian government to withdraw the persons involved in the act of burning the nation's cultural heritage. Bitungnews.com tried to contact the Media and Information Service, Ministry of Foreign Affairs on 021 3813453, but until this news was published it was not picked up. And electronic messages to infomed@kemlu.go.id have not received a response either.
berita_id: Bitungnews - Budaya Reog Ponorogo adalah salah satu warisan budaya leluhur Indonesia.Jenis seni ini bahkan telah diklaim tujuh kali oleh negara -negara tetangga, Malaysia, sebagai budaya mereka.Rakyat Indonesia selalu reaktif, memprotes klaim ini.Insiden di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia di Davao, Filipina adalah sebaliknya, jika Malaysia mengklaim seni budaya negara itu, sejumlah elemen dalam konsulat Jenderal Indonesia benar -benar membakar Barong Reog Ponorogo, bersama dengan dekorasi gamelan.Menurut informasi yang disusun oleh Bitungnews.com, pembakaran dilakukan pada hari Selasa, 20 Oktober 2015. Alasan pembakaran Barong Reog Ponorogo, dan dekorasi naga di gamelan, adalah karena ada iblis dan itu adalah idola.Sayangnya, akting konsulat jenderal, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, tidak mencegah pembakaran.Faktanya, Konsulat Akting Jenderal Davao disebut penjaga keamanan bernama Santander untuk menuangkan gas di atas ular reog dan 2 gamelan naga, penjaga keamanan itu begitu terkejut dan terkejut katanya dalam bisaya tagalog: "Hadluk Kaayu, saya scasay soatu gwapo gwapo kaugon,Naga memalukan bahwa naga itu begitu baik sehingga terus membakar, reog itu terlalu buruk tetapi bagaimana lagi saya bisa diberitahu), "kata Santander."Ketika dekorasi Barong Reog dan Dragon Gamelan dibakar, yang merupakan inventaris museum budaya konsulat Jenderal Indonesia, tidak ada staf umum konsulat Indonesia lainnya yang mengetahuinya," kata sumber Bitungnews.com."Setelah kejadian ini, para pelaku dihujat oleh sebagian besar warga negara Indonesia di Davao, tetapi para pelaku masih merasa tidak bersalah karena mereka berpikir apa yang mereka lakukan adalah tepat di mata Tuhan," tambah sumber itu.Seorang warga negara Indonesia yang tinggal di Davao, menyatakan bahwa penjabat konsulat jenderal di Davao dinyatakan kepribadian non grata, dan meminta pemerintah Indonesia untuk menarik orang -orang yang terlibat dalam tindakan membakar warisan budaya negara.Bitungnews.com mencoba menghubungi Layanan Media dan Informasi, Kementerian Luar Negeri di 021 3813453, tetapi sampai berita ini diterbitkan tidak diambil.Dan pesan elektronik ke infomed@kemlu.go.id juga belum menerima tanggapan.

berita: Netizens are busy talking about social media, Facebook in Indonesia will be closed on April 24, 2018. Is that right? We tried to find out the truth of the news, it turned out to be a hoax or not true. So far, there has been no firm statement from the Ministry of user Communication and Information (Kemenkominfo) confirming that Facebook Indonesia will be blocked or closed on April 24, 2018. However, the Ministry of Communication and Information does not hesitate to block Facebook in Indonesia like Telegram, if it is proven that there is a criminal element in the leakage of Facebook user data in Indonesia. If indeed Facebook Indonesia will be blocked, even then it will only be temporary and if the situation gets worse. "We will see this situation first. If it gets worse, we will close temporarily," said Minister of Communication and Informatics Rudiantara, Wednesday (11/4/2018) at the Kominfo Building, Medan Merdeka, Jakarta. "If there are indications that Facebook in Indonesia is being used for incitement, as happened in Myanmar, I have no qualms about blocking it," added Rudiantara. Reported by CNN Indonesia, the Facebook data leak scandal in Indonesia recorded as many as 1,095,918 users who could potentially be affected by data abuse. From November 2013 to 2015 there were 748 people in Indonesia who installed thisisyourdigitallife application. The application, which is a personality test quiz, is known to use Facebook account access. "There are a total of 1,096,666 people in Indonesia or around 1.26 percent of the total number of people affected globally," explained Facebook Indonesia's Head of Public Policy Ruben Hattari during a Hearing Meeting (RDP) with members of Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives in Jakarta, Tuesday (17/4). According to Ruben, the figure is known to not include people who have downloaded the application, but then deleted their Facebook account. The company owned by Mark Zuckerberg claims not to store the data of individual users who download the application. To note, there are about 87 million global Facebook user data stolen by Cambridge Analytica (CA). Indonesia occupies the third position as the country with the most user data victims.
berita_id: Netizen sibuk berbicara tentang media sosial, Facebook di Indonesia akan ditutup pada 24 April 2018. Apakah itu benar?Kami mencoba mencari tahu kebenaran berita itu, ternyata itu adalah tipuan atau tidak benar.Sejauh ini, belum ada pernyataan tegas dari Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi Pengguna (Kemenkominfo) yang mengkonfirmasi bahwa Facebook Indonesia akan diblokir atau ditutup pada 24 April 2018. Namun, Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi tidak ragu untuk memblokir Facebook di Indonesia seperti Telegram, jika terbukti bahwa ada elemen kriminal dalam leahage di Facebook di Facebook.Jika memang Facebook Indonesia akan diblokir, meskipun itu hanya akan bersifat sementara dan jika situasinya semakin buruk."Kami akan melihat situasi ini terlebih dahulu. Jika semakin buruk, kami akan menutup sementara," kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika Rudiantara, Rabu (11/4/2018) di gedung Kepomo, Medan Merdeka, Jakarta."Jika ada indikasi bahwa Facebook di Indonesia digunakan untuk hasutan, seperti yang terjadi di Myanmar, saya tidak punya keraguan tentang memblokirnya," tambah Rudiantara.Dilaporkan oleh CNN Indonesia, skandal kebocoran data Facebook di Indonesia mencatat sebanyak 1.095.918 pengguna yang berpotensi dipengaruhi oleh penyalahgunaan data.Dari November 2013 hingga 2015 ada 748 orang di Indonesia yang memasang aplikasi ThisisyyourDigitallife.Aplikasi, yang merupakan kuis tes kepribadian, diketahui menggunakan akses akun Facebook."Ada total 1.096.666 orang di Indonesia atau sekitar 1,26 persen dari jumlah total orang yang terkena dampak global," jelas kepala kebijakan publik Ruben Hattari di Indonesia di Indonesia selama pertemuan pendengaran (RDP) dengan anggota Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia di Jakarta, Selasa (17/4).Menurut Ruben, angka tersebut diketahui tidak termasuk orang yang telah mengunduh aplikasi, tetapi kemudian menghapus akun Facebook mereka.Perusahaan yang dimiliki oleh Mark Zuckerberg mengklaim tidak menyimpan data pengguna individu yang mengunduh aplikasi.Untuk dicatat, ada sekitar 87 juta data pengguna Global Facebook yang dicuri oleh Cambridge Analytica (CA).Indonesia menempati posisi ketiga sebagai negara dengan korban data pengguna terbanyak.

berita: Raids on pacifiers suspected of containing drugs were also carried out in Bangkalan Regency. During the raid, which was held by joint officers from the Bangkalan Police, Satpol PP, and the Bangkalan Health Office, thousands of bottles of dot candy were secured from a number of shops. The target of the raid was not only big shops. A number of hawkers who sell in elementary schools (SD) also did not escape the simultaneous operation in a number of Bangkalan areas. Even the joint officers found the candy agent allegedly containing the banned substance. The total number of confiscated candies was 1,530 bottles. All the evidence is secured at the Mapolres and will be tested in the laboratory to determine the substance in it. “This raid is not only in the city. But we spread it to a number of areas such as Tanah Merah, Kamal and Sukolilo," explained Head of the Bangkalan Police Ops, Kompol Agung Setyono, Wednesday (8/7/2017). The next step, said Agung, is to wait for the results of the examination and research on the content of the candy. If it is proven that they contain illegal drugs, the candy sellers will be summoned for questioning. However, if it does not contain harmful substances, it will be returned. “This candy has spread everywhere. Of course, it is a concern for parents to supervise their children when buying any food,” he added. Meanwhile, Head of the Health Division of the Bangkalan Health Office, Ciptaning Tekad, added that at least the candy should be secured first and waiting for the results of research from the Surabaya Food and Drug Supervisory Agency (BBPOM). "If you look at the ML code, these are imported goods. If confect MD is a domestic product. But all the explanations are in Indonesian. Whether this is fake or not, we are waiting for the results of the examination," he explained.
berita_id: Penggerebekan pada dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan juga dilakukan di Kabupaten Bangkalan.Selama penggerebekan, yang dipegang oleh petugas bersama dari polisi Bangkalan, Satpol PP, dan Kantor Kesehatan Bangkalan, ribuan botol permen DOT diamankan dari sejumlah toko.Target serangan itu bukan hanya toko -toko besar.Sejumlah penjaja yang menjual di sekolah dasar (SD) juga tidak luput dari operasi simultan di sejumlah wilayah Bangkalan.Bahkan petugas gabungan menemukan agen permen yang diduga mengandung zat yang dilarang.Jumlah total permen yang disita adalah 1.530 botol.Semua bukti diamankan di Mapolres dan akan diuji di laboratorium untuk menentukan zat di dalamnya."Serangan ini tidak hanya di kota. Tapi kami menyebarkannya ke sejumlah daerah seperti Tanah Merah, Kamal dan Sukolilo," jelas kepala Ops Polisi Bangkalan, Kompol Agung Setyono, Rabu (8/7/2017).Langkah selanjutnya, kata Agung, adalah menunggu hasil pemeriksaan dan penelitian tentang konten permen.Jika terbukti bahwa mereka mengandung obat -obatan terlarang, penjual permen akan dipanggil untuk ditanyai.Namun, jika tidak mengandung zat berbahaya, itu akan dikembalikan."Permen ini telah menyebar ke mana -mana. Tentu saja, itu menjadi perhatian orang tua untuk mengawasi anak -anak mereka ketika membeli makanan apa pun," tambahnya.Sementara itu, kepala Divisi Kesehatan Kantor Kesehatan Bangkalan, Ciptaning Tekad, menambahkan bahwa setidaknya permen harus diamankan terlebih dahulu dan menunggu hasil penelitian dari Badan Pengawas Makanan dan Obat Surabaya (BBPOM)."Jika Anda melihat Kode ML, ini adalah barang impor. Jika Konferter MD adalah produk domestik. Tetapi semua penjelasannya dalam bahasa Indonesia. Apakah ini palsu atau tidak, kami sedang menunggu hasil pemeriksaan," jelasnya.

berita: As a people, perhaps you have ever thought at a glance how much salary a leader of the President receives in this country. Well, for those who are curious, recently there has been an explanation regarding the proposed salary increase for the positions of president, vice president and a number of other high-ranking positions in the country. Quoted from the Tempo page. Co., circulated the presentation in the form of a table with the title "Table of Income Index of State Officials and Other Officials Adjusted to Income Index of Civil Servants". In the table, the President's salary is Rp. 533,422,694 and the Vice President is Rp. 368,948,462. In addition to the President publish and his Deputy, the table also shows the salaries of state officials such as ministers, the Attorney General, the Commander of the Indonesian Armed Forces, the Chief of the Indonesian Police, the Chair of the MPR, and the Chair of the DPR. They are proposed to receive the same salary, which is Rp. 92,237.116.
