However, as the exposure circulated to the public sphere, the Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (Ministry of PAN RB) hastily clarified about President Joko Widodo's proposed salary of Rp 533 million. According to the Head of the Legal Communications and Public Information Bureau of the PAN Ministry, RB Herman Suryatman, the information on President Jokowi's proposed salary increase is invalid. This was based on the discussion material in February last year. “Those are simulation figures that are not yet valid. Materials for the RPP coordination meeting on salaries and allowances that were held last year. February 2017 to be exact," Herman said in a written statement received by Tempo, Saturday, March 10 2018. Herman explained that the explanation contained a simulation of the income levels of civil servants and state officials and was a study material that still needed further discussion. “The data in the presentation not only contains a simulation of the income of state officials, but also the income of civil servants. Please don't be misunderstood," said Herman
berita_id: Sebagai orang, mungkin Anda pernah berpikir sekilas berapa banyak gaji yang diterima oleh pemimpin presiden di negara ini.Nah, bagi mereka yang penasaran, baru-baru ini ada penjelasan mengenai kenaikan gaji yang diusulkan untuk posisi presiden, wakil presiden dan sejumlah posisi berpangkat tinggi lainnya di negara ini.Dikutip dari halaman tempo.Co., mengedarkan presentasi dalam bentuk tabel dengan judul "Tabel Indeks Pendapatan Pejabat Negara dan pejabat lainnya yang disesuaikan dengan indeks pendapatan pegawai negeri".Di meja, gaji presiden adalah RP.533.422.694 dan wakil presiden adalah RP.368.948.462.Selain Publish Presiden dan wakilnya, meja itu juga menunjukkan gaji pejabat negara seperti menteri, jaksa agung, komandan angkatan bersenjata Indonesia, kepala polisi Indonesia, ketua MPR, dan ketua DPR.Mereka diusulkan untuk menerima gaji yang sama, yaitu RP.92.237.116.Namun, ketika paparan itu beredar ke ruang publik, Kementerian Reformasi Administratif dan Reformasi Birokratis (Kementerian Pan RB) dengan tergesa -gesa mengklarifikasi tentang gaji yang diusulkan Presiden Joko Widodo sebesar Rp 533 juta.Menurut kepala Komunikasi Hukum dan Biro Informasi Publik Kementerian PAN, RB Herman Suryatman, informasi tentang kenaikan gaji Presiden Jokowi yang diusulkan tidak valid.Ini didasarkan pada materi diskusi pada bulan Februari tahun lalu."Itu adalah angka simulasi yang belum valid. Bahan untuk pertemuan koordinasi RPP tentang gaji dan tunjangan yang diadakan tahun lalu. Februari 2017 tepatnya," kata Herman dalam sebuah pernyataan tertulis yang diterima oleh Tempo, Sabtu, 10 Maret 2018. Herman menjelaskan bahwa penjelasan tersebut berisi simulasi tingkat pendapatan dari pegawai negeri sipil dan pejabat negara dan merupakan materi studi yang masih diperlukan."Data dalam presentasi tidak hanya berisi simulasi pendapatan pejabat negara, tetapi juga pendapatan pegawai negeri. Tolong jangan disalahpahami," kata Herman

berita: The walk out (WO) of pianist Ananda Sukarlan when DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan gave a speech at the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), in Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran, turned out to be very long. Ananda's action was followed by a crowd calling for the removal of the Traveloka application. What caused this walk out action to be followed by an invitation with the hashtag #uninstallTraveloka? Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Incidentally, in this event, the Canisius Awards will be presented to 5 alumni from various generations. A total of 5 alumni were screened from the 95 finalists who became candidates. They are Ananda Sukarlan (composer & pianist), Derianto Kusuma (founder of Traveloka), Father Magnis Suseno (Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). Based on the news circulating on the timeline, Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. This information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. Traveloka to detikinet responded to the news about the call to boycott its services. This hotel and travel ticket booking application also provides clarification regarding the events at the Canisius College event. Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. But he was unable to attend. "Actually, Mr. Deri (Derianto) was not present. He was on a business trip that day. So if it is said that Mr. Deri is there and it is called to provide support (to genus oryza Ananda), he is not there," said Busyra. Regarding the news that Derianto gave support to Ananda who walked out and raised an invitation to boycott Traveloka, according to Busyro, Traveloka is still investigating. "We have just seen a lot of people about this, we are also still investigating. What I can say is that he was unable to attend and we have not taken any action,” he said. Tribunnews also observed that, after getting off the stage, Ananda was greeted and praised by the award recipients, including former minister Ir. Sarwono Kusumaatmaja and Father E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J., Principal of Kanisius High School. It was not written, Traveloka CTO Derianto Kusuma came and congratulated him. When receiving the award, Ananda also had the opportunity to deliver a 10-minute speech. “You have invited someone with values ​​and integrity that go against what we were taught. Although you may have to invite him because of his position, but next time we have to see the person as well. He obtained his position in ways that were inconsistent with Canisius' values. I'm not talking about politics, this is a matter of conscience and human values," he said
berita_id: Walk Out (WO) pianis Ananda Sukarlan ketika Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato pada peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran, ternyata sangat lama.Tindakan Ananda diikuti oleh kerumunan yang menyerukan penghapusan aplikasi Traveloka.Apa yang menyebabkan tindakan berjalan ini diikuti oleh undangan dengan tagar #uninstalltraveloka?Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Kebetulan, dalam acara ini, Canisius Awards akan diberikan kepada 5 alumni dari berbagai generasi.Sebanyak 5 alumni disaring dari 95 finalis yang menjadi kandidat.Mereka adalah Ananda Sukarlan (komposer & pianis), DeRianto Kusuma (pendiri Traveloka), Pastor Magnis Suseno (Jesuit Figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farma).Berdasarkan berita yang beredar di timeline, pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma menyapa dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Informasi ini kemudian memicu beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.Traveloka ke Detikinet menanggapi berita tentang panggilan untuk memboikot layanannya.Aplikasi pemesanan hotel dan tiket perjalanan ini juga memberikan klarifikasi mengenai acara di acara Canisius College.Manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Tapi dia tidak bisa hadir."Sebenarnya, Tn. Deri (Derianto) tidak ada. Dia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis hari itu. Jadi jika dikatakan bahwa Mr. Deri ada di sana dan dipanggil untuk memberikan dukungan (kepada genus Oryza Ananda), dia tidak ada di sana," kata Busyra.Mengenai berita bahwa DeRianto memberi dukungan kepada Ananda yang berjalan keluar dan mengangkat undangan untuk memboikot Traveloka, menurut Busyro, Traveloka masih menyelidiki."Kami baru saja melihat banyak orang tentang ini, kami juga masih menyelidiki. Apa yang dapat saya katakan adalah bahwa ia tidak dapat hadir dan kami belum mengambil tindakan apa pun," katanya.Tribunnews juga mengamati bahwa, setelah turun dari panggung, Ananda disambut dan dipuji oleh penerima penghargaan, termasuk mantan Menteri IR.Sarwono Kusumaatmaja dan Pastor E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J., Kepala Sekolah Menengah Kanisius.Itu tidak ditulis, Traveloka CTO DERIANTO KUSUMA datang dan memberi selamat kepadanya.Saat menerima penghargaan, Ananda juga memiliki kesempatan untuk menyampaikan pidato 10 menit.“Anda telah mengundang seseorang dengan nilai -nilai dan integritas yang bertentangan dengan apa yang kami ajarkan. Meskipun Anda mungkin harus mengundangnya karena posisinya, tetapi lain kali kami harus melihat orang itu juga. Dia memperoleh posisinya dengan cara yang tidak konsisten dengan nilai -nilai Canisius. Saya tidak berbicara tentang politik, ini adalah masalah hati nurani dan nilai manusia," katanya.

berita: Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Remember the crooked cellphone phenomenon that happened to the iPhone 6 Plus? Galaxy S6 Edge owners can also experience the same thing. The initial launch of the iPhone 6 Plus was immediately hit by an unpleasant issue, namely the body of the cellphone which turned out to be easy to bend when pressed. This apparently also happened to the latest Samsung phones. SquareTrade, an electronics company, conducted tests on the iPhone 6 Plus, Galaxy S6 Edge and HTC One M9. All three try to be pressed with the same machine. From the results of these tests, it can be  seen that the iPhone 6 Plus starts to bend when it receives a pressure of 50 Kg, and looks broken when pressed up to 81 Kg. While the Galaxy S6 Edge turns out to have the same resistance. The screen and body look completely damaged when under pressure weighing 81 Kg. "Is this the second bendgate issue? No. Samsung fans will experience worse, they will not find a bent phone, but a broken glass in their pocket," said the voice actor in the video. As for the HTC One M9. The screen already looks bent when it takes 54 kg of pressure, and because the power button is right in the middle, the damage prevents the phone from working at all. Here is a video of the testing done by SquareTrade From the results of these tests, it can be seen that the scathing criticism directed at Apple about the iPhone 6 Plus being easily bent was also experienced by its competitors, the Galaxy S6 Edge and HTC One M9. But it should also be noted. Even to make the three phones curved is not easy, because it requires quite hard pressure at one point.
berita_id: JAKARTA, CNN Indonesia - Ingat fenomena ponsel bengkok yang terjadi pada iPhone 6 Plus?Pemilik Galaxy S6 Edge juga dapat mengalami hal yang sama.Peluncuran awal iPhone 6 Plus segera dilanda masalah yang tidak menyenangkan, yaitu tubuh ponsel yang ternyata mudah ditekuk saat ditekan.Ini tampaknya juga terjadi pada ponsel Samsung terbaru.Squaretrade, sebuah perusahaan elektronik, melakukan tes pada iPhone 6 Plus, Galaxy S6 Edge dan HTC One M9.Ketiganya mencoba ditekan dengan mesin yang sama.Dari hasil tes ini, dapat dilihat bahwa iPhone 6 Plus mulai menekuk ketika menerima tekanan 50 kg, dan terlihat rusak ketika ditekan hingga 81 kg.Sementara Galaxy S6 Edge ternyata memiliki resistensi yang sama.Layar dan tubuh terlihat benar -benar rusak ketika di bawah tekanan dengan berat 81 kg."Apakah ini masalah Bendgate kedua? Tidak. Penggemar Samsung akan mengalami lebih buruk, mereka tidak akan menemukan telepon bengkok, tetapi pecahan gelas di saku mereka," kata aktor suara dalam video.Adapun HTC One M9.Layar sudah terlihat bengkok ketika mengambil tekanan 54 kg, dan karena tombol daya tepat di tengah, kerusakan mencegah ponsel bekerja sama sekali.Berikut adalah video pengujian yang dilakukan oleh Squaretrade dari hasil tes ini, dapat dilihat bahwa kritik pedas yang diarahkan pada Apple tentang iPhone 6 Plus yang mudah ditekuk juga dialami oleh para pesaingnya, Galaxy S6 Edge dan HTC One M9.Tapi itu juga harus dicatat.Bahkan untuk membuat tiga ponsel melengkung tidak mudah, karena membutuhkan tekanan yang cukup keras pada satu titik.

berita: Call for a boycott of Traveloka by uninstalling the Traveloka trending topic application on Twitter. The hashtag #UninstallTraveloka became trending due to the walk out action of pianist Ananda Sukarlan when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11/2017), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, was said to have greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech. Considered as support for Ananda's action, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. Even the hashtags #UninstallTraveloka and #BoikotTraveloka are among the trending topics on Twitter in Indonesia. Among netizens, there are also those who defend and assess that the Traveloka boycott will not have any impact on the hotel and travel ticket booking application. Derianto and Ananda are two of the five outstanding Kanisius College alumni who received awards at this event. Besides the two, there were Father Magnis Suseno (a Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (a Scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). Support Ananda Harassing Anies Baswedan, Boycott and #UninstallTraveloka Trending Andanda and Traveloka officials who are "Ahokers" are considered to be intolerant. The Muhammadiyah Youth of DKI Jakarta Province assessed that the walkout (WO) carried out by Ananda Sukarlan and the Traveloka boss to Anies Baswedan was an intolerant attitude. The Muhammadiyah youth also issued a statement of attitude, namely boycotting Traveloka because of the support of its owner, Derianto Kususma, against the attitude of pianist Ananda Sukarlan who was WO when Anies Baswedan gave a speech. Derianto did WO following the attitude of pianist Ananda Sukarlan. Chairman of the Muhammadiyah Youth of DKI Jakarta Province, Syahrul Hasan, said that the WO action carried out by Ananda Sukarlan and several others illustrates the attitude of intolerance and poor morals as hosts in receiving guests. Where the presence of Anies Baswedan as a guest is at the official request of the host himself. "Ananda Sukarlan's walkout action accusing Anies Baswedan of winning the governor's seat is not in accordance with Kanisius' values, this is far from being burned," said Syahrul in a release received by Republika.co.id, Tuesday (14/11). Syahrul explained, Anies Baswedan was part of the Muhammadiyah extended family, both structurally and culturally. Currently, he is entrusted with the advisory role of the Muhammadiyah Branch of Pondok Labu where Din Syamsudin MA serves as the head of the branch. When Din Syamsudin piano player served as chairman of the Muhammadiyah Central Executive for the period 2005-2010 and 2010-2015, PP Muhammadiyah, whose office was on Jl Menteng Raya 62, was next to the Kanisius College building. "Muhammadiyah always provides parking space for Muhammadiyah Da'wah Building for activities carried out by the Kanisius College extended family as a real and authentic manifestation of the tolerance of the Muhammadiyah extended family. Anies Baswedan, of course, as part of the Muhammadiyah extended family has the same attitude in maintaining tolerance and unity among people religion that has been going well so far, because he is also the grandson of the founder of the Republic of Indonesia whom we both love," said Syahrul.
berita_id: Hubungi untuk boikot Traveloka dengan menghapus aplikasi Traveloka Trending Topic Application di Twitter.Tagar #uninstalltraveloka menjadi tren karena aksi pianis Ananda Sukarlan ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11/2017), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, dikatakan telah menyapa dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies.Dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda, informasi ini kemudian memicu beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Bahkan tagar #uninstalltraveloka dan #boikottraveloka adalah salah satu topik tren di Twitter di Indonesia.Di antara netizen, ada juga orang -orang yang membela dan menilai bahwa boikot Traveloka tidak akan berdampak pada aplikasi pemesanan tiket hotel dan perjalanan.DeRianto dan Ananda adalah dua dari lima alumni Kanisius College yang luar biasa yang menerima penghargaan di acara ini.Selain keduanya, ada ayah Magnis Suseno (sosok Jesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (seorang pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farha).Dukungan Ananda Melecehkan Anies Baswedan, Boikot, dan #uninstalltraveloka Trending Andanda dan pejabat Traveloka yang "Ahokers" dianggap tidak toleran.Pemuda Muhammadiyah dari provinsi DKI Jakarta menilai bahwa pemogokan (WO) yang dilakukan oleh Ananda Sukarlan dan bos Traveloka ke Anies Baswedan adalah sikap yang tidak toleran.Pemuda Muhammadiyah juga mengeluarkan pernyataan sikap, yaitu memboikot Traveloka karena dukungan dari pemiliknya, DeRianto Kususma, melawan sikap pianis Ananda Sukarlan yang ketika Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.DERIANTO MELAKUKAN WO mengikuti sikap pianis Ananda Sukarlan.Ketua pemuda Muhammadiyah dari provinsi DKI Jakarta, Syahrul Hasan, mengatakan bahwa tindakan WO yang dilakukan oleh Ananda Sukarlan dan beberapa lainnya menggambarkan sikap intoleransi dan moral yang buruk sebagai tuan rumah dalam menerima tamu.Di mana kehadiran Anies Baswedan sebagai tamu atas permintaan resmi tuan rumah sendiri."Tindakan pemogokan Ananda Sukarlan menuduh Anies Baswedan memenangkan kursi gubernur tidak sesuai dengan nilai -nilai Kanisius, ini jauh dari dibakar," kata Syahrul dalam rilis yang diterima oleh Republika.co.id, Selasa (14/11).Syahrul menjelaskan, Anies Baswedan adalah Raya 62, berada di sebelah gedung Kanisius College."Muhammadiyah selalu menyediakan tempat parkir untuk Muhammadiyah Da'wah Building untuk kegiatan yang dilakukan oleh Kanisius College Besar Keluarga sebagai manifestasi nyata dan otentik dari toleransi Toleransi dari Muhammadiyah yang ada di antara keluarga yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan keluarga.Karena dia juga cucu pendiri Republik Indonesia yang kami berdua cintai, "kata Syahrul.

berita: The night of the 90th anniversary of Kanisius College at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran, North Jakarta, Saturday (11/11/2017) has been a hot topic of conversation for the last few days. It is not about the existence of the Kanisius College educational institution which has succeeded in producing many outstanding children of the nation and occupying several important positions in this country, but what is being discussed is the walk out action (WO) carried out by the pianist who is also an alumni of Kanisius College, Ananda Sukarlan. This became a topic of discussion, because Ananda chose WO when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech at the event. Moreover, Ananda, who is one of the five recipients of the award given by Kanisius College, in his speech criticized the event committee for deliberately inviting figures who contradict the values ​​taught by Canisius. Although he did not mention names, but with the speech delivered after the WO action, it was judged by many parties that the figure in question was Anies, and related to the campaign situation in the 2017 DKI Pilkada. There were pros and cons to his attitude. Quoted from Metrotvnews.com, Wednesday (11/15/2017), Ananda confirmed that his WO action was a personal decision, and did not represent any party. In addition, he also denied various oblique issues that circulated by calling himself impolite. “Some people say I was screaming in my chair, that's not true. It happened, I sat in the VIP seat which was at the front, (bench) number two from the front, while the exit door was at the back," he said. "So, if I stand up, I can see it. I stand up and walk out politely because I don't want to disturb people who want to listen to Mr. Anies' speech. The situation is that I stand up and go back like someone wants to go to the toilet," continued Ananda. Regarding the allegation that he instigated several invitations to WO, Ananda also denied. “After that there were some who came out, but not because of my explain provocation. It's not a gang (action), we're not all out. My seat is separated from my friends, because I sit VIP to receive the award. I don't conspire with my friends. It was a spontaneous event. It was really my initiative, not from anyone," said Ananda. For the various rumors circulating, Ananda regretted the netizens who did not properly digest the information. Even the issue spread to other issues, around religion and politics. “There is a website that writes that I am a Christian. Please, if you want to slander research first, Canisius is Catholic. Not Christian. I myself am Muslim. If you want to slander me, it is better to slander me as a Catholic," said Ananda. "Please also explain that this has nothing to do with (College) Canisius. My speech actually criticized (College) Kanisius. My speech did not criticize Anies Baswedan. My speech criticized the event committee. My speech was also not screaming like Hitler. For me ( speech) was quite polite," he said. Ananda further explained about his background growing up in an environment full of diversity. Ananda studied the Koran as a child. He also reads a lot of books about other religions. Including studying the teachings of Catholicism, Hinduism, and Buddhism. "For me, what is good I apply. So, I don't think about any anti-religion, including my own religion. This is not about SARA and politics. For websites that slander me as a Christian, please change the slander to Catholic, because you want to attack Canisius. Please don't equate Catholics and Christians," he said. Previously, Governor Anies, who was asked to respond to the actions of WO Ananda and a number of alumni of Kanisius College, admitted that he did not know anything. But he insists that he has a good relationship with Kanisius. "I only found out after I was in the office. When I arrived this morning I didn't even know. I don't know. Because when I was in the room everyone was in there. In fact, Father Baskoro is my friend. He came here himself. Then Father Benny is a good friend," said Anies at Jakarta City Hall, Monday (11/13/2017). For what happened, Anies said, he respects any differences of opinion. He said everyone has the right to express their opinion in their own way. After all, he continued, as a leader, he has a duty to protect and greet all citizens, regardless of background. "I respect different views. I respect different views. And I give the right to anyone to express their way," said the former Minister of Education and Culture. "Our part is to greet everyone, protect everyone. So that's my responsibility as governor. So I will greet everyone and protect everyone if then there is a negative reaction, so that's just a bonus for me. There's nothing out of the ordinary. Relax," he concluded. . Interestingly, the pros and cons of this incident spread to the invitation to uninstall Traveloka in cyberspace. Reportedly, the invitation was triggered by the presence of one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, who greeted and congratulated Ananda for his actions. "Well, I think it's like this. We respect people with views. Respect different people. No need to uninstall and so on," said Anies in response to an invitation to uninstall Traveloka, Tuesday (14/11/2017). The reason, continued the former Chancellor of Paramadina University, the Traveloka application so far has provided benefits for the community. This invitation should not arise just because of differences of opinion. "Traveloka also provides benefits for many citizens. After all, it is a service that has great benefits for many people. So let's get used to different views in a healthy way, respecting each other without having to carry out punishments like that. So there's no need to uninstall all kinds of things. ," explained Anies.

The Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara, emphasized that the Ministry of Communication and Informatics is ready to close Facebook accounts that are considered to present SARA content, are negative, hoaxes, and break the unity of the people and the nation. According to him, this is in accordance with the ITE Law and is based on the 1945 Constitution. Not only closing someone's Facebook account, his party also firmly closed the account organizer, namely Facebook to leave Indonesia, if SARA content or hoax news had exceeded the limit. "So, the decision is to close the account, it is in accordance with the law. However, not only closing the account, Kominfo can also close the implementation. It is possible that Facebook will be closed. If necessary, it will be forced," said Rudiantara to Jitunews.com, in a discussion on the MUI Fatwa on the Law and Guidelines for Bermuamalah Through Social Media, in Jakarta, Monday (5/6) night. "Because we will not benefit from social media firm itself. If it is too much, MUI asks to be closed, so we will close it," he added. This support for 'expelling' or closing Facebook from Indonesia, said Rudiantara, was already supported by Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives, during a hearing at the end of May 2017. "Last week, we had a meeting with the House of Representatives Commission I. Because indeed the situation was very negative, damaging one another and both Muslims into bad relations because of this social media," he explained. According to Rudiantara, from the data he has obtained to date, there are 111 million Indonesians who use Facebook. That means 75 percent of all Indonesians use Facebook. "Actually, social media is to increase ukhuwah. This social media is built to strengthen relationships between people. The current trend is to become negative," he said annoyed. He again said that the ITE Law actually has two tasks for the government. The first is to carry out socialization and education. And, the second is to restrict access or cut off access to cyberspace. "The submission of this fatwa (MUI Fatwa on Law and Guidelines for Bermuamalah Through Social Media) is a starting point. Then I will knock on the door asking for help again on how to apply it in the field. Second, how to use this MUI fatwa reference for us to manage, especially content that is negative," he explained again closing the conversation.
berita_id: Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara, menekankan bahwa Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika siap untuk menutup akun Facebook yang dianggap menyajikan konten Sara, negatif, tipuan, dan mematahkan kesatuan rakyat dan bangsa.Menurutnya, ini sesuai dengan hukum ITE dan didasarkan pada Konstitusi 1945.Tidak hanya menutup akun Facebook seseorang, partainya juga dengan tegas menutup penyelenggara akun, yaitu Facebook untuk meninggalkan Indonesia, jika konten Sara atau berita tipuan telah melebihi batasnya."Jadi, keputusannya adalah untuk menutup akun, itu sesuai dengan hukum. Namun, tidak hanya menutup akun, Kominfo juga dapat menutup implementasi. Ada kemungkinan bahwa Facebook akan ditutup. Jika perlu, itu akan dipaksakan," kata Rudiantara untuk Jitunews.com, dalam sebuah diskusi tentang MUI Fatwa tentang hukum dan pedoman untuk Bekuam."Karena kita tidak akan mendapat manfaat dari firma media sosial itu sendiri. Jika terlalu banyak, Mui meminta untuk ditutup, jadi kita akan menutupnya," tambahnya.Dukungan ini untuk 'mengeluarkan' atau menutup Facebook dari Indonesia, kata Rudiiantara, sudah didukung oleh Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia, selama sidang pada akhir Mei 2017. "Minggu lalu, kami mengadakan pertemuan dengan Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat I. Karena memang situasinya sangat negatif, merusak satu sama lain dan kedua Muslim ke dalam hubungan yang buruk karena media sosial ini," ia menjelaskan.Menurut Rudiantara, dari data yang diperolehnya hingga saat ini, ada 111 juta orang Indonesia yang menggunakan Facebook.Itu berarti 75 persen dari semua orang Indonesia menggunakan Facebook."Sebenarnya, media sosial adalah untuk meningkatkan ukhuwah. Media sosial ini dibangun untuk memperkuat hubungan antara orang -orang. Tren saat ini adalah menjadi negatif," katanya kesal.Dia sekali lagi mengatakan bahwa hukum ITE sebenarnya memiliki dua tugas untuk pemerintah.Yang pertama adalah melakukan sosialisasi dan pendidikan.Dan, yang kedua adalah membatasi akses atau memotong akses ke dunia maya."Pengajuan fatwa ini (MUI Fatwa tentang hukum dan pedoman untuk Bermuamalah melalui media sosial) adalah titik awal. Lalu saya akan mengetuk pintu meminta bantuan lagi tentang cara menerapkannya di lapangan. Kedua, bagaimana menggunakan referensi MUI Fatwa ini untuk dikelola, terutama konten yang negatif," ia menjelaskan lagi menutup percakapan.

berita: In everyday life, we use various kinds of brushes to make up, paint, clean dust, grouping paint the house, grease cake pans, to smear food such as grilled chicken, bread, cakes, and various baked or grilled meats and seafood. when combing hair, cleaning hair in salons or barbershops, washing clothes, and scrubbing floors Do you know what brushes and brushes you use come from? Most likely from sea urchins! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, generally from China. These imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than other animal hairs, such as squirrels, goats, civets, camels, and dogs. period January – June 2001, Indonesia imported “Boar Bristle and Pig or Boar Hair” amounting to 282,983 tons or USD 1713309 What's interesting? Just so you know, Anping is a company that has a history of 400 years in processing bristle and animal tail feathers. This company is the largest distribution center for animal tail feathers in the north of China. It is said that more than 50000 people are involved in the production process and have more than 1000 workshops spread all over the world. various countries The keyword that shows the identity of this white brush is the writing BRISTLE on the brush handle, which in the Webster Dictionary means PIG HAIR (boar bristle). or the other is done in a very easy and simple way Animal hair contains a protein called KERATIN Keratin is a group of proteins known as fiber proteins. Like protein, hair or fur that contains keratin when burned will cause a distinctive odor. it's the same when we c smell of roasted meat Meanwhile, if the brush is made of palm fiber, fiber, or plastic, then it will definitely not emit a specific smell other than the smell of burning ash. The brush is unclean, so if it is used to spread bread, then the bread is unclean. In short, it is unlawful to eat unclean objects. NOTE: This unclean brush is also widely used to apply seasonings to grilled corn, pecel catfish, grilled fish, grilled chicken, barbeque, etc. For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly HARAM, no matter how small, the material from pigs is forbidden to be consumed and to be applied. The illustrations in this article are examples of brushes and bristle brushes (the term is PIG or BOAR or HOG or BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places, such as markets, painting supply stores, building material stores, make-up shops and salons, online shops, etc ll Are you familiar with the various shapes below? There are painting brushes, wall paint brushes, makeup brushes, hair brushes, barber or barber brushes, clothes brushes, etc. BEWARE! TIPS AVOID THE USE OF BRUSHS AND BORN BRUSHS: Use 100% synthetic brushes and brushes, such as nylon. Wall paint brushes and food brushes are available, at slightly more expensive prices. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for toothbrushes. Use other alternatives than brushes. Examples of paint rollers for painting, sponges and cotton buds for applying make-up, as well as knives and spatulas for greasing food. Beware of foods that use a pig brush to cook and clean their tools Sea urchin brushes are sold in white and black. However, manufacturers can process sea urchins by bleaching them and then coloring them, so that they look like other animal hairs. Wallahu Ta'ala A'lam
berita_id: Dalam kehidupan sehari -hari, kami menggunakan berbagai jenis kuas untuk membuat, melukis, membersihkan debu, mengelompokkan cat rumah, wajan kue minyak, untuk mengolesi makanan seperti ayam panggang, roti, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian, dan menggosok lantai, apakah Anda tahu kuas dan sikat apa yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar dari landak laut!Sikat disediakan di Indonesia, umumnya dari Cina.Sikat impor ini diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada rambut hewan lainnya, seperti tupai, kambing, sipil, unta, dan anjing.Periode Januari - Juni 2001, Indonesia mengimpor "bulu babi dan rambut babi atau babi" sebesar 282.983 ton atau USD 1713309 Apa yang menarik?Asal tahu saja, Anping adalah perusahaan yang memiliki sejarah 400 tahun dalam memproses bulu dan bulu ekor hewan.Perusahaan ini adalah pusat distribusi terbesar untuk bulu ekor hewan di utara Cina.Dikatakan bahwa lebih dari 50000 orang terlibat dalam proses produksi dan memiliki lebih dari 1000 lokakarya yang tersebar di seluruh dunia.Berbagai negara Kata kunci yang menunjukkan identitas sikat putih ini adalah bulu tulisan pada pegangan sikat, yang dalam kamus Webster berarti rambut babi (bulu babi).Atau yang lain dilakukan dengan cara yang sangat mudah dan sederhana rambut hewan mengandung protein yang disebut keratin keratin adalah sekelompok protein yang dikenal sebagai protein serat.Seperti protein, rambut atau bulu yang mengandung keratin ketika dibakar akan menyebabkan bau yang khas.Itu sama ketika kita berbau daging panggang sementara itu, jika kuas terbuat dari serat kelapa, serat, atau plastik, maka pasti tidak akan memancarkan aroma tertentu selain bau abu yang terbakar.Sikatnya najis, jadi jika digunakan untuk menyebarkan roti, maka roti itu najis.Singkatnya, tidak sah untuk memakan benda najis.Catatan: Sikat najis ini juga banyak digunakan untuk mengoleskan bumbu pada jagung panggang, ikan lele pecel, ikan bakar, ayam panggang, barbeque, dll. Untuk umat Islam, penggunaan bulu babi jelas haram, tidak peduli seberapa kecil, bahan dari babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan diterapkan.Ilustrasi dalam artikel ini adalah contoh kuas dan sikat bulu (istilah ini adalah babi atau babi atau babi atau sikat rambut bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat, seperti pasar, toko pasokan lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, toko make-up dan salon, toko online, dll. Apakah Anda akrab dengan berbagai bentuk di bawah?Ada kuas lukisan, kuas cat dinding, sikat rias, sikat rambut, kuas tukang cukur atau tukang cukur, sikat pakaian, dll. Waspadalah!Kiat Hindari penggunaan kuas dan kuas yang lahir: Gunakan sikat dan kuas sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Sikat cat dinding dan kuas makanan tersedia, dengan harga yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.Gunakan alternatif lain selain kuas.Contoh rol cat untuk lukisan, spons dan cotton buds untuk mengoleskan make-up, serta pisau dan spatula untuk makanan yang berminyak.Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang menggunakan sikat babi untuk memasak dan membersihkan alat -alat mereka sikat landak laut dijual putih dan hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkannya dan kemudian mewarnai mereka, sehingga mereka terlihat seperti rambut hewan lainnya.Wallahu Ta'ala A'lam

berita: Medan 13/02/2017, Responding to news in several print and online media about the circulation of Candy Dot which is suspected to contain drugs and other hazardous materials which was first discovered in Surabaya - East Java, so that it made the public nervous, especially those who have small children. In response to this, BB Pom Medan in collaboration with the North Sumatra BNN and feel the District / City Health Office carried out field supervision and from the results of the supervision that the bonbon dot was already circulating in several regions / districts in the North Sumatra region. Labfor Medan Branch has conducted an examination by taking samples from Langkat consisting of BB 1: Spray Candy, BB2: Candy Dot and BB3: White Powder, after being examined with GCMS and FTIR instruments, negative results were obtained for narcotics and psychotropic substances and after it was detected that the bonbon contained D-Glucose Monohydrate, Glucopur, Sweetener, D-Glucose, DL-Phenylalanie, Methy Ester, Methyl Stearate, Palmitic Acid and according to the Medan Branch of Labfor that all substances detected in the bonbon are generally used as sweeteners, not narcotics / psychotropics. . With the results from the Medan Branch Labfor Laboratory, it is appealed to the public not to panic, but so that people are wiser in consuming food products that have a distribution permit, and look at the expiration date so that it does not cause health.
berita_id: Medan 13/02/2017, menanggapi berita di beberapa media cetak dan online tentang sirkulasi permen yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan dan bahan berbahaya lainnya yang pertama kali ditemukan di Surabaya - Jawa Timur, sehingga membuat publik gugup, terutama mereka yang memiliki anak kecil.Menanggapi hal ini, BB Pom Medan bekerja sama dengan Sumatra Utara BNN dan merasa kantor kesehatan distrik / kota melakukan pengawasan lapangan dan dari hasil pengawasan bahwa titik bonbon sudah beredar di beberapa wilayah / distrik di wilayah Sumatra Utara.Labfor Medan Branch has conducted an examination by taking samples from Langkat consisting of BB 1: Spray Candy, BB2: Candy Dot and BB3: White Powder, after being examined with GCMS and FTIR instruments, negative results were obtained for narcotics and psychotropic substances and after it was detected that the bonbon contained D-Glucose Monohydrate, Glucopur, Sweetener, D-Glucose,DL-phenylalanie, mety ester, metil stearat, asam palmitat dan menurut cabang Medan laboratorium bahwa semua zat yang terdeteksi dalam bonbon umumnya digunakan sebagai pemanis, bukan narkotika / psikotropika..Dengan hasil dari laboratorium Medan Cabang Labfor, ia menarik bagi publik untuk tidak panik, tetapi sehingga orang lebih bijaksana dalam mengonsumsi produk makanan yang memiliki izin distribusi, dan melihat tanggal kedaluwarsa sehingga tidak menyebabkan kesehatan.

berita: After a few weeks on the market and becoming the most sought after item by premium class gadget lovers, it turns out that there are some iPhone 6 users who feel disappointed with the product they bought at a fairly expensive price. There are some iPhone users who feel that the quality of the device they buy is far below the standard because they feel the iPhone 6 is soft and bends easily. The above is not just an issue or gossip. If you put your new iPhone in a trouser pocket without a protective case or try to squeeze it a little like you want to break a chocolate bar, you'll soon find out that the iPhone 6's body bends easily. If you don't feel willing to bend your own iPhone, there are many videos and pictures that you can download and view from the internet that show Apple's weakness. Due to the outpouring of disappointment from iPhone 6 users that is widely uploaded on YouTube and also reports that enter Apple, which says the body of the latest iPhone is much softer than its predecessor, Apple had to swallow the bitter pill by experiencing a decline in the value of Apple's shares by 3.8%. Apple's stock price dropped after a video of the bent iPhone went viral on YouTube. In addition, the video showing that the iPhone 6 is flabby and easy to bend is also exacerbated by the many reports stating that there are many errors in the iOS update from iOS 7 to iOS 8. The problems encountered include intermittent updates and also users of more than 5GB of space are only for updates, so many iPhone users have to delete some of the photo and video files they have. To avoid a wider issue, Apple then made a claim that the damage that occurred to the iPhone 6 which was claimed to be soft and easy to bend was rare when used normally. Apple claims that in 6 days of sale, there were only 9 consumers who contacted the iPhone because their product was bent, but Apple forgot that iPhones are sold worldwide and there are more users who don't know who to contact to get their iPhone replaced because indeed the damage is not included. warranty. Another issue related to the iPhone 6 flaccid and easy to bend issue is the iOS 8 update which is otherwise problematic. Many consumers are calling because they find an error detecting their fingerprint. Because of this, Apple then discontinued the distribution of iOS and released a new one a day later. When compared with competitors, the strength of the iPhone 6 is only half that of competing products such as Samsung and LG. Of the Galaxy Note 3, LG G3, HTC One M8, and iPHone, tested at 4.5KG, the ones that bring out curled right up were the iPhone 6 and M8, reports Consumer Reports.
berita_id: Setelah beberapa minggu di pasar dan menjadi yang paling dicari oleh pecinta gadget kelas premium, ternyata ada beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 yang merasa kecewa dengan produk yang mereka beli dengan harga yang cukup mahal.Ada beberapa pengguna iPhone yang merasa bahwa kualitas perangkat yang mereka beli jauh di bawah standar karena mereka merasa iPhone 6 mudah dan berbelok dengan mudah.Di atas bukan hanya masalah atau gosip.Jika Anda meletakkan iPhone baru Anda ke dalam saku celana tanpa kotak pelindung atau mencoba memerasnya sedikit seperti Anda ingin memecahkan cokelat, Anda akan segera mengetahui bahwa tubuh iPhone 6 dengan mudah membungkuk.Jika Anda tidak merasa mau menekuk iPhone Anda sendiri, ada banyak video dan gambar yang dapat Anda unduh dan lihat dari internet yang menunjukkan kelemahan Apple.Karena curahan kekecewaan dari pengguna iPhone 6 yang secara luas diunggah di YouTube dan juga melaporkan bahwa masuk Apple, yang mengatakan tubuh iPhone terbaru jauh lebih lembut daripada pendahulunya, Apple harus menelan pil pahit dengan mengalami penurunan nilai saham Apple sebesar 3,8%.Harga saham Apple turun setelah video iPhone bengkok menjadi viral di YouTube.Selain itu, video yang menunjukkan bahwa iPhone 6 lembek dan mudah ditekuk juga diperburuk oleh banyak laporan yang menyatakan bahwa ada banyak kesalahan dalam pembaruan iOS dari iOS 7 ke iOS 8. Masalah yang dihadapi termasuk pembaruan yang terputus -putus dan juga pengguna lebih dari 5GB ruang yang hanya untuk pembaruan, banyak pengguna iPhone harus menghapus beberapa file dan video yang dimiliki.Untuk menghindari masalah yang lebih luas, Apple kemudian membuat klaim bahwa kerusakan yang terjadi pada iPhone 6 yang diklaim lembut dan mudah ditekuk jarang terjadi jika digunakan secara normal.Apple mengklaim bahwa dalam 6 hari penjualan, hanya ada 9 konsumen yang menghubungi iPhone karena produk mereka bengkok, tetapi Apple lupa bahwa iPhone dijual di seluruh dunia dan ada lebih banyak pengguna yang tidak tahu siapa yang harus dihubungi untuk mengganti iPhone mereka karena memang kerusakan tidak termasuk.jaminan.Masalah lain yang terkait dengan iPhone 6 lembek dan masalah yang mudah ditekuk adalah pembaruan iOS 8 yang merupakan masalah.Banyak konsumen menelepon karena mereka menemukan kesalahan mendeteksi sidik jari mereka.Karena itu, Apple kemudian menghentikan distribusi iOS dan merilis yang baru sehari kemudian.Jika dibandingkan dengan pesaing, kekuatan iPhone 6 hanya setengah dari produk yang bersaing seperti Samsung dan LG.Dari Galaxy Note 3, LG G3, HTC One M8, dan iPhone, diuji pada 4,5kg, yang mengeluarkan keriting tepat adalah iPhone 6 dan M8, lapor konsumen.

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of Indonesia is confirmed to be a hoax or false news. This certainty was revealed after the Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati confirmed this in front of journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace, West Java. "It doesn't exist and has never been discussed," he said on Monday, March 12 2018. When giving information about government minister President Joko Widodo's meeting with the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) delegation, he received a question about it. The Minister of Finance explained that at this time there were indeed a lot of circulating information and documents that were made as if they came from government institutions. “What the Menpan said (in social media) was a hoax, that's what it is. In today's social media, there is a lot of information and documents that are made similar to those from the government and published," he said. Previously, it was widely circulated on social media regarding the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia. In the issue, it is stated that the president will be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp 553422694 per month. The vice president is said to be proposed to receive a salary of Rp 368948462 per month.
berita_id: Berita yang beredar tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Indonesia dikonfirmasi sebagai tipuan atau berita palsu.Kepastian ini terungkap setelah Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati mengkonfirmasi hal ini di depan jurnalis di Istana Presiden Bogor, Jawa Barat."Itu tidak ada dan belum pernah dibahas," katanya pada hari Senin, 12 Maret 2018. Ketika memberikan informasi tentang pertemuan Menteri Pemerintah Joko Widodo dengan delegasi Bank Investasi Investasi Asia (AIIB), ia menerima pertanyaan tentang hal itu.Menteri Keuangan menjelaskan bahwa pada saat ini memang ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang beredar yang dibuat seolah -olah mereka berasal dari lembaga pemerintah."Apa yang dikatakan Menpan (di media sosial) adalah tipuan, itulah yang terjadi. Di media sosial saat ini, ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan yang dari pemerintah dan diterbitkan," katanya.Sebelumnya, secara luas diedarkan di media sosial mengenai rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia.Dalam masalah ini, dinyatakan bahwa Presiden akan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji hingga RP 553422694 per bulan.Wakil presiden dikatakan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji Rp 368948462 per bulan.

berita: The Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara, emphasized that the government would not hesitate to close the Facebook platform if the world's largest social media site became a place for spreading false news, as happened to the Rohingya. "I take a position, I threaten to close Facebook and the government has no doubts if it has to close Facebook if it is used for hoaxes," said Rudiantara at the Ministry of Communication and Information Building, Jakarta, Thursday (5/4) yesterday. After Facebook admitted to being used as an anti-Rohingya propaganda tool in Myanmar, Rudiantara said he did not want something similar to happen in Indonesia. In addition, indications of the leakage of one million user data from Indonesia in the Cambridge Analytica case require a cooperative attitude from Facebook in following up on requests from the Ministry of Communication and Information. Rudiantara said that his party would not just take action to close social media platforms, but through a process and with the right profit reasons. Although he assessed that so far, Facebook is among the three platforms that are less cooperative, namely only fulfilling 50 percent of the Ministry of Communication and Information's requests to close content that was considered not according to the norm since two years ago. "This is what I want to convey to the public, that this is the situation, I personally have no intention of closing anything like that, it must be guarded for the benefit of the state and society," said Rudiantara. The Minister of Communication and Information emphasized that all social media must be willing to participate in maintaining the stability of the country if they want to do business in Indonesia, if it causes instability in Indonesia, the government will act decisively. There are also Facebook users in Indonesia who access social media every month more than 115 million people, of the 2.07 billion people who access Facebook every month worldwide.
berita_id: Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiiantara, menekankan bahwa pemerintah tidak akan ragu untuk menutup platform Facebook jika situs media sosial terbesar di dunia menjadi tempat untuk menyebarkan berita palsu, seperti yang terjadi pada Rohingya."Saya mengambil posisi, saya mengancam untuk menutup Facebook dan pemerintah tidak memiliki keraguan jika harus menutup Facebook jika digunakan untuk tipuan," kata Rudiiantara di Kementerian Komunikasi dan Pembangunan Informasi, Jakarta, Kamis (5/4) kemarin.Setelah Facebook mengaku digunakan sebagai alat propaganda anti-Rohingya di Myanmar, Rudiantara mengatakan dia tidak ingin sesuatu yang serupa terjadi di Indonesia.Selain itu, indikasi kebocoran satu juta data pengguna dari Indonesia dalam kasus Cambridge Analytica membutuhkan sikap kooperatif dari Facebook dalam menindaklanjuti permintaan dari Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi.Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa partainya tidak akan hanya mengambil tindakan untuk menutup platform media sosial, tetapi melalui suatu proses dan dengan alasan keuntungan yang tepat.Meskipun ia menilai bahwa sejauh ini, Facebook adalah salah satu dari tiga platform yang kurang kooperatif, yaitu hanya memenuhi 50 persen dari kementerian komunikasi dan permintaan informasi untuk menutup konten yang dianggap tidak sesuai dengan norma sejak dua tahun lalu."Inilah yang ingin saya sampaikan kepada publik, bahwa inilah situasinya, saya pribadi tidak punya niat untuk menutup hal seperti itu, itu harus dijaga untuk kepentingan negara bagian dan masyarakat," kata Rudiiantara.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi menekankan bahwa semua media sosial harus bersedia untuk berpartisipasi dalam menjaga stabilitas negara jika mereka ingin melakukan bisnis di Indonesia, jika itu menyebabkan ketidakstabilan di Indonesia, pemerintah akan bertindak secara tegas.Ada juga pengguna Facebook di Indonesia yang mengakses media sosial setiap bulan lebih dari 115 juta orang, dari 2,07 miliar orang yang mengakses Facebook setiap bulan di seluruh dunia.

berita: Jakarta, There is a behavior in society that pricks a needle or cuts a little skin on people who have had a stroke until the blood comes out. It is said that the goal is to facilitate the flow of blood that is blocked due to a stroke. the part where the needle is pierced so that the blood comes out is done on all the fingertips or in the ear. Then there is also the act of tugging at the ear if you see a stroke patient whose mouth is sticking out. Unfortunately, this action has absolutely no evidence and even tends to injure the sufferer. There is no empirical evidence for treating needle pricks or ear tugging as first aid for stroke. There are so many things in society that are misunderstood about various ways to be done during an emergency, for example pricking with a needle. Actually, this method is not empirically proven to cure the early phase of stroke, said Dr. Manfaluthy Hakim, SpS (K) from the department of neurology FKUI when contacted by detikHealth, Wednesday (07/04/2012). Dr. Luthy said the most appropriate way to treat stroke is to immediately take him to the hospital, this is because the success of a stroke is strongly influenced by time. Dr Luthy used to call the golden period for a stroke 3 hours after the initial attack. If they are helped during this golden period, the chances of recovery are greater than those who are helped too  late, said the doctor who was born in Jakarta 49 years ago. If you experience or see symptoms like these, you suddenly experience paralysis on one side of the body, speak sluggishly, tingling in one part of the body or become unconscious, you should immediately be taken to the hospital for treatment and treatment. Do not delay any longer or try to help self-medicate, because how quickly the patient gets the right help, the damage to the brain caused by a stroke can be minimized. People sometimes recognize the term mild stroke if the symptoms that appear are not too severe or only a few signs and symptoms appear. But society should not underestimate this condition. If we don't have the term mild, moderate or severe stroke, everything is the same, namely stroke and the treatment is the same. Because if you call it a mild stroke and there is no treatment, it can become a serious condition, he said. For example, the blockage in the brain is only a little but if it is not immediately taken to the hospital it can become severe, other conditions such as a ruptured blood vessel that has expanded can make the patient unable to be helped. Dr. Luthy revealed that based on data from Riskesdas in 2007 it was known that at the age of 55-64 years, both people living in cities and villages, stroke was the main cause of death.
berita_id: Jakarta, ada perilaku dalam masyarakat yang menusuk jarum atau memotong sedikit kulit pada orang -orang yang mengalami stroke sampai darah keluar.Dikatakan bahwa tujuannya adalah untuk memfasilitasi aliran darah yang diblokir karena stroke.Bagian di mana jarum ditusuk sehingga darah keluar dilakukan pada semua ujung jari atau di telinga.Lalu ada juga tindakan menarik telinga jika Anda melihat pasien stroke yang mulutnya mencuat.Sayangnya, tindakan ini sama sekali tidak memiliki bukti dan bahkan cenderung melukai penderita.Tidak ada bukti empiris untuk mengobati tusukan jarum atau menarik telinga sebagai pertolongan pertama untuk stroke.Ada begitu banyak hal di masyarakat yang disalahpahami tentang berbagai cara yang harus dilakukan selama keadaan darurat, misalnya menusuk dengan jarum.Sebenarnya, metode ini tidak terbukti secara empiris untuk menyembuhkan fase awal stroke, kata Dr. Manfaluthy Hakim, SPS (K) dari Departemen Neurologi FKUI ketika dihubungi oleh DetikHealth, Rabu (07/04/2012).Luthy mengatakan cara yang paling tepat untuk mengobati stroke adalah dengan segera membawanya ke rumah sakit, ini karena keberhasilan stroke sangat dipengaruhi oleh waktu.Dr Luthy biasa memanggil periode emas untuk stroke 3 jam setelah serangan awal.Jika mereka dibantu selama periode emas ini, peluang pemulihan lebih besar daripada mereka yang dibantu terlambat, kata dokter yang lahir di Jakarta 49 tahun yang lalu.Jika Anda mengalami atau melihat gejala seperti ini, Anda tiba -tiba mengalami kelumpuhan di satu sisi tubuh, berbicara dengan lamban, kesemutan di satu bagian tubuh atau menjadi tidak sadar, Anda harus segera dibawa ke rumah sakit untuk perawatan dan perawatan.Jangan menunda lagi atau mencoba membantu obat-obatan sendiri, karena seberapa cepat pasien mendapatkan bantuan yang tepat, kerusakan otak yang disebabkan oleh stroke dapat diminimalkan.Orang terkadang mengenali istilah stroke ringan jika gejala yang muncul tidak terlalu parah atau hanya beberapa tanda dan gejala yang muncul.Tetapi masyarakat tidak boleh meremehkan kondisi ini.Jika kita tidak memiliki istilah stroke ringan, sedang atau parah, semuanya sama, yaitu stroke dan pengobatannya sama.Karena jika Anda menyebutnya stroke ringan dan tidak ada perawatan, itu bisa menjadi kondisi yang serius, katanya.Sebagai contoh, penyumbatan di otak hanya sedikit tetapi jika tidak segera dibawa ke rumah sakit, ia bisa menjadi parah, kondisi lain seperti pembuluh darah yang pecah yang telah diperluas dapat membuat pasien tidak dapat dibantu.Luthy mengungkapkan bahwa berdasarkan data dari Riskesdas pada tahun 2007 diketahui bahwa pada usia 55-64 tahun, baik orang yang tinggal di kota-kota dan desa, stroke adalah penyebab utama kematian.

berita: The Indonesian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Retno LP Marsudi, confirmed that the news that Reog Ponorogo was deliberately set on fire at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) office in Davao, Philippines, was not entirely true. "Reog and gamelan ornaments in the form of dragon heads were burned because they were damaged and infested with termites," said Retno via text message, Saturday, October 31, 2015. For information, several media outlets had published news stating that officials at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao had allowed people to burn Indonesian cultural products. because it is considered idol worship. It was reported that the Reog and the dragon headdress were burned on 20 October 2015 in the courtyard of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao with the help of two security guards. "Reog has october been damaged so it has nothing to do with the notion of worshiping idols," said Retno.
berita_id: Menteri Luar Negeri Indonesia, Retno LP Marsudi, mengkonfirmasi bahwa berita bahwa Reog Ponorogo sengaja dibakar di Kantor Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) di Davao, Filipina, tidak sepenuhnya benar."Ornamen reog dan gamelan dalam bentuk naga kepala dibakar karena mereka rusak dan terinfeksi rayap," kata Retno melalui pesan teks, Sabtu, 31 Oktober 2015. Sebagai informasi, beberapa media telah menerbitkan berita yang menyatakan bahwa pejabat di konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao telah mengizinkan orang untuk membakar produk -produk budaya Indonesia.Karena itu dianggap sebagai penyembahan berhala.Dilaporkan bahwa REOG dan HEADDRESS Naga dibakar pada 20 Oktober 2015 di halaman Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao dengan bantuan dua penjaga keamanan."Reog telah Oktober telah rusak sehingga tidak ada hubungannya dengan gagasan menyembah berhala," kata Retno.

berita: Regarding the finding of candy snacks containing drugs, a number of people are worried, such as the Pekanbaru legislature. The Council asked the Police, Disperindag, BPOM and other related agencies enounce to act immediately and go to the field to ensure that the snacks for children suspected of containing drugs were not circulating in Pekanbaru City. "This is what worries us and the public, so it must be anticipated as soon as possible, so that it does not enter our area. For this reason, the police have been able to move down to the field to ensure that pacifiers suspected of containing drugs are not circulating in Pekanbaru, trace every trader and producer, " said Member of Commission II DPRD Pekanbaru City, Roem Diani Dewi, Friday (10/3). This PKS politician said that if the candy case which was indicated to contain drugs was true, then the police were asked to be firm and enforce the existing rules. "Don't let the goods have been circulated before taking action, because in some stalls it seems that they are already circulating, and we will see for ourselves," said Roem. In addition, said Roem, if it is proven that it is true and positive for containing drugs, law enforcement authorities are asked to be firm and give appropriate punishment to the food distributor or supplier. "It is the perpetrators of this crime who need to be dealt with. It is clear that this is damaging the nation's generation by incorporating harmful substances into snacks, especially for children," said Roem. Furthermore, Roem also hopes that, as a form of anticipation, the government, be it BPOM, Diskes, and schools need to work together to disseminate information to students about the dangers of drugs. "We hope that students are given an understanding of the dangers of this drug, especially if it is packaged in an attractive form like the alleged pacifier containing drugs, it is very difficult to be recognized by the public especially children. I think the school also plays a role and should not allow traffickers roaming outside schools whose health and safety are not guaranteed," explained Roem. The finding of pacifiers suspected of containing drugs is reportedly being traded in a number of elementary schools and kindergartens (TK) in the city of Surabaya, even to confirm the case, the Surabaya East Java government and other related parties such as the BPOM are reportedly conducting an investigation.
berita_id: Mengenai temuan camilan permen yang mengandung obat -obatan, sejumlah orang khawatir, seperti legislatif Pekanbaru.Dewan meminta polisi, Disperindag, BPOM, dan lembaga terkait lainnya untuk bertindak segera dan pergi ke lapangan untuk memastikan bahwa makanan ringan untuk anak -anak yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan tidak beredar di Kota Pekanbaru."Inilah yang membuat kami khawatir dan publik, jadi itu harus diantisipasi sesegera mungkin, sehingga tidak memasuki daerah kami. Untuk alasan ini, polisi telah dapat pindah ke lapangan untuk memastikan bahwa dot yang dicurigai mengandung obat -obatan tidak beredar di PEKANBARU, ROUS setiap pedagang dan produser," kata anggota Komisi II PEKAN.Politisi PKS ini mengatakan bahwa jika kasus permen yang diindikasikan mengandung narkoba itu benar, maka polisi diminta untuk menjadi tegas dan menegakkan aturan yang ada."Jangan biarkan barang telah diedarkan sebelum mengambil tindakan, karena di beberapa kios tampaknya mereka sudah beredar, dan kita akan melihat sendiri," kata Roem.Selain itu, kata Roem, jika terbukti bahwa itu benar dan positif untuk mengandung obat -obatan, otoritas penegak hukum diminta untuk tegas dan memberikan hukuman yang tepat kepada distributor makanan atau pemasok."Ini adalah pelaku kejahatan ini yang perlu ditangani. Jelas bahwa ini merusak generasi bangsa dengan memasukkan zat berbahaya ke dalam makanan ringan, terutama untuk anak -anak," kata Roem.Selain itu, Roem juga berharap bahwa, sebagai bentuk antisipasi, pemerintah, baik itu bpom, disk, dan sekolah perlu bekerja sama untuk menyebarkan informasi kepada siswa tentang bahaya narkoba."Kami berharap bahwa siswa diberi pemahaman tentang bahaya obat ini, terutama jika dikemas dalam bentuk yang menarik seperti dugaan dot yang mengandung obat -obatan, sangat sulit untuk diakui oleh publik terutama anak -anak. Saya pikir sekolah juga memainkan peran dan seharusnya tidak mengizinkan pedagang berkeliaran di luar sekolah yang kesehatan dan keselamatannya tidak dijamin," jelas Roem.Temuan dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan dilaporkan diperdagangkan di sejumlah sekolah dasar dan taman kanak -kanak (TK) di kota Surabaya, bahkan untuk mengkonfirmasi kasus tersebut, pemerintah Jawa East Surabaya dan partai -partai terkait lainnya seperti BPOM dilaporkan melakukan penyelidikan.

berita: Twitter social media is busy discussing the invitation to revoke the application or uninstall Traveloka. The invitation was the result of a walk out action by renowned pianist Ananda Sukarlan at the 90th anniversary event of Kanisius College which was attended by the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan, Saturday 11 November 2017. As soon as Ananda left the meeting room, news circulated that one of the founders of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma greeted the pianist. The attitude of the Traveloka founder was seen by the public as support for harassment of Anies who son was giving a speech. The invitation to revoke the Traveloka application then became a trending topic on Twitter, with the hashtag #UninstallTraveloka. Twitter users are split into two voices; there are those who support the boycott of the Traveloka application, there are those who regret the excessive action. Traveloka provides an official answer to the rolling issue. According to Traveloka, there was misinformation from the widely circulated news. "We state that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders," explained Traveloka in an official statement to VIVA. via email, Tuesday 14 November 2017. Traveloka stated that it was proud that one of the founders received an award from Kanisius alumni at the event. "This award further motivates us to increase our contribution to society by increasing mobility and improving the quality of life," said Traveloka. Traveloka provides clarification about the dragging of their founder's name. Derianto was not present at the event, in contrast to the news circulating so far. Traveloka said that the news that Derianto came and greeted Ananda was a hoax, because at that time Derianto was outside Jakarta. "However, he was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned a few months earlier. He was not in Jakarta," said Traveloka.
berita_id: Twitter Social Media sibuk mendiskusikan undangan untuk mencabut aplikasi atau menghapus instalan Traveloka.Undangan itu adalah hasil dari aksi walk out oleh pianis terkenal Ananda Sukarlan di acara peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College yang dihadiri oleh gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan, Sabtu 11 November 2017. Segera setelah Ananda meninggalkan Ruang Rapat, beredar berita bahwa salah satu pendiri Travelers dari Travelers, Dere Dherian.Sikap pendiri Traveloka dipandang oleh publik sebagai dukungan untuk pelecehan anies yang putra memberikan pidato.Undangan untuk mencabut aplikasi Traveloka kemudian menjadi topik yang sedang tren di Twitter, dengan tagar #uninstalltraveloka.Pengguna Twitter dibagi menjadi dua suara;Ada yang mendukung boikot aplikasi Traveloka, ada yang menyesali tindakan berlebihan.Traveloka memberikan jawaban resmi untuk masalah bergulir.Menurut Traveloka, ada informasi yang salah dari berita yang diedarkan secara luas."Kami menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi dan inovasi. Nilai-nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal," jelas Traveloka dalam pernyataan resmi kepada Viva.melalui email, Selasa 14 November 2017. Traveloka menyatakan bahwa itu bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius di acara tersebut."Penghargaan ini semakin memotivasi kami untuk meningkatkan kontribusi kami kepada masyarakat dengan meningkatkan mobilitas dan meningkatkan kualitas hidup," kata Traveloka.Traveloka memberikan klarifikasi tentang menyeret nama pendiri mereka.DeRianto tidak hadir di acara tersebut, berbeda dengan berita yang beredar sejauh ini.Traveloka mengatakan bahwa berita bahwa DeRianto datang dan menyapa Ananda adalah tipuan, karena pada saat itu Deraianto berada di luar Jakarta."Namun, dia tidak dapat hadir karena dia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya. Dia tidak berada di Jakarta," kata Traveloka.

berita: Is catfish the dirtiest fish? yes. Catfish is one of the favorite food menus & even in every Javanese food stall and this menu is always available, because the price is very cheap & delicious can be the main attraction for this one fish. Although delicious & cheap in price, catfish is the dirtiest animal among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is that? The following is an explanation: The catfish pond is very dirty & surrounded by chicken & pig coops according to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong who admitted that he had supplied a lot of catfish to street markets & restaurants in Hainan province in Haikou city which he harvested 3 once a month. Because there were many complaints from the public, journalists investigated the fish from the local fisheries & marine department. The reporters took samples from the 7 ponds that housed the catfish. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken & pig coops, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of their fish before the test results are out. So why can catfish live in dirty water? that's because this catfish can live in muddy slums with food. Usually this catfish board is cow dung, chicken manure, and goat manure, so it is only natural that this catfish is fat because it is satisfied to eat in a dirty place. Catfish are fish that consume waste. Catfish are the dirtiest animals that are easy to breed in dirty places. Why can catfish live in dirty water? because these fish consume waste in the form of chicken, cow, and pig manure, even these fish can also consume human waste. So it can be ascertained that the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. That's a variety of information about catfish in China, but in Indonesia this fish has been cultivated well by catfish farmers & they use pellets as food instead of using waste which is very dangerous for the health of the human body. So there is soundly no doubt that consuming catfish in Indonesia is clean, but as a wise consumer you must still be aware of the content of this fish & consuming catfish in large quantities can cause disturbing our health. Apart from all that, is there a healthy function of catfish? in fact this one fish is not only delicious but also contains various substances that are good for the health of the human body. Here are 4 functions in catfish Healthy heart & brain Catfish contains omega-3 & omega-6 which are usually contained in expensive fish such as cod and salmon. The content of omega-3 and omega-6 can help heart and brain health activities, and in fact in a serving of catfish contains 220 mg of omega-3 and 875 mg of omega-6. Contains protein with good value In a serving of catfish contains 15.6 grams of protein which is very useful in the formation of muscle tissue & strengthens the immune system. Contains vitamin B-12, a serving of catfish contains vitamin B-12, which is 40% of the body's needs. This vitamin functions in helping to break down food into energy for the body, so consuming these foods can make the body stronger. Contains DHA Pregnant women are advised to eat catfish, because this fish contains DHA which is good for the formation of the baby's nerves and also this fish has a very low mercury content and is safe for consumption. That's a variety of information about the dirtiest fish catfish, one mouthful contains three thousand cancer cells, but in fact this fish also has high nutritional value if cultivated properly. Thank you for reading catfish the dirtiest fish 1 mouthful contains thousands of cancer cells and it turns out that catfish is the dirtiest fish in the world.
berita_id: Apakah ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor?Ya.Catfish adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit & bahkan di setiap kios makanan Jawa dan menu ini selalu tersedia, karena harganya sangat murah & lezat dapat menjadi daya tarik utama untuk ikan yang satu ini.Meskipun lezat & harganya murah, ikan lele adalah hewan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Kenapa begitu?Berikut ini adalah penjelasan: Kolam ikan lele sangat kotor & dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam & babi menurut seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-hong yang mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele ke pasar jalanan & restoran di Provinsi Hainan di Kota Haikou yang ia panen 3 sekali sebulan.Karena ada banyak keluhan dari publik, jurnalis menyelidiki ikan dari perikanan & departemen kelautan setempat.Para wartawan mengambil sampel dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Tujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam & babi, sedangkan di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Para petani ikan disarankan untuk menangguhkan penjualan ikan mereka sebelum hasil tes keluar.Jadi mengapa ikan lele bisa hidup di air kotor?Itu karena ikan lele ini bisa hidup di daerah kumuh berlumpur dengan makanan.Biasanya papan ikan lele ini adalah kotoran sapi, kotoran ayam, dan pupuk kambing, jadi wajar jika ikan lele ini gemuk karena puas makan di tempat yang kotor.Ikan lele adalah ikan yang mengonsumsi limbah.Lele adalah hewan paling kotor yang mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor.Mengapa ikan lele bisa hidup di air kotor?Karena ikan ini mengonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk ayam, sapi, dan pupuk babi, bahkan ikan ini juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah manusia.Jadi dapat dipastikan bahwa tubuh ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang sangat berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Itu adalah berbagai informasi tentang ikan lele di Cina, tetapi di Indonesia ikan ini telah dibudidayakan dengan baik oleh petani lele & mereka menggunakan pelet sebagai makanan alih -alih menggunakan limbah yang sangat berbahaya bagi kesehatan tubuh manusia.Jadi tidak ada keraguan bahwa mengonsumsi ikan lele di Indonesia itu bersih, tetapi sebagai konsumen yang bijak, Anda masih harus menyadari kandungan ikan ini & mengonsumsi ikan lele dalam jumlah besar dapat menyebabkan mengganggu kesehatan kita.Terlepas dari semua itu, apakah ada fungsi ikan lele yang sehat?Sebenarnya ikan yang satu ini tidak hanya lezat tetapi juga mengandung berbagai zat yang baik untuk kesehatan tubuh manusia.Berikut adalah 4 fungsi dalam catfish Healthy Heart & Brain Catfish mengandung omega-3 & omega-6 yang biasanya terkandung dalam ikan mahal seperti cod dan salmon.Isi omega-3 dan omega-6 dapat membantu kegiatan kesehatan jantung dan otak, dan pada kenyataannya dalam porsi ikan lele mengandung 220 mg omega-3 dan 875 mg omega-6.Mengandung protein dengan nilai baik dalam porsi ikan lele mengandung 15,6 gram protein yang sangat berguna dalam pembentukan jaringan otot & memperkuat sistem kekebalan tubuh.Mengandung vitamin B-12, porsi ikan lele mengandung vitamin B-12, yang merupakan 40% dari kebutuhan tubuh.Vitamin ini berfungsi dalam membantu memecah makanan menjadi energi bagi tubuh, sehingga mengonsumsi makanan ini dapat membuat tubuh lebih kuat.Berisi wanita hamil DHA disarankan untuk makan ikan lele, karena ikan ini mengandung DHA yang baik untuk pembentukan saraf bayi dan juga ikan ini memiliki kandungan merkuri yang sangat rendah dan aman untuk dikonsumsi.Itu adalah berbagai informasi tentang ikan lele ikan paling kotor, satu suap berisi tiga ribu sel kanker, tetapi pada kenyataannya ikan ini juga memiliki nilai gizi yang tinggi jika dibudidayakan dengan benar.Terima kasih telah membaca Catfish, ikan paling kotor 1 suapan berisi ribuan sel kanker dan ternyata ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di dunia.

berita: Clarias or what we usually call catfish has recently become a hot topic of conversation around the world of health. Some associate it with fish that live in dirty water all day long, some say that a mouthful of catfish contains 3000 cancer cells. It is very strange that such news can scare so many people. In an instant it became viral information in cyberspace. Please note that receiving information from the internet should not only read the title, but also read the contents of the article to the end. Indeed, misleading titles often make people curious, not only that, the rating obtained from the creator of the title immediately skyrocketed. However, there are also netizens who when they see the title, they immediately believe that catfish actually contains cancer cells. Imagine if the untrue news was then believed and disseminated by many readers, the catfish pond entrepreneurs might go out of business because no one else wants to buy this fish. Catfish is not as bad as imagined, in fact this fish provides very many benefits for humans. What are the benefits? Here we provide the benefits and the actual explanation of catfish. Catfish Can Digest Any Food Into Protein. This fish that lives in fresh water is considered a very special fish, one of its features is the ability of the digestive tract of this fish to convert whatever it eats into a very high source of protein, including feces. into protein through the digestive system. Not only as a complementary menu when eating, the protein content consumed from catfish is also able to improve the digestive process and growth in humans. Besides being able to help repair muscle damage, the content contained in catfish is also known to cure herpes. Has a Higher Phosphorus Content than Eggs Eggs are known as food ingredients that contain 100 mg (milligrams) of phosphorus, but in fact this amount is still smaller than the phosphorus content found in catfish meat, which amounts to 168 mg per 100 grams. The phosphorus content in catfish is able to improve metabolism in the body and provide energy. Not only that, the most famous benefit of the content of catfish is to strengthen teeth and gums. turn Helps Control Blood Pressure in the Brain Unlike the title of information obtained in other articles which say that catfish is a source of disease. Here, catfish is known as a food that can prevent stokes. The content of sodium and potassium found in catfish is able to clean dirty blood cells, improve blood circulation to the brain. Until this fish is believed to be a fish that is able to prevent its eaters from being disturbed by stokes. Very Good for Pregnant Women Besides being easy to digest, this fish has a lot of nutritional content for pregnant women. The low-fat content and rich in Omega 3 contained in the meat is believed to be able to help the mother's digestive process and the development of the fetus it contains. In addition to the above, the benefits of catfish are also known as the most powerful drug for treating heart disease to cleaning dirty blood cells that are channeled through the blood vessels.
berita_id: Clarias atau apa yang biasanya kita sebut Catfish baru -baru ini menjadi topik hangat percakapan di seluruh dunia kesehatan.Beberapa mengaitkannya dengan ikan yang hidup dalam air kotor sepanjang hari, beberapa mengatakan bahwa seteguk ikan lele berisi 3000 sel kanker.Sangat aneh bahwa berita semacam itu dapat menakuti begitu banyak orang.Dalam sekejap itu menjadi informasi viral di dunia maya.Harap dicatat bahwa menerima informasi dari Internet tidak hanya harus membaca judulnya, tetapi juga membaca konten artikel sampai akhir.Memang, judul yang menyesatkan sering membuat orang penasaran, tidak hanya itu, peringkat yang diperoleh dari pencipta judul segera meroket.Namun, ada juga netizen yang ketika mereka melihat judulnya, mereka segera percaya bahwa ikan lele sebenarnya mengandung sel kanker.Bayangkan jika berita yang tidak benar kemudian dipercaya dan disebarluaskan oleh banyak pembaca, pengusaha tambak ikan lele mungkin gulung tikar karena tidak ada orang lain yang mau membeli ikan ini.Lele tidak seburuk yang dibayangkan, sebenarnya ikan ini memberikan banyak manfaat bagi manusia.Apa manfaatnya?Di sini kami memberikan manfaat dan penjelasan sebenarnya tentang ikan lele.Lele dapat mencerna makanan apa pun menjadi protein.Ikan yang hidup dalam air tawar ini dianggap sebagai ikan yang sangat istimewa, salah satu fiturnya adalah kemampuan saluran pencernaan
