"After approaching 10 (at night), we met with the head of his entourage, we announced to his entourage that the rules at Istiqlal, this mosque will be closed and will be opened again one hour before Fajr," he said. Abu explained, the group from East Java understood and understood. The mosque management waited for them to leave the Istiqlal Mosque voluntarily. Then at 03.40 WIB the mosque was reopened. "And what's in the photo, it looks like people are queuing up to enter, it's the Wali Songo pilgrimage group and school children, that's normal, they go to Istiqlal every day," he explained. He emphasized that in conclusion, the news circulating on Instagram, Twitter and other social media was a lie
berita_id: Sirkulasi foto peserta aksi 212 volume dua di media sosial yang tidak dapat memasuki masjid istiqlal pagi ini karena pintu masjid ditutup.Menurut masjid manajemen, masalah yang beredar tidak benar."Ini adalah tipuan seribu persen," kata kepala bagian protokol dari masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam ke Republika.co.id Selasa pagi.Dia mengatakan, untuk kasus tadi malam, memang ada peserta dalam aksi yang berasal dari Jawa Timur sebanyak lima bus.Mereka mengaku datang dari Madura.Peserta sekolah memasuki masjid setelah waktu Isha.Masjid ini memberikan kesempatan untuk beribadah dan membersihkan."Setelah mendekati 10 (di malam hari), kami bertemu dengan kepala rombongannya, kami mengumumkan kepada rombongannya bahwa aturan di ISTIQLAL, masjid ini akan ditutup dan akan dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum Fajr," katanya.Abu menjelaskan, kelompok dari Jawa Timur memahami dan memahami.Manajemen masjid menunggu mereka meninggalkan masjid Istiqlal secara sukarela.Kemudian pada 03.40 WIB masjid dibuka kembali."Dan apa yang ada di foto, sepertinya orang -orang mengantri untuk masuk, itu adalah kelompok ziarah Wali Songo dan anak -anak sekolah, itu normal, mereka pergi ke Istiqlal setiap hari," jelasnya.Dia menekankan bahwa sebagai kesimpulan, berita yang beredar di Instagram, Twitter dan media sosial lainnya adalah kebohongan

berita: The National Narcotics Agency (BNN) of Surabaya City asked the public not to panic about pacifier candy. The candy, which is suspected of containing hazardous materials and drugs, is now being raided by the Surabaya City Government. The head of the Surabaya City BNN, AKBP Suparti, asked the public not to be in a hurry to worry about pacifiers. "We ask the public not to panic. We will first test the pacifier candy," said Suparti, Tuesday (7/3/2017). Suparti said that until now there is no evidence that the candy is dangerous or contains narcotic substances. "There's no lab test yet, so it can't be determined whether the candy is dangerous or not," said Suparti. The former Head of Sub-Division of Public Relations of the Surabaya Police said that his party had also taken samples of pacifier candy in various places. Such as stalls, shops, and several markets. "We populace went down and took the pacifier candy. Later a lab test will be carried out to determine whether it is dangerous or contains narcotics," said Suparti. He emphasized that his party would soon conduct a lab test on the candy.
berita_id: Badan Narkotika Nasional (BNN) Kota Surabaya meminta publik untuk tidak panik tentang Permen Paten.Permen, yang diduga mengandung bahan dan obat -obatan berbahaya, sekarang sedang digerebek oleh pemerintah kota Surabaya.Kepala Bnn Kota Surabaya, AKBP Suparti, meminta publik untuk tidak terburu -buru untuk khawatir tentang dot."Kami meminta publik untuk tidak panik. Pertama -tama kami akan menguji permen dot," kata Suparti, Selasa (7/3/2017).Suparti mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada bukti bahwa permen itu berbahaya atau mengandung zat narkotika."Belum ada tes laboratorium, jadi tidak dapat ditentukan apakah permen itu berbahaya atau tidak," kata Suparti.Mantan kepala sub-divisi hubungan masyarakat dari polisi Surabaya mengatakan bahwa partainya juga telah mengambil sampel permen dot di berbagai tempat.Seperti kios, toko, dan beberapa pasar."Kami populasi turun dan mengambil permen dot. Kemudian tes laboratorium akan dilakukan untuk menentukan apakah itu berbahaya atau mengandung narkotika," kata Suparti.Dia menekankan bahwa partainya akan segera melakukan tes lab pada permen.

berita: Catfish are freshwater fish, which usually live in critical places such as rice fields, dirty and muddy fish ponds and swamps. Many catfish live in places that lack oxygen. These fish are also known as carnivores, because they eat small shrimp and worms. Catfish are also known as tough fish species, because they are equipped with an additional respiratory apparatus in the form of a labyrinth, which allows catfish to survive in polluted and dirty water conditions. This way of living and growing in such a dirty place has led to accusations that catfish contain cancer cells. However, currently, the catfish circulating in the market are not catfish that live in the wild. Currently, there are many catfish farming in ponds, by providing good quality feed and controlling the cleanliness of the pond so that it is free from pollution. According to data from the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (KKP), catfish production in 2013 reached 543,461 tons, an increase from 441,217 tons in 2012 and 337,577 tons in 2011. Meanwhile, catfish consumption according to the Central Statistics Agency (BPS) was recorded at 29.98 kg / capita / year, up from 22.58 kg/capita/year in 2004. In Jakarta no less than 6,000 pecel catfish stalls have been registered with the Indonesian Street Vendors Association (APKLI). The popularity of catfish always increases every year. This is inseparable from the myriad benefits of this murmured fish meat. The nutritional content found in catfish is a cheap source of valuable protein. As we know protein is very necessary for the growth of the fetus in the womb. Even the nutrition contained in 2.5 kg of catfish is equivalent to the nutrition of 1 kg of beef. The high phosphorus in catfish meat adds to the benefits of the fish, especially for pregnant women and their fetuses. In addition to phosphorus, potassium and sodium in catfish are also useful as the best food source for the heart and blood vessels. By regularly consuming catfish, it helps the heart work in pregnant women so that the blood will be pumped properly. The allegation that there are cancer cells in catfish cannot be believed to be true, this is reinforced by the statement of cancer experts from the Indonesian Oncology Association. Currently there is no research that states that eating catfish can choice trigger cancer, said dr.Dradjat R Suardi, SpB (K) Onk, a cancer expert from the Indonesian Oncology Association.
berita_id: Ikan lele adalah ikan air tawar, yang biasanya tinggal di tempat -tempat kritis seperti sawah, kolam ikan yang kotor dan berlumpur dan rawa -rawa.Banyak ikan lele tinggal di tempat -tempat yang kekurangan oksigen.Ikan -ikan ini juga dikenal sebagai karnivora, karena mereka makan udang kecil dan cacing.Ikan lele juga dikenal sebagai spesies ikan yang tangguh, karena mereka dilengkapi dengan peralatan pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin, yang memungkinkan ikan lele untuk bertahan hidup dalam kondisi air yang tercemar dan kotor.Cara hidup dan tumbuh di tempat yang begitu kotor ini telah menyebabkan tuduhan bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker.Namun, saat ini, ikan lele yang beredar di pasar bukanlah ikan lele yang hidup di alam liar.Saat ini, ada banyak pertanian ikan lele di kolam, dengan memberikan pakan berkualitas baik dan mengendalikan kebersihan kolam sehingga bebas dari polusi.Menurut data dari Kementerian Urusan Maritim dan Perikanan (KKP), produksi ikan lele pada tahun 2013 mencapai 543.461 ton, peningkatan dari 441.217 ton pada 2012 dan 337.577 ton pada tahun 2011. Sementara itu, Capfish Consumption menurut Badan Statistik Sentral (bps) direkam di 29.9.KG/Capita/Tahun pada tahun 2004. Di Jakarta tidak kurang dari 6.000 kios lele PECEL telah terdaftar di Indonesian Street Vendors Association (APKLI).Popularitas ikan lele selalu meningkat setiap tahun.Ini tidak dapat dipisahkan dari berbagai manfaat daging ikan yang bergumam ini.Kandungan nutrisi yang ditemukan dalam ikan lele adalah sumber protein berharga yang murah.Seperti yang kita ketahui, protein sangat diperlukan untuk pertumbuhan janin di dalam rahim.Bahkan nutrisi yang terkandung dalam 2,5 kg ikan lele setara dengan nutrisi 1 kg daging sapi.Tingginya fosfor dalam daging ikan lele menambah manfaat ikan, terutama untuk wanita hamil dan janinnya.Selain fosfor, kalium dan natrium dalam lele juga berguna sebagai sumber makanan terbaik untuk pembuluh jantung dan darah.Dengan mengonsumsi ikan lele secara teratur, itu membantu jantung bekerja pada wanita hamil sehingga darah akan dipompa dengan benar.Tuduhan bahwa ada sel kanker dalam ikan lele tidak dapat diyakini benar, ini diperkuat oleh pernyataan para ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia.Saat ini tidak ada penelitian yang menyatakan bahwa makan ikan lele dapat memicu kanker, kata Dr.Dradjat R Suardi, SPB (K) Onk, seorang ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia.

berita: In a state document confiscated by US troops, during a coup in 2004, it was revealed that there were "uncommendable" actions or negative messages behind the film. The document states that President Saddam Hussein received information about the film from the state intelligence agency. According to information, the names used in the Pokemon movies contain an invitation info that cannot be tolerated. Reporting from neutrality (13/4/16), it was revealed a fact that the word Pokemon itself means "I am Jewish". The name Pokemon is taken from the Syriac language, or the Syriac language which in Indonesian means 'I am Jewish'.
berita_id: Dalam sebuah dokumen negara yang disita oleh pasukan AS, selama kudeta pada tahun 2004, terungkap bahwa ada tindakan "tidak menyenangkan" atau pesan negatif di balik film tersebut.Dokumen tersebut menyatakan bahwa Presiden Saddam Hussein menerima informasi tentang film dari Badan Intelijen Negara.Menurut informasi, nama -nama yang digunakan dalam film Pokemon berisi info undangan yang tidak dapat ditoleransi.Pelaporan dari Netralitas (13/4/16), terungkap fakta bahwa kata Pokemon itu sendiri berarti "Saya Yahudi".Nama Pokemon diambil dari bahasa Syria, atau bahasa Syria yang dalam bahasa Indonesia berarti 'Saya Yahudi'.

berita: The burning of Reog Ponorogo by the Consulate area General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao City, Philippines, is considered not a trivial matter. The consulate general should not burn the reog even though it has been damaged by age. The chairman of the Reog Ponorogo Association throughout Indonesia, Begug Purnomosidi, said that the Consul General should have thought about it before being burned. What is burned, this is your own culture, don't burn it, let alone disseminate it. This is an insult, he told Republika.co.id, Monday (2/11). This act is said to be associated with the extermination of idols. Although this has been denied by the Indonesian Consulate General, the burning still leaves its own disappointment for reog lovers. That's the same as Indonesians abroad insulting their own culture, that's not true, he said. Begug and his friends just landed in Jakarta today. Tomorrow, they plan to meet with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemenlu) to resolve this issue. Initially, Reog Ponorogo art lovers in the regions wanted to flock to Jakarta to convey their disappointment to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. But the intention was prevented by Begung. Should be resolved internally with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. If there is a problem, it can be a long story, he said. The Reog Ponorogo Association throughout Indonesia wants the Foreign Minister to take action against his subordinates. We want the Foreign Minister to discipline Indonesians abroad, especially her subordinates, to respect the nation. REPUBLIKA.CO.ID, JAKARTA – The burning of Reog Ponorogo by the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao City, Philippines, is considered not a trivial matter. The consulate general should not burn the reog even though it has been damaged by age. The chairman of the Reog Ponorogo Association throughout Indonesia, Begug Purnomosidi, said that the Consul General should have thought about it before being burned. What is burned, this is your own culture, don't burn it, let alone disseminate it. This is an insult, he told Republika.co.id, Monday (2/11). This act is said to be associated with the extermination of idols. Although this has been denied by the Indonesian Consulate General, the burning still leaves its own disappointment for reog lovers. That's the same as Indonesians abroad insulting their own culture, that's not true, he said. Begug and his friends just landed in Jakarta today. Tomorrow, they plan to meet with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemenlu) to resolve this issue. Initially, Reog Ponorogo art lovers in the regions wanted to flock to Jakarta to convey their disappointment to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. But the intention was prevented by Begung. Should be resolved internally with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. If there is a problem, it can be a long story, he said. The Reog Ponorogo Association throughout Indonesia wants the Foreign Minister to take action against his subordinates. We want the Foreign Minister to discipline Indonesians abroad, especially her subordinates, to respect the nation. Don't even hit it from the inside, said Begug.
berita_id: Pembakaran Reog Ponorogo oleh Area Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) di Kota Davao, Filipina, dianggap bukan masalah sepele.Konsulat Jenderal tidak boleh membakar reog meskipun telah rusak karena usia.Ketua Asosiasi Reog Ponorogo di seluruh Indonesia, Purnomosidi Begug, mengatakan bahwa konsul jenderal seharusnya memikirkannya sebelum dibakar.Apa yang dibakar, ini adalah budaya Anda sendiri, jangan membakarnya, apalagi menyebarkannya.Ini adalah penghinaan, katanya kepada Republika.co.id, Senin (2/11).Tindakan ini dikatakan terkait dengan pemusnahan idola.Meskipun ini telah ditolak oleh Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia, pembakaran masih meninggalkan kekecewaannya sendiri untuk pecinta Reog.Itu sama dengan orang Indonesia di luar negeri menghina budaya mereka sendiri, itu tidak benar, katanya.Begug dan teman -temannya baru saja mendarat di Jakarta hari ini.Besok, mereka berencana untuk bertemu dengan Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemenlu) untuk menyelesaikan masalah ini.Awalnya, pecinta seni Reog Ponorogo di daerah ingin berbondong -bondong ke Jakarta untuk menyampaikan kekecewaan mereka kepada Kementerian Luar Negeri.Tetapi niat itu dicegah oleh Begung.Harus diselesaikan secara internal dengan Kementerian Luar Negeri.Jika ada masalah, itu bisa menjadi cerita panjang, katanya.Asosiasi Reog Ponorogo di seluruh Indonesia ingin Menteri Luar Negeri mengambil tindakan terhadap bawahannya.Kami ingin Menteri Luar Negeri mendisiplinkan orang Indonesia di luar negeri, terutama bawahannya, untuk menghormati bangsa.Republika.co.id, Jakarta - Pembakaran Reog Ponorogo oleh Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) di Kota Davao, Filipina, dianggap bukan masalah sepele.Konsulat Jenderal tidak boleh membakar reog meskipun telah rusak karena usia.Ketua Asosiasi Reog Ponorogo di seluruh Indonesia, Purnomosidi Begug, mengatakan bahwa konsul jenderal seharusnya memikirkannya sebelum dibakar.Apa yang dibakar, ini adalah budaya Anda sendiri, jangan membakarnya, apalagi menyebarkannya.Ini adalah penghinaan, katanya kepada Republika.co.id, Senin (2/11).Tindakan ini dikatakan terkait dengan pemusnahan idola.Meskipun ini telah ditolak oleh Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia, pembakaran masih meninggalkan kekecewaannya sendiri untuk pecinta Reog.Itu sama dengan orang Indonesia di luar negeri menghina budaya mereka sendiri, itu tidak benar, katanya.Begug dan teman -temannya baru saja mendarat di Jakarta hari ini.Besok, mereka berencana untuk bertemu dengan Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemenlu) untuk menyelesaikan masalah ini.Awalnya, pecinta seni Reog Ponorogo di daerah ingin berbondong -bondong ke Jakarta untuk menyampaikan kekecewaan mereka kepada Kementerian Luar Negeri.Tetapi niat itu dicegah oleh Begung.Harus diselesaikan secara internal dengan Kementerian Luar Negeri.Jika ada masalah, itu bisa menjadi cerita panjang, katanya.Asosiasi Reog Ponorogo di seluruh Indonesia ingin Menteri Luar Negeri mengambil tindakan terhadap bawahannya.Kami ingin Menteri Luar Negeri mendisiplinkan orang Indonesia di luar negeri, terutama bawahannya, untuk menghormati bangsa.Bahkan jangan memukulnya dari dalam, kata Begug.

berita: Ahok is not dismissed as Governor of DKI Jakarta due to his status as a defendant in the case of blasphemy against Islam, shows how difficult the law in this country is to enforce. How can you seek brave out justice if the law is a tool to seek justice alone is difficult to enforce. Not a few legal and state administration experts, including former Constitutional Court Justice Mahfud MD, criticized the steps taken by the government, especially the Minister of Home Affairs Tjahyo Kumolo and President Joko Widodo who remained silent when Ahok returned to the governorship, while several other regional heads were dismissed when their status was accused of an act. criminal. This eventually led to the demands of law enforcement through the actions of defending Islam and Defending the State carried out by the Muslim community who joined the FUI (Islamic Community Forum) today (Tuesday, 21/02/2017). In addition to the masses from FUI, there were also a number of students who were members of the student movement for people's defense. Their demands include dismissing the governor who is a suspect, stopping the criminalization of ulama, stopping the arrest of student activists, restoring the nation's sovereignty and returning it to the original 1945 Constitution. The action, which was held in front of the DPR-MPR Building, turned out to be attracting people from outside Jakarta. They tried to gather at the Istiqlal Mosque to pray Fajr in congregation and also at that time the weather was raining. Apparently the fence of the Istiqlal mosque was tightly closed, even though it was approaching Fajr time. As a result, the Action congregation had to get rained on, some of them chose to lie down on the street while waiting for Fajr time. According to a report from one of the gabbarberita.com contributors in the field, the new mosque opened at around 04.00 WIB. Previously where were the BPPMI management and were appointed and inaugurated directly by the Minister of Religion who was also in the structure as the Chairman of BPPMI.
berita_id: Ahok tidak dipecat sebagai gubernur DKI Jakarta karena statusnya sebagai terdakwa dalam kasus penistaan ​​terhadap Islam, menunjukkan betapa sulitnya hukum di negara ini untuk menegakkan.Bagaimana Anda bisa mencari keadilan yang berani jika hukum adalah alat untuk mencari keadilan saja sulit untuk ditegakkan.Tidak sedikit pakar administrasi hukum dan negara bagian, termasuk mantan pengadilan konstitusional Mahfud MD, mengkritik langkah -langkah yang diambil oleh pemerintah, terutama Menteri Dalam Negeri Tjahyo Kumolo dan Presiden Joko Widodo yang tetap diam ketika Ahok kembali ke gubernur, sementara beberapa kepala regional lainnya diberhentikan ketika status mereka ditimbulkan oleh sebuah tindakan.pidana.Hal ini akhirnya mengarah pada tuntutan penegakan hukum melalui tindakan membela Islam dan mempertahankan negara yang dilakukan oleh komunitas Muslim yang bergabung dengan FUI (Forum Komunitas Islam) hari ini (Selasa, 21/02/2017).Selain massa dari Fui, ada juga sejumlah siswa yang merupakan anggota gerakan siswa untuk pertahanan rakyat.Tuntutan mereka termasuk memecat gubernur yang merupakan tersangka, menghentikan kriminalisasi ulama, menghentikan penangkapan aktivis mahasiswa, memulihkan kedaulatan negara dan mengembalikannya ke konstitusi asli 1945.Aksi, yang diadakan di depan gedung DPR-MPR, ternyata menarik orang dari luar Jakarta.Mereka mencoba berkumpul di masjid Istiqlal untuk berdoa Fajr di jemaat dan juga pada waktu itu cuaca sedang hujan.Rupanya pagar masjid Istiqlal tertutup rapat, meskipun mendekati waktu fajr.Akibatnya, jemaat aksi harus dihujani, beberapa dari mereka memilih untuk berbaring di jalan sambil menunggu waktu Fajr.Menurut laporan dari salah satu kontributor Gabbarberita.com di lapangan, masjid baru dibuka pada sekitar pukul 04.00 WIB.Sebelumnya di mana manajemen BPPMI dan ditunjuk dan diresmikan secara langsung oleh Menteri Agama yang juga berada dalam struktur sebagai ketua BPPMI.

berita: Maybe you've read an article or just a chain message about first aid for stroke survivors by sticking a needle into the tip of a finger until it bleeds. Don't swallow this information raw and do it. As explained by Dr. Astried Indrasari SpPD, the news is just a hoax and has not been proven true. There is no first aid to prevent stroke by pricking the patient's finger. Appropriate help is to immediately lift carefully and take the patient to the hospital in order to get the right therapy, he stressed. Patients must receive appropriate therapy to minimize the risk of stroke. If the cause of the patient's fainting is due to a blockage, it is assisted to expedite the blocked blood vessels. Meanwhile, if there is a broken blood vessel, it is prevented so that the broken blood vessel does not get bigger, he said. The doctor at the Regional General Hospital (RSUD) Abdul Wahab Sjahranie (AWS) said that if you want to prevent a stroke, you must take precautions before experiencing blockage or rupture of blood vessels. Most people don't prevent it from the start, but when something new happens, they get worried and confused, he explained. When the blood infirmary vessels are blocked or ruptured, the blood flow in the body will die, so that a person experiences loss of balance. There is no prevention of stroke, which is only therapy so that blockage and rupture of blood vessels does not get worse. Because if left unchecked, it can threaten the patient's life, said Astried
berita_id: Mungkin Anda telah membaca sebuah artikel atau hanya pesan rantai tentang pertolongan pertama untuk penyintas stroke dengan memasukkan jarum ke ujung jari sampai berdarah.Jangan menelan informasi ini mentah dan melakukannya.Seperti yang dijelaskan oleh Dr. Astried Indrasari SPPD, berita itu hanya tipuan dan belum terbukti benar.Tidak ada pertolongan pertama untuk mencegah stroke dengan menusuk jari pasien.Bantuan yang tepat adalah segera mengangkat dengan hati -hati dan membawa pasien ke rumah sakit untuk mendapatkan terapi yang tepat, ia menekankan.Pasien harus menerima terapi yang tepat untuk meminimalkan risiko stroke.Jika penyebab pingsan pasien adalah karena penyumbatan, itu dibantu untuk mempercepat pembuluh darah yang diblokir.Sementara itu, jika ada pembuluh darah yang rusak, itu dicegah sehingga pembuluh darah yang rusak tidak menjadi lebih besar, katanya.Dokter di Rumah Sakit Umum Regional (RSUD) Abdul Wahab Sjahranie (AWS) mengatakan bahwa jika Anda ingin mencegah stroke, Anda harus mengambil tindakan pencegahan sebelum mengalami penyumbatan atau pecahnya pembuluh darah.Kebanyakan orang tidak mencegahnya sejak awal, tetapi ketika sesuatu yang baru terjadi, mereka khawatir dan bingung, jelasnya.Ketika pembuluh darah darah diblokir atau pecah, aliran darah dalam tubuh akan mati, sehingga seseorang mengalami kehilangan keseimbangan.Tidak ada pencegahan stroke, yang hanya terapi sehingga penyumbatan dan pecahnya pembuluh darah tidak menjadi lebih buruk.Karena jika dibiarkan tidak terkendali, itu dapat mengancam kehidupan pasien, kata astried

berita: Stroke is a disease that must be treated as soon as avert possible. Otherwise, the patient's hope for recovery will be smaller. The patient's brain can be damaged and can even lead to death. Therefore, first aid for stroke needs to be done carefully. Mishandling the consequences can be fatal. inserting a needle into the tip of the finger This fact is very wrong. If the needle is not sterile, it can cause infection (such as tetanus) Especially if the person has diabetes. One of the risk factors for stroke is diabetes. This means that diabetic patients are more susceptible to infection and the healing phase is also longer. in stroke patients, blockage or bleeding occurs in the blood vessels in the brain, not in the fingers. Anatomically, the finger is far from the brain, so sticking a needle will not help. The most important thing in dealing with a stroke is to recognize the symptoms. speech is not clear, sudden paralysis, difficulty walking, fainting until loss of consciousness, immediately take to the hospital if you see the above symptoms, especially in the first three hours, which is called the golden period. At that time, the patient is still very likely to avoid a stroke (if immediately treated) correctly) More severe stroke conditions can also be prevented. Therefore, avoid taking any measures as first aid, including inserting a needle into the finger. Take him to the hospital immediately before it is too late.
berita_id: Stroke adalah penyakit yang harus dirawat sesegera mungkin.Kalau tidak, harapan pasien untuk pemulihan akan lebih kecil.Otak pasien dapat rusak dan bahkan dapat menyebabkan kematian.Karena itu, pertolongan pertama untuk stroke perlu dilakukan dengan hati -hati.Salah menangani konsekuensinya bisa berakibat fatal.Memasukkan jarum ke ujung jari fakta ini sangat salah.Jika jarum tidak steril, itu dapat menyebabkan infeksi (seperti tetanus) terutama jika orang tersebut menderita diabetes.Salah satu faktor risiko stroke adalah diabetes.Ini berarti bahwa pasien diabetes lebih rentan terhadap infeksi dan fase penyembuhan juga lebih lama.Pada pasien stroke, penyumbatan atau perdarahan terjadi pada pembuluh darah di otak, bukan di jari.Secara anatomis, jari jauh dari otak, jadi menempelkan jarum tidak akan membantu.Hal terpenting dalam menangani stroke adalah mengenali gejalanya.Pidato tidak jelas, kelumpuhan mendadak, kesulitan berjalan, pingsan sampai kehilangan kesadaran, segera turun ke rumah sakit jika Anda melihat gejala di atas, terutama dalam tiga jam pertama, yang disebut periode emas.Pada saat itu, pasien masih sangat mungkin untuk menghindari stroke (jika segera diobati dengan benar) dengan benar) kondisi stroke yang lebih parah juga dapat dicegah.Oleh karena itu, hindari mengambil tindakan apa pun sebagai pertolongan pertama, termasuk memasukkan jarum ke jari.Bawa dia ke rumah sakit segera sebelum terlambat.

berita: Acupuncture has been used for thousands of years as a healing method, but only recently has it been evaluated for medical conditions by the standards used in Western medicine. One of them is the role of acupuncture as a stroke treatment. What should I know before undergoing acupuncture? Acupuncture is a type of eastern medicine that uses special needles, which are injected into targeted areas of the body to relieve symptoms and ailments. Some of the consequences of stroke may indeed be improved with acupuncture. Strokes can cause severe side effects so sufferers about often seek every possible option to maximize neural recovery. Acupuncture is one of the alternative treatment methods that most stroke sufferers try. If you choose to try acupuncture for the treatment of your stroke symptoms, be sure to tell your doctor. Get referrals and make sure that your acupuncturist is certified and experienced. What are the benefits that can be obtained from stroke treatment with acupuncture? 1. Overcoming the problem of difficulty swallowing After a stroke, difficulty swallowing can be a problem and can even lead to choking, which can be dangerous. So far, rehabilitation and physical therapy for swallowing muscle problems caused by stroke have not been entirely effective. However, a study was conducted, involving 120 stroke patients with swallowing problems, and then comparing patients who received swallowing therapy and patients who received swallowing training as well as acupuncture. The group that underwent swallowing therapy along with acupuncture scored significantly better than the group that only received therapy without acupuncture. No side effects were noted in the acupuncture group. This means if you have swallowing problems that don't go away after a stroke, acupuncture may be safe and an option that can help you. 2. Overcoming muscle stiffness (spasticity) Spasticity is a type of muscle stiffness that occurs after a stroke. Several studies have evaluated the benefits of acupuncture for the treatment of post-stroke spasticity. Results published in the January 2015 issue of the journal showed that acupuncture compared with conventional treatment or sham acupuncture (acupuncture that was intentionally injected in the wrong place for research purposes) significantly reduced post-stroke spasticity, especially in the wrists, knees and elbows. 3. Helps post-stroke healing An article published in March 2015 in the Journal of Acupuncture Medicine evaluated the effects of acupuncture on stroke recovery. The authors of the article concluded that overall, acupuncture appears to be beneficial. However, because not all trials were of the same quality, they were not convinced that acupuncture was beneficial for stroke survivors. So far, there is no evidence that acupuncture helps prevent stroke or helps reduce the area of ​​damage from an ischemic stroke in the brain. However, several high-quality trials evaluating the specific effects of acupuncture on swallowing ability and post-stroke spasticity look promising.
berita_id: Akupunktur telah digunakan selama ribuan tahun sebagai metode penyembuhan, tetapi baru -baru ini telah dievaluasi untuk kondisi medis menurut standar yang digunakan dalam kedokteran barat.Salah satunya adalah peran akupunktur sebagai pengobatan stroke.Apa yang harus saya ketahui sebelum menjalani akupunktur?Akupunktur adalah jenis obat timur yang menggunakan jarum khusus, yang disuntikkan ke area tubuh yang ditargetkan untuk meringankan gejala dan penyakit.Beberapa konsekuensi dari stroke mungkin memang ditingkatkan dengan akupunktur.Stroke dapat menyebabkan efek samping yang parah sehingga penderita tentang sering mencari setiap opsi yang mungkin untuk memaksimalkan pemulihan saraf.Akupunktur adalah salah satu metode pengobatan alternatif yang dicoba oleh sebagian besar penderita stroke.Jika Anda memilih untuk mencoba akupunktur untuk perawatan gejala stroke Anda, pastikan untuk memberi tahu dokter Anda.Dapatkan rujukan dan pastikan bahwa ahli akupunktur Anda bersertifikat dan berpengalaman.Apa manfaat yang dapat diperoleh dari pengobatan stroke dengan akupunktur?1. Mengatasi masalah kesulitan menelan setelah stroke, kesulitan menelan bisa menjadi masalah dan bahkan dapat menyebabkan tersedak, yang bisa berbahaya.Sejauh ini, rehabilitasi dan terapi fisik untuk menelan masalah otot yang disebabkan oleh stroke belum sepenuhnya efektif.Namun, sebuah penelitian dilakukan, melibatkan 120 pasien stroke dengan masalah menelan, dan kemudian membandingkan pasien yang menerima terapi menelan dan pasien yang menerima pelatihan menelan serta akupunktur.Kelompok yang menjalani terapi menelan bersama dengan akupunktur mencetak secara signifikan lebih baik daripada kelompok yang hanya menerima terapi tanpa akupunktur.Tidak ada efek samping yang dicatat pada kelompok akupunktur.Ini berarti jika Anda memiliki masalah menelan yang tidak hilang setelah stroke, akupunktur mungkin aman dan opsi yang dapat membantu Anda.2. Mengatasi kekakuan otot (kelenturan) kelenturan adalah jenis kekakuan otot yang terjadi setelah stroke.Beberapa penelitian telah mengevaluasi manfaat akupunktur untuk pengobatan kelenturan pasca-stroke.Hasil yang diterbitkan dalam jurnal edisi Januari 2015 menunjukkan bahwa akupunktur dibandingkan dengan perlakuan konvensional atau akupunktur palsu (akupunktur yang sengaja disuntikkan di tempat yang salah untuk tujuan penelitian) secara signifikan mengurangi kelenturan pasca-stroke, terutama di pergelangan tangan, lutut dan siku.3. Membantu Penyembuhan Pasca-Stroke Sebuah artikel yang diterbitkan pada bulan Maret 2015 dalam Journal of Acupuncture Medicine mengevaluasi efek akupunktur pada pemulihan stroke.Para penulis artikel menyimpulkan bahwa secara keseluruhan, akupunktur tampaknya bermanfaat.Namun, karena tidak semua uji coba memiliki kualitas yang sama, mereka tidak yakin bahwa akupunktur bermanfaat bagi penderita stroke.Sejauh ini, tidak ada bukti bahwa akupunktur membantu mencegah stroke atau membantu mengurangi area kerusakan akibat stroke iskemik di otak.Namun, beberapa uji coba berkualitas tinggi yang mengevaluasi efek spesifik akupunktur pada kemampuan menelan dan kelenturan pasca-stroke terlihat menjanjikan.

berita: A reog Ponorogo at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao City, Philippines, was destroyed by burning on October 20, 2015. The Consulate General in Davao City emphasized that this burning was not an attempt to destroy or eliminate reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. Extermination is carried out with care and respect. "I have checked Davao. Reog and the dragon's head are damaged and infested with termites," said Foreign Minister Retno Marsudi via spokesperson Arrmanatha Nasir. "So, there is no intention of destroying cultural objects and has nothing to do with idols," he continued. City is communicating with parties in Indonesia to try to find a new replacement for Ponorogo dutch east indies reog.
berita_id: Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia di Kota Davao, Filipina, dihancurkan dengan membakar pada 20 Oktober 2015. Konsulat Jenderal di Kota Davao menekankan bahwa pembakaran ini bukanlah upaya untuk menghancurkan atau menghilangkan Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang sebagai asset budaya.Pemusnahan dilakukan dengan hati -hati dan hormat."Saya telah memeriksa Davao. Reog dan kepala naga rusak dan penuh dengan rayap," kata Menteri Luar Negeri Retno Marsudi melalui juru bicara Arrmanatha Nasir."Jadi, tidak ada niat untuk menghancurkan benda -benda budaya dan tidak ada hubungannya dengan berhala," lanjutnya.City berkomunikasi dengan pesta -pesta di Indonesia untuk mencoba menemukan pengganti baru untuk Hindia Dutch East Ponorogo Reog.

berita: Currently, citizens are upset by the issue of closing the Facebook social network in Indonesia. Regarding this, the Minister of Communication and Information of the Republic of Indonesia, Rudiantara, emphasized that he would not close Facebook permanently, but only temporarily. "That is if the situation gets worse," he said. Currently, the Government is focusing on prescribed securing the Facebook network. After the investigation, the Government will take action. However, until now, there is no clarity about the closure of Facebook in Indonesia. The government can indeed provide strict sanctions to block Facebook permanently, if necessary. Especially with the fact that the data of one million Indonesian users was also leaked in the Cambridge Analytica scandal which was widely reported recently. The government also urges all parties to be wiser in using social media. Don't let social media like Facebook be misused to spread hatred. Thus, netizens no longer need to worry about information about the closure of Facebook. Because until now, the Government has not made an official statement.
berita_id: Saat ini, warga kesal dengan masalah menutup jejaring sosial Facebook di Indonesia.Mengenai hal ini, Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi Republik Indonesia, Rudiantara, menekankan bahwa ia tidak akan menutup Facebook secara permanen, tetapi hanya sementara."Itu jika situasinya semakin buruk," katanya.Saat ini, pemerintah fokus pada yang ditentukan mengamankan jaringan Facebook.Setelah penyelidikan, pemerintah akan mengambil tindakan.Namun, sampai sekarang, tidak ada kejelasan tentang penutupan Facebook di Indonesia.Pemerintah memang dapat memberikan sanksi yang ketat untuk memblokir Facebook secara permanen, jika perlu.Terutama dengan fakta bahwa data satu juta pengguna Indonesia juga bocor dalam skandal Cambridge Analytica yang banyak dilaporkan baru -baru ini.Pemerintah juga mendesak semua pihak untuk lebih bijaksana dalam menggunakan media sosial.Jangan biarkan media sosial seperti Facebook disalahgunakan untuk menyebarkan kebencian.Dengan demikian, netizen tidak perlu lagi khawatir tentang informasi tentang penutupan Facebook.Karena sampai sekarang, pemerintah belum membuat pernyataan resmi.

berita: Indeed, the Consultants General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao, the Philippines are confused. They had the heart to suddenly burn the Reog Ponorogo peacock and its accompanying gamelan because it was considered an object containing idols. The actions of the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia have clearly destroyed the noble cultural heritage of our ancestors and do not know about the history of Reog Ponorogo which has become worldwide and has become a cultural asset of the Indonesian nation at UNESCO. As reported by the news site Bitungnews.com Thursday (29/10/2015), a number of elements of the Indonesian Consulate General were seen burning the Barong Reog Ponorogo and the accompanying gamelan. From information compiled by bitungnews.com, the burning was carried out on Tuesday, October 20, 2015. Even though the cultural object is the pride of the people of Ponorogo. The reason for the burning of Barong Reog Ponorogo, and the dragon decoration on the gamelan, is because there is a demon and it is an idol. Unfortunately, the Acting Consulate General, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, did not prevent the arson. In fact, reportedly, Acting Consulate General Davao actually called a security guard named Santander to pour gas over the reog and 2 gamelan dragons, the security guard was so surprised and surprised he said in the Bisaya Tagalog language: "Hadluk kaayu ko, dear kaayu ang dragon gwapo kaayu unya sunugon, kasayang sa reog pero gisugo man ko (I'm so scared, it's a shame that the dragon snake is so good it wants to be burned, the reog is too bad but how else can I be told)," said Santander. "When the Barong Reog and dragon gamelan decorations were burned, which are the inventory of the Indonesian Consulate General's cultural museum, none of the other Indonesian Consulate General staff knew about it," said a source as quoted by bitungnews.com. "After this incident, the perpetrators were blasphemed by most of the Indonesian citizens in Davao, but the perpetrators still feel innocent because they think what they are doing is right in the eyes of God," added the source. An Indonesian citizen residing in Davao, stated that the Acting Consulate General in Davao was declared persona non grata, and asked the Indonesian government to withdraw the persons involved in the act of burning the nation's cultural heritage. Cultural activist and historical object Yul Adriansyah condemned the burning of reog carried out by a number of elements of the Indonesian Consulate General. "It's really sad, Reog Ponorogo's property was burned because it was considered an idol," said Yul in a questioning tone. According to Yul, the actions taken by the Indonesian Consulate General have gone too far and do not respect Indonesian culture, which should be respected and promoted in other countries. "It's not even burned, I'm sad to hear that, and this is a shame for the honor of the Indonesian people who uphold the noble culture of our nation," said the man who is also a journalist. Regarding the news of the sudden burning of Reog Ponorogo, the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao City, Philippines, clarified the issue. They admitted that they did burn the Reog Ponorogo but the reason was not related to the expulsion of idols or spirits. The objection was conveyed through a press release on its website which was updated this afternoon, Saturday, October 31, 2015. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City admitted that they had burned full phase of the moon Reog Ponorogo on October 20, 2015. The Reog Ponorogo is an asset they have had since 1988. So what was the real reason they destroyed cultural objects by burning them? "The destruction by burning had to be carried out because the Ponorogo reog was already in a damaged condition and was eaten by termites," wrote the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao. The Consulate General affirmed that the burning was not at all an attempt by the Consulate General in Davao City to damage or eliminate Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The destruction of these assets has been carried out carefully and with full respect for Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The Consulate General in Davao City also wants to emphasize that the burning has absolutely nothing to do with efforts to expel idols or spirits. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City is currently communicating with parties in Indonesia to seek a new replacement for Reog Ponorogo. Previously, the Indonesian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Retno LP Marsudi, said that the news of a Reog Ponorogo being deliberately burned at the office of the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao, Philippines, was not entirely true. "Reog and gamelan decorations in the form of dragon heads were burned because they were damaged and infested with termites," said Retno via text message. For information, several media had published news stating that officials at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao allowed these individuals to burn the cultural products of the Indonesian people because they were considered to be worshiping idols.

Thousands of people who were going to take part in the 212 Action, from various areas, were detained in front of the courtyard of the Istiqlal mosque in Central Jakarta. Our monitoring Tuesday at 04.00. Wib (21/2/2017) saw dozens of inter-city buses parked on the side of the bull field in front of the Istiqlal mosque fence which dropped thousands of participants from the 212 Action. They felt strange because they were not allowed to enter the mosque even though they were going to perform the Fajr prayer. One of the participants of Action 212 from Madura named Solihin, we had an interview "We all here as Muslims feel intimidated, it is forbidden to worship in the mosque gently with the lock on the gate of the mosque, the mosque is the house of Allah so we as devout Muslims must carry out worship , try to think that the mosque inside is empty, we have to pray in front of the gate, it doesn't make sense," said Solihin to us in a high tone. The 212 Defend Islam Action Volume 2 will be held at the dawn prayer, the participants of the action began to arrive who are planning to walk to the DPR building, it is estimated that player around 50,000 people or even more. Polda Metro Jaya has given permission for the 212 Action today starting at 07.00 until 18.00.Wib, thousands of Police and TNI personnel were deployed to secure this action.
berita_id: Ribuan orang yang akan mengambil bagian dalam aksi 212, dari berbagai daerah, ditahan di depan halaman Masjid Istiqlal di Jakarta Tengah.Pemantauan kami Selasa pukul 04.00.WIB (21/2/2017) melihat lusinan bus antar kota yang diparkir di sisi lapangan banteng di depan pagar masjid Istiqlal yang menjatuhkan ribuan peserta dari aksi 212.Mereka merasa aneh karena mereka tidak diizinkan memasuki masjid meskipun mereka akan melakukan doa Fajr.One of the participants of Action 212 from Madura named Solihin, we had an interview "We all here as Muslims feel intimidated, it is forbidden to worship in the mosque gently with the lock on the gate of the mosque, the mosque is the house of Allah so we as devout Muslims must carry out worship , try to think that the mosque inside is empty, we have to pray in front of the gate, it doesn't make sense," said Solihin tokami dengan nada tinggi.The 212 Defend Islam Action Volume 2 akan diadakan pada doa fajar, para peserta tindakan mulai berdatangan yang berencana berjalan ke gedung DPR, diperkirakan bahwa pemain sekitar 50.000 orang atau bahkan lebih.Polda Metro Jaya telah memberikan izin untuk 212 tindakan hari ini mulai pukul 07.00 hingga 18.00.WIB, ribuan polisi dan personel TNI dikerahkan untuk mengamankan tindakan ini.

berita: Alarmed by rumors that the Pokemon video game has elements of Jewish religion and culture, a Muslim asks a rabbi from Jerusalem to find out. According to Ben Abrahamson, founder of the Al Sadiqin Organization, a center for the study of Islamic and Jewish history, Pokemon has no meaning in Jewish culture. "It has no meaning in our culture," explained Ben on his personal Facebook page. "It comes from Japan and comes from Japanese video game culture, most of its symbols and writing appear in Japanese animation." However, Ben admits that there are also many people who don't like Pokemon. "A lot of people don't like it because it's a waste of time, it's selfish, and it makes one go wild astray on the internet," he replied, when told that Pokemon caused a lot of trouble among Muslims. In the comment section, Ben also quoted verse 6, Surah Al-Hujurat from the Quran to answer the rumors posted on the internet. The verse advises Muslims to research any news to determine its truth so that undesirable things do not befall a race and lead to regret. According to his website, Ben and Al Sadiqin find and explain the common heritage of Islam and Judaism, and reject the notion that the two religions have been enemies since time immemorial. For years, the rumor that Pokemon is a Jewish invention and has religious elements has been spread to Muslims through social media and the internet. According to the baseless accusation, "Pokemon" means "I am Jewish" in Syriac, while the creature's names "Pikachu" and "Charmander" mean "be a Jew", and "God is weak". "Pokemon" is published by the Nintendo company, and its name is an abbreviation of the word "Pocket Monsters", referring to the 722 cute creatures that players collect in the video game. Recently, Perak Mufti Tan Sri Harussani Zakaria has suggested that Malaysia ban the "augmented reality" game application Pokemon Go because it is considered gambling. Pahang Mufti Datuk Seri Abdul Rahman Osman also thinks it should be banned if it is proven to contain elements of gambling.
berita_id: Khawatir oleh desas -desus bahwa video game Pokemon memiliki unsur -unsur agama dan budaya Yahudi, seorang Muslim meminta seorang rabi dari Yerusalem untuk mengetahuinya.Menurut Ben Abrahamson, pendiri Organisasi Al Sadiqin, sebuah pusat studi tentang sejarah Islam dan Yahudi, Pokemon tidak memiliki arti dalam budaya Yahudi."Tidak ada arti dalam budaya kita," jelas Ben di halaman Facebook pribadinya."Itu berasal dari Jepang dan berasal dari budaya video game Jepang, sebagian besar simbol dan tulisannya muncul dalam animasi Jepang."Namun, Ben mengakui bahwa ada juga banyak orang yang tidak suka Pokemon."Banyak orang tidak menyukainya karena buang -buang waktu, itu egois, dan itu membuat seseorang tersesat liar di internet," jawabnya, ketika diberitahu bahwa Pokemon menyebabkan banyak masalah di kalangan Muslim.Di bagian komentar, Ben juga mengutip ayat 6, Surah al-Hujurat dari Al-Quran untuk menjawab rumor yang diposting di internet.Ayat ini menyarankan umat Islam untuk meneliti berita apa pun untuk menentukan kebenarannya sehingga hal -hal yang tidak diinginkan tidak menimpa perlombaan dan mengarah pada penyesalan.Menurut situs webnya, Ben dan Al Sadiqin menemukan dan menjelaskan warisan umum Islam dan Yudaisme, dan menolak anggapan bahwa kedua agama telah menjadi musuh sejak dahulu kala.Selama bertahun -tahun, desas -desus bahwa Pokemon adalah penemuan Yahudi dan memiliki unsur -unsur agama telah menyebar ke Muslim melalui media sosial dan internet.Menurut tuduhan yang tidak berdasar, "Pokemon" berarti "Saya orang Yahudi" di Syria, sementara nama makhluk itu "Pikachu" dan "Charmander" berarti "menjadi seorang Yahudi", dan "Tuhan itu lemah"."Pokemon" diterbitkan oleh Nintendo Company, dan namanya adalah singkatan dari kata "monster saku", merujuk pada 722 makhluk lucu yang dikumpulkan pemain dalam video game.Baru -baru ini, Perak Mufti Tan Sri Harussani Zakaria telah menyarankan agar Malaysia melarang aplikasi game "augmented reality" Pokemon Go karena dianggap perjudian.Pahang mufti datuk seri Abdul Rahman Osman juga berpikir itu harus dilarang jika terbukti mengandung elemen perjudian.

berita: Member of Commission III of the House of Representatives, Taufiqulhadi, asked the public not to be consumed by misleading news or hoaxes related to the commotion at the Brimob Command Headquarters detention, Kelapa Dua Depok, West Java, last Friday, November 10 2017. Rumors circulated that the prisoners of terrorism were noisy because of the throwing of the holy Koran. Taufiqulhadi confirmed, that is not true. "I hope the public will not be easily provoked. Because there is an insult to the Koran that is a hoax," said Taufiqulhadi on the sidelines of a discussion at Gado-Gado Boplo, Menteng, Jakarta, Saturday, November 11 2017. There are sympathizers of certain groups who spread the hoax issue. So he asked the public not to be consumed by the false news. He said the atomic number  commotion was caused by a cellphone that was confiscated by the authorities. "The officers' cellphones were secured. And I think that's true. For example, if the officers didn't protect the terrorists' cellphones, the idea of ​​terrorism could be released from detention," he said. So, it was the right step from security to immediately confiscate the cell phones belonging to the detainees. Taufiqulhadi supports the security measures. "And we expect a firmer stance to secure those inside."

Recently, the city of Surabaya was shocked by the discovery of pacifiers in bottles suspected of containing drugs. With this discovery information, the Civil Service Police Unit (Satpol PP) of Surabaya City conducted raids in 14 sub-districts and confiscated hundreds of these candy pacifiers. "The raid was held for two days, March 6 to 7. On the first day, 345 bottles of candy suspected of containing drugs were confiscated," said Head of Surabaya City Satpol PP, Irvan Widiyanto, Wednesday (8/3/2017). The 14 sub-districts that were targeted for the raid were the sub-districts of Gunung Anyar, Simokerto, Gubeng, Bulak, Tandes, Jambangan, Tenggilis Mejoyo, Tambak sari, Sukolilo, Sambi Kerep, Sawahan, Karang Pilang, Wiyung, and Pabean Cantikan. is still being tested in the laboratory. "A total of 345 bottles were obtained and laboratory tests are still being carried out," said Irvan. The locations targeted for the raids were hawkers and grocery stores near the elementary school (SD). The raid was carried out after it was found that students skipped school examine in the East Surabaya area last week. The elementary school student felt dizzy after consuming pacifiers. "Satpol PP also cooperates with Pusksemas in each sub-district. So that testing can be carried out immediately when the candy is found," he explained. Meanwhile, the Head of the Surabaya City National Narcotics Agency (BNNK), AKBP Suparti, asked the public to calm down and not panic over the incident. His party has also dispatched a team after receiving information on the pacifier candy which is suspected to contain the drug. "This is still a guess. It will be confirmed later after the Lab test. At the earliest, this test can be known in the next three days," he said briefly.
berita_id: Baru -baru ini, kota Surabaya terkejut dengan penemuan dot dalam botol yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Dengan informasi penemuan ini, Unit Kepolisian Dinas Sipil (SATPOL PP) dari Kota Surabaya melakukan penggerebekan di 14 sub-distrik dan menyita ratusan dot permen ini."Serangan itu diadakan selama dua hari, 6 hingga 7 Maret. Pada hari pertama, 345 botol permen yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan disita," kata kepala Surabaya City Satpol PP, Irvan Widiyanto, Rabu (8/3/2017).Ke-14 sub-distrik yang ditargetkan untuk serangan itu adalah sub-distrik Gunung Anyar, Simokerto, Gubeng, Bulak, Tandes, Jambangan, Tenggilis Mejoyo, Tambak Sari, Sukolilo, Sambi Kerep, Sawahan, Karang Pilan, Wiyung, dan Paban.masih diuji di laboratorium."Sebanyak 345 botol diperoleh dan tes laboratorium masih dilakukan," kata Irvan.Lokasi yang ditargetkan untuk penggerebekan adalah penjaja dan toko kelontong di dekat Sekolah Dasar (SD).Serangan itu dilakukan setelah ditemukan bahwa siswa melewatkan pemeriksaan sekolah di daerah Surabaya Timur minggu lalu.Siswa sekolah dasar merasa pusing setelah mengonsumsi dot."Satpol PP juga bekerja sama dengan Pusksemas di setiap sub-distrik. Sehingga pengujian dapat dilakukan segera ketika permen ditemukan," jelasnya.Sementara itu, kepala Badan Narkotika Nasional Kota Surabaya (BNNK), AKBP Suparti, meminta masyarakat untuk tenang dan tidak panik atas insiden tersebut.Partainya juga telah mengirim tim setelah menerima informasi tentang permen dot yang diduga mengandung obat."Ini masih dugaan. Ini akan dikonfirmasi nanti setelah tes laboratorium. Paling awal, tes ini dapat diketahui dalam tiga hari ke depan," katanya sebentar.

berita: Traveloka has responded to a lot of news regarding calls to boycott its services. This hotel and travel ticket booking application also provides clarification regarding the events at the Canisius College event. As is known, invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application are milling about on Twitter's timeline. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. According to news circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. But he was unable to attend. "Traveloka is proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from Kanisius alumni. However, he was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned several months earlier. to Ananda), he was not there," he said. "We state that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders," he continued. Regarding the circulation of mention of Derianto's name providing support to Ananda and raising an invitation to boycott Traveloka, according to Busyro, Traveloka is still investigating. "We have just seen a lot of people about this, we are also still investigating. What I can say is that he was unable to attend and we have not taken any position," he said. Derianto and Ananda plan are two of the five outstanding Kanisius College alumni who received awards at this event. Besides the two, there were Father Magnis Suseno (a Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (a Scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma)
berita_id: Traveloka telah menanggapi banyak berita tentang panggilan untuk memboikot layanannya.Aplikasi pemesanan hotel dan tiket perjalanan ini juga memberikan klarifikasi mengenai acara di acara Canisius College.Seperti yang diketahui, undangan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka sedang berkeliaran di timeline Twitter.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Menurut berita yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.Manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Tapi dia tidak bisa hadir."Traveloka bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya. Ke Ananda), ia tidak ada di sana," katanya."Kami menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi dan inovasi. Nilai-nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal," lanjutnya.Mengenai sirkulasi menyebutkan nama Deraianto memberikan dukungan kepada Ananda dan mengajukan undangan untuk memboikot Traveloka, menurut Busyro, Traveloka masih menyelidiki."Kami baru saja melihat banyak orang tentang ini, kami juga masih menyelidiki. Apa yang dapat saya katakan adalah bahwa ia tidak dapat hadir dan kami belum mengambil posisi apa pun," katanya.DERIANTO DAN ANANDA RENCANA adalah dua dari lima alumni Kanisius College yang luar biasa yang menerima penghargaan di acara ini.Selain keduanya, ada Pastor Magnis Suseno (sosok Jesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (seorang pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farha)

berita: This is important information for all Muslims, especially in Indonesia, please spread this information. Recently, information was spread about one of the toothbrush products that contains pig bristles. If you find that the toothbrush package says "Bristle", it means that the toothbrush contains pig bristles. Sometimes it also says "Pure Bristle" and "100% China Bristle" Quoted from the Langitan.com magazine page, China Bristles means the same as Hog Bristles which means pet pigs. In addition to being used as an ingredient for toothbrushes, materials containing sea urchins are also used in bread brushes, wall paint, cosmetics and so on. According to one employee at the District Court (PN) of Tuban Regency, Bahyu Agung Kurniawan, that it is necessary to be careful because not all of these sea urchins have Bristles inscribed. Even though many scholars have different opinions about the issue of using sea requirement urchins, it is better to avoid it so that the scholars get out of disputes. And that is the best wara' attitude, which is to avoid brushes from sea urchins because the majority of scholars forbid their use. Based on the 2014 MUI fatwa, it was stated that it had forbidden the use of pig bristle brushes. And in 2016, the use of sea bristles already exists in toothbrush products. Wallahu a'lam...
berita_id: Ini adalah informasi penting untuk semua Muslim, terutama di Indonesia, silakan sebarkan informasi ini.Baru -baru ini, informasi tersebar tentang salah satu produk sikat gigi yang berisi bulu babi.Jika Anda menemukan bahwa paket sikat gigi mengatakan "bulu", itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Kadang -kadang juga mengatakan "bulu murni" dan "100% China Bristle" yang dikutip dari halaman majalah Langitan.com, China Bristles berarti sama dengan bulu babi yang berarti babi hewan peliharaan.Selain digunakan sebagai bahan untuk sikat gigi, bahan yang mengandung landak laut juga digunakan dalam sikat roti, cat dinding, kosmetik dan sebagainya.Menurut seorang karyawan di Pengadilan Distrik (PN) Kabupaten Tuban, Bahyu Agung Kurniawan, bahwa perlu untuk berhati -hati karena tidak semua bulu babi laut ini tertulis.Meskipun banyak sarjana memiliki pendapat berbeda tentang masalah penggunaan landak persyaratan laut, lebih baik menghindarinya sehingga para sarjana keluar dari perselisihan.Dan itu adalah sikap Wara terbaik, yaitu untuk menghindari kuas dari bulu babi karena mayoritas cendekiawan melarang penggunaannya.Berdasarkan MUI Fatwa 2014, dinyatakan bahwa ia telah melarang penggunaan sikat bulu babi.Dan pada tahun 2016, penggunaan bulu laut sudah ada dalam produk sikat gigi.Wallahu a'lam ...

berita: A number of detainees at the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java rioted which resulted in the destruction of a number of facilities. It is still unclear what caused the riot, but the police claimed that it happened because the detainees refused during the search. According to the Head of the Public Information Bureau of the National Police Public Relations Division, Brigadier General Rikwanto, the riot occurred on Friday (11/10/2017) at around 4 pm. "On Friday, November 10 2017, at 16.00 WIB there was a commotion at the Mako Brimob terrorist detention center Salemba prison branch carried out by terrorist prisoners," said Rikwanto, Friday (10/2017). According to Rikwanto, the commotion caused damage to the prison facilities. These included the breaking down of the prison cell door and the damage to the gate of the hallway block and window panes, namely in Block C and Block B. Rikwanto denied any news that said this incident was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by officers. The riot was triggered by Rikwanto explained that after Friday prayers, the detainees were put into their respective cells by the Densus 88 team. While carrying out these activities, the Densus 88 team conducted a search. There are 4 pieces of HP found. "Four cellphones were found. They belonged to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, and Jumali," he said. One of the detainees did not accept the search. According to Rikwanto, the detainee who was not named then made a provocation. "It is true that with the inspection activities, one of the prisoners did not accept it and provoked the officers with various words, then some members were provoked by their words and there were prisoners who were takbir loudly so that they provoked the prisoners of the next block," he explained. But it didn't last long. The apparatus, according to Rikwanto, immediately took control of the situation. Meanwhile, information circulated from a social media channel which stated that the cause of the commit riot was that the detainees who were charged with terrorism cases were outraged by the news that the wardens were suspected of harassing the Koran and the books of the clerics belonging to the detainees. "Densus and the warden arrogantly entered the Ikhwan's room and the Koran was trampled on by Brimob, the warden and Densus finally caused the ikhwans to go on a rampage and destroy the Brimob mako detention room, the current situation is still tense ..." That's the excerpt from the release of #AlfathChannel, which was spread in the media social.
berita_id: Sejumlah tahanan di markas Komando Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat Rioted yang mengakibatkan penghancuran sejumlah fasilitas.Masih belum jelas apa yang menyebabkan kerusuhan, tetapi polisi mengklaim bahwa itu terjadi karena tahanan menolak selama pencarian.Menurut kepala Biro Informasi Publik Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Kepolisian Nasional, Brigadir Jenderal Rikwanto, kerusuhan itu terjadi pada hari Jumat (11/10/2017) sekitar pukul 4 sore."Pada hari Jumat, 10 November 2017, pukul 16.00 WIB ada keributan di Pusat Penahanan Teroris Mako Brimob Cabang Penjara Salemba yang dilakukan oleh para tahanan teroris," kata Rikwanto, Jumat (10/2017).Menurut Rikwanto, keributan menyebabkan kerusakan pada fasilitas penjara.Ini termasuk kehabisan pintu sel penjara dan kerusakan pada gerbang blok lorong dan panel jendela, yaitu di Blok C dan Blok B. Rikwanto membantah ada berita yang mengatakan insiden ini dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh petugas.Kerusuhan itu dipicu oleh Rikwanto menjelaskan bahwa setelah doa Jumat, para tahanan dimasukkan ke dalam sel masing -masing oleh tim Densus 88.Saat melakukan kegiatan ini, tim Densus 88 melakukan pencarian.Ada 4 potong HP yang ditemukan."Empat ponsel ditemukan. Mereka milik Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, dan Jumali," katanya.Salah satu tahanan tidak menerima pencarian.Menurut Rikwanto, tahanan yang tidak dinamai kemudian membuat provokasi."Memang benar bahwa dengan kegiatan inspeksi, salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan memprovokasi para petugas dengan berbagai kata, kemudian beberapa anggota diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka dan ada tahanan yang Takbir dengan keras sehingga mereka memicu tahanan blok berikutnya," jelasnya.Tapi itu tidak bertahan lama.Peralatan, menurut Rikwanto, segera mengendalikan situasi.Sementara itu, informasi yang diedarkan dari saluran media sosial yang menyatakan bahwa penyebab kerusuhan komit adalah bahwa tahanan yang didakwa dengan kasus -kasus terorisme marah oleh berita bahwa para penjaga diduga melecehkan Alquran dan buku -buku ulama milik para tahanan."Densus dan sipir dengan sombong memasuki kamar Ikhwan dan Alquran diinjak -injak oleh Brimob, sipir dan Densus akhirnya menyebabkan Ikhwan mengamuk dan menghancurkan ruang penahanan Brimob Mako, situasi saat ini masih tegang ..." Itu adalah kutukan dari rilis #fathchannel, yang mana di media.

berita: The circulation of pacifiers fifteen suspected of containing drug substances is still visible in schools in Bekasi, one of which is at Madrasah Ibtidaiyah At-taqwa 15 on Jalan Raya Babelan, Bekasi Regency. In order to anticipate things that are not desired, the school conducts socialization in each class. One of the teachers, Affan Umar said, "we are doing socialization so that our children do not buy products that are still being investigated by the police," he said. Affan added, in order to anticipate dependence due to the drug content in the candy, the school carried out socialization in each class so that students did not buy the candy branded Hard Candy or DOT candy. "We socialize in every class, from grade one to grade six, everything is not too late," he added. In addition, the school will also prohibit traders from selling DOT candy. "We have also banned the traders, because it is useless if we ban the students but the traders are still selling the dangerous candy," he concluded.
berita_id: Sirkulasi dot lima belas yang diduga mengandung zat obat masih terlihat di sekolah-sekolah di Bekasi, salah satunya di Madrasah Ibtidaiyah di-taqwa 15 di Jalan Raya Babelan, Kabupaten Bekasi.Untuk mengantisipasi hal -hal yang tidak diinginkan, sekolah melakukan sosialisasi di setiap kelas.Salah satu guru, Affan Umar mengatakan, "Kami melakukan sosialisasi sehingga anak -anak kami tidak membeli produk yang masih diselidiki oleh polisi," katanya.Affan menambahkan, untuk mengantisipasi ketergantungan karena kandungan narkoba dalam permen, sekolah melakukan sosialisasi di setiap kelas sehingga siswa tidak membeli permen keras bermerek atau permen titik."Kami bersosialisasi di setiap kelas, dari kelas satu hingga kelas enam, semuanya belum terlambat," tambahnya.Selain itu, sekolah juga akan melarang pedagang menjual DOT Candy."Kami juga telah melarang para pedagang, karena tidak ada gunanya jika kami melarang siswa tetapi para pedagang masih menjual permen berbahaya," pungkasnya.

berita: Liputan1.com, News The 212 Action Mass could not enter the Istiqlal Mosque Hoax This was conveyed by the Protocol Section of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah, who denied that they had locked the Istiqlal Mosque for the mass 212 demonstrations that would continue to take action in front of the DPR/MPR Building. "A thousand percent hoax," said Abu when contacted, Tuesday (21/2/2017). Abu said, according to the standard operating procedures at the Istiqlal Mosque, the doors of the Istiqlal Mosque were closed at 21.30 WIB and would be reopened one hour before the dawn prayer. "Outside the fasting month, the Isha prayer ends, around 21.30 WIB according to the law, it is closed, sterile. Then it is opened again one hour before dawn. That is outside the fasting month," he explained. According to him, last night's incident only five buses from East Java that will take part in the 212 action. "They entered after Isha, then they were given the opportunity to pray and clean up, have a good talk with the chairman, we gave understanding, and thank God they understood traverse and left istiqlal properly. volunteer," he said. He reiterated that there were no crowds who were not allowed to enter the Istiqlal Mosque, according to him, this issue was not true at all. "The intruders are the people who wrote accusing the PKI. Except for Axis 212, 411, which we expelled the day before and it was an emergency. There was no coordination, unlike the previous actions," he said.
berita_id: LIPUTAN1.com, Berita Misa aksi 212 tidak dapat memasuki tipuan masjid Istiqlal ini disampaikan oleh bagian protokol masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah, yang membantah bahwa mereka telah mengunci masjid Istiqlal untuk pembangunan MASS 212 yang akan terus mengambil tindakan di depan DPR/MPR."Seribu persen tipuan," kata Abu ketika dihubungi, Selasa (21/2/2017).Abu mengatakan, menurut prosedur operasi standar di Masjid Istiqlal, pintu masjid Istiqlal ditutup pada 21.30 WIB dan akan dibuka kembali satu jam sebelum doa fajar."Di luar bulan puasa, doa Isha berakhir, sekitar 21.30 WIB menurut hukum, ditutup, steril. Kemudian dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum fajar. Itu di luar bulan puasa," jelasnya.Menurutnya, insiden tadi malam hanya lima bus dari Jawa Timur yang akan mengambil bagian dalam aksi 212."Mereka masuk setelah Isha, maka mereka diberi kesempatan untuk berdoa dan membersihkan, berbicara dengan baik dengan ketua, kami memberi pengertian, dan bersyukur kepada Tuhan mereka mengerti melintasi dan meninggalkan Istiqlal dengan benar. Relawan," katanya.Dia menegaskan bahwa tidak ada kerumunan yang tidak diizinkan memasuki masjid Istiqlal, menurutnya, masalah ini tidak benar sama sekali."Para penyusup adalah orang -orang yang menulis menuduh PKI. Kecuali untuk Axis 212, 411, yang kami ungkapkan sehari sebelumnya dan itu adalah keadaan darurat. Tidak ada koordinasi, tidak seperti tindakan sebelumnya," katanya.

berita: Lately, the virtual world has been making a fuss about toothbrushes made of “bristle” because they are DEFINITELY made from pigs. Although we are required to be vigilant, not all bristle terms always refer to sea urchins. The lexical meaning of bristle is a short, stiff hair, fiber, etc (Webster's Dictionary). So all the hair, the stiff fiber, then the term will be referred to as bristle. Hair, stiff beard, can be categorized as bristle. skirmish Another example is the stiff fibers or pine leaves can also be referred to as bristle. So, how is its application in the industrial world? In the industrial world, bristle is indeed used as a material for making brushes or brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle can be sourced from animal hair or plant fibers or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. The animal hair used can be sourced from pigs, goats, horses, or camels. The plant fiber that has also been used as a brush or brush material is palm fiber. Nylon is also a synthetic fiber that is commonly used for brushes, brushes or toothbrushes. From the halal aspect, brushes and brushes, including toothbrushes derived from animal hair, are critical points. When the material is sea urchin then it should not be used because any material derived from pigs is both haram and unclean, either in dry or wet form. In addition, besides the prohibition of the substance, the MUI has issued a fatwa for anything derived from pork that is haram for its use (al-intifa') including the fur. But the problem is that not all brush or brush or toothbrush users are able to recognize whether the brush they are using is a brush or a brush that comes from pig bristles. One of the information that can be seen as a marker that a brush or brush comes from sea urchins is that it is written as the name of the product, for example “Boar Bristle Brush”. Boar is the English term for wild boar or wild boar. This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles. Toothbrush can also use this boar bristles. Amazon.com, a global online store also offers pig toothbrushes under the name “Fuchs Toothbrushes Pure Natural (Boar) Bristle Record V Adult Soft (Pack of 5)-Assorted colors by Fuchs Toothbrushes” (check this url http://www. .amazon.com/Fuchs-Toothbrushes-Natural-Bristle-Assorted/dp/B018IWRZ9K/ref=sr_1_3?s=beauty&ie=UTF8&qid=1455426484&sr=1-3&keywords=boar+bristle+toothbrush) and brush 1 TRUSTED Wooden Boar Hair Bristle Beard Brush by Leven Rose - Perfect For a Beard Grooming Kit for Men - Made of Boars Hair Bristles and Firm Natural Wood). Please check the url of this link http://www.amazon.com/dp/B0152BO0F2?psc=1. However, brushes, brushes, or toothbrushes are not always made from pigs even though they have bristle written on them, because the term bristle is still a general term. There are several manufacturers who have used goat hair or camel or horse hair as brush material or made of nylon. The last group of materials is clearly acceptable. When there is no information on the source of the material, at least a simple method can be used. To determine whether it is made from animal hair or not, the method in question is to burn the material. If it smells like burning hair or horns, better leave it alone. Materials from plastic or coconut fiber do not emit such a distinctive odor when burned.
berita_id: Akhir -akhir ini, dunia virtual telah membuat keributan tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari "bulu" karena mereka pasti terbuat dari babi.Meskipun kami diharuskan waspada, tidak semua istilah bulu selalu merujuk pada bulu babi.Arti leksikal dari bulu adalah rambut pendek, kaku, serat, dll (Kamus Webster).Jadi semua rambut, serat kaku, maka istilah ini akan disebut sebagai bulu.Rambut, jenggot kaku, dapat dikategorikan sebagai bulu.Skirmish Contoh lain adalah serat kaku atau daun pinus juga dapat disebut sebagai bulu.Jadi, bagaimana penerapannya di dunia industri?Di dunia industri, Bristle memang digunakan sebagai bahan untuk membuat kuas atau sikat, termasuk sikat gigi.BRISTLE dapat bersumber dari rambut hewani atau serat tanaman atau serat sintetis seperti nilon dan silikon.Rambut hewan yang digunakan dapat bersumber dari babi, kambing, kuda, atau unta.Serat tanaman yang juga telah digunakan sebagai sikat atau bahan sikat adalah serat kelapa sawit.Nylon juga merupakan serat sintetis yang biasanya digunakan untuk kuas, sikat atau sikat gigi.Dari aspek halal, sikat dan sikat, termasuk sikat gigi yang berasal dari rambut hewani, adalah titik kritis.Ketika bahannya adalah landak laut maka tidak boleh digunakan karena bahan apa pun yang berasal dari babi adalah haram dan najis, baik dalam bentuk kering atau basah.Selain itu, selain larangan zat, MUI telah mengeluarkan fatwa untuk apa pun yang berasal dari daging babi yang merupakan haram untuk penggunaannya (al-intifa ') termasuk bulu.Tetapi masalahnya adalah tidak semua sikat atau sikat atau sikat gigi dapat mengenali apakah kuas yang mereka gunakan adalah kuas atau kuas yang berasal dari bulu babi.Salah satu informasi yang dapat dilihat sebagai penanda bahwa kuas atau kuas berasal dari landak laut adalah bahwa itu ditulis sebagai nama produk, misalnya "Boar Bristle Brush".Babi adalah istilah bahasa Inggris untuk babi hutan atau babi hutan.Ini berarti bahwa produk adalah kuas yang menggunakan bulu babi liar.Sikat gigi juga dapat menggunakan bulu babi ini.Amazon.com, toko online global juga menawarkan sikat gigi pigsi dengan nama “Fuchs Toothbrushes Pure Natural (Boar) Bristle Record v Dewasa Lembut (Paket 5) Warna-warna yang disebabkan oleh sikat gigi Fuchs” (periksa url ini http: // www..amazon.com/Fuchs-Toothbrushes-Natural-Bristle-Assorted/dp/B018IWRZ9K/ref=sr_1_3?s=beauty&ie=UTF8&qid=1455426484&sr=1-3&keywords=boar+bristle+toothbrush) and brush 1 TRUSTED Wooden Boar Hair Bristle Beard Brush by Leven Rose - Perfect For aKit Perawatan Jenggot untuk Pria - Terbuat dari bulu babi dan kayu alami yang kencang).Silakan periksa URL tautan ini http://www.amazon.com/dp/b0152bo0f2?psc=1.Namun, kuas, sikat, atau sikat gigi tidak selalu terbuat dari babi meskipun mereka memiliki bulu yang tertulis di atasnya, karena istilah bulu masih merupakan istilah umum.Ada beberapa produsen yang menggunakan rambut kambing atau unta atau rambut kuda sebagai bahan sikat atau terbuat dari nilon.Kelompok material terakhir jelas dapat diterima.Ketika tidak ada informasi tentang sumber materi, setidaknya metode sederhana dapat digunakan.Untuk menentukan apakah itu terbuat dari rambut hewani atau tidak, metode yang dimaksud adalah membakar material.Jika baunya seperti rambut atau tanduk yang terbakar, lebih baik biarkan saja.Bahan dari plastik atau serat kelapa tidak memancarkan bau yang khas saat dibakar.

berita: Needlestick First Aid For Stroke Sufferers? Suspicious We often hear a chain message spread about First Aid for stroke survivors is to pierce needles at several points from the fingertips to the ear. Reading the news, of course I did not necessarily believe the truth. Finally I decided to find out more about stroke sufferers and how to do first aid for stroke sufferers correctly. Some websites from the internet say that this news is a mere hoax. Why? Because a stroke is caused by the rupture of a blood vessel in the brain. The blood that comes out can actually suppress the surrounding brain tissue so that its function is disrupted. A medical expert dr. somebody Devika Y, on the aladokter.com website said that finger pricking with a needle in stroke sufferers is of no benefit. Puncture with a needle can actually pose a risk of infection if the needle used is not sterile. The first aid we need to do if someone has a stroke is to take the patient to a safe place Position the person in a state of the body facing the left side Immediately contact the nearest hospital and ask for an ambulance to come to the location Or you can take the person directly to the hospital. The sooner a stroke is treated, the better the results. Subsequent treatment will be carried out by the medical team at the hospital. So, if someone has a stroke near us, don't hesitate to immediately take him to the nearest hospital so that he can be handled by an expert.
