berita_id: Perlu pertolongan pertama yang perlu untuk penderita stroke?Mencurigakan kita sering mendengar pesan rantai menyebar tentang pertolongan pertama untuk penyintas stroke adalah untuk menembus jarum di beberapa titik dari ujung jari ke telinga.Membaca berita, tentu saja saya tidak perlu mempercayai kebenaran.Akhirnya saya memutuskan untuk mencari tahu lebih banyak tentang penderita stroke dan bagaimana melakukan pertolongan pertama untuk penderita stroke dengan benar.Beberapa situs web dari internet mengatakan bahwa berita ini hanyalah tipuan.Mengapa?Karena stroke disebabkan oleh pecahnya pembuluh darah di otak.Darah yang keluar sebenarnya dapat menekan jaringan otak di sekitarnya sehingga fungsinya terganggu.Seorang ahli medis DR.Seseorang Devika Y, di situs web Aladokter.com mengatakan bahwa jari tusukan dengan jarum pada penderita stroke tidak bermanfaat.Tusukan dengan jarum sebenarnya dapat menimbulkan risiko infeksi jika jarum yang digunakan tidak steril.Pertolongan pertama yang perlu kita lakukan jika seseorang mengalami stroke adalah membawa pasien ke tempat yang aman posisi orang dalam keadaan tubuh yang menghadap ke sisi kiri segera menghubungi rumah sakit terdekat dan meminta ambulans untuk datang ke lokasi atau Anda dapat membawa orang tersebut langsung ke rumah sakit.Semakin cepat stroke diobati, semakin baik hasilnya.Perawatan selanjutnya akan dilakukan oleh tim medis di rumah sakit.Jadi, jika seseorang memiliki stroke di dekat kami, jangan ragu untuk segera membawanya ke rumah sakit terdekat sehingga ia dapat ditangani oleh seorang ahli.

berita: Dangers of Consuming Catfish Containing Cancer Cells - Catfish is a type of fish that lives in fresh water. Catfish are easily recognizable because of their slick body, slightly flattened elongated, and have long "whiskers" that stick out from around the mouth. Catfish is one of the favorite food menus and even in every food stall this menu is always available, because the price is quite cheap and the taste is good, which is the main attraction for this fish. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is that? This is because catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places. Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places because these fish consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pigs, and even these fish can also consume human waste. So it is possible that in the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. Catfish contains cancer cells. The news that catfish contains 3,000 cancer cells first appeared in China. An article that mentions dirty and dirty catfish has gone viral on social media. The article mentions that human waste is also used as feed at a catfish farm in Haikou City, China. However, catfish connoisseurs are asked not to be influenced by this information. The reason is, catfish in Indonesia is different from China. Apart from all that, are there any health benefits of catfish? it turns out that this one fish besides being delicious also contains several substances that are good man for the health of the human body. The content contained in catfish, in addition to the savory meat, it turns out that catfish meat has a lot of nutritional content. The following is the nutritional value of catfish 100 grams, edible parts of fish and fresh fish (FAO, 1972) Types of nutrients Bag. Edible fish Whole fresh fish. 1 Water content (%) 78.5 47.1 Energy source (cal.) 90 54, Protein (gr) 18.7 11.2 Fat (gr) 1.1 0.7 Calcium (Ca) (mgr) 15 9 Phosphorus (P) (mgr) 260 156 Iron (Fe) (mgr) 2 1,2 Sodium (mgr) 150 90 Thiamine (vit B1) (mgr) 0.10 0.06 Riboflavin (vit B2) (mgr) 0 ,05 0.03 Niacin (mgr) 2.0 1.2 From the data above it can be concluded that catfish contains high protein and bone-strengthening substances (calcium) which are good to eat. In addition, catfish also contains other minerals that are also important for body health (Djatmiko Hertami, 1986) Well that's some information about catfish in China, but in Indonesia this fish has been cultivated well by catfish farmers and they use pellets as food instead of using waste that is very harmful to the health of the human body. So that consuming catfish in Indonesia there is no need to doubt its cleanliness, but as wise consumers we must remain vigilant about the content of this fish and do not need to consume catfish in large quantities on a regular basis because it can interfere with our health.
berita_id: Bahaya mengonsumsi ikan lele yang mengandung sel kanker - ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang hidup di air tawar.Ikan lele mudah dikenali karena tubuhnya yang licin, sedikit memanjang, dan memiliki "kumis" panjang yang menonjol dari sekitar mulut.Catfish adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit dan bahkan di setiap kios makanan, menu ini selalu tersedia, karena harganya cukup murah dan rasanya enak, yang merupakan daya tarik utama untuk ikan ini.Meskipun lezat dan murah, ikan lele adalah yang paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lain yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Kenapa begitu?Ini karena ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor.Lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor karena ikan ini mengkonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi, dan babi, dan bahkan ikan ini juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah manusia.Jadi ada kemungkinan bahwa dalam tubuh ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang sangat berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Lele mengandung sel kanker.Berita bahwa ikan lele berisi 3.000 sel kanker pertama kali muncul di Cina.Sebuah artikel yang menyebutkan lele yang kotor dan kotor telah beredar di media sosial.Artikel itu menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan di sebuah peternakan ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina.Namun, penikmat lele diminta untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh informasi ini.Alasannya adalah, ikan lele di Indonesia berbeda dari Cina.Terlepas dari semua itu, apakah ada manfaat kesehatan ikan lele?Ternyata ikan yang satu ini selain lezat juga mengandung beberapa zat yang baik untuk kesehatan tubuh manusia.Konten yang terkandung dalam ikan lele, selain daging gurih, ternyata daging lele memiliki banyak kandungan nutrisi.Berikut ini adalah nilai nutrisi ikan lele 100 gram, bagian ikan yang dapat dimakan dan ikan segar (FAO, 1972) jenis tas nutrisi.Ikan yang dapat dimakan utuh ikan segar.1 Water content (%) 78.5 47.1 Energy source (cal.) 90 54, Protein (gr) 18.7 11.2 Fat (gr) 1.1 0.7 Calcium (Ca) (mgr) 15 9 Phosphorus (P) (mgr) 260 156 Iron (Fe) (mgr) 2 1,2 Sodium (mgr) 150 90 Thiamine (vit B1) (mgr) 0.10 0.06 Riboflavin (vitB2) (mgr) 0, 05 0,03 niasin (mgr) 2.0 1.2 dari data di atas dapat disimpulkan bahwa ikan lele mengandung protein tinggi dan zat penguatan tulang (kalsium) yang baik untuk dimakan.Selain itu, ikan lele juga mengandung mineral lain yang juga penting untuk kesehatan tubuh (Djatmiko Hertami, 1986) dengan baik bahwa beberapa informasi tentang ikan lele di Cina, tetapi di Indonesia ikan ini telah dibudidayakan dengan baik oleh petani lele dan mereka menggunakan pelet sebagai makanan alih -alih menggunakan limbah yang sangat berbahaya bagi kesehatan tubuh manusia.Sehingga mengkonsumsi ikan lele di Indonesia tidak perlu meragukan kebersihannya, tetapi sebagai konsumen yang bijak kita harus tetap waspada tentang kandungan ikan ini dan tidak perlu mengonsumsi ikan lele dalam jumlah besar secara teratur karena dapat mengganggu kesehatan kita.

berita: The salaries of the President of the Republic of Indonesia, Joko Widodo and the Vice President, Jusuf Kalla have not increased This was stated by Bey Mahmudi, the head of the press bureau of the presidential secretary. Regarding the salary increase received by Jokowi and Jusuf Kalla "The amount of income received by the President and Vice President has not changed since 2001," explained Bey Mahmudi. -Law Number 7 of 1978 concerning Financial/Administrative Rights of the President and Vice President and Former Presidents and basic Vice Presidents In article 2 of the Law, it is stated that the basic salary of the President is six times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia other than the President and Vice President. vice president principal is four times ga Furthermore, according to Government Regulation No. 75 of 2000, the highest basic salary of a state official (Chairman of the DPR, MA, BPK) is IDR 5040000 per month. Thus, the amount of the Presidential Basic Salary per month is six times The salary is Rp. 30240000. Meanwhile, the Basic Salary of the Vice President each month is four times the salary, which is Rp. 2016000000. The amount of office allowances that the President and Vice President receive each month is in accordance with Presidential Decree Number 68 of 2001, which is Rp. 32500000 for the President and Rp. 22000000 for Vice President
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia, Joko Widodo dan Wakil Presiden, Jusuf Kalla belum meningkatkan ini dinyatakan oleh Bey Mahmudi, kepala Biro Pers Sekretaris Presiden.Mengenai kenaikan gaji yang diterima oleh Jokowi dan Jusuf Kalla "jumlah pendapatan yang diterima oleh presiden dan wakil presiden tidak berubah sejak tahun 2001," jelas Bey Mahmudi.-Law Nomor 7 tahun 1978 tentang hak -hak keuangan/administrasi Presiden dan Wakil Presiden dan mantan presiden dan Wakil Presiden Dasar dalam Pasal 2 Hukum, dinyatakan bahwa gaji dasar Presiden enam kali lipat gaji dasar pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia selain Presiden dan Wakil Presiden.Wakil Presiden Kepala Sekolah empat kali lipat Ga lebih jauh, menurut Peraturan Pemerintah No. 75 tahun 2000, gaji dasar tertinggi dari seorang pejabat negara (ketua DPR, MA, BPK) adalah IDR 5040000 per bulan.Dengan demikian, jumlah gaji dasar presiden per bulan adalah enam kali gaji adalah RP.30240000. Sementara itu, gaji dasar wakil presiden setiap bulan adalah empat kali lipat gaji, yaitu RP.2016000000. Jumlah tunjangan kantor yang diterima presiden dan wakil presiden setiap bulan sesuai dengan keputusan presiden nomor 68 tahun 2001, yaitu RP.32500000 untuk Presiden dan RP.22000000 untuk Wakil Presiden

berita: The dot-shaped candy product has obtained a production permit from the Food and Drug Supervisory Agency (BPOM). "Yes, it's true (it already has a permit)," said Head of the BPOM Food and Drug Investigation Center Hendri Siswadi, when contacted in Jakarta, Thursday, March 9 2017. The candy in the form of a pacifier suspected of containing drugs was found in Surabaya, East Java. BPOM Surabaya is examining the content of candy which is suspected to contain drugs. However, temporary results, said Hendri, the content of hazardous materials has not been found. "Until today, BPOM Surabaya has tested using 16 parameters with negative results." The discovery of the candy allegedly containing drugs stems from the routine operation of the Civil Service Police Unit when raiding students who were truant during school hours in Surabaya. One of them is in an Internet cafe that is confect usually used as a hangout place for students when playing truant. During the operation, the team found an elementary school student who felt dizzy after consuming candy. The head of the Civil Service Police Unit, Irvan Widianto, said that there were several forms of drug candy in the form of baby pacifiers with the brand name Hard Candy and jelly sticks.
berita_id: Produk permen berbentuk DOT telah memperoleh izin produksi dari Badan Pengawas Makanan dan Obat (BPOM)."Ya, itu benar (sudah memiliki izin)," kata kepala pusat investigasi makanan dan obat BPOM Hendri Siswadi, ketika dihubungi di Jakarta, Kamis, 9 Maret 2017. Permen dalam bentuk dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan ditemukan di Surabaya, Java Timur.BPOM Surabaya sedang memeriksa kandungan permen yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Namun, hasil sementara, kata Hendri, kandungan bahan berbahaya belum ditemukan."Sampai hari ini, BPOM Surabaya telah menguji menggunakan 16 parameter dengan hasil negatif."Penemuan permen yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan berasal dari operasi rutin unit polisi layanan sipil ketika menggerebek siswa yang bolos selama jam sekolah di Surabaya.Salah satunya berada di kafe internet yang dikutuk biasanya digunakan sebagai tempat nongkrong bagi siswa saat bermain bolos.Selama operasi, tim menemukan seorang siswa sekolah dasar yang merasa pusing setelah mengonsumsi permen.Kepala Unit Polisi Dinas Sipil, Irvan Widianto, mengatakan bahwa ada beberapa bentuk permen narkoba dalam bentuk dot bayi dengan nama merek permen keras dan tongkat jelly.

berita: The Brimob Police Headquarters, Kelapa Dua, Depok, was hit by riots all day yesterday. The National Police Headquarters officially stated that the riots started with cell phone raids. However, a video circulated on Youtube that recorded the riot, in which the residents stated that they did not want their religion to be harassed, so they had to fight back. This was immediately denied by the Police Headquarters. "It's not true about the Qur'an. This is purely a matter of raids on cellphones (cell phones) by officers. The occupants didn't accept it, then they took it," said Karo Penmas, Police Public Relations Division, Brigadier General Rikwanto, to reporters last night. It is said, the commotion occurred at 16.00 WIB. Rikwanto said the riots caused a number of facilities in the detention center to be damaged. "There was a riot of terrorist prisoners at the Korbrimob Rutan Salemba branch of the detention center carried out by terrorist prisoners which resulted in the destruction of prison facilities, such as the prison's cell door being broken down, the gate of the block hallway, the window panes (in Block C and Block B)," explained Rikwanto. The commotion occurred after Friday prayers, when the prisoners were put into their respective cells. After entering the cell, the Densus picket member released the keys in rooms A5 and C5 (RB). "Because there is a key slot from the inside, for security and to make it easier for the picket officers to open the cell door," added Rikwanto. After that, members of the Densus picket conducted a search of the detention cell. The search results found 4 cellphones belonging to detainees Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, and Jumali. "It is not true that there was throwing of the Koran," said Rikwanto repeatedly. Chaos ensued after the inspection was over. Detainees who did not accept the search provoked the officers, so that some officers were provoked by the words of the prisoners. On the other hand, the prisoners continued to scream while shouting takbir so as to provoke the prisoners of the next block. "Members of the picket from Unit III Pioneers took action by shooting upwards to signal chaos and to warn the prisoners," added Rikwanto. The commotion was then successfully overcome. Currently the situation is reported to be conducive. INDOPOS reporters who monitored the Mobile Brigade Headquarters reported that the atmosphere was conducive. There is no meaningful activity on the officers. The situation seemed calm and guarded as usual. A number of journalists were in the vicinity of the headquarters of the elite police force. Several guards continued to patrol the outside and inside of the Kelapa Dua Mobile Brigade Corps building, Depok City. No personnel from Densus 88 were seen coming to the location. Separately, the Head of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Headquarters Inspector General Pol Setyo Wasisto explained that prior to the Salemba Rutan riot in Kelapa Dua, riots had also occurred in Class II A Prison Permisan Nusakambangan Island, Cilacap, Central Java. This incident took place on Tuesday (7/11) at around 07.50 WIB. The attack was carried out by terrorists targeting the John Refra group aka John Kei. It was found that three people were injured and one colleague of John Kei died. Setyo Wasisto revealed that this commotion began with an attack carried out by an inmate with the initials WBP, a terrorist from a block of residents incarcerated from room 3 to room 1 inhabited by John Kei. This attack uses wooden blocks and stones that are around the block room. "This made the inmate outside the room to go to John Kei's room and intend to help him attack another inmate with the initials T. However, because of the outnumbered numbers, prisoner T went back into the cell room and locked him from the inside," he said. Finally, at around 10.00 WIB, the prison situation was brought under control after prison officers intervened and re-entered the prisoners into their respective cell rooms. However, at around 12.30 WIB, there was a beating in room block C number 20. This location is the room for the assistant prison officer. This incident left several victims injured, including John Kei. This man received a wound on his left temple and a torn left palm. Then, another victim was Webrianto Warta Bone, a general convict who suffered injuries to his upper left temple and right back shoulder and bruised legs. The third victim, Muhamad Asrul Sidik, suffered injuries to his left temple and bruised hands. "Meanwhile, one person died on behalf of Ondi bin Robert. The perpetrators in this incident amounted to 11 people who came from terrorist prisoners," he said. The perpetrators included Muhamad Ikhwan alias Abu Umar, Zainal Abidin, Zakaria alias Zack, Sultan Kolbi, Priyoutomo alias Iok, Ahmad Basuki bin Abdul Ghofur, Khairul Rizal, Mansur bin Saribin, M Ali, M Aris Raharjo alias Alif, and M Basri. . The evidence that was secured by the lesion Nusakambangan Sub-Sector Police were kitchen knives, stones, broken glass, pieces of wood blocks. Furthermore, there is a white shirt belonging to the victim on behalf of Asrul who was hit by a blood rickshaw and a white shirt belonging to the victim on behalf of John Kei who was hit by a blood rickshaw. "In the report we received, it was not caused by the cause of the attack. I also do not dare to assume because the report (cause) does not exist," he explained. Asked whether the riots in these two locations were related, Setyo did not answer

The Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara, emphasized that the government would not hesitate to close the Facebook platform if the world's largest social media site became a place for spreading false news, as happened to the Rohingya. "I take a position, I threaten to close Facebook and the government has no doubts if it has to close Facebook if it is used for hoaxes," said Rudiantara at the Ministry of Communication and Information Building, Jakarta, Thursday (5/4) yesterday. After Facebook admitted to being used as an anti-Rohingya propaganda tool in Myanmar, Rudiantara said he did not want something similar to happen in Indonesia. In addition, indications of the leakage of one million user data from Indonesia in the Cambridge Analytica case require a cooperative attitude from Facebook in following up on requests from the Ministry of Communication and Information. Rudiantara said that his party would not just take action to close social media platforms, but through a process and with the right profit reasons. Although he assessed that so far, Facebook is among the three platforms that are less cooperative, namely only fulfilling 50 percent of the Ministry of Communication and Information's requests to close content that was considered not according to the norm since two years ago. "This is what I want to convey to the public, that this is the situation, I personally have no intention of closing anything like that, it must be guarded for the benefit of the state and society," said Rudiantara. The Minister of Communication and Information emphasized that all social media must be willing to participate in maintaining the stability of the country if they want to do business in Indonesia, if it causes instability in Indonesia, the government will act decisively. There are also Facebook users in Indonesia who access social media every month more than 115 million people, of the 2.07 billion people who access Facebook every month worldwide.
berita_id: Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiiantara, menekankan bahwa pemerintah tidak akan ragu untuk menutup platform Facebook jika situs media sosial terbesar di dunia menjadi tempat untuk menyebarkan berita palsu, seperti yang terjadi pada Rohingya."Saya mengambil posisi, saya mengancam untuk menutup Facebook dan pemerintah tidak memiliki keraguan jika harus menutup Facebook jika digunakan untuk tipuan," kata Rudiiantara di Kementerian Komunikasi dan Pembangunan Informasi, Jakarta, Kamis (5/4) kemarin.Setelah Facebook mengaku digunakan sebagai alat propaganda anti-Rohingya di Myanmar, Rudiantara mengatakan dia tidak ingin sesuatu yang serupa terjadi di Indonesia.Selain itu, indikasi kebocoran satu juta data pengguna dari Indonesia dalam kasus Cambridge Analytica membutuhkan sikap kooperatif dari Facebook dalam menindaklanjuti permintaan dari Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi.Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa partainya tidak akan hanya mengambil tindakan untuk menutup platform media sosial, tetapi melalui suatu proses dan dengan alasan keuntungan yang tepat.Meskipun ia menilai bahwa sejauh ini, Facebook adalah salah satu dari tiga platform yang kurang kooperatif, yaitu hanya memenuhi 50 persen dari kementerian komunikasi dan permintaan informasi untuk menutup konten yang dianggap tidak sesuai dengan norma sejak dua tahun lalu."Inilah yang ingin saya sampaikan kepada publik, bahwa inilah situasinya, saya pribadi tidak punya niat untuk menutup hal seperti itu, itu harus dijaga untuk kepentingan negara bagian dan masyarakat," kata Rudiiantara.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi menekankan bahwa semua media sosial harus bersedia untuk berpartisipasi dalam menjaga stabilitas negara jika mereka ingin melakukan bisnis di Indonesia, jika itu menyebabkan ketidakstabilan di Indonesia, pemerintah akan bertindak secara tegas.Ada juga pengguna Facebook di Indonesia yang mengakses media sosial setiap bulan lebih dari 115 juta orang, dari 2,07 miliar orang yang mengakses Facebook setiap bulan di seluruh dunia.

berita: People who have a sudden stroke (falling from the bathroom), the blood vessels to the brain will burst little by little. Remember, to overcome this do not be nervous or panic. If the victim is at the scene such as in the bathroom, bedroom or living room. Do not move to another place, because it will accelerate the rupture of blood vessels and do not let the victim fall again. You can do this by removing the victim's blood using a needle that has been burned or sterilized and then inserted into the tip of each finger until 1-2 drops of blood come out. If the blood does not come out, it can be massaged until it comes out, after which the victim will be conscious after a few minutes. If the victim's mouth is tilted, pull the earlobe until it is red and directly pierce the bottom of the earlobe with the sterile needle until the blood drips out. After the victim is conscious and his mouth has recovered, then he is taken to a doctor or hospital. Usually, people who have a stroke will have their blood vessels burst more quickly due to shocks on the way to the hospital or net ball doctor. The person may not regain consciousness or faint when this happens it will usually be disabled or paralyzed. (We must remember BLOODING from the finger of a person who has a stroke, then we can help that person from a stroke).
berita_id: Orang yang tiba -tiba mengalami stroke (jatuh dari kamar mandi), pembuluh darah ke otak akan meledak sedikit demi sedikit.Ingat, untuk mengatasi hal ini jangan gugup atau panik.Jika korban berada di tempat kejadian seperti di kamar mandi, kamar tidur atau ruang tamu.Jangan pindah ke tempat lain, karena itu akan mempercepat pecahnya pembuluh darah dan jangan membiarkan korban jatuh lagi.Anda dapat melakukan ini dengan menghilangkan darah korban menggunakan jarum yang telah dibakar atau disterilkan dan kemudian dimasukkan ke ujung setiap jari sampai 1-2 tetes darah keluar.Jika darah tidak keluar, itu dapat dipijat sampai keluar, setelah itu korban akan sadar setelah beberapa menit.Jika mulut korban dimiringkan, tarik daun telinga sampai merah dan langsung menusuk bagian bawah daun telinga dengan jarum steril sampai darah keluar.Setelah korban sadar dan mulutnya pulih, maka ia dibawa ke dokter atau rumah sakit.Biasanya, orang yang mengalami stroke akan membuat pembuluh darah mereka meledak lebih cepat karena guncangan dalam perjalanan ke rumah sakit atau dokter bola bersih.Orang tersebut tidak boleh mendapatkan kembali kesadaran atau pingsan ketika ini terjadi biasanya akan dinonaktifkan atau lumpuh.(Kita harus ingat darah dari jari seseorang yang mengalami stroke, maka kita dapat membantu orang itu dari stroke).

berita: The Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI) straightened the information circulating on social media regarding the closing of the gate for visitors the night before the 212 Action. According to the Secretary of BPPMI KH Rusli Effendi, since 2002, his party has enforced a rule to close all gates every night at 21.30 WIB and reopen them at 03.40 WIB before security system the Fajr prayer. "All pilgrims are not allowed to stay in the mosque area except under certain conditions and with permission from the security forces and the leadership of BPPMI," said Rusli in Jakarta, Tuesday (21/2). Regarding the conditions at night from 20 until the early hours of February 21, the security of the Istiqlal Mosque had explained to the congregation (participants of the 212 action) who had gathered in the mosque's courtyard about the procedure. "They understand and are willing to leave the mosque area," he said. According to Rusli, BPPMI did not receive notification from any party regarding the plans for the congregation to stay overnight as in the previous conditions when Muslims held 411, 212 or 112 actions. There was also no special communication from the authorities regarding this matter. "The Istiqlal Mosque is always devoted to the people and strives for national unity and unity and always maintains the comfort of worship. We urge all Muslims not to be influenced by news that cannot be accounted for," he concluded.
berita_id: Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal (BPPMI) meluruskan informasi yang beredar di media sosial mengenai penutupan gerbang bagi pengunjung malam sebelum aksi 212.Menurut Sekretaris Bppmi Kh Rusli Effendi, sejak tahun 2002, partainya telah menegakkan aturan untuk menutup semua gerbang setiap malam pukul 21.30 WIB dan membukanya kembali pada 03.40 WIB sebelum sistem keamanan doa Fajr."Semua peziarah tidak diizinkan untuk tinggal di daerah masjid kecuali dalam kondisi tertentu dan dengan izin dari pasukan keamanan dan kepemimpinan BPPMI," kata Rusli di Jakarta, Selasa (21/2).Mengenai kondisi di malam hari dari 20 hingga jam awal 21 Februari, keamanan masjid Istiqlal telah menjelaskan kepada jemaat (peserta aksi 212) yang telah berkumpul di halaman masjid tentang prosedur tersebut."Mereka mengerti dan bersedia meninggalkan daerah masjid," katanya.Menurut Rusli, BPPMI tidak menerima pemberitahuan dari pihak mana pun mengenai rencana jemaat untuk menginap seperti dalam kondisi sebelumnya ketika Muslim memegang 411, 212 atau 112 tindakan.Juga tidak ada komunikasi khusus dari pihak berwenang mengenai masalah ini."Masjid Istiqlal selalu dikhususkan untuk orang -orang dan berusaha untuk persatuan dan persatuan nasional dan selalu mempertahankan kenyamanan ibadah. Kami mendesak semua Muslim untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak dapat diperhitungkan," pungkasnya.

berita: Did you know that stroke is a dangerous health problem which is the number 3 killer in the world? Therefore, it is very important to know tips to prevent stroke from an early age and to know first aid if someone has a stroke. This is because in addition to causing death, stroke can also cause disability. In general, stroke is a condition where part of the brain is damaged. This happens because the arteries that supply blood to the brain are blocked, leaking, damaged or torn. How to prevent stroke that you can apply in your daily life is to start living a healthy lifestyle. If you have a history of diabetes and high blood pressure, you should reduce your sugar and salt intake. So what should you do when you see someone having a stroke? There are so many people who don't know and are confused about what to do when they see other people experiencing stroke symptoms. Though first aid is needed in order to prevent things that are not desirable. Here is first aid for people who have had a stroke that you can do. Why is that? This is because it can allow the rupture of blood vessels in the brain. In this condition, you should help so that the sufferer does not fall back. Pierce the fingertips with a needle The second step is to pierce all the fingertips using feel a needle. We recommend using a syringe to be more sterile. However, if you don't have one, you can use other needles such as sewing needles and pins. To sterilize the needle, you should burn it first. Then stick the needle all over the fingertips. Make sure the blood comes out. If you can't, you can press the fingers. In this way, the patient will be conscious in a period of about 10 minutes. Pull and pierce the ear with a needle The next aid is by pulling both ears and pricking them with a needle. This is done when the patient's mouth and face look less normal. The trick, pull the patient's ears until they look red. after that, pierce the lower ends of both ears and do this 2 times. In a few minutes the patient will return to normal and conscious. Seek medical help After the patient's condition begins to recover, seek medical help immediately. Take the patient to the nearest clinic or hospital for further action. So that's some first aid for people who have had a stroke that you can do.
berita_id: Tahukah Anda bahwa stroke adalah masalah kesehatan yang berbahaya yang merupakan pembunuh nomor 3 di dunia?Oleh karena itu, sangat penting untuk mengetahui tips untuk mencegah stroke sejak usia dini dan mengetahui pertolongan pertama jika seseorang mengalami stroke.Ini karena selain menyebabkan kematian, stroke juga dapat menyebabkan kecacatan.Secara umum, stroke adalah suatu kondisi di mana bagian otak rusak.Ini terjadi karena arteri yang memasok darah ke otak diblokir, bocor, rusak atau robek.Cara mencegah stroke yang dapat Anda terapkan dalam kehidupan sehari -hari adalah mulai menjalani gaya hidup sehat.Jika Anda memiliki riwayat diabetes dan tekanan darah tinggi, Anda harus mengurangi asupan gula dan garam.Jadi apa yang harus Anda lakukan ketika Anda melihat seseorang mengalami stroke?Ada begitu banyak orang yang tidak tahu dan bingung tentang apa yang harus dilakukan ketika mereka melihat orang lain mengalami gejala stroke.Meskipun pertolongan pertama diperlukan untuk mencegah hal -hal yang tidak diinginkan.Ini pertolongan pertama untuk orang -orang yang mengalami stroke yang dapat Anda lakukan.Kenapa begitu?Ini karena dapat memungkinkan pecahnya pembuluh darah di otak.Dalam kondisi ini, Anda harus membantu sehingga penderita tidak mundur.Menusuk ujung jari dengan jarum langkah kedua adalah menusuk semua ujung jari menggunakan Feel a Needle.Kami merekomendasikan menggunakan jarum suntik untuk menjadi lebih steril.Namun, jika Anda tidak memilikinya, Anda dapat menggunakan jarum lain seperti menjahit jarum dan pin.Untuk mensterilkan jarum, Anda harus membakarnya terlebih dahulu.Kemudian tempelkan jarum di seluruh ujung jari.Pastikan darah keluar.Jika Anda tidak bisa, Anda dapat menekan jari.Dengan cara ini, pasien akan sadar dalam jangka waktu sekitar 10 menit.Tarik dan tusuk telinga dengan jarum bantuan berikutnya adalah dengan menarik kedua telinga dan menusuknya dengan jarum.Ini dilakukan ketika mulut dan wajah pasien terlihat kurang normal.Triknya, tarik telinga pasien sampai terlihat merah.Setelah itu, menembus ujung bawah kedua telinga dan lakukan ini 2 kali.Dalam beberapa menit pasien akan kembali normal dan sadar.Carilah bantuan medis setelah kondisi pasien mulai pulih, segera cari bantuan medis.Bawa pasien ke klinik atau rumah sakit terdekat untuk tindakan lebih lanjut.Jadi itu adalah pertolongan pertama untuk orang -orang yang memiliki stroke yang bisa Anda lakukan.

berita: The document states that President Saddam Hussein received information about the film from the state intelligence agency. According to information, the names used in the Pokemon movies contain an invitation that cannot be tolerated. Reporting from neutrality (13/4/16), it was revealed a fact that the word Pokemon itself means "I am Jewish". The name Pokemon is taken from the Syriac language, or the Syriac language, which in Indonesian means: 'I am Jewish'. Meaning of Pikachu in gens Syriac: "Be a Jew" Also reported from neutrality (13/4/16), it was revealed that the word Pikachu, a type of monster icon in Pokemon, means "Be Jewish". The name Pikachu is taken from the Syriac language, or Syriac, which in Indonesian means 'Be a Jew'. Then it was revealed a fact that the word Charmender, one of the iconic types of monsters in pokemon which means "God is Weak". The name Charmender is taken from the Syriac, or Syriac language which in Indonesian means 'God is Weak.' Of course, the meaning is very offensive to adherents of religion, especially Islam and Christianity. Because, in Islam, it is clearly called Allahu Akbar (God is Great). and in Christianity it is called the Holy God. The reason for the ban, as stated in the document, was to prevent the entry of Jewish influences into the children and the nation's culture. Pokemon cartoons were banned in Iraq by President Saddam Hussein. Of course, the prohibition is not just a ban without a reason. There are good reasons why Saddam Hussein was so adamant in boycotting these children's cartoons. In a state document confiscated by US troops, during a coup in 2004, it was revealed that there were "uncommendable" actions or negative messages behind the film. The document states that President Saddam Hussein received information about the film from the state intelligence agency. According to information, the names used in the Pokemon movies contain an invitation that cannot be tolerated.
berita_id: Dokumen tersebut menyatakan bahwa Presiden Saddam Hussein menerima informasi tentang film dari Badan Intelijen Negara.Menurut informasi, nama -nama yang digunakan dalam film Pokemon berisi undangan yang tidak dapat ditoleransi.Pelaporan dari Netralitas (13/4/16), terungkap fakta bahwa kata Pokemon itu sendiri berarti "Saya Yahudi".Nama Pokemon diambil dari bahasa Syria, atau bahasa Syria, yang dalam bahasa Indonesia berarti: 'Saya Yahudi'.Makna Pikachu di Gens Syria: "Jadilah seorang Yahudi" juga dilaporkan dari netralitas (13/4/16), terungkap bahwa kata Pikachu, sejenis ikon monster di Pokemon, berarti "menjadi Yahudi".Nama Pikachu diambil dari bahasa Syria, atau Syria, yang dalam bahasa Indonesia berarti 'menjadi orang Yahudi'.Kemudian terungkap fakta bahwa kata charmender, salah satu jenis monster ikonik di Pokemon yang berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Nama Charmender diambil dari bahasa Syria, atau bahasa Syria yang dalam bahasa Indonesia berarti 'Tuhan itu lemah.'Tentu saja, artinya sangat menyinggung penganut agama, terutama Islam dan Kekristenan.Karena, dalam Islam, itu jelas disebut Allahu Akbar (Tuhan itu hebat).dan dalam agama Kristen itu disebut Allah yang Kudus.Alasan larangan tersebut, sebagaimana dinyatakan dalam dokumen, adalah untuk mencegah masuknya pengaruh Yahudi ke dalam anak -anak dan budaya bangsa.Kartun Pokemon dilarang di Irak oleh Presiden Saddam Hussein.Tentu saja, larangan ini bukan hanya larangan tanpa alasan.Ada alasan bagus mengapa Saddam Hussein begitu bersikeras memboikot kartun anak -anak ini.Dalam sebuah dokumen negara yang disita oleh pasukan AS, selama kudeta pada tahun 2004, terungkap bahwa ada tindakan "tidak menyenangkan" atau pesan negatif di balik film tersebut.Dokumen tersebut menyatakan bahwa Presiden Saddam Hussein menerima informasi tentang film dari Badan Intelijen Negara.Menurut informasi, nama -nama yang digunakan dalam film Pokemon berisi undangan yang tidak dapat ditoleransi.

berita: Dream - The Muslim community was shocked by the news about a toothbrush made from pig bristles. One of the markers is the ingredient in the toothbrush, 'bristle', which is listed on the packaging. The word 'bristle' is then interpreted as 'sea urchin'. As a result, many Muslims are worried about using a toothbrush on the market. But, does 'bristle' really mean 'sea urchin'? Regarding this case, the Institute for the Study of Food, Drugs and Cosmetics, the Indonesian Ulema Council (LPPOM MUI) provided an explanation. Quoted from the halalmui.org page, LPPOM MUI explains the term 'bristle' means stiff hair or fiber. This definition refers to Webster's Dictionary, so all stiff hair, including stiff beards, palm fibers, pine leaves fall into the bristle category. In the industrial world, bristle is often used as a material for making brushes and brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle materials can come from animals such as pigs, horses, goats, or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. To emphasize what bristles are used on a toothbrush, usually the term bristle will be written in the product name. For care example, 'Boar Bristle Brush' which means 'Boar Bristle Brush. 'Boar' means 'boar' or 'boar'. If you find a toothbrush with the above sentence on the packaging, then the toothbrush is declared forbidden to use. "This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles. Toothbrushes can also use boar bristles," wrote LPPOM MUI, quoted from halalmui.org, Wednesday, November 2, 2016. However, not all toothbrushes that contain the term 'bristle' in the packaging must be made from pig bristles. There are already many manufacturers that use horse, goat, camel hair, as well as nylon and silicone fibers in their toothbrush products. "When there is no information on the source of the material, at least a simple method can be used. To determine whether it is made from animal hair or not, the method in question is to burn the material." "If it smells like burning hair or horns, it's better to leave it alone. Materials from plastic or coconut fiber don't give off that characteristic smell when burned." wrote LPPOM MUI.
berita_id: Dream - Komunitas Muslim terkejut dengan berita tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Salah satu penanda adalah bahan di sikat gigi, 'Bristle', yang tercantum pada kemasannya.Kata 'bristle' kemudian ditafsirkan sebagai 'landak laut'.Akibatnya, banyak Muslim khawatir menggunakan sikat gigi di pasaran.Tapi, apakah 'Bristle' benar -benar berarti 'landak laut'?Mengenai kasus ini, Institut untuk Studi Makanan, Obat -obatan dan Kosmetik, Dewan Ulama Indonesia (LPPOM MUI) memberikan penjelasan.Dikutip dari halaman halalmui.org, lppom mui menjelaskan istilah 'bulu' berarti rambut atau serat yang kaku.Definisi ini mengacu pada kamus Webster, jadi semua rambut kaku, termasuk janggut kaku, serat kelapa sawit, daun pinus termasuk dalam kategori bulu.Di dunia industri, bulu sering digunakan sebagai bahan untuk membuat sikat dan sikat, termasuk sikat gigi.Bahan bulu dapat berasal dari hewan seperti babi, kuda, kambing, atau serat sintetis seperti nilon dan silikon.Untuk menekankan bulu apa yang digunakan pada sikat gigi, biasanya istilah bulu akan ditulis dalam nama produk.Sebagai contoh, 'Boar Bristle Brush' yang berarti 'Boar Bristle Brush.'Babi' berarti 'babi hutan' atau 'babi hutan'.Jika Anda menemukan sikat gigi dengan kalimat di atas pada kemasan, maka sikat gigi dinyatakan dilarang digunakan."Ini berarti bahwa produk ini adalah kuas yang menggunakan bulu babi liar. Sikat gigi juga dapat menggunakan bulu babi," tulis LPPOM MUI, dikutip dari halalmui.org, Rabu, 2 November 2016. Namun, tidak semua sikat gigi yang mengandung istilah 'bristle' dalam kemasan harus dibuat dari Bristles babi.Sudah ada banyak produsen yang menggunakan kuda, kambing, rambut unta, serta serat nilon dan silikon dalam produk sikat gigi mereka."Ketika tidak ada informasi tentang sumber material, setidaknya metode sederhana dapat digunakan. Untuk menentukan apakah itu terbuat dari rambut hewani atau tidak, metode yang dimaksud adalah membakar material.""Jika baunya seperti rambut atau tanduk yang terbakar, lebih baik membiarkannya sendiri. Bahan -bahan dari plastik atau serat kelapa tidak mengeluarkan aroma khas saat dibakar."menulis lppom mui.

berita: This week, content circulated on Facebook's timeline stating that this social media would be blocked or closed in Indonesia on April 24, 2018. The Ministry of Communication and Information finally spoke up about this news, and stated that it was fake news or a hoax. The Director General of Informatics Applications at the Ministry of Communications and Informatics, Semuel Abrijani Pangerapan, confirmed that the news that Internet access to Facebook would be closed on April 24 was false news. "It must be a hoax. Fake news," said Semuel to the coil (kumparan.com), Friday (20/4). In spreading this hoax, the perpetrators used a photo that seemed to be the headline of a newspaper with the headline "FB Indonesia will be shut down." The perpetrator then added the caption text: "April 24, 2018 at 00.00 WIB." There is also a user status update stating the same thing and until now it has been viral on Facebook, as shown below: Facebook blocked Semuel said the viral picture above does not clearly show the origins of the media and the source of the news. The Ministry of Communication and Information, as the regulator of Internet content in Indonesia, has never stated that it will block Facebook on April 24. DPR Opens Option to Ask Kominfo to Block Facebook 3 Important Figures Behind the Leak of 50 Million Facebook User Data Semuel said the Ministry of Communication and Information would indeed take firm steps to block Facebook if it was found that Facebook violated the law that harmed users in Indonesia in the case of data misuse by political consultant Cambridge Analytica to win Donald Trump in the 2016 US presidential election. "Like Minister Rudiantara's statement, (Facebook) will be temporarily blocked if there are findings of violation of the law or harm to Indonesian Facebook users," said Semuel. Facebook given until April 26 Facebook is currently being hit by a problem because there is a case of data misuse by Cambridge Analytica. The Ministry of Communication and Information has sent a second warning letter asking Facebook to submit the results of an audit of data misused by Cambridge Analytica, along with the Indonesian users who were affected. Facebook Indonesia is given until April 26 to submit the results of the audit. Facebook Indonesia management asked the government for time so that they first coordinate with Facebook management in the region. This data misuse is not only carried out by Cambridge Analytica, but the Ministry of Communication and Information also mentions that there are CubeYou and Aggregate IQ institutions that collect Facebook user data and then misuse it. Cambridge Analytica Case Cambridge Analytica collects Facebook user data through the psychological test quiz application This Is Your Digital Life, created by Cambridge University researcher Aleksandr Kogan. Through This Is Your Digital Life, Kogan managed to collect more than 50 million data in the form of likes, interests, user's birth date, to location. This data was then handed over to Cambridge Analytica by Kogan. The British political consultant then used data such as likes, location, date of birth of users, to target political advertisements aimed at improving Donald Trump's reputation and bringing down political opponents. INA Facebook Public Policy, Ruben Hattari. INA Facebook Public Policy, Ruben Hattari. (Photo: Iqbal Firdaus/coil) Facebook apologizes for the misuse of this data and promises to make improvements to privacy and promises to limit access rights for third-party applications that want to retrieve Facebook user data. Ruben Hattari, Head of Public Policy at Facebook Indonesia, said there are around 748 Facebook users in Indonesia who have installed the This is Your Digital Life application. The application has been closed by Facebook since cambridge 2015.
berita_id: Minggu ini, konten yang diedarkan pada timeline Facebook yang menyatakan bahwa media sosial ini akan diblokir atau ditutup di Indonesia pada 24 April 2018. Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi akhirnya berbicara tentang berita ini, dan menyatakan bahwa itu adalah berita palsu atau tipuan.Direktur Jenderal Aplikasi Informatika di Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika, Semuel Abrijani Pangerapan, mengkonfirmasi bahwa berita bahwa akses internet ke Facebook akan ditutup pada 24 April adalah berita palsu."Itu pasti tipuan. Berita palsu," kata Semuel kepada koil (kumparan.com), Jumat (20/4).Dalam menyebarkan tipuan ini, para pelaku menggunakan foto yang tampaknya menjadi berita utama sebuah koran dengan judul "FB Indonesia akan ditutup."Pelaku kemudian menambahkan teks teks: "24 April 2018 pukul 00.00 WIB."Ada juga pembaruan status pengguna yang menyatakan hal yang sama dan sampai sekarang telah viral di Facebook, seperti yang ditunjukkan di bawah ini: Facebook diblokir Semuel mengatakan gambar viral di atas tidak dengan jelas menunjukkan asal -usul media dan sumber berita.Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi, sebagai regulator konten Internet di Indonesia, tidak pernah menyatakan bahwa mereka akan memblokir Facebook pada 24 April. DPR membuka opsi untuk meminta Kominfo untuk memblokir angka -angka penting Facebook 3 di balik kebocoran 50 juta data pengguna Facebook, Semuel, dan informasi yang merugikan para pengguna dalam hal -hal yang melanggar hukum, dalam hal -hal yang merugikan, para pengguna yang merugikan, para pengguna yang merugikan, Facebook, melanggar undang -undang yang melanggar hukum, dan informasi yang merugikan para pengguna yang melanggar hukum, Facebook, melanggar undang -undang yang melanggar hukum, dan informasi yang merugikan para pengguna di Indones.Trump dalam pemilihan presiden AS 2016."Seperti pernyataan Menteri Rudiantara, (Facebook) akan diblokir sementara jika ada temuan pelanggaran hukum atau kerugian pada pengguna Facebook Indonesia," kata Semuel.Facebook yang diberikan hingga 26 April Facebook saat ini dipukul oleh masalah karena ada kasus penyalahgunaan data oleh Cambridge Analytica.Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi telah mengirim surat peringatan kedua yang meminta Facebook untuk mengirimkan hasil audit data yang disalahgunakan oleh Cambridge Analytica, bersama dengan pengguna Indonesia yang terpengaruh.Facebook Indonesia diberikan hingga 26 April untuk mengirimkan hasil audit.Manajemen Facebook Indonesia meminta waktu kepada pemerintah sehingga mereka pertama kali berkoordinasi dengan manajemen Facebook di wilayah tersebut.Penyalahgunaan data ini tidak hanya dilakukan oleh Cambridge Analytica, tetapi Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi juga menyebutkan bahwa ada Cubeyou dan agregat lembaga IQ yang mengumpulkan data pengguna Facebook dan kemudian menyalahgunakannya.Cambridge Analytica Case Cambridge Analytica mengumpulkan data pengguna Facebook melalui aplikasi kuis tes psikologis ini adalah kehidupan digital Anda, yang dibuat oleh peneliti Universitas Cambridge Aleksandr Kogan.Melalui ini adalah kehidupan digital Anda, Kogan berhasil mengumpulkan lebih dari 50 juta data dalam bentuk suka, minat, tanggal lahir pengguna, ke lokasi.Data ini kemudian diserahkan ke Cambridge Analytica oleh Kogan.Konsultan politik Inggris kemudian menggunakan data seperti suka, lokasi, tanggal lahir pengguna, untuk menargetkan iklan politik yang bertujuan meningkatkan reputasi Donald Trump dan menjatuhkan lawan politik.Ina Kebijakan Publik Facebook, Ruben Hattari.Ina Kebijakan Publik Facebook, Ruben Hattari.(Foto: Iqbal Firdaus/Coil) Facebook meminta maaf atas penyalahgunaan data ini dan berjanji untuk melakukan perbaikan privasi dan berjanji untuk membatasi hak akses untuk aplikasi pihak ketiga yang ingin mengambil data pengguna Facebook.Ruben Hattari, Kepala Kebijakan Publik di Facebook Indonesia, mengatakan ada sekitar 748 pengguna Facebook di Indonesia yang telah menginstal aplikasi ini adalah aplikasi kehidupan digital Anda.Aplikasi telah ditutup oleh Facebook sejak Cambridge 2015.

berita: The president's salary, which is only around Rp. 62 million per month, is currently considered very low. The government plans to propose an increase in the president's salary so that it is worth Rp. 553 million per month. In the RPP, apart from the president, the vice president and other high-ranking state officials will also experience salary increases. The president's salary has skyrocketed because the calculation is based on an index of 1:12698 between the salaries of the lowest rank civil servants and those of the lowest rank civil servants. The highest income index for the president is simulated to reach 96000 so that he will earn an income of IDR 553.4 million per month. Meanwhile, the vice president (wapres) will receive an income of IDR 368.9 million per month from the previous basic salary of IDR 20 million. vice president salary based on income index 64000 With pe With this salary change, the monthly income of the president of the Republic of Indonesia will compete with the salaries of leaders in other countries. The extent of the salary comparison is in the info graphic. In the RPP, new salary proposals also appear for ministers, attorney general, commander of the TNI, chief of police, chairman of the MPR, chairman of the DPR, chairman of the DPD, chairman of the KPK, chairman of the BPK, chairman of the Supreme Court, and chairman of the Constitutional Court With an index calculation of 16000, their income is IDR 92.2 million per month Then for the deputy chairman of the MPR, DPR, DPD, KPK, BPK , MA, and MK, the income index is 15,333 and receives an income of Rp. 88.3 million per month. As for the deputy minister, deputy head of the National Police, members of the DPR, DPD members, BPK members, and Supreme Court justices, per month, they earn Rp. 80.7 million. With an income index of 14000, the Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (Kemenpan RB) acknowledged the issue of the circulation of this RPP even though he stated that the proposal was not yet ripe. The Head of the Legal, Communication and Information Bureau Public Ormation Ke Menpan RB Herman Suryatman said that the information on the RPP was not valid. Herman said that the RPP was sourced from the discussion material held last year. "Those are simulation numbers that are not valid. 2017," he said in Jakarta yesterday. As is known, the RPP on the Salaries and Benefits of Civil Servants is a technical regulation of the Law on State Civil Apparatus (ASN). According to Herman, the presentation contains a simulation of the income of civil servants and other state officials. still needs further study. "Not only does it contain a simulation of the income of state officials, but also a lieutenant simulation of the income of civil servants. Please don't be misunderstood," he said. Using a calculation index of 1:12698, the income of civil servants, both central and regional, will increase. regional officials such as governors governors, regents, mayors, provincial DPRD, and city regency DPRDs will also experience an increase. The governor will earn an income of IDR 76.8 million per month with an index of 13333 Then the deputy governor, regent mayor, and chairman of the provincial DPRD will earn income Rp. 73.2 million with an income index of 12698. Meanwhile, the deputy regent/mayor, deputy chairman of the provincial DPRD, and the chairman of the Regency/City DPRD have a salary of Rp. 69.7 million per month with an income index of 12094. The province which has an income index of 11518 has a monthly salary of Rp. 66.3 million. Lastly, for members of the district and city DPRD, the salary to be earned is Rp. 63.3 million with an income index of 10969. Public policy expert at the University of Padjadjaran (Unpad) Yogi Suprayogi assessed, even though it is only a simulation, the salary increase for state officials is irrelevant. He said the current salary earned by state officials is sufficient. There is an additional operational allowance. That's big. It's what he likes. No need to grow it. It's irrelevant," he said. According to him, if there must be an increase, the salaries of the president and central officials must be adjusted to the inflation rate. "We are also not a developed country. Singapore could reach Rp 10 billion," he said. Yogi said, rather than an increase in the salaries of state officials, improving the salaries of civil servants is considered more important at this time. currently still discussing the technical rules of the ASN Law, one of which is the RPP on Salaries and Allowances Yogi emphasized the importance of changing the salary scheme of civil servants. Among the three things, Yogi requested that the basic salary be increased more than and performance allowances Currently the basic salary is smaller so that many civil servants go here and there to increase their performance allowances. Expensive allowances must be greater than the other two components so that teachers are willing to be placed in remote areas. In addition, he also highlighted that performance allowances must be based on performance. He warned not to other countries pay salaries based on level of education Salary provision in some countries is also partly based on performance In the United States, the salary of civil servants in the Department of State ranges from USD88000 to USD96000 per year However, the lowest government employee salary is USD18785 per year Fri There are 2.79 million civil servants in Uncle Sam's country. The salary of the US president is around USD 400,000. The presidential salary increase was very drastic in 2001. Previously, the president's salary was only USD 200,000. Malaysian Prime Minister (PM) Najib Razak gave an annual bonus in 2018 to government employees who In addition, he provides a pension of 1000 ringgit per month for those who have served for 25 years. The salary of Malaysian civil servants who serve 14 years is around 36000 ringgit and those who have served for more than 1019 years get an income of 70753 ringgit. new civil servants working in Singapore reach 3,000 Singapore dollars per month For managerial positions earn around 8,000 Singapore dollars The number of employees in Singapore reaches 84,000 people According to Thomas Friedman of the New York Times, civil servants in Singapore are among the most efficient and uncorruptible bureaucrats “They have high standards of discipline and accountability,” said Friedman

The Ministry of Communication and Information (Kominfo) through the Director General of Informatics Applications again sent a letter to Facebook on Thursday (19/4/2018). The letter is still related to the leak of data of 1.3 million Facebook users in Indonesia and the alleged misuse of the data. Through the letter, on behalf of the government of the Republic of Indonesia, Kominfo asked for confirmation and explanation of the information on the misuse of Facebook user data, which reportedly spread to other analysis firms besides Cambridge Analytica, namely CubeYou and Aggregate IQ. In addition, Kominfo also asked for confirmation and further explanation regarding the technical actions that Facebook will take to limit access to the data they have. Regarding this data access restriction, the Head of Public Policy at Facebook Indonesia previously disclosed in a letter sent on April 5, 2018. Again, Kominfo asked Facebook to provide schedule data and audit results for cases of misuse of user data from the leaking of data of 1.3 million Indonesian Facebook users. Previously, at a meeting with Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives, Facebook was asked to conduct an audit for one month, starting April 17, 2018. In response to this, Facebook mistreat confirmed that it would conduct a transparent audit, but could not promise an exact date for the completion of the process. Finally, in a letter sent by Kominfo, Facebook was asked to provide data on Indonesian Facebook users who were affected by data misuse by Cambridge Analytica. Kominfo emphasized that Facebook could fulfill all of these requests, no later than seven calendar days after the letter was sent last Thursday. If by the time limit specified Facebook has not fulfilled the request, there is no certainty about the steps that will be taken by the government. There is also no certainty about the news that Facebook will be closed on April 24, 2018. The government can indeed impose strict sanctions by blocking Facebook, however, the Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara, has never mentioned the issue of blocking since the first time this case emerged. So, it can be ascertained that the news of the closing of Facebook on April 24, 2018 is not true or a hoax.
berita_id: Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi (KOMINFO) melalui Direktur Jenderal Aplikasi Informatika lagi mengirim surat ke Facebook pada hari Kamis (19/4/2018).Surat itu masih terkait dengan kebocoran data 1,3 juta pengguna Facebook di Indonesia dan dugaan penyalahgunaan data.Melalui surat itu, atas nama Pemerintah Republik Indonesia, Kominfo meminta konfirmasi dan penjelasan informasi tentang penyalahgunaan data pengguna Facebook, yang dilaporkan menyebar ke perusahaan analisis lain selain Cambridge Analytica, yaitu Cubeyou dan agregat IQ.Selain itu, Kominfo juga meminta konfirmasi dan penjelasan lebih lanjut mengenai tindakan teknis yang akan dilakukan Facebook untuk membatasi akses ke data yang mereka miliki.Mengenai pembatasan akses data ini, kepala kebijakan publik di Facebook Indonesia sebelumnya diungkapkan dalam surat yang dikirim pada 5 April 2018. Sekali lagi, Kominfo meminta Facebook untuk memberikan data jadwal dan hasil audit untuk kasus penyalahgunaan data pengguna dari bocor data 1,3 juta pengguna Facebook Indonesia.Sebelumnya, pada pertemuan dengan Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia, Facebook diminta untuk melakukan audit selama satu bulan, mulai 17 April 2018. Sebagai tanggapan terhadap hal ini, Facebook Mistreat mengkonfirmasi bahwa itu akan melakukan audit transparan, tetapi tidak dapat menjanjikan tanggal pasti untuk penyelesaian proses tersebut.Akhirnya, dalam surat yang dikirim oleh KOMOMO, Facebook diminta untuk memberikan data tentang pengguna Facebook Indonesia yang dipengaruhi oleh penyalahgunaan data oleh Cambridge Analytica.Kepomo menekankan bahwa Facebook dapat memenuhi semua permintaan ini, selambat -lambatnya tujuh hari kalender setelah surat itu dikirim Kamis lalu.Jika pada batas waktu yang ditentukan Facebook belum memenuhi permintaan, tidak ada kepastian tentang langkah -langkah yang akan diambil oleh pemerintah.Juga tidak ada kepastian tentang berita bahwa Facebook akan ditutup pada 24 April 2018. Pemerintah memang dapat menjatuhkan sanksi yang ketat dengan memblokir Facebook, namun, Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara, tidak pernah menyebutkan masalah pemblokiran sejak pertama kali kasus ini muncul.Jadi, dapat dipastikan bahwa berita tentang penutupan Facebook pada 24 April 2018 tidak benar atau tipuan.

berita: Rumors of the closing of the Facebook (FB) service in Indonesia on April 24 2018 suddenly became a viral issue on Social Media (Medsos). This is because FB as a means of communication, has the most users in Indonesia compared to other social media. Responding to this, there were many reactions that were conveyed by netizens in their posts, ranging from anxiety, sadness and even fear because of a data leak, so that it could be used against things that were not appropriate by hackers. Then what we are curious about is, is it true that FB in Indonesia will be closed or is it just a HOAX? Reporting from Kompas.com, the information regarding the closing of FB which has become viral on social media cannot be confirmed (aka HOAX). "The government can indeed take firm action to block Facebook because the data of one million Indonesian users was also leaked in the Cambridge Analytica (CA) scandal. However, there is no certainty that april on April 24, FB will actually be blocked in Indonesia," he wrote on the Kompas website. com. Tuesday (17/04/2018) This was also stated by Rudiatara as the Minister of Communication and Information (Kominfo) that blocking FB cannot be done arbitrarily, "Everything must remain procedural so as not to be rash," he explained. But on the other hand, the Minister of Communication and Informatics also emphasized that the blocking of FB could occur at any time, if the leak of FB user data in Indonesia is used for criminal matters. "In the meantime, these two things have not been proven, they are still under investigation and waiting for the results of the audit," said Rudiantara
berita_id: Rumor tentang penutupan layanan Facebook (FB) di Indonesia pada 24 April 2018 tiba -tiba menjadi masalah viral di media sosial (MEDSOS).Ini karena FB sebagai alat komunikasi, memiliki sebagian besar pengguna di Indonesia dibandingkan dengan media sosial lainnya.Menanggapi hal ini, ada banyak reaksi yang disampaikan oleh netizen di pos mereka, mulai dari kecemasan, kesedihan dan bahkan ketakutan karena kebocoran data, sehingga dapat digunakan terhadap hal -hal yang tidak sesuai oleh peretas.Lalu yang ingin kita penasaran, apakah benar FB di Indonesia akan ditutup atau hanya tipuan?Pelaporan dari Kompas.com, informasi mengenai penutupan FB yang telah menjadi viral di media sosial tidak dapat dikonfirmasi (alias tipuan)."Pemerintah memang dapat mengambil tindakan tegas untuk memblokir Facebook karena data satu juta pengguna Indonesia juga bocor dalam skandal Cambridge Analytica (CA). Namun, tidak ada kepastian bahwa April pada 24 April, FB sebenarnya akan diblokir di Indonesia," tulisnya di situs web Kompas.com.Selasa (17/04/2018) Ini juga dinyatakan oleh Rudiatara sebagai Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (KOMINFO) bahwa memblokir FB tidak dapat dilakukan secara sewenang -wenang, "semuanya harus tetap prosedural agar tidak terburu -buru," jelasnya.Tetapi di sisi lain, Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika juga menekankan bahwa pemblokiran FB dapat terjadi kapan saja, jika kebocoran data pengguna FB di Indonesia digunakan untuk masalah pidana."Sementara itu, kedua hal ini belum terbukti, mereka masih sedang diselidiki dan menunggu hasil audit," kata Rudiantara

berita: The issue of the blocking and closing of Facebook in Indonesia continues to roll. Even the discourse of closing Facebook and social networks is not the first time. It was the same in years past. As the issue resurfaced, the Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo), Rudiantara, was afflicted with the question "do you dare to block Facebook in Indonesia?". This follows the incident of the theft of 1 million user data in the country by the analyst firm Cambridge Analytica, which was announced on April 5, 2018. It has been a week since the announcement, Rudiantara has twice sent a warning letter (SP) to Facebook. However, there is no sign that the social networking giant will be blocked. (Also read: This is Facebook's reply letter after being given a second warning from Kominfo) Rudiantara denied that it was said to be "soft" to Facebook. He claimed that Indonesia was considered the most assertive by his fellow Southeast Asians. “Indonesia is considered to be bold and assertive. Which other ASEAN country dares to close the international Electronic System Operator (PSE)? Only Indonesia," he said. "We are the reference. Neighboring countries in ASEAN even sent a number of staff to see the system in Indonesia,” he added. It is known that previously there were several PSEs that were blocked because they were considered to have violated the rules of the game in Indonesia. For example, Telegram, Tumblr, Vimeo, etc. Although he dared to block, Rudiantara did not want to be careless. According to him, there are certain conditions under which the government can immediately take blocking action, for example if there are indications of incitement between groups. "If there are indications that Facebook in Indonesia is being used for incitement, as happened in Myanmar, I have no qualms about blocking it," he said. For the data theft case, Rudiantara said he valuate was still waiting for the full audit results from Facebook. If there are results, then the government can measure the potential problems that arise and take further action. For now, in the First and Second Warning Letters given by Kominfo to Facebook, his party requested that potentially harmful third-party services be stopped. This is said to have been agreed by Facebook. Right now, it's already SP II. We wait, later after SP II it can be upgraded to temporary service termination if needed," he said. Meanwhile, Member of Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives, Bobby Adhityo Rizaldi, hopes that there is an immediate need for a solution regarding the data leak of Facebook users in Indonesia of more than one million users. According to Bobby, closing Facebook is not a solution to solve this problem. "Current challenges must be solved with modern solutions. Closing FB without having a solution will only cause unnecessary domestic noise," Bobby said in a public hearing (RDPU) between Commission I and Facebook Indonesia and Southeast Asia. at the DPR Building, Senayan. Although Facebook has apologized for the misuse of data by an application developed by academics at Cambridge University, DR. Alexander Kogan. However, according to Bobby, there is no need to close Facebook because the use of Facebook by the Indonesian people has touched the Indonesian economy. "The use of the FB platform has touched the joints of the micro-enterprise economy in Indonesia, apart from only social media, it doesn't need to be closed," Bobby explained. The Golkar Party politician advised the Indonesian government to make regulations on commercialization and proper monitoring infrastructure in this regard. "The issue of FB is similar to online motorcycle taxis which have become a new economic media platform, which did not exist 10 years ago," he explained. Meanwhile, the Chairman of the House of Representatives, Bambang Soesatyo, assessed that if Facebook in Indonesia was closed it would cause other problems. He said this, considering that Facebook has helped the Indonesian people a lot. "The steps to close Facebook in my opinion are less creative. Because Facebook has benefits for the people, especially SMEs," said Bamsoet, the typical greeting for the chairman of the DPR. The former chairman of Commission III also added that there must be other solutions and strict sanctions for Facebook. "There must be more creative ways other than closing Facebook, and strict sanctions must still be given," he said.
berita_id: Masalah pemblokiran dan penutupan Facebook di Indonesia terus bergulir.Bahkan wacana untuk menutup Facebook dan jejaring sosial bukan pertama kalinya.Itu sama di tahun -tahun sebelumnya.Sebagai masalah muncul kembali, Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo), Rudiantara, menderita pertanyaan "Apakah Anda berani memblokir Facebook di Indonesia?".Ini mengikuti insiden pencurian 1 juta data pengguna di negara itu oleh perusahaan analis Cambridge Analytica, yang diumumkan pada 5 April 2018. Sudah seminggu sejak pengumuman, Rudiiantara telah dua kali mengirim surat peringatan (SP) ke Facebook.Namun, tidak ada tanda bahwa raksasa jejaring sosial akan diblokir.(Baca Juga: Ini adalah surat balasan Facebook setelah diberi peringatan kedua dari Kominfo) Rudiiantara membantah bahwa itu dikatakan "lembut" ke Facebook.Dia mengklaim bahwa Indonesia dianggap paling tegas oleh sesama orang Asia Tenggara."Indonesia dianggap berani dan tegas. Negara ASEAN lainnya yang berani menutup Operator Sistem Elektronik Internasional (PSE)? Hanya Indonesia," katanya."Kami adalah referensi. Negara -negara tetangga di ASEAN bahkan mengirim sejumlah staf untuk melihat sistem di Indonesia," tambahnya.Diketahui bahwa sebelumnya ada beberapa PSE yang diblokir karena mereka dianggap telah melanggar aturan permainan di Indonesia.Misalnya, Telegram, Tumblr, Vimeo, dll. Meskipun ia berani memblokir, Rudiantara tidak ingin ceroboh.Menurutnya, ada kondisi tertentu di mana pemerintah dapat segera mengambil tindakan pemblokiran, misalnya jika ada indikasi hasutan antar kelompok."Jika ada indikasi bahwa Facebook di Indonesia digunakan untuk hasutan, seperti yang terjadi di Myanmar, saya tidak ragu memblokirnya," katanya.Untuk kasus pencurian data, Rudiantara mengatakan dia Nilaiuat masih menunggu hasil audit penuh dari Facebook.Jika ada hasil, maka pemerintah dapat mengukur potensi masalah yang muncul dan mengambil tindakan lebih lanjut.Untuk saat ini, dalam surat peringatan pertama dan kedua yang diberikan oleh Kominfo ke Facebook, partainya meminta agar layanan pihak ketiga yang berpotensi berbahaya dihentikan.Ini dikatakan telah disepakati oleh Facebook.Saat ini, ini sudah SP II.Kami menunggu, nanti setelah SP II dapat ditingkatkan ke penghentian layanan sementara jika diperlukan, "katanya. Sementara itu, anggota Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Indonesia, Bobby Adhityo Rizaldi, berharap ada kebutuhan langsung untuk solusi yang tidak ada pada solusinya.Menutup FB tanpa memiliki solusi hanya akan menyebabkan kebisingan domestik yang tidak perlu, "kata Bobby dalam audiensi publik (RDPU) antara Komisi I dan Facebook Indonesia dan Asia Tenggara. Di gedung DPR, Senayan. Meskipun Facebook telah meminta maaf atas Penyalahgunaan Data oleh aplikasi yang dikembangkan oleh akademisi di Cambridge University, Dr. Alexander Kogan, menurut Boban.menyentuh ekonomi Indonesia.ada 10 tahun yang lalu, "ia menjelaskan. Sementara itu, ketua Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat, Bambang Soesatyo, menilai bahwa jika Facebook di Indonesia ditutup itu akan menyebabkan masalah lain. Dia mengatakan ini, mengingat bahwa Facebook telah banyak membantu orang -orang Indonesia." Langkah -langkah untuk menutup Facebook menurut saya kurang kreatif.Karena Facebook memiliki manfaat bagi orang -orang, terutama UKM, "kata Bamsoet, salam khas untuk ketua DPR. Mantan ketua Komisi III juga menambahkan bahwa harus ada solusi lain dan sanksi yang ketat untuk Facebook." Pasti ada cara yang lebih kreatif selain menutup Facebook, dan sanksi ketat masih harus diberikan, "katanya.

berita: News about the Traveloka application being blocked has surfaced recently. The call to uninstall this application has recently been widely discussed on social networks. Initially, this call emerged when a pianist named Ananda Sukarlan walked out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan delivered his speech. At that time Anies was delivering his speech in celebration of the 90th anniversary of Kanisius College at the Jakarta International Expo Kemayoran. It is well known that Ananda Sukarlan himself is one of the alumni of Kanisius College. With the action he did, namely by walking out when Anies gave a speech, it was also followed by a number of other alumni. One of the people who are said to support Ananda's walk out is the founder and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma. Derianto is considered to have supported Ananda's actions by shaking hands and congratulating him. The action taken by Derianto also resulted in the call to uninstall Traveloka and the company gave a response. Traveloka stated that one of the bosses did not attend the Kanisius College celebration because he was leaving the city. According to a clarification made by Traveloka, Derinato had planned to go overseas for several months and was unable to attend the Kanisius Alumni event. “We are proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from Aumni Kanisius. However, Mr. Derianto could not attend because he was on an official trip out of town and it had been planned several months ago,” said Traveloka. Meanwhile, the news circulating, namely Traveloka's CTO support for the pianist named Ananda, lotion was also clarified. Traveloka stated that the company always puts the values ​​of mutual respect for one another. This is also applied to all employees and leadership stakeholders. 'Traveloka is a company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian people who prioritize the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. We always apply these values ​​to all employees. This is at the same time responding to issues surrounding Anies' speech at the 90th Celebration of Kanisius College, which closed Traveloka.
berita_id: Berita tentang aplikasi Traveloka yang diblokir telah muncul baru -baru ini.Panggilan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi ini baru -baru ini telah dibahas secara luas di jejaring sosial.Awalnya, panggilan ini muncul ketika seorang pianis bernama Ananda Sukarlan berjalan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan menyampaikan pidatonya.Pada waktu itu Anies menyampaikan pidatonya untuk merayakan peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College di Jakarta International Expo Kemayoran.Sudah diketahui bahwa Ananda Sukarlan sendiri adalah salah satu alumni Kanisius College.Dengan tindakan yang dia lakukan, yaitu dengan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidato, itu juga diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lainnya.Salah satu orang yang dikatakan mendukung Ananda's Walk Out adalah pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma.DeRianto dianggap mendukung tindakan Ananda dengan berjabat tangan dan memberi selamat padanya.Tindakan yang diambil oleh DeRianto juga menghasilkan panggilan untuk menghapus instalan Traveloka dan perusahaan memberikan tanggapan.Traveloka menyatakan bahwa salah satu bos tidak menghadiri perayaan Kanisius College karena dia meninggalkan kota.Menurut klarifikasi yang dibuat oleh Traveloka, DeRinato telah merencanakan untuk pergi ke luar negeri selama beberapa bulan dan tidak dapat menghadiri acara alumni Kanisius.“Kami bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari Aumni Kanisius. Namun, Mr. DeRianto tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi di luar kota dan telah direncanakan beberapa bulan yang lalu,” kata Traveloka.Sementara itu, berita yang beredar, yaitu dukungan CTO Traveloka untuk pianis bernama Ananda, Lotion juga diklarifikasi.Traveloka menyatakan bahwa perusahaan selalu memberikan nilai -nilai saling menghormati satu sama lain.Ini juga diterapkan untuk semua karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan kepemimpinan.'Traveloka adalah perusahaan yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri orang -orang Indonesia yang memprioritaskan nilai -nilai saling menghormati, toleransi, dan inovasi.Kami selalu menerapkan nilai -nilai ini untuk semua karyawan.Ini pada saat yang sama menanggapi isu -isu seputar pidato anies di perayaan ke -90 Kanisius College, yang menutup Traveloka.

berita: Since a month ago, news about catfish which allegedly contains 3000 cancer cells is growing rapidly. In the news circulating, it is known that the catfish in Haikou, Hainan province, China is cultivated in a pond with strong smelling garbage, surrounded by pig and chicken cages. Then, is it true that catfish contains 3000 cancer cells? Knowing the Ins and Outs of Catfish There are many species of catfish in Indonesia. Clarias batrachus is one of the favorite breeds of farmed catfish. There is also the African catfish (also known as king cat fish, king catfish, ed.) which is the result slob of crossbreeding female catfish from Taiwan and males from Kenya, Africa. However, it is not known which of the F1, F2, or F3 breeds produced this type of catfish. Have you ever heard of sangkuriang catfish? Sangkuriang catfish is the result of genetic engineering from the Sukabumi Freshwater Cultivation Center (BBAT) derived from African catfish. Catfish live in fresh water, precisely in rivers where the water is not too heavy, for example in lakes or small puddles. Stigma catfish are dirty and dirty, right? Catfish have additional gills, so they can take oxygen from the air. That is the reason why catfish can live even in oxygen-poor water environments. This fish is also able to live even though the environment is polluted with organic materials. Catfish are carnivores that like to eat water fleas, larvae, worms, and snails. The remains of rotting objects and human waste also like to be eaten by catfish. However, catfish do not like plants. This behavior makes people think of catfish as dirty fish. Compared to grouper and carp, catfish is favored by the public because the price is more affordable. Catfish connoisseurs are generally people with middle to lower economic levels. The high demand for catfish makes catfish farming more attractive to the public. Make no mistake, catfish in Indonesia is now cultivated with good quality cultivation. Unlike the news circulating. Providing good feed and regular pond maintenance will prevent the development of disease in catfish. So of course it will make catfish safe for consumption. It is not true that catfish is said to contain 3000 Cancer Cells. Several issues circulating also discuss that the size of the catfish can detect what food he eats during his life. According to rumors, the large size of the catfish indicates that the catfish is raised with feed from human waste or in a septic tank. However, this issue is questionable. The reason is, there are also catfish that harvest late because they failed to buy a middleman or seller so that their body size continues to grow because it is past the harvest period. What about catfish on the market? In general, all catfish on the market come from catfish farms. The seller must have a relationship with catfish farmers who are able to supply a number of catfish every day continuously with a certain size. This is difficult to do if catfish farming is only done in a natural way, which takes many years until the fish are big. Not only cultivators, the government also continues to monitor fish hatcheries and cultivation, especially catfish. In an interview with detik.com, the Head of the East Java Provincial Fisheries and Marine Service, Heru Tjahjono, explained that his party had tested samples of hormone, antibiotic, and heavy metal residues in catfish farming units in East Java. As a result, no samples containing the three residues were found. So, don't be afraid to eat catfish, okay?
berita_id: Sejak sebulan yang lalu, berita tentang ikan lele yang diduga mengandung 3000 sel kanker tumbuh dengan cepat.Dalam berita yang beredar, diketahui bahwa ikan lele di haikou, provinsi Hainan, Cina dibudidayakan di sebuah kolam dengan sampah berbau yang kuat, dikelilingi oleh kandang babi dan ayam.Lalu, benarkah ikan lele mengandung 3000 sel kanker?Mengetahui seluk beluk ikan lele ada banyak spesies ikan lele di Indonesia.Clarias Batrachus adalah salah satu ras favorit ikan lele yang dibudidayakan.Ada juga lele Afrika (juga dikenal sebagai King Cat Fish, King Catfish, ed.) Yang merupakan hasil jorok dari ikan lele betina dari Taiwan dan laki -laki dari Kenya, Afrika.Namun, tidak diketahui ras F1, F2, atau F3 yang mana yang menghasilkan jenis ikan lele ini.Pernahkah Anda mendengar tentang ikan lele Sangkuriang?Lele Sangkuriang adalah hasil dari rekayasa genetika dari Sukabumi Freshwater Cultivation Center (BBAT) yang berasal dari ikan lele Afrika.Ikan lele hidup di
